   śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ /	SrI gaNADipataye namaH /
   sarasvatyainamaḥ /	sarasvatyA enamaH /
   atha śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇaṃ prārabhyate /	aTa SrI garuxa mahApurANam prAraByate /
   tatrādau karmakāṇḍākhyaḥ pūrvakhaṇḍaḥ prārabhyate /	tatra AdO karmakANxa AKyaH pUrva KaNxaH prAraByate /
   oṃ nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /	om nArAyaNam namaskRtya naram ca eva narottamam /
   devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet // GarP_Mang.1 //	devIm sarasvatIm ca eva tatas jayam udIrayet // GarP_Mang.1 //
   oṃ ajamajaramanantaṃ jñānarūpaṃ mahāntaṃ śivamamalamanādiṃ	om ajam ajaram anantam jQAna rUpam mahAntam Sivam amalam anAdim
   bhūtadehādihīnam /	BUta deha Adi hInam /
   sakalakaraṇahīnaṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ taṃ harimamalamamāyaṃ sarvagaṃ vanda	sakala karaNa hInam sarva BUta sTitam tam harim amalam ama ayam sarvagam vanda
   ekam // GarP_1,1.1 //	ekam // GarP_1,1.1 //
   namasyāmi hariṃ rudraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇādhipam /	namasyAmi harim rudram brahmANam ca gaNADipam /
   devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva manovākkarmabhiḥ sadā // GarP_1,1.2 //	devIm sarasvatIm ca eva manaH vAk karmaBiH sadA // GarP_1,1.2 //
   sūtaṃ paurāṇikaṃ śāntaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam /	sUtam pOrANikam SAntam sarva SAstra viSAradam /
   viṣṇubhaktaṃ mahātmānaṃ naimiśāraṇyamāgatam // GarP_1,1.3 //	vizNu Baktam mahAtmAnam nEmiSa araNyam Agatam // GarP_1,1.3 //
   tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena upaviṣṭaṃ śubhāsane /	tIrTa yAtrA prasaFgena upavizwam SuBa Asane /
   dhyāyantaṃ viṣṇumanaghaṃ tamabhyarcyāstuvankavim // GarP_1,1.4 //	DyAyantam vizNum anaGam tam aByarcya astuvan kavim // GarP_1,1.4 //
   śaunakādyā mahābhāgā naimiṣīyāstapodhanāḥ /	SOnaka AdyAH mahABAgAH nEmizIyAH tapoDanAH /
   munayo ravisaṅkāśāḥ śāntā yajña parāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,1.5 //	munayaH ravi saFkASAH SAntAH yajQa parAyaNAH // GarP_1,1.5 //
   ṛṣaya ūcuḥ /	RzayaH UcuH /
   sūta ! jānāsi sarvaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchāmastvāmato vayam /	sUta ! jAnAsi sarvam tvam pRcCAmaH tvAm atas vayam /
   devatānāṃ hi ko deva īśvaraḥ pūjya eva kaḥ // GarP_1,1.6 //	devatAnAm hi kaH devaH ISvaraH pUjyaH eva kaH // GarP_1,1.6 //
   ko dhyeyaḥ ko jagatsraṣṭā jagatpātti ca hanti kaḥ /	kaH DyeyaH kaH jagatsrazwA jagatpAtti ca hanti kaH /
   kasmātpravartate dharmo duṣṭahantā ca kaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,1.7 //	kasmAt pravartate DarmaH duzwa hantA ca kaH smRtaH // GarP_1,1.7 //
   tasya devasya kiṃ rūpaṃ jagatsargaḥ kathaṃ mataḥ /	tasya devasya kim rUpam jagat sargaH kaTam mataH /
   kairvrataiḥ sa tu tuṣṭaḥ syātkena yogena vāpyate // GarP_1,1.8 //	kEH vratEH sa tu tuzwaH syAt kena yogena vA Apyate // GarP_1,1.8 //
   avatārāśca ke tasya kathaṃ vaṃśādisambhavaḥ /	avatArAH ca ke tasya kaTam vaMSa Adi samBavaH /
   varṇāśramādidharmāṇāṃ kaḥ pātā kaḥ pravartakaḥ // GarP_1,1.9 //	varNa ASrama Adi DarmANAm kaH pAtA kaH pravartakaH // GarP_1,1.9 //
   etatsarvaṃ tathānyacca brūhi sūta ! mahāmate ! /	etat sarvam taTA anyat ca brUhi sUta ! mahAmate ! /
   nārāyaṇakathāḥ sarvāḥ kathayāsmākamuttamāḥ // GarP_1,1.10 //	nArAyaNa kaTAH sarvAH kaTaya asmAkam uttamAH // GarP_1,1.10 //
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vakṣye sāraṃ viṣṇukathā śrayam /	purANam gAruxam vakzye sAram vizNu kaTA Srayam /
   garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya purā vyāsācchrutaṃ mayā // GarP_1,1.11 //	garuxa uktam kaSyapAya purA vyAsAt Srutam mayA // GarP_1,1.11 //
   eko nārāyaṇo devo devānāmīśvareśvaraḥ /	ekaH nArAyaNaH devaH devAnAm ISvara ISvaraH /
   paramātmā paraṃ brahma janmādyasya yato bhavet // GarP_1,1.12 //	paramAtmA param brahma janma Adyasya yatas Bavet // GarP_1,1.12 //
   jagato rakṣaṇārthāya vāsudevo 'jaro 'maraḥ /	jagataH rakzaNa arTAya vAsudevaH ajaraH amaraH /
   sa kumārādirūpeṇa avatārānkarotyajaḥ // GarP_1,1.13 //	sa kumAra Adi rUpeNa avatArAn karoti ajaH // GarP_1,1.13 //
   hariḥ sa prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargamāsthitaḥ /	hariH sa praTamam devaH kOmAram sargam AsTitaH /
   cacāra duścaraṃ brahman brahmacaryamakhaṇḍitam // GarP_1,1.14 //	cacAra duScaram brahman brahmacaryam aKaNxitam // GarP_1,1.14 //
   dvitīyaṃ tu bhavāyāsya rasātalagatāṃ mahīm /	dvitIyam tu BavAya asya rasAtala gatAm mahIm /
   uddhariṣyannupādatte yajñeśaḥ saukaraṃ vapuḥ // GarP_1,1.15 //	udDarizyan= upAdatte yajQeSaH sOkaram vapuH // GarP_1,1.15 //
   tṛtīyamṛṣisargaṃ tu devarṣitvamupetya saḥ /	tRtIyam Rzi sargam tu devarzi tvam upetya saH /
   tantraṃ sātvatamācaṣṭe naiṣkarmyaṃ karmaṇāṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,1.16 //	tantram sAtvatam Acazwe nEzkarmyam karmaNAm yatas // GarP_1,1.16 //
   naranārāyaṇo bhūtvā turye tepe tapo hariḥ /	nara nArAyaNaH BUtvA turye tepe tapaH hariH /
   dharmasaṃ rakṣaṇārthāya pūjitaḥ sa surāsuraiḥ // GarP_1,1.17 //	Darmasam rakzaNa arTAya pUjitaH sa sura asurEH // GarP_1,1.17 //
   pañcamaḥ kapilo nāma siddheśaḥ kālaviplutam /	paQcamaH kapilaH nAma sidDa ISaH kAla viplutam /
   provāca sūraye sāṅkhyaṃ tattvagrāmavi nirṇayam // GarP_1,1.18 //	provAca sUraye sAFKyam tattva grAmavi nirNayam // GarP_1,1.18 //
   ṣaṣṭhamatrerapatyatvaṃ dattaḥ prāpto 'nasūyayā /	zazWam atreH apatya tvam dattaH prAptaH anasUyayA /
   ānvīkṣikīmalarkāya prahlādādibhya ūcivān // GarP_1,1.19 //	AnvIkzikIm alarkAya prahlAda AdiByaH UcivAn // GarP_1,1.19 //
   tataḥ sapta ākūtyāṃ ruceryajño 'bhyajāyata /	tatas sapta AkUtyAm ruceH yajQaH aByajAyata /
   sutrāmādyaiḥ suragaṇairyaṣṭvā svāyambhuvāntare // GarP_1,1.20 //	sutrAma AdyEH sura gaNEH yazwvA svAyamBuva antare // GarP_1,1.20 //
   aṣṭame merudevyāṃ tu nābherjāta urukramaḥ /	azwame merudevyAm tu nABeH jAtaH urukramaH /
   darśayanvartma nārīṇāṃ sarvāśramanamaskṛtam // GarP_1,1.21 //	darSayan vartma nArINAm sarva ASrama namaskRtam // GarP_1,1.21 //
   ṛṣibhiryācito bheje navamaṃ pārthivaṃ vapuḥ /	RziBiH yAcitaH Beje navamam pArTivam vapuH /
   dugdhairmahauṣadhairviprāstena saṃjīvitāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,1.22 //	dugDEH mahOzaDEH viprAH tena saMjIvitAH prajAH // GarP_1,1.22 //
   rūpaṃ sa jagṛhe mātsyaṃ cākṣuṣāntarasaṃplave /	rUpam sa jagRhe mAtsyam cAkzuza antara saMplave /
   nāvyāropya mahīmayyāmapādvaivasvataṃ manum // GarP_1,1.23 //	nAvi Aropya mahImayyAm apAt vEvasvatam manum // GarP_1,1.23 //
   surāsurāṇāmudadhiṃ mathnatāṃ mandarācalam /	sura asurANAm udaDim maTnatAm mandara acalam /
   dadhre kamaṭharūpeṇa pṛṣṭha ekādaśe vibhuḥ // GarP_1,1.24 //	daDre kamaWa rUpeNa pRzWe ekAdaSe viBuH // GarP_1,1.24 //
   dhānvantaraṃ dvādaśamaṃ trayodaśamameva ca /	DAnvantaram dvAdaSamam trayodaSamam eva ca /
   āpyāyatsurānanyānmohinyā mohayaṃstriyā // GarP_1,1.25 //	ApyAyat surAn anyAn mohinyA mohayaM= triyAH // GarP_1,1.25 //
   caturdaśaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ caitya (vaira) daityendramūrjitam /	caturdaSam nArasiMham ca etya (vEra) dEtya indram Urjitam /
   dadāra karajairugrairerakāṃ kaṭakudyathā // GarP_1,1.26 //	dadAra karajEH ugrEH erakAm kawa kudyaTA // GarP_1,1.26 //
   pañcadaśaṃ vāmanako bhūtvāgādadhvaraṃ baleḥ /	paQcadaSam vAmanakaH BUtvA AgAt aDvaram baleH /
   pāda trayaṃ yācamānaḥ pratyāditsustriviṣṭapam // GarP_1,1.27 //	pAda trayam yAcamAnaH pratyAditsuH trivizwapam // GarP_1,1.27 //
   avatāre ṣoḍaśame paśyanbrahmadruho nṛpān /	avatAre zoxaSame paSyan brahma druhaH nRpAn /
   triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ kupito niḥ kṣattrāmakaronmahīm // GarP_1,1.28 //	tris sapta kRtvas kupitaH niH kzattrAm akarot mahIm // GarP_1,1.28 //
   tataḥ saptadaśe jātaḥ satyavatyāṃ parāśarāt /	tatas saptadaSe jAtaH satyavatyAm parASarAt /
   cakre vedataroḥ śākhāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ // GarP_1,1.29 //	cakre veda taroH SAKAm dRzwvA puMsaH alpa meDasaH // GarP_1,1.29 //
   naradevatvamāpannaḥ surakāryacikīrṣayā /	naradeva tvam ApannaH sura kArya cikIrzayA /
   samudranigrahādīni cakre kāryāṇyataḥ param // GarP_1,1.30 //	samudra nigraha AdIni cakre kAryANi atas param // GarP_1,1.30 //
   ekonaviṃśe viṃśatime vṛṣṇiṣu prāpya janmanī /	ekonaviMSe viMSatime vRzNizu prApya janmanI /
   rāmakṛṣṇāviti bhuvo bhagavānaharadbharam // GarP_1,1.31 //	rAma kRzNO= iti BuvaH BagavAn aharat Baram // GarP_1,1.31 //
   tataḥ kalestu sandhyānte saṃmohāya suradviṣām /	tatas kaleH tu sanDyA ante saMmohAya sura dvizAm /
   buddho nāmrā jinasutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,1.32 //	budDaH nAmrAH jinasutaH kIkawezu Bavizyati // GarP_1,1.32 //
   atha so 'ṣṭamasandhyāyāṃ naṣṭaprāyeṣu rāñjasu /	aTa saH azwama sanDyAyAm nazwa prAyezu rAQjasu /
   bhavitā viṣṇuyaśaso nāmnā kalkī jagatpatiḥ // GarP_1,1.33 //	BavitA vizNuyaSasaH nAmnA kalkI jagatpatiH // GarP_1,1.33 //
   avatārā hyasaṃkhyeyā hareḥ sattvanidherdvijāḥ /	avatArAH hi asaMKyeyAH hareH sattva niDeH dvijAH /
   manuvedavido hyādyāḥ sarve viṣṇukalāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,1.34 //	manu veda vidaH hi AdyAH sarve vizNu kalAH smRtAH // GarP_1,1.34 //
   tasmātsargādayo jātāḥ saṃpūjyāśca vratādinā /	tasmAt sarga AdayaH jAtAH saMpUjyAH ca vrata AdinA /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye karmakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye karma kANxe
   etatpurāṇapravṛttihetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ	etatpurANapravRttihetunirUpaNam nAma praTamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  2	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 2
   ṛṣaya ūcuḥ /	RzayaH UcuH /
   kathaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /	kaTam vyAsena kaTitam purANam gAruxam tava /
   etatsarvaṃ samākhyāhi paraṃ viṣṇukathāśrayam // GarP_1,2.1 //	etat sarvam samAKyAhi param vizNu kaTA ASrayam // GarP_1,2.1 //
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   ahaṃ hi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato badarikāśramam /	aham hi muniBiH sArDam gataH badarikASramam /
   tatra dṛṣṭo mayā vyāso dhyāyamānaḥ pareśvaram // GarP_1,2.2 //	tatra dRzwaH mayA vyAsaH DyAyamAnaH para ISvaram // GarP_1,2.2 //
   taṃ praṇamyopaviṣṭo 'haṃ pṛṣṭavānhi munīśvaram /	tam praNamya upavizwaH aham pRzwavAn hi muni ISvaram /
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   vyāsa brūhi hare rūpaṃ jagatsargādikaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,2.3 //	vyAsa brUhi hare rUpam jagat sarga Adikam tatas // GarP_1,2.3 //
   manye dhyāyasi taṃ yasmāttasmājjānāsi taṃ vibhum /	manye DyAyasi tam yasmAt tasmAt jAnAsi tam viBum /
   evaṃ pṛṣṭo yathā prāha tathā viprā?nibodhata // GarP_1,2.4 //	evam pRzwaH yaTA prAha taTA viprA? niboData // GarP_1,2.4 //
   vyāsa uvāca /	vyAsaH uvAca /
   śṛṇu sūta ! pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /	SRNu sUta ! pravakzyAmi purANam gAruxam tava /
   saha nāradadakṣādyairbrahmā māmuktavānyathā // GarP_1,2.5 //	saha nArada dakza AdyEH brahmA mAm uktavAn yaTA // GarP_1,2.5 //
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   dakṣanāradamukhyaistu yuktaṃ tvāṃ kathamuktavān /	dakza nArada muKyEH tu yuktam tvAm kaTam uktavAn /
   brahmā śrīgāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ sāravācakam // GarP_1,2.6 //	brahmA SrI gAruxam puNyam purANam sAra vAcakam // GarP_1,2.6 //
   vyāsa uvāca /	vyAsaH uvAca /
   ahaṃ hi nārado dakṣo bhṛgvādyāḥ praṇipatya tam /	aham hi nAradaH dakzaH BRgu AdyAH praNipatya tam /
   sāraṃ brūhīti papracchurbrahmāṇaṃ brahmalokagam // GarP_1,2.7 //	sAram brUhi iti papracCuH brahmANam brahma loka gam // GarP_1,2.7 //
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ rudraṃ ca māṃ yathā /	purANam gAruxam sAram rudram ca mAm yaTA /
   suraiḥ sahābravīdviṣṇustathāhaṃ vyāsa vacmite // GarP_1,2.8 //	surEH saha abravIt vizNuH taTA aham vyAsa vacmite // GarP_1,2.8 //
   vyāsa uvāca /	vyAsaH uvAca /
   kathaṃ rudraṃ suraiḥ sārdhamabravīdvai hariḥ purā /	kaTam rudram surEH sArDam abravIt vE hariH purA /
   purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ brūhi brahmanmahārthakam // GarP_1,2.9 //	purANam gAruxam sAram brUhi brahman mahA arTakam // GarP_1,2.9 //
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   ahaṃ gato 'driṃ kailāsamindrādyairdaivataiḥ saha /	aham gataH adrim kElAsam indra AdyEH dEvatEH saha /
   tatra dṛṣṭo mayā rudro dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ padam // GarP_1,2.10 //	tatra dRzwaH mayA rudraH DyAyamAnaH param padam // GarP_1,2.10 //
   pṛṣṭo namaskṛtaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ devaṃ dhyāyasi śaṅkara? /	pRzwaH namaskRtaH kim tvam devam DyAyasi SaFkara? /
   tvatto nānyaṃ paraṃ devaṃ jānāmi brūhi māṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,2.11 //	tvattaH na anyam param devam jAnAmi brUhi mAm tatas // GarP_1,2.11 //
   sārātsārataraṃ tattvaṃ śrotukāmaḥ suraiḥ saha /	sArAt sArataram tattvam Srotu kAmaH surEH saha /
   rudrauvāca /	rudra OvAca /
   ahaṃ dhyāyāmi taṃ viṣṇuṃ paramātmānamīśvaram // GarP_1,2.12 //	aham DyAyAmi tam vizNum paramAtmAnam ISvaram // GarP_1,2.12 //
   sarvadaṃ sarvagaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaprāṇihṛdisthitam /	sarva dam sarvagam sarvam sarva prANi hRdisTitam /
   bhasmoddhūlitadehastu jaṭāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,2.13 //	Basma udDUlita dehaH tu jawA maNxala maNxitaH // GarP_1,2.13 //
   viṣṇorārādhanārthaṃ me vratacaryā pitāmaha /	vizNoH ArADana arTam me vrata caryA pitAmaha /
   tameva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāraṃ yaṃ cintayāmyaham // GarP_1,2.14 //	tam eva gatvA pRcCAmaH sAram yam cintayAmi aham // GarP_1,2.14 //
   viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ padmanābhaṃ hariṃ dehavivarjitam /	vizNum jizNum padmanABam harim deha vivarjitam /
   śuciṃ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatpadaṃ parameśvaram // GarP_1,2.15 //	Sucim Sucizadam haMsam tat padam parameSvaram // GarP_1,2.15 //
   yuktā sarvātmanātmānaṃ taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	yuktA sarva AtmanA AtmAnam tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   yasminviśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca // GarP_1,2.16 //	yasmin viSvAni BUtAni tizWanti ca viSanti ca // GarP_1,2.16 //
   guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe sūtre maṇigaṇā iva /	guNa BUtAni BUteSe sUtre maNi gaNAH iva /
   sahasrākṣaṃ sahasrāṅghriṃ sahasroruṃ varānanam // GarP_1,2.17 //	sahasrAkzam sahasrAFGrim sahasra Urum varAnanam // GarP_1,2.17 //
   aṇīyasāmaṇīyāṃsaṃ sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām /	aNIyasAm aNIyAMsam sTavizWam ca sTavIyasAm /
   garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasāmapi // GarP_1,2.18 //	garIyasAm garizWam ca SrezWam ca SreyasAm api // GarP_1,2.18 //
   yaṃ vākyeṣvanuvākyeṣu niṣatsūpaniṣatsu ca /	yam vAkyezu anuvAkyezu nizad su upanizatsu ca /
   gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu // GarP_1,2.19 //	gRNanti satya karmANam satyam satyezu sAmasu // GarP_1,2.19 //
   purāṇa puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto dvijātiṣu /	purANa puruzaH proktaH brahmA proktaH dvijAtizu /
   kṣaye saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktastamupāsyamupāsmahe // GarP_1,2.20 //	kzaye saFkarzaNaH proktaH tam upAsyam upAsmahe // GarP_1,2.20 //
   yasmiṃllokāḥ sphurantīme jale śakunayo yathā /	yasmin= lokAH sPuranti ime jale SakunayaH yaTA /
   ṛtamekākṣaraṃ brahma yattatsadasataḥ param // GarP_1,2.21 //	Rtam eka akzaram brahma yat tat sat asataH param // GarP_1,2.21 //
   arcayanti ca yaṃ devā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ /	arcayanti ca yam devAH yakza rAkzasa pannagAH /
   yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ // GarP_1,2.22 //	yasya agniH Asyam dyOH mUrDA Kam nABiH caraNO kzitiH // GarP_1,2.22 //
   candrādityau ca nayane taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	candra AdityO ca nayane tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   yasya trilokī jaṭhare masya kāṣṭhāśca bāhavaḥ // GarP_1,2.23 //	yasya trilokI jaWare masya kAzWAH ca bAhavaH // GarP_1,2.23 //
   yasyocchvāsaśca pavanaḥ taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	yasya ucCvAsaH ca pavanaH tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasandhiṣu // GarP_1,2.24 //	yasya keSezu jImUtAH nadyaH sarva aFga sanDizu // GarP_1,2.24 //
   kukṣau samudrāścatvārastaṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	kukzO samudrAH catvAraH tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   paraḥ kālātparo yajñātparaḥ sadasataścayaḥ // GarP_1,2.25 //	paraH kAlAt paraH yajQAt paraH sat asataH cayaH // GarP_1,2.25 //
   anādirādi rviśvasya taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	anAdiH Adi rviSvasya tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   manasaścandramā yasya cakṣuṣośca divākaraḥ // GarP_1,2.26 //	manasaH candramAH yasya cakzuzoH ca divAkaraH // GarP_1,2.26 //
   mukhādagniśca saṃjajñe taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	muKAt agniH ca saMjajQe tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   padybhāṃ yasya kṣitirjātā śrotrābhyāṃ ca tathā diśaḥ // GarP_1,2.27 //	padi BAm yasya kzitiH jAtA SrotrAByAm ca taTA diSaH // GarP_1,2.27 //
   mūrdhabhāgāddivaṃ yasya taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	mUrDa BAgAt divam yasya tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca // GarP_1,2.28 //	sargaH ca pratisargaH ca vaMSaH manvantarANi ca // GarP_1,2.28 //
   vaṃśānucaritaṃ yasmāttaṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /	vaMSAnucaritam yasmAt tam devam cintayAmi aham /
   yaṃ dhyāyāmyahametasmādūjāmaḥ sāramīkṣitum // GarP_1,2.29 //	yam DyAyAmi aham etasmAt UjAmaH sAram Ikzitum // GarP_1,2.29 //
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   ityukto 'haṃ purā rudraḥ śvetadvīpanivāsinam /	iti uktaH aham purA rudraH SvetadvIpa nivAsinam /
   stutvā praṇamya taṃ viṣṇuṃ śrotukāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.30 //	stutvA praNamya tam vizNum Srotu kAma sTitaH surEH // GarP_1,2.30 //
   asmākaṃ madhyato rudra uvāca parameśvaram /	asmAkam maDyatas rudraH uvAca parameSvaram /
   sārāntsārataraṃ viṣṇuṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstaṃ praṇamya vai // GarP_1,2.31 //	sArAntsArataram vizNum pRzwavAn= tam praNamya vE // GarP_1,2.31 //
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   yathā papraccha māṃ vyāsa stathāsau bhagavān bhavaḥ /	yaTA papracCa mAm vyAsa staTA asO BagavAn BavaH /
   papraccha viṣṇuṃ devādyaiḥ śṛṇvatāmamaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.32 //	papracCa vizNum deva AdyEH SRNvatAm amarEH saha // GarP_1,2.32 //
   rudra uvāca /	rudraH uvAca /
   hare kathaya deveśa ! devadevaḥ ka īśvaraḥ /	hare kaTaya deveSa ! devadevaH kaH ISvaraH /
   ko dhyeyaḥ kaśca vai pūjyaḥ kairvratai stuṣyate paraḥ // GarP_1,2.33 //	kaH DyeyaH kaH ca vE pUjyaH kEH vratE stuzyate paraH // GarP_1,2.33 //
   kairdharmaiḥ kaiśca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharmapūjayā /	kEH DarmEH kEH ca niyamEH kayA vA Darma pUjayA /
   kenācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syātkiṃ tadrūpaṃ ca tasya vai // GarP_1,2.34 //	kena AcAreNa tuzwaH syAt kim tad rUpam ca tasya vE // GarP_1,2.34 //
   kasmāddevājjagajjātaṃ jagatpālayate cakaḥ /	kasmAt devAt jagat jAtam jagatpAlayate cakaH /
   kīdṛśairavatāraiśca kasminyāti layaṃ jagat // GarP_1,2.35 //	kIdRSEH avatArEH ca kasmin yAti layam jagat // GarP_1,2.35 //
   sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca /	sargaH ca pratisargaH ca vaMSaH manvantarANi ca /
   kasmāddevātpravartante kasmimannetatpratiṣṭhitam // GarP_1,2.36 //	kasmAt devAt pravartante kasmim an= etat pratizWitam // GarP_1,2.36 //
   etatsarvaṃ hare ! brūhi yaccānyadapi kiñcana /	etat sarvam hare ! brUhi yat ca anyat api kiQcana /
   parameśvaramāhātmyaṃ yuktayogādikaṃ tathā // GarP_1,2.37 //	parameSvara mAhAtmyam yukta yoga Adikam taTA // GarP_1,2.37 //
   tathāṣṭādaśa vidyāśca harī rudraṃ tato 'bravīt /	taTA azwAdaSa vidyAH ca hariH rudram tatas abravIt /
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   śṛṇu rudra ! pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.38 //	SRNu rudraH ! pravakzyAmi brahmaNA ca surEH saha // GarP_1,2.38 //
   ahaṃ hi devo devānāṃ sarvalokeśvareśvaraḥ /	aham hi devaH devAnAm sarva loka ISvara ISvaraH /
   ahaṃ dhyeyaśca pūjyaśca stutyohaṃ statibhiḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.39 //	aham DyeyaH ca pUjyaH ca stutyoham statiBiH surEH // GarP_1,2.39 //
   ahaṃ hi pūjito rudra ! dadāmi paramāṃ gatim /	aham hi pUjitaH rudraH ! dadAmi paramAm gatim /
   niyamaiśca vrataistuṣṭa ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ // GarP_1,2.40 //	niyamEH ca vratEH tuzwaH AcAreNa ca mAnavEH // GarP_1,2.40 //
   jagatsthiterahaṃ bījaṃ jagatkartā tvahaṃ śiva ! /	jagat sTiteH aham bIjam jagatkartA tu aham SivaH ! /
   duṣṭanigrahakartā hi dharmagoptā tvahaṃ hara ! // GarP_1,2.41 //	duzwa nigraha kartA hi Darma goptA tu aham hara ! // GarP_1,2.41 //
   avatāraiśca matsyādyaiḥ pālayāmyakhilaṃ jagat /	avatArEH ca matsya AdyEH pAlayAmi aKilam jagat /
   ahaṃ mantrāśca mantrārthaḥ pūjādhyānaparo hyaham // GarP_1,2.42 //	aham mantrAH ca mantra arTaH pUjA DyAna paraH hi aham // GarP_1,2.42 //
   svargādīnāṃ ca kartāhaṃ svargādīnyahameva ca /	svarga AdInAm ca kartA aham svarga AdIni aham eva ca /
   yogī yogohamevādyaḥ purāṇānyahamevaca // GarP_1,2.43 //	yogI yoga Uham eva AdyaH purANAni aham eva ca // GarP_1,2.43 //
   jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyameva ca /	jQAtA SrotA taTA mantA vaktA vaktavyam eva ca /
   sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,2.44 //	sarvaH sarva AtmakaH devaH Bukti mukti karaH paraH // GarP_1,2.44 //
   dhyānaṃ pūjopahāro 'haṃ maṇḍalānyahameva ca /	DyAnam pUjA upahAraH aham maNxalAni aham eva ca /
   itihāsānyahaṃ rudra ! sarvavedā hyahaṃ śiva ! // GarP_1,2.45 //	itihAsAni aham rudraH ! sarva vedAH hi aham Siva ! // GarP_1,2.45 //
   sarvajñānānyahaṃ śambho ! brahmātmāhamahaṃ śiva ! /	sarva jQAnAni aham SamBo ! brahma AtmA aham aham Siva ! /
   ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham // GarP_1,2.46 //	aham brahmA sarva lokaH sarva deva AtmakaH hi aham // GarP_1,2.46 //
   ahaṃ sākṣātsadācāro dharmo 'haṃ vaiṣṇavo hyaham /	aham sAkzAt sat AcAraH DarmaH aham vEzNavaH hi aham /
   varṇāśramāstathā cāhaṃ taddharmo 'haṃ purātanaḥ // GarP_1,2.47 //	varNa ASramAH taTA ca aham tad DarmaH aham purAtanaH // GarP_1,2.47 //
   yamo 'haṃ niyamo rudra ! vratāni vividhāni ca /	yamaH aham niyamaH rudraH ! vratAni viviDAni ca /
   ahaṃ sūryastathā candro maṅgalādīnyahaṃ tathā // GarP_1,2.48 //	aham sUryaH taTA candraH maFgala AdIni aham taTA // GarP_1,2.48 //
   purā māṃ garuḍaḥ pakṣī tapasārādhayadbhuvi /	purA mAm garuxaH pakzI tapasA ArADayat Buvi /
   tuṣṭa ūce varaṃ brūhi matto vavre varaṃ sa tu // GarP_1,2.49 //	tuzwaH Uce varam brUhi mattaH vavre varam sa tu // GarP_1,2.49 //
   garuḍa uvāca /	garuxaH uvAca /
   mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare /	mama mAtA ca vinatA nAgEH dAsIkRtA hare /
   yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat // GarP_1,2.50 //	yaTA aham deva tAn jitvA ca amRtam hi AnayAmi tat // GarP_1,2.50 //
   dāsyādvimokṣayiṣyāmi yathāhaṃ vāhanastava /	dAsyAt vimokzayizyAmi yaTA aham vAhanaH tava /
   mahābalo mahāvīryaḥ sarvajño nāgadāraṇaḥ // GarP_1,2.51 //	mahA balaH mahA vIryaH sarvajQaH nAga dAraNaH // GarP_1,2.51 //
   purāṇasaṃhitākartā yathāhaṃ syāṃ tathā kuruṃ /	purANa saMhitA kartA yaTA aham syAm taTA kurum /
   viṣṇuruvāca /	vizNuH uvAca /
   yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,2.52 //	yaTA tvayA uktam garuxa taTA sarvam Bavizyati // GarP_1,2.52 //
   nāgadāsyānmātaraṃ tvaṃ vinatāṃ mokṣayiṣyasi /	nAgadAsyAt mAtaram tvam vinatAm mokzayizyasi /
   devādīnsakalāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayiṣyasi // GarP_1,2.53 //	deva AdIn sakalAn jitvA ca amRtam hi Anayizyasi // GarP_1,2.53 //
   mahābalo vāhanastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi viṣārdanaḥ /	mahA balaH vAhanaH tvam Bavizyasi viza ardanaH /
   purāṇaṃ matprasādācca mama māhātmyavācakam // GarP_1,2.54 //	purANam mad prasAdAt ca mama mAhAtmya vAcakam // GarP_1,2.54 //
   yaduktaṃ matsvarūpaṃ ca tava cāvirbhaviṣyati /	yat uktam mad svarUpam ca tava ca AvirBavizyati /
   gāruḍaṃ tava nāmnā talloke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,2.55 //	gAruxam tava nAmnA tat loke KyAtim gamizyati // GarP_1,2.55 //
   yathāhaṃ devadevānāṃ śrīḥ khyāto vinatāsuta /	yaTA aham deva devAnAm SrIH KyAtaH vinatA sutaH /
   tathā khyātiṃ purāṇeṣu gāruḍaṃ gāruḍaiṣyati // GarP_1,2.56 //	taTA KyAtim purANezu gAruxam gAruxa ezyati // GarP_1,2.56 //
   yathāhaṃ kīrtanīyo 'tha tathā tvaṃ garuḍātmanā /	yaTA aham kIrtanIyaH aTa taTA tvam garuxa AtmanA /
   māṃ dhyātvā pakṣimukhyedaṃ purāṇaṃ gada gāruḍam // GarP_1,2.57 //	mAm DyAtvA pakzi muKya idam purANam gada gAruxam // GarP_1,2.57 //
   ityukto garuḍo rudra ! kaśyapāyāha pṛcchate /	iti uktaH garuxaH rudraH ! kaSyapAya Aha pRcCate /
   kaśyapo gāruḍaṃ śrutvā vṛkṣaṃ dagdhamajīvayat // GarP_1,2.58 //	kaSyapaH gAruxam SrutvA vRkzam dagDam ajIvayat // GarP_1,2.58 //
   svayaṃ cānyamanā bhūtvā vidyayānyānya jīvayat /	svayam ca anya manAH BUtvA vidyayA anyAnya jIvayat /
   yakṣi oṃuṃsvāhājāpī vidyayaṃ gāruḍī parā /	yakzi oMuMsvAhA jApI vidyayam gAruxI parA /
   garuḍoktaṃ gāruḍaṃ hi śṛṇu rudra ! madātmakam // GarP_1,2.59 //	garuxa uktam gAruxam hi SRNu rudra ! mad Atmakam // GarP_1,2.59 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ	SrIgaruxamahApurANotpattinirUpaNam nAma dvitIyaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  3	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 3
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ /	iti rudra abja jaH vizNoH SuSrAva brahmaNaH muniH /
   vyāso vyāsādahaṃ vakṣyehaṃ te śaunaka naimiṣe // GarP_1,3.1 //	vyAsaH vyAsAt aham vakzya Iham te SOnaka nEmize // GarP_1,3.1 //
   munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ madhye sargādyaṃ devapūjanam /	munInAm SRNvatAm maDye sarga Adyam deva pUjanam /
   tīrthaṃ bhuvanakośaṃ ca manvantaramihocyate // GarP_1,3.2 //	tIrTam Buvana koSam ca manvantaram iha ucyate // GarP_1,3.2 //
   varṇāśramādidharmāśca dānarājādidharmakāḥ /	varNa ASrama Adi DarmAH ca dAna rAja Adi DarmakAH /
   vyavahāro vrataṃ vaṃśā vaidyakaṃ sanidānakam // GarP_1,3.3 //	vyavahAraH vratam vaMSAH vEdyakam sa nidAnakam // GarP_1,3.3 //
   aṅgāni pralayo dharmakāmārthajñānamuttamam /	aFgAni pralayaH Darma kAma arTa jQAnam uttamam /
   saprapañcaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ kṛtaṃ viṣṇornigadyate // GarP_1,3.4 //	sa prapaQcam nizprapaQcam kRtam vizNoH nigadyate // GarP_1,3.4 //
   purāṇe gāruḍe sarvaṃ garuḍo bhagavānatha /	purANe gAruxe sarvam garuxaH BagavAn aTa /
   vāsudevaprasādena sāmarthyātiśayairyutaḥ // GarP_1,3.5 //	vAsudeva prasAdena sAmarTya atiSayEH yutaH // GarP_1,3.5 //
   bhutvā harervāhanaṃ ca sargādīnāṃ ca kāraṇam /	ButvA hareH vAhanam ca sarga AdInAm ca kAraNam /
   devānvijitya garuḍo hyamṛtāharaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_1,3.6 //	devAn vijitya garuxaH hi amRta AharaNam taTA // GarP_1,3.6 //
   cakre kṣudhā hṛtaṃ yasya brahmāṇḍamudare hareḥ /	cakre kzuDA hRtam yasya brahmANxam udare hareH /
   yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_1,3.7 //	yam dRzwvA smRta mAtreNa nAgAn dInAm ca saMkzayaH // GarP_1,3.7 //
   kaśyapo gāruḍādvṛkṣaṃ dagdhaṃ cājīvayadyataḥ /	kaSyapaH gAruxAt vRkzam dagDam ca ajIvayat yatas /
   garuḍaḥ sa haristena proktaṃ śrīkaśyapāya ca // GarP_1,3.8 //	garuxaH sa hariH tena proktam SrI kaSyapAya ca // GarP_1,3.8 //
   tacchrīmadrāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvadaṃ paṭhatastava /	tat SrImadrAruxam puNyam sarva dam paWataH tava /
   vakṣye vyāsaṃ namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tadyathā // GarP_1,3.9 //	vakzye vyAsam namaskRtya SRNu SOnaka tat yaTA // GarP_1,3.9 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ	vizayanirUpaNam nAma tRtIyaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  4	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 4
   rudra uvāca /	rudraH uvAca /
   sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca /	sargaH ca pratisargaH ca vaMSaH manvantarANi ca /
   vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana // GarP_1,4.1 //	vaMSAnucaritam ca eva etat brUhi janArdana // GarP_1,4.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   śṛṇu rudra pravakṣyāmi sargādīnpāpanāśanām /	SRNu rudra pravakzyAmi sarga AdIn pApa nASanAm /
   sargasthitilayāntāṃ tāṃ viṣṇoḥ krīḍāṃ purātanīm // GarP_1,4.2 //	sarga sTiti laya antAm tAm vizNoH krIxAm purAtanIm // GarP_1,4.2 //
   naranārāyaṇo devo vāsudevo nirañjanaḥ /	nara nArAyaNaH devaH vAsudevaH niraQjanaH /
   paramātmā paraṃ brahma jagajjanilayādikṛt // GarP_1,4.3 //	paramAtmA param brahma jagat jani laya Adi kRt // GarP_1,4.3 //
   tadetatsarvamevaitavdyaktāvyaktasvarūpavat /	tat etat sarvam eva etavdyakta avyakta svarUpa vat /
   tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa ca sthitam // GarP_1,4.4 //	taTA puruza rUpeNa kAla rUpeNa ca sTitam // GarP_1,4.4 //
   vyaktaṃ viṣṇustathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /	vyaktam vizNuH taTA avyaktam puruzaH kAlaH eva ca /
   krīḍato bālakasyeva ceṣṭāstasya niśāmaya // GarP_1,4.5 //	krIxataH bAlakasya iva cezwAH tasya niSAmayaH // GarP_1,4.5 //
   anādinidhano dhātā tvanantaḥ puruṣottamaḥ /	anAdi niDanaH DAtA tu anantaH puruzottamaH /
   tasmādbhavati cāvyaktaṃ tasmādātmāpi jāyate // GarP_1,4.6 //	tasmAt Bavati ca avyaktam tasmAt AtmA api jAyate // GarP_1,4.6 //
   tasmāhuddhirmanastasmāttataḥ khaṃ pavana stataḥ /	tasmAhudDiH manaH tasmAt tatas Kam pavana stataH /
   tasmāttejastatastvāpastato bhūmistato 'bhavat // GarP_1,4.7 //	tasmAt tejaH tatas tu ApaH tatas BUmiH tatas aBavat // GarP_1,4.7 //
   aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi /	aNxaH hiraNmayaH rudra tasya antar svayam eva hi /
   śarīragrahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyarthaṃ kurute prabhuḥ // GarP_1,4.8 //	SarIra grahaNam pUrvam sRzwi arTam kurute praBuH // GarP_1,4.8 //
   brahmā caturmukho bhūtvā rajomātrādhikaḥ sadā /	brahmA caturmuKaH BUtvA rajaH mAtra aDikaH sadA /
   śarīragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvāsṛjadetaccarācaram // GarP_1,4.9 //	SarIra grahaNam kRtvA asRjat etat carAcaram // GarP_1,4.9 //
   aṇḍasyāntarjagatsarvaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam /	aNxasya antar jagat sarvam sa deva asura mAnuzam /
   sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca // GarP_1,4.10 //	srazwA sRjati ca AtmAnam vizNuH pAlyam ca pAti ca // GarP_1,4.10 //
   apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara /	apasaMhriyate ca ante saMhartA ca svayam hara /
   brahmā bhūtvāsṛjadviṣṇurjagatpāti hariḥ svayam // GarP_1,4.11 //	brahmA BUtvA asRjat vizNuH jagat pAti hariH svayam // GarP_1,4.11 //
   rudrarūpī ca kalpānte jagatsaṃharate 'khilam /	rudra rUpI ca kalpa ante jagat saMharate aKilam /
   brahmā tu sṛṣṭikāle 'smiñjamadhyagatāṃ mahīm // GarP_1,4.12 //	brahmA tu sRzwi kAle asmin ja maDya gatAm mahIm // GarP_1,4.12 //
   daṃṣṭūyoddharati jñātvā vārahīmāsthitastanūm /	daMzwUya udDarati jQAtvA vAra hIm AsTitaH tanUm /
   devādisargānvakṣye 'haṃ saṃkṣepācchṛṇu śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,4.13 //	deva Adi sargAn vakzye aham saMkzepAt SRNu SaFkara ! // GarP_1,4.13 //
   (1)prathamo mahataḥ sargo virūpo brahmaṇastu saḥ /	(1)praTamaH mahataH sargaH virUpaH brahmaNaH tu saH /
   (2) nanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,4.14 //	(2) nanmAtrANAm dvitIyaH tu BUta sargaH hi sa smRtaH // GarP_1,4.14 //
   (3)vaikārikastṛtīyastu sargastvaindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ /	(3)vEkArikaH tRtIyaH tu sargaH tu EndriyakaH smRtaH /
   ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,4.15 //	iti eza prAkRtaH sargaH samBUtaH budDi pUrvakaH // GarP_1,4.15 //
   (4)mukhyasargaścaturthastu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ /	(4) muKya sargaH caturTaH tu muKyAH vE sTAvarAH smRtAH /
   (5)tiryaksrotāstu yaḥ proktastiryagyonyaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,4.16 //	(5)tiryaksrotAH tu yaH proktaH tiryagyonyaH saH ucyate // GarP_1,4.16 //
   (6) tadūrdhvastotasāṃ ṣaṣṭho devasargastu sa smṛtaḥ /	(6) tad UrDva stotasAm zazWaH deva sargaH tu sa smRtaH /
   (7) tator'vāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā nuṣaḥ // GarP_1,4.17 //	(7) tator avAksrotasAm sargaH saptamaH sa tu mA nuzaH // GarP_1,4.17 //
   (8)aṣṭamo 'nugrahaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikastāmasastu saḥ /	(8)azwamaH anugrahaH sargaH sAttvikaH tAmasaH tu saH /
   pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,4.18 //	paQca ete vEkRtAH sargAH prAkRtAH tu trayaH smRtAH // GarP_1,4.18 //
   prākṛto vaikṛtaścāpi (9) kaumāro navamaḥ smṛtaḥ /	prAkRtaH vEkRtaH ca api (9) kOmAraH navamaH smRtaH /
   sthāvarāntāḥ surādyāstu prajā rudra ! caturvidhāḥ // GarP_1,4.19 //	sTAvara antAH sura AdyAH tu prajAH rudraH ! caturviDAH // GarP_1,4.19 //
   brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ /	brahmaNaH kurvataH sRzwim jajQire mAnasAH sutAH /
   tato devāsurapitṝnmānuṣāṃśca catuṣṭayam // GarP_1,4.20 //	tatas deva asura pitLn mAnuzAn= ca catuzwayam // GarP_1,4.20 //
   sisṛkṣurambhāṃsyetāni svamātmānamayūyujat /	sisRkzuH amBAMsi etAni svam AtmAnam ayUyujat /
   vyaktātmanastamomātrādudriktāstatprajāpateḥ // GarP_1,4.21 //	vyakta AtmanaH tamaH mAtrAt udriktAH tad prajApateH // GarP_1,4.21 //
   sisṛkṣerjaghanātpūrvamasurā jajñire tataḥ /	sisRkzeH jaGanAt pUrvam asurAH jajQire tatas /
   utsasarja tatastāṃ tu tamomātrātmikāṃ tanūm // GarP_1,4.22 //	utsasarja tatas tAm tu tamaH mAtra AtmikAm tanUm // GarP_1,4.22 //
   tamomātrā tanustyaktā śaṅkarābhūdvibhāvarī /	tamaH mAtrA tanuH tyaktA SaFkara aBUt viBAvarI /
   yakṣopakṣāṃsi taddehe prītimāpustataḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,4.23 //	yakzaH pakzAMsi tad dehe prItim ApuH tatas surAH // GarP_1,4.23 //
   sattvodriktāstu mukhataḥ saṃbhūtā brahmaṇo hara ! /	sattva udriktAH tu muKataH saMBUtAH brahmaNaH hara ! /
   sattvaprāyā tanustena santyaktā sāpyabhūddinam // GarP_1,4.24 //	sattva prAyA tanuH tena santi aktA sA api aBUt dinam // GarP_1,4.24 //
   tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā /	tatas hi balinaH rAtrO= asurAH devatAH divA /
   sattvamātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya pitaraśca tato 'bhavan // GarP_1,4.25 //	sattva mAtrAm tanum gRhya pitaraH ca tatas aBavan // GarP_1,4.25 //
   sā cotsṛṣṭābhavatsandhyā dinanaktāntarasthitiḥ /	sA ca utsRzwA aBavat sanDyA dina nakta antara sTitiH /
   rajomātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya manuṣyāstvabhavaṃstataḥ // GarP_1,4.26 //	rajaH mAtrAm tanum gRhya manuzyAH tu aBavan= tatas // GarP_1,4.26 //
   sā tyaktā cābhavajjyotsnā prāksandhyā yābhidhīyate /	sA tyaktA ca aBavat jyotsnA prAc sanDyA yA aBiDIyate /
   jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai // GarP_1,4.27 //	jyotsnA rAtrI ahanI sanDyA SarIrANi tu tasya vE // GarP_1,4.27 //
   rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca /	rajaH mAtrAm tanu gRhya kzuD aBUt kopaH eva ca /
   kṣuttṛṭkṣāmā amṛgbhakṣā rākṣasā rakṣaṇācca ye // GarP_1,4.28 //	kzut tRz kzAmA amRgBakzAH rAkzasAH rakzaNAt ca ye // GarP_1,4.28 //
   yakṣākhyā jakṣaṇājjñeyāḥ sarpā vai keśasarpaṇāt /	yakza AKyAH jakzaNAt jQeyAH sarpAH vE keSa sarpaNAt /
   jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ // GarP_1,4.29 //	jAtAH kopena BUtAH te ganDarvAH jajQire tatas // GarP_1,4.29 //
   gāyanto jajñire vācaṃ gandharvāpsarasaśca ye /	gAyantaH jajQire vAcam ganDarva apsarasaH ca ye /
   svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān // GarP_1,4.30 //	svargam dyOH vakzasaH cakre suKataH ajAH sa muzwavAn // GarP_1,4.30 //
   sṛṣṭavānudarādrāśca pārśvābhyāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ /	sRzwavAn udarAdrAH ca pArSvAByAm ca prajApatiH /
   padybhāṃ caivāntyamātaṅgānmahiṣoṣṭrāvikāṃstathā // GarP_1,4.31 //	padyBAm ca eva antya mAtaFgAn mahiza uzwra AvikAn= taTA // GarP_1,4.31 //
   opadhyaḥ phalamūlinyo romabhyastasya jajñire /	opaDyaH Pala mUlinyaH romaByaH tasya jajQire /
   gaurajaḥ puruṣo medhyo hyaśvāśvataragardabhāḥ // GarP_1,4.32 //	gOH ajaH puruzaH meDyaH hi aSva aSvatara gardaBAH // GarP_1,4.32 //
   etān grāmyānpaśūnprāhurāraṇyāṃśca nibodha me /	etAn grAmyAn paSUn prAhuH AraNyAn= ca niboDa me /
   śvāpadaṃ dvikhuraṃ hastivānarāḥ pakṣipañcamāḥ // GarP_1,4.33 //	SvApadam dvi Kuram hasti vAnarAH pakzi paQcamAH // GarP_1,4.33 //
   audakāḥ paśavaḥ ṣaṣṭhāḥ saptamāśca sarīsṛpāḥ /	OdakAH paSavaH zazWAH saptamAH ca sarIsRpAH /
   pūrvādibhyo mukhebhyastu ṛgvedādyāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,4.34 //	pUrva AdiByaH muKeByaH tu Rgveda AdyAH prajajQire // GarP_1,4.34 //
   āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ /	AsyAt vE brAhmaNAH jAtAH bAhuByAm kzattriyAH smRtAH /
   ūrubhyāṃ tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padybhāma jāyata // GarP_1,4.35 //	UruByAm tu viSaH sRzwAH SUdraH padi BAma jAyata // GarP_1,4.35 //
   brahmaloko brāhmaṇānāṃ śākraḥ kṣattriyajanmanām /	brahma lokaH brAhmaNAnAm SAkraH kzattriya janmanAm /
   mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām // GarP_1,4.36 //	mArutam ca viSAm sTAnam gAnDarvam SUdra janmanAm // GarP_1,4.36 //
   brahmacārivratasthānāṃ brahmalokaḥ prajāyate /	brahmacAri vrata sTAnAm brahma lokaH prajAyate /
   prājāpatyaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ yathāvihitakāriṇām // GarP_1,4.37 //	prAjApatyam gRhasTAnAm yaTA vihita kAriNAm // GarP_1,4.37 //
   sthānaṃ saptaṛṣīṇāṃ ca tathaiva vanavāsinām /	sTAnam sapta RzINAm ca taTA eva vana vAsinAm /
   yatīnāmakṣayaṃ sthānaṃ yadṛcchāgāmināṃ sadā // GarP_1,4.38 //	yatInAm akzayam sTAnam yadRcCA gAminAm sadA // GarP_1,4.38 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   sṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ	sRzwivarNanam nAma caturTaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  5	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 5
   iriruvāca /	iriH uvAca /
   kṛtvehāmutrasaṃsthānaṃ prajāsargaṃ tu mānasam /	kRtvA iha amutra saMsTAnam prajA sargam tu mAnasam /
   athāmṛjatprajākartṝnbhānasāṃstanayānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,5.1 //	aTa amRjat prajA kartLn BAnasAn= tanayAn praBuH // GarP_1,5.1 //
   dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam /	Darmam rudram manum ca eva sanakam ca sanAtanam /
   bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,5.2 //	BRgum sanatkumAram ca rucim SradDAm taTA eva ca // GarP_1,5.2 //
   marīcimatryaṅgirasau pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum /	marIcim atri aFgirasO pulastyam pulaham kratum /
   vasiṣṭhaṃ nāradaṃ caiva pitṝnbarhiṣadastathā // GarP_1,5.3 //	vasizWam nAradam ca eva pitLn barhizadaH taTA // GarP_1,5.3 //
   agniṣvāttāṃśca kavyādānājyapāṃśca sukālinaḥ /	agnizvAttAn= ca kavya AdAn AjyapAn= ca sukAlinaH /
   upahūtāṃstathā dīpyāṃ (prā) strīṃśca mūrtivivarjitān // GarP_1,5.4 //	upahUtAn= taTA dIpyAm (prA) strIn= ca mUrti vivarjitAn // GarP_1,5.4 //
   caturo mūrtiyuktāṃśca aṅguṣṭhāddakṣamīśvaram /	caturaH mUrti yuktAn= ca aFguzWAt dakzam ISvaram /
   vāmāṃ guṣṭhāttasya bhāryāmasṛjatpadmasambhavaḥ // GarP_1,5.5 //	vAmAm guzWAt tasya BAryAm asRjat padma samBavaH // GarP_1,5.5 //
   tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ /	tasyAm tu janayAmAsa dakzaH duhitaraH SuBAH /
   dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān // GarP_1,5.6 //	dadO tAH brahma putreByaH satIm rudrAya dattavAn // GarP_1,5.6 //
   rudra putrā babhūvurhi asaṃkhyātā mahābalāḥ /	rudra putrAH baBUvuH hi asaMKyAtAH mahA balAH /
   bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām // GarP_1,5.7 //	BRgave ca dadO KyAtim rUpeNa apratimAm SuBAm // GarP_1,5.7 //
   bhṛgordhātāvidhātārau janayāmāsa sā śubhā /	BRgoH DAtA viDAtArO janayAmAsa sA SuBA /
   śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā // GarP_1,5.8 //	Sriyam ca janayAmAsa patnI nArAyaNasya yA // GarP_1,5.8 //
   tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam /	tasyAm vE janayAmAsa bala unmAdO hariH svayam /
   āyatirniyatiścaiva manoḥ kanye mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,5.9 //	AyatiH niyatiH ca eva manoH kanye mahAtmanaH // GarP_1,5.9 //
   dhātāvidhātroste bhārye tayorjātau sutāvubhau /	DAtAviDAtroH te BArye tayoH jAtO sutO= uBO /
   prāṇaścaiva mṛkaṇḍuśca mārkaṇḍeyo mṛkaṇḍutaḥ // GarP_1,5.10 //	prANaH ca eva mRkaNxuH ca mArkaNxeyaH mRkaNxutaH // GarP_1,5.10 //
   patni marīceḥ sambhūtiḥ paurṇamāsamasūyata /	patni marIceH samBUtiH pOrNamAsam asUyata /
   virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,5.11 //	virajAH sarvagaH ca eva tasya putrO mahAtmanaH // GarP_1,5.11 //
   smṛteścāṃṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ prasūtāḥ kanyakāstathā /	smRteH ca aMFgirasaH putrAH prasUtAH kanyakAH taTA /
   sinīvālī kuhūścaiva rākā cānumatistathā // GarP_1,5.12 //	sinIvAlI kuhUH ca eva rAkA ca anumatiH taTA // GarP_1,5.12 //
   anasūyā tathaivātrerjajñe putrānakalmaṣān /	anasUyA taTA eva atreH jajQe putrAn akalmazAn /
   somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // GarP_1,5.13 //	somam durvAsasam ca eva dattAtreyam ca yoginam // GarP_1,5.13 //
   prītyāṃ pulastyabhāryāyāṃ dattolistatsuto 'bhavat /	prItyAm pulastya BAryAyAm dattoliH tad sutaH aBavat /
   karṃmaśaścārthavīraśca sahiṣṇuśca sutatrayam // GarP_1,5.14 //	karMmaSas ca arTa vIraH ca sahizNuH ca suta trayam // GarP_1,5.14 //
   kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ /	kzamA tu suzuve BAryA pulahasya prijApateH /
   kratośca sumatirbhāryā bālakhilyānasūyata // GarP_1,5.15 //	kratoH ca sumatiH BAryA bAlaKilya anasUyata // GarP_1,5.15 //
   ṣaṣṭiryāni sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmūrdharetasām /	zazwiH yAni sahasrANi RzINA mUrDaretasAm /
   aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrāṇāṃ jvaladbhāskaravarcasām // GarP_1,5.16 //	aFguzWa parva mAtrANAm jvalat BAskara varcasAm // GarP_1,5.16 //
   ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ /	UrjAyAm tu vasizwasya sapta ajAyanta vE sutAH /
   rajogātrordhabāhuśca śaraṇaścānaghastathā // GarP_1,5.17 //	rajaH gAtra UrDa bAhuH ca SaraNaH ca anaGaH taTA // GarP_1,5.17 //
   sutapāḥ śukra ityete sarve saptarṣayo 'malāḥ /	sutapAH SukraH iti ete sarve saptarzayaH amalAH /
   svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye // GarP_1,5.18 //	svAhAm prAdAt sa dakzaH api SaSarIrAya vahnaye // GarP_1,5.18 //
   tasmātsvāhā sutāṃllebhe trīnudāraujaso hara ! /	tasmAt svAhA sutAn= leBe trIn udAra ojasaH hara ! /
   phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ // GarP_1,5.19 //	PAvakam pavamAnam ca Sucim ca api jala ASinaH // GarP_1,5.19 //
   pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā /	pitRByaH ca svaDA jajQe menAm vEtaraNIm taTA /
   te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ // GarP_1,5.20 //	te uBe brahma vAdinyO menAyAm tu himAcalaH // GarP_1,5.20 //
   mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī /	mEnAkam janayAmAsa gOrIm pUrvam tu yA satI /
   tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_1,5.21 //	tatas brahma Atma samBUtam pUrvam svAyaMBuvam praBuH // GarP_1,5.21 //
   ātmānameva kṛtavānprajāpālyaṃ manuṃ hara ! /	AtmAnam eva kRtavAn prajApAlyam manum hara ! /
   śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām // GarP_1,5.22 //	SatarUpAm ca tAm nArIm tapaH nihata kalmazAm // GarP_1,5.22 //
   svāyambhuvo manurdevaḥ patnitve jagṛhe vibhuḥ /	svAyamBuvaH manuH devaH patni tve jagRhe viBuH /
   tasmācca puruṣāddevī śatarūpā vyajāyata // GarP_1,5.23 //	tasmAt ca puruzAt devI SatarUpA vyajAyata // GarP_1,5.23 //
   priyavratottānapādau prasūtyākūtisaṃjñete /	priyavrata uttAnapAdO prasUti AkUti saMjQete /
   devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau // GarP_1,5.24 //	devahUtim manuH tAsu AkUtim rucaye dadO // GarP_1,5.24 //
   prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame /	prasUtim ca eva dakzAya davahUtim ca kardame /
   ruceryajño dakṣiṇābhūddakṣiṇāyāṃ ca yajñataḥ // GarP_1,5.25 //	ruceH yajQaH dakziNA aBUt dakziNAyAm ca yajQataH // GarP_1,5.25 //
   abhavandvādaśa sutā yāmā nāma mahābalāḥ /	aBavan dvAdaSa sutA yAmAH nAma mahA balAH /
   caturvośatikanyāśca sṛṣṭavāndakṣa uttamāḥ // GarP_1,5.26 //	caturvoSati kanyAH ca sRzwavAn dakzaH uttamAH // GarP_1,5.26 //
   śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā /	SradDA calA DRtiH tuzwiH puzwiH meDA kriyA taTA /
   buddhirlajjā vapuḥ śāntirṛddhiḥ kīrtistnayodaśī // GarP_1,5.27 //	budDiH lajjA vapuH SAntiH RdDiH kIrtiH tnayodaSI // GarP_1,5.27 //
   patnyarthaṃ pratijagrāha dharmo dākṣāyaṇīprabhuḥ /	patnI arTam pratijagrAha DarmaH dAkzAyaNI praBuH /
   khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā // GarP_1,5.28 //	KyatiH sati aTa samBUtiH smRtiH prItiH kzamA taTA // GarP_1,5.28 //
   sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā /	sannatiH ca anasUyA ca UrjA svAhA svaDA taTA /
   bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ // GarP_1,5.29 //	BRGurBavaH marIciH ca taTA ca eva aFgirAH muniH // GarP_1,5.29 //
   pulastyaḥ pulahaścaiva kratuścarṣivarastathā /	pulastyaH pulahaH ca eva kratuH ca Rzi varaH taTA /
   ātrirvasiṣṭho vahniśca pitaraśca yathākramam // GarP_1,5.30 //	AtriH vasizWaH vahniH ca pitaraH ca yaTAkramam // GarP_1,5.30 //
   khyātyādyā jagṛhuḥ kanyā munayo munisattamāḥ /	KyAti AdyAH jagRhuH kanyAH munayaH muni sattamAH /
   śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam // GarP_1,5.31 //	SradDA kAmam calAH darpam niyamam DRtiH Atmajam // GarP_1,5.31 //
   santoṣaṃ ca tathā tuṣṭirlobhaṃ puṣṭirasūyata /	santozam ca taTA tuzwiH loBam puzwiH asUyate /
   medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca // GarP_1,5.32 //	meDA Srutam kriyA daNxam layam vinayam eva ca // GarP_1,5.32 //
   bodhaṃ buddhistathā lajjā vinayaṃ vapurātmajam /	boDam budDiH taTA lajjA vinayam vapuH Atmajam /
   vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata // GarP_1,5.33 //	vyavasAyam prajajQe vE kzemam SAntiH asUyata // GarP_1,5.33 //
   sukhamṛddhiryaśaḥ kīrtirityete dharmasūnavaḥ /	suKam RdDiH yaSaH kIrtiH iti ete Darma sUnavaH /
   kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate // GarP_1,5.34 //	kAmasya ca ratiH BAryA tad putraH harzaH ucyate // GarP_1,5.34 //
   īje kadācidyajñena hayamedhena dakṣakaḥ /	Ije kadAcid yajQena hayameDena dakzakaH /
   tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ // GarP_1,5.35 //	tasya jAmAtaraH sarve yajQam jagmuH nimantritAH // GarP_1,5.35 //
   bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā /	BAryaBiH sahitAH sarve rudram devIm satIm vinA /
   anāhūtā satī prāptā dakṣeṇaivāvamānitā // GarP_1,5.36 //	anAhUtA satI prAptAH dakzeNa eva avamAnitAH // GarP_1,5.36 //
   tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt /	tyaktA deham punar jAtA menAyAm tu himAlayAt /
   śambhorbhāryābhavadraurī tasyāṃ jajñe vināyakaḥ // GarP_1,5.37 //	SamBoH BAryA Bavat rOrI tasyAm jajQe vinAyakaH // GarP_1,5.37 //
   kumāraścaiva bhṛṅgīśaḥ kruddho rudraḥ pratāpavān /	kumAraH ca eva BRFgISaH krudDaH rudraH pratApavAn /
   vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk /	viDvaMsya yajQam dakzam tu tam SaSApa pinAkaDRk /
   dhruvasyānvayasambhūto manuṣyastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // GarP_1,5.38 //	Druvasya anvaya samBUtaH manuzyaH tvam Bavizyasi // GarP_1,5.38 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ	prajA kartR AdisRzwiH nAma paQcamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  6	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 6
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   uttānapādādabhavatsurucyāmuttamaḥ sutaḥ /	uttAnapAdAt aBavat surucyAm uttamaH sutaH /
   sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam // GarP_1,6.1 //	sunItyAm tu DruvaH putraH sa leBe sTAnam uttamam // GarP_1,6.1 //
   muniprasādādārādhya devadevaṃ janārdanam /	muni prasAdAt ArADya devadevam janArdanam /
   dhruvasya tanayaḥ śliṣṭirmahābalaparākramaḥ // GarP_1,6.2 //	Druvasya tanayaH SlizwiH mahA bala parAkramaH // GarP_1,6.2 //
   tasya prācīnavarhistu putrastasyāpyudāradhīḥ /	tasya prAcInavarhiH tu putraH tasya api udAra DIH /
   divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.3 //	divaQjayaH tasya sutaH tasya putraH ripuH smRtaH // GarP_1,6.3 //
   ripoḥ putrastathā śrīmāṃścākṣuṣaḥ kīrtito manuḥ /	ripoH putraH taTA SrImAn= cAkzuzaH kIrtitaH manuH /
   rurustasya sutaḥ śrīmānaṅgastasyāpi cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,6.4 //	ruruH tasya sutaH SrImAn aFgaH tasya api ca AtmajaH // GarP_1,6.4 //
   aṅgasya veṇaḥ putrastu nāstiko dharmavarjitaḥ /	aFgasya veNaH putraH tu nAstikaH Darma varjitaH /
   adharṃmakārī veṇa(na) śca munibhiśca kuśairhataḥ // GarP_1,6.5 //	aDarMmakArI veNa(na) Sca muniBiH ca kuSEH hataH // GarP_1,6.5 //
   ūruṃ mamanthuḥ putrārthe tato 'sya tanayo 'bhavat /	Urum mamanTuH putra arTe tatas asya tanayaH aBavat /
   hrasvo 'timātraḥ kṛṣṇāṅgo niṣīdeti tato 'bruvan // GarP_1,6.6 //	hrasvaH atimAtraH kRzNa aFgaH nizIda iti tatas abruvan // GarP_1,6.6 //
   niṣādastena vai jāto bindhyaśailanivāsakaḥ /	nizAdaH tena vE jAtaH binDya SEla nivAsakaH /
   tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ // GarP_1,6.7 //	tatas asya dakziNam pANim mamanTuH sahasA dvijAH // GarP_1,6.7 //
   tasmāttasya suto jāto viṣṇormānasarūpadhṛk /	tasmAt tasya sutaH jAtaH vizNoH mAnasa rUpaDRk /
   puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau // GarP_1,6.8 //	puTuH iti eva nAmA sa veNa putraH divam yayO // GarP_1,6.8 //
   dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi /	dudoha pRTivIm rAjA prajAnAm jIvanAya hi /
   antardhānaḥ pṛthoḥ putro tahavirdhānastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,6.9 //	antarDAnaH pRToH putraH tahavirDAnaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,6.9 //
   prācīnavaharstetputraḥ pṛthivyāmekarāḍ babhau /	prAcInavaharH tet putraH pRTivyAm ekarAj baBO /
   upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām // GarP_1,6.10 //	upayeme samudrasya lavaNasya sa vE sutAm // GarP_1,6.10 //
   tasmātsuṣāva sāmudrī daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ /	tasmAt suzAva sAmudrI daSa prAcInabarhizaH /
   sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // GarP_1,6.11 //	sarve prAcetasAH nAma Danurvedasya pAragAH // GarP_1,6.11 //
   apṛthagadharṃmacaraṇāste 'tapyanta mahattapaḥ /	apRTak aDarMma caraNAH te atapyanta mahat tapaH /
   daśavarṣasahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ // GarP_1,6.12 //	daSa varza sahasrANi samudra salileSayAH // GarP_1,6.12 //
   prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa /	prajApati tvam saMprApya BAryA tezAm ca mAriza /
   abhavaddhavaśāpena tasyāṃ dakṣo 'bhavattataḥ // GarP_1,6.13 //	aBavat hava SApena tasyAm dakzaH aBavat tatas // GarP_1,6.13 //
   asṛjanmanasā dakṣaḥ prajāḥ pūrvaṃ caturvodhāḥ /	asRjat manasA dakzaH prajAH pUrvam catur voDAH /
   nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu // GarP_1,6.14 //	na avarDanta ca tAH tasya apaDyAtA hareNa tu // GarP_1,6.14 //
   maithunena tataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumaicchatprajāpatiḥ /	mETunena tatas sRzwim kartum EcCat prajApatiH /
   asikrīmāvahadbhāryāṃ vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ // GarP_1,6.15 //	asi krIma avahat BAryAm vIraNasya prajApateH // GarP_1,6.15 //
   tasya putrasahasraṃ tu vairaṇyāṃ samapadyata /	tasya putra sahasram tu vEraNyAm samapadyata /
   nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ // GarP_1,6.16 //	nArada uktAH BuvaH ca antam gatAH jQAtum ca na AgatAH // GarP_1,6.16 //
   dakṣaputrasahasraṃ ca teṣu naṣṭeṣu sṛṣṭavān /	dakza putra sahasram ca tezu nazwezu sRzwavAn /
   śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara ! // GarP_1,6.17 //	SavalASvAH te api gatAH BrAtLNAm padavIm hara ! // GarP_1,6.17 //
   dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi /	dakzaH krudDaH SaSApa aTa nAradam janma ca Apsyasi /
   nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,6.18 //	nAradaH hi aBavat putraH kaSyapasya muneH punar // GarP_1,6.18 //
   yajñe dhvaste 'tha dakṣo 'pi śaśāprograṃ maheśvaram /	yajQe Dvaste aTa dakzaH api SaSa aprogram maheSvaram /
   stutvātvāmupacāraiśca pūjayiṣyanti śaṅkara // GarP_1,6.19 //	stutvA tvAm upacArEH ca pUjayizyanti SaFkara // GarP_1,6.19 //
   janmāntare 'pi vaireṇa te vinaśyanti śaṅkara ! /	janma antare api vEreNa te vinaSyanti SaFkara ! /
   tasmādvairaṃ na kartavyaṃ kadācidapi kenacit /	tasmAt vEram na kartavyam kadAcid api kenacid /
   asiknyāṃ (mahiṣyāṃ) janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaro hyatha // GarP_1,6.20 //	asiknyAm (mahizyAn) janayAmAsa dakzaH duhitaraH hi aTa // GarP_1,6.20 //
   ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau /	zazwim kanyA rUpa yutAH dve ca eva aFgirase dadO /
   dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha // GarP_1,6.21 //	dve prAdAt sa kRSASvAya daSa DarMmAya ca api aTa // GarP_1,6.21 //
   caturdaśa kaśyapāya aṣṭāviṃśātimindave /	caturdaSa kaSyapAya azwAviMSa atim indave /
   pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā // GarP_1,6.22 //	pradadO bahu putrAya su praBAm BAminIm taTA // GarP_1,6.22 //
   manoramāṃ bhānumatīṃ viśālāṃ bahudāmatha /	manoramAm BAnumatIm viSAlAm bahu dAm aTa /
   dakṣaḥ prādānmahādeva ! catasro 'riṣṭanemaye (ne) // GarP_1,6.23 //	dakzaH prAdAt mahAdeva ! catasraH arizwanemaye (ne) // GarP_1,6.23 //
   sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām /	sa kRSASvAya ca prAdAt su prajAm ca taTA jayAm /
   arundhatī vasuryār(jā) mī lambā bhānurmarudvatī // GarP_1,6.24 //	arunDatI vasuH yAr( jA) mI lambA BAnuH marudvatI // GarP_1,6.24 //
   saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa /	saFkalpA ca muhUrtA ca sADyA viSvA ca tAH daSa /
   dharṃmapatnyaḥ samākhyātāḥ kaśyapasya vadāmyaham // GarP_1,6.25 //	DarMma patnyaH samAKyAtAH kaSyapasya vadAmi aham // GarP_1,6.25 //
   aditirditirdanuḥ kālā hyanāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ /	aditiH ditiH danuH kAlA hi anAyuH siMhikA muniH /
   kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā // GarP_1,6.26 //	kadrUH sADyA harA kroDAH vinatA suraBiH KagAH // GarP_1,6.26 //
   viśvedevāstu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyānvyajāyata /	viSvedevAH tu viSvAyAH sADyA sADyAn vyajAyata /
   marutvatyāṃ marutvanto vasostu vasavastathā // GarP_1,6.27 //	marutvatyAm marutvantaH vasoH tu vasavaH taTA // GarP_1,6.27 //
   bhānostu bhānavo rudra ! muhūrtācca muhūrtajāḥ /	BAnoH tu BAnavaH rudraH ! muhUrtAt ca muhUrta jAH /
   lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā (jā) mitaḥ // GarP_1,6.28 //	lambAyAH ca eva GozaH aTa nAgavITiH tu yAH (jA) mitaH // GarP_1,6.28 //
   pṛthivīviṣayaṃ sarvamarutvatyāṃ vyajāyata /	pRTivI vizayam sarva marutvatyAm vyajAyata /
   saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi // GarP_1,6.29 //	saFkalpAyAH tu sarva AtmA jajQe saMkalpaH eva hi // GarP_1,6.29 //
   āpo dhruvaśca somaśca dharaścaivānilo 'nalaḥ /	ApaH DruvaH ca somaH ca DaraH ca eva anilaH analaH /
   pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.30 //	pratyUzaH ca praBAsaH ca vasavaH nAmaBiH smRtAH // GarP_1,6.30 //
   āpasya putro vetuṇḍiḥ (ṇḍaḥ) śramaḥ śrānto dhvanistathā /	Apasya putraH vetuNxiH (NxaH) SramaH SrAntaH DvaniH taTA /

   somasya bhagavānvarcā varcasvī yena jāyate /	somasya BagavAn varcA varcasvI yena jAyate /

   manoharāyāṃ śiśiraḥ prāṇo 'tha ramaṇastathā /	manoharAyAm SiSiraH prANaH aTa ramaNaH taTA /

   avijñātagatiścaiva dvau putrāvanilasya tu /	avijQAta gatiH ca eva dvO putrO= anilasya tu /

   tasya śākho viśākhaśca naigameyaśca pṛṣṭajaḥ /	tasya SAKaH viSAKaH ca nEgameyaH ca pRzwa jaH /
   apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.35 //	apatyam kRttikAnAm tu kArtikeyaH iti smRtaH // GarP_1,6.35 //
   pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam /	pratyuzasya viduH putram Rzim nAmnA tu devalam /
   viśvakarṃmā prabhāsasya vikhyāto devavardhakiḥ // GarP_1,6.36 //	viSvakarMmA praBAsasya viKyAtaH deva varDakiH // GarP_1,6.36 //
   ajaikapādahirbudhnyastvaṣṭā rudraśca vīryavān /	ajEkapAd ahirbuDnyaH tvazwA rudraH ca vIryavAn /
   tvaṣṭuścāpyātmajaḥ putro viśvarūpo mahātapāḥ // GarP_1,6.37 //	tvazwuH ca api AtmajaH putraH viSvarUpaH mahA tapAH // GarP_1,6.37 //
   haraśca bahurūpaśca tryambakaścāparājitaḥ /	haraH ca bahurUpaH ca tryambakaH ca aparAjitaH /
   vṛṣākapiśca śambhuśca kaparde raivatastathā // GarP_1,6.38 //	vRzAkapiH ca SamBuH ca kaparde rEvataH taTA // GarP_1,6.38 //
   mṛgavyādhaśca śarvaśca kapālī ca mahāmune ! /	mRgavyADaH ca SarvaH ca kapAlI ca mahA mune ! /
   ekādaśaite kathitā rudrāstribhuvaneśvarāḥ // GarP_1,6.39 //	ekAdaSA ete kaTitAH rudrAH triBuvana ISvarAH // GarP_1,6.39 //
   adityāṃ kaśyapāccaiva sūryā dvādaśa jajñire /	adityAm kaSyapAt ca eva sUryAH dvAdaSa jajQire /
   viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca // GarP_1,6.40 //	vizNuH Sakror ayyamA DAtA tvazwA pUzA taTA eva ca // GarP_1,6.40 //
   vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca /	vivasvAn savitA ca eva mitraH varuNaH eva ca /

   saptaviṃśatiḥ somasya patnyo nakṣatrasaṃjñitāḥ /	saptaviMSatiH somasya patnyaH nakzatra saMjQitAH /
   hiraṇyakaśipurdityāṃ hiraṇyākṣo 'bhavattadā // GarP_1,6.42 //	hiraNyakaSipuH dityAm hiraNyAkzaH aBavat tadA // GarP_1,6.42 //
   siṃhikā cābhavatkanyā vipracittiparigrahā /	siMhikA ca aBavat kanyA vipracitti parigrahAH /

   anuhrādaśca hrādaśca prahrādaścaiva vīryavān /	anuhrAdaH ca hrAdaH ca prahrAdaH ca eva vIryavAn /

   saṃhrādaputra āyuṣmāñchibirvāṣkala eva ca /	saMhrAda putraH AyuzmAn SibiH vAzkalaH eva ca /
