   baleḥ putraśataṃ tvāsīdvāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ vṛṣadhvaja ! /	baleH putra Satam tu AsIt vANa jyezWam vRzaDvaja ! /
   hiraṇyākṣasutāścāsansarva eva mahābalāḥ // GarP_1,6.46 //	hiraNyAkza sutAH ca Asan sarve eva mahA balAH // GarP_1,6.46 //
   utkuraḥ śakuniścaiva bhūtasantāpanastathā /	utkuraH SakuniH ca eva BUta santApanaH taTA /
   mahānāgo mahābāhuḥ kālanābhastathāparaḥ // GarP_1,6.47 //	mahA nAgaH mahA bAhuH kAlanABaH taTA aparaH // GarP_1,6.47 //
   abhavandanuputrāśca dvimūrdhā śaṅkarastathā /	aBavandanu putrAH ca dvimUrDA SaFkaraH taTA /
   ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ kapilaḥ śambarastathā // GarP_1,6.48 //	ayomuKaH SaFkuSirAH kapilaH SambaraH taTA // GarP_1,6.48 //
   ekacakro mahābāhustārakaśca mahābalaḥ /	ekacakraH mahA bAhuH tArakaH ca mahA balaH /
   svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ // GarP_1,6.49 //	svarBAnuH vRzaparvA ca pulomA ca mahA asuraH // GarP_1,6.49 //
   ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān /	ete danoH sutAH KyAtA vipracittiH ca vIryavAn /
   svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // GarP_1,6.50 //	svarBAnoH supraBA kanyA SarmizWA vArzaparvaNI // GarP_1,6.50 //
   upadānavī hayaśirāḥ prakhyātā varakanyakāḥ /	upadAnavI hayaSirAH praKyAtAH vara kanyakAH /
   vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā // GarP_1,6.51 //	vESvAnara sute ca uBe pulomA kAlakA taTA // GarP_1,6.51 //
   ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ /	uBe te tu mahABAge mArIceH tu parigrahaH /
   tābhyāṃ putrasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭirdānavasattamāḥ // GarP_1,6.52 //	tAByAm putra sahasrANi zazwiH dAnava sattamAH // GarP_1,6.52 //
   paulomāḥ kālakañjāśca mārīcatanayāḥ smṛtāḥ /	pOlomAH kAla kaQjAH ca mArIca tanayAH smRtAH /
   siṃhikāyāṃ samutpannā vipracittisutāstathā // GarP_1,6.53 //	siMhikAyAm samutpannAH vipracitti sutAH taTA // GarP_1,6.53 //
   vyaṃśaḥ śalyaśca balavānnabhaścaiva mahābalaḥ /	vyaMSaH SalyaH ca balavAn naBaH ca eva mahA balaH /
   vātāpirnamuciścaiva ilvalaḥ khasṛmāṃstathā // GarP_1,6.54 //	vAtApiH namuciH ca eva ilvalaH KasRmAn= taTA // GarP_1,6.54 //
   añja (nta) ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca /	aQjaH (nta) kaH narakaH ca eva kAla nABaH taTA eva ca /
   nivātakavacā daityāḥ prahrādasya kule 'bhavan // GarP_1,6.55 //	nivAta kavacAH dEtyAH prahrAdasya kule aBavan // GarP_1,6.55 //
   ṣaṭ sutāśca mahāsattvāstāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /	zaw sutAH ca mahAsattvAH tAmrAyAH parikIrtitAH /
   śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike // GarP_1,6.56 //	SukI SyenI ca BAsI ca sugrIvI Suci gRDrike // GarP_1,6.56 //
   śukī śukānajanayadulūkī pratyalūkakān /	SukI SukAn ajanayat ulUkI pratyalUkakAn /
   śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi // GarP_1,6.57 //	SyenI SyenAn= taTA BAsI BAsAn gRDrAn= ca gRDrI api // GarP_1,6.57 //
   śukyaudakānpakṣigaṇānsugrīvī tu vyajāyata /	SukyOdakAn pakzi gaNAn sugrIvI tu vyajAyata /
   (aśvānuṣṭān gardabhāṃśca tāmrāvaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,6. 58 //)	(aSva anuzwAn gardaBAn= ca tAmrAvaMSaH prakIrtitaH // GarP_1,6. 58 //)
   vinatāyāstu putrau dvau vikhyātau garuḍāruṇau /	vinatAyAH tu putrO dvO viKyAtO garuxa aruNO /
   surasāyāḥ sahasraṃ tu sarpāṇāmamitaujasām // GarP_1,6.59 //	surasAyAH sahasram tu sarpANAm amita ojasAm // GarP_1,6.59 //
   kādraveyāśca phaṇinaḥ sahasramamitaujasaḥ /	kAdraveyAH ca PaNinaH sahasram amita ojasaH /
   teṣā prādhānā bhūteśa ! śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ // GarP_1,6.60 //	tezA prADAnAH BUteSa ! Seza vAsuki takzakAH // GarP_1,6.60 //
   śaṅkhaḥ śveto mahāpadmaḥ (śaṅkhaḥ) kambalāśvatarau tathā /	SaFKaH SvetaH mahApadmaH (SaFKaH) kambala aSvatarO taTA /
   elāpatrastathā nāgaḥ karkoṭakadhanañjayau // GarP_1,6.61 //	elApatraH taTA nAgaH karkowaka DanaQjayO // GarP_1,6.61 //
   gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /	gaNam kroDa vaSam vidDi te ca sarve ca daMzwriNaH /
   krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān // GarP_1,6.62 //	kroDA tu janayAmAsa piSAcAn= ca mahA balAn // GarP_1,6.62 //
   gāstu vai janayāmāsa surabhirmahiṣāṃstathā /	gAH tu vE janayAmAsa suraBiH mahizAn= taTA /
   irā vṛkṣalatāballīstṛṇajātīśca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,6.63 //	irA vRkza latA ballIH tRNa jAtIH ca sarvaSas // GarP_1,6.63 //
   khagā ca yakṣarakṣāṃsi munirapsarasastathā /	KagA ca yakza rakzAMsi muniH apsarasaH taTA /
   ariṣṭā tu mahāsattvān gandharvānsamajījanat // GarP_1,6.64 //	arizwA tu mahAsattvAn ganDarvAn samajIjanat // GarP_1,6.64 //
   devā ekonapañcāśanmaruto hyabhavanniti /	devAH ekonapaQcASat marutaH hi aBavan= iti /
   ekajyo tiśca dvirjyoticaturjyotistathaiva ca // GarP_1,6.65 //	ekajyaH tiH ca dvirjyoti catur jyotiH taTA eva ca // GarP_1,6.65 //
   ekaśukro dviśukraśca triśukraśca mahābalaḥ /	eka SukraH dviSukraH ca tri SukraH ca mahA balaH /
   īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā // GarP_1,6.66 //	IdRS sadRS taTA anyAdRS tatas pratisadRS taTA // GarP_1,6.66 //
   mitaśca samitaścaiva sumitaśca mahābalaḥ /	mitaH ca samitaH ca eva sumitaH ca mahA balaH /
   ṛtajitsatyajiccaiva suṣeṇaḥ senajittathā // GarP_1,6.67 //	Rtajit satyajit ca eva suzeNaH senajit taTA // GarP_1,6.67 //
   atimitro 'pyamitraśca dūramitro 'jitastathā /	atimitraH api amitraH ca dUra mitraH ajitaH taTA /
   ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo (camaso) dhruvaḥ // GarP_1,6.68 //	RtaH ca RtaDarMmA ca vihartA varuNaH (camaso) DruvaH // GarP_1,6.68 //
   vidhāraṇaśca durmedhā ayamekagaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /	viDAraNaH ca durmeDAH ayam eka gaNaH smRtaH /
   īdṛśaśca sadṛkṣaśca etādṛkṣo mitāśanaḥ // GarP_1,6.69 //	IdRSaH ca sadRkzaH ca etAdRkzaH mita aSanaH // GarP_1,6.69 //
   etenaḥ prasadṛkṣaśca surataśca mahātapāḥ /	etenaH prasadRkzaH ca surataH ca mahA tapAH /
   hetumānprasavastadvatsurabhaśca mahāyaśāḥ // GarP_1,6.70 //	hetumAn prasavaH tadvat suraBaH ca mahA yaSAH // GarP_1,6.70 //
   nādirugro dhvanirbhāso bimukto vikṣipaḥ sahaḥ /	na AdiH ugraH DvaniH BAsaH bimuktaH vikzipaH sahaH /
   dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ // GarP_1,6.71 //	dyutiH vasuH anADRzyaH lABa kAmaH jayI virAj // GarP_1,6.71 //
   udveṣaṇo gaṇo nāma vāyuskandhe tu saptame /	udvezaNaH gaNaH nAma vAyu skanDe tu saptame /
   etatsarvaṃ hare rūpaṃ rājāno dānavāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,6.72 //	etat sarvam hare rUpam rAjAnaH dAnavAH surAH // GarP_1,6.72 //
   sūryādi parivāreṇa manvādyā ījire harim // GarP_1,6.73 //	sUrya Adi parivAreNa manu AdyAH Ijire harim // GarP_1,6.73 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   uttānapādavaṃśādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ	uttAnapAdavaMSAdivarNanam nAma zazWaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  7	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 7
   rudra uvāca /	rudraH uvAca /
   sūryādipūjanaṃ brūhi kṛtaṃ svāyambhuvādibhiḥ /	sUrya Adi pUjanam brUhi kRtam svAyamBuva AdiBiH /
   bhuktimuktipradaṃ sāraṃ vyāsa ! saṃkṣepataḥ param // GarP_1,7.1 //	Bukti mukti pradam sAram vyAsa ! saMkzepataH param // GarP_1,7.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   sūryādipūjāṃ vakṣyāmi dharṃmakāmādikārikām // GarP_1,7.2 //	sUrya Adi pUjAm vakzyAmi DarMma kAma Adi kArikAm // GarP_1,7.2 //
   oṃ sūryāsanāya namaḥ /	om sUrya AsanAya namaH /
   oṃ namaḥ sūryamūrtaye /	om namaH sUrya mUrtaye /
   oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ /	om hrAm hrIm saH sUryAya namaH /
   oṃ somāya namaḥ /	om somAya namaH /
   oṃ maṅgalāya namaḥ /	om maFgalAya namaH /
   oṃ budhāya namaḥ	om buDAya namaH
   oṃ bṛhaspataye namaḥ /	om bRhaspataye namaH /
   oṃ śukrāya namaḥ /	om SukrAya namaH /
   oṃ śanaiścarāya namaḥ /	om SanEScarAya namaH /
   oṃ rāhave namaḥ /	om rAhave namaH /
   oṃ ketave namaḥ /	om ketave namaH /
   oṃ tejaścaṇḍāya namaḥ // GarP_1,7.3 //	om tejaH caNxAya namaH // GarP_1,7.3 //
   āsanāvāhanaṃ pādyamarghyamācamanaṃ tathā /	Asana AvAhanam pAdyam arGyam Acamanam taTA /
   snānaṃ vastropavītañca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,7.4 //	snAnam vastra upavItaQca ganDa puzpam ca DUpakam // GarP_1,7.4 //
   dīpakaṃ ca naskāraṃ pradakṣiṇavisarjane /	dIpakam ca naskAram pradakziNa visarjane /
   sūryādīnāṃ sadā kuryāditi mantrairvṛṣadhvaja ! // GarP_1,7.5 //	sUrya AdInAm sadA kuryAt iti mantrEH vRzaDvaja ! // GarP_1,7.5 //
   oṃ hrāṃśivāya namaḥ /	om hrAMSivAya namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ śivamūrtaye śivāya namaḥ /	om hrAm Siva mUrtaye SivAya namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om hrAm hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ hrīṃ śirase svāhā /	om hrIm Sirase svAhA /
   oṃ hrūṃ śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /	om hrUm SiKAyE vazaw /
   oṃ hrai kavacāya huṃ /	om hrE kavacAya hum /
   oṃ hrauṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ /	om hrOm netratrayAya vOzaw /
   oṃ hraḥ astrāya namaḥ /	om hraH astrAya namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ sadyojātaya namaḥ /	om hrAm sadyojAtaya namaH /
   oṃ hrīṃ vāmadevāya namaḥ /	om hrIm vAmadevAya namaH /
   oṃ hrūṃ aghorāya namaḥ /	om hrUm aGorAya namaH /
   oṃ hraiṃ tatpuruṣāya namaḥ /	om hrEm tatpuruzAya namaH /
   oṃ hrauṃ īśānāya namaḥ /	om hrOm ISAnAya namaH /
   oṃ hrīṃ gauryai namaḥ /	om hrIm gOryE namaH /
   oṃ hrauṃ gurubhyo namaḥ /	om hrOm guruByaH namaH /
   oṃ hrauṃ indrāya namaḥ /	om hrOm indrAya namaH /
   oṃ hrauṃ caṇḍāya namaḥ /	om hrOm caNxAya namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ aghorāya namaḥ /	om hrAm aGorAya namaH /
   oṃ vāsudevāsanāya namaḥ /	om vAsudeva AsanAya namaH /
   oṃ vāsudavamūrtaye namaḥ /	om vAsudava mUrtaye namaH /
   oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ /	om am om namaH Bagavate vAsudevAya namaH /
   oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ /	om Am om namaH Bagavate saFkarzaNAya namaH /
   oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate pradyumnāya namaḥ /	om am om namaH Bagavate pradyumnAya namaH /
   oṃ aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate aniruddhāya namaḥ /	om aH om namaH Bagavate anirudDAya namaH /
   oṃ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /	om nArAyaNAya namaH /
   oṃ tatsabdrahyaṇe namaḥ /	om tad sabdrahyaNe namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ viṣṇave namaḥ /	om hrAm vizNave namaH /
   oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namaḥ /	om kzOm namaH Bagavate narasiMhAya namaH /
   oṃ bhūḥ oṃ namo bhagavate varāhāya namaḥ /	om BUH om namaH Bagavate varAhAya namaH /
   oṃ kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ vainateyāya namaḥ /	om kam wam pam Sam vEnateyAya namaH /
   oṃ jaṃ khaṃ raṃ sudarśa nāya namaḥ /	om jam Kam ram sudarSa nAya namaH /
   oṃ khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadaiyau namaḥ /	om Kam Wam Pam zam gadEyO namaH /
   oṃ vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ /	om vam lam mam kzam pAQcajanyAya namaH /
   oṃ ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai namaḥ /	om Gam Xam Bam ham SriyE namaH /
   oṃ gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ saṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ /	om gam xam vam sam puzwyE namaH /
   oṃ dhaṃ ṣaṃ vaṃ saṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ /	om Dam zam vam sam vanamAlAyE namaH /
   oṃ saṃ daṃ laṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ /	om sam dam lam SrIvatsAya namaH /
   oṃ ṭhaṃ caṃ bhaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ /	om Wam cam Bam yam kOstuBAya namaH /
   oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ /	om guruByaH namaH /
   oṃ indrādidikpālebhyo namaḥ /	om indra Adi dikpAleByaH namaH /
   oṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ // GarP_1,7.6 //	om vizvaksenAya namaH // GarP_1,7.6 //
   āsanādīnhareratairmantrairmantrairdadyādvṛṣadhvaja ! /	Asana AdIn hareratEH mantrEH mantrEH dadyAt vRzaDvaja ! /
   viṣṇuśaktyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ pūjāṃ śṛṇu śubhapradām // GarP_1,7.7 //	vizNu SaktyAH sarasvatyAH pUjAm SRNu SuBa pradAm // GarP_1,7.7 //
   oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ /	om hrIm sarasvatyE namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om hrAm hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ hrīṃ śirase namaḥ /	om hrIm Sirase namaH /
   oṃ hrūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ /	om hrUm SiKAyE namaH /
   oṃ hraiṃ kavacāya namaḥ /	om hrEm kavacAya namaH /
   oṃ hrauṃ netratrayāya namaḥ /	om hrOm netratrayAya namaH /
   oṃ hraḥ astrāya namaḥ // GarP_1,7.8 //	om hraH astrAya namaH // GarP_1,7.8 //
   śraddhā ṛddhiḥ kalā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ /	SradDA RdDiH kalA meDA tuzwiH puzwiH praBA matiH /
   oṃ hrīṅkārādyā namo 'ntāśca sarasvatyāśca śaktayaḥ // GarP_1,7.9 //	om hrIFkAra AdyAH namaH antAH ca sarasvatyAH ca SaktayaH // GarP_1,7.9 //
   kṣetrapālāya namaḥ /	kzetrapAlAya namaH /
   oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ /	om guruByaH namaH /
   oṃ paramagurubhyo namaḥ // GarP_1,7.10 //	om parama guruByaH namaH // GarP_1,7.10 //
   padmasthāyāḥ sarasvatyā āsanādyaṃ prakalpayet /	padma sTAyAH sarasvatyAH Asana Adyam prakalpayet /
   sūryādīnāṃ svakairprantraiḥ pavitrārohaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_1,7.11 //	sUrya AdInAm svakEH prantrEH pavitra ArohaNam taTA // GarP_1,7.11 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryādīnāṃ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe sUrya AdInAm
   sarasvatyāśca pūjanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ	sarasvatyAH ca pUjanam nAma saptamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  8	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 8
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   bhūmiṣṭhe maṇḍape snātvā maṇḍale viṣṇumarcayet /	BUmizWe maNxape snAtvA maNxale vizNum arcayet /
   pañcaraṅgikacūrṇena vajranābhaṃ tu maṇḍalam // GarP_1,8.1 //	paQca raFgika cUrNena vajranABam tu maNxalam // GarP_1,8.1 //
   ṣoḍaśaiḥ koṣṭhakaistatra saṃmitaṃ rudra? kārayet /	zoxaSEH kozWakEH tatra saMmitam rudra? kArayet /
   caturthapañcakoṇeṣu sūtrapātaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_1,8.2 //	caturTa paQca koNezu sUtra pAtam tu kArayet // GarP_1,8.2 //
   koṇasūtrādubhayataḥ koṇā ye tatra saṃsthitāḥ /	koNa sUtrAt uBayatas koNAH ye tatra saMsTitAH /
   teṣu caiva prakurvīta sūtrapātaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,8.3 //	tezu ca eva prakurvIta sUtra pAtam vicakzaNaH // GarP_1,8.3 //
   tadanantarakoṇeṣu evameva hi kārayet /	tad anantara koNezu evam eva hi kArayet /
   prathamā nābhiruddiṣṭā madhye rekhāprasaṃgame // GarP_1,8.4 //	praTamA nABiH uddizwAH maDye reKA prasaMgame // GarP_1,8.4 //
   antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ /	antarezu ca sarvezu azwO ca eva tunABayaH /
   pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet // GarP_1,8.5 //	pUrva maDyama nABi ByAm aTam sUtram tu BrAmayet // GarP_1,8.5 //
   antarā sa dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ pādonaṃ bhrāmayeddhara ! /	antarA sa dvijaSrezWaH pAda Unam BrAmayet hara ! /
   anena nābhisūtrasya karṇikāṃ bhrāmayecchiva ! // GarP_1,8.6 //	anena nABi sUtrasya karNikAm BrAmayet Siva ! // GarP_1,8.6 //
   karṇikāyā dvibhāgena kesarāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥ /	karNikAyAH dvi BAgena kesarANi vicakzaNaH /
   tadagreṇa sadā vidvāndalānyeva samālikhet // GarP_1,8.7 //	tad agreNa sadA vidvAn dalAni eva samAliKet // GarP_1,8.7 //
   sarveṣu nābhikṣetraṣu mānenānena suvrata ! /	sarvezu na aBi kzetrazu mAnena anena suvrata ! /
   padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit // GarP_1,8.8 //	padmAni tAni kurvIta deSikaH para mA arTa vid // GarP_1,8.8 //
   ādisūtravibhāgena dvārāṇi parikalpayet /	Adi sUtra viBAgena dvArANi parikalpayet /
   dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet // GarP_1,8.9 //	dvAra SoBAm taTA tatra tad arDena tu kalpayet // GarP_1,8.9 //
   karṇikāṃ pītavarṇena sitaraktādikesaraiḥ /	karNikAm pIta varNena sita rakta Adi kesarEH /
   antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca // GarP_1,8.10 //	antaram nIla varNena dalAni asitena ca // GarP_1,8.10 //
   kṛṣṇavarṇena rajasā caturaśraṃ prapūrayet /	kRzNa varNena rajasA caturaSram prapUrayet /
   dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale // GarP_1,8.11 //	dvArANi Sukla varNena reKAH paQca ca maNxale // GarP_1,8.11 //
   sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam /	sitA raktA taTA pItA kRzNA ca eva yaTAkramam /
   kṛtvaiva maṇḍalañcādau nyāsaṃ kṛtvārcayeddharim // GarP_1,8.12 //	kRtvA eva maNxa laQca AdO nyAsam kRtvA arcayet harim // GarP_1,8.12 //
   hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā /	hRd maDye tu nyaset vizNum kaNWe saFkarzaNam taTA /
   pradyumnaṃ śirasi nyasya śikhāyāmaniruddhakam // GarP_1,8.13 //	pradyumnam Sirasi nyasya SiKAyAm anirudDakam // GarP_1,8.13 //
   brahmāṇaṃ sarvagātreṣu karayoḥ śrīdharaṃ tathā /	brahmANam sarva gAtrezu karayoH SrIDaram taTA /
   ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim // GarP_1,8.14 //	aham vizNuH iti DyAtvA karNikAyAm nyaset harim // GarP_1,8.14 //
   nyasetsaṅkarṣaṇaṃ pūrve pradyumnaṃ caiva dakṣiṇe /	nyaset saFkarzaNam pUrve pradyumnam ca eva dakziNe /
   aniruddhaṃ paścime ca brihmāṇaṃ cottare nyaset // GarP_1,8.15 //	anirudDam paScime ca brihmANam ca uttare nyaset // GarP_1,8.15 //
   śrīdharaṃ rudrakoṇeṣu indrādīndikṣu vinyaset /	SrIDaram rudra koNezu indra AdIn dikzu vinyaset /
   tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,8.16 //	tatas aByarcya ca ganDa AdyEH prApnuyAt paramam padam // GarP_1,8.16 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ	vizNupUjopayogivajranABamaNxalanirUpaNam nAma azwamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  9	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 9
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   samaye (yā) dīkṣitaḥ śiṣyo baddhanetrastu vāsasā /	samaye (yA) dIkzitaH SizyaH badDa netraH tu vAsasA /
   aṣṭāhutiśataṃ tasya mūlamantreṇa homayet // GarP_1,9.1 //	azwa Ahuti Satam tasya mUlamantreNa homayet // GarP_1,9.1 //
   dviguṇaṃ putrake homaṃ triguṇaṃ sādhake matam /	dviguNam putrake homam triguNam sADake matam /
   nirvāṇadeśike rudra ! caturguṇamudāhṛtam // GarP_1,9.2 //	nirvANa deSike rudraH ! caturguNam udAhRtam // GarP_1,9.2 //
   guruviṣṇudvijastrīṇāṃ hantā badhyastva(śca)dīkṣitaiḥ /	guru vizNu dvija strINAm hantA baDyaH tva(H ca)dIkzitEH /
   atha dīkṣāṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmādharmakṣayaṅkarīm // GarP_1,9.3 //	aTa dIkzAm pravakzyAmi Darma aDarma kzayaFkarIm // GarP_1,9.3 //
   upaveśya bahiḥ śiṣyāndhāraṇaṃ teṣu kārayet /	upaveSya bahis SizyAn DAraNam tezu kArayet /
   vāyavyā kalayā rudra śoṣyamāṇānvicintayet // GarP_1,9.4 //	vAyavyA kalayA rudra SozyamANAn vicintayet // GarP_1,9.4 //
   āgreyyā dahyamānāṃśca plāvitānambhasā punaḥ /	AgreyyAH dahyamAnAn= ca plAvitAn amBasA punar /
   tejastejāsi taṃ jīvamekīkṛtya samākṣipet // GarP_1,9.5 //	tejaH teja asi tam jIvam ekIkRtya samAkzipet // GarP_1,9.5 //
   prāṇavaṃ cintayevdyomni śarīre 'nyattu kāraṇam /	prANavam cintayA ivdyomni SarIre anyat tu kAraNam /
   ekaikaṃ yo jayettatra kṣetrajñaṃ dehakāraṇāt // GarP_1,9.6 //	ekEkam yaH jayet tatra kzetrajQam deha kAraNAt // GarP_1,9.6 //
   utpādya yojayetpaścādekaikaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja /	utpAdya yojayet paScAt ekEkam vRzaBaDvaja /
   maṇḍalādiṣvaśaktastu kalpayitvār'cayeddharim // GarP_1,9.7 //	maNxala Adizu aSaktaH tu kalpayitvA Ar acayet harim // GarP_1,9.7 //
   caturdvāraṃ bhavettacca brahmatīrthādanukramāt /	catur dvAram Bavet tat ca brahma tIrTAt anukramAt /
   hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,9.8 //	hastam padmam samAKyAtam patrANi aFgulayaH smRtAH // GarP_1,9.8 //
   karṇikā talahastantu nakhānyasya tu kesarāḥ /	karNikA talahaH tantu naKAni asya tu kesarAH /
   tatrārcayeddhariṃ dhyātvā sūryandvagnayantareva ca // GarP_1,9.9 //	tatra arcayet harim DyAtvA sUryandvagnayantareva ca // GarP_1,9.9 //
   taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ /	tam hastam pAtayet mUrDni Sizyasya tu samAhitaH /
   haste viṣṇuḥ sthito yasmādviṣṇuhastastatastvayam /	haste vizNuH sTitaH yasmAt vizNu hastaH tatas tu ayam /
   naśyanti sparśanāttasya pātakānyakhilāni ca // GarP_1,9.10 //	naSyanti sparSanAt tasya pAtakAni aKilAni ca // GarP_1,9.10 //
   guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā /	guruH Sizyam samaByarcya netre badDe tu vAsasA /
   devasya pramukhaṃ kṛtvā puṣpamevārpayettataḥ /	devasya pramuKam kRtvA puzpam eva arpayet tatas /
   puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // GarP_1,9.11 //	puzpam nipatitam yatra mUrDnaH devasya SArFgiNaH // GarP_1,9.11 //
   tannāma kārayettasya strīṇāṃ nāmāṅkitaṃ svayam /	tad nAma kArayet tasya strINAm nAma aFkitam svayam /
   śūdrāṇāṃ dāsasaṃyuktaṃ kārayettu vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,9.12 //	SUdrANAm dAsa saMyuktam kArayet tu vicakzaNaH // GarP_1,9.12 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ	vizNudIkzA anidR nAma navamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  10	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 10
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   r śyādipūjāṃ pravarśyāmi sthaṇḍilādiṣu siddhaye /	r SyAdi pUjAm pravarSyAmi sTaNxila Adizu sidDaye /
   śrīṃ hrīṃ mahālakṣmyai namaḥ /	SrIm hrIm mahAlakzmyE namaH /
   śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāddhṛdayaṃ ca śiraḥ śikhām /	SrAm SrIm SrUm SrEm SrOm SraH kramAt hRdayam ca SiraH SiKAm /
   kavacaṃ netramastraṃ ca āsanaṃ mūrtimarcayet // GarP_1,10.1 //	kavacam netram astram ca Asanam mUrtim arcayet // GarP_1,10.1 //
   maṇḍale padmagarbhe ca caturdvāri rajo 'nvite /	maNxale padma garBe ca catur dvAri rajaH anvite /
   catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣe khākṣyādi maṇḍalam // GarP_1,10.2 //	catuH zazwi antam azwa Adi Ka akze Ka akzi Adi maNxalam // GarP_1,10.2 //
   khākṣīndusūryagaṃ sarvaṃ khādivedenduvartanāt /	KAkzi indu sUrya gam sarvam Ka Adi veda indu vartanAt /
   lakṣmīmaṅgāni caikasminkoṇe durgāṃ gaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_1,10.3 //	lakzmIm aFgAni ca ekasmin koNe durgAm gaNam gurum // GarP_1,10.3 //
   kṣetrapālamathāgnyādau homāñjuhāva kāmabhāk /	kzetrapAlam aTa agni AdO homAn juhAva kAma BAj /
   oṃ ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.4 //	om Gam wam xam ham SrI mahAlakzmyE namaH // GarP_1,10.4 //
   anena pūjayellakṣmīṃ pūrvoktaparivārakaiḥ /	anena pUjayet lakzmIm pUrva ukta parivArakEH /
   oṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ /	om sEm sarasvatyE namaH /
   oṃ hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.5 //	om hrIm sEm sarasvatyE namaH // GarP_1,10.5 //
   oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.6 //	om hrIm vada vat avAc u Adi nisvAhAH om hrIm sarasvatyE namaH // GarP_1,10.6 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ	lakzmyarcananirUpaNam nAma daSamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  11	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 11
   hariruvācaṃ /	hariH uvAcam /
   navavyūhārcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ kaśyapāya hi /	nava vyUha arcanam vakzye yat uktam kaSyapAya hi /
   jīvamutkṣipya mūrdhanyaṃ nābhyāṃ vyomniniveśayet // GarP_1,11.1 //	jIvam utkzipya mUrDanyam nAByAm vyomniniveSayet // GarP_1,11.1 //
   tatoramiti bījena dahedbhūtātmakaṃ vapuḥ /	tatoram iti bIjena dahet BUta Atmakam vapuH /
   yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet // GarP_1,11.2 //	yam iti anena bIjena tat ca sarva vinASayet // GarP_1,11.2 //
   lamityanena bījena plāvayetsacarācaram /	lam iti anena bIjena plAvayet sacarAcaram /
   vamityanena bījena cintayedamṛtaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,11.3 //	vam iti anena bIjena cintayet amRtam tatas // GarP_1,11.3 //
   tato budvudamadhye tu pītavāsāścaturbhujaḥ /	tatas budvuda maDye tu pIta vAsAH catur BujaH /
   ahaṃ matastathātmānaṃ dhyānena paricintayet // GarP_1,11.4 //	aham mataH taTA AtmAnam DyAnena paricintayet // GarP_1,11.4 //
   mantranyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryāttrividhaṃ karadehayoḥ /	mantra nyAsam tatas kuryAt triviDam kara dehayoH /
   dvādaśākṣarabījena uktabījairanantaram // GarP_1,11.5 //	dvAdaSa akzara bIjena ukta bIjEH anantaram // GarP_1,11.5 //
   ṣaḍaṅgena tataḥ kuryātsākṣādyena harirbhavet /	zaxaFgena tatas kuryAt sAkzAt yena hariH Bavet /
   dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhamārabhya madhyāṅguṣṭhandale nyaset // GarP_1,11.6 //	dakziNa aFguzWam AraBya maDya aFguzWan dale nyaset // GarP_1,11.6 //
   madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ /	maDye bIja dvayam nyasya nyaset aFge tatas punar /
   hṛcchirasi śikhāvarṃmavakkrākṣyudahapṛṣṭhataḥ // GarP_1,11.7 //	hRd Sirasi SiKA varMma vakkrAkzyu daha pRzWataH // GarP_1,11.7 //
   bāhvośca karayorjānvoḥ pādayoścāpi vinyaset /	bAhvoH ca karayoH jAnvoH pAdayoH ca api vinyaset /
   padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet // GarP_1,11.8 //	padma AkArO karO kRtvA maDye aFguzWam niveSayet // GarP_1,11.8 //
   cintayettatra sarveśaṃ paraṃ tattvamanāmayam /	cintayet tatra sarva ISam param tattvam anAmayam /
   kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set // GarP_1,11.9 //	kramAt ca etAni bIjAni tarjanI Adizu vinya set // GarP_1,11.9 //
   tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā /	tatas mUrDa akzi vakkrezu kaNWe ca hRdaye taTA /
   nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayorvinyasetkramāt // GarP_1,11.10 //	nABO guhye taTA jAnvoH pAdayoH vinyaset kramAt // GarP_1,11.10 //
   pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset /	pANyoH zaxaFga bIjAni nyasya kAye tatas nyaset /
   aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntaṃ vinyasedvījapañcakam // GarP_1,11.11 //	aFguzWa Adi kanizWA antam vinyaset vIja paQcakam // GarP_1,11.11 //
   karamadhye netrabījamaṅganyāsa'pyayaṃ kramaḥ /	kara maDye netra bIjam aFganyAsa api ayam kramaH /
   hṛdaye hṛdayaṃ nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset // GarP_1,11.12 //	hRdaye hRdayam nyasya SiraH Sirasi vinyaset // GarP_1,11.12 //
   śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau /	SiKAyAm tu SiKAm nyasya kavacam sarvatas tanO /
   netraṃ netre vidhātavyamastrañca karayordvayoḥ // GarP_1,11.13 //	netram netre viDAtavyam astraQca karayoH dvayoH // GarP_1,11.13 //
   tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret /	tena eva ca diSaH badDA pUjA viDim aTa Acaret /
   hṛdaye cintayetpūrvaṃ yogapīṭhaṃ samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,11.14 //	hRdaye cintayet pUrvam yoga pIWam samAhitaH // GarP_1,11.14 //
   dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam /	Darma jQanam ca vErAgyam ESvaryam ca yaTAkramam /
   āgneyādau ca pūrvādāvadharmādīṃśca vinyaset // GarP_1,11.15 //	Agneya AdO ca pUrva AdO= aDarma AdIn= ca vinyaset // GarP_1,11.15 //
   ebhiḥ paricchannatanuṃ pīṭhabhūtaṃ tadātmakam /	eBiH paricCanna tanum pIWa BUtam tad Atmakam /
   anantaṃ vinsetpaścātpūrvakāyonnataṃ sthitam // GarP_1,11.16 //	anantam vinset paScAt pUrva kAya unnatam sTitam // GarP_1,11.16 //
   tato vidyātsarojātaṃ dalāṣṭasamadigdalam /	tatas vidyAt saraH jAtam dala azwa sama diS dalam /
   sitābjaṃ śatapatrāḍhyaṃ viprakīrṇordhakarṇikam // GarP_1,11.17 //	sita abjam Satapatra AXyam viprakIrNa UrDa karNikam // GarP_1,11.17 //
   dhyātvā vedādinā paścātsūryasomānalātmanām /	DyAtvA veda AdinA paScAt sUrya soma anala AtmanAm /
   maṇḍalāni kramādevamuparyupari cintayet // GarP_1,11.18 //	maNxalAni kramAt evam upari upari cintayet // GarP_1,11.18 //
   tataḥ pūrvādidiksaṃsthāḥ śaktīḥ keśavagocarāḥ /	tatas pUrva Adi diS saMsTAH SaktIH keSava gocarAH /
   vimalādyā nyasedaṣṭau navamīṃ karṇikāgatām // GarP_1,11.19 //	vimala AdyAH nyaset azwO navamIm karNikA gatAm // GarP_1,11.19 //
   evaṃ dhyātvā samabhyarcya yogapīṭhamanantaram /	evam DyAtvA samaByarcya yoga pIWam anantaram /
   manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ // GarP_1,11.20 //	manasA AvAhya tatra ISam harim SArFgam nyaset punar // GarP_1,11.20 //
   hṛdayādīni pūrvādicaturdigdalayogataḥ /	hRdaya AdIni pUrva Adi catur diS dala yogataH /
   madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ // GarP_1,11.21 //	maDye netram tu koNezu astramantram nyaset tatas // GarP_1,11.21 //
   saṅkarṣaṇādibījāni pūrvādikramayogataḥ /	saFkarzaNa Adi bIjAni pUrva Adi krama yogataH /
   dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,11.22 //	dvAri pUrve pare ca eva vEnateyam tu vinyaset // GarP_1,11.22 //
   sudarśanaṃ sahasrāraṃ dakṣiṇe dvāri vinyaset /	sudarSanam sahasrAram dakziNe dvAri vinyaset /
   śriyaṃ dakṣiṇato nyasya lakṣmīmuttaratastathā // GarP_1,11.23 //	Sriyam dakziNatas nyasya lakzmIm uttaratas taTA // GarP_1,11.23 //
   dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset /	dvAryattare gadAm nyasya SaFKam koNezu vinyaset /
   devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset // GarP_1,11.24 //	deva dakziNatas SArFgam vAme ca eva suDIH nyaset // GarP_1,11.24 //
   tadvatkhaṅgaṃ tathā cakraṃ nyasetpārśvadvayordvayam /	tadvat KaFgam taTA cakram nyaset pArSva dvayoH dvayam /
   tato 'ntarlokapālāṃśca svadigbhedena vinyaset // GarP_1,11.25 //	tatas antar lokapAlAn= ca sva diS Bedena vinyaset // GarP_1,11.25 //
   vajrādīnyāyudhānyeva tathaiva viniveśayet /	vajra AdIni AyuDAni eva taTA eva viniveSayet /
   ūrghvaṃ brihma tathānantamadhaśca paricintayet // GarP_1,11.26 //	UrGvam brihma taTA anantam aDas ca paricintayet // GarP_1,11.26 //
   sarvaṃ dhyātveti saṃpūjya mudrāḥ sandarśayettataḥ /	sarvam DyAtvA iti saMpUjya mudrAH sandarSayet tatas /
   añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī // GarP_1,11.27 //	aQjaliH praTamA mudrA kzipram deva prasADanI // GarP_1,11.27 //
   vandanī hṛdayāsaktātsārdhaṃ dakṣiṇatonnatā /	vandanI hRdaya AsaktAt sArDam dakziNatA unnatA /
   ūrdhāṅguṇṭho vāmamuṣṭirdakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhabandhanaḥ // GarP_1,11.28 //	UrDAFguNWaH vAma muzwiH dakziNa aFguzWa banDanaH // GarP_1,11.28 //
   savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /	savyasya tasya ca aFguzWaH yaH saH udDaH prakIrtitaH /
   tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ // GarP_1,11.29 //	tisraH sADAraNAH hi etAH mUrti Bedena kalpitAH // GarP_1,11.29 //
   kaniṣṭhādipramokeṇa aṣṭau mudrā yathākramam /	kanizWA Adi pramokeNa azwO mudrA yaTAkramam /
   aṣṭānāṃ pūrvabījānāṃ kramaśastvavadhārayet // GarP_1,11.30 //	azwAnAm pUrva bIjAnAm kramaSas tu avaDArayet // GarP_1,11.30 //
   aṅguṣṭhena kaniṣṭhāntaṃ nāmayitvāṅgulitrayam /	aFguzWena kanizWA antam nAmayitvA aFguli trayam /
   mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam // GarP_1,11.31 //	mudrA iyam narasiMhasya nyubjam kRtvA kara dvayam // GarP_1,11.31 //
   savyahastaṃ tathottānaṃ kṛtvordhaṃ bhrāmayecchanaiḥ /	savya hastam taTA uttAnam kRtvA UrDam BrAmayet SanEs /
   navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā // GarP_1,11.32 //	navamIyam smRtA mudrA varAha aBimatA sadA // GarP_1,11.32 //
   muṣṭidvayamathottānamṛjvaikaikena mocayet /	muzwi dvayam aTa uttAnam RjvA ekEkena mocayet /
   utkuñcayetsarvamuktā aṅgamudreyamucyate // GarP_1,11.33 //	utkuQcayet sarva muktA aFga mudrA iyam ucyate // GarP_1,11.33 //
   muṣṭidvayamatho baddhā evamevānupūrvaśaḥ /	muzwi dvayam aTo badDAH evam eva anupUrvaSas /
   daśānāṃ lokapālānāṃ mudrāśca kramayogataḥ // GarP_1,11.34 //	daSAnAm lokapAlAnAm mudrAH ca krama yogataH // GarP_1,11.34 //
   suramādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca upāntyañcāntyameva ca /	suram Adyam dvitIyam ca upAnti aQcA antyam eva ca /
   vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam // GarP_1,11.35 //	vAsudevaH balaH kAmaH hi anirudDaH yaTAkramam // GarP_1,11.35 //
   praṇavastatsadityetad huṃ kṣaiṃ bhūriti mantrakāḥ /	praNavaH tat sat iti etat hum kzEm BUH iti mantrakAH /
   nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ // GarP_1,11.36 //	nArAyaNaH taTA brahmA vizNuH siMhaH varAha rAj // GarP_1,11.36 //
   sitāruṇaharidrābhā nīlaśyāmallohitāḥ /	sita aruNa haridrA ABAH nIla SyAmat lohitAH /
   meghāgnimadupiṅgābhā varṇato navanāmakāḥ // GarP_1,11.37 //	meGa agnimadu piFga ABAH varNataH nava nAmakAH // GarP_1,11.37 //
   kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam /	kam wam pam Sam garutmAn syAt jam Kam vam ca sudarSanam /
   ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam // GarP_1,11.38 //	zam cam Pam zam gadA devI vam lam mam kzam ca SaFKakam // GarP_1,11.38 //
   ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā /	Gam Xam Bam ham Bavet SrIH ca gam jam vam Sam ca puzwikA /
   ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet // GarP_1,11.39 //	Gam vam ca vanamAlA syAt SrI vatsam dam sam Bavet // GarP_1,11.39 //
   chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca /	Cam xam pam yam kOstuBaH proktaH ca anantaH hi aham eva ca /
   ityaṅgāniyathāyogaṃ devadevasya vai daśā // GarP_1,11.40 //	iti aFgAniyaTAyogam devadevasya vE daSA // GarP_1,11.40 //
   garuḍo 'mbujasaṃkāśo gadā caivāsitākṛtiḥ /	garuxaH ambuja saMkASaH gadA ca eva asita AkRtiH /
   puṣṭiḥ śirīṣapuṣpābhā lakṣmīḥ kāñcanasannibhā // GarP_1,11.41 //	puzwiH SirIza puzpa ABA lakzmIH kAQcana sanniBAH // GarP_1,11.41 //
   pūrṇacandranibhaḥ śaṅkhaḥ kaustubhastvaruṇadyutiḥ /	pUrNa candra niBaH SaFKaH kOstuBaH tu aruNa dyutiH /
   cakraṃ sūryasahasrābhaṃ śrīvatsaḥ kundasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,11.42 //	cakram sUrya sahasra ABam SrIvatsaH kunda sanniBaH // GarP_1,11.42 //
   pañcavarṇanibhā mālā hyananto meghasannibhaḥ /	paQca varNa niBAH mAlAH hi anantaH meGa sanniBaH /
   vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ // GarP_1,11.43 //	vidyut rUpANi ca astrANi yAni na uktAni varNataH // GarP_1,11.43 //
   arghyapādyādi vai dadyātpuṇḍarīkākṣavidyayā // GarP_1,11.44 //	arGya pAdya Adi vE dadyAt puNxarIkAkza vidyayA // GarP_1,11.44 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ	navavyUha arcanam nAma ekAdaSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  12	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 12
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   pūjānukramasiddhyarthaṃ pūjānukrama ucyate /	pUjA anukrama sidDi arTam pUjA anukramaH ucyate /
   oṃ nama ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ // GarP_1,12.1 //	om namaH ityAdO saMsmRtiH paramAtmanaH // GarP_1,12.1 //
   yaṃ raṃ vaṃ lamiti kāyaśuddhiḥ /	yam ram vam lam iti kAya SudDiH /
   oṃ nama iti caturbhujātmanirmāṇam // GarP_1,12.2 //	om namaH iti catur Buja Atma nirmANam // GarP_1,12.2 //
   tatastrividhaḥ karakāyanyāsaḥ /	tatas triviDaH karakAya nyAsaH /
   tato tdṛdisthayogapīṭhapūjā /	tatas tdRdisTa yoga pIWa pUjA /
   oṃ anantāya namaḥ /	om anantAya namaH /

   oṃ satyāyai namaḥ /	om satyAyE namaH /
   oṃ īśānāyai namaḥ /	om ISAnAyE namaH /
   oṃ sarvatomukhyai namaḥ /	om sarvatomuKyE namaH /
   oṃ saṃgopāṅgāya harerāsanāya namaḥ /	om saMga upAFgAya hareH AsanAya namaH /
   tataḥ karṇikāyām aṃ vāsudevāya namaḥ /	tatas karNikAyAm  am vAsudevAya namaH /
   āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	Am hRdayAya namaH /
   īṃ śirase namaḥ /	Im Sirase namaH /
   ūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ /	Um SiKAyE namaH /
   aiṃ kavacāya namaḥ /	Em kavacAya namaH /
   auṃ netratrayāya namaḥ /	Om netratrayAya namaH /
   aḥ phaṭ astrāya namaḥ /	aH Paw astrAya namaH /
   āṃ saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ /	Am saFkarzaNAya namaH /
   aṃ pradyumnāya namaḥ /	am pradyumnAya namaH /
   aḥ aniruddhāya namaḥ /	aH anirudDAya namaH /
   oṃ aḥ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /	om aH nArAyaNAya namaH /
   oṃ tatsabdahmaṇe namaḥ /	om tad sabda hmaNe namaH /
   oṃ huṃ viṣṇave namaḥ /	om hum vizNave namaH /
   kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūrvarāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya	kzEm narasiMhAya BUH varAhya kam vEnateyAya jam Kam vam sudarSanAya
   khaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ	Kam cam Pam zam gadAyE vam lam mam kzam pAQcajanyAya Gam Xam Bam ham
   śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śaṃ śrīvatsāya	SriyE gam xam vam Sam puzwyE Dam vam vanamAlAyE dam Sam SrIvatsAya
   chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śaṃ śārṅgāya iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ	Cam xam yam kOstuBAya Sam SArFgAya im izuDiByAm cam carmaNe Kam
   khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye	KaxgAya indrAya surAya partaye agnaye
   tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye varuṇāya	tejoDipatayeya mAya Darma aDipataya IkzaMnEH RtAya rakzA UDipataye varuNAya
   jalādhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye dhāṃ dhanadāya dhanādhipataye hāṃ	jala aDipataye yom vAyave prANa aDipataye DAm DanadAya DanADipataye hAm
   īśānāya vidyādhipataye oṃ vajrāya śaktyai oṃ daṇḍāya khaṅgāya oṃ pāśāya	ISAnAya vidyA aDipataye om vajrAya SaktyE om daNxAya KaFgAya om pASAya
   dhvajāya gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātālādhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe	DvajAya gadAyE triSUlAya lam anantAya pAtAla aDipataye Kam brahmaNe
   sarvalokādhipataye oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ /	sarva loka aDipataye om namaH Bagavate vAsudevAya namaH /

   oṃ naṃ namaḥ /	om nam namaH /

   oṃ puruṣottamāya namaḥ // GarP_1,12.3 //	om puruzottamAya namaH // GarP_1,12.3 //
   namaste puṇḍarīkākṣa namaste viśvabhāvana /	namaH te puNxarIkAkza namaH te viSvaBAvanaH /
   subrahmaṇya namaste 'stu mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja // GarP_1,12.4 //	subrahmaNya namaH te astu mahApuruza pUrvajaH // GarP_1,12.4 //
   homakarṇaṇi caiteṣāṃ svāhāntamupakalpayet /	homa karNaNi ca etezAm svAhA antam upakalpayet /
   evaṃ japtvā vidhānena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,12.5 //	evam japtvA viDAnena Satam azwa uttaram taTA // GarP_1,12.5 //
   arghaṃ dattvā jitaṃ tena praṇāmaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /	arGam dattvA jitam tena praNAmam ca punar punar /
   tato 'gnāvapi sampūjyaṃ taṃ yajeta yathāvidhi // GarP_1,12.6 //	tatas agnO= api sampUjyam tam yajeta yaTAviDi // GarP_1,12.6 //
   devadevaṃ svabījena aṅgādibhirathācyutam /	devadevam sva bIjena aFga AdiBiH aTa acyutam /
   pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit // GarP_1,12.7 //	pUrvam ulliKya ca aByukzya praNavena tu mantra vid // GarP_1,12.7 //
   bhrāmayitvānalaṃ kuṇḍe pūjayecca śubhaiḥ phalaiḥ /	BrAmayitvA analam kuNxe pUjayet ca SuBEH PalEH /
   pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset // GarP_1,12.8 //	pUrvam tat sakalam DyAtvA maNxale manasA nyaset // GarP_1,12.8 //
   vāsudevākhyatattvena hutvā cāṣṭottaraṃ śatam /	vAsudeva AKya tattvena hutvA ca azwa uttaram Satam /
   saṃkarṣaṇādibījena yajetṣaṭkaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,12.9 //	saMkarzaNa Adi bIjena yajet zawkam taTA eva ca // GarP_1,12.9 //
   trayantrayaṃ tathāṅgānāmekaikāndikpatīṃstathā /	trayantrayam taTA aFgAnAm ekEkAn dikpatIn= taTA /
   pūrṇāhutiṃ tathaivānte dadyātsamyagupasthitaḥ // GarP_1,12.10 //	pUrNAhutim taTA eva ante dadyAt samyak upasTitaH // GarP_1,12.10 //
   vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet /	vAc atIte pare tattve AtmAnam ca layam nayet /
   upaviśya punarmudrāṃ darśayitvā nametpunaḥ // GarP_1,12.11 //	upaviSya punar mudrAm darSayitvA namet punar // GarP_1,12.11 //
   nityamevaṃvidhaṃ homaṃ naimitte dviguṇaṃ bhavet /	nityam evaMviDam homam nEmitte dviguNam Bavet /
   gacchagaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo nirañjanaḥ // GarP_1,12.12 //	gacCagacCa param sTAnam yatra devaH niraQjanaH // GarP_1,12.12 //
   gacchantu devatāḥ sarvāḥ svasthānasthitihetave /	gacCantu devatAH sarvAH sva sTAna sTiti hetave /
   sudarśanaḥ śrīhariśca acyutaḥ sa trivikramaḥ // GarP_1,12.13 //	sudarSanaH SrI hariH ca acyutaH sa trivikramaH // GarP_1,12.13 //
   caturbhujo vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumna eva ca /	catur BujaH vAsudevaH zazWaH pradyumnaH eva ca /
   saṃkarṣaṇaḥ pūruṣo 'tha navavyūho daśātmakaḥ // GarP_1,12.14 //	saMkarzaNaH pUruzaH aTa nava vyUhaH daSa AtmakaH // GarP_1,12.14 //
   aniruddho dvādaśātmā atha ūrdhamanantakaḥ /	anirudDaH dvAdaSa AtmA aTa UrDam anantakaH /
   ete ekādibhiścakrairvijñeyā lakṣitāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,12.15 //	ete eka AdiBiH cakrEH vijQeyAH lakzitAH surAH // GarP_1,12.15 //
   cakrāṅkitaiḥ pūjitaḥ syāndrṛhe rakṣetsadānaraiḥ /	cakra aFkitEH pUjitaH syAndrRhe rakzet sadA narEH /
   oṃ cakrāya svāhā,oṃ vicakrāya svāhā,oṃ sucakrāya svāhā,oṃ mahācakrāya	om cakrAya svAhA,om vicakrAya svAhA,om su cakrAya svAhA,om mahA cakrAya
   svāhā,oṃ mahācakrāya asurāntakṛt huṃ phaṭ oṃ huṃ sahasrāra huṃ phaṭ //	svAhA,om mahA cakrAya asura anta kRt hum Paw om hum sahasrAra hum Paw //

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  13	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 13
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   pravakṣyāmyadhunā hyetadvaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ śubham /	pravakzyAmi aDunA hi etat vEzNavam paQjaram SuBam /
   namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam // GarP_1,13.1 //	namaH namaH te movidam cakram gRhya sudarSanam // GarP_1,13.1 //
   prācyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /	prAcyAm rakzasva mAm vizNo ! tvAm aham SaraNam gataH /
   gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te // GarP_1,13.2 //	gadAm kOmodakIm gRhNa padmanABa namaH asta te // GarP_1,13.2 //
   yāmyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /	yAmyAm rakzasva mAm vizNo ! tvAm aham SaraNam gataH /
   halamādāya saunande namaste puruṣottama // GarP_1,13.3 //	halam AdAya sOnande namaH te puruzottamaH // GarP_1,13.3 //
   pratīcyāṃ rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmaha śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /	pratIcyAm rakza mAm vizNo ! tvAm aha SaraNam gataH /
   musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām // GarP_1,13.4 //	musalam SAtanam gRhya puNxarIkAkza rakza mAm // GarP_1,13.4 //
   uttarasyāṃ jagannātha ! bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /	uttarasyAm jagannATa ! Bavantam SaraNam gataH /
   khaḍgamādāya carṃmātha astraśāstrādikaṃ hare ! // GarP_1,13.5 //	Kaxgam AdAya carMma aTa astra SAstra Adikam hare ! // GarP_1,13.5 //
   namaste rakṣa rakṣoghna ! aiśānyāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /	namaH te rakza rakzaH GnaH ! ESAnyAm SaraNam gataH /
   pāñcajanyaṃ mahāśaṅkhamanughoṣyaṃ ca paṅkajam // GarP_1,13.6 //	pAQcajanyam mahA SaFKam anuGozyam ca paFkajam // GarP_1,13.6 //
   pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara /	pragRhya rakza mAm vizNo AgnyeyyAm rakza sUkaraH /
   candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā // GarP_1,13.7 //	candra sUryam samAgRhya Kaxgam cAndramasam taTA // GarP_1,13.7 //
   nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin /	nErRtyAm mAm ca rakzasva divya mUrte nR kesarin /
   vaijayantīṃ smapragṛhya śrīvatsaṃ kaṇṭhabhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,13.8 //	vEjayantIm sma pragRhya SrIvatsam kaNWa BUzaNam // GarP_1,13.8 //
   vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te /	vAyavyAm rakza mAm deva hayagrIva namaH astu te /
   vainateyaṃ samāruhya tvantarikṣe janārdana ! // GarP_1,13.9 //	vEnateyam samAruhya tu antarikze janArdana ! // GarP_1,13.9 //
   māṃ rakṣasvājita sadā namaste 'stvaparājita /	mAm rakzasva ajita sadA namaH te astu aparAjita /
   viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale // GarP_1,13.10 //	viSAla akzam samAruhya rakza mAm tvam rasAtale // GarP_1,13.10 //
   akūpāra namastubhyaṃ mahāmīna namo 'stu pte /	akUpAra namaH tuByam mahA amIna namaH astu pte /
   karaśīrṣādyaṅgulīṣu satya tvaṃ bāhupañjaram // GarP_1,13.11 //	kara SIrza Adi aFgulIzu satya tvam bAhu paQjaram // GarP_1,13.11 //
   kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama /	kRtvA rakzasva mAm vizNo namaH te puruzottamaH /
   etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat // GarP_1,13.12 //	etat uktam SaFkarAya vEzNavam paQjaram mahat // GarP_1,13.12 //
   purā rakṣārthamīśānyāḥ kātyāyanyā vṛṣadhvaja /	purA rakzA arTam ISAnyAH kAtyAyanyA vRzaDvaja /
   nāśāyāmāsa sā yena cāmarānmahiṣāsuram // GarP_1,13.13 //	nASAyAmAsa sA yena ca amarAn mahiza asuram // GarP_1,13.13 //
   dānavaṃ raktabījaṃ ca anyāṃśca surakaṇṭakān /	dAnavam raktabIjam ca anyAn= ca sura kaNwakAn /
   etajjapannaro bhaktyā śatrūnvijayate sadā // GarP_1,13.14 //	etad japan naraH BaktyA SatrUn vijayate sadA // GarP_1,13.14 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ	iti SrI gAruxe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe vizNu paQjara stotram
   nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ	nAma trayodaSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  14	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 14
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   atha yogaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktikaraṃ param /	aTa yogam pravakzyAmi Bukti mukti karam param /
   dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,14.1 //	DyAyiBiH procyate DyeyaH DyAnena hariH ISvaraH // GarP_1,14.1 //
   tacchṛṇuṣva maheśāna sarvapāpavināśanam /	tat SRNuzva maheSAna sarva pApa vinASanam /
   viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaro 'nantaḥ ṣaḍbhirbhūparivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.2 //	vizNuH sarva ISvaraH anantaH zaxBiH BU parivarjitaH // GarP_1,14.2 //
   vāsudevo jagannātho brahmātmāsmyahameva hi /	vAsudevaH jagannATaH brahma AtmA asmi aham eva hi /
   dehidehasthito nityaḥ sarvadehavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.3 //	dehi deha sTitaH nityaH sarva deha vivarjitaH // GarP_1,14.3 //
   dehadharṃmavihīnaśca kṣarākṣaravivarjitaḥ /	deha DarMma vihInaH ca kzara akzara vivarjitaH /
   ṣaḍvidheṣu sthito draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hyatīndriyaḥ // GarP_1,14.4 //	zaxviDezu sTitaH drazwA SrotA GrAtA hi atIndriyaH // GarP_1,14.4 //
   taddharṃmarahitaḥ sraṣṭā nāmagotravivarjitaḥ /	tad harMma rahitaH srazwA nAma gotra vivarjitaH /
   mantā manaḥ sthito devo manasā parivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.5 //	mantA manaH sTitaH devaH manasA parivarjitaH // GarP_1,14.5 //
   manodharṃmavihīnaśca vijñānaṃ jñānameva ca /	manaH DarMma vihInaH ca vijQAnam jQAnam eva ca /
   boddhā buddhisthitaḥ sākṣī sarvajño buddhivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.6 //	bodDA budDi sTitaH sAkzI sarvajQaH budDi varjitaH // GarP_1,14.6 //
   buddhidharṃmavihīnaśca sarvaḥ sarvagato manaḥ /	budDi DarMma vihInaH ca sarvaH sarva gataH manaH /
   sarvaprāṇivinirmuktaḥ prāṇadharṃmavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.7 //	sarva prANi vinirmuktaH prANa DarMma vivarjitaH // GarP_1,14.7 //
   prāṇaprāṇo mahāśānto bhayena parivarjitaḥ /	prANa prANaH mahA SAntaH Bayena parivarjitaH /
   ahaṅkārādihīnaśca taddharṃmaparivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.8 //	ahaFkAra Adi hInaH ca tad harMma parivarjitaH // GarP_1,14.8 //
   tatsākṣī tanniyantā ca paramānandarūpakaḥ /	tad sAkzI tat niyantA ca parama Ananda rUpakaH /
   jāgratsvapnasuṣuptisthastatsākṣī tadvivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.9 //	jAgrat svapna suzupti sTaH tad sAkzI tad vivarjitaH // GarP_1,14.9 //
   turīyaḥ paramo dhātā dṛgrūpo guṇavarjitaḥ /	turIyaH paramaH DAtA dRS rUpaH guNa varjitaH /
   mukto buddho 'jaro vyāpī satya ātmāsmyahaṃ śivaḥ // GarP_1,14.10 //	muktaH budDaH ajaraH vyApI satyaH AtmA asmi aham SivaH // GarP_1,14.10 //
   evaṃ ye mānavā vijñā dhyāyantīśaṃ paraṃ padam /	evam ye mAnavAH vijQAH DyAyanti ISam param padam /
   prāpnuyuste ca tadrūpaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,14.11 //	prApnuyuH te ca tad rUpam na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,14.11 //
   iti dhyānaṃ samākhyātaṃ tava śaṅkara suvrata /	iti DyAnam samAKyAtam tava SaFkara suvrata /
   paṭhedya etatsatataṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,14.12 //	paWet yaH etat satatam vizNu lokam sa gacCati // GarP_1,14.12 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dhyānayogo	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe DyAna yogaH 
   nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ	nAma caturdaSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  15	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 15
   rudra uvāca /	rudraH uvAca /

   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /

   oṃ khakholkāya namaḥ /	om KaKolkAya namaH /
