   GarP_1,16.13 //	GarP_1,16.13 //
   sakalīkaraṇaṃ kuryādrāyatryā bhāskarasya ca /	sakalIkaraNam kuryAt rAyatryA BAskarasya ca /
   dharṃmātmane ca pūrvasminyamā yeti ca dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,16.14 //	DarMma Atmane ca pUrvasmin yamA yA iti ca dakziNe // GarP_1,16.14 //
   daṇḍanāyakāya tato daivatāyeti cottare /	daNxanAyakAya tatas dEvatAya iti ca uttare /
   śyāmapiṅgalamaiśānyāmāgneyyāṃ dīkṣitaṃ yajet // GarP_1,16.15 //	SyAma piFgalam ESAnyAm AgneyyAm dIkzitam yajet // GarP_1,16.15 //
   vajrapāṇiṃ ca nairṛtyāṃ bhūrbhuvaḥsvaśca vāyave /	vajrapANim ca nErRtyAm BUH BuvaH svaH ca vAyave /
   oṃ candrāya nakṣatrādhipataye namaḥ /	om candrAya nakzatra aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ aṅgārakāya kṣitisutāya namaḥ /	om aFgArakAya kzitisutAya namaH /
   oṃ budhāya somasutāya namaḥ /	om buDAya somasutAya namaH /
   oṃ vāgīśvarāya sarvavidyādhipataye namaḥ /	om vAc ISvarAya sarva vidyA aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ śukrāya maharṣaye bhṛgusutāya namaḥ /	om SukrAya mahA Rzaye BRgu sutAya namaH /
   oṃ śanaiścarāya sūryātmajāya namaḥ /	om SanEScarAya sUrya AtmajAya namaH /
   oṃ rāhave namaḥ /	om rAhave namaH /
   oṃ ketave namaḥ // GarP_1,16.16 //	om ketave namaH // GarP_1,16.16 //
   pūrvādīśānaparyantā ete pūjyā vṛṣadhvaja /	pUrva Adi ISAna paryantAH ete pUjyAH vRzaDvaja /
   oṃ anūkāya namaḥ /	om anUkAya namaH /
   oṃ prathamanāthāya namaḥ /	om praTama nATAya namaH /
   oṃ buddhāya namaḥ // GarP_1,16.17 //	om budDAya namaH // GarP_1,16.17 //
   oṃ bhagavannaparimitamayūkhamālin ! sakalajagatpate ! saptāśvavāhana !	om Bagavan= aparimita mayUKa mAlin ! sakala jagatpate ! sapta aSva vAhana !
   caturbhuja ! paramasiddhiprada ! visphuliṅgapiṅgala ! tata ehyehi	catur Buja ! parama sidDi prade ! visPuliFga piFgala ! tatas ehi ehi
   idamarghyaṃ mama śirasi gataṃ gṛhṇagṛhṇa tejograrūpam anagna ! jvalajvala	idam arGyam mama Sirasi gatam gRhNa gRhNa teja ugra rUpam anagne ! jvalajvala
   ṭhaṭha namaḥ // GarP_1,16.18 //	Wa Wa namaH // GarP_1,16.18 //
   anenāvāhya mantreṇa tataḥ sūryaṃ visarjayet /	anena AvAhya mantreNa tatas sUryam visarjayet /
   oṃ namo bhagavate ādityāya sahasra kiraṇāya gaccha sukhaṃ punarāgamanāyeti	om namaH Bagavate AdityAya sahasra kiraNAya gacCa suKam punar AgamanAya iti
   // GarP_1,16.19 //	// GarP_1,16.19 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   haridhyānasūryārcanayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ	hariDyAnasUryArcanayornirUpaNam nAma zoxaSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  17	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 17
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   punaḥ sūryārcanaṃ vakṣye yaduktaṃ dhanadāya hi /	punar sUrya arcanam vakzye yat uktam DanadAya hi /
   aṣṭapatraṃ likhetpadmaṃ śucau deśe sakarṇikam // GarP_1,17.1 //	azwa patram liKet padmam SucO deSe sa karNikam // GarP_1,17.1 //
   āvāhanīṃ tato baddhā mudrāmāvāhayedravim /	AvAhanIm tatas badDA mudrAm AvAhayet ravim /
   khakholkaṃ sthāpya mudrāṃ tu sthāpayenmantrarūpiṇīm // GarP_1,17.2 //	Ka Kolkam sTApya mudrAm tu sTApayet mantra rUpiNIm // GarP_1,17.2 //
   āgneyyāṃ diśi devasya hṛdayaṃ sthāpayecchiva ! /	AgneyyAm diSi devasya hRdayam sTApayet Siva ! /
   aiśānyāṃ tu śiraḥ sthāpyaṃ nairṛtyāṃ vinyasecchikhām // GarP_1,17.3 //	ESAnyAm tu SiraH sTApyam nErRtyAm vinyaset SiKAm // GarP_1,17.3 //
   paurandaryāṃ nyaseddharṃmamekāgrasthitamānasaḥ /	pOrandaryAm nyaset harMmam ekAgra sTita mAnasaH /
   vāyavyāṃ caiva netraṃ tu vāruṇyāmastrameva ca // GarP_1,17.4 //	vAyavyAm ca eva netram tu vAruNyAm astram eva ca // GarP_1,17.4 //
   aiśānyāṃ sthāpayetsomaṃ paurandaryāṃ tu lohitam /	ESAnyAm sTApayet somam pOrandaryAm tu lohitam /
   āgneyyāṃ somatanayaṃ yāmyāṃ caiva bṛhaspatim // GarP_1,17.5 //	AgneyyAm soma tanayam yAmyAm ca eva bRhaspatim // GarP_1,17.5 //
   nairṛtyāṃ dānavaguruṃ vāruṇyāṃ tu śanaiścaram /	nErRtyAm dAnava gurum vAruNyAm tu SanEScaram /
   vāyavyāṃ ca tathā ketuṃ kauberyāṃ rāhumeva ca // GarP_1,17.6 //	vAyavyAm ca taTA ketum kOberyAm rAhum eva ca // GarP_1,17.6 //
   dvitīyāyāṃ tu kakṣāyāṃ sūryāndvādaśa pūjayet /	dvitIyAyAm tu kakzAyAm sUryAn dvAdaSa pUjayet /
   bhagaḥ sūryor'yyamā caiva mitro vai varuṇastathā // GarP_1,17.7 //	BagaH sUryor ayyamA ca eva mitraH vE varuNaH taTA // GarP_1,17.7 //
   savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃśca mahābalaḥ /	savitA ca eva DAtA ca vivasvAn= ca mahA balaH /
   tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathā cendro dvādaśo viṣṇurucyate // GarP_1,17.8 //	tvazwA pUzA taTA ca indraH dvAdaSaH vizNuH ucyate // GarP_1,17.8 //
   pūrvādāvarcayeddevānindrādīñchraddhayā naraḥ /	pUrvAdO= arcayet devAn indra AdIn SradDayA naraH /
   jayā ca vijayā caiva jayanti cāparājitā /	jayA ca vijayA ca eva jayanti ca aparAjitAH /
   śeṣaśca vāsukiścaiva nāgānityādi pūjayet // GarP_1,17.9 //	SezaH ca vAsukiH ca eva nAgAn ityAdi pUjayet // GarP_1,17.9 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryārcana	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe sUrya arcana
   vidhirnāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ	viDiH nAma saptadaSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  18	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 18
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya vakṣye mṛtyuñjayārcanam /	garuxa uktam kaSyapAya vakzye mRtyuQjaya arcanam /
   uddhārapūrvakaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ matam // GarP_1,18.1 //	udDAra pUrvakam puNyam sarva deva mayam matam // GarP_1,18.1 //
   oṅkāraṃ pūrvamuddhṛtya ju(hu)ṅkāṃraṃ tadanantaram /	oFkAram pUrvam udDRtya ju(hu)FkAMram tad anantaram /
   savisargaṃ tṛtīyaṃ syānmṛtyudāridrayamardanam // GarP_1,18.2 //	sa visargam tRtIyam syAt mRtyu dAridraya mardanam // GarP_1,18.2 //
   īśaviṣṇavarkadevyādikavacaṃ sarvasādhakam /	ISa vizNa varka devI Adi kavacam sarva sADakam /
   amṛteśaṃ mahāmantrantryakṣaraṃ pūjanaṃ samam /	amRta ISam mahAmantrantrI akzaram pUjanam samam /
   japanānmṛtyuhīnāḥ syuḥ sarvapāpavivarjitāḥ // GarP_1,18.3 //	japanAt mRtyu hInAH syuH sarva pApa vivarjitAH // GarP_1,18.3 //
   śatajapyādvedaphalaṃ yajñatīrthaphalaṃ labhet /	Sata japyAt veda Palam yajQatIrTa Palam laBet /
   aṣṭottaraśatājjāpyātrisandhyaṃ mṛtyu śatrujita // GarP_1,18.4 //	azwottaraSatAt jApya atri sanDyam mRtyu Satru jitaH // GarP_1,18.4 //
   dhyāyecca sitapadmasthaṃ varadaṃ cābhayaṃ kare /	DyAyet ca sita padma sTam vara dam ca aBayam kare /
   dvābhyāṃ cāmṛtakumbhaṃ tu cintayedamṛteśvaram // GarP_1,18.5 //	dvAByAm ca amRta kumBam tu cintayet amRteSvaram // GarP_1,18.5 //
   tasyaivāṅgagatāṃ devīmamṛtāmṛtabhāṣiṇī(vini) m /	tasya eva aFga gatAm devIm amRta amRta BAziNI( vini) m /
   kalaśaṃ dakṣiṇe haste vāmahaste saroruham // GarP_1,18.6 //	kalaSam dakziNe haste vAma haste saroruham // GarP_1,18.6 //
   japedaṣṭasahasraṃ vai trisandhyaṃ māsamekataḥ /	japet azwa sahasram vE trisanDyam mAsam ekatas /
   jarāmṛtyumahāvyādhiśatrucchivaśāntidam // GarP_1,18.7 //	jarA mRtyu mahA vyADi Satru= Siva SAnti dam // GarP_1,18.7 //
   āhvānaṃ sthāpanaṃ rodhaṃ sannidhānaṃ niveśanam /	AhvAnam sTApanam roDam sanniDAnam niveSanam /
   pādyamā camanaṃ snānamarghyaṃ sraganulepanam // GarP_1,18.8 //	pAdyamA camanam snAnam arGyam sraj anulepanam // GarP_1,18.8 //
   dīpāṃbaraṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ ca naivadyaṃ pānavījanam /	dIpa aMbaram BUzaNam ca nEvat yam pAna vIjanam /
   mātrāmudrājapadhyānaṃ dakṣiṇā cāhutiḥ stutiḥ // GarP_1,18.9 //	mAtrA mudrA japa DyAnam dakziNA ca AhutiH stutiH // GarP_1,18.9 //
   vādyaṃ gatiṃ ca nṛtyaṃ ca nyāsayogaṃ pradakṣiṇam /	vAdyam gatim ca nRtyam ca nyAsa yogam pradakziNam /
   praṇatirmantraśayyā ca vandanaṃ ca visarjanam // GarP_1,18.10 //	praNatiH mantra SayyA ca vandanam ca visarjanam // GarP_1,18.10 //
   ṣaḍaṅgādiprakāreṇa pūjanaṃ tu kramoditam /	zaxaFga Adi prakAreNa pUjanam tu krama uditam /
   parameśamukhodrītaṃ yo jānāti sa pūjakaḥ // GarP_1,18.11 //	parameSa muKa udrItam yaH jAnAti sa pUjakaH // GarP_1,18.11 //
   arghyapātrārcanaṃ cādāvastreṇaiva tu tāḍanam /	arGya pAtra arcanam ca AdO= astreNa eva tu tAxanam /
   śodhanaṃ kavacenaiva amṛtīkaraṇaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,18.12 //	SoDanam kavacena eva amRtIkaraNam tatas // GarP_1,18.12 //
   pūjā cādhāraśaktyādeḥ prāṇāyāmaṃ tathāsane /	pUjA ca ADAra Sakti AdeH prANAyAmam taTA Asane /
   pīṭhasuddhiṃ tataḥ kuryācchoṣaṇādyaistataḥ smaret // GarP_1,18.13 //	pIWa sudDim tatas kuryAt SozaNa AdyEH tatas smaret // GarP_1,18.13 //
   ātmānaṃ devarūpaṃ ca karāṅganyāsakaṃ caret /	AtmAnam deva rUpam ca kara aFga nyAsakam caret /
   ātmānaṃ pūjayetpaścājyo tīrūpaṃ hṛdabjataḥ // GarP_1,18.14 //	AtmAnam pUjayet paScAjyaH tIrUpam hRd abjataH // GarP_1,18.14 //
   mūrtau vā sthaṇḍile vāpi kṣipetpuṣpaṃ tu bhāsvaram /	mUrtO vA sTaNxile vA api kzipet puzpam tu BAsvaram /
   āhvānadvārapūjārthaṃ pūjā cādhāraśaktitaḥ // GarP_1,18.15 //	AhvAna dvAra pUjA arTam pUjA ca ADAra SaktitaH // GarP_1,18.15 //
   sānnidhyakaraṇaṃ deve parivārasya pūjanam /	sAnniDya karaNam deve parivArasya pUjanam /
   aṅgaṣaṭkasya pūjā vai kartavyā ca vipaścitaiḥ // GarP_1,18.16 //	aFga zawkasya pUjA vE kartavyA ca vipaScitEH // GarP_1,18.16 //
   dharmādayaśca śakrādyāḥ sāyudhāḥ parivārakāḥ /	Darma AdayaH ca Sakra AdyAH sa AyuDAH parivArakAH /
   yugavedamuhūrtāśca pūjeyaṃ bhuktimuktikṛt // GarP_1,18.17 //	yuga veda muhUrtAH ca pUjA iyam Bukti mukti kRt // GarP_1,18.17 //
   mātṛkāśca gaṇāṃścādau nandigaṅge ca pūjayet /	mAtRkAH ca gaNAn= ca AdO nandigaFge ca pUjayet /
   mahākālaṃ ca yamanāṃ dehalyāṃ pūjayetpurā // GarP_1,18.18 //	mahAkAlam ca yamanAm dehalyAm pUjayet purA // GarP_1,18.18 //
   oṃ amṛteśvara oṃ bhairavāya namaḥ /	om amRteSvaraH om BEravAya namaH /
   evaṃ oṃ juṃ haṃsaḥ sūryāya namaḥ // GarP_1,18.19 //	evam om jum haMsaH sUryAya namaH // GarP_1,18.19 //
   evaṃ śivāya kṛṣṇāya brahmaṇe ca gaṇāya ca /	evam SivAya kRzNAya brahmaNe ca gaNAya ca /
   caṇḍikāyai sarasvatyai mahālakṣmādi pūjayet // GarP_1,18.20 //	caNxikAyE sarasvatyE mahA lakzma Adi pUjayet // GarP_1,18.20 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśāvye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa avye AcAra kANxe
   'mṛteśamṛtyuñjayapūjanaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ	amRteSamRtyuQjayapUjanam nAma azwAdaSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  19	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 19
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   prāṇeśvaraṃ gāruḍaṃ ca śivoktaṃ pravadāmyaham /	prANeSvaram gAruxam ca Siva uktam pravadAmi aham /
   sthānānyādau pravakṣyāmi nāgadaṣṭo na jīvati // GarP_1,19.1 //	sTAnAni AdO pravakzyAmi nAga dazwaH na jIvati // GarP_1,19.1 //
   citāvalmīkaśailādau kape ca vivare taroḥ /	citA valmIka SEla AdO kape ca vivare taroH /
   daṃśe rekhātrayaṃ yasya pracchannaṃ sa na jīvati // GarP_1,19.2 //	daMSe reKA trayam yasya pracCannam sa na jIvati // GarP_1,19.2 //
   ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca karkaṭe meṣe mūlāśleṣāmaghādiṣu /	zazWyAm ca karkawe meze mUla ASlezA maGa Adizu /
   kakṣāśroṇigale sandhau śaṅkhakarṇodarādiṣu // GarP_1,19.3 //	kakzA SroNi gale sanDO SaFKa karNa udara Adizu // GarP_1,19.3 //
   daṇḍī śastradharo bhikṣurna gnādiḥ kāladūtakaḥ /	daNxI Sastra DaraH BikzuH na gnAdiH kAladUtakaH /
   bāhau ca vakkre grīvāyāṃ daṣṭāyāṃ na hi jīvati // GarP_1,19.4 //	bAhO ca vakkre grIvAyAm dazwAyAm na hi jIvati // GarP_1,19.4 //
   pūrvaṃ dinapatirbhuṅkte ardhayāmaṃ tato 'pare /	pUrvam dinapatiH BuFkte arDa yAmam tatas apare /
   śeṣā grahāḥ pratidinaṃ ṣaṭsaṃkhyā parivartanaiḥ // GarP_1,19.5 //	SezAH grahAH pratidinam zaz saMKyA parivartanEH // GarP_1,19.5 //
   nāgabhogaḥ kramāñjñeyo rātrau bāṇavivartanaiḥ /	nAga BogaH kramAn jQeyaH rAtrO bANa vivartanEH /
   śeṣor'kaḥ phaṇipaścandrastakṣako bhauma īritaḥ // GarP_1,19.6 //	SezoH akaH PaNipaH candraH takzakaH BOmaH IritaH // GarP_1,19.6 //
   karkoṭo jño guruḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca bhārgavaḥ /	karkowaH jQaH guruH padmaH mahApadmaH ca BArgavaH /
   śaṅkhaḥ śanaiścaro rāhuḥ kulikaścāhayo grahāḥ // GarP_1,19.7 //	SaFKaH SanEScaraH rAhuH kulikaH ca ahayaH grahAH // GarP_1,19.7 //
   rātrau divā suragurorbhāge syādamarāntakaḥ /	rAtrO divA sura guroH BAge syAt amara antakaH /
   paṅgoḥ kāle divā rāhuḥ kulikena saha sthitaḥ // GarP_1,19.8 //	paFgoH kAle divA rAhuH kulikena saha sTitaH // GarP_1,19.8 //
   yāmārdhasandhisaṃsthāṃ ca velāṃ kālavatīṃ caret /	yAma arDa sanDi saMsTAm ca velAm kAlavatIm caret /
   bāṇadviṣaḍvahnivājiyugabhūrekabhāgataḥ? // GarP_1,19.9 //	bANa dvi zaz vahni vAji yuga BUH eka BAgataH? // GarP_1,19.9 //
   divā ṣaḍedanetrādripañcatrimānuṣāṃśakaiḥ /	divA zaxeda netra adri paQcatri mAnuza aMSakEH /
   pādāṅguṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe gulphe jānuni liṅgake // GarP_1,19.10 //	pAdAFguzWe pAda pRzWe pAda pRzWe gulPe jAnuni liFgake // GarP_1,19.10 //
   nābhau hṛdi stanataṭe kaṇṭhe nāsāpuṭe 'kṣiṇi /	nABO hRdi stana tawe kaNWe nAsA puwe akziNi /
   karṇayośca bhruvoḥ śaṅkhe mastake pratipatkramāt // GarP_1,19.11 //	karNayoH ca BruvoH SaFKe mastake pratipad kramAt // GarP_1,19.11 //
   tiṣṭhaccandraśca jīvecca puṃso dakṣiṇabhāgake /	tizWat candraH ca jIvet ca puMsaH dakziNa BAgake /
   kāyasya vāmabhāge tu striyā vāyuvahātkarāt // GarP_1,19.12 //	kAyasya vAma BAge tu striyAH vAyu vahAt karAt // GarP_1,19.12 //
   amṛtastatkṛto moho nivarteta ca mardanāt /	amRtaH tad kRtaH mohaH nivarteta ca mardanAt /
   ātmanaḥ paramaṃ bījaṃ haṃsākhyaṃ sphaṭikāmalam // GarP_1,19.13 //	AtmanaH paramam bIjam haMsa AKyam sPawika amalam // GarP_1,19.13 //
   dātavyaṃ viṣapāpaghnaṃ bījaṃ tasya caturvidham /	dAtavyam viza pApa Gnam bIjam tasya caturviDam /
   vindupañcasvarayutamādyamuktaṃ dvitīyakam /	vindu paQca svara yutam Adyam uktam dvitIyakam /
   ṣaṣṭhārūḍhaṃ tṛtīyaṃ syātsavisargaṃ caturthakam /	zazWa ArUXam tRtIyam syAt sa visargam caturTakam /
   oṃ kuru kule svāhā // GarP_1,19.14 //	om kuru kule svAhA // GarP_1,19.14 //
   vidyā trailokyarakṣārthaṃ garuḍena dhṛtā purā /	vidyA trElokya rakzA arTam garuxena DRtA purA /
   vadhepsurnāganāgānāṃ mukhe 'tha praṇavaṃ nyaset // GarP_1,19.15 //	vaDa IpsuH nAga nAgAnAm muKe aTa praNavam nyaset // GarP_1,19.15 //
   gale kuru nyaseddhīmānkule ca gulphayoḥ smṛtaḥ /	gale kuru nyaset DImAn kule ca gulPayoH smRtaH /
   svāhā pādayuge caiva yugahā nyāsa īritaḥ // GarP_1,19.16 //	svAhA pAda yuge ca eva yuga hA nyAsaH IritaH // GarP_1,19.16 //
   gṛhe vivikhitā yatra tannāgāḥ saṃtyajanti ca /	gRhe viviKitAH yatra tad nAgAH saMtyajanti ca /
   sahasramantraṃ japtvā tu karṇe sūtraṃ dhṛtaṃ tathā // GarP_1,19.17 //	sahasra mantram japtvA tu karNe sUtram DRtam taTA // GarP_1,19.17 //
   yadrṛhe śarkarā japtā kṣiptā nāgāstyajanti tat /	yat rRhe SarkarA japtA kziptAH nAgAH tyajanti tat /
   saptalakṣasya japyāddhi siddhiḥ prāptā surāsuraiḥ // GarP_1,19.18 //	sapta lakzasya japyAt hi sidDiH prAptA sura asurEH // GarP_1,19.18 //
   oṃ suvarṇarekhe kukkuṭavigraharūpiṇi svāhā /	om suvarNa reKe kukkuwa vigraha rUpiNi svAhA /
   evañcāṣṭadale padma dale varṇayugaṃ likhet // GarP_1,19.19 //	evaQca azwa dale padma dale varNa yugam liKet // GarP_1,19.19 //
   nāmaitadvāridhārābhiḥ snāto daṣṭo viṣaṃ tyajet /	nAma etat vAri DArABiH snAtaH dazwaH vizam tyajet /
   oṃ pakṣi svāhā // GarP_1,19.20 //	om pakzi svAhA // GarP_1,19.20 //
   aṅguṣṭhādi kaniṣṭhāntaṃ kare nyasyātha dehake /	aFguzWa Adi kanizWA antam kare nyasya aTa dehake /
   ke (kai) vakkre hṛdi liṅge ca pādayorgaruḍasya hi // GarP_1,19.21 //	ke (kE) vakkre hRdi liFge ca pAdayoH garuxasya hi // GarP_1,19.21 //
   nākrāmanti ca tacchāyāṃ svapne 'pi viṣapannagāḥ /	na AkrAmanti ca tad CAyAm svapne api viza pannagAH /
   yastu lakṣaṃ japeccāsyāḥ sa dṛṣṭvā(ṣṭyā) nāśayedviṣam // GarP_1,19.22 //	yaH tu lakzam japet ca asyAH sa dRzwvA a(zwyA) nASayet vizam // GarP_1,19.22 //
   oṃ hrī hrau hrīṃ bhi(bhī) ruṇḍāyai svāhā /	om hrI hrO hrIm Bi(BI) ruNxAyE svAhA /
   karṇe japtā tviyaṃ vidyā daṣṭakasya viṣaṃ haret // GarP_1,19.23 //	karNe japtA tu iyam vidyA dazwakasya vizam haret // GarP_1,19.23 //
   a ā nyasettu pādāgre i ī gulaphe 'tha jānuni /	a A nyaset tu pAda agre i I gulaPe aTa jAnuni /
   u ū e ai kaṭitaṭe o nābhau hṛdi au nyaset // GarP_1,19.24 //	u U e E kawi tawe aH nABO hRdi O nyaset // GarP_1,19.24 //
   vakkre amuttamāṅge aḥ nyasedvai haṃsasaṃyutāḥ /	vakkre am uttamAFge aH nyaset vE haMsa saMyutAH /
   haṃso viṣādi ca harejjapto dhyāto 'tha pūjitaḥ // GarP_1,19.25 //	haMsaH viza Adi ca haret japtaH DyAtaH aTa pUjitaH // GarP_1,19.25 //
   garuḍo 'hamiti dhyātvā kuryādviṣaharāṃ (rīṃ) kriyām /	garuxaH aham iti DyAtvA kuryAt viza harAm (rIM) kriyAm /
   haṃmantraṃ gātravinyastaṃ viṣādiharamīritam // GarP_1,19.26 //	haMmantram gAtra vinyastam viza Adi haram Iritam // GarP_1,19.26 //
   nyasya haṃsaṃ vāmakare nāsāmukhanirodhakṛt /	nyasya haMsam vAma kare nAsA muKa niroDa kRt /
   mantro hareddaṣṭakasya tvaṅmāṃsādigataṃ viṣam // GarP_1,19.27 //	mantraH haret dazwakasya tvac mAMsa Adi gatam vizam // GarP_1,19.27 //
   sa vāyunā samākṛṣya daṣṭānāṃ garalaṃ haret /	sa vAyunA samAkRzya dazwAnAm garalam haret /
   tanau nyaseddaṣṭakasya nīlakaṇṭhādi saṃsmaret // GarP_1,19.28 //	tanO nyaset dazwakasya nIlakaNWa Adi saMsmaret // GarP_1,19.28 //
   pītaṃ pratyaṅgirāmūlaṃ taṇḍuladbhirviṣāpaham /	pItam pratyaFgirA mUlam taNxuladBiH viza apaham /
   punarnavāphalinīnāṃ mūlaṃ vakkrajamīdṛśam // GarP_1,19.29 //	punarnavA PalinInAm mUlam vakkrajam IdRSam // GarP_1,19.29 //
   mūlaṃ śuklabṛhatyāstu karkoṭyāgairikarṇikam /	mUlam Sukla bRhatyAH tu karkowi AgErikarNikam /
   adbhirghṛṣṭaghṛtopetalepo 'yaṃ viṣamardanaḥ // GarP_1,19.30 //	adBiH GRzwa GRta upeta lepaH ayam viza mardanaH // GarP_1,19.30 //
   viṣamṛddhiṃ na vrajecca uṣṇaṃ pibati yo ghṛtam /	vizam RdDim na vrajet ca uzNam pibati yaH GRtam /
   pañcāṅgaṃ tu śirīṣasya mūlaṃ gṛñjanajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,19.31 //	paQcAFgam tu SirIzasya mUlam gRQjana jam taTA // GarP_1,19.31 //
   sarvāṅgalepataśacāpi pānādvā viṣahṛdbhavet /	sarva aFga lepataSacA api pAnAt vA viza hRt Bavet /
   hrīṃ gonasādiviṣahṛt // GarP_1,19.32 //	hrIm gonasa Adi viza hRt // GarP_1,19.32 //
   hṛllalāṭavisargāntaṃ dhyātaṃ vaśyā dikṛdbhavet /	hRd lalAwa visarga antam DyAtam vaSyAH dikRt Bavet /
   nyastaṃ yonau vaśetkanyāṃ kuryānmadajalāvilam // GarP_1,19.33 //	nyastam yonO vaSet kanyAm kuryAt mada jala Avilam // GarP_1,19.33 //
   japtvā saptāṣṭasāhasraṃ garutmāniva sarvagaḥ /	japtvA sapta azwa sAhasram garutmAn iva sarva gaH /
   kaviḥ syācchrutidharī ca vaśyāḥ strīścāyurāpnuyāt /	kaviH syAt Sruti DarI ca vaSyAH strIH ca AyuH ApnuyAt /
   viṣahṛtsyātkathā tadvanmaṇirvyāsaḥ smṛto dhruvam // GarP_1,19.34 //	viza hRt syAt kaTA tadvat maNiH vyAsaH smRtaH Druvam // GarP_1,19.34 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   sarpaviṣaharopāya(prāṇeśvaravidyā) nirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	sarpa vizaharopAya(prANeSvaravidyA) nirUpaNam nAma ekonaviMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  20	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 20
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   vakṣye tatparamaṃ guhyaṃ śivoktaṃ mantrabṛndakam /	vakzye tat paramam guhyam Siva uktam mantra bRndakam /
   pāśaṃ dhanuśca cakraṃ ca mudraraṃ śūlapaṭṭiśam // GarP_1,20.1 //	pASam DanuH ca cakram ca mudraram SUla pawwiSam // GarP_1,20.1 //
   etairevāyudhairyuddhe mantraiḥ śatrūñjayennṛpaḥ /	etEH eva AyuDEH yudDe mantrEH SatrUn jayet nRpaH /
   mantroddhāraḥ padmapātre ādi pūrvādike likhet // GarP_1,20.2 //	mantra udDAraH padma pAtre Adi pUrva Adike liKet // GarP_1,20.2 //
   aṣṭavargaṃ cāṣṭamaṃ ca khyātamīśānapatrake /	azwa vargam ca azwamam ca KyAtam ISAna patrake /
   oṃ kāro brahma bījaṃ syāddhrīṅkāro viṣṇureva ca // GarP_1,20.3 //	om kAraH brahma bIjam syAt hrIFkAraH vizNuH eva ca // GarP_1,20.3 //
   hrīṅkā raśca śivaḥ śūle triśākhe tu kramānnyaset /	hrIFkA raH ca SivaH SUle tri SAKe tu kramAt nyaset /
   oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ // GarP_1,20.4 //	om hrIm hrIm // GarP_1,20.4 //
   śūlaṃ gṛhītvā hastenābhrāmya cākāśasaṃmukham /	SUlam gRhItvA hastena ABrAmya ca AkASa saMmuKam /
   taddarśanāndrahā nāgā dṛṣṭvā vā nāśamāpnu yuḥ // GarP_1,20.5 //	tad darSanAn drahAH nAgAH dRzwvA vA nASam Apnu yuH // GarP_1,20.5 //
   dhūmārakte karaṃ madhye dhyātvā khe cintayennaraḥ /	DUma Arakte karam maDye DyAtvA Ke cintayet naraH /
   duṣṭā nāgā grahā meghā vinaśyanti ca rākṣasāḥ // GarP_1,20.6 //	duzwAH nAgAH grahAH meGAH vinaSyanti ca rAkzasAH // GarP_1,20.6 //
   trilokānrakṣayenmantro martyalokasya kā kathā /	tri lokAn rakzayet mantraH martya lokasya kA kaTA /
   oṃ jūṃ sūṃ hūṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,20.7 //	om jUm sUm hUm Paw // GarP_1,20.7 //
   khādirānkīlakānaṣṭau kṣetre saṃmantrya vinyaset /	KAdirAn kIlakAn azwO kzetre saMmantrya vinyaset /
   na tatra vajrapātasya sphūrjathvāderupadravaḥ // GarP_1,20.8 //	na tatra vajra pAtasya sPUrjaTu AdeH upadravaH // GarP_1,20.8 //
   garuḍoktairmahāmantraiḥ kīlakānaṣṭa mantrayet /	garuxa uktEH mahA mantrEH kIlakAn azwa mantrayet /
   ekaviṃśativārāṇi kṣetre tu nikhanenniśi // GarP_1,20.9 //	ekaviMSati vArANi kzetre tu niKanet niSi // GarP_1,20.9 //
   vidyunmūṣakavajrādisamupadrava eva ca /	vidyut mUzaka vajra Adi samupadravaH eva ca /
   harakṣamalavarayū binduyuktaḥ sadāśivaḥ // GarP_1,20.10 //	harakzamala varayU bindu yuktaH sadASivaH // GarP_1,20.10 //
   oṃ hrāṃ sadāśivāya namaḥ /	om hrAm sadASivAya namaH /
   tarjanyā vinyasetpiṇḍaṃ (ṇḍe) dāḍimīkusumaprabham // GarP_1,20.11 //	tarjanyAH vinyaset piNxam (Nxe) dAximI kusuma praBam // GarP_1,20.11 //
   tasyaiva darśanādduṣṭā meghavidyuddipādayaḥ /	tasya eva darSanAt duzwAH meGa vidyut dipa AdayaH /
   rākṣasā bhūtaḍākinyaḥ pradravanti diśo daśa // GarP_1,20.12 //	rAkzasAH BUta xAkinyaH pradravanti diSaH daSa // GarP_1,20.12 //
   oṃ hrīṃ gaṇeśāya namaḥ /	om hrIm gaNeSAya namaH /
   (oṃ hrīṃ) stambhanādicakrāya namaḥ /	(om hrIM) stamBana Adi cakrAya namaH /
   oṃ aiṃ brahayaintrai lokyaḍāmarāya namaḥ // GarP_1,20.13 //	om Em brahayEntrEH lokya xAmarAya namaH // GarP_1,20.13 //
   bhairavaṃ piṇḍamākhyātaṃ viṣapāpagrahāpaham /	BEravam piNxam AKyAtam viza pApa graha apaham /
   kṣetrasya rakṣaṇaṃ bhūtarākṣasādeḥ pramardanam // GarP_1,20.14 //	kzetrasya rakzaNam BUta rAkzasa AdeH pramardanam // GarP_1,20.14 //
   oṃ namaḥ /	om namaH /
   indravajraṃ kare dhyātvā duṣṭameghādivāraṇam /	indravajram kare DyAtvA duzwa meGa Adi vAraNam /
   viṣa śatrugaṇā bhūtā naśyante vajramudrayā // GarP_1,20.15 //	viza Satru gaNAH BUtAH naSyante vajra mudrayA // GarP_1,20.15 //
   oṃ kṣuṃ(kṣa) namaḥ /	om kzuM(kza) namaH /
   smaretpāśaṃ vāmahaste viṣabhūtādi naśyati /	smaret pASam vAma haste viza BUta Adi naSyati /
   oṃ hrāṃ (hro) namaḥ /	om hrAm (hro) namaH /
   hareduccāraṇānmantro viṣameghagrahādikān // GarP_1,20.16 //	haret uccAraNAt mantraH viza meGa graha AdikAn // GarP_1,20.16 //
   dhyātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca dahecchedakāstreṇa vai jagat /	DyAtvA kRtAntam ca dahet Cedaka astreNa vE jagat /
   oṃ kṣṇaṃ (kṣma) namaḥ /	om kzNam (kzma) namaH /
   dhyātvā tu bhairavaṃ kuryāndrahabhūtaviṣāpaham // GarP_1,20.17 //	DyAtvA tu BEravam kuryAn dra ha BUta viza apaham // GarP_1,20.17 //
   oṃ lasaddijihvākṣa svāhā /	om lasat dijihva akza svAhA /
   kṣetrādau grahabhūtādiviṣapakṣinivāraṇam // GarP_1,20.18 //	kzetra AdO graha BUta Adi viza pakzi nivAraNam // GarP_1,20.18 //
   oṃ kṣva (kṣṇaṃ) namaḥ /	om kzva (kzNaM) namaH /
   raktena paṭahe likhya śabdātresurgrahādayaḥ /	raktena pawahe liKya Sabda atresuH graha AdayaH /
   oṃ mara mara mārayamāraya svāhā /	om mara mara mArayam Araya svAhA /
   oṃ huṃ phaṭ svāhā // GarP_1,20.19 //	om hum Paw svAhA // GarP_1,20.19 //
   śūlaṃ cāṣṭaśatairmantrya bhrāmaṇācchatruvṛndahṛt /	SUlam ca azwaSatEH mantrya BrAmaNAt Satru vRnda hRt /
   ūrdhaśaktinipātena adhaḥ śaktiṃ nikuñceyet // GarP_1,20.20 //	UrDa Sakti nipAtena aDas Saktim nikuQceyet // GarP_1,20.20 //
   pūrake pūritā mantrāḥ kumbhakena sumantritāḥ /	pUrake pUritAH mantrAH kumBakena su mantritAH /
   praṇavenāpyāyitāste manavastadudīritāḥ /	praNavena ApyAyitAH te manavaH tad udIritAH /
   evamāpyāyitā mantrā bhṛtyavatphaladāyakāḥ // GarP_1,20.21 //	evam ApyAyitAH mantrAH BRtya vat Pala dAyakAH // GarP_1,20.21 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣādiharamantrabṛndanirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	vizAdiharamantrabRndanirUpaNam nAma viMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  21	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 21
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   pañcavatkrārcanaṃ vakṣye pṛtha gyadbhuktimuktidam /	paQca vat krArcanam vakzye pRTa gyat Bukti mukti dam /
   oṃ bhūrviṣṇave ādibhūtāya sarvādhārāya mūrtaye svāhā // GarP_1,21.1 //	om BUH vizNave Adi BUtAya sarva ADArAya mUrtaye svAhA // GarP_1,21.1 //
   sadyojātasya cāhvānamanena prathamaṃ caret /	sadyojAtasya ca AhvAnam anena praTamam caret /
   oṃ hāṃ sadyojātāyaiva kalā hyaṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,21.2 //	om hAm sadyojAtAya eva kalAH hi azwO prakIrtitAH // GarP_1,21.2 //
   siddhirṛddhirdhṛtirlakṣmīrmedhā kāntiḥ svadhā sthitiḥ (8) /	sidDiH RdDiH DRtiH lakzmIH meDA kAntiH svaDA sTitiH (8) /
   oṃ hīṃ vāmadevāyaiva kalāstasya trayodaśa // GarP_1,21.3 //	om hIm vAmadevAya eva kalAH tasya trayodaSa // GarP_1,21.3 //
   rajā rakṣā ratiḥ pālyā kānti stṛṣṇā matiḥ kriyā /	rajA rakzA ratiH pAlyA kAnti stRzNA matiH kriyA /
   kāmā buddhiśca rātriśca trāsanī mohinī tathā (13) // GarP_1,21.4 //	kAmA budDiH ca rAtriH ca trAsanI mohinI taTA (13) // GarP_1,21.4 //
   manonmanī aghorā ca tathā mohā kṣudhā kalāḥ /	manonmanI aGorA ca taTA mohAH kzuDA kalAH /
   nidrā mṛtyuśca māyā ca (8)aṣṭasaṃkhyā bhayaṅkara // GarP_1,21.5 //	nidrA mRtyuH ca mAyA ca (8)azwa saMKyA BayaFkara // GarP_1,21.5 //
   oṃ haiṃ tatpuruṣāyaiva (ṣāya) nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntirna	om hEm tatpuruzAya eva (zAya) nivRttiH ca pratizWA ca vidyA SAntiH na
   kevalā // GarP_1,21.6 //	kevalAH // GarP_1,21.6 //
   oṃ hauṃ īśānāya namo niścalā ca nirañjanā /	om hOm ISAnAya namaH niScalA ca niraQjanAH /
   śaśinī cāṅganā caiva marīcirjvālinī tathā // GarP_1,21.7 //	SaSinI ca aFganA ca eva marIciH jvAlinI taTA // GarP_1,21.7 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍaṃ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxam
   pañcavakkrapūjanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	paQcavakkrapUjanam nAma ekaviMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  22	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 22
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   śivārcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi buktimuktikaraṃ param /	Siva arcanam pravakzyAmi bukti mukti karam param /
   śāntaṃ sarvagataṃ śūnyaṃ mātrādvādaśake sthitam // GarP_1,22.1 //	SAntam sarva gatam SUnyam mAtrA dvAdaSake sTitam // GarP_1,22.1 //
   pañca vakkrāṇi hrasvāni dīrghāṇyaṅgāni bindunā /	paQca vakkrANi hrasvAni dIrGANi aFgAni bindunA /
   savisargaṃ vadedastraṃ śiva ūrghvaṃ tathā punaḥ // GarP_1,22.2 //	sa visargam vadet astram SivaH UrGvam taTA punar // GarP_1,22.2 //
   ṣaṣṭhenādho mahāmantro haumityevākhilārthadaḥ /	zazWena aDas mahA mantraH hOm iti eva aKila arTa daH /
   hastābhyāṃ saṃspṛśetpādāvūrdhvaṃ pādānmastakam // GarP_1,22.3 //	hastAByAm saMspRSet pAdO= UrDvam pAdAt mastakam // GarP_1,22.3 //
   mahāmudrā hi sarveṣāṃ karāṅganyāsamācaret /	mahAmudrA hi sarvezAm kara aFga nyAsam Acaret /
   tālahastena pṛṣṭhaṃ ca astramantreṇa śodhayet // GarP_1,22.4 //	tAla hastena pRzWam ca astra mantreNa SoDayet // GarP_1,22.4 //
   kaniṣṭhāmāditaḥ kṛtvā tarjanyaṅgāni vinyaset /	kanizWAm Aditas kRtvA tarjanI aFgAni vinyaset /
   pūjanaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi karṇikāyāṃ tdṛdambuje // GarP_1,22.5 //	pUjanam saMpravakzyAmi karNikAyAm tdRt ambuje // GarP_1,22.5 //
   dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryādi tdṛdārcayet /	Darmam jQAnam ca vErAgyam ESvarya Adi tdRdA arcayet /
   āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca pādyamarghyaṃ hṛdārpayet // GarP_1,22.6 //	AvAhanam sTApanam ca pAdyam arGyam hRdA arpayet // GarP_1,22.6 //
   ācāmaṃ snapanaṃ pūjāmekādhāraṇatulyakam? /	AcAmam snapanam pUjAm ekA DAraNa tulya kam? /
   agnikāryavidhiṃ vakṣye astreṇollekhanaṃ caret // GarP_1,22.7 //	agni kArya viDim vakzye astreNa ulleKanam caret // GarP_1,22.7 //
   varṃmaṇābhyukṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ śaktinyāsaṃ hṛdā caret /	varMmaNA aByukzaNam kAryam Sakti nyAsam hRdA caret /
   tdṛdi vā śaktigarte ca prakṣipejjātavedasam // GarP_1,22.8 //	tdRdi vA Sakti garte ca prakzipet jAtavedasam // GarP_1,22.8 //
   garbhādhānādikaṃ kṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ cārasya paścimām /	garBADAna Adikam kRtvA nizkRtim cArasya paScimAm /
   hṛdā kṛtvā sarvakarṃma śivaṃ sāṃgaṃ tu homayet // GarP_1,22.9 //	hRdA kRtvA sarva karMma Sivam sa aMgam tu homayet // GarP_1,22.9 //
   pūjayenmaṇḍale śambhuṃ padmagarbhe garāṅkitam /	pUjayet maNxale SamBum padma garBe gara aFkitam /
   catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣi khādyādimaṇḍalam // GarP_1,22.10 //	catuH zazwi antam azwa Adi Ka akzi KAdya Adi maNxalam // GarP_1,22.10 //
   khākṣīndrasūryagaṃ sarvakhādivedendu (devendu) vartanam /	KAkzi indra sUrya gam sarva KA Adi veda indu (deva indu) vartanam /
   āgneyyāṃ kārayetkuṇḍamardhacandranibhaṃ śubham // GarP_1,22.11 //	AgneyyAm kArayet kuNxam arDacandra niBam SuBam // GarP_1,22.11 //
   agniśāstra parāyustho tdṛdayādigaṇocyate /	agni SAstra para Ayu sTaH tdRdayAdi gaNa ucyate /
   astraṃ diśā supadmasya karṇikāyāṃ sadāśivaḥ // GarP_1,22.12 //	astram diSA su padmasya karNikAyAm sadASivaH // GarP_1,22.12 //
   dīkṣāṃ vakṣye pañcatattve sthitāṃ bhūmyādikāṃ pare /	dIkzAm vakzye paQcatattve sTitAm BUmi AdikAm pare /
   nivṛttirbhūpratiṣṭhādyairvidyāgniḥ śāntivannijaḥ // GarP_1,22.13 //	nivRttiH BU pratizWA AdyEH vidyA agniH SAnti vat nijaH // GarP_1,22.13 //
   śāntyatītaṃ bhavevdyoma tatparaṃ śāntamavyayam /	SAnti atItam Bavevdyoma tad param SAntam avyayam /
   ekaikasya śataṃ homā hatyevaṃ pañca homayet // GarP_1,22.14 //	ekEkasya Satam homAH hati evam paQca homayet // GarP_1,22.14 //
   paścātpūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā prā(pra)sodana śivaṃ smaret /	paScAt pUrNAhutim dattvA prA( pra)sodana Sivam smaret /
   prāyaścittaviśuddhyarthamekaikāṣṭāhutiṃ kramāt // GarP_1,22.15 //	prAyaScitta viSudDi arTam ekEka azwa Ahutim kramAt // GarP_1,22.15 //
   homayedastrabījena evaṃ dīkṣāṃ samāpayet /	homayet astra bIjena evam dIkzAm samApayet /
   yajanavyatirekeṇa gopyaṃ saṃskāramuttamam // GarP_1,22.16 //	yajana vyatirekeNa gopyam saMskAram uttamam // GarP_1,22.16 //
   evaṃ saṃskāraśuddhasya śivatvaṃ jāyate dhruvam // GarP_1,22.17 //	evam saMskAra SudDasya Siva tvam jAyate Druvam // GarP_1,22.17 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   śivārcanaprakāro nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	SivArcanaprakAraH nAma dvAviMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  23	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 23
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   śivārcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharṃmakāmādisādhanam /	Siva arcanam pravakzyAmi DarMma kAma Adi sADanam /
   tribhirmantrairācāmettu svāhāntaiḥ praṇavādikaiḥ // GarP_1,23.1 //	triBiH mantrEH AcAmet tu svAhA antEH praNava AdikEH // GarP_1,23.1 //
   oṃ hāṃ ātmatattvāya vidyātattvāya hīṃ tathā /	om hAm Atma tattvAya vidyA tattvAya hIm taTA /
   oṃ hūṃ śivatattvāya svāhā hṛdā syācchrotravandanam // GarP_1,23.2 //	om hUm Siva tattvAya svAhA hRdA syAt Srotra vandanam // GarP_1,23.2 //
   bhasmasnānaṃ tarpaṇaṃ ca oṃ hāṃ svāhā sarvamantrakāḥ /	Basma snAnam tarpaNam ca om hAm svAhA sarva mantrakAH /
   sarve devāḥ sarvamunirnamo 'nto vauṣaḍantakaḥ // GarP_1,23.3 //	sarve devAH sarva muniH namaH antaH vOzaw antakaH // GarP_1,23.3 //
   svadhāntāḥ sarvapitaraḥ svadhāntāśca pitāmahāḥ /	svaDA antAH sarva pitaraH svaDA antAH ca pitAmahAH /
   oṃ hāṃ prapitāmahebhyastathā mātāmahādayaḥ // GarP_1,23.4 //	om hAm prapitAmaheByaH taTA mAtAmaha AdayaH // GarP_1,23.4 //
   hāṃ namaḥ sarvamātṛbhyastataḥ syātprāṇasaṃyamaḥ /	hAm namaH sarva mAtRByaH tatas syAt prANa saMyamaH /
   ācāmaṃ mārjanaṃ cātho gāyatrīṃ ca japettataḥ // GarP_1,23.5 //	AcAmam mArjanam ca aTo gAyatrIm ca japet tatas // GarP_1,23.5 //
   oṃ hāṃ tanmaheśāya vidmahe,vāgviśuddhāya dhīmahi, tanno rudraḥ pracodayāt	om hAm tat maheSAya vidmahe,vAc viSudDAya DImahi, tat naH rudraH pracodayAt 
   // GarP_1,23.6 //	// GarP_1,23.6 //
   sūryopasthānakaṃ kṛtvā sūryamantraiḥ prapūjayet /	sUrya upasTAnakam kRtvA sUrya mantrEH prapUjayet /
   oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ haḥ śivasūryāya namaḥ /	om hAm hIm hUm hEm hOm haH Siva sUryAya namaH /
   oṃ haṃ khakholkāya sūryamūrtaye namaḥ /	om ham KaKolkAya sUrya mUrtaye namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ // GarP_1,23.7 //	om hrAm hrIm saH sUryAya namaH // GarP_1,23.7 //
   daṇḍine piṅgale tvātibhūtāni ca tataḥ smaret /	daNxine piFgale tvA atiBUtAni ca tatas smaret /
   agnayādau vimaleśānamārādhya paramaṃ sukham // GarP_1,23.8 //	agnayA AdO vimala ISAnam ArADya paramam suKam // GarP_1,23.8 //
   yajetpadmāṃ ca rāṃ dīptāṃ rīṃ sūkṣmāṃ rūṃ jayāṃ ca reṃ /	yajet padmAm ca rAm dIptAm rIm sUkzmAm rUm jayAm ca rem /
   bhadrāṃ ca raiṃ vibhūtiṃ roṃ vimalāṃ raumamodhi (rodhi) kām // GarP_1,23.9	BadrAm ca rEm viBUtim rom vimalAm rOmamoDi (roDi) kAm // GarP_1,23.9
   raṃ vidyutāṃ ca pūrvādau rā (raṃ) madhye sarvatomukhīm /	ram vidyutAm ca pUrva AdO rA (raM) maDye sarvatomuKIm /
   arkāsanaṃ sūryamūrteṃ hrāṃ hrūṃ (hrīṃ) saḥ sūryamarcayet // GarP_1,23.10	arka Asanam sUrya mUrtem hrAm hrUm (hrIM) saH sUryam arcayet // GarP_1,23.10
   oṃ āṃ hṛdarkāya ca śiraḥ śikhā ca bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom /	om Am hRd arkAya ca SiraH SiKA ca BUH BuvaH svar om /
   jvālinīṃ hraṃ kavacasya cāstraṃ rājñāṃ ca dīkṣitām // GarP_1,23.11 //	jvAlinIm hram kavacasya ca astram rAjQAm ca dIkzitAm // GarP_1,23.11 //
   yajetsūryahṛdā sarvānsoṃ somaṃ maṃ ca maṅgalam /	yajet sUrya hRdA sarvAn som somam mam ca maFgalam /
   baṃ budhaṃ bṛṃ bṛhaspatiṃ bhaṃ bhārgavaṃ śaṃ śanaiścaram // GarP_1,23.12	bam buDam bRm bRhaspatim Bam BArgavam Sam SanEScaram // GarP_1,23.12
   raṃ rāhuṃ kaṃ yajetketuṃ oṃ tejaścaṇḍamarcayet /	ram rAhum kam yajet ketum om tejaH caNxam arcayet /
   sūryamabhyarcya cācamya kaniṣṭhāto 'ṅgakāṃnyaset // GarP_1,23.13 //	sUryam aByarcya ca Acamya kanizWAtaH aFgakAMnyaset // GarP_1,23.13 //
   hāṃ hṛcchiro hūṃ śikhā haiṃ varṃma hauṃ caiva netrakam /	hAm hRd SiraH hUm SiKA hEm varMma hOm ca eva netrakam /
   ho 'straṃ śaktisthitiṃ kṛtvā bhūtaśuddhiṃ punarnyaset // GarP_1,23.14 //	haH astram Sakti sTitim kRtvA BUtaSudDim punar nyaset // GarP_1,23.14 //
   arghyapātraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tadadbhiḥ prokṣayedyajet // GarP_1,23.15 //	arGya pAtram tatas kRtvA tat adBiH prokzayet yajet // GarP_1,23.15 //
   ātmānaṃ padmasaṃsthaṃ ca hauṃ śivāya tato bahiḥ /	AtmAnam padma saMsTam ca hOm SivAya tatas bahis /
   dvāre nandimahākālau gaṅgā ca yamunātha gauḥ // GarP_1,23.16 //	dvAre nandi mahAkAlO gaFgA ca yamunA aTa gOH // GarP_1,23.16 //
   śrīrastraṃ vāstvadhipatiṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇaṃ gurum /	SrIH astram vAstu aDipatim brahmANam ca gaNam gurum /
   śaktyanantau yajenmadhye pūrvādau dharṃmakādikam // GarP_1,23.17 //	Sakti anantO yajet maDye pUrva AdO DarMmaka Adikam // GarP_1,23.17 //
   adharṃmādyaṃ ca vahnyādau madhye padmasya karṇike /	aDarMma Adyam ca vahni AdO maDye padmasya karNike /
   vāmājyeṣṭhā ca pūrvādau raudrī kālī ca pūrṣadaḥ // GarP_1,23.18 //	vAmA jyezWA ca pUrva AdO rOdrI kAlI ca pUrza daH // GarP_1,23.18 //
   oṃ hauṃ kalavikariṇyai balavikariṇī tataḥ /	om hOm kala vikariNyE bala vikariNI tatas /
   balapramathinī sarvabhūtānāṃ damanī tataḥ // GarP_1,23.19 //	bala pramaTinI sarva BUtAnAm damanI tatas // GarP_1,23.19 //
   manonmanī yajedetāḥ paṭhimadhye śivāgrataḥ /	manonmanI yajet etAH paWi maDye Siva agratas /
   śivāsanaṃ mahāmūrti mūrtimadhye śivāya ca // GarP_1,23.20 //	Siva Asanam mahA mUrti mUrti maDye SivAya ca // GarP_1,23.20 //
   āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca sannidhānaṃ nirodhanam /	AvAhanam sTApanam ca sanniDAnam niroDanam /
   sakalīkaraṇaṃ mudrādarśanaṃ cārghyapādyakam // GarP_1,23.21 //	sakalIkaraNam mudrA darSanam ca arGya pAdyakam // GarP_1,23.21 //
   ācāmābhyaṅgamudvartaṃ snānaṃ nirṃmathanaṃ caret /	AcAma aByaFgam udvartam snAnam nirMmaTanam caret /
   vastraṃ vilepanaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ caruṃ dadet // GarP_1,23.22 //	vastram vilepanam puzpam DUpam dIpam carum dadet // GarP_1,23.22 //
   ācāmaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ hastaśodhanam /	AcAmam muKa vAsam ca tAmbUlam hasta SoDanam /
   chatracāmarapāvitraṃ paramīkaraṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,23.23 //	Catra cAmara pAvitram paramIkaraNam caret // GarP_1,23.23 //
   rūpakpena caikāhajapo jāpyasamarpaṇam /	rUpakpena ca eka aha japaH jApya samarpaNam /
   stutirnatirhṛdādyaiśca jñeyaṃ nāmāṅga pūjanam // GarP_1,23.24 //	stutiH natiH hRd AdyEH ca jQeyam nAma aFga pUjanam // GarP_1,23.24 //
   agnīśarakṣo vāyavye madhye pūrvāditantrakam /	agnISa rakzaH vAyavye maDye pUrva Adi tantrakam /
   indrādyāṃśca yajeccaṇḍaṃ tasmai nirmālyamarpayet // GarP_1,23.25 //	indra AdyAn= ca yajet caNxam tasmE nirmAlyam arpayet // GarP_1,23.25 //
   guhāyātiguhyagoptā tvaṃ gṛhāṇāsmatkṛtaṃ japam /	guhAya ati guhya goptA tvam gRhANa asmat kRtam japam /
   siddhirbhavatu me deva tatprasādāttvayi sthitiḥ // GarP_1,23.26 //	sidDiH Bavatu me deva tad prasAdAt tvayi sTitiH // GarP_1,23.26 //
   yatkiñcitkriyate karma sadā sukṛtaduṣkṛtam /	yat kiQcit kriyate karma sadA sukRta duzkRtam /
   tanme śivapadasthasya rudra kṣapaya śaṅkara // GarP_1,23.27 //	tat me Siva pada sTasya rudra kzapaya SaFkara // GarP_1,23.27 //
   śivo dātā śivo bhoktā śivaḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat /	SivaH dAtA SivaH BoktA SivaH sarvam idam jagat /
   śivo jayati sarvatra yaḥ śivaḥ so 'hameva ca // GarP_1,23.28 //	SivaH jayati sarvatra yaH SivaH saH aham eva ca // GarP_1,23.28 //
   yatkṛtaṃ yatkariṣyāmi tatsarvaṃ sukṛtaṃ tava(tastavam) /	yat kRtam yat karizyAmi tat sarvam sukRtam tava(tastavam) /
   tvaṃ trātā viśvanetā ca nānyonātho 'stimeśiva // GarP_1,23.29 //	tvam trAtA viSva netA ca na anyonATaH astim eSivaH // GarP_1,23.29 //
   athānyena prakāreṇa śivapūjāṃ vadāmyaham /	aTa anyena prakAreNa Siva pUjAm vadAmi aham /
   gaṇaḥ sarasvatī nandī mahākālo 'thagaṅgayā // GarP_1,23.30 //	gaNaH sarasvatI nandI mahAkAlaH aTagaFgayA // GarP_1,23.30 //
   pavanāstraṃ vāstvadhipo dvāri pūrvāditastvime /	pavana astram vAstu aDipaH dvAri pUrva AditaH tu ime /
   indrādyāḥ pūjanīyāśca tattvāni pṛthivī jalam // GarP_1,23.31 //	indra AdyAH pUjanIyAH ca tattvAni pRTivI jalam // GarP_1,23.31 //
   tejo vāyurvyoma gandho rasarūpe ca śabdakaḥ /	tejaH vAyuH vyoma ganDaH rasa rUpe ca SabdakaH /
   sparśo vāk pāṇi pādaṃ ca pāyūpasthaṃ śrutitvacam // GarP_1,23.32 //	sparSaH vAc pANi pAdam ca pAyu upasTam Sruti tvacam // GarP_1,23.32 //
   cakṣurjihvā ghrāṇamano buddhiścāhaṃ prakṛtyapi /	cakzuH jihvA GrANa manaH budDiH ca aham prakRti api /
   pumānnāgo buddhividye kalā kālo niyatyapi // GarP_1,23.33 //	pumAn nAgaH budDi vidye kalA kAlaH niyati api // GarP_1,23.33 //
   māyā ca śuddha vidyā ca īśvaraśca sadāśivaḥ /	mAyA ca SudDa vidyA ca ISvaraH ca sadASivaH /
   śaktiḥ śivaśca tāñjñātvā mukto jñānī śivo bhavet // GarP_1,23.34 //	SaktiH SivaH ca tAn jQAtvA muktaH jQAnI SivaH Bavet // GarP_1,23.34 //
   yaḥ śivaḥ sa harirbrahmā so 'haṃ brahmāsmi śaṅkara // GarP_1,23.35 //	yaH SivaH sa hariH brahmA saH aham brahmA asmi SaFkara // GarP_1,23.35 //
   bhūtaśuddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi yayā śuddhaḥ śivo bhavet /	BUtaSudDim pravakzyAmi yayA SudDaH SivaH Bavet /
   hṛtpadme sadyomantraḥ syānnivṛttiśca kalā iḍā // GarP_1,23.36 //	hRd padme sadyas mantraH syAt nivRttiH ca kalA ixA // GarP_1,23.36 //
   piṅgalā dve ca nāḍyau tu prāṇo 'pānaśca mārutau /	piFgalA dve ca nAxyO tu prANaH apAnaH ca mArutO /
   indro deho brahmahetuścaturastraṃ ca maṇḍalam // GarP_1,23.37 //	indraH dehaH brahma hetuH caturastram ca maNxalam // GarP_1,23.37 //
   vaktreṇa lāñchitaṃ vāyumekoddhātaguṇāḥ śarāḥ /	vaktreNa lAQCitam vAyum eka udDAta guNAH SarAH /
   tdṛtsthānasādṛśyarutaṃ śatakoṭipravistaram // GarP_1,23.38 //	tdRt sTAna sAdRSya rutam Sata kowi pravistaram // GarP_1,23.38 //
   oṃ hrīṃ pratiṣṭhāyai hrūṃ hraḥ phaṭ /	om hrIm pratizWAyE hrUm hraH Paw /
   oṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ vidyāyai hraṃ hraḥ phaṭ /	om hrIm hrUm vidyAyE hram hraH Paw /
   caturaśītikoṭīnāmucchrayaṃ bhūmitantrakam // GarP_1,23.39 //	caturaSIti kowInAm ucCrayam BUmi tantrakam // GarP_1,23.39 //
   tanmadhye bhavavṛkṣaṃ ca ātmānaṃ ca vicintayet /	tad maDye Bava vRkzam ca AtmAnam ca vicintayet /
   adhomukhīṃ tataḥ pṛthvīṃ tattacchudhdaṃ bhaveddhruvam // GarP_1,23.40 //	aDomuKIm tatas pRTvIm tat tat SuDdam Bavet Druvam // GarP_1,23.40 //
   vāmā devī pratiṣṭhā ca suṣumnā dhārikā tathā /	vAmA devI pratizWA ca suzumnA DArikA taTA /
   samānodānavaruṇā devatā viṣṇu kāraṇam // GarP_1,23.41 //	samAna udAna varuNA devatAH vizNu kAraNam // GarP_1,23.41 //
   addhātāśca guṇā vedāḥ śvetaṃ dhyānaṃ tathaiva ca /	adDAtAH ca guNAH vedAH Svetam DyAnam taTA eva ca /
   evaṃ kuryātkaṇṭhapadmamardhacandrākhyamaṇḍalam // GarP_1,23.42 //	evam kuryAt kaNWa padmam arDacandra AKya maNxalam // GarP_1,23.42 //
   padmāṅkitaṃ dviviṃśatikakoṭivistīrṇamau smaret /	padma aFkitam dviviMSatika kowi vistIrNamO smaret /
   caturnavatyucchrayaṃ ca ātmānaṃ ca adhomukham // GarP_1,23.43 //	caturnavati ucCrayam ca AtmAnam ca aDomuKam // GarP_1,23.43 //
   tālusthānaṃ ca padmaṃ ca aghoro vidyayānvitaḥ /	tAlu sTAnam ca padmam ca aGoraH vidyayA anvitaH /
   nābhyo(ḍyo) ṣṭhayorhastijihvādhyāno nāgognidevatā // GarP_1,23.44 //	na aByo(xyo) zWayoH hasti jihvA DyAnaH nAga ugni devatA // GarP_1,23.44 //
   rudrahetustriruddhātāstriguṇā raktavarṇakam /	rudra hetuH tris udDAtAH triguNAH rakta varNakam /
   jvālākṛte trikoṇaṃ ca catuḥ koṭiśatāni ca // GarP_1,23.45 //	jvAlA kRte tri koNam ca catuH kowi SatAni ca // GarP_1,23.45 //
   vistīrṇaṃ ca samutsedhaṃ rudratattvaṃ vicintayet /	vistIrNam ca samutseDam rudra tattvam vicintayet /
   lalāṭe vai tatpuruṣaḥ śāntiryaḥ śādvalaṃ budhāḥ (vṛṣā) // GarP_1,23.46 //	lalAwe vE tatpuruzaH SAntiH yaH SAdvalam buDAH (vRzA) // GarP_1,23.46 //
   kūrmaśca kṛkaro vāyurdeva īśvarakāraṇam /	kUrmaH ca kRkaraH vAyuH devaH ISvara kAraNam /
   dviruddhāto guṇau dvau ca dhūmraṣaṭkoṇamaṇḍalam // GarP_1,23.47 //	dvis udDAtaH guNO dvO ca DUmra zawkoNa maNxalam // GarP_1,23.47 //
   bindvaṅkitaṃ cāṣṭakoṭivistīrṇaṃ cocchrayastathā /	bindu aFkitam ca azwa kowi vistIrNam ca ucCrayaH taTA /
   caturdaśādhikaṃ koṭivāyutattvaṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,23.48 //	caturdaSa aDikam kowi vAyu tattvam vicintayet // GarP_1,23.48 //
   dvādaśati sarasije śāntya tītāstatheśvarāḥ /	dvAdaSati sarasije SAntya tItAH taTA ISvarAH /
   kuhūśca śaṅkhinī nāḍyo devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GarP_1,23.49 //	kuhUH ca SaFKinI nAxyaH devadattaH DanaQjayaH // GarP_1,23.49 //
   śikhaiśānakāraṇaṃ ca sadāśiva iti smṛtaḥ /	SiKA ESAna kAraNam ca sadASivaH iti smRtaH /
   guṇa ekastathoddhātaḥ śuddhasphaṭikavatsmaret // GarP_1,23.50 //	guNaH ekaH taTA udDAtaH SudDa sPawika vat smaret // GarP_1,23.50 //
   ṣoḍaśakoṭivistīrṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatikocchrayam /	zoxaSa kowi vistIrNam paQcaviMSatikA ucCrayam /
   vartulaṃ cintayevdyoma bhutaśuddhirudāhṛtā // GarP_1,23.51 //	vartulam cintayA ivdyoma Buta SudDiH udAhRtAH // GarP_1,23.51 //
   guṇayo gururbojaguruḥ śaktayanantau ca dharṃmakaḥ /	guNayaH guruH bojaguruH SaktayanantO ca DarMmakaH /
   jñānavairāgyamaiśvaryaistataḥ pūrvādipatrake // GarP_1,23.52 //	jQAna vErAgyam ESvaryEH tatas pUrva Adi patrake // GarP_1,23.52 //
   adhordhvavadane dve ca padmakarṇikakesaram /	aDorDva vadane dve ca padma karNika kesaram /
   vāmādyā ātmavidyā ca sadā dhyāyecchivākhyakam // GarP_1,23.53 //	vAma AdyAH Atma vidyA ca sadA DyAyet Siva AKyakam // GarP_1,23.53 //
   tattvaṃ śivāsane mūrtirhe hauṃ vidyādehāya namaḥ /	tattvam Siva Asane mUrtiH he hOm vidyA dehAya namaH /
   baddhapadmāsanāsīnaḥ sitaḥ ṣoḍaśavārṣikaḥ // GarP_1,23.54 //	badDa padmAsana AsInaH sitaH zoxaSa vArzikaH // GarP_1,23.54 //
   pañcavaktraḥ karāgraiḥ svairdaśabhiścaiva dhārayan /	paQcavaktraH kara agrEH svEH daSaBiH ca eva DArayan /
   abhayaṃ prasādaṃ śaktiṃ śūlaṃ khaṭvāṅgamīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,23.55 //	aBayam prasAdam Saktim SUlam KawvAFgam ISvaraH // GarP_1,23.55 //
   dakṣaiḥ karairvāmakaiśca bhujaṅgaṃ cākṣasūtrakam /	dakzEH karEH vAmakEH ca BujaFgam ca akza sUtrakam /
   ḍamarukaṃ nīlotpalaṃ bījapūrakamuttamam // GarP_1,23.56 //	xamarukam nIlotpalam bIjapUrakam uttamam // GarP_1,23.56 //
   icchājñānakriyāśaktistrinetro hi sadāśivaḥ /	icCA jQAna kriyA SaktiH trinetraH hi sadASivaH /
   evaṃ śivārcanadhyānī sarvadā kālavarjitaḥ // GarP_1,23.57 //	evam Siva arcana DyAnI sarvadA kAla varjitaH // GarP_1,23.57 //
   ihāhorā vacāreṇa trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati /	iha ahorAH vacAreNa trINi varzANi jIvati /
   dinadvayasya cāreṇa jīvedvarṣadvayaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,23.58 //	dina dvayasya cAreNa jIvet varza dvayam naraH // GarP_1,23.58 //
   dinatrayasya cāreṇa varṣamekaṃ sa jīvati /	dina trayasya cAreNa varzam ekam sa jIvati /
   nākāle śītale mṛtyuruṣṇe caiva tu kārake // GarP_1,23.59 //	na akAle SItale mRtyuH uzNe ca eva tu kArake // GarP_1,23.59 //

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  24	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 24
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /

   gaṇāsanaṃ gaṇamūrti gaṇādhipatimarcayet // GarP_1,24.1 //	gaNAsanam gaNa mUrti gaNADipatim arcayet // GarP_1,24.1 //
   gāmādihṛdayādyaṅgaṃ durgāyā gurupādukāḥ /	gAm Adi hRdaya Adi aFgam durgAyAH guru pAdukAH /
   durgāsanaṃ ca tanmūrtiṃ hrīṃ durge rakṣaṇīti ca // GarP_1,24.2 //	durgAsanam ca tad mUrtim hrIm durge rakzaNi iti ca // GarP_1,24.2 //
   tdṛdādikaṃ nava śaktyo rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍayā /	tdRd Adikam nava SaktyaH rudracaNxA pracaNxayA /
   caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā caṇḍā caṇḍavatī kramāt // GarP_1,24.3 //	caNxogrA caNxanAyikA caNxA caNxavatI kramAt // GarP_1,24.3 //
   caṇārūpā caṇḍikākhyā durgedurge 'tha rakṣiṇi /	caNA rUpA caNxikA AKyA durgedurge aTa rakziNi /
   vajrakhaḍgādikā mudrāḥ śivādyā vahnideśataḥ // GarP_1,24.4 //	vajra Kaxga AdikAH mudrAH Siva AdyAH vahni deSataH // GarP_1,24.4 //
   sadāśivamahāpretapadmāsana mathāpi vā /	sadASiva mahA preta padmAsana maTa api vA /
   aiṃ klīṃ (hrīṃ) saustripurāyai namaḥ /	Em klIm (hrIM) sOH tripurAyE namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ kṣeṃ kṣaiṃ strīṃ skīṃ roṃ spheṃ sphīṃ śāṃ padmāsanaṃ ca	om hrAm hrIm kzem kzEm strIm skIm rom sPem sPIm SAm padmAsanam ca
   mūrtiṃ ca tripurātdṛdayādikam // GarP_1,24.5 //	mUrtim ca tripurAt dRdaya Adikam // GarP_1,24.5 //
   pīṭhāmbuje tu brāhayādīrbrahmāṇī ca maheśvarī /	pIWa ambuje tu brAhaya AdIH brahmANI ca maheSvarI /
   kaumārī vaiṣṇavī pūjyā vārāhī cendradevatā // GarP_1,24.6 //	kOmArI vEzNavI pUjyA vArAhI ca indradevatAH // GarP_1,24.6 //

   asitāṅgoruruścaṇḍaḥ krodha unmattabhairavaḥ // GarP_1,24.7 //	asita aFga UruruH caNxaH kroDaH unmattaBEravaH // GarP_1,24.7 //
   kapālī bhīṣaṇaścaiva saṃhāraścāṣṭa bhairavāḥ /	kapAlI BIzaNaH ca eva saMhAraH ca azwa BEravAH /
   ratiḥ prītiḥ kāmadevaḥ pañca bāṇāśca yoginī // GarP_1,24.8 //	ratiH prItiH kAmadevaH paQca bANAH ca yoginI // GarP_1,24.8 //
   vaṭukaṃ durgayā vighnarājo guruśca kṣetrapaḥ /	vawukam durgayA viGna rAjaH guruH ca kzetrapaH /

   aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ sphaiṃ namo bhagavate sphaiṃ kubjīkāyai namaḥ /	Em hrIm SrIm hrIm sPEm namaH Bagavate sPEm kubjIkAyE namaH /

   rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca sunandā nāgnajityapi /	rukmiNI satyaBAmA ca sunandA nAgnajitI api /

   śaṅkhacakragadāpadmaṃ musalaṃ śārṅgamarcayet /	SaFKa cakra gadA padmam musalam SArFgam arcayet /

   mukuṭaṃ valamālāṃ ca aindrādyāndhvajamukhyakān /	mukuwam vala mAlAm ca Endra AdyAn Dvaja muKyakAn /

   trailokyamohinīṃ vakṣye puruṣottamamukhyakām /	trElokya mohinIm vakzye puruzottama muKyakAm /
   pūjāmantrāñchrīdharādyāndharṃmakāmādidāyakān // GarP_1,29.1 //	pUjA mantrAn SrIDara AdyAn DarMma kAma Adi dAyakAn // GarP_1,29.1 //
   oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ hrūṃ oṃ namaḥ /	om hrIm SrIm klIm hrUm om namaH /
   puruṣottama apratirūpa lakṣmīnivāsa jagatkṣobhaṇa sarvastrīhṛdayadāraṇa	puruzottamaH apratirUpa lakzmI nivAsa jagat kzoBaNa sarva strI hRdaya dAraNa
   tribhuvanamadonmādanakara surāsuramanuja suṃdarī janamanāṃsi tāpayatāpaya	triBuvana mada unmAdana kara sura asuram anuja suMdarI jana manAMsi tApayatApaya
   śoṣayaśoṣaya mārayamāraya stambhayastambhaya drāvayadrāvaya ākarṣaya	SozayaSozaya mArayam Araya stamBaya H tamBaya drAvayat rAvayaH Akarzaya
   ākarṣaya,paramasubhaga sarvasaubhāgyakara sarvakāmaprada amukaṃ hanahana	Akarzaya, parama suBaga sarva sOBAgya kara sarva kAma prada amukam hana hana
   cakreṇa gadayā khaḍgena sarvabāṇairbhidhibhindhi pāśena kuṭṭakuṭṭa	cakreNa gadayA Kaxgena sarva bANEH BiDi BinDi pASena kuwwa kuwwa
   aṅkuśena tāḍayatāḍaya turuturu kiṃ tiṣṭhasi tārayatāraya yāvatsamīhitaṃ me	aFkuSena tAxayatAxaya turuturu kim tizWasi tArayatAraya yAvat samIhitam me
   siddhaṃ bhavati hrīṃ (hrūṃ) phaṭ namaḥ // GarP_1,29.2 //	sidDam Bavati hrIm (hrUM) Paw namaH // GarP_1,29.2 //
   oṃ śrīṃ (śrīḥ) śrīdharāya trailokyamohanāya namaḥ /	om SrIm (SrIH) SrIDarAya trElokya mohanAya namaH /
   klīṃ puruṣottamāya trailokyamohanāya namaḥ // GarP_1,29.3 //	klIm puruzottamAya trElokya mohanAya namaH // GarP_1,29.3 //
   oṃ viṣṇave trailokyamohanāya namaḥ /	om vizNave trElokya mohanAya namaH /
   oṃ śrīṃ klīṃ trailokyamohanāya vipṇave namaḥ // GarP_1,29.4 //	om SrIm klIm trElokya mohanAya vipNave namaH // GarP_1,29.4 //
   trailokyamohanā mantrāḥ sarve sarvārthasādhakāḥ /	trElokya mohanAH mantrAH sarve sarva arTa sADakAH /
   sarve cintyā pṛthag vāpi vyāsātsaṃkṣepato 'tha vā // GarP_1,29.5 //	sarve cintyA pRTak vA api vyAsAt saMkzepataH aTa vA // GarP_1,29.5 //
   āsanaṃ mūrtimantraṃ ca homādyaṅgaṣaḍaṅgakam /	Asanam mUrti mantram ca homa Adi aFga zaxaFgakam /
   cakraṃ gadāṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca musalaṃ śaṃmakhaśarṅgakam // GarP_1,29.6 //	cakram gadAm ca Kaxgam ca musalam SaMmaKa SarFgakam // GarP_1,29.6 //
   śaraṃ pāśaṃ cāṅkuśaṃ ca lakṣmīgaruḍasaṃyutam /	Saram pASam ca aFkuSam ca lakzmI garuxa saMyutam /
   viṣvaksenaṃ vistarādvānaraḥ sarvamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,29.7 //	vizvaksenam vistarAt vAnaraH sarvam avApnuyAt // GarP_1,29.7 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kAxe
   trailokyamohinī(śrīdhara) pūjanavidhirnāmaikonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	trElokya mohinI( SrIDara) pUjanaviDiH nAma ekonatriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  30	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 30
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi śrīdharasyārcanaṃ śubham /	vistareNa pravakzyAmi SrIDarasya arcanam SuBam /
   parivāraśca sarveṣāṃ samojñeyo hi paṇḍitaiḥ // GarP_1,30.1 //	parivAraH ca sarvezAm samojQeyaH hi paNxitEH // GarP_1,30.1 //
   oṃ śrāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om SrAm hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ śrīṃśirase svāhā /	om SrIMSi rase svAhA /
   oṃ śrū śikhāyai vaṣaṭū /	om SrU SiKAyE vazawU /
   oṃ śraiṃ kavacāya huṃ /	om SrEm kavacAya hum /
   oṃ śrauṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ /	om SrOm netratrayAya vOzaw /
   oṃ śraḥ astrāya phaṭ iti // GarP_1,30.2 //	om SraH astrAya Paw iti // GarP_1,30.2 //
   darśayedātmano mudrāṃ śaṅkhacakragadādikām /	darSayet AtmanaH mudrAm SaFKa cakra gadA AdikAm /
   dhyātvātmānaṃ śrīdharākhyaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam // GarP_1,30.3 //	DyAtvA AtmAnam SrIDara AKyam SaFKa cakra gadA Daram // GarP_1,30.3 //
   tatastaṃ pūjayeddevaṃ maṇḍale svastikādike /	tatas tam pUjayet devam maNxale svastika Adike /
   āsanaṃ pūjayedādau devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ /	Asanam pUjayet AdO devadevasya SArFgiNaH /
   ebirmantrairmahādeva tānmatrāñchṛṇu śaṅkara // GarP_1,30.4 //	ebiH mantrEH mahAdeva tAn matrAn SRNu SaFkara // GarP_1,30.4 //
   oṃ śrīdharāsanadevatāḥ āgacchatā /	om SrIDarAsana devatAH AgacCatA /
   oṃ samastaparivārāyacyutāsanāya namaḥ // GarP_1,30.5 //	om samasta parivArAya cyuta AsanAya namaH // GarP_1,30.5 //
   oṃ dhātre namaḥ /	om DAtre namaH /
   oṃ vidhātre namaḥ /	om viDAtre namaH /

   arcayitvā samaṃ rudra harimāvāhya saṃyajet /	arcayitvA samam rudra harim AvAhya saMyajet /
   mantrairebhirmahāprājñaḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanaiḥ // GarP_1,30.7 //	mantrEH eBiH mahA prAjQaH sarva pApa praNASanEH // GarP_1,30.7 //
   oṃ hrīṃ śrīdharāya trailokyamohanāya viṣṇave namaḥ āgaccha // GarP_1,30.8	om hrIm SrIDarAya trElokya mohanAya vizNave namaH AgacCa // GarP_1,30.8
   oṃ śriyai namaḥ /	om SriyE namaH /

   oṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ // GarP_1,30.9 //	om vizvaksenAya namaH // GarP_1,30.9 //
   abhiṣekaṃ tathā vasttraṃ tato yajñopavītakam /	aBizekam taTA vasttram tatas yajQopavItakam /

   dadyādebhirmahāmantraiḥ samapyārtha japenmanum /	dadyAt eBiH mahA mantrEH samapyArTa japet manum /
   śatamaṣṭottaraṃ cāpi japtvā hyatha samarpayet // GarP_1,30.11 //	Satam azwa uttaram ca api japtvA hi aTa samarpayet // GarP_1,30.11 //
   tato muhūrtamekantudhyāyeddevaṃ hṛdi sthitam /	tatas muhUrtam ekantuDyAyet devam hRdi sTitam /
   śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabham // GarP_1,30.12 //	SudDa sPawika saMkASam sUrya kowi sama praBam // GarP_1,30.12 //
   prasannavadanaṃ saumyaṃ sphuranmakarakuṇḍalam /	prasanna vadanam sOmyam sPurat makara kuNxalam /
   kirīṭinamudārāṅgaṃ vanamālāsamanvitam // GarP_1,30.13 //	kirIwinam udAra aFgam vanamAlA samanvitam // GarP_1,30.13 //
   parabrahmasvarūpaṃ ca śrīdharaṃ cintayetsudhīḥ /	para brahma svarUpam ca SrIDaram cintayet suDIH /
   anena caiva stotreṇa stuvīta parameśvaram // GarP_1,30.14 //	anena ca eva stotreNa stuvIta parameSvaram // GarP_1,30.14 //
   śrīnivāsāya devāya namaḥ śrīpataye namaḥ /	SrInivAsAya devAya namaH SrIpataye namaH /
   śrīdharāya saśārṅgāya śrīpradāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,30.15 //	SrIDarAya sa SArFgAya SrI pradAya namaH namaH // GarP_1,30.15 //
   śrīvallabhāya śāntāya śrīmate ca namonamaḥ /	SrIvallaBAya SAntAya SrImate ca namaH namaH /
   śrīparvatanivāsāya namaḥ śreyaskarāya ca // GarP_1,30.16 //	SrIparvata nivAsAya namaH SreyaskarAya ca // GarP_1,30.16 //
   śreyasāṃ pataye caiva hyāśramāya namonamaḥ /	SreyasAm pataye ca eva hi ASramAya namaH namaH /
   namaḥ śreyaḥ svarūpāya śrīkarāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,30.17 //	namaH SreyaH svarUpAya SrIkarAya namaH namaH // GarP_1,30.17 //
   śaraṇyāya vareṇyāya namo bhūyo namonamaḥ /	SaraNyAya vareNyAya namaH BUyas namaH namaH /
   stotraṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtya devadevaṃ visarjayet // GarP_1,30.18 //	stotram kRtvA namaskRtya devadevam visarjayet // GarP_1,30.18 //
   iti rudra samākhyātā pūjā viṣṇormahātmanaḥ /	iti rudra samAKyAtA pUjA vizNoH mahAtmanaH /
   yaḥ karoti mahābhaktyā sa yāti paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,30.19 //	yaH karoti mahA BaktyA sa yAti paramam padam // GarP_1,30.19 //
   iṃ yaḥ paṭhate 'dhyāyaṃ viṣṇupūjāprakāśakam /	im yaH paWate aDyAyam vizNu pUjA prakASakam /
   sa vidhūyeha pāpāni yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // GarP_1,30.20 //	sa viDUya iha pApAni yAti vizNoH param padam // GarP_1,30.20 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīdharā	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe SrIDarA
   (viṣṇvar) canavidhirnāma triṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	(vizNvar) canaviDiH nAma triMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrī garuḍamahāpurāṇam  31	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 31
   rudra uvāca /	rudraH uvAca /
   bhūya evaṃ jagannātha pūjāṃ kathaya me prabho /	BUyas evam jagannATa pUjAm kaTaya me praBo /
   yayā tareyaṃ saṃsārasāgaraṃ hyatidustaram // GarP_1,31.1 //	yayA tareyam saMsAra sAgaram hi ati dustaram // GarP_1,31.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   arcanaṃ viṣṇudevasya vakṣyāmi vṛṣabhadhvaja /	arcanam vizNu devasya vakzyAmi vRzaBaDvaja /
   tacchṛṇuṣva mahābhāga bhuktimuktipradaṃ śubham // GarP_1,31.2 //	tat SRNuzva mahABAga Bukti mukti pradam SuBam // GarP_1,31.2 //
   kṛtvā snānaṃ tataḥ sandhyāṃ tato yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet /	kRtvA snAnam tatas sanDyAm tatas yAga gRham vrajet /
   prakṣālya pāṇī pādau ca ācamya ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,31.3 //	prakzAlya pANI pAdO ca Acamya ca viSezataH // GarP_1,31.3 //
   mūlamantraṃ samastaṃ tu hastayorvyāpakaṃ nyaset /	mUlamantram samastam tu hastayoH vyApakam nyaset /
   mūlamantraṃ ca devasya śṛṇu rudra vadāmi te // GarP_1,31.4 //	mUlamantram ca devasya SRNu rudra vadAmi te // GarP_1,31.4 //
   oṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ śrīdharāya viṣṇave namaḥ /	om SrIm hrIm SrIDarAya vizNave namaH /
   ayaṃ mantraḥ sureśasya viṣṇorīśasya vācakaḥ // GarP_1,31.5 //	ayam mantraH sureSasya vizNoH ISasya vAcakaH // GarP_1,31.5 //
   sarvavyādhiharaścaiva sarvagrahaharastathā /	sarva vyADi haraH ca eva sarva graha haraH taTA /
   sarvapāpaharaścaiva buktimuktipradāyakaḥ // GarP_1,31.6 //	sarva pApa haraH ca eva bukti mukti pradAyakaH // GarP_1,31.6 //
   aṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ kuyyāndebhirmantraurvicakṣaṇaḥ /	aFganyAsam tatas kuyyAn deBiH mantrOH vicakzaNaH /
   oṃ hāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om hAm hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ hīṃ śirase svāhā /	om hIm Sirase svAhA /
   oṃ hūṃ śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /	om hUm SiKAyE vazaw /
