   oṃ haḥ astrāya phaṭ // GarP_1,31.7 //	om haH astrAya Paw // GarP_1,31.7 //
   iti mantraḥ samākhyāto mayā te prabhaviṣṇunā /	iti mantraH samAKyAtaH mayA te praBavizNunA /
   nyāsaṃ kṛtvātmano mudrāṃ darśayedvijitātmavān // GarP_1,31.8 //	nyAsam kRtvA AtmanaH mudrAm darSayet vijita AtmavAn // GarP_1,31.8 //
   tato dhyāyetparaṃ viṣṇu tdṛtkoṭarasamāśritam /	tatas DyAyet param vizNu tdRt kowara sam ASritam /
   śaṅkhacakrasamāyuktaṃ kundendudhavalaṃ harim // GarP_1,31.9 //	SaFKa cakra samAyuktam kunda indu Davalam harim // GarP_1,31.9 //
   śrīvatsakaustubhayutaṃ vanamālāsamanvitam /	SrIvatsa kOstuBa yutam vanamAlA samanvitam /
   ratnahārakirīṭena saṃyuktaṃ parameśvaram // GarP_1,31.10 //	ratna hAra kirIwena saMyuktam parameSvaram // GarP_1,31.10 //
   ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā kṛtvā vai śodhanādikam /	aham vizNuH iti DyAtvA kRtvA vE SoDana Adikam /
   yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinī kṛtya nāmabhiḥ // GarP_1,31.11 //	yam kzEm ram iti bIjEH ca kaWinI kRtya nAmaBiH // GarP_1,31.11 //
   aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ praṇavenaiva bhedayet /	aNxam utpAdya ca tatas praNavena eva Bedayet /
   tatra pūrvoktarūpaṃ tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,31.12 //	tatra pUrva ukta rUpam tu BAvayitvA vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,31.12 //
   ātmapūjāṃ tataḥ kuryādrandhapuṣpādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ /	Atma pUjAm tatas kuryAt ranDa puzpa AdiBiH SuBEH /
   āvāhya pūjayetsarvā devatā āsanasya yāḥ // GarP_1,31.13 //	AvAhya pUjayet sarvAH devatAH Asanasya yAH // GarP_1,31.13 //
   mantrairebhirmahādeva tanmantraṃ śṛṇu śaṅkara /	mantrEH eBiH mahAdeva tad mantram SRNu SaFkara /
   viṣṇavāsanadevatā āgacchata // GarP_1,31.14 //	vizNa vAsana devatA AgacCata // GarP_1,31.14 //
   oṃ samastaparivārāyācyutāya namaḥ /	om samasta parivArAya acyutAya namaH /
   oṃ dhātre namaḥ /	om DAtre namaH /
   oṃ vidhātre namaḥ /	om viDAtre namaH /
   oṃ gaṅgāyai namaḥ /	om gaFgAyE namaH /
   oṃ yamunāyai namaḥ /	om yamunAyE namaH /
   oṃ śaṅkhanidhaye namaḥ /	om SaFKa niDaye namaH /
   oṃ padmanidhaye namaḥ /	om padma niDaye namaH /
   oṃ caṇḍāya namaḥ /	om caNxAya namaH /
   oṃ pracaṇḍāya namaḥ /	om pracaNxAya namaH /
   oṃ dvāraśriyai namaḥ /	om dvAra SriyE namaH /
   oṃ ādhāraśaktyai namaḥ /	om ADAra SaktyE namaH /
   oṃ kūrṃmāya namaḥ /	om kUrMmAya namaH /
   oṃ anantāya namaḥ /	om anantAya namaH /
   oṃ śriyai namaḥ /	om SriyE namaH /
   oṃ dharṃmāya namaḥ /	om DarMmAya namaH /
   oṃ jñānāya namaḥ /	om jQAnAya namaH /
   oṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ /	om vErAgyAya namaH /
   oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ /	om ESvaryAya namaH /
   oṃ adharṃmāya namaḥ /	om aDarMmAya namaH /
   oṃ ajñānāya namaḥ /	om ajQAnAya namaH /
   oṃ avairāgyāya namaḥ /	om avErAgyAya namaH /
   oṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ /	om anESvaryAya namaH /
   oṃsaṃ sattvāya namaḥ /	oM sam sattvAya namaH /
   oṃ raṃ rajase namaḥ /	om ram rajase namaH /
   oṃ taṃ tamase namaḥ /	om tam tamase namaH /
   oṃ kaṃ kandāya namaḥ /	om kam kandAya namaH /
   oṃ naṃ nālāya namaḥ /	om nam nAlAya namaH /
   oṃ lāṃ padmāya namaḥ /	om lAm padmAya namaH /
   oṃ aṃ arkamaṇḍalāya namaḥ /	om am arka maNxalAya namaH /
   oṃ soṃ somamaṇḍalāya namaḥ /	om som soma maNxalAya namaH /
   oṃ vaṃ vahnimaṇḍalāya namaḥ /	om vam vahni maNxalAya namaH /
   oṃ vimalāyai namaḥ /	om vimalAyE namaH /
   oṃ utkarṣiṇyai namaḥ /	om utkarziNyE namaH /
   oṃ jñānāyai namaḥ /	om jQAnAyE namaH /
   oṃ kriyāyai namaḥ /	om kriyAyE namaH /
   oṃ yogāyai namaḥ /	om yogAyE namaH /
   oṃ prahvyai namaḥ /	om prahvyE namaH /
   oṃ satyāyai namaḥ /	om satyAyE namaH /
   oṃ īśānāyai namaḥ /	om ISAnAyE namaH /
   oṃ anugrahāyai namaḥ // GarP_1,31.15 //	om anugrahAyE namaH // GarP_1,31.15 //
   gandhapuṣpādibhistvetairmantrairetāstu pūjayet /	ganDa puzpa AdiBiH tu etEH mantrEH etAH tu pUjayet /
   pūjayitvā tato viṣṇuṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakāriṇam // GarP_1,31.16 //	pUjayitvA tatas vizNum sRzwi saMhAra kAriNam // GarP_1,31.16 //
   āvāhya maṇḍale rudra pūjayetpa rameśvaram /	AvAhya maNxale rudra pUjayet pa rameSvaram /
   anena vidhinā rudra sarvapāpaharaṃ param // GarP_1,31.17 //	anena viDinA rudra sarva pApa haram param // GarP_1,31.17 //
   yathātmani tathā deve nyāsaṃ kurvīta cāditaḥ /	yaTA Atmani taTA deve nyAsam kurvIta ca Aditas /
   mudrāṃ pradarśayetpaścādarghyādīnarpayettataḥ // GarP_1,31.18 //	mudrAm pradarSayet paScAt arGya AdIn arpayet tatas // GarP_1,31.18 //
   snānāṃ kuryāttato vastraṃ dadyādācamanaṃ tataḥ /	snAnAm kuryAt tatas vastram dadyAt Acamanam tatas /
   gandhapuṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ dadyāccaruṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,31.19 //	ganDa puzpam taTA DUpam dIpam dadyAt carum tatas // GarP_1,31.19 //
   pradakṣiṇaṃ tato japyaṃ tatastasminsarpayet /	pradakziNam tatas japyam tatas tasmin sarpayet /
   aṅgādīnāṃ svamantraiśca pūjāṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,31.20 //	aFga AdInAm sva mantrEH ca pUjAm kurvIta sADakaH // GarP_1,31.20 //
   devasya mūlamantreṇetyevaṃ viddhi vṛṣadhvaja /	devasya mUlamantreNa iti evam vidDi vRzaDvaja /
   mantrāñchṛṇu trinetra tvaṃ kathyamānānmayādhunā // GarP_1,31.21 //	mantrAn SRNu trinetra tvam kaTyamAnAn mayA aDunA // GarP_1,31.21 //
   oṃ hāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om hAm hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ hīṃ śirase namaḥ /	om hIm Sirase namaH /
   oṃ hūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ /	om hUm SiKAyE namaH /
   oṃ haiṃ kavacāya namaḥ /	om hEm kavacAya namaH /
   oṃ hauṃ netratrayāya namaḥ /	om hOm netratrayAya namaH /
   oṃ haḥ astrāya namaḥ /	om haH astrAya namaH /
   oṃ śriyai namaḥ /	om SriyE namaH /
   oṃ śaṅkāya namaḥ /	om SaFkAya namaH /
   oṃ padmāya namaḥ /	om padmAya namaH /
   oṃ cakrāya namaḥ /	om cakrAya namaH /
   oṃ gadāyainamaḥ /	om gadAya enamaH /
   oṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ /	om SrIvatsAya namaH /
   oṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ /	om kOstuBAya namaH /
   oṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ /	om vanamAlAyE namaH /
   oṃ pītāmbarāya namaḥ /	om pIta ambarAya namaH /
   oṃ khaḍgāya namaḥ /	om KaxgAya namaH /
   oṃ musalāya namaḥ /	om musalAya namaH /
   oṃ pāśāya namaḥ /	om pASAya namaH /
   oṃ aṅkuśāya namaḥ /	om aFkuSAya namaH /
   śārṅgāya namaḥ /	SArFgAya namaH /
   oṃ śarāya namaḥ /	om SarAya namaH /
   oṃ brahmaṇe namaḥ /	om brahmaNe namaH /
   oṃ nārādāya namaḥ /	om nArAdAya namaH /
   oṃ pūrvasiddhebhyo namaḥ /	om pUrva sidDeByaH namaH /
   oṃ bhāgavatebhyo namaḥ /	om BAgavateByaH namaH /
   oṃ gurubhyo namaḥ /	om guruByaH namaH /
   oṃ paramagurubhyo namaḥ /	om parama guruByaH namaH /
   oṃ indrāya surādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om indrAya sura aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ agnaye tejo 'dhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om agnaye tejaH aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ yamāya pretādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om yamAya preta aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ nirṛtaye rakṣo 'dhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om nirRtaye rakzaH aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ varuṇāya jalādhipataye savādanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om varuNAya jala aDipataye sa vAdana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om vAyave prANa aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ somāya nakṣatrādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om somAya nakzatra aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ īśānāya vidyādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om ISAnAya vidyA aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ anantāya nāgādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om anantAya nAga aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ brahmaṇe lokādhipataye savāhanaparivārāya namaḥ /	om brahmaNe loka aDipataye sa vAhana parivArAya namaH /
   oṃ vajrāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om vajrAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ śaktyai huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om SaktyE hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ daṇḍāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om daNxAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ khaḍgāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om KaxgAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ pāśāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om pASAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ dhvajāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om DvajAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ gadāyai huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om gadAyE hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ triśūlāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om triSUlAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ cakrāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om cakrAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ padmāya huṃ phaṭ namaḥ /	om padmAya hum Paw namaH /
   oṃ vaiṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ // GarP_1,31.22 //	om vEm vizvaksenAya namaH // GarP_1,31.22 //
   ebhimantrairmahādeva pūjyā aṅgādayo naraiḥ /	eBimantrEH mahAdeva pUjyAH aFga AdayaH narEH /
   pūjayitvā mahātmānaṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmasvarūpiṇam // GarP_1,31.23 //	pUjayitvA mahAtmAnam vizNum brahma svarUpiNam // GarP_1,31.23 //
   stuvīta cānayā stutyā paramātmānamavyayam /	stuvIta ca anayA stutyA paramAtmAnam avyayam /
   viṣṇave devadevāya namo vai prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.24 //	vizNave devadevAya namaH vE praBavizNave // GarP_1,31.24 //
   viṣṇave vāsudevāya namaḥ sthitikarāya ca /	vizNave vAsudevAya namaH sTiti karAya ca /
   grasiṣṇave namaścaiva namaḥ pralayaśāyine // GarP_1,31.25 //	grasizNave namaH ca eva namaH pralaya SAyine // GarP_1,31.25 //
   devānāṃ prabhave caiva yajñānāṃ prabhave namaḥ /	devAnAm praBave ca eva yajQAnAm praBave namaH /
   munīnāṃ prabhave nityaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.26 //	munInAm praBave nityam yakzANAm praBavizNave // GarP_1,31.26 //
   jiṣṇave sarvadevānāṃ sarvagāya mahātmane /	jizNave sarva devAnAm sarvagAya mahAtmane /
   brahmendrarudravandyāya sarveśāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,31.27 //	brahma indra rudra vandyAya sarva ISAya namaH namaH // GarP_1,31.27 //
   sarvalokahitārthāya lokādhyakṣāya vai namaḥ /	sarva loka hita arTAya loka aDyakzAya vE namaH /
   sarvagoptre sarvakartre sarvaduṣṭavināśine // GarP_1,31.28 //	sarva goptre sarva kartre sarva duzwa vinASine // GarP_1,31.28 //
   varapradāya śāntāya vareṇyāya namonamaḥ /	vara pradAya SAntAya vareNyAya namaH namaH /
   śaraṇyāya surūpāya dharmakāmārthadāyine // GarP_1,31.29 //	SaraNyAya surUpAya Darma kAma arTa dAyine // GarP_1,31.29 //
   stutvā dhyāyetsvahṛdaye brahmarūpiṇamavyayam /	stutvA DyAyet sva hRdaye brahma rUpiNam avyayam /
   elaṃ tu pūjayedviṣṇuṃ mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara // GarP_1,31.30 //	elam tu pUjayet vizNum mUlamantreNa SaFkara // GarP_1,31.30 //
   mūlamantraṃ japedvāpi yaḥ sa yāti naro harim /	mUlamantram japet vA api yaH sa yAti naraH harim /
   etatte kathitaṃ rudra viṣṇorarcanamuttamam // GarP_1,31.31 //	etat te kaTitam rudra vizNoH arcanam uttamam // GarP_1,31.31 //
   rahasyaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ param /	rahasyam paramam guhyam Bukti mukti pradam param /
   etadyaśca paṭhedvidvānviṣṇubhaktaḥ pumānhara /	etat yaH ca paWet vidvAn vizNu BaktaH pumAn hara /
   śṛṇuyācchrāvayedvāpi viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,31.32 //	SRNuyAt SrAvayet vA api vizNu lokam sa gacCati // GarP_1,31.32 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣṇupūjāvidhirnāmaikatriṃśodhyāyaḥ	vizNu pUjA viDiH nAma ekatriMSoDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  32	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 32
   maheśvara uvāca /	maheSvaraH uvAca /
   pañcatattvārcanaṃ brūhi śaṅkhacakragadādhara /	paQcatattva arcanam brUhi SaFKa cakra gadA Dara /
   yena vijñānamātreṇa naro yāti paraṃ padam // GarP_1,32.1 //	yena vijQAna mAtreNa naraH yAti param padam // GarP_1,32.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   pañcatattvārcanaṃ vakṣye tava śaṅkara suvrata /	paQcatattva arcanam vakzye tava SaFkara suvrata /
   maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ divyaṃ rahasyaṃ kāmadaṃ param // GarP_1,32.2 //	maFgalyam maFgalam divyam rahasyam kAma dam param // GarP_1,32.2 //
   tacchṛṇuṣva mahādeva pavitraṃ kalināśanam /	tat SRNuzva mahAdeva pavitram kali nASanam /
   eka evāvyayaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,32.3 //	ekaH eva avyayaH SAntaH paramAtmA sanAtanaH // GarP_1,32.3 //
   vāsudevo dhruvaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ /	vAsudevaH DruvaH SudDaH sarva vyApI niraQjanaH /
   sa eva māyāyā deva pañcadhā saṃsthito hariḥ // GarP_1,32.4 //	saH eva mAyAyAH deva paQcaDA saMsTitaH hariH // GarP_1,32.4 //
   lokānugrahakṛdviṣṇuḥ sarvaduṣṭavināśanaḥ /	loka anugraha kRt vizNuH sarva duzwa vinASanaH /
   vāsudevasvarūpeṇa tathā saṅkarṣaṇena ca // GarP_1,32.5 //	vAsudeva svarUpeNa taTA saFkarzaNena ca // GarP_1,32.5 //
   tathā pradyumnarūpeṇāniruddhākhyena ca sthitaḥ /	taTA pradyumna rUpeNa anirudDa AKyena ca sTitaH /
   nārāyaṇasvarūpeṇa pañcadhā hyadvayaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,32.6 //	nArAyaNa svarUpeNa paQcaDA hi advayaH sTitaH // GarP_1,32.6 //
   eteṣāṃ vācakānmantrānetāñchṛṇu vṛṣadhvaja ! /	etezAm vAcakAn mantrAn etAn SRNu vRzaDvaja ! /
   oṃ aṃ vāsudevāya namaḥ /	om am vAsudevAya namaH /
   oṃ āṃ saṃkarṣaṇāya namaḥ /	om Am saMkarzaNAya namaH /
   oṃ aṃ pradyumnāya namaḥ /	om am pradyumnAya namaH /
   oṃ aniruddhāya namaḥ /	om anirudDAya namaH /
   oṃ oṃ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ // GarP_1,32.7 //	om om nArAyaNAya namaH // GarP_1,32.7 //
   pañca mantrāḥ samākhyātā devānāṃ vācakāstava /	paQca mantrAH samAKyAtAH devAnAm vAcakAH tava /
   sarvapāpaharāḥ puṇyāḥ sarvarogavināśanāḥ // GarP_1,32.8 //	sarva pApa harAH puNyAH sarva roga vinASanAH // GarP_1,32.8 //
   adhunā saṃpravakṣyāmi pañcatattvārcanaṃ śubham /	aDunA saMpravakzyAmi paQcatattva arcanam SuBam /
   vidhinā yena kartavyaṃ yairvā mantraiśca śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,32.9 //	viDinA yena kartavyam yEH vA mantrEH ca SaFkara ! // GarP_1,32.9 //
   ādau snānaṃ prakurvīta snātvā sandhyāṃ samācaret /	AdO snAnam prakurvIta snAtvA sanDyAm samAcaret /
   arcanāgāramāsādya prakṣālyārṅghyādikaṃ tathā // GarP_1,32.10 //	arcanA AgAram AsAdya prakzAlya arFGya Adikam taTA // GarP_1,32.10 //
   ācamyopaviśetprājño baddhāsanamabhīpsitam /	Acamya upaviSet prAjQaH badDa Asanam aBIpsitam /
   śoṣaṇādi tataḥ kuryād aṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti mantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,32.11 //	SozaNa Adi tatas kuryAt am kzEm ram iti mantrakEH // GarP_1,32.11 //
   sāmānyaṃ kaṭhinīkṛtya cāṇḍamutpādayettataḥ /	sAmAnyam kaWinIkRtya ca aNxam utpAdayet tatas /
   vibhidyāṇḍaṃ tato hyaṇḍe bhāvayetparameśvaram // GarP_1,32.12 //	viBidya aNxam tatas hi aNxe BAvayet parameSvaram // GarP_1,32.12 //
   vāsudevaṃ jagannāthaṃ pītakauśeyavāsasam /	vAsudevam jagannATam pIta kOSeya vAsasam /
   sahasrādityasaṅkāśaṃ sphuranmakarakuṇḍalam // GarP_1,32.13 //	sahasra Aditya saFkASam sPurat makara kuNxalam // GarP_1,32.13 //
   ātmano hṛdi padme tu dhyāyettu parameśvaram /	AtmanaH hRdi padme tu DyAyet tu parameSvaram /
   tataḥ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ devamātmānaṃ cintayetprabhum // GarP_1,32.14 //	tatas saMkarzaNam devam AtmAnam cintayet praBum // GarP_1,32.14 //
   pradyumnamaniruddhaṃ ca śrīmannārāyaṇaṃ tataḥ /	pradyumnam anirudDam ca SrImat nArAyaNam tatas /
   indrādīṃśca surāṃstasmāddevadevātsamutthitān // GarP_1,32.15 //	indra AdIn= ca surAn= tasmAt devadevAt samutTitAn // GarP_1,32.15 //
   cintayecca tato nyāsaṃ kayyāndvai kārayordvayoḥ /	cintayet ca tatas nyAsam kayyAn dvE kArayoH dvayoH /
   vyāpakaṃ mūlamantreṇa cāṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ param // GarP_1,32.16 //	vyApakam mUlamantreNa ca aFganyAsam tatas param // GarP_1,32.16 //
   aṅgamantrairmahādeva ! tānmantrāñśṛṇu suvrata ! /	aFga mantrEH mahAdeva ! tAn mantrAn SRNu suvrata ! /
   oṃ āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om Am hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ īṃ śirase namaḥ /	om Im Sirase namaH /
   oṃ ūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ /	om Um SiKAyE namaH /
   oṃ aiṃ kavacāya namaḥ /	om Em kavacAya namaH /
   oṃ auṃ netratrayāya namaḥ /	om Om netratrayAya namaH /
   oṃ aḥ astrāya phaṭ // GarP_1,32.17 //	om aH astrAya Paw // GarP_1,32.17 //
   oṃ samastaparivārāyācyutāya namaḥ /	om samasta parivArAya acyutAya namaH /
   oṃ dhātre namaḥ /	om DAtre namaH /
   oṃ vidhātre namaḥ /	om viDAtre namaH /
   oṃ ādhāraśaktayai namaḥ /	om ADAra SaktayE namaH /
   oṃ kūrmāya namaḥ /	om kUrmAya namaH /
   oṃ anantāya namaḥ /	om anantAya namaH /
   oṃ pṛthivyainamaḥ /	om pRTivI A enamaH /
   oṃ dharmāya namaḥ /	om DarmAya namaH /
   oṃ dharmāya namaḥ /	om DarmAya namaH /
   oṃ jñānāya namaḥ /	om jQAnAya namaH /
   oṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ /	om vErAgyAya namaH /
   oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ /	om ESvaryAya namaH /
   oṃ ajñānāya namaḥ /	om ajQAnAya namaH /
   oṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ /	om anESvaryAya namaH /
   oṃ aṃ arkamaṇḍalāya namaḥ /	om am arka maNxalAya namaH /
   oṃ soṃ somamaṇāḍalāya namaḥ /	om som soma maNAxalAya namaH /
   oṃ vaṃ vahnimaṇḍalāya namaḥ /	om vam vahni maNxalAya namaH /
   oṃ vaṃ vāsudevāya parabrahmaṇe śivāya tejorūpāya vyāpine	om vam vAsudevAya para brahmaNe SivAya tejaH rUpAya vyApine
   sarvadevādhidevāya namaḥ /	sarva deva aDidevAya namaH /
   oṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ /	om pAQcajanyAya namaH /
   oṃ sudarśavanāya namaḥ /	om sudarSa vanAya namaH /
   oṃ gadāyai namaḥ /	om gadAyE namaH /
   oṃ padmāya namaḥ /	om padmAya namaH /
   oṃ śriyai namaḥ /	om SriyE namaH /
   oṃ hriyai namaḥ /	om hriyE namaH /
   oṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ /	om puzwyE namaH /
   oṃ gītyai namaḥ /	om gItyE namaH /
   oṃ śaktyai namaḥ /	om SaktyE namaH /
   oṃ prītyai namaḥ /	om prItyE namaH /
   oṃ indrāya namaḥ /	om indrAya namaH /
   oṃ agnaye namaḥ /	om agnaye namaH /
   oṃ yamāya namaḥ /	om yamAya namaH /
   oṃ nirṛtaye namaḥ /	om nirRtaye namaH /
   oṃ varuṇāya namaḥ /	om varuNAya namaH /
   oṃ vāyave namaḥ /	om vAyave namaH /
   oṃ somāya namaḥ /	om somAya namaH /
   oṃ īśānāya namaḥ /	om ISAnAya namaH /
   oṃ anantāya namaḥ /	om anantAya namaH /
   oṃ brahmaṇe namaḥ /	om brahmaNe namaH /
   oṃ viṣvaksenāya namaḥ // GarP_1,32.18 //	om vizvaksenAya namaH // GarP_1,32.18 //
   ete mantrāḥ samākhyātāstava rudra samāsataḥ /	ete mantrAH samAKyAtAH tava rudra samAsatas /
   pūjā caiva prakartavyā maṇḍale svastikādike // GarP_1,32.19 //	pUjA ca eva prakartavyA maNxale svastika Adike // GarP_1,32.19 //
   oṃ padmāya namaḥ /	om padmAya namaH /
   aṅganyāsaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mudrāḥ sarvāḥ pradaśayat /	aFganyAsam ca kRtvA tu mudrAH sarvAH pradaSayat /
   ātmānaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca dhyātvā caiva pareśvaram // GarP_1,32.20 //	AtmAnam vAsudevam ca DyAtvA ca eva para ISvaram // GarP_1,32.20 //
   āsanaṃ pūjayetpaścādāvāhya vidhivannaraḥ /	Asanam pUjayet paScAt AvAhya viDivat naraH /
   dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,32.21 //	dvAre DAtuH viDAtuH ca pUjA kAryA vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,32.21 //
   garuḍaṃ pūjayedagre vāsudevasya śaṅkara /	garuxam pUjayet agre vAsudevasya SaFkara /
   śaṅkhādipadmaparyantaṃ madhyadeśe prapūjayet // GarP_1,32.22 //	SaFKa Adi padma paryantam maDyadeSe prapUjayet // GarP_1,32.22 //
   dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ pūrvadeśataḥ /	Darmam jQAnam ca vErAgyam ESvaryam pUrva deSataH /
   āgneyādiṣvarcayedvai adharmādicatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,32.23 //	Agneya Adizu arcayet vE aDarma Adi catuzwayam // GarP_1,32.23 //
   maṇḍalatrayamadhye tu kīrtitā hyasanasthitiḥ /	maNxala traya maDye tu kIrtitA hi asana sTitiH /
   pūrvādipadmapatreṣu pūjyāḥ saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ // GarP_1,32.24 //	pUrva Adi padma patrezu pUjyAH saMkarzaNa AdayaH // GarP_1,32.24 //
   karṇikāyāṃ vāsudevaṃ pūjayetparameśvaram /	karNikAyAm vAsudevam pUjayet parameSvaram /
   pāñcajanyādayaḥ pūjyāḥ aiśānyādiṣu saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_1,32.25 //	pAQcajanya AdayaH pUjyAH ESAni Adizu saMsTitAH // GarP_1,32.25 //
   śaktayaścaiva pūrvādau devadevasya śaṅkara /	SaktayaH ca eva pUrva AdO devadevasya SaFkara /
   indrādayo lokapālāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ // GarP_1,32.26 //	indra AdayaH lokapAlAH pUjyAH pUrva Adizu sTitAH // GarP_1,32.26 //
   adho nāga tadūddhva tu brahmāṇaṃ pūjayetsudhīḥ /	aDas nAga tad u udDva tu brahmANam pUjayet suDIH /
   iti sthānakramo jñeyo maṇḍale śaṅkara tvayā // GarP_1,32.27 //	iti sTAna kramaH jQeyaH maNxale SaFkara tvayA // GarP_1,32.27 //
   āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ kṛtvā nyāsaṃ tu tasya ca /	AvAhya maNxale devam kRtvA nyAsam tu tasya ca /
   mudrāṃ pradarśya pādyadīndadyānmūlena śaṅkara // GarP_1,32.28 //	mudrAm pradarSya pAdya dIn dadyAt mUlena SaFkara // GarP_1,32.28 //
   snānaṃ vastraṃ tathācāmaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /	snAnam vastram taTA AcAmam ganDam puzpam ca DUpakam /
   dīpaṃ naivedyamācāmaṃ namaskāraṃ pradakṣiṇam /	dIpam nEvedyam AcAmam namaskAram pradakziNam /
   kuryācchaṅkara mūlena japaṃ cāpi samarpayet // GarP_1,32.29 //	kuryAt SaFkara mUlena japam ca api samarpayet // GarP_1,32.29 //
   daṃ stotraṃ japetpaścādvāsudevamanusmaran /	dam stotram japet paScAt vAsudevam anusmaran /
   oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ sakarṣaṇāya ca // GarP_1,32.30 //	om namaH vAsudevAya namaH sa karzaNAya ca // GarP_1,32.30 //
   pradyumnāyādidevāyāniruddhāya namonamaḥ /	pradyumnAya Adi devAya anirudDAya namaH namaH /
   namo nārāyaṇāyaiva narāyaṇāṃ pataye namaḥ // GarP_1,32.31 //	namaH nArAyaNAya eva narAyaNAm pataye namaH // GarP_1,32.31 //
   narapūjyāya kīrtyāya stutyāya varadāya ca /	nara pUjyAya kIrtyAya stutyAya vara dAya ca /
   anādinidhanāyaiva purāṇāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,32.32 //	anAdi niDanAya eva purANAya namaH namaH // GarP_1,32.32 //
   sṛṣṭisaṃhārakartre ca brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ /	sRzwi saMhAra kartre ca brahmaNaH pataye namaH /
   mano vai vedavedyāya śaṅkhacakradharāya ca // GarP_1,32.33 //	manaH vE veda vedyAya SaFKa cakra DarAya ca // GarP_1,32.33 //
   kalikalmaṣahartre ca sureśāya namonamaḥ /	kali kalmaza hartre ca sureSAya namaH namaH /
   saṃkāravṛkṣacchetre ca māyābhetre namonamaḥ // GarP_1,32.34 //	saMkAra vRkza= Cetre ca mAyA Betre namaH namaH // GarP_1,32.34 //
   vahurūpāya tīrthāya triguṇāyāguṇāya ca /	vahu rUpAya tIrTAya triguNAya aguNAya ca /
   brahmaviṣṇavīśarūpaya mokṣadāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,32.35 //	brahma vizNa vISa rUpaya mokza dAya namaH namaH // GarP_1,32.35 //
   mokṣadvārāya dharmāya nirmāṇāya namonamaḥ /	mokza dvArAya DarmAya nirmANAya namaH namaH /
   sarvakāmapradāyaiva parabrahmasvarūpiṇe // GarP_1,32.36 //	sarva kAma pradAya eva para brahma svarUpiNe // GarP_1,32.36 //
   saṃsārasāgare ghore nimagnaṃ māṃ samuddhara /	saMsAra sAgare Gore nimagnam mAm samudDara /
   tvadanyo nāsti deveśa nāsti trātā jagatprabho // GarP_1,32.37 //	tvad anyaH na asti deveSa na asti trAtA jagatpraBo // GarP_1,32.37 //
   tvāmava sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ gato 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /	tvAm ava sarvagam vizNum gataH aham SaraNam gataH /
   jñānadīpapradānena tamomuktaṃ prakāśaya // GarP_1,32.38 //	jQAna dIpa pradAnena tamaH muktam prakASaya // GarP_1,32.38 //
   evaṃ stuvīta deveśaṃ sarvakleśavināśanam /	evam stuvIta deveSam sarva kleSa vinASanam /
   anyaiścavādakeḥ stātraiḥ stutvā vai nīlalohita // GarP_1,32.39 //	anyEH ca vAdakeH stAtrEH stutvA vE nIlalohitaH // GarP_1,32.39 //
   pañcatattvasamāyuktaṃ dhyāyodviṣṇuṃ naro hṛdi /	paQcatattva samAyuktam DyAya udvizNum naraH hRdi /
   visarjayattatā devamiti pūjā prakīrtitā // GarP_1,32.40 //	visarjayat tatA devam iti pUjA prakIrtitAH // GarP_1,32.40 //
   sarvakāmapradā śreṣṭhā vāsudevasya śaṅkara /	sarva kAma pradA SrezWAH vAsudevasya SaFkara /
   etatpūjanamātreṇa kṛtakṛtyo bhavennaraḥ // GarP_1,32.41 //	etad pUjana mAtreNa kRtakRtyaH Bavet naraH // GarP_1,32.41 //
   idaṃ ca yaḥ paṭhedrudra pañcatattvārcanaṃ naraḥ /	idam ca yaH paWet rudra paQcatattva arcanam naraH /
   śṛṇuyācchravāyedvāpi viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,32.42 //	SRNuyAt SravAyet vA api vizNu lokam sa gacCati // GarP_1,32.42 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   pañcatattvā(viṣṇavar) ca navidhirnāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	paQcatattvA(vizNavar) ca naviDiH nAma dvAtriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  33	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 33
   rudra uvāca /	rudraH uvAca /
   sudarśanasya pūjāṃ me vada śaṅkhagadādhara /	sudarSanasya pUjAm me vada SaFKa gadA Dara /
   graharogādikaṃ sarvaṃ yatkṛtvā nāśameti vai // GarP_1,33.1 //	graha roga Adikam sarvam yat kRtvA nASam eti vE // GarP_1,33.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   sudarśanasya cakrasya śṛṇu pūjāṃ vṛṣadhvaja /	sudarSanasya cakrasya SRNu pUjAm vRzaDvaja /
   snānamādau prakurvīta pūjayecca hariṃ tata // GarP_1,33.2 //	snAnam AdO prakurvIta pUjayet ca harim tatas // GarP_1,33.2 //
   mūlamantreṇa vai nyāsaṃ mūlamantraṃ śṛṇuṣvaca /	mUlamantreNa vE nyAsam mUlamantram SRNuzva ca /
   sahasrāraṃ huṃ phaṭ namo mantraḥ praṇavapūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,33.3 //	sahasrAram hum Paw namaH mantraH praNava pUrvakaH // GarP_1,33.3 //
   kathitaḥ sarvaduṣṭānāṃ nāśako mantrabhedakaḥ /	kaTitaH sarva duzwAnAm nASakaH mantra BedakaH /
   dhyāyetmudarśanaṃ devaṃ hṛdi padme 'male śubhe // GarP_1,33.4 //	DyAyet mu darSanam devam hRdi padme amale SuBe // GarP_1,33.4 //
   śaṅkacakragadāpadmadharaṃ saumyaṃ kirīṭinam /	SaFka cakra gadA padma Daram sOmyam kirIwinam /
   āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā hara // GarP_1,33.5 //	AvAhya maNxale devam pUrva ukta viDinA hara // GarP_1,33.5 //
   pūjayedrandhapuṣpādyairupacārairmaheśvara /	pUjayet ranDa puzpa AdyEH upacArEH maheSvara /
   pūjayitvā japenmantraṃ śatamaṣṭottaraṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,33.6 //	pUjayitvA japet mantram Satam azwa uttaram naraH // GarP_1,33.6 //
   evaṃ yaḥ kurute rudra ! cakrasyārcanamuttamam /	evam yaH kurute rudraH ! cakrasya arcanam uttamam /
   sarvarogavinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ samāpnuyāt // GarP_1,33.7 //	sarva roga vinirmuktaH vizNu lokam samApnuyAt // GarP_1,33.7 //
   etatstotraṃ japetpaścātsarvavyādhivināśanam /	etat stotram japet paScAt sarva vyADi vinASanam /
   namaḥ sudarśanāyaiva sahasrādityavarcase // GarP_1,33.8 //	namaH sudarSanAya eva sahasra Aditya varcase // GarP_1,33.8 //
   jvālāmālāpradīptāya sahasrārāya cakṣuṣe /	jvAlA mAlA pradIptAya sahasrArAya cakzuze /
   sarvaduṣṭavināśāya sarvapātakamardine // GarP_1,33.9 //	sarva duzwa vinASAya sarva pAtaka mardine // GarP_1,33.9 //
   sucakrāya vicakrāya sarvamantravibhedine /	sucakrAya vicakrAya sarva mantra viBedine /
   prasavitre jagaddhātre jagadvidhvaṃsine namaḥ // GarP_1,33.10 //	prasavitre jagadDAtre jagat viDvaMsine namaH // GarP_1,33.10 //
   pālanārthāya lokānāṃ duṣṭāsuravināśine /	pAlana arTAya lokAnAm duzwa asura vinASine /
   ugrāya caiva saumyāya caṇḍāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.11 //	ugrAya ca eva sOmyAya caNxAya ca namaH namaH // GarP_1,33.11 //
   namaścakṣuḥ kvarūpāya saṃsārabhayabhedine /	namaH cakzuH kva rUpAya saMsAra Baya Bedine /
   māyāpañjarabhetre ca śivāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.12 //	mAyA paQjara Betre ca SivAya ca namaH namaH // GarP_1,33.12 //
   grahātigraharūpāya grahāṇāṃ pateya namaḥ /	graha atigraha rUpAya grahANAm pateya namaH /
   kālāya mṛtyave caiva bhīmāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.13 //	kAlAya mRtyave ca eva BImAya ca namaH namaH // GarP_1,33.13 //
   bhaktānugrahadātre ca bhaktagoptre namonamaḥ /	Bakta anugraha dAtre ca Bakta goptre namaH namaH /
   viṣṇurūpāya śāntāya cāyudhānāṃ dharāya ca // GarP_1,33.14 //	vizNu rUpAya SAntAya ca AyuDAnAm DarAya ca // GarP_1,33.14 //
   viṣṇuśastrāya cakrāya namo bhūyo namonamaḥ /	vizNu SastrAya cakrAya namaH BUyas namaH namaH /
   iti stotraṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ cakrasya tava kīrtitam // GarP_1,33.15 //	iti stotram mahA puNyam cakrasya tava kIrtitam // GarP_1,33.15 //
   yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /	yaH paWet parayA BaktyA vizNu lokam sa gacCati /
   cakrapūjāvidhiṃ yaśca paṭhedrudra jitondriyaḥ /	cakra pUjA viDim yaH ca paWet rudra jita undriyaH /
   sa pāpaṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā viṣṇulokāya kalpate // GarP_1,33.16 //	sa pApam BasmasAt kRtvA vizNu lokAya kalpate // GarP_1,33.16 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   sudarśanapūjāvidhirnāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	sudarSanapUjAviDiH nAma trayastriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  34	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 34
   rudra uvāca /	rudraH uvAca /
   punardevārcanaṃ brūhi hṛṣīkeśa gadādhara /	punar deva arcanam brUhi hRzIkeSa gadADara /
   śṛṇvato nāsti tṛptirme gadatastava pūjanam // GarP_1,34.1 //	SRNvataH na asti tRptiH me gadataH tava pUjanam // GarP_1,34.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   hayagrīvasya devasya pūjanaṃ kathayāmi te /	hayagrIvasya devasya pUjanam kaTayAmi te /
   tacchṛṇuṣva jagannātho yena viṣṇuḥ pratuṣyati // GarP_1,34.2 //	tat SRNuzva jagannATaH yena vizNuH pratuzyati // GarP_1,34.2 //
   mūlamantraṃ mahādeva hayagrīvasya vācakam /	mUlamantram mahAdeva hayagrIvasya vAcakam /
   pravakṣyāmi paraṃ puṇyaṃ tadādau śṛṇu śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.3 //	pravakzyAmi param puNyam tad AdO SRNu SaFkara // GarP_1,34.3 //
   oṃ saiṃ kṣaiṃ śirase namaḥ iti praṇavasaṃyutaḥ /	om sEm kzEm Sirase namaH iti praNava saMyutaH /
   ayaṃ navākṣaromantraḥ sarvavidyāpradāyakaḥ // GarP_1,34.4 //	ayam nava akzaraH mantraH sarva vidyA pradAyakaH // GarP_1,34.4 //
   asyāṅgāni mahādeva tāñchṛṇuṣva vṛṣadhvaja /	asya aFgAni mahAdeva tAn SRNuzva vRzaDvaja /
   oṃ kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om kzAm hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ kṣīṃ śirase svāhāśiraḥ proktaṃ kṣūṃ vaṣaṭ tathā // GarP_1,34.5 //	om kzIm Sirase svAhA SiraH proktam kzUm vazaw taTA // GarP_1,34.5 //
   oṃ kārayuktā devasya śikhā jñeyā vṛṣadhvaja /	om kAra yuktAH devasya SiKA jQeyA vRzaDvaja /
   oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya huṃ vai kavacaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_1,34.6 //	om kzEm kavacAya hum vE kavacam parikIrtitam // GarP_1,34.6 //
   oṃ kṣaiṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ netraṃ devasya kīrtitam /	om kzEm netratrayAya vOzaw netram devasya kIrtitam /
   oṃ haḥ astrāya phaṭ astraṃ devasya kīrtitam // GarP_1,34.7 //	om haH astrAya Paw astram devasya kIrtitam // GarP_1,34.7 //
   pūjāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi nanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu ādau snātvā tathācamya tato	pUjA viDim pravakzyAmi nat me nigadataH SRNu AdO snAtvA taTA Acamya tatas 
   yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,34.8 //	yAga gRham vrajet // GarP_1,34.8 //
   tataḥ praviśya vidhivatkuryādvaṃ śoṣaṇādikam /	tatas praviSya viDivat kuryAt vam SozaNa Adikam /
   yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinīkṛtya lamiti // GarP_1,34.9 //	yam kzEm ram iti bIjEH ca kaWinIkRtya lam iti // GarP_1,34.9 //
   aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ oṃ kāreṇaiva bhedayet /	aNxam utpAdya ca tatas om kAreNa eva Bedayet /
   aṇḍamadhye hayagrīvamātmānaṃ paricintayet // GarP_1,34.10 //	aNxa maDye hayagrIvam AtmAnam paricintayet // GarP_1,34.10 //
   śaṅkhakundendudhavalaṃ mṛṇālarajataprabham /	SaFKa kunda indu Davalam mRNAla rajata praBam /
   gokṣīrasadṛśaṃ tadvatsūryakoṭisamagrabham /	go kzIra sadRSam tadvat sUrya kowi samagraBam /
   śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ dhārayantaṃ caturbhujam // GarP_1,34.11 //	SaFKam cakram gadAm padmam DArayantam catur Bujam // GarP_1,34.11 //
   kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ vanamālāsamaṃnvitam /	kirIwinam kuNxalinam vanamAlA samaMnvitam /
   sucakraṃ sukapolaṃ ca ṣītāmbaradharaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,34.12 //	su cakram su kapolam ca zIta ambara Daram viBum // GarP_1,34.12 //
   bhāvayitvā mahātmānaṃ sarvadevaiḥ samanvitam /	BAvayitvA mahAtmAnam sarva devEH samanvitam /
   aṅgamantraistato nyāsaṃ mūlamantreṇa vai tathā // GarP_1,34.13 //	aFga mantrEH tatas nyAsam mUlamantreNa vE taTA // GarP_1,34.13 //
   tataśca darśayenmudrāṃ śaṅkhapadmādikāṃ śubhām /	tatas ca darSayet mudrAm SaFKa padma AdikAm SuBAm /
   dhyāyeddhyātvārcayedviṣṇuṃ mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.14 //	DyAyet DyAtvA arcayet vizNum mUlamantreNa SaFkara // GarP_1,34.14 //
   tataścāvāhayedrudra devatā āsanasya yāḥ /	tatas ca AvAhayet rudra devatAH Asanasya yAH /
   oṃ hayagrīvāsanasya āgacchata ca devatāḥ // GarP_1,34.15 //	om hayagrIvA Asanasya AgacCata ca devatAH // GarP_1,34.15 //
   āvāhya maṇḍale tāstu pūjayetsvastikādike /	AvAhya maNxale tAH tu pUjayet svastika Adike /
   dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.16 //	dvAre DAtuH viDAtuH ca pUjA kAryA vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,34.16 //
   samastaparivārāya acyutāya nama iti /	samasta parivArAya acyutAya namaH iti /
   asya madhyer'canaṃ kāryaṃ dvāre gaṅgāñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.17 //	asya maDyeH acanam kAryam dvAre gaFgAQca pUjayet // GarP_1,34.17 //
   yamunāṃ ca mahādevīṃ śaṅkhapadmanidhī tathā /	yamunAm ca mahAdevIm SaFKa padma niDI taTA /
   garuḍaṃ pūjayedagre madhye śaktiñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.18 //	garuxam pUjayet agre maDye SaktiQca pUjayet // GarP_1,34.18 //
   ādhārākhyāṃ mahādeva tataḥ kūrmaṃ samarcayet /	ADAra AKyAm mahAdeva tatas kUrmam samarcayet /
   anantaṃ pṛthivīṃ paścāddharmajñāne(nau) tato 'cayet // GarP_1,34.19 //	anantam pRTivIm paScAt Darma jQAne(nO) tatas acayet // GarP_1,34.19 //
   vairāgyamatha caiśvaryamāgneyādiṣu pūjayet /	vErAgyam aTa ca ESvaryam Agneya Adizu pUjayet /
   adharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśrargyādīṃstu pūrvataḥ // GarP_1,34.20 //	aDarma ajQAna avErAgya anESrargya AdIn= tu pUrvatas // GarP_1,34.20 //
   sattvaṃ rajastamaścaiva madhyadeśe 'tha pūjayet /	sattvam rajaH tamaH ca eva maDya deSe aTa pUjayet /
   kandaṃ nālaṃ ca padmaṃ ca madhye caiva prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.21 //	kandam nAlam ca padmam ca maDye ca eva prapUjayet // GarP_1,34.21 //
   arkasomāgnisaṃjñānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ hi pūjanam /	arka soma agni saMjQAnAm maNxalAnAm hi pUjanam /
   madhyadeśe prakartavyamiti rudra prakīrtitam // GarP_1,34.22 //	maDyadeSe prakartavyam iti rudra prakIrtitam // GarP_1,34.22 //
   vimalotkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyāyoge vṛṣadhvaja /	vimala utkarziNI jQAnA kriyA yoge vRzaDvaja /
   prahvī satyā tatheśānānugrahau śaktayo hyamūḥ // GarP_1,34.23 //	prahvI satyA taTA ISAna anugrahO SaktayaH hi amUH // GarP_1,34.23 //
   pūrvādiṣu ca patreṣu pūjyāśca vimalādayaḥ /	pUrva Adizu ca patrezu pUjyAH ca vimala AdayaH /
   anugrahā karṇikāyāṃ pūjyā śreyo 'rthibhirnaraiḥ // GarP_1,34.24 //	anugrahA karNikAyAm pUjyA SreyaH arTiBiH narEH // GarP_1,34.24 //
   praṇavādyairnamo 'ntaiśca caturthyantaiśca nāmabhiḥ /	praNava AdyEH namaH antEH ca caturTI antEH ca nAmaBiH /
   mantrairebhirmahādeva āsanaṃ paripūjayet // GarP_1,34.25 //	mantrEH eBiH mahAdevaH Asanam paripUjayet // GarP_1,34.25 //
   snānagandhapradānena puṣpadhūpapradānataḥ /	snAna ganDa pradAnena puzpa DUpa pradAnataH /
   dīpanaivedyadānena āsanasyārcanaṃ śubham // GarP_1,34.26 //	dIpa nEvedya dAnena Asanasya arcanam SuBam // GarP_1,34.26 //
   kartavyaṃ vidhinānena iti te hara kīrtitam /	kartavyam viDinA anena iti te hara kIrtitam /
   tataścāvāhayeddevaṃ hayagrīvaṃ sureśvaram // GarP_1,34.27 //	tatas ca AvAhayet devam hayagrIvam sureSvaram // GarP_1,34.27 //
   vāmanāsāpuṭenaiva āgacchantaṃ vicintayet /	vAma nAsA puwena eva AgacCantam vicintayet /
   āgacchataḥ prayogeṇa mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.28 //	AgacCataH prayogeNa mUlamantreNa SaFkara // GarP_1,34.28 //
   āvāhanaṃ prakartavyaṃ devadevasya śaṅkhinaḥ /	AvAhanam prakartavyam devadevasya SaFKinaH /
   āvāhyamaṇḍale tasya nyāsaṃ kuryādatandritaḥ // GarP_1,34.29 //	AvAhya maNxale tasya nyAsam kuryAt atandritaH // GarP_1,34.29 //
   nyāsaṃ kṛtvā ca tatrasthaṃ cintayetparameśvaram /	nyAsam kRtvA ca tatrasTam cintayet parameSvaram /
   hayagrīvaṃ mahādevaṃ surāsuranamaskṛtam // GarP_1,34.30 //	hayagrIvam mahAdevam sura asura namaskRtam // GarP_1,34.30 //
   indrādilokapālaiśca saṃyuktaṃ viṣṇumavyayam /	indra Adi lokapAlEH ca saMyuktam vizNum avyayam /
   dyātvā pradarśayenmudrāḥ śaṅkhacakrādikāḥ śubhāḥ // GarP_1,34.31 //	dyAtvA pradarSayet mudrAH SaFKa cakra AdikAH SuBAH // GarP_1,34.31 //
   pādyārghyācamanīyāni tato dadyācca viṣṇave /	pAdya arGya AcamanIyAni tatas dadyAt ca vizNave /
   snāpayecca tato devaṃ padmanābhamanāmayam // GarP_1,34.32 //	snApayet ca tatas devam padmanABam anAmayam // GarP_1,34.32 //
   devaṃ saṃsthāpya vidhivadvastraṃ dadyādvṛṣadhvaja /	devam saMsTApya viDivat vastram dadyAt vRzaDvaja /
   tato hyācamanaṃ dadyādupavītaṃ tataḥ śubham // GarP_1,34.33 //	tatas hi Acamanam dadyAt upavItam tatas SuBam // GarP_1,34.33 //
   tataśca maṇḍale rudra dhyāyeddevaṃ pareśvaram /	tatas ca maNxale rudra DyAyet devam para ISvaram /
   dhyātvā pādyādikaṃ bhūyo dadyāddevāya śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.34 //	DyAtvA pAdya Adikam BUyas dadyAt devAya SaFkara // GarP_1,34.34 //
   dadyādbhairavadevāya mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara /	dadyAt BErava devAya mUlamantreNa SaFkara /
   oṃ kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ anena hṛdayaṃ yajet // GarP_1,34.35 //	om kzAm hRdayAya namaH anena hRdayam yajet // GarP_1,34.35 //
   oṃ kṣīṃ śirase namaśca śirasaḥ pūjanaṃ bhavet /	om kzIm Sirase namaH ca SirasaH pUjanam Bavet /
   oṃ kṣūṃ śikhāyai namaśca śikhāmetena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.36 //	om kzUm SiKAyE namaH ca SiKAm etena pUjayet // GarP_1,34.36 //
   oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya namaḥ kavacaṃ paripūjayet /	om kzEm kavacAya namaH kavacam paripUjayet /
   oṃ kṣaiṃ netrāya namaśca netraṃ cānena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.37 //	om kzEm netrAya namaH ca netram ca anena pUjayet // GarP_1,34.37 //
   oṃ kṣaḥ astrāya nama iti astraṃ cānena pūjayet /	om kzaH astrAya namaH iti astram ca anena pUjayet /
   hṛdayaṃ ca śiraścaiva śikhāṃ ca kavacaṃ tathā // GarP_1,34.38 //	hRdayam ca SiraH ca eva SiKAm ca kavacam taTA // GarP_1,34.38 //
   pūrvādiṣu pradeśeṣu hyetāstu paripūjayet /	pUrva Adizu pradeSezu hi etAH tu paripUjayet /
   koṇeṣvastraṃ yajedrudra netraṃ madhyai prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.39 //	koNezu astram yajet rudra netram maDyE prapUjayet // GarP_1,34.39 //
   pūjayetparamāṃ devīṃ lakṣmīṃ lakṣmīpradāṃ śubhām /	pUjayet paramAm devIm lakzmIm lakzmI pradAm SuBAm /
   śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ tathā cakraṃ gadāṃ pūrvāditor'cayet // GarP_1,34.40 //	SaFKam padmam taTA cakram gadAm pUrva Aditor acayet // GarP_1,34.40 //
   khaḍgaṃ ca musalaṃ pāśamaṅkuśaṃ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ /	Kaxgam ca musalam pASam aFkuSam sa Saram DanuH /
   pūjayetpūrvato rudra ebhirmantraiḥ svanāmakaiḥ // GarP_1,34.41 //	pUjayet pUrvatas rudraH eBiH mantrEH sva nAmakEH // GarP_1,34.41 //
   śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ mālāṃ tathā pītāmbaraṃ śubham /	SrIvatsam kOstuBam mAlAm taTA pIta ambaram SuBam /
   pūjayetpūrvato rudra śaṅkhacakragadādharam // GarP_1,34.42 //	pUjayet pUrvatas rudra SaFKa cakra gadA Daram // GarP_1,34.42 //
   brahmāṇaṃ nāradaṃ siddhaṃ guruṃ paraguruṃ tathā /	brahmANam nAradam sidDam gurum para gurum taTA /
   gurośca pāduke tadvatparamasya gurostathā // GarP_1,34.43 //	guroH ca pAduke tadvat paramasya guroH taTA // GarP_1,34.43 //
   indraṃ savāhanaṃ cātha parivārayutaṃ tathā /	indram sa vAhanam ca aTa parivAra yutam taTA /
   agniṃ yamaṃ nirṛtiṃ ca varuṇaṃ vāyumeva ca // GarP_1,34.44 //	agnim yamam nirRtim ca varuNam vAyum eva ca // GarP_1,34.44 //
   somamīśānamevaṃ vai brahmāṇaṃ paripūjayet /	somam ISAnam evam vE brahmANam paripUjayet /
   pūrvādikordhvaparyantaṃ pūjayedvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,34.45 //	pUrva Adika UrDva paryantam pUjayet vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,34.45 //
   vajraṃ śaktiṃ tathā daṇḍaṃ khaṅgaṃ pāśaṃ dhvajaṃ gadām /	vajram Saktim taTA daNxam KaFgam pASam Dvajam gadAm /
   triśūlaṃ cakrapadme ca āyudhānyatha pūjayet // GarP_1,34.46 //	triSUlam cakra padme ca AyuDAni aTa pUjayet // GarP_1,34.46 //
   viṣvaksenaṃ tato devamaiśānyāṃ diśi pūjayet /	vizvaksenam tatas devam ESAnyAm diSi pUjayet /
   ebhirmantrairnamo 'ntaiśca praṇavādyairvṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.47 //	eBiH mantrEH namaH antEH ca praNava AdyEH vRzaDvajaH // GarP_1,34.47 //
   pūjā kāryā mahādeva hyanantasya vṛṣadhvaja /	pUjA kAryA mahAdeva hi anantasya vRzaDvaja /
   devasya mūlamantreṇa pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.48 //	devasya mUlamantreNa pUjA kAryA vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,34.48 //
   gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ naivedyameva ca /	ganDam puzpam taTA DUpam dIpam nEvedyam eva ca /
   pradakṣiṇaṃ namaskāraṃ japyaṃ tasmai samarpayet // GarP_1,34.49 //	pradakziNam namaskAram japyam tasmE samarpayet // GarP_1,34.49 //
   stuvīta cānyā stutyā praṇavādyairvṛṣadhvaja /	stuvIta ca anyA stutyA praNava AdyEH vRzaDvaja /
   oṃ namo hayaśirase vidyādhyakṣāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,34.50 //	om namaH haya Sirase vidyA aDyakzAya vE namaH // GarP_1,34.50 //
   namo vidyāsvarūpāya vidyādātre namonamaḥ /	namaH vidyA svarUpAya vidyA dAtre namaH namaH /
   namaḥ śāntāya devāya triguṇāyātmane namaḥ // GarP_1,34.51 //	namaH SAntAya devAya triguNAya Atmane namaH // GarP_1,34.51 //
   surāsuranihantre ca sarvaduṣṭavināśine /	sura asura nihantre ca sarva duzwa vinASine /
   sarvalokādhipataye brahmarūpāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,34.52 //	sarva loka aDipataye brahma rUpAya vE namaH // GarP_1,34.52 //
   namaśceśvaravandyāya śaṅkacakradhāraya ca /	namaH ca ISvara vandyAya SaFkacakra DAraya ca /
   nama ādyāya dāntāya sarvasattvahitāya ca // GarP_1,34.53 //	namaH AdyAya dAntAya sarva sattva hitAya ca // GarP_1,34.53 //
   triguṇāyāguṇāyaiva brahmaviṣṇusvarūpiṇe /	triguNAya aguNAya eva brahma vizNu svarUpiNe /
   kartre hartre sureśāya sarvagāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,34.54 //	kartre hartre sureSAya sarvagAya namaH namaH // GarP_1,34.54 //
   ityevaṃ saṃstavaṃ kṛtvā devadevaṃ vicintayet /	iti evam saMstavam kRtvA devadevam vicintayet /
   hṛtpadme vimale rudra śaṅkhacakragadādharam // GarP_1,34.55 //	hRd padme vimale rudra SaFKa cakra gadA Daram // GarP_1,34.55 //
   sūryakoṭipratīkāśaṃ sarvāvayavasundaram /	sUrya kowi pratIkASam sarva avayava sundaram /
   hayagrīvomahīśeśaṃ paramātmānamavyayam // GarP_1,34.56 //	hayagrIvaH mahI ISa ISam paramAtmAnam avyayam // GarP_1,34.56 //
   iti te kathitā pūjā hayagrīvasya śaṅkara /	iti te kaTitA pUjA hayagrIvasya SaFkara /
   yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā sa gacchetparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,34.57 //	yaH paWet parayA BaktyA sa gacCet paramam padam // GarP_1,34.57 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   hayagrīvapūjāvidhirnāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	hayagrIvapUjAviDiH nAma catustriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  35	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 35
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   nyāsādikaṃ pravakṣyāmi gāyattryāḥ śṛṇu śaṅkara /	nyAsa Adikam pravakzyAmi gAyattryAH SRNu SaFkara /
   viśvāmitraṛṣiścaiva savitā cātha devatā // GarP_1,35.1 //	viSvAmitra RziH ca eva savitA ca aTa devatAH // GarP_1,35.1 //
   brahmaśīrṣā rudraśikhā viṣṇorhṛdayasaṃśritā /	brahma SIrzA rudraSiKA vizNoH hRdaya saMSritA /
   viniyogaikanayanā kātyāyanasagotrajā // GarP_1,35.2 //	viniyoga eka nayanA kAtyAyana sagotra jAH // GarP_1,35.2 //
   trailokyacaraṇā jñeyā pṛthivīkukṣisaṃsthitā /	trElokya caraNA jQeyA pRTivI kukzi saMsTitA /
   evaṃ jñātvā tu gāyattrīṃ japeddvādaśalakṣakam // GarP_1,35.3 //	evam jQAtvA tu gAyattrIm japet dvAdaSa lakzakam // GarP_1,35.3 //
   tripadāṣṭākṣarā jñeyā catuṣpādā ṣaḍakṣarā /	tri padA azwa akzarA jQeyA catuzpAdA zaz akzarA /
   jepa ca tripadā groktā arcane ca catuṣpadā // GarP_1,35.4 //	jepa ca tripadA groktAH arcane ca catuzpadAH // GarP_1,35.4 //
   nyāse jape tathā dhyāne agnikārye tathārcane /	nyAse jape taTA DyAne agni kArye taTA arcane /
   gāyattrīṃ vinyasennityaṃ sarvapāpagraṇāśinīm // GarP_1,35.5 //	gAyattrIm vinyaset nityam sarva pApa graNa ASinIm // GarP_1,35.5 //
   pādāṃsuṣṭhe gulphamadhye jaṅghayorviddhi jānunoḥ /	pAdAMsuzWe gulPa maDye jaFGayoH vidDi jAnunoH /
   ūrvorguhye ca vṛṣaṇe nāḍyāṃ nābhau tanūdare // GarP_1,35.6 //	UrvoH guhye ca vRzaNe nAxyAm nABO tanu udare // GarP_1,35.6 //
   stanayorhṛdi kaṇṭhauṣṭhamukhe tāluni cāṃsayoḥ /	stanayoH hRdi kaNWa ozWa muKe tAluni ca aMsayoH /
   netre bhuvārlalāṭe ca pūrvasyāṃ dakṣiṇottare // GarP_1,35.7 //	netre BuvArlalAwe ca pUrvasyAm dakziNa uttare // GarP_1,35.7 //
   paścame mūrdhni cākāraṃ nyasedvarṇānvadāmyaham /	paScame mUrDni ca AkAram nyaset varNAn vadAmi aham /
   indranīlaṃ ca vahniṃ ca pītaṃ śyāmaṃ ca kāpilam // GarP_1,35.8 //	indranIlam ca vahnim ca pItam SyAmam ca kApilam // GarP_1,35.8 //
   śvetaṃ vidyutprabhaṃ tāraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ krameṇa tat /	Svetam vidyut praBam tAram kRzNam raktam krameNa tat /
   śyāmaṃ śuklaṃ tathā pītaṃ śvetaṃ vai padmarāgavat // GarP_1,35.9 //	SyAmam Suklam taTA pItam Svetam vE padmarAga vat // GarP_1,35.9 //
   śaṅkhavarṇaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ ca raktaṃ cāsavasannibham /	SaFKa varNam pANxuram ca raktam ca Asava sanniBam /
   arkavarṇasamaṃ saumyaṃ śaṅkhābhaṃ śvetameva ca // GarP_1,35.10 //	arka varNa samam sOmyam SaFKa ABam Svetam eva ca // GarP_1,35.10 //
   yadyatspṛśati hastena yacca paśyati cakṣuṣā /	yat yat spRSati hastena yat ca paSyati cakzuzA /
   pūtaṃ bhavati tatsarvaṃ gāyattryā na paraṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,35.11 //	pUtam Bavati tat sarvam gAyattryA na param viduH // GarP_1,35.11 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   gāyattrīnyāsanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	gAyattrInyAsanirUpaNam nAma paQcatriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  36	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 36
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   sandhyāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu rudrāghanāśanam /	sanDyA viDim pravakzyAmi SRNu rudra aGa nASanam /
   prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kṛtvā sandhyāsnānamupakramet // GarP_1,36.1 //	prANAyAma trayam kRtvA sanDyA snAnam upakramet // GarP_1,36.1 //
   sapraṇavāṃ savyāhṛtiṃ gāyattrīṃ śirasā saha /	sa praNavAm sa vyAhRtim gAyattrIm SirasA saha /
   triḥ paṭhedāyatapraṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,36.2 //	tris paWet Ayata praNaH prANAyAmaH saH ucyate // GarP_1,36.2 //
   manovākrāyajaṃ doṣaṃ prāṇāyāmairdaheddvijaḥ /	manaH vAkrAya jam dozam prANAyAmEH dahet dvijaH /
   tasmātsarveṣu kāleṣu prāṇāyāmaparo bhavet // GarP_1,36.3 //	tasmAt sarvezu kAlezu prANAyAma paraH Bavet // GarP_1,36.3 //
   sāyamagniśca metyuktā prātaḥ sūryetyapaḥ pibet /	sAyam agniH ca mA iti uktA prAtar sUrya iti apaH pibet /
   āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne upaspṛśya yathāvidhi // GarP_1,36.4 //	ApaH punantu maDyAhne upaspRSya yaTAviDi // GarP_1,36.4 //
   āpohiṣṭhetyṛcā kuryānmārjanaṃ tu kuśodakaiḥ /	ApohizWA iti RcA kuryAt mArjanam tu kuSa udakEH /
   praṇavena tu saṃyuktaṃ kṣipedvāri padepade // GarP_1,36.5 //	praNavena tu saMyuktam kzipet vAri padepade // GarP_1,36.5 //
   rajastamaḥ svamohotthāñjāgratsvapnasuṣuptijān /	rajaH tamaH sva moha utTAn ja agrat svapna suzupti jAn /
   vāṅmanaḥ karmajāndoṣānnavaitānnavabhirdahet // GarP_1,36.6 //	vAc manaH karma jAn dozAn nava etAn navaBiH dahet // GarP_1,36.6 //
   samuddhṛtyodakaṃ pāṇau japtvā ca drupadāṃ kṣipet /	samudDRtya udakam pANO japtvA ca drupadAm kzipet /
   tripaḍaṣṭau dvādaśadhā vartayedaghamarpaṇam // GarP_1,36.7 //	tri paxazwO dvAdaSaDA vartayet aGam arpaNam // GarP_1,36.7 //
   udutyañcitramityābhyāmupatiṣṭheddivākaram /	uduti aQcitram iti AByAm upatizWet divAkaram /
   divā rātrau ca yatpāpaṃ sarvaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt // GarP_1,36.8 //	divA rAtrO ca yat pApam sarvam naSyati tad kzaNAt // GarP_1,36.8 //
   pūrvasaṃdhyāṃ japaṃstiṣṭhetpaścimāmupaviśya ca /	pUrva saMDyAm japan= tizWet paScimAm upaviSya ca /
   mahāvyāhṛtisaṃyuktāṃ gāyattrīṃ praṇavānvitām // GarP_1,36.9 //	mahAvyAhRti saMyuktAm gAyattrIm praNava anvitAm // GarP_1,36.9 //
   daśabhirjanmajanitaṃ śatena tu purā kṛtam /	daSaBiH janma janitam Satena tu purA kRtam /
   triyugaṃ tu sahasreṇa gāyattrī hanti duṣkṛtam // GarP_1,36.10 //	tri yugam tu sahasreNa gAyattrI hanti duzkRtam // GarP_1,36.10 //
   raktā bhavati gāyattrī sāvitrī śuklavarṇikā /	raktA Bavati gAyattrI sAvitrI Sukla varNikA /
   kṛṣṇā sarasvatī jñeyā saṃdhyātrayamudāhṛtam // GarP_1,36.11 //	kRzNA sarasvatI jQeyA saMDyA trayam udAhRtam // GarP_1,36.11 //
   oṃ bhūrvinyasya hṛdaye oṃ bhuvaḥ śirasi nyaset /	om BUH vinyasya hRdaye om BuvaH Sirasi nyaset /
   oṃ svariti śikhāyāṃ ca gāyattryāḥ prathamaṃ padam // GarP_1,36.12 //	om svar iti SiKAyAm ca gAyattryAH praTamam padam // GarP_1,36.12 //
   vinyasetkavace vidvāndvitīyaṃ netrayornyaset /	vinyaset kavace vidvAn dvitIyam netrayoH nyaset /
   tṛtīyenāṅgavinyāsaṃ caturthaṃ sarvato nyaset // GarP_1,36.13 //	tRtIyena aFga vinyAsam caturTam sarvatas nyaset // GarP_1,36.13 //

   oṃ arkāsanāya namaḥ /	om arka AsanAya namaH /
   oṃ hrāṃ sūryamūrtaye namaḥ /	om hrAm sUrya mUrtaye namaH /
   etāstu pūjayenmadhye hranmantrāñchṛṇu śaṅkara /	etAH tu pUjayet maDye hranmantrAn SRNu SaFkara /
   oṃ haṃ saṃ khaṃ khakholkāya krāṃ krīṃ saḥ svāhā sūryamūrtaye namaḥ /	om ham sam Kam KaKolkAya krAm krIm saH svAhA sUrya mUrtaye namaH /
   anenāvāhanaṃ kuryātsthāpanaṃ sannidhāpanam /	anena AvAhanam kuryAt sTApanam sanniDApanam /
   sanniropanamantreṇa sakalīkaraṇaṃ tathā // GarP_1,39.5 //	sanniropana mantreNa sakalIkaraNam taTA // GarP_1,39.5 //
   mudrāyā darśanaṃ rudra mūlamantreṇa vā hara /	mudrAyAH darSanam rudra mUlamantreNa vA hara /
   tejorūpaṃ raktavarṇaṃ sitapadmopari sthitam /	tejaH rUpam rakta varNam sita padma upari sTitam /
   ekacakrarathārūḍhaṃ dvibāhuṃ dhṛtapaṅkajam // GarP_1,39.6 //	eka cakra raTa ArUXam dvi bAhum DRta paFkajam // GarP_1,39.6 //
   evaṃ dhyāyetsadā sūryaṃ mūlamantraṃ śṛṇuṣva ca /	evam DyAyet sadA sUryam mUlamantram SRNuzva ca /
   oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ // GarP_1,39.7 //	om hrAm hrIm saH sUryAya namaH // GarP_1,39.7 //
   vāratrayaṃ padmamudrāṃ bimbamudrāṃ ca darśayet /	vAra trayam padma mudrAm bimba mudrAm ca darSayet /
   oṃ āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om Am hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ arkāya śirase svāhā /	om arkAya Sirase svAhA /
   oṃ aḥ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ jvālini śikhāyai vaṣaṭ /	om aH BUH BuvaH svar jvAlini SiKAyE vazaw /
   oṃ huṃ kavacāya huṃ /	om hum kavacAya hum /
   oṃ bhāṃ netrābhyāṃ vauṣaṭ /	om BAm netrAByAm vOzaw /
   oṃ vaḥ astrāya phaḍiti // GarP_1,39.8 //	om vaH astrAya Paw iti // GarP_1,39.8 //
   āgneyyāmathavaiśānyāṃ nairṛtyāmarcayeddhara /	AgneyyAm aTavA ESAnyAm nErRtyAm arcayet hara /
   tdṛyadayādi hi vāyavyāṃ netraṃ cāntaḥ prapūjayet // GarP_1,39.9 //	tdRya dayA Adi hi vAyavyAm netram ca antar prapUjayet // GarP_1,39.9 //
   disvastraṃ pūjayedrudra somaṃ tu śvetavarṇakam /	disvastram pUjayet rudra somam tu Sveta varNakam /
   dale pūrver'cayedrudra budhaṃ cāmīkaraprabham // GarP_1,39.10 //	dale pUrver acayet rudra buDam cAmIkara praBam // GarP_1,39.10 //
   dakṣiṇe pūjayedrudra pativarṇaṃ guruṃ yajet /	dakziNe pUjayet rudra pati varNam gurum yajet /
   paścime caiva bhūteśaṃ uttare bhārgavaṃ sitam // GarP_1,39.11 //	paScime ca eva BUteSam uttare BArgavam sitam // GarP_1,39.11 //
   raktamaṅgārakaṃ caiva āgneye pūjayeddhara /	raktam aFgArakam ca eva Agneye pUjayet hara /
   śanaiścaraṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ nairṛtyāṃ diśi pūjayet // GarP_1,39.12 //	SanEScaram kRzNa varNam nErRtyAm diSi pUjayet // GarP_1,39.12 //
   rāhuṃ vāyavyadeśe tu nandyāvartanibhiṃ hara /	rAhum vAyavya deSe tu nandyAvarta niBim hara /
   aiśānyāṃ dhūmravarṇaṃ tu ketuṃ saṃ paripūjayet // GarP_1,39.13 //	ESAnyAm DUmra varNam tu ketum sam paripUjayet // GarP_1,39.13 //
   ebhirmantrairmahādeva tacchṛṇuṣva ca śaṅkara // GarP_1,39.14 //	eBiH mantrEH mahAdeva tat SRNuzva ca SaFkara // GarP_1,39.14 //
   oṃ soṃ somāya namaḥ /	om som somAya namaH /
   oṃ buṃ budhāya namaḥ /	om bum buDAya namaH /
   oṃ bṛṃ bṛhaspataye namaḥ /	om bRm bRhaspataye namaH /
   oṃ bhaṃ bhārgavāya namaḥ /	om Bam BArgavAya namaH /
   oṃ aṃ aṅgārakāya namaḥ /	om am aFgArakAya namaH /
   oṃ śaṃ śanaiścarāya namaḥ /	om Sam SanEScarAya namaH /
   oṃ raṃ rāhave namaḥ /	om ram rAhave namaH /
   oṃ kaṃ ketave nama iti // GarP_1,39.15 //	om kam ketave namaH iti // GarP_1,39.15 //
   pādyādīnmūlamantreṇa dattvā sūryāya śaṅkara /	pAdya AdIn mUlamantreNa dattvA sUryAya SaFkara /
   naivedyānte dhenumudrāṃ darśayetsādhakottamaḥ // GarP_1,39.16 //	nEvedya ante DenumudrAm darSayet sADaka uttamaH // GarP_1,39.16 //
   japtvā cāṣṭasahasraṃ tu tacca tasmai samarpayet /	japtvA ca azwa sahasram tu tat ca tasmE samarpayet /
   aiśānyāṃ diśi bhūteśa tejaścaṇḍaṃ tu pūjayet // GarP_1,39.17 //	ESAnyAm diSi BUteSa tejaH caNxam tu pUjayet // GarP_1,39.17 //
   oṃ tejaścaṃṇḍāya huṃ phaṭ svadhā svāhā pauṣaṭ /	om tejaH caMNxAya hum Paw svaDA svAhA pOzaw /
   nirmālyaṃ cārpayettasmai hyarghyaṃ dadyāttato hara // GarP_1,39.18 //	nirmAlyam ca arpayet tasmE hi arGyam dadyAt tatas hara // GarP_1,39.18 //
   tilataṇḍulasaṃyuktaṃ raktacandanacarcitam /	tila taNxula saMyuktam raktacandana carcitam /
   gandhodakena saṃmiśraṃ puṣpadhūpasamanvitam // GarP_1,39.19 //	ganDa udakena saMmiSram puzpa DUpa samanvitam // GarP_1,39.19 //
   kṛtvā śirasi tatpātraṃ jānubhyāmavaniṃ gataḥ /	kRtvA Sirasi tat pAtram jAnuByAm avanim gataH /
   darghyaṃ tu sūryāya tdṛnmantreṇa vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,39.20 //	darGyam tu sUryAya tdRt mantreNa vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,39.20 //
   gaṇaṃ gurūnprapūjyātha sarvāndevānanprapūjayet /	gaNam gurUn prapUjya aTa sarvAn devAnan prapUjayet /
   oṃ gaṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ /	om gam gaNapataye namaH /
   oṃ aṃ gurubhyo namaḥ // GarP_1,39.21 //	om am guruByaH namaH // GarP_1,39.21 //
   sūryasya kathitā pūjā kṛtvaitāṃ viṣṇulokabhāk // GarP_1,39.22 //	sUryasya kaTitA pUjA kRtvA etAm vizNu loka BAj // GarP_1,39.22 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   sūryārcanaprakāro nāmaikonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	sUryArcanaprakAraH nAma ekonacatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  40	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 40
   śaṅkara uvāca /	SaFkaraH uvAca /
   māheśvarīṃ ca me pūjāṃ vada śaṅkhagadādhara /	mAheSvarIm ca me pUjAm vada SaFKa gadA Dara /
   yāṃ jñātvā mānavāḥ siddhiṃ gacchanti parameśvara // GarP_1,40.1 //	yAm jQAtvA mAnavAH sidDim gacCanti parameSvara // GarP_1,40.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   śṛṇu māheśvarīṃ pūjāṃ kathyamānāṃ vṛṣadhvaja /	SRNu mAheSvarIm pUjAm kaTyamAnAm vRzaDvaja /
   ādau snātvā tathācamya hyāsane copaviśya ca // GarP_1,40.2 //	AdO snAtvA taTA Acamya hi Asane ca upaviSya ca // GarP_1,40.2 //
   nyāsaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍale vai pūjayacce maheśvaram /	nyAsam kRtvA maNxale vE pUjayat ce maheSvaram /
   mantrairetairmaheśāna parivārayutaṃ haram // GarP_1,40.3 //	mantrEH etEH maheSAna parivAra yutam haram // GarP_1,40.3 //
   oṃ hāṃ śivāsanadevatā āgacchateti /	om hAm Siva Asana devatA AgacCata iti /
   anenāvāhayedrudra devatā āsanasya yāḥ // GarP_1,40.4 //	anena AvAhayet rudra devatAH Asanasya yAH // GarP_1,40.4 //
   oṃ hāṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ /	om hAm gaNapataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ /	om hAm sarasvatyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ nandine namaḥ /	om hAm nandine namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ mahākālāya namaḥ /	om hAm mahAkAlAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ gaṅgāyai namaḥ /	om hAm gaFgAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ lakṣmyai namaḥ /	om hAm lakzmyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ mahākalāyai namaḥ /	om hAm mahAkalAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ astrāya nama iti // GarP_1,40.5 //	om hAm astrAya namaH iti // GarP_1,40.5 //
   ete dvāre prapūjyā vai snānagandhādibhirhara /	ete dvAre prapUjyAH vE snAna ganDa AdiBiH hara /
   oṃ hāṃ brahmaṇe vāstvadhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm brahmaNe vAstu aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ gurubhyo namaḥ /	om hAm guruByaH namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ ādhāraśaktyai namaḥ /	om hAm ADAra SaktyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ anantāya namaḥ /	om hAm anantAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ dharmāya namaḥ /	om hAm DarmAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ jñānāya namaḥ /	om hAm jQAnAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ /	om hAm vErAgyAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ /	om hAm ESvaryAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ adharmāya namaḥ /	om hAm aDarmAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ ajñānāya namaḥ /	om hAm ajQAnAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ avairāgyāya namaḥ /	om hAm avErAgyAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ /	om hAm anESvaryAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ urdhvacchandāya namaḥ /	om hAm urDvat CandAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ adhaśchandāya namaḥ /	om hAm aDas CandAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ padmāya namaḥ /	om hAm padmAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ karṇikāyai namaḥ /	om hAm karNikAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ vāmāyai namaḥ /	om hAm vAmAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ jyeṣṭhāyai namaḥ /	om hAm jyezWAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ raudyai namaḥ /	om hAm rOdyE namaH /
   oṃ kālyai namaḥ /	om kAlyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kalavikaraṇyai namaḥ /	om hAm kalavikaraNyE namaH /
   oṃ balapramathinyai namaḥ /	om bala pramaTinyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ sarvabhūtadamanyai namaḥ /	om hAm sarva BUta damanyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ manonmanyai namaḥ /	om hAm manonmanyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ maṇḍalatritayāya namaḥ /	om hAm maNxala tritayAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ hauṃ haṃ śivamūrtaye namaḥ /	om hAm hOm ham Siva mUrtaye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ vidyādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm vidyA aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ /	om hAm hIm hOm SivAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ /	om hAm hRdayAya namaH /
   oṃ śirase namaḥ /	om Sirase namaH /
   oṃ hūṃ śikhāyai namaḥ /	om hUm SiKAyE namaH /
   oṃ haiṃ kavacāya namaḥ /	om hEm kavacAya namaH /
   oṃ hauṃ netratrayāya namaḥ /	om hOm netratrayAya namaH /
   oṃ haḥ astrāya namaḥ /	om haH astrAya namaH /
   oṃ sadyojātāya namaḥ // GarP_1,40.6 //	om sadyojAtAya namaH // GarP_1,40.6 //
   oṃ hāṃ siddhyai namaḥ /	om hAm sidDyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ ṛddhyai namaḥ /	om hAm RdDyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ vidyutāyai namaḥ /	om hAm vidyutAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ lakṣmyai namaḥ /	om hAm lakzmyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ bodhāyai namaḥ /	om hAm boDAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kālyai namaḥ /	om hAm kAlyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ svadhāyai namaḥ /	om hAm svaDAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ prabhāyai namaḥ // GarP_1,40.7 //	om hAm praBAyE namaH // GarP_1,40.7 //
   satyasyāṣṭau kalā jñeyāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ // GarP_1,40.8 //	satyasya azwO kalAH jQeyAH pUjyAH pUrva Adizu sTitAH // GarP_1,40.8 //
   oṃ hāṃ vāmadevāya namaḥ /	om hAm vAmadevAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ rajase namaḥ /	om hAm rajase namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ rakṣāyai namaḥ /	om hAm rakzAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ ratyai namaḥ /	om hAm ratyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kanyāyai namaḥ /	om hAm kanyAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kāmāyai namaḥ /	om hAm kAmAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ jananyai namaḥ /	om hAm jananyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kriyāyai namaḥ /	om hAm kriyAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ vṛddhyai namaḥ /	om hAm vRdDyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kāryāyai namaḥ /	om hAm kAryAyE namaH /
   oṃ rā(dhā) tryai namaḥ /	om rA(DA) tryE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ bhrāmaṇyai namaḥ /	om hAm BrAmaNyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ mohinyai namaḥ /	om hAm mohinyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kṣa(tva)rāyai namaḥ /	om hAm kza(tu a)rAyE namaH /
   vāmadevakalā jñeyāstrayo daśa vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,40.9 //	vAmadeva kalAH jQeyAH trayaH daSa vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,40.9 //
   oṃ hāṃ tatpuruṣāya namaḥ /	om hAm tatpuruzAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ nivṛttyai namaḥ /	om hAm nivRttyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ pratiṣṭhāyai namaḥ /	om hAm pratizWAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ vidyāyai namaḥ /	om hAm vidyAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ śāntyai namaḥ /	om hAm SAntyE namaH /
   jñeyāstatpuruṣasyaiva catasro vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,40.10 //	jQeyAH tatpuruzasya eva catasraH vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,40.10 //
   oṃ hāṃ tṛṣṇāyai namaḥ /	om hAm tRzNAyE namaH /
   kalāṣaṭkaṃ hyakhorasya vijñeyaṃ bhairavaṃ hara // GarP_1,40.11 //	kalA zawkam hi aKorasya vijQeyam BEravam hara // GarP_1,40.11 //
   oṃ hāṃ īśānāya namaḥ /	om hAm ISAnAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ samityai namaḥ /	om hAm samityE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ aṅgadāyai namaḥ /	om hAm aFgadAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ kṛṣṇāyai namaḥ /	om hAm kRzNAyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ marīcyai namaḥ /	om hAm marIcyE namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ jvālāyai namaḥ /	om hAm jvAlAyE namaH /
   īśānasya kalāḥ pañca jānīhi vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,40.12 //	ISAnasya kalAH paQca jAnIhi vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,40.12 //
   oṃ hāṃ śivaparivārebhyo namaḥ /	om hAm Siva parivAreByaH namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ indrāya surādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm indrAya sura aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ agnaye tejo 'dhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm agnaye tejaH aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ yamāya pretādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm yamAya preta aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ nirṛtaye rakṣo 'dhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm nirRtaye rakzaH aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ varuṇāya jalādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm varuNAya jala aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm vAyave prANa aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ somāya netrādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm somAya netra aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ īśānāya sarvavidyādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm ISAnAya sarva vidyA aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ anantāya nāgādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm anantAya nAga aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ brahmaṇe sarvalokādhipataye namaḥ /	om hAm brahmaNe sarva loka aDipataye namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ dhūlicaṇḍeśvarāya namaḥ // GarP_1,40.13 //	om hAm DUli caNxeSvarAya namaH // GarP_1,40.13 //
   āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ sannidhānaṃ ca śaṅkara /	AvAhanam sTApanam sanniDAnam ca SaFkara /
   sannirodhaṃ tathā kuryātsakalīkaraṇaṃ tathā // GarP_1,40.14 //	sanniroDam taTA kuryAt sakalIkaraNam taTA // GarP_1,40.14 //
   tattvanyāsaṃ ca mudrāyā darśanaṃ dyānameva ca /	tattva nyAsam ca mudrAyAH darSanam dyAnam eva ca /
   pādyamācamanaṃ hyarghyaṃ puṣpāṇyabhyaṅgadānakam // GarP_1,40.15 //	pAdyam Acamanam hi arGyam puzpANi aByaFga dAnakam // GarP_1,40.15 //
   tata udvartanaṃ snānaṃ sugandhaṃ cānulepanam /	tatas udvartanam snAnam suganDam ca anulepanam /
   vastrālaṃ kārabhogāṃśca hyaṅganyāsaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,40.16 //	vastra alam kAra BogAn= ca hi aFganyAsam ca DUpakam // GarP_1,40.16 //
   dīpaṃ naivedyadānaṃ ca hastodvartanameva ca /	dIpam nEvedya dAnam ca hasta udvartanam eva ca /
   pādyārghyācamanaṃ gandhaṃ tāmbūlaṃ gītavādanam // GarP_1,40.17 //	pAdya arGya Acamanam ganDam tAmbUlam gIta vAdanam // GarP_1,40.17 //
   nṛtyaṃ chatrā dikaraṇaṃ mudrāṇāṃ darśanaṃ tatā /	nRtyam CatrA dikaraNam mudrANAm darSanam tatA /
   rūpaṃ dhyānaṃ japañcātha ekavadbhāva eva ca // GarP_1,40.18 //	rUpam DyAnam japaQca aTa eka vat BAvaH eva ca // GarP_1,40.18 //
   mūlamantreṇa vai kuryājjapapūjāsamarpaṇam /	mUlamantreNa vE kuryAt japa pUjA samarpaNam /
   māheśī kathitā pūjā rudra pāpavināsinī // GarP_1,40.19 //	mAheSI kaTitA pUjA rudra pApa vinAsinI // GarP_1,40.19 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   maheśvarapūjāvidhirnāma catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	maheSvarapUjAviDiH nAma catvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  41	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 41
   vāsudeva uvāca /	vAsudevaH uvAca /
   oṃ viśvāvasurnāma gandharvaḥ kanyānāmadhipatirlabhāmi te kanyāṃ samutpādya	om viSvAvasuH nAma ganDarvaH kanyAnAm aDipatiH laBAmi te kanyAm samutpAdya
   tasmai viśvavāsave svāhā /	tasmE viSva vAsave svAhA /
   strīlābho mantrajāpyācca kālarātriṃ vadāmyaham // GarP_1,41.1 //	strI lABaH mantra jApyAt ca kAlarAtrim vadAmi aham // GarP_1,41.1 //
   oṃ namo bhagavati ṛkṣakarṇi caturbhuje ūrdhvakeśi trinayane kālarātri	om namaH Bagavati RkzakarNi catur Buje UrDvakeSi trinayane kAlarAtri
   mānuṣāṇāṃ vasārudhirabhojane amukasya prāptakālasya mṛtyuprade huṃ phaṭ	mAnuzANAm vasA ruDira Bojane amukasya prApta kAlasya mRtyu prade hum Paw 
   hanahana dahadaha māṃsarudhiraṃ pacapaca ṛkṣapatni svāhā / na tithirna ca	hana hana dahadaha mAMsa ruDiram pacapace Rkza patni svAhA / na tiTiH na ca
   nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate // GarP_1,41.2 //	nakzatram na upavAsaH viDIyate // GarP_1,41.2 //
   kruddho raktena saṃmārjya karau tābhyāṃ pragṛhya ca /	krudDaH raktena saMmArjya karO tAByAm pragRhya ca /
   pradoṣe saṃjapelliṅgamāmapātraṃ ca mārayet /	pradoze saMjapet liFgam Ama pAtram ca mArayet /
   oṃ namaḥ sarvatoyantrāṇyetadyathā jambhani mohani sarvaśatruvidāriṇi	om namaH sarvatas yantrANi etat yaTA jamBani mohani sarva Satru vidAriNi
   rakṣarakṣa māmamukaṃ sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ svāhā /	rakzarakza mAm amukam sarva Baya upadraveByaH svAhA /
   śukre naṣṭe mahādeva vakṣye 'haṃ dvijapādiha // GarP_1,41.3 //	Sukre nazwe mahAdeva vakzye aham dvijapAt iha // GarP_1,41.3 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   vaśyādisādhikamantranirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	vaSyAdisADikamantranirUpaNam nAma ekacatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  42	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 42
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   pavitrāropaṇaṃ vakṣye sivasyāśivanāśanam /	pavitrAropaNam vakzye sivasya aSiva nASanam /
   ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ kuryātputrakaḥ samayī hara // GarP_1,42.1 //	AcAryaH sADakaH kuryAt putrakaH samayI hara // GarP_1,42.1 //
   saṃvatsarakṛtāṃ pūjāṃ vighneśo harate 'nyathā /	saMvatsara kRtAm pUjAm viGneSaH harate anyaTA /
   āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe māghe kuryādbhādrapade 'pi vā // GarP_1,42.2 //	AzAXe SrAvaNe mAGe kuryAt BAdrapade api vA // GarP_1,42.2 //
   sauvarṇaraupyatāmraṃ ca sūtraṃ kārpāsikaṃ kramāt /	sOvarNa rOpya tAmram ca sUtram kArpAsikam kramAt /
   jñeyaṃ kujādau saṃgrāhyaṃ kanyayā kartitaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,42.3 //	jQeyam kuja AdO saMgrAhyam kanyayA kartitam ca yat // GarP_1,42.3 //
   triguṇaṃ triguṇīkṛtya tataḥ kuryātpavitrakam /	triguNam triguNIkRtya tatas kuryAt pavitrakam /
   granthayo vāmadevena satyena kṣālayecchiva // GarP_1,42.4 //	granTayaH vAmadevena satyena kzAlayet Siva // GarP_1,42.4 //
   aghoreṇa tu saṃśodhya baddhastatpuruṣādbhavet /	aGoreNa tu saMSoDya badDaH tatpuruzAt Bavet /
   dhūpayedīśamantreṇa tantudevā iti (me) smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,42.5 //	DUpayet ISa mantreNa tantu devAH iti (me) smRtAH // GarP_1,42.5 //
   oṃ kāraścandramā vahnirbrahnā nāgaḥ śikhidhvajaḥ /	om kAraH candramAH vahniH brahnA nAgaH SiKiDvajaH /
   ravirviṣṇuḥ śivaḥ proktaḥ kramāttantuṣu devatāḥ // GarP_1,42.6 //	raviH vizNuH SivaH proktaH kramAt tantuzu devatAH // GarP_1,42.6 //
   aṣṭottaraśataṃ kuryātpañcāśatpañcaviṃśatim /	azwottaraSatam kuryAt paQcASat paQcaviMSatim /
   rudro 'ttamādi vijñeyaṃ mānaṃ ca granthayo daśa // GarP_1,42.7 //	rudraH attamAdi vijQeyam mAnam ca granTayaH daSa // GarP_1,42.7 //
   caturaṅgulāntarāḥ syurgranthināmāni ca kramāt /	catur aFgula antarAH syuH granTi nAmAni ca kramAt /
   prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā caturtho cāparājitā // GarP_1,42.8 //	prakRtiH pOruzI vIrA caturTaH ca aparAjitAH // GarP_1,42.8 //
   jayā ca vijayā rudrā ajitā ca sadāśivā /	jayA ca vijayA rudrAH ajitA ca sadASivA /
   manonmanī sarvamukhī dvyaṅgulāṅgulato 'thavā // GarP_1,42.9 //	manonmanI sarva muKI dvi aFgula aFgulataH aTavA // GarP_1,42.9 //
   rañjayetkuṅkumādyaistu kuryādrandhaiḥ pavitrakam /	raQjayet kuFkuma AdyEH tu kuryAt ranDEH pavitrakam /
   saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tathetare // GarP_1,42.10 //	saptamyAm vA trayodaSyAm Sukla pakze taTA itare // GarP_1,42.10 //
   kṣīrādibhiśca saṃsnāpya liṅgaṃ gandhādibhiryajet /	kzIra AdiBiH ca saMsnApya liFgam ganDa AdiBiH yajet /
   dadyādrandhapavitraṃ tu ātmane brahmaṇe hara // GarP_1,42.11 //	dadyAt ranDa pavitram tu Atmane brahmaNe hara // GarP_1,42.11 //
   puṣpaṃ gandhayutaṃ dadyānmūleneśānagocare /	puzpam ganDa yutam dadyAt mUlena ISAna gocare /
   pūrve ca daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ tu uttare cāmalakīphalam // GarP_1,42.12 //	pUrve ca daNxakAzWam tu uttare ca AmalakI Palam // GarP_1,42.12 //
   mṛttikāṃ paścime dadyāddakṣiṇe bhasma bhūtayaḥ /	mRttikAm paScime dadyAt dakziNe Basma BUtayaH /
   nairṛtehyaguruṃ dadyācchikhāmantreṇa mantravit // GarP_1,42.13 //	nErRtehi agurum dadyAt SiKA mantreNa mantra vid // GarP_1,42.13 //
   vāyavyāṃ sarṣapaṃ dadyātkavacena vṛṣadhvaja /	vAyavyAm sarzapam dadyAt kavacena vRzaDvaja /
   gṛhaṃ saṃveṣṭya sūtreṇa dadyādrandhapavitrakam // GarP_1,42.14 //	gRham saMvezwya sUtreNa dadyAt ranDa pavitrakam // GarP_1,42.14 //
   homaṃ kṛtvā gneya dattvā dadyādbhūtabaliṃ tathā /	homam kRtvA gneya dattvA dadyAt BUta balim taTA /
   āmantrito 'si deveśa gaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,42.15 //	AmantritaH asi deveSa gaNEH sArDam maheSvara // GarP_1,42.15 //
   prātastvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi atra sannihito bhava /	prAtar tvAm pUjayizyAmi atra sannihitaH Bava /
   nimantryānena tiṣṭhettu kurvan gītādikaṃ niśi // GarP_1,42.16 //	nimantrya anena tizWet tu kurvan gIta Adikam niSi // GarP_1,42.16 //
   mantritāni pavitrāṇi sthāpayeddevapārśvataḥ /	mantritAni pavitrANi sTApayet deva pArSvataH /
   snātvādityaṃ caturdaśyāṃ prāgrudraṃ ca prapūjayet // GarP_1,42.17 //	snAtvA Adityam caturdaSyAm prAk rudram ca prapUjayet // GarP_1,42.17 //
   lalāṭasthaṃ viśvarūpaṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ prapūjayet /	lalAwa sTam viSva rUpam DyAtvA AtmAnam prapUjayet /
   astreṇa prokṣitānyevaṃ hṛdayenārcitānyatha // GarP_1,42.18 //	astreNa prokzitAni evam hRdayena arcitAni aTa // GarP_1,42.18 //
   saṃhitāmantritānyeva dhūpitāni samarpayet /	saMhitA mantritAni eva DUpitAni samarpayet /
   śivatattvātmakaṃ cādau vidyātattvātmakaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,42.19 //	Siva tattva Atmakam ca AdO vidyA tattva Atmakam tatas // GarP_1,42.19 //
   ātmatattvātmakaṃ paścāddevakākhyaṃ tator'cayet /	Atma tattva Atmakam paScAt devaka AKyam tator acayet /
   oṃ hauṃ hauṃ śivatattvāya namaḥ /	om hOm hOm Siva tattvAya namaH /
   oṃ hīṃ(hīḥ) vidyātattvāya namaḥ // GarP_1,42.20 //	om hIM(hIH) vidyA tattvAya namaH // GarP_1,42.20 //
   oṃ hāṃ (hauḥ) ātmatattvāya namaḥ /	om hAm (hOH) Atma tattvAya namaH /
   oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ kṣaiṃ sarvatattvāya namaḥ /	om hAm hIm hUm kzEm sarva tattvAya namaH /
   kālātmanā tvayā deva yaddṛṣṭaṃ māmake vidhau // GarP_1,42.21 //	kAla AtmanA tvayA deva yat dRzwam mAmake viDO // GarP_1,42.21 //
   kṛtaṃ kliṣṭaṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ hutaṃ gupta ca yatkṛtam /	kRtam klizwam samutsRzwam hutam gupta ca yat kRtam /
   sarvātmanātmanā śambho pavitreṇa tvadicchayā // GarP_1,42.22 //	sarva AtmanA AtmanA SamBo pavitreNa tvad icCayA // GarP_1,42.22 //
   pūrayapūraya makhavrataṃ tanniyameśvarāya sarvatattvātmakāya	pUrayapUraya maKa vratam tat niyameSvarAya sarva tattva AtmakAya
   sarvakāraṇapālitāya oṃ hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ haiṃ hauṃ śivāya namaḥ // GarP_1,42.23	sarva kAraNa pAlitAya om hAm hIm hUm hEm hOm SivAya namaH // GarP_1,42.23
   pūrvairanena yo dadyātpavitrāṇāṃ catuṣṭayam /	pUrvEH anena yaH dadyAt pavitrANAm catuzwayam /
   dattvā vahneḥ (vare) pavitraṃ ca gurave dakṣiṇāṃ diśet // GarP_1,42.24 //	dattvA vahneH (vare) pavitram ca gurave dakziNAm diSet // GarP_1,42.24 //
   baliṃ dattvā dvijān bhojya caṇḍaṃ prācyai visarjayet // GarP_1,42.25 //	balim dattvA dvijAn Bojya caNxam prAcyE visarjayet // GarP_1,42.25 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   śivapavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	SivapavitrAropaNam nAma dvicatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  43	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 43
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   pavitrāropaṇaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradaṃ hareḥ /	pavitrAropaNam vakzye Bukti mukti pradam hareH /
   purā devāsure yuddhe brahmādyāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,43.1 //	purA devAsure yudDe brahma AdyAH SaraNam yayuH // GarP_1,43.1 //
   viṣṇuśca teṣāṃ devānāṃ dhvajaṃ graiveyakaṃ dadau /	vizNuH ca tezAm devAnAm Dvajam grEveyakam dadO /
   etau dṛṣṭvā vinaṅkṣyanti dānavānabravīddhariḥ // GarP_1,43.2 //	etO dRzwvA vinaFkzyanti dAnavAn abravIt hariH // GarP_1,43.2 //
   viṣṇūkte hyabravīnnāgo vāsukeranujastadā /	vizNu ukte hi abravIt nAgaH vAsukeH anujaH tadA /
   vṛṇīta ca vapitrākhyaṃ varaṃ cedaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,43.3 //	vRNIta ca vapitra AKyam varam ca idam vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,43.3 //
   graiveyaṃ haridattaṃ tu mannāmnā khyātimeṣyati /	grEveyam hari dattam tu mad nAmnA KyAtim ezyati /
   ityukte tena te devāstannāmnā tadvaraṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,43.4 //	iti ukte tena te devAH tad nAmnA tad varam viduH // GarP_1,43.4 //
   prāvṛṭkāle tu ye martyā nārciṣyanti pavitrakaiḥ /	prAvRz kAle tu ye martyAH na arcizyanti pavitrakEH /
   teṣāṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā viphalā ca bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,43.5 //	tezAm sAMvatsarI pUjA viPalA ca Bavizyati // GarP_1,43.5 //
   tasmātsarveṣu deveṣu pavitrāropaṇaṃ kramāt /	tasmAt sarvezu devezu pavitrAropaNam kramAt /
   pratipatpaurṇamāsyāntā yasya yā tithirucyate // GarP_1,43.6 //	pratipad pOrNamAsya antA yasya yA tiTiH ucyate // GarP_1,43.6 //
   dvādaśyāṃ viṣṇave kāryaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe 'tha vā hara /	dvAdaSyAm vizNave kAryam Sukle kRzNe aTa vA hara /
   vyatīpāte 'yane caiva candarasūryagrahe śiva // GarP_1,43.7 //	vyatIpAte ayane ca eva candara sUrya grahe Siva // GarP_1,43.7 //
   viṣṇave vṛddhikārye ca gurorāgamane tathā /	vizNave vRdDi kArye ca guroH Agamane taTA /
   nityaṃ pavitramuddiṣṭaṃ prāvṛṭkāle tvavaśyakam // GarP_1,43.8 //	nityam pavitram uddizwam prAvRz kAle tu avaSyakam // GarP_1,43.8 //
   kauśeyaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ vā kārpāsaṃ kṣaumameva vā /	kOSeyam pawwasUtram vA kArpAsam kzOmam eva vA /
   kuśasūtra dvijānāṃ syādrājñā kauśeyapaṭṭakam // GarP_1,43.9 //	kuSasUtra dvijAnAm syAt rAjQA kOSeya pawwakam // GarP_1,43.9 //
   vaiśyānāṃ cīraṇaṃ kṣaumaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ śaṇavalkajam /	vESyAnAm cIraNam kzOmam SUdrANAm SaNa valka jam /
   kārpāsaṃ padmajaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ śastamīśvara // GarP_1,43.10 //	kArpAsam padma jam ca eva sarvezAm Sastam ISvara // GarP_1,43.10 //
   brāhmaṇyā kartitaṃ sūtraṃ triguṇaṃ triguṇīkṛtam /	brAhmaNyA kartitam sUtram triguNam triguNIkRtam /
   oṃ kāro 'tha śivaḥ somo hyagnirbrahyā phaṇī raviḥ // GarP_1,43.11 //	om kAraH aTa SivaH somaH hi agniH brahyA PaNI raviH // GarP_1,43.11 //
   vighneśo viṣṇurityete sthitāstantuṣu devatāḥ /	viGneSaH vizNuH iti ete sTitAH tantuzu devatAH /
   brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca trisūtre devatāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.12 //	brahmA vizNuH ca rudraH ca tri sUtre devatAH smRtAH // GarP_1,43.12 //
   sauvarṇe rājate tāmre vaiṇave mṛnmaye nyaset /	sOvarNe rAjate tAmre vENave mRd maye nyaset /
   aṅguṣṭhena catuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ tadardhataḥ // GarP_1,43.13 //	aFguzWena catuH zazwiH SrezWam maDyam tad arDataH // GarP_1,43.13 //
   tadardhā tu kaniṣṭhā syātsūtramaṣṭottaraṃ śatam /	tad arDA tu kanizWA syAt sUtram azwa uttaram Satam /
   uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ caiva kanyasaṃ pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.14 //	uttamam maDyamam ca eva kanyasam pUrvavat kramAt // GarP_1,43.14 //
   uttamoṃ'guṣṭhamānena madhyamo madhyamena tu /	uttamoM aguzWa mAnena maDyamaH maDyamena tu /
   kanyase ca kaniṣṭhena aṅgulyā granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.15 //	kanyase ca kanizWena aFgulyAH granTayaH smRtAH // GarP_1,43.15 //
   vimāne sthaṇḍile caiva etatsāmānyalakṣaṇam /	vimAne sTaNxile ca eva etad sAmAnya lakzaNam /
   śivoddhṛtaṃ pavitraṃ tu pratimāyāṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,43.16 //	Siva udDRtam pavitram tu pratimAyAm ca kArayet // GarP_1,43.16 //
   hṛnnābhirū(ru) rumāne ca jānubhyāmavalambinī /	hRd nABiH U(ru) rumAne ca jAnuByAm avalambinI /
   aṣṭottarasahasreṇa catvāro granthayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,43.17 //	azwottarasahasreNa catvAraH granTayaH smRtAH // GarP_1,43.17 //
   ṣaṭtriṃ(ḍviṃ) śacca caturviśaddvādaśa granthayo 'thavā /	zaz triM(xvin) Sat ca catur viSat dvAdaSa granTayaH aTavA /
   uttamādiṣu vijñeyāḥ parvabhirvā pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.18 //	uttama Adizu vijQeyAH parvaBiH vA pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.18 //
   carcitaṃ kuṅkumenaiva haridrācandanena vā /	carcitam kuFkumena eva haridrA candanena vA /
   sopavāsaḥ pavitrantu pātrasthamadhivāsayet // GarP_1,43.19 //	sa upavAsaH pavitrantu pAtra sTam aDivAsayet // GarP_1,43.19 //
   aśvatthapatrapuṭake aṣṭadikṣu niveśitam /	aSvatTa patra puwake azwa dikzu niveSitam /
   daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ kuśāgraṃ ca pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu // GarP_1,43.20 //	daNxakAzWam kuSa agram ca pUrve saFkarzaNena tu // GarP_1,43.20 //
   rocanākuṅkumenava pradyumnena tu dakṣiṇe /	rocanA kuFkumenava pradyumnena tu dakziNe /
   yuddhārtho phalasiddhyarthamaniruddhena paścime // GarP_1,43.21 //	yudDa arTaH Pala sidDi arTam anirudDena paScime // GarP_1,43.21 //
   candanaṃ nīlayuktaṃ ca tilabhasmākṣataṃ tathā /	candanam nIla yuktam ca tila Basma akzatam taTA /
   āgneyādiṣu koṇeṣur śyādīnāṃ tu kramānnyaset // GarP_1,43.22 //	Agneya Adizu koNezuH SyA AdInAm tu kramAt nyaset // GarP_1,43.22 //
   pavitraṃ vāsudevena abhimantrya sakṛtsakṛt /	pavitram vAsudevena aBimantrya sakRt sakRt /
   dṛṣṭvā punaḥ prapūjyātha vastreṇācchādya yatnataḥ // GarP_1,43.23 //	dRzwvA punar prapUjya aTa vastreNa AcCAdya yatnatas // GarP_1,43.23 //
   devasya purataḥ sthāpyaṃ pratimāmaṇḍalasya vā /	devasya puratas sTApyam pratimA maNxalasya vA /
   paścime dakṣiṇe caiva uttare pūrvavatkramāt // GarP_1,43.24 //	paScime dakziNe ca eva uttare pUrvavat kramAt // GarP_1,43.24 //
   brāhmādīṃścāpi saṃsthāpya kalaśaṃ cāpi pūjayet /	brAhma AdIn= ca api saMsTApya kalaSam ca api pUjayet /
   astreṇa maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā naivedyañca samarpayet // GarP_1,43.25 //	astreNa maNxalam kRtvA nEvedyaQca samarpayet // GarP_1,43.25 //
   adhivāsya pavitraṃ tu trisūtreṇa navena vā (ca) /	aDivAsya pavitram tu tri sUtreNa navena vA (ca) /
   vedikāṃ veṣṭayitvā tu ātmānaṃma kalaśaṃ ghṛtam // GarP_1,43.26 //	vedikAm vezwayitvA tu AtmAnaMma kalaSam GRtam // GarP_1,43.26 //
   agnikuṇḍaṃ vimānaṃ ca maṇḍapaṃ gṛhameva ca /	agnikuNxam vimAnam ca maNxapam gRham eva ca /
   sūtramekaṃ tu saṃgṛhya dadyāddevasya mṛrdhāni // GarP_1,43.27 //	sUtram ekam tu saMgRhya dadyAt devasya mRrDAni // GarP_1,43.27 //
   dattvā paṭhedimaṃ mantraṃ pūjayitvā maheśvaram /	dattvA paWet imam mantram pUjayitvA maheSvaram /
   āvāhito 'si deveśa pūjārthaṃ parameśvara // GarP_1,43.28 //	AvAhitaH asi deveSa pUjA arTam parameSvara // GarP_1,43.28 //
   tatprabhāter'cayiṣyāmi sāmagyāḥ sannidhau bhava /	tad praBAter acayizyAmi sAmagyAH sanniDO Bava /
   ekarātraṃ trirātraṃ vā adhivāsya pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.29 //	eka rAtram tri rAtram vA aDivAsya pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.29 //
   rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prātaḥ saṃpūjya keśavam /	rAtrO jAgaraNam kRtvA prAtar saMpUjya keSavam /
   āropayetkrameṇaiva jyeṣṭhamadhyakanīyasam // GarP_1,43.30 //	Aropayet krameNa eva jyezWa maDya kanIyasam // GarP_1,43.30 //
   dhūpayitvā pavitraṃ tu mantreṇaivābhimantrayet /	DUpayitvA pavitram tu mantreNa eva aBimantrayet /
   prajaptagranthikaṃ caiva pūjayetkusumādibhiḥ // GarP_1,43.31 //	prajapta granTikam ca eva pUjayet kusuma AdiBiH // GarP_1,43.31 //
   gāyattryā cārcitaṃ tena devaṃ saṃpūjya dāpayet /	gAyattryA ca arcitam tena devam saMpUjya dApayet /
   samaṃ putrakalatrādyaiḥ sūtrapucchaṃ tu dhārayet // GarP_1,43.32 //	samam putra kalatra AdyEH sUtra pucCam tu DArayet // GarP_1,43.32 //
   viśuddhagranthikaṃ ramyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam /	viSudDa granTikam ramyam mahApAtaka nASanam /
   sarvapāpakṣayaṃ deva tavāgre dhārayāmyaham // GarP_1,43.33 //	sarva pApa kzayam deva tava agre DArayAmi aham // GarP_1,43.33 //
   evaṃ dhūpādinābhyarcya madhyamādīntsamarpayet /	evam DUpa AdinA aByarcya maDyam AdIn tsamarpayet /
   pavitraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ sarvapātakanāśanam // GarP_1,43.34 //	pavitram vEzNavam tejaH sarva pAtaka nASanam // GarP_1,43.34 //
   dharmakāmārthasiddhyarthaṃ svakaṇṭhe dhārayāmyaham /	Darma kAma arTa sidDi arTam sva kaNWe DArayAmi aham /
   vanamālāṃ samabhyarcya svena mantreṇa dāpayet // GarP_1,43.35 //	vanamAlAm samaByarcya svena mantreNa dApayet // GarP_1,43.35 //
   naivedyaṃ vividhaṃ dattvā kusumāderbaliṃ haret /	nEvedyam viviDam dattvA kusuma AdeH balim haret /
   agniṃ saṃtarpya tatrāpi dvādaśāṅgulamānataḥ // GarP_1,43.36 //	agnim saMtarpya tatra api dvAdaSa aFgula mAnataH // GarP_1,43.36 //
   aṣṭottaraśatenaiva dadyādekapavitrakam /	azwottaraSatena eva dadyAt eka pavitrakam /
   ādau dattvārghyamāditye tatra caikaṃ pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.37 //	AdO dattvA arGyam Aditye tatra ca ekam pavitrakam // GarP_1,43.37 //
   viṣvaksenaṃ tataḥ prārcya surumarghyādibhirhara /	vizvaksenam tatas prArcya surumarGya AdiBiH hara /
   devasyāgre paṭhenmantraṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,43.38 //	devasya agre paWet mantram kRta aQjali puwaH sTitaH // GarP_1,43.38 //
   jñānato 'jñānato vāpi pūjanādi kṛtaṃ mayā /	jQAnataH ajQAnataH vA api pUjana Adi kRtam mayA /
   tatsarvaṃ pūrṇamevāstu tvatprasādātsureśvara // GarP_1,43.39 //	tat sarvam pUrNam eva astu tvad prasAdAt sura ISvara // GarP_1,43.39 //
   maṇividrumamālabhirmandārakusumādibhiḥ /	maNi vidruma m AlaBiH mandAra kusuma AdiBiH /
   iyaṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā tavāstu garuḍadhvaja // GarP_1,43.40 //	iyam sAMvatsarI pUjA tava astu garuxaDvaja // GarP_1,43.40 //
   vanamālā yathā deva kaustubhaṃ satataṃ hṛdi /	vanamAlA yaTA deva kOstuBam satatam hRdi /
   tadvatpavitraṃ tantūnāṃ mālāṃ tvaṃ hṛdaye dhara // GarP_1,43.41 //	tadvat pavitram tantUnAm mAlAm tvam hRdaye Dara // GarP_1,43.41 //
   evaṃ prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām /	evam prArTya dvijAn Bojya dattvA teByaH ca dakziNAm /
   visarjayettu tenaiva sāyāhne tvapare 'hani // GarP_1,43.42 //	visarjayet tu tena eva sAyAhne tu apare ahani // GarP_1,43.42 //
   sāṃvatsarīmimāṃ pūjāṃ sampādya vidhivanmayā /	sAMvatsarIm imAm pUjAm sampAdya viDivat mayA /
   vrajeḥ pavitrakedānīṃ viṣṇulekaṃ visarjitaḥ // GarP_1,43.43 //	vrajeH pavitraka idAnIm vizNu lekam visarjitaH // GarP_1,43.43 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣṇupavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	vizNupavitrAropaNam nAma tricatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  44	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 44
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   pūjayitvā pavitrādyairbrahma dhyātvā harirbhavet /	pUjayitvA pavitra AdyEH brahma DyAtvA hariH Bavet /
   brahmadhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi māyāyantrapramardakam // GarP_1,44.1 //	brahma DyAnam pravakzyAmi mAyA yantra pramardakam // GarP_1,44.1 //
   yacchedvāṅmanasaṃ prājñastaṃ yajejjñānamātmani /	yacCet vAc manasam prAjQaH tam yajet jQAnam Atmani /
   jñānaṃ mahati saṃyacchedya icchejjñānamātmāni // GarP_1,44.2 //	jQAnam mahati saMyacCet yaH icCet jQAnam AtmAni // GarP_1,44.2 //
   dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkarāvarjitam /	deha indriya manaH budDi prANa ahaFkara Avarjitam /
   varjitaṃ bhūtatanmātrairguṇajanmāśanādibhiḥ // GarP_1,44.3 //	varjitam BUta tanmAtrEH guNa janma aSana AdiBiH // GarP_1,44.3 //
   svaprakāśaṃ nirākāraṃ sadānaṃ damanādi yat /	sva prakASam nirAkAram sa dAnam damana Adi yat /
   nityaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhamṛddhaṃ satyamānandamadvayam // GarP_1,44.4 //	nityam SudDam budDam RdDam satyam Anandam advayam // GarP_1,44.4 //
   turīyamakṣaraṃ brahma ahamasmi paraṃ padam /	turIyam akzaram brahma aham asmi param padam /
   ahaṃ brahmetyavasthānaṃ samādhirapi (riti) gīyate // GarP_1,44.5 //	aham brahma iti avasTAnam samADiH api (riti) gIyate // GarP_1,44.5 //
   ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /	AtmAnam raTinam vidDi SarIram raTam eva tu /
   buddhiṃ ca sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca /	budDim ca sAraTim vidDi manaH pragraham eva ca /
   indriyāṇi hayānāhurviṣayāsteṣu gocarāḥ // GarP_1,44.6 //	indriyANi hayAn AhuH vizayAH tezu gocarAH // GarP_1,44.6 //
