   ātmendriyamanoyukto bhoktetyārmanīṣiṇaḥ /	Atma indriya manaH yuktaH BoktA iti ArmanIziNaH /
   yastu vijñāna bāhmena yuktena manasā sadā // GarP_1,44.7 //	yaH tu vijQAna bAhmena yuktena manasA sadA // GarP_1,44.7 //
   sa tu tatpadamāpnoti sa hi bhūyo na jāyate /	sa tu tat padam Apnoti sa hi BUyas na jAyate /
   vijñānasārathiryastu manaḥ pragrahavānnaraḥ // GarP_1,44.8 //	vijQAna sAraTiH yaH tu manaH pragrahavAn naraH // GarP_1,44.8 //
   svardhunyāḥ pāramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /	svarDunyAH pAram Apnoti tat vizNoH paramam padam /
   ahiṃsādiryamaḥ proktaḥ śaucādirniyamaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,44.9 //	ahiMsA AdiH yamaH proktaH SOca AdiH niyamaH smRtaH // GarP_1,44.9 //
   āsanaṃ padmakādyuktaṃ prāṇāyāmo marujjayaḥ /	Asanam padmaka Adi uktam prANAyAmaH marut jayaH /
   pratyāhā ro jayaḥ prokto dhyānamīśvaracintanam // GarP_1,44.10 //	pratyAhAH raH jayaH proktaH DyAnam ISvara cintanam // GarP_1,44.10 //
   manodhṛtirdhāraṇā sthātsamādhirbrahmaṇi sthitiḥ /	manaH DRtiH DAraNA sTAt samADiH brahmaNi sTitiH /
   pūrvaṃ cetaḥ sthiraṃ na syāttatomūrtiṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,44.11 //	pUrvam cetaH sTiram na syAt tatas mUrtim vicintayet // GarP_1,44.11 //
   hṛtpadmakarṇikāmadhye śaṅkhacakragadābjavān /	hRd padma karNikA maDye SaFKa cakra gadA abjavAn /
   śrīvatsakaustubhayuto vanamālāśriyā yutaḥ // GarP_1,44.12 //	SrIvatsa kOstuBa yutaH vanamAlA SriyA yutaH // GarP_1,44.12 //
   nityaḥ śuddho bhūtiyuktaḥ satyānandāhvayaḥ paraḥ /	nityaH SudDaH BUti yuktaH satya Ananda AhvayaH paraH /
   ātmāhaṃ paramaṃ brahma paramaṃ jyotireva tu // GarP_1,44.13 //	AtmA aham paramam brahma paramam jyotiH eva tu // GarP_1,44.13 //
   caturviśatimūrtiḥ sa śālagrāmaśilāsthitaḥ /	catur viSati mUrtiH sa SAlagrAma SilA sTitaH /
   dvārakādiśilāsaṃstho dhyeyaḥ pūjyo 'pyahaṃ ca saḥ // GarP_1,44.14 //	dvArakA Adi SilA saMsTaH DyeyaH pUjyaH api aham ca saH // GarP_1,44.14 //
   manaso 'bhīpsitaṃ prāpya devo vaimāniko bhavet /	manasaH aBIpsitam prApya devaH vEmAnikaH Bavet /
   niṣkāmo muktimāpnoti mūrtiṃ dhyāyayaṃstuvañjapan // GarP_1,44.15 //	nizkAmaH muktim Apnoti mUrtim DyAyayan= tuvan japan // GarP_1,44.15 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   brahmamūrtidhyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	brahmamUrtiDyAnanirUpaNam nAma catuScatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  45	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 45
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   prasaṃgātkathayiṣyāmi śālagrāmasya lakṣaṇam /	prasaMgAt kaTayizyAmi SAlagrAmasya lakzaNam /
   śālagrāmaśilāsparśātkoṭijanmāghanāśanam // GarP_1,45.1 //	SAlagrAma SilA sparSAt kowi janma aGa nASanam // GarP_1,45.1 //
   śakhacakragadāpadmī (hastaḥ) (keśavākhyo) gadādharaḥ /	SaKa cakra gadA padmI (hastaH) (keSava AKyo) gadADaraH /
   sabjakaumādakīcakraśaṅkhī (nārāyaṇo) vibhuḥ // GarP_1,45.2 //	sabja kOmAdakI cakra SaFKI (nArAyaNo) viBuH // GarP_1,45.2 //
   sacakraśaṅkhābjagado (mādhavaḥ) śrīgadādharaḥ /	sa cakra SaFKa abja gadaH (mADavaH) SrI gadADaraH /
   gadabjaśaṅkhacakrī vā (govindo)'rcyo gadādharaḥ // GarP_1,45.3 //	gadabja SaFKa cakrI vA (govindo) arcyaH gadADaraH // GarP_1,45.3 //
   padmaśaṅkhārigādine (viṣṇurūpāya) te namaḥ /	padma SaFKa ari gAdine (vizNu rUpAya) te namaH /
   saśaṅkhābjagadācakra (madhusūdanamūrtaye) // GarP_1,45.4 //	sa SaFKa abja gadA cakra (maDusUdana mUrtaye) // GarP_1,45.4 //
   namo gadāriśaṅkhābjayukta(traivikramāya) ca /	namaH gadA ari SaFKa abja yukta( trEvikramAya) ca /
   sārikaumodakīpadmaśaṅkha(vāmanamūrtaye) // GarP_1,45.5 //	sA ari kOmodakI padma SaFKa (vAmana mUrtaye) // GarP_1,45.5 //
   cakrābjaśaṅkhagādine namaḥ (śrīdharamūrtaye) /	cakra abja SaFKaga Adine namaH (SrIDara mUrtaye) /
   (hṛṣīkeśāyā)'bjagadāśaṅkhine cakriṇe namaḥ // GarP_1,45.6 //	(hRzIkeSAyA) abja gadA SaFKine cakriNe namaH // GarP_1,45.6 //
   sābjacakragadāśaṅkha(padmanābhasvarūpiṇe) /	sa abja cakra gadA SaFKa(padmanABa svarUpiNe) /
   śaṅkhacakragadāpadmin (dāmodara) manonamaḥ // GarP_1,45.7 //	SaFKa cakra gadA padmin (dAmodara) manaH namaH // GarP_1,45.7 //
   sāriśaṅkhagadābjāya (vāsudevāya) vai namaḥ /	sA ari SaFKa gadA abjAya (vAsudeva aya) vE namaH /
   śaṅkhābjacakragādine namaḥ (saṅkarṣaṇāya) ca // GarP_1,45.8 //	SaFKa abja cakragAdine namaH (saFkarzaNAya) ca // GarP_1,45.8 //
   suśaṅkhasugadābjāridhṛte (pradyumnamūrtaye) /	su SaFKa su gadA abja ari DRte (pradyumna mUrtaye) /
   namo('niruddhāya) gadāśaṅkhābjārīvidhāriṇe // GarP_1,45.9 //	namo( anirudDAya) gadA SaFKa abja arI viDAriNe // GarP_1,45.9 //
   sābjaśaṅkhagadācakra(puruṣottamamūrtaye) /	sa abja SaFKa gadA cakra( puruza uttama mUrtaye) /
   namo('dhokṣajarūpāya) gadāśaṅkhāripadmine // GarP_1,45.10 //	namaH ( aDokzaja rUpa aya) gadA SaFKa ari padmine // GarP_1,45.10 //
   (nṛsiṃhamūrtaye) padmagadāśaṅkhāridhāriṇe /	(nRsiMha mUrtaye) padma gadA SaFKa ari DAriNe /
   padmāriśaṅkhagadine namo '(stvacyutamūrtaye) // GarP_1,45.11 //	padmAri SaFKa ga dine namaH a(stu acyuta mUrtaye) // GarP_1,45.11 //
   saśaṅkacakrābjagadaṃ (janārdana) mihānaye /	sa SaFka cakra abja gadam (janArdana) miha Anaye /
   (upendraḥ) sagadaḥ sāriḥ padmaśaṅkhinnamonamaḥ // GarP_1,45.12 //	(upendraH) sa gadaH sa ariH padma SaFKinna maH namaH // GarP_1,45.12 //
   sucakrābjagadāśaṅkhayuktāya (harimūrtaye) /	su cakra abja gadA SaFKa yuktAya (hari mUrtaye) /
   sagadābjāriśaṅkhāya namaḥ (śrīkṛṣṇamūrtaye) // GarP_1,45.13 //	sa gadA abja ari SaFKAya namaH (SrI kRzNa mUrtaye) // GarP_1,45.13 //
   śālagrāmaśilādvāragatalagnadvicakradhṛk /	SAlagrAma SilA dvAra gata lagna dvi cakra DRk /
   śuklābho(vāsudevākhyaḥ) so 'vyādvaḥ śrīgadādharaḥ // GarP_1,45.14 //	SuklABaH (vAsudeva AKyaH) saH avyAt vaH SrI gadADaraH // GarP_1,45.14 //
   lagnadvicakro raktābhaḥ pūrvabhāgastupuṣkalaḥ /	lagna dvi cakraH rakta ABaH pUrva BAgaH tu puzkalaH /
   saṃkarṣaṇo 'tha(pradyumnaḥ) sūkṣmacakrastu pītakaḥ // GarP_1,45.15 //	saMkarzaNaH aTa( pradyumnaH) sUkzma cakraH tu pItakaH // GarP_1,45.15 //
   sa dīrghaḥ saśiraśchidro yo('niruddhastu) vartulaḥ /	sa dIrGaH sa SiraH CidraH yo( anirudDaH tu) vartulaH /
   nīlo dvāri trirekhaśca atha (nārāyaṇo)'sitaḥ // GarP_1,45.16 //	nIlaH dvAri tri reKaH ca aTa (nArAyaNaH ) asitaH // GarP_1,45.16 //
   madhye gādakṛtī rekhā nābhicakro (kra) mahonnataḥ /	maDye gAdakRtI reKA nABi cakraH (kra) mahA unnataH /
   pṛthuvakṣā (nṛsiṃho) vaḥ kapilo 'vyāttribindukaḥ // GarP_1,45.17 //	pRTu vakzAH (nRsiMhaH ) vaH kapilaH avyAt tri bindukaH // GarP_1,45.17 //
   athavā pañcabindustatpūjanaṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ /	aTavA paQca binduH tad pUjanam brahmacAriNaH /
   (varāhaḥ) śaktiliṅgo 'vyādviṣamadvayacakrakaḥ // GarP_1,45.18 //	(varAhaH) Sakti liFgaH avyAt vizama dvaya cakrakaH // GarP_1,45.18 //
   nīlastrirekhaḥ sthūlo 'tha (kūrmamūrtiḥ sa bindumān /	nIlaH tri reKaH sTUlaH aTa (kUrma mUrtiH sa bindumAn /
   (kṛṣṇaḥ) sa vartulāvartaḥ pātu vo natapṛṣṭhakaḥ // GarP_1,45.19 //	(kRzNaH) sa vartula AvartaH pAtu vaH nata pRzWakaH // GarP_1,45.19 //
   (śrīdharaḥ) pañcarekho 'vyā (dvanamālī) gādāṅkitaḥ /	(SrIDaraH) paQca reKaH avyA (dvanamAlI) gAda aFkitaH /
   (vāmano) vartulo hrasvo vā (rā) macakraḥ sureśvaraḥ // GarP_1,45.20 //	(vAmano) vartulaH hrasvaH vA (rA) macakraH sureSvaraH // GarP_1,45.20 //
   nānāvarṇo 'nekamūrtirnāgabhogī (tvanantakaḥ) /	nAnA varNaH aneka mUrtiH nAga BogI (tu anantakaH) /
   sthūlo (dāmodaro) nīlo madhyevakraḥ sunīlakaḥ // GarP_1,45.21 //	sTUlaH (dAmodaro) nIlaH maDyevakraH sunIlakaH // GarP_1,45.21 //
   saṃkīrṇadvārakaḥ so 'vyādatha brahmā sulohitaḥ /	saMkIrNa dvArakaH saH avyAt aTa brahmA su lohitaH /
   sadīrgharekhaḥ suṣira ekacakrāmbujaḥ pṛthuḥ // GarP_1,45.22 //	sa dIrGa reKaH suziraH eka cakra ambujaH pRTuH // GarP_1,45.22 //
   pṛthucchidraḥ sthūlacakraḥ(kṛṣṇo) (viṣṇuśca) bilvavat /	pRTu= CidraH sTUla cakraH(kRzNo) (vizNuH ca) bilva vat /
   (hayagrīvo) 'ṅkuśākāraḥ pañcarekhaḥ sakaustubhaḥ // GarP_1,45.23 //	(hayagrIvo) aFkuSa AkAraH paQca reKaH sa kOstuBaH // GarP_1,45.23 //
   (vaikuṇṭho maṇiratnābha ekacakrāmbujo 'sitaḥ /	(vEkuNWaH maNi ratna ABaH eka cakra ambujaH asitaH /
   (matsyo) dīrgho 'mbujākāro dvārarekhaśca pātu vaḥ // GarP_1,45.24 //	(matsyo) dIrGaH ambuja AkAraH dvAra reKaH ca pAtu vaH // GarP_1,45.24 //
   rāmacakro dakṣarekhaḥ śyāmovo 'vyā (ttrivikramaḥ) /	rAma cakraH dakza reKaH SyAmovaH avyA (ttri vikramaH) /
   śālagrāme dvārakāyāṃ sthitāya gadina namaḥ // GarP_1,45.25 //	SAlagrAme dvArakAyAm sTitAya gadina namaH // GarP_1,45.25 //
   ekadvāraścatuścakro vanamālāvibhūṣitaḥ /	eka dvAraH catur cakraH vanamAlA viBUzitaH /
   svarṇarekhāsamāyukto goṣpadena virājitaḥ // GarP_1,45.26 //	svarNa reKA samAyuktaH gozpadena virAjitaH // GarP_1,45.26 //
   kadambakusumākāro (lakṣmīnārāyaṇo)'vatu /	kadamba kusuma AkAraH (lakzmI nArAyaNo) avatu /
   ekena lakṣito yovyādradādhārī (sudarśanaḥ) // GarP_1,45.27 //	ekena lakzitaH yovyAdradAH DArI (sudarSanaH) // GarP_1,45.27 //
   (lakṣmīnārāyaṇo) dvābhyāntribhirmūrti(strivikramaḥ) /	(lakzmI nArAyaNo) dvAByAn triBiH mUrti(H trivikramaH) /
   caturbhiśca (caturvyūho) (vāsudevaśca) pañcabhiḥ // GarP_1,45.28 //	caturBiH ca (catur vyUhaH ) (vAsudevaH ca) paQcaBiH // GarP_1,45.28 //
   (pradyumnaḥ) ṣaḍūbhireva syāt (saṃkarṣaṇa) itastataḥ /	(pradyumnaH) zaxUBiH eva syAt (saMkarzaNa) itas tatas /
   (puruṣottamo)'ṣṭabhiḥ syā(nnavavyūho) navāṅkitaḥ // GarP_1,45.29 //	(puruza uttamo) azwaBiH syA(t nava vyUhaH ) nava aFkitaH // GarP_1,45.29 //
   (daśāvatāro) daśabhiraniruddho 'vatādatha /	(da SAvatAro) daSaBiH anirudDaH avatAt aTa /
   (dvādaśātmā) dvādaśabirata ūrdhva(manantakaḥ) // GarP_1,45.30 //	(dvAdaSa AtmA) dvAdaSa birataH UrDva(m anantakaH) // GarP_1,45.30 //
   viṣṇormūrtimayaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsa divaṃ vrajet /	vizNoH mUrti mayam stotram yaH paWet sa divam vrajet /
   (brahmā) caturmukho daṇḍī kamaṇḍaluyugānvitaḥ // GarP_1,45.31 //	(brahmA) caturmuKaH daNxI kamaNxalu yuga anvitaH // GarP_1,45.31 //
   (maheśvaraḥ) prañcavakro daśabāhurvṛṣadhvajaḥ /	(maheSvaraH) praQcavakraH daSa bAhuH vRzaDvajaH /
   yathāyudhastathā gaurī caṇḍikā ca sarasvatī // GarP_1,45.32 //	yaTA AyuDaH taTA gOrI caNxikA ca sarasvatI // GarP_1,45.32 //
   mahālakṣmīrmātaraśca padmahasto (divākaraḥ) /	mahAlakzmIH mAtaraH ca padma hastaH (divAkaraH) /
   gajāsyaśca gaṇaḥ skandaḥ ṣaṇmukhonekadhā guṇāḥ // GarP_1,45.33 //	gajAsyaH ca gaNaH skandaH zaNmuKonekaDA guNAH // GarP_1,45.33 //
   ete 'rcitāḥ sthāpitāśca prāsāde vāstupūjite /	ete arcitAH sTApitAH ca prAsAde vAstu pUjite /
   dharmārthakāmamokṣādyāḥ prāpyante puruṣeṇa ca // GarP_1,45.34 //	Darma arTa kAma mokza AdyAH prApyante puruzeNa ca // GarP_1,45.34 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   śālagrāmamūrtilakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAlagrAmamUrtilakzaNam nAma paQcacatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  46	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 46
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   vāstuṃ saṃkṣepato vakṣye gṛhādau vighnanāśanam /	vAstum saMkzepataH vakzye gRha AdO viGna nASanam /
   īsānakoṇādārabhya hyekāśītipade yajet // GarP_1,46.1 //	IsAna koNAt AraBya hi ekASIti pade yajet // GarP_1,46.1 //
   īśāne ca śiraḥ pādau nairṛte 'gnyanile karau /	ISAne ca SiraH pAdO nErRte agni anile karO /
   āvāsavāsaveśmādau pure grāme vaṇikpathe // GarP_1,46.2 //	AvAsa vAsa veSma AdO pure grAme vaNikpaTe // GarP_1,46.2 //
   prāsādārāmadurgeṣu devālayamaṭheṣu ca /	prAsAda ArAma durgezu devAlaya maWezu ca /
   dvāviṃśati surānbāhye tadantaśca trayodaśa // GarP_1,46.3 //	dvAviMSati surAn bAhye tad antar ca trayodaSa // GarP_1,46.3 //
   īśaścaivātha parjanyo jayantaḥ kuliśāyudhaḥ /	ISaH ca eva aTa parjanyaH jayantaH kuliSa AyuDaH /
   sūryaḥ satyo bhṛguścaiva ākāśo vāyureva ca // GarP_1,46.4 //	sUryaH satyaH BRguH ca eva AkASaH vAyuH eva ca // GarP_1,46.4 //
   pūṣā ca vitathaścaiva grahakṣetrayamāvubhau /	pUzA ca vitaTaH ca eva graha kzetra yamO= uBO /
   gandharvo bhṛgurājastu mṛgaḥ pitṛgaṇastathā // GarP_1,46.5 //	ganDarvaH BRgurAjaH tu mRgaH pitR gaNaH taTA // GarP_1,46.5 //
   dauvāriko 'tha sugrīvaḥ puṣpadanto gaṇādhipaḥ /	dOvArikaH aTa sugrIvaH puzpadantaH gaNADipaH /
   asuraḥ śeṣapāpau (dau) ca rogo/ḍahimukha (khya) eva ca // GarP_1,46.6 //	asuraH Seza pApO (dO) ca rogaH /xahimuKaH (Kya) eva ca // GarP_1,46.6 //
   bhallāṭaḥ somasarpau ca aditiścaditistathā /	BallAwaH soma sarpO ca aditiH caditiH taTA /
   bahirdvātriṃśadete tu tadantaścaturaḥ śṛṇu // GarP_1,46.7 //	bahis dvAtriMSat ete tu tad antar caturaH SRNu // GarP_1,46.7 //
   īśānādicatuṣkoṇasaṃsthitānpūjayeddhudhaḥ /	ISAna Adi catuzkoNa saMsTitAn pUjayet huDaH /
   āpaścaivātha sāvitrī jayo rudrastathaiva ca // GarP_1,46.8 //	ApaH ca eva aTa sAvitrI jayaH rudraH taTA eva ca // GarP_1,46.8 //
   madhye navapade brahmā tasyāṣṭhau ca samīpagān /	maDye nava pade brahmA tasya azWO ca samIpa gAn /
   devānekottarānetānpūrvādau nāmataḥ śṛṇu // GarP_1,46.9 //	devAn eka uttarAn etAn pUrva AdO nAmataH SRNu // GarP_1,46.9 //
   aryamā savitā caiva vivasvānvibudhādhipaḥ /	aryamA savitA ca eva vivasvAn vibuDa aDipaH /
   mitro 'tha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,46.10 //	mitraH aTa rAjayakzmA ca taTA pRTvIDaraH kramAt // GarP_1,46.10 //
   aṣṭamaścāpavatsaśca parito brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ /	azwamaH ca apavatsaH ca paritas brahmaNaH smRtAH /
   īśānakoṇādārabhya durge car (jñeyo) vaṃśa ucyate // GarP_1,46.11 //	ISAna koNAt AraBya durge car (jQeyo) vaMSaH ucyate // GarP_1,46.11 //
   āgneyakoṇādārabhya vaṃśo bhavati durdharaḥ /	Agneya koNAt AraBya vaMSaH Bavati durDaraH /
   aditiṃ himavantaṃ ca jayantaṃ ca idaṃ trayam // GarP_1,46.12 //	aditim himavantam ca jayantam ca idam trayam // GarP_1,46.12 //
   nāyikā kālikā nāma śakrādrandharvagāḥ punaḥ /	nAyikA kAlikAH nAma SakrAt ranDarva gAH punar /
   vāstudevānpūjayitvā gṛhaprāsādakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,46.13 //	vAstudevAn pUjayitvA gRha prAsAda kRt Bavet // GarP_1,46.13 //
   surejyaḥ purataḥ kāryo yasyāgneyyāṃ mahānasam /	surejyaH puratas kAryaH yasya AgneyyAm mahAnasam /
   kapinirgamane (ṇī)?yena pūrvataḥ satramaṇḍapam // GarP_1,46.14 //	kapi nirgamane (NI)?yena pUrvatas satra maNxapam // GarP_1,46.14 //
   gandhapuṣpagṛhaṃ kāryamaiśānyāṃ paṭṭasaṃyutam /	ganDa puzpa gRham kAryam ESAnyAm pawwa saMyutam /
   bhāṇḍāgāraṃ ca kauberyāṃ goṣṭhāgāraṃ ca vāyave // GarP_1,46.15 //	BANxAgAram ca kOberyAm gozWAgAram ca vAyave // GarP_1,46.15 //
   udagāśrayaṃ ca vāruṇyāṃ vātāyanasamanvitam /	udak ASrayam ca vAruNyAm vAtAyana samanvitam /
   samitkuśendhanasthānamāyudhānāṃ ca nairṛte // GarP_1,46.16 //	samiD kuSa inDana sTAnam AyuDAnAm ca nErRte // GarP_1,46.16 //
   abhyāgatālayaṃ ramyasaśayyāsanāpadukam /	aByAgata Alayam ramya sa SayyA AsanA padukam /
   toyāgnidīpasadbhṛtyairyuktaṃ dakṣiṇato bhavet // GarP_1,46.17 //	toya agni dIpa sat BRtyEH yuktam dakziNatas Bavet // GarP_1,46.17 //
   gṛhāntarāṇi sarvāṇi sajalaiḥ kadalīgṛhaiḥ /	gRha antarANi sarvANi sa jalEH kadalI gRhEH /
   pañcavarṇaiśca kusumaiḥ śobhitāni prakalpayet // GarP_1,46.18 //	paQca varNEH ca kusumEH SoBitAni prakalpayet // GarP_1,46.18 //
   prākāraṃ tadvahirdadyātpañcahastapramāṇataḥ /	prAkAram tat vahiH dadyAt paQca hasta pramANataH /
   evaṃ viṣṇvāśramaṃ kuryādvanaiścopavanairyutam // GarP_1,46.19 //	evam vizNu ASramam kuryAt vanEH ca upavanEH yutam // GarP_1,46.19 //
   catuḥ ṣaṣṭipado vāstuḥ prāsādādau prapūjitaḥ /	catuH zazwi padaH vAstuH prAsAda AdO prapUjitaH /
   madhye catuṣpado brahmā dvipa dāstvaryamādayaḥ // GarP_1,46.20 //	maDye catuzpadaH brahmA dvipa dAstu aryam AdayaH // GarP_1,46.20 //
   karṇe caivātha śikhyādyāstathā devāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /	karNe ca eva aTa SiKi AdyAH taTA devAH prakIrtitAH /
   tebhyo hyubhayataḥ sārdhādanye 'pi dvipadāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,46.21 //	teByaH hi uBayatas sArDAt anye api dvipadAH surAH // GarP_1,46.21 //
   catuḥ ṣaṣṭipadā devā ityevaṃ parikīrtitāḥ /	catuH zazwi padAH devAH iti evam parikIrtitAH /
   carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī // GarP_1,46.22 //	carakI ca vidArI ca pUtanA pApa rAkzasI // GarP_1,46.22 //
   īśānādyāstato bāhye devādyā hetukādayaḥ /	ISAna AdyAH tatas bAhye deva AdyAH hetuka AdayaH /
   haitukastripurāntaśca agnivetālakau yamaḥ // GarP_1,46.23 //	hEtukaH tripurAntaH ca agni vetAlakO yamaH // GarP_1,46.23 //
   agnijihvaḥ kālakaśca karālo hyakapādakaḥ /	agnijihvaH kAlakaH ca karAlaH hi akapAdakaH /
   aiśānyāṃ bhīmarūpastu pātāle pretanāyakaḥ // GarP_1,46.24 //	ESAnyAm BIma rUpaH tu pAtAle pretanAyakaH // GarP_1,46.24 //
   ākāśe gandhamālī syātkṣetrapālāṃstato yajet /	AkASe ganDamAlI syAt kzetrapAlAn= tatas yajet /
   vistārābhihataṃ dairghyaṃ rāśiṃ vāstostu kārayet // GarP_1,46.25 //	vistAra aBihatam dErGyam rASim vAstoH tu kArayet // GarP_1,46.25 //
   kṛtvā ca vasubhirbhāgaṃ śeṣaṃ baddhā yamādiśet /	kRtvA ca vasuBiH BAgam Sezam badDAH yam AdiSet /
   punarguṇitamaṣṭābhirṛbhāgaṃ tu bhājayet // GarP_1,46.26 //	punar guNitam azwa aBiH RBAgam tu BAjayet // GarP_1,46.26 //
   yaccheṣaṃ tadbhavedṛkṣaṃ bhāgairhṛtvāvyayaṃ bhavet /	yat Sezam tat Bavet Rkzam BAgEH hRtvA avyayam Bavet /
   ṛkṣaṃ caturguṇaṃ kṛtvā navabhirbhāgahāritam // GarP_1,46.27 //	Rkzam caturguNam kRtvA navaBiH BAga hAritam // GarP_1,46.27 //
   śeṣamaṃśaṃ vijānīyāddevalasya mataṃ yathā /	Sezam aMSam vijAnIyAt devalasya matam yaTA /
   aṣṭābhirguṇitaṃ piṇḍaṃ ṣaṣṭibhirbhāgāharitam // GarP_1,46.28 //	azwABiH guNitam piNxam zazwiBiH BAga Aharitam // GarP_1,46.28 //
   yaccheṣaṃ tadbhavejjīvaṃ maraṇaṃ bhatahāritam /	yat Sezam tat Bavet jIvam maraNam Bata hAritam /
   vāstukroḍe gṛhaṃ kuryānna pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā // GarP_1,46.29 //	vAstu kroxe gRham kuryAt na pRzWe mAnavaH sadA // GarP_1,46.29 //
   vāmapārśvena svāpiti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	vAma pArSvena svApiti na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   siṃhakanyātulāyāṃ ca dvāraṃ śudhyedathottaram // GarP_1,46.30 //	siMha kanyA tulAyAm ca dvAram SuDyet aTa uttaram // GarP_1,46.30 //
   evaṃ ca vṛścikādau syātpūrvadakṣiṇapaścimam /	evam ca vRScika AdO syAt pUrva dakziNa paScimam /
   dvāraṃ dīrghārdhavistāraṃ dvārāṇyaṣṭau smṛtāni ca // GarP_1,46.31 //	dvAram dIrGa arDa vistAram dvArANi azwO smRtAni ca // GarP_1,46.31 //
   santānapreṣyanīcatvaṃ svayānaṃ svarṇabhūṣaṇam /	santAna prezya nIca tvam sva yAnam svarNaBUzaNam /
   sutahīnaṃ tu raudreṇa vīryaghnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_1,46.32 //	suta hInam tu rOdreNa vIrya Gnam dakziNe taTA // GarP_1,46.32 //
   vahnau badhaścāyurvṛddhiṃputtralābhasutṛptidaḥ /	vahnO baDaH ca AyuH vRdDiMputtra lABa su tRpti daH /
   dhanade nṛpapīḍādamarthaghnaṃ rogadaṃ jale // GarP_1,46.33 //	Danade nRpa pIxA dam arTa Gnam roga dam jale // GarP_1,46.33 //
   nṛpabhī tirmṛtāpatyaṃ hyanapatyaṃ na vairadam /	nRpaBI tiH mRta apatyam hi anapatyam na vEra dam /
   arthadaṃ cārthahānyai ca doṣadaṃ putramṛtyudam // GarP_1,46.34 //	arTa dam ca arTa hAnyE ca doza dam putra mRtyu dam // GarP_1,46.34 //
   dvārāṇyuttarasaṃjñāni pūrvadvārāṇi vacmyaham /	dvArANi uttara saMjQAni pUrva dvArANi vacmi aham /
   agnibhītirbahu kanyādhanasaṃmānakopadam // GarP_1,46.35 //	agni BItiH bahu kanyA Dana saMmAna kopa dam // GarP_1,46.35 //
   rājaghnaṃ kopadaṃ pūrve phalato dvāramīritam /	rAja Gnam kopa dam pUrve PalataH dvAram Iritam /
   īśānādau bhavetpūrvamagneyyādau tu dakṣiṇam // GarP_1,46.36 //	ISAna AdO Bavet pUrvam agneyI AdO tu dakziNam // GarP_1,46.36 //
   nairṛtyādau paścimaṃ syādvāyavyādau tu cottaram /	nErRtya AdO paScimam syAt vAyavI a AdO tu ca uttaram /
   aṣṭabhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇāṃ ca phalāphalam // GarP_1,46.37 //	azwa BAge kRte BAge dvArANAm ca Pala aPalam // GarP_1,46.37 //
   aśvatthaplakṣanyagrodhāḥ pūrvādau syādudumbaraḥ /	aSvatTa plakza nyagroDAH pUrva AdO syAt udumbaraH /
   gṛhasya śobhanaḥ prokta īśāne caiva sālmaliḥ /	gRhasya SoBanaH proktaH ISAne ca eva sAlmaliH /
   pūjito vignahārī syātprāsādasya gṛhasya ca // GarP_1,46.38 //	pUjitaH vigna hArI syAt prAsAdasya gRhasya ca // GarP_1,46.38 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   vāstumānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	vAstumAnalakzaNam nAma zawcatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  47	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 47
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   prāsādānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca vakṣye śaunaka tacchṛṇu /	prAsAdAnAm lakzaNam ca vakzye SOnaka tat SRNu /
   catuḥ ṣaṣṭipadaṃ kṛtvā digvidikṣūpalakṣitam // GarP_1,47.1 //	catuH zazwi padam kRtvA diS vidikzu upalakzitam // GarP_1,47.1 //
   catuṣkoṇaṃ caturbhiśca dvārāṇi sūryasaṃkhyayā /	catuzkoNam caturBiH ca dvArANi sUrya saMKyayA /
   catvāriṃśāṣṭabiścaiva bhittīnāṃ kalpanā bhavet // GarP_1,47.2 //	catvAriMSa azwabiH ca eva BittInAm kalpanA Bavet // GarP_1,47.2 //
   ūrdhvakṣetrasamā jaṅghā jaṅghārdhadviguṇaṃ bhavet /	UrDva kzetra samA jaFGA jaFGA arDa dviguNam Bavet /
   garbhavistāravistīrṇaḥ śukāṅghriśca vidhīyate // GarP_1,47.3 //	garBa vistAra vistIrNaH Suka aFGriH ca viDIyate // GarP_1,47.3 //
   tattribhāgena kartavyaḥ pañcabhāgena vā punaḥ /	tad tri BAgena kartavyaH paQca BAgena vA punar /
   nirgamastu śukāṅghreśca ucchrāyaḥ śikharārdhagaḥ // GarP_1,47.4 //	nirgamaH tu Suka aFGreH ca ucCrAyaH SiKara arDa gaH // GarP_1,47.4 //
   caturdhā śikharaṃ kṛtvā tribhāge vedibandhanam /	caturDA SiKaram kRtvA tri BAge vedi banDanam /
   caturthe punarasyaiva kaṇṭhamāmūlasādhanam // GarP_1,47.5 //	caturTe punar asya eva kaNWam AmUla sADanam // GarP_1,47.5 //
   atha vāpi samaṃ vāstuṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśabhāgikam /	aTa vA api samam vAstum kRtvA zoxaSa BAgikam /
   tasya madhye caturbhāgamādau garbhaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_1,47.6 //	tasya maDye catur BAgam AdO garBam tu kArayet // GarP_1,47.6 //
   caturbhāgena bhittīnāmucchrāyaḥ syātpramāṇataḥ // GarP_1,47.7 //	catur BAgena BittInAm ucCrAyaH syAt pramANataH // GarP_1,47.7 //
   dviguṇaḥ śikharocchrāyo bhittyucchāyācca mānataḥ /	dviguNaH SiKara ucCrAyaH Bitti ucCAyAt ca mAnataH /
   śikharārdhasya cairdhena vidheyāstu pradakṣiṇāḥ // GarP_1,47.8 //	SiKara arDasya cErDena viDeyAH tu pradakziNAH // GarP_1,47.8 //
   caturdikṣu tathā jñeyo nirgamastuḥ tathā budhaiḥ /	catur dikzu taTA jQeyaH nirgamaH tuH taTA buDEH /
   pañcabhāgena saṃbhajya garbhamānaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,47.9 //	paQca BAgena saMBajya garBa mAnam vicakzaNaH // GarP_1,47.9 //
   bhāgamekaṃ gṛhītvā tu nirgamaṃ klapayetpunaḥ /	BAgam ekam gRhItvA tu nirgamam klapayet punar /
   garbhasūtrasamo bhāgādagrato mukhamaṇḍapaḥ // GarP_1,47.10 //	garBasUtra samaH BAgAt agratas muKa maNxapaH // GarP_1,47.10 //
   etatsāmānyamuddiṣṭaṃ prāsādasya hi lakṣaṇam /	etat sAmAnyam uddizwam prAsAdasya hi lakzaNam /
   liṅgamānamatho vakṣye pīṭho liṅgasamo bhavet // GarP_1,47.11 //	liFga mAnam aTo vakzye pIWaH liFga samaH Bavet // GarP_1,47.11 //
   dviguṇena bhavedrarbhaḥ samantācchaunaka dhruvam /	dviguNena Bavet rarBaH samantAt SOnaka Druvam /
   taddvidhā ca bhavedbhītirjaṅghā tadvistarārdhagā // GarP_1,47.12 //	tat dviDA ca Bavet BItiH jaFGA tad vistara arDa gAH // GarP_1,47.12 //
   dviguṇaṃ śikharaṃ proktaṃ jaṅghāyāścaiva śaunaka /	dviguNam SiKaram proktam jaFGAyAH ca eva SOnakaH /
   pīṭhagarbhāvaraṃ karma tanmānena śukāṅghrikam // GarP_1,47.13 //	pIWa garBa avaram karma tad mAnena Suka aFGrikam // GarP_1,47.13 //
   nir gamastu samākhyātaḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva tu /	niH gamaH tu samAKyAtaH Sezam pUrvavat eva tu /
   liṅgamānaṃ smṛtaṃ hyetaddvāramānamathocyate // GarP_1,47.14 //	liFga mAnam smRtam hi etat dvAra mAnam aTa ucyate // GarP_1,47.14 //
   karāgraṃ vedavatkṛtvā dvāraṃ bhāgāṣṭamaṃ bhavet /	kara agram veda vat kRtvA dvAram BAga azwamam Bavet /
   vistareṇa samākhyātaṃ dviguṇaṃsvecchayā bhavet // GarP_1,47.15 //	vistareNa samAKyAtam dviguNaMsva icCayA Bavet // GarP_1,47.15 //
   dvāravatpīṭhamadhye tu śeṣaṃ suṣirakaṃ bhavet /	dvAra vat pIWa maDye tu Sezam suzirakam Bavet /
   pādikaṃ śeṣikaṃ bhittirdvārārdhena parigrahāt // GarP_1,47.16 //	pAdikam Sezikam BittiH dvAra arDena parigrahAt // GarP_1,47.16 //
   tadvistārasamā jaṅghā sikharaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet /	tad vistAra samA jaFGA siKaram dviguNam Bavet /
   śukāṅghriḥ pūrvavajjñeyā nirgamocchrāyakaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,47.17 //	SukAFGriH pUrvavat jQeyA nirgama ucCrAyakam Bavet // GarP_1,47.17 //
   maṇḍape mānametattu svarūpaṃ cāparaṃ vade /	maNxape mAnam etat tu svarUpam ca aparam vade /
   traivedaṃ kārayetkṣetraṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ // GarP_1,47.18 //	trEvedam kArayet kzetram yatra tizWanti devatAH // GarP_1,47.18 //
   itthaṃ kṛtena mānena bāhyabhāgavinirgatam /	itTam kRtena mAnena bAhya BAga vinirgatam /
   nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ // GarP_1,47.19 //	nemiH pAdena vistIrNA prAsAdasya samantataH // GarP_1,47.19 //
   garbhaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kuryānnemyā mānaṃ bhavediha /	garBam tu dviguNam kuryAt nemyAH mAnam Bavet iha /
   sa eva bhitterutsedho śikharo dviguṇo mataḥ // GarP_1,47.20 //	saH eva BitteH utseDaH SiKaraH dviguNaH mataH // GarP_1,47.20 //
   prāsādānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi mānaṃ yoniṃ ca mānataḥ /	prAsAdAnAm ca vakzyAmi mAnam yonim ca mAnataH /
   vairājaḥ puṣpakākhyaśca kailāso mālikāhvayaḥ // GarP_1,47.21 //	vErAjaH puzpaka AKyaH ca kElAsaH mAlikA AhvayaH // GarP_1,47.21 //
   triviṣṭapaṃ ca pañcaite prāsādāḥ sarvayonayaḥ /	trivizwapam ca paQca ete prAsAdAH sarva yonayaH /
   prathamaścaturaśro hi dvitīyastu tadāyataḥ // GarP_1,47.22 //	praTamaH caturaSraH hi dvitIyaH tu tadA AyataH // GarP_1,47.22 //
   vṛtto vṛttāyataścānyo 'ṣṭāśraśceha ca pañcamaḥ /	vRttaH vRtta AyataH ca anyaH azwASraH ca iha ca paQcamaH /
   etebhya eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ sumanoharāḥ // GarP_1,47.23 //	eteByaH eva samBUtAH prAsAdAH su manoharAH // GarP_1,47.23 //
   sarvaprakṛtibhūtebhyaścatvāriṃśattathaiva ca /	sarva prakRti BUteByaH catvAriMSat taTA eva ca /
   meruśca mandaraścaiva vimānaśca tathāparaḥ // GarP_1,47.24 //	meruH ca mandaraH ca eva vimAnaH ca taTA aparaH // GarP_1,47.24 //
   bhadrakaḥ sarvatā bhadro rucako nandanastathā /	BadrakaH sarvatA BadraH rucakaH nandanaH taTA /
   nandivardhanasaṃjñaśca śrīvatsaśca navetyamī // GarP_1,47.25 //	nandivarDana saMjQaH ca SrIvatsaH ca navA iti amI // GarP_1,47.25 //
   caturaśrāḥ samudbhūtā vairājāditi gamyatām /	caturaSrAH samudBUtA vErAjAt iti gamyatAm /
   valabhī gṛharājaśca śā lāgṛhaṃ ca mandiram // GarP_1,47.26 //	valaBI gRharAjaH ca SA lAgRham ca mandiram // GarP_1,47.26 //
   vimānaṃ ca tathā brahmamandiraṃ bhavanaṃ tathā /	vimAnam ca taTA brahma mandiram Bavanam taTA /
   uttambhaṃ śibikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ // GarP_1,47.27 //	uttamBam SibikAH veSma navA ete puzpaka udBavAH // GarP_1,47.27 //
   valayo dundubhiḥ padmo mahāpadmastathāparaḥ /	valayaH dunduBiH padmaH mahApadmaH taTA aparaH /
   mukulī cāsya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaśca kalaśastathā // GarP_1,47.28 //	mukulI ca asya uzNIzI SaFKaH ca kalaSaH taTA // GarP_1,47.28 //
   guvāvṛkṣastathānyaśca vṛttāḥ kailāsasambhavāḥ /	guvAvRkzaH taTA anyaH ca vRttAH kElAsa samBavAH /
   gajo 'tha vṛṣabho haṃso garuḍaḥ siṃhanāmakaḥ // GarP_1,47.29 //	gajaH aTa vRzaBaH haMsaH garuxaH siMhanAmakaH // GarP_1,47.29 //
   bhūmukho bhūdharaścaiva śrījayaḥ pṛthivīdharaḥ /	BUmuKaH BUDaraH ca eva SrI jayaH pRTivIDaraH /
   vṛttāyatāḥ samudbhūtā navaite maṇikāhvayāt // GarP_1,47.30 //	vRtta AyatAH samudBUtA navA ete maNikA AhvayAt // GarP_1,47.30 //
   vajraṃ cakraṃ tathānyacca muṣṭikaṃ vabhrusaṃjñitam /	vajram cakram taTA anyat ca muzwikam vaBru saMjQitam /
   vakraḥ svastikakhaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣa eva ca // GarP_1,47.31 //	vakraH svastika KaxgO ca gadA SrIvRkzaH eva ca // GarP_1,47.31 //
   vijayo nāmataḥ śvetastriviṣṭipasamudbhavāḥ /	vijayaH nAmataH SvetaH trivizwipa samudBavAH /
   trikoṇaṃ padmamardhenduścatuṣkoṇaṃ dviraṣṭakam // GarP_1,47.32 //	tri koNam padmam arDenduH catuzkoNam dvis azwakam // GarP_1,47.32 //
   yatra tatra vidhātavyaṃ saṃsthānaṃ maṇḍapasya tu /	yatra tatra viDAtavyam saMsTAnam maNxapasya tu /
   rājyaṃ ca vibhavaścaivaḥ hyāyurvardvanameva ca // GarP_1,47.33 //	rAjyam ca viBavaH ca evaH hi AyuH vardvanam eva ca // GarP_1,47.33 //
   putralābhaḥ striyaḥ puṣṭistrikoṇādikramādbhavet /	putra lABaH striyaH puzwiH trikoNa Adi kramAt Bavet /
   kuryāddhajādikaṃ khyātadvāri garbhagṛhaṃ tathā // GarP_1,47.34 //	kuryAt haja Adikam KyAta dvAri garBagRham taTA // GarP_1,47.34 //
   maṇāḍapaḥ samasaṃkhyābhirguṇitaḥ sūtrakastathā /	maNAxapaH sama saMKyABiH guNitaH sUtrakaH taTA /
   maṇḍapasya caturthāṃśādbhadraḥ kāryo vijānatā // GarP_1,47.35 //	maNxapasya caturTa aMSAt BadraH kAryaH vijAnatA // GarP_1,47.35 //
   spardhāgavākṣakopeto nirgavākṣo 'tha vā bhavet /	sparDA gavAkzaka upetaH nirgavAkzaH aTa vA Bavet /
   sārdhabhittipramāṇena bhitimānena vā punaḥ // GarP_1,47.36 //	sArDa Bitti pramANena Biti mAnena vA punar // GarP_1,47.36 //
   bhitterdvaiguṇyato vāpi kartavyā maṇḍapāḥ kracit /	BitteH dvEguNyataH vA api kartavyAH maNxapAH kracit /
   prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣamabhūmikā // GarP_1,47.37 //	prAsAde maQcarI kAryA citrA vizama BUmikAH // GarP_1,47.37 //
   parimāṇavirodhena rekhāvaiṣamyabhūṣitā /	parimANa viroDena reKA vEzamya BUzitA /
   ādhārastu caturdhāraścaturmaṇḍapaśobhitaḥ // GarP_1,47.38 //	ADAraH tu caturDAraH catur maNxapa SoBitaH // GarP_1,47.38 //
   śataśṛṅgasamāyukto meruḥ prāsāda uttamaḥ /	SataSRFga samAyuktaH meruH prAsAdaH uttamaH /
   maṇḍapāstasya kartavyā bhadraistribhiralaṅkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,47.39 //	maNxapAH tasya kartavyAH BadrEH triBiH alaFkRtAH // GarP_1,47.39 //
   ghacanākāramānānāṃ bhinnābhinnā bhavanti te /	Gacana AkAra mAnAnAm Binna aBinnAH Bavanti te /
   kiyanto yeṣu cādhārā nirādhārāśca kecana // GarP_1,47.40 //	kiyantaH yezu ca ADArAH nirADArAH ca kecana // GarP_1,47.40 //
   praticchandakabhedena prāsādāḥ sambhavanti te /	praticCandaka Bedena prAsAdAH samBavanti te /
   anyonyāsaṃkarāsteṣāṃ ghaṭanānāmabhedataḥ // GarP_1,47.41 //	anyonya asaMkarAH tezAm GawanAnAm aBedataH // GarP_1,47.41 //
   devatānāṃ viśeṣāya prāsādā bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ /	devatAnAm viSezAya prAsAdAH bahavaH smRtAH /
   prāsāde niyamo nāsti devatānāṃ svayambhuvām // GarP_1,47.42 //	prAsAde niyamaH na asti devatAnAm svayamBuvAm // GarP_1,47.42 //
   tāneva devatānāṃ ca pūrvamānena kārayet /	tAn eva devatAnAm ca pUrva mAnena kArayet /
   caturaśrāyatāstattra catuṣkoṇasamanvitāḥ // GarP_1,47.43 //	caturaSrAyatAH tat tra catuzkoNa samanvitAH // GarP_1,47.43 //
   candraśālānvitā kāryā bherīśikharasaṃyutā /	candraSAlA anvitA kAryA BerI SiKara saMyutAH /
   purato vāhanānāṃ ca kartavyā lagna(ghu) maṇḍapāḥ // GarP_1,47.44 //	puratas vAhanAnAm ca kartavyAH lagna(Gu) maNxapAH // GarP_1,47.44 //
   nāṭyaśālā ca kartavyā dvāradeśasamāśrayā /	nAwya SAlA ca kartavyA dvAra deSa samASrayAH /
   prasāde devatānāṃ ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣvapi // GarP_1,47.45 //	prasAde devatAnAm ca kAryA dikzu vidikzu api // GarP_1,47.45 //
   dvārapālāśca kartavyā mukhyā gatvā pṛthakpṛthak /	dvArapAlAH ca kartavyA muKyA gatvA pRTak pRTak /
   kiñcidadūrataḥ kāryā maṭhāstatropajīvinām // GarP_1,47.46 //	kiQcid adUrataH kAryAH maWAH tatra upajIvinAm // GarP_1,47.46 //
   prāvṛtā jagatī kāryā phalapuṣpajalānvitā /	prAvRtA jagatI kAryA Pala puzpa jala anvitA /
   prasādeṣu surāṃsthāpya pūjābhiḥ pūjayennaraḥ /	prasAdezu surAMsTApya pUjABiH pUjayet naraH /
   vāsudevaḥ sarvadevaḥ sarvabhāk tadgṛhādikṛt // GarP_1,47.47 //	vAsudevaH sarva devaH sarva BAj tad gRha Adi kRt // GarP_1,47.47 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSe AcAra kANxe
   prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃnāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	prAsAdaliFgamaNxapAdilakzaNanirUpaNaMnAma saptacatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  48	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 48
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   pratiṣṭhāṃ sarvadevānāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vadāmyaham /	pratizWAm sarva devAnAm saMkzepeNa vadAmi aham /
   sutithyādau suramyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.1 //	su tiTi AdO su ramyAm ca pratizWAm kArayet guruH // GarP_1,48.1 //
   ṛtvigbhiḥ saha cācāryaṃ varayenmadhyadeśagam /	RtvigBiH saha ca AcAryam varayet maDyadeSa gam /
   svaśākhoktavidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu // GarP_1,48.2 //	sva SAKA ukta viDAnena aTa vA praNavena tu // GarP_1,48.2 //
   pañcabhirbahubhirvātha kuryātpādyārghyameva ca /	paQcaBiH bahuBiH vA aTa kuryAt pAdya arGyam eva ca /
   mudrikābhistathā vastrairgandhamālyānulepanaiḥ // GarP_1,48.3 //	mudrikABiH taTA vastrEH ganDa mAlya anulepanEH // GarP_1,48.3 //
   mantranyāsaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet /	mantra nyAsam guruH kRtvA tatas karma samAraBet /
   prāsādasyāgrataḥ kuryānmaṇḍapaṃ daśahastakam // GarP_1,48.4 //	prAsAdasya agratas kuryAt maNxapam daSa hastakam // GarP_1,48.4 //
   kuryāddvādaśahastaṃ vā stambhaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiryutam /	kuryAt dvAdaSa hastam vA stamBEH zoxaSaBiH yutam /
   dhvajāṣṭakaiścaturhastāṃ madhye vediṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,48.5 //	Dvaja azwakEH catur hastAm maDye vedim ca kArayet // GarP_1,48.5 //
   nadīsaṃgamatīrātthāṃ vālukāṃ tatra dāpayet /	nadI saMgama tIra AtTAm vAlukAm tatra dApayet /
   caturaśraṃ kārmukābhaṃ vartulaṃ kamalākṛti // GarP_1,48.6 //	caturaSram kArmuka ABam vartulam kamala AkRti // GarP_1,48.6 //
   pūrvāditaḥ samārabhya kartavyaṃ kuṇḍapañcakam /	pUrva AditaH samAraBya kartavyam kuNxapaQcakam /
   athavā caturaśrāṇi sarvāṇyetāni kārayet // GarP_1,48.7 //	aTavA caturaSrANi sarvANi etAni kArayet // GarP_1,48.7 //
   śāntikarmidhānena sarvakāmārthasiddhaye /	SAnti karmiDAnena sarva kAma arTa sidDaye /
   śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryo homamācaret // GarP_1,48.8 //	SiraH sTAne tu devasya AcAryaH homam Acaret // GarP_1,48.8 //
   aiśānyāṃ kecidicchanti upalipyāvaniṃ śubhām /	ESAnyAm kecid icCanti upalipya avanim SuBAm /
   dvārāṇi caiva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇāntike // GarP_1,48.9 //	dvArANi ca eva catvAri kRtvA vE toraNa antike // GarP_1,48.9 //
   nyagrodhodumbarāśvatthabailvapālāśakhādirāḥ /	nyagroDa udumbara aSvatTa bElva pAlASa KAdirAH /
   toraṇāḥ pañcahastāśca vastrapuṣpādyalaṅkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,48.10 //	toraNAH paQca hastAH ca vastra puzpa Adi alaFkRtAH // GarP_1,48.10 //
   nikhaneddhastamekakaṃ catvāraścaturo diśaḥ /	niKanet hastam ekakam catvAraH caturaH diSaH /
   pūrvadvāre mṛgendraṃ tu hayarājaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.11 //	pUrva dvAre mRgendram tu haya rAjam tu dakziNe // GarP_1,48.11 //
   paścime gopatirnāma suraśārdūlamuttare /	paScime gopatiH nAma sura SArdUlam uttare /
   agnimīleti hi mantreṇa prathamaṃ pūrvato nyaset // GarP_1,48.12 //	agnimIlA iti hi mantreNa praTamam pUrvatas nyaset // GarP_1,48.12 //
   īṣetvetihi mantreṇa dakṣiṇasyāṃ dvitīyakam /	IzetvA itihi mantreNa dakziNasyAm dvitIyakam /
   agnāyāhimantreṇa paścimasyāṃ tṛtīyakam // GarP_1,48.13 //	agnAya ahi mantreNa paScimasyAm tRtIyakam // GarP_1,48.13 //
   śannodevīti mantreṇa uttarasyāṃ caturthakam /	Sanna udevI iti mantreNa uttarasyAm caturTakam /
   pūrve ambudavatkāryā āgnoyyāṃ dhūmarūpiṇī // GarP_1,48.14 //	pUrve ambuda vat kAryA AgnoyyAm DUma rUpiNI // GarP_1,48.14 //
   yāmyāṃ vai kṛṣṇarūpā tu nairṛtyā śyāmalā (dhūsarā) bhavet /	yAmyAm vE kRzNa rUpA tu nErRtyA SyAmalA (DUsarA) Bavet /
   vāruṇyāṃ pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyāṃ pītavarṇikā // GarP_1,48.15 //	vAruNyAm pANxurA jQeyA vAyavyAm pIta varNikA // GarP_1,48.15 //
   uttare raktavarṇā tu śukleśī ca patākikā /	uttare rakta varNA tu SukleSI ca patAkikAH /
   bahurūpā tathā madhye indravidyeti pūrvake // GarP_1,48.16 //	bahu rUpA taTA maDye indra vidyA iti pUrvake // GarP_1,48.16 //
   āgniṃ saṃsuptimantreṇa yamonāgeti dakṣiṇe /	Agnim saMsupti mantreNa yamaH nAga iti dakziNe /
   pūjyā rakṣohanoveti paścime uttare 'pi ca // GarP_1,48.17 //	pUjyA rakzohana uvA iti paScime uttare api ca // GarP_1,48.17 //
   vāta ityabhiṣicyātha āpyāyasveti cottare /	vAtaH iti aBizicya aTa ApyAyasva iti ca uttare /
   tamīśānamataścaiva viṣṇornuketi madhyame // GarP_1,48.18 //	tam ISAnam atas ca eva vizNoH nukA iti maDyame // GarP_1,48.18 //
   kalaśau tu tato dvaudvau niveśyau toraṇāntike /	kalaSO tu tatas dvOdvO niveSyO toraNa antike /
   vastrayugmasamāyuktāścandanādyaiḥ svalaṅkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,48.19 //	vastra yugma samAyuktAH candana AdyEH su alaFkRtAH // GarP_1,48.19 //
   puṣpairvitānairbahulairādivarṇābhimantritāḥ /	puzpEH vitAnEH bahulEH Adi varNa aBimantritAH /
   dikpālāśca tataḥ pūjyāḥ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // GarP_1,48.20 //	dikpAlAH ca tatas pUjyAH SAstra dRzwena karmaNA // GarP_1,48.20 //
   trātāramindrabhantreṇa agnirmūrdheti cāpare /	trAtAram indra BantreNa agniH mUrDA iti ca apare /
   asminvṛkṣa itaṃ caiva pracārīti parā smṛtā // GarP_1,48.21 //	asmin vRkzaH itam ca eva pracAri iti parA smRtAH // GarP_1,48.21 //
   kiñcedadhātu ācatvābhitvādeti ca saptamī /	kiQcet aDAtu Acatva aBitvAda iti ca saptamI /
   imārudreti dikyālānpūjayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,48.22 //	imArudra iti dikyAlAn pUjayitvA vicakzaNaH // GarP_1,48.22 //
   homadravyāṇi vāyavye kuryātsopaskarāṇi ca /	homa dravyANi vAyavye kuryAt sa upaskarANi ca /
   śaṅkhāñchāstroditāñchvetānnetrābhyāṃ vinyasedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.23 //	SaFKAn SAstra uditAn SvetAn netrAByAm vinyaset guruH // GarP_1,48.23 //
   ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /	Alokanena dravyANi SudDim yAnti na saMSayaH /
   tdṛdayādīni cāṅgāni vyāhṛtipraṇavena ca // GarP_1,48.24 //	tdRdaya AdIni ca aFgAni vyAhRti praNavena ca // GarP_1,48.24 //
   astraṃ caiva samastānāṃ nyāso 'yaṃ sarvakāmikaḥ /	astram ca eva samastAnAm nyAsaH ayam sarva kAmikaH /
   akṣatānviṣṭaraṃ caiva astreṇaivābhimantritān // GarP_1,48.25 //	akzatAn vizwaram ca eva astreNa eva aBimantritAn // GarP_1,48.25 //
   viṣṭareṇa spṛśedduvyānyāgamaṇḍapasaṃbhṛtān /	vizwareNa spRSet duvyAni Aga maNxapa saMBRtAn /
   akṣatānvikiretpaścādastrapūtānsamantataḥ // GarP_1,48.26 //	akzatAn vikiret paScAt astra pUtAn samantataH // GarP_1,48.26 //
   śakrīṃ diśamathārabhya yāvadīśānagocaram /	SakrIm diSam aTa AraBya yAvat ISAna gocaram /
   avakīryākṣatārnsaṃvāṃllepayenmaṇḍapaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,48.27 //	avakIrya akzatArn saMvAn= lepayet maNxapam tatas // GarP_1,48.27 //
   gandhādyairarghyapātre ca mantragrāmaṃ nyasedguruḥ /	ganDa AdyEH arGya pAtre ca mantra grAmam nyaset guruH /
   tenārghyapātratoyena prokṣayedyāgamaṇḍapam // GarP_1,48.28 //	tena arGya pAtra toyena prokzayet yAga maNxapam // GarP_1,48.28 //
   pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tadākhyaṃ kalaśaṃ nyaset /	pratizWA yasya devasya tad AKyam kalaSam nyaset /
   aiśānyāṃ pūjayedyāmye astreṇaiva ca bardhanīm // GarP_1,48.29 //	ESAnyAm pUjayet yAmye astreNa eva ca barDanIm // GarP_1,48.29 //
   kalaśaṃ vardhanīṃ caiva grahānvāsttoṣpatiṃ tathā /	kalaSam varDanIm ca eva grahAn vAsttozpatim taTA /
   āsanetāni sarvāṇi praṇavākhyaṃ japedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.30 //	AsanetAni sarvANi praNava AKyam japet guruH // GarP_1,48.30 //
   sūtragrīvaṃ ratnagarbhaṃ vastrayugmena veṣṭitam /	sUtra grIvam ratna garBam vastra yugmena vezwitam /
   sarvauṣadhīgandhaliptaṃ pūjayetkalaśaṃ guruḥ // GarP_1,48.31 //	sarva ozaDI ganDa liptam pUjayet kalaSam guruH // GarP_1,48.31 //
   devastu kalaśe pūjyo vardhanyā vastramuttamam /	devaH tu kalaSe pUjyaH varDanyA vastram uttamam /
   vardhanyā tu samāyuktaṃ kalaśaṃ bhrāmayedanu // GarP_1,48.32 //	varDanyA tu samAyuktam kalaSam BrAmayet anu // GarP_1,48.32 //
   vardhanīdhārayā siñcannagrato dhārayettataḥ /	varDanI DArayA siQcan= agratas DArayet tatas /
   abhyarcya vardhanīkumbhaṃ sthaṇḍile devamarcayet // GarP_1,48.33 //	aByarcya varDanI kumBam sTaNxile devam arcayet // GarP_1,48.33 //
   ghaṭaṃ cāvāhya vāyavyāṃ gaṇānāṃ tveti sadgaṇam /	Gawam ca AvAhya vAyavyAm gaNAnAm tvA iti sat gaNam /
   devamīśānakoṇe tu japedvāstoṣpatiṃ budhaḥ // GarP_1,48.34 //	devam ISAna koNe tu japet vAstozpatim buDaH // GarP_1,48.34 //
   vāstoṣpatīti mantreṇa vāstudoṣopaśāntaye /	vAstozpati iti mantreNa vAstu doza upaSAntaye /
   kumbhasya pūrvato bhūtaṃ gaṇadevaṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.35 //	kumBasya pUrvatas BUtam gaNa devam balim haret // GarP_1,48.35 //
   paṭhediti ca vidyāśca kuryādālambhanaṃ budhaḥ /	paWet iti ca vidyAH ca kuryAt AlamBanam buDaH /
   yogeyogeti mantreṇāstaraṇaṃ śādvalaiḥ kuśaiḥ // GarP_1,48.36 //	yogeyogA iti mantreNa AstaraNam SAdvalEH kuSEH // GarP_1,48.36 //
   ṛtvigbhiḥ sārdhamācāryaḥ snānapīṭhe gurustadā /	RtvigBiH sArDam AcAryaH snAna pIWe guruH tadA /
   vividhairbrahmaghoṣaiśca puṇyāhajayamaṅgalaiḥ // GarP_1,48.37 //	viviDEH brahmaGozEH ca puNya aha jaya maFgalEH // GarP_1,48.37 //
   kṛtvā brahmarathe devaṃ pratiṣṭhanti tato dvijāḥ /	kRtvA brahmaraTe devam pratizWanti tatas dvijAH /
   aiśānyāmānayetpīṭhamaṇḍape vinyasedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.38 //	ESAnyAm Anayet pIWa maNxape vinyaset guruH // GarP_1,48.38 //
   bhadraṅkarṇetyatha snātvā sūtravalkalajena tu /	BadraFkarNa iti aTa snAtvA sUtra valkala jena tu /
   saṃsnāpya lakṣaṇoddhāraṃ kuryāttūryādi (dūrābhi) vādanaiḥ // GarP_1,48.39	saMsnApya lakzaNa udDAram kuryAt tUrya Adi (dUrABi) vAdanEH // GarP_1,48.39
   madhusarpiḥ samāyuktaṃ kāṃsye vā tāmrabhājane /	maDu sarpiH samAyuktam kAMsye vA tAmra BAjane /
   akṣiṇī cāñjayeccāsya suvarṇasya śalākayā // GarP_1,48.40 //	akziNI ca aQjayet ca asya suvarNasya SalAkayA // GarP_1,48.40 //
   agnirjyotīti mantreṇa netrodvāṭaṃ tu kārayet /	agniH jyoti iti mantreNa netra udvAwam tu kArayet /
   lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāmaikaṃ sthāpako va(da) det // GarP_1,48.41 //	lakzaNe kriyamANe tu nAma ekam sTApakaH va(da) det // GarP_1,48.41 //
   imaṃmegaṅgemantreṇa netrayoḥ śītalakriyā /	imaMmegaFgemantreNa netrayoH SItala kriyA /
   agnirmūrdheti mantreṇa dadyādvalmī kamṛttikām // GarP_1,48.42 //	agniH mUrDA iti mantreNa dadyAt valmI kamRttikAm // GarP_1,48.42 //
   bilvodumbaramaśvatthaṃ vaṭaṃ pālāśameva ca /	bilva udumbaram aSvatTam vawam pAlASam eva ca /
   yajñāyajñeti mantreṇa dadyātpañcakaṣāyakam // GarP_1,48.43 //	yajQAyajQA iti mantreNa dadyAt paQcakazAyakam // GarP_1,48.43 //
   pañcagavyaṃ snāpayecca sahadevyādi bhistataḥ /	paQcagavyam snApayet ca sahadevI Adi BiH tatas /
   sahadevī balā caiva śatamūlī śatāvarī // GarP_1,48.44 //	sahadevI balA ca eva SatamUlI SatAvarI // GarP_1,48.44 //
   kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathaiva ca /	kumArI ca guxUcI ca siMhI vyAGrI taTA eva ca /
   yā oṣadhīti mantreṇa snānamoṣadhimajjalaiḥ // GarP_1,48.45 //	yA ozaDI iti mantreNa snAnam ozaDimat jalEH // GarP_1,48.45 //
   yāḥ phalinīti mantreṇa phalasnānaṃ vidhīyate /	yAH PalinI iti mantreNa Pala snAnam viDIyate /
   drupadādiveti mantreṇa kāryamudvartanaṃ budhaiḥ // GarP_1,48.46 //	drupadAt iva iti mantreNa kAryam udvartanam buDEH // GarP_1,48.46 //
   kalaśeṣu ca vinyasya uttarādiṣvanukramāt /	kalaSezu ca vinyasya uttara Adizu anukramAt /
   ratnāni caiva dhānyāni oṣadhīṃ śatapuṣpikām // GarP_1,48.47 //	ratnAni ca eva DAnyAni ozaDIm SatapuzpikAm // GarP_1,48.47 //
   samudrāṃścaiva vinyasya caturaścaturo diśaḥ /	samudrAn= ca eva vinyasya caturaH caturaH diSaH /
   kṣīraṃ dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasyeti vā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.48 //	kzIram daDi kzIrodasya GRta udasya iti vA punar // GarP_1,48.48 //
   āpyāyasva dadhikrāvṇo yā auṣadhīritīti ca /	ApyAyasva daDikrAvNaH yA OzaDIH iti iti ca /
   tejo 'sīti ca mantraiśca kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet // GarP_1,48.49 //	tejaH asi iti ca mantrEH ca kumBam ca eva aBimantrayet // GarP_1,48.49 //
   samudrākhyaiścaturbhiśca snāpayetkalaśaiḥ punaḥ /	samudra AKyEH caturBiH ca snApayet kalaSEH punar /
   snātaścaiva suveṣaśca dhūpo deyaśca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,48.50 //	snAtaH ca eva suvezaH ca DUpaH deyaH ca gugguluH // GarP_1,48.50 //
   abhiṣekāya kumbheṣu tattattīrthāni vinyaset /	aBizekAya kumBezu tad tad tIrTAni vinyaset /
   pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāstathā // GarP_1,48.51 //	pRTivyAm yAni tIrTAni saritaH sAgarAH taTA // GarP_1,48.51 //
   yā oṣadhīti mantreṇa kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet /	yA ozaDI iti mantreNa kumBam ca eva aBimantrayet /
   tena toyena yaḥ snāyātsa mucyetsarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.52 //	tena toyena yaH snAyAt sa mucyet sarva pAtakEH // GarP_1,48.52 //
   abhiṣicya samudraiśca tvarghyaṃ dadyāttataḥ punaḥ /	aBizicya samudrEH ca tu arGyam dadyAt tatas punar /
   gandhadvāreti gandhaṃ ca nyāsaṃ vai vedamantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.53 //	ganDa dvAra iti ganDam ca nyAsam vE veda mantrakEH // GarP_1,48.53 //
   svaśāstravihitaiḥ prāptairyuvaṃvastreti vastrakam /	sva SAstra vihitEH prAptEH yuvaMvastra iti vastrakam /
   kavihāviti mantreṇa ānayenmaṇḍapaṃ śubham // GarP_1,48.54 //	kavi hO= iti mantreNa Anayet maNxapam SuBam // GarP_1,48.54 //
   śambhavāyeti mantreṇa śayyāyāṃ viniveśayet /	SamBavAya iti mantreNa SayyAyAm viniveSayet /
   viśvataścakṣurmantreṇa kuryātsakalaniṣkalam // GarP_1,48.55 //	viSvatas cakzuH mantreNa kuryAt sakala nizkalam // GarP_1,48.55 //
   sthitvā caiva pare tattve mantranyāsaṃ tu kārayet /	sTitvA ca eva pare tattve mantra nyAsam tu kArayet /
   svaśāstravihito mantro nyāsastasmiṃstathoditaḥ // GarP_1,48.56 //	sva SAstra vihitaH mantraH nyAsaH tasmin= taTA uditaH // GarP_1,48.56 //
   vastreṇācchādayitvā tu pūjanīyaḥ svabhāvataḥ /	vastreNa AcCAdayitvA tu pUjanIyaH svaBAvataH /
   yathāśāstraṃ nivedyāni pādamūle tu dāpayet // GarP_1,48.57 //	yaTASAstram nivedyAni pAda mUle tu dApayet // GarP_1,48.57 //
   atha praṇavasaṃyuktaṃ vastrayugmena veṣṭitam /	aTa praNava saMyuktam vastra yugmena vezwitam /
   kalaśaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet // GarP_1,48.58 //	kalaSam sa hiraNyam ca SiraH sTAne nivedayet // GarP_1,48.58 //
   sthitvā kuṇḍasamīpe 'tha agneḥ sthāpanamācaret /	sTitvA kuNxa samIpe aTa agneH sTApanam Acaret /
   svaśāstravihitairmantrairvedoktairvātha vā guruḥ // GarP_1,48.59 //	sva SAstra vihitEH mantrEH veda uktEH vA aTa vA guruH // GarP_1,48.59 //
   śrīsūktaṃ pāvamānyaṃ ca vāsadāmyasavājinam /	SrIsUktam pAvamAnyam ca vAsa dAmyasa vAjinam /
   vṛṣākapiṃ ca mitraṃ bahvacaḥ pūrvato japet // GarP_1,48.60 //	vRzAkapim ca mitram bahvacaH pUrvatas japet // GarP_1,48.60 //
   rudraṃ puruṣasūktaṃ ca ślokādhyāyaṃ ca śukriyam /	rudram puruzasUktam ca Sloka aDyAyam ca Sukriyam /
   brahmāṇaṃ pitṛmaitraṃ ca adhvaryurdakṣiṇe japet // GarP_1,48.61 //	brahmANam pitR mEtram ca aDvaryuH dakziNe japet // GarP_1,48.61 //
   vedavrataṃ vāmadevyaṃ jyeṣṭhasāma rathantaram /	vedavratam vAmadevyam jyezWasAma raTantaram /
   bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet // GarP_1,48.62 //	BeruNxAni ca sAmAni CandogaH paScime japet // GarP_1,48.62 //
   atharvaśirasaṃ caiva kumbhasūktamatharvaṇaḥ /	aTarvaSirasam ca eva kumBasUktam aTarvaNaH /
   nīlarudrāṃśca maitraṃ ca atharvaścottare japet // GarP_1,48.63 //	nIla rudrAn= ca mEtram ca aTarvaH ca uttare japet // GarP_1,48.63 //
   kuṇḍaṃ cāstreṇa saṃprokṣya ācāryastu viśeṣataḥ /	kuNxam ca astreNa saMprokzya AcAryaH tu viSezataH /
   tāmrapātre śarāve vā yathāvibhavato 'pi vā // GarP_1,48.64 //	tAmra pAtre SarAve vA yaTA viBavataH api vA // GarP_1,48.64 //
   jātavedasamānīya agratastaṃ niveśayet /	jAtavedasam AnIya agratas tam niveSayet /
   astreṇa jvālayedvahniṃ kavacena tu veṣṭayet // GarP_1,48.65 //	astreNa jvAlayet vahnim kavacena tu vezwayet // GarP_1,48.65 //
   amṛtīkṛtya taṃ paścānmantraiḥ sarvaiśca deśikaḥ /	amRtIkRtya tam paScAt mantrEH sarvEH ca deSikaH /
   pātraṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ ca kuṇḍaṃ bhrāmya tataḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,48.66 //	pAtram gRhya karAByAm ca kuNxam BrAmya tatas punar // GarP_1,48.66 //
   vaiṣṇavena tu yogena paraṃ tejastu niḥ kṣipet /	vEzNavena tu yogena param tejaH tu niH kzipet /
   dakṣiṇe sthāpayedbrahma praṇītāñcottareṇa tu // GarP_1,48.67 //	dakziNe sTApayet brahma praNItAQca uttareNa tu // GarP_1,48.67 //
   sādhāraṇena mantreṇa svasūtravihitena vā /	sADAraNena mantreNa sva sUtra vihitena vA /
   dikṣudikṣu tato dadyātparidhiṃ viṣṭaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,48.68 //	dikzu dikzu tatas dadyAt pariDim vizwarEH saha // GarP_1,48.68 //
   brahmaviṣṇuhareśānāḥ pūjyāḥ sādhāraṇena tu /	brahma vizNu hara ISAnAH pUjyAH sADAraNena tu /
   darbheṣu sthāpayedvahniṃ darbhaiśca pariveṣṭitam // GarP_1,48.69 //	darBezu sTApayet vahnim darBEH ca parivezwitam // GarP_1,48.69 //
   darbhatoyena saṃspṛṣṭo mantrahīno 'pi śudhyati /	darBa toyena saMspRzwaH mantra hInaH api SuDyati /
   prāgagrairudagagraiśca pratyagagrairakhaṇḍitaiḥ // GarP_1,48.70 //	prAc agrEH udak agrEH ca pratyak agrEH aKaNxitEH // GarP_1,48.70 //
   vitatairveṣṭito vahniḥ svayaṃ sānnidhyamāvrajet /	vitatEH vezwitaH vahniH svayam sAnniDyam Avrajet /
   agnestu rakṣaṇārthāya yaduktaṃ karma ntravit // GarP_1,48.71 //	agneH tu rakzaNa arTAya yat uktam karma ntra vid // GarP_1,48.71 //
   ācāryāḥ kecidicchanti jātakarmādyanantaram /	AcAryAH kecid icCanti jAtakarma Adi anantaram /
   pavitraṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtim // GarP_1,48.72 //	pavitram tu tatas kRtvA kuryAt Ajyasya saMskRtim // GarP_1,48.72 //
   ācāryo 'tha nirīkṣyāpi nīrājyamabhimantritam /	AcAryaH aTa nirIkzya api nIrAjyam aBimantritam /
   ājyabhāgābhighārāntamavekṣetājyasiddhaye // GarP_1,48.73 //	Ajya BAga aBiGAra antam avekzeta Ajya sidDaye // GarP_1,48.73 //
   pañcapañcāhutīrhutvā ājyena tadanantaram /	paQca paQca AhutIH hutvA Ajyena tad anantaram /
   garbhādhānāditastāvadyāvadgaudānikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,48.74 //	garBADAna AditaH tAvat yAvat gOdAnikam Bavet // GarP_1,48.74 //
   svaśāstravihitairmantraiḥ praṇavenātha homayet /	sva SAstra vihitEH mantrEH praNavena aTa homayet /
   tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā pūrṇātpūrṇamanārethaḥ // GarP_1,48.75 //	tatas pUrNAhutim dattvA pUrNAt pUrNam anAreTaH // GarP_1,48.75 //
   evamutpādito vahniḥ sarvakarmasu siddhidaḥ /	evam utpAditaH vahniH sarva karmasu sidDi daH /
   pūjayitvā tato vahniṃ kuṇḍeṣu viharettathā // GarP_1,48.76 //	pUjayitvA tatas vahnim kuNxezu viharet taTA // GarP_1,48.76 //
   indrādīnāṃ svamantraiśca tathāhutiśataṃśatam /	indra AdInAm sva mantrEH ca taTA Ahuti SataMSatam /
   purṇāhutiṃ śatasyānte sarveṣāṃ caiva homayet // GarP_1,48.77 //	purNa Ahutim Satasya ante sarvezAm ca eva homayet // GarP_1,48.77 //
   svāmāhutimathājyeṣu hotā tatkalaśe nyaset /	svAm a Ahutim aTa Ajyezu hotA tad kalaSe nyaset /
   devatāścaiva mantrāṃśca tathaiva jātavedasam // GarP_1,48.78 //	devatAH ca eva mantrAn= ca taTA eva jAtavedasam // GarP_1,48.78 //
   ātmānamekataḥ kṛtvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet /	AtmAnam ekatas kRtvA tatas pUrNAm pradApayet /
   niṣkṛṣya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.79 //	nizkRzya bahis AcAryaH dikpAlAnAm balim haret // GarP_1,48.79 //
   bhūtānāṃ caiva devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ca prayogataḥ /	BUtAnAm ca eva devAnAm nAgAnAm ca prayogataH /
   tilāśca samidhaścaiva homadravyaṃ dvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,48.80 //	tilAH ca samiDaH ca eva homa dravyam dvayam smRtam // GarP_1,48.80 //
   ājyaṃ tayoḥ sahakāri tatpradhānaṃ yadaṅka(kṣa)yoḥ /	Ajyam tayoH sahakAri tad praDAnam yat aFka (kza)yoH /
   paruṣasuktaṃ pūrveṇaiva rudracaiva tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.81 //	paruza suktam pUrveNa eva rudra ca eva tu dakziNe // GarP_1,48.81 //
   jyeṣṭhasāma ca bhāruṇḍaṃ tannayāmīti paścime /	jyezWasAma ca BAruNxam tat nayAmi iti paScime /
   nīlarudro mahāmantraḥ kumbhasūktamatharvaṇaḥ // GarP_1,48.82 //	nIla rudraH mahA mantraH kumBasUktam aTarvaNaH // GarP_1,48.82 //
   hutvā sahasramekaikaṃ devaṃ śirasi kalpayet /	hutvA sahasram ekEkam devam Sirasi kalpayet /
   evaṃ madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.83 //	evam maDye taTA pAde pUrNAhutyA taTA punar // GarP_1,48.83 //
   śiraḥ sthāneṣu juhuyādāviśeccāpyanukramāt /	SiraH sTAnezu juhuyAt AviSet ca api anukramAt /
   vedānāmādimantrairvā mantrairvā devanāmabhiḥ // GarP_1,48.84 //	vedAnAm Adi mantrEH vA mantrEH vA deva nAmaBiH // GarP_1,48.84 //
   svaśāstravihitairvāpi gāyattryā vātha te dvijāḥ /	sva SAstra vihitEH vA api gAyattryA vA aTa te dvijAH /
   gāyattryā vāthavācāryo vyāhṛtipraṇavena tu // GarP_1,48.85 //	gAyattryA vA aTavA AcAryaH vyAhRti praNavena tu // GarP_1,48.85 //
   evaṃ homavidhiṃ kṛtvā nyasenmantrāṃstu deśikaḥ /	evam homa viDim kRtvA nyaset mantrAn= tu deSikaH /
   caraṇāvagnimīḷe tu iṣetvo gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,48.86 //	caraNO= agnimI?e tu izetvaH gulPayoH sTitAH // GarP_1,48.86 //
   agna āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevīti jānunī /	agne AyAhi jaFGe dve Sanna udevI iti jAnunI /
   bṛhadrathantare ūrū udareṣvātilo (svātino) nyaset // GarP_1,48.87 //	bRhat raTantare UrU udarezu AtilaH (svAtino) nyaset // GarP_1,48.87 //
   dīrghāyuṣṭvāya hṛdaye śrīścate galake nyaset /	dIrGa AyuzwvAya hRdaye SrIH cate galake nyaset /
   trātāramindramurasi netrābhyāṃ tu triyambakam // GarP_1,48.88 //	trAtAram indram urasi netrAByAm tu triyambakam // GarP_1,48.88 //
   mūrdhābhava tathā mūrdhni ālagnāddhomamācaret /	mUrDA aBava taTA mUrDni AlagnAt homam Acaret /
   utthā payettato devamuttiṣṭhabrahmaṇaspate ! // GarP_1,48.89 //	utTA payet tatas devam uttizWa brahmaNaspate ! // GarP_1,48.89 //
   vedapuṇyāhaśabdena prāsādānāṃ pradakṣiṇam /	veda puNya aha Sabdena prAsAdAnAm pradakziNam /
   piṇḍikālaṃbhanaṃ kṛtvā devasyatveti mantravit // GarP_1,48.90 //	piNxikA laMBanam kRtvA devasyatvA iti mantra vid // GarP_1,48.90 //
   dikpā lānsaha ratnaiśca dhātūnoṣadhayastathā /	dikpAH lAn saha ratnEH ca DAtUn ozaDayaH taTA /
   lauhabījāni siddhāni paścāddevaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,48.91 //	lOha bIjAni sidDAni paScAt devam tu vinyaset // GarP_1,48.91 //
   na garbhe sthāpayeddevaṃ na garbhaṃ tu parityajet /	na garBe sTApayet devam na garBam tu parityajet /
   īṣanmadhyaṃ parityajya tato doṣāpahaṃ tu tat // GarP_1,48.92 //	Izat maDyam parityajya tatas doza apaham tu tat // GarP_1,48.92 //
   tilasya tuṣamātraṃ tu uttaraṃ kiñcidānayet /	tilasya tuza mAtram tu uttaram kiQcid Anayet /
   oṃ sthiro bhava śivo bhava prajābhyaśca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,48.93 //	om sTiraH Bava SivaH Bava prajAByaH ca namaH namaH // GarP_1,48.93 //
   devasya tvā saviturvaḥ ṣaḍbhyo vai vinyasedguruḥ /	devasya tvA savituH vaH zaxByaH vE vinyaset guruH /
   tattvavarṇakalāmātraṃ prajāni bhuvanātmaje // GarP_1,48.94 //	tattva varNa kalA mAtram prajAni Buvana Atmaje // GarP_1,48.94 //
   ṣaḍbhyo vinyasya siddhārthaṃ dhruvārthairabhimantrayet /	zaxByaH vinyasya sidDArTam Druva arTEH aBimantrayet /
   sampātakalaśenaiva snāpayetsupratiṣṭhitam // GarP_1,48.95 //	sampAta kalaSena eva snApayet su pratizWitam // GarP_1,48.95 //
   dīpadhūpasugandhaiśca naivedyaiśca prapūjayet /	dIpa DUpa suganDEH ca nEvedyEH ca prapUjayet /
   arghyaṃ dattvā namaskṛtya tato devaṃ kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,48.96 //	arGyam dattvA namaskRtya tatas devam kzamApayet // GarP_1,48.96 //
   pātraṃ vastrayugaṃ chatraṃ tathā divyāṅgulīyakam /	pAtram vastra yugam Catram taTA divya aFgulIyakam /
   ṛttvigbhyaśca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā caiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,48.97 //	RttvigByaH ca pradAtavyA dakziNA ca eva Saktitas // GarP_1,48.97 //
   caturthau juhuyātpaścādyajamānaḥ samāhitaḥ /	caturTO juhuyAt paScAt yajamAnaH samAhitaH /
   āhutīnāṃ śataṃ hutvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet // GarP_1,48.98 //	AhutInAm Satam hutvA tatas pUrNAm pradApayet // GarP_1,48.98 //
   niṣkramya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret /	nizkramya bahis AcAryaH dikpAlAnAm balim haret /
   ācāryaḥ puṣpahastastu kṣamasveti visarjayet // GarP_1,48.99 //	AcAryaH puzpa hastaH tu kzamasva iti visarjayet // GarP_1,48.99 //
   yāgānte kapilāṃ dadyādācāryāya ca cāmaram /	yAga ante kapilAm dadyAt AcAryAya ca cAmaram /
   mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ chatraṃ keyūraṃ kaṭisūtrakam // GarP_1,48.100 //	mukuwam kuNxalam Catram keyUram kawi sUtrakam // GarP_1,48.100 //
   vyajanaṃ grāmavastrādīnsopaskāraṃ sumaṇḍapam /	vyajanam grAma vastra AdIn sa upaskAram su maNxapam /
   bhojanaṃ ca mahātkuryātkṛtakṛtyaśca jāyate /	Bojanam ca mahAt kuryAt kRtakRtyaH ca jAyate /
   yajamāno vimuktaḥ syātsthāpakasya prasādataḥ // GarP_1,48.101 //	yajamAnaH vimuktaH syAt sTApakasya prasAdataH // GarP_1,48.101 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ	devapratizWAdinirUpaNam nAma azwacatvAriMSaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  49	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 49
   iti pratiṣṭhāprakaraṇaṃ samāptam /	iti pratizWA prakaraNam samAptam /
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   sargādikṛddhariścaiva pūjyaḥ svāyambhuvādibhiḥ /	sarga Adi kRt hariH ca eva pUjyaH svAyamBuva AdiBiH /
   viprādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa taddharmaṃ vyāsa ! vai śṛṇu // GarP_1,49.1 //	vipra AdyEH svena DarmeNa tad Darmam vyAsa ! vE SRNu // GarP_1,49.1 //
   yajanaṃ yājanaṃ dānaṃ brāhmaṇasya pratigrahaḥ /	yajanam yAjanam dAnam brAhmaNasya pratigrahaH /
   adhyāpanaṃ cādhyayanaṃ ṣaṭ karmāṇidvijottame // GarP_1,49.2 //	aDyApanam ca aDyayanam zax karmANi dvijottame // GarP_1,49.2 //
   dānamadhyayanaṃ yajño dharmaḥ kṣattriyavaiśyayoḥ /	dAnam aDyayanam yajQaH DarmaH kzattriya vESyayoH /
   daṇḍastasya kṛṣirvaiśyasya śasyate // GarP_1,49.3 //	daNxaH tasya kRziH vESyasya Sasyate // GarP_1,49.3 //
   śuśrūṣaiva dvijātīnāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ dharmasādhanam /	SuSrUzA eva dvijAtInAm SUdrANAm Darma sADanam /
   kārukarma tathā'jīvo pākayajño 'pi dharmataḥ // GarP_1,49.4 //	kAru karma taTA ajIvaH pAkayajQaH api DarmataH // GarP_1,49.4 //
   bhikṣācaryātha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāya eva ca /	BikzA caryA aTa SuSrUzA guroH svADyAyaH eva ca /
   sandhyākarmāgnikāryañca dharmo 'yaṃ brahmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,49.5 //	sanDyA karma agnikAryaQca DarmaH ayam brahmacAriNaH // GarP_1,49.5 //
   sarveṣāmāśramāṇāṃ ca dvaividhyaṃ tu caturvidham /	sarvezAm ASramANAm ca dvEviDyam tu caturviDam /
   brahmacāryupakurvāṇo naiṣṭhiko brahmatatparaḥ // GarP_1,49.6 //	brahmacArI upakurvANaH nEzWikaH brahma tatparaH // GarP_1,49.6 //
   yo 'dhītya vidhivadvedān gṛhasthāśramamāvrajet /	yaH aDItya viDivat vedAn gRhasTa ASramam Avrajet /
   upakurvāṇako jñeyo naiṣṭhiko maraṇāntikaḥ // GarP_1,49.7 //	upakurvANakaH jQeyaH nEzWikaH maraNa antikaH // GarP_1,49.7 //
   agnayo 'tithiśuśrūṣā yajño dānaṃ surārcanam /	agnayaH atiTi SuSrUzA yajQaH dAnam sura arcanam /
   gṛhasthasya samāsena dharmo 'yaṃ dvijasattama ! // GarP_1,49.8 //	gRhasTasya samAsena DarmaH ayam dvijasattamaH ! // GarP_1,49.8 //
   udāsīnaḥ sādhakaśca gṛhastho dvividho bhavet /	udAsInaH sADakaH ca gRhasTaH dviviDaH Bavet /
   kuṭumbabharaṇe yuktaḥ sādhako 'sau gṛhī bhavet // GarP_1,49.9 //	kuwumba BaraNe yuktaH sADakaH asO gRhI Bavet // GarP_1,49.9 //
   ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya tyaktvā bhāryādhanādikam /	RNAni trINi apAkRtya tyaktvA BAryA Dana Adikam /
   ekākī yastu vicaredudāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ // GarP_1,49.10 //	ekAkI yaH tu vicaret udAsInaH sa mOkzikaH // GarP_1,49.10 //
   bhūmau mūlaphalāśitvaṃ svādhyāyastapa eva ca /	BUmO mUla Pala ASi tvam svADyAyaH tapaH eva ca /
   saṃvibhāgo yathānyāyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vanavāsinaḥ // GarP_1,49.11 //	saMviBAgaH yaTAnyAyam DarmaH ayam vana vAsinaH // GarP_1,49.11 //
   tapastapyati yo 'raṇye yajeddevāñjuhoti ca /	tapaH tapyati yaH araNye yajet devAn juhoti ca /
   svādhyāye caiva nirato vanasthastāpasottamaḥ // GarP_1,49.12 //	svADyAye ca eva nirataH vanasTaH tApasa uttamaH // GarP_1,49.12 //
   tapasā karśito 'tyarthaṃ yastu dhyānaparo bhavet /	tapasA karSitaH atyarTam yaH tu DyAna paraH Bavet /
   sanyāsī sa hi vijñeyo vānaprasthāśrame sthitaḥ // GarP_1,49.13 //	sanyAsI sa hi vijQeyaH vAnaprasTa ASrame sTitaH // GarP_1,49.13 //
   yogābhyāsarato nityamārurukṣurjitendriyaḥ /	yoga aByAsa rataH nityam ArurukzuH jita indriyaH /
   jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ // GarP_1,49.14 //	jQAnAya vartate BukzuH procyate pAramezWikaH // GarP_1,49.14 //
   yastvātmaratireva syānnityatṛpto mahāmuniḥ /	yaH tu Atma ratiH eva syAt nitya tRptaH mahA muniH /
   samyak ca damasampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣurucyate // GarP_1,49.15 //	samyak ca dama sampannaH sa yogI BikzuH ucyate // GarP_1,49.15 //
   bhaikṣyaṃ śrutaṃ ca maunitvaṃ tapo dhyānaṃ viśeṣataḥ /	BEkzyam Srutam ca mOni tvam tapaH DyAnam viSezataH /
   samyak ca jñānavairāgyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ bhikṣuke mataḥ // GarP_1,49.16 //	samyak ca jQAna vErAgyam DarmaH ayam Bikzuke mataH // GarP_1,49.16 //
   jñānasanyāsinaḥ kecidvedasanyāsino 'pare /	jQAna sanyAsinaH kecid veda sanyAsinaH apare /
   karmasanyāsinaḥ kecittrividhaḥ pārameṣṭhikaḥ // GarP_1,49.17 //	karma sanyAsinaH kecid triviDaH pAramezWikaH // GarP_1,49.17 //
   yogī ca trividho jñeyo bhautikaḥ kṣattra evaca /	yogI ca triviDaH jQeyaH BOtikaH kzattre eva ca /
   tṛtīyo 'ntyāśramī prokto yogamūrtiṃsamāsthitaḥ // GarP_1,49.18 //	tRtIyaH antya ASramI proktaH yoga mUrtiMsam AsTitaH // GarP_1,49.18 //
   prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa(duṣka) rabhāvanā /	praTamA BAvanA pUrve mokze tu akza(duzka) raBAvanAH /
   tṛtīye cāntimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī // GarP_1,49.19 //	tRtIye ca antimA proktA BAvanA pArameSvarI // GarP_1,49.19 //
   dharmātsaṃjāyate mokṣo hyarthātkāmo 'bhijāyate /	DarmAt saMjAyate mokzaH hi arTAt kAmaH aBijAyate /
   pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // GarP_1,49.20 //	pravRttiH ca nivRttiH ca dviviDam karma vEdikam // GarP_1,49.20 //
   jñānaṃ pūrvaṃ nivṛttaṃ syātpravṛttaṃ cāgnidevakṛt /	jQAnam pUrvam nivRttam syAt pravRttam ca agni deva kRt /
   kṣamā damo dayā dānamalobhā (bho) bhyāsa eva ca // GarP_1,49.21 //	kzamA damaH dayA dAnam aloBA (Bo) ByAsaH eva ca // GarP_1,49.21 //
   ārjavaṃ cānsūyā ca tīrthānusaraṇaṃ tathā /	Arjavam ca an sUyA ca tIrTa anusaraNam taTA /
   satyaṃ saṃtoṣa āstikyaṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.22 //	satyam saMtozaH Astikyam taTA ca indriya nigrahaH // GarP_1,49.22 //
   devatābhyarcanaṃ pūjā brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣataḥ /	devatA aByarcanam pUjA brAhmaNAnAm viSezataH /
   ahiṃsā priyavāditvamapaiśunyamarūkṣatā // GarP_1,49.23 //	ahiMsA priya vAdi tvam apESunyam arUkzatA // GarP_1,49.23 //
   ete āśramikā dharmāścaturvarṇyaṃ bavīmyataḥ /	ete ASramikAH DarmAH catur varNyam bavImyatas /
   prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // GarP_1,49.24 //	prAjApatyam brAhmaNAnAm smRtam sTAnam kriyAvatAm // GarP_1,49.24 //
   sthānamaindraṃ kṣattriyāṇāṃ saṃgrāmeṣvapalāyinām /	sTAnam Endram kzattriyANAm saMgrAmezu apalAyinAm /
   vaiśyānāṃ mārutaṃ sthānaṃ svadharamamanuvartatām // GarP_1,49.25 //	vESyAnAm mArutam sTAnam svaDaramam anuvartatAm // GarP_1,49.25 //
   gāndharvaṃ śūdrajātīnāṃ paricāre ca vartatām /	gAnDarvam SUdra jAtInAm paricAre ca vartatAm /
   aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇāmṛṣīṇāmūrdhvaretasām // GarP_1,49.26 //	azwASIti sahasrANAm RzINAm UrDvaretasAm // GarP_1,49.26 //
   smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva vana (guru) vāsinām /	smRtam tezAm tu yat sTAnam tat eva vanaH (guru) vAsinAm /
   saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ sthānaṃ tadvai vanaukasām // GarP_1,49.27 //	saptarzINAm tu yat sTAnam sTAnam tat vE vanOkasAm // GarP_1,49.27 //
   yatīnāṃ yatacittānāṃ nyāsināmūrdhvaretasām /	yatInAm yata cittAnAm nyAsinAm UrDvaretasAm /
   ānandaṃ brahma tatsthānaṃ yasmānnāvartate muniḥ // GarP_1,49.28 //	Anandam brahma tat sTAnam yasmAt na Avartate muniH // GarP_1,49.28 //
   yogināmamṛtasthānaṃ vyomākhyaṃ paramākṣaram /	yoginAm amRta sTAnam vyoma AKyam parama akzaram /
   ānandamaiśvaraṃ yasmānmukto nāvartate naraḥ // GarP_1,49.29 //	Anandam ESvaram yasmAt muktaH na Avartate naraH // GarP_1,49.29 //
   muktiraṣṭāṅgavijñānātsaṃkṣepāttadvade śṛṇu /	muktiH azwa aFga vijQAnAt saMkzepAt tadvade SRNu /
   yamāḥ pañca tvahiṃsādyā ahiṃsā prāṇyahiṃsanam // GarP_1,49.30 //	yamAH paQca tu ahiMsA AdyAH ahiMsA prANi ahiMsanam // GarP_1,49.30 //
   satyaṃ bhūtahitaṃ vākyamasteyaṃ svāgrahaṃ param /	satyam BUta hitam vAkyam asteyam svAgraham param /
   amaithunaṃ brahmacaryaṃ sarvatyāgo 'parigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.31 //	amETunam brahmacaryam sarva tyAgaH aparigrahaH // GarP_1,49.31 //
   niyamāḥ pañca satyādyā bāhmamābhyantaraṃ dvidhā /	niyamAH paQca satya AdyAH bAhmam AByantaram dviDA /
   śaucaṃ tuṣṭiśca santoṣastapaścondriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.32 //	SOcam tuzwiH ca santozaH tapaH ca undriya nigrahaH // GarP_1,49.32 //
   svādhyāyaḥ syānmantrajāpaḥ praṇidhānaṃ hareryajiḥ /	svADyAyaH syAt mantra jApaH praNiDAnam hareH yajiH /
   āsanaṃ padmakādyuktaṃ prāṇāyāmo marujjayaḥ // GarP_1,49.33 //	Asanam padmaka Adi uktam prANAyAmaH marut jayaH // GarP_1,49.33 //
   mantradhyāna to garbho viparīto hyagarbhakaḥ /	mantraDyAna taH garBaH viparItaH hi agarBakaH /
   evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpyuktaṃ puraṇātpūrakaḥ sa ca // GarP_1,49.34 //	evam dviDA triDA api uktam puraNAt pUrakaH sa ca // GarP_1,49.34 //
   kumbhako niścalatvācca recanādrecakastridhā /	kumBakaH niScala tvAt ca recanAt recakaH triDA /
   laghurdvādaśamātraḥ syāccaturviṃśatikaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,49.35 //	laGuH dvAdaSa mAtraH syAt caturviMSatikaH paraH // GarP_1,49.35 //
   ṣaṭtriṃśanmātrikaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pratyāhāraśca rodhanam /	zawtriMSat mAtrikaH SrezWaH pratyAhAraH ca roDanam /
   brahmātmacintā dhyānaṃ syāddhāraṇā manaso dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,49.36 //	brahma Atma cintA DyAnam syAt DAraNA manasaH DRtiH // GarP_1,49.36 //
   ahaṃ brahmetyavasthānaṃ samādhirbrahmaṇaḥ sthitiḥ /	aham brahma iti avasTAnam samADiH brahmaNaH sTitiH /
   ahamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakam // GarP_1,49.37 //	aham AtmA param brahma satyam jQAnam anantakam // GarP_1,49.37 //
   brahma vijñānamānandaḥ sa tattvamasi kevalam /	brahma vijQAnam AnandaH sa tat tvam asi kevalam /
   ahaṃ brahmāsmyahaṃ brahma aśarīramānindriyam // GarP_1,49.38 //	aham brahma asmi aham brahma aSarIram An indriyam // GarP_1,49.38 //
   ahaṃmanobuddhimahadahaṅkārādivarjitam /	ahaMmanaH budDi mahat ahaFkAra Adi varjitam /
   jāgratsvapnasuṣuptyādiyuktajyotistadīyakam // GarP_1,49.39 //	jAgrat svapna suzupti Adi yukta jyotiH tadIyakam // GarP_1,49.39 //
   nityaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhamuktaṃ satyamānandamadvayam /	nityam SudDam budDamuktam satyam Anandam advayam /
   yo 'sāvādityapuruṣaḥ so 'sāvahamakhaṇḍitam /	yaH asO= Aditya puruzaH saH asO= aham aKaNxitam /
   iti dhyāyanvimucyet brāhmaṇo bhavabandhanāt // GarP_1,49.40 //	iti DyAyan vimucyet brAhmaNaH Bava banDanAt // GarP_1,49.40 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ	varNASramaDarmanirUpaNam nAma ekonapaQcASat tamaH DyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  50	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 50
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   ahanyahani yaḥ kuryātkriyāṃ sa jñānamāpnuyāt /	ahani ahani yaH kuryAt kriyAm sa jQAnam ApnuyAt /
   brāhme muhūrte cotthāya dharmamarthaṃ ca cintayet // GarP_1,50.1 //	brAhme muhUrte ca utTAya Darmam arTam ca cintayet // GarP_1,50.1 //
   cintayeddhṛdi padmasthamānandamajaraṃ harim /	cintayet hRdi padma sTam Anandam ajaram harim /
   uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // GarP_1,50.2 //	uzaH kAle tu saMprApte kRtvA ca AvaSyakam buDaH // GarP_1,50.2 //
   strāyānnadīṣu śuddhāsu śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi /	strAyAt nadIzu SudDAsu SOcam kRtvA yaTAviDi /
   prataḥ snānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto janāḥ // GarP_1,50.3 //	pratas snAnena pUyante ye api pApa kRtaH janAH // GarP_1,50.3 //
   tasmātsarvaprayatnena prātaḥ snānaṃ samācaret /	tasmAt sarva prayatnena prAtar snAnam samAcaret /
   prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṣṭakaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,50.4 //	prAtar snAnam praSaMsanti dRzwa adRzwazwa karam hi tat // GarP_1,50.4 //
   sukhātsuptasya satataṃ lālādyāḥ saṃstravanti hi /	suKAt suptasya satatam lAlA AdyAH saMstravanti hi /
   ato naivācaretkarmāṇyakṛtvā snānamāditaḥ // GarP_1,50.5 //	atas na eva Acaret karmANi akRtvA snAnam Aditas // GarP_1,50.5 //
   alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca duḥ svapnaṃ durvicintitam /	alakzmIH kAlakarNaH ca duH svapnam durvicintitam /
   prataḥ snānena pāpāni dhūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,50.6 //	pratas snAnena pApAni DUyante na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,50.6 //
   na ca snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ prāśastyaṃ karma saṃsmṛtam /	na ca snAnam vinA puMsAm prASastyam karma saMsmRtam /
   home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,50.7 //	home japye viSezeNa tasmAt snAnam samAcaret // GarP_1,50.7 //
   aśaktāvaśiraskaṃ tu snānamasya vidhīyate /	aSaktO= aSiraskam tu snAnam asya viDIyate /
   ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi mārjanaṃ kāyikaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,50.8 //	ArdreNa vAsasA vA api mArjanam kAyikam smRtam // GarP_1,50.8 //
   brāhmamāgneyamuddiṣṭaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyameva ca /	brAhmam Agneyam uddizwam vAyavyam divyam eva ca /
   vāruṇaṃ yaugikaṃ tadvatṣaḍaṅgaṃ snānamācaret // GarP_1,50.9 //	vAruNam yOgikam tadvat zaz aFgam snAnam Acaret // GarP_1,50.9 //
   brāhmaṃ tu mārjanaṃ mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhiḥ /	brAhmam tu mArjanam mantrEH kuSEH sa udaka binduBiH /
   āgreyaṃ bhasmanā'pādamastakāddehadhūnanam // GarP_1,50.10 //	Agreyam BasmanA apAda mastakAt deha DUnanam // GarP_1,50.10 //
   gavāṃ hi rajasā proktaṃ vāyavyaṃ snānamuttamam /	gavAm hi rajasA proktam vAyavyam snAnam uttamam /
   yattu sātapavarṣeṇa snānaṃ taddivyamucyate // GarP_1,50.11 //	yat tu sa Atapa varzeNa snAnam tat divyam ucyate // GarP_1,50.11 //
   vāruṇaṃ cāvagāhaṃ ca mānarsa tvātmavedanam /	vAruNam ca avagAham ca mAnarsa tu Atma vedanam /
   yaugikaṃ snānamākhyātaṃ yogena haricintanam // GarP_1,50.12 //	yOgikam snAnam AKyAtam yogena hari cintanam // GarP_1,50.12 //
   ātmatīrthamiti khyātaṃ sevitaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ /	AtmatIrTam iti KyAtam sevitam brahma vAdiBiH /
   kṣīravṛkṣasamudbhūtaṃ mālatīsambhavaṃ śubham // GarP_1,50.13 //	kzIravRkza samudBUtam mAlatI samBavam SuBam // GarP_1,50.13 //
   apāmārgaṃ ca vilvaṃ ca karavīraṃ ca dhāvane /	apAmArgam ca vilvam ca karavIram ca DAvane /
   udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vā bhakṣayeddantadhāvanam // GarP_1,50.14 //	udaFmuKaH prAFmuKaH vA Bakzayet dantaDAvanam // GarP_1,50.14 //
   prakṣālya bhuktvā tajjahyācchucau deśe samāhitaḥ /	prakzAlya BuktvA tat jahyAt SucO deSe samAhitaH /
   snātvā santarpayeddevānṛṣīnpitṛgaṇāṃstathā // GarP_1,50.15 //	snAtvA santarpayet devAn RzIn pitR gaNAn= taTA // GarP_1,50.15 //
   ācamya vidhivannityaṃ punarācamya vāgyataḥ /	Acamya viDivat nityam punar Acamya vAgyataH /
   saṃmārjya mantrai rātmānaṃ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhaiḥ // GarP_1,50.16 //	saMmArjya mantrEH rA AtmAnam kuSEH sa udaka bindu BEH // GarP_1,50.16 //
   āpohiṣṭhāvyāhṛtibhiḥ sāvitryā vāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ /	ApohizWA vyAhRtiBiH sAvitryAH vAruNEH SuBEH /
   oṅkāravyāhṛtiyutāṃ gāyattrīṃ vedamātaram // GarP_1,50.17 //	oFkAra vyAhRti yutAm gAyattrIm vedamAtaram // GarP_1,50.17 //
   japtvā jalāñjaliṃ dadyādbhāraskaraṃ prati tanmanāḥ /	japtvA jala aQjalim dadyAt BAraskaram prati tad manAH /
   prākkūleṣu tataḥ sthitvā darbheṣu susamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.18 //	prAc kUlezu tatas sTitvA darBezu su samAhitaH // GarP_1,50.18 //
   prāṇāyāmaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā dhyāyetsandhyāmiti śrutiḥ /	prANAyAmam tatas kRtvA DyAyet sanDyAm iti SrutiH /
   yā sandhyā sā jagatsūtirmāyātītā hi niṣkalā // GarP_1,50.19 //	yA sanDyA sA jagat sUtiH mAyA atItAH hi nizkalAH // GarP_1,50.19 //
   aiśvarī kevalā śaktistattvatrayasamudbhavā /	ESvarI kevalA SaktiH tattva traya samudBavA /
   dhyātvā raktāṃ sitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ gāyattrīṃ vai japedvudhaḥ // GarP_1,50.20 //	DyAtvA raktAm sitAm kRzNAm gAyattrIm vE japet vuDaH // GarP_1,50.20 //
   prāṅmukhaḥ satataṃ vipraḥ sandhyopāsanamācaret /	prAFmuKaH satatam vipraH sanDyA upAsanam Acaret /
   sandhyāhīno 'śucirnityamanarhaḥ sarvakarmasu // GarP_1,50.21 //	sanDyA hInaH aSuciH nityam anarhaH sarva karmasu // GarP_1,50.21 //
   yadanyatkurute kiñcinna tasya phalabhāgbhavet /	yat anyat kurute kiQcid na tasya Pala BAj Bavet /
   ananyacetasaḥ santo brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ // GarP_1,50.22 //	ananya cetasaH santaH brAhmaNAH vedapAragAH // GarP_1,50.22 //
   upāsya vidhivatsandhyāṃ prāptāḥ pūrvaparāṃ gatim /	upAsya viDivat sanDyAm prAptAH pUrva parAm gatim /
   yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.23 //	yaH anyatra kurute yatnam Darma kArye dvijottamaH // GarP_1,50.23 //
   vihāya sandhyāpraṇatiṃ sa yāti narakāyutam /	vihAya sanDyA praNatim sa yAti naraka ayutam /
   tasmātsarvaprayatnena sandhyopāsanamācaret // GarP_1,50.24 //	tasmAt sarva prayatnena sanDyA upAsanam Acaret // GarP_1,50.24 //
   upāsito bhavettena devo yogatanuḥ paraḥ /	upAsitaH Bavet tena devaH yoga tanuH paraH /
   sahasraparamāṃ nityāṃ śatamadhyāṃ daśāvarām // GarP_1,50.25 //	sahasra paramAm nityAm Sata maDyAm daSa avarAm // GarP_1,50.25 //
   gāyattrīṃ vai japedvidvānprāṅmukhaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ /	gAyattrIm vE japet vidvAn prAFmuKaH prayataH SuciH /
   athopatiṣṭhedādityamudayasthaṃ samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.26 //	aTa upatizWet Adityam udaya sTam samAhitaH // GarP_1,50.26 //
   mantraistu vividhaiḥ sauraiḥ ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃjñitaiḥ /	mantrEH tu viviDEH sOrEH Rc yajuH sAma saMjQitEH /
   upasthāya mahāyogaṃ devadevaṃ divākaram // GarP_1,50.27 //	upasTAya mahA yogam devadevam divAkaram // GarP_1,50.27 //
   kurvīta praṇatiṃ bhūmau mūrdhānamabhimantritaḥ /	kurvIta praNatim BUmO mUrDAnam aBimantritaH /
   oṃ khakholkāya śāntāya kāraṇatrayahetave // GarP_1,50.28 //	om KaKolkAya SAntAya kAraNa traya hetave // GarP_1,50.28 //
   nivedayāmi cātmānaṃ namaste jñānarūpiṇe /	nivedayAmi ca AtmAnam namaH te jQAna rUpiNe /
   tvameva brahma paramamāpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam // GarP_1,50.29 //	tvam eva brahma paramam ApaH jyotiH rasaH amRtam // GarP_1,50.29 //
   bhūrbhuvaḥ svastvamoṅkāraḥ sarvo rudraḥ sanātanaḥ /	BUH BuvaH svar tvam oFkAraH sarvaH rudraH sanAtanaH /
   etadvai sūryahṛdayaṃ japtvā stavanamuttamam // GarP_1,50.30 //	etat vE sUrya hRdayam japtvA stavanam uttamam // GarP_1,50.30 //
   prātaḥ kāle ca madhyāhne namaskuryāddivākaram /	prAtar kAle ca maDyAhne namaskuryAt divAkaram /
   athāgamya gṛhaṃ vipraḥ (paścāt) samācamya yathāvidhi // GarP_1,50.31 //	aTa Agamya gRham vipraH (paH ca at) samAcamya yaTAviDi // GarP_1,50.31 //
   prajvālya vahniṃ vidhivajjuhuyājjātavedasam /	prajvAlya vahnim viDivat juhuyAt jAtavedasam /
   ṛtvik putro 'tha patnī vā śiṣyo vāpi sahodaraḥ // GarP_1,50.32 //	Rtvij putraH aTa patnI vA SizyaH vA api sahodaraH // GarP_1,50.32 //
   prāpyānujñāṃ viśeṣeṇa juhuyādvā yathāvidhi /	prApya anujQAm viSezeNa juhuyAt vA yaTAviDi /
   vinā ma (ta) ntreṇa yatkarma nāmutreha phalapradam // GarP_1,50.33 //	vinA me (ta) ntreNa yat karma na amutra iha Pala pradam // GarP_1,50.33 //
   daivatāni namaskuryādupahārānnivedayet /	dEvatAni namaskuryAt upahArAn nivedayet /
   guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta hitaṃ cāsya samācaret // GarP_1,50.34 //	gurum ca eva api upAsIta hitam ca asya samAcaret // GarP_1,50.34 //
   vedābhyāsaṃ tataḥ kuryātprayatnācchaktito dvijaḥ /	veda aByAsam tatas kuryAt prayatnAt Saktitas dvijaH /
   japedvādhyāpayecchiṣyāndhārayedvai vicārayet // GarP_1,50.35 //	japet vA aDyApayet SizyAn DArayet vE vicArayet // GarP_1,50.35 //
   avekṣeta ca śāstrāṇi dharmādīni dvijottamaḥ /	avekzeta ca SAstrANi Darma AdIni dvijottamaH /
   vaidikāṃścaiva nigamānvedāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,50.36 //	vEdikAn= ca eva nigamAn vedAFgAni ca sarvaSas // GarP_1,50.36 //
   upayādīśvaraṃ caiva yogakṣemaprāsiddhaye /	upayAt ISvaram ca eva yogakzema prAsidDaye /
   sādhayedvividhānarthānkuṭumbārthaṃ tato dvijaḥ // GarP_1,50.37 //	sADayet viviDAn arTAn kuwumba arTam tatas dvijaH // GarP_1,50.37 //
   tato madhyāhnasamaye snānārthaṃ mṛdamāharet /	tatas maDyAhna samaye snAna arTam mRdam Aharet /
   puṣpākṣatāṃstilakuśān gomayaṃ śuddhameva ca // GarP_1,50.38 //	puzpa akzatAn= tila kuSAn gomayam SudDam eva ca // GarP_1,50.38 //
   nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca /	nadIzu devaKAtezu taxAgezu saraH su ca /
   snānaṃ samācarennaiva parakīye kadācana // GarP_1,50.39 //	snAnam samAcaret na eva parakIye kadAcana // GarP_1,50.39 //
   pañca piṇḍānanuddhṛtya snānaṃ duṣyanti nityaśaḥ /	paQca piNxAn anudDRtya snAnam duzyanti nityaSas /
   mṛdaikayā śiraḥ kṣālyaṃ dvābhyāṃ nābhestathopari // GarP_1,50.40 //	mRdA ekayA SiraH kzAlyam dvAByAm nABeH taTA upari // GarP_1,50.40 //
   adhaśca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyaṃ pādau ṣaṭbhistathaiva ca /	aDas ca tisRBiH kzAlyam pAdO zawBiH taTA eva ca /
   mṛttikā ca samuddiṣṭā vṛddhāmalakamātnikā // GarP_1,50.41 //	mRttikA ca samuddizwA vRdDa Amalaka mAtnikAH // GarP_1,50.41 //
   gomayasya pramāṇaṃ tu tenāṅgaṃ lepayettataḥ /	gomayasya pramANam tu tena aFgam lepayet tatas /
   prakṣālyācamya vidhivattataḥ snāyātsamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.42 //	prakzAlya Acamya viDivat tatas snAyAt samAhitaH // GarP_1,50.42 //
   lepayitvā tu tīrasthastalliṅgaireva mantrataḥ /	lepayitvA tu tIra sTaH tad liFgEH eva mantrataH /
   abhimantrya jalaṃ mantrairāliṅgairvāruṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ // GarP_1,50.43 //	aBimantrya jalam mantrEH AliFgEH vAruNEH SuBEH // GarP_1,50.43 //
   tnānakāle smaredviṣṇamāpo nārāyaṇo yataḥ /	tnAna kAle smaret vizNamApaH nArAyaNaH yatas /
   prekṣya oṅkāramādityaṃ trirnimajjejjalāśaye // GarP_1,50.44 //	prekzya oFkAram Adityam tris nimajjet jalASaye // GarP_1,50.44 //
   ācāntaḥ punarācāmenmantreṇānena mantravit /	AcAntaH punar AcAmet mantreNa anena mantra vid /

   tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam /	tvam yajQaH tvam vazawkAraH ApaH jyotiH rasaH amRtam /
   drupadāṃ vā trirabhyasyevdyāhṛtipraṇavānvitām // GarP_1,50.46 //	drupadAm vA tris aByasyevdyAhRti praNava anvitAm // GarP_1,50.46 //
   sāvitrīṃ vā jape dvidvāṃstathā caivāghamarṣaṇam /	sAvitrIm vA jape dvi dvAn= taTA ca eva aGamarzaNam /

   idamāpaḥ pravahatavyāhṛtibhistathaiva ca /	idam ApaH pravahata vyAhRtiBiH taTA eva ca /

   antarjalamavāṅmagno japettriraghamarṣaṇam /	antar jalam avAk magnaH japet tris aGamarzaNam /
   drupadāṃ vātha sāvitrariṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,50.49 //	drupadAm vA aTa sAvitrarim tat vizNoH paramam padam // GarP_1,50.49 //
   āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ devadevaṃ ramareddharim /	Avartayet vA praNavam devadevam ramaret harim /
   apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte // GarP_1,50.50 //	apaH pANO samAdAya japtvA vE mArjane kRte // GarP_1,50.50 //
   vinyasya mūrdhni tattoyaṃ mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ /	vinyasya mUrDni tat toyam mucyate sarva pAtakEH /
   sandhyāmupāsya cācamya saṃsmarennityamīśvaram // GarP_1,50.51 //	sanDyAm upAsya ca Acamya saMsmaret nityam ISvaram // GarP_1,50.51 //
   athopatiṣṭhedādityamūrdhvapuṣpānvitāñjalim /	aTa upatizWet Adityam UrDva puzpa anvita aQjalim /
   prakṣipyālokayeddevamudayantaṃ na śakyate // GarP_1,50.52 //	prakzipya Alokayet devam udayantam na Sakyate // GarP_1,50.52 //
   udutyaṃ citramityevaṃ taccakṣuriti mantrataḥ /	udutyam citram iti evam tat cakzuH iti mantrataH /
   haṃsaḥ śuciṣadetena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,50.53 //	haMsaH Sucizad etena sAvitryA ca viSezataH // GarP_1,50.53 //
   anyaiḥ saurairvaidikaiśca gāyattrīṃ ca tato japet /	anyEH sOrEH vEdikEH ca gAyattrIm ca tatas japet /
   mantrāṃśca vividhānpaścātprākkūle ca kaśāsane // GarP_1,50.54 //	mantrAn= ca viviDAn paScAt prAc kUle ca kaSAsane // GarP_1,50.54 //
   tiṣṭhaṃśca vīkṣyamāṇor'kaṃ japaṃ kuryātsamāhitaḥ /	tizWan= ca vIkzyamANoH akam japam kuryAt samAhitaH /
   sphaṭikābjākṣarudrākṣaiḥ putrajīvasamudbhavaiḥ // GarP_1,50.55 //	sPawika abja akza rudrAkzEH putrajIva samudBavEH // GarP_1,50.55 //
   kartavyā tvakṣālā syādantarā tatra sā smṛtā /	kartavyA tu akzAlA syAt antarA tatra sA smRtA /
   yadi syātklinnavāsā vai vārimadhyagataścaret // GarP_1,50.56 //	yadi syAt klinna vAsAH vE vAri maDya gataH caret // GarP_1,50.56 //
   anyathā ca śucau bhūmyāṃ darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ /	anyaTA ca SucO BUmyAm darBezu ca samAhitaH /
   pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tataḥ kṣitau // GarP_1,50.57 //	pradakziNam samAvRtya namaskRtya tatas kzitO // GarP_1,50.57 //
   ācamya ca yathāśāstraṃ śaktyā svādhyāyamācaret /	Acamya ca yaTASAstram SaktyA svADyAyam Acaret /
