   ādāvoṅkāramuccārya namo 'nte tarpayāmi ca /	AdO= oFkAram uccArya namaH ante tarpayAmi ca /
   devānbrahmaṛṣīṃścaiva tarpayedakṣatodakaiḥ // GarP_1,50.59 //	devAn brahma RzIn= ca eva tarpayet akzata udakEH // GarP_1,50.59 //
   pitṝndevānmunīn bhaktyā svasūtroktavidhānataḥ // GarP_1,50.60 //	pitLn devAn munIn BaktyA sva sUtra ukta viDAnataH // GarP_1,50.60 //
   devarṣoṃstarpayeddhīmānudakāñjalibhiḥ pitṝt /	devarzon= tarpayet DImAn udaka aQjaliBiH pitLt /
   yajñopavītī devānāṃ nivītī ṛṣitarpaṇe // GarP_1,50.61 //	yajQa upavItI devAnAm nivItI Rzi tarpaNe // GarP_1,50.61 //
   prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata /	prAcInAvItI pitrye tu tena tIrTena BArata /
   niṣpīḍya snānavastraṃ vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ // GarP_1,50.62 //	nizpIxya snAna vastram vE samAcamya ca vAgyataH // GarP_1,50.62 //
   svairmantrairarcayeddevānpuṣpaiḥ patraistathāmbubhiḥ /	svEH mantrEH arcayet devAn puzpEH patrEH taTA ambuBiH /
   brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ sūryaṃ tathaiva madhusūdanam // GarP_1,50.63 //	brahmANam SaFkaram sUryam taTA eva maDusUdanam // GarP_1,50.63 //
   anyāṃścābhimatāndevān bhaktyā cākrodhano hara ! /	anyAn= ca aBimatAn devAn BaktyA ca akroDanaH hara ! /
   pradadyādvātha puṣpādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.64 //	pradadyAt vA aTa puzpa Adi sUktena puruzeNa tu // GarP_1,50.64 //
   āpo vā devatāḥ sarvāstena samyak samarcitāḥ /	ApaH vA devatAH sarvAH tena samyak samarcitAH /
   dhyātvā praṇavapūrvaṃ vai devaṃ vārisamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.65 //	DyAtvA praNava pUrvam vE devam vAri samAhitaH // GarP_1,50.65 //
   namaskāreṇa puṣāpāṇi vinyasedvai pṛthakpṛthak /	namaskAreNa puzA pANi vinyaset vE pRTak pRTak /
   narte hyārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam // GarP_1,50.66 //	na Rte hi ArADanAt puNyam vidyate karma vEdikam // GarP_1,50.66 //
   tasmāttatrādimadhyānte cetasā dhārayeddharim /	tasmAt tatra Adi maDya ante cetasA DArayet harim /
   tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.67 //	tat vizNoH iti mantreNa sUktena puruzeNa tu // GarP_1,50.67 //
   nivedayecca ātmānaṃ viṣṇave 'malatejase /	nivedayet ca AtmAnam vizNave amala tejase /
   tadādhyātmamanāḥ śāntastadviṣṇoriti mantrataḥ // GarP_1,50.68 //	tadA aDyAtma manAH SAntaH tat vizNoH iti mantrataH // GarP_1,50.68 //
   aprete saśirā vetiyajetvā puṣpake harim /	aprete sa SirAH vA iti yajetvA puzpake harim /
   devayajñaṃ pitṛyajñaṃ tathaiva ca /	deva yajQam pitR yajQam taTA eva ca /
   mānuṣaṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca pañca yajñānsamācaret // GarP_1,50.69 //	mAnuzam brahma yajQam ca paQca yajQAn samAcaret // GarP_1,50.69 //
   yadi syāttarpaṇādarvāgbrayajñaṃ kuto bhavet /	yadi syAt tarpaNAt arvAgbra yajQam kutas Bavet /
   kṛtvā manuṣyayajñaṃ vai tataḥ svādhyāyamācaret // GarP_1,50.70 //	kRtvA manuzya yajQam vE tatas svADyAyam Acaret // GarP_1,50.70 //
   vaiśvadevastu kartavyo devayajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ /	vESvadevaH tu kartavyaH devayajQaH sa tu smRtaH /
   bhūtayajñaḥṛ sa vai jñeyo bhūtebhyo yastvayaṃ baliḥ // GarP_1,50.71 //	BUta yajQaHR sa vE jQeyaH BUteByaH yaH tu ayam baliH // GarP_1,50.71 //
   śvabhyaśca śvapacebhyaśca patitādibhya eva ca /	SvaByaH ca SvapaceByaH ca patita AdiByaH eva ca /
   dadyādbhūmau bahistvannaṃ pakṣibhyaśca dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.72 //	dadyAt BUmO bahis tu annam pakziByaH ca dvijottamaH // GarP_1,50.72 //
   ekaṃ tu bhojayedvipraṃ pitṝnuddiśya sattamāḥ /	ekam tu Bojayet vipram pitLn uddiSya sattamAH /
   nityaśrāddhaṃ taduddiśya pitṛyajño gatipradaḥ // GarP_1,50.73 //	nitya SrAdDam tat uddiSya pitR yajQaH gati pradaH // GarP_1,50.73 //
   uddhṛtya vā yathāśakti kiñcidannaṃ samāhitaḥ /	udDRtya vA yaTASakti kiQcid annam samAhitaH /
   vedatattvārthaviduṣe dvijāyaivopapādayet // GarP_1,50.74 //	veda tattva arTa viduze dvijAya eva upapAdayet // GarP_1,50.74 //
   pūjayedatithiṃ nityaṃ namasyedarcayoddvijam /	pUjayet atiTim nityam namasyet arcaya uddvijam /
   manovākkarmabhiḥ śāntaṃ svāgataiḥ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,50.75 //	manaH vAk karmaBiH SAntam svAgatEH sva gRham tatas // GarP_1,50.75 //
   bhikṣāmāhurgrāsamātramannaṃ tatsyāccaturguṇam /	BikzAm AhuH grAsa mAtram annam tat syAt caturguNam /
   puṣkalaṃ hantakāraṃ tu taccaturguṇamucyate // GarP_1,50.76 //	puzkalam hantakAram tu tat caturguNam ucyate // GarP_1,50.76 //
   godohamātrakālaṃ vai pratīkṣyo hyatithiḥ svayam /	godoha mAtra kAlam vE pratIkzyaH hi atiTiH svayam /
   abhyāgatānyathāśakti pūjayedatithiṃ tathā // GarP_1,50.77 //	aByAgatAn yaTASakti pUjayet atiTim taTA // GarP_1,50.77 //
   bhikṣāṃ vai bhikṣave dadyādvidhivadbrahyacāriṇe /	BikzAm vE Bikzave dadyAt viDivat brahyacAriNe /
   dadyādannaṃ yathāśakti arthibhyo lobhavarjitaḥ // GarP_1,50.78 //	dadyAt annam yaTASakti arTiByaH loBa varjitaH // GarP_1,50.78 //
   bhuñjati bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ vāgyato 'nnamakutsayan /	BuQjati banDuBiH sArDam vAgyataH annam akutsayan /
   akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.79 //	akRtvA tu dvijaH paQca mahAyajQAn dvijottamaH // GarP_1,50.79 //
   bhuñjate cetsa mūḍhātmā tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati /	BuQjate ced sa mUXa AtmA tiryagyonim ca gacCati /
   vedābhyāso 'nvahaṃ śaktyā mahāyajñakriyākṣamāḥ // GarP_1,50.80 //	veda aByAsaH anvaham SaktyAH mahA yajQa kriyA kzamAH // GarP_1,50.80 //
   nāśayantyāśu pāpāni devānāmarcanaṃ tathā /	nASayanti ASu pApAni devAnAm arcanam taTA /
   yo mohādatha vālasyādakṛtvā devatārcanam // GarP_1,50.81 //	yaH mohAt aTa vA AlasyAt akRtvA devatA arcanam // GarP_1,50.81 //
   bhuṅkte sa yāti narakāntsūṃkareṣveva jāyate /	BuFkte sa yAti narakAn tsUMkarezu eva jAyate /
   aśaucaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā // GarP_1,50.82 //	aSOcam saMpravakzyAmi aSuciH pAtakI sadA // GarP_1,50.82 //
   aśaucaṃ caiva saṃsargācchuddhiḥ saṃsargavarjanāt /	aSOcam ca eva saMsargAt SudDiH saMsarga varjanAt /
   daśāhaṃ prāhurāśaucaṃ sarveviprā vipaścitaḥ // GarP_1,50.83 //	daSa aham prAhuH ASOcam sarveviprAH vipaScitaH // GarP_1,50.83 //
   mṛteṣu vātha jāteṣu brāhmaṇānāṃ dvijottama /	mRtezu vA aTa jAtezu brAhmaNAnAm dvijottamaH /
   ādantajananāt sadya ācūḍādekarātrakam // GarP_1,50.84 //	Adanta jananAt sadyas AcUxAt eka rAtrakam // GarP_1,50.84 //
   trirātramaupanayanāddaśarātramataḥ param /	tri rAtram OpanayanAt daSa rAtram atas param /
   kṣattriyo dvādaśahena daśabhiḥ pañcabhirviśaḥ // GarP_1,50.85 //	kzattriyaH dvAdaSa hena daSaBiH paQcaBiH viSaH // GarP_1,50.85 //
   śudhyenmāsena vai śūdro yatīnāṃ nāsti pātakam /	SuDyet mAsena vE SUdraH yatInAm na asti pAtakam /
   rātribhirmāsatulyābhirgarbhastrāveṣu śaucakam // GarP_1,50.86 //	rAtriBiH mAsa tulyABiH garBaH trAvezu SOcakam // GarP_1,50.86 //
   iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nityakarmASOcayornirUpaNam nAma paQcASattamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  51	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 51
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi dānadharmamanuttamam /	aTa atas saMpravakzyAmi dAna Darmam anuttamam /
   arthānāmucite pātre śraddhayā pratipādanam // GarP_1,51.1 //	arTAnAm ucite pAtre SradDayA pratipAdanam // GarP_1,51.1 //
   dānaṃ tu kathitaṃ tajjñairbhuktimuktiphalapradam /	dAnam tu kaTitam tad jQEH Bukti mukti Pala pradam /
   nyāyenopārjayedvittaṃ dānabhogaphalaṃ ca tat // GarP_1,51.2 //	nyAyena upArjayet vittam dAna Boga Palam ca tat // GarP_1,51.2 //
   adhyāpanaṃ yājanaṃ ca vṛttamāhuḥ pratigraham /	aDyApanam yAjanam ca vRttam AhuH pratigraham /
   kusīdaṃ kṛṣivāṇijyaṃ kṣattravṛtto 'tha varjayet // GarP_1,51.3 //	kusIdam kRzi vANijyam kzattra vRttaH aTa varjayet // GarP_1,51.3 //
   yaddīyate tu pātrebhyastaddānaṃ parikīrtitam /	yat dIyate tu pAtreByaH tat dAnam parikIrtitam /
   nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vimalaṃ dānamīritam // GarP_1,51.4 //	nityam nEmittikam kAmyam vimalam dAnam Iritam // GarP_1,51.4 //
   ahanyahani yatkiñciddīyate 'nupakāriṇe /	ahani ahani yat kiQcid dIyate anupakAriNe /
   anuddiśya phalaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇāya tu nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,51.5 //	anuddiSya Palam tasmAt brAhmaNAya tu nityaSas // GarP_1,51.5 //
   yattu pāpopaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupāṃ kare /	yat tu pApa upaSAntyE ca dIyate vidupAm kare /
   naimittikaṃ taduddiṣṭandānaṃ sadbhiranuṣṭhitam // GarP_1,51.6 //	nEmittikam tat uddizwandAnam sadBiH anuzWitam // GarP_1,51.6 //
   apatyavijayaiśvaryasvargārthaṃ yatpradīyate /	apatya vijaya ESvarya svarga arTam yat pradIyate /
   dānaṃ tatkāmyamākhyātamṛṣibhirdharmācintakaiḥ // GarP_1,51.7 //	dAnam tat kAmyam AKyAtam RziBiH Darma acintakEH // GarP_1,51.7 //
   īśvaraprīṇanārthāya brahmāvitsupradīyate /	ISvara prINana arTAya brahmA vid su pradIyate /
   cetasā sattvayuktena dānaṃ tadvimalaṃ śivam // GarP_1,51.8 //	cetasA sattva yuktena dAnam tat vimalam Sivam // GarP_1,51.8 //
   ikṣubhiḥ santatāṃ bhumiṃ yavagodhūmaśālinīm /	ikzuBiH santatAm Bumim yava goDUma SAlinIm /
   dadāti vedaviduṣe sa na bhūyo 'bhijāyate // GarP_1,51.9 //	dadAti veda viduze sa na BUyas aBijAyate // GarP_1,51.9 //
   bhūmidānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /	BUmi dAnAt param dAnam na BUtam na Bavizyati /
   vidyāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahmaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,51.10 //	vidyAm dattvA brAhmaNAya brahma loke mahIyate // GarP_1,51.10 //
   dadyādaharahastāstu śraddhayā brahmacāriṇe /	dadyAt aharahar tAH tu SradDayA brahmacAriNe /
   sarvapāpavinirmukto brahmasthānamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,51.11 //	sarva pApa vinirmuktaH brahma sTAnam avApnuyAt // GarP_1,51.11 //
   vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu brāhmaṇānsapta pañca ca /	vESAKyAm pOrNamAsyAm tu brAhmaNAn sapta paQca ca /
   upoṣyābhyarcayedvidvānmadhunā tilasarpiṣā // GarP_1,51.12 //	upozya aByarcayet vidvAn maDunA tila sarpizA // GarP_1,51.12 //
   gandhādibhiḥ samabhyarcya vācayedvā svayaṃ vadet /	ganDa AdiBiH samaByarcya vAcayet vA svayam vadet /
   prīyatāṃ dharmarājeti yathā manasi vartate // GarP_1,51.13 //	prIyatAm DarmarAjA iti yaTA manasi vartate // GarP_1,51.13 //
   yāvajjīvaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati /	yAvajjIvam kRtam pApam tad kzaNAt eva naSyati /
   kṛṣṇājine tilānkṛtvā hiraṇyamadhusarpiṣā // GarP_1,51.14 //	kRzNAjine tilAn kRtvA hiraNya maDu sarpizAH // GarP_1,51.14 //
   dadāti yastu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam /	dadAti yaH tu viprAya sarvam tarati duzkRtam /
   ghṛtānnamudakaṃ caiva vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.15 //	GRta annam udakam ca eva vESAKyAm ca viSezataH // GarP_1,51.15 //
   nirdiśya dharmarājāya viprebhyo mucyate bhayāt /	nirdiSya DarmarAjAya vipreByaH mucyate BayAt /
   dvādaśyāmarcayedviṣṇumupoṣyāghapraṇāśanam // GarP_1,51.16 //	dvAdaSyAm arcayet vizNum upozya aGa praNASanam // GarP_1,51.16 //
   sarvapāpavinirmukto naro bhavati niścitam /	sarva pApa vinirmuktaH naraH Bavati niScitam /
   yo hi yāṃ devatāmicchetsamārādhayituṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,51.17 //	yaH hi yAm devatAm icCet samArADayitum naraH // GarP_1,51.17 //
   brāhmaṇānpūjayeddatnādbhojayedyoṣitaḥ surān /	brAhmaNAn pUjayet datnAt Bojayet yozitaH surAn /
   santānakāmaḥ satataṃ pūjayedvai purandaram // GarP_1,51.18 //	santAna kAmaH satatam pUjayet vE purandaram // GarP_1,51.18 //
   brahmavarcasakāmastu brāhmaṇānbrahmaniścayāt /	brahmavarcasa kAmaH tu brAhmaNAn brahma niScayAt /
   ārogyakāmo 'tha raviṃ dhanakāmo hutāśanam // GarP_1,51.19 //	Arogya kAmaH aTa ravim Dana kAmaH hutASanam // GarP_1,51.19 //
   karmaṇāṃ siddhikāmastu pūjayedvai vināyakam /	karmaNAm sidDi kAmaH tu pUjayet vE vinAyakam /
   bhogakāmo hi śaśinaṃ balakāmaḥ samīraṇam // GarP_1,51.20 //	Boga kAmaH hi SaSinam bala kAmaH samIraNam // GarP_1,51.20 //
   mumukṣuḥ sarvasaṃsārātprayatnenārcayeddharim /	mumukzuH sarva saMsArAt prayatnena arcayet harim /
   akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā pūjayettu gadādharam // GarP_1,51.21 //	akAmaH sarva kAmaH vA pUjayet tu gadADaram // GarP_1,51.21 //
   vāridastṛptimāpnoti sukhamakṣayyamannadaḥ /	vAri daH tRptim Apnoti suKam akzayyam anna daH /
   tilapradaḥ prajāmiṣṭāṃ dīpadaścakṣuruttamam // GarP_1,51.22 //	tila pradaH prajAm izwAm dIpa daH cakzuH uttamam // GarP_1,51.22 //
   bhūmidaḥ sarvamāpnoti dīrghamāyurhiraṇyadaḥ /	BUmi daH sarvam Apnoti dIrGam AyuH hiraNya daH /
   gṛhado 'gryāṇi veśmāni rūpyado rūpamuttamam // GarP_1,51.23 //	gRha daH agryANi veSmAni rUpya daH rUpam uttamam // GarP_1,51.23 //
   vāsodaścāndrasālokyamaśvisālokyamaśvadaḥ /	vAsaH daH cAndrasAlokyam aSvi sAlokyam aSva daH /
   anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ puṣṭāṃ godo bradhnasya viṣṭapam // GarP_1,51.24 //	anaxuddaH Sriyam puzwAm godaH braDnasya vizwapam // GarP_1,51.24 //
   yānaśayyāprado bhāryāmaiśvaryamabhayapradaḥ /	yAna SayyA pradaH BAryAm ESvaryam aBaya pradaH /
   dhānyadaḥ śāvataṃ saukhyaṃ brahmado brahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,51.25 //	DAnya daH SAvatam sOKyam brahma daH brahma SASvatam // GarP_1,51.25 //
   vedavitsu dadajjñānaṃ svargaloke mahīyate /	veda vid su dadat jQAnam svarga loke mahIyate /
   gavāṃ ghāsapradānena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,51.26 //	gavAm GAsa pradAnena sarva pApEH pramucyate // GarP_1,51.26 //
   indhanānāṃ pradānena dīptāgnirjāyate naraḥ /	inDanAnAm pradAnena dIpta agniH jAyate naraH /
   auṣadhaṃ snehamāhāraṃ rogirogapraśāntaye // GarP_1,51.27 //	OzaDam sneham AhAram rogi roga praSAntaye // GarP_1,51.27 //
   dadāno rogarahitaḥ sukhī dīrghāyureva ca /	dadAnaH roga rahitaH suKI dIrGa AyuH eva ca /
   asipatravanaṃ mārgaṃ kṣuradhārāsamanvitam // GarP_1,51.28 //	asipatravanam mArgam kzura DArA samanvitam // GarP_1,51.28 //
   tīkṣṇā tapaṃ ca taraticchatropānatprado naraḥ /	tIkzNA tapam ca tarati= Catra upAnat pradaH naraH /
   yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe // GarP_1,51.29 //	yat yat izwatamam loke yat ca asya dayitam gRhe // GarP_1,51.29 //
   tattadguṇavate deyaṃ tadevākṣayamicchatā /	tat tat guNavate deyam tat eva akzayam icCatA /
   ayena viṣuve caiva grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // GarP_1,51.30 //	ayena vizuve ca eva grahaNe candra sUryayoH // GarP_1,51.30 //
   saṃkrāntyādiṣu kāleṣu dattaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /	saMkrAnti Adizu kAlezu dattam Bavati ca akzayam /
   prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.31 //	prayAga Adizu tIrTezu gayAyAm ca viSezataH // GarP_1,51.31 //
   dānadharmātparo dharmo bhūtānāṃ nahe vidyate /	dAna DarmAt paraH DarmaH BUtAnAm na he vidyate /
   svargāyurbhūtikāmena dānaṃ pāpopaśāntaye // GarP_1,51.32 //	svarga AyuH BUti kAmena dAnam pApa upaSAntaye // GarP_1,51.32 //
   dīyamānaṃ tu yo mohādgoviprāgnisureṣu ca /	dIyamAnam tu yaH mohAt go vipra agni surezu ca /
   nivārayati pāpātmā tiryagyoniṃ vrajennaraḥ // GarP_1,51.33 //	nivArayati pApa AtmA tiryagyonim vrajet naraH // GarP_1,51.33 //
   yastu durbhikṣavelāyāmannādyaṃ na prayacchati /	yaH tu durBikza velAyAm annAdyam na prayacCati /
   mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahmahā sa tu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,51.34 //	mriyamANezu viprezu brahma hA sa tu garhitaH // GarP_1,51.34 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   dānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ	dAnaDarmanirUpaNam nAma ekapaQcASattamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  52	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 52
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittavidhiṃ dvijāḥ /	atas param pravakzyAmi prAyaScitta viDim dvijAH /
   brahmahā ca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,52.1 //	brahma hA ca surApaH ca steyI ca guru talpa gaH // GarP_1,52.1 //
   pañca pātakinastvete tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ /	paQca pAtakinaH tu ete tad saMyogI ca paQcamaH /
   upapāpāni gohatyāprabhṛtīni surā jaguḥ // GarP_1,52.2 //	upapApAni go hatyA praBRtIni surAH jaguH // GarP_1,52.2 //
   brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /	brahma hA dvAdaSa abdAni kuwIm kRtvA vane vaset /
   kuryādanaśanaṃ vātha bhṛgoḥ patanameva ca // GarP_1,52.3 //	kuryAt anaSanam vA aTa BRgoH patanam eva ca // GarP_1,52.3 //
   jvalantaṃ vā viśedagniṃ jalaṃ vā praviśetsvayam /	jvalantam vA viSet agnim jalam vA praviSet svayam /
   brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇānparityajet // GarP_1,52.4 //	brAhmaNa arTe gavArTe vA samyak prANAn parityajet // GarP_1,52.4 //
   dattvā cānnaṃ ca viduṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati /	dattvA ca annam ca viduze brahma hatyAm vyapohati /
   aśvamedhāvabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.5 //	aSvameDa avaBRTake snAtvA vA mucyate dvijaH // GarP_1,52.5 //
   sarvasvaṃ vā vedavide brāhmaṇāya pradāpayet /	sarva svam vA veda vide brAhmaNAya pradApayet /
   sarasvatyāstaraṅgiṇyāḥ saṅgame lokaviśrute // GarP_1,52.6 //	sarasvatyAH taraFgiNyAH saFgame loka viSrute // GarP_1,52.6 //
   śuddhe triṣavaṇasnātastrirātropoṣito dvijaḥ /	SudDe trizavaNa snAtaH tri rAtra upozitaH dvijaH /
   setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,52.7 //	setu banDe naraH snAtvA mucyate brahmahatyayA // GarP_1,52.7 //
   kapālamocane snātvā vārāṇasyāṃ tathaiva ca /	kapAla mocane snAtvA vArANasyAm taTA eva ca /
   surāpastu surāṃ pītvā agnivarṇāṃ dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,52.8 //	surApaH tu surAm pItvA agni varNAm dvijottamaH // GarP_1,52.8 //
   payo ghṛtaṃ vā gomūtraṃ tasmātpāpātpramucyate /	payaH GRtam vA go mUtram tasmAt pApAt pramucyate /
   suvarṇasteyī muktaḥ syānmusalena hato nṛpaiḥ // GarP_1,52.9 //	suvarNa steyI muktaH syAt musalena hataH nRpEH // GarP_1,52.9 //
   cīravāsā dvijo 'raṇye caredbrahmahaṇavratam /	cIra vAsAH dvijaH araNye caret brahma haNa vratam /
   gurubhāryāṃ samāruhya brāhmaṇaḥ kāmamohitaḥ // GarP_1,52.10 //	guru BAryAm samAruhya brAhmaNaH kAma mohitaH // GarP_1,52.10 //
   avagūhetstriyaṃ taptāṃ dīptāṃ kārṣṇāyasīṃ kṛtām /	avagUhet striyam taptAm dIptAm kArzNAyasIm kRtAm /
   gurvaṅganāgāminaśca careyurbahmahavratam // GarP_1,52.11 //	guru aFganA gAminaH ca careyuH bahma ha vratam // GarP_1,52.11 //
   cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryātpañca catvāri vā punaḥ /	cAndrAyaNAni vA kuryAt paQca catvAri vA punar /
   patitena ca saṃsargaṃ kurute yastu vai dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.12 //	patitena ca saMsargam kurute yaH tu vE dvijaH // GarP_1,52.12 //
   sa tatpāpāpanodārthaṃ tasyaiva vratamācaret /	sa tad pApa apanoda arTam tasya eva vratam Acaret /
   taptakṛcchraṃ caredvātha saṃvatsaramatandritaḥ // GarP_1,52.13 //	taptakRcCram caret vA aTa saMvatsaram atandritaH // GarP_1,52.13 //
   sarvasvadānaṃ vidhivatsarvapāpaviśodhanam /	sarva sva dAnam viDivat sarva pApa viSoDanam /
   cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca vidhinā kṛtaṃ caivātikṛcchrakam // GarP_1,52.14 //	cAndrAyaNam ca viDinA kRtam ca eva atikRcCrakam // GarP_1,52.14 //
   puṇyakṣetre gayādau ca gamanaṃ pāpanāśanam /	puNya kzetre gayA AdO ca gamanam pApa nASanam /
   amāvasyāṃ tithiṃ prāpya yaḥ samārādhayedbhavam // GarP_1,52.15 //	amAvasyAm tiTim prApya yaH samArADayet Bavam // GarP_1,52.15 //
   brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate /	brAhmaNAn BojayitvA tu sarva pApEH pramucyate /
   upoṣitaścaturdaśyāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,52.16 //	upozitaH caturdaSyAm kRzNa pakze samAhitaH // GarP_1,52.16 //
   yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave cāntakāya ca /	yamAya DarmarAjAya mRtyave ca antakAya ca /
   vaivasvatāya kālāya sarvabhūtakṣayāya ca // GarP_1,52.17 //	vEvasvatAya kAlAya sarva BUta kzayAya ca // GarP_1,52.17 //
   pratyekaṃ tilasaṃyuktāndadyātsapta jalāñjalīn /	pratyekam tila saMyuktAn dadyAt sapta jala aQjalIn /
   snātvā nadyāṃ tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.18 //	snAtvA nadyAm tu pUrvAhne mucyate sarva pAtakEH // GarP_1,52.18 //
   brahmacaryamadhaḥ śayyāmupavāsaṃ dvijārcanam /	brahmacaryam aDas SayyAm upavAsam dvija arcanam /
   vrateṣveteṣu kurvīta śāntaḥ saṃyatamānasaḥ // GarP_1,52.19 //	vratezu etezu kurvIta SAntaH saMyata mAnasaH // GarP_1,52.19 //
   paṣṭhyāmupoṣito devaṃ śuklapakṣe samāhitaḥ /	pazWyAm upozitaH devam Sukla pakze samAhitaH /
   saptamyāmarcayedbhānuṃ mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.20 //	saptamyAm arcayet BAnum mucyate sarva pAtakEH // GarP_1,52.20 //
   ekādaśyāṃ nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya janārdanam /	ekAdaSyAm nirAhAraH samaByarcya janArdanam /
   dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya mahāpāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,52.21 //	dvAdaSyAm Sukla pakzasya mahA pApEH pramucyate // GarP_1,52.21 //
   tapo japastīrthasevā devabrāhmaṇapūjanam /	tapaH japaH tIrTa sevA deva brAhmaNa pUjanam /
   grahaṇādiṣu kāleṣu mahāpātakanāśanam // GarP_1,52.22 //	grahaNa Adizu kAlezu mahApAtaka nASanam // GarP_1,52.22 //
   yaḥ sarvapāpayukto 'pi puṇyatīrtheṣu mānavaḥ /	yaH sarva pApa yuktaH api puNya tIrTezu mAnavaH /
   niyamena tyajetprāṇānmucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.23 //	niyamena tyajet prANAn mucyate sarva pAtakEH // GarP_1,52.23 //
   brahmaghnaṃ vā kṛtaghnaṃ vā mahāpātakadūṣitam /	brahma Gnam vA kRtaGnam vA mahApAtaka dUzitam /
   bhartāramuddharennārī praviṣṭā saha pāvakam // GarP_1,52.24 //	BartAram udDaret nArI pravizwA saha pAvakam // GarP_1,52.24 //
   pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇotsukā /	pativratA tu yA nArI BartuH SuSrUzaNa utsukA /
   na tasyā vidyate pāpamiha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,52.25 //	na tasyAH vidyate pApam iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,52.25 //
   tathā rāmasya subhagā sītā trailokyaviśrutā /	taTA rAmasya suBagA sItA trElokya viSrutA /
   patnī dāśaratherdevī vijigye rākṣaseśvaram // GarP_1,52.26 //	patnI dASaraTeH devI vijigye rAkzaseSvaram // GarP_1,52.26 //
   phalgutīrthādiṣu snātaḥ sarvācāraphalaṃ labhet /	PalgutIrTa Adizu snAtaH sarva AcAra Palam laBet /
   ityāha bhagavānviṣṇuḥ purā mama yatavratāḥ // GarP_1,52.27 //	iti Aha BagavAn vizNuH purA mama yata vratAH // GarP_1,52.27 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   prāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ	prAyaScittanirUpaNam nAma dvipaQcASattamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  53	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 53
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   evaṃ brahmābravīcchrutvā hareraṣṭanidhīṃstathā /	evam brahmA abravIt SrutvA hareH azwa niDIn= taTA /
   tatra padmamahāpadmau tathā makarakacchapau // GarP_1,53.1 //	tatra padma mahA padmO taTA makara kacCapO // GarP_1,53.1 //
   mukundaku(na) ndau nīlaśca śaṅkhaścaivāparo nidhiḥ /	mukunda ku(na) ndO nIlaH ca SaFKaH ca eva aparaH niDiH /
   satyāmṛddhau bhavantyete svarūpaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_1,53.2 //	satyAm RdDO Bavanti ete svarUpam kaTayAmi aham // GarP_1,53.2 //
   padmena lakṣitaścaiva sāttviko jāyate naraḥ /	padmena lakzitaH ca eva sAttvikaH jAyate naraH /
   dākṣiṇyasāraḥ puruṣaḥ suvarṇādikasaṃgraham // GarP_1,53.3 //	dAkziNya sAraH puruzaH suvarNa Adika saMgraham // GarP_1,53.3 //
   rupyādi kuryāddadyāttu yatidaivādiyajvanām /	rupya Adi kuryAt dadyAt tu yati dEva Adi yajvanAm /
   mahāpadmāṅkito dadyāddhanādyaṃ dhārmikāya ca // GarP_1,53.4 //	mahApadma aFkitaH dadyAt Dana Adyam DArmikAya ca // GarP_1,53.4 //
   nīdhī padmamahāpadmau sāttvikau puruṣau smṛtī /	nIDI padma mahA padmO sAttvikO puruzO smRtI /
   makareṇāṅkitaḥ khaḍgabāṇakuntādisaṃgrahī // GarP_1,53.5 //	makareNa aFkitaH Kaxga bANa kunta Adi saMgrahI // GarP_1,53.5 //
   dadyācchrutāya maitrīṃ ca yāti nityaṃ ca rājabhiḥ /	dadyAt SrutAya mEtrIm ca yAti nityam ca rAjaBiH /
   dravyārthaṃ śatruṇā nāśaṃ saṃgrāme cāpi saṃvrajet // GarP_1,53.6 //	dravya arTam SatruNA nASam saMgrAme ca api saMvrajet // GarP_1,53.6 //
   makaraḥ kacchapaścaiva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau /	makaraH kacCapaH ca eva tAm asO tu niDI smRtO /
   kacchapī viśvasennaiva na bhuṅkena (nā) dadāti ca // GarP_1,53.7 //	kacCapI viSvaset na eva na BuFkena (nA) dadAti ca // GarP_1,53.7 //
   nidhānamurvyāṃ kurute nidhiḥ sopyekapūruṣaḥ /	niDAnam urvyAm kurute niDiH sa upyeka pUruzaH /
   rājasenamukundena lakṣitā rājyasaṃgrahī // GarP_1,53.8 //	rAjasena mukundena lakzitA rAjya saMgrahI // GarP_1,53.8 //
   bhuktabhogo gāyanebhyo dadyādveśyādikāsu ca /	Bukta BogaH gAyaneByaH dadyAt veSyA AdikAsu ca /
   rajastamomayo nandī ādhāraḥ syātkulasya ca // GarP_1,53.9 //	rajaH tamaH mayaH nandI ADAraH syAt kulasya ca // GarP_1,53.9 //
   stutaḥ prīto bhavati vai bahubhāryā bhavanti ca /	stutaH prItaH Bavati vE bahu BAryAH Bavanti ca /
   pūrvamitreṣu śaithilyaṃ prītimanyaiḥ karoti ca // GarP_1,53.10 //	pUrva mitrezu SETilyam prItim anyEH karoti ca // GarP_1,53.10 //
   nīlana cāṅkitaḥ sattvatejasā saṃyuto bhavet /	nIlana ca aFkitaH sattva tejasA saMyutaH Bavet /
   vastradhānyādisaṃgrāhī taḍāgādi karoti ca // GarP_1,53.11 //	vastra DAnya Adi saMgrAhI taxAga Adi karoti ca // GarP_1,53.11 //
   tripū(pau) ruṣo nidhiścaiva āmrārāmādi kārayet /	tripU(pO) ruzaH niDiH ca eva Amra ArAma Adi kArayet /
   ekasya syānnidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayaṃ bhuṅkte dhanādi(nta)kam // GarP_1,53.12	ekasya syAt niDiH SaFKaH svayam BuFkte Dana Adi (nta)kam // GarP_1,53.12
   kadannabhukparijano na ca śobhanavastradhṛk /	kadanna Buj parijanaH na ca SoBana vastra DRk /
   svapoṣaṇaparaḥ śaṅkhī dadyātparanare vṛthā // GarP_1,53.13 //	sva pozaNa paraH SaFKI dadyAt para nare vRTA // GarP_1,53.13 //
   miśrāvalokanānmiśrasvabhāvaphaladāyinaḥ /	miSra avalokanAt miSra svaBAva Pala dAyinaH /
   nidhīnāṃ rūpamuktaṃ tu hariṇāpi harādike /	niDInAm rUpam uktam tu hariNA api hara Adike /
   harirbhuvanakośādi yathovāca tathā vade // GarP_1,53.14 //	hariH Buvana koSa Adi yaTA uvAca taTA vade // GarP_1,53.14 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   navanidhivarṇanaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ	navaniDivarNanam nAma tripaQcASattamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  54	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 54
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   agnīdhraścāgnibāhuśca bapuṣmāndhyutimāṃstathā /	agnIDraH ca agnibAhuH ca bapuzmAn DyutimAn= taTA /
   medhāmedhātithirbhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putra eva ca // GarP_1,54.1 //	meDA meDAtiTiH BavyaH SabalaH putraH eva ca // GarP_1,54.1 //
   jyotiṣmāndaśamo jātaḥ putrā hyete priyavratāt /	jyotizmAn daSamaH jAtaH putrAH hi ete priyavratAt /
   medhāgnibāhuputrāstu trayo yogaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,54.2 //	meDA agnibAhu putrAH tu trayaH yoga parAyaNAH // GarP_1,54.2 //
   jātismarā mahābhāgā nairājyāya mamo daṣuḥ /	jAtismarAH mahABAgAH nErAjyAya mamaH dazuH /
   vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānāṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // GarP_1,54.3 //	viBajya sapta dvIpAni saptAnAm pradadO nRpaH // GarP_1,54.3 //
   yojanānāṃ pramāṇena pañcāśatkoṭirāplutā /	yojanAnAm pramANena paQcASat kowiH AplutA /
   jalopari mahī yātā maurivāste sarijjale // GarP_1,54.4 //	jala upari mahI yAtAH mOrivAste sarit jale // GarP_1,54.4 //
   jambūplakṣāhvayau dvīpau śālmalaścāparo hara /	jambU plakza AhvayO dvIpO SAlmalaH ca aparaH hara /
   kuśaḥ krauñcastathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ // GarP_1,54.5 //	kuSaH krOQcaH taTA SAkaH puzkaraH ca eva saptamaH // GarP_1,54.5 //
   ete dvīpāḥ samudraistu sapta saptabhirāvṛtāḥ /	ete dvIpAH samudrEH tu sapta saptaBiH AvRtAH /
   lavaṇekṣusurāsarpirdādhidugdhajalaiḥ samam // GarP_1,54.6 //	lavaNa ikzu surA sarpiH dADi dugDa jalEH samam // GarP_1,54.6 //
   dvīpāttu dviguṇo dvīpaḥ samudraśca vṛṣadhvaja /	dvIpAt tu dviguNaH dvIpaH samudraH ca vRzaDvaja /
   jambūdvīpe sthito merurlakṣayojanavistṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.7 //	jambUdvIpe sTitaH meruH lakza yojana vistRtaH // GarP_1,54.7 //
   caturaśītisāhasrairyojanairasya cocchrayaḥ /	caturaSIti sAhasrEH yojanEH asya ca ucCrayaH /
   praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśādhastāddvatriṃśanmūrdhni vistṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.8 //	pravizwaH zoxaSa aDastAt dvatriMSat mUrDni vistRtaH // GarP_1,54.8 //
   adhaḥ ṣoḍaśasāhasraḥ karṇikākārasaṃsyitaḥ /	aDas zoxaSa sAhasraH karNikA AkAra saMsyitaH /
   himavānhemakūṭaśca niṣadhaścāsya dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,54.9 //	himavAn hemakUwaH ca nizaDaH ca asya dakziNe // GarP_1,54.9 //
   nīlaḥ śvetaśca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ /	nIlaH SvetaH ca SRFgI ca uttare varzaparvatAH /
   plakṣādiṣu narā rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ // GarP_1,54.10 //	plakza Adizu narAH rudra ye vasanti sanAtanAH // GarP_1,54.10 //
   śaṅkarātha na teṣvasti yugāvasthā kathañcana /	SaFkara aTa na tezu asti yuga avasTA kaTaQcana /
   jambūdvīpeśvarātputrā hyagrīdhnādabhavannava // GarP_1,54.11 //	jambUdvIpa ISvarAt putrAH hi agrIDnAt aBavat = avaH // GarP_1,54.11 //
   nābhiḥ kiṃpuruṣaścaiva harivarṣamilā vṛtaḥ /	nABiH kiMpuruzaH ca eva hari varzam ilA vRtaH /
   ramyo hiraṇmayākhyaśca kururbhadrāśva eva ca // GarP_1,54.12 //	ramyaH hiraNmaya AKyaH ca kuruH BadrASvaH eva ca // GarP_1,54.12 //
   ketumālo nṛpastebhyastatsaṃjñān khaṇḍakāndadau /	ketumAlaH nRpaH teByaH tad saMjQAn KaNxa kAn dadO /
   nābhestu merudevyāṃ tu putro 'bhūdṛṣabho hara // GarP_1,54.13 //	nABeH tu merudevyAm tu putraH aBUt RzaBaH hara // GarP_1,54.13 //
   tatputro bharato nāma śālagrāme sthito vratī /	tad putraH BarataH nAma SAlagrAme sTitaH vratI /
   sumatirbharatasyābhūttatputrastaijaso 'bhavat // GarP_1,54.14 //	sumatiH Baratasya aBUt tad putraH tEjasaH aBavat // GarP_1,54.14 //
   indradyumnaśca tatputraḥ parameṣṭhī tataḥ smṛtaḥ /	indradyumnaH ca tad putraH paramezWI tatas smRtaH /
   pratīhāraścatatputraḥ pratihartā tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,54.15 //	pratIhAraH ca tad putraH pratihartA tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,54.15 //
   sutastasmādathai jātaḥ prastārastatsuto vibhuḥ /	sutaH tasmAt aTE jAtaH prastAraH tad sutaH viBuH /
   pṛthuśca tatsuto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.16 //	pRTuH ca tad sutaH naktaH naktasya api gayaH smRtaH // GarP_1,54.16 //
   naro gayasya tanayastatputrobhudvirāḍagataḥ /	naraH gayasya tanayaH tad putra uBudvirAxa gataH /
   tato dhīmānmahātejā bhauvanastasya cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,54.17 //	tatas DImAn mahA tejAH BOvanaH tasya ca AtmajaH // GarP_1,54.17 //
   tvaṣṭā tvaṣṭuśca virajā rajastasyāpyabhūtsutaḥ /	tvazwA tvazwuH ca virajAH rajaH tasya api aBUt sutaH /
   śatajidrajasastasya viṣvagjyotiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.18 //	Satajit rajasaH tasya vizvagjyotiH sutaH smRtaH // GarP_1,54.18 //
   iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrAgAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamo	BuvanakoSavarNanopayogipriyavratavaMSanirUpaNam nAma catuH paQcaSattamaH 
   'dhyāyaḥ	aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  55	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 55
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   madhye tvilāvṛto varṣo bhadrāśvaḥ pūrvato 'dbhutaḥ /	maDye tu ilAvRtaH varzaH BadrASvaH pUrvatas adButaH /
   pūrvadakṣaiṇato varṣo hiraṇvānvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,55.1 //	pUrva dakza eNataH varzaH hiraNvAn vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,55.1 //
   tataḥ kimpuruṣo varṣo merordakṣiṇataḥ smṛtaḥ /	tatas kimpuruzaH varzaH meroH dakziNatas smRtaH /
   bhārato dakṣiṇe prokto harirdakṣiṇapāścime // GarP_1,55.2 //	BArataH dakziNe proktaH hariH dakziNa pAScime // GarP_1,55.2 //
   paścime ketumālaśca ramyakaḥ paścimottare /	paScime ketumAlaH ca ramyakaH paScima uttare /
   uttare ca kurorvarṣaḥ kalpavṛkṣasamāvṛtaḥ // GarP_1,55.3 //	uttare ca kuroH varzaH kalpavRkza samAvRtaH // GarP_1,55.3 //
   siddhiḥ svābhāvikī rudra ! varjayitvā tu bhāratam /	sidDiH svABAvikI rudraH ! varjayitvA tu BAratam /
   indradvīpaḥ kaśerumāṃstāmravarṇo gabhastitamān // GarP_1,55.4 //	indradvIpaH kaSerumAn= tAmra varNaH gaBastitamAn // GarP_1,55.4 //
   nāgadvīpaḥ kaṭāhaśca siṃhalo vāruṇastathā /	nAgadvIpaH kawAhaH ca siMhalaH vAruNaH taTA /
   ayaṃ tunavamasteṣāṃ dvīpaḥ sāgarasaṃvṛtaḥ // GarP_1,55.5 //	ayam tunavamaH tezAm dvIpaH sAgara saMvRtaH // GarP_1,55.5 //
   pūrve kirātāstasyāste paścime yavanāḥ sthitāḥ /	pUrve kirAtAH tasyAH te paScime yavanAH sTitAH /
   andhrā dakṣiṇato rudra ! turaṣkāstvapi cottare // GarP_1,55.6 //	anDrAH dakziNatas rudraH ! turazkAH tu api ca uttare // GarP_1,55.6 //
   brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyā vaiśyāḥ sūdrāścāntaravāsinaḥ /	brAhmaNAH kzattriyAH vESyAH sUdrAH ca antara vAsinaH /
   mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimānṛkṣaparvataḥ // GarP_1,55.7 //	mahendraH malayaH sahyaH SuktimAn Rkza parvataH // GarP_1,55.7 //
   vindhyaśca pāriyātraśca saptātra kulaparvatāḥ /	vinDyaH ca pAriyAtraH ca sapta atra kula parvatAH /
   vedasmṛtir narmadā ca varadā surasā śivā // GarP_1,55.8 //	vedasmRtiH narmadA ca vara dA surasA SivAH // GarP_1,55.8 //
   tāpī payoṣṇī sarayūḥ kāverī gomatī tathā /	tApI payozNI sarayUH kAverI gomatI taTA /
   godāvarī bhīmarathī kṛṣṇaveṇī mahānadī // GarP_1,55.9 //	godAvarI BImaraTI kRzNaveNI mahAnadI // GarP_1,55.9 //
   ketumālā tāmraparṇo candrabhāgā sarasvatī /	ketumAlA tAmraparNaH candraBAgA sarasvatI /
   ṛṣikulyā ca kāverī mattagaṅgā payasvinī // GarP_1,55.10 //	RzikulyA ca kAverI mattagaFgA payasvinI // GarP_1,55.10 //
   vidarbhā ca śatadrūśca nadyaḥ pāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ /	vidarBA ca SatadrUH ca nadyaH pApa harAH SuBAH /
   āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ madhyadeśādayo janāḥ // GarP_1,55.11 //	AsAm pibanti salilam maDyadeSa AdayaH janAH // GarP_1,55.11 //
   pāñcālāḥ kuravo matsyā yaudheyāḥ sapaṭaccarāḥ /	pAQcAlAH kuravaH matsyAH yODeyAH sa pawaccarAH /
   kuntayaḥ śūrasenāśca madhyadeśajanāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,55.12 //	kuntayaH SUrasenAH ca maDyadeSa janAH smRtAH // GarP_1,55.12 //
   vṛṣadhvaja ! janāḥ pādmāḥ sūtamāgadhacedayaḥ /	vRzaDvaja ! janAH pAdmAH sUta mAgaDa cedayaH /
   kāśaya (ṣāyā) śca videhāśca pūrvasyāṃ kosalāstathā // GarP_1,55.13 //	kASaya (zAyA) Sca videhAH ca pUrvasyAm kosalAH taTA // GarP_1,55.13 //
   kaliṅgavaṅgapuṇḍrāṅgā vaidarbhā mūlakāstathā /	kaliFga vaFga puNxra aFgAH vEdarBAH mUlakAH taTA /
   vindhyāntarnilayā deśāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇataḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,55.14 //	vinDya antar nilayAH deSAH pUrva dakziNatas smRtAH // GarP_1,55.14 //
   pulandāśmakajīmūtanayarāṣṭranivāsinaḥ /	pulanda aSmaka jImUta naya rAzwra nivAsinaH /
   karṇār(nā)ṭakambojaghaṇā dakṣiṇāpathavāsinaḥ // GarP_1,55.15 //	karNa ar( nA)wa kamboja GaNAH dakziNApaTa vAsinaH // GarP_1,55.15 //
   ambaṣṭhadraviḍā lāṭāḥ kāmbhojā strīmukhāḥ śakāḥ /	ambazWa dravixAH lAwAH kAmBojAH strI muKAH SakAH /
   ānartavāsinaścaiva jñeyā yakṣiṇapaścime // GarP_1,55.16 //	Anarta vAsinaH ca eva jQeyAH yakziNa paScime // GarP_1,55.16 //
   strīrājyāḥ saindhavā mlecchā nāsti kā yavanāstathā /	strI rAjyAH sEnDavAH mlecCAH na asti kAH yavanAH taTA /
   paścimena ca vijñeyā māthurā naiṣadhaiḥ saha // GarP_1,55.17 //	paScimena ca vijQeyAH mATurAH nEzaDEH saha // GarP_1,55.17 //
   māṇḍavyāśca tuṣārāśca mūlikāśvamukhāḥ khaśāḥ /	mANxavyAH ca tuzArAH ca mUlika aSva muKAH KaSAH /
   mahākeśā mahānāsā deśāstūttarapaścime // GarP_1,55.18 //	mahAkeSAH mahAnAsAH deSAH tu uttara paScime // GarP_1,55.18 //
   lamba (mpā) kā stananāgāśca mādragāndhārabāhlikāḥ /	lamba (mpA) kA stana nAgAH ca mAdra gAnDAra bAhlikAH /
   himācalālayā mlecchā udīcīṃ diśamāśritāḥ // GarP_1,55.19 //	himAcala AlayAH mlecCAH udIcIm diSam ASritAH // GarP_1,55.19 //
   trigartanīlakolāta (bha) brahmaputrāḥ saṭaṅkaṇāḥ /	trigarta nIla kolAtaH (Ba) brahma putrAH sa waFkaNAH /
   abhīṣāhāḥ sakāśmīrā udakparveṇa kīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,55.20 //	aBIzAhAH sa kASmIrAH udak parveNa kIrtitAH // GarP_1,55.20 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ	BuvanakoSavarNanam nAma paQcapaQcASattamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  56	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 56
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   sapta medhātitheḥ putrāḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarasya ca /	sapta meDAtiTeH putrAH plakzadvIpa ISvarasya ca /
   jyeṣṭhaḥ śāntabhavo nāma śiśirastadantaraḥ // GarP_1,56.1 //	jyezWaH SAntaBavaH nAma SiSiraH tad antaraH // GarP_1,56.1 //
   sukhodayastathā nandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemaka eva ca /	suKa udayaH taTA nandaH SivaH kzemakaH eva ca /
   dhruvaśca saptamasteṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te // GarP_1,56.2 //	DruvaH ca saptamaH tezAm plakzadvIpa ISvarAH hi te // GarP_1,56.2 //
   gomedaścaiva candraśca nārado dundubhistathā /	gomedaH ca eva candraH ca nAradaH dunduBiH taTA /
   somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo baibhrājaścātra saptamaḥ // GarP_1,56.3 //	somakaH sumanAH SElaH bEBrAjaH ca atra saptamaH // GarP_1,56.3 //
   anutaptā śikhī caiva vipāśā tridivā kramuḥ /	anutaptA SiKI ca eva vipASA tridivA kramuH /
   amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāstatra nimnagāḥ // GarP_1,56.4 //	amRtA sukRtA ca eva sapta etAH tatra nimnagAH // GarP_1,56.4 //
   vapuṣmāñchālmalasyeśastatsutā varṣanāmakāḥ /	vapuzmAn SAlmalasya ISaH tad sutAH varza nAmakAH /
   śveto 'tha haritaścaiva jīmūto rohitastathā // GarP_1,56.5 //	SvetaH aTa haritaH ca eva jImUtaH rohitaH taTA // GarP_1,56.5 //
   vaidyuto mānasaścaiva saprabhaśācapi saptamaḥ /	vEdyutaH mAnasaH ca eva sa praBaSAt api saptamaH /
   kumudaśconnato droṇo mahiṣo 'tha balāhakaḥ // GarP_1,56.6 //	kumudaH ca unnataH droNaH mahizaH aTa balAhakaH // GarP_1,56.6 //
   krauñcaḥ kakudmānhyete vai girayaḥ saritastvimāḥ /	krOQcaH kakudmAn hi ete vE girayaH saritaH tu imAH /
   yonitoyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukla vimocanī // GarP_1,56.7 //	yoni toyA vitRzNA ca candrA Sukla vimocanI // GarP_1,56.7 //
   vidhṛtiḥ saptamī tāsāṃ smṛtāḥ pāpapraśāntidāḥ /	viDRtiH saptamI tAsAm smRtAH pApa praSAnti dAH /
   jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe sapta putrāḥ śṛṇuṣvatān // GarP_1,56.8 //	jyotizmataH kuSadvIpe sapta putrAH SRNuzvatAn // GarP_1,56.8 //
   udbhido veṇumāṃścaiva dvairatho lambano dhṛtiḥ /	udBidaH veNumAn= ca eva dvEraTaH lambanaH DRtiH /
   prabhākaro 'tha kapilastannāmā varṣapaddhatiḥ // GarP_1,56.9 //	praBAkaraH aTa kapilaH tad nAmA varza padDatiH // GarP_1,56.9 //
   vidrumo hemaśailaśca dyutimānpuṣpavāṃstathā /	vidrumaH hemaSElaH ca dyutimAn puzpavAn= taTA /
   kuśeśayo hariścaiva saptamo mandarācalaḥ // GarP_1,56.10 //	kuSeSayaH hariH ca eva saptamaH mandara acalaH // GarP_1,56.10 //
   dhūtapāpā śivā caiva pavitrā sanmatistathā /	DUtapApA SivA ca eva pavitrA sat matiH taTA /
   vidyudabhrā mahī cānyā sarvapāpaharāstvimāḥ // GarP_1,56.11 //	vidyut aBrA mahI ca anyA sarva pApa harAH tu imAH // GarP_1,56.11 //
   krauñcadvīpe dyutimataḥ putrāḥ sapta mahātmanaḥ /	krOQcadvIpe dyutimataH putrAH sapta mahAtmanaH /
   kuśalo mandagaścoṣṇaḥ pīvaro 'thondhakārakaḥ // GarP_1,56.12 //	kuSalaH mandagaH ca uzNaH pIvaraH aTa unDakArakaH // GarP_1,56.12 //
   muniśca dundubhiścaiva saptaite tatsutā hara /	muniH ca dunduBiH ca eva saptA ete tad sutAH hara /
   krauñcaśca vāmanaścaiva tṛtīyaścāndha (tha) kārakaḥ // GarP_1,56.13 //	krOQcaH ca vAmanaH ca eva tRtIyaH ca anDaH (Ta) kArakaH // GarP_1,56.13 //
   divāvṛtpañcamaścānyo dundubhiḥ puṇḍarīkavān /	divAvRt paQcamaH ca anyaH dunduBiH puNxarIkavAn /
   gaurī kumudvatī caiva sandhyā rātrirmanojavā // GarP_1,56.14 //	gOrI kumudvatI ca eva sanDyA rAtriH manojavAH // GarP_1,56.14 //
   khyātiśca puṇḍarīkā ca saptaitā varṣanimnagāḥ /	KyAtiH ca puNxarIkA ca sapta etAH varza nimnagAH /
   śākadvīpeśvarādbhavyātsapta putrāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,56.15 //	SAkadvIpa ISvarAt BavyAt sapta putrAH prajajQire // GarP_1,56.15 //
   jaladśca kumāraśca sukumāroruṇī bakaḥ /	jaladH ca kumAraH ca sukumAra UruNI bakaH /
   kusumodaḥ samodārkiḥ saptamaśca mahādrumaḥ // GarP_1,56.16 //	kusumodaH samodArkiH saptamaH ca mahA drumaH // GarP_1,56.16 //
   sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā /	sukumArI kumArI ca nalinI DenukA ca yA /
   ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā // GarP_1,56.17 //	ikzuH ca veNukA ca eva gaBastI saptamI taTA // GarP_1,56.17 //
   śabalātpuṣkareśācca mahāvīraśca dhātakiḥ /	SabalAt puzkara ISAt ca mahAvIraH ca DAtakiH /
   abhūdvarṣadvayaṃ caiva mānasottaraparvataḥ // GarP_1,56.18 //	aBUt varza dvayam ca eva mAnasottara parvataH // GarP_1,56.18 //
   yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ūrdhvaṃ pañcāśaducchritaḥ /	yojanAnAm sahasrANi UrDvam paQcASat ucCritaH /
   tāvaccaiva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // GarP_1,56.19 //	tAvat ca eva ca vistIrNaH sarvatas parimaNxalaH // GarP_1,56.19 //
   svādūdakenodadhinā puṣkaraḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ /	svAdu udakena udaDinA puzkaraH parivezwitaH /
   svādūdakasya purato dṛśyate lokasaṃsthitiḥ // GarP_1,56.20 //	svAdu udakasya puratas dRSyate loka saMsTitiH // GarP_1,56.20 //
   dviguṇā kāñcanī bhūmiḥ sarvajantuvivarjitā /	dviguNA kAQcanI BUmiH sarva jantu vivarjitAH /
   lokālokastataḥ śailo yojanāyutāvistṛtaḥ /	lokAlokaH tatas SElaH yojana ayutA vistRtaH /
   tamasā parvato vyāptastamo 'pyaṇḍakaṭāhataḥ // GarP_1,56.21 //	tamasA parvataH vyAptaH tamaH api aNxa kawAhataH // GarP_1,56.21 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ	BuvanakoSavarNanam nAma zawpaQcASattamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  57	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 57
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   saptatistu sahasrāṇi bhūmyucchrāyo 'pi kathyate /	saptatiH tu sahasrANi BUmi ucCrAyaH api kaTyate /
   daśasāhasramekaikaṃ pātālaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,57.1 //	daSa sAhasram ekEkam pAtAlam vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,57.1 //
   atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ ca gabhastimat /	atalam vitalam ca eva nitalam ca gaBastimat /
   mahākhyaṃ sutalaṃ cāgryaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam // GarP_1,57.2 //	mahA AKyam sutalam ca agryam pAtAlam ca api saptamam // GarP_1,57.2 //
   kṛṣṇā śuklāruṇā pītā śarkarā śailakāñcanā /	kRzNA Sukla aruNA pItA SarkarA SEla kAQcanA /
   bhūyastatra daiteyā vasanti ca bhujaṅgamāḥ // GarP_1,57.3 //	BUyas tatra dEteyAH vasanti ca BujaFgamAH // GarP_1,57.3 //
   raudre tu puṣkaradvīpe narakāḥ santi tāñchṛṇu /	rOdre tu puzkaradvIpe narakAH santi tAn SRNu /
   rauravaḥ sūkaro rodhastālo vinaśanastathā // GarP_1,57.4 //	rOravaH sUkaraH roDaH tAlaH vinaSanaH taTA // GarP_1,57.4 //
   mahājvālastaptakumbho lavaṇo 'thi vimohitaḥ /	mahAjvAlaH taptakumBaH lavaNaH aTi vimohitaH /
   rudhirākhyo vaitaraṇī kṛmiśaḥ kṛmibho janaḥ // GarP_1,57.5 //	ruDira AKyaH vEtaraNI kRmiSaH kRmiBaH janaH // GarP_1,57.5 //
   asipatravanaḥ kṛṣṇo nānābhakṣaśca dāruṇaḥ /	asipatravanaH kRzNaH nAnA BakzaH ca dAruNaH /
   tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālastvadhaḥ śirāḥ // GarP_1,57.6 //	taTA pUya vahaH pApaH vahni jvAlaH tu aDas SirAH // GarP_1,57.6 //
   saṃdaṃśaḥ kṛṣṇasūtraśca tamaścāvīcireva ca /	saMdaMSaH kRzNa sUtraH ca tamaH ca avIciH eva ca /
   śvabhojano 'thāpratiṣṭhoṣṇavīcirnarakāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,57.7 //	Sva BojanaH aTa apratizWA uzNa vIciH narakAH smRtAH // GarP_1,57.7 //
   pāpinasteṣu pacyante viṣaśastrāgnidāyinaḥ /	pApinaH tezu pacyante viza Sastra agni dAyinaH /
   uparyupari vai lokā rudra ! bhūtādayaḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,57.8 //	upari upari vE lokAH rudraH ! BUta AdayaH sTitAH // GarP_1,57.8 //
   vārivahnyanilākāśairvṛtaṃ bhūtādinā ca tat /	vAri vahni anila AkASEH vRtam BUta AdinA ca tat /
   tadaṇḍaṃ mahatā rudra ! pradhānena ca veṣṭitam // GarP_1,57.9 //	tat aNxam mahatA rudraH ! praDAnena ca vezwitam // GarP_1,57.9 //
   aṇḍaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyāptaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,57.10 //	aNxam daSaguNam vyAptam nArAyaNaH sTitaH // GarP_1,57.10 //
   iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
