   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  58	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 58
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   vakṣye pramāṇasaṃsthāne sūryādīnāṃ śṛṇuṣva me /	vakzye pramANa saMsTAne sUrya AdInAm SRNuzva me /
   yojānānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava // GarP_1,58.1 //	yojAnAnAm sahasrANi BAskarasya raTaH nava // GarP_1,58.1 //
   īṣādaṇḍastathaivāsya dviguṇo vṛṣabhadhvaja /	IzA daNxaH taTA eva asya dviguNaH vRzaBaDvaja /
   sārdhakoṭistathā sapta niyutānyadhikāni ca // GarP_1,58.2 //	sArDa kowiH taTA sapta niyutAni aDikAni ca // GarP_1,58.2 //
   yojanānāṃ tu tasyākṣastatra cakraṃ pratiṣṭhitam /	yojanAnAm tu tasya akzaH tatra cakram pratizWitam /
   trinābhimati pañcāre ṣaṇneminyakṣayātmake // GarP_1,58.3 //	tri nABimati paQca are zaz nemini akzaya Atmake // GarP_1,58.3 //
   saṃvatsaramaye kṛtsnaṃ kālacakraṃ pratiṣṭhitam /	saMvatsara maye kRtsnam kAlacakram pratizWitam /
   catvāriṃśatsahasrāṇi dvitīyo 'kṣo vivasvataḥ // GarP_1,58.4 //	catvAriMSat sahasrANi dvitIyaH akzaH vivasvataH // GarP_1,58.4 //
   pañcānyāni tu sārdhāni syandanasya vṛṣadhvaja /	paQca anyAni tu sArDAni syandanasya vRzaDvaja /
   akṣapramāṇamubhayoḥ pramāṇaṃ tu yugārdhayoḥ // GarP_1,58.5 //	akza pramANam uBayoH pramANam tu yuga arDayoH // GarP_1,58.5 //
   hrasvo 'kṣastadyugārdhena dhruvādhāre rathasya vai /	hrasvaH akzaH tad yuga arDena Druva ADAre raTasya vE /
   dvitīye 'kṣe tu taccakraṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānasācale // GarP_1,58.6 //	dvitIye akze tu tat cakram saMsTitam mAnasa acale // GarP_1,58.6 //
   gāyattrī sabṛhatyuṣṇigjagatītriṣṭubeva ca /	gAyattrI sa bRhatI uzNih jagatI trizwuB A iva ca /
   anuṣṭuppaṅktirityuktāśchandāṃsi harayo raveḥ // GarP_1,58.7 //	anuzwuB paFktiH iti uktAH CandAMsi harayaH raveH // GarP_1,58.7 //
   dhātā kratusthalā caiva pulastyo vāsukistathā /	DAtA kratusTalA ca eva pulastyaH vAsukiH taTA /
   rathakṛdgrāmaṇīrhetistumburuścaitramāsake // GarP_1,58.8 //	raTakRt grAmaNIH hetiH tumburuH cEtra mAsake // GarP_1,58.8 //
   aryamā pulahaścaiva rathojāḥ puñjikasthalā /	aryamA pulahaH ca eva raTojAH puQjikasTalA /
   prahetiḥ kacchanīraśca nāradaścaiva mādhave // GarP_1,58.9 //	prahetiH kacCanIraH ca nAradaH ca eva mADave // GarP_1,58.9 //
   mitro 'tristakṣako rakṣaḥ pauruṣeyo 'tha menakā /	mitraH atriH takzakaH rakzaH pOruzeyaH aTa menakA /
   hāhā rathasvanaścaiva jyeṣṭhe bhāno rathe sthitāḥ // GarP_1,58.10 //	hAhA raTasvanaH ca eva jyezWe BAnoH raTe sTitAH // GarP_1,58.10 //
   varuṇo vasiṣṭho rambhā sahajanyā kuhūrbudhaḥ /	varuNaH vasizWaH ramBA sahajanyA kuhUH buDaH /
   rathacitrastathā śukro vasantyāṣāḍhasaṃjñite / // GarP_1,58.11 //	raTacitraH taTA SukraH vasanti AzAXa saMjQite / // GarP_1,58.11 //
   indro viśvāvasuḥ srota(śrotra) elāpatrastathāṅgirāḥ /	indraH viSvAvasuH srota(Srotra) elApatraH taTA aFgirAH /
   pramlocā ca nabhasyete sarpāścārke tu santi vai // GarP_1,58.12 //	pramlocA ca naBasi ete sarpAH ca arke tu santi vE // GarP_1,58.12 //
   vivasvānugrasenaśca bhṛgurāpūraṇastathā /	vivasvAn ugrasenaH ca BRguH ApUraNaH taTA /
   anumlocāśaṅkhapālau vyāghro bhādrapade tatā // GarP_1,58.13 //	anumlocA SaFKapAlO vyAGraH BAdrapade tatA // GarP_1,58.13 //
   pūṣā ca surucirdhātā gautamo 'tha dhanañjayaḥ /	pUzA ca suruciH DAtA gOtamaH aTa DanaQjayaH /
   suṣeṇo 'nyo dhṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau // GarP_1,58.14 //	suzeNaH anyaH DRtAcI ca vasanti ASvayuje ravO // GarP_1,58.14 //
   viśvāvasurbharadvājaḥ parjanyairāvatau tadā /	viSvAvasuH BaradvAjaH parjanya ErAvatO tadA /
   viśvācī senajiccāpaḥ (pi) kārtike cādhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,58.15 //	viSvAcI senajit cApaH (pi) kArtike ca aDikAriNaH // GarP_1,58.15 //
   aṃśuśca kāśyapastārkṣyo mahāpadmastathorvaśī /	aMSuH ca kASyapaH tArkzyaH mahApadmaH taTA urvaSI /
   citrasenastathā vidyunmārgaśīrṣādhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,58.16 //	citrasenaH taTA vidyut mArgaSIrza aDikAriNaH // GarP_1,58.16 //
   kraturbhargastathorṇāyuḥ sphūrjaḥ karkoṭakastathā /	kratuH BargaH taTA UrNAyuH sPUrjaH karkowakaH taTA /
   ariṣṭanemiścaivānyā pūrvacittivarrātsarāḥ /	arizwanemiH ca eva anyA pUrva citti varrAt sarAH /
   pauṣamāse vasantyete sapta bhāskaramaṇḍale // GarP_1,58.17 //	pOza mAse vasanti ete sapta BAskara maNxale // GarP_1,58.17 //
   tvaṣṭātha jamadagniśca kambalo 'tha tilottamā /	tvazwA aTa jamadagniH ca kambalaH aTa tilottamA /
   brahmāpeto 'tha ṛtajiddhṛtarāṣṭraśca saptamaḥ /	brahma apetaH aTa Rtajit DRtarAzwraH ca saptamaH /
   māghamāse vasantyete sapta bhāskaramaṇḍale // GarP_1,58.18 //	mAGa mAse vasanti ete sapta BAskara maNxale // GarP_1,58.18 //
   viṣṇuraśvataro rambhā sūryavarcāśca satyajit /	vizNuH aSvataraH ramBA sUryavarcAH ca satyajit /
   viśvāmitrastathā rakṣo yajñāpeto hi phālgune // GarP_1,58.19 //	viSvAmitraH taTA rakzaH yajQApetaH hi PAlgune // GarP_1,58.19 //
   saviturmaṇḍale brahmanviṣṇuśaktyupabṛṃhitāḥ /	savituH maNxale brahman vizNu Sakti upabRMhitAH /
   stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvairgoyate puraḥ // GarP_1,58.20 //	stuvanti munayaH sUryam ganDarvEH goyate puras // GarP_1,58.20 //
   nṛtyantyo 'psaraso yānti sūryasyānuniśācarāḥ /	nRtyantyaH apsarasaH yAnti sUryasya anuniSAcarAH /
   vahanti pannagā yakṣaiḥ kriyate 'bhīṣusaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,58.21 //	vahanti pannagAH yakzEH kriyate aBIzu saMgrahaH // GarP_1,58.21 //
   bālakhilyāstathaivainaṃ parivārya samāsate /	bAlaKilyAH taTA eva enam parivArya samAsate /
   rathastricakraḥ somasya kundābhāstasya vājinaḥ // GarP_1,58.22 //	raTaH tri cakraH somasya kunda ABAH tasya vAjinaH // GarP_1,58.22 //
   vāmadakṣiṇato yuktā daśa tena caratyasau /	vAma dakziNatas yuktAH daSa tena carati asO /
   vārya (yva) granidravyasambhūto rathaścandrasutasyaca // GarP_1,58.23 //	vAryaH (yva) grani dravya samBUtaH raTaH candra sutasya ca // GarP_1,58.23 //
   piśaṅgesturagairyuktaḥ so 'ṣṭābhirvāyuvegibhiḥ /	piSaFgeH turagEH yuktaH saH azwABiH vAyu vegiBiH /
   savarūthaḥ sānukarṣo yukto bhūmibhavairhayaiḥ // GarP_1,58.24 //	sa varUTaH sa anukarzaH yuktaH BUmi BavEH hayEH // GarP_1,58.24 //
   sopāsaṃgapatākastu śukrasyāpi ratho mahān /	sa upAsaMga patAkaH tu Sukrasya api raTaH mahAn /
   ratho bhūmisutasyāpi taptakāñcanasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,58.25 //	raTaH BUmisutasya api tapta kAQcana sanniBaH // GarP_1,58.25 //
   aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān // GarP_1,58.26 //	azwa aSvaH kAQcanaH SrImAn BOmasya api raTaH mahAn // GarP_1,58.26 //
   padmarāgāruṇairaśvaiḥ saṃyukto vahnisaṃbhavaiḥ /	padmarAga aruNEH aSvEH saMyuktaH vahni saMBavEH /
   aṣṭābhiḥ pāṇḍarairyuktairvājibhiḥ kāñcane rathe // GarP_1,58.27 //	azwABiH pANxarEH yuktEH vAjiBiH kAQcane raTe // GarP_1,58.27 //
   tiṣṭhaṃstiṣṭhati varṣaṃ vai rāśaurāśau bṛhaspatiḥ /	tizWan= tizWati varzam vE rASOrASO bRhaspatiH /
   ākāśasambhavairaśvaiḥ śavalaiḥ syandanaṃ yutam // GarP_1,58.28 //	AkASa samBavEH aSvEH SavalEH syandanam yutam // GarP_1,58.28 //
   samāruhya śanairyāti mandagāmī śanaiścaraḥ /	samAruhya SanEs yAti manda gAmI SanEScaraH /
   svarbhānosturagā hyaṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham // GarP_1,58.29 //	svarBAnoH turagAH hi azwO BRFga ABAH DUsaram raTam // GarP_1,58.29 //
   sakṛdyaktāstu bhūteśabahantyavirataṃ śiva /	sakRt yaktAH tu BUteSa bahanti aviratam Siva /
   tathā keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau te vātaraṃhasaḥ // GarP_1,58.30 //	taTA ketu raTasya aSvAH azwO te vAta raMhasaH // GarP_1,58.30 //
   palāladhūmavarṇābhā lākṣārasanibhāruṇāḥ /	palAla DUma varNa ABAH lAkzA rasa niBa aruNAH /
   dvīpanadyadrayudanvanto bhuvanāniharestanuḥ // GarP_1,58.31 //	dvIpanadI a t rayu danvantaH BuvanA nihareH tanuH // GarP_1,58.31 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   bhuvanakośanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ	BuvanakoSanirUpaNam nAma azwapaQcASattamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  59	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 59
   (atha jyotiḥ śāstram)	(aTa jyotiH SAstram)
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   jyotiścakraṃ bhuvo mānamuktvā provāca keśavaḥ /	jyotiScakram BuvaH mAnam uktvA provAca keSavaH /
   caturlakṣaṃ jyotiṣasya sāraṃ rudrāya sarvadaḥ // GarP_1,59.1 //	catur lakzam jyotizasya sAram rudrAya sarva daH // GarP_1,59.1 //
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   kṛttikāstvagnidevatyā rohiṇyo brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ /	kRttikAH tu agni devatyAH rohiNyaH brahmaNaH smRtAH /
   ilvalāḥ somadevatyā raudraṃ cārdramudāhṛtam // GarP_1,59.2 //	ilvalAH soma devatyAH rOdram ca Ardram udAhRtam // GarP_1,59.2 //
   punarvasustathādityastiṣyaśca gurudaivataḥ /	punarvasuH taTA AdityaH tizyaH ca guru dEvataH /
   aśleṣāḥ sarpadevatyā maghāśca pitṛdevatāḥ // GarP_1,59.3 //	aSlezAH sarpa devatyAH maGAH ca pitR devatAH // GarP_1,59.3 //
   bhāgyāśca pūrvaphalgunya aryamā ca tathottaraḥ /	BAgyAH ca pUrva Palgunya aryamA ca taTA uttaraH /
   sāvitraśca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,59.4 //	sAvitraH ca taTA hastA citrA tvazwA prakIrtitaH // GarP_1,59.4 //
   svātī ca vāyudevatyā nakṣatraṃ parikīrtitam /	svAtI ca vAyu devatyAH nakzatram parikIrtitam /
   indrāgnidevatā proktā viśākhā vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,59.5 //	indra agni devatA proktA viSAKA vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,59.5 //
   maitramṛkṣamanūrādhā jyeṣṭhā śākraṃ prakīrtitam /	mEtram Rkzam anUrADA jyezWA SAkram prakIrtitam /
   tathā nirṛtidevatyo mūlastajjñairudāhṛtaḥ // GarP_1,59.6 //	taTA nirRti devatyaH mUlaH tad jQEH udAhRtaH // GarP_1,59.6 //
   āpyāstvāṣāṭhapūrvāstu uttarā vaiśvadevatāḥ /	ApyAH tu AzAWa pUrvAH tu uttarAH vESvadevatAH /
   brāhmaścaivābhijitproktaḥ śravaṇā vaiṣṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,59.7 //	brAhmaH ca eva aBijit proktaH SravaNA vEzNavaH smRtaH // GarP_1,59.7 //
   vāsavastu tathā ṛkṣaṃ dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ /	vAsavaH tu taTA Rkzam DanizWA procyate buDEH /
   tathā śatabhiṣā proktaṃ nakṣatraṃ vāruṇaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.8 //	taTA SataBizA proktam nakzatram vAruNam Siva // GarP_1,59.8 //
   ājaṃ bhādrapadā pūrvā ahirbrudhnyastathottarā /	Ajam BAdrapadA pUrvAH ahirbruDnyaH taTA uttarA /
   pauṣṇaṃ ca revatī ṛkṣamaśvayukcāśvadaivatam // GarP_1,59.9 //	pOzNam ca revatI Rkzam aSva yuj ca aSva dEvatam // GarP_1,59.9 //
   bharaṇyṛkṣaṃ tathā yāmyaṃ proktāste ṛkṣadevatāḥ /	BaraNI Rkzam taTA yAmyam proktAH te Rkza devatAH /
   brahmāṇī saṃsthitā pūrve pritapannavamītithau // GarP_1,59.10 //	brahmANI saMsTitA pUrve prita pad navamI tiTO // GarP_1,59.10 //
   māheśvarī cottare ca dvitīyā daśāmītithau /	mAheSvarI ca uttare ca dvitIyA daSAmi itiTO /
   pañcamyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā // GarP_1,59.11 //	paQcamyAm ca trayodaSyAm vArAhI dakziNe sTitAH // GarP_1,59.11 //
   ṣaṣṭhyāṃ caiva caturdaśyāmindrāṇī paścime sthitā /	zazWyAm ca eva caturdaSyAm indrANI paScime sTitA /
   saptamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare // GarP_1,59.12 //	saptamyAm pOrNamAsyAm ca cAmuNxA vAyu gocare // GarP_1,59.12 //
   aṣṭamyamāvāsyayoge mahālakṣmīśagocare /	azwamI amAvAsya yoge mahAlakzmI ISa gocare /
   ekādaśyāṃ tṛtīyāyāmagnikoṇe tu vaiṣṇavī // GarP_1,59.13 //	ekAdaSyAm tRtIyAyAm agni koNe tu vEzNavI // GarP_1,59.13 //
   dvādaśyāṃ ca caturthyāṃ tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā /	dvAdaSyAm ca caturTyAm tu kOmArI nErRte taTA /
   yoginīsuṃmukhenaiva gamanādi na kārayet // GarP_1,59.14 //	yoginI suMmuKena eva gamana Adi na kArayet // GarP_1,59.14 //
   aśvinīmaitrarevatyo mṛgamūlapunarvasu /	aSvinI mEtra revatyaH mRga mUla punarvasu /
   puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭhamucyate // GarP_1,59.15 //	puzyA hastA taTA jyezWA prasTAne SrezWam ucyate // GarP_1,59.15 //
   hastādipañcaṛkṣāṇi uttarātrayameva ca /	hasta Adi paQca RkzANi uttarA trayam eva ca /
   aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū // GarP_1,59.16 //	aSvinI rohiNI puzyA DanizWA ca punarvasU // GarP_1,59.16 //
   vastraprāvaraṇe śreṣṭho nakṣatrāṇāṃ gaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /	vastra prAvaraNe SrezWaH nakzatrANAm gaNaH smRtaH /
   kṛttikā bharaṇyaśleṣā maghā mūlaviśākhayoḥ // GarP_1,59.17 //	kRttikA BaraNI aSlezAH maGA mUla viSAKayoH // GarP_1,59.17 //
   trīṇi,pūrvā tathā caiva adhovakrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ? /	trINi,pUrvA taTA ca eva aDas vakrAH prakIrtitAH? /
   eṣu vāpītaḍāgādikūpabhūmitṛṇāni ca // GarP_1,59.18 //	ezu vApI taxAga Adi kUpa BUmi tRNAni ca // GarP_1,59.18 //
   devāgārasya khananaṃ nidhānakhananaṃ tathā /	devAgArasya Kananam niDAna Kananam taTA /
   gaṇitaṃ jyotiṣārambhaṃ khanibilapraveśanam // GarP_1,59.19 //	gaNitam jyotizA AramBam Kani bila praveSanam // GarP_1,59.19 //
   kuryādadhogatānyeva anyāni ca vṛṣadhvaja /	kuryAt aDas gatAni eva anyAni ca vRzaDvaja /
   revatī cāśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū // GarP_1,59.20 //	revatI ca aSvinI citrA svAtI hastA punarvasU // GarP_1,59.20 //
   anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /	anurADAH mRgaH jyezWAH ete pArSva muKAH smRtAH /
   gajoṣṭrāśvabalīvardadamanaṃ mahiṣasya ca // GarP_1,59.21 //	gaja uzwra aSva balIvarda damanam mahizasya ca // GarP_1,59.21 //
   bījānāṃ vapanaṃ kuryādgamanāgamanādikam /	bIjAnAm vapanam kuryAt gamana Agamana Adikam /
   cakrayantrarathānāṃ ca nāvādīnāṃ pravāhaṇam // GarP_1,59.22 //	cakrayantra raTAnAm ca nO= AdInAm pravAhaNam // GarP_1,59.22 //
   pārśveṣu yāni karmāṇi kuryādeteṣu tānyapi /	pArSvezu yAni karmANi kuryAt etezu tAni api /
   rohiṇyārdrāṃ tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā cottarātrayam // GarP_1,59.23 //	rohiNI ArdrAm taTA puzyA DanizWA ca uttarA trayam // GarP_1,59.23 //
   vāruṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva nava cordhvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /	vAruNam SravaNam ca eva nava ca UrDva muKAH smRtAH /
   eṣu rājyābhiṣekaṃ ca paṭṭabandhaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,59.24 //	ezu rAjya aBizekam ca pawwabanDam ca kArayet // GarP_1,59.24 //
   ūrdhvamukhyānyucchritāni sarvāṇyeteṣu kārayet /	UrDva muKyAni ucCritAni sarvANi etezu kArayet /
   caturtho cāśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā // GarP_1,59.25 //	caturTaH ca aSuBA zazWI azwamI navamI taTA // GarP_1,59.25 //
   amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tadvādaśī ca caturdaśī /	amAvAsyA pUrNimA ca tad vAdaSI ca caturdaSI /
   aśuklā pratipacchreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā // GarP_1,59.26 //	aSuklA pratipad SrezWA dvitIyA candra sUnunA // GarP_1,59.26 //
   tṛtīyā bhūmiputreṇa caturtho ca śanaiścare /	tRtIyA BUmiputreNa caturTaH ca SanEScare /
   gurau śubhā pañcamī syātṣaṣṭīmaṅgalaśukrayoḥ // GarP_1,59.27 //	gurO SuBA paQcamI syAt zazwI maFgala SukrayoH // GarP_1,59.27 //
   saptamī somaputreṇa aṣṭamī kujabhāskarau /	saptamI somaputreNa azwamI kuja BAskarO /
   navamī candravā(sau) reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā // GarP_1,59.28 //	navamI candravA( sO) reNa daSamI tu gurO SuBA // GarP_1,59.28 //
   ekādaśyā guruśukrau dvādaśyāṃ ca punarbudhaḥ /	ekAdaSyAH guru SukrO dvAdaSyAm ca punar buDaH /
   trayodaśī śukrabhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.29 //	trayodaSI Sukra BOmO SanO SrezWA caturdaSI // GarP_1,59.29 //
   paurṇamāsyapyamāvāsyā śreṣṭhā syācca bṛhaspatau /	pOrNamAsI api amAvAsyA SrezWA syAt ca bRhaspatO /
   dvādaśīṃ dahate bhānuḥ śaśī caikādaśīṃ dahet // GarP_1,59.30 //	dvAdaSIm dahate BAnuH SaSI ca ekAdaSIm dahet // GarP_1,59.30 //
   kujo dahecca daśāmīṃ navamīṃ ca budho dahet /	kujaH dahet ca daSAmIm navamIm ca buDaH dahet /
   aṣṭamīṃ dahate jīvaḥ saptamīṃ bhārgavo dahet // GarP_1,59.31 //	azwamIm dahate jIvaH saptamIm BArgavaH dahet // GarP_1,59.31 //
   sūryaputro dahetṣaṣṭhīṃ gamanādyāsu nāsti vai /	sUryaputraH dahet zazWIm gamana AdyAsu na asti vE /
   pratipannavamīṣveva caturdaśyaṣṭamīṣu ca // GarP_1,59.32 //	pratipad navamIzu eva caturdaSI azwamIzu ca // GarP_1,59.32 //
   budhavāreṇa prasthānaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet /	buDa vAreNa prasTAnam dUratas parivarjayet /
   meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyāṃ mithune 'ṣṭamī // GarP_1,59.33 //	meze karkawake zazWI kanyAyAm miTune azwamI // GarP_1,59.33 //
   vṛṣe kumbhe caturtho ca dvādaśī makare tule /	vRze kumBe caturTaH ca dvAdaSI makare tule /
   daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanurmone caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.34 //	daSamI vRScike siMhe DanuH mone caturdaSI // GarP_1,59.34 //
   etā dagdhā na gantavyaṃ pīḍādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ /	etAH dagDA na gantavyam pIxA AdiH kila mAnavEH /
   viśākhātrayamāditye pūrvāṣāḍhātraye śaśī // GarP_1,59.35 //	viSAKA trayam Aditye pUrvAzAXA traye SaSI // GarP_1,59.35 //
   dhaniṣṭhātritayaṃ bhaume budhe vai revatītrayam /	DanizWA tritayam BOme buDe vE revatI trayam /
   rohiṇyāditrayaṃ jīve śukre puṣyātrayaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.36 //	rohiNI Adi trayam jIve Sukre puzyA trayam Siva // GarP_1,59.36 //
   śanivāre varjayecca uttarāphalgunītrayam /	SanivAre varjayet ca uttarA PalgunI trayam /
   eṣu yogeṣu cotpātamṛtyurogādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,59.37 //	ezu yogezu ca utpAta mRtyu roga Adikam Bavet // GarP_1,59.37 //
   mūler'kaḥ śravaṇe candraḥ proṣṭhapadyuttare kujaḥ /	mUler akaH SravaNe candraH prozWapadI uttare kujaH /
   kṛttikāsu budhaścaiva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ // GarP_1,59.38 //	kRttikAsu buDaH ca eva gurO rudra punarvasuH // GarP_1,59.38 //
   pūrvaphalgunī śukre ca svātiścaiva śanaiśvare /	pUrva PalgunI Sukre ca svAtiH ca eva Sana ESvare /
   etai cāmṛtayogāḥ syuḥ sarvakāryaprasādhakāḥ // GarP_1,59.39 //	etE ca amRta yogAH syuH sarva kArya prasADakAH // GarP_1,59.39 //
   kālaṃ pravadhyanni?śaktidā? neṣṭamanda? /	kAlam pravaDyat ni?Sakti dA? na izwa manda? /
   parvādistu jñeyaḥ kālaḥ kālaviśāradaiḥ // GarP_1,59.40 //	parva AdiH tu jQeyaH kAlaH kAla viSAradEH // GarP_1,59.40 //
   ekīkṛtyākṣarānmātraṃ nāmnoḥ strīpuṃsayostribhiḥ /	ekIkRtya akzarAt mAtram nAmnoH strIpuMsayoH triBiH /
   bhāge dviśeṣe strīnāśaḥ pusaḥ syādekaśūnyayoḥ // GarP_1,59.41 //	BAge dvi Seze strI nASaH pusaH syAt eka SUnyayoH // GarP_1,59.41 //
   viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ /	vizkamBe GawikAH paQca SUle sapta prakIrtitAH /
   ṣaḍgaṇḍe cātigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghātavajrayoḥ // GarP_1,59.42 //	zaz gaNxe ca ati gaNxe ca nava vyAGAta vajrayoH // GarP_1,59.42 //
   vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dinedine /	vyatIpAte ca pariGe vEDRte ca dinedine /
   etai mṛtyuyutā hyeṣu sarvakarmāṇi varjayet // GarP_1,59.43 //	etE mRtyu yutAH hi ezu sarva karmANi varjayet // GarP_1,59.43 //
   haster'kaśca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā /	haster akaH ca guruH puzye anurADA buDe SuBA /
   rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumaṃ somena vai śubham // GarP_1,59.44 //	rohiNI ca SanO SrezWA sOmam somena vE SuBam // GarP_1,59.44 //
   śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā /	Sukre ca revatI SrezWA aSvinI maFgale SuBA /
   eteṣu siddhiyogā vai sarvadoṣavināśanāḥ // GarP_1,59.45 //	etezu sidDi yogAH vE sarva doza vinASanAH // GarP_1,59.45 //
   bhārgave bhaparaṇī caiva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja ! /	BArgave BaparaNI ca eva some citrA vRzaDvaja ! /
   bhaume cai vottarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara ! // GarP_1,59.46 //	BOme cE vA uttarAzAXA DanizWA ca buDe hara ! // GarP_1,59.46 //
   garau śatabhiṣā rudra ! śukre vai rohiṇī tathā /	garO SataBizA rudraH ! Sukre vE rohiNI taTA /
   śanau ca revatī śambho ! viṣayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,59.47 //	SanO ca revatI SamBo ! viza yogAH prakIrtitAH // GarP_1,59.47 //
   puṣyaḥ punarvasuścaiva revatī citrayā saha /	puzyaH punarvasuH ca eva revatI citrayA saha /
   śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hastāśvanīmṛgāstathā // GarP_1,59.48 //	SravaNam ca DanizWA ca hasta aSvanI mRgAH taTA // GarP_1,59.48 //
   kuryācchatabhiṣāyāṃ ca jātakarmādi mānavaḥ /	kuryAt SataBizAyAm ca jAtakarma Adi mAnavaH /
   viśākhā cottarātrīṇi maghārdrā bharaṇī tathā /	viSAKA ca uttarA trINi maGA ArdrA BaraNI taTA /
   āśleṣā kṛttikā rudra ! prasthāne maraṇapradāḥ // GarP_1,59.49 //	ASlezA kRttikAH rudraH ! prasTAne maraNa pradAH // GarP_1,59.49 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre nakzatrataddevatAdagDayogAdinirUpaNam nAma ekonazazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  60	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 60
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   ṣaḍāditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ /	zaz Aditye daSA jQeyA some paQcadaSa smRtAH /
   aṣṭāvaṅgārake cava budhai spatadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,60.1 //	azwO= aFgArake cava buDE spatadaSa smRtAH // GarP_1,60.1 //
   śanaiścare daśa jñeyā gurorekonaviṃśatiḥ /	SanEScare daSa jQeyA guroH ekonaviMSatiH /
   rāhordvādaśavarṣāṇi ekaviṃśatirbhārgave // GarP_1,60.2 //	rAhoH dvAdaSa varzANi ekaviMSatiH BArgave // GarP_1,60.2 //
   raverdaśā duḥ khadā syādudveganṛpanāśakṛt /	raveH daSA duH KadA syAt udvega nRpa nASa kRt /
   vibhūtidā somadaśā sukhamiṣṭānnadā tathā // GarP_1,60.3 //	viBUti dA soma daSA suKam izwa anna dA taTA // GarP_1,60.3 //
   duḥ khapradā kujadaśā rājyādeḥ syādvināśinī /	duH Ka pradA kuja daSA rAjya AdeH syAt vinASinI /
   divyastrīdā budhadaśā rājyadā kośavṛddhidā // GarP_1,60.4 //	divya strIdA buDa daSA rAjya dA koSa vRdDi dA // GarP_1,60.4 //
   śanerdaśā rājyanāśabandhuduḥ khakarī bhavet /	SaneH daSA rAjya nASa banDuduH Ka karI Bavet /
   gurordaśā rājyadā syātsukhadharmādidāyinī // GarP_1,60.5 //	guroH daSA rAjya dA syAt suKa Darma Adi dAyinI // GarP_1,60.5 //
   rāhordaśā rājyanāśavyādhidā duḥ khadā bhavet /	rAhoH daSA rAjya nASa vyADi dA duH KadA Bavet /
   hastyaśvadā śukradaśā rājyastrīlābhadā bhavet // GarP_1,60.6 //	hasti aSva dA Sukra daSA rAjya strI lABa dA Bavet // GarP_1,60.6 //
   meṣa aṅgārakakṣetraṃ vṛṣaḥ śukrasya kīrtitaḥ /	meza aFgAraka kzetram vRzaH Sukrasya kIrtitaH /
   mithunasya budho jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca // GarP_1,60.7 //	miTunasya buDaH jQeyaH somaH karkawakasya ca // GarP_1,60.7 //
   sūryakṣetraṃ bhavetsiṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetraṃ budhasya ca /	sUrya kzetram Bavet siMhaH kanyA kzetram buDasya ca /
   bhārgavasya tulā kṣetraṃ vṛścikoṅgārakasya ca // GarP_1,60.8 //	BArgavasya tulA kzetram vRScikoFgArakasya ca // GarP_1,60.8 //
   dhanuḥ sura guroścaiva śanermakarakumbhakau /	DanuH sura guroH ca eva SaneH makara kumBakO /
   mīnaḥ suraguroścaiva grahakṣetraṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_1,60.9 //	mInaH suraguroH ca eva graha kzetram prakIrtitam // GarP_1,60.9 //
   paurṇamāsyādvayaṃ tatra pūrvāṣāḍhādvayaṃ bhavet /	pOrNamAsya advayam tatra pUrvAzAXA dvayam Bavet /
   dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe // GarP_1,60.10 //	dvis AzAXaH sa vijQeyaH vizNuH svapiti karkawe // GarP_1,60.10 //
   aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā syādalaṅkṛtau /	aSvinI revatI citrA DanizWA syAt alaFkRtO /
   mṛgāhikapimārjāraśvānaḥ sūkarapakṣiṇaḥ // GarP_1,60.11 //	mRga ahi kapi mArjAra SvAnaH sUkara pakziNaH // GarP_1,60.11 //
   nakulo mūṣakaścaiva yātrāyāṃ dakṣiṇe śubhaḥ /	nakulaH mUzakaH ca eva yAtrAyAm dakziNe SuBaH /
   viprakanyā śivā eṣāṃ śaṅkhabherīvasundharāḥ // GarP_1,60.12 //	vipra kanyA SivAH ezAm SaFKa BerI vasunDarAH // GarP_1,60.12 //
   veṇustrīpūrṇakumbhāśca yātrāyāṃ darśanaṃ śubham /	veNu strI pUrNa kumBAH ca yAtrAyAm darSanam SuBam /
   jambūkoṣṭrakharādyāśca yātrāyāṃ vāmake śubhāḥ // GarP_1,60.13 //	jambUka uzwra Kara AdyAH ca yAtrAyAm vAmake SuBAH // GarP_1,60.13 //
   kārpāsauṣadhitailaṃ ca pakrāṅgārabhujaṅgamāḥ /	kArpAsa ozaDi tElam ca pakra aFgAra BujaFgamAH /
   muktakeśī raktamālyanagnādyaśubhamīkṣitam // GarP_1,60.14 //	muktakeSI rakta mAlya nagna Adi aSuBam Ikzitam // GarP_1,60.14 //
   hakrāya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye labhatpūrve mahāphalam /	hakrAya lakzaNam vakzye laBat pUrve mahA Palam /
   āgneye śokasantāpau dakṣiṇe hānimāpnuyāt // GarP_1,60.15 //	Agneye Soka santApO dakziNe hAnim ApnuyAt // GarP_1,60.15 //
   nairṛtya śokasantāpau miṣṭānnaṃ caiva paścime /	nErRtya Soka santApO mizwAnnam ca eva paScime /
   artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahobhavet // GarP_1,60.16 //	arTa prApnoti vAyavye uttare kalahoBavet // GarP_1,60.16 //
   īśāne maraṇaṃ proktaṃ hikkāyāścaphalāphalam /	ISAne maraNam proktam hikkAyAH ca Pala aPalam /
   vilikhya ravicakraṃ tu bhāskaro narasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,60.17 //	viliKya ravi cakram tu BAskaraH nara sanniBaH // GarP_1,60.17 //
   yasminnṛkṣe vasadbhānustadāndi trīṇi mastake /	yasmin= Rkze vasat BAnuH tadA andi trINi mastake /
   trayaṃ vakre pradātavyamekaikaṃ skandhayornyaset // GarP_1,60.18 //	trayam vakre pradAtavyam ekEkam skanDayoH nyaset // GarP_1,60.18 //
   ekaikaṃ bāhuyugme tu ekaika hastayordvayoḥ /	ekEkam bAhu yugme tu ekEka hastayoH dvayoH /
   hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekaṃ nābhau pradāpayet // GarP_1,60.19 //	hRdaye paQca RkzANi ekam nABO pradApayet // GarP_1,60.19 //
   ṛkṣamekaṃ nyasedguhye ekaikaṃ jānuke nyaset /	Rkzam ekam nyaset guhye ekEkam jAnuke nyaset /
   nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravipāde niyojayet // GarP_1,60.20 //	nakzatrANi ca SezANi ravi pAde niyojayet // GarP_1,60.20 //
   caraṇasyena ṛkṣeṇa alpāyurjāyate naraḥ /	caraNasyena RkzeNa alpa AyuH jAyate naraH /
   vidaśagamanaṃ jānau guhyasthe paradāravān // GarP_1,60.21 //	vidaSa gamanam jAnO guhya sTe para dAravAn // GarP_1,60.21 //
   nābhisthenālpasantuṣṭo hṛtsthena syānmaheśvaraḥ /	nABi sTena alpa santuzwaH hRd sTena syAt maheSvaraH /
   pāṇisthena bhaveccauraḥ sthānabhraṣṭo bhaveddhaja // GarP_1,60.22 //	pANi sTena Bavet cOraH sTAna BrazwaH Bavet Daja // GarP_1,60.22 //
   skandhasthite dhanapatirmukhe miṣṭānnamāpnuyāt /	skanDa sTite DanapatiH muKe mizwa annam ApnuyAt /
   mastake padṛvastraṃ syānnakṣatraṃ yadi sthitam // GarP_1,60.23 //	mastake padR vastram syAt nakzatram yadi sTitam // GarP_1,60.23 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍaṃ prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxam praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre grahadaSAdinirUpaNam nAma zazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  61	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 61
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   saptamopacayādyasthaścandraḥ sarvatra śobhanaḥ /	saptama upacaya Adya sTaH candraH sarvatra SoBanaH /
   śuklapakṣe dvitīyastu pañcamo navamastathā // GarP_1,61.1 //	Sukla pakze dvitIyaH tu paQcamaH navamaH taTA // GarP_1,61.1 //
   saṃpūjyamāno lokaistu guruvaddṛśyate śaśī /	saMpUjyamAnaH lokEH tu guru vat dRSyate SaSI /
   candrasya dvādaśāvasthā bhavanti śṛṇu tā api // GarP_1,61.2 //	candrasya dvAdaSa avasTAH Bavanti SRNu tAH api // GarP_1,61.2 //
   triṣutriṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu aśvinyādi vadāmyaham /	trizutrizu ca Rkzezu aSvinI Adi vadAmi aham /
   pravāsasthaṃ punardṛṣṭaṃ mṛtāvasthaṃ jayāvaham // GarP_1,61.3 //	pravAsa sTam punar dRzwam mRta avasTam jaya Avaham // GarP_1,61.3 //
   hāsyāvasthaṃ natā(krīḍā) vasthaṃ pramodāvasthameva ca /	ha asya avasTam na tA( krIxA) vasTam pramoda avasTam eva ca /
   viṣādāvasthabhogasthe jvarāvasthaṃ vyavasthitam // GarP_1,61.4 //	vizAda avasTa Boga sTe jvara avasTam vyavasTitam // GarP_1,61.4 //
   kampā(nyā) vasthaṃ sukhāvasthaṃ dvādaśāvasthagaṃ bhavet /	kampa a(nyA) vasTam suKa avasTam dvAdaSa avasTa gam Bavet /
   pravāso hānimṛnyṛ ca jayo hāseratiḥ sukham // GarP_1,61.5 //	pravAsaH hAnimRnyR ca jayaH hAseratiH suKam // GarP_1,61.5 //
   śoko bhogo jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukhaṃ ceti kramātphalam /	SokaH BogaH jvaraH kampaH suKam ca iti kramAt Palam /
   janmasthaḥ kurute tuṣṭiṃ dvitīye nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,61.6 //	janma sTaH kurute tuzwim dvitIye na asti nirvRtiH // GarP_1,61.6 //
   tṛtīye rājasanmānaṃ caturthe kalahāgamaḥ /	tRtIye rAja sat mAnam caturTe kalaha AgamaH /
   pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strīlābho vai tathā bhavet // GarP_1,61.7 //	paQcamena mRgAFkena strI lABaH vE taTA Bavet // GarP_1,61.7 //
   ghanadhānyāgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame /	Gana DAnya AgamaH zazWe ratiH pUjA ca saptame /
   aṣṭame prāṇasandeho navame kośasañcayaḥ // GarP_1,61.8 //	azwame prANa sandehaH navame koSa saQcayaH // GarP_1,61.8 //
   daśame kāryaniṣpattidhruvamekādaśe jayaḥ /	daSame kArya nizpatti Druvam ekAdaSe jayaH /
   dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyureva na saṃkhayaḥ // GarP_1,61.9 //	dvAdaSena SaSAFkena mRtyuH eva na saMKayaH // GarP_1,61.9 //
   kṛttikādau ca pūrveṇa saptarkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet /	kRttikA AdO ca pUrveNa sapta RkzANi ca vE vrajet /
   maghādau dakṣiṇe gacchedanurādhādi paścime // GarP_1,61.10 //	maGA AdO dakziNe gacCet anurADA Adi paScime // GarP_1,61.10 //
   praśastā cottara yātrā dhaniṣṭhādiṣu saptasu /	praSastA ca uttara yAtrA DanizWA Adizu saptasu /
   aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau // GarP_1,61.11 //	aSvinI revatI citrA DanizWA samalaFkRtO // GarP_1,61.11 //
   mṛgāśvicitrāpuṣyāśca mūlā hastā śubhāḥ sadā /	mRga aSvi citrA puzyAH ca mUlAH hastA SuBAH sadA /
   kanyāpradāne yātrāyāṃ pratiṣṭhādiṣu karmasu // GarP_1,61.12 //	kanyA pradAne yAtrAyAm pratizWA Adizu karmasu // GarP_1,61.12 //
   śukracandrau hi janmasthau śubhadau ca dvitīyake /	Sukra candrO hi janma sTO SuBa dO ca dvitIyake /
   śaśijñaśukrajīvāśca rāśau rāśau cātha tṛtīyake // GarP_1,61.13 //	SaSi jQa Sukra jIvAH ca rASO rASO ca aTa tRtIyake // GarP_1,61.13 //
   bhaumamandaśaśāṅkārkā budhaḥ śreṣṭhaścaturthake /	BOma manda SaSAFka arkAH buDaH SrezWaH caturTake /
   śukrajīvau pañcame ca candraketusamāhitau // GarP_1,61.14 //	Sukra jIvO paQcame ca candra ketu samAhitO // GarP_1,61.14 //
   mandākārai ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe gurucandrau ca saptame /	manda AkArE ca kujaH zazWe guru candrO ca saptame /
   jñaśukrāvaṣṭame śreṣṭhau navamastho guruḥ śubhaḥ // GarP_1,61.15 //	jQa SukrO= azwame SrezWO navama sTaH guruH SuBaH // GarP_1,61.15 //
   arkārkicandrā daśame grahā ekādaśe khilāḥ /	arka Arki candrAH daSame grahAH ekAdaSe KilAH /
   budho 'tha dvādaśe caiva bhārgavaḥ sukhado bhavet // GarP_1,61.16 //	buDaH aTa dvAdaSe ca eva BArgavaH suKa daH Bavet // GarP_1,61.16 //
   siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣa uttamaḥ /	siMhena makaraH SrezWaH kanyayA mezaH uttamaH /
   tulayā saha mīnastu kumbhena sahakarkaṭaḥ // GarP_1,61.17 //	tulayA saha mInaH tu kumBena saha karkawaH // GarP_1,61.17 //
   dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭho mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ /	DanuzA vRzaBaH SrezWaH miTunena ca vRScikaH /
   etatṣaḍaṣṭakaṃ?prītyai bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,61.18 //	etat zaz azwakaM?prItyE Bavati eva na saMSayaH // GarP_1,61.18 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre grahāṇāṃ śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre grahANAm SuBASuBasTAnAdinirUpaNam nAma ekapazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre lagnaGawikA pramANAdinirUpaNam nAma dvizazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  63	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 63
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  63	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 63
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   narastrīlakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye saṃkṣapācchṛṇu śaṅkara /	nara strI lakzaNam vakzye saMkzapAt SRNu SaFkara /
   asvedinau mṛdutalau kamalodarasannibhau // GarP_1,63.1 //	asvedinO mRdu talO kamala udara sanniBO // GarP_1,63.1 //
   śliṣṭāṅgulī tāmranakhau sugulphau śirayojjhitau /	Slizwa aFgulI tAmra naKO su gulPO SirayA ujJitO /
   kūrmonnatau ca caraṇau syātāṃ nṛpavarasya hi // GarP_1,63.2 //	kUrma unnatO ca caraNO syAtAm nRpa varasya hi // GarP_1,63.2 //
   virūkṣapāṇḍuranakhau vakrau caiva śirānatau /	virUkza pANxura naKO vakrO ca eva SirAnatO /
   sūrpākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau viralāṅgulī // GarP_1,63.3 //	sUrpa AkArO ca caraNO saMKuzkO virala aFgulI // GarP_1,63.3 //
   duḥ khadāridyadau syātā nātra kāryāṃ vicāraṇā /	duH KadAridya dO syAtA na atra kAryAm vicAraNA /
   alparomayutā śreṣṭhā jaṅghā hastikaropamā // GarP_1,63.4 //	alpa roma yutA SrezWA jaFGA hasti kara upamA // GarP_1,63.4 //
   romaikaikaṃ kūpake syādbhūpānāṃ tu mahātmanām /	roma ekEkam kUpake syAt BUpAnAm tu mahAtmanAm /
   dvedve romṇī paṇḍitānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,63.5 //	dvedve romNI paNxitAnAm SrotriyANAm taTA eva ca // GarP_1,63.5 //
   romatrayaṃ daridrāṇāṃ rogī nirmāṃsajānukaḥ /	roma trayam daridrANAm rogI nirmAMsa jAnukaH /
   alpaliṅgī ca dhanavānsyācca putrādivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,63.6 //	alpa liFgI ca DanavAn syAt ca putra Adi varjitaH // GarP_1,63.6 //
   sthūlaliṅgo daridraḥ syāddukhyekavṛṣṇī bhavet /	sTUlaliFgaH daridraH syAt duKi eka vRzNI Bavet /
   viṣamestrīcañcalo vai nṛpaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe same // GarP_1,63.7 //	vizameH trI caQcalaH vE nRpaH syAt vRzaNe same // GarP_1,63.7 //
   pralambavṛṣaṇo 'lpāyurnirdravyaḥ kumaṇirbhavet /	pralamba vRzaNaH alpa AyuH nirdravyaH kumaNiH Bavet /
   pāṇḍurairmalinaiścaiva maṇibhiśca sukhī naraḥ // GarP_1,63.8 //	pANxurEH malinEH ca eva maNiBiH ca suKI naraH // GarP_1,63.8 //
   niḥ svāḥ saśabdamūtrāḥ syurnṛpā niḥśabdadhārayā /	niH svAH sa Sabda mUtrAH syuH nRpAH niHSabda DArayA /
   bhogāḍhyāḥ samajaṭharā niḥ svāḥ syurghaṭasannibhāḥ // GarP_1,63.9 //	Boga AXyAH sama jaWarAH niH svAH syuH Gawa sanniBAH // GarP_1,63.9 //
   sarpodarā daridrāḥ syū rekhābhiścāyurucyate /	sarpa udarAH daridrAH syuH reKABiH ca AyuH ucyate /
   lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisro rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ // GarP_1,63.10 //	lalAwe yasya dRSyante tisraH reKAH samAhitAH // GarP_1,63.10 //
   sukhī putrasamāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭiṃ jīvate naraḥ /	suKI putra samAyuktaH sa zazwim jIvate naraH /
   catvāriṃśacca varṣāṇi dvirekhādarśanānnaraḥ // GarP_1,63.11 //	catvAriMSat ca varzANi dvi reKA darSanAt naraH // GarP_1,63.11 //
   viṃśatyabdaṃ tvekarekhā ākarṇāntāḥ śatāyuṣaḥ // GarP_1,63.12 //	viMSati abdam tu eka reKAH AkarNa antAH Sata AyuzaH // GarP_1,63.12 //
   saptatyāyurdvirekhā tu ṣaṣṭyāyustisṛbhirbhavet /	saptati AyuH dvi reKA tu zazwi AyuH tisRBiH Bavet /
   vyaktāvyaktābhī rekhābhirviṃśatyāyurbhavennaraḥ // GarP_1,63.13 //	vyakta avyaktABiH reKABiH viMSati AyuH Bavet naraH // GarP_1,63.13 //
   catvāriṃśacca varṣāṇi hīnarekhastu jīvati /	catvAriMSat ca varzANi hIna reKaH tu jIvati /
   bhinnābhiścaiva rekhābhirapamṛtyurnarasya hi // GarP_1,63.14 //	BinnABiH ca eva reKABiH apamRtyuH narasya hi // GarP_1,63.14 //
   triśūlaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ vāpi lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /	triSUlam pawwiSam vA api lalAwe yasya dRSyate /
   dhanaputra samāyuktaḥ sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.15 //	Dana putra samAyuktaH sa jIvet SaradaH Satam // GarP_1,63.15 //
   tarjanyā madhyamāṅgulyā āyūrekhā tu madhyataḥ /	tarjanyAH maDyama aFgulyA AyUreKA tu maDyatas /
   saṃprāptā yā bhavedrudra ! sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.16 //	saMprAptA yA Bavet rudra ! sa jIvet SaradaH Satam // GarP_1,63.16 //
   prathamā jñānarekhā tu hyaṅguṣṭhādanuvartate /	praTamA jQAna reKA tu hi aFguzWAt anuvartate /
   madhyamāmūlagā rekhā āyūrekhā ataḥ param // GarP_1,63.17 //	maDyamA mUla gAH reKAH AyUreKAH atas param // GarP_1,63.17 //
   kaniṣṭhikāṃ samāśritya āyūrekhā samāviśet /	kanizWikAm samASritya AyUreKA samAviSet /
   acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.18 //	acCinnA vA viBaktA vA sa jIvet SaradaH Satam // GarP_1,63.18 //
   yasya pāṇitale rekhā āyustasya prakāśayet /	yasya pANi tale reKA AyuH tasya prakASayet /
   śatavarṣāṇi jīvecca bhogī rudra ! na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,63.19 //	Sata varzANi jIvet ca BogI rudraH ! na saMSayaH // GarP_1,63.19 //
   kaniṣṭhikāṃ samāśritya madhyamāyāmupāgatā /	kanizWikAm samASritya maDyamAyAm upAgatA /
   ṣaṣṭhivarṣāyuṣaṃ kuryādāyūrekhā tu mānavam // GarP_1,63.20 //	zazWi varza Ayuzam kuryAt AyUreKA tu mAnavam // GarP_1,63.20 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre sAmudrike puMllakzaNanirUpaNam nAma trizazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  64	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 64
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśā mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalam /	yasyAH tu kuQcitAH keSAH muKam ca parimaNxalam /
   nābhiśca dakṣiṇāvartā sā kanyā kulavardhinī // GarP_1,64.1 //	nABiH ca dakziNa AvartA sA kanyA kula varDinI // GarP_1,64.1 //
   yā ca kāñcanavarṇābhā raktahastasaroruhā /	yA ca kAQcana varNa ABA rakta hasta saroruhA /
   sahasrāṇāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ bhavetsāpi pativratā // GarP_1,64.2 //	sahasrANAm tu nArINAm Bavet sa api pativratA // GarP_1,64.2 //
   vakrakeśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍalākṣī ca yā bhavet /	vakra keSA ca yA kanyA maNxalAkzI ca yA Bavet /
   bhartā ca mriyate tasyā niyataṃ duḥ khabhāginī // GarP_1,64.3 //	BartA ca mriyate tasyAH niyatam duH Ka BAginI // GarP_1,64.3 //
   pūrṇacandramukhī kanyā bālasūryasamaprabhā /	pUrNa candra muKI kanyA bAla sUrya sama praBA /
   viśālanetrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham // GarP_1,64.4 //	viSAla netrA bimbozWI sA kanyA laBate suKam // GarP_1,64.4 //
   rekhābhirbahubhiḥ kleśaṃ svalpābhirdhanahīnatā /	reKABiH bahuBiH kleSam svalpABiH Dana hIna tA /
   raktābhiḥ sukhamāpnoti kṛṣṇābhiḥ preṣyatāṃvrajet // GarP_1,64.5 //	raktABiH suKam Apnoti kRzNABiH prezya tAM vrajet // GarP_1,64.5 //
   kārye ca mantrī satstrī syātsatī (khī) syātkaraṇeṣu ca /	kArye ca mantrI sat strI syAt satI (KI) syAt karaNezu ca /
   streheṣu bhāryā mātā syādveśyā ca śayane śubhā // GarP_1,64.6 //	strehezu BAryA mAtA syAt veSyA ca Sayane SuBAH // GarP_1,64.6 //
   aṅkuśaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ yasyāḥ pāṇitale bhavet /	aFkuSam kuNxalam cakram yasyAH pANi tale Bavet /
   putraṃ prasūyate nārī narendraṃ labhate patim // GarP_1,64.7 //	putram prasUyate nArI narendram laBate patim // GarP_1,64.7 //
   yasyāstu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau /	yasyAH tu romaSO pArSvO romaSO ca payoDarO /
   annatau cādharoṣṭhau ca kṣipraṃ mārayate patim // GarP_1,64.8 //	annatO ca aDara uzWO ca kzipram mArayate patim // GarP_1,64.8 //
   yasyāḥ pāṇitale rekhā prākārastoraṇaṃ bhavet /	yasyAH pANi tale reKA prAkAraH toraNam Bavet /
   api dāsakule jātā rājñītvamupagacchati // GarP_1,64.9 //	api dAsa kule jAtAH rAjQI tvam upagacCati // GarP_1,64.9 //
   udvṛttā kapilā yasya romarājī nirantaram /	udvRttA kapilA yasya romarAjI nirantaram /
   api rājakule jātā dāsītvamupagacchati // GarP_1,64.10 //	api rAja kule jAtA dAsI tvam upagacCati // GarP_1,64.10 //
   yasyā anāmikāṅguṣṭhau pṛthivyāṃ naiva tiṣṭhataḥ /	yasyAH anAmikA aFguzWO pRTivyAm na eva tizWataH /
   patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.11 //	patim mArayate kzipram sva icCA AcAreNa vartate // GarP_1,64.11 //
   yasyā gamanamātreṇa bhūmikampaḥ prajāyate /	yasyAH gamana mAtreNa BUmikampaH prajAyate /
   patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.12 //	patim mArayate kzipram sva icCA AcAreNa vartate // GarP_1,64.12 //
   cakṣuḥ snehena saubhāgyaṃ dantasnehena bhojanam /	cakzuH snehena sOBAgyam danta snehena Bojanam /
   tvacaḥ snehena śāyyāṃ ca pādasnehena vāhanam // GarP_1,64.13 //	tvacaH snehena SAyyAm ca pAda snehena vAhanam // GarP_1,64.13 //
   snigdhonnatau tāmranakhau nāryāśca caraṇau śubhau /	snigDa unnatO tAmra naKO nAryAH ca caraNO SuBO /
   matsyāṅkuśābjacihnau ca cakralāṅgalalakṣitau // GarP_1,64.14 //	matsya aFkuSa abja cihnO ca cakra lAFgala lakzitO // GarP_1,64.14 //
   asvedinau mūdutalau praśastau caraṇau striyāḥ /	asvedinO mUdu talO praSastO caraNO striyAH /
   śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hastikaropamau // GarP_1,64.15 //	SuBe jaFGe virome ca UrU hasti kara upamO // GarP_1,64.15 //
   aśvatthapatrasadṛśaṃ vipulaṃ guhyamuttamam /	aSvatTa patra sadRSam vipulam guhyam uttamam /
   nābhiḥ praśastā gambhīrā dakṣiṇāvartikā śubhā /	nABiH praSastA gamBIrA dakziNa AvartikA SuBA /
   aromā trivalī nāryā hṛtstanau romavarjitau // GarP_1,64.16 //	aromA trivalI nAryAH hRd stanO roma varjitO // GarP_1,64.16 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre sAmudrike strIlakzaNanirUpaNam nAma catuH zazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  65	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 65
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   samudroktaṃ pravakṣyāmi narastrīlakṣaṇaṃ śubham /	samudra uktam pravakzyAmi nara strI lakzaNam SuBam /
   yena vijñātamātreṇa atītānāgatāpramā // GarP_1,65.1 //	yena vijQAta mAtreNa atIta anAgatA pramA // GarP_1,65.1 //
   asvedinau mṛdutalau kamalodarasannibhau /	asvedinO mRdu talO kamala udara sanniBO /
   śleṣṭāṅgulī tāmranakhau pādāviṣṇau śirojjhitau // GarP_1,65.2 //	Slezwa aFgulI tAmra naKO pAda AvizNO Sira ujJitO // GarP_1,65.2 //
   kūrmonnatau gūḍhagulphau supārṣṇo nṛpateḥ smṛtau /	kUrma unnatO gUXa gulPO su pArzNaH nRpateH smRtO /
   śū(sar) pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau // GarP_1,65.3 //	SU(sar) pAkArO virUkzO ca vakrO pAdO SirAlakO // GarP_1,65.3 //
   saṃśuṣkau pāṇḍuranakhau niḥ svasya viralāṅgulī /	saMSuzkO pANxura naKO niH svasya virala aFgulI /
   mārgāyotkaṇṭakau pādau kaṣāyasadṛśau tathā // GarP_1,65.4 //	mArgAya utkaNwakO pAdO kazAya sadRSO taTA // GarP_1,65.4 //
   vicchittidau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku (pakra) sannibhau /	vicCitti dO ca vaMSasya brahman GO SaFku (pakra) sanniBO /
   agamyāgamane prītau jaṅghā viralaromikā // GarP_1,65.5 //	agamyA gamane prItO jaFGA virala romikAH // GarP_1,65.5 //
   mṛduromā samā jaṅghā tathā karikaraprabhā /	mRduromA samA jaFGA taTA kari kara praBA /
   ūravo jānavastulyā nṛpasyopacitāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,65.6 //	UravaH jAnavaH tulyAH nRpasya upacitAH smRtAH // GarP_1,65.6 //
   niḥ svasya sṛgālajaṅghā raumaikaikaṃ cakūpake /	niH svasya sRgAlajaFGA rOma ekEkam cakUpake /
   nṛpāṇāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dvedve śriye ca dhīmatām // GarP_1,65.7 //	nRpANAm SrotriyANAm ca dvedve Sriye ca DImatAm // GarP_1,65.7 //
   tryādyairniḥ svā mānavāḥ syurduḥ svabhājaśca ninditāḥ /	tri AdyEH niH svAH mAnavAH syuH duH sva BAjaH ca ninditAH /
   keśāśca vai kuñcitāśca pravāse mriyate naraḥ // GarP_1,65.8 //	keSAH ca vE kuQcitAH ca pravAse mriyate naraH // GarP_1,65.8 //
   nirmāṃsajānuḥ saubhāgyamalpairnimnai ratiḥ striyāḥ /	nirmAMsa jAnuH sOBAgyam alpEH nimnEH ratiH striyAH /
   vikaṭaiśca daridrāḥ syuḥ samāṃsai rājyameva ca // GarP_1,65.9 //	vikawEH ca daridrAH syuH sa mAMsEH rAjyam eva ca // GarP_1,65.9 //
   mahadbhirāyurākhyātaṃ hyalpaliṅgo dhanī naraḥ /	mahadBiH AyuH AKyAtam hi alpa liFgaH DanI naraH /
   apatyarahitaścaiva sthūlaliṅgo ghanojjhitaḥ // GarP_1,65.10 //	apatya rahitaH ca eva sTUla liFgaH Gana ujJitaH // GarP_1,65.10 //
   meḍhe vāmanate caiva sutārtharahito bhavet /	meXe vAmanate ca eva suta arTa rahitaH Bavet /
   vakre 'nyathā putravāntsyāddāridrayaṃ vinatetvadhaḥ // GarP_1,65.11 //	vakre anyaTA putravAn tsyAt dAridrayam vinatetu aDas // GarP_1,65.11 //
   alpe tvatanayo liṅgeśirāle 'tha sukhī naraḥ /	alpe tu atanayaH liFgeSirAle aTa suKI naraH /
   sthūlagranthiyute liṅge bhavetputrādisaṃyutaḥ // GarP_1,65.12 //	sTUla granTi yute liFge Bavet putra Adi saMyutaH // GarP_1,65.12 //
   kośagūḍhe dīrghairbhugnaiśca dhanavarjitaḥ /	koSa gUXe dIrGEH BugnEH ca Dana varjitaH /
   balavānyuddhaśīlaśca laghuśektaḥ sa eva ca // GarP_1,65.13 //	balavAn yudDa SIlaH ca laGu SektaH saH eva ca // GarP_1,65.13 //
   durbalastvekavṛṣaṇo viṣamābhyāñcalaḥ striyām /	durbalaH tu eka vRzaNaH vizama aByAQcalaH striyAm /
   samābhyāṃ kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śatābdavān // GarP_1,65.14 //	samAByAm kzitipaH proktaH pralambena Sata abdavAn // GarP_1,65.14 //
   udvṛṃ (ddha) tābhyāṃ ca bahvāyū rūkṣairmaṇibhirīśvaraḥ /	udvRm (dDa) tAByAm ca bahu AyuH rUkzEH maNiBiH ISvaraH /
   pāṇḍarairmaṇibhirniḥ svā malinaiḥ sukhabhāginaḥ // GarP_1,65.15 //	pANxarEH maNiBiH niH svAH malinEH suKa BAginaH // GarP_1,65.15 //
   saśabdaniḥ śabdamūtrāḥ syudaṃridrāśca mānavāḥ /	sa Sabda niH Sabda mUtrAH syudaMridrAH ca mAnavAH /
   ekadvitricatuḥ pañcaṣaḍbhirdhārābhireva ca // GarP_1,65.16 //	eka dvi tri catuH paQca zaxBiH DArABiH eva ca // GarP_1,65.16 //
   dakṣiṇāvartacalitamūtrā bhiśca nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ /	dakziNa Avarta calita mUtrAH BiH ca nRpAH smRtAH /
   vikīrṇamūtrā niḥ svāśca pradhānasukhadāyikāḥ // GarP_1,65.17 //	vikIrNa mUtrAH niH svAH ca praDAna suKa dAyikAH // GarP_1,65.17 //
   ekadhārāśca vanitāḥ snigdhairmaṇibhirunnataiḥ /	eka DArAH ca vanitAH snigDEH maNiBiH unnatEH /
   samaiḥ strīratnadhanino madhye nimnaiśca kanyakāḥ // GarP_1,65.18 //	samEH strI ratna DaninaH maDye nimnEH ca kanyakAH // GarP_1,65.18 //
   śuṣkairniśvā viśuṣkaiśca durbhagāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /	SuzkEH niSvAH viSuzkEH ca durBagAH parikIrtitAH /
   puṣpagandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhugandhe dhanaṃ bahuḥ // GarP_1,65.19 //	puzpa ganDe nRpAH Sukre maDu ganDe Danam bahuH // GarP_1,65.19 //
   putrāḥ śukre matsyagandhe tanuśukre ca kanyakāḥ /	putrAH Sukre matsya ganDe tanu Sukre ca kanyakAH /
   mahābhogī māṃsagandhe yajvā syānmadagandhini // GarP_1,65.20 //	mahA BogI mAMsa ganDe yajvA syAt mada ganDini // GarP_1,65.20 //
   daridraḥ kṣāragandhe ca dīrghāyuḥ śīghramaithunī /	daridraH kzAraganDe ca dIrGa AyuH SIGra mETunI /
   aśīghramaithunyalpāyuḥ sthūlasphik syāddhanojjhitaḥ // GarP_1,65.21 //	aSIGra mETunI alpa AyuH sTUla sPic syAt Dana ujJitaH // GarP_1,65.21 //
   māṃsalasphik sukhī syācca siṃhasphik bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ /	mAMsala sPic suKI syAt ca siMha sPic BUpatiH smRtaH /
   bhavetsiṃhakaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapikaṭirnaraḥ // GarP_1,65.22 //	Bavet siMha kawI rAjA niH svar kapi kawiH naraH // GarP_1,65.22 //
   sarpodarā daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiśca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ /	sarpa udarAH daridrAH syuH piWarEH ca GawEH samEH /
   dhanino vipulaiḥ pārśvairniḥ svā raktaiśca nimnagaiḥ // GarP_1,65.23 //	DaninaH vipulEH pArSvEH niH svA raktEH ca nimnagEH // GarP_1,65.23 //
   samakakṣāśca bhogāḍhyā nimnakakṣā dhanojjhitāḥ /	sama kakzAH ca Boga AXyAH nimna kakzAH Dana ujJitAH /
   nṛpāśconnatakakṣāḥ syurjihnā viṣamakakṣakāḥ // GarP_1,65.24 //	nRpAH ca unnata kakzAH syuH jihnAH vizama kakzakAH // GarP_1,65.24 //
   matsyodarā bahudhanā nābhibhiḥ sukhinaḥ smṛtāḥ /	matsya udarAH bahu DanAH nABiBiH suKinaH smRtAH /
   vistīrṇābhirbahulābhirnimnābhiḥ kleśabhāginaḥ // GarP_1,65.25 //	vistIrNABiH bahulABiH nimnABiH kleSa BAginaH // GarP_1,65.25 //
   balimadhyagatā nābhiḥ śūlabādhāṃ karoti hi /	bali maDya gatA nABiH SUla bADAm karoti hi /
   vāmāvartaśca sādhyaṃ vai medhāṃ dakṣiṇatastathā // GarP_1,65.26 //	vAmAvartaH ca sADyam vE meDAm dakziNatas taTA // GarP_1,65.26 //
   pārśvāyatā cirāyurdā tūpaviṣṭā dhaneśvaram /	pArSva AyatA cira AyuH dA tu upavizwAH DaneSvaram /
   adho gavāḍhyaṃ kuryācca nṛpatvaṃ padmakarṇikā // GarP_1,65.27 //	aDas gavA AXyam kuryAt ca nRpa tvam padma karNikAH // GarP_1,65.27 //
   ekabaliḥ śatāyuḥ syācchrībhogī dvivaliḥ smṛtaḥ /	ekabaliH SatAyuH syAt SrI BogI dvi valiH smRtaH /
   trivaliḥ kṣmāpa ācārya ṛjubhirvālibhiḥ sukhī // GarP_1,65.28 //	tri valiH kzmApaH AcAryaH RjuBiH vAliBiH suKI // GarP_1,65.28 //
   agamyāgāmī jihmabalirbhūpāḥ pārśvaiśca māṃsalaiḥ /	agamyA gAmI jihma baliH BUpAH pArSvEH ca mAMsalEH /
   mṛdubhiḥ susamaiścaiva dakṣiṇāvartaromabhiḥ // GarP_1,65.29 //	mRduBiH su samEH ca eva dakziNa Avarta romaBiH // GarP_1,65.29 //
   viparītaiḥ parapreṣyā nirdravyāḥ sukhavarjitāḥ /	viparItEH para prezyAH nirdravyAH suKa varjitAH /
   anuddhataiścūcukaiśca bhavanti subhagā narāḥ // GarP_1,65.30 //	anudDatEH cUcukEH ca Bavanti suBagAH narAH // GarP_1,65.30 //
   nirdhanā viṣamairderghaiḥ pītopacitakairnṛpāḥ /	nirDanAH vizamEH derGEH pIta upacitakEH nRpAH /
   samonnataṃ ca hṛdayamakampaṃ māṃsalaṃ pṛthu // GarP_1,65.31 //	sama unnatam ca hRdayam akampam mAMsalam pRTu // GarP_1,65.31 //
   nṛpāṇāmadhamānāṃ ca khararomaśirālakam /	nRpANAm aDamAnAm ca Kara roma SirAlakam /
   arthavānsamavakṣāḥ syātpīnairvakṣobhirūrjitaḥ // GarP_1,65.32 //	arTavAn samavakzAH syAt pInEH vakzoBiH UrjitaH // GarP_1,65.32 //
   vakṣobhirviṣamairniḥ svaḥ śastreṇanidhanāstathā /	vakzoBiH vizamEH niH svaH SastreNa niDanAH taTA /
   viṣamairjatrubhirniḥ svā asthinaddhaiśca mānavāḥ // GarP_1,65.33 //	vizamEH jatruBiH niH svAH asTi nadDEH ca mAnavAH // GarP_1,65.33 //
   unnatairbhogino nimnairniḥ svāḥ pīnairdhanānvitāḥ /	unnatEH BoginaH nimnEH niH svAH pInEH Dana anvitAH /
   niḥ svaścipiṭakaṇṭhaḥ syācchirāśuṣkagalaḥ sukhī // GarP_1,65.34 //	niH svaH cipiwa kaNWaH syAt SirA Suzka galaH suKI // GarP_1,65.34 //
   śūraḥ syānmahiṣagrīvaḥ śāstrātto mṛgakaṇṭhakaḥ /	SUraH syAt mahiza grIvaH SAstra AttaH mRgakaNWakaH /
   kambugrīvaśca nṛpatirlambakaṇṭho 'tibhakṣakaḥ // GarP_1,65.35 //	kambu grIvaH ca nRpatiH lamba kaNWaH ati BakzakaH // GarP_1,65.35 //
   aromaśā bhugnapṛṣṭhaṃ śubhaṃ cāśubhamanyathā /	aromaSAH Bugna pRzWam SuBam ca aSuBam anyaTA /
   kakṣāśvatthadalā śreṣṭhā sugandhirmṛgaromikā // GarP_1,65.36 //	kakzA aSvatTa dalA SrezWA suganDiH mRga romikAH // GarP_1,65.36 //
   anyathā tvarthahīnānāṃ dāridrayasya ca kāraṇam /	anyaTA tu arTa hInAnAm dAridrayasya ca kAraNam /
   saṃmāsau caiva bhugnālpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau // GarP_1,65.37 //	saMmAsO ca eva Bugna alpO SlizwO ca vipulO SuBO // GarP_1,65.37 //
   ājānulambitau bāhū vṛttau pīnau nṛpeśvare /	AjAnulambitO bAhU vRttO pInO nRpa ISvare /
   niḥ svānāṃ romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau karikara prabhau // GarP_1,65.38 //	niH svAnAm romaSO hrasvO SrezWO kari kara praBO // GarP_1,65.38 //
   hastāṅgulaya eva syuvāyudvārayutāḥ śubhāḥ /	hasta aFgulayaH eva syuvAyu dvAra yutAH SuBAH /
   medhāvināṃ ca sūkṣmāḥ syurbhṛtyānāṃ cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,65.39 //	meDAvinAm ca sUkzmAH syuH BRtyAnAm cipiwAH smRtAH // GarP_1,65.39 //
   sthūlāṅgulībhirniḥ svāḥ syurnatāḥ syuḥ sukṛśaistadā /	sTUla aFgulIBiH niH svAH syuH natAH syuH su kRSEH tadA /
   kapitulyakarāḥ niḥ svā vyāghratulyakarairbalam // GarP_1,65.40 //	kapi tulya karAH niH svAH vyAGra tulya karEH balam // GarP_1,65.40 //
   pitṛvittavināśaśca nimnātkaratalānnarāḥ /	pitR vitta vinASaH ca nimnAt kara talAt narAH /
   maṇibandhairnigūḍhaiśca suśliṣṭaiḥ śubhagandhibhiḥ // GarP_1,65.41 //	maNibanDEH nigUXEH ca su SlizwEH SuBa ganDiBiH // GarP_1,65.41 //
   nṛpā hīnāḥ karacchaidaiḥ saśabdairdhanavarjitāḥ /	nRpAH hInAH kara= CEdEH sa SabdEH Dana varjitAH /
   saṃvṛtaiścaiva nimnaiśca dhaninaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,65.42 //	saMvRtEH ca eva nimnEH ca DaninaH parikIrtitAH // GarP_1,65.42 //
   prottānaka radātāro viṣamairviṣamā narāḥ /	prottAnaka radAtAraH vizamEH vizamAH narAH /
   karaiḥ karatalaiścaiva lākṣābhairīśvarāstalaiḥ // GarP_1,65.43 //	karEH kara talEH ca eva lAkzA ABEH ISvarAH talEH // GarP_1,65.43 //
   paradāraratāḥ pītairūkṣairniḥ svā narā matāḥ /	para dAra ratAH pItEH UkzEH niH svAH narAH matAH /
   tuṣatulyanakhāḥ klībāḥ kuṭilaiḥ sphuṭitairnarāḥ // GarP_1,65.44 //	tuza tulya naKAH klIbAH kuwilEH sPuwitEH narAH // GarP_1,65.44 //
   niḥ svāśca kunakhaistadvadvivarṇaiḥ paratarkakāḥ /	niH svAH ca kunaKEH tadvat vivarNEH paratarkakAH /
   tāmrairbhūpā dhanāḍhyāśca aṅguṣṭhaiḥ sayavaistathā // GarP_1,65.45 //	tAmrEH BUpAH Dana AXyAH ca aFguzWEH sa yavEH taTA // GarP_1,65.45 //
   aṅguṣṭhamūlajaiḥ putrī syāddīrghāṅguliparvakaḥ /	aFguzWa mUla jEH putrI syAt dIrGa aFguli parvakaH /
   dīrghāyuḥ subhagaścaiva nirdhano viralāṅguliḥ // GarP_1,65.46 //	dIrGa AyuH suBagaH ca eva nirDanaH virala aFguliH // GarP_1,65.46 //
   ghanāṅguliśca sadhanastisro rekhāścayasya vai /	Gana aFguliH ca sa DanaH tisraH reKAH cayasya vE /
   nṛpateḥ karatalagā maṇibandhātsamutthitāḥ // GarP_1,65.47 //	nRpateH kara tala gAH maNibanDAt samutTitAH // GarP_1,65.47 //
   yugamīnāṅkitanaro bhavetsatraprado naraḥ /	yuga mIna aFkita naraH Bavet satra pradaH naraH /
   vajrākārāśca dhanināṃ matsyapucchanibhā budhe // GarP_1,65.48 //	vajra AkArAH ca DaninAm matsya pucCa niBAH buDe // GarP_1,65.48 //
   śaṅkhātapatraśivikāgajapadmopamā nṛpe /	SaFKa Atapatra SivikA gaja padma upamAH nRpe /
   kumbhāṅkuśapatākābhā mṛṇālābhā nidhīśvare // GarP_1,65.49 //	kumBa aFkuSa patAkA ABA mRNAla ABAH niDi ISvare // GarP_1,65.49 //
   dāmābhāśca gavāḍhyānāṃ svastikābhā nṛpeśvare /	dAma ABAH ca gavA AXyAnAm svastika ABAH nRpa ISvare /
   cakrāsitomaradhanuḥ kuntābhā nṛpateḥ kare // GarP_1,65.50 //	cakra asi tomara DanuH kunta ABAH nRpateH kare // GarP_1,65.50 //
   alūkhalābhā yajñāḍhyā vedībhā cāgnihotriṇi /	alUKala ABAH yajQa AXyA vedIBA ca agnihotriNi /
   vāpīdevakulyābhāstrikoṇābhāścadhārmike // GarP_1,65.51 //	vApI devakulyA BAH tri koNa ABAH ca DArmike // GarP_1,65.51 //
   aṅguṣṭhamūlagā rekhāḥ putrāḥ sūkṣmāśca dārikāḥ /	aFguzWa mUla gAH reKAH putrAH sUkzmAH ca dArikAH /
   pradeśinīgatā rekhā kaniṣṭhāmūlagāminī // GarP_1,65.52 //	pradeSinI gatA reKA kanizWA mUla gAminI // GarP_1,65.52 //
   śatāyuṣaṃ ca kurute chinnayā taruto bhayam /	Sata Ayuzam ca kurute CinnayA tarutaH Bayam /
   niḥ svāśca bahurekhāḥ syunirdravyāścibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ // GarP_1,65.53 //	niH svAH ca bahu reKAH syunirdravyAH cibukEH kRSEH // GarP_1,65.53 //
   māṃsalaiśca dhanopetā āraktairadharairnṛpāḥ /	mAMsalEH ca Dana upetAH AraktEH aDarEH nRpAH /
   bimbopamaiśca sphuṭitairoṣṭhairūkṣaiścakaṇḍitaiḥ // GarP_1,65.54 //	bimba upamEH ca sPuwitEH ozWa erUkzEH cakaNxitEH // GarP_1,65.54 //
   viṣamairdhanahīnāśca dantāḥ snigdhā ghanāḥ śubhāḥ /	vizamEH Dana hInAH ca dantAH snigDAH GanAH SuBAH /
   tīkṣṇā dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhā jihvā raktā samā śubhā // GarP_1,65.55 //	tIkzNAH dantAH samAH SrezWA jihvA raktA samA SuBAH // GarP_1,65.55 //
   ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhanakṣaye /	SlakzNA dIrGA ca vijQeyA tAlU Svete Dana kzaye /
   kṛṣṇe ca paruṣo vakraṃ samaṃ saumyaṃ ca saṃvṛtam // GarP_1,65.56 //	kRzNe ca paruzaH vakram samam sOmyam ca saMvRtam // GarP_1,65.56 //
   bhūpānāmamalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ viparītaṃ ca duḥ khinām /	BUpAnAm amalam SlakzNam viparItam ca duH KinAm /
   mahā duḥ khaṃ durbhagāṇāṃ strīmukhaṃ putramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,65.57 //	mahA duH Kam durBagANAm strI muKam putram ApnuyAt // GarP_1,65.57 //
   āḍhyānāṃ vartulaṃ vakraṃ nirdravyāṇāṃ ca dīrghakam /	AXyAnAm vartulam vakram nirdravyANAm ca dIrGakam /
   bhīruvakraḥ pāpakarmā dhūrtānāṃ caturaśrakam // GarP_1,65.58 //	BIru vakraH pApa karmA DUrtAnAm caturaSrakam // GarP_1,65.58 //
   nimnaṃ vakramaputrāṇāṃ kṛpaṇānāṃ ca hrasvakam /	nimnam vakram aputrANAm kRpaNAnAm ca hrasvakam /
   sampūrṇaṃ bhogināṃ kāntaṃ śmaśru snigdhaṃ śubhaṃ mṛdu // GarP_1,65.59 //	sampUrNam BoginAm kAntam SmaSru snigDam SuBam mRdu // GarP_1,65.59 //
   saṃhataṃ cāsphuṭitāgraṃ raktaśmaśruśca caurakaḥ /	saMhatam ca asPuwita agram rakta SmaSruH ca cOrakaH /
   raktālpaparuṣaśmaśrukarṇāḥ syuḥ pāpamṛtyavaḥ // GarP_1,65.60 //	rakta alpa paruza SmaSru karNAH syuH pApa mRtyavaH // GarP_1,65.60 //
   nirmāṃsaiścipiṭairbhogāḥ kṛpaṇā hrasvakarṇakāḥ /	nirmAMsEH cipiwEH BogAH kRpaNAH hrasva karNakAH /
   śaṅkukarṇāśca rājāno romakarṇā gatāyuṣaḥ // GarP_1,65.61 //	SaFku karNAH ca rAjAnaH roma karNAH gata AyuzaH // GarP_1,65.61 //
   bṛhatkarṇāśca dhaninorājānaḥ parikīrtitāḥ /	bRhatkarNAH ca DaninaH rAjAnaH parikIrtitAH /
   karṇaiḥ snigdhāvanaddhaiśca vyālambairmāṃsalairnṛpāḥ // GarP_1,65.62 //	karNEH snigDa avanadDEH ca vyAlambEH mAMsalEH nRpAH // GarP_1,65.62 //
   bhogī vai nimnagaṇḍaḥ syānmatrī sampūrṇagaṇḍakaḥ /	BogI vE nimna gaNxaH syAt matrI sampUrNa gaNxakaH /
   śukanāsaḥ sukhī syācca śuṣkanāso 'tijīvanaḥ // GarP_1,65.63 //	SukanAsaH suKI syAt ca Suzka nAsaH ati jIvanaH // GarP_1,65.63 //
   chinnāgrakūpanāsaḥ syādagamyāgamane rataḥ /	Cinna agra kUpa nAsaH syAt agamyA gamane rataH /
   dīrghanāse ca saubhāgyaṃ cauraścākuñcitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,65.64 //	dIrGa nAse ca sOBAgyam cOraH ca AkuQcita indriyaH // GarP_1,65.64 //
   mṛtyuścipiṭanāse syāddhīno bhāgyavatāṃ bhavet /	mRtyuH cipiwa nAse syAt hInaH BAgyavatAm Bavet /
   svalpacchidrau supuṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpeśvare // GarP_1,65.65 //	su alpa= CidrO su puwO ca avakrO ca nRpa ISvare // GarP_1,65.65 //
   krūre dakṣiṇavakrā syādvalināṃ ca kṣutaṃ sakṛt /	krUre dakziNa vakrA syAt valinAm ca kzutam sakRt /
   syādviniṣpiṇḍitaṃ hrādi sānunādaṃ ca jīvakṛt // GarP_1,65.66 //	syAt vinizpiNxitam hrAdi sa anunAdam ca jIva kRt // GarP_1,65.66 //
   vakrāntaiḥ padmapatrābhairlocanaiḥ sukhabhāginaḥ /	vakra antEH padma patra ABEH locanEH suKa BAginaH /
   mārjāralocanaiḥ pāpmā durātmā madhupiṅgalaiḥ // GarP_1,65.67 //	mArjAra locanEH pApmA durAtmA maDu piFgalEH // GarP_1,65.67 //
   krūrāḥ kekaranetrāśca haritākṣāḥ sakalmaṣāḥ /	krUrAH kekara netrAH ca harita akzAH sa kalmazAH /
   jihyaiśca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyo gajalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.68 //	jihyEH ca locanEH SUrAH senAnyaH gaja locanAH // GarP_1,65.68 //
   gambhīrākṣā īśvarāḥ syurmantriṇaḥ sthūlacakṣuṣaḥ /	gamBIra akzAH ISvarAH syuH mantriNaH sTUla cakzuzaH /
   nīlotpa lākṣā vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyaṃ śyāmacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,65.69 //	nIlotpa lAkzA vidvAMsaH sOBAgyam SyAma cakzuzAm // GarP_1,65.69 //
   syātkṛṣṇatārakākṣāṇāmakṣṇāmutpāṭanaṃ kila /	syAt kRzNa tAraka akzANAm akzNAm utpAwanam kila /
   maṇḍalākṣāśca pāpāḥ syurniḥ svāḥ syurdenalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.70 //	maNxala akzAH ca pApAH syuH niH svAH syuH dena locanAH // GarP_1,65.70 //
   dṛk snigdhā vipulā bhoge alpāyuradhikonnatā /	dRS snigDA vipulA Boge alpa AyuH aDika unnatA /
   viśālonnatā sukhinī daridrā viṣamabhruvaḥ // GarP_1,65.71 //	viSAlA unnatA suKinI daridrAH vizama BruvaH // GarP_1,65.71 //
   ghanadīrghāsusaktabhrūrbālendūnnatasubhruvaḥ /	Gana dIrGa asu sakta BrUH bAla indUnnata suBruvaH /
   āḍhyo niḥ svaśca khaṇḍabhrṛrmadhye ca vinatabhruvaḥ // GarP_1,65.72 //	AXyaH niH svar ca KaNxa BrRH maDye ca vinata BruvaH // GarP_1,65.72 //
   strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ sutārthe parivarjitāḥ /	strIzu gamyAsu saktAH syuH suta arTe parivarjitAH /
   annatairvipulaiḥ śaṅkhairlalāṭairviṣamaistathā // GarP_1,65.73 //	annatEH vipulEH SaFKEH lalAwEH vizamEH taTA // GarP_1,65.73 //
   nirdhanā dhanavantaśca ardhendusadṛśairnarāḥ /	nirDanAH DanavantaH ca arDa indu sadRSEH narAH /

   annatābhaiḥ śirābhiśca svastikābhirdhaneśvarāḥ /	anna tA ABEH SirABiH ca svastikABiH Dana ISvarAH /
   nimnairlalāṭairbandhārhāḥ krūrakarmaratāstathā // GarP_1,65.75 //	nimnEH lalAwEH banDa arhAH krUra karma ratAH taTA // GarP_1,65.75 //
   saṃvṛtaiśca lalāṭaiśca kṛpaṇā unnatairnṛpāḥ /	saMvRtEH ca lalAwEH ca kRpaNAH unnatEH nRpAH /
   anaśru snigdharuditamadīnaṃ śubhadaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,65.76 //	anaSru snigDa ruditam adInam SuBa dam nRNAm // GarP_1,65.76 //
   pracurāśrudīnaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca ruditaṃ ca sukhāvaham /	pracura aSru dInam rUkzam ca ruditam ca suKa Avaham /
   akampaṃ hasitaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mīlitākṣamaghāvaham // GarP_1,65.77 //	akampam hasitam SrezWam mIlita akzam aGa Avaham // GarP_1,65.77 //
   asakṛddhasitaṃ duṣṭaṃ sonmādasya hyanekadhā /	asakRt hasitam duzwam sa unmAdasya hi anekaDA /
   lalāṭopasṛtāstisro rekhāḥ syuḥ śatavarṣiṇām // GarP_1,65.78 //	lalAwa upasRtAH tisraH reKAH syuH Sata varziNAm // GarP_1,65.78 //
   nṛpatvaṃ syāccatasṛbhirāyuḥ pañcanavatyatha /	nRpa tvam syAt catasRBiH AyuH paQcanavati aTa /
   arekheṇāyurnavatirvicchinnābhiśca puṃślalāḥ // GarP_1,65.79 //	areKeNa AyuH navatiH vicCinnABiH ca puMSlalAH // GarP_1,65.79 //
   keśāntopagatābhiśca aśītyāyurnaro bhavet /	keSAnta upagatABiH ca aSIti AyuH naraH Bavet /
   pañcabhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pañcāśadvahubhistathā // GarP_1,65.80 //	paQcaBiH saptaBiH zaxBiH paQcASat vahuBiH taTA // GarP_1,65.80 //
   catvāriṃśacca vakrābhistriṃśadbhrūlagnagāmibhiḥ /	catvAriMSat ca vakrABiH triMSat BrU lagna gAmiBiH /
   viṃśatirvāmavakrā bhirāyuḥ kṣudrābhiralpakam // GarP_1,65.81 //	viMSatiH vAma vakrAH BiH AyuH kzudrABiH alpakam // GarP_1,65.81 //
   chatrākāraiḥ śirobhistu nṛpā nimnaśirā dhanī /	Catra AkArEH SiroBiH tu nRpAH nimna SirAH DanI /
   cipiṭaiśca piturmṛtyurgavādyāḥ parimaṇḍalaiḥ // GarP_1,65.82 //	cipiwEH ca pituH mRtyuH gava AdyAH parimaNxalEH // GarP_1,65.82 //
   ghaṭamūrdhā pāparucirdhanādyaiḥ parivarjitaḥ /	Gawa mUrDA pApa ruciH Dana AdyEH parivarjitaH /
   kṛṣṇairākuñcitaiḥ keśaiḥ snigdhairekaikasambhavaiḥ // GarP_1,65.83 //	kRzNEH AkuQcitEH keSEH snigDEH eka eka samBavEH // GarP_1,65.83 //
   abhinnāgraiśca mṛdubhirna cātibahubhirnṛpāḥ /	aBinna agrEH ca mRduBiH na ca ati bahuBiH nRpAH /
