   niḥ svāścaivātikucilairghanairasita (dhika) mūrdhajaiḥ /	niH svAH ca eva ati kucilEH GanEH asitaH (Dika) mUrDajEH /
   yadyadgātraṃ mahārūkṣaṃ śirālaṃ māṃsavarjitam // GarP_1,65.85 //	yat yat gAtram mahA rUkzam SirAlam mAMsa varjitam // GarP_1,65.85 //
   tattatsyā daśubhaṃ sarvaṃ tato 'nyathā /	tat tatsyAH daSuBam sarvam tatas anyaTA /
   vipulastriṣu gambhīro dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaśca pañcasu // GarP_1,65.86 //	vipulaH trizu gamBIraH dIrGaH sUkzmaH ca paQcasu // GarP_1,65.86 //
   ṣaḍunnataścaturhrasvo raktaḥ saptasvasau nṛpaḥ /	zaz unnataH catur hrasvaH raktaH saptasu asO nRpaH /
   nābhiḥ svaraśca sasattvaṃ ca trayaṃ gambhīramīritam // GarP_1,65.87 //	nABiH svaraH ca sa sattvam ca trayam gamBIram Iritam // GarP_1,65.87 //
   puṃsaḥ syādativistīrṇaṃ lalāṭaṃ vadanaṃ hyuraḥ /	puMsaH syAt ati vistIrNam lalAwam vadanam hi uraH /
   cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syur nṛpakṛkāṭikāḥ // GarP_1,65.88 //	cakzuH kakzA nAsikA ca zaw syuH nRpa kRkAwikAH // GarP_1,65.88 //
   unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam /	unnatAni ca hrasvani jaFGA grIvA ca liFgakam /
   pṛṣṭhaṃ catvāri raktāni karatālvadharā nakhāḥ // GarP_1,65.89 //	pRzWam catvAri raktAni kara tAlu aDarAH naKAH // GarP_1,65.89 //
   netrāntapādajihvauṣṭhāḥ pañca sūkṣmāṇi santi vai /	netra anta pAda jihvA ozWAH paQca sUkzmANi santi vE /
   daśanāṅguliparvāṇi nakhakeśatvacaḥ śubhāḥ // GarP_1,65.90 //	daSana aFguli parvANi naKa keSa tvacaH SuBAH // GarP_1,65.90 //
   dīrghāḥ stanāntaraṃ bāhudantalocananāsikāḥ /	dIrGAH stanAntaram bAhu danta locana nAsikAH /
   narāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,65.91 //	narANAm lakzaNam proktam vadAmi strIzu lakzaNam // GarP_1,65.91 //
   rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā /	rAjQyAH snigDO samO pAdO talO tAmrO naKO taTA /
   śliṣṭāṅgulī connatāgrau tāṃ pāpya nṛpatirbhavet // GarP_1,65.92 //	Slizwa aFgulI ca unnata agrO tAm pApya nRpatiH Bavet // GarP_1,65.92 //
   nigūḍhagulphopacitau padmakāntitalau śubhau /	nigUXa gulPa upacitO padma kAnti talO SuBO /
   asvedinau mṛdutalau matsyāṅkuśaghvajāñcitau // GarP_1,65.93 //	asvedinO mRdu talO matsya aFkuSaGvaja AQcitO // GarP_1,65.93 //
   vajrābjahalacihnau ca dāsyāḥ pādau tato 'nyathā /	vajra abja hala cihnO ca dAsyAH pAdO tatas anyaTA /
   jaṅghe ca romarahite suvṛtte viśire śubhe // GarP_1,65.94 //	jaFGe ca roma rahite su vRtte viSire SuBe // GarP_1,65.94 //
   anulbaṇaṃ sandhideśaṃ samaṃ jānudvayaṃ śubham /	anulbaNam sanDi deSam samam jAnu dvayam SuBam /
   ūrū karikarākārāvaromau ca samau śubhau // GarP_1,65.95 //	UrU kari kara AkAra avaromO ca samO SuBO // GarP_1,65.95 //
   aśvatthapatrasadṛśaṃ vipulaṃ guhyamuttamam /	aSvatTa patra sadRSam vipulam guhyam uttamam /
   śroṇīlalāṭakaṃ strīṇāmūru kūrmonnataṃ śubham // GarP_1,65.96 //	SroNI lalAwakam strINAm Uru kUrma unnatam SuBam // GarP_1,65.96 //
   gūḍho maṇiśca śubhado nitambaśca guruḥ śubhaḥ /	gUXaH maNiH ca SuBa daH nitambaH ca guruH SuBaH /
   vistīrṇamāṃsopacitā gambhīrā vipulā śubhā // GarP_1,65.97 //	vistIrNa mAMsa upacitA gamBIrA vipulA SuBAH // GarP_1,65.97 //
   nābhiḥ pradakṣiṇāvartā madhyaṃ tribaliśobhitam /	nABiH pradakziNa AvartAH maDyam tri bali SoBitam /
   aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanāvaviṣamau śubhau // GarP_1,65.98 //	aromaSO stanO pInO GanO= avizamO SuBO // GarP_1,65.98 //
   kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdugrīvā ca kambubhā /	kaWinO romaSA SastA mRdu grIvA ca kambuBA /
   āraktāvadharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalaṃ vartulaṃ mukham // GarP_1,65.99 //	AraktO= aDarO SrezWO mAMsalam vartulam muKam // GarP_1,65.99 //
   kundapuṣpasamā dantā bhāṣitaṃ kokilāsamam /	kunda puzpa samAH dantAH BAzitam kokilA samam /
   dākṣiṇyayuktamaśaṭhaṃ haṃsaśabdasukhāvaham // GarP_1,65.100 //	dAkziNya yuktam aSaWam haMsa Sabda suKa Avaham // GarP_1,65.100 //
   nāsā samā samapuṭā strīṇāṃ tu rucirā śubhā /	nAsA samA sama puwA strINAm tu rucirA SuBA /
   nīlotpalanibhaṃ cakṣurnāsālagnaṃ na lambakam // GarP_1,65.101 //	nIlotpala niBam cakzuH nAsA lagnam na lambakam // GarP_1,65.101 //
   na pṛthū bālendunibhe bhruvau cātha lalāṭakam /	na pRTU bAla indu niBe BruvO ca aTa lalAwakam /
   śubhamardhendusaṃsthānamatuṅgaṃ syādalomaśam // GarP_1,65.102 //	SuBam arDa indu saMsTAna matuFgam syAt alomaSam // GarP_1,65.102 //
   sumāṃsalaṃ karṇayugmaṃ samaṃ mṛdu samāhitam /	su mAMsalam karNa yugmam samam mRdu samAhitam /
   snigdhā nīlāśca mṛdavo mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ // GarP_1,65.103 //	snigDAH nIlAH ca mRdavaH mUrDajAH kuQcitAH kacAH // GarP_1,65.103 //
   strīṇāṃ samaṃ śiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pāde pāṇitale 'tha vā /	strINAm samam SiraH SrezWam pAde pANi tale aTa vA /
   vājikuñjaraśrīvṛkṣayūpeṣuyavatomaraiḥ // GarP_1,65.104 //	vAji kuQjara SrI vRkza yUpa izu yava tomarEH // GarP_1,65.104 //
   dhvajacāmaramālābhiḥ śailakuṇḍalavedibhiḥ /	Dvaja cAmara mAlABiH SEla kuNxala vediBiH /
   śaṅkhātapatrapadmaiśca matsyasvastikasadrathaiḥ // GarP_1,65.105 //	SaFKa Atapatra padmEH ca matsya svastika sat raTEH // GarP_1,65.105 //
   lakṣaṇairaṅkuśādyaiśca striyaḥ syū rājavallabhāḥ /	lakzaNEH aFkuSa AdyEH ca striyaH syuH rAja vallaBAH /
   nigūḍhamaṇibandhau ca padmagarbhopamau karau // GarP_1,65.106 //	nigUXa maNi banDO ca padma garBa upamO karO // GarP_1,65.106 //
   na nimnaṃ nonnataṃ strīṇāṃ bhavetkaratalaṃ śubham /	na nimnam na unnatam strINAm Bavet kara talam SuBam /
   rekhānvitaṃ tvavidhavāṃ kuryātsaṃbhoginīṃ striyam /	reKA anvitam tu aviDavAm kuryAt saMBoginIm striyam /
   rekhā yā maṇibandhotthā gatā madhyāṅguliṃ kare // GarP_1,65.107 //	reKA yA maNibanDa utTAH gatA maDya aFgulim kare // GarP_1,65.107 //
   gatā pāṇitale yā ca yordhvapādatale sthitā /	gatA pANi tale yA ca yA UrDva pAda tale sTitAH /
   strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ tathā sā syādrājyāya ca sukhāya ca // GarP_1,65.108 //	strINAm puMsAm taTA sA syAt rAjyAya ca suKAya ca // GarP_1,65.108 //
   kaniṣṭhikāmūlabhavā rekhā kuryācchatāyuṣam /	kanizWikA mUla BavA reKA kuryAt Sata Ayuzam /
   pradeśinīmadhyamābhyāmantarālagatā satī // GarP_1,65.109 //	pradeSinI maDyamAByAm antarAla gatA satI // GarP_1,65.109 //
   ūnā ūnāyuṣaṃ kuryādrekhāścāṅguṣṭhamūlagāḥ /	UnAH Una Ayuzam kuryAt reKAH ca aFguzWa mUla gAH /
   bṛhatyaḥ putrāstanvyastu pramadāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,65.110 //	bRhatyaH putrAH tanvyaH tu pramadAH parikIrtitAH // GarP_1,65.110 //
   svalpāyuṣo bahu (laghu) cchinnā dīrghāchinnā mahāyuṣam /	su alpa AyuzaH bahu (laGu) cCinnA dIrGA CinnAH mahA Ayuzam /
   śubhaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ proktaṃ tvaśubhamanyathā // GarP_1,65.111 //	SuBam tu lakzaNam strINAm proktam tu aSuBam anyaTA // GarP_1,65.111 //
   kaniṣṭhikānāmikā vā yasyā na spṛśate mahīm /	kanizWikA nAmikA vA yasyAH na spRSate mahIm /
   aṅguṣṭhaṃ vā gatātītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā // GarP_1,65.112 //	aFguzWam vA gatA atItya tarjanI kulawA ca sA // GarP_1,65.112 //
   ūrdhvaṃ dvābhyāṃ piṇḍikābhyāṃ jaṅghe cātiśirālake /	UrDvam dvAByAm piNxikAByAm jaFGe ca ati SirAlake /
   romaśecātimāṃse ca kumbhākāraṃ tathodaram // GarP_1,65.113 //	romaSeca ati mAMse ca kumBa AkAram taTA udaram // GarP_1,65.113 //
   vāmāvartaṃ nimnamalpaṃ duḥ khitānāṃ ca guhyakam /	vAmAvartam nimnam alpam duH KitAnAm ca guhyakam /
   grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svā dīrghayā ca kulakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,65.114 //	grIvayA hrasvayA niH svA dIrGayA ca kula kzayaH // GarP_1,65.114 //
   pṛthulayā pracaṇḍāśca striyaḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ /	pRTulayA pracaNxAH ca striyaH syuH na atra saMSayaH /
   kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lolekṣaṇā satī // GarP_1,65.115 //	kekare piFgale netre SyAme lola IkzaNA satI // GarP_1,65.115 //
   smite kūpe gaṇḍayośca sā dhruvaṃ vyabhicāriṇī /	smite kUpe gaNxayoH ca sA Druvam vyaBicAriNI /
   pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaraṃ hanti cāṅganā // GarP_1,65.116 //	pralambinI lalAwe tu devaram hanti ca aFganA // GarP_1,65.116 //
   udare śvaśuraṃ hanti patiṃ hanti sphicordvayoḥ /	udare SvaSuram hanti patim hanti sPicoH dvayoH /
   yā tu romottarauṣṭhī syānna śubhā bhartureva hi // GarP_1,65.117 //	yA tu roma uttara ozWI syAt na SuBA BartuH eva hi // GarP_1,65.117 //
   stanau saromāvaśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā /	stanO sa romO= aSuBO karNO ca vizamO taTA /
   karālā viṣamā dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te // GarP_1,65.118 //	karAlAH vizamAH dantAH kleSAya ca Bavanti te // GarP_1,65.118 //
   cauryāya kṛṣṇamāṃsāśca dīrghā bhurtuśca mṛtyave /	cOryAya kRzNa mAMsAH ca dIrGA BurtuH ca mRtyave /
   kravyādarūpairhastaiśca vṛkakākādisannibhaiḥ // GarP_1,65.119 //	kravyAda rUpEH hastEH ca vRka kAka Adi sanniBEH // GarP_1,65.119 //
   śirālairviṣamaiḥ śuṣkairvittahīnā bhavanti hi /	SirAlEH vizamEH SuzkEH vitta hInAH Bavanti hi /
   samunnatottareṣṭhī yā kalahe rūkṣabhāṣiṇī // GarP_1,65.120 //	samunnata uttarezWI yA kalahe rUkza BAziNI // GarP_1,65.120 //
   strīṣu doṣā virūpāsu patrākāro guṇāstataḥ /	strIzu dozAH virUpAsu patra AkAraH guNAH tatas /
   narastrīlakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vakṣye tajjñānadāyakam // GarP_1,65.121 //	nara strI lakzaNam proktam vakzye tad jQAna dAyakam // GarP_1,65.121 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre sAmudrike strInaralakzaNam nAma paQcazazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  66	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 66
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   nirlakṣaṇā śubhā syācca cakrāṅkitaśilārcanāt /	nirlakzaNA SuBA syAt ca cakra aFkita SilA arcanAt /
   ādau sudarśano mūrtirlakṣmīnārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,66.1 //	AdO sudarSanaH mUrtiH lakzmI nArAyaNaH paraH // GarP_1,66.1 //
   tricakro 'sāvacyutaḥ syāccatuścakraścaturbhujaḥ /	tri cakraH asO= acyutaH syAt catur cakraH catur BujaH /
   vāsudevaśca pradyumnastataḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,66.2 //	vAsudevaH ca pradyumnaH tatas saFkarzaNaH smRtaH // GarP_1,66.2 //
   puruṣottamaścāṣṭamaḥ syānnavyūho daśātmakaḥ /	puruzottamaH ca azwamaH syAt na vyUhaH daSa AtmakaH /
   ekādaśo 'niruddhaḥ syāddvādaśo dvādaśātmakaḥ // GarP_1,66.3 //	ekAdaSaH anirudDaH syAt dvAdaSaH dvAdaSa AtmakaH // GarP_1,66.3 //
   ata ūrdhvamanantaḥ syācchakre rekādikaiḥ kramāt /	atas UrDvam anantaH syAt Sakre reka AdikEH kramAt /
   sudarśanā lakṣitāśca pūjitāḥ sarvakāmadāḥ // GarP_1,66.4 //	sudarSanAH lakzitAH ca pUjitAH sarva kAma dAH // GarP_1,66.4 //
   śālagrāmaśilā yatra devo dvāravatībhavaḥ /	SAlagrAma SilA yatra devaH dvAravatI BavaH /
   ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktirna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,66.5 //	uBayoH saMgamaH yatra tatra muktiH na saMSayaH // GarP_1,66.5 //
   śālagrāmo dvārakā ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā /	SAlagrAmaH dvArakA ca nEmizam puzkaram gayA /
   vārāṇasī prayāgaśca kurukṣetraṃ ca sūkaram // GarP_1,66.6 //	vArANasI prayAgaH ca kurukzetram ca sUkaram // GarP_1,66.6 //
   gaṅgā ca narmadā caiva candrabhāgā sarasvatī /	gaFgA ca narmadA ca eva candraBAgA sarasvatI /
   puruṣottamo mahākālastīrthānyetāni śaṅkara // GarP_1,66.7 //	puruzottamaH mahAkAlaH tIrTAni etAni SaFkara // GarP_1,66.7 //
   sarvapāpaharāṇyeva bhuktamuktipradāni vai /	sarva pApa harANi eva Bukta mukti pradAni vE /
   prabhavo vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodo 'tha prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,66.8 //	praBavaH viBavaH SuklaH pramodaH aTa prajApatiH // GarP_1,66.8 //
   aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca /	aFgirAH SrImuKaH BAvaH yuvA DAtA taTA eva ca /
   īśvaro bahudhānyaśca pramāthī vikramo viṣuḥ // GarP_1,66.9 //	ISvaraH bahuDAnyaH ca pramATI vikramaH vizuH // GarP_1,66.9 //
   citrabhānuḥ svabānuśca tāraṇaḥ pārthivo vyayaḥ /	citraBAnuH sva bAnuH ca tAraNaH pArTivaH vyayaH /
   sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ // GarP_1,66.10 //	sarvajit sarva DArI ca viroDI vikRtiH KaraH // GarP_1,66.10 //
   nandano vijayaścaiva jayo manmathadurmukhau /	nandanaH vijayaH ca eva jayaH manmaTa durmuKO /
   hemalambo vilaṃbaśca vikāraḥ śarvarī plavaḥ // GarP_1,66.11 //	hema lambaH vilaMbaH ca vikAraH SarvarI plavaH // GarP_1,66.11 //
   śubhakṛcchobhanaḥ krodhī viśvāvamuparābhavau /	SuBa kRt SoBanaH kroDI viSvAvam uparA BavO /
   plavaṅgaḥ kīlakaḥ saumyaḥ sādhāraṇavirodhakṛt // GarP_1,66.12 //	plavaFgaH kIlakaH sOmyaH sADAraNa viroDa kRt // GarP_1,66.12 //
   paridhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso nalaḥ /	pariDAvI pramAdI ca AnandaH rAkzasaH nalaH /
   piṅgalaḥ kālasiddhārthau raudrirvai durmatistathā // GarP_1,66.13 //	piFgalaH kAla sidDArTO rOdriH vE durmatiH taTA // GarP_1,66.13 //
   dundubhī rudhirodgārī raktākṣaḥ krodhano 'kṣayaḥ /	dunduBiH ruDira udgArI raktAkzaH kroDanaH akzayaH /
   aśobhanāḥ śobhanāśca nāmnaivaite hi vatsarāḥ // GarP_1,66.14 //	aSoBanAH SoBanAH ca nAmnA eva ete hi vatsarAH // GarP_1,66.14 //
   kālaṃ vakṣyāmi saṃsiddhyai rudra pañcasvarodayāt /	kAlam vakzyAmi saMsidDyE rudra paQca svara udayAt /
   rājā sā(mā) jā udāsā ca pīḍā mṛtyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,66.15 //	rAjA sa a(mA) jAH udAsA ca pIxA mRtyuH taTA eva ca // GarP_1,66.15 //
   ā ī ū ai au svarāṃśca likhetpañcāgnikoṣṭhake /	A I U E O svarAn= ca liKet paQca agni kozWake /
   ūrdhvatiryaggatai rekhaiḥ ṣaḍvahnikramamāgataiḥ // GarP_1,66.16 //	UrDva tiryak gatEH reKEH zaz vahni kramam AgatEH // GarP_1,66.16 //
   tithī ekā gnikoṣṭheṣu trayo rājātha sā (mā) jayāḥ /	tiTI ekA gni kozWezu trayaH rAjA aTa sA (mA) jayAH /
   udāsāmṛtyupīḍāśca kujaḥ somasutaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,66.17 //	udAsA mRtyu pIxAH ca kujaH somasutaH kramAt // GarP_1,66.17 //
   guruśukrau ca mandaśca ravicandrau yathoditam /	guru SukrO ca mandaH ca ravi candrO yaTA uditam /
   revatyādimṛgāntāśca ṛkṣāṇi prathamā kalā // GarP_1,66.18 //	revati Adi mRga antAH ca RkzANi praTamA kalAH // GarP_1,66.18 //
   pañcapañcānyatra bhāni caitrādya udayastathā /	paQca paQca anyatra BAni cEtra AdyaH udayaH taTA /
   dvādaśāhairdvayormāsanāmnorādyakṣaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,66.19 //	dvAdaSa ahEH dvayoH mAsa nAmnoH Adi akzaram taTA // GarP_1,66.19 //
   kalāliṅgā ca yā tiṣṭhetpañcamastasya vai mṛtiḥ /	kalAliFgA ca yA tizWet paQcamaH tasya vE mRtiH /
   kalā tithistathā vāro nakṣatraṃ māsameva ca // GarP_1,66.20 //	kalA tiTiH taTA vAraH nakzatram mAsam eva ca // GarP_1,66.20 //
   nāmodayasya pūrvaṃ ca tathā bhavati nānyathā /	nAma udayasya pUrvam ca taTA Bavati na anyaTA /
   oṃ kṣaiṃ (kṣauḥ) śivāya namaḥ // GarP_1,66.21 //	om kzEm (kzOH) SivAya namaH // GarP_1,66.21 //
   kṣāmādyaṅgaśivāmīkṣā viṣagrahamatirhara /	kzAma Adi aFga SivAm IkzAH viza graha matiH hara /
   trailokyamohanaṃ bījaṃ nṛsiṃhasya tu padma(nna)gam // GarP_1,66.22 //	trElokya mohanam bIjam nRsiMhasya tu padma(nna)gam // GarP_1,66.22 //
   mṛtyuñjayo gaṇo lakṣmī rocanādyaistu lekhitaḥ /	mRtyuQjayaH gaNaH lakzmI rocanA AdyEH tu leKitaH /
   bhūrje tu dhāritāḥ kaṇṭhe bāhau ceti jayādidāḥ // GarP_1,66.23 //	BUrje tu DAritAH kaNWe bAhO ca iti jaya Adi dAH // GarP_1,66.23 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe jyotiH
   śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SAstre SAlagrAma zazwyUbda svara udayAnAm nirUpaNam nAma zawzazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  67	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 67
   (iti jyotiḥ śāstraṃ samāptam) /	(iti jyotiH SAstram samAptam) /
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   hareḥ śrutvā haro gaurīṃ dehasthaṃ jñānamabravīt // GarP_1,67.1 //	hareH SrutvA haraH gOrIm deha sTam jQAnam abravIt // GarP_1,67.1 //
   kujo vahnī raviḥ pṛthvī saurirāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /	kujaH vahniH raviH pRTvI sOrirApaH prakIrtitaH /
   vāyusaṃsthāsthito rāhurdakṣarandhrāvabhāsakaḥ // GarP_1,67.2 //	vAyu saMsTA sTitaH rAhuH dakza ranDra avaBAsakaH // GarP_1,67.2 //
   guruḥ śukrastathā saumyaścandraścaiva caturthakaḥ /	guruH SukraH taTA sOmyaH candraH ca eva caturTakaH /
   vāmanāḍīṃ tu madhyasthāṃ kārayedātmanastathā // GarP_1,67.3 //	vAma nAxIm tu maDyasTAm kArayet AtmanaH taTA // GarP_1,67.3 //
   yadācara ilāyuktastadā karmasamācaret /	yat AcaraH ilA yuktaH tadA karmasamAcaret /
   sthānasevāṃ tathā dhyānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ rājadarśanam // GarP_1,67.4 //	sTAna sevAm taTA DyAnam vANijyam rAja darSanam // GarP_1,67.4 //
   anyāni śubhakarmāṇi kārayeta prayatnataḥ /	anyAni SuBa karmANi kArayeta prayatnataH /
   dakṣanāḍīpravāhe tu śanirbhaumaśca saihikaḥ // GarP_1,67.5 //	dakza nAxI pravAhe tu SaniH BOmaH ca sa EhikaH // GarP_1,67.5 //
   inaścaiva tathāpye pāpānāmudayo bhavet /	inaH ca eva taTA apye pApAnAm udayaH Bavet /
   śubhāśubhaviveko hi jñāyate tu svarodayāt // GarP_1,67.6 //	SuBa aSuBa vivekaH hi jQAyate tu svara udayAt // GarP_1,67.6 //
   dehamadhye sthitā nāḍyo bahurūpāḥ suvistarāḥ /	deha maDye sTitAH nAxyaH bahu rUpAH su vistarAH /
   nābheradhastādyaḥ kandastvaṅkurāstatra nirgatāḥ // GarP_1,67.7 //	nABeH aDastAt yaH kandaH tu aFkurAH tatra nirgatAH // GarP_1,67.7 //
   dvisaptatisahasrāṇi nābhimadhye vyavasthite /	dvisaptati sahasrANi nABi maDye vyavasTite /
   cakravacca sthitāstāstu sarvāḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,67.8 //	cakra vat ca sTitAH tAH tu sarvAH prANa harAH smRtAH // GarP_1,67.8 //
   tāsāṃ madhye trayaḥ śreṣṭhā vāmadakṣaiṇamadhyamāḥ /	tAsAm maDye trayaH SrezWAH vAma dakza eNa maDyamAH /
   vāmā somātmikā proktā dakṣiṇā ravisannibhā // GarP_1,67.9 //	vAmA soma AtmikA proktAH dakziNA ravi sanniBAH // GarP_1,67.9 //
   madhyamā ca bhavedagniḥ phalantī kālapūriṇī /	maDyamA ca Bavet agniH PalantI kAla pUriNI /
   vāmā hyamṛtarūpā ca jagadāpyāyane sthitā // GarP_1,67.10 //	vAmA hi amRta rUpA ca jagat ApyAyane sTitAH // GarP_1,67.10 //
   dakṣiṇā raudrabhāgena jagacchoṣayate sadā /	dakziNA rOdra BAgena jagat Sozayate sadA /
   dvayorvāhe tu mṛtyuḥ syātsarvakāryavināśinī // GarP_1,67.11 //	dvayoH vAhe tu mRtyuH syAt sarva kArya vinASinI // GarP_1,67.11 //
   nirgame tu bhavedvāmā praveśe dakṣaiṇā smṛtā /	nirgame tu Bavet vAmA praveSe dakza eNA smRtA /
   iḍācāre tathā saumyaṃ candrasūryagatastathā // GarP_1,67.12 //	ixA AcAre taTA sOmyam candra sUrya gataH taTA // GarP_1,67.12 //
   kārayetkrūra karmāṇi prāṇe piṅgalasaṃsthite /	kArayet krUra karmANi prANe piFgala saMsTite /
   yātrāyāṃ sarvakāryeṣu viṣāpahāraṇe iḍā // GarP_1,67.13 //	yAtrAyAm sarva kAryezu viza apahAraNe ixA // GarP_1,67.13 //
   bhojane maithune yuddhe piṅgalā siddhidāyikā /	Bojane mETune yudDe piFgalA sidDi dAyikA /
   uccāṭamāraṇādyeṣu karmasveteṣu piṅgalā // GarP_1,67.14 //	uccAwa mAraNa Adyezu karmasu etezu piFgalAH // GarP_1,67.14 //
   maithune caiva saṃgrāme bhojane siddhidāyikā /	mETune ca eva saMgrAme Bojane sidDi dAyikA /
   śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyāṃ viṣakarmaṇi // GarP_1,67.15 //	SoBanezu ca kAryezu yAtrAyAm viza karmaNi // GarP_1,67.15 //
   śāntimuktyarthasiddhyai ca iḍā yojyā narādhipaiḥ /	SAnti mukti arTa sidDyE ca ixA yojyAH narADipEH /
   dvābhyāṃ caiva pravāhe ca krūrasaumyavivarjane // GarP_1,67.16 //	dvAByAm ca eva pravAhe ca krUra sOmya vivarjane // GarP_1,67.16 //
   viṣavattaṃ tu jānīyātsaṃsmarettu vicakṣaṇaḥ /	viza vat tam tu jAnIyAt saMsmaret tu vicakzaNaH /
   saumyādiśubhakāryeṣu lābhādijayajīvite // GarP_1,67.17 //	sOmya Adi SuBa kAryezu lABa Adi jaya jIvite // GarP_1,67.17 //
   gamanāgamane caiva vāmā sarvatra pūjitā /	gamana Agamane ca eva vAmA sarvatra pUjitAH /
   yuddhādibhojane ghāte strīṇāṃ caiva tu saṃgame // GarP_1,67.18 //	yudDa Adi Bojane GAte strINAm ca eva tu saMgame // GarP_1,67.18 //
   praśastā dakṣiṇā nāḍī praveśe kṣudrakarmaṇi /	praSastA dakziNA nAxI praveSe kzudra karmaNi /
   śubhāśubhāni kāryāṇi lābhālābhau jayājayau // GarP_1,67.19 //	SuBa aSuBAni kAryANi lABa alABO jaya ajayO // GarP_1,67.19 //
   jīvājīvāya yatpṛcchenna sidhyati ca madhyamā /	jIvAjIvAya yat pRcCet na siDyati ca maDyamA /
   vāmācāre 'thavā dakṣe pratyaye yatra nāyakaḥ // GarP_1,67.20 //	vAma AcAre aTavA dakze pratyaye yatra nAyakaH // GarP_1,67.20 //
   tanusthaḥ pṛcchate yastu tatra siddhirna saṃśayaḥ /	tanu sTaH pRcCate yaH tu tatra sidDiH na saMSayaH /
   vaicchando vāmadevastu yadā vahati cātmani // GarP_1,67.21 //	vEcCandaH vAmadevaH tu yadA vahati ca Atmani // GarP_1,67.21 //
   tatra bhāge sthitaḥ pṛcchetsiddhirbhavati niṣphalā /	tatra BAge sTitaH pRcCet sidDiH Bavati nizPalAH /
   vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra saṃkramate śivā // GarP_1,67.22 //	vAme vA dakziNe vA api yatra saMkramate SivAH // GarP_1,67.22 //
   ghore ghorāṇi kāryāṇi saumye vai madhyamāni ca /	Gore GorANi kAryANi sOmye vE maDyamAni ca /
   prasthite bhāgato haṃse dvābhyāṃ vai sarvavāhinī // GarP_1,67.23 //	prasTite BAgataH haMse dvAByAm vE sarva vAhinI // GarP_1,67.23 //
   tadā mṛtyuṃ vijānīyādyogī yogaviśāradaḥ /	tadA mRtyum vijAnIyAt yogI yoga viSAradaH /
   yatrayatra sthitaḥ pṛcchedvāmadakṣiṇasaṃmukhaḥ // GarP_1,67.24 //	yatra yatra sTitaH pRcCet vAma dakziNa saMmuKaH // GarP_1,67.24 //
   tatratatra samaṃ diśyādvātasyodayanaṃ sadā /	tatra tatra samam diSyAt vAtasya udayanam sadA /
   agrato vāmikā śreṣṭhā pṛṣṭhato dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.25 //	agratas vAmikA SrezWA pRzWatas dakziNA SuBAH // GarP_1,67.25 //
   vāmena vāmikā proktā dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā /	vAmena vAmikA proktA dakziNe dakziNA SuBA /
   vāme vāmā śubhe caiva dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.26 //	vAme vAmA SuBe ca eva dakziNe dakziNA SuBAH // GarP_1,67.26 //
   jīvo jīvati jīvena yacchūnyaṃ tastvaro bhavet /	jIvaH jIvati jIvena yat SUnyam taH tvaraH Bavet /
   yatkiñcitkāryamuddiṣṭaṃ jayādiśubhalakṣaṇam // GarP_1,67.27 //	yat kiQcitkAryam uddizwam jaya Adi SuBa lakzaNam // GarP_1,67.27 //
   tatsarvaṃ pūrṇanāḍyāṃ tu jāyate nirvikalpataḥ /	tat sarvam pUrNanAxyAm tu jAyate nirvikalpataH /
   anyanāḍyādiparyantaṃ pakṣatrayamudāhṛtam // GarP_1,67.28 //	anya nAxI Adi paryantam pakza trayam udAhRtam // GarP_1,67.28 //
   yāvatṣaṣṭhī tu pṛcchāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ prathamo jayet /	yAvat zazWI tu pRcCAyAm pUrNAyAm praTamaH jayet /
   riktāyāṃ tu dvitīyastu kathayettadaśaṅkitaḥ // GarP_1,67.29 //	riktAyAm tu dvitIyaH tu kaTayet tat aSaFkitaH // GarP_1,67.29 //
   vāmācārasamo vāyurjāyate karmasiddhidaḥ /	vAma AcAra samaH vAyuH jAyate karma sidDi daH /
   pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣamākṣaram // GarP_1,67.30 //	pravRtte dakziNe mArge vizame vizama akzaram // GarP_1,67.30 //
   anyatra vāmavāhe tu nāma vai viṣamākṣaram /	anyatra vAma vAhe tu nAma vE vizama akzaram /
   tadāsau jayamāpnoti yodhaḥ saṃgrāmamadhyataḥ // GarP_1,67.31 //	tadA asO jayam Apnoti yoDaH saMgrAma maDyatas // GarP_1,67.31 //
   dakṣavātapravāhe tu yadi nāma samākṣaram /	dakza vAta pravAhe tu yadi nAma sama akzaram /
   jā(ja) yate nātra sandeho nāḍīmaghye tu lakṣayet // GarP_1,67.32 //	jA(ja) yate na atra sandehaH nAxImaGye tu lakzayet // GarP_1,67.32 //
   piṅgalāntargate prāṇe śamanīyāhavaṃ jayet /	piFgala antargate prANe SamanIya Ahavam jayet /
   yāvannāḍyudayaṃ cārastāṃ diśaṃ yāvadāpayet // GarP_1,67.33 //	yAvat nAxI udayam cAraH tAm diSam yAvat Apayet // GarP_1,67.33 //
   na dātuṃ jāyate so 'pi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	na dAtum jAyate saH api na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   atha saṃgrāmamadhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet // GarP_1,67.34 //	aTa saMgrAma maDye tu yatra nAxI sadA vahet // GarP_1,67.34 //
   sā diśā jayamāpnoti śūnye bhaṅgaṃ vinirdiśet /	sA diSA jayam Apnoti SUnye BaFgam vinirdiSet /
   jātacāre jayaṃ vidyānmṛtake mṛtamādiśet // GarP_1,67.35 //	jAta cAre jayam vidyAt mRtake mRtam AdiSet // GarP_1,67.35 //
   jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ /	jayam parAjayam ca eva yaH jAnAti sa paNxitaH /
   vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra sañcarate śivam // GarP_1,67.36 //	vAme vA dakziNe vA api yatra saQcarate Sivam // GarP_1,67.36 //
   kṛtvā tatpadamāpnoti yātrā santataśobhanā /	kRtvA tat padam Apnoti yAtrA santata SoBanA /
   śaśisūryapravāhe tu sati yuddhaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,67.37 //	SaSi sUrya pravAhe tu sati yudDam samAcaret // GarP_1,67.37 //
   yastu pṛcchati tatrasthaḥ sa sādhurjayatidhruvam /	yaH tu pRcCati tatrasTaH sa sADuH jayatiDruvam /
   yāṃ diśaṃ vahate vāyustāṃ diśaṃ yāvadājayaḥ // GarP_1,67.38 //	yAm diSam vahate vAyuH tAm diSam yAvat AjayaH // GarP_1,67.38 //
   jāyate nātra sandeha handro yadyagrataḥ sthitaḥ /	jAyate na atra sandeha handraH yadi agratas sTitaH /
   meṣyādyā daśa yā nāḍyo dakṣiṇā vāma saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_1,67.39 //	mezi a AdyAH daSa yAH nAxyaH dakziNAH vAma saMsTitAH // GarP_1,67.39 //
   caresthire tadvimārge tādṛśetādṛśe kramāt /	caresTire tad vimArge tAdRSeta adRSe kramAt /
   nirgame nirgamaṃ yāti saṃgrahe saṃgrahaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,67.40 //	nirgame nirgamam yAti saMgrahe saMgraham viduH // GarP_1,67.40 //
   pṛcchakasya vacaḥ śrutvā ghaṇṭākāreṇa lakṣayet /	pRcCakasya vacaH SrutvA GaNwA AkAreNa lakzayet /
   vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi pañcatattvasthitaḥ śive // GarP_1,67.41 //	vAme vA dakziNe vA api paQca tattva sTitaH Sive // GarP_1,67.41 //
   ūrdhve 'gniradha āpaśca tiryaksaṃsthaḥ prabhañjanaḥ /	UrDve agniH aDas ApaH ca tiryak saMsTaH praBaQjanaH /
   madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā // GarP_1,67.42 //	maDye tu pRTivI jQeyA naBaH sarvatra sarvadA // GarP_1,67.42 //
   ūrdhve mṛtyuradhaḥ śāntistiryak coccāṭayetsudhīḥ /	UrDve mRtyuH aDas SAntiH tiryak ca uccAwayet suDIH /
   madhye stambhaṃ vijānīyānmokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage // GarP_1,67.43 //	maDye stamBam vijAnIyAt mokzaH sarvatra sarvage // GarP_1,67.43 //
   iti śrīgāruḍemahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe svarodaye	iti SrI gAruxemahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe svara udaye
   śubhāśubhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SuBASuBanirUpaNam nAma saptazazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  68	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 68
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   parikṣāṃ vacmiratnānāṃ balo nāmāsuro 'bhavat /	parikzAm vacmi ratnAnAm balaH nAma asuraH aBavat /
   indrādyā nirjitāstena vijetuṃ tairna śakyate // GarP_1,68.1 //	indra AdyAH nirjitAH tena vijetum tEH na Sakyate // GarP_1,68.1 //
   varavyājena paśutāṃ yācitaḥ sa surairmakhe /	vara vyAjena paSu tAm yAcitaH sa surEH maKe /
   balo dadau sa (sva) paśutāmatisattva surairhataḥ // GarP_1,68.2 //	balaH dadO saH (sva) paSu tAm atisattva surEH hataH // GarP_1,68.2 //
   paśuvatsa viśastastaiḥ svavākyāśaniyantritaḥ /	paSu vat sa viSastaH tEH sva vAkya aSani yantritaH /
   balo lokoparāya devānāṃ hitakāmyayā // GarP_1,68.3 //	balaH loka uparAya devAnAm hita kAmyayA // GarP_1,68.3 //
   tasya sattvaviśuddhasya viśuddhena ca karmaṇā /	tasya sattva viSudDasya viSudDena ca karmaNA /
   kāyasyāvayavāḥ sarve ratnabījatvamāyayuḥ // GarP_1,68.4 //	kAyasya avayavAH sarve ratna bIja tvam AyayuH // GarP_1,68.4 //
   devānāmatha yakṣāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ pavanāśinām /	devAnAm aTa yakzANAm sidDAnAm pavanASinAm /
   ratnabījaṃsva(jama)yaṃ grāhaḥ sumahānabhavattadā // GarP_1,68.5 //	ratna bIjaMsu a(jam a)yam grAhaH su mahAn aBavat tadA // GarP_1,68.5 //
   teṣāṃ tu patatāṃ vegādvimānena vihāyasā /	tezAm tu patatAm vegAt vimAnena vihAyasA /
   yadyatpapāta ratnānāṃ bījaṃ kracana kiñcana // GarP_1,68.6 //	yat yat papAta ratnAnAm bIjam kracana kiQcana // GarP_1,68.6 //
   mahodadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane 'pi vā /	mahodaDO sariti vA pavarta kAnane api vA /
   tattadākaratāṃ yātaṃ sthānamādheyagauravāt // GarP_1,68.7 //	tat tat Akara tAm yAtam sTAnam ADeya gOravAt // GarP_1,68.7 //
   teṣu rakṣoviṣavyālavyādhighnānyaghahāni ca /	tezu rakzaH viza vyAla vyADi GnAni aGa hAni ca /
   prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathaiva viguṇāni ca // GarP_1,68.8 //	prAdurBavanti ratnAni taTA eva viguNAni ca // GarP_1,68.8 //
   vajraṃ muktāmaṇayaḥ sapadmarāgāḥ samarakatāḥ proktāḥ /	vajram muktAmaNayaH sa padmarAgAH samaraka tAH proktAH /
   api cendranīlamaṇivaravaidūryāḥ puṣparāgāśca // GarP_1,68.9 //	api ca indranIla maNi vara vEdUryAH puzparAgAH ca // GarP_1,68.9 //
   karketanaṃ sapulakaṃ rudhirākhyasamanvitaṃ tathā sphaṭikam /	karketanam sa pulakam ruDira AKya samanvitam taTA sPawikam /
   vidrumamaṇiśca yatnāduddiṣṭaṃ saṃgrahe tajjñaiḥ // GarP_1,68.10 //	vidruma maNiH ca yatnAt uddizwam saMgrahe tajjQEH // GarP_1,68.10 //
   ākāravarṇau prathamaṃ guṇadoṣau tatphalaṃ parīkṣā ca /	AkAra varNO praTamam guNa dozO tat Palam parIkzA ca /
   mūlyaṃ ca ratnakuśalairvijñeyaṃ sarvaśāstrāṇām // GarP_1,68.11 //	mUlyam ca ratna kuSalEH vijQeyam sarva SAstrANAm // GarP_1,68.11 //
   kulagneṣūpajāyante yāni copahate 'hani /	kulagnezu upajAyante yAni ca upahate ahani /
   dauṣaistānyapiyujyante hīyante guṇasampadā // GarP_1,68.12 //	dOzEH tAni apiyujyante hIyante guNa sampadA // GarP_1,68.12 //
   parīkṣāpariśuddhānāṃ ratnānāṃ pṛthivībhujā /	parIkzA pariSudDAnAm ratnAnAm pRTivIBujA /
   dhāraṇaṃ saṃgraho vāpi kāryaḥ śriyamabhīpsatā // GarP_1,68.13 //	DAraNam saMgrahaH vA api kAryaH Sriyam aBIpsatA // GarP_1,68.13 //
   śāstrajñaḥ kuśalāścāpi ratnabhājaḥ parīkṣakāḥ /	SAstra jQaH kuSalAH ca api ratna BAjaH parIkzakAH /
   ta eva mūlyamātrāyā vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,68.14 //	te eva mUlya mAtrAyAH vettAraH parikIrtitAH // GarP_1,68.14 //
   mahā prabhāvaṃ vibudhairyasyamādvajramudāhṛtam /	mahA praBAvam vibuDEH yasyam At vajram udAhRtam /
   vajrapūrvā parīkṣeyaṃ tato 'smābhiḥ prakīrtyate // GarP_1,68.15 //	vajra pUrvA parIkzA iyam tatas asmABiH prakIrtyate // GarP_1,68.15 //
   tasyāsthileśo nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcideva /	tasya asTi leSaH nipapAta yezu BuvaH pradeSezu kaTaQcid eva /
   vajrāṇi vajrāyudhanirjigīṣorbhavanti nānākṛtimanti teṣu // GarP_1,68.16 //	vajrANi vajra AyuDa nirjigIzoH Bavanti nAnA AkRtimanti tezu // GarP_1,68.16 //
   haimamātaṅgasaurāṣṭrāḥ pauṇḍrakāliṅgakosalāḥ /	hEma mAtaFga sOrAzwrAH pONxraka AliFga kosalAH /
   veṇvātaṭāḥ sasauvīrā vajrasyāṣṭa vihārakāḥ // GarP_1,68.17 //	veNvA tawAH sa sOvIrAH vajrasya azwa vihArakAH // GarP_1,68.17 //
   ātāmrā himaśailajāśca śaśibhā veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre	AtAmrAH himaSEla jAH ca SaSi BAH veNvA tawIyAH smRtAH sOvIre
   tvasitābjameghasadṛśāstābhrāśca saurāṣṭrajāḥ /	tu asita abja meGa sadRSAH tABrAH ca sOrAzwra jAH /
   kāliṅgāḥ kana kāvadātarucirāḥ pītaprabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍrabhavā	kAliFgAH kana kA avadAta rucirAH pIta praBAH kosale SyAmAH puNxra BavA
   mataṅgaviṣaye nātyantapītaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,68.18 //	mataFga vizaye na atyanta pIta praBAH // GarP_1,68.18 //
   atyarthaṃ laghu varṇataśca guṇavatpārśveṣu samyak	atyarTam laGu varNataH ca guNavat pArSvezu samyak 
   samaṃrekhābindukalaṅkakākapadakatrāsādibhirvarjitam /	samaMreKA bindu kalaFka kAka padaka trAsa AdiBiH varjitam /
   loke 'sminparāmāṇumātramapi yadvajraṃ kraciddṛśyate tasmindevasamāśrayo	loke asmin parAmANu mAtram api yat vajram kracit dRSyate tasmin deva samASrayaH 
   hyavitathastīkṣṇāgradhāraṃ yadi // GarP_1,68.19 //	hi avitaTaH tIkzNa agra DAram yadi // GarP_1,68.19 //
   vajreṣu varṇayuktyā devānāmapi vigrahaḥ proktaḥ /	vajrezu varNa yuktyA devAnAm api vigrahaH proktaH /
   varṇebhyaśca vibhāgaḥ kāryo varṇāśrayādeva // GarP_1,68.20 //	varNeByaH ca viBAgaH kAryaH varNa ASrayAt eva // GarP_1,68.20 //
   haritasitapītapiṅgaśyāmāstāmrāḥ svabhāvato rucirāḥ /	harita sita pIta piFga SyAmAH tAmrAH svaBAvataH rucirAH /
   harivaruṇaśakrahutavahapitṛpatimarutāṃ svakā varṇāḥ // GarP_1,68.21 //	hari varuNa Sakra hutavaha pitR pati marutAm svakAH varNAH // GarP_1,68.21 //
   viprasya śaṅkhakumudasphaṭikāvadātaḥ syātkṣattriyasya	viprasya SaFKa kumuda sPawika avadAtaH syAt kzattriyasya
   śaśababhruvilocanābhaḥ /	SaSa baBru vilocana ABaH /
   vaiśyasya kāntakadalīdalasannikāśaḥ śūdrasya dhautakaravālasamānadīptiḥ //	vESyasya kAnta kadalI dala sannikASaH SUdrasya DOta karavAla samAna dIptiH //
   GarP_1,68.22 //	GarP_1,68.22 //
   dvau vajravarṇau pṛthivīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau /	dvO vajra varNO pRTivIpatInAm sadBiH pradizwO na tu sArvajanyO /
   yaḥ syājjavāvidrumabhaṅgaśoṇo yo vā haridrārasannikāśaḥ // GarP_1,68.23 //	yaH syAt javA vidruma BaFga SoNaH yaH vA haridrA rasannikASaH // GarP_1,68.23 //
   īśatvātsarvavarṇānāṃ guṇavatsārbavarṇikam /	ISa tvAt sarva varNAnAm guNavat sArba varNikam /
   kāmato dhārayedrājā na tvanyo 'nyatkathañcana // GarP_1,68.24 //	kAmataH DArayet rAjA na tu anyaH anyat kaTaQcana // GarP_1,68.24 //
   adharottaravṛttayā hi yādṛk syādvarṇasaṅkaraḥ /	aDara uttara vRttayA hi yAdRS syAt varNa saFkaraH /
   tataḥ kaṣṭataro vajravarṇānāṃ saṅkaro mataḥ // GarP_1,68.25 //	tatas kazwataraH vajra varNAnAm saFkaraH mataH // GarP_1,68.25 //
   na ca mārgavibhāgamātravṛttyā viduṣā vajraparigraho vidheyaḥ /	na ca mArga viBAga mAtra vRttyA viduzA vajra parigrahaH viDeyaH /
   guṇavadguṇasampadāṃ vibhūtirviparīto vyasanodayasya hetuḥ // GarP_1,68.26	guNavat guNa sampadAm viBUtiH viparItaH vyasana udayasya hetuH // GarP_1,68.26
   ekamapi yasya śṛṅgaṃ vidalitamavalokyate viśīrṇaṃ vā /	ekam api yasya SRFgam vidalitam avalokyate viSIrNam vA /
   guṇavadapi tanna dhāryaṃ vajraṃ śreyo 'rthibhirbhavane // GarP_1,68.27 //	guNavat api tat na DAryam vajram SreyaH arTiBiH Bavane // GarP_1,68.27 //
   sphuṭitāgnivi śīrṇaśṛṅgadeśaṃ malavarṇaiḥ pṛṣatairupetamadhyam /	sPuwita agni vi SIrNa SRFga deSam mala varNEH pRzatEH upeta maDyam /
   na hi vajrabhṛto 'pi vajramāśu śriyamapyāśrayalālasāṃ na kuryāt //	na hi vajraBRtaH api vajram ASu Sriyam api ASraya lAlasAm na kuryAt //
   GarP_1,68.28 //	GarP_1,68.28 //
   yasyaikadeśaḥ kṣatajāvabhāso yadvā bhavellohitavarṇacitram /	yasya eka deSaH kzataja avaBAsaH yat vA Bavet lohita varNa citram /
   na tanna kuryāddhriyamāṇamāśu svacchandamṛtyorapi jīvitāntam //	na tat na kuryAt DriyamANam ASu svacCanda mRtyoH api jIvita antam //
   GarP_1,68.29 //	GarP_1,68.29 //
   koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāśca ṣaḍaṣṭau dvādaśeti ca /	kowyaH pArSvani DArAH ca zaz azwO dvAdaSa iti ca /
   uttuṅgasamatīkṣṇāgrāḥ vajrasyākarajā guṇāḥ // GarP_1,68.30 //	uttuFga sama tIkzNa agrAH vajrasya Akara jAH guNAH // GarP_1,68.30 //
   ṣaṭkoṭi śudvamamalaṃ sphuṭatīkṣṇadhāraṃ varṇānvitaṃ laghu	zaz kowi Sudvam amalam sPuwa tIkzNa DAram varNa anvitam laGu
   supārśvamapetadoṣam /	supArSvam apeta dozam /
   indrāyudhāṃśuvisṛticchuritāntarikṣamevaṃvidhaṃ bhuvi bhavetsulabhaṃ na	indrAyuDa aMSu visRti= Curita antarikzam evaMviDam Buvi Bavet sulaBam na
   vajram // GarP_1,68.31 //	vajram // GarP_1,68.31 //
   tīkṣṇāgraṃ vimalamapetasarvadoṣaṃ dhatte yaḥ prayatatanuḥ sadaiva vajram /	tIkzNa agram vimalam apeta sarva dozam Datte yaH prayata tanuH sadA eva vajram /
   vṛddhistaṃ pratidinameti yāvadāyuḥ strīsampatsutadhanadhānyagodaśūnām //	vRdDiH tam pratidinam eti yAvat AyuH strI sampad suta Dana DAnya go daSUnAm //
   GarP_1,68.32 //	GarP_1,68.32 //
   vyālavahniviṣavyāghrataskarāmbubhayāni ca /	vyAla vahni viza vyAGra taskara ambu BayAni ca /
   dūrāttasya nivartante karmāṇyātharvaṇāni ca // GarP_1,68.33 //	dUrAt tasya nivartante karmANi ATarvaNAni ca // GarP_1,68.33 //
   yadi vajramapetasarvadoṣaṃ bibhṛyāttaṇḍulaviṃśatiṃ gurutve /	yadi vajram apeta sarva dozam biBRyAt taNxula viMSatim guru tve /
   maṇiśāstravido vadanti tasya dviguṇaṃ rūpakalakṣamagramūlyam //	maNi SAstra vidaH vadanti tasya dviguNam rUpaka lakzam agra mUlyam //
   GarP_1,68.34 //	GarP_1,68.34 //
   tribhāgahīnārdhatadardhaśeṣaṃ trayodaśaṃ triṃśadator'ddhabhāgāḥ /	tri BAga hIna arDa tad arDa Sezam trayodaSam triMSat ator adDa BAgAH /
   aśītibhāgo 'tha śatāṃśabhāgaḥ sahasrabhāgo 'lpasamānayogaḥ // GarP_1,68.35	aSIti BAgaH aTa Sata aMSa BAgaH sahasra BAgaH alpa samAna yogaH // GarP_1,68.35
   yattaṇḍulairdvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ pradiṣṭam /	yat taNxulEH dvAdaSaBiH kRtasya vajrasya mUlyam praTamam pradizwam /
   dvābhyāṃ kramādvānimupāgatasya tvekāvamānasya viniścayo 'yam //	dvAByAm kramAt vAnim upAgatasya tu eka avamAnasya viniScayaH ayam //
   GarP_1,68.36 //	GarP_1,68.36 //
   na cāpi taṇḍulaireva vajrāṇāṃ dharaṇakramaḥ /	na ca api taNxulEH eva vajrANAm DaraNa kramaH /
   aṣṭābhiḥ sarṣapairgairaistaṃṇḍulaṃ parikalpayet // GarP_1,68.37 //	azwABiH sarzapEH gErEH taMNxulam parikalpayet // GarP_1,68.37 //
   yattu sarvaguṇairyuktaṃ vajraṃ tarati vāriṇi /	yat tu sarva guNEH yuktam vajram tarati vAriNi /
   ratnavarge samaste 'pi tasya dhāraṇamiṣyate // GarP_1,68.38 //	ratna varge samaste api tasya DAraNam izyate // GarP_1,68.38 //
   alpenāpi hi doṣeṇa lakṣyālakṣyeṇa dvaṣitam /	alpena api hi dozeNa lakzya alakzyeNa dvazitam /
   sva (sa) mūlyāddaśamaṃ bhāgaṃ vajraṃ labhati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,68.39 //	sve (sa) mUlyAt daSamam BAgam vajram laBati mAnavaH // GarP_1,68.39 //
   prakaṭānekadoṣasya svalpasya mahato 'pi vā /	prakawa aneka dozasya su alpasya mahataH api vA /
   sva (su) mūlyācchataśo bhāgo vajrasya na vidhīyate // GarP_1,68.40 //	sve (su) mUlyAt SataSas BAgaH vajrasya na viDIyate // GarP_1,68.40 //
   spaṣṭadoṣamalaṅkāre vajraṃ yadyapi dṛśyate /	spazwa dozam alaFkAre vajram yadi api dRSyate /
   ratnānāṃ parikarmārthaṃ mūlyaṃ tasya bhavellaghu // GarP_1,68.41 //	ratnAnAm parikarma arTam mUlyam tasya Bavet laGu // GarP_1,68.41 //
   prathamaṃ guṇasampadābhyupetaṃ pratibaddhaṃ samupaiti yacca doṣam /	praTamam guNa sampadA aByupetam pratibadDam samupEti yat ca dozam /
   alamābharaṇena tasya rājño guṇahīno 'pi maṇirna bhūṣaṇāya // GarP_1,68.42	alam ABaraNena tasya rAjQaH guNa hInaH api maNiH na BUzaNAya // GarP_1,68.42
   nāryā vajramadhāryaṃ guṇavadapi sutaprasūtimicchantyā /	nAryAH vajram aDAryam guNavat api suta prasUtim icCantyA /
   anyatra dīrghācipiṭatryaśrādyaguṇairviyuktācca // GarP_1,68.43 //	anyatra dIrGA cipiwa tri aSra Adya guNEH viyuktAt ca // GarP_1,68.43 //
   ayasā puṣparāgeṇa tathā gomedakena ca /	ayasA puzparAgeNa taTA gomedakena ca /
   vaidūryasphaṭikābhyāṃ ca kācaiścāpi pṛthagvidhaiḥ // GarP_1,68.44 //	vEdUrya sPawikAByAm ca kAcEH ca api pRTagviDEH // GarP_1,68.44 //
   pratirūpāṇi kurvanti vajrasya kuśalā janāḥ /	pratirUpANi kurvanti vajrasya kuSalAH janAH /
   parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ suparīkṣakaiḥ // GarP_1,68.45 //	parIkzA tezu kartavyA vidvadBiH su parIkzakEH // GarP_1,68.45 //
   kṣārollekhanaśāṇābhisteṣāṃ kāryaṃ parīkṣaṇam /	kzAra ulleKana SANABiH tezAm kAryam parIkzaNam /
   pṛthivyāṃ yāni ratnāni ye cānye lohadhātavaḥ // GarP_1,68.46 //	pRTivyAm yAni ratnAni ye ca anye loha DAtavaH // GarP_1,68.46 //
   sarvāṇi vilikhedvajraṃ tacca tairna vilikhyate /	sarvANi viliKet vajram tat ca tEH na viliKyate /
   gurutā sarvaratnānāṃ gauravādhārakāraṇam // GarP_1,68.47 //	guru tA sarva ratnAnAm gOrava ADAra kAraNam // GarP_1,68.47 //
   vajre tāṃ vaiparītyena sūrayaḥ paricakṣate /	vajre tAm vEparItyena sUrayaH paricakzate /
   jātirajātiṃ vilikhati jātiṃ vilikhanti vajrakuruvindāḥ // GarP_1,68.48 //	jAtiH ajAtim viliKati jAtim viliKanti vajra kuruvindAH // GarP_1,68.48 //
   vajrairvajraṃ vilikhati nānyena vilikhyate vajram /	vajrEH vajram viliKati na anyena viliKyate vajram /
   vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayo ye ca kecana jātayaḥ // GarP_1,68.49 //	vajrANi muktA maNayaH ye ca kecana jAtayaH // GarP_1,68.49 //
   na teṣāṃ pratibaddhānāṃ bhā bhavatyūrdhvagāminī /	na tezAm pratibadDAnAm BAs Bavati UrDva gAminI /
   tiryak kṣatatvātkeṣāñcitkathañcidyadi jāyate /	tiryak kzata tvAt kezAQcid kaTaQcit yadi jAyate /
   tiryagvilikhyamānānāṃ sā (sa) pārśveṣu vihanyate // GarP_1,68.50 //	tiryak viliKyamAnAnAm sA (sa) pArSvezu vihanyate // GarP_1,68.50 //
   yadyapi viśīrṇakoṭiḥ sabindurekhānvito vivarṇo vā /	yadi api viSIrNa kowiH sa bindu reKA anvitaH vivarNaH vA /
   tadapi dhanadhānyaputrānkaroti sendrāyudho vajraḥ // GarP_1,68.51 //	tat api Dana DAnya putrAn karoti sa indrAyuDaH vajraH // GarP_1,68.51 //
   saudā minīvisphuritābhirāmaṃ rājā yathoktaṃ kaliśaṃ dadhānaḥ /	sOdAH minI visPurita aBirAmam rAjA yaToktam kaliSam daDAnaH /
   parākramākrāntaparapratāpaḥ samastasāmantabhuvaṃ bhunakti // GarP_1,68.52	parAkrama AkrAnta para pratApaH samasta sAmanta Buvam Bunakti // GarP_1,68.52
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	ratnatadviSezavajraparIkzaNAdivarNanam nAma azwazazwitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  69	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 69
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   dvipendrajīmūtavarāhaśaṅkhamatsyāhiśuktyudbhavaveṇujāni /	dvipa indra jImUta varAha SaFKa matsya ahi Sukti udBava veNu jAni /
   muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣāṃ ca śuktyudbhavameva bhūri //	muktAPalAni praTitAni loke tezAm ca Sukti udBavam eva BUri //
   GarP_1,69.1 //	GarP_1,69.1 //
   tatraiva caikasya hi mūlamātra niviśyate ratnapadasya jātu /	tatra eva ca ekasya hi mUla mAtra niviSyate ratna padasya jAtu /
   vedhyaṃ tu śuktayudbhavameva teṣāṃ śeṣāṇyavedhyāni vadanti tajjñāḥ //	veDyam tu SuktayudBavam eva tezAm SezANi aveDyAni vadanti tad jQAH //
   GarP_1,69.2 //	GarP_1,69.2 //
   tvaksāranāgendratimiprasūtaṃ yacchaṅkhajaṃ yacca varā hajātam /	tvaksAra nAga indra timi prasUtam yat SaFKa jam yat ca varA hajAtam /
   prāyo vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalyatayā tathāpi // GarP_1,69.3	prAyas vimuktAni Bavanti BAsA SastAni mAFgalya tayA taTA api // GarP_1,69.3
   yā mauktikānāmiha jātaye 'ṣṭau prakīrtitā ratnaviniścayajñaiḥ /	yA mOktikAnAm iha jAtaye azwO prakIrtitAH ratna viniScaya jQEH /
   kambūdbhavaṃ teṣvadhamaṃ pradiṣṭamutpadyate yacca gajendrakumbhāt //	kambu udBavam tezu aDamam pradizwam utpadyate yat ca gaja indra kumBAt //
   GarP_1,69.4 //	GarP_1,69.4 //
   svayonimadyacchavitulyavarṇaṃ śāṅkhaṃ bṛhallolaphalapramāṇam /	sva yonim adya= Cavi tulya varNam SAFKam bRhat lola Pala pramANam /
   utpadyate vāraṇakumbhamadhyādāpītavarṇaṃ prabhayā vihīnam // GarP_1,69.5	utpadyate vAraNa kumBa maDyAt ApIta varNam praBayA vihInam // GarP_1,69.5
   ye kambavaḥ śārṅgamukhāvamarśapītasya śaṅkhapravarasya gotre /	ye kambavaH SArFga muKa avamarSa pItasya SaFKa pravarasya gotre /
   mataṅgajāścāpi viśuddhavaṃśyāste mauktikānāṃ prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ //	mataFga jAH ca api viSudDa vaMSyAH te mOktikAnAm praBavAH pradizwAH //
   GarP_1,69.6 //	GarP_1,69.6 //
   utpadyate mauktikameṣu vṛttamāpītavarṇaṃ prabhayā vihīnam /	utpadyate mOktikam ezu vRttam ApIta varNam praBayA vihInam /
   pāṭhīnapṛṣṭhasya samānavarṇaṃ mīnātsuvṛttaṃ laghu cātisūkṣmam //	pAWIna pRzWasya samAna varNam mInAt su vRttam laGu ca ati sUkzmam //
   GarP_1,69.7 //	GarP_1,69.7 //
   utpadyate vāricarānaneṣu matsyāśce te madhyacarāḥ payodheḥ /	utpadyate vAri cara Ananezu matsyAH ce te maDya carAH payoDeH /
   varāhadaṃṣṭrāprabhavaṃ pradiṣṭaṃ tasyaiva daṃṣṭrāṅkuratulyavarṇam //	varAha daMzwrA praBavam pradizwam tasya eva daMzwrA aFkura tulya varNam //
   GarP_1,69.8 //	GarP_1,69.8 //
   kracitkathañcitsa bhuvaḥ pradeśe prajāyate sūkararāḍviśiṣṭaḥ /	kracit kaTaQcitsa BuvaH pradeSe prajAyate sUkara rAj viSizwaH /
   varṣopalānāṃ samavarṇaśobhaṃ tvaksāraparvaprabhavaṃ pradiṣṭam //	varza upalAnAm sama varNa SoBam tvaksAra parva praBavam pradizwam //
   GarP_1,69.9 //	GarP_1,69.9 //
   te veṇavo divyajanopabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye /	te veNavaH divya jana upaBogye sTAne prarohanti na sArvajanye /
   bhaujaṃ gamaṃ mīnaviśuddhavṛttaṃ saṃsthānato 'tyujjvalavarṇaśobham //	BOjam gamam mIna viSudDa vRttam saMsTAnataH ati ujjvala varNa SoBam //
   GarP_1,69.10 //	GarP_1,69.10 //
   nitāntadhautapravikalpamānanistriṃśadhārāsamavarṇakānti /	nitAnta DOta pravikalpamAna nistriMSa DArA sama varNa kAnti /
   prāpyātiratnāni mahāprabhāṇi rājyaṃ śriyaṃ vā mahatīṃ durāpām //	prApya ati ratnAni mahA praBANi rAjyam Sriyam vA mahatIm durApAm //
   GarP_1,69.11 //	GarP_1,69.11 //
   tejo 'nvitāḥ puṇyakṛto bhavanti muktāphalasyāhiśirobhavasya /	tejaH anvitAH puNya kRtaH Bavanti muktAPalasya ahi SiraH Bavasya /
   jijñāsayā ratnadhanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ śubhemuhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt //	jijQAsayA ratna Danam viDi jQEH SuBemuhUrte prayatEH prayatnAt //
   GarP_1,69.12 //	GarP_1,69.12 //
   rakṣāvidhānaṃ sumahadvidhāya harmyopariṣṭhaṃ kriyate yadā tat /	rakzA viDAnam su mahat viDAya harmya uparizWam kriyate yadA tat /
   tadā mahādundubhimandraghoṣairvidyullatāvisphuritāntarālaiḥ //	tadA mahA dunduBi mandra GozEH vidyut latA visPurita antarAlEH //
   GarP_1,69.13 //	GarP_1,69.13 //
   payodharākrāntivilambinamrairghanairnavairāvriyate 'ntarikṣam /	payoDara AkrAnti vilambi namrEH GanEH navEH Avriyate antarikzam /
   na taṃ bhujaṅgā na tu yātudhānā na vyādhayo nāpyupasargadoṣāḥ //	na tam BujaFgAH na tu yAtuDAnAH na vyADayaH na api upasarga dozAH //
   GarP_1,69.14 //	GarP_1,69.14 //
   hiṃsanti yasyāhiśiraḥ samutthaṃ muktāphalaṃ tiṣṭhati kośamadhye /	hiMsanti yasya ahi SiraH samutTam muktAPalam tizWati koSa maDye /
   nābhyeti meghaprabhavaṃ dharitrīṃ vipradgataṃ tadvibudhā haranti //	na aByeti meGa praBavam DaritrIm vipradgatam tat vibuDAH haranti //
   GarP_1,69.15 //	GarP_1,69.15 //
   arciḥ prabhānāvṛtadigvibhāgamādityavahuḥ khavibhāvyabimbam /	arciH praBA ana AvRta diS viBAgam Aditya vahuH Ka viBAvya bimbam /
   tejastiraskṛtya hutāśanendunakṣatratārāprabhavaṃ samagram // GarP_1,69.16	tejaH tiraskRtya hutASana indu nakzatra tArA praBavam samagram // GarP_1,69.16
   divā yathā dīrptiṅkaraṃ tathaiva tamo 'vagāḍhāsvapi tanniśāsu /	divA yaTA dIrptiFkaram taTA eva tamaH avagAXAsu api tat niSAsu /
   vicitraratnadyuticārutoyā catuḥ samudrābharaṇopapannā // GarP_1,69.17 //	vicitra ratna dyuti cAru toyA catuH samudra ABaraNa upapannAH // GarP_1,69.17 //
   mūlyaṃ na vā syāditi niścayo me kṛtsnā mahī tasya muvarṇapūrṇā /	mUlyam na vA syAt iti niScayaH me kRtsnA mahI tasya muvarNa pUrNA /
   hīno 'piyastallabhate kadācidvipākayogānmahataḥ śubhasya // GarP_1,69.18	hInaH apiyaH tat laBate kadAcid vipAka yogAt mahataH SuBasya // GarP_1,69.18
   sāpatnyahīnāṃ sa mahīṃ samagrāṃ bhunakti tattiṣṭhati yāvadeva /	sApatnya hInAm sa mahIm samagrAm Bunakti tat tizWati yAvat eva /
   na kevalaṃ tacchubhakṛnnṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānāmapi tasya janma //	na kevalam tat SuBa kRt nRpasya BAgyEH prajAnAm api tasya janma //
   GarP_1,69.19 //	GarP_1,69.19 //
   tadyojanānāṃ paritaḥ sahasraṃ sarvānanarthānvimukhī karoti /	tad yojanAnAm paritas sahasram sarvAn anarTAn vimuKI karoti /
   nakṣatramāleva divo viśīrṇā dantāvalistasya mahāmurasya // GarP_1,69.20 //	nakzatra mAlA iva divaH viSIrNA danta AvaliH tasya mahA murasya // GarP_1,69.20 //
   vicitravarṇeṣu viśuddhavarṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasāṃ papāta /	vicitra varNezu viSudDa varNA payaH su patyuH payasAm papAta /
   sampūrṇacandrāṃśukalāpakāntermāṇipravekasya mahāguṇasya // GarP_1,69.21 //	sampUrNa candra aMSu kalApa kAnteH mANi pravekasya mahA guNasya // GarP_1,69.21 //
   tacchuktimatsu sthitimāpa bījamāsanpurāpyanyabhavāni yāni /	tad Suktimatsu sTitim Apa bIjam Asan purA api anya BavAni yAni /
   yasminpradeśe 'mbunidhau papāta sucārumuktāmaṇiratnabījam /	yasmin pradeSe ambuniDO papAta su cAru muktAmaNi ratna bIjam /
   tasminpayastoyadharāvakīrṇaṃ śuktau sthitaṃ mauktikatāmavāpa //	tasmin payaH toya Dara avakIrNam SuktO sTitam mOktika tAm avApa //
   GarP_1,69.22 //	GarP_1,69.22 //
   saiṃhalikapāralaukikasaurāṣṭrikatāmraparṇapāraśavāḥ /	sEMhalika pAra lOkika sOrAzwrika tAmra parNa pAraSavAH /
   kauverapāṇḍyahāṭakahemakamityākarāstvaṣṭau // GarP_1,69.23 //	kOvera pANxya hAwaka hemakam iti AkarAH tu azwO // GarP_1,69.23 //
   śuktyudbhavaṃ nātinikṛṣṭavarṇaṃ pramāṇasaṃsthānaguṇaprabhābhiḥ /	SuktyudBavam na ati nikRzwa varNam pramANa saMsTAna guNa praBABiH /
   utpadyate vardhanapārasīkapātālalokāntarasiṃhaleṣu // GarP_1,69.24 //	utpadyate varDana pArasIka pAtAla loka antara siMhalezu // GarP_1,69.24 //
   cintyā na tasyākarajā viśeṣā rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān /	cintyAH na tasya Akara jAH viSezAH rUpe pramANe ca yateta vidvAn /
   na ca vyavasthāsti guṇāguṇeṣu sarvatra sarvākṛtayo bhavanti //	na ca vyavasTA asti guNa aguNezu sarvatra sarva AkRtayaH Bavanti //
   GarP_1,69.25 //	GarP_1,69.25 //
   etasya śuktiprabhasya muktāphalasya cānyena samunmitasya /	etasya Sukti praBasya muktAPalasya ca anyena samunmitasya /
   mūlyaṃ sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇāṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyādhikāni pañca //	mUlyam sahasrANi tu rUpakANAm triBiH SatEH api ADikAni paQca //
   GarP_1,69.26 //	GarP_1,69.26 //
   yanmāṣakārdhena tato vihīnaṃ tatpañcabhāgadvayahīnamūlyam /	yat mAzaka arDena tatas vihInam tad paQca BAga dvaya hIna mUlyam /
   yanmāṣakāṃstrīnbibhṛyātsahasre dve tasya mūlyaṃ paramaṃ pradiṣṭam //	yat mAzakAn= trIn biBRyAt sahasre dve tasya mUlyam paramam pradizwam //
   GarP_1,69.27 //	GarP_1,69.27 //
   ardhādhikau dvau vahato 'sya mūlyaṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyadhikaṃ sahasram /	arDa aDikO dvO vahataH asya mUlyam triBiH SatEH api aDikam sahasram /
   dvimāṣa konmānitagauravasya śatāni cāṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam // GarP_1,69.28	dvi mAza ka unmAnita gOravasya SatAni ca azwO kaTitAni mUlyam // GarP_1,69.28
   ardhādhikaṃ māṣakamunmitasya samaṃ ca viṃśatritayaṃ śatānām /	arDa aDikam mAzakam unmitasya samam ca viMSa tritayam SatAnAm /
   guñjāśca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyaṃ paraṃ tasya vadanti tajjñāḥ /	guQjAH ca zaw DArayataH Sate dve mUlyam param tasya vadanti tad jQAH /
   adhyardhamunmāna(pa) kṛtaṃ śataṃ syānmūlyaṃ guṇaistasya samanvitasya //	aDyarDam unmAn a(pa) kRtam Satam syAt mUlyam guNEH tasya samanvitasya //
   GarP_1,69.29 //	GarP_1,69.29 //
   yadi ṣoḍaśabhirbhavedanūnandharaṇaṃ tatpravadanti dārvikākhyam /	yadi zoxaSaBiH Bavet anUnanDaraNam tat pravadanti dArvikA AKyam /
   adhikaṃ daśabhiḥ śataṃ ca mūlyaṃ samavāpnotyapi bāliśasya hastāt //	aDikam daSaBiH Satam ca mUlyam samavApnoti api bAliSasya hastAt //
   GarP_1,69.30 //	GarP_1,69.30 //
   dviguṇairdaśabhirbhavedanūnaṃ dharaṇaṃ tadbhavakaṃ vadanti tajjñāḥ /	dviguNEH daSaBiH Bavet anUnam DaraNam tad Bavakam vadanti tad jQAH /
   navasaptatimāpnuyātsvamūlyaṃ yadi na syādguṇasampadā vihīnam //	nava saptatim ApnuyAt sva mUlyam yadi na syAt guNa sampadA vihInam //
   GarP_1,69.31 //	GarP_1,69.31 //
   triṃśatā dharaṇaṃ pūrṇaṃ śikyaṃ tasyeti kīrtyate /	triMSatA DaraNam pUrNam Sikyam tasya iti kIrtyate /
   catvāriṃśadbhavettasyāḥ paraṃ mūlyaṃ viniścayaḥ // GarP_1,69.32 //	catvAriMSat Bavet tasyAH param mUlyam viniScayaH // GarP_1,69.32 //
   catvāriṃśadra bhavettasyāstriṃśanmūlyaṃ labhet sā /	catvAriMSadra Bavet tasyAH triMSat mUlyam laBet sA /
   pañcāśattu bhavetsomastasya mūlyaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ // GarP_1,69.33 //	paQcASat tu Bavet somaH tasya mUlyam tu viMSatiH // GarP_1,69.33 //
   ṣaṣṭirnikaraśīrṣaṃ syāttasyā mūlyaṃ caturdaśa /	zazwiH nikara SIrzam syAt tasyAH mUlyam caturdaSa /
   aśītirnavatiścaiva kūpyeti parikīrtitā /	aSItiH navatiH ca eva kUpyA iti parikIrtitA /
   ekādaśa syānnava ca tayormūlyamanukramāt // GarP_1,69.34 //	ekAdaSa syAt nava ca tayoH mUlyam anukramAt // GarP_1,69.34 //
   ādāya tatsakalameva tato 'nnabhāṇḍaṃ jambīrajātarasayojanayā vipakram /	AdAya tat sakalam eva tatas anna BANxam jambIra jAta rasa yojanayA vipakram /
   ghṛṣṭaṃ tato mṛdutanūkṛtapiṇḍamūlaiḥ kuryādyatheṣṭamanu mauktikamāśu	GRzwam tatas mRdu tanUkRta piNxa mUlEH kuryAt yaTezwam anu mOktikam ASu
   viddham // GarP_1,69.35 //	vidDam // GarP_1,69.35 //
   mṛlliptamatsyapuṭamadhyagataṃ tu kṛtvā paścātpacettanu tataśca biḍālapuṭyā	mRd lipta matsya puwa maDya gatam tu kRtvA paScAt pacet tanu tatas ca bixAla puwyA
   dugdhe tataḥ payasi taṃ vipacetsudhāyāṃ pakraṃ tato 'pi payasā	dugDe tatas payasi tam vipacet suDAyAm pakram tatas api payasA
   śucicikraṇena // GarP_1,69.36 //	Suci cikraNena // GarP_1,69.36 //
   śuddhaṃ tato vimalavastranigharṣaṇena syānmauktikaṃ	SudDam tatas vimala vastra niGarzaNena syAt mOktikam
   vipulasadguṇakāntiyuktam /	vipula sat guNa kAnti yuktam /
   vyāḍirjagāda jagatāṃ hi mahāprabhāvaḥ siddho vidagdhahitatatparayā dayāluḥ	vyAxiH jagAda jagatAm hi mahA praBAvaH sidDaH vidagDa hita tad parayA dayAluH
   // GarP_1,69.37 //	// GarP_1,69.37 //
   śvetakācasamaṃ tāraṃ hemāṃśaśatayojitam /	Sveta kAca samam tAram hema aMSa Sata yojitam /
   rasamadhye pradhāryeta mauktikaṃ dehabhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,69.38 //	rasa maDye praDAryeta mOktikam deha BUzaNam // GarP_1,69.38 //
   evaṃ hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ /	evam hi siMhale deSe kurvanti kuSalAH janAH /
   yasminkṛtraimasandehaḥ kracidbhavati mauktike // GarP_1,69.39 //	yasmin kRtrEma san dehaH kracit Bavati mOktike // GarP_1,69.39 //
   uṣṇe salavaṇe snehe niśāṃ tadvāsayejjale /	uzNe sa lavaNe snehe niSAm tat vAsayet jale /
   vrīhibhirmardanīyaṃ vā śuṣkavastropaveṣṭitam // GarP_1,69.40 //	vrIhiBiH mardanIyam vA Suzka vastra upavezwitam // GarP_1,69.40 //
   yattu nāyāti vaivarṇyaṃ vijñeyaṃ tadakṛtrimam /	yat tu na AyAti vEvarNyam vijQeyam tat akRtrimam /
   sitaṃ pramāṇavatsnigdhaṃ guru svacchaṃ sunirmalam // GarP_1,69.41 //	sitam pramANa vat snigDam guru svacCam su nirmalam // GarP_1,69.41 //
   tejo 'dhikaṃ suvṛttaṃ ca mauktikaṃ guṇavatsmṛtam // GarP_1,69.42 //	tejaH aDikam su vRttam ca mOktikam guNavat smRtam // GarP_1,69.42 //
   pramāṇavadgauravaraśmiyuktaṃ sitaṃ suvṛttaṃ samasūkṣmavedham /	pramANa vat gOrava raSmi yuktam sitam su vRttam sama sUkzma veDam /
   akreturapyāvahati pramodaṃ yanmauktikaṃ tadguṇavatpradiṣṭam //	akretuH api Avahati pramodam yat mOktikam tat guNavat pradizwam //
   GarP_1,69.43 //	GarP_1,69.43 //
   evaṃ samastena guṇodayena yanmauktikaṃ yogamupāgataṃ syāt /	evam samastena guNa udayena yat mOktikam yogam upAgatam syAt /
   na tasya bhartāramanarthajāta eko 'pi kaścit samupaiti doṣaḥ //	na tasya BartAram anarTa jAtaH ekaH api kaScid samupEti dozaH //
   GarP_1,69.44 //	GarP_1,69.44 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   'dhyāyaḥ	aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  70	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 70
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   divākarastasya mahāmahimno mahāsurasyottamaratnabījam /	divAkaraH tasya mahA mahimnaH mahA asurasya uttama ratna bIjam /
   asṛggṛhītvā carituṃ pratasthe nistriṃśanīlena nabhaḥ sthalena //	asRk gRhItvA caritum pratasTe nistriMSa nIlena naBaH sTalena //
   GarP_1,70.1 //	GarP_1,70.1 //
   jettrā surāṇāṃ samareṣvajastraṃ vīryāvalepoddhatamānasena /	jettrA surANAm samarezu ajastram vIrya avalepa udData mAnasena /
   laṅkādhipenārdhapathe sametya svarbhānuneva prasabhaṃ niruddhaḥ //	laFkA aDipena arDa paTe sametya svarBAnunA iva prasaBam nirudDaH //
   GarP_1,70.2 //	GarP_1,70.2 //
   tatsiṃhalīcārunitambabimbavikṣo bhitāgādhamahāhradāyām /	tad siMhalI cAru nitamba bimba vikzaH Bita agADa mahA hradAyAm /
   pūgadrumābaddhataṭadvayāyāṃ mumoca sūryaḥ sariduttamāyām // GarP_1,70.3 //	pUga druma AbadDa tawa dvayAyAm mumoca sUryaH sarit uttamAyAm // GarP_1,70.3 //
   tataḥ prabhṛti sā gaṅgā tulyapuṇyaphalodayā /	tatas praBRti sA gaFgA tulya puNya Pala udayA /
   nāmnā rāvaṇagaṅgeti prathimānamupāgatā // GarP_1,70.4 //	nAmnA rAvaNagaFgA iti praTimAnam upAgatAH // GarP_1,70.4 //
   tataḥ prabhṛtyeva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnairnicitāni tasyāḥ /	tatas praBRti eva ca SarvarIzu kUlAni ratnEH nicitAni tasyAH /
   suvarṇanārācaśatairivāntarbahiḥ pradīptairniśitāni bhānti // GarP_1,70.5	suvarNa nArAca SatEH iva antar bahis pradIptEH niSitAni BAnti // GarP_1,70.5
   tasyāstaṭepūjjvacārurāgā bhavanti toyeṣu ca padmarāgāḥ /	tasyAH tawepu ujjvacAru rAgAH Bavanti toyezu ca padmarAgAH /
   saugandhikotthāḥ kuruvindajāśca mahāguṇāḥ sphāṭikasaṃprasūtāḥ //	sOganDika utTAH kuruvinda jAH ca mahA guNAH sPAwika saMprasUtAH //
   GarP_1,70.6 //	GarP_1,70.6 //
   bandhū kaguñjāsakalendragopajavāsamāsṛksamavarṇaśobhāḥ /	banDU kaguQjA sakala indragopa javAsa mAsRk sama varNa SoBAH /
   bhrājiṣṇavo dāḍimabījavarṇāstathāpare kiśukapuṣpabhāsaḥ // GarP_1,70.7 //	BrAjizNavaH dAxima bIja varNAH taTA apare kiSuka puzpa BAsaH // GarP_1,70.7 //
   khindurapadmotpalakuṅkumānāṃ lākṣārasasyāpi samānavarṇaḥ /	Kindura padma utpala kuFkumAnAm lAkzA rasasya api samAna varNaH /
   sāṃdre 'pi rāge prabhayā svayaiva bhānti svalakṣyāḥ sphuṭamadhyaśobhāḥ //	sAMdre api rAge praBayA svayA eva BAnti sva lakzyAH sPuwa maDya SoBAH //
   GarP_1,70.8 //	GarP_1,70.8 //
   bhānośca bhāsāmanuvedhayogāmāsādya raśami prakareṇa dūram /	BAnoH ca BAsAm anuveDa yogAm AsAdya raSami prakareNa dUram /
   pārśvāni sarvāṇyanurañjayanti guṇāpapannāḥ sphaṭikaprasūtāḥ // GarP_1,70.9	pArSvAni sarvANi anuraQjayanti guNa apapannAH sPawika prasUtAH // GarP_1,70.9
   kusuṃbhanīlavyatimiśrarāgapratyugraraktābujatulyabhāsaḥ /	kusuMBa nIla vyatimiSra rAga pratyugra rakta abuja tulya BAsaH /
   tathāpare 'ruṣkarakaṇṭakāripuṣpatviṣo hiṅgulavattviṣo 'nye // GarP_1,70.10	taTA apare aruzkara kaNwakAri puzpa tvizaH hiFgulavat tvizaH anye // GarP_1,70.10
   cakorapuṃskokilasārasānāṃ netrāvabhāsaśca bhavanti kecit /	cakora puMskokila sArasAnAm netra avaBAsaH ca Bavanti kecid /
   anye punaḥ santi ca puṣpitānāṃ tulyatviṣā kokanadottamānām // GarP_1,70.11	anye punar santi ca puzpitAnAm tulya tvizA kokanada uttamAnAm // GarP_1,70.11
   prabhāvakāṭhinyagurutvayogaiḥ prāyaḥ samānāḥ sphaṭikodbhavānām /	praBAva kAWinya guru tva yogEH prAyas samAnAH sPawika udBavAnAm /
   ānīlaraktotpalacārubhāsaḥ saugandhikotthā maṇayo bhavanti // GarP_1,70.12	AnIla rakta utpala cAru BAsaH sOganDika utTAH maNayaH Bavanti // GarP_1,70.12
   kāmaṃ tu rāgaḥ kuruvindajeṣu sa naiva yādṛk sphaṭikodbhaveṣu /	kAmam tu rAgaH kuruvinda jezu sa na eva yAdRS sPawika udBavezu /
   nirarciṣo 'ntarbahulā bhavanti prabhāvavanto 'pi nataiḥ samastaiḥ //	nirarcizaH antar bahulAH Bavanti praBAvavantaH api natEH samastEH //
   GarP_1,70.13 //	GarP_1,70.13 //
   ye tu rāvaṇagaṅgāyāṃ jāyante kuruvindakāḥ /	ye tu rAvaNa gaFgAyAm jAyante kuruvindakAH /
   padmarāgaghanaṃ rāgaṃ bibhrāṇāḥ sphaṭikārciṣaḥ // GarP_1,70.14 //	padmarAga Ganam rAgam biBrANAH sPawika arcizaH // GarP_1,70.14 //
   varṇānuyāyinasteṣā māndhradeśe tathā pare /	varNa anuyAyinaH tezAH mAnDra deSe taTA pare /
   na jāyante hi ye kecinmūlyaleśamavāpnuyuḥ // GarP_1,70.15 //	na jAyante hi ye kecid mUlya leSam avApnuyuH // GarP_1,70.15 //
   tathaiva sphāṭikotthānāṃ deśe tumburusaṃjñake /	taTA eva sPAwika utTAnAm deSe tumburu saMjQake /
   sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante svalpamūlyā hi te smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,70.16 //	saDarmANaH prajAyante su alpa mUlyAH hi te smRtAH // GarP_1,70.16 //
   varṇādhikyaṃ gurutvaṃ ca snigdhatā samatācchatā /	varNa ADikyam guru tvam ca snigDa tA sama tAcCatA /
   arciṣmattā mahattā ca maṇīnāṃ guṇasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,70.17 //	arcizmat tA mahat tA ca maNInAm guNa saMgrahaH // GarP_1,70.17 //
   ye karkaracchidramalopadigdhāḥ prabhāvimuktāḥ paruṣā vivarṇāḥ /	ye karkara= Cidra mala upadigDAH praBA vimuktAH paruzAH vivarNAH /
   na te praśastā maṇayo bhavanti samānato jātiguṇaiḥ samastaiḥ //	na te praSastAH maNayaH Bavanti samAnatas jAti guNEH samastEH //
   GarP_1,70.18 //	GarP_1,70.18 //
   doṣopasṛṣṭaṃ maṇimaprabodhādvibharti yaḥ kaścana kañcideva /	doza upasRzwam maNim apraboDAt viBarti yaH kaScana kaQcid eva /
   taṃ śokacintāmayamṛtyuvittanāśādayo doṣagaṇā bhajante // GarP_1,70.19 //	tam Soka cintA Amaya mRtyu vitta nASa AdayaH doza gaNAH Bajante // GarP_1,70.19 //
   kāmaṃ cārutarāḥ pañca jātīnā pratirūpakāḥ /	kAmam cArutarAH paQca jAtInA pratirUpakAH /
   vijā tayaḥ prayatnena vidvāṃstanupalakṣayet // GarP_1,70.20 //	vijA tayaH prayatnena vidvAn= tanupalakzayet // GarP_1,70.20 //
   kalaśapurodbhavasiṃhalatumburudeśotthamuktapāṇīyāḥ /	kalaSa pura udBava siMhala tumburu deSa utTa muktapANIyAH /
   śrīpūrṇakāśca sadṛśā vijātayaḥ padmarāgāṇām // GarP_1,70.21 //	SrI pUrNakAH ca sadRSAH vijAtayaH padmarAgANAm // GarP_1,70.21 //
   tuṣopasargātkalaśābhidhānamātāmrabhāvādapi tumburūttham /	tuza upasargAt kalaSa aBiDAnam AtAmra BAvAt api tumburu utTam /
   kārṣṇyāttathā siṃhaladeśajātaṃ muktābhidhānaṃ nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt //	kArzNyAt taTA siMhala deSa jAtam mukta aBiDAnam naBasaH svaBAvAt //
   GarP_1,70.22 //	GarP_1,70.22 //
   śrīpūrṇakaṃ dīptivinākṛtatvādvijātiliṅgāśraya eva bhedaḥ /	SrI pUrNakam dIpti vinAkRta tvAt vijAti liFga ASrayaH eva BedaH /
   yastāmrikāṃ puṣyati padmarāgo yogāttuṣāṇāmiva pūrṇamadhyaḥ // GarP_1,70.23	yaH tAmrikAm puzyati padmarAgaH yogAt tuzANAm iva pUrNa maDyaH // GarP_1,70.23
   strehapradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaśca yo vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim /	streha pradigDaH pratiBAti yaH ca yaH vA praGRzwaH prajahAti dIptim /
   ākrāntamūrdhā ca tathāṅgulibhyāṃ yaḥ kālikāṃ pārśvagatāṃ bibharti //	AkrAnta mUrDA ca taTA aFguliByAm yaH kAlikAm pArSva gatAm biBarti //
   GarP_1,70.24 //	GarP_1,70.24 //
   saṃprāpya cotkṣipya yathānuvṛttiṃ vibhartiyaḥ sarvaguṇānatīva /	saMprApya ca utkzipya yaTA anuvRttim viBartiyaH sarva guNAn atIva /
   tulyapramāṇasya ca tulyajāteryo vā gurutvena bhavettu tulyaḥ /	tulya pramANasya ca tulya jAteH yaH vA guru tvena Bavet tu tulyaH /
   prāpyāpi ratnākarajā svajātiṃ lakṣedgurutvena guṇena vidvān //	prApya api ratnAkara jA sva jAtim lakzet guru tvena guNena vidvAn //
   GarP_1,70.25 //	GarP_1,70.25 //
   apraṇaśyati sandehe śāṇe tu parilekhayet /	apraNaSyati sandehe SANe tu parileKayet /
   su(sva) jātakasamutthena likhitvāpi parasparam // GarP_1,70.26 //	su(sva) jAtaka samutTena liKitvA api parasparam // GarP_1,70.26 //
   vajraṃ vā kuruvindaṃ vā vimucyānena kenacit /	vajram vA kuruvindam vA vimucya anena kenacid /
   nāśakyaṃ lekhanaṃ kartuṃ padmarāgendranīlayoḥ // GarP_1,70.27 //	na aSakyam leKanam kartum padmarAga indranIlayoH // GarP_1,70.27 //
   jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇerna jātu vijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /	jAtyasya sarve api maNeH na jAtu vijAtayaH santi samAna varNAH /
   tathāpi nānākaraṇārthameva bhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,70.28	taTA api nAnA karaNa arTam eva Beda prakAraH paramaH pradizwaH // GarP_1,70.28
   guṇopapannena sahāvabaddhomeṇirna dhāryo viguṇo hi jātyā /	guNa upapannena saha avabadDa umeNiH na DAryaH viguNaH hi jAtyA /
   na kaustubhenāpi sahāvabaddhaṃ vidvānvijātiṃ bibhṛyātkadācit //	na kOstuBena api saha avabadDam vidvAn vijAtim biBRyAt kadAcid //
   GarP_1,70.29 //	GarP_1,70.29 //
   cāṇḍāla eko 'pi yathā dvijātīnsametya bhūrīnapi hantyayatnāt /	cANxAlaH ekaH api yaTA dvijAtIn sametya BUrIn api hanti ayatnAt /
   atho maṇīnbhūriguṇopapannāñchakroti viplāvayituṃ vijātyaḥ // GarP_1,70.30	aTo maNi in BUri guNa upapannAn Sakroti viplAvayitum vijAtyaH // GarP_1,70.30
   sapatnamadhye 'pi kṛtādhivāsaṃ pramādavṛttāvapi vartamānam /	sapatna maDye api kRta aDivAsam pramAda vRttO= api vartamAnam /
   na padmarāgasya mahāguṇasya bhartāramāpatspṛśatīha kācit // GarP_1,70.31	na padmarAgasya mahA guNasya BartAram Apad spRSati iha kAcid // GarP_1,70.31
   doṣopasargaprabhavāśca ye te nopadravāstaṃ samabhidravanti /	doza upasarga praBavAH ca ye te na upadravAH tam samaBidravanti /
   guṇaiḥ samuttejitacārurāgaṃ yaḥ padmarāgaṃ prayato bibharti //	guNEH samuttejita cAru rAgam yaH padmarAgam prayataH biBarti //
   GarP_1,70.32 //	GarP_1,70.32 //
   vajrasya yattaṇḍulasaṃkhyayoktaṃ mūlyaṃ samutpāditagauravasya /	vajrasya yat taNxula saMKyayA uktam mUlyam samutpAdita gOravasya /
   tatpadmarāgasya mahāguṇasya tanmāṣakalpākalitasya mūlyam // GarP_1,70.33	tad padmarAgasya mahA guNasya tad mAza kalpa Akalitasya mUlyam // GarP_1,70.33
   varṇadāptyapapannaṃ hi maṇiratnaṃ praśasyate /	varNa dApti apapannam hi maNi ratnam praSasyate /
   tābhyāmīṣadapi bhraṣṭaṃ maṇimūlyātprahīyate // GarP_1,70.34 //	tAByAm Izat api Brazwam maNi mUlyAt prahIyate // GarP_1,70.34 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   padmarāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	padmarAgaparIkzaNam nAma saptatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  71	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 71
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   dānavādhipateḥ pittamādāya bhujagādhipaḥ /	dAnava aDipateH pittam AdAya Bujaga aDipaH /
   dvidhā kurvanniva vyoma satvaraṃ vāsukiryayau // GarP_1,71.1 //	dviDA kurvan= iva vyoma sa tvaram vAsukiryayO // GarP_1,71.1 //
   sa tadā svaśiroratnaprabhādīpte nabho 'mbudhau /	sa tadA sva SiraH ratna praBA dIpte naBaH ambuDO /
   rājataḥ samahānekaḥ khaṇḍaseturivābabhau // GarP_1,71.2 //	rAjataH sa mahAnekaH KaNxa setuH iva AbaBO // GarP_1,71.2 //
   tataḥ pakṣanipātena saṃharanniva rodasī /	tatas pakza nipAtena saMharan= iva rodasI /
   garutmānpannagendrasya prahartumupacakrame // GarP_1,71.3 //	garutmAn pannaga indrasya prahartum upacakrame // GarP_1,71.3 //
   sahasaiva mumoca tatphaṇīndraḥ surasābhyaktaturuṣka (raṣka) pādapāyām /	sahasA eva mumoca tad PaNi indraH surasA aByakta turuzka (razka) pAdapAyAm /
   kalikāghanagandhavāsitā yāṃ varamāṇikyagirerupatyakāyām // GarP_1,71.4 //	kalikA Gana ganDa vAsitA yAm vara mANikya gireH upatyakAyAm // GarP_1,71.4 //
   tasya prapātasamanantarakālameva tadvadvarālayamatītya ramāsamīpe /	tasya prapAta samanantara kAlam eva tadvat vara Alayam atItya ramA samIpe /
   sthānaṃ kṣiterupapayonidhitīralekhaṃyāṃ varamāṇikyagirerupatyakāyām //	sTAnam kziteH upapayoniDi tIra leKaMyAm vara mANikya gireH upatyakAyAm //
   GarP_1,71.5 //	GarP_1,71.5 //
   tatraiva kiñcitpatatastu pittādupetya jagrāha tato garutmān /	tatra eva kiQcid patataH tu pittAt upetya jagrAha tatas garutmAn /
   mūrchāparītaḥ sahasaiva ghoṇārandhradvayena pramumoca sarvam //	mUrCA parItaH sahasA eva GoNA ranDra dvayena pramumoca sarvam //
   GarP_1,71.6 //	GarP_1,71.6 //
   tatrākaṭhoraśukakaṇṭhaśirīṣapuṣpakhadyotapṛṣṭhacaraśādvalaśaivalānām /	tatra akaWora Suka kaNWa SirIza puzpa Kadyota pRzWa cara SAdvala SEvalAnAm /
   kalhāraśaṣpakabhujaṅgabhujāñca patraprāptatviṣo marakatāḥ śubhadā bhavanti	kalhAra Sazpaka BujaFga BujAQca patra prApta tvizaH marakatAH SuBa dAH Bavanti
   // GarP_1,71.7 //	// GarP_1,71.7 //
   tadyatra bhogīndrabhujābhiyuktaṃ papāta pittaṃ ditijādhipasya /	tat yatra Bogi indra Buja aBiyuktam papAta pittam ditija aDipasya /
   tasyākarasyātitarāṃ sa deśo duḥ khopalabhyaśca guṇaiśca yuktaḥ //	tasya Akarasya atitarAm sa deSaH duH Ka upalaByaH ca guNEH ca yuktaH //
   GarP_1,71.8 //	GarP_1,71.8 //
   tasminmarakatasthāne yatkiñcidupajāyate /	tasmin marakata sTAne yat kiQcid upajAyate /
   tatsarvaṃ viṣarogāṇāṃ praśamāya prakīrtyate // GarP_1,71.9 //	tat sarvam viza rogANAm praSamAya prakIrtyate // GarP_1,71.9 //
   sarvamantrau ṣadhigaṇairyanna śakyaṃ cikitsitum /	sarva mantrO zaDi gaNEH yat na Sakyam cikitsitum /
   mahāhidaṃṣṭrāprabhavaṃ viṣaṃ tattena śāmyati // GarP_1,71.10 //	mahA ahi daMzwrA praBavam vizam tat tena SAmyati // GarP_1,71.10 //
   anyadapyākare tatra yaddoṣairupavarjitam /	anyat api Akare tatra yad dozEH upavarjitam /
   jāyate tatpavitrāṇāmuttamaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_1,71.11 //	jAyate tad pavitrANAm uttamam parikIrtitam // GarP_1,71.11 //
   atyantaharitavarṇaṃ komalamarcirvibhedajaṭilaṃ ca /	atyanta harita varNam komalam arciH viBeda jawilam ca /
   kāñcanacūrṇasyāntaḥ pūrṇamiva lakṣyate yacca // GarP_1,71.12 //	kAQcana cUrNasya antar pUrNam iva lakzyate yat ca // GarP_1,71.12 //
   yuktaṃ saṃsthānaguṇaiḥ samarāgaṃ gauraveṇa na vihīnam /	yuktam saMsTAna guNEH sama rAgam gOraveNa na vihInam /
   savituḥ karasaṃsparśācchurayati sarvāśramaṃ dīptyā // GarP_1,71.13 //	savituH kara saMsparSAt Curayati sarva ASramam dIptyA // GarP_1,71.13 //
   hitvā ca haritabhāvaṃ yasyāntarvinihitā bhaveddīptiḥ /	hitvA ca harita BAvam yasya antar vinihitA Bavet dIptiH /
   aciraprabhāprabhāhatanavaśādvalasannibhā bhāti // GarP_1,71.14 //	acira praBA praBA hatanava SAdvala sanniBAH BAti // GarP_1,71.14 //
   yacca manasaḥ prasādaṃ vidadhāti nirīkṣyamatimātram /	yat ca manasaH prasAdam vidaDAti nirIkzyam atimAtram /
   nanmarakataṃ mahāgaṇamiti ratnavidāṃ manovṛttiḥ // GarP_1,71.15 //	nat marakatam mahA gaNam iti ratna vidAm manaH vRttiH // GarP_1,71.15 //
   varṇasyāti vibhutvādyasyāntaḥ svacchakiraṇaparidhānam /	varNasya ati viBu tvAt yasya antar svacCa kiraNa pariDAnam /
   sāndrasnigdhaviśuddhaṃ komalabarhiprabhādisamakānti // GarP_1,71.16 //	sAndra snigDa viSudDam komala barhi praBA Adi sama kAnti // GarP_1,71.16 //
   varṇojjvalayā kāntyā sāndrākāro vibhāsayā bhāti /	varNa ujjvalayA kAntyA sAndra AkAraH viBAsayA BAti /
   tadapi guṇavatsaṃjñāmāpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam // GarP_1,71.17 //	tat api guNavat saMjQAm Apnoti hi yAdRSI pUrvam // GarP_1,71.17 //
   śabalakaṭhoramalinaṃ rūkṣaṃ pāṣāṇakarkaropetam /	Sabala kaWora malinam rUkzam pAzANa karkara upetam /
   digdhaṃ śilājatunā marakatamevaṃvidhaṃ viguṇam // GarP_1,71.18 //	digDam SilAjatunA marakatam evaMviDam viguNam // GarP_1,71.18 //
   yatsandhiśoṣitaṃ ratnamanyanmarakatādbhavet /	yad sanDi Sozitam ratnam anyat marakatAt Bavet /
   śreyaskāmairna taddhāryaṃ kretavyaṃ vā katañcana // GarP_1,71.19 //	SreyaskAmEH na tad DAryam kretavyam vA kataQcana // GarP_1,71.19 //
   bhallātakī putrikā ca tadvarṇasamayogataḥ /	BallAtakI putrikA ca tad varNa sama yogataH /
   maṇermarakatasyaite lakṣaṇīyā vijātayaḥ // GarP_1,71.20 //	maNeH marakatasya ete lakzaNIyAH vijAtayaH // GarP_1,71.20 //
   kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptiṃ tyajati putrikā /	kzOmeNa vAsasA mRzwA dIptim tyajati putrikA /
   lāghavenaiva kācasya śakyā kartuṃ vibhāvanā // GarP_1,71.21 //	lAGavena eva kAcasya SakyA kartum viBAvanA // GarP_1,71.21 //
   kasyacidanekarūpairmarakatamanugacchato 'pi guṇavarṇaiḥ /	kasyacid aneka rUpEH marakatam anugacCataH api guNa varNEH /
   bhallātakasyasvanāttu vaiṣamyamupaiti varṇasya // GarP_1,71.22 //	BallAtakasya svanAt tu vEzamyam upEti varNasya // GarP_1,71.22 //
   vajrāṇi muktāḥ santyanye ye ca keciddvijātayaḥ /	vajrANi muktAH santi anye ye ca kecid dvijAtayaH /
   teṣāṃ nāpratibaddhānāṃ bhā bhavatyūrdhvagāminī // GarP_1,71.23 //	tezAm na apratibadDAnAm BAs Bavati UrDva gAminI // GarP_1,71.23 //
   ṛjutvāccaiva keṣāñcitkathañcidupajāyate /	Rju tvAt ca eva kezAQcid kaTaQcid upajAyate /
   tiryagālocyamānānāṃ sadyaścaiva praṇaśyati // GarP_1,71.24 //	tiryak AlocyamAnAnAm sadyas ca eva praNaSyati // GarP_1,71.24 //
   snānācamanajapyeṣu rakṣāmantrakriyāvidhau /	snAna Acamana japyezu rakzA mantra kriyA viDO /
   dadadbhirgohiraṇyāni kurvadbhiḥ sādhanāni ca // GarP_1,71.25 //	dadadBiH go hiraNyAni kurvadBiH sADanAni ca // GarP_1,71.25 //
   daivapitryātitheyeṣu gurusaṃpūjaneṣu ca /	dEva pitrya AtiTeyezu guru saMpUjanezu ca /
   bādhyamāneṣu vividhairdeṣajātairviṣodbhavaiḥ // GarP_1,71.26 //	bADyamAnezu viviDEH deza jAtEH viza udBavEH // GarP_1,71.26 //
   dauṣairhenaṃ guṇairyuktaṃ kāñcanapratiyojitam /	dOzEH henam guNEH yuktam kAQcana pratiyojitam /
   saṃgrāme vicaradbhiśca dhāryaṃ marakataṃ budhaiḥ // GarP_1,71.27 //	saMgrAme vicaradBiH ca DAryam marakatam buDEH // GarP_1,71.27 //
   tulayā padmarāgasya yanmūlyamupajāyate /	tulayA padmarAgasya yat mUlyam upajAyate /
   labhate 'bhyadhikaṃ tasmādguṇairmarakataṃ yutam // GarP_1,71.28 //	laBate aByaDikam tasmAt guNEH marakatam yutam // GarP_1,71.28 //
   tathā ca padmarāgāṇāṃ doṣairmūlyaṃ prahīyate /	taTA ca padmarAgANAm dozEH mUlyam prahIyate /
   tato 'syāpyadhikā hānirdeṣairmarakate bhavet // GarP_1,71.29 //	tatas asya api aDikA hAniH dezEH marakate Bavet // GarP_1,71.29 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍa	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe purva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxa
   marakataparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	marakataparIkzaNam nAma ekasaptatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  72	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 72
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   tatraiva siṃhalavadhūkarapallavāgravyālūnabālalavalīkusumapravāle /	tatra eva siMhala vaDUkara pallava agra vyAlUna bAla lavalI kusuma pravAle /
   deśe papāta ditijasya nitāntakāntaṃ protphullanīrajasamadyuti netrayugmam	deSe papAta ditijasya nitAnta kAntam protPulla nIraja sama dyuti netra yugmam
   // GarP_1,72.1 //	// GarP_1,72.1 //
   tatpratyayādubhayaśobhanavīcibhāsā vistāriṇī jalanidherupakacchabhūmiḥ /	tad pratyayAt uBaya SoBana vIci BAsA vistAriNI jalaniDeH upakacCa BUmiH /
   prodbhinnaketakavanapratibaddhalekhāsāndrendranīlamaṇiratnavatī vibhāti //	prodBinna ketaka vana pratibadDa leKA sAndra indranIla maNi ratnavatI viBAti //
   GarP_1,72.2 //	GarP_1,72.2 //
   tatrāsitābjahalabhṛdvasanāsibhṛṅgaśārṅgāyudhāṅgaharakaṇṭhakaṣāyapuṣpaiḥ /	tatra asita abja hala BRt vasana asi BRFga SArFga AyuDa aFga hara kaNWa kazAya puzpEH /
   śuṣketaraiśca kusumairgirikarṇikāyāstasmādbhavanti maṇayaḥ sadṛśāvabhāsaḥ	Suzka itarEH ca kusumEH girikarNikAyAH tasmAt Bavanti maNayaH sadRSa avaBAsaH
   // GarP_1,72.3 //	// GarP_1,72.3 //
   anye prasannapayasaḥ payasāṃ nidhāturambutviṣaḥ śikhigaṇapratimāstathānye	anye prasanna payasaH payasAm niDAtuH ambu tvizaH SiKi gaNa pratimAH taTA anye
   nīlīrasaprabhavabudvudabhāśca kecitkecittathā samadakokilakaṇṭhabhāsaḥ //	nIlI rasa praBava budvudaBAH ca kecid kecid taTA sa mada kokila kaNWa BAsaH //
   GarP_1,72.4 //	GarP_1,72.4 //
   ekaprakārā vispaṣṭavarṇaśobhāvabhāsinaḥ /	eka prakArAH vispazwa varNa SoBA avaBAsinaH /
   jāyante maṇayastasminnindranīlā mahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,72.5 //	jAyante maNayaH tasmin= indranIlAH mahA guNAH // GarP_1,72.5 //
   mṛtpāṣāṇaśilārandhrakarkarātrāsasaṃyutāḥ /	mRd pAzANa SilA ranDra karkarA trAsa saMyutAH /
   abhrikāpaṭalacchāyāvarṇadoṣaiśca dūṣitāḥ // GarP_1,72.6 //	aBrikA pawala= CAyA varNa dozEH ca dUzitAH // GarP_1,72.6 //
   tata eva hi jāyante maṇayastatra bhūrayaḥ /	tatas eva hi jAyante maNayaH tatra BUrayaH /
   sāstrasambodhitadhiyastānpraśaṃsanti sūrayaḥ // GarP_1,72.7 //	sa astra samboDita DiyaH tAn praSaMsanti sUrayaH // GarP_1,72.7 //
   dhāryamāṇasya ye dṛṣṭā padmarāgamaṇerguṇāḥ /	DAryamANasya ye dRzwA padmarAga maNeH guNAH /
   dhāraṇādindranīlasya tānevāpnoti mānavaḥ // GarP_1,72.8 //	DAraNAt indranIlasya tAn eva Apnoti mAnavaH // GarP_1,72.8 //
   yathā ca padmarāgāṇāṃ jātakatritayaṃ bhavet /	yaTA ca padmarAgANAm jAtaka tritayam Bavet /
   indra nīleṣvapi tathā draṣṭavyamaviśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,72.9 //	indra nIlezu api taTA drazwavyam aviSezatas // GarP_1,72.9 //
   parīkṣāpratyayairyaiśca padmarāgaḥ parīkṣyate /	parIkzA pratyayEH yEH ca padmarAgaH parIkzyate /
   ta eva pratyayā dṛṣṭā indranīlamaṇerapi // GarP_1,72.10 //	te eva pratyayAH dRzwAH indranIla maNeH api // GarP_1,72.10 //
   yāvantaṃ ca kramedagniṃ padmarāgopayogataḥ /	yAvantam ca kramet agnim padmarAga upayogataH /
   indranīlamaṇistasmātkrameta sumahattaram // GarP_1,72.11 //	indranIla maNiH tasmAt krameta su mahattaram // GarP_1,72.11 //
   tathāpi na parīkṣārthaṃ guṇānāmabhi (ti) vṛddhaye /	taTA api na parIkzA arTam guNAnAm aBi (ti) vRdDaye /
   maṇiragnau samādheyaḥ kathañcidapi kaścana // GarP_1,72.12 //	maNiH agnO samADeyaH kaTaQcid api kaScana // GarP_1,72.12 //
   agnimātrāparijñāne dāhadoṣaiśca dūpitaḥ /	agni mAtrA parijQAne dAha dozEH ca dUpitaH /
   so 'narthāya bhavedbhartuḥ kartuḥ kārayitustathā // GarP_1,72.13 //	saH anarTAya Bavet BartuH kartuH kArayituH taTA // GarP_1,72.13 //
   kācotpalakaravīrasphaṭikādyā iha budhaiḥ savaidūryāḥ /	kAca utpala karavIra sPawika AdyAH iha buDEH sa vEdUryAH /
   kathitā vijātaya ime sadṛśā maṇinendranīlena // GarP_1,72.14 //	kaTitAH vijAtayaH ime sadRSAH maNinA indranIlena // GarP_1,72.14 //
   gurubhāvakaṭhinabhāvāveteṣāṃ nityameva vijñeyau /	guru BAva kaWina BAvO= etezAm nityam eva vijQeyO /
   kācādyathāvaduttaravivardhamānau viśeṣeṇa // GarP_1,72.15 //	kAcAt i aTAvat uttara vivarDamAnO viSezeNa // GarP_1,72.15 //
   indranīlo yathā kaścidvibhartyātāmravarṇatām /	indranIlaH yaTA kaScid viBarti AtAmra varNa tAm /
   rakṣaṇayau tathā tāmrau karavīrotpalāvubhau // GarP_1,72.16 //	rakzaNayO taTA tAmrO karavIra utpalO= uBO // GarP_1,72.16 //
   yasya madhyagatā bhāti nīlasyendrāyudhaprabhā /	yasya maDya gatAH BAti nIlasya indrAyuDa praBA /
   tamindranīlamityāhurmahārhaṃ bhuvi durlabham // GarP_1,72.17 //	tam indranIlam iti AhuH mahArham Buvi durlaBam // GarP_1,72.17 //
   yasya varṇasya bhūyastvātkṣīre śataguṇe sthitaḥ /	yasya varNasya BUyas tvAt kzIre SataguNe sTitaH /
   nīlatāṃ tannayetsarvaṃ mahānīlaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,72.18 //	nIla tAm tat nayet sarvam mahAnIlaH saH ucyate // GarP_1,72.18 //
   yatpadmarāgasya mahāguṇasya mūlyaṃ bhavenmāṣasamunmitasya /	yad padmarAgasya mahA guNasya mUlyam Bavet mAza samunmitasya /
   tadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyātu litasya mūlyam //	tad indranIlasya mahA guNasya suvarNa saMKyAtu litasya mUlyam //
   GarP_1,72.19 //	GarP_1,72.19 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   indranīlaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma dvisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	indranIlaparIkzaNam nAma dvisaptatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  73	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 73
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   vaidūryapuṣparāgāṇāṃ karkete bhīṣmake vade /	vEdUrya puzparAgANAm karkete BIzmake vade /
   parīkṣāṃ brahmaṇā proktāṃ vyāsena kathitāṃ dvijā // GarP_1,73.1 //	parIkzAm brahmaNA proktAm vyAsena kaTitAm dvijAH // GarP_1,73.1 //
   kalpāntakālakṣubitāmburāśernirhrādakalpādditijasya nādāt /	kalpa anta kAla kzubita ambu rASeH nirhrAda kalpAt ditijasya nAdAt /
   vaidūryamutpannamanekavarṇaṃ śobhābhirāmadyutivarṇabījam // GarP_1,73.2 //	vEdUryam utpannam aneka varNam SoBA aBirAma dyuti varNa bIjam // GarP_1,73.2 //
   avidūre vidūrasya gireruttuṅgarodhasaḥ /	avidUre vidUrasya gireH uttuFga roDasaH /
   kāmabhūtikasīmānamanu tasyākarobhavat // GarP_1,73.3 //	kAma BUtika sImAnam anu tasya akaro Bavat // GarP_1,73.3 //
   tasya nādasamutthatvādākaraḥ sumahāguṇaḥ /	tasya nAda samutTa tvAt AkaraH su mahA guNaH /
   abhūduttarīto loke lokatrayavibhūṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,73.4 //	aBUt uttarItaH loke lokatraya viBUzaNaH // GarP_1,73.4 //
   tasyaiva dānavapaterninadānurūpāḥ pravṛṭpayodavaradarśita cārurūpāḥ /	tasya eva dAnava pateH ninada anurUpAH pravRwpayodavara darSita cAru rUpAH /
   vaidūryaratnamaṇayo vividhāvabhāsastasmātsphuliṅganivahā iva saṃbabhūvuḥ	vEdUrya ratna maNayaH viviDa avaBAsaH tasmAt sPuliFga nivahAH iva saMbaBUvuH
   // GarP_1,73.5 //	// GarP_1,73.5 //
   padmarāgamupādāya maṇivarṇā hi ye kṣitau /	padmarAgam upAdAya maNi varNAH hi ye kzitO /
   sarvāṃstānvarṇaśobhābhirvaidūryamanugacchati // GarP_1,73.6 //	sarvAn= tAn varNa SoBABiH vEdUryam anugacCati // GarP_1,73.6 //
   teṣāṃ pradhānaṃ śikhikaṇṭhanīlaṃ yadvā bhavedveṇudalaprakāśam /	tezAm praDAnam SiKi kaNWa nIlam yat vA Bavet veNu dala prakASam /
   cāṣāgrapakṣapratimaśriyo ye na te praśastā maṇiśāstravidbhiḥ //	cAza agra pakza pratima SriyaH ye na te praSastA maNi SAstra vidBiH //
   GarP_1,73.7 //	GarP_1,73.7 //
   guṇavānvaidūryamaṇiryojayati svāminaṃ paraṃbhā (bho) gyaiḥ /	guNavAn vEdUrya maNiH yojayati svAminam paraMBA (Bo) gyEH /
   doṣairyukto doṣaistasmādyatnātparīkṣeta // GarP_1,73.8 //	dozEH yuktaH dozEH tasmAt yatnAt parIkzeta // GarP_1,73.8 //
   girikācaśiśupālau kāca sphaṭikāśca dhūmanirbhinnāḥ /	giri kAca SiSupAlO kAca sPawikAH ca DUma nirBinnAH /
   vaidūryamaṇerete vijātayaḥ sannibhāḥ santi // GarP_1,73.9 //	vEdUrya maNeH ete vijAtayaH sanniBAH santi // GarP_1,73.9 //
   likhyābhāvātkācaṃ laghubhāvācchaisupālakaṃ vidyāt /	liKya aBAvAt kAcam laGu BAvAt SEsupAlakam vidyAt /
   girikācasadīptitvātsphaṭikaṃ varṇojjvalatvena // GarP_1,73.10 //	giri kAca sa dIpti tvAt sPawikam varNa ujjvala tvena // GarP_1,73.10 //
   yadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇasaṃkhyākalitasya mūlyam /	yat indranIlasya mahA guNasya suvarNa saMKyA kalitasya mUlyam /
   tadeva vaidūryamaṇeḥ pradiṣṭaṃ paladvayonmāpi tagauravasya // GarP_1,73.11	tat eva vEdUrya maNeH pradizwam pala dvaya unmA api tagOravasya // GarP_1,73.11
   jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇestu yādṛgvijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /	jAtyasya sarve api maNeH tu yAdRS vijAtayaH santi samAna varNAH /
   tathāpi nānākaraṇānumeyabhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,73.12 //	taTA api nAnA karaNa anumeya Beda prakAraH paramaH pradizwaH // GarP_1,73.12 //
   sukhopalakṣyaśca sadā vicāryo hyayaṃ prabhedo viduṣā nareṇa /	suKa upalakzyaH ca sadA vicAryaH hi ayam praBedaH viduzA nareNa /
   snehaprabhedo laghutā mṛdutvaṃ vijātiliṅgaṃ khalu sārvajanyam //	sneha praBedaH laGu tA mRdu tvam vijAti liFgam Kalu sArvajanyam //
   GarP_1,73.13 //	GarP_1,73.13 //
   kuśalākuśalaiḥ prapūryamāṇāḥ pratibaddhāḥ pratisatkriyāprayogaiḥ /	kuSala akuSalEH prapUryamANAH pratibadDAH pratisatkriyA prayogEH /
   guṇadoṣasamudbhavaṃ labhante maṇayor'thontaramūlyameva bhinnāḥ //	guNa doza samudBavam laBante maNayor aTontara mUlyam eva BinnAH //
   GarP_1,73.14 //	GarP_1,73.14 //

   yadi nāma bhavanti doṣahīnā maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇamāpnuvanti mūlyam //	yadi nAma Bavanti doza hInAH maNayaH zaxguNam Apnuvanti mUlyam //
   GarP_1,73.15 //	GarP_1,73.15 //
   ākarānsamatītānāmudadhestīrasannidhau /	AkarAn samatItAnAm udaDeH tIra sanniDO /

   suvarṇo manunā yastu proktaḥ ṣoḍaśamāṣakaḥ /	suvarNaH manunA yaH tu proktaH zoxaSa mAzakaH /
   tasya saptatimo bhāgaḥ saṃjñārūpaṃ kariṣyati // GarP_1,73.17 //	tasya saptatimaH BAgaH saMjQA rUpam karizyati // GarP_1,73.17 //
   śāṇaścaturmāṣamāno māṣakaḥ pañcakṛṣṇalaḥ /	SANaH catur mAza mAnaH mAzakaH paQca kRzNalaH /

   itthaṃ maṇividhiḥ prokto ratnānāṃ mūlyaniścaye // GarP_1,73.19 //	itTam maNi viDiH proktaH ratnAnAm mUlya niScaye // GarP_1,73.19 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /

   āpītapāṇḍuruciraḥ pāṣāṇaḥ padmarāgasaṃjñastu /	ApIta pANxu ruciraH pAzANaH padmarAga saMjQaH tu /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  75	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 75

   GarP_1,75.4 //	GarP_1,75.4 //

   // GarP_1,75.5 //	// GarP_1,75.5 //

   tejo 'tidīpti kulapuṣṭivihīnavarṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśaṃ vapurudvahanti //	tejaH atidIpti kula puzwi vihIna varNAH karketanasya sadRSam vapuH udvahanti //

   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
