   tatra pradhānaṃ śaśalohitābhaṃ guñjājapāpuṣpanibhaṃ pradiṣṭam /	tatra praDAnam SaSa lohita ABam guQjA japA puzpa niBam pradizwam /

   prasannaṃ komalaṃ snigdhaṃ surāgaṃ vidrumaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,80.3 //	prasannam komalam snigDam su rAgam vidrumam hi tat // GarP_1,80.3 //
   dhanadhānyakaraṃ loke viṣārtibhayanāśanam /	Dana DAnya karam loke viza Arti Baya nASanam /
   parīkṣā pulakasyoktā rudhirākṣasya vai maṇeḥ /	parIkzA pulakasya uktA ruDirAkzasya vE maNeH /
   sphaṭikasya vidrumasya ratnajñānāya śaunaka ! // GarP_1,80.4 //	sPawikasya vidrumasya ratna jQAnAya SOnakaH ! // GarP_1,80.4 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   vidrumaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	vidrumaparIkzaNam nAma aSItitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  81	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 81
   (iti ratnamuktādi parīkṣā samāptā ) /	(iti ratna muktA Adi parIkzA samAptA ) /
   (atha tīrthakṣetramāhātmyamārabhyate ) /	(aTa tIrTa kzetra mAhAtmyam AraByate ) /
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   sarvatīrthāni vakṣyāmi gaṅgā tīrthottamottamā /	sarva tIrTAni vakzyAmi gaFgA tIrTa uttama uttamA /
   sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgātriṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā // GarP_1,81.1 //	sarvatra sulaBAH gaFgA trizu sTAnezu durlaBAH // GarP_1,81.1 //
   gaṅgādvāre prayāge ca gaṅgāsāgarasaṅgame /	gaFgAdvAre prayAge ca gaFgAsAgara saFgame /
   prayāgaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhuktimuktidam // GarP_1,81.2 //	prayAgam paramam tIrTam mRtAnAm Bukti mukti dam // GarP_1,81.2 //
   sevanātkṛtapiṇḍānāṃ pāpajitkāmadaṃ nṛṇām /	sevanAt kRta piNxAnAm pApa jit kA madam nRNAm /
   vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ viśveśo yatra keśavaḥ // GarP_1,81.3 //	vArANasI param tIrTam viSveSaH yatra keSavaH // GarP_1,81.3 //
   kurukṣetraṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ dānādyairbhuktimuktidam /	kurukzetram param tIrTam dAna AdyEH Bukti mukti dam /
   prabhāsaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ somanātho hi tatra ca // GarP_1,81.4 //	praBAsam param tIrTam somanATaH hi tatra ca // GarP_1,81.4 //
   dvārakā ca purī ramyā bhuktimuktipradāyikā /	dvArakA ca purI ramyA Bukti mukti pradAyikA /
   prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvataṃ param // GarP_1,81.5 //	prAcI sarasvatI puNyA saptasArasvatam param // GarP_1,81.5 //
   kedāraṃ sarvapāpaghnaṃ sa (śa) mbhalagrāma uttamaḥ /	kedAram sarva pApa Gnam saH (Sa) mBala grAmaH uttamaH /
   naranarāyaṇaṃ tīrthaṃ muktyai vadarikāśramaḥ // GarP_1,81.6 //	nara narAyaNam tIrTam muktyE vadarikASramaH // GarP_1,81.6 //
   śvetadvīpaṃ purī māyā naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ param /	SvetadvIpam purI mAyA nEmizam puzkaram param /
   ayodhyā cārghyatīrthaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ ca gomatī // GarP_1,81.7 //	ayoDyA ca arGyatIrTam tu citrakUwam ca gomatI // GarP_1,81.7 //
   vaināyakaṃ mahītīrthaṃ rāmagiryāśramaṃ param /	vEnAyakam mahI tIrTam rAmagiri ASramam param /
   kāñcīpurī tuṅgabhadrā śrīśailaṃ setubandhanam // GarP_1,81.8 //	kAQcI purI tuFgaBadrA SrISElam setu banDanam // GarP_1,81.8 //
   rāmeśvaraṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaṃ tathottamam /	rAmeSvaram param tIrTam kArtikeyam taTA uttamam /
   bhṛgutuṅgaṃ kāmatīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ cāmarakaṇṭakam // GarP_1,81.9 //	BRgutuFgam kAmatIrTam tIrTam ca amarakaNwakam // GarP_1,81.9 //
   ujjayinyāṃ mahākālaḥ kubjake śrīdharo hariḥ /	ujjayinyAm mahAkAlaH kubjake SrIDaraH hariH /
   kubjāmrakaṃ mahātīrthaṃ kālasarpiśca kāmadam // GarP_1,81.10 //	kubjAmrakam mahA tIrTam kAlasarpiH ca kAma dam // GarP_1,81.10 //
   mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā /	mahA keSI ca kAverI candraBAgA vipASayA /
   ekāmraṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ brahmeśaṃ devakoṭakam // GarP_1,81.11 //	ekAmram ca taTA tIrTam brahmeSam deva kowakam // GarP_1,81.11 //
   mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaścaiva mahānadaḥ /	maTurA ca purI ramyA SoNaH ca eva mahAnadaH /
   jambūsaro mahātīrthaṃ tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca // GarP_1,81.12 //	jambUsaraH mahA tIrTam tAni tIrTAni vidDi ca // GarP_1,81.12 //
   sūryaḥ śivo gaṇo devī hariryatra ca tiṣṭhati /	sUryaH SivaH gaNaH devI hariH yatra ca tizWati /
   eteṣu ca yathānyeṣu snānaṃ dānaṃ japastapaḥ // GarP_1,81.13 //	etezu ca yaTA anyezu snAnam dAnam japaH tapaH // GarP_1,81.13 //
   pūjā śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /	pUjA SrAdDam piNxa dAnam sarvam Bavati ca akzayam /
   śālagrāmaṃ sarvadaṃ syāttīrthaṃ paśupateḥ param // GarP_1,81.14 //	SAlagrAmam sarva dam syAt tIrTam paSupateH param // GarP_1,81.14 //
   kokāmukhaṃ ca vārāhaṃ bhā (bhu) ṇḍīraṃ svāmisaṃjñakam /	kokAmuKam ca vArAham BAs (Bu) NxIram svAmi saMjQakam /
   lo (mo) hadaṇḍe mahāviṣṇurmandāre madhusūdanaḥ // GarP_1,81.15 //	laH (mo) hadaNxe mahA vizNuH mandAre maDusUdanaH // GarP_1,81.15 //
   kāmarūpaṃ mahātīrthaṃ kāmākhyā (kṣā) yatra tiṣṭhati /	kAmarUpam mahA tIrTam kAma AKyA (kzA) yatra tizWati /
   puṇḍravardhanakaṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaśca yatra ca // GarP_1,81.16 //	puNxravarDanakam tIrTam kArtikeyaH ca yatra ca // GarP_1,81.16 //
   virajastu mahātīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ śrīpuruṣottamam /	virajaH tu mahA tIrTam tIrTam SrI puruzottamam /
   mahendraparvatastīrthaṃ kāverī ca nadī parā // GarP_1,81.17 //	mahA indra parvataH tIrTam kAverI ca nadI parA // GarP_1,81.17 //
   godāvarī mahātīrthaṃ payoṣṇī varadā nadī /	godAvarI mahA tIrTam payozNI vara dA nadI /
   vindhyaḥ pāpaharaṃ tīrthaṃ narmadābheda uttamaḥ // GarP_1,81.18 //	vinDyaH pApa haram tIrTam narmadA BedaH uttamaH // GarP_1,81.18 //
   gokarṇaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ māhiṣmatī purī /	gokarNam paramam tIrTam tIrTam mAhizmatI purI /
   kālañjaraṃ mahītīrthaṃ śuklatīrthamanuttamam // GarP_1,81.19 //	kAlaQjaram mahI tIrTam SuklatIrTam anuttamam // GarP_1,81.19 //
   kṛte śauce muktidaṃ ca śārṅgadhārī tadantike /	kRte SOce mukti dam ca SArFgaDArI tad antike /
   virajaṃ sarvadaṃ tīrthaṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tīrthamuttamam // GarP_1,81.20 //	virajam sarva dam tIrTam svarNAkzam tIrTam uttamam // GarP_1,81.20 //
   nanditīrthaṃ muktidaṃ ca koṭitīrthaphalapradam /	nanditIrTam mukti dam ca kowi tIrTa Pala pradam /
   nāsikyaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ govardhanamataḥ param // GarP_1,81.21 //	nAsikyam ca mahA tIrTam govarDanam atas param // GarP_1,81.21 //
   kṛṣṇaveṇī bhīmarathī gaṇḍakī yā tvirāvatī /	kRzNaveNI BImaraTI gaNxakI yA tu irAvatI /
   tīrthaṃ bindusaraḥ puṇyaṃ viṣṇupādodakaṃ param // GarP_1,81.22 //	tIrTam bindusaraH puNyam vizNu pAda udakam param // GarP_1,81.22 //
   brahmadhyānaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthamindriyanigrahaḥ /	brahma DyAnam param tIrTam tIrTam indriya nigrahaH /
   damastīrthaṃ tu paramaṃ bhavaśuddhiḥ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,81.23 //	damaH tIrTam tu paramam Bava SudDiH param taTA // GarP_1,81.23 //
   jñānahrade dhyānajale rāgadveṣamalāpahe /	jQAna hrade DyAna jale rAga dveza mala apahe /
   yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,81.24 //	yaH snAti mAnase tIrTe sa yAti paramAm gatim // GarP_1,81.24 //
   idaṃ tīrthamidaṃ neti ye narā bhedadarśinaḥ /	idam tIrTam idam na iti ye narAH Beda darSinaH /
   teṣāṃ vidhīyate tīrthagamanaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,81.25 //	tezAm viDIyate tIrTa gamanam tad Palam ca yat // GarP_1,81.25 //
   sarvaṃ brahmetiyo 'veti nātīrthaṃ tasya kiñcana /	sarvam brahma itiyaH avA iti na atIrTam tasya kiQcana /
   eteṣu snānadānāni śrāddhaṃ piṇḍamathākṣayam // GarP_1,81.26 //	etezu snAna dAnAni SrAdDam piNxam aTa akzayam // GarP_1,81.26 //
   sarvā nadyaḥ sarvaśailāḥ tīrthaṃ devādisevitam /	sarvAH nadyaH sarva SElAH tIrTam deva Adi sevitam /
   śrīraṅgaṃ ca harestīrthaṃ tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī // GarP_1,81.27 //	SrIraFgam ca hareH tIrTam tApI SrezWA mahA nadI // GarP_1,81.27 //
   saptagodāvaraṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ koṇagiriḥ param /	sapta godAvaram tIrTam tIrTam koNagiriH param /
   mahālakṣmīryatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī // GarP_1,81.28 //	mahAlakzmIH yatra devI praNItA paramA nadI // GarP_1,81.28 //
   sahyādrau devadeveśa ekavīraḥ sureśvarī /	sahya adrO devadeveSaH ekavIraH sureSvarI /
   gaṅgādvāre kuśāvarte vindhyake nīlaparvate // GarP_1,81.29 //	gaFgAdvAre kuSAvarte vinDyake nIlaparvate // GarP_1,81.29 //
   snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavenna punarbhave /	snAtvA kanaKale tIrTe sa Bavet na punarBave /
   sū uvāca /	sU uvAca /
   etānyanyāni tīrthāni snānādyaiḥ sarvadāni hi // GarP_1,81.30 //	etAni anyAni tIrTAni snAna AdyEH sarva dAni hi // GarP_1,81.30 //
   śrutvābravīddharerbrahmā vyāsaṃ dakṣādisaṃyutam /	SrutvA abravIt hareH brahmA vyAsam dakza Adi saMyutam /
   etānyuktvā ca tīrthāni puna stīrthottamottamam /	etAni uktvA ca tIrTAni puna stIrTa uttama uttamam /
   gayākhyaṃ prāha sarveṣāmakṣayaṃ brahmalokadam // GarP_1,81.31 //	gayA AKyam prAha sarvezAm akzayam brahma loka dam // GarP_1,81.31 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  82	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 82
   śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ /	SrI gaNeSAya namaH /
   (atha gayāmāhātmyaṃ prārabhyate) /	(aTa gayA mAhAtmyam prAraByate) /
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   sārātsārataraṃ vyāsa gayābhāhātmya muttamam /	sArAt sArataram vyAsa gayA BAha Atmya muttamam /
   pravakṣyāmi samāsena buktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu // GarP_1,82.1 //	pravakzyAmi samAsena bukti mukti pradam SRNu // GarP_1,82.1 //
   gayāsuro 'bhavatpūrvaṃ vīryavānparamaḥ sa ca /	gayAsuraH aBavat pUrvam vIryavAn paramaH sa ca /
   tapastapyanmahāghoraṃ sarvabhūtopatāpanam // GarP_1,82.2 //	tapaH tapyan mahA Goram sarva BUta upatApanam // GarP_1,82.2 //
   tattapastāpitā devāstadvadhārthaṃ hariṃ gatāḥ /	tad tapaH tApitAH devAH tad vaDa arTam harim gatAH /
   śaraṇaṃ harirūce tān bhavitavyaṃ śivātmabhaiḥ // GarP_1,82.3 //	SaraNam hariH Uce tAn Bavitavyam Siva AtmaBEH // GarP_1,82.3 //
   pātyate 'sya mahādeho tathetyūcuḥ surā harim /	pAtyate asya mahA dehaH taTA iti UcuH surAH harim /
   kadācicchivapūjārthaṃ kṣīrābdheḥ kamalāni ca // GarP_1,82.4 //	kadAcid Siva pUjA arTam kzIrAbDeH kamalAni ca // GarP_1,82.4 //
   ānīya kīkaṭe deśe śayanaṃ cākarodvalī /	AnIya kIkawe deSe Sayanam ca akarot valI /
   viṣṇumāyāvimūḍho 'sau gadayā viṣṇunā hataḥ // GarP_1,82.5 //	vizNu mAyA vimUXaH asO gadayA vizNunA hataH // GarP_1,82.5 //
   ato gadādharo viṣṇurgayāyāṃ muktidaḥ sthitaḥ /	atas gadADaraH vizNuH gayAyAm mukti daH sTitaH /
   tasya deho liṅgarūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,82.6 //	tasya dehaH liFga rUpI sTitaH SudDe pitAmahaH // GarP_1,82.6 //
   janārdanaśca kāleśastathānyaḥ prapitāmahaḥ /	janArdanaH ca kAleSaH taTA anyaH prapitAmahaH /
   viṣṇurāhātha maryādāṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,82.7 //	vizNuH Aha aTa maryAdAm puNya kzetram Bavizyati // GarP_1,82.7 //
   yajñaṃ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ snānādi kurute naraḥ /	yajQam SrAdDam piNxa dAnam snAna Adi kurute naraH /
   sa svargaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchenna narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,82.8 //	sa svargam brahma lokam ca gacCet na narakam naraH // GarP_1,82.8 //
   gayātīrthaṃ paraṃ jñātvā yāgaṃ cakre pitāmahaḥ /	gayA tIrTam param jQAtvA yAgam cakre pitAmahaH /
   brāhmaṇānpūjayāmāsa ṛtvigarthamupāgatān // GarP_1,82.9 //	brAhmaNAn pUjayAmAsa Rtvij arTam upAgatAn // GarP_1,82.9 //
   mahānadīṃ rasavahāṃ sṛṣṭvā vāpyādikaṃ tathā /	mahAnadIm rasa vahAm sRzwvA vA api Adikam taTA /
   bhakṣyabhojyaphalādīṃśca kāmadhenuṃ tathāsṛjat // GarP_1,82.10 //	Bakzya Bojya Pala AdIn= ca kAmaDenum taTA sRjat // GarP_1,82.10 //
   pañcakrośaṃ gayokṣetraṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dadau prabhuḥ /	paQcakroSam gayokzetram brAhmaNeByaH dadO praBuH /
   dharamayāgeṣu lobhāttu pratigṛhya dhanādikam // GarP_1,82.11 //	Darama yAgezu loBAt tu pratigRhya Dana Adikam // GarP_1,82.11 //
   sthitā viprāstadā śaptā gayāyāṃ brāhmaṇāstataḥ /	sTitAH viprAH tadA SaptAH gayAyAm brAhmaNAH tatas /
   mā bhūttraipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūttraipuruṣaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,82.12 //	mA BUt trEpuruzI vidyA mA BUt trEpuruzam Danam // GarP_1,82.12 //
   yuṣmākaṃ syādvārivahā nadī pāṣāṇaparvataḥ /	yuzmAkam syAt vAri vahA nadI pAzANa parvataH /
   śaptaistu prārthito brahmānugrahaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,82.13 //	SaptEH tu prArTitaH brahma anugraham kRtavAn praBuH // GarP_1,82.13 //
   lokāḥ puṇyā gayāyāṃ hi śrāddhino brahmalokagāḥ /	lokAH puNyAH gayAyAm hi SrAdDinaH brahma loka gAH /
   yuṣmānye pūjayiṣyanti tairahaṃ pūjitaḥ sadā // GarP_1,82.14 //	yuzmAn ye pUjayizyanti tEH aham pUjitaH sadA // GarP_1,82.14 //
   brahmajñānaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ gogṛhe maraṇaṃ tathā /	brahma jQAnam gayA SrAdDam go gRhe maraNam taTA /
   vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktireṣā caturvidhā // GarP_1,82.15 //	vAsaH puMsAm kurukzetre muktiH ezA caturviDAH // GarP_1,82.15 //
   samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarvā vāpīkūpahradāstathā /	samudrAH saritaH sarvAH vApI kUpa hradAH taTA /
   snātukāmā gayātīrthaṃ vyāsa yāsa yānti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,82.16 //	snAtu kAmAH gayAtIrTam vyAsa yAsa yAnti na saMSayaH // GarP_1,82.16 //
   brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamaḥ /	brahmahatyA surA pAnam steyam guru aFganA AgamaH /
   pāpaṃ tatsaṃgajaṃ sarvaṃ gayāśrāddhādvinaśyati // GarP_1,82.17 //	pApam tad saMga jam sarvam gayA SrAdDAt vinaSyati // GarP_1,82.17 //
   asaṃskṛtā mṛtā ya ca paśucorahatāśca ye /	asaMskRtAH mRtAH yaH ca paSu cora hatAH ca ye /
   sarpadaṣṭā gayāśrāddhānmuktāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_1,82.18 //	sarpa dazwAH gayA SrAdDAt muktAH svargam vrajanti te // GarP_1,82.18 //
   gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ /	gayAyAm piNxa dAnena yat Palam laBate naraH /
   na tacchakyaṃ mayā vaktuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi // GarP_1,82.19 //	na tat Sakyam mayA vaktum varza kowi SatEH api // GarP_1,82.19 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	gayAmAhAtmyam nAma dvyaSItitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  83	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 83
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ vanam /	kIkawezu gayA puNyA puNyam rAja gRham vanam /
   viṣayaścāraṇaḥ puṇyo nadīnāṃ ca punaḥ punā // GarP_1,83.1 //	vizayaH cAraNaH puNyaH nadInAm ca punar punA // GarP_1,83.1 //
   muṇḍapṛṣṭhaṃ tu pūrvasminpaścime dakṣiṇottare /	muNxapRzWam tu pUrvasmin paScime dakziNa uttare /
   sārdhakrośadvayaṃ mānaṃ gayāyāṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_1,83.2 //	sArDa kroSa dvayam mAnam gayAyAm parikIrtitam // GarP_1,83.2 //
   pañcakrośaṃ gayākṣetraṃ krośamekaṃ gayāśiraḥ /	paQcakroSam gayA kzetram kroSam ekam gayASiraH /
   tatra piṇḍapradānena tṛptirbhavati śāśvatī // GarP_1,83.3 //	tatra piNxa pradAnena tRptiH Bavati SASvatI // GarP_1,83.3 //
   nagājjanārdanāccaiva kūpāccottaramānasāt /	nagAt janArdanAt ca eva kUpAt ca uttara mAnasAt /
   etadgayāśiraḥ proktaṃ phalgutīrthaṃ taducyate // GarP_1,83.4 //	etat gayASiraH proktam PalgutIrTam tat ucyate // GarP_1,83.4 //
   tatra piṇḍapradānena pitṝṇā paramā gatiḥ /	tatra piNxa pradAnena pitLNA paramA gatiH /
   gayāgamanamātreṇa pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.5 //	gayA gamana mAtreNa pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet // GarP_1,83.5 //
   gayāyāṃ pitṛrūpeṇa devadevo janārdanaḥ /	gayAyAm pitR rUpeNa devadevaH janArdanaH /
   taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt // GarP_1,83.6 //	tam dRzwvA puNxarIkAkzam mucyate vE RNa trayAt // GarP_1,83.6 //
   rathamārgaṃ gayatīrthe dṛṣṭvā rudrapadādike /	raTa mArgam gayatIrTe dRzwvA rudra pada Adike /
   kāleśvaraṃ ca kedāraṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.7 //	kAleSvaram ca kedAram pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet // GarP_1,83.7 //
   dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaṃ devaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate /	dRzwvA pitAmaham devam sarva pApEH pramucyate /
   lokaṃ tvanāmayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,83.8 //	lokam tu anAmayam yAti dRzwvA ca prapitAmaham // GarP_1,83.8 //
   tathā gadādharaṃ devaṃ mādhavaṃ puruṣottamam /	taTA gadADaram devam mADavam puruzottamam /
   taṃ praṇamya prayatnena na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.9 //	tam praNamya prayatnena na BUyas jAyate naraH // GarP_1,83.9 //
   maunādityaṃ mahātmānaṃ kanakārkaṃ viśeṣataḥ /	mOna Adityam mahAtmAnam kanaka arkam viSezataH /
   dṛṣṭvā maunena viprarṣe pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.10 //	dRzwvA mOnena vipra Rze pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet // GarP_1,83.10 //
   brahmāṇaṃ pūjayitvā ca brahmalokamavāpnuyāt /	brahmANam pUjayitvA ca brahma lokam avApnuyAt /
   gāyattrīṃ pratarutthāya yastu paśyati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,83.11 //	gAyattrIm pratarutTAya yaH tu paSyati mAnavaH // GarP_1,83.11 //
   sandhyāṃ kṛtvā prayatnena sarvavedaphalaṃ labhet /	sanDyAm kRtvA prayatnena sarva veda Palam laBet /
   sāvitrīṃ caiva madhyāhne dṛṣṭvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.12 //	sAvitrIm ca eva maDyAhne dRzwvA yajQa Palam laBet // GarP_1,83.12 //
   sarasvatīṃ ca sāyāhne dṛṣṭvā dānaphalaṃ labhet /	sarasvatIm ca sAyAhne dRzwvA dAna Palam laBet /
   nagasthamīśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.13 //	naga sTam ISvaram dRzwvA pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet // GarP_1,83.13 //
   dharmāraṇyaṃ dharmamīśaṃ dṛṣṭvā syādṛṇanāśanam /	DarmAraNyam Darmam ISam dRzwvA syAt RNa nASanam /
   devaṃ gṛdhreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,83.14 //	devam gRDreSvaram dRzwvA kaH na mucyeta banDanAt // GarP_1,83.14 //
   dhenuṃ dṛṣṭvā dhenuvane brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn /	Denum dRzwvA Denu vane brahma lokam nayet pitLn /
   prabhāseśaṃ prabhāse ca dṛṣṭvā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_1,83.15 //	praBAseSam praBAse ca dRzwvA yAti parAm gatim // GarP_1,83.15 //
   koṭīśvaraṃ cāśvamedhaṃ dṛṣṭvā syādṛṇanāśanam /	kowISvaram ca aSvameDam dRzwvA syAt RNa nASanam /
   svargadvāreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyate bhavabandhanāt // GarP_1,83.16 //	svarga dvAra ISvaram dRzwvA mucyate Bava banDanAt // GarP_1,83.16 //
   rāmeśvaraṃ gadālolaṃ dṛṣṭvā svargamavāpnuyāt /	rAmeSvaram gadA lolam dRzwvA svargam avApnuyAt /
   brahmeśvaraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,83.17 //	brahmeSvaram taTA dRzwvA mucyate brahmahatyayA // GarP_1,83.17 //
   muṇḍapṛṣṭhe mahācaṇḍīṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmānavāpnuyāt /	muNxapRzWe mahA caNxIm dRzwvA kAmAn avApnuyAt /
   phalgvīśaṃ phalgucaṇḍīṃ ca gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalām // GarP_1,83.18 //	PalgvISam PalgucaNxIm ca gOrIm dRzwvA ca maFgalAm // GarP_1,83.18 //
   gomakaṃ gopatiṃ devaṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet /	gomakam gopatim devam pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet /
   aṅgāreśaṃ ca siddheśaṃ gayādityaṃ gajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,83.19 //	aFgAreSam ca sidDeSam gayA Adityam gajam taTA // GarP_1,83.19 //
   mārkaṇḍeyeśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet /	mArkaNxeyeSvaram dRzwvA pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet /
   phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,83.20 //	PalgutIrTe naraH snAtvA dRzwvA devam gadADaram // GarP_1,83.20 //
   etena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ nṝṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām /	etena kim na paryAptam nLNAm su kRta kAriNAm /
   brahmalokaṃ prayāntīha puruṣā ekaviṃśatiḥ // GarP_1,83.21 //	brahma lokam prayAnti iha puruzAH ekaviMSatiH // GarP_1,83.21 //
   pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthānī ye samudrāḥ sarāṃsi ca /	pRTivyAm yAni tIrTAnI ye samudrAH sarAMsi ca /
   phalgutīrthaṃ gamiṣyanti vāramekaṃ dinedine // GarP_1,83.22 //	PalgutIrTam gamizyanti vAram ekam dinedine // GarP_1,83.22 //
   pṛthivyāṃ ca gayā puṇyā gayāyāṃ ca gayāśiraḥ /	pRTivyAm ca gayA puNyAH gayAyAm ca gayASiraH /
   śreṣṭhaṃ tathā phalgutīrthaṃ tanmukhaṃ ca surasya hi // GarP_1,83.23 //	SrezWam taTA PalgutIrTam tad muKam ca surasya hi // GarP_1,83.23 //
   udīci kanakānadyo nābhitīrthaṃ tu madhyataḥ /	udIci kanakAnadyaH nABitIrTam tu maDyatas /
   puṇyaṃ brahmasadastīrthaṃ snānātsyādbrahmalokadam // GarP_1,83.24 //	puNyam brahma sadaH tIrTam snAnAt syAt brahma loka dam // GarP_1,83.24 //
   kūpe piṇḍādikaṃ kṛtvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavem /	kUpe piNxa Adikam kRtvA pitLNAm anRNaH Bavem /
   tathākṣayavaṭe śrāddhī brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.25 //	taTA akzaya vawe SrAdDI brahma lokam nayet pitLn // GarP_1,83.25 //
   haṃsatīrthe naraḥ snātvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate /	haMsatIrTe naraH snAtvA sarva pApEH pramucyate /
   koṭitītha gayālole vaitaraṇyāṃ ca gomake // GarP_1,83.26 //	kowitITa gayA lole vEtaraNyAm ca gomake // GarP_1,83.26 //
   brahmalokaṃ nayecchrāddhī puruṣānekaviṃśatim /	brahma lokam nayet SrAdDI puruzAn ekaviMSatim /
   brahmatīrthe rāmatīrthe āgneye somatīrthake // GarP_1,83.27 //	brahmatIrTe rAmatIrTe Agneye somatIrTake // GarP_1,83.27 //
   śrāddhī rāmahrade brahmalokaṃ pitṛkulaṃ nayet /	SrAdDI rAmahrade brahma lokam pitR kulam nayet /
   uttare mānase śrāddhī na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.28 //	uttare mAnase SrAdDI na BUyas jAyate naraH // GarP_1,83.28 //
   dakṣiṇe mānase śrāddhī brahmalokaṃ pitṝnnayet /	dakziNe mAnase SrAdDI brahma lokam pitLn nayet /
   svagadvāre naraḥ śrāddhī brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn /	sva gadvAre naraH SrAdDI brahma lokam nayet pitLn /
   bhīṣmatarpaṇakṛttasya kūṭe tārayate pitṝn /	BIzma tarpaNa kRttasya kUwe tArayate pitLn /
   gṛdhreśvare tathā śrāddhī pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.29 //	gRDreSvare taTA SrAdDI pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet // GarP_1,83.29 //
   śrāddhī ca dhenukāraṇye brihmalokaṃ pitṝnnayet /	SrAdDI ca DenukA araNye brihma lokam pitLn nayet /
   tiladhenupradaḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā dhenuṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.30 //	tilaDenu pradaH snAtvA dRzwvA Denum na saMSayaH // GarP_1,83.30 //
   aindre vā naratīrthe ca vāsave vaiṣṇave tathā /	Endre vA naratIrTe ca vAsave vEzNave taTA /
   mahānadyāṃ kṛtaśrāddho brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.31 //	mahAnadyAm kRta SrAdDaH brahma lokam nayet pitLn // GarP_1,83.31 //
   gāyattre caiva sāvitre tīrthe sārasvate tathā /	gAyattre ca eva sAvitre tIrTe sArasvate taTA /
   snānasa ndhyātarpaṇakṛcchrāddhī caikottaraṃ śatam // GarP_1,83.32 //	snAnasa nDyA tarpaNa kRcCrAt DI ca eka uttaram Satam // GarP_1,83.32 //
   pitṝṇāṃ tu kulaṃ brahmalokaṃ nayati mānavaḥ /	pitLNAm tu kulam brahma lokam nayati mAnavaH /
   brahmayoniṃ vinirgacchetprayataḥ pitṛmānasaḥ // GarP_1,83.33 //	brahma yonim vinirgacCet prayataH pitR mAnasaH // GarP_1,83.33 //
   tarpayitvā pitṝndevānna viśedyonisaṅkaṭe /	tarpayitvA pitLn devAn na viSet yoni saFkawe /
   tarpaṇe kākajaṅghāryā pitṝṇāṃ tṛptirakṣayā // GarP_1,83.34 //	tarpaNe kAkajaFGA AryA pitLNAm tRptiH akzayAH // GarP_1,83.34 //
   dharmāraṇye mataṅgasya vāpyāṃ śrāddhāddivaṃ vrajet /	DarmAraNye mataFgasya vApyAm SrAdDAt divam vrajet /
   dharmayūpe ca kūpe ta pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.35 //	Darma yUpe ca kUpe te pitLNAm anRNaH Bavet // GarP_1,83.35 //
   pramāṇaṃ devatāḥ santu lokapālāśca sākṣiṇaḥ /	pramANam devatAH santu lokapAlAH ca sAkziNaH /
   mayāgatya mataṅge 'sminpitṝṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā // GarP_1,83.36 //	mayA Agatya mataFge asmin pitLNAm nizkRtiH kRtAH // GarP_1,83.36 //
   rāmatīrthe narāḥ snātvā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsake /	rAmatIrTe narAH snAtvA SrAdDam kRtvA praBAsake /
   śilāyāṃ pretabhāvātsyurmuktāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ kila // GarP_1,83.37 //	SilAyAm preta BAvAt syuH muktAH pitR gaNAH kila // GarP_1,83.37 //
   śrāddhakṛccha svapuṣṭāyāṃ triḥ saphtakuṃlamuddharet /	SrAdDa kRt Ca sva puzwAyAm tris saPta kuMlam udDaret /
   śrāddhakṛnmuṇḍapṛṣṭhādau brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.38 //	SrAdDa kRt muNxa pRzWa AdO brahma lokam nayet pitLn // GarP_1,83.38 //
   gayāyāṃ na hi tatsthānaṃ yatra tīrthaṃ na vidyate /	gayAyAm na hi tat sTAnam yatra tIrTam na vidyate /
   pañcakrośe gayākṣetre yatra tatra tu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.39 //	paQcakroSe gayA kzetre yatra tatra tu piNxa daH // GarP_1,83.39 //
   akṣayaṃ phalamāpnoti brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn /	akzayam Palam Apnoti brahma lokam nayet pitLn /
   janārdanasya haste tu piṇḍaṃ dadyātsvakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,83.40 //	janArdanasya haste tu piNxam dadyAt svakam naraH // GarP_1,83.40 //
   eṣa piṇḍe mayā dattastava haste janārdana ! /	eza piNxe mayA dattaH tava haste janArdana ! /
   paralokaṃ gate mokṣamakṣayyamupatiṣṭhatām // GarP_1,83.41 //	para lokam gate mokzam akzayyam upatizWatAm // GarP_1,83.41 //
   brahmalokamavāpnoti pitṛbhiḥ saha niścitam /	brahma lokam avApnoti pitRBiH saha niScitam /
   gayāyāṃ dharmapṛṣṭhe ca sarasi brahmaṇastathā // GarP_1,83.42 //	gayAyAm Darma pRzWe ca sarasi brahmaNaH taTA // GarP_1,83.42 //
   gayāśīrṣe 'kṣayavaṭe pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam /	gayASIrze akzaya vawe pitLNAm dattam akzayam /
   dharmāraṇyaṃ dharmapṛṣṭhaṃ dhenukāraṇyameva ca // GarP_1,83.43 //	DarmAraNyam Darma pRzWam DenukA araNyam eva ca // GarP_1,83.43 //
   dṛṣṭvaitāni pitṝṃścāryavaṃśyānviṃśatimuddharet /	dRzwvA etAni pitLn= ca Arya vaMSyAn viMSatim udDaret /
   brahmāraṇyaṃ mahānadyāḥ paścimo bhāga ucyate // GarP_1,83.44 //	brahmAraNyam mahA nadyAH paScimaH BAgaH ucyate // GarP_1,83.44 //
   pūrvo brahmasado bhāgo nāgādrirbharatāśramaḥ /	pUrvaH brahma sadaH BAgaH nAga adriH Barata ASramaH /
   bharatasyāśrame śrāddhī mataṅgasya pade bhavet // GarP_1,83.45 //	Baratasya ASrame SrAdDI mataFgasya pade Bavet // GarP_1,83.45 //
   gayāśīrṣāddakṣiṇato mahānadyāśca paścime /	gayASIrzAt dakziNatas mahA nadyAH ca paScime /
   tatsmṛtaṃ campakavanaṃ tatra pāṇḍuśilāsti hi // GarP_1,83.46 //	tat smRtam campakavanam tatra pANxu SilA asti hi // GarP_1,83.46 //
   śrāddhī tatra tṛtīyāyāṃ niścirāyāśca maṇḍale /	SrAdDI tatra tRtIyAyAm niScirAyAH ca maNxale /
   mahāhrade ca kauśikyāmakṣayaṃ phalamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,83.47 //	mahAhrade ca kOSikyAm akzayam Palam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,83.47 //
   vaitaraṇyā ścottaratastṛtīyākhyo jalāśayaḥ /	vEtaraNyA Sca uttaratas tRtIya AKyaH jalASayaH /
   padāni tatra krauñcasya śrāddhī svargaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.48 //	padAni tatra krOQcasya SrAdDI svargam nayet pitLn // GarP_1,83.48 //
   krauñcapādāduttarato niścirākhyo jalāśayaḥ /	krOQcapAdAt uttaratas niScira AKyaH jalASayaH /
   sakṛdyatrābhigamanaṃ sakṛtpiṃṇḍaprapātanam // GarP_1,83.49 //	sakRt yatra aBigamanam sakRt piMNxa prapAtanam // GarP_1,83.49 //
   durlabhaṃ kiṃ punarnityamasminneva vyavasthitiḥ /	durlaBam kim punar nityam asmin= eva vyavasTitiH /
   mahānadyāmupaspṛśya tarpayetpitṛdevatāḥ // GarP_1,83.50 //	mahAnadyAm upaspRSya tarpayet pitR devatAH // GarP_1,83.50 //
   akṣayānprāpnuyāllokānkulaṃ cāpi samuddharet /	akzayAn prApnuyAt lokAn kulam ca api samudDaret /
   sāvitre paṭhyate sandhyā kṛtā syāddvādaśābdikī // GarP_1,83.51 //	sAvitre paWyate sanDyA kRtA syAt dvAdaSa AbdikI // GarP_1,83.51 //
   śuklakṛṣṇāvubhau pakṣau gayāyāṃ yo vasennaraḥ punātyāsaptamaṃ caiva kulaṃ	Sukla kRzNO= uBO pakzO gayAyAm yaH vaset naraH punAti Asaptamam ca eva kulam
   nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.52 //	na asti atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,83.52 //
   gayāyāṃ muṇāḍapṛṣṭhaṃ ca aravindaṃ ca parvatam /	gayAyAm muNAxa pRzWam ca aravindam ca parvatam /
   tṛtīyaṃ kraiñcapādaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,83.53 //	tRtIyam krEQca pAdam ca dRzwvA pApEH pramucyate // GarP_1,83.53 //
   makare vartamāne ca grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ /	makare vartamAne ca grahaNe candra sUryayoH /
   durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gayāyāṃ piṇḍapātanam // GarP_1,83.54 //	durlaBam trizu lokezu gayAyAm piNxapAtanam // GarP_1,83.54 //
   mahāhrade ca kauśikyāṃ mūlakṣetre viśeṣataḥ /	mahAhrade ca kOSikyAm mUla kzetre viSezataH /
   guhāyāṃ gṛdhrakūṭasya śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ (sapta) mahāphalam // GarP_1,83.55	guhAyAm gRDrakUwasya SrAdDam dattam (sapta) mahA Palam // GarP_1,83.55
   yatra māheśvarī dhārā śrāddhī tatrānṛṇo bhavet /	yatra mAheSvarI DArA SrAdDI tatra anRNaH Bavet /
   puṇyāṃ viśālāmāsādya nadīṃ trailokya viśrutām // GarP_1,83.56 //	puNyAm viSAlAm AsAdya nadIm trElokya viSrutAm // GarP_1,83.56 //
   agniṣṭomamavāpnoti śrāddhī prāyāddivaṃ naraḥ /	agnizwomam avApnoti SrAdDI prAyAt divam naraH /
   śrāddhī māsapade snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.57 //	SrAdDI mAsa pade snAtvA vAjapeya Palam laBet // GarP_1,83.57 //
   ravipāde piṇḍadānātpatitoddhāraṇaṃ bhavet /	ravi pAde piNxa dAnAt patita udDAraNam Bavet /
   gayāstho yo dadātyannaṃ pitarastena putriṇaḥ // GarP_1,83.58 //	gayA sTaH yaH dadAti annam pitaraH tena putriNaH // GarP_1,83.58 //
   kāṅkṣante pitaraḥ putrānnarakādbhayabhīravaḥ /	kAFkzante pitaraH putrAn narakAt Baya BIravaH /
   gayāṃ yāsyati yaḥ kaścitso 'smānsantarayiṣyati // GarP_1,83.59 //	gayAm yAsyati yaH kaScid saH asmAn santarayizyati // GarP_1,83.59 //
   gayāprāptaṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇāmutsavo bhavet /	gayA prAptam sutam dRzwvA pitLNAm utsavaH Bavet /
   pabhdyāmapi jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā asmabhyaṃ kila dāsyati // GarP_1,83.60 //	paBdyAm api jalam spRzwvA asmaByam kila dAsyati // GarP_1,83.60 //
   ātmajo vā tathānyo vā gayākūpe yadā tadā /	AtmajaH vA taTA anyaH vA gayA kUpe yadA tadA /
   yannāmnā pātayetpiṇḍaṃ taṃ nayedbrahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,83.61 //	yad nAmnA pAtayet piNxam tam nayet brahma SASvatam // GarP_1,83.61 //
   puṇḍarīkaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ prāpnuyātkoṭitīrthagaḥ /	puNxarIkam vizNu lokam prApnuyAt kowitIrTa gaH /
   yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā // GarP_1,83.62 //	yA sA vEtaraNI nAma trizu lokezu viSrutAH // GarP_1,83.62 //
   sāvatīrṇā gayākṣetre pitṝṇāṃ tāraṇāya hi /	sa avatIrNA gayA kzetre pitLNAm tAraNAya hi /
   śrāddhadaḥ piṇḍadastatra gopradānaṃ karotiyaḥ // GarP_1,83.63 //	SrAdDa daH piNxadaH tatra go pradAnam karotiyaH // GarP_1,83.63 //
   ekaviṃśativaṃśyānsa tārayennātra saṃśayaḥ /	ekaviMSati vaMSyAn sa tArayet na atra saMSayaH /
   yadi putro gayāṃ gacchetkadācitkālaparyaye // GarP_1,83.64 //	yadi putraH gayAm gacCet kadAcid kAla paryaye // GarP_1,83.64 //
   tāneva bhojayedviprānbrahmaṇā ye prakalpitāḥ /	tAn eva Bojayet viprAn brahmaNA ye prakalpitAH /
   teṣāṃ brahmasadaḥ sthānaṃ somapānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,83.65 //	tezAm brahma sadaH sTAnam soma pAnam taTA eva ca // GarP_1,83.65 //
   brahmaprakalpitaṃ sthānaṃ viprā brahmaprakalpapitāḥ /	brahma prakalpitam sTAnam viprAH brahma prakalpa pitAH /
   pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ // GarP_1,83.66 //	pUjitEH pUjitAH sarve pitRBiH saha devatAH // GarP_1,83.66 //
   tarpayettu gayāviprānhavyakavyairvidhānataḥ /	tarpayet tu gayA viprAn havya kavyEH viDAnataH /
   sthānaṃ dehaparityāge gayāyāṃ tu vidhīyate // GarP_1,83.67 //	sTAnam deha parityAge gayAyAm tu viDIyate // GarP_1,83.67 //
   yaḥ karoti vṛṣotsargaṃ gayākṣetre hyanuttame /	yaH karoti vRzotsargam gayA kzetre hi anuttame /
   agniṣṭomaśataṃ puṇyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.68 //	agnizwoma Satam puNyam laBate na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,83.68 //
   ātmano 'pi mahābuddhirgayāyāṃ tu tilairvinā /	AtmanaH api mahA budDiH gayAyAm tu tilEH vinA /
   piṇḍanirvāpaṇaṃ kuryādanyeṣāmapi mānavaḥ // GarP_1,83.69 //	piNxa nirvApaNam kuryAt anyezAm api mAnavaH // GarP_1,83.69 //
   yāvanto jñātayaḥ pitryā bāndhavāḥ suhṛdastathā /	yAvantaH jQAtayaH pitryAH bAnDavAH suhRdaH taTA /
   tebhyo vyāsagayābhūmau piṇḍo deyo vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,83.70 //	teByaH vyAsa gayA BUmO piNxaH deyaH viDAnataH // GarP_1,83.70 //
   rāmatīrthe naraḥ snātvā gośatasyāpnuyātphalam /	rAmatIrTe naraH snAtvA go Satasya ApnuyAt Palam /
   mataṅgavāpyāṃ snātvā ca gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.71 //	mataFga vApyAm snAtvA ca go sahasra Palam laBet // GarP_1,83.71 //
   niścirāsaṃgame snātvā brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn /	niScirA saMgame snAtvA brahma lokam nayet pitLn /
   vasiṣṭhasyāśrame snātvā vājapeyaṃ ca vindati // GarP_1,83.72 //	vasizWasya ASrame snAtvA vAjapeyam ca vindati // GarP_1,83.72 //
   mahākauśyāṃ samāvāsādaśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet /	mahAkOSyAm samAvAsAt aSvameDa Palam laBet /
   pitāmahasya sarasaḥ prasṛtā lokapāvanī // GarP_1,83.73 //	pitAmahasya sarasaH prasRtA loka pAvanI // GarP_1,83.73 //
   samīpe tvagnidhāreti viśrutā kapilā hi sā /	samIpe tu agniDArA iti viSrutA kapilA hi sA /
   agniṣṭomaphalaṃ śrāddhī snātvātra kṛtakṛtyatā // GarP_1,83.74 //	agnizwoma Palam SrAdDI snAtvA atra kRtakRtya tA // GarP_1,83.74 //
   śrāddhī kumāradhārāyāmaśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet /	SrAdDI kumAraDArAyAm aSvameDa Palam laBet /
   kumāramabhigamyātha natvā muktimavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,83.75 //	kumAram aBigamya aTa natvA muktim avApnuyAt // GarP_1,83.75 //
   somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā somalokaṃ ca gacchati /	somakuNxe naraH snAtvA soma lokam ca gacCati /
   saṃvartasya naro vāpyāṃ subhagaḥ syāttu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.76 //	saMvartasya naraH vApyAm suBagaH syAt tu piNxa daH // GarP_1,83.76 //
   dhautapāpo naro yāti pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍadaḥ /	DOtapApaH naraH yAti preta kuNxe ca piNxa daH /
   devanadyāṃ lelihāne mathane jānugartake // GarP_1,83.77 //	devanadyAm lelihAne maTane jAnu gartake // GarP_1,83.77 //
   evamādiṣu tīrtheṣu piṇḍadastārayetpitṝn /	evamAdizu tIrTezu piNxadaH tArayet pitLn /
   natvā devānvasiṣṭheśaprabhṛtīnṛṇasaṃkṣayam // GarP_1,83.78 //	natvA devAn vasizWa ISa praBRtIn RNa saMkzayam // GarP_1,83.78 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma tryaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	gayAmAhAtmyam nAma tryaSItitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  84	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 84
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   udyatastu gayāṃ gantuṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /	udyataH tu gayAm gantum SrAdDam kRtvA viDAnataH /
   vidhāya kārpaṭīviṣaṃ grāmasyāpi pradakṣiṇam // GarP_1,84.1 //	viDAya kArpawIvizam grAmasya api pradakziNam // GarP_1,84.1 //
   tato grāmāntaraṃ gatvā śrāddhaśeṣasya bhojanam /	tatas grAma antaram gatvA SrAdDa Sezasya Bojanam /
   kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ gacchetpratigrahavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,84.2 //	kRtvA pradakziNam gacCet pratigraha vivarjitaH // GarP_1,84.2 //
   gṛhāccalitamātrasya gayāyāṃ gamanaṃ prati /	gRhAt calita mAtrasya gayAyAm gamanam prati /
   svargārohaṇasopānaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu padepade // GarP_1,84.3 //	svarga ArohaNa sopAnam pitLNAm tu padepade // GarP_1,84.3 //
   muṇḍanaṃ copavāsaśca sarvatīrtheṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ /	muNxanam ca upavAsaH ca sarva tIrTezu ayam viDiH /
   varjayitvā kurukṣetraṃ viśālāṃ virajāṃ gayām // GarP_1,84.4 //	varjayitvA kurukzetram viSAlAm virajAm gayAm // GarP_1,84.4 //
   divā ca sarvadā rātrau gayāyāṃ śrāddhakṛdbhavet /	divA ca sarvadA rAtrO gayAyAm SrAdDa kRt Bavet /
   vārāṇasyāṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrthe śoṇanade tathā // GarP_1,84.5 //	vArANasyAm kRtam SrAdDam tIrTe SoNanade taTA // GarP_1,84.5 //
   punaḥ punāmahānadyāṃ śrāddhī svargaṃ pitṝnnayet /	punar punAmahA nadyAm SrAdDI svargam pitLn nayet /
   uttaraṃ mānasaṃ gatvā siddhiṃ prāpnotyanuttamām // GarP_1,84.6 //	uttaram mAnasam gatvA sidDim prApnoti anuttamAm // GarP_1,84.6 //
   tasminnivartayecchrāddhaṃ snānaṃ caiva nivartayet /	tasmin nivartayet SrAdDam snAnam ca eva nivartayet /
   kāmānsa labhate divyānmokṣopāyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,84.7 //	kAmAn sa laBate divyAn mokza upAyam ca sarvaSas // GarP_1,84.7 //
   dakṣiṇaṃ mānasaṃ gatvā maunī piṇḍādi kārayet /	dakziNam mAnasam gatvA mOnI piNxa Adi kArayet /
   ṛṇatrayāpākaraṇaṃ labheddakṣiṇamānase // GarP_1,84.8 //	RNa traya apAkaraNam laBet dakziNa mAnase // GarP_1,84.8 //
   siddhānāṃ prītijananaiḥ pāpānāṃ ca bhayaṅkaraiḥ /	sidDAnAm prIti jananEH pApAnAm ca BayaFkarEH /
   lelihānairmahāghorairakṣataiḥ pannagottamaiḥ // GarP_1,84.9 //	lelihAnEH mahA GorEH akzatEH pannaga uttamEH // GarP_1,84.9 //
   nāmnā kanakhalaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /	nAmnA kanaKalam tIrTam trizu lokezu viSrutam /
   udīcyāṃ muṇḍapṛṣṭhasya devarṣigaṇasevitam // GarP_1,84.10 //	udIcyAm muNxapRzWasya deva Rzi gaNa sevitam // GarP_1,84.10 //
   tatra snātvā divaṃ yāti śrāddhaṃ dattamathākṣayam /	tatra snAtvA divam yAti SrAdDam dattam aTa akzayam /
   sūryaṃ natvā tvidaṃ kuryātkṛtapiṇḍādisatkriyaḥ // GarP_1,84.11 //	sUryam natvA tu idam kuryAt kRta piNxa Adi satkriyaH // GarP_1,84.11 //
   kavyavāhastathā somo yamaścaivāryamā tathā /	kavya vAhaH taTA somaH yamaH ca eva aryamA taTA /
   agniṣvāttā barhiṣadaḥ somapāḥ pidṛdevatāḥ // GarP_1,84.12 //	agnizvAttAH barhizadaH somapAH pidRdevatAH // GarP_1,84.12 //
   āgacchantu mahābhāgā yuṣamābhī rakṣitāstviha /	AgacCantu mahABAgAH yuzam ABiH rakzitAH tu iha /
   madīyāḥ pitaro ye ca kule jātāḥ sanābhayaḥ // GarP_1,84.13 //	madIyAH pitaraH ye ca kule jAtAH sanABayaH // GarP_1,84.13 //
   teṣāṃ piṇḍapradānārthamāgato 'smi gayāmimām /	tezAm piNxa pradAna arTam AgataH asmi gayAm imAm /
   kṛtapiṇḍaḥ phalgutīrthe paśyaiddevaṃ pitāmaham // GarP_1,84.14 //	kRta piNxaH PalgutIrTe paSyEt devam pitAmaham // GarP_1,84.14 //
   gadādharaṃ tataḥ paśyetpitṝṇāmanṛṇāmanṛṇo bhavet /	gadADaram tatas paSyet pitLNAm anRNAm anRNaH Bavet /
   phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,84.15 //	PalgutIrTe naraH snAtvA dRzwvA devam gadADaram // GarP_1,84.15 //
   ātmānaṃ tārayetsadyo daśa pūrvāndaśāparān /	AtmAnam tArayet sadyas daSa pUrvAn daSa aparAn /
   prathamehnividhiḥ prokto dvitīyadivase vrajet // GarP_1,84.16 //	praTamehni viDiH proktaH dvitIya divase vrajet // GarP_1,84.16 //
   dharmāraṇyaṃ mataṅgasya vāpyāṃ piṇḍādikṛdbhavet /	DarmAraNyam mataFgasya vApyAm piNxa Adi kRt Bavet /
   dharmāraṇyaṃ samāsādya vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,84.17 //	DarmAraNyam samAsAdya vAjapeya Palam laBet // GarP_1,84.17 //
   rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ syādbrahmatīrthake /	rAjasUya aSvameDAByAm Palam syAt brahmatIrTake /
   śrāddhaṃ piṇḍodakaṃ kāryaṃ madhye vai kūpayūpayoḥ // GarP_1,84.18 //	SrAdDam piNxa udakam kAryam maDye vE kUpa yUpayoH // GarP_1,84.18 //
   kūpodakena tatkāryaṃ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam /	kUpa udakena tat kAryam pitLNAm dattam akzayam /
   tṛtīye 'bahni brahmasado gatvā snātvātha tarpaṇam // GarP_1,84.19 //	tRtIye abahni brahma sadaH gatvA snAtvA aTa tarpaNam // GarP_1,84.19 //
   kṛtvā śrāddhādikaṃ piṇḍaṃ madhye vai yūpakūpayoḥ /	kRtvA SrAdDa Adikam piNxam maDye vE yUpa kUpayoH /
   gopracārasamīpasthā ābrahma brahmakalpitāḥ // GarP_1,84.20 //	go pracAra samIpa sTAH Abrahma brahma kalpitAH // GarP_1,84.20 //
   teṣā sevanamātreṇa pitaro mokṣagāminaḥ /	tezA sevana mAtreNa pitaraH mokza gAminaH /
   yūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,84.21 //	yUpam pradakziNIkRtya vAjapeya Palam laBet // GarP_1,84.21 //
   phalgutīrthe caturthe 'hini snātvā devāditarpaṇam /	PalgutIrTe caturTe ahini snAtvA deva Adi tarpaNam /
   kṛtvā śrāddhaṅgayāśīrṣe kuryādrudrapadādiṣu // GarP_1,84.22 //	kRtvA SrAdDaFgayASIrze kuryAt rudra pada Adizu // GarP_1,84.22 //
   piṇāḍāndehimukhe vyāse pañcāgnau ca padatraye /	piNAxAn dehi muKe vyAse paQca agnO ca pada traye /
   sūryendukārtikeyeṣu kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tathākṣayam // GarP_1,84.23 //	sUrya indu kArtikeyezu kRtam SrAdDam taTA akzayam // GarP_1,84.23 //
   śrāddhaṃ tu navadevatyaṃ kuryāddvādaśadaivatam /	SrAdDam tu nava devatyam kuryAt dvAdaSa dEvatam /
   anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ mṛtavāsare // GarP_1,84.24 //	anvazwakAsu vRdDO ca gayAyAm mRta vAsare // GarP_1,84.24 //
   atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddhamanyatra patinā saha /	atra mAtuH pRTak SrAdDam anyatra patinA saha /
   snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devaṃ pitāmaham // GarP_1,84.25 //	snAtvA daSASvameDe tu dRzwvA devam pitAmaham // GarP_1,84.25 //
   rudrapādaṃ naraḥ spṛṣṭvā na cehāvartate punaḥ /	rudra pAdam naraH spRzwvA na ca iha Avartate punar /
   trirvittapūrṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ dattvā yatphalamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,84.26 //	tris vitta pUrNAm pRTivIm dattvA yat Palam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,84.26 //
   sa tatphalamavāpnoti kṛtvā śrāddhaṃ gayāśire /	sa tat Palam avApnoti kRtvA SrAdDam gayASire /
   śamīpatrapramāṇena piṇḍaṃ dadyādgayāśire // GarP_1,84.27 //	SamI patra pramANena piNxam dadyAt gayASire // GarP_1,84.27 //
   pitaro yānti devatvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	pitaraH yAnti deva tvam na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   muṇḍapṛṣṭe padaṃ nyastaṃ mahādevena dhīmatā // GarP_1,84.28 //	muNxa pRzwe padam nyastam mahAdevena DImatA // GarP_1,84.28 //
   alpena tapasā tatra mahāpuṇyamavāpnuyāt /	alpena tapasA tatra mahA puNyam avApnuyAt /
   gayāśīrṣe tu yaḥ piṇḍānnāmnā yeṣāṃ tu nirvapet // GarP_1,84.29 //	gayASIrze tu yaH piNxAn nAmnA yezAm tu nirvapet // GarP_1,84.29 //
   narakasthā divaṃ yānti svargasthā mokṣamāpnuyuḥ /	naraka sTAH divam yAnti svarga sTAH mokzam ApnuyuH /
   pañcame 'hni gandālole snātvā vaṭatale tataḥ // GarP_1,84.30 //	paQcame ahni ganda Alole snAtvA vawa tale tatas // GarP_1,84.30 //
   piṇḍāndadyātpitṝṇāṃ ca sakalaṃ tārayetkulam /	piNxAn dadyAt pitLNAm ca sakalam tArayet kulam /
   vaṭamūlaṃ samāsādya śākenoṣṇodakena vā // GarP_1,84.31 //	vawa mUlam samAsAdya SAkena uzNa udakena vA // GarP_1,84.31 //
   ekasmin bhojite vipra koṭirbhavati bhojitāḥ /	ekasmin Bojite vipra kowiH Bavati BojitAH /
   kṛte śrāddhe 'kṣayavaṭe dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,84.32 //	kRte SrAdDe akzaya vawe dRzwvA ca prapitAmaham // GarP_1,84.32 //
   akṣayāllaṃbhate lokānkulānāmuddharecchatam /	akzayAt laMBate lokAn kulAnAm udDaret Satam /
   eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ puttrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,84.33 //	ezwavyAH bahavaH puttrAH yadi ekaH api gayAm vrajet // GarP_1,84.33 //
   yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet /	yajeta vA aSvameDena nIlam vA vRzam utsRjet /
   pretaḥ kaścitsamuddiśya vaṇijaṃ kañcidabravīt // GarP_1,84.34 //	pretaH kaScid samuddiSya vaNijam kaQcid abravIt // GarP_1,84.34 //
   mama nāmnā gayāśīrṣe piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kuru /	mama nAmnA gayASIrze piNxa nirvapaNam kuru /
   pretabhāvādvimuktaḥ syāṃsvargado dātureva ca // GarP_1,84.35 //	preta BAvAt vimuktaH syAMsvarga daH dAtuH eva ca // GarP_1,84.35 //
   śrutvā vaṇiggayāśīrṣa pretarājāya piṇḍakam /	SrutvA vaNiggayASIrza pretarAjAya piNxakam /
   pradadāvanujaiḥ sārdhaṃ svapitṛbhyastato dadau // GarP_1,84.36 //	pradadO= anujEH sArDam sva pitRByaH tatas dadO // GarP_1,84.36 //
   sarve muktā viśālo 'pi saputro 'bhucca piṇḍadaḥ /	sarve muktAH viSAlaH api sa putraH aBut ca piNxa daH /
   viśālāyāṃ viśālo 'bhūdrājaputrobravīddvijān // GarP_1,84.37 //	viSAlAyAm viSAlaH aBUt rAja putraH bravIt dvijAn // GarP_1,84.37 //
   kathaṃ putrādayaḥ syurme viprāścoturviśālakam /	kaTam putra AdayaH syuH me viprAH cotuH viSAlakam /
   gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,84.38 //	gayAyAm piNxa dAnena tava sarvam Bavizyati // GarP_1,84.38 //
   viśālo 'tha gayāśīrṣa piṇḍado 'bhūcca putravān /	viSAlaH aTa gayASIrza piNxa daH aBUt ca putravAn /
   dṛṣṭvākāśe sitaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puruṣamabravīt // GarP_1,84.39 //	dRzwvA AkASe sitam raktam kRzNam puruzam abravIt // GarP_1,84.39 //
   ke yūyaṃ teṣu caivaikaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakam /	ke yUyam tezu ca eva ekaH sitaH proce viSAlakam /
   ahaṃ sitaste janaka indralokaṃ gataḥ śabham // GarP_1,84.40 //	aham sitaH te janakaH indra lokam gataH SaBam // GarP_1,84.40 //
   mama putra pitā rakto brahmahā pāpakṛtparam /	mama putra pitA raktaH brahma hA pApa kRt param /
   ayaṃ pitāmahaḥ kṛṣṇa ṛṣayo 'nena ghātitāḥ // GarP_1,84.41 //	ayam pitAmahaH kRzNaH RzayaH anena GAtitAH // GarP_1,84.41 //
   avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptau muktau jātau ca piṇḍada /	avIcim narakam prAptO muktO jAtO ca piNxada /
   muktīkṛtāstataḥ sarve vrajāmaḥ svargamuttamam // GarP_1,84.42 //	muktIkRtAH tatas sarve vrajAmaH svargam uttamam // GarP_1,84.42 //
   kṛtakṛtyo viśālo 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ yayau /	kRtakRtyaH viSAlaH api rAjyam kRtvA divam yayO /
   ye 'smatkule tu pitaro luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ // GarP_1,84.43 //	ye asmad kule tu pitaraH lupta piNxa udaka kriyAH // GarP_1,84.43 //
   ye cāpyakṛtacūḍāstu ye ca garbhādviniḥsṛtāḥ /	ye ca api akRta cUxAH tu ye ca garBAt viniHsRtAH /
   yeṣāṃ dāho na kriyāca ye 'gnidagdhāstathāpare // GarP_1,84.44 //	yezAm dAhaH na kriyA ca ye agni dagDAH taTA apare // GarP_1,84.44 //
   bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gatim /	BUmO dattena tRpyantu tRptAH yAntu parAm gatim /
   pitā pitāmahaścaiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,84.45 //	pitA pitAmahaH ca eva taTA eva prapitAmahaH // GarP_1,84.45 //
   mātā pitāmahī caiva tathaiva prapitāmahī /	mAtA pitAmahI ca eva taTA eva prapitAmahI /
   tathā mātāmahaścaiva pramātāmaha eva ca // GarP_1,84.46 //	taTA mAtAmahaH ca eva pramAtAmahe eva ca // GarP_1,84.46 //
   vṛddhapramātāmahaśca tathā mātāmahī param /	vRdDa pramAtAmahaH ca taTA mAtAmahI param /
   pramātāmahī tathā vṛddhapramātāmahīti vai // GarP_1,84.47 //	pramAtAmahI taTA vRdDa pramAtAmahI iti vE // GarP_1,84.47 //
   anyeṣāṃ caiva piṇḍo 'yamakṣayyamupatiṣṭhatām // GarP_1,84.48 //	anyezAm ca eva piNxaH ayam akzayyam upatizWatAm // GarP_1,84.48 //
   iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrAgAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	gayAmAhAtmyam nAma caturaSItitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  85	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 85
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   snātvā pretaśilādau tu varuṇāsthāmṛtena ca /	snAtvA preta SilA AdO tu varuNA sTA amRtena ca /
   piṇḍaṃ dadyādimairmantrairāvāhya ca pitṝnparān // GarP_1,85.1 //	piNxam dadyAt imEH mantrEH AvAhya ca pitLn parAn // GarP_1,85.1 //
   asmatkule mṛtā ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /	asmad kule mRtAH ye ca gatiH yezAm na vidyate /
   āvāhayiṣyetānsarvān darbhapṛṣṭhe tilodakaiḥ // GarP_1,85.2 //	AvAhayizyetAn sarvAn darBa pRzWe tila udakEH // GarP_1,85.2 //
   pitavaṃśe mṛtā ye ca mātṛvaṃśe ca ye mṛtāḥ /	pita vaMSe mRtAH ye ca mAtR vaMSe ca ye mRtAH /
   taṣāmuddharaṇārthāye imaṃ piṇḍe dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.3 //	tazAm udDaraNa arTAye imam piNxe dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.3 //
   mātāmahakule ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /	mAtAmaha kule ye ca gatiH yezAm na vidyate /
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya imaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.4 //	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya imam piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.4 //
   ajātadantā ye kecidye ca garbhe prapīḍitāḥ /	ajAta dantAH ye kecid ye ca garBe prapIxitAH /
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya ima piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.5 //	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya ima piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.5 //
   bandhuvargāśca ye kecinnāmagotravivarjitāḥ /	banDu vargAH ca ye kecid nAma gotra vivarjitAH /
   svagotre paragotre vā gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /	sva gotre para gotre vA gatiH yezAm na vidyate /
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya ima piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.6 //	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya ima piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.6 //
   udbandhanamṛtā ye ca viṣaśastrahatāśca ye /	udbanDana mRtAH ye ca viza Sastra hatAH ca ye /
   ātmopaghātino ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.7 //	Atma upaGAtinaH ye ca teByaH piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.7 //
   agnidāhe mṛtā ye ca siṃhavyāghrahatāścaye /	agni dAhe mRtAH ye ca siMha vyAGra hatAH caye /
   daṃṣṭribhiḥ śṛṅgibhirvāpi teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.8 //	daMzwriBiH SRFgiBiH vA api tezAm piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.8 //
   agnidagdhāśca ye kecinnāgnidagdhāstathāpare /	agni dagDAH ca ye kecid na agni dagDAH taTA apare /
   vidyuccaurahatā ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.9 //	vidyut cOra hatAH ye ca teByaH piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.9 //
   raurave cāndhatāmistre kālasūtre ca ye gatāḥ /	rOrave ca anDatAmistre kAlasUtre ca ye gatAH /
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya imaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.10 //	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya imam piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.10 //
   asipatravane ghore kaṃbhīpāke ca ye gatāḥ /	asipatravane Gore kaMBIpAke ca ye gatAH /
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya iṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.11 //	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya im piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.11 //
   anyeṣāṃ yātanā sthānāṃ pretalokanivāsinām /	anyezAm yAtanA sTAnAm preta loka nivAsinAm /
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya ima piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.12 //	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya ima piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.12 //
   puśuyoniṃ gatā ye ca pakṣikīṭasarīsṛpāḥ /	puSuyonim gatAH ye ca pakzi kIwa sarIsRpAH /
   athavā vṛkṣayoni sthāstebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.13 //	aTavA vRkza yoni sTAH teByaH piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.13 //
   asaṃkhyayātanāsaṃsthā ye nītā yamaśāsanaiḥ /	asaMKya yAtanA saMsTAH ye nItAH yama SAsanEH /
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya imaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.14 //	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya imam piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.14 //
   jātyantarasahasreṣu bhramanti svena karmaṇā /	jAti antara sahasrezu Bramanti svena karmaNA /
   mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ yeṣāṃ tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.15 //	mAnuzyam durlaBam yezAm teByaH piNxam dadAmi aham // GarP_1,85.15 //
   ye bāndhavābāndhavā vā ye 'nyajanmani bāndhavāḥ /	ye bAnDava abAnDavAH vA ye anya janmani bAnDavAH /
   te sarvetṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā // GarP_1,85.16 //	te sarvetRptim AyAntu piNxa dAnena sarvadA // GarP_1,85.16 //
   ye kecitpretarūpeṇa vartante pitaro mama /	ye kecid preta rUpeNa vartante pitaraH mama /
   te sarve tṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā // GarP_1,85.17 //	te sarve tRptim AyAntu piNxa dAnena sarvadA // GarP_1,85.17 //
   ye me pitṛkule jātāḥ kule mātustathaiva ca /	ye me pitR kule jAtAH kule mAtuH taTA eva ca /
   guruśvaśurabandhūnāṃ ye cānye bāndhavā mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,85.18 //	guru SvaSura banDUnAm ye ca anye bAnDavAH mRtAH // GarP_1,85.18 //
   ye me kule luptapiṇḍāḥ puttradāravivarjitāḥ /	ye me kule lupta piNxAH puttra dAra vivarjitAH /
   kriyālo pahatā ye ca jātyandhāḥ paṅgavastathā // GarP_1,85.19 //	kriyAlo pahatAH ye ca jAti anDAH paFgavaH taTA // GarP_1,85.19 //
   virūpā āmagarbhāśca jñātājñātāḥ kule mama /	virUpAH AmagarBAH ca jQAta ajQAtAH kule mama /
   teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ mayā dattamakṣayyamupatiṣṭhatām // GarP_1,85.20 //	tezAm piNxam mayA dattam akzayyam upatizWatAm // GarP_1,85.20 //
   sākṣiṇaḥ santu me devā brahmeśānādayastathā /	sAkziNaH santu me devAH brahma ISAna AdayaH taTA /
   maya gayāṃ samāsādya pitṝṇāṃ niṣkatiḥ kṛtā // GarP_1,85.21 //	maya gayAm samAsAdya pitLNAm nizkatiH kRtAH // GarP_1,85.21 //
   āgato 'haṃ gayāṃ deva ! pitṛkārye gadādhara /	AgataH aham gayAm deva ! pitR kArye gadADara /
   tanme sākṣī bhavatvadya anṛṇo 'hamṛṇatrayāt // GarP_1,85.22 //	tat me sAkzI Bavatu adya anRNaH aham RNa trayAt // GarP_1,85.22 //
   mahānadī brahmasaro 'kṣayo vaṭaḥ prabhāsamudyantamaho? gayāśiraḥ /	mahAnadI brahmasaraH akzayaH vawaH praBA samudyantam aho? gayASiraH /
   sarasvatīdharmakadhenupṛṣṭhā ete kurukṣetragatā gayāyām // GarP_1,85.23 //	sarasvatI Darmaka Denu pRzWAH ete kurukzetra gatAH gayAyAm // GarP_1,85.23 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe purva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	gayAmAhAtmyam nAma paQcASItitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  86	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 86
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   yeyaṃ pretaśilā khyātā gayāyāṃ sā tridhā sthitā /	yA iyam preta SilA KyAtA gayAyAm sA triDA sTitA /
   prabhāse pretakuṇḍe ca gayāsuraśirasyapi // GarP_1,86.1 //	praBAse preta kuNxe ca gayA asura Sirasi api // GarP_1,86.1 //
   dharmeṇa dhāritā bhūtyai sarvadevamayī śilā /	DarmeNa DAritA BUtyE sarva deva mayI SilA /
   pretatvaṃ ye gatā nṝṇāṃ mitrādyā bāndhavādayaḥ // GarP_1,86.2 //	preta tvam ye gatAH nLNAm mitra AdyAH bAnDava AdayaH // GarP_1,86.2 //
   teṣāmuddharaṇārthāya yataḥ pretaśilā śubhā /	tezAm udDaraNa arTAya yatas preta SilA SuBA /
   ato 'tra munayo bhūpā rājapatnyādayaḥ sadā // GarP_1,86.3 //	atas atra munayaH BUpAH rAja patnI AdayaH sadA // GarP_1,86.3 //
   tasyāṃ śilāyāṃ śrāddhādikartāro brahmalokagāḥ /	tasyAm SilAyAm SrAdDa Adi kartAraH brahma loka gAH /
   gayāsurasya yanmuṇḍaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhe śilā yataḥ // GarP_1,86.4 //	gayA asurasya yat muNxam tasya pRzWe SilA yatas // GarP_1,86.4 //
   muṇāḍapṛṣṭho giristasmātsarvadevamayo hyayam /	muNAxa pRzWaH giriH tasmAt sarva deva mayaH hi ayam /
   muṇḍapṛṣṭhasya pādeṣu yato brahmasaromukhāḥ // GarP_1,86.5 //	muNxapRzWasya pAdezu yatas brahma saraH muKAH // GarP_1,86.5 //
   aravindavanaṃ teṣu tena caivopalakṣitaḥ /	aravinda vanam tezu tena ca eva upalakzitaH /
   aravindo girirnāma krauñcapādāṅkito yataḥ // GarP_1,86.6 //	aravindaH giriH nAma krOQca pAda aFkitaH yatas // GarP_1,86.6 //
   tasmā dgiriḥ kraiñcapādaḥ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadaḥ /	tasmE dgiriH krEQcapAdaH pitLNAm brahma loka daH /
   gadādharādayo devā ādyā ādau vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_1,86.7 //	gadADara AdayaH devAH AdyAH AdO vyavasTitAH // GarP_1,86.7 //
   śilārūpeṇa cāvyaktāstasmāddevamayī śilā /	SilA rUpeNa ca avyaktAH tasmAt deva mayI SilA /
   gayā śiraśchādayitvā gurutvādāsthitā śilā // GarP_1,86.8 //	gayA SiraH CAdayitvA guru tvAt AsTitA SilA // GarP_1,86.8 //
   kālāntareṇa vyaktaścasthita ādigadādharaḥ /	kAla antareNa vyaktaH ca sTitaH AdigadADaraH /
   mahārudrādidevaistu ānādinidhano hariḥ // GarP_1,86.9 //	mahA rudra Adi devEH tu Ana Adi niDanaH hariH // GarP_1,86.9 //
   dharma saṃrakṣaṇārthāya adharmādivinaṣṭaye /	Darma saMrakzaNa arTAya aDarma Adi vinazwaye /
   daityarākṣasanāśārthaṃ matsyaḥ pūrvaṃ yathābhavat // GarP_1,86.10 //	dEtya rAkzasa nASa arTam matsyaH pUrvam yaTA Bavat // GarP_1,86.10 //
   kūrmo varāho nṛharirvāmano rāma ūrjitaḥ /	kUrmaH varAhaH nRhariH vAmanaH rAmaH UrjitaH /
   yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kṛṣṇobuddho 'tha kalkyapi // GarP_1,86.11 //	yaTA dASaraTiH rAmaH kRzNobudDaH aTa kalkI api // GarP_1,86.11 //
   tathā vyakto 'vyaktarūpī āsīdādirgadādharaḥ /	taTA vyaktaH avyakta rUpI AsIt AdiH gadADaraH /
   ādirādau pūjito 'tra devairbrahmādibhiryataḥ // GarP_1,86.12 //	AdiH AdO pUjitaH atra devEH brahma AdiBiH yatas // GarP_1,86.12 //
   pādyādyairgandhapuṣpādyairata ādigadādharaḥ /	pAdya AdyEH ganDa puzpa AdyEH atas AdigadADaraH /
   gadādharaṃ suraiḥ sārdhamādyaṃ gatvā dadāti yaḥ // GarP_1,86.13 //	gadADaram surEH sArDam Adyam gatvA dadAti yaH // GarP_1,86.13 //
   arghyaṃ pātraṃ ca pādyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /	arGyam pAtram ca pAdyam ca ganDa puzpam ca DUpakam /
   dīpaṃ naivaidyamutkaṣṭaṃ mālyāni vividhāni ca // GarP_1,86.14 //	dIpam nEvEdyam utkazwam mAlyAni viviDAni ca // GarP_1,86.14 //
   vastrāṇi mukuṭaṃ ghaṇṭā cāmaraṃ prekṣaṇīyakam /	vastrANi mukuwam GaNwA cAmaram prekzaNIyakam /
   alaṅkārādikaṃ piṇḍamannadānādikaṃ tathā // GarP_1,86.15 //	alaFkAra Adikam piNxam anna dAna Adikam taTA // GarP_1,86.15 //
   teṣāṃ tāvaddhanaṃ dhānyamāyurāro gyasampadaḥ /	tezAm tAvat Danam DAnyam AyuH AraH gyasampadaH /
   puttrādisantatiśreyovidyārthaṃ kāma īpsitaḥ // GarP_1,86.16 //	puttra Adi santati SreyaH vidyA arTam kAmaH IpsitaH // GarP_1,86.16 //
   bhāryā svargādivāsaśca svargādāgatya rājyakam /	BAryA svarga Adi vAsaH ca svargAt Agatya rAjyakam /
   kulīnaḥ sattvasampanno raṇe marditaśātravanaḥ // GarP_1,86.17 //	kulInaH sattva sampannaH raNe mardita SAtra vanaH // GarP_1,86.17 //
   vadhabandhavinirmuktaścānte mokṣamavāpnuyāt /	vaDa banDa vinirmuktaH ca ante mokzam avApnuyAt /
   śrāddhapiṇḍādikartāraḥ pitṛbhirbrahmalokagāḥ // GarP_1,86.18 //	SrAdDa piNxa Adi kartAraH pitRBiH brahma loka gAH // GarP_1,86.18 //
   jagannāthaṃ ye 'pcayanti subhadrāṃ balabhadrakam /	jagannATam ye apcayanti suBadrAm balaBadrakam /
   jñānaṃ prāpya śriyaṃ putrānvrajanti puruṣottamam // GarP_1,86.19 //	jQAnam prApya Sriyam putrAn vrajanti puruzottamam // GarP_1,86.19 //
   puruṣottamarājasya sūryasya ca gaṇasya ca /	puruzottama rAjasya sUryasya ca gaNasya ca /
   puratastatra piṇḍādi pitṝṇāṃ brihmalokadaḥ // GarP_1,86.20 //	puratas tatra piNxa Adi pitLNAm brihma loka daH // GarP_1,86.20 //
   natvā kapardivighneśaṃ sarvavighnaiḥ pramucyate /	natvA kapardi viGneSam sarva viGnEH pramucyate /
   kārtikeyaṃ pūjayitvā brahmalokamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.21 //	kArtikeyam pUjayitvA brahma lokam avApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.21 //
   dvādaśādityamabhyarcya sarvarogaiḥ pramucyate /	dvAdaSa Adityam aByarcya sarva rogEH pramucyate /
   vaiśvānaraṃ samabhyarcya uttamāṃ dīptimāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.22 //	vESvAnaram samaByarcya uttamAm dIptim ApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.22 //
   revantaṃ pūjayitvātha aśvānāpnotyanuttamān /	revantam pUjayitvA aTa aSvAn Apnoti anuttamAn /
   abhyarcyendraṃ mahaiśvaryaṃ gaurīṃ saubhāgyamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.23 //	aByarcya indram mahA ESvaryam gOrIm sOBAgyam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.23 //
   vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ prārcya lakṣmīṃ saṃpūjya ca śriyam /	vidyAm sarasvatIm prArcya lakzmIm saMpUjya ca Sriyam /
   garuḍaṃ ca samabhyarcya vighnavṛndātpramucyate // GarP_1,86.24 //	garuxam ca samaByarcya viGna vRndAt pramucyate // GarP_1,86.24 //
   kṣetrapālaṃ samabhyarcya grahavṛndaiḥ pramucyate /	kzetrapAlam samaByarcya graha vRndEH pramucyate /
   muṇḍapṛṣṭhaṃ samabhyarcya sarvakāmamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.25 //	muNxapRzWam samaByarcya sarva kAmam avApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.25 //
   nāgāṣṭakaṃ samabhyarcya nāgadaṣṭo vimucyate /	nAga azwakam samaByarcya nAga dazwaH vimucyate /
   brahmāṇaṃ pūjayitvā ca brahmalokamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.26 //	brahmANam pUjayitvA ca brahma lokam avApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.26 //
   balabhadraṃ samabhyarcya balārogyamavāpnuyāt /	balaBadram samaByarcya bala Arogyam avApnuyAt /
   subhadrāṃ pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyaṃ paramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.27 //	suBadrAm pUjayitvA tu sOBAgyam param ApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.27 //
   sarvānkāmānavāpnoti saṃpūjya puruṣottamam /	sarvAn kAmAn avApnoti saMpUjya puruzottamam /
   nārāyaṇaṃ tu saṃpūjya narāṇāmadhipo bhavet // GarP_1,86.28 //	nArAyaNam tu saMpUjya narANAm aDipaH Bavet // GarP_1,86.28 //
   spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃhaṃ saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet /	spRzwvA natvA nArasiMham saMgrAme vijayI Bavet /
   varāhaṃ pūjayitvā tu bhūmirājyamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.29 //	varAham pUjayitvA tu BUmi rAjyam avApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.29 //
   mālāvidyādharau spaṣṭvā vidyādharapadaṃ labhet /	mAlA vidyADarO spazwvA vidyADara padam laBet /
   sarvānkāmānavāpnoti saṃpūjyādigadādharam // GarP_1,86.30 //	sarvAn kAmAn avApnoti saMpUjya Adi gadADaram // GarP_1,86.30 //
   somanāthaṃ samabhyarcya śivalokamavāpnuyāt /	somanATam samaByarcya Siva lokam avApnuyAt /
   rudreśvaraṃ namaskṛtya rudraloke mahīyate // GarP_1,86.31 //	rudra ISvaram namaskRtya rudra loke mahIyate // GarP_1,86.31 //
   rāmeśvaraṃ naro natvā rāmavatsupriyo bhavet /	rAmeSvaram naraH natvA rAma vat su priyaH Bavet /
   brahmeśvaraṃ naraḥ stutvā brahmalokāya kalpyate // GarP_1,86.32 //	brahmeSvaram naraH stutvA brahma lokAya kalpyate // GarP_1,86.32 //
   kāleśvaraṃ samabhyarcya naraḥ kālañjayo bhavet /	kAleSvaram samaByarcya naraH kAlaQjayaH Bavet /
   kedāraṃ pūjayitvā tu śivaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,86.33 //	kedAram pUjayitvA tu Siva loke mahIyate // GarP_1,86.33 //
   siddheśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya siddho brahmapuraṃ vrajet /	sidDeSvaram ca saMpUjya sidDaH brahma puram vrajet /
   ādyai rudrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyādigadādharam // GarP_1,86.34 //	AdyEH rudra AdiBiH sArDam dRzwvA hi AdigadADaram // GarP_1,86.34 //
   kulānāṃ śatamuddhṛtya nayedbrahmapuraṃ naraḥ /	kulAnAm Satam udDRtya nayet brahma puram naraH /
   dharmārtho prāpnuyāddharmamarthārtho cārthamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.35 //	Darma arTaH prApnuyAt Darmam arTa arTaH ca arTam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.35 //
   kāmānsaṃprāpnuyātkāmī mokṣārtho mokṣamāpnuyāt /	kAmAn saMprApnuyAt kAmI mokza arTaH mokzam ApnuyAt /
   rājyārtho rājyamāpnoti śāntyartho śāntimāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.36 //	rAjya arTaH rAjyam Apnoti SAnti arTaH SAntim ApnuyAt // GarP_1,86.36 //
   sarvārtho sarvamāpnoti saṃpūjyādigadādharam /	sarva arTaH sarvam Apnoti saMpUjya Adi gadADaram /
   putrānputrārthinī strī ca saubhāgyaṃ ca tadarthinī // GarP_1,86.37 //	putrAn putra arTinI strI ca sOBAgyam ca tad arTinI // GarP_1,86.37 //
   vaṃśārthinī ca vaṃśānvai prāpyārcyādigadādharam /	vaMSa arTinI ca vaMSAn vE prApya arcya Adi gadADaram /
   śrāddhena piṇḍadānena annadānena vāridaḥ // GarP_1,86.38 //	SrAdDena piNxa dAnena anna dAnena vAridaH // GarP_1,86.38 //
   brahmalokamavāpnoti saṃpūjyādigadādharam /	brahma lokam avApnoti saMpUjya Adi gadADaram /
   pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthebhyo yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī // GarP_1,86.39 //	pRTivyAm sarva tIrTeByaH yaTA SrezWA gayA purI // GarP_1,86.39 //
   tathā śilādirūpaśca śreṣṭhaścaiva gadādharaḥ /	taTA SilA Adi rUpaH ca SrezWaH ca eva gadADaraH /
   tasmindṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yataḥ sarvaṃ gadādharaḥ // GarP_1,86.40 //	tasmin dRzwe SilA dRzwAH yatas sarvam gadADaraH // GarP_1,86.40 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	gayAmAhAtmyam nAma zaz aSItitamaH aDyAyaH
   (iti gayāmāhātmyaṃ samāptam) /	(iti gayA mAhAtmyam samAptam) /
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  87	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 87
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   caturdaśa manūnvakṣye tatsutāśca sukādikān /	caturdaSa manUn vakzye tad sutAH ca sukAdikAn /
   manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ pūrvamagnighrādyāśca tatsutāḥ // GarP_1,87.1 //	manuH svAyamBuvaH pUrvam agniGra AdyAH ca tad sutAH // GarP_1,87.1 //
   marīciratryaṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /	marIciH atri aFgirasO pulastyaH pulahaH kratuH /
   vasiṣṭhaśca mahātejā ṛṣayaḥ saptakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.2 //	vasizWaH ca mahA tejAH RzayaH sapta kIrtitAH // GarP_1,87.2 //
   jayākhyāśācamitākhyāśca śukrā yāmāstathaiva ca /	jaya AKyA SAcamita AKyAH ca SukrAH yAmAH taTA eva ca /
   gaṇā dvādaśakāścaiti catvāraḥ somapāyinaḥ // GarP_1,87.3 //	gaNAH dvAdaSakAH ca eti catvAraH soma pAyinaH // GarP_1,87.3 //
   viśvabhugvāmadevendro bāṣkalistadarirhyabhūt /	viSvaBuj vAmadeva indraH bAzkaliH tad ariH hi aBUt /
   sa hato viṣṇunā daityaścakreṇa sumahātmanā // GarP_1,87.4 //	sa hataH vizNunA dEtyaH cakreNa su mahAtmanA // GarP_1,87.4 //
   manuḥ svārociṣaścātha tatputro maṇḍaleśvaraḥ /	manuH svArocizaH ca aTa tad putraH maNxaleSvaraH /
   citrako vinataścaiva karṇānto vidyuto raviḥ // GarP_1,87.5 //	citrakaH vinataH ca eva karNa antaH vidyutaH raviH // GarP_1,87.5 //
   bṛhadguṇo nabhaścaiva mahābalaparākramaḥ /	bRhadguNaH naBaH ca eva mahA bala parAkramaH /
   ūrja stambastathā prāṇa ṛṣabho niścala (ra) stathā // GarP_1,87.6 //	Urja stambaH taTA prANaH RzaBaH niScalaH (ra) staTA // GarP_1,87.6 //
   datto (mbho) liścāvarīvāṃśca ṛṣyaḥ saptakīrtitāḥ /	dattaH (mBo) liH ca AvarIvAn= ca RzyaH sapta kIrtitAH /
   tuṣitā dvādaśa proktāstathā pārāvatāśca ye // GarP_1,87.7 //	tuzitAH dvAdaSa proktAH taTA pArAvatAH ca ye // GarP_1,87.7 //
   indro vipaściddevānāṃ tadripuḥ purukṛtsaraḥ /	indraH vipaScit devAnAm tad ripuH purukRt saraH /
   jaghāna hastirūpeṇa bhagavānmadhusūdanaḥ // GarP_1,87.8 //	jaGAna hasti rUpeNa BagavAn maDusUdanaH // GarP_1,87.8 //
   auttamasya manoḥ putrā ājaśca paraśustathā /	Ottamasya manoH putrAH AjaH ca paraSuH taTA /
   vinītaśca suketuśca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,87.9 //	vinItaH ca suketuH ca sumitraH subalaH SuciH // GarP_1,87.9 //
   devo devāvṛdho rudra ! mahotsāhojitastathā /	devaH devAvRDaH rudraH ! mahA utsAha ujitaH taTA /
   rathaujā ūrdhvabāhuśca śaraṇaścānagho muniḥ // GarP_1,87.10 //	raTOjAH UrDvabAhuH ca SaraNaH ca anaGaH muniH // GarP_1,87.10 //
   sutapāḥ śaṅkurityete ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ /	sutapAH SaFkuH iti ete RzayaH sapta kIrtitAH /
   vaśavartisvadhāmānaḥ śivāḥ satyāḥ pratardanāḥ // GarP_1,87.11 //	vaSavarti svaDAmAnaH SivAH satyAH pratardanAH // GarP_1,87.11 //
   pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāstu te /	paQca deva gaNAH proktA sarve dvAdaSakAH tu te /
   indraḥ svaśāntistacchukraḥ pralambo nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.12 //	indraH sva SAntiH tad SukraH pralambaH nAma dAnavaH // GarP_1,87.12 //
   matsyarūpī harirviṣṇustaṃ jaghāna ca dānavam /	matsya rUpI hariH vizNuH tam jaGAna ca dAnavam /
   tāmasasya manoḥ putrā jānujaṅgho 'tha nirbhayaḥ // GarP_1,87.13 //	tAmasasya manoH putrAH jAnujaFGaH aTa nirBayaH // GarP_1,87.13 //
   navakhyātirnayaścaiva priyabhṛtyo vivikṣipaḥ /	nava KyAtiH nayaH ca eva priya BRtyaH vivikzipaH /
   dṛḍheṣudhiḥ prastalākṣaḥ kṛbandhuḥ kṛtastathā // GarP_1,87.14 //	dRXezuDiH prastala akzaH kRbanDuH kRtaH taTA // GarP_1,87.14 //
   jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ (dhṛṣṭa) kāvyaścaitraścetāgnihemakāḥ (kau) /	jyotirDAmA pRTuH (DRzwa) kAvyaH cEtraH cetAgni hemakAH (kO) /
   munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta surāgāḥ sudhiyastathā // GarP_1,87.15 //	munayaH kIrtitAH sapta surAgAH suDiyaH taTA // GarP_1,87.15 //
   harayo devatāmāṃ ca catvāraḥ pañca (sapta) viṃśakāḥ /	harayaH devatAmAm ca catvAraH paQca (sapta) viMSakAH /
   gaṇā indraḥ śivistasya śatrurbhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,87.16 //	gaNAH indraH SiviH tasya SatruH BomaraTAH smRtAH // GarP_1,87.16 //
   hariṇā kūrmarūpeṇa hato bhīmaratho 'suraḥ /	hariNA kUrma rUpeNa hataH BImaraTaH asuraH /
   raivatasya manoḥ putro mahā prāṇaśca sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,87.17 //	rEvatasya manoH putraH mahA prANaH ca sADakaH // GarP_1,87.17 //
   vana (la) bandhurniramitraḥ pratyaṅgaḥ parahā śuciḥ /	vane (la) banDuH niramitraH pratyaFgaH para hA SuciH /
   dṛḍhavrataḥ ketuśṛgaṃ ṛṣayastasya varṇyate // GarP_1,87.18 //	dRXa vrataH ketu SRgam RzayaH tasya varNyate // GarP_1,87.18 //
   vedaśrīrvedabāhuśca ūrdhvabāhustathaiva ca /	veda SrIH vedabAhuH ca UrDvabAhuH taTA eva ca /
   hiraṇyaromā parjanyaḥ satyanetraḥ (nāmā) svadhāma ca // GarP_1,87.19 //	hiraNyaromA parjanyaH satyanetraH (nAmA) sva DAma ca // GarP_1,87.19 //
   abhūtarajasaścaiva tathā devāśvamedhasaḥ /	aBUtarajasaH ca eva taTA deva aSvameDasaH /
   vaikuṇṭha (ṇṭhāḥ ścāmṛta (tā) ścaiva catvāro devatāgaṇāḥ // GarP_1,87.20	vEkuNWaH (NWAH Sca amRte (tA) Sca eva catvAraH devatA gaNAH // GarP_1,87.20
   gaṇe caturdaśa surā vibhuridraḥ pratāpavān /	gaNe caturdaSa surAH viBuH idraH pratApavAn /
   śāntaḥ śatrurhato daityo haṃsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.21 //	SAntaH SatruH hataH dEtyaH haMsa rUpeNa vizNunA // GarP_1,87.21 //
   cākṣuṣasya manoḥ putrā uruḥ pururmahābalaḥ /	cAkzuzasya manoH putrAH uruH puruH mahA balaH /
   śatadyumnastapasvī ca satyabāhuḥ(kyo) kṛtistathā // GarP_1,87.22 //	SatadyumnaH tapasvI ca satyabAhuH (kyo) kRtiH taTA // GarP_1,87.22 //
   agniṣṇuratirātraśca sudyumnaśca tathā naraḥ /	agnizNuH atirAtraH ca sudyumnaH ca taTA naraH /
   haviṣmānuttamaḥ śrīmānsva (su) dhāmā virajastathā // GarP_1,87.23 //	havizmAn uttamaH SrImAn sva (su) DAmA virajaH taTA // GarP_1,87.23 //
   abhimānaḥ sahiṣṇuśca madhuśrīrṛṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ /	aBimAnaH sahizNuH ca maDu SrIH RzayaH smRtAH /
   āryāḥ prabhūtā bhāvyāśca lekhāśca pṛthukāstathā // GarP_1,87.24 //	AryAH praBUtAH BAvyAH ca leKAH ca pRTukAH taTA // GarP_1,87.24 //
   aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktā divaukasām /	azwakasya gaNAH paQca taTA proktAH divOkasAm /
   indro manojavaḥ śatrurmahākālo mahābhajaḥ // GarP_1,87.25 //	indraH manojavaH SatruH mahAkAlaH mahA BajaH // GarP_1,87.25 //
   aśvarūpeṇa sa hato hariṇā lokadhāriṇā /	aSva rUpeNa sa hataH hariNA loka DAriNA /
   manorvaivasvatasyete putrā viṣṇuparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,87.26 //	manoH vEvasvatasya ite putrAH vizNu parAyaNAH // GarP_1,87.26 //
   ikṣvākuratha nābhāgo dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātireva ca /	ikzvAkuH aTa nABAgaH DRzwaH SaryAtiH eva ca /
   nariṣyantastathā pāṃsurnabho nediṣṭha eva ca // GarP_1,87.27 //	narizyantaH taTA pAMsuH naBaH nedizWaH eva ca // GarP_1,87.27 //
   karūṣaśca pṛṣadhraśca sudyumnaśca manoḥ sutāḥ /	karUzaH ca pRzaDraH ca sudyumnaH ca manoH sutAH /
   atrirvasiṣṭho bhagavāñjamadagniśca kaśyapaḥ // GarP_1,87.28 //	atriH vasizWaH BagavAn jamadagniH ca kaSyapaH // GarP_1,87.28 //
   gautamaśca bharadvājo viśāmitro 'tha saptamaḥ /	gOtamaH ca BaradvAjaH viSAmitraH aTa saptamaH /
   tathā hyekonapañcāśanmarutaḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.29 //	taTA hi ekonapaQcASat marutaH parikIrtitAH // GarP_1,87.29 //
   ādityā vasavaḥ sādhyāgaṇā dvādaśakāstrayaḥ /	AdityAH vasavaH sADya agaNAH dvAdaSakAH trayaH /
   ekādaśā tathā rudrā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.30 //	ekAdaSA taTA rudrAH vasavaH azwO prakIrtitAH // GarP_1,87.30 //
   dvāvaśvinau vinirdiṣṭau viśvedevāstathā daśā /	dvO= aSvinO vinirdizwO viSvedevAH taTA daSA /
   daśauvāṅgiraso devā nava devagaṇāstathā // GarP_1,87.31 //	daSOvAFgirasaH devAH nava deva gaNAH taTA // GarP_1,87.31 //
   tejasvī nāma vai śakro hiraṇyākṣo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ /	tejasvI nAma vE SakraH hiraNyAkzaH ripuH smRtaH /
   hato varāharūpeṇa hariṇyākhyo 'tha viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.32 //	hataH varAha rUpeNa hariNI a AKyaH aTa vizNunA // GarP_1,87.32 //
   vakṣye manorbhaviṣyasya sāvarṇyākhyasya vai sutān /	vakzye manoH Bavizyasya sAvarNya AKyasya vE sutAn /
   vijayaścārvavīraśca nirmohaḥ satyavākrṛtī // GarP_1,87.33 //	vijayaH ca arvavIraH ca nirmohaH satya vAkrRtI // GarP_1,87.33 //
   variṣṭhaśca gariṣṭhaśca vācaḥ saṃgatireva ca /	varizWaH ca garizWaH ca vAcaH saMgatiH eva ca /
   aśvatthāmā kṛpo vyāso gālavo dīptimānatha // GarP_1,87.34 //	aSvatTAmA kRpaH vyAsaH gAlavaH dIptimAn aTa // GarP_1,87.34 //
   ṛṣyaśṛṅgastathā rāma ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ /	RzyaSRFgaH taTA rAmaH RzayaH sapta kIrtitAH /
   sutapā amṛtābhāśca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ // GarP_1,87.35 //	sutapAH amRta ABAH ca muKyAH ca api taTA surAH // GarP_1,87.35 //
   teṣāṃ gaṇastu devānā mekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /	tezAm gaNaH tu devAnA mekEkaH viMSakaH smRtaH /
   virocanasutasteṣāṃ balirindro bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,87.36 //	virocana sutaH tezAm baliH indraH Bavizyati // GarP_1,87.36 //
   dattvemāṃ yācamānāya viṣṇave yaḥ padatrayam /	dattvA imAm yAcamAnAya vizNave yaH pada trayam /
   ṛddhimindrapadaṃ hitvā tataḥ siddhimavāpsyati // GarP_1,87.37 //	RdDim indra padam hitvA tatas sidDim avApsyati // GarP_1,87.37 //
   vāruṇerdakṣasāvarṇernavamasya sutāñchṛṇu /	vAruNeH dakzasAvarNeH navamasya sutAn SRNu /
   dhṛtiketurdeptiketuḥ pañcahasto nirāmayaḥ /	DRtiketuH depti ketuH paQca hastaH nirAmayaH /
   pṛtuśravā bṛhadūdyumna ṛcīko bṛhato guṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.38 //	pRtuSravAH bRhadUdyumnaH RcIkaH bRhataH guNaH // GarP_1,87.38 //
   medhātithirdyutiścaiva savaso vasureva ca /	meDAtiTiH dyutiH ca eva sa vasaH vasuH eva ca /
   jyotiṣmānhavyakavyau ca ṛṣayo vibhurīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,87.39 //	jyotizmAn havya kavyO ca RzayaH viBuH ISvaraH // GarP_1,87.39 //
   paro marīcirgarbhaśca sva (su) dharmāṇaśca te trayaḥ /	paraH marIciH garBaH ca sve (su) DarmANaH ca te trayaH /
   deśaśatru) kālakākṣastaddhantā padmanābhakaḥ // GarP_1,87.40 //	deSa Satru) kAlakAkzaH tad hantA padmanABakaH // GarP_1,87.40 //
   bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ /	Bavizyanti tadA devAH ekEkaH dvAdaSaH gaNaH /
   teṣāmindro mahāvīryo bhaviṣyatyadbhuto hara // GarP_1,87.40*1 //	tezAm indraH mahA vIryaH Bavizyati adButaH hara // GarP_1,87.40*1 //
   dhamaputrasya putrāṃstu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu /	Dama putrasya putrAn= tu daSa masya manoH SRNu /
   sukṣetraścottamaujāśca bhūriśreṇyaśca vīryavān // GarP_1,87.41 //	su kzetraH ca uttamOjAH ca BUriSreNyaH ca vIryavAn // GarP_1,87.41 //
   śatānīko niramitro vṛṣaseno jayadrathaḥ /	SatAnIkaH niramitraH vRzasenaH jayadraTaH /
   bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāśca śāntirindraḥ pratāpavān // GarP_1,87.42 //	BUridyumnaH suvarcAH ca SAntiH indraH pratApavAn // GarP_1,87.42 //
   ayo (po) mūrtirhaviṣmāṃśca sukṛtiścāvyayastathā /	ayaH (po) mUrtiH havizmAn= ca sukRtiH ca avyayaH taTA /
   nābhāgo 'pratimaujāśca saurabha ṛṣayastathā // GarP_1,87.43 //	nABAgaH apratimOjAH ca sOraBaH RzayaH taTA // GarP_1,87.43 //
   prāṇākhyāḥ śatasaṃkhyāstu devatānāṃ gaṇastadā /	prANa AKyAH Sata saMKyAH tu devatAnAm gaNaH tadA /
   teṣāmindraśca bhavitā śāntirnāma mahābalaḥ /	tezAm indraH ca BavitA SAntiH nAma mahA balaH /
   baliḥ śatrustaṃ hariśca gadayā ghātayiṣyati // GarP_1,87.44 //	baliH SatruH tam hariH ca gadayA GAtayizyati // GarP_1,87.44 //
   rudra putrasya te putrānvakṣyāmyekādaśasya tu /	rudra putrasya te putrAn vakzyAmi ekAdaSasya tu /
   sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ pururguruḥ // GarP_1,87.45 //	sarvatragaH suSarmA ca devAnIkaH puruH guruH // GarP_1,87.45 //
   kṣetravarṇo dṛḍheṣuśca ārdrakaḥ putrakastathā /	kzetra varNaH dRXezuH ca ArdrakaH putrakaH taTA /
   haviṣmāṃśca haviṣyaśca varuṇo viśvavistarau // GarP_1,87.46 //	havizmAn= ca havizyaH ca varuNaH viSva vistarO // GarP_1,87.46 //
   viṣṇuścaivāgnitejāśca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ /	vizNuH ca eva agni tejAH ca RzayaH sapta kIrtitAH /
   vihaṅgamāḥ kāmagam nirmāṇarucayastathā // GarP_1,87.47 //	vihaFgamAH kAma gam nirmANa rucayaH taTA // GarP_1,87.47 //
   ekaikastriṃśakasteṣāṃ gaṇaścaindraśca vai vṛṣaḥ /	ekEkaH triMSakaH tezAm gaNaH ca EndraH ca vE vRzaH /
   dhasagrīvo ripustasya śrīrūpī ghātayiṣyati // GarP_1,87.48 //	Dasa grIvaH ripuH tasya SrI rUpI GAtayizyati // GarP_1,87.48 //
   manostu dakṣaputrasya dvādaśasyātmajāñchṛṇu /	manoH tu dakza putrasya dvAdaSasya AtmajAn SRNu /
   devavānu padevaśca devaśreṣṭho vidūrathaḥ // GarP_1,87.49 //	devavAnu padevaH ca deva SrezWaH vidUraTaH // GarP_1,87.49 //
   mitravānmitradevaśca mitrabinduśca vīryavān /	mitravAn mitradevaH ca mitrabinduH ca vIryavAn /
   mitravāhaḥ pravāhaśca dakṣaputramanoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,87.50 //	mitravAhaH pravAhaH ca dakza putra manoH sutAH // GarP_1,87.50 //
   tapasvī sutapāścaiva tapomūrtistaporatiḥ /	tapasvI sutapAH ca eva tapomUrtiH tapaH ratiH /
   tapodhṛtirdyutiścānyaḥ saptamaśca tapodhanāḥ // GarP_1,87.51 //	tapoDRtiH dyutiH ca anyaH saptamaH ca tapoDanAH // GarP_1,87.51 //
   svadharmāṇaḥ sutapaso harito hohitāstathā /	svaDarmANaH su tapasaH haritaH hohitAH taTA /
   surārayo gaṇāścaite pratyekaṃ daśako gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.52 //	surArayaH gaNAH ca ete pratyekam daSakaH gaNaH // GarP_1,87.52 //
   ṛtadhāmā ca bhadre (tatre) ndrastārako nāma tadripuḥ /	RtaDAmA ca Badre (tatre) ndraH tArakaH nAma tad ripuH /
   harirnapuṃsakaṃ bhūtvā ghātayiṣyati śaṅkara // GarP_1,87.53 //	hariH napuMsakam BUtvA GAtayizyati SaFkara // GarP_1,87.53 //
   trayodaśasya raucyasya manoḥ putrānnibodha me /	trayodaSasya rOcyasya manoH putrAn niboDa me /
   citraseno vicitraśca tapodharmarato dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,87.54 //	citrasenaH vicitraH ca tapaH Darma rataH DRtiH // GarP_1,87.54 //
   sunetraḥ kṣetravṛttiśca sunayo dharmapo dṛḍhaḥ /	sunetraH kzetra vRttiH ca sunayaH DarmapaH dRXaH /
   dhṛtimānavyayaścaiva niśārūpo nirutsukaḥ // GarP_1,87.55 //	DRtimAn avyayaH ca eva niSA rUpaH nirutsukaH // GarP_1,87.55 //
   nirmohastattvadarśo ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ /	nirmohaH tattva darSaH ca RzayaH sapta kIrtitAH /
   sva (su) romāṇaḥ sva (su) dharmāṇaḥ sva (su) karmāṇastathāmarāḥ //	sve (su) romANaH sve (su) DarmANaH sve (su) karmANaH taTA amarAH //
   GarP_1,87.56 //	GarP_1,87.56 //
   trayastriṃśadvibhedāste devānāṃ tatra vai gaṇāḥ /	trayastriMSat viBedAH te devAnAm tatra vE gaNAH /
   indro divaspatiḥ śatrustviṣṭibho nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.57 //	indraH divaspatiH SatruH tu izwiBaH nAma dAnavaH // GarP_1,87.57 //
   māyūreṇa ca rūpeṇa ghātayiṣyati mādhavaḥ /	mAyUreNa ca rUpeNa GAtayizyati mADavaH /
   caturdaśasya bhautyasya śṛṇu putrānmanormama // GarP_1,87.58 //	caturdaSasya BOtyasya SRNu putrAn manoH mama // GarP_1,87.58 //
   ururgabhīro dhṛṣṭaśca tarasvīgrā (gra) ha eva ca /	uruH ga BIraH DRzwaH ca tarasvIgrAH (gra) ha eva ca /

   tejasvī durlabhaścaiva bhautyasyaite manoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,87.59 //	tejasvI durlaBaH ca eva BOtyasya ete manoH sutAH // GarP_1,87.59 //
   agnīdhraścāgnibāhuśca māgadhaśca tathā śuciḥ /	agnIDraH ca agnibAhuH ca mAgaDaH ca taTA SuciH /

   śucirindro mahādaityo ripuhantā hariḥ svayam /	SuciH indraH mahA dEtyaH ripu hantA hariH svayam /

   kṛtastataḥ purāṇāni vidyāścāṣṭādaśaiva tu /	kRtaH tatas purANAni vidyAH ca azwAdaSa eva tu /
