   namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhe pātāle ye mahāsuraiḥ /	namasye aham pitLn SrAdDe pAtAle ye mahA asurEH /
   santarpyante sudhāhārāstyaktadambhamadaiḥ sadā // GarP_1,89.24 //	santarpyante suDA AhArAH tyakta damBa madEH sadA // GarP_1,89.24 //
   namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhairarcyante ye rasātale /	namasye aham pitLn SrAdDEH arcyante ye rasAtale /
   bhogairaśeṣairvidhivannāgaiḥ kāmānabhīpsubhiḥ // GarP_1,89.25 //	BogEH aSezEH viDivat nAgEH kAmAn aBIpsuBiH // GarP_1,89.25 //
   namasye 'haṃ pitṝñchrāddhaiḥ sarpaiḥ santarpitānsadā /	namasye aham pitLn SrAdDEH sarpEH santarpitAn sadA /
   tatraiva vidhivanmantrabhogasampatsamanvitaiḥ // GarP_1,89.26 //	tatra eva viDivat mantra Boga sampad samanvitEH // GarP_1,89.26 //
   pitṝnnamasye nivasanti sākṣādye devaloke 'tha mahītale vā /	pitLn namasye nivasanti sAkzAt ye deva loke aTa mahI tale vA /
   tathāntarikṣe ca surāripūjyāste vai pratīcchantu mayopanītam //	taTA antarikze ca sura ari pUjyAH te vE pratIcCantu mayA upanItam //
   GarP_1,89.27 //	GarP_1,89.27 //
   pitṝnnamasye paramārthabhūtā ye vai vimāne nivasantyamūrtāḥ /	pitLn namasye parama arTa BUtAH ye vE vimAne nivasanti amUrtAH /
   yajanti yānastamalairmanobhiryogīśvarāḥ kleśavimuktihetūn // GarP_1,89.28	yajanti yAn aH ta malEH manoBiH yogi ISvarAH kleSa vimukti hetUn // GarP_1,89.28
   pitṝnnamasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhābhujaḥ kāmyaphalābhisandhau /	pitLn namasye divi ye ca mUrtAH svaDA BujaH kAmya Pala aBisanDO /
   pradānaśaktāḥ sakalepsitānāṃ vimuktidā ye 'nabhisaṃhiteṣu // GarP_1,89.29	pradAna SaktAH sakala IpsitAnAm vimukti dAH ye anaBisaMhitezu // GarP_1,89.29
   tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaraḥ samastā icchāvatāṃ ye pradiśanti kāmān /	tRpyantu te asmin pitaraH samastAH icCAvatAm ye pradiSanti kAmAn /
   suratvamindratvamito 'dhikaṃ vā gajāśvaratnāni mahāgṛhāṇi // GarP_1,89.30	sura tvam indra tvam itas aDikam vA gaja aSva ratnAni mahA gRhANi // GarP_1,89.30
   somasya ye raśmiṣu yer'kabimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti /	somasya ye raSmizu yer akabimbe Sukle vimAne ca sadA vasanti /
   tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyairgandhādinā puṣṭimito vrajantu //	tRpyantu te asmin pitaraH anna toyEH ganDa AdinA puzwim itas vrajantu //
   GarP_1,89.31 //	GarP_1,89.31 //
   yeṣāṃ hute 'gnau haviṣā ca tṛptirye bhuñjate vipraśarīrasaṃsthāḥ /	yezAm hute agnO havizA ca tRptiH ye BuQjate vipra SarIra saMsTAH /
   ye piṇḍadānena mudaṃ prayānti tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyaiḥ //	ye piNxa dAnena mudam prayAnti tRpyantu te asmin pitaraH anna toyEH //
   GarP_1,89.32 //	GarP_1,89.32 //
   ye khaḍgamāṃsena surairabhīṣṭaiḥ kṛṣṇaistilairdivya manoharaiśca /	ye Kaxga mAMsena surEH aBIzwEH kRzNEH tilEH divya manoharEH ca /
   kālena śākena maharṣivaryaiḥ saṃprīṇitāste mudamatra yāntu // GarP_1,89.33	kAlena SAkena mahA Rzi varyEH saMprINitAH te mudam atra yAntu // GarP_1,89.33
   kavyānyaśeṣāṇi ca yānyabhīṣṭānyatīva teṣāṃ mama pūjitānām /	kavyAni aSezANi ca yAni aBIzwAni atIva tezAm mama pUjitAnAm /
   teṣāñca sānnidhyamihāstu puṣpagandhāmbubhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu //	tezAQca sAnniDyam iha astu puzpa ganDa ambu Bojyezu mayA kRtezu //
   GarP_1,89.34 //	GarP_1,89.34 //
   dinedine ye pratigṛhṇater'cāṃ māsāntapūjyā bhuvi ye 'ṣṭakāsu /	dinedine ye pratigRhNater acAm mAsa anta pUjyAH Buvi ye azwakAsu /
   ye vatsarānte 'bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me pitaro 'tra tuṣṭim //	ye vatsara ante aByudaye ca pUjyAH prayAntu te me pitaraH atra tuzwim //
   GarP_1,89.35 //	GarP_1,89.35 //
   pūjyā dvijānāṃ kumudendubhāso ye kṣattriyāṇāṃ jvalanārkavarṇāḥ /	pUjyAH dvijAnAm kumuda indu BAsaH ye kzattriyANAm jvalana arka varNAH /
   tathā viśāṃ ye kanakāvadātā nīlīprabhāḥ śūdrajanasya ye ca // GarP_1,89.36	taTA viSAm ye kanaka avadAtAH nIlI praBAH SUdra janasya ye ca // GarP_1,89.36
   te 'sminsamastā mama puṣpagandhadhūpāmbubhojyādinivedanena /	te asmin samastAH mama puzpa ganDa DUpa ambu Bojya Adi nivedanena /
   tathāgnihomena ca yānti tṛptiṃ sadā pitṛbhyaḥ praṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ //	taTA agni homena ca yAnti tRptim sadA pitRByaH praNataH asmi teByaH //
   GarP_1,89.37 //	GarP_1,89.37 //
   ye devapūrvāṇyabhitṛptihetora śranti kavyāni śubhāhṛtāni /	ye deva pUrvANi aBitRpti hetora Sranti kavyAni SuBa AhRtAni /
   tṛptāśca ye bhūtisṛjo bhavanti tṛpyantu te 'sminpraṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ //	tRptAH ca ye BUti sRjaH Bavanti tRpyantu te asmin praNataH asmi teByaH //
   GarP_1,89.38 //	GarP_1,89.38 //
   rakṣāṃsi bhūtānyasurāṃstathogrātrirṇāśayantu tvaśivaṃ prajānām /	rakzAMsi BUtAni asurAn= taTA ugrAtriH NASayantu tu aSivam prajAnAm /
   ādyāḥ surāṇāmamareśapūjyāstṛpyantu te 'sminpraṇato 'smitebhyaḥ //	AdyAH surANAm amara ISa pUjyAH tRpyantu te asmin praNataH asmiteByaH //
   GarP_1,89.39 //	GarP_1,89.39 //
   agniṣvāttā barhiṣada ājyapāḥ somapāstathā /	agnizvAttAH barhizadaH AjyapAH somapAH taTA /
   vrajantu tṛptiṃ śrāddhe 'sminpitarastarpitā mayā // GarP_1,89.40 //	vrajantu tRptim SrAdDe asmin pitaraH tarpitAH mayA // GarP_1,89.40 //
   agniṣvāttāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ prācīṃ rakṣantu me diśam /	agnizvAttAH pitR gaNAH prAcIm rakzantu me diSam /
   tathā barhiṣadaḥ pāntu yāmyāṃ me pitaraḥ sadā /	taTA barhizadaH pAntu yAmyAm me pitaraH sadA /
   pratīcīmājyapāstadvadudīcīmapi somapāḥ // GarP_1,89.41 //	pratIcIm AjyapAH tadvat udIcIm api somapAH // GarP_1,89.41 //
   rakṣobhūtapiśācebhyastathaivāsuradoṣataḥ /	rakzaH BUta piSAceByaH taTA eva asura dozataH /
   sarvataḥ pitaro rakṣāṃ kurvantu mama nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,89.42 //	sarvatas pitaraH rakzAm kurvantu mama nityaSas // GarP_1,89.42 //
   viśvo viśvabhugārādhyo dharmo dhanyaḥ śubhānanaḥ /	viSvaH viSva Buj ArADyaH DarmaH DanyaH SuBa AnanaH /
   bhūtido bhūtikṛd bhūtiḥ pitṝṇāṃ ye gaṇā nava // GarP_1,89.43 //	BUti daH BUti kRt BUtiH pitLNAm ye gaNAH nava // GarP_1,89.43 //
   kalyāṇaḥ kalyadaḥ kartā kalyaḥ kalyatarāśrayaḥ /	kalyANaH kalya daH kartA kalyaH kalyatara ASrayaH /
   kalyatāheturanghaḥ ṣaḍime te gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.44 //	kalyatA hetuH anGaH zaw ime te gaNAH smRtAH // GarP_1,89.44 //
   varo vareṇyo varadastuṣṭidaḥ puṣṭidastathā /	varaH vareNyaH vara daH tuzwi daH puzwi daH taTA /
   viśvapātā tathā dhātā saptaite ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.45 //	viSvapAtA taTA DAtA saptA ete ca gaNAH smRtAH // GarP_1,89.45 //
   mahānmahātmā mahito mahimāvānmahābalaḥ /	mahAn mahAtmA mahitaH mahimAvAn mahA balaH /
   gaṇāḥ pañca tathaivaite pitṝṇāṃ pāpanāśanāḥ // GarP_1,89.46 //	gaNAH paQca taTA eva ete pitLNAm pApa nASanAH // GarP_1,89.46 //
   sukhado dhanadaścānyo dharmado 'nyaśca bhūtidaḥ /	suKa daH DanadaH ca anyaH Darma daH anyaH ca BUti daH /
   pitṝṇāṃ kathyate caiva tathā gaṇacatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,89.47 //	pitLNAm kaTyate ca eva taTA gaNa catuzwayam // GarP_1,89.47 //
   ekatriṃśatpitṛgaṇā yairvyāptamakhilaṃ jagat /	ekatriMSat pitR gaNAH yEH vyAptam aKilam jagat /
   ta evātra pitṛgaṇāstuṣyantu ca madāhitāt // GarP_1,89.48 //	te eva atra pitR gaNAH tuzyantu ca mada ahitAt // GarP_1,89.48 //
   mākraṇḍeya uvāca /	mA AkraNxeyaH uvAca /
   evaṃ tu stuvatastasya tejasorāśirucchritaḥ /	evam tu stuvataH tasya tejasA urASiH ucCritaH /
   prādurbabhūva sahasā gaganavyāptikārakaḥ // GarP_1,89.49 //	prAdurbaBUva sahasA gagana vyApti kArakaH // GarP_1,89.49 //
   taddṛṣṭvā sumahattejaḥ samācchādya sthitaṃ jagat /	tat dRzwvA su mahat tejaH samAcCAdya sTitam jagat /
   jānubhyāmavanīṃ gatvā ruciḥ stotramidañjagau // GarP_1,89.50 //	jAnuByAm avanIm gatvA ruciH stotram idaQjagO // GarP_1,89.50 //
   ruciruvāca /	ruciH uvAca /
   arcitānāmamūrtānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ dīptatejasām /	arcitAnAm amUrtAnAm pitLNAm dIpta tejasAm /
   namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhyānināṃ divyacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,89.51 //	namasyAmi sadA tezAm DyAninAm divya cakzuzAm // GarP_1,89.51 //
   indrādīnāṃ ca netāro dakṣamārīcayostathā /	indra AdInAm ca netAraH dakza mArIcayoH taTA /
   saptarṣoṇāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ tānnamasyāmi kāmadān // GarP_1,89.52 //	saptarzoNAm taTA anyezAm tAn namasyAmi kAma dAn // GarP_1,89.52 //
   manvādīnāṃ ca netāraḥ sūryācandramasostathā /	manu AdInAm ca netAraH sUryAcandramasoH taTA /
   tānnamasyāmyahaṃ sarvānpitṝnapyudadhāvapi // GarP_1,89.53 //	tAn namasyAmi aham sarvAn pitLn api udaDO= api // GarP_1,89.53 //
   nakṣatrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ ca vāyvagnyornabhasastathā /	nakzatrANAm grahANAm ca vAyu agnyoH naBasaH taTA /
   dyāvāpṛthivyośca tathā namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ // GarP_1,89.54 //	dyAvApRTivyoH ca taTA namasyAmi kRtAQjaliH // GarP_1,89.54 //
   prajāpateḥ kaśyapāya somāya varuṇāya ca /	prajApateH kaSyapAya somAya varuNAya ca /
   yogeśvarebhyaśca sadā namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ // GarP_1,89.55 //	yogeSvareByaH ca sadA namasyAmi kRtAQjaliH // GarP_1,89.55 //
   namo gaṇebhyaḥ saptabhyastathā lokeṣu saptasu /	namaH gaNeByaH saptaByaH taTA lokezu saptasu /
   svāyambhuve namasyāmi brahmaṇe yogacakṣuṣe // GarP_1,89.56 //	svAyamBuve namasyAmi brahmaNe yoga cakzuze // GarP_1,89.56 //
   somādhārānpitṛgaṇānyogamūrtidharāṃstathā /	soma ADArAn pitR gaNAn yoga mUrti DarAn= taTA /
   namasyāmi tathā somaṃ pitaraṃ jagatāmaham // GarP_1,89.57 //	namasyAmi taTA somam pitaram jagatAm aham // GarP_1,89.57 //
   agnirūpāṃstathaivānyānnamasyāmi pitṝnaham /	agni rUpAn= taTA eva anyAn namasyAmi pitLn aham /
   agnisomamayaṃ viśvaṃ yata etadaśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,89.58 //	agni soma mayam viSvam yatas etat aSezatas // GarP_1,89.58 //
   ye ca tejasi ye caite somasūryāgnimūrtayaḥ /	ye ca tejasi ye ca ete soma sUrya agni mUrtayaH /
   jagatsvarūpiṇaścaiva tathā brahmasvarūpiṇaḥ // GarP_1,89.59 //	jagat svarUpiNaH ca eva taTA brahma svarUpiNaH // GarP_1,89.59 //
   tebhyo 'khilebhyo yogibhyaḥ pitṛbhyo yatamānasaḥ /	teByaH aKileByaH yogiByaH pitRByaH yata mAnasaH /
   namonamo namaste 'stu prasīdantu svadhābhujaḥ // GarP_1,89.60 //	namaH namaH namaH te astu prasIdantu svaDA BujaH // GarP_1,89.60 //
   mākraṇḍeya uvāca /	mA AkraNxeyaH uvAca /
   evaṃ stutāstatastena tajaso munisattamāḥ /	evam stutAH tatas tena tajasaH muni sattamAH /
   niścakramuste pitaro bhāsayanto diśādaśa // GarP_1,89.61 //	niScakramuH te pitaraH BAsayantaH diSAdaSa // GarP_1,89.61 //
   nivedanañca yattena puṣpagandhānulepanam /	nivedanaQca yat tena puzpa ganDa anulepanam /
   tadbhūṣitānatha sa tāndadṛśe purataḥ sthitān // GarP_1,89.62 //	tad BUzitAn aTa sa tAn dadRSe puratas sTitAn // GarP_1,89.62 //
   praṇipatya rucirbhaktyā punareva kṛtāñjaliḥ /	praNipatya ruciH BaktyA punar eva kRtAQjaliH /
   namastubhyaṃ namastubhyamityāha pṛthagādṛtaḥ // GarP_1,89.63 //	namaH tuByam namaH tuByam iti Aha pRTak AdRtaH // GarP_1,89.63 //
   tataḥ prasannāḥ pitarastamūcurmunisattamam /	tatas prasannAH pitaraH tam UcuH muni sattamam /
   varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sa tānuvācānatakandharaḥ // GarP_1,89.64 //	varam vRNIzva iti sa tAn uvAca Anata kanDaraH // GarP_1,89.64 //
   ruciruvāca /	ruciH uvAca /
   prajānāṃ sargakartṛtvamādiṣṭaṃ brahmaṇā mama /	prajAnAm sarga kartR tvam Adizwam brahmaNA mama /
   so 'haṃ patnīmabhīpsāmi dhanyāṃ divyāṃ prajāvatīm // GarP_1,89.65 //	saH aham patnIm aBIpsAmi DanyAm divyAm prajAvatIm // GarP_1,89.65 //
   pitara ūcuḥ /	pitaraH UcuH /
   atraiva sadyaḥ patnī te bhavatvatimanoramā /	atra eva sadyas patnI te Bavatu ati manoramA /
   tasyāñca putro bhavitā bhavato munisattama ! // GarP_1,89.66 //	tasya aQca putraH BavitA BavataH muni sattama ! // GarP_1,89.66 //
   manvantarādhipo dhīmāṃstvannāmnaivopalakṣitaḥ /	manvantara aDipaH DImAn= tvad nAmnA eva upalakzitaH /
   ruce ! raucya iti khyātiṃ prayāsyati jagattraye // GarP_1,89.67 //	ruce ! rOcyaH iti KyAtim prayAsyati jagattraye // GarP_1,89.67 //
   tasyāpi bahavaḥ putrā mahābalaparākramāḥ /	tasya api bahavaH putrAH mahA bala parAkramAH /
   bhaviṣyanti mahātmānaḥ pṛthivīparipālakāḥ // GarP_1,89.68 //	Bavizyanti mahAtmAnaH pRTivI paripAlakAH // GarP_1,89.68 //
   tvaṃ ca prijāpatirbhūtvā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā caturvidhāḥ /	tvam ca prijApatiH BUtvA prajAH sRzwvA caturviDAH /
   kṣīṇādhikāro dharmajñastataḥ siddhimavāpsyasi // GarP_1,89.69 //	kzINa aDikAraH Darma jQaH tatas sidDim avApsyasi // GarP_1,89.69 //
   stotreṇānena ca naro yo 'smāṃstoṣyati bhaktitaḥ /	stotreNa anena ca naraH yaH asmAn= tozyati BaktitaH /
   tasya tuṣṭā vayaṃ bhogānātmajaṃ dhyānamuttamam // GarP_1,89.70 //	tasya tuzwAH vayam BogAn Atmajam DyAnam uttamam // GarP_1,89.70 //
   āyurārogyamarthaṃ ca putrapautrādikaṃ tathā /	AyuH Arogyam arTam ca putra pOtra Adikam taTA /
   vāñchadbhiḥ satataṃ stavyāḥ stotreṇānena vai yataḥ // GarP_1,89.71 //	vAQCadBiH satatam stavyAH stotreNa anena vE yatas // GarP_1,89.71 //
   śrāddheṣu ya imaṃ bhaktyā tvasmatprītikaraṃ stavam /	SrAdDezu yaH imam BaktyA tu asmad prIti karam stavam /
   paṭhiṣyati dvijāgryāṇāṃ bhuñjatāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.72 //	paWizyati dvijAgryANAm BuQjatAm puratas sTitaH // GarP_1,89.72 //
   stotraśravaṇasaṃprītyā sannidhāne pare kṛte /	stotra SravaNa saMprItyA sanniDAne pare kRte /
   asmābhirakṣayaṃ śrāddhaṃ tadbhaviṣyatyasaṃśayam // GarP_1,89.73 //	asmABiH akzayam SrAdDam tat Bavizyati asaMSayam // GarP_1,89.73 //
   yadyapyaśrotriyaṃ śrāddhaṃ yadyapyupahataṃ bhavet /	yadi api aSrotriyam SrAdDam yadi api upahatam Bavet /
   anyāyopāttavittena yadi vā kṛtamanyathā // GarP_1,89.74 //	anyAya upAtta vittena yadi vA kRtam anyaTA // GarP_1,89.74 //
   aśrāddhārhairupatairupahāraistathā kṛtaiḥ /	aSrAdDa arhEH upatEH upahArEH taTA kRtEH /
   akāle 'pyatha vā deśe vidhihīnamathāpi vā // GarP_1,89.75 //	akAle api aTa vA deSe viDi hInam aTa api vA // GarP_1,89.75 //
   aśraddhayā vā puruṣairdambhamāśritya yatkṛtam /	aSradDayA vA puruzEH damBam ASritya yat kRtam /
   asmākaṃ tṛptaye śrāddhantathāpyetadudīraṇāt // GarP_1,89.76 //	asmAkam tRptaye SrAdDantaTA api etat udIraNAt // GarP_1,89.76 //
   yatraitatpaṭhyate śrāddhe stotramastatsukhāvaham /	yatra etat paWyate SrAdDe stotramaH tad suKa Avaham /
   asmākaṃ jāyate tṛptistatra dvādaśāvarṣikī // GarP_1,89.77 //	asmAkam jAyate tRptiH tatra dvAdaSa AvarzikI // GarP_1,89.77 //
   hemante dvādaśābdāni tṛptimetatprayacchati /	hemante dvAdaSa abdAni tRptim etat prayacCati /
   śiśire dviguṇābdāni tṛptiṃ stotramidaṃ śubham // GarP_1,89.78 //	SiSire dviguNa abdAni tRptim stotram idam SuBam // GarP_1,89.78 //
   vasante ṣoḍaśa samāstṛptaye śrāddhakarmaṇi /	vasante zoxaSa samAH tRptaye SrAdDa karmaNi /
   grīṣme ca ṣoḍaśaivaitatpaṭhitaṃ tṛptikārakam // GarP_1,89.79 //	grIzme ca zoxaSa eva etat paWitam tRpti kArakam // GarP_1,89.79 //
   vikale 'pi kṛte śrāddhe stotreṇānena sādhite /	vikale api kRte SrAdDe stotreNa anena sADite /
   varṣāsu tṛptirasmākamakṣayyā jāyate ruce // GarP_1,89.80 //	varzAsu tRptiH asmAkam akzayyA jAyate ruce // GarP_1,89.80 //
   śaratkāle 'pi paṭhitaṃ śrāddhakāle prayacchati /	Sarad kAle api paWitam SrAdDa kAle prayacCati /
   asmākametatpuruṣaistṛptiṃ pañcadaśābdikīm // GarP_1,89.81 //	asmAkam etat puruzEH tRptim paQcadaSa AbdikIm // GarP_1,89.81 //
   yasmin gehe ca likhitametattiṣṭhati nityadā /	yasmin gehe ca liKitam etat tizWati nityadA /
   sannidhānaṃ kṛte śrāddhe tatrāsmākaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,89.82 //	sanniDAnam kRte SrAdDe tatra asmAkam Bavizyati // GarP_1,89.82 //
   tasmādetattvayā śrāddhe viprāṇāṃ bhuñjatāṃ puraḥ /	tasmAt etat tvayA SrAdDe viprANAm BuQjatAm puras /
   śrāvaṇīyaṃ mahābhāga asmākaṃ puṣṭikārakam // GarP_1,89.83 //	SrAvaNIyam mahABAga asmAkam puzwi kArakam // GarP_1,89.83 //

   sā covāca mahātmānaṃ ruciṃ sumadhurākṣarakam /	sA ca uvAca mahAtmAnam rucim su maDura akzarakam /

   tasyāṃ tasya suto jajñe mahāvīryo mahādyutiḥ /	tasyAm tasya sutaH jajQe mahA vIryaH mahA dyutiH /
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  91	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 91
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   svāyambhuvādyā munayo hariṃ dhyāyanti karmaṇā /	svAyamBuva AdyAH munayaH harim DyAyanti karmaNA /
   vratācārārcanādhyānastutijapyaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,91.1 //	vrata AcAra arcanA DyAna stuti japya parAyaNAH // GarP_1,91.1 //
   dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitam /	deha indriya manaH budDi prANa ahaFkAra varjitam /
   ākaśena vihīnaṃ vai tejasā parivarjitam // GarP_1,91.2 //	AkaSena vihInam vE tejasA parivarjitam // GarP_1,91.2 //
   udakena vihīnaṃ vai taddharmaparivarjitam /	udakena vihInam vE tad Darma parivarjitam /
   pṛthivīrahitaṃ caiva sarvabhatavivarjitam // GarP_1,91.3 //	pRTivI rahitam ca eva sarva Bata vivarjitam // GarP_1,91.3 //
   bhūtādhyakṣaṃ tathā baddhaniyantāraṃ prabhuṃ vibhum /	BUta aDyakzam taTA badDa niyantAram praBum viBum /
   caitanyarūpatārūpaṃ sarvādhyakṣaṃ nirañjanam // GarP_1,91.4 //	cEtanya rUpa tA rUpam sarva aDyakzam niraQjanam // GarP_1,91.4 //
   muktasaṅgaṃ maheśānaṃ sarvadevaprapūjitam /	mukta saFgam maheSAnam sarva deva prapUjitam /
   tejorūpamasattvaṃ ca tapasā parivarjitam // GarP_1,91.5 //	tejaH rUpam asattvam ca tapasA parivarjitam // GarP_1,91.5 //
   rahitaṃ rajasā nityaṃ vyatiriktaṃ guṇaistribhiḥ /	rahitam rajasA nityam vyatiriktam guNEH triBiH /
   sarvarūpavihīnaṃ vai kartṛtvādivivarjitam // GarP_1,91.6 //	sarva rUpa vihInam vE kartR tva Adi vivarjitam // GarP_1,91.6 //
   vāsanārahitaṃ śuddhaṃ sarvadoṣavivarjitam /	vAsanA rahitam SudDam sarva doza vivarjitam /

   jarāmaraṇahīnaṃ vai kūṭasthaṃ mohavarjitam /	jarA maraNa hInam vE kUwasTam moha varjitam /

   satyaṃ sarvācārahīnaṃ niṣkalaṃ parameśvaram /	satyam sarva AcAra hInam nizkalam parameSvaram /

   adhyakṣaṃ jāgradādīnāṃ śāntarūpaṃ sureśvaram /	aDyakzam jAgrat AdInAm SAnta rUpam sureSvaram /

   sarvadṛṣṭaṃ tathā mūrtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ param /	sarva dRzwam taTA mUrtam sUkzmam sUkzmataram param /
   jñānadṛk śrotravijñānaṃ paramānandarūpakam // GarP_1,91.11 //	jQAna dRS Srotra vijQAnam parama Ananda rUpakam // GarP_1,91.11 //
   viśvena rahitaṃ tadvattaijasena vivarjitam /	viSvena rahitam tadvat tEjasena vivarjitam /
   prājñena rahitañcaiva turīyaṃ paramākṣaram // GarP_1,91.12 //	prAjQena rahitaQca eva turIyam parama akzaram // GarP_1,91.12 //
   sarvagoptṛ sarvahantṛ sarvabhūtātmarūpi ca /	sarva goptR sarva hantR sarva BUta Atma rUpi ca /
   buddhidharmavihīnaṃ vai nirādhāraṃ śivaṃ harim // GarP_1,91.13 //	budDi Darma vihInam vE nirADAram Sivam harim // GarP_1,91.13 //
   vikriyārahitaṃ caiva vedāntairvedyameva ca /	vikriyA rahitam ca eva vedAntEH vedyam eva ca /

   śabdena varjitañcaiva rasena ca vivarjitam /	Sabdena varjitaQca eva rasena ca vivarjitam /

   rūpeṇa rahitaṃ ñcaiva gandhena parivarjitam /	rUpeNa rahitam Qca eva ganDena parivarjitam /

   cārvaṅgulīyasaṃyuktaḥ sudīptanakha eva ca /	cAru aFgulIya saMyuktaH su dIpta naKaH eva ca /

   dharmopadeśakartṛtvaṃ saṃprāpyāgātparaṃ padam /	Darma upadeSa kartR tvam saMprApya agAt param padam /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca caturdaśa /	vedAH sTAnAni vidyAnAm Darmasya ca caturdaSa /

   vasiṣṭhadakṣasaṃvartaśātātapaparāśarāḥ /	vasizWa dakza saMvarta SAtAtapa parASarAH /

   deśakāla upāyena dravyaṃ śraddhāsamanvitam /	deSa kAle upAyena dravyam SradDA samanvitam /

   ijyācāro damo 'hiṃsā dānaṃ svādhyāyakarma ca /	ijyA AcAraH damaH ahiMsA dAnam svADyAya karma ca /

   brahmakṣāttriyaviṭśūdrā varṇāstvādyāstrayo dvijāḥ /	brahma kzAttriya viS SUdrAH varNAH tu AdyAH trayaH dvijAH /

   ahanyekādaśe nāma caturthe māsi niṣkramaḥ /	ahani ekAdaSe nAma caturTe mAsi nizkramaH /

   evamenaḥ śamaṃ yāti bījagarbhasamudbhavam /	evam enaH Samam yAti bIja garBa samudBavam /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  94	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 94
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   garbhāṣṭame 'ṣṭame vābde brāhmaṇasyopanāyanam /	garBa azwame azwame vA abde brAhmaNasya upanAyanam /
   rajñāmekādaśe saike viśāmeke yathākulam // GarP_1,94.1 //	rajQAm ekAdaSe sA eke viSAm eke yaTAkulam // GarP_1,94.1 //
   upanīya kuruḥ śiṣyaṃ mahāvyāhṛtipūrvakam /	upanIya kuruH Sizyam mahAvyAhRti pUrvakam /
   vedamadhyāpayedenaṃ śaucācārāṃśca śikṣayet // GarP_1,94.2 //	vedam aDyApayet enam SOca AcArAn= ca Sikzayet // GarP_1,94.2 //
   divā sandhyāsu karṇasthabrahmasūtra udaḍmukhaḥ /	divA sanDyAsu karNa sTa brahmasUtraH udaxmuKaH /
   kuryānmūtrapurīṣe tu rātrau ceddakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // GarP_1,94.3 //	kuryAt mUtra purIze tu rAtrO ced dakziNA muKaH // GarP_1,94.3 //
   gṛhītaśiśraścotthāya mṛdbhirabhyuddhṛtairjalaiḥ /	gRhIta SiSraH ca utTAya mRdBiH aByudDRtEH jalEH /
   gandhalepakṣayakaraṃ śaucaṃ kuryānmahāvrataḥ // GarP_1,94.4 //	ganDa lepa kzaya karam SOcam kuryAt mahA vrataH // GarP_1,94.4 //
   antarjānuḥ śucau deśa upaviṣṭa udaṅmukhaḥ /	antar jAnuH SucO deSaH upavizwaH udaFmuKaH /
   prāgvā brāhmeṇa tīrthena dvijo nityamupaspṛśet // GarP_1,94.5 //	prAk vA brAhmeNa tIrTena dvijaH nityam upaspRSet // GarP_1,94.5 //
   kaniṣṭhādeśinyaṅguṣṭhamūlānyagraṃ karasya ca /	kanizWA deSinI aFguzWa mUlAni agram karasya ca /
   prajāpatipitṛbrahmadevatīrthānyanukramāt // GarP_1,94.6 //	prajApati pitR brahma deva tIrTAni anukramAt // GarP_1,94.6 //
   triḥ prāśyāpo dvirunmṛjya khānyādbhiḥ samupaspṛśet /	tris prASya apaH dvis unmRjya KAnyAdBiH samupaspRSet /
   adbhistu prakṛtisthābhirhenābhiḥ phenabuhudaiḥ // GarP_1,94.7 //	adBiH tu prakRti sTABiH henABiH Pena buhudEH // GarP_1,94.7 //
   hṛtkaṇṭhatālugābhistu yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dvijātayaḥ /	hRd kaNWa tAlu gABiH tu yaTAsaMKyam dvijAtayaH /
   śudhyeraṃstrī ca śūdraśca sakṛtspṛṣṭābhirantataḥ // GarP_1,94.8 //	SuDyeraM strI ca SUdraH ca sakRt spRzwABiH antatas // GarP_1,94.8 //
   snānamabdaivatairmantrairmārjanaṃ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ /	snAnam ap dEvatEH mantrEH mArjanam prANa saMyamaH /
   sūryasya cāpyupasthānaṃ gāyattrayāḥ pratyayaṃ japaḥ // GarP_1,94.9 //	sUryasya ca api upasTAnam gAyat trayAH pratyayam japaH // GarP_1,94.9 //
   gāyattrīṃ śirasā sārdhaṃ japedvyāhṛtipūrvikām /	gAyattrIm SirasA sArDam japet vyAhRti pUrvikAm /
   pratipraṇavasaṃyuktāṃ trirayaṃ prāṇasaṃyamaḥ // GarP_1,94.10 //	prati praNava saMyuktAm tris ayam prANa saMyamaH // GarP_1,94.10 //
   prāṇānāyamya samprokṣya tryṛcenābdaivatena tu /	prANAn Ayamya samprokzya tryRcena abdEvatena tu /
   japannāsīta sāvittrīṃ pratyagātārakodayāt // GarP_1,94.11 //	japan= AsIta sAvittrIm pratyagAtAraka udayAt // GarP_1,94.11 //
   sandhyāṃ prāk prātarevaṃ hi tiṣṭhedāsūryadarśanāt /	sanDyAm prAk prAtar evam hi tizWedA sUrya darSanAt /
   agnikāryaṃ tataḥ kuryātsandhyayorubhayorapi // GarP_1,94.12 //	agni kAryam tatas kuryAt sanDyayoH uBayoH api // GarP_1,94.12 //
   tato 'bhivādayedvṛdvānasāvahamiti bruvan /	tatas aBivAdayet vRdvAnasa Avaham iti bruvan /
   guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta svādhyāyārthaṃ samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,94.13 //	gurum ca eva api upAsIta svADyAya arTam samAhitaH // GarP_1,94.13 //
   sāhūtaścāpyadhīyīta sarvaṃ cāsmai nivedayet /	sa AhUtaH ca api aDIyIta sarvam ca asmE nivedayet /
   hitaṃ tasyācarennityaṃ manovākrāyakarmabhiḥ // GarP_1,94.14 //	hitam tasya Acaret nityam manaH vAkrAya karmaBiH // GarP_1,94.14 //
   daṇḍājinopavītāni mekhalāṃ caiva dhārayet /	daNxa ajina upavItAni meKalAm ca eva DArayet /
   brāhmaṇeṣu caredbhaikṣamanindyeṣvātmavṛttaye // GarP_1,94.15 //	brAhmaNezu caret BEkzam anindyezu Atma vRttaye // GarP_1,94.15 //
   ādimadhyāvasāneṣu bhavecchandopalakṣitā /	Adi maDya avasAnezu Bavet Canda upalakzitAH /
   brāhmaṇakṣattriyaviśāṃ bhaikṣacaryā yathākramam // GarP_1,94.16 //	brAhmaNa kzattriya viSAm BEkza caryAH yaTAkramam // GarP_1,94.16 //
   kṛtāgnikāryo bhuñjīta vinīto gurvanujñayā /	kRta agni kAryaH BuQjIta vinItaH guru anujQayA /
   āpośānakriyāpūrvaṃ satkṛtyānnamakutsayan // GarP_1,94.17 //	ApoSAna kriyA pUrvam satkRtya annam akutsayan // GarP_1,94.17 //
   brahmacāryāsthito naikamannamadyādanāpadi /	brahmacArI AsTitaH na ekam annam adyAt anApadi /
   brāhmaṇaḥ kāmamaśrīyācchrāddhe vratamapaḍiyan // GarP_1,94.18 //	brAhmaNaH kAmam aSrIyAt SrAdDe vratam apaxiyan // GarP_1,94.18 //
   madhu māṃsaṃ tathā svinnamityādi parivarjayet /	maDu mAMsam taTA svinnam ityAdi parivarjayet /
   sa gururyaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedamasmai prayacchati // GarP_1,94.19 //	sa guruH yaH kriyAH kRtvA vedam asmE prayacCati // GarP_1,94.19 //
   upanīya dadātyenāmācāryaḥ sa prakīrtitaḥ /	upanIya dadAti enAm AcAryaH sa prakIrtitaH /
   ekadeśamupādhyāya ṛtvigyajñakṛducyate // GarP_1,94.20 //	eka deSam upADyAyaH Rtvij yajQa kRt ucyate // GarP_1,94.20 //
   ete mānyā yathāpūrvamebhyo mātā garīyasī /	ete mAnyAH yaTApUrvam eByaH mAtA garIyasI /
   prativedaṃ brahmacaryaṃ dvādaśābdāni pañca vā // GarP_1,94.21 //	prativedam brahmacaryam dvAdaSa abdAni paQca vA // GarP_1,94.21 //
   grahaṇāntikamityeke keśāntaścaiva ṣoḍaśe /	grahaNa antikam iti eke keSAntaH ca eva zoxaSe /
   āṣoḍaśā'dvāviṃśāccācaturviṃśācca vatsarāt // GarP_1,94.22 //	AzoxaSA advAviMSAt ca acaturviMSAt ca vatsarAt // GarP_1,94.22 //
   brahmakṣattraviśāṃ kāla aupanāyanikaḥ paraḥ /	brahma kzattra viSAm kAlaH OpanAyanikaH paraH /
   ata ūrdhvaṃ patantyete sarvadharmavivarjitāḥ // GarP_1,94.23 //	atas UrDvam patanti ete sarva Darma vivarjitAH // GarP_1,94.23 //
   sāvitrīpatitā vrātyā vrātyastomādṛte kratoḥ /	sAvitrIpatitAH vrAtyAH vrAtyastomAt Rte kratoH /
   māturyadagre jāyante dvitīyaṃ mauñjabandhanam // GarP_1,94.24 //	mAtuH yat agre jAyante dvitIyam mOQja banDanam // GarP_1,94.24 //
   brāhmaṇakṣattriya viśastasmādete dvijātayaḥ /	brAhmaNa kzattriya viSaH tasmAt ete dvijAtayaH /
   yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇām // GarP_1,94.25 //	yajQAnAm tapasAm ca eva SuBAnAm ca eva karmaNAm // GarP_1,94.25 //
   veda eva dvijātīnāṃ niḥ śreyasakaraḥ paraḥ /	vedaH eva dvijAtInAm niH Sreyasa karaH paraH /
   madhunā payasā caiva sa devāṃstarpayeddvijaḥ // GarP_1,94.26 //	maDunA payasA ca eva sa devAn= tarpayet dvijaH // GarP_1,94.26 //
   pitṝnmadhughṛtābhyāṃ ca ṛco 'dhīte hi so 'nvaham /	pitLn maDu GRtAByAm ca RcaH aDIte hi saH anvaham /
   yajuḥ sāma paṭhettadvadatharvāṅgirasaṃ dvijaḥ // GarP_1,94.27 //	yajuH sAma paWet tadvat aTarva aFgirasam dvijaH // GarP_1,94.27 //
   santarpayetpitṝndevānso 'nvahaṃ hi ghṛtāmṛtaiḥ /	santarpayet pitLn devAn saH anvaham hi GRta amRtEH /
   vākovākyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca nārāśaṃsīśca gāthikāḥ // GarP_1,94.28 //	vAkovAkyam purANam ca nArASaMsIH ca gATikAH // GarP_1,94.28 //
   itihāsāṃstathā vidyā yo 'dhīte śaktito 'nvaham /	itihAsAn= taTA vidyA yaH aDIte SaktitaH anvaham /
   santarpayetpitṝndevānmāṃsakṣīrodanādibhiḥ // GarP_1,94.29 //	santarpayet pitLn devAn mAMsa kzIrodana AdiBiH // GarP_1,94.29 //
   te tṛptāstarpayantyenaṃ sarvakāmaphalaiḥ śubhaiḥ /	te tRptAH tarpayanti enam sarva kAma PalEH SuBEH /
   yaṃyaṃ kratumadhītesau tasyasyāpnuyātphalam // GarP_1,94.30 //	yaMyam kratum aDIta isO tasyasya ApnuyAt Palam // GarP_1,94.30 //
   bhūmidānasya tapasaḥ svādhyāyaphalabhāgdvijaḥ /	BUmi dAnasya tapasaH svADyAya Pala BAj dvijaH /
   neṣṭhiko brahmacārī tu vasedācāryasannidhau // GarP_1,94.31 //	nezWikaH brahmacArI tu vaset AcArya sanniDO // GarP_1,94.31 //
   tadabhāve 'sya tanaye patnyāṃ vaiśvānare 'pi vā /	tad aBAve asya tanaye patnyAm vESvAnare api vA /
   anena vidhinā dehe sādhayedvijitendriyaḥ /	anena viDinA dehe sADayet vijita indriyaH /
   brahmalokamavāpnoti na ceha jāyate punaḥ // GarP_1,94.32 //	brahma lokam avApnoti na ca iha jAyate punar // GarP_1,94.32 //
   ita śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe	ita SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSAkye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkyoktavarNaDarmanirUpaNam nAma caturnavatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  95	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 95
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   śṛṇvantu munayo dharmān gṛhasthasya yatavratāḥ /	SRNvantu munayaH DarmAn gRhasTasya yata vratAH /
   gurave ca dhanaṃ dattvā snātvā ca tadanujñayā // GarP_1,95.1 //	gurave ca Danam dattvA snAtvA ca tad anujQayA // GarP_1,95.1 //
   samāpitabrahmacaryo lakṣaṇyāṃ striyamudvahet /	samApita brahmacaryaH lakzaNyAm striyam udvahet /
   ananyapūrvikāṃ kāntāmasapiṇḍāṃ yavīyasīm // GarP_1,95.2 //	ananya pUrvikAm kAntAm asapiNxAm yavIyasIm // GarP_1,95.2 //
   arogiṇīṃ bhrātṛmatīmasamānārṣagotrajām /	arogiNIm BrAtRmatIm asamAna Arza gotra jAm /
   pañcamātsaptamādūrdhvaṃ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtastathā // GarP_1,95.3 //	paQcamAt saptamAt UrDvam mAtRtaH pitRtaH taTA // GarP_1,95.3 //
   daśapūruṣavikhyātācchrotriyāṇāṃ mahākulāt /	daSa pUruza viKyAtAt SrotriyANAm mahA kulAt /
   savarṇaḥ śrotriyo vidvānvaro doṣānvito na ca // GarP_1,95.4 //	savarNaH SrotriyaH vidvAn varaH doza anvitaH na ca // GarP_1,95.4 //
   yaducyate dvijātīnāṃ śūdrāddāropasaṃgrahaḥ /	yat ucyate dvijAtInAm SUdrAt dAra upasaMgrahaH /
   na tanmama mataṃ yasmāttatrāyaṃ jāyate svayam // GarP_1,95.5 //	na tat mama matam yasmAt tatra ayam jAyate svayam // GarP_1,95.5 //
   tisro varṇānupūrvyeṇa dve tathaikā yathākramam /	tisraH varNa AnupUrvyeNa dve taTA ekA yaTAkramam /
   brāhmaṇakṣattriyaviśāṃ bhāryāḥ svā śūdrajanmanaḥ // GarP_1,95.6 //	brAhmaNa kzattriya viSAm BAryAH svA SUdra janmanaH // GarP_1,95.6 //
   brāhmo vivāha āhūya dīyate śaktyalaṅkṛtā /	brAhmaH vivAhaH AhUya dIyate Sakti alaFkRtA /
   tajjaḥ punātyubhayataḥ puruṣonekaviṃśatim // GarP_1,95.7 //	tad jaH punAti uBayatas puruzaH nekaviMSatim // GarP_1,95.7 //
   yajñasthāyartvije daivamādāyārṣastu goyugam /	yajQa sTAya Rtvije dEvam AdAya ArzaH tu go yugam /
   caturdaśa prathamajaḥ punātyuttarajaśca ṣaṭū // GarP_1,95.8 //	caturdaSa praTama jaH punAti uttara jaH ca zawU // GarP_1,95.8 //
   ityuktvā caratāṃ dharmaṃ saha yā dīyate 'rthine /	iti uktvA caratAm Darmam saha yA dIyate arTine /
   sa kāyaḥ pāvayettajjaḥ ṣaḍvaṃśyānātmanā saha // GarP_1,95.9 //	sa kAyaH pAvayet tad jaH zaz vaMSyAn AtmanA saha // GarP_1,95.9 //
   āsuro draviṇādānādgāndharvaḥ samayānmithaḥ /	AsuraH draviNa AdAnAt gAnDarvaH samayAt miTas /
   rākṣaso yuddhaharaṇātpaiśācaḥ kanyakācchalāt // GarP_1,95.10 //	rAkzasaH yudDa haraNAt pESAcaH kanyakAcCalAt // GarP_1,95.10 //
   catvāro brāhmaṇasyādyāstathā gāndharvarākṣasau /	catvAraH brAhmaNasya AdyAH taTA gAnDarva rAkzasO /
   rājñastathāsuro vaiśye śūdre cāntyastu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,95.11 //	rAjQaH taTA AsuraH vESye SUdre ca antyaH tu garhitaH // GarP_1,95.11 //
   pāṇirgrāhyaḥ savarṇāsu gṛhṇīta kṣattriyā śaram /	pANiH grAhyaH savarNAsu gRhNIta kzattriyA Saram /
   vaiśyā pratodamādadyādvedane cāgrajanmanaḥ // GarP_1,95.12 //	vESyA pratodam AdadyAt vedane ca agrajanmanaH // GarP_1,95.12 //
   pitā pitāmaho bhrātā sakulyo jananī tathā /	pitA pitAmahaH BrAtA sakulyaH jananI taTA /
   kanyāpradaḥ pūrvanāśe prakṛtīsthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,95.13 //	kanyA pradaH pUrva nASe prakRtI sTaH paraH paraH // GarP_1,95.13 //
   aprayacchansamāpnoti bhrūṇahatyāmṛtāvṛtau /	aprayacCan samApnoti BrUNahatyA amRtOvRtO /
   eṣāmabhāve dātṝṇāṃ kanyā kuryāt svayaṃvaram // GarP_1,95.14 //	ezAm aBAve dAtLNAm kanyA kuryAt svayaMvaram // GarP_1,95.14 //
   sakṛtpradīyate kanyā haraṃstāṃ coradaṇḍabhāk /	sakRt pradIyate kanyA haran= tAm cora daNxa BAj /
   aduṣṭāṃ hi tyajandaṇḍyaḥ suduṣṭāṃ tu parityajet // GarP_1,95.15 //	aduzwAm hi tyajan daNxyaH su duzwAm tu parityajet // GarP_1,95.15 //
   aputrā gubapujñāto devaraḥ putrakānyagā /	aputrA gubapujQAtaH devaraH putrakAnyagA /
   sapiṇḍo vā samotro vā ghṛtābhyakta ṛtāviyāt // GarP_1,95.16 //	sapiNxaH vA samotraH vA GRta aByaktaH RtO= iyAt // GarP_1,95.16 //
   āgarbhasambhavaṃ gacchetpatitastvanyathā bhavet /	AgarBa samBavam gacCet patitaH tu anyaTA Bavet /
   anena vidhinā jāta kṣetrapasya bhavetsutaḥ // GarP_1,95.17 //	anena viDinA jAta kzetrapasya Bavet sutaH // GarP_1,95.17 //
   hṛtādhikārāṃ malināṃ piṇḍamātropasevinīm /	hRta aDikArAm malinAm piNxa mAtra upasevinIm /
   paribhūtāmadhaḥ śayyāṃ vāsayedyvabhicāriṇīm // GarP_1,95.18 //	pariBUtAm aDas SayyAm vAsayet i vaBicAriNIm // GarP_1,95.18 //
   somaḥ śaucaṃ dadau tāsāṃ gandharvaśca subhāṃ giram /	somaH SOcam dadO tAsAm ganDarvaH ca suBAm giram /
   pāvakaḥ sarvamedhyatvaṃ medhyā vai yoṣito yataḥ // GarP_1,95.19 //	pAvakaH sarvameDya tvam meDyAH vE yozitaH yatas // GarP_1,95.19 //
   vyabhicārādṛtauśuddhirgarbhetyāgaṃ karoti ca /	vyaBicArAt RtOSudDiH garBetyAgam karoti ca /
   garbhabhartṛvadhe tāsāṃ tathā mahati pātake // GarP_1,95.20 //	garBa BartR vaDe tAsAm taTA mahati pAtake // GarP_1,95.20 //
   surāpi vyādhitā dveṣṭrī vandhyārthaghnyapriyaṃvadā /	surA api vyADitA dvezwrI vanDya arTa GnI apriyaMvadA /
   adhivinnā ca bhartavyā mahadenonyathā bhavet // GarP_1,95.21 //	aDivinnA ca BartavyA mahadena unyaTA Bavet // GarP_1,95.21 //
   yatrāvirodho dampatyostrivargastattra vardhate /	yatra aviroDaH dampatyoH trivargaH tat tra varDate /
   mṛte jīvati yā patyau yā nānyamupagacchati // GarP_1,95.22 //	mRte jIvati yA patyO yA na anyam upagacCati // GarP_1,95.22 //
   seha kīrtimavāpnoti modate comayā saha /	sA iha kIrtim avApnoti modate ca umayA saha /
   śuddhāṃ tyajaṃstṛtīyāṃśaṃ dadyādāmaraṇaṃ striyāḥ // GarP_1,95.23 //	SudDAm tyajan= tRtIya aMSam dadyAt AmaraNam striyAH // GarP_1,95.23 //
   strībhirbharturvacaḥ kāryameṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ striyāḥ /	strIBiH BartuH vacaH kAryam eza DarmaH paraH striyAH /
   ṣoḍaśartuniśāḥ strīṇāṃ tāsu yugmāsu saṃviśet // GarP_1,95.24 //	zoxaSa Rtu niSAH strINAm tAsu yugmAsu saMviSet // GarP_1,95.24 //
   brahmacārī ca parvāṇyādyāśtatastrastu varjayet /	brahmacArI ca parvANi AdyAH tatastraH tu varjayet /
   evaṃ gacchaṃ striyaṃ kṣāmāṃ maghāṃ mūlāṃ ca varjayet // GarP_1,95.25 //	evam gacCam striyam kzAmAm maGAm mUlAm ca varjayet // GarP_1,95.25 //
   lakṣaṇyaṃ janayedeva putraṃ rogavivarjitam /	lakzaNyam janayet eva putram roga vivarjitam /
   yathā kāmī bhavedvāpi strīṇāṃ (sma) valamanusmaran // GarP_1,95.26 //	yaTA kAmI Bavet vA api strINAm (sma) valam anusmaran // GarP_1,95.26 //
   svadāranirataścaiva striyo rakṣyā yatastataḥ /	sva dAra nirataH ca eva striyaH rakzyAH yatas tatas /
   bhartṛbhrātṛpitṛjñātiśvaśrūśvaśuradevaraiḥ // GarP_1,95.27 //	BartR BrAtR pitR jQAti SvaSrU SvaSura devarEH // GarP_1,95.27 //
   bandhubhiśca striyaḥ pūjyā bhūṣaṇācchādanāśanaiḥ /	banDuBiH ca striyaH pUjyAH BUzaNa AcCAdana aSanEH /
   saṃyato paskarā dakṣā hṛṣṭā vyayaparāṅmukhī // GarP_1,95.28 //	saMyataH paskarA dakzA hRzwA vyaya parAFmuKI // GarP_1,95.28 //
   śvaśrūśvaśurayoḥ kuryātpādayorvandanaṃ sadā /	SvaSrU SvaSurayoH kuryAt pAdayoH vandanam sadA /
   krīḍāśarīrasaṃskārasamājotsavadaśanam // GarP_1,95.29 //	krIxA SarIra saMskAra samAja utsava daSanam // GarP_1,95.29 //
   hāsyaṃ paragṛhe yānaṃ tyajetpreṣitabhartṛkā /	hAsyam para gRhe yAnam tyajet prezita BartRkA /
   rakṣetkanyāṃ pitā bālye yauvane patireva tām // GarP_1,95.30 //	rakzet kanyAm pitA bAlye yOvane patiH eva tAm // GarP_1,95.30 //
   vārdhakye rakṣate putro hyanyathā jñātayastathā /	vArDakye rakzate putraH hi anyaTA jQAtayaH taTA /
   patiṃ vinā na tiṣṭhettu divā vā yadi vā niśi // GarP_1,95.31 //	patim vinA na tizWet tu divA vA yadi vA niSi // GarP_1,95.31 //
   jyeṣṭhāṃ dharmavidhau kuryānna kaniṣṭhāṃ kadācana /	jyezWAm Darma viDO kuryAt na kanizWAm kadAcana /
   dāhayedagnihotreṇa striyaṃ vṛttavatīṃ patiḥ // GarP_1,95.32 //	dAhayet agnihotreNa striyam vRttavatIm patiH // GarP_1,95.32 //
   āharedvidhivaddārānagniṃ caivāvilambitaḥ /	Aharet viDivat dArAn agnim ca eva avilambitaH /
   hitā bharturdivaṃ gacchediha kīrtīravāpya ca // GarP_1,95.33 //	hitAH BartuH divam gacCet iha kIrtIH avApya ca // GarP_1,95.33 //
   iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrAgAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktagṛhalthadharmanirṇayo nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkya uktagRhalTa DarmanirNayaH nAma paQcanavatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrāgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  96	SrAgaruxa mahApurANam 96
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   vakṣye saṅkarajātyādigṛhasthādi vidhiṃ param /	vakzye saFkara jAti Adi gRhasTa Adi viDim param /
   viprānmūrdhāvaṣikto hi kṣāttriyāyāṃ viśaḥ striyām // GarP_1,96.1 //	viprAn mUrDAvaziktaH hi kzAttriyAyAm viSaH striyAm // GarP_1,96.1 //
   jāto 'mbaṣṭhastu śūdrāyāṃ niṣādaḥ parvato 'pi vā /	jAtaH ambazWaH tu SUdrAyAm nizAdaH parvataH api vA /
   māhiṣyaḥ kṣattriyājjāto vaiśyāyāṃ mlecchasaṃjñitaḥ // GarP_1,96.2 //	mAhizyaH kzattriyAt jAtaH vESyAyAm mlecCa saMjQitaH // GarP_1,96.2 //
   śūdrāyāṃ karaṇo vaiśyādvinnāsveṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /	SUdrAyAm karaNaH vESyAt vinnAsu eza viDiH smRtaH /
   brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣattriyātsūto vaiśyādvaidehakastathā // GarP_1,96.3 //	brAhmaNyAm kzattriyAt sUtaH vESyAt vEdehakaH taTA // GarP_1,96.3 //
   śūdrājjātastu cāṇḍālaḥ sarvavarṇavigarhitaḥ /	SUdrAt jAtaH tu cANxAlaH sarva varNa vigarhitaH /
   kṣattriyā māgadhaṃ vaiśyācchūdrā kṣattārameva ca // GarP_1,96.4 //	kzattriyA mAgaDam vESyAt SUdrA kzattAram eva ca // GarP_1,96.4 //
   śūdrādayogavaṃ vaiśyā janayāmāsa vai sutam /	SUdrAt ayogavam vESyA janayAmAsa vE sutam /
   māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyāṃ tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate // GarP_1,96.5 //	mAhizyeNa karaNyAm tu raTakAraH prajAyate // GarP_1,96.5 //
   asatsantastu vai jñeyāḥ pratilomānulomajāḥ /	asat santaH tu vE jQeyAH pratiloma anuloma jAH /
   jātyutkarṣāddvijo jñeyaḥ saptame pañcame 'pi vā // GarP_1,96.6 //	jAti utkarzAt dvijaH jQeyaH saptame paQcame api vA // GarP_1,96.6 //
   vyatyaye karmaṇāṃ sāmyaṃ pūrvavaccottarāvaram /	vyatyaye karmaNAm sAmyam pUrvavat ca uttarAvaram /
   karma smārtaṃ vivāhāgnau kurvīta pratyahaṃ gṛhī // GarP_1,96.7 //	karma smArtam vivAha agnO kurvIta pratyaham gRhI // GarP_1,96.7 //
   dāyakālādṛte vāpi śrautaṃ vaitānikāgniṣu /	dAya kAlAt Rte vA api SrOtam vEtAnika agnizu /
   śarīracintāṃ nirvartya kṛtaśaucavidhirdvijaḥ // GarP_1,96.8 //	SarIra cintAm nirvartya kRta SOca viDiH dvijaH // GarP_1,96.8 //
   prātaḥ sandhyāmupāsīta dantadhāvanapūrvakam /	prAtar sanDyAm upAsIta danta DAvana pUrvakam /
   hutvāgnau saryadevatyāñjapenmantrānsamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,96.9 //	hutvA agnO sarya devatyAn japet mantrAn samAhitaH // GarP_1,96.9 //
   vedārthānadhigacchecca śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca /	veda arTAn aDigacCet ca SAstrANi viviDAni ca /
   yogakṣomādisiddhyarthamupeyādīśvaraṃ gṛhī // GarP_1,96.10 //	yogakzoma Adi sidDi arTam upeyAt ISvaram gRhI // GarP_1,96.10 //
   snātvā devānpitṝṃścaiva tarpayedarcayettathā /	snAtvA devAn pitLn= ca eva tarpayet arcayet taTA /
   vedānatha purāṇāni setihāsāni śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,96.11 //	vedAn aTa purANAni sa itihAsAni Saktitas // GarP_1,96.11 //
   japayajñānusiddhyarthaṃ vidyāṃ cādhyātmikīṃ japet /	japa yajQa anu sidDi arTam vidyAm ca ADyAtmikIm japet /
   balikarmasvadhāhomasvādhyāyātithisakriyāḥ // GarP_1,96.12 //	bali karma svaDA homa svADyAya atiTi sa kriyAH // GarP_1,96.12 //
   bhūtapitramarabrahmamanuṣyāṇāṃ mahāmakhāḥ /	BUta pitR amara brahma manuzyANAm mahA maKAH /
   devebhyastu hutaṃ cāgnau kṣipedbhūtabaliṃ haret // GarP_1,96.13 //	deveByaH tu hutam ca agnO kzipet BUta balim haret // GarP_1,96.13 //
   annaṃ bhūmauśvacāṇḍālavāyasebhyaśca niḥ kṣipet /	annam BUmOSva cANxAla vAyaseByaH ca niH kzipet /
   annaṃ pitṛmanuṣyebhyo deyamapyanvahaṃ jalam // GarP_1,96.14 //	annam pitR manuzyeByaH deyam api anvaham jalam // GarP_1,96.14 //
   svādhyāyamanvahaṃ kuryānna paceccānnamātmane /	svADyAyam anvaham kuryAt na pacet ca annam Atmane /
   bālasvavāsinīvṛddhagarbhiṇyāturakanyakāḥ // GarP_1,96.15 //	bAla svavAsinI vRdDa garBiNI Atura kanyakAH // GarP_1,96.15 //
   saṃbhojyātithibhṛtyāṃśca dampatyoḥ śeṣabhojanam /	saMBojya atiTi BRtyAn= ca dampatyoH Seza Bojanam /
   prāṇāgnihotravidhināśrīyādannamakutsayan // GarP_1,96.16 //	prANa agnihotra viDinA ASrIyAt annam akutsayan // GarP_1,96.16 //
   mitaṃ vipākaṃ ca hitaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bālādipūrvakam /	mitam vipAkam ca hitam Bakzyam bAla Adi pUrvakam /
   āpośānenopariṣṭādadhastāccaiva bhujyate // GarP_1,96.17 //	ApaH SAnena uparizwAt aDastAt ca eva Bujyate // GarP_1,96.17 //
   anagnamamṛtaṃ caiva kāryamannaṃ dvijanmanā /	anagnam amRtam ca eva kAryam annam dvijanmanA /
   atithibhyastu varṇebhyo deyaṃ śaktyānupūrvaśaḥ // GarP_1,96.18 //	atiTiByaH tu varNeByaH deyam SaktyA anupUrvaSas // GarP_1,96.18 //
   apraṇodyo 'tithiḥ sāyamapi nātra vicāraṇā /	apraNodyaH atiTiH sAyam api na atra vicAraNA /
   satkṛtya bhikṣave bhikṣā dātavyā suvratāya ca // GarP_1,96.19 //	satkRtya Bikzave BikzA dAtavyA suvratAya ca // GarP_1,96.19 //
   āgatān bhojayetsarvānmahokṣaṃ śrotriyāya ca /	AgatAn Bojayet sarvAn mahA ukzam SrotriyAya ca /
   pratisaṃvatsaraṃ tvarcyāḥ snātakācāryapārthivāḥ // GarP_1,96.20 //	pratisaMvatsaram tu arcyAH snAtaka AcArya pArTivAH // GarP_1,96.20 //
   priyo vivāhyaśca tathā yajñaṃ pratyṛrtvijaḥ punaḥ /	priyaH vivAhyaH ca taTA yajQam pratyRrtvijaH punar /
   adhvanīno 'tithiḥ proktaḥ śrotriyo vedapāragaḥ // GarP_1,96.21 //	aDvanInaH atiTiH proktaH SrotriyaH vedapAragaH // GarP_1,96.21 //
   mānyāvetau gṛhasthasya brahmalokamabhīpsataḥ /	mAnyO= etO gRhasTasya brahma lokam aBIpsataH /
   parapākarucirna syādanindyāmantraṇādṛte // GarP_1,96.22 //	para pAka ruciH na syAt anindya AmantraNAt Rte // GarP_1,96.22 //
   vākpāṇipādacāpalyaṃ varjayaccātibhojanam /	vAc pANi pAda cApalyam varjayat ca ati Bojanam /
   śrotriyaṃ vātithiṃ tṛptamāsīmāntādanuvrajet // GarP_1,96.23 //	Srotriyam vA atiTim tRptam AsImA antAt anuvrajet // GarP_1,96.23 //
   ahaḥ śeṣaṃ sahāsīta śiṣṭairiṣṭaiśca bandhubhiḥ /	ahar Sezam saha AsIta SizwEH izwEH ca banDuBiH /
   upāsya paścimāṃ sandhyāṃ hutvāgnau bhojanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,96.24 //	upAsya paScimAm sanDyAm hutvA agnO Bojanam tatas // GarP_1,96.24 //
   kuryādbhatyaiḥ samāyuktaiścintayedātmano hitam /	kuryAt BatyEH samAyuktEH cintayet AtmanaH hitam /
   brāhme muhūrte cotthāya mānyo vipro dhanādibhiḥ // GarP_1,96.25 //	brAhme muhUrte ca utTAya mAnyaH vipraH Dana AdiBiH // GarP_1,96.25 //
   vṛddhārtānāṃ samādeyaḥ panthā vai bhāravāhinām /	vRdDa ArtAnAm samAdeyaH panTAH vE BAra vAhinAm /
   ijyādhyayanadānāni vaiśyasya kṣattriyasya ca // GarP_1,96.26 //	ijyA aDyayana dAnAni vESyasya kzattriyasya ca // GarP_1,96.26 //
   pratigraho 'dhiko vipre yājanādhyāpane tathā /	pratigrahaH aDikaH vipre yAjana aDyApane taTA /
   pradhānaṃ kṣattriye karma prajānāṃ paripālanam // GarP_1,96.27 //	praDAnam kzattriye karma prajAnAm paripAlanam // GarP_1,96.27 //
   kusīdakṛṣivāṇijyaṃ pāśupālyaṃ viśaḥ smṛtam /	kusIda kRzi vANijyam pASupAlyam viSaH smRtam /
   śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā dvijo yajñānna hāpayet // GarP_1,96.28 //	SUdrasya dvija SuSrUzA dvijaH yajQAn na hApayet // GarP_1,96.28 //
   ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ śaucamindriyasaṃyamaḥ /	ahiMsA satyam asteyam SOcam indriya saMyamaH /
   damaḥ kṣamārjavaṃ dānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmasādhanam // GarP_1,96.29 //	damaH kzamA Arjavam dAnam sarvezAm Darma sADanam // GarP_1,96.29 //
   ācaretsadṛśīṃ vṛttimajihmāmaśaṭhāntathā /	Acaret sadRSIm vRttim ajihmAm aSaWAn taTA /
   traivārṣikā dhikānno yaḥ sa somaṃ pātumarhati // GarP_1,96.30 //	trEvArzikAH DikA annaH yaH sa somam pAtum arhati // GarP_1,96.30 //
   syādannaṃ vārṣikaṃ yasya kuryātprakasaumikīṃ kriyām /	syAt annam vArzikam yasya kuryAt prakasOmikIm kriyAm /
   pratisaṃvatsaraṃ somaḥ paśuḥ pratyayanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,96.31 //	pratisaMvatsaram somaH paSuH pratyayanam taTA // GarP_1,96.31 //
   kartavyā'grahaṇeṣṭiśca cāturmāsyāni yatnataḥ /	kartavyA agrahaNa izwiH ca cAturmAsyAni yatnatas /
   eṣāmasambhave kuryādiṣṭiṃ vaiśvānarīṃ dvijaḥ // GarP_1,96.32 //	ezAm asamBave kuryAt izwim vESvAnarIm dvijaH // GarP_1,96.32 //
   hīnakalpaṃ na kurvīta sati dravye phalapradam /	hIna kalpam na kurvIta sati dravye Pala pradam /
   caṇḍālo jāyate yajñakaraṇācchūdrabhikṣitāta // GarP_1,96.33 //	caNxAlaH jAyate yajQa karaNAt SUdra BikzitAtaH // GarP_1,96.33 //
   yajñārthalabdhaṃ nādadyādbhāsaḥ kāko 'pi vā bhavet /	yajQa arTa labDam na AdadyAt BAsaH kAkaH api vA Bavet /
   kusūtakumbhīdhānyo vā tryāhikaḥ śvastano 'pi vā // GarP_1,96.34 //	kusUta kumBIDAnyaH vA tryAhikaH SvastanaH api vA // GarP_1,96.34 //
   jīvedvāpi śiloñchena śreyāneṣāṃ paraḥ paraḥ /	jIvet vA api Sila uQCena SreyAn ezAm paraH paraH /
   na svādhyāyavirodhyarthamīheta na yatastataḥ // GarP_1,96.35 //	na svADyAya viroDi arTam Iheta na yatas tatas // GarP_1,96.35 //
   rājāntevāsiyājyebhyaḥ sīdanniccheddhanaṃ kṣudhā /	rAja antevAsi yAjyeByaH sIdan= icCet Danam kzuDA /
   dambhahaitukapāṣaṇḍibakavṛttīṃśca varjayet // GarP_1,96.36 //	damBa hEtuka pAzaNxi baka vRttIn= ca varjayet // GarP_1,96.36 //
   śuklāmbaradharo nīcakeśaśmaśrunakhaḥ śuciḥ /	Sukla ambara DaraH nIca keSa SmaSru naKaH SuciH /
   na bhāryādarśane 'śrīyānnaikavāsā na saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_1,96.37 //	na BAryA darSane aSrIyAt na eka vAsAH na saMsTitaH // GarP_1,96.37 //
   apriyaṃ na vadejjātu brahmasūtrī vinītavān /	apriyam na vadet jAtu brahmasUtrI vinItavAn /
   devapradakṣiṇāṅkuryādyaṣṭimānsakamaṇḍaluḥ // GarP_1,96.38 //	deva pradakziNa aFkuryAt yazwi mAn sa kamaNxaluH // GarP_1,96.38 //
   na tu mehennadīcchāyābhasmagoṣṭāmbuvartmasu /	na tu mehet nadI= CAyA Basma gozwa ambu vartmasu /
   na pratyagnyarkagosomasandhyāmbustrīdvijanmanām // GarP_1,96.39 //	na prati agni arka go soma sanDyA ambu strI dvijanmanAm // GarP_1,96.39 //
   nekṣetāgnyarkanagnāṃ strīṃ na ca saṃsṛṣṭamaithunām /	na Ikzeta agni arka nagnAm strIm na ca saMsRzwa mETunAm /
   na ca mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā svapetpratyakūśirā na ca // GarP_1,96.40 //	na ca mUtram purIzam vA svapet pratyakUSirAH na ca // GarP_1,96.40 //
   ṣṭīvanāsṛkśakṛnmūtraviṣāṇyapsu na saṃkṣipet /	zwIvana asRk SakRt mUtra vizANi apsu na saMkzipet /
   pādau pratāpayennāgnau na cainamabhilaṅghayet // GarP_1,96.41 //	pAdO pratApayet na agnO na ca enam aBilaFGayet // GarP_1,96.41 //
   pibennāñjalinā toyaṃ na śayānaṃ prabodhayet /	pibet na aQjalinA toyam na SayAnam praboDayet /
   nākṣaiḥ krījecca kitavairvyādhitaiśca na saṃviśet // GarP_1,96.42 //	na akzEH krIjet ca kitavEH vyADitEH ca na saMviSet // GarP_1,96.42 //
   viruddhaṃ varjayetkama pretadhūmaṃ nadītaram /	virudDam varjayet kama preta DUmam nadItaram /
   keśabhasmatuṣāṅgārakapāleṣu ca saṃsthitim // GarP_1,96.43 //	keSa Basma tuza aFgAra kapAlezu ca saMsTitim // GarP_1,96.43 //
   nācakṣīta dhayantīṃ gāṃ nādvāreṇāviśetkracit /	na AcakzIta DayantIm gAm na advAreNa aviSet kracit /
   na rājñaḥ pratigṛhṇāyāllubdhasyocchāstravartinaḥ // GarP_1,96.44 //	na rAjQaH pratigRhNAyAt lubDasya ucCAstra vartinaH // GarP_1,96.44 //
   adhyāyānāmupākarma śrāvaṇyāṃ śravaṇena vā /	aDyAyAnAm upAkarma SrAvaNyAm SravaNena vA /
   hastenauṣadhibhāve vā pañcamyāṃ śrāvaṇasya ca // GarP_1,96.45 //	hastena ozaDi BAve vA paQcamyAm SrAvaNasya ca // GarP_1,96.45 //
   pauṣamāsasya rohiṇyāmaṣṭakāyāmathāpi vā /	pOza mAsasya rohiNyAm azwakAyAm aTa api vA /
   jalānte chandasāṃ kuryādutsargaṃ vidhivadvahiḥ // GarP_1,96.46 //	jala ante CandasAm kuryAt utsargam viDivat vahiH // GarP_1,96.46 //
   anadhyāyastryahaṃ prete śiṣyartviggurubandhuṣu /	anaDyAyaH tri aham prete Sizya Rtvij guru banDuzu /
   upākarmaṇi cotsarge svaśākhaśrotriye mṛte // GarP_1,96.47 //	upAkarmaNi ca utsarge sva SAKa Srotriye mRte // GarP_1,96.47 //
   sandhyāgarjitanirghātabhūkampolkānipātane /	sanDyA garjita nirGAta BUkampa ulkA nipAtane /
   samāpya vedaṃ dyuniśamāraṇyakamadhītya ca // GarP_1,96.48 //	samApya vedam dyuniSam AraNyakam aDItya ca // GarP_1,96.48 //
   pañcadaśyāṃ caturdaśyāmaṣṭamyāṃ rāhusūtake /	paQcadaSyAm caturdaSyAm azwamyAm rAhu sUtake /
   ṛtusandhiṣu bhuktvā vā śrāddhikaṃ pratigṛhya ca // GarP_1,96.49 //	Rtu sanDizu BuktvA vA SrAdDikam pratigRhya ca // GarP_1,96.49 //
   paśumaṇḍūkanakulaśvāhimārjārasūkaraiḥ /	paSu maNxUka nakula Sva ahi mArjAra sUkarEH /
   kṛte 'ntare tvahorātraṃ śakrapāte tathocchraye // GarP_1,96.50 //	kRte antare tu ahorAtram Sakra pAte taTA ucCraye // GarP_1,96.50 //
   śvakroṣṭugardabholūkasāmabāṇārtaniḥ svane /	Sva krozwu gardaBa ulUka sAma bANa ArtaniH svane /
   amedhyaśavaśūdrāntyaśmaśānapatitāntike // GarP_1,96.51 //	ameDya Sava SUdra antya SmaSAna patita antike // GarP_1,96.51 //
   deśe 'śucāvātmani ca vidyutstanitasaṃplave /	deSe aSucO= Atmani ca vidyut stanita saMplave /
   bhuktvārdrapāṇirambho 'ntarardharātre 'timārute // GarP_1,96.52 //	BuktvA Ardra pANiH amBaH antar arDarAtre ati mArute // GarP_1,96.52 //
   digdāhe pāṃsuvarṣeṣu sandhyānī hārabhītiṣu /	digdAhe pAMsu varzezu sanDyAnI hAra BItizu /
   dhāvataḥ pūtigandhe ca śiṣṭe ca gṛhamāgate // GarP_1,96.53 //	DAvataH pUti ganDe ca Sizwe ca gRham Agate // GarP_1,96.53 //
   kharoṣṭrayānahastyaśvanauvṛkṣagirirohaṇe /	Kara uzwra yAna hasti aSva nOvRkza giri rohaNe /
   saptatriṃśadanadhyāyānetāṃstātkālikānviduḥ // GarP_1,96.54 //	saptatriMSat anaDyAyAn etAn= tAtkAlikAn viduH // GarP_1,96.54 //
   vedadiṣṭaṃ tathācāryaṃ rājacchāyāṃ parastriyam /	veda dizwam taTA AcAryam rAja= CAyAm para striyam /
   nākrāmedraktaviṇmūtraṣṭhīvanodvartanāni ca // GarP_1,96.55 //	na AkrAmet rakta viz mUtra zWIvana udvartanAni ca // GarP_1,96.55 //
   viprāhikṣattriyātmāno nāvajñeyāḥ kadācana /	vipra ahi kzattriya AtmAnaH na avajQeyAH kadAcana /
   dūrāducchiṣṭaviṇmūtrapādāmbhāṃsi samutsṛjet // GarP_1,96.56 //	dUrAt ucCizwa viz mUtra pAda amBAMsi samutsRjet // GarP_1,96.56 //
   śrutismṛtyuktamācāraṃ kuryānmarmaṇi na spṛśet /	Sruti smRti uktam AcAram kuryAt marmaNi na spRSet /
   na nindātāḍane kuryātsutaṃ śiṣyaṃ ca tāḍayet // GarP_1,96.57 //	na nindA tAxane kuryAt sutam Sizyam ca tAxayet // GarP_1,96.57 //
   ācaretsarvadā dharmaṃ tadviruddhaṃ tu nācaret /	Acaret sarvadA Darmam tat virudDam tu na Acaret /
   mātāpitratithībhyāḍhyairvivādaṃ nācaredgṛhī // GarP_1,96.58 //	mAtA pitR atiTi iByAXyEH vivAdam na Acaret gRhI // GarP_1,96.58 //
   pañca piṇḍānanuddhṛtya na snāyātparavāriṣu /	paQca piNxAn anudDRtya na snAyAt para vArizu /
   snāyānnadīprastravaṇadevakhātahradeṣu ca // GarP_1,96.59 //	snAyAt nadI prastravaNa devaKAta hradezu ca // GarP_1,96.59 //
   varjayetparaśayyādi na cāśrīyādanāpadi /	varjayet para SayyA Adi na ca aSrIyAt anApadi /
   kadaryabaddhaco (vai) rāṇāṃ tathā cānamnikasya ca // GarP_1,96.60 //	kadarya badDa caH (vE) rANAm taTA ca Anamnikasya ca // GarP_1,96.60 //
   vaiṇābhiśastavārdhuṣyagaṇikāgaṇadīkṣiṇām /	vENa aBiSasta vArDuzya gaNikA gaNa dIkziNAm /
   cikitsakāturakruddhaklībaraṅgopajīvinām // GarP_1,96.61 //	cikitsaka Atura krudDa klIba raFga upajIvinAm // GarP_1,96.61 //
   krūrograpatitavrātyadāmbhikocchiṣṭabhojinām /	krUra ugra patita vrAtya dAmBika ucCizwa BojinAm /
   śāstravikrayiṇaścaiva strījitagrāmayājinām // GarP_1,96.62 //	SAstra vikrayiNaH ca eva strI jita grAma yAjinAm // GarP_1,96.62 //
   nṛśaṃsarājarajakakṛtaghnavadhajīvinām /	nRSaMsa rAja rajaka kRtaGna vaDa jIvinAm /
   piśunānṛtinoścaiva somavikrayiṇastathā // GarP_1,96.63 //	piSuna anRtinoH ca eva soma vikrayiNaH taTA // GarP_1,96.63 //
   bandināṃ svarṇakārāṇāmannameṣāṃ kadācana /	bandinAm svarNakArANAm annam ezAm kadAcana /
   na bhoktavyaṃ vṛthā māṃsaṃ keśakīṭasamanvitam // GarP_1,96.64 //	na Boktavyam vRTA mAMsam keSa kIwa samanvitam // GarP_1,96.64 //
   bhaktaṃ paryuṣitocchiṣṭaṃ śvaspṛṣṭaṃ patito (te) kṣitam /	Baktam paryuzita ucCizwam Sva spRzwam patitaH (te) kzitam /
   udakyāspṛṣṭasaṃghuṣṭamaparyāptaṃ ca varjayet // GarP_1,96.65 //	udakyA spRzwa saMGuzwam aparyAptam ca varjayet // GarP_1,96.65 //
   ghoghrātaṃ śakunocchiṣṭaṃ pādaspṛṣṭa ca kāmataḥ /	GoGrAtam Sakuna ucCizwam pAda spRzwa ca kAmataH /
   śūdreṣu dāsagopālakulamitrārdhasīriṇaḥ // GarP_1,96.66 //	SUdrezu dAsa gopAla kula mitra arDa sIriNaH // GarP_1,96.66 //
   bhojyānno nāpitaścaiva yaścātmānaṃ nivedayet /	Bojya annaH nApitaH ca eva yaH ca AtmAnam nivedayet /
   annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ bhojyaṃ snehāktaṃ cirasaṃbhṛ (sthi) tam // GarP_1,96.67	annam paryuzitam Bojyam sneha aktam cira saMBR (sTi) tam // GarP_1,96.67
   asnehā api ghodhūmayavagorasavikriyāḥ /	asnehAH api GoDUma yava go rasa vikriyAH /
   auṣṭramaikaśaphaṃ strīṇāṃ payaśca parivarjayet // GarP_1,96.68 //	Ozwram EkaSaPam strINAm payaH ca parivarjayet // GarP_1,96.68 //
   kravyādapakṣidātyūhaśukamāṃsāni varjayet /	kravyAda pakzi dAtyUha Suka mAMsAni varjayet /
   sārasaikaśaphānhaṃsānbalākabakaṭiṭṭibhān // GarP_1,96.69 //	sArasa ekaSaPAn haMsAn balAka baka wiwwiBAn // GarP_1,96.69 //
   vṛthā kṛsarasaṃyāva pāyasāpūpaśaṣkulīḥ /	vRTA kRsara saMyAva pAyasa apUpa SazkulIH /
   kuraraṃ jālapādaṃ ca khañjarīṭamṛgadvijān // GarP_1,96.70 //	kuraram jAlapAdam ca KaQjarIwa mRga dvijAn // GarP_1,96.70 //
   cāṣānmatsyātraktapādañcagddhvā vai kāmato naraḥ /	cAzAn mad syAt rakta pAdaQcagdDvA vE kAmataH naraH /
   ballūraṃ kāmato jagddhvā sopa vāsastryahaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,96.71 //	ballUram kAmataH jagdDvA sA upa vAsaH tri aham Bavet // GarP_1,96.71 //
   palāṇḍulaśunādīni jagddhvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret /	palANxu laSuna AdIni jagdDvA cAndrAyaNam caret /
   śrāddhe devānpitṝnprārcya khādanmāṃsaṃ na doṣabhāk // GarP_1,96.72 //	SrAdDe devAn pitLn prArcya KAdan mAMsam na doza BAj // GarP_1,96.72 //
   vasetsa narake ghora dināni paśuromataḥ /	vaset sa narake Gora dinAni paSu romataH /
   saṃmitāni durācāro yo hantyavidhinā paśūn /	saMmitAni durAcAraH yaH hanti aviDinA paSUn /
   māṃsaṃ santyajya saṃprārthya kāmānyāti tato harim // GarP_1,96.73 //	mAMsam santyajya saMprArTya kAmAn yAti tatas harim // GarP_1,96.73 //
   iti śrīgāruje mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruje mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkyoktaSrAdDanirUpaNam nAma zaNNavatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  97	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 97
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   dravyaśuddhiṃpravakṣyāmi tannibodhata sattamāḥ /	dravya SudDiMpravakzyAmi tat niboData sattamAH /
   sauvarṇarājatābjānāṃ śaṅkharajjvādicarmaṇām // GarP_1,97.1 //	sOvarNa rAjatA abjAnAm SaFKa rajju Adi carmaNAm // GarP_1,97.1 //
   pātrāṇāṃ cāsanānāṃ ca vāriṇā śuddhiriṣyate /	pAtrANAm ca AsanAnAm ca vAriNA SudDiH izyate /
   uṣṇavābhaḥ strukstruvayordhānyādeḥ prokṣaṇena ca // GarP_1,97.2 //	uzNava ABaH strukH truvayoH DAni AdeH prokzaNena ca // GarP_1,97.2 //
   takṣaṇāddāruśṛṅgāderyajñapātrasya mārjanāt /	takzaNAt dAru SRFga AdeH yajQa pAtrasya mArjanAt /
   soṣṇairudakagomūtraiḥ śudhyatyāvikakauśikam // GarP_1,97.3 //	sa uzNEH udaka go mUtrEH SuDyati Avika kOSikam // GarP_1,97.3 //
   bhaikṣyaṃ yoṣinmukhaṃ paśyanpunaḥ pākānmahīmayam /	BEkzyam yozit muKam paSyan punar pAkAn mahI mayam /
   gāghnāte 'nne tathā keśamakṣikākīṭadūṣite // GarP_1,97.4 //	gAGnAte anne taTA keSa makzikA kIwa dUzite // GarP_1,97.4 //
   bhasmakṣepādviśuddhiḥ syādbhūśuddhirmājanādinā /	Basma kzepAt viSudDiH syAt BU SudDiH mAjana AdinA /
   trapusīsakatāmrāṇāṃ kṣārāmlodakavāribhiḥ // GarP_1,97.5 //	trapu sIsaka tAmrANAm kzAra amla udaka vAriBiH // GarP_1,97.5 //
   bhasmādbhirlohakāṃsyānāmajñātaṃ ca sadā śuci /	Basma adBiH loha kAMsyAnAm ajQAtam ca sadA Suci /
   amedhyāktasya mṛttoyairgandhalepāpakarṣaṇāt // GarP_1,97.6 //	ameDya aktasya mRd toyEH ganDa lepa apakarzaNAt // GarP_1,97.6 //
   śuci gotṛptidaṃ toyaṃ prakṛtisthaṃ mahīgatam /	Suci go tRpti dam toyam prakRti sTam mahI gatam /
   tathā māṃsaṃ śvacāṇḍālakravyādādinipātitam // GarP_1,97.7 //	taTA mAMsam Sva cANxAla kravyAda Adi nipAtitam // GarP_1,97.7 //
   raśmiragnī rajaśchāyā gauraśvo vasudhānilāḥ /	raSmiH agniH rajaH CAyAH gOraSvaH vasuDA anilAH /
   aśvājavipruṣo medhyā stathācamanabindavaḥ // GarP_1,97.8 //	aSva aja vipruzaH meDyA staTA Acamana bindavaH // GarP_1,97.8 //
   snātvā pītvā kṣute supte bhuktvā rathyāprasarpaṇe /	snAtvA pItvA kzute supte BuktvA raTyA prasarpaNe /
   ācāntaḥ punarācāmedvāso 'nyatparidhāya ca // GarP_1,97.9 //	AcAntaH punar AcAmet vAsaH anyat pariDAya ca // GarP_1,97.9 //
   kṣute niṣṭhīvite svāpe paridhāne 'śrupātane /	kzute nizWIvite svApe pariDAne aSru pAtane /
   pañcasveteṣu nācāmeddakṣiṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ spṛśet /	paQcasu etezu na AcAmet dakziNam SravaNam spRSet /
   tiṣṭhantyagnyādayo devā viprakarṇe tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,97.10 //	tizWanti agni AdayaH devAH viprakarNe tu dakziNe // GarP_1,97.10 //
   iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrAgAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktadravyaśuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkyoktadravyaSudDinirUpaNam nAma saptanavatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  98	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 98
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   atha dānividhiṃ vakṣye tanme śṛṇuta suvratāḥ /	aTa dAni viDim vakzye tat me SRNuta suvratAH /
   anyebhyo brāhmaṇāḥ śreṣṭhāstebhyaścaiva kriyāparāḥ // GarP_1,98.1 //	anyeByaH brAhmaNAH SrezWAH teByaH ca eva kriyA parAH // GarP_1,98.1 //
   brahmavettā ca tebhyo 'pi pātraṃ vidyāttapo 'nvitāḥ (tam) /	brahma vettA ca teByaH api pAtram vidyAt tapaH anvitAH (tam) /
   gobhūdhānyahiraṇyādi pātre dātavyamarcitam // GarP_1,98.2 //	go BU DAnya hiraNya Adi pAtre dAtavyam arcitam // GarP_1,98.2 //
   vidyātapobhyāṃ hīnena na tu grāhyaḥ pratigrahaḥ /	vidyA tapoByAm hInena na tu grAhyaH pratigrahaH /
   gṛhṇanpradātāramadho nayatyātmānameva ca // GarP_1,98.3 //	gRhNan pradAtAram aDas nayati AtmAnam eva ca // GarP_1,98.3 //
   dātavyaṃ pratyahaṃ pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ /	dAtavyam pratyaham pAtre nimittezu viSezataH /
   yācitenāpi dātavyaṃ śraddhāpūtaṃ tu śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,98.4 //	yAcitena api dAtavyam SradDA pUtam tu Saktitas // GarP_1,98.4 //
   hemaśṛṅgī śaphaiḥ raupyaiḥ śuśīlā vastrasaṃyutā /	hema SRFgI SaPEH rOpyEH SuSIlA vastra saMyutAH /
   sakāṃsyāpātrā dātavya kṣīriṇī gauḥ sadakṣiṇā // GarP_1,98.5 //	sa kAMsya apAtrA dAtavya kzIriNI gOH sa dakziNAH // GarP_1,98.5 //
   daśasauvarṇikaṃ śṛṅgaṃ śaphaṃ saptapalaiḥ kṛtam /	daSa sOvarNikam SRFgam SaPam sapta palEH kRtam /
   pañcāśatpalikaṃ pātraṃ kāṃsyaṃ vatsasya kīrtyate // GarP_1,98.6 //	paQcASat palikam pAtram kAMsyam vatsasya kIrtyate // GarP_1,98.6 //
   svarṇapippalapātreṇa vatso vā vatsikāpi vā /	svarNa pippala pAtreNa vatsaH vA vatsikA api vA /
   asyā api ca dātavyamapatyaṃ rogavarjitam // GarP_1,98.7 //	asyAH api ca dAtavyam apatyam roga varjitam // GarP_1,98.7 //
   dātā svargamavāpnoti vatsarānromasaṃmitān /	dAtA svargam avApnoti vatsarAn roma saMmitAn /
   kaṣilā cetārayet bhūyaścāsaptamaṃ kulam // GarP_1,98.8 //	kazilA cetArayet BUyas ca Asaptamam kulam // GarP_1,98.8 //
   yāvadvatsasya dvau pādau mukhaṃ yonyāṃ pradṛśyate /	yAvat vatsasya dvO pAdO muKam yonyAm pradRSyate /
   tāvadgauḥ pṛthivī jñeyā yāvadgarbhaṃ na muñcati // GarP_1,98.9 //	tAvat gOH pRTivI jQeyAH yAvat garBam na muQcati // GarP_1,98.9 //
   yathā kathañciddattvā gāndhenuṃ vādhenumeva vā /	yaTA kaTaQcid dattvA gAnDenum vA aDenum eva vA /
   arogāmaparikliṣṭāṃ dātā svarge mahīyate // GarP_1,98.10 //	arogAm apariklizwAm dAtA svarge mahIyate // GarP_1,98.10 //
   śrāntasaṃvāhanaṃ rogiparicaryā surārcanam /	SrAnta saMvAhanam rogi paricaryA sura arcanam /
   pādaśaucaṃ dvijocchiṣṭamārjanaṃ gāpradānavat // GarP_1,98.11 //	pAda SOcam dvija ucCizwa mArjanam gA pradAna vat // GarP_1,98.11 //
   dvijāya yadabhīṣṭaṃ tu dattvā svargamavāpnuyāt /	dvijAya yat aBIzwam tu dattvA svargam avApnuyAt /
   bhūdīpāṃścānnavastrāṇi sarpirdattvā vrajecchiyam // GarP_1,98.12 //	BU dIpAn= ca anna vastrANi sarpiH dattvA vrajet Siyam // GarP_1,98.12 //
   gṛhadhānyacchatramālyavṛkṣayā naghṛtaṃ jalam /	gRha DAnya= Catra mAlya vRkzayA na GRtam jalam /
   śayyānulepanaṃ dattvā svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,98.13 //	SayyA anulepanam dattvA svarga loke mahIyate // GarP_1,98.13 //
   brahmadātā brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti suradurlabham /	brahma dAtA brahma lokam prApnoti sura durlaBam /
   vedārthayajñaśāstrāṇi dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi // GarP_1,98.14 //	veda arTa yajQa SAstrANi Darma SAstrANi ca eva hi // GarP_1,98.14 //
   mūlyenāpi likhitvāpi brahmalokamavāpnuyāt /	mUlyena api liKitvA api brahma lokam avApnuyAt /
   etanmūlaṃ jagadyasmādasṛjatpūrvamīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,98.15 //	etat mUlam jagat yasmAt asRjat pUrvam ISvaraH // GarP_1,98.15 //
   tasmātsarvaprayatnena kāryo vedārthasaṃgrahaḥ /	tasmAt sarva prayatnena kAryaH veda arTa saMgrahaH /
   itihāsapurāṇaṃ vā likhitvā yaḥ prayacchati // GarP_1,98.16 //	itihAsa purANam vA liKitvA yaH prayacCati // GarP_1,98.16 //
   brahmadānasamaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnoti dviguṇonnatim /	brahma dAna samam puNyam prApnoti dviguNa unnatim /
   lokāyataṃ kutarkaśca prākṛtamlecchabhāṣitam // GarP_1,98.17 //	lokAyatam kutarkaH ca prAkRta mlecCa BAzitam // GarP_1,98.17 //
   na śrotavyaṃ dvijenaitadadho nayati taṃ dvijam /	na Srotavyam dvijena etat aDas nayati tam dvijam /
   samartho yo na gṛhṇīyāddātṛlokānavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,98.18 //	samarTaH yaH na gRhNIyAt dAtR lokAn avApnuyAt // GarP_1,98.18 //
   kuśāḥ śākaṃ payo gandhāḥ pratyākhyeyā na vāri ca /	kuSAH SAkam payaH ganDAH pratyAKyeyAH na vAri ca /
   ayacitāhṛtaṃ grāhyamapi duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ // GarP_1,98.19 //	ayacita AhRtam grAhyam api duzkRta karmaNaH // GarP_1,98.19 //
   anyatra kulaṭāṣaṇḍhapatitebhyo dviṣastathā /	anyatra kulawA zaNXa patiteByaH dvizaH taTA /
   devātithyarcanakṛte pitṛtṛptyarthameva ca /	deva atiTi arcana kRte pitR tRpti arTam eva ca /
   sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyādātmatṛpsarthameva ca // GarP_1,98.20 //	sarvatas pratigRhNIyAt Atma tRpsarTam eva ca // GarP_1,98.20 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktadānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkyoktadAnaDarmanirUpaNam nAma azwanavatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  99	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 99
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   atha śrāddhavidhiṃ vakṣye sarvapāpapraṇāśanam /	aTa SrAdDa viDim vakzye sarva pApa praNASanam /
   amāvasyāṣṭakāvṛddhikṛṣṇapakṣāyanadvayam // GarP_1,99.1 //	amAvasya azwakA vRdDi kRzNa pakzAyana dvayam // GarP_1,99.1 //
   dravyaṃ brāhmaṇasampattirviṣuvatsūryasaṃkramaḥ /	dravyam brAhmaNa sampattiH vizuvat sUrya saMkramaH /
   vyatīpāto gajacchāyā grahaṇaṃ candrasūryayoḥ // GarP_1,99.2 //	vyatIpAtaH gajacCAyA grahaNam candra sUryayoH // GarP_1,99.2 //
   śrāddhaṃ pratiruciścaiva śrāddhakālāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /	SrAdDam pratiruciH ca eva SrAdDa kAlAH prakIrtitAH /
   agniyaḥ sarvadeveṣu śrotriyo vedavidyuvā // GarP_1,99.3 //	agniyaH sarva devezu SrotriyaH veda vid yuvA // GarP_1,99.3 //
   vedārthavijjyeṣṭhasāmā trimadhustrisuparṇikaḥ /	veda arTa vid jyezWa sAmA trimaDuH trisuparNikaH /
   svastrīya ṛtvigajāmātāyajyaśvaśuramātulāḥ // GarP_1,99.4 //	sva strIyaH Rtvi gaja amAtAyajya SvaSura mAtulAH // GarP_1,99.4 //
   triṇāciketadauhitraśiṣyasambandhibāndhavāḥ /	triNAciketa dOhitra Sizya sambanDi bAnDavAH /
   karmaniṣṭhāstaponiṣṭhāḥ pañcāgnibrahmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,99.5 //	karma nizWAH tapaH nizWAH paQca agni brahmacAriNaH // GarP_1,99.5 //
   pitṛmātṛparāścaiva brāhmaṇāḥ śrāddhadevatāḥ /	pitR mAtR parAH ca eva brAhmaNAH SrAdDa devatAH /
   rogī hīnātiriktāṅgaḥ kāṇaḥ paunarbhavastathā // GarP_1,99.6 //	rogI hIna atirikta aFgaH kANaH pOnarBavaH taTA // GarP_1,99.6 //
   avakīrṇyāda yo ye ca ye cācāravivarjitāḥ /	avakIrNyAda yaH ye ca ye ca AcAra vivarjitAH /
   avaiṣṇavāśca te sarve na śrāddhārhāḥ kadācana // GarP_1,99.7 //	avEzNavAH ca te sarve na SrAdDa arhAH kadAcana // GarP_1,99.7 //
   nimantrayecca pūrvedyurdvijairbhāvyaṃ ca saṃyataiḥ /	nimantrayet ca pUrvedyus dvijEH BAvyam ca saMyatEH /
   ājāntāṃścaiva pūrvāhnehyāsaneṣūpaveśayet // GarP_1,99.8 //	AjAntAn= ca eva pUrvAhnehi Asanezu upaveSayet // GarP_1,99.8 //
   yugmāndeve tathā pitrye svapradeśeṣu śaktitaḥ /	yugmAn deve taTA pitrye sva pradeSezu Saktitas /
   dvau daiva prāgudak pitrye trīṇyekaṃ cobhayoḥ pṛthak // GarP_1,99.9 //	dvO dEva prAc udak pitrye trINi ekam ca uBayoH pRTak // GarP_1,99.9 //
   mātāmahānāmapyevaṃ tantraṃ vā vaiśvadevikam /	mAtAmahAnAm api evam tantram vA vESvadevikam /
   hastaprakṣālanaṃ dattvā viṣṭarārthe kuśānapi // GarP_1,99.10 //	hasta prakzAlanam dattvA vizwara arTe kuSAn api // GarP_1,99.10 //
   āvāhya tadanujñāto viśvadevāsaityṛcā /	AvAhya tad anujQAtaH viSva devA sEtyR cAH /
   yavairannaṃ vikīryātha bhājane sapavitrake // GarP_1,99.11 //	yavEH annam vikIrya aTa BAjane sa pavitrake // GarP_1,99.11 //
   śannodevyā payaḥ kṣiptvā yavo 'sīti yavāṃstathā /	SannodevyA payaH kziptvA yavaH asi iti yavAn= taTA /
   yādivyā iti mantreṇa hasteṣveva viniḥ kṣipet // GarP_1,99.12 //	yAdivyA iti mantreNa hastezu eva viniH kzipet // GarP_1,99.12 //
   gandhodake tathā dīpamālyadāmapradīpakam /	ganDa udake taTA dIpa mAlya dAma pradIpakam /
   apasavyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pitṝṇāmapradakṣiṇam // GarP_1,99.13 //	apasavyam tatas kRtvA pitLNAm apradakziNam // GarP_1,99.13 //
   dviguṇāṃstu kuśāndattvā uśantastvetyṛcā pitṝn /	dviguNAn= tu kuSAn dattvA uSantaH tvA iti RcA pitLn /
   āvāhya tadanu jñāto japedāyantunastataḥ // GarP_1,99.14 //	AvAhya tadanu jQAtaH japet AyantunaH tatas // GarP_1,99.14 //
   yavārthastu tilaiḥ kāryaḥ kuryādarghyādi pūrvavat /	yava arTaH tu tilEH kAryaH kuryAt arGya Adi pUrvavat /
   dattvārghyaṃ saṃstravāṃsteṣāṃ pātre kṛtvā vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,99.15 //	dattvA arGyam saMstravAn= tezAm pAtre kRtvA viDAnataH // GarP_1,99.15 //
   pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasīti nyubjaṃ pātraṃ karotyadhaḥ /	pitRByaH sTAnam asi iti nyubjam pAtram karoti aDas /
   agnau kariṣya ādāya pṛcchatyannaṃ ghṛplutam // GarP_1,99.16 //	agnO karizye AdAya pRcCati annam GRplutam // GarP_1,99.16 //
   kuruṣveti tathoktosau hutvāgnau pitṛyajñavat /	kuruzva iti taTA ukta UsO hutvA agnO pitR yajQa vat /
   hutaśeṣaṃ pradadyācca bhājaneṣu samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,99.17 //	huta Sezam pradadyAt ca BAjanezu samAhitaH // GarP_1,99.17 //
   yathālābhopapanneṣu raupyeṣu ca viśeṣataḥ /	yaTA lABa upapannezu rOpyezu ca viSezataH /
   dattvānnaṃ pṛthivīpātramiti pātrābhimantraṇam // GarP_1,99.18 //	dattvA annam pRTivI pAtram iti pAtra aBimantraNam // GarP_1,99.18 //
   kṛtve daṃviṣṇurityevaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet /	kRtve daMvizNuH iti evam dvija aFguzWam niveSayet /
   savyāhṛtiṃ ca gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetyṛcastathā // GarP_1,99.19 //	sa vyAhRtim ca gAyattrIm maDuvAta iti RcaH taTA // GarP_1,99.19 //
   japtvā yathāsukhaṃ vācyaṃ bhuñjīraṃste 'pi vāgyatāḥ /	japtvA yaTAsuKam vAcyam BuQjIran= te api vAgyatAH /
   annamiṣṭaṃ haviṣyaṃ ca dadyādakrodhanotvaraḥ // GarP_1,99.20 //	annam izwam havizyam ca dadyAt akroDana utvaraH // GarP_1,99.20 //
   ātṛptestu pavitrāṇi japtvā pūrvajapaṃ tathā /	AtRpteH tu pavitrANi japtvA pUrva japam taTA /
   annamādāya tṛptāḥ sthaḥ śeṣaṃ caivānumantrya ca // GarP_1,99.21 //	annam AdAya tRptAH sTaH Sezam ca eva anumantrya ca // GarP_1,99.21 //
   tadannaṃ vikiredbhūmau dadyāccāpaḥ sakṛtsakṛt /	tat annam vikiret BUmO dadyAt ca apaH sakRt sakRt /
   sarvamannamupādāya satilaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // GarP_1,99.22 //	sarvam annam upAdAya sa tilam dakziNAmuKaH // GarP_1,99.22 //
   ucchiṣṭasannidhau piṇḍānpradadyātpitṛyajñavat /	ucCizwa sanniDO piNxAn pradadyAt pitR yajQa vat /
   mātāmahānāmapyavaṃ dadyādācamanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,99.23 //	mAtAmahAnAm api avam dadyAt Acamanam tatas // GarP_1,99.23 //
   svasti vācyaṃ tato dadyādakṣayyodakameva ca /	svasti vAcyam tatas dadyAt akzayya udakam eva ca /
   dattvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā svadhākāramudāharet // GarP_1,99.24 //	dattvA ca dakziNAm SaktyA svaDAkAram udAharet // GarP_1,99.24 //
   vācyatāminyanujñātaḥ pitṛbhyaśca svadhocyatām /	vAcya tAmini anujQAtaH pitRByaH ca svaDA ucyatAm /
   viprairastu svadhetyukto bhūmau siñcettato jalam // GarP_1,99.25 //	viprEH astu svaDA iti uktaH BUmO siQcet tatas jalam // GarP_1,99.25 //
   prīyantāmiti cāhaivaṃ viśvedevyaṃ jalaṃ dadat /	prIyantAm iti ca Aha evam viSvedevyam jalam dadat /
   dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca // GarP_1,99.26 //	dAtAraH naH aBivarDantAm vedAH santatiH eva ca // GarP_1,99.26 //
   śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadvahu deyaṃ ca no 'stviti /	SradDA ca naH mA vyagamat vahu deyam ca naH astu iti /
   ityutkrotkrā priyā vācaḥ praṇipatya visarjayet // GarP_1,99.27 //	iti utkrotkrA priyAH vAcaH praNipatya visarjayet // GarP_1,99.27 //
   vājevāje iti prītyā pitṛpūrvaṃ visarjanam /	vAjevAje iti prItyA pitR pUrvam visarjanam /
   yasmiṃste saṃstravāḥ pūrvamarghyapātre nipātitāḥ // GarP_1,99.28 //	yasmin= te saMstravAH pUrvam arGya pAtre nipAtitAH // GarP_1,99.28 //
   pitṛpātraṃ taduttānaṃ kṛtvā viprānvisarjayet /	pitRpAtram tat uttAnam kRtvA viprAn visarjayet /
   pradakṣiṇamanuvrajya bhuñjīta pitṛsevitam // GarP_1,99.29 //	pradakziNam anuvrajya BuQjIta pitR sevitam // GarP_1,99.29 //
   brahmacārī bhavettāṃ tu rajanīṃ bhāryayā maha /	brahmacArI Bavet tAm tu rajanIm BAryayA mahaH /
   evaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vṛddhau nāndīmukhānapi // GarP_1,99.30 //	evam pradakziNam kRtvA vRdDO nAndImuKAn api // GarP_1,99.30 //
   yajettadadhikarkandhūmiśrāḥ piṇḍā yaivaḥ śritāḥ /	yajet tad aDikarkanDU miSrAH piNxAH yA evaH SritAH /
   ekoddiṣṭaṃ daivahīnaṃ ekānnaikapavitrakam // GarP_1,99.31 //	ekoddizwam dEva hInam eka anna eka pavitrakam // GarP_1,99.31 //
   āvāhanāgnaukaraṇarahitaṃ tvapasavyavat /	AvAhana agnOkaraNa rahitam tu apasavya vat /
   upatiṣṭhatāmityakṣayyasthāne viprānvisarjayet // GarP_1,99.32 //	upatizWatAm iti akzayya sTAne viprAn visarjayet // GarP_1,99.32 //
   abhiraṇyatāṃ prabūyād bruyustebhiratāḥ sma ha /	aBiraNya tAm prabUyAt bruyuH teBiratAH sma ha /
   gandho dakatilairmiśraṃ kuryātpātracatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,99.33 //	ganDaH daka tilEH miSram kuryAt pAtra catuzwayam // GarP_1,99.33 //
   arghyārthaṃ pitṛpātreṣu pretapātraṃ prasecayet /	arGya arTam pitRpAtrezu pretapAtram prasecayet /
   yesamānā iti dvābhyāṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret // GarP_1,99.34 //	yesamAnAH iti dvAByAm Sezam pUrvavat Acaret // GarP_1,99.34 //
   etatsapiṇḍīkaraṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ striyā api /	etat sapiNxIkaraNam ekoddizwam striyAH api /
   arvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ yasya saṃvatsarādbhavet // GarP_1,99.35 //	arvAk sapiNxIkaraNam yasya saMvatsarAt Bavet // GarP_1,99.35 //
   tasyāpyannaṃ sodakumbhaṃ dadyātsaṃvatsaraṃ dvijaḥ /	tasya api annam sa udakumBam dadyAt saMvatsaram dvijaH /
   piṇḍāṃśca goja viprebhyo dadyādgnau jale 'pi vā // GarP_1,99.36 //	piNxAn= ca goja vipreByaH dadyAt gnO jale api vA // GarP_1,99.36 //
   haviṣyānnena vai māsaṃ pāyasena tu vatsaram /	havizya annena vE mAsam pAyasena tu vatsaram /
   mātsyahāriṇakaurabhraśākunacchāgapārṣataiḥ // GarP_1,99.37 //	mAtsya hAriNaka OraBra SAkuna= CAga pArzatEH // GarP_1,99.37 //
   aiṇarauravavā rāhaśāśamāṃsairyathākramam /	ENa rOravavA rAha SASa mAMsEH yaTAkramam /
   māsavṛddhyāpi tuṣyanti dattairiha pitāmahāḥ // GarP_1,99.38 //	mAsa vRdDyA api tuzyanti dattEH iha pitAmahAH // GarP_1,99.38 //
   dadyādvarṣātrayodaśyāṃ maghāsu ca na saṃśayaḥ /	dadyAt varzA trayodaSyAm maGAsu ca na saMSayaH /
   pratipatprabhṛtiṣvevaṃ kanyā dīñchrāddhado labhet // GarP_1,99.39 //	pratipad praBRtizu evam kanyA dIQCrAdhadaH laBet // GarP_1,99.39 //
   śastreṇa nihatānāṃ tu caturdaśyāṃ pradīyate /	SastreNa nihatAnAm tu caturdaSyAm pradIyate /
   svargaṃ hyapatyamojaśca śauryaṃ kṣetraṃ balaṃ tathā // GarP_1,99.40 //	svargam hi apatyam ojaH ca SOryam kzetram balam taTA // GarP_1,99.40 //
   putraśraiṣṭyaṃ sa saubhāgyaṃ samṛddhiṃ mukhyatāṃ śubham /	putra SrEzwyam sa sOBAgyam samRdDim muKya tAm SuBam /
   pravṛttacakratāṃ caiva vāṇijyaprabhṛtīṃstathā // GarP_1,99.41 //	pravRtta cakra tAm ca eva vANijya praBRtIn= taTA // GarP_1,99.41 //
   arogitvaṃ yaśo vītaśokatāṃ paramāṃ gatim /	arogi tvam yaSaH vIta Soka tAm paramAm gatim /
   dhanaṃ vidyāṃ ca vāksiddhiṃ kupyaṃ gojāvikaṃ tathā // GarP_1,99.42 //	Danam vidyAm ca vAc sidDim kupyam gojAvikam taTA // GarP_1,99.42 //
   aśvānāyuśca vidhivadyaḥ śrāddhaṃ saṃprayacchati /	aSvAn AyuH ca viDivat yaH SrAdDam saMprayacCati /
   kṛttikādibharaṇyantaṃ sa kāmānprāpnuyādimān // GarP_1,99.43 //	kRttikA Adi BaraNI antam sa kAmAn prApnuya At imAn // GarP_1,99.43 //
   vastrādyāḥ prīṇayantyeva naraṃ śrāddhakṛtaṃ dvijāḥ /	vastra AdyAH prINayanti eva naram SrAdDa kRtam dvijAH /
   āyuḥ prajā dhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargamokṣasukhāni ca // GarP_1,99.44 //	AyuH prajAH Danam vidyAm svarga mokza suKAni ca // GarP_1,99.44 //
   prayacchati yathā rājyaṃ prītyā nityaṃ pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,99.45 //	prayacCati yaTA rAjyam prItyA nityam pitAmahaH // GarP_1,99.45 //
   iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrAgAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktaśrāddhavidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkyoktaSrAdDaviDinirUpaNam nAma navanavatitamaH aDyAyaH
   śrāgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  100	SrAgaruxa mahApurANam 100
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   vināyakopasṛṣṭasya lakṣaṇāni nibodhata /	vinAyaka upasRzwasya lakzaNAni niboData /
   svapne 'vagāhate 'tyarthaṃ jalaṃ muṇḍāṃśca paśyati // GarP_1,100.1 //	svapne avagAhate atyarTam jalam muNxAn= ca paSyati // GarP_1,100.1 //
   vimanā viphalārambhaḥ saṃsadityanimittataḥ /	vimanAH viPala AramBaH saMsaditi a nimittataH /
   rājā rājyaṃ kumārī ca patiṃ putraṃ ca gurviṇī // GarP_1,100.2 //	rAjA rAjyam kumArI ca patim putram ca gurviNI // GarP_1,100.2 //
   nāpnuyātsnāpanaṃ tasya puṇye 'hnividhipūrvakam /	na ApnuyAt snApanam tasya puNye ahni viDi pUrvakam /
   gaurasarṣapakalkena sājyenotsāritasya tu // GarP_1,100.3 //	gOrasarzapa kalkena sa Ajyena utsAritasya tu // GarP_1,100.3 //
   sarvauṣadhaiḥ sarvagandhairviliptaśirasastathā /	sarva OzaDEH sarva ganDEH vilipta SirasaH taTA /
   bhadrāsanopaviṣṭasya svasti vācyaṃ dvijāñchubhān // GarP_1,100.4 //	BadrAsana upavizwasya svasti vAcyam dvijAn SuBAn // GarP_1,100.4 //
   mṛttikāṃ rocanāṃ gandhān gugguluṃ cāpsu niḥ kṣipet /	mRttikAm rocanAm ganDAn guggulum ca apsu niH kzipet /
   yā āhṛtā ekavarṇaiścaturbhiḥ kalaśairhradāt // GarP_1,100.5 //	yAH AhRtAH eka varNEH caturBiH kalaSEH hradAt // GarP_1,100.5 //
   carmaṇyānuḍuhe rakte sthāpyaṃ bhadrāsane tathā /	carmaNi Anuxuhe rakte sTApyam BadrAsane taTA /
   sahasrākṣaṃ śatadhāramṛṣibhiḥ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,100.6 //	sahasrAkzam Sata DAram RziBiH pAvanam smRtam // GarP_1,100.6 //
   tena tvāmabhiṣiñcāmi pāvamānyaḥ punantu te /	tena tvAm aBiziQcAmi pAvamAnyaH punantu te /
   bhagaṃ tu varuṇo rājā bhagaṃ sūryo bṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_1,100.7 //	Bagam tu varuNaH rAjA Bagam sUryaH bRhaspatiH // GarP_1,100.7 //
   bhagamindraśca vāyuśca bhagaṃ saptarṣayo daduḥ /	Bagam indraH ca vAyuH ca Bagam saptarzayaH daduH /
   yatte keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yacca mūrdhani // GarP_1,100.8 //	yat te keSezu dOrBAgyam sImante yat ca mUrDani // GarP_1,100.8 //
   lalāṭe karṇayorakṣṇorāpastadghnuntu te sadā /	lalAwe karNayoH akzNa urApaH tat Gnuntu te sadA /
   snātasya sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ snuveṇaudumbareṇa tu // GarP_1,100.9 //	snAtasya sArzapam tElam snuveNa OdumbareNa tu // GarP_1,100.9 //
   juhuyānmūrdhani kuśānsavyena parigṛhya ca /	juhuyAt mUrDani kuSAn savyena parigRhya ca /
   mitaścasamitaścaiva tathā śālakaṭaṅkaṭau // GarP_1,100.10 //	mitaH ca samitaH ca eva taTA SAla kawaFkawO // GarP_1,100.10 //
   kuṣmāṇḍo rājaputraśca ante svāhāsamanvitaiḥ /	kuzmANxaH rAja putraH ca ante svAhA samanvitEH /
   dadyāccatuṣpathe bhūmau kuśānāstīrya sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,100.11 //	dadyAt catuzpaTe BUmO kuSAn AstIrya sarvaSas // GarP_1,100.11 //
   kṛtākṛtāṃstaṇḍulāṃśca palalaudanameva ca /	kRta akRtAn= taNxulAn= ca palala odanam eva ca /
   puṣpaṃ citraṃ sugandhaṃ ca surāṃ ca trividhāmapi // GarP_1,100.12 //	puzpam citram suganDam ca surAm ca triviDAm api // GarP_1,100.12 //
   mūlakaṃ pūrikāpūpaṃ tathaivauṇḍerakastrajaḥ /	mUlakam pUrikA pUpam taTA eva oNxera ka stra jaH /
   dadhi pāyasamannaṃ ca guḍapiṣṭaṃ samodakam // GarP_1,100.13 //	daDi pAyasam annam ca guxa pizwam samodakam // GarP_1,100.13 //
   etānsarvānupāhṛtya bhūmau kṛtvā tataḥ śiraḥ /	etAn sarvAn upAhRtya BUmO kRtvA tatas SiraH /
   ambikāmupatiṣṭhecca dadyādarghyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // GarP_1,100.14 //	ambikAm upatizWet ca dadyAt arGyam kRtAQjaliH // GarP_1,100.14 //
   dūrvāsarṣapapuṣpaiśca putrajanmabhirantataḥ /	dUrvA sarzapa puzpEH ca putra janmaBiH antatas /
   kṛtasvastyayanaṃ caiva prārthayedambikāṃ satīm // GarP_1,100.15 //	kRta svastyayanam ca eva prArTayet ambikAm satIm // GarP_1,100.15 //
   rūpaṃ dehi yaśodehi bhagaṃ bhagavati ! dehi me /	rUpam dehi yaSodehi Bagam Bagavati ! dehi me /
   putrāndehi śriyaṃ dehi sarvānkāmāṃśca dehi me // GarP_1,100.16 //	putrAn dehi Sriyam dehi sarvAn kAmAn= ca dehi me // GarP_1,100.16 //
   brāhmaṇān bhojayetpaścācchuklavastrānulepanaiḥ /	brAhmaNAn Bojayet paScAt Sukla vastra anulepanEH /
   vastrayugmaṅgurordadyāsaṃpūjya ca grahāṃstathā /	vastra yugm aFguroH dadyA saMpUjya ca grahAn= taTA /
   śreyaḥ karmaphalaṃ vindyātsūryārcanaratastathā // GarP_1,100.17 //	SreyaH karma Palam vindyAt sUrya arcana rataH taTA // GarP_1,100.17 //
   iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrAgAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkloktagaṇapatikalpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkloktagaNapatikalpanirUpaNam nAma SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  101	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 101
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   śrīkāmaḥ śāntikāmo vā grahadṛṣṭyabhicāravān /	SrI kAmaH SAnti kAmaH vA graha dRzwi aBicAravAn /
   grahayañjñaṃ samaṃ kuryādgahāścaite budhaiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,101.1 //	grahayaQjQam samam kuryAt gahAH ca ete buDEH smRtAH // GarP_1,101.1 //
   sūryaḥ somo maṅgalaśca budhaścaiva bṛhaspatiḥ /	sUryaH somaH maFgalaH ca buDaH ca eva bRhaspatiH /
   śukraḥ śanaiścaro rāhuḥ keturgrahagaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,101.2 //	SukraH SanEScaraH rAhuH ketuH graha gaNAH smRtAH // GarP_1,101.2 //
   tāmrakātsphāṭikādraktacandanātsvarṇakādubhau /	tAmrakAt sPAwikAt raktacandanAt svarNakAt uBO /
   rajatādayasaḥ sīsātkāṃsyādvarṇānnibodhata // GarP_1,101.3 //	rajatAt ayasaH sIsAt kAMsyAt varNAn niboData // GarP_1,101.3 //
   raktaḥ śuklastathā raktaḥ pītaḥ pītaḥ sitositaḥ /	raktaH SuklaH taTA raktaH pItaH pItaH sitositaH /
   kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kramādvarṇā dravyāṇi munayastataḥ // GarP_1,101.4 //	kRzNaH kRzNaH kramAt varNAH dravyANi munayaH tatas // GarP_1,101.4 //
   sthāpayedgahavarṇāni homārthaṃ pralikhetpaṭe /	sTApayet gaha varNAni homa arTam praliKet pawe /
   snāpayeddhomayeccaiva grahadravyairvidhānataḥ /	snApayet homayet ca eva graha dravyEH viDAnataH /
   suvarṇāni pradeyāni vāsāṃsi susumāni ca // GarP_1,101.5 //	suvarNAni pradeyAni vAsAMsi su sumAni ca // GarP_1,101.5 //
   gandhāśca balayaścaiva dhūpo deyaścagugguluḥ /	ganDAH ca balayaH ca eva DUpaH deyaH ca gugguluH /
   kartavyāstatra mantraiśca caravaḥ pratidaivatam // GarP_1,101.6 //	kartavyAH tatra mantrEH ca caravaH pratidEvatam // GarP_1,101.6 //
   ākṛṣṇena imandevā agnirmūrdhādivaḥ kakut /	AkRzNena iman devA agniH mUrDA AdivaH kakud /
   ubdudhyasveti juhuyādebhireva yathākramam // GarP_1,101.7 //	ubduDyasva iti juhuyAt eBiH eva yaTAkramam // GarP_1,101.7 //
   bṛhaspateparidīyeti sarve annātparisutam /	bRhaspateparidIya iti sarve annAt parisutam /
   śannodevī kayānaśca ketuṅkraṇvanniti kramāt // GarP_1,101.8 //	SannodevI kayAnaH ca ketuFkraNvan= iti kramAt // GarP_1,101.8 //
   arkaḥ palāśaḥ khadirastvapāmārgo 'tha pippalaḥ /	arkaH palASaH KadiraH tu apAmArgaH aTa pippalaH /
   audumbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāśca samidhaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,101.9 //	OdumbaraH SamI dUrvA kuSAH ca samiDaH kramAt // GarP_1,101.9 //
   hotavyā madhusarpirbhyāṃ dadhnā caiva samanvitaḥ /	hotavyA maDu sarpirByAm daDnA ca eva samanvitaH /

   dadhyodanaṃ haviḥ pūpānmāṃsaṃ citrānnameva ca /	daDi odanam haviH pUpAn mAMsam citrAnnam eva ca /

   dhenuḥ śaṅkhastathānaḍvānhema vāso hayastathā /	DenuH SaFKaH taTA anaxvAn hema vAsaH hayaH taTA /

   grahāḥ pūjyāḥ sadā yasmādrajyādi prāpyate phalam // GarP_1,101.12 //	grahAH pUjyAH sadA yasmAt rajyA Adi prApyate Palam // GarP_1,101.12 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  102	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 102
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /

   ārdravāsāstu hemante yogābhyāsāddinaṃ nayet /	Ardra vAsAH tu hemante yoga aByAsAt dinam nayet /

   śrāgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  104	SrAgaruxa mahApurANam 104

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  105	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 105

   govadho vrātyatāsteyamṛṇānāṃ ca parikriyā /	go vaDaH vrAtya tA steyam RNAnAm ca parikriyA /

   ucchedya liṅgaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ nairṛtyāmutsṛjoddiśi /	ucCedya liFgam vRzaNam nErRtyAm utsRja uddiSi /
