   cāndrāyaṇaṃ vā trīnmāsanabhyasedvedasaṃhitām /	cAndrAyaNam vA trIn mAsanaByaset veda saMhitAm /
   pañcagavyaṃ pibedgoghno māsamāsīta saṃyataḥ // GarP_1,105.30 //	paQcagavyam pibet go GnaH mAsam AsIta saMyataH // GarP_1,105.30 //
   goṣṭheśayo go 'nugāmī gopradānena śudhyati /	gozWeSayaH gaH anugAmI go pradAnena SuDyati /
   upapātakaśuddhiḥ syāccāndrāyaṇavratena ca // GarP_1,105.31 //	upapAtaka SudDiH syAt cAndrAyaNa vratena ca // GarP_1,105.31 //
   payasā vāpi māsena parākeṇāpi vā punaḥ /	payasA vA api mAsena parAkeNa api vA punar /
   ṛṣabhaikaṃ sahasraṃ gā dadyātkṣattravadhe pumān // GarP_1,105.32 //	RzaBa ekam sahasram gAH dadyAt kzattra vaDe pumAn // GarP_1,105.32 //
   brahmahatyāvrataṃ vāpi vatsaratritayaṃ caret /	brahmahatyA vratam vA api vatsara tritayam caret /
   vaiśyahābdaṃ ca (bdāṃśca) redetaddadyādvaikaśataṃ gavām // GarP_1,105.33	vESya hA abdam ca (bdAn= ca) redetat dadyAt vA eka Satam gavAm // GarP_1,105.33
   ṣaṇmāsācchūdrahā caitaddadyādvā dhenavo daśa /	zaz mAsAt SUdra hA ca etat dadyAt vA DenavaH daSa /
   apraduṣṭāṃ striyaṃ hatvā śūdrahatyāvrataṃ caret // GarP_1,105.34 //	apraduzwAm striyam hatvA SUdra hatyA vratam caret // GarP_1,105.34 //
   mārjāragodhānakulapaśumaṇḍūkaghātanāt /	mArjAra goDA nakula paSu maNxUka GAtanAt /
   pibetkṣīraṃ tryahaṃ pāpī kṛcchraṃ vāpyadhikaṃ caret // GarP_1,105.35 //	pibet kzIram tri aham pApI kRcCram vA api aDikam caret // GarP_1,105.35 //
   gaje nīlānvṛṣānpañca śuke vatsaṃ dvihāyanam /	gaje nIlAn vRzAn paQca Suke vatsam dvi hAyanam /
   kharājameṣeṣu vṛṣo deyaḥ krauñce trihāyaṇaḥ // GarP_1,105.36 //	Kara aja mezezu vRzaH deyaH krOQce tri hAyaNaH // GarP_1,105.36 //
   vṛkṣagulmalatāvīrucchedane japyamṛkśatam /	vRkza gulma latA vIruD Cedane japyam Rc Satam /
   avakīrṇo bhavedgattvā brahmacārī ca yoṣitam // GarP_1,105.37 //	avakIrNaH Bavet gattvA brahmacArI ca yozitam // GarP_1,105.37 //
   gardabhaṃ paśumālabhya nairṛtaṃ ca viśudhyati /	gardaBam paSum AlaBya nErRtam ca viSuDyati /
   madhumāṃsāśane kāryaṃ kṛcchraṃ śeṣavratāni ca // GarP_1,105.38 //	maDu mAMsa aSane kAryam kRcCram Seza vratAni ca // GarP_1,105.38 //
   kṛcchratrayaṃ guruḥ kuryānmriyet prahito yadi /	kRcCra trayam guruH kuryAt mriyet prahitaH yadi /
   pratikūlaṃ guroḥ kṛtvā prasādyaiva viśudhyati // GarP_1,105.39 //	pratikUlam guroH kRtvA prasAdya eva viSuDyati // GarP_1,105.39 //
   ripūndhānyapradānādyaiḥ snehādyairvāpyupakramet /	ripUn DAnya pradAna AdyEH sneha AdyEH vA api upakramet /
   kriyamāṇopakāre ca mṛte vipre na pātakam // GarP_1,105.40 //	kriyamANa upakAre ca mRte vipre na pAtakam // GarP_1,105.40 //
   mahāpāpopapāpābhyāṃ yobhiśasto mṛṣā param /	mahA pApa upapApAByAm yoBiSastaH mRzA param /
   abbhakṣo māsamāsīta sa jāpī niyatandriyaḥ // GarP_1,105.41 //	abBakzaH mAsam AsIta sa jApI niyatandriyaH // GarP_1,105.41 //
   aniyukto bhrātṛbhāryāṃ gacchaṃścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret /	aniyuktaH BrAtR BAryAm gacCan= cAndrAyaNam caret /
   trirātrānte ghṛtaṃ prāśya gatvodakyāṃ śucirbhavet // GarP_1,105.42 //	tri rAtra ante GRtam prASya gatvA udakyAm SuciH Bavet // GarP_1,105.42 //
   goṣṭhe vasanbrahmacārī māsamekaṃ payovratī /	gozWe vasan brahmacArI mAsam ekam payaH vratI /
   gāyattrījapyanirato mucyate 'satpratigrahāt // GarP_1,105.43 //	gAyattrI japya nirataH mucyate asat pratigrahAt // GarP_1,105.43 //
   triḥ kṛcchramācaredvrātyayājako 'pi carannapi /	tris kRcCram Acaret vrAtya yAjakaH api caran= api /
   vedaplāvī yavāśyabdaṃ tyaktvā ca śaraṇāgatān // GarP_1,105.44 //	veda plAvI yavASI abdam tyaktvA ca SaraNa AgatAn // GarP_1,105.44 //
   prāṇāyāmatrayaṃ kuryātkharayānoṣṭrayānagaḥ /	prANAyAma trayam kuryAt Kara yAna uzwra yAna gaH /
   nagnaḥ snātvā ca suptvā ca gatvā caiva divā striyam // GarP_1,105.45 //	nagnaH snAtvA ca suptvA ca gatvA ca eva divA striyam // GarP_1,105.45 //
   guruntvaṃ kṛtya huṅkṛtya vipraṃ nirjitya vāda taḥ /	guruntvam kRtya huFkRtya vipram nirjitya vAda tas /
   prasādya taṃ ca munayastato hyupavaseddinam // GarP_1,105.46 //	prasAdya tam ca munayaH tatas hi upavaset dinam // GarP_1,105.46 //
   vipre daṇḍodyame kṛcchramatikṛcchraṃ nipātane /	vipre daNxa udyame kRcCram atikRcCram nipAtane /
   deśaṃ kālaṃ vayaḥ śaktiṃ pāpaṃ cāvekṣya yatnataḥ // GarP_1,105.47 //	deSam kAlam vayaH Saktim pApam ca avekzya yatnatas // GarP_1,105.47 //
   prāyaścitaṃ prakalpyaṃ syādyatra yoktā tu niṣkṛtiḥ /	prAyaScitam prakalpyam syAt yatra yoktA tu nizkRtiH /
   garbhatyāgo bhartṛnindā strīṇāṃ patanakāraṇam // GarP_1,105.48 //	garBa tyAgaH BartR nindA strINAm patana kAraNam // GarP_1,105.48 //
   eṣa grahāntike doṣaḥ tasmāttāṃ dūtarastyajet /	eza graha antike dozaH tasmAt tAm dUtaraH tyajet /
   vikhyātadoṣaḥ kurvīta guroranumataṃ vratam // GarP_1,105.49 //	viKyAta dozaH kurvIta guroH anumatam vratam // GarP_1,105.49 //
   asaṃvikhyātadoṣastu rahasyaṃ vratamācaret /	asaMviKyAta dozaH tu rahasyam vratam Acaret /
   trirātropoṣaṇo japtvā brahmahā tvaghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,105.50 //	tri rAtra upozaNaH japtvA brahma hA tu aGamarzaNam // GarP_1,105.50 //
   antarjale viśuddhe ca dattvā gāṃ ca payasvinīm /	antar jale viSudDe ca dattvA gAm ca payasvinIm /
   lomabhyaḥ svāheti ṛcā divasaṃ mārutāśanaḥ // GarP_1,105.51 //	lomaByaH svAhA iti RcA divasam mAruta aSanaH // GarP_1,105.51 //
   jale japtvā tu juhuyāccātvāriṃśadghṛtāhutīḥ /	jale japtvA tu juhuyAt cAtvAriMSat GRta AhutIH /
   trirātropoṣaṇo hutvā kūṣmāṇḍībhirghṛtaṃ śuciḥ // GarP_1,105.52 //	tri rAtra upozaNaH hutvA kUzmANxIBiH GRtam SuciH // GarP_1,105.52 //
   surāpaḥ svarṇahārī ca rudrajāpī jale sthitaḥ /	surApaH svarNa hArI ca rudra jApI jale sTitaH /
   sahasraśīrṣājapyena mucyate gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,105.53 //	sahasra SIrzA japyena mucyate guru talpa gaH // GarP_1,105.53 //
   prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kuryātsarvapāpāpanuktye /	prANAyAma Satam kuryAt sarva pApa apanuktye /
   oṅkārābhiyutaṃ somasalilapraśanācchuciḥ // GarP_1,105.54 //	oFkAra aBiyutam soma salila praSanAt SuciH // GarP_1,105.54 //
   kṛtvopavāsaṃ retoviṇmūtrāṇāṃ prāśanedvijaḥ /	kRtvA upavAsam retaH viz mUtrANAm prASanedvijaH /
   ajñānakṛtapāpasya nāśaḥ sandhyātraye kṛte // GarP_1,105.55 //	ajQAna kRta pApasya nASaH sanDyA traye kRte // GarP_1,105.55 //
   rudraikādaśajapyāddhi pāpanāśo bhaveddvijaiḥ /	rudra ekAdaSa japyAt hi pApa nASaH Bavet dvijEH /
   vedābhyāsarataṃ śāntaṃ pañcayajñakriyāparam // GarP_1,105.56 //	veda aByAsa ratam SAntam paQcayajQa kriyA param // GarP_1,105.56 //
   na spṛśanti hā pāpāni cāśu smṛtvā hyapohitaḥ /	na spRSanti hA pApAni ca ASu smRtvA hi apohitaH /
   japtvā sahasragāyattrīṃ śucirbrahmahaṇādṛte // GarP_1,105.57 //	japtvA sahasragAyattrIm SuciH brahma haNAt Rte // GarP_1,105.57 //
   brahmacaryaṃ dayā kṣāntirdhyānaṃ satyamakalkatā /	brahmacaryam dayA kzAntiH DyAnam satyam akalka tA /
   ahiṃsā steyamādhurye damaścaite yamāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,105.58 //	ahiMsA steya mADurye damaH ca ete yamAH smRtAH // GarP_1,105.58 //
   snānamaunopavāsojyāsvādhyāyopasthanigrahaḥ /	snAna mOna upavAsaH jyA svADyAya upasTa nigrahaH /
   tapo 'krodho gurorbhaktiḥ śaucaṃ ca niyamāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,105.59 //	tapaH akroDaH guroH BaktiH SOcam ca niyamAH smRtAH // GarP_1,105.59 //
   pañcagavyaṃ tu gokṣīraṃ dadhimūtraśakṛdghṛtam /	paQcagavyam tu go kzIram daDi mUtra SakRt GRtam /
   jagdhvā parehnyupavasetkṛcchraṃ sāntapanaṃ caret // GarP_1,105.60 //	jagDvA parehni upavaset kRcCram sAntapanam caret // GarP_1,105.60 //
   pṛthak sāntapanairdravyaiḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sopavāsakaḥ /	pRTak sAntapanEH dravyEH zaz ahar sa upavAsakaH /
   saptāhena tu kṛcchro 'yaṃ mahāsāntapanaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,105.61 //	sapta ahena tu kRcCraH ayam mahA sAntapanaH smRtaH // GarP_1,105.61 //
   parṇodumbararājīvabīlvapatrakuśodakaiḥ /	parNa udumbara rAjIva bIlva patra kuSa udakEH /
   pratyekaṃ pratyahābhyastaiḥ parṇa kṛcchra udāhṛtaḥ // GarP_1,105.62 //	pratyekam pratyaha aByastEH parNa kRcCraH udAhRtaH // GarP_1,105.62 //
   taptakṣīraghṛtāmbūnāmekaikaṃ pratyahaṃ pibet /	tapta kzIra GRta ambUnAm ekEkam pratyaham pibet /
   ekarātropavāsaśca taptakṛcchraśca pāvanaḥ // GarP_1,105.63 //	eka rAtra upavAsaH ca taptakRcCraH ca pAvanaH // GarP_1,105.63 //
   ekabhaktena naktena tathaivāyācitena ca /	eka Baktena naktena taTA eva ayAcitena ca /
   upavāsena cakana pādakṛcchra udāhṛtaḥ // GarP_1,105.64 //	upavAsena cakana pAdakRcCraH udAhRtaH // GarP_1,105.64 //
   yathā kathañcittriguṇaḥ prajāpatyo 'yamucyate /	yaTA kaTaQcid triguNaH prajApatyaH ayam ucyate /
   ayamevātikṛcchraḥ syātpāṇipūrṇāmbubhojanāt // GarP_1,105.65 //	ayam eva atikRcCraH syAt pANi pUrNa ambu BojanAt // GarP_1,105.65 //
   kṛcchrātikṛcchraṃ payasā divasānekaviṃśatim /	kRcCrAtikRcCram payasA divasAn ekaviMSatim /
   dvādaśāhopavāsaiśca parākaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // GarP_1,105.66 //	dvAdaSa aha upavAsEH ca parAkaH samudAhRtaH // GarP_1,105.66 //
   piṇyākācāmatakrāmbusaktūnāṃ prativāsaram /	piNyAka AcAma takra ambu saktUnAm prativAsaram /
   ekaikamupavāsaśca kṛcchraḥ saumyo 'yamucyate // GarP_1,105.67 //	ekEkam upavAsaH ca kRcCraH sOmyaH ayam ucyate // GarP_1,105.67 //
   eṣāṃ trirātramabhyāsādekaikaṃ syādyathākramāt /	ezAm tri rAtram aByAsAt ekEkam syAt yaTAkramAt /
   tulāpuruṣa ityeṣa jñeyaḥ pañcadaśāhikaḥ // GarP_1,105.68 //	tulApuruzaH iti eza jQeyaH paQcadaSa AhikaH // GarP_1,105.68 //
   tithipiṇḍāṃścaredvṛddhyā śukle śikhyaṇḍasaṃmitān /	tiTi piNxAn= caret vRdDyA Sukle SiKi aNxa saMmitAn /
   ekaikaṃ hrāsayetkṛṣṇe piṇḍaṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,105.69 //	ekEkam hrAsayet kRzNe piNxam cAndrAyaNam caret // GarP_1,105.69 //
   yathākathañcitpiṇḍānāṃ catvāriṃśacchatadvayam /	yaTA kaTaQcid piNxAnAm catvAriMSat Sata dvayam /
   māsenaivopabhuñjīta cāndrāyaṇamathāparam // GarP_1,105.70 //	mAsena eva upaBuQjIta cAndrAyaNam aTa aparam // GarP_1,105.70 //
   kṛtvā triṣavaṇaṃ snānaṃ piṇḍaṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret /	kRtvA trizavaNam snAnam piNxam cAndrAyaNam caret /
   pavitrāṇi japetpiṇḍān gāyattryā cābhimantrayet // GarP_1,105.71 //	pavitrANi japet piNxAn gAyattryA ca aBimantrayet // GarP_1,105.71 //
   anādiṣṭeṣu pāpeṣu śuddhiścāndrāyaṇena tu /	anAdizwezu pApezu SudDiH cAndrAyaNena tu /
   dharmārtho yaścaredetaccandrasyaiti salokatām // GarP_1,105.72 //	Darma arTaH yaH caret etat candrasya eti salokatAm // GarP_1,105.72 //
   kṛcchrakṛddharmakāmastu mahatīṃ śriyamaśnute // GarP_1,105.73 //	kRcCra kRt Darma kAmaH tu mahatIm Sriyam aSnute // GarP_1,105.73 //
   iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrAgAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktaprāyaścittaviveko nāma pañcottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkyoktaprAyaScittavivekaH nAma paQcottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  106	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 106
   yājñavalkya uvāca /	yAjQavalkyaH uvAca /
   pretā (ta) śaucaṃ pravakṣyāmi tacchṛṇudhvaṃ yatavratāḥ /	pretAH (ta) SOcam pravakzyAmi tat SRNuDvam yata vratAH /
   ūnadvivarṣaṃ nikhanenna kuryādu dakaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,106.1 //	Una dvi varzam niKanet na kuryAt u dakam tatas // GarP_1,106.1 //
   ā śmaśānādanuvrajya itarairjñātibhiryutaḥ /	A SmaSAnAt anuvrajyaH itarEH jQAtiBiH yutaH /
   yamasūktaṃ tathā japyaṃ japadbhirlaukikāgninā // GarP_1,106.2 //	yama sUktam taTA japyam japadBiH lOkika agninA // GarP_1,106.2 //
   sa dagdhavya upetaścaidāhitāgnyāvṛtārthavat /	sa dagDavyaH upetaH ca edAhitAgni AvRta arTavat /
   saptamāddaśamādvāpi jñātayo 'bhyupayāntyapaḥ // GarP_1,106.3 //	saptamAt daSamAt vA api jQAtayaH aByupayAnti apaH // GarP_1,106.3 //
   apanaḥ śośucadaghamanena pitṛdiṅmukhāḥ /	apanaH SoSucat aGam anena pitR diFmuKAH /
   evaṃ mātāmahācāryapatnīnāṃ codakakriyāḥ // GarP_1,106.4 //	evam mAtAmaha AcArya patnInAm ca udaka kriyAH // GarP_1,106.4 //
   kāmodakāḥ putrasakhisvastrīyaśvaśurartvijaḥ /	kAma udakAH putra saKi sva strIyaSvaSura RtvijaH /
   nāmagotreṇa hyudakaṃ sakṛtsiñcanti vāgyatāḥ // GarP_1,106.5 //	nAma gotreNa hi udakam sakRt siQcanti vAgyatAH // GarP_1,106.5 //
   pāṣaṇḍapatitānāṃ tu na kuryurudakakriyāḥ /	pAzaNxa patitAnAm tu na kuryuH udaka kriyAH /
   nabrahmacāriṇo vrātyā yoṣitaḥ kāmagāstathā // GarP_1,106.6 //	na brahmacAriNaH vrAtyAH yozitaH kAmagAH taTA // GarP_1,106.6 //
   surāpyastvātmaghātinyo nāśaucodakabhājanāḥ /	surApyaH tu Atma GAtinyaH na ASOca udaka BAjanAH /
   tato na roditavyaṃ hi tvanityā jīvasaṃ sthitiḥ // GarP_1,106.7 //	tatas na roditavyam hi tu anityA jIvasam sTitiH // GarP_1,106.7 //
   kriyā kāryā yathāśakti tato gacchedgṛhānprati /	kriyA kAryA yaTASakti tatas gacCet gRhAn prati /
   vidaśya nimbapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ // GarP_1,106.8 //	vidaSya nimba patrANi niyatAH dvAri veSmanaH // GarP_1,106.8 //
   ācamyāthāgnimudakaṃ gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān /	Acamya aTa agnim udakam gomayam gOrasarzapAn /
   praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvāśmani padaṃ śanaiḥ // GarP_1,106.9 //	praviSeyuH samAlaBya kRtvA aSmani padam SanEs // GarP_1,106.9 //
   praveśanādikaṃ karma pretasaṃsparśanādapi /	praveSana Adikam karma preta saMsparSanAt api /
   īkṣatāṃ tatkṣaṇācchuddhiḥ pareṣāṃ snānasaṃyamāt // GarP_1,106.10 //	IkzatAm tad kzaNAt SudDiH parezAm snAna saMyamAt // GarP_1,106.10 //
   krītalabdhāśanā bhūmau svapeyuste pṛthakpṛthak /	krIta labDa aSanAH BUmO svapeyuH te pRTak pRTak /
   piṇḍayajñakṛtā deyaṃ pretāyānnaṃ dinatrayam // GarP_1,106.11 //	piNxa yajQa kRtA deyam pretAya annam dina trayam // GarP_1,106.11 //
   jalamekāhamākāśe sthāpyaṃ kṣīraṃ tu mṛnmaye /	jalam eka aham AkASe sTApyam kzIram tu mRd maye /
   vaitānopāsanāḥ kāryāḥ kriyāśca śruticoditāḥ // GarP_1,106.12 //	vEtAna upAsanAH kAryAH kriyAH ca Sruti coditAH // GarP_1,106.12 //
   ādantajanmanaḥ sadyaḥ ācūḍaṃ naiśikī smṛtā /	Adanta janmanaH sadyas AcUxam nESikI smRtA /
   trirātramā vratādeśāddaśarātramataḥ param // GarP_1,106.13 //	tri rAtramAH vrata AdeSAt daSa rAtram atas param // GarP_1,106.13 //
   trirātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā śāvamāśaucamucyate /	tri rAtram daSa rAtram vA SAvam ASOcam ucyate /
   ūnadvivarṣa ubhayoḥ sūtakaṃ mātureva hi // GarP_1,106.14 //	Una dvi varzaH uBayoH sUtakam mAtuH eva hi // GarP_1,106.14 //
   antarā janmamaraṇe śeṣāhobhirviśudhyati /	antarA janma maraNe Seza ahoBiH viSuDyati /
   daśa dvādaśa varṇānāṃ tathā pañcadaśaiva ca // GarP_1,106.15 //	daSa dvAdaSa varNAnAm taTA paQcadaSa eva ca // GarP_1,106.15 //
   triṃśaddināni ca tathā bhavati pretasūtakam /	triMSat dinAni ca taTA Bavati preta sUtakam /
   ahastvadattakanyāsu bāleṣu ca viśodhanam // GarP_1,106.16 //	ahar tu adatta kanyAsu bAlezu ca viSoDanam // GarP_1,106.16 //
   gurvantevāsyanūcānamātulaśrotriyeṣu ca /	guru antevAsi anUcAna mAtula Srotriyezu ca /
   anauraseṣu putreṣu bhāryāsvanyagatāsu ca // GarP_1,106.17 //	anOrasezu putrezu BAryAsu anya gatAsu ca // GarP_1,106.17 //
   nivāsarājani tathā tadahaḥ śuddhikāra(ṇa)m /	nivAsa rAjani taTA tat ahar SudDi kAra(Na)m /
   hatānāṃ nṛpagoviprairanvakṣaṃ cātmaghātinām // GarP_1,106.18 //	hatAnAm nRpa go viprEH anvakzam ca Atma GAtinAm // GarP_1,106.18 //
   viṣādyaiśca hatānāṃ ca nāśaucaṃ pṛthivīpateḥ /	viza AdyEH ca hatAnAm ca na ASOcam pRTivIpateH /
   satrivratibrahmacāridātṛbrahmavidāṃ tathā // GarP_1,106.19 //	sa tri vrati brahmacAri dAtR brahma vidAm taTA // GarP_1,106.19 //
   dāne vivāhe yajñe ca saṃgrāme deśaviplave /	dAne vivAhe yajQe ca saMgrAme deSa viplave /
   āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,106.20 //	Apadi api ca kazwAyAm sadyas SOcam viDIyate // GarP_1,106.20 //
   kālo 'gniḥ karmamṛdvāyurmano jñānaṃ tapo japaḥ (lam) /	kAlaH agniH karma mRd vAyuH manaH jQAnam tapaH japaH (lam) /
   paścāttāṣo nirāhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ śuddhihetavaḥ // GarP_1,106.21 //	paScAttAzaH nirAhAraH sarvezAm SudDi hetavaH // GarP_1,106.21 //
   akāryakāriṇāṃ dānaṃ vego nadyāstu śuddhikṛt /	akArya kAriNAm dAnam vegaH nadyAH tu SudDi kRt /
   kṣāttreṇa karmaṇā jīvedviśāṃ vāpyāpadi dvijaḥ // GarP_1,106.22 //	kzAttreNa karmaNA jIvet viSAm vA api Apadi dvijaH // GarP_1,106.22 //
   phalasomakṣaumavīruddadhi kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ jalam /	Pala soma kzOma vIruD daDi kzIram GRtam jalam /
   tilodanarasakṣāramadhu lākṣā śṛtaṃ haviḥ // GarP_1,106.23 //	tilodana rasa kzAra maDu lAkzA SRtam haviH // GarP_1,106.23 //
   vastropalāsavaṃ puṣpaṃ śākamṛccarmapādukam /	vastra upala Asavam puzpam SAka mRd carma pAdukam /
   eṇatvacaṃ ca kauśeyaṃ lavaṇaṃ māsameva ca // GarP_1,106.24 //	eNa tvacam ca kOSeyam lavaNam mAsam eva ca // GarP_1,106.24 //
   piṇyākamūlagandhāṃśca vaiśyavṛtto na vikrayet /	piNyAka mUla ganDAn= ca vESya vRttaH na vikrayet /
   dharmārthaṃ vikrayaṃ neyāstilā dhānyena tatsamāḥ // GarP_1,106.25 //	Darma arTam vikrayam neyAH tilAH DAnyena tad samAH // GarP_1,106.25 //
   lavaṇādi na vikrīyāttathā cāpadgato dvijaḥ /	lavaNa Adi na vikrIyAt taTA ca Apad gataH dvijaH /
   hīnādvipro vigṛhṇaṃśca lipyate nārkavaddvijaḥ // GarP_1,106.26 //	hInAt vipraH vigRhNan= ca lipyate na arka vat dvijaH // GarP_1,106.26 //
   kuryātkṛṣyādikaṃ tadvadavikreyā hayāstathā /	kuryAt kRzi Adikam tadvat avikreyAH hayAH taTA /
   bubhukṣitastryaṃ sthitvā dṛṣṭvā vṛttivivarjitam /	buBukzitastryam sTitvA dRzwvA vRtti vivarjitam /
   rājā dharmyāṃ prakurvīta vṛttiṃ viprādikasya ca // GarP_1,106.27 //	rAjA DarmyAm prakurvIta vRttim vipra Adikasya ca // GarP_1,106.27 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yājñavalkyoktāśaucāpadvṛttyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma paḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yAjQavalkyoktASOcApadvRttyornirUpaNam nAma paxuttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  107	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 107
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   parāśaro 'bravīdvyāsaṃ dharmaṃ varṇāśramādikam /	parASaraH abravIt vyAsam Darmam varNa ASrama Adikam /
   kalpekalpe kṣayotpattyā kṣīyante nu prajādayaḥ // GarP_1,107.1 //	kalpekalpe kzaya utpattyA kzIyante nu prajA AdayaH // GarP_1,107.1 //
   śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ sadācaro yaḥ kaścidve dakartṛkaḥ /	SrutiH smRtiH sadAcaraH yaH kaScid ve dakartRkaH /
   vedāḥ smṛtā brāhmaṇādau dharmā manvādibhiḥ sadā // GarP_1,107.2 //	vedAH smRtAH brAhmaNa AdO DarmAH manu AdiBiH sadA // GarP_1,107.2 //
   dānaṃ kaliyuge dharmaḥ kartāraṃ ca kalau tyajet /	dAnam kali yuge DarmaH kartAram ca kalO tyajet /
   pāpakṛtyaṃ tu tatraiva śāpaṃ phalati varṣataḥ // GarP_1,107.3 //	pApa kRtyam tu tatra eva SApam Palati varzataH // GarP_1,107.3 //
   ācārātprāpnuyātsarvaṃ ṣaṭ karmāṇi dinedine /	AcArAt prApnuyAt sarvam zax karmANi dinedine /
   sandhyā snānaṃ japo homo devātithyādipūjanam // GarP_1,107.4 //	sanDyA snAnam japaH homaH deva atiTi Adi pUjanam // GarP_1,107.4 //
   apūrvaḥ suvratī vipro hyapūrvā yatayastadā /	apUrvaH suvratI vipraH hi apUrvAH yatayaH tadA /
   kṣattriyaḥ parasainyāni jitvā pṛthvīṃ prapālayet // GarP_1,107.5 //	kzattriyaH para sEnyAni jitvA pRTvIm prapAlayet // GarP_1,107.5 //
   vaṇik kṛṣyādi vaiśye syāddvijabhaktiśca śūdrake /	vaNij kRzi Adi vESye syAt dvija BaktiH ca SUdrake /
   abhakṣyabhakṣaṇāccauryādagamyā gamanātpatet // GarP_1,107.6 //	aBakzya BakzaNAt cOryAt agamyA gamanAt patet // GarP_1,107.6 //
   kṛṣiṃ kurvandvijaḥ śrāntaṃ balīvardaṃ na vāhayet /	kRzim kurvan dvijaH SrAntam balIvardam na vAhayet /
   dinārdhaṃ snānayogādikārī viprāṃśca bhojayet // GarP_1,107.7 //	dina arDam snAna yoga Adi kArI viprAn= ca Bojayet // GarP_1,107.7 //
   nirvapetpañca yajñāni krūre nindāṃ ca kārayet /	nirvapet paQca yajQAni krUre nindAm ca kArayet /
   tilājyaṃ na vikrīṇita sūnāyajñamaghānvitaḥ // GarP_1,107.8 //	tila Ajyam na vikrINita sUnA yajQam aGa anvitaH // GarP_1,107.8 //
   rājño dattvā tu ṣaḍbhāgaṃ devatānāṃ ca viṃśatim /	rAjQaH dattvA tu zaz BAgam devatAnAm ca viMSatim /
   trayastriṃśacca viprāṇāṃ kṛṣikartā na lipyate // GarP_1,107.9 //	trayastriMSat ca viprANAm kRzi kartA na lipyate // GarP_1,107.9 //
   karṣakāḥ kṣattraviṭchūdrāḥ khale 'dattvā tu caurakaḥ /	karzakAH kzattra viS SUdrAH Kale adattvA tu cOrakaH /
   dinatrayeṇa śudhyeta brāhmaṇaḥ pretasūtake // GarP_1,107.10 //	dina trayeNa SuDyeta brAhmaNaH preta sUtake // GarP_1,107.10 //
   kṣattro daśāhādvaiśyāstu dvādaśāhānmāsi śūdrakaḥ /	kzattraH daSa ahAt vESyAH tu dvAdaSa ahAt mAsi SUdrakaH /
   yāti vipro daśāhāttu kṣattro dvādaśakāddināt // GarP_1,107.11 //	yAti vipraH daSa ahAt tu kzattraH dvAdaSakAt dinAt // GarP_1,107.11 //
   pañcadaśāhādvaiśyastu śūdro māsena śudhyati /	paQcadaSa ahAt vESyaH tu SUdraH mAsena SuDyati /
   ekapiṇḍāstu dāyādāḥ pṛthagdvāraniketanāḥ // GarP_1,107.12 //	eka piNxAH tu dAyAdAH pRTak dvAra niketanAH // GarP_1,107.12 //
   janmanā ca vipattau ca bhavetteṣāṃ ca sūtakam /	janmanA ca vipattO ca Bavet tezAm ca sUtakam /
   caturthe daśarātraṃ syātṣaṇṇiśāḥ puṃsi pañcame // GarP_1,107.13 //	caturTe daSa rAtram syAt zaNNiSAH puMsi paQcame // GarP_1,107.13 //
   ṣaṣṭhe catura hācchuddhiḥ saptame ca dinatrayam /	zazWe catura hAt SudDiH saptame ca dina trayam /
   deśāntare mṛte bāle sadyaḥ śuddhiryato mṛte // GarP_1,107.14 //	deSa antare mRte bAle sadyas SudDiH yatas mRte // GarP_1,107.14 //
   ajātadantā ye bālā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /	ajAta dantAH ye bAlAH ye ca garBAt viniH sRtAH /
   na teṣāmagnisaṃskāro na piṇḍaṃ nodakakriyā // GarP_1,107.15 //	na tezAm agni saMskAraH na piNxam na udaka kriyA // GarP_1,107.15 //
   yadi garbho vipadyata stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /	yadi garBaH vipadyata stravate vA api yozitaH /
   yāvanmāsaṃ sthito garbhastāvaddināni sūtakam // GarP_1,107.16 //	yAvat mAsam sTitaH garBaH tAvat dinAni sUtakam // GarP_1,107.16 //
   ānāmakaraṇātsadya ācūḍāntādaharniśam /	AnAma karaNAt sadyas AcUxa antAt aharniSam /
   āvratāttu trirātreṇa tadūrdhvandaśabhirdinaiḥ // GarP_1,107.17 //	AvratAt tu tri rAtreNa tad UrDvandaSaBiH dinEH // GarP_1,107.17 //
   ācaturthādbhavetstravaḥ pātaḥ pañcamaṣaṣṭhayoḥ /	AcaturTAt Bavet stravaH pAtaH paQcama zazWayoH /
   brahmacaryā dagnihotrānnāśuddhiḥ saṅgavarjanāt // GarP_1,107.18 //	brahmacaryA dagnihotra anna aSudDiH saFga varjanAt // GarP_1,107.18 //
   śilpinaḥ kāravo vaidyā dāsīdāsāśca bhṛtyakāḥ /	SilpinaH kAravaH vEdyAH dAsI dAsAH ca BRtyakAH /
   agnimāñchrotriyo rājā sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,107.19 //	agnimAn SrotriyaH rAjA sadyas SOcAH prakIrtitAH // GarP_1,107.19 //
   daśāhācchudhyate mātā snānātsūte pitā śuciḥ /	daSa ahAt SuDyate mAtA snAnAt sUte pitA SuciH /
   saṅgātsūtau sūtakaṃ syādupaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_1,107.20 //	saFgAt sUtO sUtakam syAt upaspRSya pitA SuciH // GarP_1,107.20 //
   vivāhotsavayajñeṣu antarā mṛtasūtake /	vivAha utsava yajQezu antarA mRta sUtake /
   pūrvasaṃkalpitādanyavarjanaṃ ca vidhīyate // GarP_1,107.21 //	pUrva saMkalpitAt anya varjanam ca viDIyate // GarP_1,107.21 //
   mṛtena śudhyate sūtiḥ mṛtavajjātakaṃ janau /	mRtena SuDyate sUtiH mRta vat jAtakam janO /
   gograhādau vipannānāmekarātraṃ tu sūtakam // GarP_1,107.22 //	gograha AdO vipannAnAm eka rAtram tu sUtakam // GarP_1,107.22 //
   anāthapretavahanātprāṇāyāmena śudhyati /	anATa preta vahanAt prANAyAmena SuDyati /
   pretaśūdrasya vahanāntrirātramaśucirbhavet // GarP_1,107.23 //	preta SUdrasya vahana antri rAtram aSuciH Bavet // GarP_1,107.23 //
   ātmaghātiviṣodvandhakṛmidaṣṭe na saṃskṛtiḥ /	Atma GAti viza udu anDa kRmi dazwe na saMskRtiH /
   gohataṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā kṛcchreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,107.24 //	go hatam kRmi dazwam ca spRzwvA kRcCreNa SuDyati // GarP_1,107.24 //
   aduṣṭāpatitaṃ bhāryā yauvane yā parityajet /	aduzwa apatitam BAryA yOvane yA parityajet /
   saptajanma bhavetstrītvaṃ vaidhavyaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,107.25 //	sapta janma Bavet strI tvam vEDavyam ca punar punar // GarP_1,107.25 //
   bālahatyā tvagamanādṛtau ca strī tu sūkari /	bAla hatyA tu agamanAt RtO ca strI tu sUkari /
   agamyā vratakāriṇyo bhraṣṭapānodakakriyāḥ // GarP_1,107.26 //	agamyAH vrata kAriNyaH Brazwa pAna udaka kriyAH // GarP_1,107.26 //
   aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ pitṛjau piṇḍadau pituḥ /	OrasaH kzetrajaH putraH pitR jO piNxadO pituH /
   parivittestu kṛcchraṃ syātkanyāyāḥ kṛcchrameva ca // GarP_1,107.27 //	parivitteH tu kRcCram syAt kanyAyAH kRcCram eva ca // GarP_1,107.27 //
   atikṛcchraṃ careddātā hotā cāndrāyaṇañcaret /	atikRcCram caret dAtA hotA cAndrAyaNaQcaret /
   kubjavāmanaṣaṇḍeṣu gadgadeṣu jaḍeṣu ca // GarP_1,107.28 //	kubja vAmana zaNxezu gadgadezu jaxezu ca // GarP_1,107.28 //
   jātyandhabadhire mūke na doṣaḥ parivedane /	jAti anDa baDire mUke na dozaH parivedane /
   naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe vā patite patau // GarP_1,107.29 //	nazwe mRte pravrajite klIbe vA patite patO // GarP_1,107.29 //
   pañcasvāpatsu nārīṇāṃ patiranyo vidhīyate /	paQcasu Apatsu nArINAm patiH anyaH viDIyate /
   bhartrā sahamṛtā nārī romābdāni vaseddivi // GarP_1,107.30 //	BartrA sahamRtA nArI roma abdAni vaset divi // GarP_1,107.30 //
   śvādidaṣṭastu gāyattryā japācchuddho bhavennaraḥ /	Sva Adi dazwaH tu gAyattryAH japAt SudDaH Bavet naraH /
   dāhyo lokāgninā vipraścāṇḍālādyairhato 'gnimān // GarP_1,107.31 //	dAhyaH loka agninA vipraH cANxAla AdyEH hataH agnimAn // GarP_1,107.31 //
   kṣīraiḥ prakṣālya tasyāsthi svāgninā mantrato dahet /	kzIrEH prakzAlya tasya asTi sva agninA mantrataH dahet /
   pravāse tu mṛte bhūyaḥ kṛtvā kuśamayaṃ dahet // GarP_1,107.32 //	pravAse tu mRte BUyas kRtvA kuSa mayam dahet // GarP_1,107.32 //
   kṛṣṇājine samāstīrya ṣaṭ śatāni palāśajān /	kRzNAjine samAstIrya zax SatAni palASa jAn /
   śamīṃ śiśre viniḥ kṣipya araṇiṃ vṛṣaṇe kṣipet // GarP_1,107.33 //	SamIm SiSre viniH kzipya araNim vRzaNe kzipet // GarP_1,107.33 //
   kaṇḍaṃ dakṣiṇahaste tu vāmahaste tathopabhṛt /	kaNxam dakziNa haste tu vAma haste taTA upaBRt /
   pārśve tūlūkhalaṃ dadyātpṛṣṭhe tu musalaṃ dadet // GarP_1,107.34 //	pArSve tu ulUKalam dadyAt pRzWe tu musalam dadet // GarP_1,107.34 //
   ure niḥ kṣipya dṛṣadaṃ taṇḍulājyatilānmukhe /	ure niH kzipya dRzadam taNxula Ajya tilAn muKe /
   śrotra ca prokṣaṇīṃ dādyadājyasthālīṃ ca cakṣuṣoḥ // GarP_1,107.35 //	Srotra ca prokzaNIm dAdyat Ajya sTAlIm ca cakzuzoH // GarP_1,107.35 //
   karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇyaśakalān kṣipet /	karNe netre muKe GrANe hiraNya SakalAn kzipet /
   agnihotropakaraṇādbrahmalokagatirbhavet // GarP_1,107.36 //	agnihotra upakaraNAt brahma loka gatiH Bavet // GarP_1,107.36 //
   asau svargāya lokāya svāhetyājyāhutiḥ sakṛt /	asO svargAya lokAya svAhA iti Ajya AhutiH sakRt /
   haṃsasārasakrauñcānāṃ cakravākaṃ ca kukruṭam // GarP_1,107.37 //	haMsa sArasa krOQcAnAm cakravAkam ca kukruwam // GarP_1,107.37 //
   mayarameṣaghātī ca ahorātreṇa śudhyati /	maya rameza GAtI ca ahorAtreNa SuDyati /
   pakṣiṇaḥ sakalānhatvā ahorātreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,107.38 //	pakziNaH sakalAn hatvA ahorAtreNa SuDyati // GarP_1,107.38 //
   sarvāṃścatuṣpadānhatvā ahorātro ṣito japet /	sarvAn= catuzpadAn hatvA ahorAtraH zitaH japet /
   śūdraṃ hatvā caretkṛcchramatikṛcchraṃ tu vaiśyahā /	SUdram hatvA caret kRcCram atikRcCram tu vESya hA /
   kṣattraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ vipraṃ dvāviṃśātriṃśamāhare (vahe) t // GarP_1,107.39	kzattram cAndrAyaNam vipram dvAr viMSA triMSam Ahare (vahe) t // GarP_1,107.39
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSAkye AcAra kANxe
   parāśaroktadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	parASaroktaDarmanirUpaNam nAma saptottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  108	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 108
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   nītisāraṃ pravakṣyāmi arthaśāstrādisaṃśritam /	nIti sAram pravakzyAmi arTa SAstra Adi saMSritam /
   rājādibhyo hitaṃ puṇyamāyuḥ svargādidāyakam // GarP_1,108.1 //	rAja AdiByaH hitam puNyam AyuH svarga Adi dAyakam // GarP_1,108.1 //
   sadbhiḥ saṅgaṃ prakurvīta siddhikāmaḥ sadā naraḥ /	sadBiH saFgam prakurvIta sidDi kAmaH sadA naraH /
   nāsadbhirihalokāya paralokāya vā hitam // GarP_1,108.2 //	na asadBiH iha lokAya para lokAya vA hitam // GarP_1,108.2 //
   varjayetkṣudrasaṃvādamaduṣṭasya tu darśanam /	varjayet kzudra saMvAdam aduzwasya tu darSanam /
   virodhaṃ saha mitreṇa saṃprītiṃ śatrusevinā // GarP_1,108.3 //	viroDam saha mitreNa saMprItim Satru sevinA // GarP_1,108.3 //
   mūrkhaśiṣyopadeśena duṣṭastrībharaṇena ca /	mUrKa Sizya upadeSena duzwa strI BaraNena ca /
   duṣṭānāṃ saṃprayogeṇa paṇḍito 'pyavasīdati // GarP_1,108.4 //	duzwAnAm saMprayogeNa paNxitaH api avasIdati // GarP_1,108.4 //
   brāhmaṇaṃ bāliśaṃ kṣattramayoddhāraṃ viśaṃ jaḍam /	brAhmaNam bAliSam kzattramayodDAram viSam jaxam /
   śūdramakṣarasaṃyuktaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayet // GarP_1,108.5 //	SUdram akzara saMyuktam dUratas parivarjayet // GarP_1,108.5 //
   kālena ripuṇāsandhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ /	kAlena ripuNA sanDiH kAle mitreNa vigrahaH /
   kāryakāraṇamāśritya kālaṃ kṣipati paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,108.6 //	kArya kAraNam ASritya kAlam kzipati paNxitaH // GarP_1,108.6 //
   kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /	kAlaH pacati BUtAni kAlaH saMharate prajAH /
   kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // GarP_1,108.7 //	kAlaH suptezu jAgarti kAlaH hi duratikramaH // GarP_1,108.7 //
   kāleṣu harate vīryaṃ kāle garbhe ca vartate /	kAlezu harate vIryam kAle garBe ca vartate /
   kālo janayate sṛṣṭiṃ punaḥ kālo 'pi saṃharet // GarP_1,108.8 //	kAlaH janayate sRzwim punar kAlaH api saMharet // GarP_1,108.8 //
   kālaḥ sūkṣmagatirnityaṃ dvividhaśceha bhāvyate /	kAlaH sUkzma gatiH nityam dviviDaH ca iha BAvyate /
   sthūlasaṃgrahacāreṇa sūkṣmacārāntareṇa ca // GarP_1,108.9 //	sTUla saMgraha cAreNa sUkzma cAra antareNa ca // GarP_1,108.9 //
   nītisāraṃ surendrāya imamūca bṛhaspatiḥ /	nIti sAram sura indrAya imam Uca bRhaspatiH /
   sarvajño yena cendro 'bhūddaityānhatvāpnuyāddivam // GarP_1,108.10 //	sarvajQaH yena ca indraH aBUt dEtyAn hatvA ApnuyAt divam // GarP_1,108.10 //
   rājarṣibrāhmaṇaiḥ kāryaṃ devaviprādipūjanam /	rAjarzi brAhmaNEH kAryam deva vipra Adi pUjanam /
   aśvamedhena yaṣṭabyaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam // GarP_1,108.11 //	aSvameDena yazwabyam mahApAtaka nASanam // GarP_1,108.11 //
   uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha satkathām /	uttamEH saha sa aFgatyam paNxitEH saha sat kaTAm /
   alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati // GarP_1,108.12 //	alubDEH saha mitra tvam kurvANaH na avasIdati // GarP_1,108.12 //
   parīvādaṃ parārthaṃ ca parihāsaṃ parastriyam /	parIvAdam para arTam ca parihAsam para striyam /
   paraveśmani vāsaṃ ca na kurvīta kadācana // GarP_1,108.13 //	para veSmani vAsam ca na kurvIta kadAcana // GarP_1,108.13 //
   paro 'pi hitavābandhurbandhurapyahitaḥ paraḥ /	paraH api hitavAbanDuH banDuH api ahitaH paraH /
   ahito dehajo vyādhirhitamāraṇyamauṣadham // GarP_1,108.14 //	ahitaH deha jaH vyADiH hitam AraNyam OzaDam // GarP_1,108.14 //
   sa bandhuryo hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yastu poṣakaḥ /	sa banDuH yaH hite yuktaH sa pitA yaH tu pozakaH /
   tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate // GarP_1,108.15 //	tat mitram yatra viSvAsaH sa deSaH yatra jIvyate // GarP_1,108.15 //
   sa bhṛtyo yo vidheyastu tadbījaṃ yatprarohati /	sa BRtyaH yaH viDeyaH tu tat bIjam yat prarohati /
   sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sa putro yastu jīvati // GarP_1,108.16 //	sA BAryA yA priyam brUte sa putraH yaH tu jIvati // GarP_1,108.16 //
   sa jīvati guṇā yasya dharmo yasya sa jīvati /	sa jIvati guNAH yasya DarmaH yasya sa jIvati /
   guṇadharmavihīno yo niṣphala tasya jīvanam // GarP_1,108.17 //	guNa Darma vihInaH yaH nizPala tasya jIvanam // GarP_1,108.17 //
   sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā /	sA BAryA yA gRhe dakzA sA BAryAyAH priyaMvadA /
   sā bhāryā yā patiprāṇā sā bhāryā yā pativratā // GarP_1,108.18 //	sA BAryA yA pati prANA sA BAryA yA pativratA // GarP_1,108.18 //
   nitya snātā sugandhā ca nityaṃ ca priyavādinī /	nitya snAtA suganDA ca nityam ca priya vAdinI /
   alpabhuktālpabhāṣī ca satataṃ maṅgalairyutā // GarP_1,108.19 //	alpa Bukta alpa BAzI ca satatam maFgalEH yutA // GarP_1,108.19 //
   satataṃ dharmabahulā satataṃ ca patipriyā /	satatam Darma bahulA satatam ca pati priyA /
   satataṃ priyavakrī ca satataṃ tvṛtukāminī // GarP_1,108.20 //	satatam priya vakrI ca satatam tu Rtu kAminI // GarP_1,108.20 //
   etadādikriyāyuktā sarvasau bhāgyavardhinī /	etad Adi kriyA yuktA sarvasO BAgya varDinI /
   yasyedṛśī bhavedbhāyyā sa devendrona mānuṣaḥ // GarP_1,108.21 //	yasya IdRSI Bavet BAyyA sa deva indraH na mAnuzaH // GarP_1,108.21 //
   yasya bhāryā virūpākṣī kaśmalā kalahapriyā /	yasya BAryA virUpAkzI kaSmalA kalaha priyA /
   uttarottaravādā syā sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.22 //	uttarottara vAdA syA sA jarA na jarA jarA // GarP_1,108.22 //
   yasya bhāryā śritānyañca paraveśmābhikāṅkṣiṇī /	yasya BAryA SritAni aQca para veSma aBikAFkziNI /
   kukriyā tyaktalajjā ca sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.23 //	kukriyA tyakta lajjA ca sA jarA na jarA jarA // GarP_1,108.23 //
   yasya bhāryā guṇajñā ca bhartāramanugāminī /	yasya BAryA guNa jQA ca BartAram anugAminI /
   alpālpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā // GarP_1,108.24 //	alpa alpena tu santuzwA sA priyA na priyA priyA // GarP_1,108.24 //
   duṣṭā bhāryā śaṭhaṃ mitraṃ bhṛtyaścottaradāyakaḥ /	duzwA BAryA SaWam mitram BRtyaH ca uttara dAyakaH /
   sasarpe ca gṛhe vāsomṛtyureva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,108.25 //	sa sarpe ca gRhe vAsaH mRtyuH eva na saMSayaH // GarP_1,108.25 //
   tyaja durjanasaṃsargaṃ bhaja sādhusamāgamam /	tyaja durjana saMsargam Baja sADu samAgamam /
   kuru puṇyamahorātra smara nityamanityatām // GarP_1,108.26 //	kuru puNyam ahorAtra smara nityam anitya tAm // GarP_1,108.26 //
   vyālīkaṇṭhapradeśāhyapi ca phaṇabhṛdbhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā	vyAlI kaNWa pradeSa ahi api ca PaNaBRt BAzaNA yA ca rOdrI yA kRzNA
   vyākulāgī rudhiranayanasaṃvyākulā vyāghrakalpā /	vyAkulAgI ruDira nayana saMvyAkulA vyAGra kalpAH /
   krodhe yaivogravaktrā sphuradanalaśikhā kākajihvā karālā sevyā na strī	kroDe yA eva ugra vaktrA sPurat analaSiKA kAkajihvA karAlA sevyA na strI
   vidagdhā parapuragamanā bhrāntacittā virākta // GarP_1,108.27 //	vidagDA para pura gamanAH BrAnta cittA virAkta // GarP_1,108.27 //
   saktiḥ sutoke sukṛtaṃ kṛtaghne śatiṃ ca vahnau (sītāpahau	saktiH su toke sukRtam kRtaGne Satim ca vahnO (sItA apahO
   hyatapayaiva)?haime /	hi atapayA eva)?hEme /
   utpadyate daivavaśātkadācidveśyāsu rāgo na bhavetkadācit // GarP_1,108.28	utpadyate dEva vaSAt kadAcid veSyAsu rAgaH na Bavet kadAcid // GarP_1,108.28
   bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭidṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsāvinivartite ca /	BujaFgame veSmani dRzwi dRzwe vyADO cikitsA vinivartite ca /
   dehe ca bālyādivayo 'nvite ca kālā vṛto 'sau labhate dhṛtiṃ kaḥ //	dehe ca bAlya Adi vayaH anvite ca kAlAH vRtaH asO laBate DRtim kaH //
   GarP_1,108.29 //	GarP_1,108.29 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	bRhaspatiproktanItisAranirUpaNam nAma azwottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  109	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 109
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣeddārānrakṣeddhanairapi /	Apad arTe Danam rakzet dArAn rakzet DanEH api /
   ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣeddārairapi dhanairapi // GarP_1,109.1 //	AtmAnam satatam rakzet dArEH api DanEH api // GarP_1,109.1 //
   tyajedakaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet /	tyajedakam kulasya arTe grAmasya arTe kulam tyajet /
   grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.2 //	grAmam janapadasya arTe Atma arTe pRTivIm tyajet // GarP_1,109.2 //
   varaṃ hi narake vāso na tu duścarite gṛhe /	varam hi narake vAsaH na tu duScarite gRhe /
   narakātkṣīyate pāpa kugṛhānna nivartate // GarP_1,109.3 //	narakAt kzIyate pApa ku gRhAt na nivartate // GarP_1,109.3 //
   calatyekena pādena tiṣṭhatyekena buddhimān /	calati ekena pAdena tizWati ekena budDimAn /
   na parīkṣya paraṃ sthānaṃ pūrvamāyatanaṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.4 //	na parIkzya param sTAnam pUrvam Ayatanam tyajet // GarP_1,109.4 //
   tyajeddeśamasadvṛttaṃ vāsaṃ sopadravaṃ tyajet /	tyajet deSam asat vRttam vAsam sa upadravam tyajet /
   tyajetkṛpaṇarājānaṃ mitraṃ māyāmayaṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.5 //	tyajet kRpaNa rAjAnam mitram mAyA mayam tyajet // GarP_1,109.5 //
   arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena kena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhāgrahasaṃkulena /	arTena kim kRpaNa hasta gatena kena jQAnena kim bahu SaWa Agraha saMkulena /
   rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena //	rUpeNa kim guNa parAkrama varjitena mitreNa kim vyasana kAla parAFmuKena //
   GarP_1,109.6 //	GarP_1,109.6 //
   adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ /	adRzwa pUrvAH bahavaH sahAyAH sarve pada sTasya Bavanti mitrAH /
   arthairvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavatyakāle svajano 'pi śatruḥ //	arTEH vihInasya pada cyutasya Bavati akAle sva janaH api SatruH //
   GarP_1,109.7 //	GarP_1,109.7 //
   āpatsu mitraṃ jānī yādraṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim /	Apatsu mitram jAnI yAdraNe SUram rahaH Sucim /
   māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim // GarP_1,109.8 //	mAryA ca viBave kzINe durBikze ca priya atiTim // GarP_1,109.8 //
   vṛkṣaṃ kṣīṇaphalaṃ tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkaṃ saraḥ sārasānirdravyaṃ puruṣaṃ	vRkzam kzINa Palam tyajanti vihagAH Suzkam saraH sArasAniH dravyam puruzam
   tyajanti gaṇikā bhraṣṭaṃ nṛpaṃ mantriṇaḥ /	tyajanti gaNikAH Brazwam nRpam mantriNaH /
   puṣpaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ dargdha vanāntaṃ mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ	puzpam paryuzitam tyajanti maDupAH dargDa vana antam mRgAH sarvaH
   kāryavaśājjano hi ramate kasyāsti ko vallabhaḥ // GarP_1,109.9 //	kArya vaSAt janaH hi ramate kasya asti kaH vallaBaH // GarP_1,109.9 //
   lubdhamarthapradānena ślādhyamañjalikarmaṇā /	lubDam arTa pradAnena SlADyam aQjali karmaNA /
   mūrkhaṃ chandānuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam // GarP_1,109.10 //	mUrKam Canda anuvRttyA ca yATAtaTyena paNxitam // GarP_1,109.10 //
   sadbhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ satpuruṣā dvijāḥ /	sadBAvena hi tuzyanti devAH sat puruzAH dvijAH /
   itareḥ khādyapānena mānadānena paṇḍitāḥ // GarP_1,109.11 //	itareH KAdya pAnena mAna dAnena paNxitAH // GarP_1,109.11 //
   uttamaṃ praṇipātena śaṭhaṃ bhedena yojayet /	uttamam praNipAtena SaWam Bedena yojayet /
   nīcaṃ svalpapradānena samaṃ tulyaparākramaiḥ // GarP_1,109.12 //	nIcam su alpa pradAnena samam tulya parAkramEH // GarP_1,109.12 //
   yasyayasya hi yo bhāvastasyatasya hitaṃ vadan /	yasyayasya hi yaH BAvaH tasyatasya hitam vadan /
   anupraviśya medhāvī kṣipramātmavaśaṃ nayet // GarP_1,109.13 //	anupraviSya meDAvI kzipram Atma vaSam nayet // GarP_1,109.13 //
   nadīnāṃ ca nakhīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām /	nadInAm ca naKInAm ca SRFgiNAm Sastra pANinAm /
   viśvāso naiva gantavyaḥ striṣu rājakuleṣu ca // GarP_1,109.14 //	viSvAsaH na eva gantavyaH strizu rAja kulezu ca // GarP_1,109.14 //
   arthanāśaṃ manastāpaṃ gṛhe duścaritāni ca /	arTa nASam manaH tApam gRhe duScaritAni ca /
   vañcanaṃ cāpa mānaṃ ca matimānna prikāśayet // GarP_1,109.15 //	vaQcanam ca apa mAnam ca matimAn na prikASayet // GarP_1,109.15 //
   hīnadurjanasaṃsarga atyantavirahādaraḥ /	hIna durjana saMsarga atyanta viraha AdaraH /
   sneho 'nyagehavāsaśca nārīsacchīlanāśanam // GarP_1,109.16 //	snehaH anya geha vAsaH ca nArI sat SIla nASanam // GarP_1,109.16 //
   kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko pīḍitaḥ /	kasya dozaH kule na asti vyADinA kaH pIxitaH /
   kena na vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ // GarP_1,109.17 //	kena na vyasanam prAptam SriyaH kasya nirantarAH // GarP_1,109.17 //
   kor'thaṃ prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpadonāgatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na	kor aTam prApya na garvitaH Buvi naraH kasya apada Una AgatAH strIBiH kasya na
   khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ /	KaNxitam Buvi manaH kaH nAma rAjQAm priyaH /
   kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ kor'tho gato gauravaṃ ko vā	kaH kAlasya na gocara antara gataH kor aTo gataH gOravam kaH vA
   durjanavāgurānipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān // GarP_1,109.18 //	durjana vAgurA nipatitaH kzemeNa yAtaH pumAn // GarP_1,109.18 //
   suhṛtsvajanabandhurna buddhiryasya na cātmani /	suhRd sva jana banDuH na budDiH yasya na ca Atmani /
   yasminkarmaṇi siddhe 'pi na dṛśyeta phalodayaḥ /	yasmin karmaNi sidDe api na dRSyeta Pala udayaH /
   vipattau ca mahadduḥkhaṃ tadvudhaḥ kathamācaret // GarP_1,109.19 //	vipattO ca mahat duHKam tat vuDaH kaTam Acaret // GarP_1,109.19 //
   yasmindeśe na saṃmānaṃ na prītirna ca bāndhavāḥ /	yasmin deSe na saMmAnam na prItiH na ca bAnDavAH /
   na ca vidyāgamaḥ kaścittaṃ deśaṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,109.20 //	na ca vidyA AgamaH kaScid tam deSam parivarjayet // GarP_1,109.20 //
   dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ /	Danasya yasya rAjataH Bayam na ca asti cOrataH /
   mṛtaṃ ca yanna mucyate samarjayasva taddhanam // GarP_1,109.21 //	mRtam ca yat na mucyate samarjayasva tad Danam // GarP_1,109.21 //
   yadarjitaṃ prāṇaharaiḥ pariśramairmṛtasya taṃ vai vibhajantirikthinaḥ /	yat arjitam prANa harEH pariSramEH mRtasya tam vE viBajanti rikTinaH /
   kṛtaṃ ca yadduṣkṛtamarthalipsayā tadeva doṣopahatasya yautukam //	kRtam ca yat duzkRtam arTa lipsayA tat eva doza upahatasya yOtukam //
   GarP_1,109.22 //	GarP_1,109.22 //
   sañcitaṃ nihitaṃ dravyaṃ parāmṛśyaṃ muhurmuhuḥ /	saQcitam nihitam dravyam parAmRSyam muhur muhur /
   ākhoriva kadaryasya dhanaṃ duḥ khāya kevalam // GarP_1,109.23 //	AKoH iva kadaryasya Danam duH KAya kevalam // GarP_1,109.23 //
   nagnā vyasanino rūkṣāḥ kapālāṅkitapāṇayaḥ /	nagnAH vyasaninaH rUkzAH kapAla aFkita pANayaH /
   darśayantīha lokasya adātuḥ phalamīdṛśam // GarP_1,109.24 //	darSayanti iha lokasya adAtuH Palam IdRSam // GarP_1,109.24 //
   śikṣayanti ca yācante dehīti kṛpaṇā janāḥ /	Sikzayanti ca yAcante dehi iti kRpaNAH janAH /
   avastheyamadānasya mā bhūdevaṃ bhavānapi // GarP_1,109.25 //	avasTeyam adAnasya mA BUt evam BavAn api // GarP_1,109.25 //
   sañcitaṃ kratuśatairna yujyate yācitaṃ guṇavate na dīyate /	saQcitam kratu SatEH na yujyate yAcitam guNavate na dIyate /
   tatkadaryaparirakṣitaṃ dhanaṃ corapārthivagṛhe prayujyate // GarP_1,109.26	tad kadarya parirakzitam Danam cora pArTiva gRhe prayujyate // GarP_1,109.26
   na devebhyo na viprobhyo bandhubhyo naiva cātmane /	na deveByaH na viproByaH banDuByaH na eva ca Atmane /
   kadaryasya dhanaṃ yāti tvagnitaskararājasu // GarP_1,109.27 //	kadaryasya Danam yAti tu agni taskara rAjasu // GarP_1,109.27 //
   atikleśena ye 'pyarthā dharmasyātikrameṇa ca /	ati kleSena ye api arTAH Darmasya atikrameNa ca /
   arervā praṇipātena mā bhūtaste kadācana // GarP_1,109.28 //	areH vA praNipAtena mA BUtaH te kadAcana // GarP_1,109.28 //
   vidyāghāto hyanabhyāsaḥ strīṇāṃ ghātaḥ kucailatā /	vidyA GAtaH hi anaByAsaH strINAm GAtaH ku cEla tA /
   vyādhīnāṃ bhojanaṃ jīrṇaṃ śatrorghātaḥ prapañcatā // GarP_1,109.29 //	vyADInAm Bojanam jIrNam SatroH GAtaH prapaQca tA // GarP_1,109.29 //
   taskarasya vadho daṇḍaḥ kumitrasyālpabhāṣaṇam /	taskarasya vaDaH daNxaH kumitrasya alpa BAzaNam /
   pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇāṃ brāhmaṇasyānimantraṇam // GarP_1,109.30 //	pRTak SayyA tu nArINAm brAhmaNasya animantraNam // GarP_1,109.30 //
   durjanāḥ śilpino dāsā duṣṭāśca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ /	durjanAH SilpinaH dAsAH duzwAH ca pawahAH striyaH /
   tāḍitā mārdavaṃ yānti na te satkārabhājanam // GarP_1,109.31 //	tAxitAH mArdavam yAnti na te satkAra BAjanam // GarP_1,109.31 //
   jānīyātpreṣaṇe bhṛtyānbāndhavānvyasanāgame /	jAnIyAt prezaNe BRtyAn bAnDavAn vyasana Agame /
   mitramāpadi kāle ca bhāryāñca vibhavakṣaye // GarP_1,109.32 //	mitram Apadi kAle ca BAryAn ca viBava kzaye // GarP_1,109.32 //
   strīṇāṃ dviguṇa āhāraḥ prajñā caiva caturguṇā /	strINAm dviguNaH AhAraH prajQA ca eva caturguNAH /
   ṣaḍguṇo vyavasāyaśca kāmaścāṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,109.33 //	zaxguNaH vyavasAyaH ca kAmaH ca azwaguNaH smRtaH // GarP_1,109.33 //
   na svapnena jayennidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet /	na svapnena jayet nidrAm na kAmena striyam jayet /
   na cendhanairjayedvahniṃ na madyena tṛṣāṃ jayet // GarP_1,109.34 //	na ca inDanEH jayet vahnim na madyena tRzAm jayet // GarP_1,109.34 //
   samāṃsairbhojanaiḥ snigdhairmadyairgandhavilepanaiḥ /	sa mAMsEH BojanEH snigDEH madyEH ganDa vilepanEH /
   vastrairmanoramairmālyaiḥ kāmaḥ strīṣu vijṛmbhate // GarP_1,109.35 //	vastrEH manoramEH mAlyEH kAmaH strIzu vijRmBate // GarP_1,109.35 //
   brahmacarye 'pi vaktavyaṃ prāptaṃ manmathaceṣṭitam /	brahmacarye api vaktavyam prAptam manmaTa cezwitam /
   hṛdyaṃ hi puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // GarP_1,109.36 //	hRdyam hi puruzam dRzwvA yoniH praklidyate striyAH // GarP_1,109.36 //
   suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam /	su vezam puruzam dRzwvA BrAtaram yadi vA sutam /
   yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ hi śaunaka ! // GarP_1,109.37 //	yoniH klidyati nArINAm satyaMsatyam hi SOnakaH ! // GarP_1,109.37 //
   nadyaśca nāryaśca samasvabhāvāḥ svatantrabhāve gamanādikeca /	nadyaH ca nAryaH ca sama svaBAvAH svatantra BAve gamana Adikeca /
   toyaiśca doṣaiśca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ //	toyEH ca dozEH ca nipAtayanti nadyaH hi kUlAni kulAH ni nAryaH //
   GarP_1,109.38 //	GarP_1,109.38 //
   nadī pātayate kūlaṃ nārī pātayate kulam /	nadI pAtayate kUlam nArI pAtayate kulam /
   nārīṇāñca nadīnāṃ ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ // GarP_1,109.39 //	nArINAn ca nadInAm ca svacCandA lalitA gatiH // GarP_1,109.39 //

   ye bālabhāvānna paṭhanti vidyāṃ ye yauvanasthā hyadhanātmadārāḥ /	ye bAla BAvAt na paWanti vidyAm ye yOvana sTAH hi aDana Atma dArAH /

   mā pāpaṃ saṃkurudhvaṃ dvijahariparamāḥ saṃbhajadhvaṃ sadaiva āyurniḥ	mA pApam saMkuruDvam dvija hari paramAH saMBajaDvam sadA eva AyuH niH
   śeṣameti skhalati jalaghaṭībhūtamṛtyucchalena // GarP_1,111.11 //	Sezam eti sKalati jala GawI BUta mRtyu= Calena // GarP_1,111.11 //
   mātṛvatparadāreṣu paradravyeṣu loṣṭavat /	mAtR vat para dArezu para dravyezu lozwa vat /
   ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.12 //	Atma vat sarva BUtezu yaH paSyati sa paNxitaH // GarP_1,111.12 //
   etadarthaṃ hi viprendrā rājyamicchanti bhūbhṛtaḥ /	etad arTam hi vipra indrAH rAjyam icCanti BUBRtaH /
   yadeṣāṃ sarvakāryeṣu vaco na pratihanyate // GarP_1,111.13 //	yat ezAm sarva kAryezu vacaH na pratihanyate // GarP_1,111.13 //
   etadarthaṃ hi kurvanti rājāno dhanasañcayam /	etad arTam hi kurvanti rAjAnaH Dana saQcayam /
   rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ taddvijātaye // GarP_1,111.14 //	rakzayitvA tu ca AtmAnam yat Danam tad dvijAtaye // GarP_1,111.14 //
   oṅkāraśabdo viprāṇāṃ yena rāṣṭraṃ pravardhate /	oFkAra SabdaH viprANAm yena rAzwram pravarDate /
   sa rājā vardhate yogādvyādhibhiśca na badhyate // GarP_1,111.15 //	sa rAjA varDate yogAt vyADiBiH ca na baDyate // GarP_1,111.15 //
   asamarthāśca kurvanti munayo dravyasañcayam /	asamarTAH ca kurvanti munayaH dravya saQcayam /
   kiṃ punastu mahīpālaḥ putravatpālayanprajāḥ // GarP_1,111.16 //	kim punar tu mahIpAlaH putra vat pAlayan prajAH // GarP_1,111.16 //
   yasyārthāstasya mitrāṇi yasyārthāstasya bāndhavāḥ /	yasya arTAH tasya mitrANi yasya arTAH tasya bAnDavAH /
   yasyārthāḥ sa mumāṃllāke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.17 //	yasya arTAH sa mumAn= lAke yasya arTAH sa ca paNxitaH // GarP_1,111.17 //
   tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanairvihīnaṃ putrāśca dārāśca suhṛjjanāśca /	tyajanti mitrANi DanEH vihInam putrAH ca dArAH ca suhRd janAH ca /
   te cārthavantaṃ punarāśrayanti hyartho hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ //	te ca arTavantam punar ASrayanti hi arTaH hi loke puruzasya banDuH //
   GarP_1,111.18 //	GarP_1,111.18 //
   andhā hi rājā bhavati yastu sāstravivarjitaḥ /	anDA hi rAjA Bavati yaH tu sa astra vivarjitaH /
   andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati // GarP_1,111.19 //	anDaH paSyati cAreNa SAstra hInaH na paSyati // GarP_1,111.19 //
   yasya putrāśca bhṛtyāśca mantriṇaśca purohitāḥ /	yasya putrAH ca BRtyAH ca mantriNaH ca purohitAH /
   indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyaṃ ciraṃ na hi // GarP_1,111.20 //	indriyANi prasuptAni tasya rAjyam ciram na hi // GarP_1,111.20 //
   yenārjitāstrayo 'pyo 'pyete putrā bhṛtyāśca bāndhavāḥ /	yena arjitAH trayaH apyaH api ete putrAH BRtyAH ca bAnDavAH /
   jitā tena samaṃ bhūpaiścaturabdhirvasundharā // GarP_1,111.21 //	jitA tena samam BUpEH catur abDiH vasunDarAH // GarP_1,111.21 //
   laṅghayecchāstrayuktāni hetuyuktāni yāni ca /	laFGayet SAstra yuktAni hetu yuktAni yAni ca /
   sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,111.22 //	sa hi naSyati vE rAjA iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,111.22 //
   manastāpaṃ na kurvīta āpadaṃ prāpya pārthivaḥ /	manaH tApam na kurvIta Apadam prApya pArTivaH /
   samabuddhiḥ prasannātmā prasannātmā sukhaduḥkhe samo bhavet //	sama budDiH prasanna AtmA prasanna AtmA suKa duHKe samaH Bavet //
   GarP_1,111.23 //	GarP_1,111.23 //
   dhīrāḥ kaṣṭamanuprāpya na bhavanti viṣādinaḥ /	DIrAH kazwam anuprApya na Bavanti vizAdinaH /
   praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodati punaḥ śaśī // GarP_1,111.24 //	praviSya vadanam rAhoH kim nodati punar SaSI // GarP_1,111.24 //
   dhigdhik śarīrasukhalālitamānaveṣu mā khedayeddhanakṛśaṃ hi śarīrameva /	Dik Dik SarIra suKa lAlita mAnavezu mA Kedayet Dana kRSam hi SarIram eva /
   saddārakā hyadhanapāṇḍusutāḥ śrutā hi duḥkhaṃ vihāya punareva sukhaṃ	sat dArakAH hi aDana pANxu sutAH SrutAH hi duHKam vihAya punar eva suKam
   prapannāḥ // GarP_1,111.25 //	prapannAH // GarP_1,111.25 //
   gandharvavidyāmālokya vādyaṃ ca gaṇikāgaṇān /	ganDarva vidyAm Alokya vAdyam ca gaNikA gaNAn /
   dhanurvedārthaśāstrāṇi loke rakṣecca bhūpatiḥ // GarP_1,111.26 //	Danurveda arTa SAstrANi loke rakzet ca BUpatiH // GarP_1,111.26 //
   kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ /	kAraNena vinA BRtye yaH tu kupyati pArTivaH /
   sa gṛhṇāti viṣonmādaṃ kṛṣṇasarpavisarjitam // GarP_1,111.27 //	sa gRhNAti viza unmAdam kRzNa sarpa visarjitam // GarP_1,111.27 //
   cāpalādvārayeddṛṣṭiṃ mithyāvākyañca vārayet /	cApalAt vArayet dRzwim miTyA vAkyaQca vArayet /
   mānave śrotriye caiva bhṛtyavarge sadaiva hi // GarP_1,111.28 //	mAnave Srotriye ca eva BRtya varge sadA eva hi // GarP_1,111.28 //
   līlāṃ karoti yo rājā bhṛtyasvajanagarvitaḥ /	lIlAm karoti yaH rAjA BRtya sva jana garvitaH /
   śāsane sarvadā kṣipraṃ ripubhiḥ paribhūyate // GarP_1,111.29 //	SAsane sarvadA kzipram ripuBiH pariBUyate // GarP_1,111.29 //
   huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ /	huFkAre BRkuwIm na eva sadA kurvIta pArTivaH /
   vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyānrājādhamaṇa śāsti ca /	vinA dozeNa yaH BRtyAn rAja aDamaNa SAsti ca /
   līlāsukhāni bhogyāni tyajediha mahīpatiḥ // GarP_1,111.30 //	lIlA suKAni BogyAni tyajet iha mahIpatiH // GarP_1,111.30 //
   sukhapravṛttaiḥ sādhyantai śatravo vigrahe sthitaiḥ // GarP_1,111.31 //	suKa pravRttEH sADyantEH SatravaH vigrahe sTitEH // GarP_1,111.31 //
   udyogaḥ sāhasaṃdhairyaṃ buddhiḥ śaktiḥ parākramaḥ /	udyogaH sAhasaMDEH yam budDiH SaktiH parAkramaH /
   ṣaḍvidho yasya utsāhastasya devo 'pi śaṅkate // GarP_1,111.32 //	zaxviDaH yasya utsAhaH tasya devaH api SaFkate // GarP_1,111.32 //
   udyogena kṛte kārye siddharyasya na vidyate /	udyogena kRte kArye sidDaryasya na vidyate /
   daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā // GarP_1,111.33 //	dEvam tasya pramANam hi kartavyam pOruzam sadA // GarP_1,111.33 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe bRhadR
   nītisāre ekādaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nIti sAre ekAdaSottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  112	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 112
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   bhṛtyā bahuvidhā jñeyā uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ /	BRtyAH bahuviDAH jQeyAH uttama aDama maDyamAH /
   niyoktavyā yathārheṣu trividheṣveva karmasu // GarP_1,112.1 //	niyoktavyA yaTArhezu triviDezu eva karmasu // GarP_1,112.1 //
   bhṛtye parikṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yasyayasya hi yo guṇaḥ /	BRtye parikzaNam vakzye yasyayasya hi yaH guNaH /
   tamimaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathākathitaṃ kila // GarP_1,112.2 //	tam imam saMpravakzyAmi ye yaTA kaTitam kila // GarP_1,112.2 //
   yathā caturbhiḥ kanakaṃ parīkṣyate nigharṣaṇacchedanatāpatāḍanaiḥ /	yaTA caturBiH kanakam parIkzyate niGarzaNa= Cedana tApa tAxanEH /
   tathā caturbhirbhṛtakaṃ parīkṣayedvatena śīlena kalena karmaṇā //	taTA caturBiH BRtakam parIkzayet vatena SIlena kalena karmaNA //
   GarP_1,112.3 //	GarP_1,112.3 //
   kulaśīlaguṇopetaḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ /	kula SIla guNa upetaH satya Darma parAyaNaH /
   rūpavānsuprasannaśca kośādhyakṣo vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.4 //	rUpavAn su prasannaH ca koSa aDyakzaH viDIyate // GarP_1,112.4 //
   mūlyarūpaparīkṣākṛdbhave dratnaparīkṣakaḥ /	mUlya rUpa parIkzA kRt Bave dratna parIkzakaH /
   balābalaparijñātā senādhyakṣo vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.5 //	bala abala parijQAtA senA aDyakzaH viDIyate // GarP_1,112.5 //
   iṅgitākāratattvajño balavān priyadarśanaḥ /	iFgita AkAra tattva jQaH balavAn priya darSanaH /
   apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //	apramAdI pramATI ca pratIhAraH saH ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //
   medhāvī vākpaṭuḥ prājñaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ /	meDAvI vAc pawuH prAjQaH satya vAdI jita indriyaH /
   sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ // GarP_1,112.7 //	sarva SAstra samAlokI hi eza sADuH sa leKakaH // GarP_1,112.7 //
   buddhimānmatimāṃścaiva paracittopalakṣakaḥ /	budDimAn matimAn= ca eva para citta upalakzakaH /
   krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.8 //	krUraH yaTA ukta vAdI ca eza dUtaH viDIyate // GarP_1,112.8 //
   samastasmṛtiśāstrajñaḥ paṇḍito 'tha jitendriyaḥ /	samasta smRti SAstra jQaH paNxitaH aTa jita indriyaH /
   śauryavīryaguṇopeto dharmādhyakṣo vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.9 //	SOrya vIrya guNa upetaH Darma aDyakzaH viDIyate // GarP_1,112.9 //
   pitṛpaitāmaho dakṣaḥ śāstrajñaḥ satyavācakaḥ /	pitRpEtAmahaH dakzaH SAstra jQaH satya vAcakaH /
   śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //	SuciH ca kaWinaH ca eva sUpakAraH saH ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //
   āyurvedakṛtābhyāsaḥ sarveṣāṃ priyadarśanaḥ /	Ayurveda kRta aByAsaH sarvezAm priya darSanaH /
   āyuḥ śīlaguṇopeto vaidya eva vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.11 //	AyuH SIla guNa upetaH vEdyaH eva viDIyate // GarP_1,112.11 //
   vedavedāṅgatattvajño japahamaparāyaṇaḥ /	veda vedAFga tattva jQaH japa hama parAyaNaH /
   āśīrvādaparo nityameṣa rājapurohita // GarP_1,112.12 //	ASIrvAda paraH nityam eza rAja purohitaH // GarP_1,112.12 //
   lekhakaḥ pāṭhakaścaiva gaṇakaḥ pratirodhakaḥ /	leKakaH pAWakaH ca eva gaNakaH pratiroDakaH /
   ālasyayuktaścaidrājā karma saṃvarjayetsadā // GarP_1,112.13 //	Alasya yuktaH cEt rAjA karma saMvarjayet sadA // GarP_1,112.13 //
   dvijihvamudvegakaraṃ krūramekāntadāruṇam /	dvijihvam udvega karam krUram ekAnta dAruNam /
   khalasyāheśca vadanamapakārāya kevalam // GarP_1,112.14 //	Kalasya aheH ca vadanam apakArAya kevalam // GarP_1,112.14 //
   durjanaḥ parihartavyo vidyayālaṅkṛto 'pisan /	durjanaH parihartavyaH vidyayA alaFkRtaH apisan /
   maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,112.15 //	maNinA BUzitaH sarpaH kim asO na BayaFkaraH // GarP_1,112.15 //
   akāraṇaviṣkṛtakopadhāriṇaḥ khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate /	akAraNa vizkRta kopa DAriNaH KalAt Bayam kasya na nAma jAyate /
   viṣaṃ mahāherviṣamasya durvacaḥ saduḥ sahaṃ sannipatetsadā mukhe //	vizam mahA aheH vizam asya durvacaH sa duH saham sannipatet sadA muKe //
   GarP_1,112.16 //	GarP_1,112.16 //
   tulyārthaṃ tulyasāmarthyaṃ marmajñaṃ vyavasāyinam /	tulya arTam tulya sAmarTyam marma jQam vyavasAyinam /
   ardharājyaharaṃ bhṛtyaṃ yo hanyātsa na hanyate // GarP_1,112.17 //	arDa rAjya haram BRtyam yaH hanyAt sa na hanyate // GarP_1,112.17 //
   śūratvayuktā mṛdumandavākyā jitendriyāḥ satyaparākramāśca /	SUra tva yuktAH mRdu manda vAkyAH jita indriyAH satya parAkramAH ca /
   prāgeva paścādviparī tarupā ye te tu bhṛtyā na hitā bhavanti //	prAk eva paScAt viparI tarupAH ye te tu BRtyAH na hitAH Bavanti //
   GarP_1,112.18 //	GarP_1,112.18 //
   nirālasyāḥ susantuṣṭāḥ pratibodhakāḥ /	nirAlasyAH su santuzwAH pratiboDakAH /
   sukhaduḥ khasamā dhīrā bhṛtyā lokeṣu durlabhāḥ // GarP_1,112.19 //	suKa duH Ka samAH DIrAH BRtyAH lokezu durlaBAH // GarP_1,112.19 //
   kṣāntistayavihīnaśca krūrabuddhiśca nindakaḥ /	kzAntistaya vihInaH ca krUra budDiH ca nindakaH /
   dāmbhikaḥ kapaṭī caiva śaṭhaśca spṛhayānvitaḥ /	dAmBikaH kapawI ca eva SaWaH ca spRhayA anvitaH /
   aśakto bhayabhītaśca rājñā tyaktavya eva saḥ // GarP_1,112.20 //	aSaktaH Baya BItaH ca rAjQA tyaktavyaH eva saH // GarP_1,112.20 //
   susandhānāni cāstrāṇi śastrāṇi vividhāni ca /	su sanDAnAni ca astrANi SastrANi viviDAni ca /
   durge praveśitavyāni tataḥ śatruṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,112.21 //	durge praveSitavyAni tatas Satrum nipAtayet // GarP_1,112.21 //
   ṣaṇmāsamatha varṣaṃ vā sandhiṃ kuryānnarādhipaḥ /	zaz mAsam aTa varzam vA sanDim kuryAt narADipaH /
   paśyansañcitamātmānaṃ punaḥ śatruṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,112.22 //	paSyan saQcitam AtmAnam punar Satrum nipAtayet // GarP_1,112.22 //
   mūrkhānniyojayedyastu trayo 'pyete mahīpateḥ /	mUrKAn niyojayet yaH tu trayaH api ete mahIpateH /
   ayaśaścārthanāśaśca narake caiva pātanam // GarP_1,112.23 //	ayaSaH ca arTa nASaH ca narake ca eva pAtanam // GarP_1,112.23 //
   yatkiñcitkurute karma śubhaṃ vā yādi vāśubham /	yat kiQcitkurute karma SuBam vA yAdi vA aSuBam /
   tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmato bhṛtyakāryataḥ // GarP_1,112.24 //	tena sma varDate rAjA sUkzmataH BRtya kAryataH // GarP_1,112.24 //
   tasmādbhūmīśvaraḥ prājñaṃ dharmakāmārthasādhane /	tasmAt BUmi ISvaraH prAjQam Darma kAma arTa sADane /
   niyoja yeddhisatataṃ gobrāhmaṇahitāya vai // GarP_1,112.25 //	niyoja yedDi satatam go brAhmaNa hitAya vE // GarP_1,112.25 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   bṛhaspatyukta nītiptāre dvādaśottarakaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	bRhaspati ukta nItiptAre dvAdaSottarakaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  113	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 113
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   guṇavantaṃ niyuñjīta guṇahīnaṃ vivarjayet /	guNavantam niyuQjIta guNa hInam vivarjayet /
   paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāśca kevalāḥ // GarP_1,113.1 //	paNxitasya guNAH sarve mUrve dozAH ca kevalAH // GarP_1,113.1 //
   sadbhirāsīta satataṃ sadbhiḥ kurvīta saṅgatim /	sadBiH AsIta satatam sadBiH kurvIta saFgatim /
   sadbhirvivādaṃ maitrīñca nāsadbhiḥ kiñcidācaret // GarP_1,113.2 //	sadBiH vivAdam mEtrIQca na asadBiH kiQcid Acaret // GarP_1,113.2 //
   paṇḍitaiśca virnātaiśca dharmaśaiḥ satyavādibhiḥ /	paNxitEH ca virnAtEH ca DarmaSEH satya vAdiBiH /
   bandhstho 'pi tiṣṭhecca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha // GarP_1,113.3 //	banDsTaH api tizWet ca na tu rAjye KalEH saha // GarP_1,113.3 //
   sāvaśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuvatrarthe yujyate /	sa avaSezANi kAryANi kuvatrarTe yujyate /
   tasmātsarvāṇi kāryāṇi sāvaśeṣāṇi kārayet // GarP_1,113.4 //	tasmAt sarvANi kAryANi sa avaSezANi kArayet // GarP_1,113.4 //
   madhuheva duhetsāraṃ kusumañca na ghātayet /	maDuhA iva duhet sAram kusumaQca na GAtayet /
   vatsāpekṣī duhetkṣīraṃ bhūmiṃ gāñcaiva pārthipaḥ // GarP_1,113.5 //	vatsa apekzI duhet kzIram BUmim gAQcA eva pArTipaH // GarP_1,113.5 //
   yathākrameṇa puṣpebhyaścinute madhu ṣaṭpadaḥ /	yaTAkrameNa puzpeByaH cinute maDu zawpadaH /
   tathā vittamu pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam // GarP_1,113.6 //	taTA vittamu pAdAya rAjA kurvIta saQcayam // GarP_1,113.6 //
   valmīkaṃ madhujālañca śuklaṇkṣe tu candramāḥ /	valmIkam maDujAlaQca SuklaNkze tu candramAH /
   rājadravyañca bhaikṣyañca stokaṃstokaṃ pravardhate // GarP_1,113.7 //	rAjadravyaQca BEkzyaQca stokaMstokam pravarDate // GarP_1,113.7 //
   arjitasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭā saṃpradattasya sañcayam /	arjitasya kzayam dRzwA saMpradattasya saQcayam /
   avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryāddānadhyayanakarmasu // GarP_1,113.8 //	avanDyam divasam kuryAt dAnaDyayana karmasu // GarP_1,113.8 //
   vane 'pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi pañcendriyanigrahastapaḥ /	vane api dozAH praBavanti rAgiNAm gRhe api paQca indriya nigrahaH tapaH /
   akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛttarāgasya gṛhaṃ tapovanam //	akutsite karmaNi yaH pravartate nivRtta rAgasya gRham tapaH vanam //
   GarP_1,113.9 //	GarP_1,113.9 //
   satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate /	satyena rakzyate DarmaH vidyA yogena rakzyate /
   mṛjayā rakṣyate pātraṃ kulaṃ śalina rakṣyate // GarP_1,113.10 //	mRjayA rakzyate pAtram kulam Salina rakzyate // GarP_1,113.10 //
   varaṃ vindhyāṭavyāṃ nivasanamabhuktasya maraṇaṃ varaṃ sarpākīrṇe	varam vinDya awavyAm nivasanam aBuktasya maraNam varam sarpa AkIrNe
   śayanamatha kūpe nipatanam /	Sayanam aTa kUpe nipatanam /
   varaṃ bhrāntāvarte sabhayajalamadhye praviśanaṃ na tu svīye pakṣe hi	varam BrAnta Avarte sa Baya jala maDye praviSanam na tu svIye pakze hi
   dhanamaṇu dehīti kathanam // GarP_1,113.11 //	Danam aNu dehi iti kaTanam // GarP_1,113.11 //
   bhāgyakṣayeṣu kṣīyante nopabhogena sampadaḥ /	BAgya kzayezu kzIyante na upaBogena sampadaH /
   pūrvārjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana // GarP_1,113.12 //	pUrva arjite hi sukRte na naSyanti kadAcana // GarP_1,113.12 //
   viprāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vidyā pṛthivyā bhūṣaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ /	viprANAm BUzaNam vidyA pRTivyAH BUzaNam nRpaH /
   nabhaso bhūṣaṇaṃ candraḥ śīlaṃ sarvasya bhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.13 //	naBasaH BUzaNam candraH SIlam sarvasya BUzaNam // GarP_1,113.13 //
   ete te candratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śurāḥ satyapratijñā	ete te candra tulyAH kzitipati tanayAH BImasena arjuna AdyAH SurAH satya pratijQA
   dinakaravapuṣaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /	dinakara vapuzaH keSavena upagUXAH /
   te vai duṣṭagrahasthāḥ kṛpaṇavaśagatā bhaikṣyacaryāṃ prayātāḥ ko vā	te vE duzwa graha sTAH kRpaNa vaSa gatAH BEkzya caryAm prayAtAH kaH vA
   kasminsamartho bhavati vidhivaśādbhrāmayetkarmarekhā // GarP_1,113.14 //	kasmin samarTaH Bavati viDi vaSAt BrAmayet karma reKA // GarP_1,113.14 //
   brahmā yena kulālavanniyamito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare viṣṇuryena	brahmA yena kulAla vat niyamitaH brahmANxa BANxa udare vizNuH yena
   daśāvatāragahane kṣipto mahāsaṅkaṭe /	daSa avatAra gahane kziptaH mahA saFkawe /
   rudroyena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nityameva	rudraH yena kapAla pANi puwake BikzAwanam kAritaH sUryaH BrAmyati nityam eva
   gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe // GarP_1,113.15 //	gagane taramE namaH karNaNe // GarP_1,113.15 //
   dātā baliryācakako murārirdānaṃ mahī vipramukhasya madhye /	dAtA baliH yAcakakaH murAriH dAnam mahI vipra muKasya maDye /
   dattvā phalaṃ bandhanameva labdhaṃ namo 'stu te daiva yatheṣṭakāriṇe //	dattvA Palam banDanam eva labDam namaH astu te dEva yaTezwa kAriNe //
   GarP_1,113.16 //	GarP_1,113.16 //
   mātā yadi bhavellakṣmīḥ pitā sākṣājjanārdanaḥ /	mAtA yadi Bavet lakzmIH pitA sAkzAt janArdanaH /
   kubuddhau pratipattiścaittasmindaṇḍaḥ patetsadā // GarP_1,113.17 //	kubudDO pratipattiH cEt tasmin daNxaH patet sadA // GarP_1,113.17 //
   yenayena yathā yadvatpurā karma suniścitam /	yenayena yaTA yadvat purA karma su niScitam /
   tattadevāntarā bhuṅkte svayamāhitamātmanā // GarP_1,113.18 //	tat tat eva antarA BuFkte svayam Ahitam AtmanA // GarP_1,113.18 //
   ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥ khamātmanā vihitaṃ sakham /	AtmanA vihitam duH Kam AtmanA vihitam saKam /
   garbhaśayyāmupādāya bhuṅkte vai paurvadaihikam // GarP_1,113.19 //	garBaSayyAm upAdAya BuFkte vE pOrvadEhikam // GarP_1,113.19 //
   na cāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivarapraveśe /	na ca antarikze na samudra maDye na parvatAnAm vivara praveSe /
   na mātṛmūrdhni pradhṛtastathāṅke tyaktuṃ kṣamaḥ karma kṛtaṃ naro hi //	na mAtR mUrDni praDRtaH taTA aFke tyaktum kzamaH karma kRtam naraH hi //
   GarP_1,113.20 //	GarP_1,113.20 //

   śāstrañca vai tūśanasā pradiṣṭaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ kālavaśādvinaṣṭaḥ //	SAstraQca vE tu uSanasA pradizwam sa rAvaNaH kAla vaSAt vinazwaH //

   gacchanti cāntarikṣe vā praviśanti mahītale /	gacCanti ca antarikze vA praviSanti mahI tale /

   karmāṇyatra pradhānāni samyagṛkṣe śubhagrahe /	karmANi atra praDAnAni samyak Rkze SuBa grahe /

   sthūlajaṅgho yadā rāmaḥ śabdagāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /	sTUlajaFGaH yadA rAmaH Sabda gAmI ca lakzmaNaH /

   na pituḥ karmaṇā putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā /	na pituH karmaNA putraH pitA vA putra karmaNA /

   karmajanyaśarīreṣu rogāḥ śarīramānasāḥ /	karma janya SarIrezu rogAH SarIra mAnasAH /

   anyathā śāstragārbhiṇyā dhiyā dhīror'thamīhate /	anyaTA SAstra gArBiNyA DiyA DIroH aTam Ihate /

   bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaśca yaḥ karoti śubhāśubham /	bAlaH yuvA ca vRdDaH ca yaH karoti SuBa aSuBam /

   ato na śocāmi na vismayo me lalāṭalekhā na punaḥ prayāti (yadasmadīyaṃ na	atas na SocAmi na vismayaH me lalAwa leKA na punar prayAti (yat asmadIyam na
   tu tat pareṣām // GarP_1,113.32 //	tu tat parezAm // GarP_1,113.32 //
   sarpaḥ kūpe gajaḥ skandhe bila ākhuśca dhāvati /	sarpaH kUpe gajaH skanDe bilaH AKuH ca DAvati /

   nālpā bhavati sadvidyā dīyamānāpi vardhate /	na alpA Bavati sat vidyA dIyamAnA api varDate /

   yer'thā dharmeṇa te satyā ye 'dharmeṇa gatāḥ śriyaḥ /	yer aTAH DarmeNa te satyAH ye aDarmeNa gatAH SriyaH /
   dharmārtho ca mahāṃlloke tatsmṛtvā hyarthakāraṇāt // GarP_1,113.35 //	Darma arTaH ca mahAn= loke tat smRtvA hi arTa kAraNAt // GarP_1,113.35 //
   annārtho yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇo janaḥ /	anna arTaH yAni duH KAni karoti kRpaNaH janaH /

   sarveṣāmeva śaucānāmannaśaucaṃ viśiṣyate /	sarvezAm eva SOcAnAm anna SOcam viSizyate /

   satyaṃ śaucaṃ manaḥ śaucaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ /	satyam SOcam manaH SOcam SOcam indriya nigrahaH /

   mṛttikānāṃ sahasreṇa codakānāṃ śatena hi /	mRttikAnAm sahasreNa ca udakAnAm Satena hi /

   śīlaṃ kulaṃ naiva na caiva vidyā jñānaṃ guṇā naiva na bījaśuddhiḥ /	SIlam kulam na eva na ca eva vidyA jQAnam guNAH na eva na bIja SudDiH /

   GarP_1,113.52 //	GarP_1,113.52 //

   bhūtapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ karma kartāramanutiṣṭhati /	BUta pUrvam kRtam karma kartAram anutizWati /

   nīcaḥ sarṣapamātrāṇi paracchidrāṇi paśyati /	nIcaH sarzapa mAtrANi para= CidrANi paSyati /
   ātmano balivamātrāṇi paśyannapi na paśyati // GarP_1,113.57 //	AtmanaH baliva mAtrANi paSyan= api na paSyati // GarP_1,113.57 //
   rāgadveṣādiyuktānāṃ na sukhaṃ kutraciddvija /	rAga dveza Adi yuktAnAm na suKam kutracid dvija /

   yatra sneho bhayaṃ tatra sneho duḥ khasya bhājanam /	yatra snehaH Bayam tatra snehaH duH Kasya BAjanam /
   snehamūlāni duḥ khāni tasmistyakte mahatsukham // GarP_1,113.59 //	sneha mUlAni duH KAni tasmiH tyakte mahat suKam // GarP_1,113.59 //
   śarīramevāyatanaṃ duḥ khasya ca sukhasya ca /	SarIram eva Ayatanam duH Kasya ca suKasya ca /
   jīvitañca śarīrañca jātyaiva saha jāyate // GarP_1,113.60 //	jIvitaQca SarIraQca jAtyA eva saha jAyate // GarP_1,113.60 //
   sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥ khaṃ sarva mātmavaśaṃ sukham /	sarvam para vaSam duH Kam sarva mA Atma vaSam suKam /
   etadvidyātsamāsena lakṣaṇaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ // GarP_1,113.61 //	etat vidyAt samAsena lakzaNam suKa duH KayoH // GarP_1,113.61 //
   sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥ khaṃ duḥ khasyānantaraṃ sukham /	suKasya anantaram duH Kam duH Kasya anantaram suKam /

   yadgataṃ tadatikrāntaṃ yadi syāttacca dūrataḥ /	yat gatam tat atikrAntam yadi syAt tat ca dUratas /

   nītisāre trayośottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nIti sAre trayoSottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  114	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 114
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   na kaścitkasyacinmitraṃ na kaścitkasyacidripuḥ /	na kaScid kasyacid mitram na kaScid kasyacid ripuH /
   kāraṇādeva jāyante mitrāṇi ripavastathā // GarP_1,114.1 //	kAraNAt eva jAyante mitrANi ripavaH taTA // GarP_1,114.1 //
   śokatrāṇaṃ bhayatrāṇaṃ prītiviśvāsabhājanam /	Soka trANam Baya trANam prIti viSvAsa BAjanam /
   kena ratnāṃmadaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mitramityakṣaradvayam // GarP_1,114.2 //	kena ratnAMma dam sRzwam mitram iti akzara dvayam // GarP_1,114.2 //
   sakṛduccaritaṃ yena harirityakṣaradvayam /	sakRt uccaritam yena hariH iti akzara dvayam /
   baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,114.3 //	badDaH parikaraH tena mokzAya gamanam prati // GarP_1,114.3 //
   na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na cātmaje /	na mAtari na dArezu na sodarye na ca Atmaje /
   viśvāsastādṛśaḥ puṃsāṃ yādṛṅmitre svabhāvaje // GarP_1,114.4 //	viSvAsaH tAdRSaH puMsAm yAdRS mitre svaBAva je // GarP_1,114.4 //
   yadicchecchāśvatīṃ prītiṃ trīndoṣānparivarjayet /	yat icCet SASvatIm prItim trIn dozAn parivarjayet /
   dyutamarthaprayogañca parokṣe dāradarśanam // GarP_1,114.5 //	dyutam arTa prayogaQca parokze dAra darSanam // GarP_1,114.5 //
   mātrā svastrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano vaset /	mAtrA svastrAH duhitrA vA na vivikta AsanaH vaset /
   balavānindriyagrāmo vidvāṃsamapi karṣati // GarP_1,114.6 //	balavAn indriya grAmaH vidvAMsam api karzati // GarP_1,114.6 //
   viparītaratiḥ kāmaḥ svāyateṣu na vidyate /	viparIta ratiH kAmaH su Ayatezu na vidyate /
   yathopāyo vadho daṇḍastathaiva hyanu vartate // GarP_1,114.7 //	yaTA upAyaH vaDaH daNxaH taTA eva hi anu vartate // GarP_1,114.7 //
   api kalpānilasyaiva turagasya mahodadheḥ /	api kalpa anilasya eva turagasya mahA udaDeH /
   śakyate prasaro boddhuṃ na hyaraktasye catasaḥ // GarP_1,114.8 //	Sakyate prasaraH bodDum na hi araktasye catasaH // GarP_1,114.8 //
   kṣaṇo nāsti raho nāsti na sti prārthayitā janaḥ /	kzaNaH na asti rahaH na asti na sti prArTayitA janaH /
   tena śaunaka nārīṇāṃ satītvamupajāyate // GarP_1,114.9 //	tena SOnaka nArINAm satI tvam upajAyate // GarP_1,114.9 //
   eka vai sevate nityamanyaścetapi rocate /	eka vE sevate nityam anyaH ca itapi rocate /
   puruṣāṇāmalābhena nārī caiva pativratā // GarP_1,114.10 //	puruzANAm alABena nArI ca eva pativratA // GarP_1,114.10 //
   jananī yāni kurute rahasyaṃ madanāturā /	jananI yAni kurute rahasyam madana AturAH /
   sutaistāni na cintyāni śīlavipratipattibhiḥ // GarP_1,114.11 //	sutEH tAni na cintyAni SIla vipratipattiBiH // GarP_1,114.11 //
   parādhīnā nidrā paradṛdayakṛtyānusaraṇaṃ sadā helā hāsyaṃ niyatamapi	para aDInA nidrA para dRdaya kRtya anusaraNam sadA helA hAsyam niyatam api
   śokena rahitam /	Sokena rahitam /
   paṇe nyastaḥ kāyo viṭajanakhurairdāritagalo bahūtkaṇṭhavṛtirjagati	paNe nyastaH kAyaH viwa jana KurEH dArita galaH bahu utkaNWa vRtiH jagati
   gaṇikrāyā bahumataḥ // GarP_1,114.12 //	gaNikrAyAH bahu mataH // GarP_1,114.12 //
   agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca /	agniH ApaH striyaH mUrKAH sarpAH rAja kulAni ca /
   nityaṃ paropasevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.13 //	nityam para upasevyAni sadyas prANa harANi zax // GarP_1,114.13 //
   kiṃ citraṃ yadi veda (śabda) śāstrakuśalo vipro bhavetpaṇḍitaḥ kiṃ citraṃ	kim citram yadi veda (Sabda) SAstra kuSalaH vipraH Bavet paNxitaH kim citram
   yadi daṇḍanītikuśalo rājā bhaveddhārmikaḥ /	yadi daNxanIti kuSalaH rAjA Bavet DArmikaH /
   kiṃ citraṃ yadi rūpayauvanavatī sādhvī bhavetkāminī taccitraṃ yadi	kim citram yadi rUpa yOvanavatI sADvI Bavet kAminI tat citram yadi
   nirdhano 'pi puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkracit // GarP_1,114.14 //	nirDanaH api puruzaH pApam na kuryAt kracid // GarP_1,114.14 //
   nātmacchidraṃ pare dadyādvidyācchidraṃ parasya ca /	na Atma= Cidram pare dadyAt vidyAt Cidram parasya ca /
   gūhetkūrma ivāṅgāni parabhāvañca lakṣayet // GarP_1,114.15 //	gUhet kUrmaH iva aFgAni para BAvan ca lakzayet // GarP_1,114.15 //
   pātālatalavā sinya uccaprākārasaṃsthitāḥ /	pAtAla talavA sinyaH ucca prAkAra saMsTitAH /
   yadi no cikurodbhedāllabhyante kaiḥ striyo na hi // GarP_1,114.16 //	yadi no cikura udBedAt laByante kEH striyaH na hi // GarP_1,114.16 //
   samadharmā hi marmajñastīkṣṇaḥ svajanakaṇṭakaḥ /	samaDarmAH hi marma jQaH tIkzNaH sva jana kaNwakaH /
   na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛtavairo bahiḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,114.17 //	na taTA bADate SatruH kRta vEraH bahis sTitaH // GarP_1,114.17 //
   sa paṇḍito yo hyanuñjayedvai miṣṭena bālaṃ viniyena śiṣṭam /	sa paNxitaH yaH hi anuQjayet vE mizwena bAlam viniyena Sizwam /
   arthena nārīṃ tapasā hi devānsarvāṃśca lokāṃśca susaṃgraheṇa //	arTena nArIm tapasA hi devAn sarvAn= ca lokAn= ca su saMgraheNa //
   GarP_1,114.18 //	GarP_1,114.18 //
   chalena mitraṃ kaluṣeṇa dharmaṃ paropatāpena samṛddhibhāvanam /	Calena mitram kaluzeNa Darmam para upatApena samRdDi BAvanam /
   sukhena vidyāṃ puruṣeṇa nārīṃ vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāste //	suKena vidyAm puruzeNa nArIm vAQCanti vE ye na ca paNxitAH te //
   GarP_1,114.19 //	GarP_1,114.19 //
   phalārtho phalinaṃ vṛkṣaṃ yaśchindyāddurmatirnaraḥ /	Pala arTaH Palinam vRkzam yaH CindyAt durmatiH naraH /
   niṣphalaṃ tasya vai kāryāṃ mahādoṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,114.20 //	nizPalam tasya vE kAryAm mahA dozam avApnuyAt // GarP_1,114.20 //
   sadhano hi tapasvī ca dūrato vai kṛtaśramaḥ /	sa DanaH hi tapasvI ca dUratas vE kRta SramaH /
   madyapa strī satītyevaṃ vipra na śraddadhāmyaham // GarP_1,114.21 //	madyapa strI satI iti evam vipra na SraddaDAmi aham // GarP_1,114.21 //
   na viśvasedaviśvaste mitrasyāpi na viśvaset /	na viSvaset aviSvaste mitrasya api na viSvaset /
   kadācitkupitaṃ mitraṃ sarvaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśayet // GarP_1,114.22 //	kadAcid kupitam mitram sarvam guhyam prakASayet // GarP_1,114.22 //
   sarvabhūteṣu viśvāsaḥ sarvabhūteṣu sāttvikaḥ /	sarva BUtezu viSvAsaH sarva BUtezu sAttvikaH /
   svabāvamātmanā gūhedetatsādhorhi lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,114.23 //	sva bAvam AtmanA gUhet etat sADoH hi lakzaNam // GarP_1,114.23 //
   yasminkasminkṛte kārye kartāramanuvartate /	yasmin kasmin kRte kArye kartAram anuvartate /
   sarvathā vartamāno 'pi dhairyabuddhintu kārayet // GarP_1,114.24 //	sarvaTA vartamAnaH api DErya budDintu kArayet // GarP_1,114.24 //
   vṛddhāḥ striyo navaṃ madyaṃ śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ trimūlakam /	vRdDAH striyaH navam madyam Suzkam mAMsam trimUlakam /
   rātrau dadhi divā svapnaṃ vidvānṣaṭ parivarjayet // GarP_1,114.25 //	rAtrO daDi divA svapnam vidvAn zaw parivarjayet // GarP_1,114.25 //
   viṣaṃ goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam /	vizam gozWI daridrasya vRdDasya taruNI vizam /
   viṣaṃ kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,114.26 //	vizam kuSikzitAH vidyA ajIrNe Bojanam vizam // GarP_1,114.26 //
   priyaṃ gānamakuṇṭhasya nīcasyoccāsanaṃ priyam /	priyam gAnam akuNWasya nIcasya ucca Asanam priyam /
   priyaṃ dānaṃ daridrasya bhūnaścataruṇī priyā // GarP_1,114.27 //	priyam dAnam daridrasya BUnaH cataruNI priyA // GarP_1,114.27 //
   atyambupānaṃ kaṭhināśanañca dhātukṣayovegavidhāraṇañca /	ati ambu pAnam kaWina aSanaQca DAtu kzayaH vega viDAraNaQca /
   divāśayo jāgaraṇañca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ //	divASayaH jAgaraNaQca rAtrO zaxBiH narANAm nivasanti rogAH //
   GarP_1,114.28 //	GarP_1,114.28 //
   bālātapaścāpyatimaithunañca śmaśānadhūmaḥ karatāpanañca /	bAla AtapaH ca api atimETunaQca SmaSAna DUmaH kara tA apanaQca /
   rajasvalāvatkranirīkṣaṇañca sudīrghamāyurnanu karṣayecca // GarP_1,114.29	rajasvalA vatkra nirIkzaNaQca su dIrGam AyuH nanu karzayet ca // GarP_1,114.29
   śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā bālārkastaruṇaṃ dadhi /	Suzkam mAMsam striyaH vRdDAH bAla arkaH taruNam daDi /
   prabhāte maithunaṃ nidrā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.30 //	praBAte mETunam nidrA sadyas prANa harANi zax // GarP_1,114.30 //
   sadyaḥ pakraghṛtaṃ drākṣā bālā strī kṣīrabhojanam /	sadyas pakra GRtam drAkzA bAlA strI kzIra Bojanam /
   uṣṇodakaṃ tarucchāyā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.31 //	uzNa udakam taru= CAyA sadyas prANa harANi zax // GarP_1,114.31 //
   kūpādakaṃ vaṭacchāyā nārīṇāñca payodharaḥ /	kUpa Adakam vawa= CAyA nArINAQca payoDaraH /
   śītakāle bhaveduṣṇamuṣṇakāle ca śītalam // GarP_1,114.32 //	SIta kAle Bavet uzNam uzNa kAle ca SItalam // GarP_1,114.32 //
   trayo balakarāḥ sadyo bālābhyaṅgasubhojanam /	trayaH bala karAH sadyas bAla aByaFga su Bojanam /
   trayo balaharāḥ sadyo hyadhvā ve maithunaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,114.33 //	trayaH bala harAH sadyas hi aDvA ve mETunam jvaraH // GarP_1,114.33 //
   śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ payo nityaṃ bhāryāmitraiḥ sahaiva tu /	Suzkam mAMsam payaH nityam BAryA mitrEH saha eva tu /
   na bhāktavyaṃ nṛpaiḥ sārdhaṃ viyogaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt // GarP_1,114.34 //	na BAktavyam nRpEH sArDam viyogam kurute kzaNAt // GarP_1,114.34 //
   kucelina dantamalopadhāriṇaṃ bahvāśinaṃ niṣṭhuravākyabhāṣiṇam /	kucelina danta mala upaDAriNam bahu ASinam nizWura vAkya BAziNam /
   sūryodaye hyastamaye 'pi śāyinaṃ vimuñcati śrīrapi cakrapāṇinam //	sUrya udaye hi asta maye api SAyinam vimuQcati SrIH api cakrapANinam //
   GarP_1,114.35 //	GarP_1,114.35 //
   nityaṃ chedastṛṇānaṃ dharaṇivilakhanaṃ pādayoścāpamārṣṭiḥ	nityam CedaH tRNAnam DaraNi vilaKanam pAdayoH ca apamArzwiH
   dantānāmapyaśaucaṃ malinavasanatā rūkṣatā mūrdhajānām /	dantAnAm api aSOcam malina vasana tA rUkza tA mUrDajAnAm /
   dve sadhye cāpi nidrā vivasanaśayanaṃ grāsahāsātirekaḥ svāṅge pīṭhe ca	dve saDye ca api nidrA vivasana Sayanam grAsa hAsa atirekaH sva aFge pIWe ca
   vādyaṃ nidhanamupanayetkeśavasyāpi lakṣmīm // GarP_1,114.36 //	vAdyam niDanam upanayet keSavasya api lakzmIm // GarP_1,114.36 //
   śiraḥ sudhautaṃ caraṇau sumārjitau varāṅganāsevanamalpabhojanam /	SiraH su DOtam caraNO su mArjitO vara aFganA sevanam alpa Bojanam /
   anagnaśāyitvamaparvamaithunaṃ cirapranaṣṭāṃ śriyamānayanti ṣaṭ //	anagna SAyi tvam aparva mETunam cira pranazwAm Sriyam Anayanti zaw //
   GarP_1,114.37 //	GarP_1,114.37 //
   yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ /	yasya kasya tu puzpasya pANAxarasya viSezataH /
   śirasā dhāryamāṇasya hyalakṣmīḥ pratihanyate // GarP_1,114.38 //	SirasA DAryamANasya hi alakzmIH pratihanyate // GarP_1,114.38 //
   dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyāsanasya ca /	dIpasya paScimA CAyA CAyA SayyA Asanasya ca /
