   bālātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇaṃ dadhi /	bAla AtapaH preta DUmaH strI vRdDA taruNam daDi /
   āyuṣkāmo na seveta tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ // GarP_1,114.40 //	AyuzkAmaH na seveta taTA saMmArjanI rajaH // GarP_1,114.40 //
   gajāśvarathadhānyānāṃ gavāñcaiva rajaḥ śubham /	gaja aSva raTa DAnyAnAm gavAQca eva rajaH SuBam /
   aśubhaṃ ca vijānīyātkharoṣṭrajāvikeṣu ca // GarP_1,114.41 //	aSuBam ca vijAnIyAt Kara uzwra ja Avikezu ca // GarP_1,114.41 //
   gavāṃ rajo dhānyarajaḥ putrasyāṅgabhavaṃ rajaḥ /	gavAm rajaH DAnya rajaH putrasya aFga Bavam rajaH /
   etadrajo mahāśastaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam // GarP_1,114.42 //	etat rajaH mahASastam mahApAtaka nASanam // GarP_1,114.42 //
   ajārajaḥ khararajo yattu saṃmārjanīrajaḥ /	ajA rajaH Kara rajaH yat tu saMmArjanI rajaH /
   etadrajo mahāpāpaṃ mahākilbiṣakārakam // GarP_1,114.43 //	etat rajaH mahA pApam mahA kilbiza kArakam // GarP_1,114.43 //
   śūrpavāto nakhāgrāmbu snānavastramṛjodakam /	SUrpa vAtaH naKa agra ambu snAna vastra mRjA udakam /
   keśāmbu mārjanīreṇurhanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,114.44 //	keSa ambu mArjanI reNuH hanti puNyam purA kRtam // GarP_1,114.44 //
   viprayorvipravahnyośca dampatyoḥ svāminostathā /	viprayoH vipra vahnyoH ca dampatyoH svAminoH taTA /
   antareṇa na gantavyaṃ hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca // GarP_1,114.45 //	antareNa na gantavyam hayasya vRzaBasya ca // GarP_1,114.45 //
   strīṣu rājāgnisarpeṣu svādhyāye śatrusevane /	strIzu rAjA agni sarpezu svADyAye Satru sevane /
   bhogāsvādeṣu viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartumarhati // GarP_1,114.46 //	Boga AsvAdezu viSvAsam kaH prAjQaH kartum arhati // GarP_1,114.46 //
   na viśvasedaviśvastaṃ viśvastaṃ viśvastaṃ nātiviśvaset /	na viSvaset aviSvastam viSvastam viSvastam na ativiSvaset /
   viśvāsādbhayamutpannaṃ mūlādapi nikṛntati // GarP_1,114.47 //	viSvAsAt Bayam utpannam mUlAt api nikRntati // GarP_1,114.47 //
   vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvasto yadi tiṣṭhati /	vEriNA saha sanDAya viSvastaH yadi tizWati /
   sa vṛkṣāgre prasupto hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate // GarP_1,114.48 //	sa vRkza agre prasuptaH hi patitaH pratibuDyate // GarP_1,114.48 //
   nātyantaṃ mṛdunā bhāvyaṃ nātyantaṃ kūrakarmaṇā /	na atyantam mRdunA BAvyam na atyantam kUra karmaNA /
   mṛdunaiva mṛduṃ hanti dāruṇenaiva dāruṇam // GarP_1,114.49 //	mRdunA eva mRdum hanti dAruNena eva dAruNam // GarP_1,114.49 //
   nātyantaṃ saralairbhāvyaṃ nātyantaṃ mṛdunā tathā /	na atyantam saralEH BAvyam na atyantam mRdunA taTA /
   saralāstatra chidyante kubjāstiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ // GarP_1,114.50 //	saralAH tatra Cidyante kubjAH tizWanti pAdapAH // GarP_1,114.50 //
   namanti phalino vṛkṣā namanti guṇino janāḥ /	namanti PalinaH vRkzAH namanti guNinaH janAH /
   śuṣkavṛkṣāśca mūrkhāśca bhidyante na namanti ca // GarP_1,114.51 //	Suzka vRkzAH ca mUrKAH ca Bidyante na namanti ca // GarP_1,114.51 //
   aprārthitāni duḥ khāni yathaivāyānti yānti ca /	aprArTitAni duH KAni yaTA eva AyAnti yAnti ca /
   mārjāra iva lumpeta tathā prārthayitāra naraḥ // GarP_1,114.52 //	mArjAraH iva lumpeta taTA prArTayitAra naraH // GarP_1,114.52 //
   pūrvaṃ paścāccarantyārye sadaiva bahusampadaḥ /	pUrvam paScAt caranti Arye sadA eva bahu sampadaH /
   viparītamanārye ca yathecchasi tathā cara // GarP_1,114.53 //	viparItam anArye ca yaTA icCasi taTA cara // GarP_1,114.53 //
   ṣaṭkarṇo bhidyate mantraścatuḥ karṇaścadhāryate /	zaz karNaH Bidyate mantraH catuH karNaH ca DAryate /
   dvikarṇasya tu mantrasya brahmāpyanta na budhyate // GarP_1,114.54 //	dvi karNasya tu mantrasya brahmA api anta na buDyate // GarP_1,114.54 //
   tayā gavā kiṃ kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī /	tayA gavA kim kriyate yA na dogDrI na garBiNI /
   kor'tha putreṇa jātena yo na vidvānna dhārmikaḥ // GarP_1,114.55 //	kor aTa putreNa jAtena yaH na vidvAn na DArmikaH // GarP_1,114.55 //
   ekenāpi suputreṇa vidyāyuktena dhīmatā /	ekena api su putreNa vidyA yuktena DImatA /
   kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.56 //	kulam puruza siMhena candreNa gaganam yaTA // GarP_1,114.56 //
   ekenāpi suvṛkṣeṇa puṣpitena sugandhinā /	ekena api su vRkzeNa puzpitena suganDinA /
   vanaṃ suvāsitaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.57 //	vanam su vAsitam sarvam su putreNa kulam yaTA // GarP_1,114.57 //
   eko hi guṇavānputro nirguṇena śatena kim /	ekaH hi guNavAn putraH nirguNena Satena kim /
   candro hanti tamāṃsyeko na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam // GarP_1,114.58 //	candraH hanti tamAMsi ekaH na ca jyotiH sahasrakam // GarP_1,114.58 //
   lālayetpañca varṣāṇi daśa varṣāṇi tāḍayet /	lAlayet paQca varzANi daSa varzANi tAxayet /
   prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putraṃ mitravadācaret // GarP_1,114.59 //	prApte tu zoxaSe varze putram mitra vat Acaret // GarP_1,114.59 //
   jāyamāno hareddārān vardhamāno hareddhanam /	jAyamAnaH haret dArAn varDamAnaH haret Danam /
   mriyamāṇo haretprāṇānnāsti putrasamo ripuḥ // GarP_1,114.60 //	mriyamANaH haret prANAn na asti putra samaH ripuH // GarP_1,114.60 //
   kecinmṛgamukhā vyāghrāḥ kecidvyāghramukhā mṛgāḥ /	kecid mRga muKAH vyAGrAH kecid vyAGra muKAH mRgAH /
   tatsvarūpapahijñāne hyaviśvāsaḥ padepade // GarP_1,114.61 //	tad svarUpa pahi jQAne hi aviSvAsaH padepade // GarP_1,114.61 //
   ekaḥ kṣamāvatāṃ doṣo dvitīyo nopapadyate /	ekaH kzamAvatAm dozaH dvitIyaH na upapadyate /
   yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktamaśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ // GarP_1,114.62 //	yat enam kzamayA yuktam aSaktam manyate janaH // GarP_1,114.62 //
   etadevānumanyeta bhogā hi kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ /	etat eva anumanyeta BogAH hi kzaNa BaFginaH /
   snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayo vai hyanākulāḥ // GarP_1,114.63 //	snigDezu ca vidagDasya matayaH vE hi anAkulAH // GarP_1,114.63 //
   jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka /	jyezWaH pitR samaH BrAtA mRte pitari SOnakaH /
   sarveṣāṃ sa pitā hi syātsarveṣāmanupālakaḥ // GarP_1,114.64 //	sarvezAm sa pitA hi syAt sarvezAm anupAlakaH // GarP_1,114.64 //
   kaniṣṭheṣu ca sarveṣu samatvenānuvartate /	kanizWezu ca sarvezu samatvena anuvartate /
   samāpabhogajīveṣu yathaivaṃ tanayeṣu ca // GarP_1,114.65 //	samApa Boga jIvezu yaTA evam tanayezu ca // GarP_1,114.65 //
   bahūnāmalpasārāṇāṃ samavāyo hi dāruṇaḥ /	bahUnAm alpa sArANAm samavAyaH hi dAruNaH /
   tṛṇairāveṣṭitā rajjustayā nāgo 'pi badhyate // GarP_1,114.66 //	tRNEH AvezwitAH rajjuH tayA nAgaH api baDyate // GarP_1,114.66 //
   apahṛtya parasvaṃ hi yastu dānaṃ prayacchati /	apahRtya para svam hi yaH tu dAnam prayacCati /
   sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthāstasya tatphalam // GarP_1,114.67 //	sa dAtA narakam yAti yasya arTAH tasya tad Palam // GarP_1,114.67 //
   devadravyavināśena brahmasvaharaṇena ca /	deva dravya vinASena brahma sva haraNena ca /
   kulānyakulatāṃ yānti brāhmaṇātikrameṇa ca // GarP_1,114.68 //	kulAni akula tAm yAnti brAhmaNa atikrameNa ca // GarP_1,114.68 //
   brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā /	brahma Gne ca surApe ca core Bagna vrate taTA /
   niṣkṛtirvihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // GarP_1,114.69 //	nizkRtiH vihitA sadBiH kRtaGne na asti nizkRtiH // GarP_1,114.69 //
   nāśranti pitaro devāḥ kṣudrasya vṛṣalīpateḥ /	na ASranti pitaraH devAH kzudrasya vRzalI pateH /
   bhāryājitasya nāśranti yasyāścopapatirgṛhe // GarP_1,114.70 //	BAryA jitasya na ASranti yasyAH ca upapatiH gRhe // GarP_1,114.70 //
   akṛjajñamanāryañca dīrdharoṣamanārjavam /	akRjajQam anAryaQca dIrDa rozam anArjavam /
   caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñjātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ // GarP_1,114.71 //	caturaH vidDi cANxAlAn jAtyA jAyeta paQcamaH // GarP_1,114.71 //
   nopekṣitavyo durbaddhi śatruralpo 'pyavajñayā /	na upekzitavyaH durbadDi SatruH alpaH api avajQayA /
   vahniralpo 'pyasaṃhāryaḥ kurute bhasmasājjagat // GarP_1,114.72 //	vahniH alpaH api asaMhAryaH kurute BasmasAt jagat // GarP_1,114.72 //
   nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ /	nave vayasi yaH SAntaH sa SAntaH iti me matiH /
   dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate // GarP_1,114.73 //	DAtuzu kzIyamANezu SamaH kasya na jAyate // GarP_1,114.73 //
   panthāna iva viprendra sarvasādhāraṇāḥ śriyaḥ /	panTAnaH iva vipra indra sarva sADAraNAH SriyaH /
   madīyā iti matvā vai na hi harṣayuto bhavet // GarP_1,114.74 //	madIyAH iti matvA vE na hi harza yutaH Bavet // GarP_1,114.74 //
   cittāyattaṃ dhātuvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ citte naṣṭe dhātavo yānti nāśam /	citta Ayattam DAtu vaSyam SarIram citte nazwe DAtavaH yAnti nASam /
   tasmāccittaṃ sarvadā rakṣaṇīyaṃ svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti //	tasmAt cittam sarvadA rakzaNIyam svasTe citte DAtavaH samBavanti //
   GarP_1,114.75 //	GarP_1,114.75 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe bRhadR
   nītisāre caturdaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nIti sAre caturdaSottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  115	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 115
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   kumāryāṃ ca kumitraṃ ca kurājānaṃ kuputrakam /	kumAryAm ca ku mitram ca ku rAjAnam ku putrakam /
   kukanyāṃ ca kudeśaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet // GarP_1,115.1 //	kukanyAm ca ku deSam ca dUratas parivarjayet // GarP_1,115.1 //
   dharmaḥ pravrajitastapaḥ pracalitaṃ satyaṃ ca dūraṃ gataṃ pṛthvī	DarmaH pravrajitaH tapaH pracalitam satyam ca dUram gatam pRTvI
   vandhyaphalā janāḥ kapaṭino laulye sthitā brāhmaṇāḥ /	vanDya PalAH janAH kapawinaH lOlye sTitAH brAhmaNAH /
   martyāḥ strīvaśagāḥ striyaśca capalā nīcā janā unnatāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ	martyAH strI vaSa gAH striyaH ca capalAH nIcAH janAH unnatAH hA kazwam
   khalujīvitaṃ kaliyuge dhanyā janā ye mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.2 //	Kalu jIvitam kali yuge DanyAH janAH ye mRtAH // GarP_1,115.2 //
   dhanyāste ye na paśyanti deśabhaṅgaṃ kulakṣayam /	DanyAH te ye na paSyanti deSa BaFgam kula kzayam /
   paracittagatān dārānputraṃ kuvyasane sthitam // GarP_1,115.3 //	para citta gatAn dArAn putram ku vyasane sTitam // GarP_1,115.3 //
   kuputre nirvṛtirnāsti kubhāryāyāṃ kuto ratiḥ /	ku putre nirvRtiH na asti ku BAryAyAm kutas ratiH /
   sumitra nāsti viśvāsaḥ kurājye nāsti jīvitam // GarP_1,115.4 //	sumitra na asti viSvAsaH ku rAjye na asti jIvitam // GarP_1,115.4 //
   parānnaṃ ca parasvaṃ ca paraśayyāḥ parastriyaḥ /	para annam ca para svam ca para SayyAH para striyaH /
   paraveśmani vāsaśca śakrādapi harecchriyam // GarP_1,115.5 //	para veSmani vAsaH ca SakrAt api haret Sriyam // GarP_1,115.5 //
   ālāpādgātrasaṃsparśātsaṃsargātsaha bhojanāt /	AlApAt gAtra saMsparSAt saMsargAt saha BojanAt /
   āsanācchayanādyānātpāpaṃ saṃkramate nṛṇām // GarP_1,115.6 //	AsanAt SayanAt yAnAt pApam saMkramate nRNAm // GarP_1,115.6 //
   striyo naśyanti rūpeṇa tapaḥ krodhana naśyati /	striyaH naSyanti rUpeNa tapaH kroDana naSyati /
   gāvo dvarapracāreṇa śūdrānnena dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,115.7 //	gAvaH dvara pracAreNa SUdra annena dvijottamaH // GarP_1,115.7 //
   āsanādekaśayyāyāṃ bojanātpaṅktisaṅkarāt /	AsanAt eka SayyAyAm bojanAt paFkti saFkarAt /
   tataḥ saṃkramate pāpaṃ ghaṭāddhaṭa ivodakam // GarP_1,115.8 //	tatas saMkramate pApam GawAt hawaH iva udakam // GarP_1,115.8 //
   lālane bahavo doṣāstāḍane bahavo guṇāḥ /	lAlane bahavaH dozAH tAxane bahavaH guNAH /
   tasmācchiṣyaṃ ca putraṃ ca tāḍayenna tu lālayet // GarP_1,115.9 //	tasmAt Sizyam ca putram ca tAxayet na tu lAlayet // GarP_1,115.9 //
   adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā /	aDvA jarA dehavatAm parvatAnAm jalam jarA /
   asaṃbhogaśca nārīṇāṃ vastrāṇāmātapo jarā // GarP_1,115.10 //	asaMBogaH ca nArINAm vastrANAm AtapaH jarA // GarP_1,115.10 //
   adhamāḥ kalimicchanti sandhimicchati madhyamāḥ /	aDamAH kalim icCanti sanDim icCati maDyamAH /
   uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // GarP_1,115.11 //	uttamAH mAnam icCanti mAnaH hi mahatAm Danam // GarP_1,115.11 //
   māno hi mūlamarthasya māne sati dhanena kim /	mAnaH hi mUlam arTasya mAne sati Danena kim /
   prabhraṣṭamānadarpasya kiṃ dhanena kimāyuṣā // GarP_1,115.12 //	praBrazwa mAna darpasya kim Danena kim AyuzA // GarP_1,115.12 //
   adhamā dhanamicchanti dhanamānau hi madhyamāḥ /	aDamAH Danam icCanti Dana mAnO hi maDyamAH /
   uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // GarP_1,115.13 //	uttamAH mAnam icCanti mAnaH hi mahatAm Danam // GarP_1,115.13 //
   vane 'pi siṃhā na namanti kaṃ ca bubhu kṣitā māṃsanirīkṣaṇaṃ ca /	vane api siMhAH na namanti kam ca buBu kzitAH mAMsa nirIkzaNam ca /
   dhanairvihīnāḥ sukuleṣu jātā na nīcakarmāṇi samārabhante // GarP_1,115.14	DanEH vihInAH su kulezu jAtAH na nIca karmANi samAraBante // GarP_1,115.14
   nābhiṣeko na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane /	na aBizekaH na saMskAraH siMhasya kriyate vane /
   nityamūrjitasattvasya svayameva mṛgendratā // GarP_1,115.15 //	nityam Urjita sattvasya svayam eva mRgendra tA // GarP_1,115.15 //
   vaṇikpramādī bhṛkaśca mānī bhikṣurvilāsī hyadhanaśca kāmī /	vaNij pramAdI BRkaH ca mAnI BikzuH vilAsI hi aDanaH ca kAmI /
   varāṅganā cāpriyavādinī ca na te ca karmāṇi samārabhante // GarP_1,115.16	vara aFganA ca apriya vAdinI ca na te ca karmANi samAraBante // GarP_1,115.16
   dātā daridraḥ kṛpaṇor'thayuktaḥ puttro 'vidheyaḥ kujanasya sevā /	dAtA daridraH kRpaNor aTa yuktaH puttraH aviDeyaH ku janasya sevA /
   paropakāreṣu narasya mṛtyuḥ prajāyate duścaritāni pañca // GarP_1,115.17	para upakArezu narasya mRtyuH prajAyate duScaritAni paQca // GarP_1,115.17
   kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamānaṃ ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kujanasya sevā /	kAntA viyogaH sva jana apamAnam RNasya SezaH ku janasya sevA /
   dāridrayābhāvādvimukhāśca mitrā vināgninā pañca dahanti tīvrāḥ //	dAridrayA aBAvAt vimuKAH ca mitrAH vinA agninA paQca dahanti tIvrAH //
   GarP_1,115.18 //	GarP_1,115.18 //
   cintāsahasreṣu ca teṣu madhye cintāścatasro 'pyasidhāratulyāḥ /	cintA sahasrezu ca tezu maDye cintAH catasraH api asi DAra tulyAH /
   nīcāpamānaṃ kṣudhitaṃ kalatraṃ bhāryā viraktā sahajoparodhaḥ //	nIca apamAnam kzuDitam kalatram BAryA viraktA sahaja uparoDaH //
   GarP_1,115.19 //	GarP_1,115.19 //
   vaśyaśca purtrer'tha karī ca vidyā arogitā sajjanasaṅgatiśca /	vaSyaH ca purtrer aTa karI ca vidyA arogitA sat jana saFgatiH ca /
   iṣṭā ca bhāryā vaśavartinī ca duḥ khasya mūloddharaṇāni pañca //	izwA ca BAryA vaSa vartinI ca duH Kasya mUla udDaraNAni paQca //
   GarP_1,115.20 //	GarP_1,115.20 //
   kuraṅgamātaṅgapataṅgaṃbhṛga mīnā hatāḥ pañcabireva pañca /	kuraFga mAtaFga pataFgaMBRga mInAH hatAH paQcabiH eva paQca /
   ekaḥ pramāthī sa kathaṃ na ghātyo yaḥ sevate pañcabhireva pañca //	ekaH pramATI sa kaTam na GAtyaH yaH sevate paQcaBiH eva paQca //
   GarP_1,115.21 //	GarP_1,115.21 //
   adhīraḥ karkaśaḥ stabdhaḥ kucelaḥ svayamāgataḥ /	aDIraH karkaSaH stabDaH ku celaH svayam AgataH /
   pañca viprā na pūjyante bṛhaspatisamā api // GarP_1,115.22 //	paQca viprAH na pUjyante bRhaspati samAH api // GarP_1,115.22 //
   āyuḥ karma ca vittaṃ ca vidyā nidhanameva ca /	AyuH karma ca vittam ca vidyA niDanam eva ca /
   pañcaitāni vivicyante jāyamānasya dehinaḥ // GarP_1,115.23 //	paQca etAni vivicyante jAyamAnasya dehinaH // GarP_1,115.23 //
   parvatārohaṇe toye gokule duṣṭanigrahe /	parvata ArohaNe toye gokule duzwa nigrahe /
   patitasya samutthāne śastāḥ pañca (hyete) guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.24 //	patitasya samutTAne SastAH paQca (hi ete) guNAH smRtAH // GarP_1,115.24 //
   abhracchāyā khale prītiḥ paranārīṣu saṃgatiḥ /	aBra= CAyA Kale prItiH para nArIzu saMgatiH /
   pañcaite hyasthirā bhāvā yauvanāni dhanāni ca // GarP_1,115.25 //	paQca ete hi asTirAH BAvAH yOvanAni DanAni ca // GarP_1,115.25 //
   asthiraṃ jīvitaṃ loke asthiraṃ dhanayauvanam /	asTiram jIvitam loke asTiram Dana yOvanam /
   asthiraṃ puttradārādyaṃ dharmaḥ kīrtiryaśaḥ sthiram // GarP_1,115.26 //	asTiram puttra dAra Adyam DarmaH kIrtiH yaSaH sTiram // GarP_1,115.26 //
   śata jīvitamatyalpaṃ rātristasyārdhahāriṇī /	Sata jIvitam ati alpam rAtriH tasya arDa hAriNI /
   vyādhiśokajarāyāsairardhaṃ tadapi niṣphalam // GarP_1,115.27 //	vyADi Soka jarA AyAsEH arDam tat api nizPalam // GarP_1,115.27 //
   āyurvarṣaśataṃ nṛṇāṃ parimitaṃ rātrau tadardhaṃ gataṃ	AyuH varza Satam nRNAm parimitam rAtrO tad arDam gatam
   tasyārdhasthitakiñcidardhamadhikaṃ bālyasya kāle gatam /	tasya arDa sTita kiQcid arDam aDikam bAlyasya kAle gatam /
   kiñcidvandhuviyogaduḥ khamaraṇairbhūpālasevāgataṃ śeṣaṃ	kiQcid vanDu viyoga duH Ka maraNEH BUpAla sevA gatam Sezam
   vāritaraṅgagarbhacapalaṃ mānena kiṃ māninām // GarP_1,115.28 //	vAri taraFga garBa capalam mAnena kim mAninAm // GarP_1,115.28 //
   ahorātramayo loke jarārūpeṇa saṃcaret /	ahorAtra mayaH loke jarA rUpeNa saMcaret /
   mṛtyurgrasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā // GarP_1,115.29 //	mRtyuH grasati BUtAni pavanam pannagaH yaTA // GarP_1,115.29 //
   gacchatastiṣṭhato vāpi jāgrataḥ svapato na cet /	gacCataH tizWataH vA api jAgrataH svapataH na ced /
   sarvasattvahitārthāya paśoriva viceṣṭitam // GarP_1,115.30 //	sarva sattva hita arTAya paSoH iva vicezwitam // GarP_1,115.30 //
   ahitahitavicāraśūnyabuddheḥ śrutisamaye bahubhirvitarkitasya /	ahita hita vicAra SUnya budDeH Sruti samaye bahuBiH vitarkitasya /
   udarabharaṇamātratuṣṭabuddheḥ puruṣapaśośca paśośca ko viśeṣaḥ //	udara BaraNa mAtra tuzwa budDeH puruza paSoH ca paSoH ca kaH viSezaH //
   GarP_1,115.31 //	GarP_1,115.31 //
   śaurye tapasi dāne ca yasya na prathitaṃ yaśaḥ /	SOrye tapasi dAne ca yasya na praTitam yaSaH /
   vidyāyāmarthalābhe vā māturuccāra eva saḥ // GarP_1,115.32 //	vidyAyAm arTa lABe vA mAtuH uccAraH eva saH // GarP_1,115.32 //
   yajjīvyate kṣaṇamapi prathitaṃ	yat jIvyate kzaNam api praTitam
   manuṣyairvijñānavikramayaśobhirabhagnamānaiḥ /	manuzyEH vijQAna vikramaya SoBiH aBagna mAnEH /
   tannāma jīvitamiti pravadanti tajjñāḥ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca	tad nAma jIvitam iti pravadanti tad jQAH kAkaH api jIvati ciram ca balim ca
   bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.33 //	BuFkte // GarP_1,115.33 //
   kiṃ jīvitena dhanamānavivarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ bhavati bhītisaśaṅkitena /	kim jIvitena Dana mAna vivarjitena mitreNa kim Bavati BIti sa SaFkitena /
   siṃhavrataṃ carata gacchata mā viṣādaṃ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca	siMha vratam carata gacCata mA vizAdam kAkaH api jIvati ciram ca balim ca
   bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.34 //	BuFkte // GarP_1,115.34 //
   yo vātmanīha na gurau na ca bhṛtyavarge dīne dayāṃ na kurute na ca	yaH vA Atmani iha na gurO na ca BRtya varge dIne dayAm na kurute na ca
   mitrakārye /	mitra kArye /
   kiṃ tasya jīvitaphalenamanuṣyaloke kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca	kim tasya jIvita Palena manuzya loke kAkaH api jIvati ciram ca balim ca
   bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.35 //	BuFkte // GarP_1,115.35 //
   yasya trivargaśūnyāni dinānyāyānti yānti ca /	yasya trivarga SUnyAni dinAni AyAnti yAnti ca /
   sa lauhakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jīvati // GarP_1,115.36 //	sa lOhakAra BastrA iva Svasan= api na jIvati // GarP_1,115.36 //
   svādhīnavṛtteḥ sāphalyaṃ na parādhīnavartitā /	svADIna vRtteH sAPalyam na para aDIna vartitA /
   ye parādhīnakarmāṇo jīvanto 'pi ca te mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.37 //	ye para aDIna karmANaH jIvantaH api ca te mRtAH // GarP_1,115.37 //
   su(sva) pūrā vai kāpuruṣāḥ su(sva) pūro mūṣikāñjaliḥ /	su(sva) pUrAH vE kApuruzAH su(sva) pUraH mUzika aQjaliH /
   asantuṣṭaḥ kāpuruṣaḥ svalpakenāpi tuṣyati // GarP_1,115.38 //	asantuzwaH kApuruzaH su alpakena api tuzyati // GarP_1,115.38 //
   abhracchāyā tṛṇādagnirnocasevā patho jalam /	aBra= CAyA tRNAt agniH nocasA ivA paTaH jalam /
   veśyārāgaḥ khale prītiḥ ṣaḍete budvudopamāḥ // GarP_1,115.39 //	veSyA rAgaH Kale prItiH zaw ete budvuda upamAH // GarP_1,115.39 //
   vācā vihitasārthena loko na ca sukhāyate /	vAcA vihita sArTena lokaH na ca suKAyate /
   jīvitaṃ mānamūlaṃ hi māne mlāne kutaḥ sukham? // GarP_1,115.40 //	jIvitam mAna mUlam hi mAne mlAne kutas suKam? // GarP_1,115.40 //
   abalasya balaṃ rājā bālasya ruditaṃ balam /	abalasya balam rAjA bAlasya ruditam balam /
   balaṃ mūrkhasya maunaṃ hi taskarasyānṛtaṃ balam // GarP_1,115.41 //	balam mUrKasya mOnam hi taskarasya anRtam balam // GarP_1,115.41 //
   yathāyathā hi puruṣaḥ śāstraṃ samadhigacchati /	yaTA yaTA hi puruzaH SAstram samaDigacCati /
   tathātathāsya medhā syādvijñānaṃ cāsya rocate // GarP_1,115.42 //	taTA taTA asya meDA syAt vijQAnam ca asya rocate // GarP_1,115.42 //
   yathāyathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute matim /	yaTA yaTA hi puruzaH kalyANe kurute matim /
   tathātathā hi sarvatra śliṣyate lokasupriyaḥ // GarP_1,115.43 //	taTA taTA hi sarvatra Slizyate loka supriyaH // GarP_1,115.43 //
   lobhapramādaviśvāsaiḥ puruṣo naśyati tribhiḥ /	loBa pramAda viSvAsEH puruzaH naSyati triBiH /
   tasmāllobho na kartavyaḥ pramādo nona viśvaset // GarP_1,115.44 //	tasmAt loBaH na kartavyaH pramAdaH na Una viSvaset // GarP_1,115.44 //
   tāvadbhayasya bhetavyaṃ yāvadbhayamanāgatam /	tAvat Bayasya Betavyam yAvat Bayam anAgatam /
   utpanne tu bhaye tīvre sthātavyaṃ vai hyabhītavat // GarP_1,115.45 //	utpanne tu Baye tIvre sTAtavyam vE hi aBIta vat // GarP_1,115.45 //
   ṛṇaśeṣaṃ cāgniśeṣaṃ vyādhiśeṣaṃ tathaiva ca /	RNa Sezam ca agni Sezam vyADi Sezam taTA eva ca /
   punaḥ punaḥ pravardhante tasmāccheṣaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,115.46 //	punar punar pravarDante tasmAt Sezam na kArayet // GarP_1,115.46 //
   kṛte pratikṛtaṃ kuryāddhiṃsite pratihiṃsitam /	kRte pratikRtam kuryAt hiMsite pratihiMsitam /
   na tatra doṣaṃ paśyāmi duṣṭe doṣaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,115.47 //	na tatra dozam paSyAmi duzwe dozam samAcaret // GarP_1,115.47 //
   parokṣe kāryahantāraṃ pratyakṣe priyavādinam /	parokze kArya hantAram pratyakze priya vAdinam /
   varjayettādṛśaṃ mitraṃ māyāmayamariṃ tathā // GarP_1,115.48 //	varjayet tAdRSam mitram mAyA mayam arim taTA // GarP_1,115.48 //
   durjanasya hi saṃgena sujano 'pi vinaśyati /	durjanasya hi saMgena su janaH api vinaSyati /
   prasannamapi pānīyaṃ kardamaiḥ kaluṣīkṛtam // GarP_1,115.49 //	prasannam api pAnIyam kardamEH kaluzIkRtam // GarP_1,115.49 //
   sa bhuṅkte sadvijo bhuṅkte samaśeṣanirūpaṇam /	sa BuFkte sa dvijaH BuFkte sama Seza nirUpaNam /
   tasmātsarvaprayatnena dvijaḥ pūjyaḥ prayatnataḥ // GarP_1,115.50 //	tasmAt sarva prayatnena dvijaH pUjyaH prayatnataH // GarP_1,115.50 //
   tadbhujyate yaddvijabhuktaśeṣaṃ sa buddhimānyo na karoti pāpam /	tat Bujyate yat dvija Bukta Sezam sa budDimAn yaH na karoti pApam /
   tatsauhṛdaṃ yakriyate parokṣe dambhairvinā yaḥ kriyate sa dharmaḥ //	tad sOhRdam yakriyate parokze damBEH vinA yaH kriyate sa DarmaH //
   GarP_1,115.51 //	GarP_1,115.51 //
   na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhāḥ vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam /	na sA saBA yatra na santi vRdDAH vRdDAH na te ye na vadanti Darmam /
   dharmaḥ sa no yatra na satyamasti naitatsatyaṃ yacchalenānuviddham //	DarmaH sa naH yatra na satyam asti na etat satyam yat Calena anuvidDam //
   GarP_1,115.52 //	GarP_1,115.52 //
   brāhmaṇo 'pi manuṣyāṇāmādityaścaiva tejasām /	brAhmaNaH api manuzyANAm AdityaH ca eva tejasAm /
   śiro 'pi sarvagātrāṇāṃ vratānāṃ satyamuttamam // GarP_1,115.53 //	SiraH api sarva gAtrANAm vratAnAm satyam uttamam // GarP_1,115.53 //
   tanmaṅgalaṃ yatra manaḥ prasannaṃ tajjīvanaṃ yanna parasya sevā /	tat maFgalam yatra manaH prasannam tat jIvanam yat na parasya sevA /
   tadarjitaṃ yatsvajanena bhuktaṃ tadgarjitaṃ yatsamare ripūṇām //	tad arjitam yat sva janena Buktam tat garjitam yat samare ripUNAm //
   GarP_1,115.54 //	GarP_1,115.54 //
   sā strīyā na madaṃ kuryātsa sukhī tṛṣṇayojjhitaḥ /	sA strIyAH na madam kuryAt sa suKI tRzNayA ujJitaH /
   tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ puruṣaḥ sa jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,115.55 //	tat mitram yatra viSvAsaH puruzaH sa jita indriyaH // GarP_1,115.55 //
   tatra muktādarasneho viluptaṃ yatra sauhṛdam /	tatra mukta Adara snehaH viluptam yatra sOhRdam /
   tadeva kevalaṃ ślaghyaṃ yasyātmā kriyate stutau // GarP_1,115.56 //	tat eva kevalam SlaGyam yasya AtmA kriyate stutO // GarP_1,115.56 //
   nadīnāmagnihotrāṇāṃ bhāratasya kalasya ca /	nadInAm agni hotrANAm BAratasya kalasya ca /
   mūlānveṣo na kartavyo mūlāddoṣo na hīyate // GarP_1,115.57 //	mUla anvezaH na kartavyaH mUlAt dozaH na hIyate // GarP_1,115.57 //
   lavaṇajalāntā nadyaḥ strībhedāntaṃ ca maithunam /	lavaNa jala antAH nadyaH strI Beda antam ca mETunam /
   ṣaiśunyaṃ janavārtāntaṃ vittaṃ duḥ khatrayāntakam // GarP_1,115.58 //	zESunyam jana vArtA antam vittam duH Ka traya antakam // GarP_1,115.58 //
   rājyaśrīrbrahmaśāpāntā pāpāntaṃ brahmavarcasam /	rAjya SrIH brahma SApa antA pApa antam brahmavarcasam /
   ācāntaṃ ghoṣavāsāntaṃ kulasyāntaṃ striyā prabho (bhuḥ) // GarP_1,115.59 //	AcAntam Goza vAsa antam kulasya antam striyA praBo (BuH) // GarP_1,115.59 //
   sarve kṣayāntā nilayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ /	sarve kzaya antAH nilayAH patana antAH samucCrayAH /
   saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,115.60 //	saMyogAH viprayoga antAH maraNa antam hi jIvitam // GarP_1,115.60 //
   yadīcchetpunarāgantuṃ nātidūramanuvrajet /	yadi icCet punar Agantum na ati dUram anuvrajet /
   udakāntānnivarteta snigdhavarṇācca pādapāt // GarP_1,115.61 //	udaka antAn nivarteta snigDa varNAt ca pAdapAt // GarP_1,115.61 //
   anāyake na vastavyaṃ na caiva bahunāyake /	anAyake na vastavyam na ca eva bahu nAyake /
   strīnāyake na vastavyaṃ vastavyaṃ bālanāyake // GarP_1,115.62 //	strI nAyake na vastavyam vastavyam bAla nAyake // GarP_1,115.62 //
   pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhattā rakṣati yauvane /	pitA rakzati kOmAre BattA rakzati yOvane /
   putrastu sthavire kāle na strī svātantryamarhati // GarP_1,115.63 //	putraH tu sTavire kAle na strI svAtantryam arhati // GarP_1,115.63 //
   tyajedvandhyāmaṣṭame 'bde navame tu mṛtaprijām /	tyajet vanDyAm azwame abde navame tu mRta prijAm /
   ekādaśe strījananīṃ sadyaścāpriyāvādinīm // GarP_1,115.64 //	ekAdaSe strI jananIm sadyas ca apriya avAdinIm // GarP_1,115.64 //
   anarthitvānmanuṣyāṇāṃ bhiyā parijanasya ca /	anarTi tvAt manuzyANAm BiyA parijanasya ca /
   arthādapetamaryādāstrayastiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu // GarP_1,115.65 //	arTAt apeta maryAdAH trayaH tizWanti BartRzu // GarP_1,115.65 //
   aśvaṃ śrāntaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ gāvaḥ prathamasūtikāḥ /	aSvam SrAntam gajam mattam gAvaH praTama sUtikAH /
   anūdake ca maṇḍūkānprājño dūreṇa varjayet // GarP_1,115.66 //	anUdake ca maNxUkAn prAjQaH dUreNa varjayet // GarP_1,115.66 //
   arthāturāṇāṃ na suhṛnna bandhuḥ kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā /	arTa AturANAm na suhRd na banDuH kAma AturANAm na Bayam na lajjA /
   cintāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ //	cintA AturANAm na suKam na nidrA kzuDA AturANAm na balam na tejaH //
   GarP_1,115.67 //	GarP_1,115.67 //
   kuto nidrā daridrasya parapreṣyavarasya ca /	kutas nidrA daridrasya para prezya varasya ca /
   paranārīprasaktasya paradravyaharasya ca // GarP_1,115.68 //	para nArI prasaktasya para dravya harasya ca // GarP_1,115.68 //
   sukhaṃ svapityanṛṇavānvyādhimuktaśca yo naraḥ /	suKam svapiti anRNavAn vyADi muktaH ca yaH naraH /
   sāvakāśastu vai bhuṅkte yastu dārairna saṅgataḥ // GarP_1,115.69 //	sa avakASaH tu vE BuFkte yaH tu dArEH na saFgataH // GarP_1,115.69 //
   ambhasaḥ parimāṇe unnataṃ kamalaṃ bhavet /	amBasaH parimANe unnatam kamalam Bavet /
   svasvāminā balavatā bhṛtyo bhavati garvitaḥ // GarP_1,115.70 //	sva svAminA balavatA BRtyaH Bavati garvitaH // GarP_1,115.70 //
   sthānasthitasya padmasya mitre varuṇabhāskarau /	sTAna sTitasya padmasya mitre varuNa BAskarO /
   sthānacyutasya tasyaiva kledaśoṣaṇakārakau // GarP_1,115.71 //	sTAna cyutasya tasya eva kleda SozaNa kArakO // GarP_1,115.71 //
   ye padasthasya mittrāṇi te tasya riputāṃ gatāḥ /	ye pada sTasya mittrANi te tasya ripu tAm gatAH /
   bhānoḥ padme jale prītiḥ sthaloddharaṇaśoṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,115.72 //	BAnoH padme jale prItiH sTala udDaraNa SozaNaH // GarP_1,115.72 //
   sthānasthitāni pūjyante pūjyante ca pade sthitāḥ /	sTAna sTitAni pUjyante pUjyante ca pade sTitAH /
   sthānabhraṣṭā na pūjyante keśā dantā nakhā narāḥ // GarP_1,115.73 //	sTAna BrazwAH na pUjyante keSAH dantAH naKAH narAH // GarP_1,115.73 //
   ācāraḥ kulamākhyati deśamākhyāti bhāṣitam /	AcAraH kulam AKyati deSam AKyAti BAzitam /
   sambhramaḥ snehamākhyāti vapurākhyāti bhojanam // GarP_1,115.74 //	samBramaH sneham AKyAti vapuH AKyAti Bojanam // GarP_1,115.74 //
   vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam /	vRTA vRzwiH samudrasya vRTA tRptasya Bojanam /
   vṛthā dānaṃ samṛddhasya nīcasya sukṛtaṃ vathā // GarP_1,115.75 //	vRTA dAnam samRdDasya nIcasya sukRtam vaTAH // GarP_1,115.75 //
   dūrastho 'pi samīpastho yo yasya hṛdaye sthitaḥ /	dUra sTaH api samIpa sTaH yaH yasya hRdaye sTitaH /
   hṛdayādapi niṣkrāntaḥ samīpastho 'pi dūrataḥ // GarP_1,115.76 //	hRdayAt api nizkrAntaH samIpa sTaH api dUratas // GarP_1,115.76 //
   mukhabhaṅgaḥ svaro dīno gātrasvedo mahadbhayam /	muKa BaFgaH svaraH dInaH gAtra svedaH mahat Bayam /
   maraṇe yāni cihnāni tāni cihnāni yācake // GarP_1,115.77 //	maraNe yAni cihnAni tAni cihnAni yAcake // GarP_1,115.77 //
   kubjasya kīṭaghātasya vātānniṣkāsitasya ca /	kubjasya kIwa GAtasya vAtAt nizkAsitasya ca /
   śikhare vasatastasya varaṃ janma na yācitam // GarP_1,115.78 //	SiKare vasataH tasya varam janma na yAcitam // GarP_1,115.78 //
   jagatpatirhi yācitvā viṣṇurvāmanatāṃ yataḥ /	jagatpatiH hi yAcitvA vizNuH vAmana tAm yatas /
   kānyo 'dhikatarastasya yor'tho yāti na lāghavam // GarP_1,115.79 //	kAnyaH aDikataraH tasya yor aTo yAti na lAGavam // GarP_1,115.79 //
   mātā śatruḥ pitā vairī bālā yena na pāṭhitāḥ /	mAtA SatruH pitA vErI bAlAH yena na pAWitAH /
   sabhāmadhye na śobhante haṃsamadhye bakāyathā // GarP_1,115.80 //	saBA maDye na SoBante haMsa maDye bakAyaTAH // GarP_1,115.80 //
   vidyā nāma kurūparūpamadhikaṃ vidyātiguptaṃ dhanaṃ vidyā sādhukarī	vidyA nAma ku rUpa rUpam aDikam vidyA ati guptam Danam vidyA sADu karI
   janapriyakarī vidyā gurūṇāṃ guruḥ /	jana priya karI vidyA gurUNAm guruH /
   vidyā bandhujanārtināśanakarī vidyā paraṃ daivataṃ vidyā rājasu pūjitā hi	vidyA banDu jana Arti nASana karI vidyA param dEvatam vidyA rAjasu pUjitAH hi
   manujo vidyavihīnaḥ paśuḥ // GarP_1,115.81 //	manujaH vidya vihInaH paSuH // GarP_1,115.81 //
   gṛhe cābhyantare dravyaṃ lagnaṃ caiva tu dṛśyate /	gRhe ca aByantare dravyam lagnam ca eva tu dRSyate /
   aśeṣaṃ haraṇīyaṃ ca vidyā na hriyate paraiḥ // GarP_1,115.82 //	aSezam haraNIyam ca vidyA na hriyate parEH // GarP_1,115.82 //
   śaunakīyaṃ nītisāraṃ viṣṇuḥ sarvatratāni ca /	SOnakIyam nIti sAram vizNuH sarvatratAni ca /
   kathayāmāsa vaipūrvaṃ tatra śuśrāva śaṅkaraḥ /	kaTayAmAsa vEpUrvam tatra SuSrAva SaFkaraH /
   śaṅkarādaśṛṇodvyāso vyāsādasmābhireva ca // GarP_1,115.83 //	SaFkarAt aSRNot vyAsaH vyAsAt asmABiH eva ca // GarP_1,115.83 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   śaunakoktanītisārādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcadaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	SOnakoktanItisArAdivarNanam nAma paQcadaSottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  116	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 116
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi hariryaiḥ sarvado bhavet /	vratAni vyAsa vakzyAmi hariH yEH sarva daH Bavet /
   sarvamāsarkṣatithiṣu vāreṣu harirarcitaḥ // GarP_1,116.1 //	sarva mAsa Rkza tiTizu vArezu hariH arcitaH // GarP_1,116.1 //
   ekabhaktena naktena upavāsaphalādinā /	eka Baktena naktena upavAsa Pala AdinA /
   dadāti dhanadhānyādi putrarājyajayādikam // GarP_1,116.2 //	dadAti Dana DAnya Adi putra rAjya jaya Adikam // GarP_1,116.2 //
   vaiśvānaraḥ pratipadi kuberaḥ pūjitor'thadaḥ /	vESvAnaraH pratipadi kuberaH pUjitor aTa daH /
   poṣya brahmo pratipadyarcitaḥ śristathāśvinī // GarP_1,116.3 //	pozya brahmo pratipadi arcitaH SriH taTA aSvinI // GarP_1,116.3 //
   dvitīyāyāṃ yamo lakṣmīnārāyaṇa ihārthadaḥ /	dvitIyAyAm yamaH lakzmI nArAyaNaH iha arTa daH /
   tṛtīyāyāṃ tridevāśca gaurīvighneśaśaṅkarāḥ // GarP_1,116.4 //	tRtIyAyAm tri devAH ca gOrI viGneSa SaFkarAH // GarP_1,116.4 //
   caturthyāṃ ca caturvyūhaḥ pañcamyāmarcito hariḥ /	caturTyAm ca catur vyUhaH paQcamyAm arcitaH hariH /
   kārtikeyo raviḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ // GarP_1,116.5 //	kArtikeyaH raviH zazWyAm saptamyAm BAskaror aTa daH // GarP_1,116.5 //
   durgāṣṭamyāṃ navamyāṃ ca mātaro 'tha diśor'thadāḥ /	durgAzwamyAm navamyAm ca mAtaraH aTa diSoH aTa dAH /
   daśamyāṃ ca yamaścandra ekādaśyāmṛṣīnyajet // GarP_1,116.6 //	daSamyAm ca yamaH candraH ekAdaSyAm RzIn yajet // GarP_1,116.6 //
   dvādaśyāṃ ca hariḥ kāmastrayodaśyāṃ maheśvaraḥ /	dvAdaSyAm ca hariH kAmaH trayodaSyAm maheSvaraH /
   caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaror'thadāḥ // GarP_1,116.7 //	caturdaSyAm paQcadaSyAm brahmA ca pitaror aTa dAH // GarP_1,116.7 //
   amāvāsyāṃ pūjanīyā vārā vai bhāskarādayaḥ /	amAvAsyAm pUjanIyAH vArA vE BAskara AdayaH /
   nakṣatrāṇi ca yogāśca pūjitāḥ sarvadāyakāḥ // GarP_1,116.8 //	nakzatrANi ca yogAH ca pUjitAH sarva dAyakAH // GarP_1,116.8 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   tithyādivratavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	tiTyAdivratavarNanam nAma zoxaSottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  117	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 117
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   mārgaśīrṣe site pakṣe vyāsāṃnaṅgatrayodaśī /	mArgaSIrze site pakze vyAsAMnaFga trayodaSI /
   mallikājaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ dhutūraiḥ pūjayecchivam // GarP_1,117.1 //	mallikA jam dantakAzWam DutUrEH pUjayet Sivam // GarP_1,117.1 //
   anaṅgāyeti naivedyaṃ madhaprāśyātha pauṣake /	anaFgAya iti nEvedyam maDa prASya aTa pOzake /
   yogeśvaraṃ pūjayecca bilvapatraiḥ kadambajam /	yogeSvaram pUjayet ca bilva patrEH kadamba jam /
   dantakāṣṭhaṃ candanādi naivedyaṃ kṛsarādikam // GarP_1,117.2 //	dantakAzWam candana Adi nEvedyam kRsara Adikam // GarP_1,117.2 //
   māghe naṭeśvarāyārcya kundairmauktikamālayā /	mAGe naweSvarAya arcya kundEH mOktika mAlayA /
   plakṣeṇa dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca naivedyaṃ pūrikā mune // GarP_1,117.3 //	plakzeNa dantakAzWam ca nEvedyam pUrikA mune // GarP_1,117.3 //
   vīreśvaraṃ phālgune tu pūjayettu marūbakaiḥ /	vIreSvaram PAlgune tu pUjayet tu marUbakEH /
   śarkarāśākamaṇḍāśca cūtajaṃ dantadhāvanam // GarP_1,117.4 //	SarkarA SAka maNxAH ca cUta jam dantaDAvanam // GarP_1,117.4 //
   caitre yajetsu rūpāya karpūraṃ prāśayenniśi /	cEtre yajetsu rUpAya karpUram prASayet niSi /
   dantadhāvanāṭajaṃ naivedyaṃ śaṣkulīṃ dadet // GarP_1,117.5 //	dantaDAvanAwa jam nEvedyam SazkulIm dadet // GarP_1,117.5 //
   pūjā damanakaḥ śambhorveśākhe 'śokrapuṣpakaiḥ /	pUjA damanakaH SamBoH veSAKe aSokra puzpakEH /
   mahārūpāya naivedyaṃ guḍabhaktaṃ puṭṭabaram // GarP_1,117.6 //	mahArUpAya nEvedyam guxa Baktam puwwabaram // GarP_1,117.6 //
   dantakāṣṭhaṃ prāśayecca dadejjatīphalaṃ tathā /	dantakAzWam prASayet ca dadet jatI Palam taTA /
   pradyumnaṃ pūjayejjyeṣṭhe campakairbilvajaṃ daśet // GarP_1,117.7 //	pradyumnam pUjayet jyezWe campakEH bilva jam daSet // GarP_1,117.7 //
   lavagārā tathā ṣaḍhi umāmadati śāsanaḥ? /	lavagArA taTA zaXi umAm adati SAsanaH? /
   aguruṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca tamapāmārgakairyajet // GarP_1,117.8 //	agurum dantakAzWam ca tam apAmArgakEH yajet // GarP_1,117.8 //
   śrāvaṇe karavīraṃ ca śambhave śūlapāṇaye /	SrAvaNe karavIram ca SamBave SUlapANaye /
   gandhāśano ghṛtādyaiśca karavīrajaśodhanam // GarP_1,117.9 //	ganDa aSanaH GRta AdyEH ca karavIra ja SoDanam // GarP_1,117.9 //
   sadyojātaṃ bhādrapade bakulaiḥ pūpakairyajet /	sadyojAtam BAdrapade bakulEH pUpakEH yajet /
   gandharvāśo madanakamāśvine ca surādhipam // GarP_1,117.10 //	ganDarva ASaH madanakam ASvine ca sura aDipam // GarP_1,117.10 //
   campakaiḥ svarṇavā (dhār) yādo jinmodakasaṃpradaḥ /	campakEH svarNavAH (DAr) yAdaH jinma udaka saMpradaH /
   khādiraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca kārtike rudramarcayet // GarP_1,117.11 //	KAdiram dantakAzWam ca kArtike rudram arcayet // GarP_1,117.11 //
   badaryā dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca madano daśamāśanaḥ /	badaryAH dantakAzWam ca madanaH daSama aSanaH /
   kṣīraśākapradaḥ padmairabdante śivamarcayet // GarP_1,117.12 //	kzIraSAka pradaH padmEH abdante Sivam arcayet // GarP_1,117.12 //
   ratimuktamanaṅgaṃ ca svarṇamaṇḍalasaṃsthitam /	rati muktam anaFgam ca svarNa maNxala saMsTitam /
   gandhādyairdaśasāhasraṃ tilavrīhyādi homayet // GarP_1,117.13 //	ganDa AdyEH daSa sAhasram tila vrIhi Adi homayet // GarP_1,117.13 //
   jāgaraṃ gītavaditraṃ prabhita'bhyārcya vedayet /	jAgaram gIta vaditram praBita aByArcya vedayet /
   dvijāya śayyāṃ pātraṃ ca chatraṃ vastramupānahau // GarP_1,117.14 //	dvijAya SayyAm pAtram ca Catram vastram upAnahO // GarP_1,117.14 //
   gāṃ dvijaṃ bhojayedbhaktyā kṛtakṛtyo bhavennaraḥ /	gAm dvijam Bojayet BaktyA kRtakRtyaH Bavet naraH /
   etadudyāpanaṃ sarvaṃ vrateṣu dhyepamīdṛśam /	etat udyApanam sarvam vratezu Dyepam IdRSam /
   phalañca śrīsutārogyasaubhāgyasvargataṃ bhavet // GarP_1,117.15 //	PalaQca SrI sutA rogya sOBAgya svar gatam Bavet // GarP_1,117.15 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   'naṅgatrayodaśīvrataṃ nāma saptadaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	anaFgatrayodaSIvratam nAma saptadaSottaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  118	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 118
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   vrataṃ kaivalyaśamanamakhaṇḍadvādaśīṃ vade /	vratam kEvalya Samanam aKaNxa dvAdaSIm vade /
   māgaśīrṣe site pakṣe gavyāśī samupoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,118.1 //	mAgaSIrze site pakze gavya ASI samupozitaH // GarP_1,118.1 //
   dvādaśyāṃ pūjaye dviṣṇuṃ dadyānmāsacatuṣṭayam /	dvAdaSyAm pUjaye dvizNum dadyAt mAsa catuzwayam /
   pañcavrīhiyutaṃ pātraṃ viprāyedamudāharet // GarP_1,118.2 //	paQca vrIhi yutam pAtram viprAya idam udAharet // GarP_1,118.2 //
   saptajanmani he viṣṇo yanmayā hi vrataṃ kṛtam /	sapta janmani he vizNo yat mayA hi vratam kRtam /
   bhagavaṃstvatprasādena tadakhaṇḍamihāstu me // GarP_1,118.3 //	Bagavan= tvad prasAdena tat aKaNxam iha astu me // GarP_1,118.3 //
   yathākhaṇḍaṃ jagatsarvaṃ tvameva puruṣottama /	yaTAKaNxam jagat sarvam tvam eva puruzottamaH /
   tathākhilānyakhaṇḍāni vritāni mama santi vai // GarP_1,118.4 //	taTA aKilAni aKaNxAni vritAni mama santi vE // GarP_1,118.4 //
   saktupātrāṇi caitrādau śrāvaṇādau ghṛtānvitān /	saktu pAtrANi cEtra AdO SrAvaNa AdO GRta anvitAn /
   vratakṛdvatapūrṇastu strīputrasvargabhāgbhavet // GarP_1,118.5 //	vrata kRt vata pUrNaH tu strI putra svarga BAj Bavet // GarP_1,118.5 //

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  119	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 119
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /

   aprāpte bhāskare kanyāṃ sati bhāge tribhirdinaiḥ // GarP_1,119.1 //	aprApte BAskare kanyAm sati BAge triBiH dinEH // GarP_1,119.1 //
   arghyaṃ dadyādagastyāya mūrtiṃ saṃpūjya vai mune ! /	arGyam dadyAt agastyAya mUrtim saMpUjya vE mune ! /
   kāśapuṣpamayīṃ kumbhe pradoṣe kṛtajāgaraḥ // GarP_1,119.2 //	kASa puzpa mayIm kumBe pradoze kRta jAgaraH // GarP_1,119.2 //
   dadhyakṣatādyaiḥ saṃpūjya upoṣya phalapuṣpakaiḥ /	daDi akzata AdyEH saMpUjyaH upozya Pala puzpakEH /

   khāsapuṣpapratīkāśa agnimārutasambhava ! /	KAsapuzpa pratIkASa agni mAruta samBava ! /
   mitrāvāruṇayoḥ puttro kumbhayone namo 'stu te // GarP_1,119.5 //	mitrAvAruNayoH puttraH kumBayone namaH astu te // GarP_1,119.5 //
   śūdrastryādiranenaiva tyajeddhānyaṃ phalaṃ rasam /	SUdra strI AdiH anena eva tyajet DAnyam Palam rasam /
   dadyāddvijātaye kumbhaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ sadakṣiṇam /	dadyAt dvijAtaye kumBam sa hiraNyam sa dakziNam /
   bhojayecca dvijānsapta varṣaṃ kṛtvā tu sarvabhāk // GarP_1,119.6 //	Bojayet ca dvijAn sapta varzam kRtvA tu sarva BAj // GarP_1,119.6 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'gastyārghyavrataṃ	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe agastya arGya vratam

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  120	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 120
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /

   gaurīṃ yajedvilvapatraiḥ kuśodakakarastataḥ /	gOrIm yajet vilva patrEH kuSa udaka karaH tatas /

   viśālākṣīṃ damanakaiścaitre ca kṛsarapradaḥ /	viSAla akzIm damanakEH cEtre ca kRsara pradaH /
   dadhiprāśo dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaraṃ śrīmukhīṃ yajet // GarP_1,120.5 //	daDi prASaH dantakAzWam tagaram SrI muKIm yajet // GarP_1,120.5 //
   vaiśākhe karṇikāraiśca aśokāśo vaṭapradaḥ /	vESAKe karNikArEH ca aSoka ASaH vawa pradaH /
   jyeṣṭhe nārāyaṇīmarcecchatapatraiśca khaṇḍadaḥ /	jyezWe nArAyaNIm arcet Sata patrEH ca KaNxa daH /
   lavaṅgāśo bhavedeva āṣāḍhe mādhavīṃ yajet // GarP_1,120.6 //	lavaFga ASaH Bavet eva AzAXe mADavIm yajet // GarP_1,120.6 //
   tilāśo bilvapatraiśca kṣīrānnavaṭakapradaḥ /	tilASaH bilva patrEH ca kzIra anna vawaka pradaH /
   audumbaraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaryāḥ śrāvaṇe śriyam // GarP_1,120.7 //	Odumbaram dantakAzWam tagaryAH SrAvaNe Sriyam // GarP_1,120.7 //
   dantakāṣṭhaṃ mallikāyā kṣīrado hyuttamāṃ yajet /	dantakAzWam mallikAyAH kzIra daH hi uttamAm yajet /
   padmairyajedbhādrapade śṛṅgadāśo gṛḍādidaḥ // GarP_1,120.8 //	padmEH yajet BAdrapade SRFgadASaH gRxAdi daH // GarP_1,120.8 //
   rājaputrīṃ cāśvayuje japāpuṣpaiśca jīrakam /	rAja putrIm ca ASvayuje japA puzpEH ca jIrakam /
   prāśayenniśi naivedyaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ kārtike yajet // GarP_1,120.9 //	prASayet niSi nEvedyEH kRsarEH kArtike yajet // GarP_1,120.9 //
   jātīpuṣpaiḥ padmajāṃ ca pañcagavyāśano yajet /	jAtI puzpEH padmajAm ca paQcagavya aSanaH yajet /
   ghṛtodanaṃ ca varṣānte sapatnīkāndvijānyajet // GarP_1,120.10 //	GRtodanam ca varza ante sa patnIkAn dvijAn yajet // GarP_1,120.10 //
   umāmaheśvaraṃ pūjya pradadyācca guḍādikam /	umA maheSvaram pUjya pradadyAt ca guxa Adikam /
   vastracchatrasuvarṇādyaiḥ rātrau ca kṛtajāgaraḥ /	vastra= Catra suvarNa AdyEH rAtrO ca kRta jAgaraH /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  121	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 121
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   cāturmāsyavratānyūce ekādaśyāṃ samācaret /	cAturmAsya vratAni Uce ekAdaSyAm samAcaret /
   āṣāḍhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā sarveṇaharimarcyaca // GarP_1,121.1 //	AzAXyAm pOrNamAsyAm vA sarveNa harim arcya ca // GarP_1,121.1 //
   idaṃ vrataṃ mayā deva gṛhītaṃ puratastava /	idam vratam mayA deva gRhItam puratas tava /
   nirvighnaṃ siddhimāpnotu prasanne tvayi keśava // GarP_1,121.2 //	nirviGnam sidDim Apnotu prasanne tvayi keSava // GarP_1,121.2 //
   gṛhīte 'sminvrate deva yadyapūrṇe mriyāmyaham /	gRhIte asmin vrate deva yadi apUrNe mriyAmi aham /
   tanme bhavatu sampūrṇaṃ tvatprasādājjanārdana // GarP_1,121.3 //	tat me Bavatu sampUrNam tvad prasAdAt janArdana // GarP_1,121.3 //
   evamabhyarcya gṛhṇīyādvratārcanajapādikam /	evam aByarcya gRhNIyAt vrata arcana japa Adikam /

   snātvāyobhyacya gṛhṇīyādvratārcanajapādikam /	snAtvA aya uByacya gRhNIyAt vrata arcana japa Adikam /
   snātvā yaccaturo māsānekabhaktena pūjayet /	snAtvA yat caturaH mAsa aneka Baktena pUjayet /
   viṣṇuṃ sa yāti viṣṇorva lokaṃ malavivarjitam // GarP_1,121.5 //	vizNum sa yAti vizNoH va lokam mala vivarjitam // GarP_1,121.5 //
   madyamāṃsasurātyagī vedaviddharipūjanāt /	madya mAMsa surAtyagI veda vid DaripUjanAt /
   tailavarji viṣṇulokaṃ viṣṇubhākkṛcchrapādakṛt // GarP_1,121.6 //	tEla varji vizNu lokam vizNu BAj kRcCra pAda kRt // GarP_1,121.6 //
   ekarātropavāsācca devo vaimāniko bhavet /	eka rAtra upavAsAt ca devaH vEmAnikaH Bavet /
   śvetadvīpaṃ trirātrāttu vrajetṣaṣṭhānnakṛnnaraḥ // GarP_1,121.7 //	SvetadvIpam tri rAtrAt tu vrajet zazWa anna kRt naraH // GarP_1,121.7 //
   cāndrāyaṇāddharerdhāma labhenmuktimayācitām /	cAndrAyaNAt hareH DAma laBet muktim ayAcitAm /
   prājāpatyaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ parākavratakṛddharim // GarP_1,121.8 //	prAjApatyam vizNu lokam parAka vrata kRt harim // GarP_1,121.8 //
   saktuyāvakabhikṣāśī payodadhighṛtāśanaḥ /	saktu yAvaka BikzA ASI payaH daDi GRta aSanaH /
   gomūtrayāvakāhāraḥ pañcagavyakṛtāśanaḥ /	go mUtra yAvaka AhAraH paQcagavya kRta aSanaH /
   śākamalaphalādyāśī rasavarjo ca viṣṇubhāk // GarP_1,121.9 //	SAka mala Pala Adi ASI rasa varjaH ca vizNu BAj // GarP_1,121.9 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  122	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 122
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /

   vānaprastho yatirnārī kuryānmāsopavāsakam // GarP_1,122.1 //	vAnaprasTaH yatiH nArI kuryAt mAsa upavAsakam // GarP_1,122.1 //
   āśvinasya site pakṣe ekādaśyāmupoṣitaḥ /	ASvinasya site pakze ekAdaSyAm upozitaH /

   adyaprabhṛtyahaṃ viṣṇo yāvadutthānakaṃ tava /	adya praBRti aham vizNo yAvat utTAnakam tava /

   hariṃ yajottriṣavaṇasnāyī gandhādibhirvratī /	harim yaja uttrizavaNa snAyI ganDa AdiBiH vratI /
   gātrābhyaṅgaṃ gandhalepaṃ devatāyatane tyajet // GarP_1,122.5 //	gAtra aByaFgam ganDa lepam devatAyatane tyajet // GarP_1,122.5 //
   dvādaśyāmatha saṃpūjya pradadyāddvijabhojanam /	dvAdaSyAm aTa saMpUjya pradadyAt dvija Bojanam /

   dugdhādiprāśanaṃ kuryādvratastho mūrchito 'ntarā /	dugDa Adi prASanam kuryAt vrata sTaH mUrCitaH antarA /
   dugdhādyairna vrataṃ naśyedbhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,122.7 //	dugDa AdyEH na vratam naSyet Bukti muktim avApnuyAt // GarP_1,122.7 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   māsopavāsavrataṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	mAsopavAsavratam nAma dvAviMSatyuttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  123	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 123
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   vratāni kārtike vakṣye snātvā viṣṇuṃ prapūjayet /	vratAni kArtike vakzye snAtvA vizNum prapUjayet /
   ekabhaktena naktena māsaṃ vāyācitena vā // GarP_1,123.1 //	eka Baktena naktena mAsam vA ayAcitena vA // GarP_1,123.1 //
   dugdhaśākaphalādyairvā upavāsena vā punaḥ /	dugDa SAka Pala AdyEH vA upavAsena vA punar /
   sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prāptakāmo hariṃ vrajet // GarP_1,123.2 //	sarva pApa vinirmuktaH prApta kAmaH harim vrajet // GarP_1,123.2 //
   sadā harervrataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tataḥ syāddakṣiṇāyane /	sadA hareH vratam SrezWam tatas syAt dakziNAyane /
   cāturmāsye tatastasmātkārtike bhīṣmapañcakam // GarP_1,123.3 //	cAturmAsye tatas tasmAt kArtike BIzma paQcakam // GarP_1,123.3 //
   tataḥ śreṣṭhavrataṃ śuklasyaikādaśyāṃ samācaret /	tatas SrezWa vratam Suklasya ekAdaSyAm samAcaret /
   snātvā trikālaṃ pitrādīnyavādyairarcayeddharim // GarP_1,123.4 //	snAtvA tri kAlam pitR AdIn yava AdyEH arcayet harim // GarP_1,123.4 //
   yajenmaunī ghṛtādyaiśca pañcagavyena vāribhiḥ /	yajet mOnI GRta AdyEH ca paQcagavyena vAriBiH /
   snāpayitvātha karpūramukhaiścaivānulepayet // GarP_1,123.5 //	snApayitvA aTa karpUra muKEH ca eva anulepayet // GarP_1,123.5 //
   ghṛtāktaguggulairdhūpaṃ dvijaḥ pañcadinaṃ dahet /	GRta akta guggulEH DUpam dvijaH paQca dinam dahet /
   naivadyaṃ paramānnaṃ tu japedaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // GarP_1,123.6 //	nEvadyam paramAnnam tu japet azwa uttaram Satam // GarP_1,123.6 //
   oṃ namo vāsudevāya ghṛtavrīhitilādikam /	om namaH vAsudevAya GRta vrIhi tila Adikam /
   aṣṭākṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhāntena tu homayet // GarP_1,123.7 //	azwa akzareNa mantreNa svAhA antena tu homayet // GarP_1,123.7 //
   prathame 'hni hareḥ pādau yajetpadmairdvitayika /	praTame ahni hareH pAdO yajet padmEH dvitayika /
   bilvapatrairjānudeśaṃ nābhi gandhena cāpare // GarP_1,123.8 //	bilva patrEH jAnu deSam nABi ganDena ca apare // GarP_1,123.8 //
   skandhā bilvajavābhiśca pañcame 'hni śiror'cayat /	skanDAH bilva javABiH ca paQcame ahni Siror acayat /
   mālatyā bhūmiśāyī syādgomayaṃ prāśayetkramāt // GarP_1,123.9 //	mAlatyA BUmi SAyI syAt gomayam prASayet kramAt // GarP_1,123.9 //
   gomūtraṃ ca dadhi kṣīraṃ pañcame pañcagavyakam /	go mUtram ca daDi kzIram paQcame paQcagavyakam /
   naktaṃ kuryātpañcadaśyāṃ vratī syādbhuktimuktibhāk // GarP_1,123.10 //	naktam kuryAt paQcadaSyAm vratI syAt Bukti mukti BAj // GarP_1,123.10 //
   ekādaśīvrataṃ nityaṃ tatkuryātpakṣayordvayoḥ /	ekAdaSIvratam nityam tat kuryAt pakzayoH dvayoH /
   aghaughanarakaṃ hanyātsarvadaṃ viṣṇulokadam // GarP_1,123.11 //	aGa oGa narakam hanyAt sarva dam vizNu loka dam // GarP_1,123.11 //
   ekādaśī dvādaśī ca niśānte ca trayodaśī /	ekAdaSI dvAdaSI ca niSA ante ca trayodaSI /
   nityamekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ // GarP_1,123.12 //	nityam ekAdaSI yatra tatra sannihitaH hariH // GarP_1,123.12 //
   daśamyekādaśī yatra tatrasthāścāsurādayaḥ /	daSamI ekAdaSI yatra tatrasTAH ca asura AdayaH /
   dvādaśyāṃ pāraṇa kuryātsūtake mṛtake caret // GarP_1,123.13 //	dvAdaSyAm pAraNa kuryAt sUtake mRtake caret // GarP_1,123.13 //
   caturdaśīṃ pratipadaṃ pūrvamiśrāmupāvaset /	caturdaSIm pratipadam pUrva miSrAm upAvaset /
   paurṇamāsyā mamāvāsyāṃ pratipanmiśritāṃ mune // GarP_1,123.14 //	pOrNamAsyAH mama avAsyAm pratipad miSritAm mune // GarP_1,123.14 //
   dvitīyāṃ tṛtīyāmiśrāṃ tṛtīyāñcāpyupāvaset /	dvitIyAm tRtIyA miSrAm tRtIyAQcA api upAvaset /
   caturthyā saṅgatāṃ nityaṃ caturthoñcanayā yutām /	caturTyA saFga tAm nityam caturTa uQcanayA yutAm /
   pañcamīṃṣaṣṭhyasaṃyuktāṃ ṣaṣṭhyā yuktāñca saptamīm // GarP_1,123.15 //	paQcamIMzazWya saMyuktAm zazWyA yuktAn ca saptamIm // GarP_1,123.15 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   bhīṣmapañcakādivrataṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	BIzmapaQcakAdivratam nAma trayoviMSatyuttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  124	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 124
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   śivarātrivrataṃ vakṣye kathāṃ vai sarvakāmadām /	SivarAtri vratam vakzye kaTAm vE sarva kAma dAm /
   yathā ca gaurī bhūteśaṃ pṛcchati sma paraṃ vratam // GarP_1,124.1 //	yaTA ca gOrI BUteSam pRcCati sma param vratam // GarP_1,124.1 //
   īśvarauvāca /	ISvara OvAca /
   māghaphālgunayormadhye kṛṣṇā yā tu caturdaśī /	mAGa PAlgunayoH maDye kRzNA yA tu caturdaSI /
   tasyāṃ jāgaraṇādrudraḥ pūjito bhuktimuktidaḥ // GarP_1,124.2 //	tasyAm jAgaraNAt rudraH pUjitaH Bukti mukti daH // GarP_1,124.2 //
   kāmayukto haraḥ pūjyo dvādaśyāmi keśavaḥ /	kAma yuktaH haraH pUjyaH dvAdaSyAmi keSavaH /
   upoṣitaiḥ pūjitaḥ sannarakāttarayattathā // GarP_1,124.3 //	upozitEH pUjitaH sat narakAt tarayat taTA // GarP_1,124.3 //
   niṣādaścarbude rājā pāpī sundarasenakaḥ /	nizAdaH carbude rAjA pApI sundara senakaH /
   sa kukruraiḥ samāyukto mṛgānhantuṃ vanaṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,124.4 //	sa kukrurEH samAyuktaH mRgAn hantum vanam gataH // GarP_1,124.4 //
   mṛgādi kamasaṃprāpya kṣutpipāsārdito girau /	mRga Adi kama saMprApya kzuD pipAsA arditaH girO /
   rātrau taḍāgatīreṣu nikuñje jāgradāsthitaḥ // GarP_1,124.5 //	rAtrO taxAga tIrezu nikuQje jAgrat AsTitaH // GarP_1,124.5 //
   tatrāsti liṅgaṃ svaṃ rakṣañcharīraṃ cākṣipattataḥ /	tatra asti liFgam svam rakzan SarIram ca akzipat tatas /
   parṇāni cāpatanmūrdhni liṅgasyaiva na jānataḥ // GarP_1,124.6 //	parNAni ca apatan mUrDni liFgasya eva na jAnataH // GarP_1,124.6 //
   tena dhūlinirodhāya kṣiptaṃ nīraṃ ca liṅgake /	tena DUli niroDAya kziptam nIram ca liFgake /
   śaraḥ pramādenaikastu pracyutaḥ karapallavāt // GarP_1,124.7 //	SaraH pramAdena ekaH tu pracyutaH karapallavAt // GarP_1,124.7 //
   jānubhyāmavanīṃ gatvā liṅgaṃ spṭaṣṭvā gṛhītavān /	jAnuByAm avanIm gatvA liFgam spwazwvA gRhItavAn /
   evaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ ca pūjanaṃ jāgaro 'bhavat // GarP_1,124.8 //	evam snAnam sparSanam ca pUjanam jAgaraH aBavat // GarP_1,124.8 //
   prātargṛhāgato bhāryādattānnaṃ bhuktavānsa ca /	prAtar gRha AgataH BAryA datta annam BuktavAn sa ca /
   kāle mṛto yamabhaṭaiḥ pāśairbaddhvā tu nīyate // GarP_1,124.9 //	kAle mRtaH yama BawEH pASEH badDvA tu nIyate // GarP_1,124.9 //
   tadā mama gaṇairyuddhe jitvā muktīkṛtaḥ sa ca /	tadA mama gaNEH yudDe jitvA muktIkRtaH sa ca /
   kukkureṇa sahaivābhūdgaṇo matpārśvago 'malaḥ // GarP_1,124.10 //	kukkureNa saha eva aBUt gaNaH mad pArSva gaH amalaH // GarP_1,124.10 //
   evamajñānataḥ puṇyañjñānātpuṇyamathākṣayam /	evam ajQAnataH puNyan jQAnAt puNyam aTa akzayam /
   trayodaśyāṃ śivaṃ pūjya kuryātta niyamaṃ vratī // GarP_1,124.11 //	trayodaSyAm Sivam pUjya kuryAt ta niyamam vratI // GarP_1,124.11 //
   prātardeva ! caturdaśyāṃ jāgariṣyāmyahaṃ niśi /	prAtar deva ! caturdaSyAm jAgarizyAmi aham niSi /
   pūjāṃ dānaṃ tapo homaṃ kariṣyāmyātmaśaktitaḥ // GarP_1,124.12 //	pUjAm dAnam tapaH homam karizyAmi Atma SaktitaH // GarP_1,124.12 //
   caturdaśyāṃ nirāhāro bhūtvā śambho pare 'hani /	caturdaSyAm nirAhAraH BUtvA SamBo pare ahani /
   bhokṣye 'haṃ bhuktimuktyarthaṃ śaraṇaṃ me bhaveśvara // GarP_1,124.13 //	Bokzye aham Bukti mukti arTam SaraNam me Bava ISvara // GarP_1,124.13 //
   pañcagavyāmṛtaiḥ snāpya tatkāle guruṃ śritaḥ /	paQcagavya amRtEH snApya tad kAle gurum SritaH /
   oṃ namo namaḥ śivāya gandhādyaḥ pūjayeddharam // GarP_1,124.14 //	om namaH namaH SivAya ganDa AdyaH pUjayet haram // GarP_1,124.14 //
   tilataṇḍulavrīhīṃśca juhuyātsaghṛtaṃ carum /	tila taNxula vrIhIn= ca juhuyAt sa GRtam carum /
   hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ dattvā śṛṇuyādgītasatkathām // GarP_1,124.15 //	hutvA pUrNAhutim dattvA SRNuyAt gIta sat kaTAm // GarP_1,124.15 //
   ardharātre triyāme ca caturthe ca punayarjat /	arDarAtre tri yAme ca caturTe ca punayarjat /
   mūlamantraṃ tathā japtvā prabhāte tu kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,124.16 //	mUlamantram taTA japtvA praBAte tu kzamApayet // GarP_1,124.16 //
   avighnena vrataṃ deva ! tvatprasadānmayārcitam /	aviGnena vratam deva ! tvad prasadAt mayA arcitam /
   kṣamasva jagatāṃ nātha ! trailokyādhipate hara ! // GarP_1,124.17 //	kzamasva jagatAm nATa ! trElokya aDipate hara ! // GarP_1,124.17 //
   yanmayādya kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ yadrudrasya niveditam /	yat mayA adya kRtam puNyam yat rudrasya niveditam /
   tvatprasādānmayā deva ! vratamadya samāpitam // GarP_1,124.18 //	tvad prasAdAt mayA deva ! vratam adya samApitam // GarP_1,124.18 //
   prasanno bhava me śrīman gṛhaṃ prati ca gamyatām /	prasannaH Bava me SrIman gRham prati ca gamyatAm /
   tvadālokanamātreṇa pavitro 'smi na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,124.19 //	tvad Alokana mAtreNa pavitraH asmi na saMSayaH // GarP_1,124.19 //
   bhojayeddhyānaniṣṭhāṃśca vastracchatrādikaṃ dadet /	Bojayet DyAna nizWAn= ca vastra= Catra Adikam dadet /
   devādideva bhūteśa lokānugrahakāraka // GarP_1,124.20 //	deva Adideva BUteSa loka anugraha kAraka // GarP_1,124.20 //
   yanmayā śraddhayā dattaṃ prīyatāṃ tena me prabhuḥ /	yat mayA SradDayA dattam prIyatAm tena me praBuH /
   iti kṣamāpya ca vratī kuryādvādaśavārṣikam // GarP_1,124.21 //	iti kzamApya ca vratI kuryAt vAdaSa vArzikam // GarP_1,124.21 //
   kīrtiśrīputrarājyādi prāpya śaivaṃ puraṃ vrajet /	kIrti SrI putra rAjya Adi prApya SEvam puram vrajet /
   dvādaśeṣvapi māseṣu prakuryādiha jāgaram // GarP_1,124.22 //	dvAdaSezu api mAsezu prakuryAt iha jAgaram // GarP_1,124.22 //
   vratī dvādaśa saṃbhojya dīpadaḥ svargamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,124.23 //	vratI dvAdaSa saMBojya dIpa daH svargam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,124.23 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  125	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 125
   pitāmaha uvāca /	pitAmahaH uvAca /
   māndhātā cakravartyāsīdupoṣyaikādaśīṃ nṛpaḥ /	mAnDAtA cakravartI AsIt upozya ekAdaSIm nRpaH /
   ekādaśyāṃ na bhuñjīta pakṣayorubhayārapi // GarP_1,125.1 //	ekAdaSyAm na BuQjIta pakzayoH uBayAH api // GarP_1,125.1 //
   daśamyekādaśīmiśrā gāndhāryā samupoṣitā /	daSamI ekAdaSI miSrA gAnDAryA samupozitA /
   tasyāḥ putraśataṃ naṣṭaṃ tasmāttāṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,125.2 //	tasyAH putra Satam nazwam tasmAt tAm parivarjayet // GarP_1,125.2 //
   dvādaśyekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ /	dvAdaSI ekAdaSI yatra tatra sannihitaH hariH /
   daśamyekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito 'suraḥ /	daSamI ekAdaSI yatra tatra sannihitaH asuraH /
   bahuvākyavirodhena sandeho jāyate yadā // GarP_1,125.3 //	bahu vAkya viroDena sandehaH jAyate yadA // GarP_1,125.3 //
   dvādaśī tu tadā grāhyā trayodaśyāntu pāraṇam /	dvAdaSI tu tadA grAhyA trayodaSya antu pAraNam /
   ekādaśī kalāpisyādupoṣyā dvādaśī tathā // GarP_1,125.4 //	ekAdaSI kalApisyAt upozyA dvAdaSI taTA // GarP_1,125.4 //
   ekādaśī dvādaśī ca viśeṣeṇa trayodaśī /	ekAdaSI dvAdaSI ca viSezeNa trayodaSI /
   trimiśrā sā tithirgrāhyā sarvapāpaharā śubhā // GarP_1,125.5 //	trimiSrA sA tiTiH grAhyA sarva pApa harA SuBAH // GarP_1,125.5 //
   ekādaśīmupoṣyaivadvādaśīma thavā dvija ! /	ekAdaSIm upozya evadvAdaSIma TavA dvija ! /
   trimiśrāṃ caiva kurvīta na daśamyā yutāṃ kracit // GarP_1,125.6 //	trimiSrAm ca eva kurvIta na daSamyA yutAm kracit // GarP_1,125.6 //
   rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kurvanpurāṇaśravaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ /	rAtrO jAgaraNam kurvan purANa SravaNam nRpaH /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  126	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 126
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   yenārcanena vai loko jagāma paramāṃ gatim /	yena arcanena vE lokaH jagAma paramAm gatim /
   tamarcanaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktikaraṃ param // GarP_1,126.1 //	tam arcanam pravakzyAmi Bukti mukti karam param // GarP_1,126.1 //
   sāmānyamaṇḍalaṃ nyasya dhātāraṃ dvāradeśataḥ /	sAmAnya maNxalam nyasya DAtAram dvAra deSataH /

   dvāraśriyaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ ca pracaṇḍaṃ vāstupūruṣam /	dvAra Sriyam ca daNxam ca pracaNxam vAstu pUruzam /
   madhye cādhāraśaktiṃ ca kūrmaṃ cānantamarcayet // GarP_1,126.3 //	maDye ca ADAra Saktim ca kUrmam ca anantam arcayet // GarP_1,126.3 //
   bhūmiṃ dharmaṃ tathā jñānaṃ vairagyaiśvaryameva ca /	BUmim Darmam taTA jQAnam vEragyA ESvaryam eva ca /
   adharmādīṃśca caturaḥ kandaṃ nālaṃ ca paṅkajam // GarP_1,126.4 //	aDarma AdIn= ca caturaH kandam nAlam ca paFkajam // GarP_1,126.4 //
   karṇikāṃ kesaraṃ sattvaṃ rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ guṇam /	karNikAm kesaram sattvam rAjasam tAmasam guNam /
   suryādimaṇḍalānyeva vimalādyāśca śaktayaḥ // GarP_1,126.5 //	suryAdi maNxalAni eva vimala AdyAH ca SaktayaH // GarP_1,126.5 //
   durgāṃ gaṇaṃ sarasvatīṃ kṣetrapālaṃ ca koṇake /	durgAm gaNam sarasvatIm kzetrapAlam ca koNake /
   āsanaṃ mūrtimabhyarcya vāsudevaṃ balaṃ smaran // GarP_1,126.6 //	Asanam mUrtim aByarcya vAsudevam balam smaran // GarP_1,126.6 //
   aniruddhaṃ mahātmānaṃ nārāyaṇamathārcayet /	anirudDam mahAtmAnam nArAyaNam aTa arcayet /
   hṛdayādīni cāṅgāni śaṅkhādīnyāyudhāni ca // GarP_1,126.7 //	hRdaya AdIni ca aFgAni SaFKa AdIni AyuDAni ca // GarP_1,126.7 //
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  127	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 127
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   māghamāse śuklapakṣe sūryarkṣeṇa yutā purā /	mAGa mAse Sukla pakze sUrya RkzeNa yutA purA /
   ekādaśī tathā caikā bhīmena samupoṣitā // GarP_1,127.1 //	ekAdaSI taTA ca ekA BImena samupozitAH // GarP_1,127.1 //
   āścarya tu vrataṃ kṛtvā pitṝṇāmanṛṇo 'bhavat /	AScarya tu vratam kRtvA pitLNAm anRNaH aBavat /
   bhīmadvādaśī vikhyātā prāṇināṃ puṇyavardhinī // GarP_1,127.2 //	BImadvAdaSI viKyAtA prANinAm puNya varDinI // GarP_1,127.2 //
   nakṣatreṇa vināpyeṣā brahmahatyādi nāśayet /	nakzatreNa vinA api ezA brahmahatyA Adi nASayet /
   vinihanti mahāpāpaṃ kunṛpo viṣayaṃ yathā // GarP_1,127.3 //	vinihanti mahA pApam ku nRpaH vizayam yaTA // GarP_1,127.3 //
   kuputtrastu kulaṃ yadvatkubhāryā ca patiṃ yathā /	ku puttraH tu kulam yadvat ku BAryA ca patim yaTA /
   adharmaṃ ca yathā dharmaḥ kumantrī ca yathā nṛpam // GarP_1,127.4 //	aDarmam ca yaTA DarmaH kumantrI ca yaTA nRpam // GarP_1,127.4 //
   ajñānena yathā jñānaṃ śaucamāśaucakaṃ yathā /	ajQAnena yaTA jQAnam SOcam ASOcakam yaTA /
   aśraddhayā yathā śraddhā satyañcaivānṛtairyathā // GarP_1,127.5 //	aSradDayA yaTA SradDA satyaQca eva anRtEH yaTA // GarP_1,127.5 //
   himaṃ yathoṣṇamāhanyādanarthaṃ cārthasaṃcayaḥ /	himam yaTA uzNam AhanyAt anarTam ca arTa saMcayaH /
   yathā prakartināddānaṃ tapo vai vismayādyathā // GarP_1,127.6 //	yaTA prakartinAt dAnam tapaH vE vismayAt yaTA // GarP_1,127.6 //
   aśikṣayā yathā putro gāvo dūragatairyathā /	aSikzayA yaTA putraH gAvaH dUra gatEH yaTA /
   krodhena ca yathā śāntiryathā vittamavaddhanāt // GarP_1,127.7 //	kroDena ca yaTA SAntiH yaTA vittama vat DanAt // GarP_1,127.7 //
   jñānenaiyathā vidyā niṣkāmena yathā phalam /	jQAnena EyaTA vidyA nizkAmena yaTA Palam /
   tathaiva pāpanāśāya prokteyaṃ dvādaśī śubhā // GarP_1,127.8 //	taTA eva pApa nASAya proktA iyam dvAdaSI SuBA // GarP_1,127.8 //
   brahmahatyā surā pāna steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamaḥ /	brahmahatyA surA pAna steyam guru aFganA AgamaH /
   yugapattuprajātānihanti tripuṣkaram // GarP_1,127.9 //	yugapattu prajAtA anihanti tripuzkaram // GarP_1,127.9 //
   na cāpi naimiṣaṃ kṣetraṃ kurukṣetraṃ prabhāsakam /	na ca api nEmizam kzetram kurukzetram praBAsakam /
   kālindī yamunā gaṅgā na caiva na sarasvatī // GarP_1,127.10 //	kAlindI yamunA gaFgA na ca eva na sarasvatI // GarP_1,127.10 //
   caiva sarvatīrthāni ekādaśyāḥ samāni hi /	ca eva sarva tIrTAni ekAdaSyAH samAni hi /
   na dānaṃ na japo homo na cānyatsukṛtaṃ kracit // GarP_1,127.11 //	na dAnam na japaH homaH na ca anyat sukRtam kracid // GarP_1,127.11 //
   ekataḥ pṛthivīdānamekato harivāsaraḥ /	ekatas pRTivI dAnam ekatas hari vAsaraH /
   tato 'pyekā mahāpuṇyā iyamekādaśī varā // GarP_1,127.12 //	tatas api ekA mahA puNyA iyam ekAdaSI varAH // GarP_1,127.12 //
   asminvarāhapuruṣaṃ kṛtvā devaṃ tu hāṭakam /	asmin varAha puruzam kRtvA devam tu hAwakam /
   ghaṭopari nave pātre kṛtvā vai tāmrabhājane // GarP_1,127.13 //	Gawa upari nave pAtre kRtvA vE tAmra BAjane // GarP_1,127.13 //
   sarvabījabhṛte viprāḥ sitavastrāvagaṇṭhite /	sarva bIja BRte viprAH sita vastra avagaNWite /
   sahiraṇyapradīpādyaiḥ kṛtvā pūjāṃ prayatnanaḥ // GarP_1,127.14 //	sa hiraNya pradIpa AdyEH kRtvA pUjAm prayatnanaH // GarP_1,127.14 //
   varāhāya namaḥ pādau kroḍākṛtaye namaḥ kaṭim /	varAhAya namaH pAdO kroxa AkRtaye namaH kawim /
   nābhiṃ gaṃbhīraghoṣayā uraḥ śrīvatsadhāriṇe // GarP_1,127.15 //	nABim gaMBIra GozayA uraH SrIvatsa DAriNe // GarP_1,127.15 //
   bāhuṃ sahasraśirase grīvāṃ sarveśvarāya ca /	bAhum sahasra Sirase grIvAm sarveSvarAya ca /
   mukhaṃ sarvātmane pūjyaṃ lalāṭaṃ prabhavāya ca // GarP_1,127.16 //	muKam sarvAtmane pUjyam lalAwam praBavAya ca // GarP_1,127.16 //
   keśāḥ śatamayūkhāya pūjyā devasya cakriṇaḥ /	keSAH Sata mayUKAya pUjyAH devasya cakriNaH /
   vidhinā pūjayitvā tu kṛtvā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,127.17 //	viDinA pUjayitvA tu kRtvA jAgaraNam niSi // GarP_1,127.17 //
   śrutvā purāṇaṃ devasya māhātmyapratipādakam /	SrutvA purANam devasya mAhAtmya pratipAdakam /
   prātarviprāya dattvā ca yācakāya śubhāya tat // GarP_1,127.18 //	prAtar viprAya dattvA ca yAcakAya SuBAya tat // GarP_1,127.18 //
   kanakakroḍasahitaṃ sannivedya paricchadam /	kanaka kroxa sahitam sat nivedya paricCadam /
   paścāttu pāraṇaṃ kuryānnātitṛptaḥ sakṛdvrataḥ // GarP_1,127.19 //	paScAt tu pAraNam kuryAt na ati tRptaH sakRt vrataH // GarP_1,127.19 //
   evaṃ kṛtvā naro vidyānna bhūya stanapo bhavet /	evam kRtvA naraH vidyAt na BUya stanapaH Bavet /

   tasmindevī prakartavyā haimī vārājatāpi vā // GarP_1,133.8 //	tasmin devI prakartavyA hEmI vA arAjatA api vA // GarP_1,133.8 //
   śūle khaṅge pustake vā paṭe vā maṇḍale (pe) yajet /	SUle KaFge pustake vA pawe vA maNxale (pe) yajet /
   kapālaṃ kheṭakaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ darpaṇaṃ tarjanīṃ dhanaḥ // GarP_1,133.9 //	kapAlam Kewakam GaNwAm darpaNam tarjanIm DanaH // GarP_1,133.9 //
   dhvajaṃ ḍamarukaṃ pāśaṃ vāmahasteṣu bibhratī /	Dvajam xamarukam pASam vAma hastezu biBratI /
   śaktiṃ ca mudgaraṃ śūlaṃ vajraṃ khaṅgaṃ tathāṅkuśam // GarP_1,133.10 //	Saktim ca mudgaram SUlam vajram KaFgam taTA aFkuSam // GarP_1,133.10 //
   śaraṃ cakraṃ śalākāṃ ca durgāmāyudhasaṃyutām /	Saram cakram SalAkAm ca durgAm AyuDa saMyutAm /
   śeṣāḥ ṣoḍaśahastāṃ syurañjanaṃ ḍamaruṃ vinā // GarP_1,133.11 //	SezAH zoxaSa hastAm syuH aQjanam xamarum vinA // GarP_1,133.11 //
   rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍā ca caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā /	rudracaNxA pracaNxA ca caNxogrA caNxanAyikA /
   caṇḍā caṇḍavatī caiva caṇḍarūpāticaṇḍikā // GarP_1,133.12 //	caNxA caNxavatI ca eva caNxa rUpa ati caNxikAH // GarP_1,133.12 //
   navamī cogracaṇḍā ca madhyamāgniprabhākṛtiḥ /	navamI ca ugracaNxA ca maDyamA agni praBA AkRtiH /
   rocanā tvaruṇā kṛṣṇā nīlaṃ dhūmrā ca śukrakā // GarP_1,133.13 //	rocanA tu aruNA kRzNA nIlam DUmrA ca SukrakAH // GarP_1,133.13 //
   pātā ca pāṇḍurā proktā ālīḍhaṃ haritaṃ tathā /	pAtA ca pANxurA proktAH AlIXam haritam taTA /
   ma (mā) hiṣo 'sya sa khaḍgāgraprakacagrahamuṣṭikaḥ // GarP_1,133.14 //	me (mA) hizaH asya sa Kaxga agra prakaca grahamuzwikaH // GarP_1,133.14 //
   japtvā daśākṣarīṃ vidyāṃ nāsau kenāpi badhyate /	japtvA daSa akzarIm vidyAm na asO kena api baDyate /
   pañca (ñcā) daśāṅgulaṃ khaḍgaṃ triśūlaṃ ca tato yajet /	paQca (QcA) daSa aFgulam Kaxgam triSUlam ca tatas yajet /
   liṅgasyāṃ pūjayedvāpi pāduke 'tha jale 'pi vā // GarP_1,133.15 //	liFgasyAm pUjayet vA api pAduke aTa jale api vA // GarP_1,133.15 //
   vicitrāṃ rakṣayetpūjāmaṣṭamyāmupavāsayet /	vicitrAm rakzayet pUjAm azwamyAm upavAsayet /

   vidhivatkālikālīti taduttharudhirādikam /	viDivat kAlikAlI iti tad utTa ruDira Adikam /

   dadyāccarakyai caiśānyāmāgneyyāṃ ca vidārikām // GarP_1,133.18 //	dadyAt carakyE ca ESAnyAm AgneyyAm ca vidArikAm // GarP_1,133.18 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   (mahākauśikamantraḥ) oṃ mahākauśikāya namaḥ /	(mahA kOSika mantraH) om mahA kOSikAya namaH /
   oṃ hūṃ hūṃ prasphura lala lala kulva kulva culva culva khalla khalla mulva	om hUm hUm prasPura lala lala kulva kulva culva culva Kalla Kalla mulva

   sitavastrayugacchannaṃ chatropānadyugānvitam /	sita vastra yuga= Cannam Catra upAnat yuga anvitam /

   śrīdharāya mukhaṃ tadvatkaṇṭhaṃ kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ /	SrIDarAya muKam tadvat kaNWam kRzNAya vE namaH /

   vyāpakāya namaḥ kukṣau keśavāyodaraṃ budhaḥ /	vyApakAya namaH kukzO keSavAya udaram buDaH /

   (iti vāravratāni) /	(iti vAra vrata ani) /

   tannāmnānte 'tacyutaṃ teṣu samyak saṃpūjayennaraḥ // GarP_1,137.5 //	tad nAmnA ante ata cyutam tezu samyak saMpUjayet naraH // GarP_1,137.5 //
   keśavaṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu ityādau kṛtikādike (kā) /	keSavam mArgaSIrze tu iti AdO kRtikA Adike (kA) /
   ghṛtahomaścaturmāsaṃ kṛsarañca nivedayet // GarP_1,137.6 //	GRta homaH catur mAsam kRsaraQca nivedayet // GarP_1,137.6 //
   āṣāḍhādau pāyasaṃ tu viprāṃstenaiva bhojayet /	AzAXa AdO pAyasam tu viprAn= tena eva Bojayet /

   pāñcarātravido mukhyā naivedyaṃ bhuñjate svayam /	pAQcarAtra vidaH muKyAH nEvedyam BuQjate svayam /

   namonamaste 'cyuta ! saṃkṣayo 'stu pāpasya vṛddhiṃ samupaitu puṇyam /	namaH namaH te acyuta ! saMkzayaH astu pApasya vRdDim samupEtu puNyam /
   aiśvaryavittādi sadākṣayaṃ me tathāstu me santatirakṣayaiva //	ESvarya vitta Adi sadA akzayam me taTA astu me santatiH akzayA eva //
   GarP_1,137.10 //	GarP_1,137.10 //
