   tathācyutaṃ me kuru vāñchitaṃ sadā mayā kṛtaṃ pāpaharāprameya //	taTA acyutam me kuru vAQCitam sadA mayA kRtam pApa hara aprameyaH //
   GarP_1,137.11 //	GarP_1,137.11 //
   acyutānanta ! govinda ! prasīda yadabhīpsitam /	acyuta ananta ! govinda ! prasIda yat aBIpsitam /
   tadakṣayamameyātmankuruṣva puruṣottama // GarP_1,137.12 //	tat akzayam ameya Atman kuruzva puruzottamaH // GarP_1,137.12 //
   kuryādvai sapta varṣāṇi āyuḥ śrīsadgatīrnaraḥ /	kuryAt vE sapta varzANi AyuH SrI sat gatIH naraH /
   upoṣyaikādaśībdamaṣṭamīṃ ca caturdaśīm // GarP_1,137.13 //	upozya ekAdaSIbdam azwamIm ca caturdaSIm // GarP_1,137.13 //
   saptamīṃ pūjayedviṣṇuṃ durgāṃ śambuṃ raviṃ kramāt /	saptamIm pUjayet vizNum durgAm Sambum ravim kramAt /
   teṣāṃ lokaṃ samāpnoti sarvakāmāṃśca nirmalaḥ // GarP_1,137.14 //	tezAm lokam samApnoti sarva kAmAn= ca nirmalaH // GarP_1,137.14 //
   ekabhaktena naktena tathaivāyācitena ca /	eka Baktena naktena taTA eva ayAcitena ca /
   upavāsena śākādyaiḥ pūjayantasarvadevatāḥ // GarP_1,137.15 //	upavAsena SAka AdyEH pUjayanta sarva devatAH // GarP_1,137.15 //
   sarvaḥ sarvāsu tithiṣu bhuktiṃ muktimavāpnuyāt /	sarvaH sarvAsu tiTizu Buktim muktim avApnuyAt /
   dhanado 'gniḥ pratipadi nāsatyo dastra arcitaḥ // GarP_1,137.16 //	DanadaH agniH pratipadi na asatyaH dastra arcitaH // GarP_1,137.16 //
   śrīryamaśca dvitīyāyāṃ pañcamyā pārvatī śriyā /	SrIH yamaH ca dvitIyAyAm paQcamyA pArvatI SriyA /
   nāgāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kārtikeyaḥ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ // GarP_1,137.17 //	nAgAH zazWyAm kArtikeyaH saptamyAm BAskaror aTa daH // GarP_1,137.17 //
   durgāṣṭamyāṃ mātaraśca navamyāmatha takṣakaḥ /	durgA azwamyAm mAtaraH ca navamyAm aTa takzakaH /
   indro daśamyāṃ dhanada ekādaśyāṃ munīśvarāḥ // GarP_1,137.18 //	indraH daSamyAm DanadaH ekAdaSyAm muni ISvarAH // GarP_1,137.18 //
   dvādaśyāṃ ca hariḥ kāmastrayodaśyāṃ maheśvaraḥ /	dvAdaSyAm ca hariH kAmaH trayodaSyAm maheSvaraH /
   caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaro 'pare // GarP_1,137.19 //	caturdaSyAm paQcadaSyAm brahmA ca pitaraH apare // GarP_1,137.19 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   tithivāranakṣatrādivratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	tiTivAranakzatrAdivratanirUpaNam nAma saptatriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  138	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 138
   (iti vratāni samāptāni) /	(iti vratAni samAptAni) /
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   rājñāṃ vaṃśānpravakṣyāmi vaṃśānucaritāni ca /	rAjQAm vaMSAn pravakzyAmi vaMSAnucaritAni ca /
   viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā dakṣo 'ṅguṣṭhācca tasya vai // GarP_1,138.1 //	vizNu nABi abjataH brahmA dakzaH aFguzWAt ca tasya vE // GarP_1,138.1 //
   tato 'pitarvivasvāṃśca tataḥ sūnurvivasvataḥ manurikṣvākuśaryātī nṛgo	tatas apitarvivasvAn= ca tatas sUnuH vivasvataH manuH ikzvAku SaryAtI nR go
   dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ // GarP_1,138.2 //	DRzwaH prazaDrakaH // GarP_1,138.2 //
   nariṣyantaśca nābhāgo diṣṭaḥ śaśaka eva ca /	narizyantaH ca nABAgaH dizwaH SaSakaH eva ca /
   manorāsīdilā kanyā sudyumno 'sya suto 'bhavat // GarP_1,138.3 //	manoH AsIt ilA kanyA sudyumnaH asya sutaH aBavat // GarP_1,138.3 //
   ilāyāṃ tu budhājjāto rājā rudra purūravāḥ /	ilAyAm tu buDAt jAtaH rAjA rudra purUravAH /
   sutāstrayaśca sudyumnādutkalo vinato gayaḥ // GarP_1,138.4 //	sutAH trayaH ca sudyumnAt utkalaH vinataH gayaH // GarP_1,138.4 //
   abhṛcchradro govadhāttu pṛṣadhrastu manoḥ sutaḥ /	aBRt SradraH go vaDAt tu pRzaDraH tu manoH sutaH /
   karūṣātkṣattriyā jātā kārūṣā iti viśrutāḥ // GarP_1,138.5 //	karUzAt kzattriyAH jAtA kArUzAH iti viSrutAH // GarP_1,138.5 //
   diṣṭaputrastu nābhāgo vaiśyātāmagamatsa ca /	dizwa putraH tu nABAgaH vESyAtAm agamat sa ca /
   tasmādbhalandanaḥ putro vatsaprītirbhalandanāt // GarP_1,138.6 //	tasmAt BalandanaH putraH vatsa prItiH BalandanAt // GarP_1,138.6 //
   tataḥ pāṃśuḥ khanitro 'bhūdbhūpastasmāttataḥ kṣupaḥ /	tatas pAMSuH KanitraH aBUt BUpaH tasmAt tatas kzupaH /
   kṣupādviṃśo 'bhavatputro viṃśājjāto viviṃśakaḥ // GarP_1,138.7 //	kzupAt viMSaH aBavat putraH viMSAt jAtaH viviMSakaH // GarP_1,138.7 //
   viviṃśācca khanīnetro vibhūtistatsutaḥ smṛtaḥ /	viviMSAt ca KanInetraH viBUtiH tad sutaH smRtaH /
   karandhamo vibhūtestu tato jāto 'pyavikṣitaḥ // GarP_1,138.8 //	karanDamaH viBUteH tu tatas jAtaH api avikzitaH // GarP_1,138.8 //
   marutto 'vikṣitasyāpi nariṣyantastataḥ smṛtaḥ /	maruttaH avikzitasya api narizyantaH tatas smRtaH /
   nariṣyantāttamo jātastatobhūdrājavardhanaḥ // GarP_1,138.9 //	narizyantAt tamaH jAtaH tatas BUt rAja varDanaH // GarP_1,138.9 //
   rājavardhātsudhṛtiśca naro 'bhūtsudhṛteḥ sutaḥ /	rAja varDAt suDRtiH ca naraH aBUt suDRteH sutaH /
   narācca kevalaḥ putraḥ kevalāddhundhumānapi // GarP_1,138.10 //	narAt ca kevalaH putraH kevalAt hunDumAn api // GarP_1,138.10 //
   dhundhumato vegavāṃśca budho vegavataḥ sutaḥ /	DunDumataH vegavAn= ca buDaH vegavataH sutaH /
   tṛṇabindurbudhājjātaḥ kānyā cailavilā tathā // GarP_1,138.11 //	tRNabinduH buDAt jAtaH kA anyA ca elavilA taTA // GarP_1,138.11 //
   viśālaṃ janayāmāsa tṛṇabindostvalambusā /	viSAlam janayAmAsa tRNabindoH tu alambusA /
   viśālāddhemacandro 'bhūddhema candrācca candrakaḥ // GarP_1,138.12 //	viSAlAt hemacandraH aBUt hema candrAt ca candrakaH // GarP_1,138.12 //
   dhūmrāśvaścaiva candrāttu dhūmrāśvātsṛñjayastathā /	DUmrASvaH ca eva candrAt tu DUmrASvAt sRQjayaH taTA /
   sañjayātsahadevo 'bhūtkṛśāśvastatsuto 'bhavat // GarP_1,138.13 //	saQjayAt sahadevaH aBUt kRSASvaH tad sutaH aBavat // GarP_1,138.13 //
   kṛśāśvātsomadattastutato 'bhūjjanamejayaḥ /	kRSa aSvAt somadatta stutatas aBUt janamejayaH /
   tatputraśca sumantiśca ete vaiśālakā nṛpāḥ // GarP_1,138.14 //	tad putraH ca sumantiH ca ete vESAlakAH nRpAH // GarP_1,138.14 //
   śaryātestu sukanyābūtsā bhāryā cyavanasya tu /	SaryAteH tu sukanyA bUtsA BAryA cyavanasya tu /
   ananto nāma śāryate ranantādrevato 'bhavat // GarP_1,138.15 //	anantaH nAma SAryate ranantAdrevataH aBavat // GarP_1,138.15 //
   raivato revatasyāpi raivatādrevatī sutā /	rEvataH revatasya api rEvatAt revatI sutA /
   dhṛṣṭasya dhārṣṭar (ta) kaṃ kṣetraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ (śyakaṃ) tadvabhūva ha //	DRzwasya DArzwar (ta) kam kzetram vEzNavam (SyakaM) tadvaBUva ha //
   GarP_1,138.16 //	GarP_1,138.16 //
   nābhāgaputro neṣṭho hyambarīṣo 'pi tatsutaḥ /	nABAga putraH nezWaH hi ambarIzaH api tad sutaH /
   ambarīṣādvirūpo 'bhūtpṛṣadaśvo virūpataḥ // GarP_1,138.17 //	ambarIzAt virUpaH aBUt pRzadaSvaH virUpataH // GarP_1,138.17 //
   rathīnaraśca tatputro vāsudevaparāyaṇaḥ /	raTInaraH ca tad putraH vAsudeva parAyaNaH /
   ikṣvākostu trayaḥ putrāḥ vikukṣinimidaṇḍakāḥ // GarP_1,138.18 //	ikzvAkoH tu trayaH putrAH vikukzi nimi daNxakAH // GarP_1,138.18 //
   ikṣvākujo vikukṣistu śaśādaḥ śaśabhakṣaṇāt /	ikzvAku jaH vikukziH tu SaSAdaH SaSa BakzaNAt /
   purañjayaḥ śaśādācca kakutsthākhyo 'bhavatsutaḥ // GarP_1,138.19 //	puraQjayaH SaSAdAt ca kakutsTa AKyaH aBavat sutaH // GarP_1,138.19 //
   anenāstu kakutsathācca pṛthuḥ putrastvanenasaḥ /	anena astu kakutsaTAt ca pRTuH putraH tu anenasaH /
   viśvarātaḥ pṛthoḥ putra ārdre 'bhūdviśvarātataḥ // GarP_1,138.20 //	viSvarAtaH pRToH putraH Ardre aBUt viSva rAtataH // GarP_1,138.20 //
   yuvanāśvo 'bhavaccārdrācchāvasto yuvanāśvataḥ /	yuvanASvaH aBavat ca ArdrAt SAvastaH yuvanASvataH /
   bṛhadaśvastuśāvastāttatputraḥ kuvalāśvakaḥ // GarP_1,138.21 //	bRhadaSvaH tuSAvastAt tad putraH kuvalASvakaH // GarP_1,138.21 //
   dhundhumāro hi vikyāto dṛḍhaśvaścatato 'bhavat /	DunDumAraH hi vikyAtaH dRXaSvaH catatas aBavat /
   candrāśvaḥ kapilāśvaśca haryaśvaśca dṛḍhaśvataḥ // GarP_1,138.22 //	candrASvaH kapilASvaH ca haryaSvaH ca dRXa SvataH // GarP_1,138.22 //
   haryaśvācca nikumbo 'bhūddhitāśvaśca nikumbhataḥ /	haryaSvAt ca nikumbaH aBUt hitASvaH ca nikumBataH /
   pūjāśvaśca hitāśvācca tatsato yuvanāśvakaḥ // GarP_1,138.23 //	pUjASvaH ca hita aSvAt ca tad sataH yuvanASvakaH // GarP_1,138.23 //
   yuvanāśvācca māndhātā bindumatyāstato 'bhavat /	yuvanASvAt ca mAnDAtA bindumatyAH tatas aBavat /
   mucukundo 'mbarīṣaśca purukutsastrayaḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,138.24 //	mucukundaH ambarIzaH ca purukutsaH trayaH sutAH // GarP_1,138.24 //
   pañcāśatkanyakāścaiva bhāryāstāḥ saubharermuneḥ /	paQcASat kanyakAH ca eva BAryAH tAH sOBareH muneH /
   yuvanāśvo 'mbarīṣācca harito yuvanāśvataḥ // GarP_1,138.25 //	yuvanASvaH ambarIzAt ca haritaH yuvanASvataH // GarP_1,138.25 //
   purukutsānnarmadāyāṃ trasadasyurabūtsutaḥ /	purukutsAn narmadAyAm trasadasyuH abUtsutaH /
   anaraṇyastato jāto haryaśvo 'pyanaraṇyataḥ // GarP_1,138.26 //	anaraNyaH tatas jAtaH haryaSvaH api anaraNyataH // GarP_1,138.26 //
   tatputro 'bhūdvasumanāstridhanvā tasya cātmajaḥ /	tad putraH aBUt vasumanAH triDanvA tasya ca AtmajaH /
   trayyāruṇastasya putrastasta satyarataḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.27 //	trayyAruNaH tasya putraH taH ta satya rataH sutaH // GarP_1,138.27 //
   yastriśaṅkuḥ samākhyāto hariścandro 'bhavattataḥ /	yaH triSaFkuH samAKyAtaH hariScandraH aBavat tatas /
   hariścandrādrohitāśvo harito rohitāśvataḥ // GarP_1,138.28 //	hariScandrAt rohitASvaH haritaH rohita aSvataH // GarP_1,138.28 //
   haritasya sutaścañcuścañcośca vijayaḥ sutaḥ /	haritasya sutaH caQcuH caQcoH ca vijayaH sutaH /
   vijayādruruko jajñe rurukāttu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.29 //	vijayAt rurukaH jajQe rurukAt tu vRkaH sutaH // GarP_1,138.29 //
   vṛkādbāhurnṛpo 'bhūcca bāhostu sagaraḥ smṛtaḥ /	vRkAt bAhuH nRpaH aBUt ca bAhoH tu sagaraH smRtaH /
   ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyāṃ sagarāddhara // GarP_1,138.30 //	zazwiH putra sahasrANi sumatyAm sagarAt hara // GarP_1,138.30 //
   keśinyāmeka evāsāvasamañjasasaṃjñakaḥ // GarP_1,138.31 //	keSinyAm ekaH eva asO= asamaQjasa saMjQakaH // GarP_1,138.31 //
   tasyāṃśumānsuto vidvāndilīpastatsuto 'bhavat /	tasya aMSumAn sutaH vidvAn dilIpaH tad sutaH aBavat /
   bhagīratho dilīpācca yo gaṅgāmānayadbhuvam // GarP_1,138.32 //	BagIraTaH dilIpAt ca yaH gaFgAm Anayat Buvam // GarP_1,138.32 //
   śruto bhagīrathasuto nābhagaśca śrutātkila /	SrutaH BagIraTa sutaH nABagaH ca SrutAt kila /
   nābhāgādambarīṣo 'bhūtsindudvīpo 'mbarīṣataḥ // GarP_1,138.33 //	nABAgAt ambarIzaH aBUt sindudvIpaH ambarIzataH // GarP_1,138.33 //
   sindudvīpasyāyutāyurṛtuparṇastadātmajaḥ /	sindudvIpasya ayutAyuH RtuparNaH tad AtmajaH /
   ṛtuṣarṇātsarvakāmaḥ sudāso 'bhūttadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,138.34 //	RtuzA rNAt sarva kAmaH sudAsaH aBUt tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,138.34 //
   sudāsasya ca saudāso nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ /	sudAsasya ca sOdAsaH nAmnA mitrasahaH smRtaH /
   kalmāṣa pādasaṃjñaśca damayantyāṃ tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,138.35 //	kalmAza pAda saMjQaH ca damayantyAm tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,138.35 //
   aśvakākhyo 'bhavatputro hyaśvakānmūla(nmṛccha) ko 'bhavat /	aSvaka AKyaH aBavat putraH hi aSvakAt mUla(t mRcCa) kaH aBavat /
   tato daśaratho rājā tasya cailavilaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.36 //	tatas daSaraTaH rAjA tasya ca ElavilaH sutaH // GarP_1,138.36 //
   tasya viśvasahaḥ putraḥ khaṭvāṅgaśca tadātmajaḥ /	tasya viSvasahaH putraH KawvAFgaH ca tad AtmajaH /
   khaṭvāṅgaddīrghabāhuśca dīrghabāhorhyajaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.37 //	KawvAFgaddIrGa bAhuH ca dIrGa bAhoH hi ajaH sutaH // GarP_1,138.37 //
   tasya puttro daśarathaścatvārastatsutāḥ smṛtāḥ /	tasya puttraH daSaraTaH catvAraH tad sutAH smRtAH /
   rāmalakṣmaṇaśatrughnabharatāśca mahābalāḥ // GarP_1,138.38 //	rAma lakzmaNa SatruGna BaratAH ca mahA balAH // GarP_1,138.38 //
   rāmātkuśalavau jātau bharatāttārkṣapuṣkarau /	rAmAt kuSa lavO jAtO BaratAt tArkza puzkarO /
   citrāṅgadaścandraketurlakṣmaṇātsaṃbabhūvatuḥ // GarP_1,138.39 //	citrAFgadaH candraketuH lakzmaNAt saMbaBUvatuH // GarP_1,138.39 //
   subāhuśūrasenau ca śatrughnātsaṃbabhūvatuḥ /	subAhu SUrasenO ca SatruGnAt saMbaBUvatuH /
   kuśasya cātithiḥ putro niṣadho hyatitheḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.40 //	kuSasya ca atiTiH putraH nizaDaH hi atiTeH sutaH // GarP_1,138.40 //
   niṣadhasya nalaḥ putro nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ /	nizaDasya nalaH putraH nalasya ca naBAH smRtaH /
   nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīkastukṣemadhanvā tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,138.41 //	naBasaH puNxarIkaH tukzemaDanvA tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,138.41 //
   devānīkastasya putro devānīkādahīnakaḥ /	devAnIkaH tasya putraH devAnIkAdahInakaH /
   ahīnakādrururyajñe pāriyātro ruroḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.42 //	ahInakAt ruruH yajQe pAriyAtraH ruroH sutaH // GarP_1,138.42 //
   pāriyātrāddalo yajñe dala putraśchalaḥ smṛtaḥ /	pAriyAtrAt dalaH yajQe dala putraH CalaH smRtaH /
   chalādukthastato hyukthādvajranābhastato gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,138.43 //	CalAt ukTaH tatas hi ukTAt vajranABaH tatas gaNaH // GarP_1,138.43 //
   uṣitāśvo gaṇājjajñe tato viśvasaho 'bhavat /	uzitASvaH gaNAt jajQe tatas viSvasahaH aBavat /
   hiraṇyanābhastatputrastatputraḥ puṣpakaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.44 //	hiraNyanABaH tad putraH tad putraH puzpakaH smRtaH // GarP_1,138.44 //
   dhruvasandhirabhūtpuṣpāddhruvasandheḥ sudarśanaḥ /	Druva sanDiH aBUt puzpAt Druva sanDeH sudarSanaH /
   sudarśanādagnivarṇaḥ padmavaṇo 'gnivarṇataḥ // GarP_1,138.45 //	sudarSanAt agni varNaH padmavaNaH agni varNataH // GarP_1,138.45 //
   śīghrastu padmavarṇāttu śīghrātputro marustvabhūt /	SIGraH tu padma varNAt tu SIGrAt putraH maruH tu aBUt /
   maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putrastasya codāvasuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.46 //	maroH prasuSrutaH putraH tasya ca udAvasuH sutaH // GarP_1,138.46 //
   udāvasornandivardhanaḥ suketurnandivardhanāt /	udAvasoH nandivarDanaH suketuH nandi varDanAt /
   suketordevarāto 'bhūdvṛhadukthastataḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.47 //	suketoH devarAtaH aBUt vRhat ukTaH tatas sutaH // GarP_1,138.47 //
   bṛhadukthānmahāvīryaḥ sudhṛtistasya cātmajaḥ /	bRhat ukTAt mahA vIryaH suDRtiH tasya ca AtmajaH /
   sudhṛterdhṛṣṭaketuśca haryaśvo dhṛṣṭaketutaḥ // GarP_1,138.48 //	suDRteH DRzwaketuH ca haryaSvaH DRzwaketutas // GarP_1,138.48 //
   haryaśvāttu marurjāto maroḥ pratīndhako 'bhavat /	haryaSvAt tu maruH jAtaH maroH pratInDakaH aBavat /
   pratīndhakātkṛtiratho devamīḍhastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,138.49 //	pratInDakAt kRtiraTaH devamIXaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,138.49 //
   vibudho devamīḍhāttu vibudhāttu mahādhṛtiḥ /	vibuDaH devamIXAt tu vibuDAt tu mahADRtiH /
   mahādhṛteḥ kīrtirāto mahāromā tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,138.50 //	mahADRteH kIrtirAtaH mahAromA tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,138.50 //
   mahāromṇaḥ svarṇaromā hrasvaromā tadātmajaḥ /	mahAromNaH svarNa romA hrasvaromA tad AtmajaH /
   sīradhvajo hrasvaromṇaḥ tasya sītābhavatsutā // GarP_1,138.51 //	sIraDvajaH hrasvaromNaH tasya sItA aBavat sutAH // GarP_1,138.51 //
   bhrātā kuśadhvajastasya sīradhvajāttu bhānumān /	BrAtA kuSaDvajaH tasya sIraDvajAt tu BAnumAn /
   śatadyumno bhānumataḥ śatadyumnācchuciḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.52 //	SatadyumnaH BAnumataH SatadyumnAt SuciH smRtaH // GarP_1,138.52 //
   ūrjanāmā śuceḥ putraḥ sanadvājastadātmajaḥ /	Urja nAmA SuceH putraH sanadvAjaH tad AtmajaH /
   sanadvājātkulirjāto 'nañjanastu kuleḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.53 //	sanadvAjAt kuliH jAtaH anaQjanaH tu kuleH sutaH // GarP_1,138.53 //
   anañjanācca kulajittasyāpi cādhinemikaḥ /	anaQjanAt ca kula jit tasya api ca aDinemikaH /
   śrutāyustasya putro 'bhūtsupārśvaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,138.54 //	SrutAyuH tasya putraH aBUt supArSvaH ca tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,138.54 //
   supārśvātsṛṃjayo jātaḥ kṣemāriḥ sṛjayātsamṛtaḥ /	supArSvAt sRMjayaH jAtaH kzemAriH sRjayAt samRtaH /
   kṣemāri tastvanenāśca tasya rāmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.55 //	kzemAri taH tu anenAH ca tasya rAmaraTaH smRtaH // GarP_1,138.55 //
   satyaratho rāmarathāttasmādupaguruḥ smṛtaḥ /	satyaraTaH rAma raTAt tasmAt upaguruH smRtaH /
   upagurorupaguptaḥ svāgataścopaguptataḥ // GarP_1,138.56 //	upaguroH upaguptaH svAgataH ca upaguptataH // GarP_1,138.56 //
   svanaraḥ svāgatājjajñe suvarcāstasya cātmajaḥ /	sva naraH svAgatAt jajQe su varcAH tasya ca AtmajaH /
   suvarcasaḥ supārśvastu suśrutaśca supārśvataḥ // GarP_1,138.57 //	suvarcasaH supArSvaH tu suSrutaH ca supArSvataH // GarP_1,138.57 //
   jayastu suśrutājjajñe jayāttu vijayo 'bhavat /	jayaH tu suSrutAt jajQe jayAt tu vijayaH aBavat /
   vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.58 //	vijayasya RtaH putraH Rtasya sunayaH sutaH // GarP_1,138.58 //
   sunayādvītahavyastu vītahavyāddhatiḥ smṛtaḥ /	sunayAt vItahavyaH tu vItahavyAt hatiH smRtaH /
   bahulāśvo dhṛteḥ putro bahulāśvātkṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.59 //	bahulASvaH DRteH putraH bahula aSvAt kRtiH smRtaH // GarP_1,138.59 //
   janakasya dvaye vaṃśe ukto yogasamāśrayaḥ // GarP_1,138.60 //	janakasya dvaye vaMSe uktaH yoga samASrayaH // GarP_1,138.60 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   sūryavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	sUryavaMSavarNanam nAma azwatriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  139	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 139
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   sūryasya kathito vaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /	sUryasya kaTitaH vaMSaH soma vaMSam SRNuzva me /
   nārāyaṇasuto brahmā brahmaṇo 'treḥ samudbhavaḥ // GarP_1,139.1 //	nArAyaNa sutaH brahmA brahmaNaH atreH samudBavaH // GarP_1,139.1 //
   atreḥ somastasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā /	atreH somaH tasya BAryA tArA suraguroH priyA /
   somāttarā budhaṃ jajñe budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ // GarP_1,139.2 //	somAttarA buDam jajQe buDa putraH purUravAH // GarP_1,139.2 //
   budhaputrādathorvaśyāṃ ṣaṭ putrāstu śrutātmakaḥ /	buDa putrAt aTa urvaSyAm zaw putrAH tu Sruta AtmakaH /
   viśvāvasuḥ śatāyuśca āyurdhomānamāvasuḥ // GarP_1,139.3 //	viSvAvasuH SatAyuH ca AyuH DomAnam AvasuH // GarP_1,139.3 //
   amāvasorbhomanāmā bhīmaputraśca kāñcanaḥ /	amAvasoH Boma nAmA BIma putraH ca kAQcanaH /
   kāñcanasya suhotro 'bhūjjahruścābhūtsuhotrataḥ // GarP_1,139.4 //	kAQcanasya suhotraH aBUt jahruH ca aBUt suhotrataH // GarP_1,139.4 //
   jahnoḥ sumanturabhavatsumantorapajāpakaḥ /	jahnoH sumantuH aBavat sumantoH apajApakaH /
   balākāśvastasya putro balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.5 //	balAkASvaH tasya putraH balAkASvAt kuSaH smRtaH // GarP_1,139.5 //
   kuśāśvaḥ kuśanābhaścāmūrtarayo vasuḥ kuśāt /	kuSASvaH kuSanABaH ca amUrtarayaH vasuH kuSAt /
   gādhiḥ kuśāśvātsaṃjajñe viśvāmitrastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.6 //	gADiH kuSASvAt saMjajQe viSvAmitraH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.6 //
   kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā /	kanyA satyavatI dattA RcIkAya dvijAya sA /
   ṛcīkājjamadāgniśca rāmastasyābhavatsutaḥ // GarP_1,139.7 //	RcIkAt jamadAgniH ca rAmaH tasya aBavat sutaH // GarP_1,139.7 //
   viśvāmitrāddevarātamaducchandādayaḥ sutāḥ /	viSvAmitrAt devarAta mat ucCanda AdayaH sutAH /
   āyuṣo nahuṣastasmādanenā rajirambhakau // GarP_1,139.8 //	AyuzaH nahuzaH tasmAt anenAH rajiramBakO // GarP_1,139.8 //
   kṣattravṛddhaḥ kṣattravṛddhātsuhotraścābhavannṛpaḥ /	kzattravRdDaH kzattra vRdDAt suhotraH ca aBavat nRpaH /
   kāśyakāśaugṛtsamadaḥ suhotrādabhavaṃstrayaḥ // GarP_1,139.9 //	kASyaka ASOgRtsamadaH suhotrAt aBavan= trayaH // GarP_1,139.9 //
   gṛtsamadācchauna ko 'bhūtkāśyāddīrghatamāstathā /	gRtsamada at SOna kaH aBUt kASyAt dIrGatamAH taTA /
   vaidyo dhanvantaristasmātketumāṃśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.10 //	vEdyaH DanvantariH tasmAt ketumAn= ca tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.10 //
   bhīmarathaḥ ketumato divodāsastadātmajaḥ /	BImaraTaH ketumataH divodAsaH tad AtmajaH /
   divodāsātpratardanaḥ śatrujitso 'tra viśrutaḥ // GarP_1,139.11 //	divodAsAt pratardanaH Satrujit saH atra viSrutaH // GarP_1,139.11 //
   ṛtadhvajastasya putro hyalarkaśca ṛtadhvajāt /	RtaDvajaH tasya putraH hi alarkaH ca Rta DvajAt /
   alarkātsannatirjajñe sunītaḥ sannateḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.12 //	alarkAt sannatiH jajQe sunItaH sannateH sutaH // GarP_1,139.12 //
   satyaketuḥ sunītasya satyaketorvibhuḥ sutaḥ /	satyaketuH su nItasya satyaketoH viBuH sutaH /
   vibhostu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ // GarP_1,139.13 //	viBoH tu suviBuH putraH su viBoH sukumArakaH // GarP_1,139.13 //
   sukumārāddhṛṣṭaketurvotihotrastadātmajaḥ /	sukumArAt hRzwaketuH votihotraH tad AtmajaH /
   vītihotrasya bhargo 'bhūdbhargabhūmistadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.14 //	vItihotrasya BargaH aBUt Barga BUmiH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.14 //
   vaiṣṇavāḥ syurmahātmāna ityete kāśayo nṛpāḥ /	vEzNavAH syuH mahAtmAnaH iti ete kASayaH nRpAH /
   pañcaputraśatānyāsanrajeḥ śakreṇa saṃhṛtāḥ // GarP_1,139.15 //	paQca putra SatAni Asan rajeH SakreNa saMhRtAH // GarP_1,139.15 //
   pratikṣattraḥ kṣattravṛddhātsaṃjayaśca ta dātmajaḥ /	pratikzattraH kzattra vRdDAt saMjayaH ca te dAtmajaH /
   vijayaḥ saṃjayasyāpi vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.16 //	vijayaH saMjayasya api vijayasya kRtaH sutaH // GarP_1,139.16 //
   kṛtādvṛṣadhanaścābhūtsahadevastadātmajaḥ /	kRtAt vRza DanaH ca aBUt sahadevaH tad AtmajaH /
   sahadevādadīno 'bhūjjayatseno 'pyadīnataḥ // GarP_1,139.17 //	sahadevAt adInaH aBUt jayatsenaH api adInataH // GarP_1,139.17 //
   jayatsenātsaṃkṛtiśca kṣattradharmā ca saṃkṛteḥ /	jayatsenAt saMkRtiH ca kzattraDarmA ca saMkRteH /
   yatiryayātiḥ saṃyātirayātirvikṛtiḥ kramāt // GarP_1,139.18 //	yatiH yayAtiH saMyAtiH ayAtiH vikRtiH kramAt // GarP_1,139.18 //
   nahuṣasya sutāḥ khyātā yayāternṛpatestathā /	nahuzasya sutAH KyAtAH yayAteH nRpateH taTA /
   yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata // GarP_1,139.19 //	yadum ca turvasum ca eva devayAnI vyajAyata // GarP_1,139.19 //
   druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruñca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī /	druhyum ca anum ca pUruQca SarmizWA vArzapArvaNI /
   sahasrajītkroṣṭumanā raghuścaiva yadoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,139.20 //	sahasra jIt krozwu manAH raGuH ca eva yadoH sutAH // GarP_1,139.20 //
   sahasrajitaḥ śatajittasmādvai hayahaihayau /	sahasrajitaH Satajit tasmAt vE haya hEhayO /
   anaraṇyo hayātputro dharmo haihayato 'bhavat // GarP_1,139.21 //	anaraNyaH hayAt putraH DarmaH hEhayataH aBavat // GarP_1,139.21 //
   dharmasya dharmanetro 'būtkuntirvai dharmanetrataḥ /	Darmasya DarmanetraH abUtkuntiH vE DarmanetrataH /
   kunterbabhūta sāhañjirmahiṣmāṃśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.22 //	kunteH baBUta sAhaQjiH mahizmAn= ca tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.22 //
   bhadraśreṇyastasya puttro bhadraśreṇayasya durdamaḥ /	BadraSreNyaH tasya puttraH BadraSreNayasya durdamaH /
   dhanako durdamāccaiva kṛtavīryaśca jānakiḥ // GarP_1,139.23 //	DanakaH durdamAt ca eva kRtavIryaH ca jAnakiH // GarP_1,139.23 //
   kṛtāgniḥ kṛtakarmā ca kṛtaujāḥ sumahābalaḥ /	kRta agniH kRta karmA ca kRtOjAH su mahA balaH /
   kṛtavīryādarjuno 'bhūdarjunācchūrasenakaḥ // GarP_1,139.24 //	kRtavIryAt arjunaH aBUt arjunAt SUrasenakaH // GarP_1,139.24 //
   jayadhvajo madhuḥ śūro vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ /	jayaDvajaH maDuH SUraH vRzaNaH paQca sa vratAH /
   jayadhvajāttālajaṅgho bharatastālajaṅgataḥ // GarP_1,139.25 //	jayaDvajAt tAlajaFGaH BarataH tAla jaFgataH // GarP_1,139.25 //
   vṛṣaṇasya madhuḥ puttro madhorvṛṣṇyādivaṃśakaḥ /	vRzaNasya maDuH puttraH maDoH vRzNi Adi vaMSakaH /
   kroṣṭorvijajñivānputtra āhistasya mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,139.26 //	krozwoH vijajQivAn puttraH AhiH tasya mahAtmanaH // GarP_1,139.26 //
   āheruśaṅkuḥ saṃjajñetasya citrarathaḥ sataḥ /	Aheru SaFkuH saMjajQetasya citraraTaH sataH /
   śaśabinduścitrarathātpatnyo lakṣañca tasya ha // GarP_1,139.27 //	SaSabinduH citraraTAt patnyaH lakzaQca tasya ha // GarP_1,139.27 //
   daśalakṣañca putrāṇāṃ pṛthukīrtyādayo varāḥ /	daSa lakzaQca putrANAm pRTu kIrti AdayaH varAH /
   pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthujayaḥ pṛthudānaḥ pṛthuśravāḥ // GarP_1,139.28 //	pRTukIrtiH pRTu jayaH pRTu dAnaH pRTuSravAH // GarP_1,139.28 //
   pṛthuśravaso 'bhūttama uśanāstamaso 'bhavat /	pRTuSravasaH aBUt tamaH uSanAH tamasaH aBavat /
   tatputraḥ śitagurnāma śrīrukmakavacastataḥ // GarP_1,139.29 //	tad putraH SitaguH nAma SrI rukmakavacaH tatas // GarP_1,139.29 //
   rukmaśca pṛthurukmaśca jyāmaghaḥ pālito hariḥ /	rukmaH ca pRTurukmaH ca jyAmaGaH pAlitaH hariH /
   śrīrukmakavacasyaite vidarbho jyāmaghāttathā // GarP_1,139.30 //	SrI rukma kavacasya ete vidarBaH jyA maGAt taTA // GarP_1,139.30 //
   bhāryāyāñcaiva śaibyāyāṃ vidarbhātkrathakauśikau /	BAryA yAQca eva SEbyAyAm vidarBAt kraTa kOSikO /
   romapādo romapādādbabhrurbabhrordhṛtistathā // GarP_1,139.31 //	romapAdaH romapAdAt baBruH baBroH DRtiH taTA // GarP_1,139.31 //
   kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tataścaidyo nṛpaḥ kila /	kOSikasya RciH putraH tatas cEdyaH nRpaH kila /
   kuntiḥ kilāsya putro 'bhūtkuntervṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.32 //	kuntiH kila asya putraH aBUt kunteH vRzNiH sutaH smRtaH // GarP_1,139.32 //
   vṛṣṇeśca nivṛtiḥ putro daśārhe nivṛtestathā /	vRzNeH ca nivRtiH putraH daSArhe nivRteH taTA /
   daśārhasya suto vyomā jīmūtaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.33 //	daSArhasya sutaH vyomA jImUtaH ca tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.33 //
   jīmūtādvikṛtirjajñe tato bhīmaratho 'bhavat /	jImUtAt vikRtiH jajQe tatas BImaraTaH aBavat /
   tato madhuratho jajñe śakunistasya cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.34 //	tatas maDuraTaH jajQe SakuniH tasya ca AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.34 //
   karambhiḥ śakuneḥ putrastasya vai devavānsmṛtaḥ /	karamBiH SakuneH putraH tasya vE devavAn smRtaH /
   devakṣattro devanato devakṣattrānmadhuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.35 //	devakzattraH devanataH devakzattrAt maDuH smRtaH // GarP_1,139.35 //
   kuruvaṃśo madhoḥ putro hyanuśca kuruvaṃśataḥ /	kuruvaMSaH maDoH putraH hi anuH ca kuru vaMSataH /
   puruhotro hyanoḥ putro hyaṃśuśca puruhotrataḥ // GarP_1,139.36 //	puruhotraH hi anoH putraH hi aMSuH ca puruhotrataH // GarP_1,139.36 //
   sattvaśrutaḥ sutaścāṃśostato vai sāttvato nṛpaḥ /	sattva SrutaH sutaH ca aMSoH tatas vE sAttvataH nRpaH /
   bhajino bhajamānaśca sātvatādandhakaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.37 //	BajinaH BajamAnaH ca sAtvatAt anDakaH sutaH // GarP_1,139.37 //
   mahābhojo vṛṣṇi divyāvanyo devāvṛdho 'bhavat /	mahA BojaH vRzNi divyO= anyaH devAvRDaH aBavat /
   nimivṛṣṇī bhajamānādayutājittathaiva ca // GarP_1,139.38 //	nimi vRzNI BajamAnAt ayutAjit taTA eva ca // GarP_1,139.38 //
   śatajicca sahasrājidbabhrurdevo bṛhaspatiḥ /	Satajit ca sahasrAjit baBruH devaH bRhaspatiH /
   mahābhojāttu bhojo 'bhūttadvṛṣṇeśca sumitrakaḥ // GarP_1,139.39 //	mahA BojAt tu BojaH aBUt tat vRzNeH ca sumitrakaH // GarP_1,139.39 //
   svadhājitsaṃjñakastasmādanamitrāśinī tathā /	svaDAjit saMjQakaH tasmAt anamitra ASinI taTA /
   anamitrasya nighno 'bhūnnighnācchatrājito 'bhavat // GarP_1,139.40 //	anamitrasya niGnaH aBUt niGnAt CatrAjitaH aBavat // GarP_1,139.40 //
   prasenaścāparaḥ khyāto hyanamitrācchibistathā /	prasenaH ca aparaH KyAtaH hi anamitrAt SibiH taTA /
   śibestu satyakaḥ putraḥ satyakātsātyakistathā // GarP_1,139.41 //	SibeH tu satyakaH putraH satyakAt sAtyakiH taTA // GarP_1,139.41 //
   sātyakeḥ sañjayaḥ putraḥ kuliścaiva tadātmajaḥ /	sAtyakeH saQjayaH putraH kuliH ca eva tad AtmajaH /
   kuleryugandharaḥ putraste śaibeyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,139.42 //	kuleH yuganDaraH putraH te SEbeyAH prakIrtitAH // GarP_1,139.42 //
   anamitrānvaye vṛṣṇiḥ śvaphalkaścitrakaḥ sutaḥ /	anamitra anvaye vRzNiH SvaPalkaH citrakaH sutaH /
   śvaphalkāccaivagāndinyāmakrūro vaiṣṇavo 'bhavat // GarP_1,139.43 //	SvaPalkAt ca eva gAndinyAm akrUraH vEzNavaH aBavat // GarP_1,139.43 //
   upamadgurathākrūrāddevadyotastataḥ sutaḥ /	upamadguH aTa akrUrAt devadyotaH tatas sutaH /
   devavānupadevaśca hyakrūrasya sutau smṛtau // GarP_1,139.44 //	devavAn upadevaH ca hi akrUrasya sutO smRtO // GarP_1,139.44 //
   pṛthurvipṛthuścitrasya tvandhakasya śuciḥ smṛtaḥ /	pRTuH vipRTuH citrasya tu anDakasya SuciH smRtaH /
   kukuro bhajamānasya tathā kambalabarhiṣaḥ // GarP_1,139.45 //	kukuraH BajamAnasya taTA kambalabarhizaH // GarP_1,139.45 //
   dhṛṣṭastu kukurājjajñe tasmātkāpotaromakaḥ /	DRzwaH tu kukurAt jajQe tasmAt kApota romakaH /
   tadātmajo vilomā ca vilomnastumburuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.46 //	tad AtmajaH vilomA ca vilomnaH tumburuH sutaH // GarP_1,139.46 //
   tasmāccadundubhirjajñe punarvasurataḥ smṛtaḥ /	tasmAt cadunduBiH jajQe punarvasuH atas smRtaH /
   tasyāhukaścāhukī ca kanyā caivāhukasya tu // GarP_1,139.47 //	tasya AhukaH ca AhukI ca kanyA ca eva Ahukasya tu // GarP_1,139.47 //
   devakaścograsenaśca devakāddevakī tvabhūt /	devakaH ca ugrasenaH ca devakAt devakI tu aBUt /
   vṛkadevopadevāca sahadevā surakṣitā // GarP_1,139.48 //	vRkadevA upadevAca sahadevA su rakzitAH // GarP_1,139.48 //
   śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ /	SrI devI SAntidevI ca vasudevaH uvAha tAH /
   devavānupadevaśca sahadevāsutau smṛtau // GarP_1,139.49 //	devavAn upadevaH ca sahadevA sutO smRtO // GarP_1,139.49 //
   ugrasenasya kaṃso 'bhūtsunāmā ca vaṭādayaḥ /	ugrasenasya kaMsaH aBUt sunAmA ca vawa AdayaH /
   vidūratho bhajamānācchūraścābhūdvidūrathāt // GarP_1,139.50 //	vidUraTaH BajamAnAt SUraH ca aBUt vidUraTAt // GarP_1,139.50 //
   vidūrathasutasyātha sūrasyāpi śamī sutaḥ /	vidUraTa sutasya aTa sUrasya api SamI sutaH /
   pratikṣattraśca śaminaḥ svayambhojastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.51 //	pratikzattraH ca SaminaH svayamBojaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.51 //
   hṛdikaśca svayambhojātkṛtavarmā tadātmajaḥ /	hRdikaH ca svayamBojAt kRtavarmA tad AtmajaH /
   devaḥ śatadhanuścaiva śūrādvai devamīḍhuṣaḥ // GarP_1,139.52 //	devaH SataDanuH ca eva SUrAt vE devamIXuzaH // GarP_1,139.52 //
   daśa putrā māriṣāyāṃ vasudevādayo 'bhavan /	daSa putrAH mArizAyAm vasudeva AdayaH aBavan /
   pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ // GarP_1,139.53 //	pRTA ca SrutadevI ca SrutakIrtiH SrutaSravAH // GarP_1,139.53 //
   rājādhidevo śūrācca pṛthāṃ kunteḥ sutāmadāt /	rAjA aDidevaH SUrAt ca pRTAm kunteH sutAm adAt /
   sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍostasyāṃ dharmānilendrakaiḥ // GarP_1,139.54 //	sA dattA kuntinA pANxoH tasyAm Darma anila indrakEH // GarP_1,139.54 //
   yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmapārtho nakulaḥ sahadevakaḥ /	yuDizWiraH BIma pArTaH nakulaH sahadevakaH /
   mādrayāṃ nāsatyadastrābhyāṃ kuntyāṃ karṇaḥ purābhavat // GarP_1,139.55 //	mAdrayAm nAsatya dastrAByAm kuntyAm karNaH purA Bavat // GarP_1,139.55 //
   śrutadevyāṃ dantavakro jajñe vai yuddhadurmadaḥ /	SrutadevyAm dantavakraH jajQe vE yudDa durmadaH /
   santardanādayaḥ pañca śrutakīrtyāñca kaikayāt // GarP_1,139.56 //	santardana AdayaH paQca SrutakIrtyAQca kEkayAt // GarP_1,139.56 //
   rājādhidevyāṃ jajñāte vindaścaivānuvindakaḥ /	rAjADidevyAm jajQAte vindaH ca eva anuvindakaH /
   śrutaśravā damaghoṣātprajajñe śiśupālakam // GarP_1,139.57 //	SrutaSravAH damaGozAt prajajQe SiSupAlakam // GarP_1,139.57 //
   pauravī rohīṇā bhāryā madirānakadundubheḥ /	pOravI rohINAH BAryA madirA AnakadunduBeH /
   devakīpramukhā bhadrā rohiṇyāṃ balabhadrakaḥ // GarP_1,139.58 //	devakI pramuKAH BadrA rohiNyAm balaBadrakaH // GarP_1,139.58 //
   sāraṇādyāḥ śaṭhaścaiva revatyāṃ balabhadrataḥ /	sAraNa AdyAH SaWaH ca eva revatyAm balaBadrataH /
   niśaṭhaścolmuko jāto devakyāṃ ṣaṭ ca jajñire // GarP_1,139.59 //	niSaWaH ca ulmukaH jAtaH devakyAm zaw ca jajQire // GarP_1,139.59 //
   kīrtimāṃśca suṣeṇaśca hyudāryo bhadrasenakaḥ /	kIrtimAn= ca suzeNaH ca hi udAryaH BadrasenakaH /
   ṛjudāso bhadradevaḥ kaṃsa evāvadhīcca tān // GarP_1,139.60 //	Rju dAsaH BadradevaH kaMsaH eva avaDIt ca tAn // GarP_1,139.60 //
   saṃkarṣaṇaḥ saptamo 'bhūdaṣṭamaḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca /	saMkarzaNaH saptamaH aBUt azwamaH kRzNaH eva ca /
   ṣoḍaśastrīsahasrāṇi bhāryāṇāñcābhavanhareḥ // GarP_1,139.61 //	zoxaSa strI sahasrANi BAryA NAQcABavan hareH // GarP_1,139.61 //
   rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī /	rukmiNI satyaBAmA ca lakzmaNA cAru hAsinI /
   śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī cāṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutānbahūn // GarP_1,139.62 //	SrezWA jAmbavatI ca azwO jajQire tAH sutAn bahUn // GarP_1,139.62 //
   pradyumnaścārudeṣṇaśca pradhānāḥ sāmba eva ca /	pradyumnaH cArudezNaH ca praDAnAH sAmbaH eva ca /
   pradyumnādaniruddho 'bhūtkakudminyāṃ mahābalaḥ // GarP_1,139.63 //	pradyumnAt anirudDaH aBUt kakudminyAm mahA balaH // GarP_1,139.63 //
   aniruddhātsubhadrāyāṃ vajro nāma nṛpo 'bhavat /	anirudDAt suBadrAyAm vajraH nAma nRpaH aBavat /
   pratibāhurvajrasutaścārustasya suto 'bhavat // GarP_1,139.64 //	pratibAhuH vajra sutaH cAruH tasya sutaH aBavat // GarP_1,139.64 //
   vahnistu turvasorvaṃśe vahnerbhargo 'bhavatsutaḥ /	vahniH tu turvasoH vaMSe vahneH BargaH aBavat sutaH /
   bhargādbhānurabhūtputro bhānoḥ putraḥ karandhamaḥ // GarP_1,139.65 //	BargAt BAnuH aBUt putraH BAnoH putraH karanDamaH // GarP_1,139.65 //
   karandhamasya maruto druhyorvaṃśaṃ nibodha me /	karanDamasya marutaH druhyoH vaMSam niboDa me /
   drahyostu tanayaḥ seturāraddhaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.66 //	drahyoH tu tanayaH setuH AradDaH ca tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.66 //
   āraddhasyaiva gāndha ro gharmo gāndhārato 'bhavat /	AradDasya eva gAnDa raH GarmaH gAnDArataH aBavat /
   ghṛtastu gharmaputro 'bhūddurgamaśca ghṛsya tu // GarP_1,139.67 //	GRtaH tu Garma putraH aBUt durgamaH ca GRsya tu // GarP_1,139.67 //
   pracetā durgamasyaiva anorvaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /	pracetAH durgamasya eva anoH vaMSam SRNuzva me /
   anoḥ sabhānaraḥ putrastasmā kālañjayo 'bhavat // GarP_1,139.68 //	anoH saBAnaraH putraH tasmE kAlaQjayaH aBavat // GarP_1,139.68 //
   kālañjayātsṛñjayo 'bhūtsṛñjayāttu puruñjayaḥ /	kAlaQjayAt sRQjayaH aBUt sRQjayAt tu puruQjayaH /
   janamejayastu tatputro mahāśālastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.69 //	janamejayaH tu tad putraH mahASAlaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.69 //
   mahāmanā mahāśāladuśīnara iha smṛtaḥ /	mahAmanAH mahA SAla duSInaraH iha smRtaH /
   aśīnarācchibirjajñe vṛṣadarbhaḥ śiveḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.70 //	aSInarAt SibiH jajQe vRzadarBaH SiveH sutaH // GarP_1,139.70 //
   mahāmanojāttitikṣoḥ putro 'bhūcca ruṣadrathaḥ /	mahA manojAt titikzoH putraH aBUt ca ruzadraTaH /
   hemo ruṣadrathājjajñe sutapā hemato 'bhavat // GarP_1,139.71 //	hemaH ruzadraTAt jajQe sutapAH hemataH aBavat // GarP_1,139.71 //
   baliḥ sutapaso jajñe hyaṅgavaṅgakaliṅgakāḥ /	baliH su tapasaH jajQe hi aFga vaFga kaliFgakAH /
   andhaḥ paiṇḍraśca bāleyā hyanapānastathāṅgataḥ // GarP_1,139.72 //	anDaH pENxraH ca bAleyAH hi anapAnaH taTA aFgataH // GarP_1,139.72 //
   anapānāddivirathastato dharmaratho 'bhavat /	anapAnAt diviraTaH tatas DarmaraTaH aBavat /
   romapādo dharmarathāccaturaṅgastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.73 //	romapAdaH Darma raTAt caturaFgaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,139.73 //
   pṛthulākṣastasya putraścampo 'bhūtpṛthulākṣataḥ /	pRTulAkzaH tasya putraH campaH aBUt pRTulAkzataH /
   campaputraśca haryaṅgastasya bhadrarathaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.74 //	campa putraH ca hari aFgaH tasya BadraraTaH sutaH // GarP_1,139.74 //
   bṛhatkarmā sutastasya bṛhadbhānustato 'bhavat /	bRhatkarmA sutaH tasya bRhadBAnuH tatas aBavat /
   buhanmanā bṛhādbhānostasya putro jayadrathaḥ // GarP_1,139.75 //	buhanmanAH bRhAt BAnoH tasya putraH jayadraTaH // GarP_1,139.75 //
   jayajrathasya vijayo vijayasya dhṛtiḥ sutaḥ /	jayajraTasya vijayaH vijayasya DRtiH sutaH /
   dhṛterdhṛvrataḥ putraḥ satyadharmā dhṛtavratāt // GarP_1,139.76 //	DRteH DRvrataH putraH satya DarmA DRta vratAt // GarP_1,139.76 //
   tasya putrastvadhirathaḥ karṇastasya suto 'bhavat // GarP_1,139.77 //	tasya putraH tu aDiraTaH karNaH tasya sutaH aBavat // GarP_1,139.77 //
   vṛrṣasenastu karṇasya puruvaṃśyāñchaṇuṣva me // GarP_1,139.78 //	vRrzasenaH tu karNasya puru vaMSyAn SaNuzva me // GarP_1,139.78 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahu pArANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	candravaMSavarNanam nAma ekonacatvAriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  140	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 140
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   janamejayaḥ puroścābhūnnamasyurjanamejayāt /	janamejayaH puroH ca aBUt namasyuH janamejayAt /
   tasya putraścābhayadaḥ sudyuścābhayadādabhūt // GarP_1,140.1 //	tasya putraH ca aBayadaH sudyuH ca aBayadAt aBUt // GarP_1,140.1 //
   sudyorbahugatiḥ putraḥ saṃjātistasya cātmajaḥ /	sudyoH bahu gatiH putraH saMjAtiH tasya ca AtmajaH /
   vatsajātiśca sañjāteḥ raudrāśvaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,140.2 //	vatsa jAtiH ca san jAteH rOdrASvaH ca tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,140.2 //
   ṛteyuḥ sthaṇḍileyuśca kakṣeyuśca kṛteyukaḥ /	RteyuH sTaNxileyuH ca kakzeyuH ca kRteyukaH /
   jaleyuḥ santateyuśca rodrāśvasya sutā varāḥ // GarP_1,140.3 //	jaleyuH santateyuH ca rodrASvasya sutAH varAH // GarP_1,140.3 //
   ratināra ṛteyośca tasya pratirathaḥ sutaḥ /	rati nAraH RteyoH ca tasya pratiraTaH sutaH /
   tasya medhātithiḥ putrastatputraścainilaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,140.4 //	tasya meDAtiTiH putraH tad putraH ca EnilaH smRtaH // GarP_1,140.4 //
   ainilasya tu duṣyanto bharatastasya cātmajaḥ /	Enilasya tu duzyantaH BarataH tasya ca AtmajaH /
   śakuntalāyāṃ saṃjajñe vitatho bharatādabhūt // GarP_1,140.5 //	SakuntalAyAm saMjajQe vitaTaH BaratAt aBUt // GarP_1,140.5 //
   vitathasya suto manyurmanyoścaiva naraḥ smṛtaḥ /	vitaTasya sutaH manyuH manyoH ca eva naraH smRtaH /
   narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putro gargo vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.6 //	narasya saMkRtiH putraH gargaH vE saMkRteH sutaH // GarP_1,140.6 //
   gargādamanyuḥ putro vai śiniḥ putro vyajāyata /	gargAt amanyuH putraH vE SiniH putraH vyajAyata /
   manyuputrānmahāvīryātsuto 'bhavadurukṣayaḥ // GarP_1,140.7 //	manyu putrAn mahA vIryAt sutaH aBavat urukzayaH // GarP_1,140.7 //
   urukṣayāttrayyāruṇirvyūhakṣatrācca manyujāt /	urukzayAt trayyAruNiH vyUha kzatrAt ca manyu jAt /
   suhotrastasya hastī ca ajamīḍhadvimīḍhakau // GarP_1,140.8 //	suhotraH tasya hastI ca ajamIXa dvimIXakO // GarP_1,140.8 //
   hastinaḥ purumīḍhaśca kaṇvo 'bhūdajamīḍhataḥ /	hastinaH purumIXaH ca kaNvaH aBUt ajamIXataH /
   kaṇvānmedhātithirjajñe yataḥ kāṇvāyanā dvijāḥ // GarP_1,140.9 //	kaNvAt meDAtiTiH jajQe yatas kANvAyanAH dvijAH // GarP_1,140.9 //
   ajamīḍhādvṛhadiṣustatputraśca bṛhaddhanuḥ /	ajamIXAt vRhadizuH tad putraH ca bRhadDanuH /
   bṛhatkarmā tasya putrastasya putro jayadrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.10 //	bRhatkarmA tasya putraH tasya putraH jayadraTaH // GarP_1,140.10 //
   jayadrathādviśvajicca senajicca tadātmajaḥ /	jayadraTAt viSvajit ca senajit ca tad AtmajaH /
   rucirāśvaḥ senajitaḥ pṛthusenastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,140.11 //	rucirASvaH senajitaH pRTusenaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,140.11 //
   pārastu pṛthusenasya pārāddvīpo 'bhavannṛpaḥ /	pAraH tu pRTusenasya pArAt dvIpaH aBavat nRpaH /
   nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiśca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.12 //	nRpasya sRmaraH putraH sukRtiH ca pRToH sutaH // GarP_1,140.12 //
   vibhrājaḥ sukṛteḥ putro vibhrājādaśvaho 'bhavat /	viBrAjaH sukRteH putraH viBrAjAt aSvahaH aBavat /
   kṛtyāṃ tasmādbrahmadatto viṣvaksenastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,140.13 //	kRtyAm tasmAt brahmadattaH vizvaksenaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,140.13 //
   yavīnaro dvimīḍhasya dhṛtimāṃśca yavīnarāt /	yavInaraH dvimIXasya DRtimAn= ca yavInarAt /
   dhatimataḥ satyadhṛtirdṛḍhanemistadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,140.14 //	DatimataH satyaDRtiH dRXa nemiH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,140.14 //
   dṛḍhanemeḥ supārśvo 'bhūt supārśvātsannatistathā /	dRXanemeH supArSvaH aBUt supArSvAt sannatiH taTA /
   kṛstu sannateḥ putraḥ kṛtādugrāyudho 'bhavat // GarP_1,140.15 //	kRH tu sannateH putraH kRtAt ugrAyuDaH aBavat // GarP_1,140.15 //
   ugrāyudhācca kṣemyau'bhūtsudhīrastu tadātmajaḥ /	ugrAyuDAt ca kzemyO aBUt suDIraH tu tad AtmajaH /
   purañjayaḥ sudhīrācca tasya putro vidūrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.16 //	puraQjayaH su DIrAt ca tasya putraH vidUraTaH // GarP_1,140.16 //
   ajamīḍhānnalinyāñca nīlo nāma nṛpo 'bhavat /	ajamIXAt nalinyAQca nIlaH nAma nRpaH aBavat /
   nīlācchāntirabhūtputraḥ suśāntistasya cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,140.17 //	nIlAt SAntiH aBUt putraH su SAntiH tasya ca AtmajaH // GarP_1,140.17 //
   suśānteśca pururjāto hyarkastasya suto 'bhavat /	su SAnteH ca puruH jAtaH hi arkaH tasya sutaH aBavat /
   arkasya caiva haryaśvo haryaśvānmukulo 'bhavat // GarP_1,140.18 //	arkasya ca eva haryaSvaH haryaSvAt mukulaH aBavat // GarP_1,140.18 //
   yavīnaro bṛhadbhānuḥ kampillaḥ sṛñjayastathā /	yavInaraH bRhadBAnuH kampillaH sRQjayaH taTA /
   pāñcālānmukulājjajñe śaradvānvaiṣṇavo mahān // GarP_1,140.19 //	pAQcAlAt mukulAt jajQe Sarad vAn vEzNavaH mahAn // GarP_1,140.19 //
   divodāso dvitīyo 'sya hyahalyāyāṃ śaradvataḥ /	divodAsaH dvitIyaH asya hi ahalyAyAm SaradvataH /
   śatānando 'bhavatputrastasya satyadhṛtiḥ sataḥ // GarP_1,140.20 //	SatAnandaH aBavat putraH tasya satya DRtiH sataH // GarP_1,140.20 //
   kṛpaḥ kṛpī satyadhṛterurvaśyāṃ vīryahānitaḥ /	kRpaH kRpI satyaDRteH urvaSyAm vIrya hAnitaH /
   droṇapatnī kṛpī jajñe aśvatthāmānamuttamam // GarP_1,140.21 //	droNapatnI kRpI jajQe aSvatTAmAnam uttamam // GarP_1,140.21 //
   divodāsānmitrayuśca mitrayoścyavano 'bhavat /	divodAsAt mitrayuH ca mitrayoH cyavanaH aBavat /
   sudāsaścyavanājjajñe saudāsastasya jātmajaḥ // GarP_1,140.22 //	sudAsaH cyavanAt jajQe sOdAsaH tasya jAtmajaH // GarP_1,140.22 //
   sahadevastasya putraḥ sahadevāttu somakaḥ /	sahadevaH tasya putraH sahadevAt tu somakaH /
   jantustu somakājjajñe pṛṣataścāparo mahān // GarP_1,140.23 //	jantuH tu somakAt jajQe pRzataH ca aparaH mahAn // GarP_1,140.23 //
   pṛṣatāddrupado jajñe dhṛṣṭadyumnastato 'bhavat /	pRzatAt drupadaH jajQe DRzwadyumnaH tatas aBavat /
   dhṛṣṭadyumnāddhṛṣṭaketurṛkṣo 'bhūtajamīḍhataḥ // GarP_1,140.24 //	DRzwadyumnAt hRzwaketuH RkzaH aBUta jamIXataH // GarP_1,140.24 //
   ṛkṣātsaṃvaraṇo jajñe kuruḥ saṃvaraṇādabhūt /	RkzAt saMvaraNaH jajQe kuruH saMvaraNAt aBUt /
   sudhanuśca pīkṣicca jahnuścaiva kuroḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,140.25 //	suDanuH ca pIkzit ca jahnuH ca eva kuroH sutAH // GarP_1,140.25 //
   sudhanuṣaḥ suhotro 'bhūccyavano 'bhūtsuhotrataḥ /	suDanuzaH suhotraH aBUt cyavanaH aBUt suhotrataH /
   cyavanātkṛtako jajñe tathoparicaro vasuḥ // GarP_1,140.26 //	cyavanAt kRtakaH jajQe taTA uparicaraH vasuH // GarP_1,140.26 //
   bṛhadrathaśca pratyagraḥ satyādyāśca vasoḥ sutāḥ /	bRhadraTaH ca pratyagraH satya AdyAH ca vasoH sutAH /
   bṛhadrathātkuśāgraśca kuśāgrādṛṣabho 'bhavat // GarP_1,140.27 //	bRhadraTAt kuSa agraH ca kuSa agrAt RzaBaH aBavat // GarP_1,140.27 //
   ṛṣabhātpuṣpavāṃstasmājjajñe satyahito nṛpaḥ /	RzaBAt puzpavAn= tasmAt jajQe satyahitaH nRpaH /
   satyahitātsudhanvābhūjjahruścava sudhanvanaḥ // GarP_1,140.28 //	satya hitAt suDanvA aBUt jahruH cava suDanvanaH // GarP_1,140.28 //
   bṛhadrathājjarāsandhaḥ sahadevastadātmajaḥ /	bRhadraTAt jarAsanDaH sahadevaH tad AtmajaH /
   sahadevācca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavānsutaḥ // GarP_1,140.29 //	sahadevAt ca ca somApiH somApeH SrutavAn sutaH // GarP_1,140.29 //
   bhīmasenograsenau ca śrutaseno 'parājitaḥ /	BImasena ugrasenO ca SrutasenaH aparAjitaH /
   janamejayastathānyo 'bhūjjahnostu suratho 'bhavat // GarP_1,140.30 //	janamejayaH taTA anyaH aBUt jahnoH tu suraTaH aBavat // GarP_1,140.30 //
   vidūrathastu surathātsārvabhaumo vidūrathāt /	vidUraTaH tu suraTAt sArvaBOmaH vidUraTAt /
   jayasenaḥ sārvabhaumādāvadhītastadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,140.31 //	jayasenaH sArvaBOmAdO= aDItaH tad AtmajaH // GarP_1,140.31 //
   ayutāyustasya putrastasya cākrodhanaḥ sutaḥ /	ayutAyuH tasya putraH tasya ca akroDanaH sutaH /
   akrodhanasyātithiśca ṛkṣo 'bhūdatitheḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.32 //	akroDanasya atiTiH ca RkzaH aBUt atiTeH sutaH // GarP_1,140.32 //
   ṛkṣācca bhīmaseno 'bhūddilīpo bhīmasenataḥ /	RkzAt ca BImasenaH aBUt dilIpaH BImasenataH /
   pratīpo 'bhūddilīpācca devāpistu pratīpataḥ // GarP_1,140.33 //	pratIpaH aBUt dilIpAt ca devApiH tu pratIpataH // GarP_1,140.33 //
   śantanuścaiva bāhlīkastrayaste bhrātaro nṛpāḥ /	SantanuH ca eva bAhlIkaH trayaH te BrAtaraH nRpAH /
   bāhlīkātsomadatto 'bhūdbhūrirbhūriśravāstataḥ // GarP_1,140.34 //	bAhlIkAt somadattaH aBUt BUriH BUriSravAH tatas // GarP_1,140.34 //
   śalaśca śantanorbhoṣmo gaṅgāyāṃ dhārmiko mahān /	SalaH ca SantanoH BozmaH gaFgAyAm DArmikaH mahAn /
   citrāṅgadavicitrau tu satyavatyāntu śantanoḥ // GarP_1,140.35 //	citrAFgada vicitrO tu satyavatyAntu SantanoH // GarP_1,140.35 //
   bhārye vicitravīryasya tvambikāmbālike tayoḥ /	BArye vicitravIryasya tu ambikA ambAlike tayoH /
   dhṛrāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuñca taddāsyāṃ vidurantathā // GarP_1,140.36 //	DRrAzwram ca pANxuQca tat dAsyAm viduran taTA // GarP_1,140.36 //
   vyāsa utpādayāmāsa gāndhāgī dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ /	vyAsaH utpAdayAmAsa gAnDAgI DRtarAzwrataH /
   śataputraṃ duryodhanādyaṃ pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire // GarP_1,140.37 //	Sata putram duryoDana Adyam pANxoH paQca prajajQire // GarP_1,140.37 //
   pratibindhyaḥ śrutasomaḥ śrutakīrtistathārjunāt /	pratibinDyaH SrutasomaH SrutakIrtiH taTA arjunAt /
   śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyāṃ pañca vai kramāt // GarP_1,140.38 //	SatAnIkaH SrutakarmA drOpadyAm paQca vE kramAt // GarP_1,140.38 //
   yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī caiva subhadrikā /	yODeyI ca hiximbA ca kOSI ca eva suBadrikA /
   vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyastu sutāḥ kramāt // GarP_1,140.39 //	vijayA vE reNumatI paQcaByaH tu sutAH kramAt // GarP_1,140.39 //
   devako ghacotkacaśca hyabhimanyuśca sarvagaḥ /	devakaH GacotkacaH ca hi aBimanyuH ca sarva gaH /
   suhotro niramitraśca parīkṣidabhimanyujaḥ // GarP_1,140.40 //	suhotraH niramitraH ca parIkzit aBimanyu jaH // GarP_1,140.40 //
   janamejayo 'sya tato bhaviṣyāṃśca nṛpāñchṛṇu // GarP_1,140.41 //	janamejayaH asya tatas BavizyAn= ca nRpAn SRNu // GarP_1,140.41 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	candravaMSavarNanam nAma catvAriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  141	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 141
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   śatānīko hyaśvamedhadattaścāpyadhisomakaḥ /	SatAnIkaH hi aSvameDa dattaH ca api aDisomakaH /
   kṛṣṇo 'niruddhaścāpyuṣṇastataścitraratho nṛpaḥ // GarP_1,141.1 //	kRzNaH anirudDaH ca api uzNaH tatas citraraTaH nRpaH // GarP_1,141.1 //
   śucidratho vṛṣṇimāṃśca supeṇaśca sunīthakaḥ /	SucidraTaH vRzNimAn= ca supeNaH ca sunITakaH /
   nṛcakṣuśca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ // GarP_1,141.2 //	nRcakzuH ca muKAbANaH meDAvI ca nRpaQjayaH // GarP_1,141.2 //
   pāriplavaśca munayo medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ /	pAriplavaH ca munayaH meDAvI ca nRpaQjayaH /
   bṛhadratho haristigmo śatānīkaḥ sudānakaḥ // GarP_1,141.3 //	bRhadraTaH hariH tigmaH SatAnIkaH sudAnakaH // GarP_1,141.3 //
   udāno 'hninaraścaiva daṇḍapāṇirnimittakaḥ /	udAnaH ahni naraH ca eva daNxapANiH nimittakaH /
   kṣemakaśca tataḥ śūdraḥ pitā pūrvastataḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,141.4 //	kzemakaH ca tatas SUdraH pitA pUrvaH tatas sutaH // GarP_1,141.4 //
   bṛhadbalāstu kathayante nṛpoścaikṣvākuvaṃśajāḥ /	bRhadbalAH tu kaTayante nRpoH ca EkzvAku vaMSa jAH /
   bṛhadbalādurukṣayo vatsavyūhastataḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,141.5 //	bRhadbalAt urukzayaH vatsa vyUhaH tatas paraH // GarP_1,141.5 //
   vatsavyūhāttataḥ sūryaḥ sahadevastadātmajaḥ /	vatsa vyUhAt tatas sUryaH sahadevaH tad AtmajaH /
   bṛhadaśvo bhānurathaḥ pratīcyaśca pratītakaḥ /	bRhadaSvaH BAnuraTaH pratIcyaH ca pratItakaH /
   manudevaḥ sunakṣatraḥ kinnaraścāntarikṣakaḥ // GarP_1,141.6 //	manudevaH su nakzatraH kinnaraH ca antarikzakaH // GarP_1,141.6 //
   suparṇaḥ kṛtajiccaiva bṛhadbhrājaśca dhārmikaḥ /	suparNaH kRtajit ca eva bRhadBrAjaH ca DArmikaH /
   kṛtañjayo dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākya eva ca // GarP_1,141.7 //	kRtaQjayaH DanaQjayaH saMjayaH SAkyaH eva ca // GarP_1,141.7 //
   śuddhodano bāhulaśca senajitkṣudrakastathā /	SudDodanaH bAhulaH ca senajit kzudrakaH taTA /
   sumitraḥ kuḍavaścātaḥ sumitrānmāgadhāñchaṇu // GarP_1,141.8 //	sumitraH kuxavaH ca atas sumitrAt mAgaDAn SaNu // GarP_1,141.8 //
   jarāsandhaḥ sahadevaḥ somāpiśca śrutaśravāḥ /	jarAsanDaH sahadevaH somApiH ca SrutaSravAH /
   ayutāyurniramitraḥ sukṣatro bahukarmakaḥ // GarP_1,141.9 //	ayutAyuH niramitraH sukzatraH bahu karmakaH // GarP_1,141.9 //
   śrutañjayaḥ senajicca bhūriścaiva śucistathā /	Sru taQjayaH senajit ca BUriH ca eva SuciH taTA /
   kṣemyaśca suvrato dharmaḥ śmaśrulo dṛḍhasenakaḥ // GarP_1,141.10 //	kzemyaH ca suvrataH DarmaH SmaSrulaH dRXasenakaH // GarP_1,141.10 //
   sumatiḥ subalo nīto satyajidviśvajittathā /	sumatiH subalaH nItaH satyajit viSva jit taTA /
   iṣuñjayaśca ityete nṛpā bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,141.11 //	izuQjayaH ca iti ete nRpAH bArhadraTAH smRtAH // GarP_1,141.11 //
   adharmiṣṭhāśca śūdrāśca bhaviṣyanti nṛpāstataḥ /	aDarmizWAH ca SUdrAH ca Bavizyanti nRpAH tatas /
   svargādikṛddhi bhagavānsākṣānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ // GarP_1,141.12 //	svarga Adi kRt hi BagavAn sAkzAt nArAyaNaH avyayaH // GarP_1,141.12 //
   naimittikaḥ prākṛtikastathaivātyantiko layaḥ /	nEmittikaH prAkRtikaH taTA eva AtyantikaH layaH /
   yāti bhūḥ pralayaṃ cāpsu hyāpastejasi pāvakaḥ // GarP_1,141.13 //	yAti BUH pralayam ca apsu hi ApaH tejasi pAvakaH // GarP_1,141.13 //
   vāyau vāyuśca viyati tvākāśau yātyahaṅkṛtau /	vAyO vAyuH ca viyati tu AkASO yAti ahaFkRtO /
   ahaṃ buddhau matirjove jīvo 'vyakte tadātmani // GarP_1,141.14 //	aham budDO matiH jove jIvaH avyakte tad Atmani // GarP_1,141.14 //
   ātmā pareśvaro viṣṇureko nārāyaṇo naraḥ /	AtmA para ISvaraH vizNuH ekaH nArAyaNaH naraH /
   avināśyaparaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsvargādi nāśi hi // GarP_1,141.15 //	avinASya param sarvam jagat svarga Adi nASi hi // GarP_1,141.15 //
   nṛpādayo gatā nāśamataḥ pāpaṃ vivarjayet /	nRpa AdayaH gatAH nASam atas pApam vivarjayet /
   dharmaṃ kuryātsthiraṃ yena pāpaṃ hitvā hariṃ vrajet // GarP_1,141.16 //	Darmam kuryAt sTiram yena pApam hitvA harim vrajet // GarP_1,141.16 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhaviṣya	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe Bavizya
   rājavaṃśa dṛ nāmaikacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	rAjavaMSa dR nAma ekacatvAriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  142	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 142
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   viṃśādīnpālayāmāsa hyavatīrṇo hariḥ prabhuḥ /	viMSa AdIn pAlayAmAsa hi avatIrNaH hariH praBuH /
   daityadharmasya nāśārthaṃ vedadharmādiguptaye // GarP_1,142.1 //	dEtya Darmasya nASa arTam veda Darma Adi guptaye // GarP_1,142.1 //
   matsyādikasvarūpeṇa tvavatāraṃ karotyajaḥ /	matsya Adika svarUpeNa tu avatAram karoti ajaH /
   matsyo bhūtvā hayagrīvaṃ daityaṃ hatvājikaṇṭakam // GarP_1,142.2 //	matsyaH BUtvA hayagrIvam dEtyam hatvA AjikaNwakam // GarP_1,142.2 //
   vedānānīya manvādīnpālayāmāsa keśavaḥ /	vedAn AnIya manu AdIn pAlayAmAsa keSavaH /
   mandaraṃ dhārayāmāsa kūrmo bhūtvā hitāya ca // GarP_1,142.3 //	mandaram DArayAmAsa kUrmaH BUtvA hitAya ca // GarP_1,142.3 //
   kṣīrodamathane vai dyo devo dhanvantarirhyarbhūt /	kzIroda maTane vE dyaH devaH DanvantariH hi arBUt /
   bibhratkamaṇḍaluṃ pūrṇamamṛtena samutthitaḥ // GarP_1,142.4 //	biBrat kamaNxalum pUrNam amRtena samutTitaH // GarP_1,142.4 //
   āyurvedamathāṣṭāṅgaṃ suśrutāya sa uktavān /	Ayurvedam aTa azwAFgam suSrutAya saH uktavAn /
   amṛtaṃ pāyayāmāsa strīrūpī ca surānhariḥ // GarP_1,142.5 //	amRtam pAyayAmAsa strI rUpI ca surAn hariH // GarP_1,142.5 //
   avatīrṇo varāho 'tha hiraṇyākṣaṃ jaghāna ha /	avatIrNaH varAhaH aTa hiraNyAkzam jaGAna ha /
   pṛthivīṃ dhārayāmāsa pālayāmāsa devatāḥ // GarP_1,142.6 //	pRTivIm DArayAmAsa pAlayAmAsa devatAH // GarP_1,142.6 //
   narasiṃho 'vartorṇo 'tha hiraṇyakaśipuṃripum /	narasiMhaH avarta UrNaH aTa hiraNyakaSipuMripum /
   daityānnihatavānvedadharmādīnabhyapālayat // GarP_1,142.7 //	dEtyAn nihatavAn veda Darma AdIn aByapAlayat // GarP_1,142.7 //
   tataḥ paraśurāmo 'bhūjjamadagnerjagatprabhuḥ /	tatas paraSurAmaH aBUt jamadagneH jagat praBuH /
   triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ cakre niḥ kṣattriyāṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,142.8 //	tris sapta kRtvas pRTivIm cakre niH kzattriyAm hariH // GarP_1,142.8 //
   kārtavīryaṃ jaghānājau kaśyapāya mahīṃ dadau /	kArtavIryam jaGAna AjO kaSyapAya mahIm dadO /
   yāgaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhurmahendre parvate sthitaḥ // GarP_1,142.9 //	yAgam kRtvA mahA bAhuH mahendre parvate sTitaH // GarP_1,142.9 //
   tato rāmo bhaviṣṇuśca caturdhā duṣṭarmadanaḥ /	tatas rAmaH BavizNuH ca caturDA duzwarmadanaH /
   putro daśarathājjajñe rāmaśca bharato 'nujaḥ // GarP_1,142.10 //	putraH daSaraTAt jajQe rAmaH ca BarataH anujaH // GarP_1,142.10 //
   lakṣmaṇaścātha śatrughno rāmabhāryā ca jānakī /	lakzmaNaH ca aTa SatruGnaH rAma BAryA ca jAnakI /
   rāmaśca pitṛsatyārthaṃ mātṛbhyo hitamācaran // GarP_1,142.11 //	rAmaH ca pitR satya arTam mAtRByaH hitam Acaran // GarP_1,142.11 //
   śṛṅgaveraṃ citrakūṭaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyamāgataḥ /	SRFgaveram citrakUwam daNxaka araNyam AgataH /
   nāsāṃ śūrpaṇakhāyāśca cchittvātha kharadūṣaṇam // GarP_1,142.12 //	nAsAm SUrpaNaKAyAH ca cCittvA aTa Kara dUzaNam // GarP_1,142.12 //
   hatvā sa rākṣasaṃ sītāpahārirajanīcaram /	hatvA sa rAkzasam sItA apahAri rajanIcaram /
   rāvaṇaṃ cānujaṃ tasya laṅkāpuryāṃ vibhīṣaṇam // GarP_1,142.13 //	rAvaNam ca anujam tasya laFkA puryAm viBIzaNam // GarP_1,142.13 //
   rakṣorājye ca saṃsthāpya sugrīvanumanmukhaiḥ /	rakzaH rAjye ca saMsTApya sugrIva numad muKEH /
   āruhya puṣpakaṃ sārdhaṃ sītayā patibhaktayā // GarP_1,142.14 //	Aruhya puzpakam sArDam sItayA pati BaktayA // GarP_1,142.14 //
   lakṣmaṇenānukūlena hyayodhyāṃ svapurīṃ gataḥ /	lakzmaNena anukUlena hi ayoDyAm sva purIm gataH /
   rājyaṃ cakāra devādīnpālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ // GarP_1,142.15 //	rAjyam cakAra deva AdIn pAlayAmAsa sa prajAH // GarP_1,142.15 //
   dharmasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ cakre hyaśvamedhādikānkratūn /	Darma saMrakzaNam cakre hi aSvameDa AdikAn kratUn /
   sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇaiva yathāsukham // GarP_1,142.16 //	sA mahIpatinA reme rAmeNa eva yaTAsuKam // GarP_1,142.16 //
   rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam /	rAvaNasya gRhe sItA sTitAH Beje na rAvaNam /
   karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavaṃ sadā // GarP_1,142.17 //	karmaNA manasA vAcA sA gatAH rAGavam sadA // GarP_1,142.17 //
   pativratā tu sā sītā hyanasūyā yathaiva tu /	pativratA tu sA sItA hi anasUyA yaTA eva tu /
   pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_1,142.18 //	pativratAyAH mAhAtmyam SRNu tvam kaTayAmi aham // GarP_1,142.18 //
   kauśiko brāhmaṇaḥ kuṣṭhī pratiṣṭhāne 'bhavatpurā /	kOSikaH brAhmaNaH kuzWI pratizWAne aBavat purA /
   taṃ tathā vyādhitaṃ bhāryā patiṃ devamivārcayat // GarP_1,142.19 //	tam taTA vyADitam BAryA patim devam iva arcayat // GarP_1,142.19 //
   nirbhartsitāpi bhartāraṃ tamamanyata daivatam /	nirBartsitA api BartAram tam amanyata dEvatam /
   bhartroktā sānayadveśyāṃ śulkamādāya cādhikam // GarP_1,142.20 //	BartrA uktA sA Anayat veSyAm Sulkam AdAya ca aDikam // GarP_1,142.20 //
   pathi sūle tadā protamacauraṃ cauraśaṅkayā /	paTi sUle tadA protam acOram cOra SaFkayA /
   māṇḍavyamatiduḥ khārtamandhakāre 'tha sa dvijaḥ // GarP_1,142.21 //	mANxavyam atiduH Ka Artam anDakAre aTa sa dvijaH // GarP_1,142.21 //
   patnīskandhasamārūḍhaścālayāmāsa kauśikaḥ /	patnI skanDa samArUXaH cAlayAmAsa kOSikaH /
   pādāvamarśaṇatkruddho māṇḍavyastamuvāca ha // GarP_1,142.22 //	pAda avamarSaNat krudDaH mANxavyaH tam uvAca ha // GarP_1,142.22 //
   sūryodaye mṛtistasya yenāhaṃ cālitaḥ padā /	sUrya udaye mRtiH tasya yena aham cAlitaH padA /
   tacchrutvā prāha tadbhāryā sūryo nodayameṣyati // GarP_1,142.23 //	tat SrutvA prAha tad BAryA sUryaH na udayam ezyati // GarP_1,142.23 //
   tataḥ sūryodayābhāvāda bhavatsatataṃ niśā /	tatas sUrya udaya aBAvAda Bavat satatam niSA /
   bahūnyabdapramāṇāni tato devā bhayaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,142.24 //	bahUni abda pramANAni tatas devAH Bayam yayuH // GarP_1,142.24 //
   brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmustāmūce padmasambhavaḥ /	brahmANam SaraNam jagmuH tAm Uce padma samBavaH /
   praśāmyate tejasaiva tapastejastvanena vai // GarP_1,142.25 //	praSAmyate tejasA eva tapaH tejaH tu anena vE // GarP_1,142.25 //
   pativratāyā māhātmyānnodgacchati divākaraḥ /	pativratAyAH mAhAtmyAt na udgacCati divAkaraH /
   tasya cānudayāddhānirmartyānāṃ bhavatāṃ tathā // GarP_1,142.26 //	tasya ca anudayAt hAniH martyAnAm BavatAm taTA // GarP_1,142.26 //
   tasmātpativratāmatreranasūyāṃ tapasvinīm /	tasmAt pativratAm atreH anasUyAm tapasvinIm /
   prasādayata vai patnīṃ bhānorudayakāmyayā // GarP_1,142.27 //	prasAdayata vE patnIm BAnoH udaya kAmyayA // GarP_1,142.27 //
   taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hyanasūyā pativratā /	tEH sA prasAditA gatvA hi anasUyA pativratA /
   kṛtvādityodayaṃ sā ca taṃ bhartāramajīvayat /	kRtvA Aditya udayam sA ca tam BartAram ajIvayat /
   pativratānasūyāyāḥ sītābhūdadhikā kila // GarP_1,142.28 //	pativratA anasUyAyAH sItA aBUt aDikA kila // GarP_1,142.28 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   daśāvatāradṛ nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	daSAvatAradR nAma dvicatvAriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  143	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 143
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   rāmāyaṇamato vakṣye śrutaṃ pāpavināśanam /	rAmAyaNam atas vakzye Srutam pApa vinASanam /
   viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā marīcistatsuto 'bhavat // GarP_1,143.1 //	vizNu nABi abjataH brahmA marIciH tad sutaH aBavat // GarP_1,143.1 //
   marīceḥ kaśyapastasmādravistasmānmanuḥ smṛtaḥ /	marIceH kaSyapaH tasmAt raviH tasmAt manuH smRtaH /
   manorikṣvākurasyābhūdvaṃśe rājā raghuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,143.2 //	manoH ikzvAkuH asya aBUt vaMSe rAjA raGuH smRtaH // GarP_1,143.2 //
   raghorajastato jāto rājā daśaratho balī /	raGoH ajaH tatas jAtaH rAjA daSaraTaH balI /
   tasya putrāstu catvāro mahābalaparākramāḥ // GarP_1,143.3 //	tasya putrAH tu catvAraH mahA bala parAkramAH // GarP_1,143.3 //
   kausalyāyāma bhūdrāmo bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ /	kOsalyA AyAma BUdrAmaH BarataH kEkayI sutaH /
   sutau lakṣmaṇaśakṣughnau sumitrāyāṃ babhūvatuḥ // GarP_1,143.4 //	sutO lakzmaNa Sakzu GnO sumitrAyAm baBUvatuH // GarP_1,143.4 //
   rāmo bhaktaḥ piturmāturviśvāmitrādavāptavān /	rAmaH BaktaH pituH mAtuH viSvAmitrAt avAptavAn /
   astragrāmaṃ tato yakṣīṃ tāṭakāṃ prajaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.5 //	astra grAmam tatas yakzIm tAwakAm prajaGAna ha // GarP_1,143.5 //
   viśāvamitrasya yajñe vai subāhuṃ nyavadhīdbalī /	viSOvamitrasya yajQe vE subAhum nyavaDIt balI /
   janakasya kratuṃ gatvā upayeme 'tha jānakīm // GarP_1,143.6 //	janakasya kratum gatvA upayeme aTa jAnakIm // GarP_1,143.6 //
   ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇo vīro bharato māṇḍavīṃ sutām /	UrmilAm lakzmaNaH vIraH BarataH mANxavIm sutAm /
   śatrughno vai kīrtimatīṃ kuśadhvajasute ubhe // GarP_1,143.7 //	SatruGnaH vE kIrtimatIm kuSaDvaja sute uBe // GarP_1,143.7 //
   pitrādibhirayodhyāyāṃ gatvā rāmādayaḥ sthitāḥ /	pitR AdiBiH ayoDyAyAm gatvA rAma AdayaH sTitAH /
   yudhājitaṃ mātulañca śatrughnabharatau gatau // GarP_1,143.8 //	yuDAjitam mAtulaQca SatruGna BaratO gatO // GarP_1,143.8 //
   gatayornṛpavaryo 'sau rājyaṃ dātuṃ samudyataḥ /	gatayoH nRpa varyaH asO rAjyam dAtum samudyataH /
   sa rāmāya tatputrāya kaikeyyā prārthitastadā // GarP_1,143.9 //	sa rAmAya tad putrAya kEkeyyA prArTitaH tadA // GarP_1,143.9 //
   caturdaśasamāvāso vanerāmasya vāñchitaḥ /	caturdaSa samAvAsaH vanerAmasya vAQCitaH /
   rāmaḥ pitṛhitārthañca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā // GarP_1,143.10 //	rAmaH pitR hita arTaQca lakzmaNena ca sItayA // GarP_1,143.10 //
   rājyañca tṛṇavattyaktvā śṛṅgaverapuraṃ gataḥ /	rAjyaQca tRNa vat tyaktvA SRFgavera puram gataH /
   rathaṃ tyaktvā prayāgañca citrakūṭagiriṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,143.11 //	raTam tyaktvA prayAgaQca citrakUwa girim gataH // GarP_1,143.11 //
   rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargaṃ samāśritaḥ /	rAmasya tu viyogena rAjA svargam samASritaH /
   saṃskṛtya bharataścāgādrāmamāha balānvitaḥ // GarP_1,143.12 //	saMskRtya BarataH ca AgAdrAmam Aha bala anvitaH // GarP_1,143.12 //
   ayodhyāntu samāgatya rājyaṃ kuru mahāmate /	ayoDyAntu samAgatya rAjyam kuru mahAmate /
   sa naicchatpāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu // GarP_1,143.13 //	sa na EcCat pAduke dattvA rAjyAya BaratAya tu // GarP_1,143.13 //
   visarjito 'tha bharato rāmarājyamapālayat /	visarjitaH aTa BarataH rAma rAjyam apAlayat /
   nandigrāme sthito bhakto hyayodhyāṃ nāviśadvratī // GarP_1,143.14 //	nandigrAme sTitaH BaktaH hi ayoDyAm na aviSat vratI // GarP_1,143.14 //
   rāmo 'pi citrakūṭācca hyatrerāśramamāyayau /	rAmaH api citrakUwAt ca hi atreH ASramam AyayO /
   natvā sutīkṣṇaṃ cāgastyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyamāgataḥ // GarP_1,143.15 //	natvA su tIkzNam ca agastyam daNxaka araNyam AgataH // GarP_1,143.15 //
   tatra śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī cāttumāgatā /	tatra SUrpaNaKA nAma rAkzasI ca attum AgatAH /
   nikṛtya karṇo nāse ca rāmeṇāthāpavāritā // GarP_1,143.16 //	nikRtya karNaH nAse ca rAmeNa aTa apavAritAH // GarP_1,143.16 //
   tatpreritaḥ kharaścāgāddūṣaṇastriśirāstathā /	tad preritaH KaraH ca AgAt dUzaNaH triSirAH taTA /
   caturdaśasahasreṇa rakṣasāntu balena ca // GarP_1,143.17 //	caturdaSa sahasreNa rakzasA antu balena ca // GarP_1,143.17 //
   rāmo 'pi preṣayāmāsa bāṇairyamapurañca tān /	rAmaH api prezayAmAsa bANEH yamapuraQca tAn /
   rākṣasyā prerito 'bhyāgādrāvaṇo haraṇāya hi // GarP_1,143.18 //	rAkzasyA preritaH aByAgAt rAvaNaH haraNAya hi // GarP_1,143.18 //
   mṛgarūpaṃ sa mārīcaṃ kṛtvāgre 'tha tridaṇḍadhṛk /	mRga rUpam sa mArIcam kRtvA agre aTa tridaNxa DRk /
   sītayā prerito rāmo mārīcaṃ nijaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.19 //	sItayA preritaH rAmaH mArIcam nijaGAna ha // GarP_1,143.19 //
   mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte ! lakṣmaṇoti ca /	mriyamANaH sa ca prAha hA sIte ! lakzmaNoti ca /
   sītokto lakṣmaṇo 'thāgādrāmaścānudadarśa tam // GarP_1,143.20 //	sItA uktaH lakzmaNaH aTa agAt rAmaH ca anudadarSa tam // GarP_1,143.20 //
   uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnaṃ sītā hṛteti saḥ /	uvAca rAkzasI mAyA nUnam sItA hRtA iti saH /
   rāvaṇo 'ntaramāsādya hyaṅkenādāya jānakīm // GarP_1,143.21 //	rAvaNaH antaram AsAdya hi aFkena AdAya jAnakIm // GarP_1,143.21 //
   jaṭāyuṣaṃ vinirbhidya yayau laṅkāṃ tato balī /	jawAyuzam vinirBidya yayO laFkAm tatas balI /
   aśokavṛkṣacchāyāyāṃ rakṣitāṃ tāmadhārayat // GarP_1,143.22 //	aSoka vRkza= CAyAyAm rakzitAm tAm aDArayat // GarP_1,143.22 //
   āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyāñca parṇaśālāṃ dadarśa ha /	Agatya rAmaH sUnyAn ca parNa SAlAm dadarSa ha /
   śokaṃ kṛtvātha jānakyā mārgaṇaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,143.23 //	Sokam kRtvA aTa jAnakyAH mArgaNam kRtavAn praBuH // GarP_1,143.23 //
   jaṭāyuṣañca saṃskṛtya tadukto dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /	jawAyuzaQca saMskRtya tad uktaH dakziNAm diSam /
   gatvā sakhyaṃ tataścakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ // GarP_1,143.24 //	gatvA saKyam tatas cakre sugrIveNa ca rAGavaH // GarP_1,143.24 //
   sapta tālānvinirbhidya śareṇānataparvaṇā /	sapta tAlAn vinirBidya SareNa Anata parvaNA /
   vālinañca vinirbhidya kiṣkindhāyāṃ harīśvaram // GarP_1,143.25 //	vAlinaQca vinirBidya kizkinDAyAm hari ISvaram // GarP_1,143.25 //
   sugrīvaṃ kṛtavānrāma ṛśyamūke svayaṃ sthitaḥ /	sugrIvam kRtavAn rAmaH RSyamUke svayam sTitaH /
   sugrīvaḥ preṣayāmāsa vānarānparvatopamān // GarP_1,143.26 //	sugrIvaH prezayAmAsa vAnarAn parvata upamAn // GarP_1,143.26 //
   sītāyā mārgaṇaṃ kartuṃ pūrvādyāśāsu sotsavān /	sItAyAH mArgaNam kartum pUrva Adi ASAsu sa utsavAn /
   pratīcīmuttarāṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ gatvā samāgatāḥ // GarP_1,143.27 //	pratIcIm uttarAm prAcIm diSam gatvA samAgatAH // GarP_1,143.27 //
   dakṣiṇāntu diśaṃ ye ca mārgayanto 'tha jānakīm /	dakziNAntu diSam ye ca mArgayantaH aTa jAnakIm /
   vanāni parvatāndvīpānnadīnāṃ pulināni ca // GarP_1,143.28 //	vanAni parvatAn dvIpAn nadInAm pulinAni ca // GarP_1,143.28 //
   jānakīnte hyapaśyanto maraṇe kṛtaniścayāḥ /	jAnakInte hi apaSyantaH maraNe kRta niScayAH /
   sampātivacanājjñātvā hanūmānkapikuñjaraḥ // GarP_1,143.29 //	sampAti vacanAt jQAtvA hanUmAn kapi kuQjaraH // GarP_1,143.29 //
   śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ pupluve makarālayam /	Sata yojana vistIrNam pupluve makara Alayam /
   apaśyajjānakīṃ tatra hyaśokavanikāsthitām // GarP_1,143.30 //	apaSyat jAnakIm tatra hi aSoka vanikA sTitAm // GarP_1,143.30 //
   bhartsitāṃ rākṣasībhiśca rāvaṇena ca rakṣasā /	BartsitAm rAkzasIBiH ca rAvaNena ca rakzasA /
   bhava bhāryeti vadatā cintayantīñca rāghavam // GarP_1,143.31 //	Bava BAryA iti vadatA cintayantIQca rAGavam // GarP_1,143.31 //
   aṅgulīyaṃ kapirdattvā sītāṃ kauśalyamabravīt /	aFgulIyam kapiH dattvA sItAm kOSalyam abravIt /
   rāmasya tasya dūto 'haṃ śokaṃ mā kuru maithili // GarP_1,143.32 //	rAmasya tasya dUtaH aham Sokam mA kuru mETili // GarP_1,143.32 //
   svābhijñānañca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati /	sva aBijQAnaQca me dehi yena rAmaH smarizyati /
   tacchrutvā pradadau sītā veṇīratnaṃ hanūmate // GarP_1,143.33 //	tat SrutvA pradadO sItA veNI ratnam hanUmate // GarP_1,143.33 //
   yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā vācyaṃ tvayā kape /	yaTA rAmaH nayet SIGram taTA vAcyam tvayA kape /
   tathetyuktvā tu hanumānvanaṃ divyaṃ babhañja ha // GarP_1,143.34 //	taTA iti uktvA tu hanumAn vanam divyam baBaQja ha // GarP_1,143.34 //
   hatvākṣaṃ rākṣasāṃścānyānbandhanaṃ svayamāgataḥ /	hatvA akzam rAkzasAn= ca anyAn banDanam svayam AgataH /
   sarvairindrajito bāṇairdṛṣṭvā rāvaṇamabravīt // GarP_1,143.35 //	sarvEH indrajitaH bANEH dRzwvA rAvaNam abravIt // GarP_1,143.35 //
   rāmadūto 'smi hanumāndehi rāmāya maithilīm /	rAma dUtaH asmi hanumAn dehi rAmAya mETilIm /
   etacchrutvā prakupito dīpayāmāsa pucchakam // GarP_1,143.36 //	etat SrutvA prakupitaH dIpayAmAsa pucCakam // GarP_1,143.36 //
   kapirjvalitalāṅgūlo laṅkāṃ dehe' mahābalaḥ /	kapiH jvalita lAFgUlaH laFkAm dehe a mahA balaH /
   dagdhvā laṅkāṃ samāyāto rāmapārśvaṃ sa vānaraḥ // GarP_1,143.37 //	dagDvA laFkAm samAyAtaH rAma pArSvam sa vAnaraH // GarP_1,143.37 //
   jagdhvā phalaṃ madhuvane dṛṣṭā sītatyavedayat /	jagDvA Palam maDuvane dRzwA sItati avedayat /
   veṇīratnañca rāmāya rāmo laṅkāpurrī yayau // GarP_1,143.38 //	veNI ratnaQca rAmAya rAmaH laFkA purrI yayO // GarP_1,143.38 //
   sasugrīvaḥ sa hanumānsāṃgadaśca salakṣmaṇaḥ /	sa sugrIvaH sa hanumAn sAMgadaH ca sa lakzmaNaH /
   vibhīṣaṇo 'pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇaṃ rāghavaṃ prati // GarP_1,143.39 //	viBIzaNaH api samprAptaH SaraNam rAGavam prati // GarP_1,143.39 //
   laṅkaiśvaryeṣvabhyaṣiñcadrāmastaṃ rāvaṇānujam /	laFkA ESvaryezu aByaziQcat rAmaH tam rAvaNa anujam /
   rāmo nalena setuñca kṛtvābdhau cottatāra tam // GarP_1,143.40 //	rAmaH nalena setuQca kRtvA abDO ca uttatAra tam // GarP_1,143.40 //
   suvelāvasthitaścaiva purīṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśaha /	suvelA avasTitaH ca eva purIm laFkAm dadarSa ha /
   atha te vānarā vīrā nīlāṅgadanalādayaḥ // GarP_1,143.41 //	aTa te vAnarAH vIrAH nIla aFgada nala AdayaH // GarP_1,143.41 //
   dhūmradhūmrākṣavīrendrā jāmbavatpramukhāstadā /	DUmra DUmrAkza vIra indrAH jAmbavat pramuKAH tadA /
   maindadvividamukhyāste purīṃ laṅkāṃ babhañjire // GarP_1,143.42 //	mEnda dvivida muKyAH te purIm laFkAm baBaQjire // GarP_1,143.42 //
   rākṣasāṃśca mahākāyānkālāñjanacayopamān /	rAkzasAn= ca mahA kAyAn kAlAQjana caya upamAn /
   rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇo hatvā sakapiḥ sarvarākṣasān // GarP_1,143.43 //	rAmaH sa lakzmaNaH hatvA sa kapiH sarva rAkzasAn // GarP_1,143.43 //
   vidyujjihvañca dhūmrākṣaṃ devāntakanarānta kau /	vidyujjihvan ca DUmrAkzam devAntaka narAnta kO /
   mahodaramahāpārśvāvatikāyaṃ mahābalam // GarP_1,143.44 //	mahodara mahApArSvO= atikAyam mahA balam // GarP_1,143.44 //
   kumbhaṃ nikumbhaṃ mattañca makarākṣaṃ hyakampanam /	kumBam nikumBam mad taQca makarAkzam hi akampanam /
   prahastaṃ vīramunmattaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam // GarP_1,143.45 //	prahastam vIram unmattam kumBakarNam mahA balam // GarP_1,143.45 //
   rāvaṇiṃ lakṣmaṇo 'cchinta hyastrādyai rāghavo balī /	rAvaNim lakzmaNaH acCinta hi astra AdyEH rAGavaH balI /
   nikṛtya bāhucakrāṇi rāvaṇantu nyapātayan // GarP_1,143.46 //	nikRtya bAhu cakrANi rAvaNantu nyapAtayan // GarP_1,143.46 //
   sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītvātha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ /	sItAm SudDAm gRhItvA aTa vimAne puzpake sTitaH /
   savānaraḥ samāyāto hyayodhyāṃ pravarāṃ purīm // GarP_1,143.47 //	sa vAnaraH samAyAtaH hi ayoDyAm pravarAm purIm // GarP_1,143.47 //
   tatra rājyaṃ cakārātha puttravatpālayanprajāḥ /	tatra rAjyam cakAra aTa puttra vat pAlayan prajAH /
   daśāśvamedhānāhṛtya gayāśirasi pātanam // GarP_1,143.48 //	daSa aSvameDAn AhRtya gayASirasi pAtanam // GarP_1,143.48 //
   piṇḍānāṃ vidhivatkṛtvā dattvā dānāni rāghavaḥ /	piNxAnAm viDivat kRtvA dattvA dAnAni rAGavaH /
   putrau kuśalavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // GarP_1,143.49 //	putrO kuSa lavO dRzwvA tO ca rAjye aByazecayat // GarP_1,143.49 //
   ekādaśasahasrāṇi rāmo rājyamakārayat /	ekAdaSa sahasrANi rAmaH rAjyam akArayat /
   śatrughno lavaṇaṃ jaghne śailūṣaṃ bhatastataḥ // GarP_1,143.50 //	SatruGnaH lavaNam jaGne SElUzam BataH tatas // GarP_1,143.50 //
   agastyādīnmunīnnatvā śrutvotpattiñca rakṣasām /	agastya AdIn munIn natvA SrutvA utpattiQca rakzasAm /
   svargaṃ gato janaiḥ sārdhamayodhyāsthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ // GarP_1,143.51 //	svargam gataH janEH sArDam ayoDyA sTEH kRtArTakaH // GarP_1,143.51 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	rAmAyaNavarNanam nAma tricatvAriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  144	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 144
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   harivaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇamāhātmyamuttamam /	harivaMSam pravakzyAmi kRzNa mAhAtmyam uttamam /
   vasudevāttu devakyāṃ vāsudevo balo 'bhavat // GarP_1,144.1 //	vasudevAt tu devakyAm vAsudevaH balaH aBavat // GarP_1,144.1 //
   dharmādirakṣaṇārthāya hyadharmādivinaṣṭaye /	Darma Adi rakzaNa arTAya hi aDarma Adi vinazwaye /
   kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍhaṃ pūtanāmanayatkṣayam // GarP_1,144.2 //	kRzNaH pItvA stanO gAXam pUtanAm anayat kzayam // GarP_1,144.2 //
   śakaṭaḥ parivṛtto 'tha bhagnau ca yamalārjunau /	SakawaH parivRttaH aTa BagnO ca yamala arjunO /
   damitaḥ kāliyo nāgo dhenuko vinipātitaḥ // GarP_1,144.3 //	damitaH kAliyaH nAgaH DenukaH vinipAtitaH // GarP_1,144.3 //
   dhṛto govardhanaḥ śaila indreṇa paripūjitaḥ /	DRtaH govarDanaH SElaH indreNa paripUjitaH /
   bhārāvataraṇaṃ cakre pratijñāṃ kṛtavānhariḥ // GarP_1,144.4 //	BAra avataraNam cakre pratijQAm kRtavAn hariH // GarP_1,144.4 //
   rakṣaṇāyārjunādeśca hyariṣṭādirnipātitaḥ /	rakzaNAya arjuna AdeH ca hi arizwa AdiH nipAtitaH /
   keśī vinihato daityo gopādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ // GarP_1,144.5 //	keSI vinihataH dEtyaH gopa AdyAH paritozitAH // GarP_1,144.5 //
   cāṇūro muṣṭiko mallaḥ kaṃso mañcānnipātitaḥ /	cANUraH muzwikaH mallaH kaMsaH maQcAt nipAtitaH /
   rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādyāḥ hyaṣṭau patnyo hareḥ parāḥ // GarP_1,144.6 //	rukmiNI satyaBAmA AdyAH hi azwO patnyaH hareH parAH // GarP_1,144.6 //
   ṣoḍhaśa strīsahasrāṇi hyanyānyāsa mahātmanaḥ /	zoXaSa strI sahasrANi hi anyAni Asa mahAtmanaH /
   tāsāṃ putrāśca pautrādyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // GarP_1,144.7 //	tAsAm putrAH ca pOtra AdyAH SataSas aTa sahasraSas // GarP_1,144.7 //
   rukmiṇyāñcaiva pradyumno nyavadhīcchaṃbarañca yaḥ /	rukmiNyAQcA eva pradyumnaH nyavaDIt SaMbaraQca yaH /
   tasya putro 'niruddho 'bhūduṣābāṇasutāpatiḥ // GarP_1,144.8 //	tasya putraH anirudDaH aBUt uzA bANa sutA patiH // GarP_1,144.8 //
   hariśakarayoryatra mahāyuddhaṃ babhūva ha /	hari SakarayoH yatra mahA yudDam baBUva ha /
   bāṇabāhusahasrañca cchinnaṃ bāhudvayaṃ hyabhūt // GarP_1,144.9 //	bANa bAhu sahasraQca cCinnam bAhu dvayam hi aBUt // GarP_1,144.9 //
   narako nihato yena pārijātaṃ jahāra yaḥ /	narakaH nihataH yena pArijAtam jahAra yaH /
   balaśca śisupālaśca hataśca dvividaḥ kapiḥ // GarP_1,144.10 //	balaH ca SisupAlaH ca hataH ca dvividaH kapiH // GarP_1,144.10 //
   aniruddhādabhūdvajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau /	anirudDAt aBUt vajraH sa ca rAjA gate harO /
   sandīpaniṃ guruñcakre saputrañca cakāra saḥ /	sandIpanim guruQcakre sa putraQca cakAra saH /
   mathurāyāṃ cograsenaṃ pālanaṃ ca divaukasām // GarP_1,144.11 //	maTurAyAm ca ugrasenam pAlanam ca divOkasAm // GarP_1,144.11 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	harivaMSavarNanam nAma catuScAtvAriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  145	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 145
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   bhārataṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi bhārāvataraṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /	BAratam saMpravakzyAmi BAra avataraNam BuvaH /
   cakre kṛṣṇo yudhyamānaḥ pāṇḍavādinimittataḥ // GarP_1,145.1 //	cakre kRzNaH yuDyamAnaH pANxava Adi nimittataH // GarP_1,145.1 //
   viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā brahmaputro 'triratritaḥ /	vizNu nABi abjataH brahmA brahma putraH atriH atritaH /
   somastato budhastasmādilāyāṃ ca purūravāḥ // GarP_1,145.2 //	somaH tatas buDaH tasmAt ilAyAm ca purUravAH // GarP_1,145.2 //
   tasyāyustatra vaṃśe 'bhūdyayātirbharataḥ kuruḥ /	tasya AyuH tatra vaMSe aBUt yayAtiH BarataH kuruH /
   śantanustasya vaṃśe 'bhūdgaṅgāyāṃ śantanoḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,145.3 //	SantanuH tasya vaMSe aBUt gaFgAyAm SantanoH sutaH // GarP_1,145.3 //
   bhīṣmaḥ sarvaguṇaiyukto brahmavaivartapāragaḥ // GarP_1,145.4 //	BIzmaH sarva guNEyuktaH brahmavEvarta pAragaH // GarP_1,145.4 //
   śantanoḥ satyavatyāṃ ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ /	SantanoH satyavatyAm ca dvO putrO saMbaBUvatuH /
   citrāṅgadantu gandharvaḥ putraṃ citrāṅgado 'vadhīt // GarP_1,145.5 //	citrAFgadantu ganDarvaH putram citrAFgadaH avaDIt // GarP_1,145.5 //
   anyo vicitravīryo 'bhūtkāśīrājasutāpatiḥ /	anyaH vicitravIryaH aBUt kASI rAja sutA patiH /
   vicitravīrye svaryāte vyāsāttatkṣetrato 'bhavat // GarP_1,145.6 //	vicitravIrye svaryAte vyAsAt tad kzetrataH aBavat // GarP_1,145.6 //
   dhṛtarāṣṭo 'mbikāputraḥ pāṇḍurāmbālikāsutaḥ /	DRtarAzwaH ambikAputraH pANxura ambAlikA sutaH /
   bhujiṣyāyāntu viduro gāndhāryāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrataḥ // GarP_1,145.7 //	Bujizya AyAntu viduraH gAnDAryAm DRtarAzwrataH // GarP_1,145.7 //
   duryodhanapradhānāstu śatasaṃkhyā mahābalāḥ /	duryoDana praDAnAH tu Sata saMKyAH mahA balAH /
   pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāñca mādyāṃ ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,145.8 //	pANxoH kuntyAQca mA AdyAm ca paQca putrAH prajajQire // GarP_1,145.8 //
   yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmaseno hyarjuno nakulastathā /	yuDizWiraH BImasenaH hi arjunaH nakulaH taTA /
   sahadevaśca pañcaite mahābalaparākramāḥ // GarP_1,145.9 //	sahadevaH ca paQca ete mahA bala parAkramAH // GarP_1,145.9 //
   kurupāṇḍavayorvairaṃ daivayo gādbabhūva ha /	kuru pANxavayoH vEram dEvayaH gAdbaBUva ha /
   duryodhanenādhīreṇa pāṇḍavāḥ samupadrutāḥ // GarP_1,145.10 //	duryoDanena aDIreNa pANxavAH samupadrutAH // GarP_1,145.10 //
   dagdhā jatugṛhe vīrāste muktāḥ svadhiyāmalāḥ // GarP_1,145.11 //	dagDAH jatu gRhe vIrAH te muktAH sva DiyA amalAH // GarP_1,145.11 //
   tatastadekacakrāyāṃ brāhmaṇasya niveśane /	tatas tad ekacakrAyAm brAhmaNasya niveSane /
   viviśuste mahātmāno nihatya bakarākṣasam // GarP_1,145.12 //	viviSuH te mahAtmAnaH nihatya baka rAkzasam // GarP_1,145.12 //
   tataḥ pāñcālaviṣayedraupadyāste svayaṃvaram /	tatas pAQcAla vizayet rOpadyAH te svayaMvaram /
   vijñāya vīryaśulkāntāṃ pāṇḍavā upayemire // GarP_1,145.13 //	vijQAya vIrya Sulka antAm pANxavAH upayemire // GarP_1,145.13 //
   droṇabhīṣmānumatyā tu dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ samānayat /	droNa BIzma anumatyA tu DRtarAzwraH samAnayat /
   ardvarājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā indraprasthe purottame // GarP_1,145.14 //	ardva rAjyam tatas prAptAH indraprasTe pura uttame // GarP_1,145.14 //
   rājasūyantataścakruḥ sabhāṃ kṛtvā yatavratāḥ /	rAjasUyantataH cakruH saBAm kRtvA yata vratAH /
   arjuno dvāravatyāntu subhadrāṃ prāptavānpriyām /	arjunaH dvAravatyA antu suBadrAm prAptavAn priyAm /
   vāsudevasya bhaginīmanumatyā muradviṣaḥ // GarP_1,145.15 //	vAsudevasya BaginIm anumatyAH muradvizaH // GarP_1,145.15 //
   nandighoṣaṃ rathaṃ divyamagnerghanuranuttamam /	nandi Gozam raTam divyam agneH GanuH anuttamam /
   gāṇḍīvaṃ nāma taddivyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /	gANxIvam nAma tat divyam trizu lokezu viSrutam /
   akṣayānsāyakāṃścaiva tathābhedyañca daṃśanam // GarP_1,145.16 //	akzayAn sAyakAn= ca eva taTA aBedyaQca daMSanam // GarP_1,145.16 //
   sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavo jātavedasam /	sa tena DanuzA vIraH pANxavaH jAtavedasam /
   kṛṣṇadvitīyo bībhatsuratarpayata vīryavān // GarP_1,145.17 //	kRzNa dvitIyaH bIBatsuH atarpayata vIryavAn // GarP_1,145.17 //
   nṛpāndigvijaye jitvā ratnānyādāya vai dadau /	nRpAn digvijaye jitvA ratnAni AdAya vE dadO /
   yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nītivide mudā // GarP_1,145.18 //	yuDizWirAya mahate BrAtre nIti vide mudA // GarP_1,145.18 //
   yudhiṣṭhiro 'pi dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ /	yuDizWiraH api Darma AtmA BrAtRBiH parivAritaH /
   jito duryodhanenaiva māyādyūtena pāpinā /	jitaH duryoDanena eva mAyA dyUtena pApinA /
   karṇaduḥ śāsanamate sthitena śakunermate // GarP_1,145.19 //	karNaduH SAsana mate sTitena SakuneH mate // GarP_1,145.19 //
   atha dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane tepurmahattapaḥ /	aTa dvAdaSa varzANi vane tepuH mahat tapaH /
   sadhaumyā draupadīṣaṣṭhā munivṛndābhisaṃvṛtāḥ // GarP_1,145.20 //	sa DOmyAH drOpadI zazWAH muni vRnda aBisaMvRtAH // GarP_1,145.20 //
   yayurvirāṭanagaraṃ guptarūpeṇa saṃśritāḥ /	yayuH virAwa nagaram gupta rUpeNa saMSritAH /
   varṣamekaṃ mahāprājñā gograhāttamapālayan // GarP_1,145.21 //	varzam ekam mahA prAjQAH go grahAt tam apAlayan // GarP_1,145.21 //
   tate yātāḥ svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prārthayāmāsurādṛtāḥ /	tate yAtAH svakam rAzwram prArTayAmAsuH AdRtAH /
   pañcagrāmānardharājyādvīrā duryodhanaṃ nṛpam // GarP_1,145.22 //	paQca grAmAn arDa rAjyAt vIrAH duryoDanam nRpam // GarP_1,145.22 //
   nāptavantaḥ kurukṣetre yuddhañcakrurbalānvitāḥ /	na AptavantaH kurukzetre yudDaQca kruH bala anvitAH /
   akṣauhiṇībhirdivyābhiḥ saptabhiḥ parivāritāḥ // GarP_1,145.23 //	akzOhiNIBiH divyABiH saptaBiH parivAritAH // GarP_1,145.23 //
   ekādaśabhirudyuktā yuktā duryodhanādayaḥ /	ekAdaSaBiH udyuktA yuktAH duryoDana AdayaH /
   āsīdyuddhaṃ saṃkulaṃ ca devāsuraraṇopamam // GarP_1,145.24 //	AsIt yudDam saMkulam ca deva asura raNa upamam // GarP_1,145.24 //
   bhīṣmaḥ senāpatirabhūdādau dauryodhane bale /	BIzmaH senApatiH aBUt AdO dOryoDane bale /
   pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha /	pANxavAnAm SiKaNxI ca tayoH yudDam baBUva ha /
   śastrāśastri mahāghoraṃ dhasarātraṃ śarāśari // GarP_1,145.25 //	SastrASastri mahA Goram Dasa rAtram SarASari // GarP_1,145.25 //
   śikhaṇḍyarjunabāṇaiśca bhīṣmaḥ śaraśataiścitaḥ /	SiKaNxi arjuna bANEH ca BIzmaH Sara SatEH citaH /
   uttarāyaṇamāvīkṣya dhyātvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,145.26 //	uttarAyaNam AvIkzya DyAtvA devam gadADaram // GarP_1,145.26 //
   uktvā dharmānbahuvidhāṃstarpayitvā pitṝnbahūn /	uktvA DarmAn bahuviDAn= tarpayitvA pitLn bahUn /
   ānande tu pade līno vimale muktakilbiṣe // GarP_1,145.27 //	Anande tu pade lInaH vimale mukta kilbize // GarP_1,145.27 //
   tato droṇo yayau yoddhuṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān /	tatas droNaH yayO yodDum DRzwadyumnena bIryavAn /
   dināni pañca tadyuddhamāsītparamadāruṇam // GarP_1,145.28 //	dinAni paQca tat yudDam AsIt parama dAruNam // GarP_1,145.28 //
   yatra te pṛthivīpālā hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare /	yatra te pRTivIpAlAH hatAH pArTena saMgare /
   śokasāgaramāsādya droṇo 'pi svargamāptavān // GarP_1,145.29 //	Soka sAgaram AsAdya droNaH api svargam AptavAn // GarP_1,145.29 //
   tataḥ karṇā yayau yoddhumarjunena mihātmanā /	tatas karNA yayO yodDum arjunena miha AtmanA /
   dinadvayaṃ mahāyuddhaṃ kṛtvā pārthāstrasāgare /	dina dvayam mahA yudDam kRtvA pArTa astra sAgare /
   nimagnaḥ sūryalokantu tataḥ prāpa sa vīryavān // GarP_1,145.30 //	nimagnaH sUrya lokantu tatas prApa sa vIryavAn // GarP_1,145.30 //
   tataḥ śalyo yayau yoddhuṃ dharmarājena dhīmatā /	tatas SalyaH yayO yodDum DarmarAjena DImatA /
   dinārdhena hataḥ śalyo bāṇairjvalanasannibhaiḥ // GarP_1,145.31 //	dina arDena hataH SalyaH bANEH jvalana sanniBEH // GarP_1,145.31 //
   duryodhano 'tha vegena gadāmādāya vīryavān /	duryoDanaH aTa vegena gadAm AdAya vIryavAn /
   abhyadhāvata vai bhībhaṃ kālāntakayamopamaḥ // GarP_1,145.32 //	aByaDAvata vE BIBam kAla antaka yama upamaH // GarP_1,145.32 //
   atha bhīmena vīreṇa gadayā vinipātitaḥ /	aTa BImena vIreNa gadayA vinipAtitaH /
   aśvatthāmā gato drauṇiḥ suptasainyaṃ tato niśi // GarP_1,145.33 //	aSvatTAmA gataH drONiH supta sEnyam tatas niSi // GarP_1,145.33 //
   jaghāna bāhuvīryeṇa piturvadhamanusmaran /	jaGAna bAhu vIryeNa pituH vaDam anusmaran /

   yudhiṣṭhiraḥ samāśvāsya strījanaṃ śokasaṃkulam /	yuDizWiraH samASvAsya strI janam Soka saMkulam /
   snātvā santarpya devāṃśca pitṝnatha pitāmahān // GarP_1,145.36 //	snAtvA santarpya devAn= ca pitLn aTa pitAmahAn // GarP_1,145.36 //
   āśvāsito 'tha bhīṣmeṇa rājyañcaivākaronmahat /	ASvAsitaH aTa BIzmeNa rAjyaQca eva akarot mahat /
   viṣṇumīje 'śvamedhena vidhivaddakṣiṇāvatā // GarP_1,145.37 //	vizNum Ije aSvameDena viDivat dakziNAvatA // GarP_1,145.37 //
   rājye parīkṣitaṃ sthāpya yādavānāṃ vināśanam /	rAjye parIkzitam sTApya yAdavAnAm vinASanam /
   śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāmasahasrakam // GarP_1,145.38 //	SrutvA tu mOsale rAjA japtvA nAma sahasrakam // GarP_1,145.38 //
   viṣṇoḥ svargaṃ jagāmātha bhīmādyairbhrātṛbhiryutaḥ /	vizNoH svargam jagAma aTa BIma AdyEH BrAtRBiH yutaH /
