   kalkirviṣṇuśca bhavitā śaṃbhalagrāmake punaḥ /	kalkiH vizNuH ca BavitA SaMBala grAmake punar /
   aśvārūḍho 'khilāṃllokāṃstadā bhasmīkariṣyati // GarP_1,145.40 //	aSva ArUXaH aKilAn= lokAn= tadA BasmIkarizyati // GarP_1,145.40 //
   devādīnāṃ rakṣaṇāya hyadharmahāraṇāya ca /	deva AdInAm rakzaNAya hi aDarma hAraNAya ca /

   yathā dhanvantarirvaṃśe jātaḥ kṣīrodamanthane /	yaTA DanvantariH vaMSe jAtaH kzIroda manTane /
   devādīnāṃ jīvanāya hyāyurvedamuvāca ha // GarP_1,145.42 //	deva AdInAm jIvanAya hi Ayurvedam uvAca ha // GarP_1,145.42 //
   viśvāmitrasutāyaiva śuśrutāya mahātmane /	viSvAmitra sutAya eva SuSrutAya mahAtmane /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  146	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 146
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   ātreyādyairmunivarairyathā pūrvamudīritam // GarP_1,146.1 //	Atreya AdyEH muni varEH yaTA pUrvam udIritam // GarP_1,146.1 //

   nidānaṃ pūrvarūpāṇi rūpāṇyupaśayastathā /	nidAnam pUrvarUpANi rUpANi upaSayaH taTA /
   saṃprāptiścaiti vijñānaṃ rogāṇāṃ pañcadhā smṛtam // GarP_1,146.3 //	saMprAptiH ca eti vijQAnam rogANAm paQcaDA smRtam // GarP_1,146.3 //

   utpitsurāmayo doṣaviśeṣeṇānadhiṣṭhitaḥ /	utpitsuH AmayaH doza viSezeNa anaDizWitaH /
   liṅgamavyaktamalpatvādvyādhīnāṃ tadyathāyatham // GarP_1,146.5 //	liFgam avyaktam alpa tvAt vyADInAm tat yaTAyaTam // GarP_1,146.5 //
   tadeva vyaktatāṃ yātaṃ rūpamityabhidhīyate /	tat eva vyakta tAm yAtam rUpam iti aBiDIyate /
   saṃsthānāṃ vyañjanaṃ liṅgaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamākṛtiḥ // GarP_1,146.6 //	saMsTAnAm vyaQjanam liFgam lakzaNam cihnam AkRtiH // GarP_1,146.6 //
   hetuvyādhiviparyastaviparyastārthakāriṇām /	hetu vyADi viparyasta viparyasta arTa kAriNAm /
   auṣadhānnavihārāṇāmupayogaṃ sukhāvaham // GarP_1,146.7 //	OzaDa anna vihArANAm upayogam suKa Avaham // GarP_1,146.7 //
   vidyādupaśayaṃ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyamiti smṛtaḥ /	vidyAt upaSayam vyADeH sa hi sAtmyam iti smRtaH /
   viparīto 'nupaśayo vyādhyasātmyetisaṃjñitaḥ // GarP_1,146.8 //	viparItaH anupaSayaH vyADi asAtmya iti saMjQitaH // GarP_1,146.8 //
   yathā duṣṭena doṣeṇa yathā cānuvisarpatā /	yaTA duzwena dozeNa yaTA ca anuvisarpatA /
   nirvṛttirāmayasyāsau saṃprāptirabhidhīyate // GarP_1,146.9 //	nirvRttiH Amayasya asO saMprAptiH aBiDIyate // GarP_1,146.9 //
   saṃkhyāvikalpaprādhānyabalakālaviśeṣataḥ /	saMKyA vikalpa prADAnya bala kAla viSezataH /
   sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti // GarP_1,146.10 //	sA Bidyate yaTA atra eva vakzyante azwO jvarAH iti // GarP_1,146.10 //
   doṣāṇāṃ samavetānāṃ vikalpośāṃśakalpanā /	dozANAm samavetAnAm vikalpa uSa aMSa kalpanA /
   svātantryapāratantryābhyāṃ vyādheḥ prādhānyamādiśet // GarP_1,146.11 //	svAtantrya pAratantryAByAm vyADeH prADAnyam AdiSet // GarP_1,146.11 //
   hetvādikārtsnyāvayavairbalābalaviśeṣaṣaṇam /	hetu Adi kArtsnya avayavEH bala abala viSeza zaNam /
   naktandinārdhabhuktāṃśairvyādhikālo yathāmalam // GarP_1,146.12 //	naktandina arDa Bukta aMSEH vyADi kAlaH yaTAmalam // GarP_1,146.12 //
   iti prokto nidānārthaḥ sa vyāsenopadekṣyate /	iti proktaH nidAna arTaH sa vyAsena upadekzyate /

   tatprakopasya tu proktaṃ vividhāhitasevanam /	tad prakopasya tu proktam viviDa ahita sevanam /
   ahitastrividho yogastrayāṇāṃ prāgudāhṛtaḥ // GarP_1,146.14 //	ahitaH triviDaH yogaH trayANAm prAk udAhRtaH // GarP_1,146.14 //
   tiktoṣaṇakaṣāyāmlarūkṣāpramitayojanaiḥ /	tikta UzaNa kazAya amla rUkza apramita yojanEH /
   dhāvanodīraṇaniśājāgarātyuccabhāṣaṇaiḥ // GarP_1,146.15 //	DAvana udIraNa niSA jAgara atyucca BAzaNEH // GarP_1,146.15 //
   kriyābhiyogabīśokacintāvyāyāmamaithunaiḥ /	kriyA aBiyoga bISoka cintA vyAyAma mETunEH /
   grīṣmāhorātrabhuktyante prakupyati samīraṇaḥ // GarP_1,146.16 //	grIzma ahar rAtra Bukti ante prakupyati samIraNaH // GarP_1,146.16 //
   pittaṃ kaṭvālatīkṣṇoṣṇakaṭukrodhavidāhibhiḥ /	pittam kawu Ala tIkzNa uzNa kawu kroDa vidAhiBiH /
   śaranmadhyāhnarātryardhavidāhasamayeṣu ca // GarP_1,146.17 //	Sarad maDyAhna rAtri arDa vidAha samayezu ca // GarP_1,146.17 //
   svādvamlalavaṇasnigdhagurvabhiṣyandiśītalaiḥ /	svAdu amla lavaNa snigDa guru aBizyandi SItalEH /
   āsyāsvapnasukhājīrṇadivāsvapnādibṛṃhaṇaiḥ // GarP_1,146.18 //	AsyA svapna suKa ajIrNa divAsvapna Adi bRMhaNEH // GarP_1,146.18 //
   pricchardanādyayogena bhuktānnasyāpyajīrṇake /	pricCardana Adya yogena Bukta annasya api ajIrNake /
   pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān // GarP_1,146.19 //	pUrvAhne pUrvarAtre ca SlezmA vakzyAmi saFkarAn // GarP_1,146.19 //
   miśrībhāvātsamastānāṃ sannipātastathā punaḥ /	miSrIBAvAt samastAnAm sannipAtaH taTA punar /
   saṃkīrṇājīrṇaviṣamaviruddhādyaśanādibhiḥ // GarP_1,146.20 //	saMkIrNa ajIrNa vizama virudDAt yaSana AdiBiH // GarP_1,146.20 //
   vyāpannamadyapānīyaśuṣkaśākāmamūlakaiḥ /	vyApanna madya pAnIya Suzka SAka Ama mUlakEH /
   piṇyākamṛtyavasarapūtiśuṣkakṛśamiṣaiḥ // GarP_1,146.21 //	piNyAka mRti avasara pUti Suzka kRSa mizEH // GarP_1,146.21 //
   doṣatrayakaraistaistaistathānnaparivartataḥ /	dozatraya karEH tEH tEH taTA anna parivartataH /
   dhātorduṣṭātpuro vātāddvigrahāveśaviplavāt // GarP_1,146.22 //	DAtoH duzwAt puras vAtAt dvi graha AveSa viplavAt // GarP_1,146.22 //
   duṣṭāmānnairatiślaiṣmagrahairjanmarkṣapīḍanāt /	duzwa Ama annEH ati SlEzma grahEH janma Rkza pIxanAt /
   mithyāyogācca vividhātpāpānāñca niṣevaṇāt /	miTyAyogAt ca viviDAt pApa anAQca nizevaNAt /

   pratirogamiti kruddhā rogavidhyanugāminaḥ /	pratirogam iti krudDAH roga viDi anugAminaH /
   rasāyanaṃ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate // GarP_1,146.24 //	rasAyanam prapadya ASu dozAH dehe vikurvate // GarP_1,146.24 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSAkye AcAra kANxe
   sarvaroganidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	sarvaroganidAnam nAma zawcatvAriMSaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  147	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 147
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   vakṣye jvaranidānaṃ hi sarvajvaravibuddhaye /	vakzye jvara nidAnam hi sarva jvara vibudDaye /
   jvaro rogapatiḥ pāpmā mṛtyurājo 'śano 'ntakaḥ /	jvaraH roga patiH pApmA mRtyu rAjaH aSanaH antakaH /
   kruddhadakṣādhvaradhvaṃsirudrordhvanayanodbhavaḥ // GarP_1,147.1 //	krudDa dakza aDvara DvaMsi rudra UrDva nayana udBavaH // GarP_1,147.1 //
   tatsantāpo mohamayaḥ santāpātmāpacārajaḥ /	tad santApaH moha mayaH santApa Atma apacAra jaH /
   vividhairnāmabhiḥ krūro nānāyoniṣu vartate // GarP_1,147.2 //	viviDEH nAmaBiH krUraH nAnA yonizu vartate // GarP_1,147.2 //
   pākalo gajeṣvabhitāpo vājiṣvalarkaḥ kukrureṣu /	pAkalaH gajezu aBitApaH vAjizu alarkaH kukrurezu /
   indramado jaladeṣvapsu nīlikā jyotiroṣadhīṣu bhūmyāmūṣaro nāma //	indramadaH jaladezu apsu nIlikA jyotiH ozaDIzu BUmyAm UzaraH nAma //
   GarP_1,147.3 //	GarP_1,147.3 //
   hṛllāsaśchardanaṃ kāsaḥ staṃbhaḥ śaitya tvagādiṣu /	hRllAsaH Cardanam kAsaH staMBaH SEtya tvac Adizu /
   aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāśca kaphodbhave // GarP_1,147.4 //	aFgezu ca samudBUtAH pixakAH ca kaPa udBave // GarP_1,147.4 //
   kāle yathāsvaṃ sarveṣāṃ pravṛttirvṛddhireva vā /	kAle yaTAsvam sarvezAm pravRttiH vRdDiH eva vA /
   nidānoktonupaśayo viparītopaśāyitā // GarP_1,147.5 //	nidAna ukta unupaSayaH viparIta upaSAyitAH // GarP_1,147.5 //
   aruciścāvipākaśca staṃbhamālasyameva ca /	aruciH ca avipAkaH ca staMBam Alasyam eva ca /
   hṛddāhaśca vipākaśca tandrā cālasyameva ca /	hRd dAhaH ca vipAkaH ca tandrA ca Alasyam eva ca /
   vastirvimardāvanayā doṣāṇāmapravartanam // GarP_1,147.6 //	vastiH vimardO= anayA dozANAm apravartanam // GarP_1,147.6 //
   lālāpraseko hṛllāsaḥ kṣunnāśo rasadaṃ mukham /	lAlA prasekaH hRllAsaH kzuD nASaH rasa dam muKam /
   svacchamuṣṇagurutvañca gātrāṇāṃ bahumūtratā /	svacCam uzNa guru tvaQca gAtrANAm bahu mUtra tA /
   na vijīrṇaṃ na ca mlānirjvarasyāmasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,147.7 //	na vijIrNam na ca mlAniH jvarasya Amasya lakzaNam // GarP_1,147.7 //
   kṣutkṣāmatā laghutvaṃ ca gātrāṇāṃ jvaramārdavam /	kzuD kzAma tA laGu tvam ca gAtrANAm jvara mArdavam /
   doṣapravṛttiraṣṭāhānnirāmajvaralakṣaṇam // GarP_1,147.8 //	doza pravRttiH azwa ahAt nirAma jvara lakzaNam // GarP_1,147.8 //
   yathā svaliṅgaṃ saṃsarge jvarasaṃsargajo 'pi vā /	yaTA sva liFgam saMsarge jvara saMsarga jaH api vA /
   śirortimūrchāvamidehadāhakaṇṭhāsyaśoṣāruciparvabhedāḥ /	Sirorti mUrCA vami deha dAha kaNWa Asya Soza aruci parva BedAH /
   unnidratā saṃbhramaromaharṣā jṛṃbhātivāktvaṃ pavanātsapittāt //	unnidra tA saMBrama roma harzAH jRMBA ati vAc tvam pavanAt sa pittAt //
   GarP_1,147.9 //	GarP_1,147.9 //
   tāpahānyaruciparvaśirorukṣṭhīvanaśvasanakāsavivarṇāḥ /	tApahAni aruci parva SiraH rukzWI vana Svasana kAsa vivarNAH /
   śītajāḍyatimirabhramitandrāśleṣmavātajanitajvaraliṅgam // GarP_1,147.10 //	SIta jAxya timira Brami tandrA Slezma vAta janita jvara liFgam // GarP_1,147.10 //
   śītastambhasvedadāhāvyavasthāstṛṣṇā kāsaḥ śleṣmapittapravṛttiḥ /	SIta stamBa sveda dAha avyavasTAH tRzNA kAsaH Slezma pitta pravRttiH /
   mohastandrāliptatiktāsyatā ca jñeyaṃ rūpaṃ śleṣmapittajvarasya //	mohaH tandrA lipta tikta Asya tA ca jQeyam rUpam Slezma pitta jvarasya //
   GarP_1,147.11 //	GarP_1,147.11 //
   sarvajo lakṣaṇaiḥ sarvairdāho 'tra ca muhurmuhuḥ /	sarvajaH lakzaNEH sarvEH dAhaH atra ca muhur muhur /
   taducchītaṃ mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,147.12 //	tat ucCItam mahA nidrA divA jAgaraNam niSi // GarP_1,147.12 //
   sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahāsvedo hi naiva vā /	sadA vA na eva vA nidrA mahA svedaH hi na eva vA /
   gītanartanahāsyādiḥ prakṛtehāpravartanam // GarP_1,147.13 //	gIta nartana hAsya AdiH prakRta iha apravartanam // GarP_1,147.13 //
   sāśruṇī kaluṣe rakte bhugne lulitapakṣmaṇī /	sa aSruNI kaluze rakte Bugne lulita pakzmaNI /
   akṣiṇī piṇḍikāpārśvaśiraḥ parvāsthirugbhramaḥ // GarP_1,147.14 //	akziNI piNxikA pArSva SiraH parva asTi ruj BramaH // GarP_1,147.14 //
   sasvanau sarujau karṇau mahāśītau hi naiva vā /	sa svanO sa rujO karNO mahA SItO hi na eva vA /
   paridagdhā kharā jihvā gurustrastāṅgasandhitā // GarP_1,147.15 //	paridagDA KarAH jihvA guruH trasta aFga sanDi tA // GarP_1,147.15 //
   ṣṭhīvanaṃ raktapittasya loṭhanaṃ śiraso 'titṛṭ /	zWIvanam raktapittasya loWanam SirasaH ati tRz /
   koṣṭhānāṃ śyāvaraktānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ ca darśanam // GarP_1,147.16 //	kozWAnAm SyAva raktAnAm maNxalAnAm ca darSanam // GarP_1,147.16 //
   hṛdvyathā malaṃsasargaḥ pravṛttirvālpaśo 'ti vā /	hRd vyaTA malaMsa sargaH pravRttiH vA alpaSas ati vA /
   snigdhāsyatā balabhraṃśaḥ svarasādaḥ pralāpitaḥ // GarP_1,147.17 //	snigDa Asya tA balaBraMSaH svara sAdaH pralApitaH // GarP_1,147.17 //
   doṣapākaściraṃ tandrā pratataṃ kaṇṭhakūjanam /	doza pAkaH ciram tandrA pratatam kaNWa kUjanam /
   sannipātamabhinyāsaṃ taṃ brūyācca hataujasam // GarP_1,147.18 //	sannipAtam aBinyAsam tam brUyAt ca hata ojasam // GarP_1,147.18 //
   vāyunā kaṇṭharuddhena pittamantaḥ supīḍitam /	vAyunA kaNWa rudDena pittam antar su pIxitam /
   vyavāyitvācca saukhyācca bahirmargaṃ prapadyate /	vyavAyi tvAt ca sOKyAt ca bahis margam prapadyate /
   tena hāridranetratvaṃ sannipātodbhavejvare // GarP_1,147.19 //	tena hAridra netra tvam sannipAta udBavejvare // GarP_1,147.19 //
   doṣe vivṛddhe naṣṭe 'gnau sarvasaṃpūrṇalakṣaṇaḥ /	doze vivRdDe nazwe agnO sarva saMpUrNa lakzaNaH /
   sānnipātajvaro 'sādhyaḥ kṛcchrasādhyastato 'nyathā // GarP_1,147.20 //	sAnnipAta jvaraH asADyaH kRcCra sADyaH tatas anyaTA // GarP_1,147.20 //
   anyatra sannipātotthaṃ yatra pittaṃ pṛthaksthitam /	anyatra sannipAta utTam yatra pittam pRTak sTitam /
   tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāhaṃ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā // GarP_1,147.21 //	tvaci kozWe ca vA dAham vidaDAti puras anu vA // GarP_1,147.21 //
   tadvadvātakaphe śītaṃ dāhādirdustarastayoḥ /	tadvat vAta kaPe SItam dAha AdiH dustaraH tayoH /
   śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syānditaśoṣite // GarP_1,147.22 //	SIta AdO tatra pittena kaPe syAndita Sozite // GarP_1,147.22 //
   pitte śānte 'tha vai mūrchā madastṛṣṇā ca jāyate /	pitte SAnte aTa vE mUrCA madaH tRzNA ca jAyate /
   dāhādau punaranteṣu tandrālasye vamiḥ kramāt // GarP_1,147.23 //	dAha AdO punar antezu tandrA Alasye vamiH kramAt // GarP_1,147.23 //
   āganturabhigātābhiṣaṅgaśāpābhicārataḥ /	AgantuH aBigAta aBizaFga SApa aBicArataH /
   caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedo dāhādyairabhighātajaḥ // GarP_1,147.24 //	caturDA tu kRtaH svedaH dAha AdyEH aBiGAta jaH // GarP_1,147.24 //
   śramācca tasminpavanaḥ prāyo raktaṃ pradūṣayan /	SramAt ca tasmin pavanaH prAyas raktam pradUzayan /

   grahāveśauṣadhiviṣakrodhabhīśokakāmajaḥ // GarP_1,147.26 //	graha AveSa ozaDi viza kroDa BI Soka kAma jaH // GarP_1,147.26 //
   abhiṣaṅgagraho 'pyasminnakasmādvāsarodane /	aBizaFga grahaH api asmin= akasmAt vAsarodane /
   oṣadhīgandhaje mūrchā śirorugvamathuḥ kṣayaḥ // GarP_1,147.27 //	ozaDI ganDa je mUrCA SiraH ruj vamaTuH kzayaH // GarP_1,147.27 //
   viṣānmūrchātisāraśca śyāvatā dāhakṛdbhramaḥ /	vizAn mUrCA atisAraH ca SyAva tA dAha kRt BramaH /
   krodhātkampaḥ śirorukca pralāpo bhayaśokaje // GarP_1,147.28 //	kroDAt kampaH SiraH ruj ca pralApaH Baya Soka je // GarP_1,147.28 //
   kāmādbhramo 'rucirdāho hrīnidrādhīdhṛtikṣayāḥ /	kAmAt BramaH aruciH dAhaH hrI nidrA aDI DRti kzayAH /
   grahādau sannipātasya rūpādau marutastayoḥ // GarP_1,147.29 //	graha AdO sannipAtasya rUpa AdO marutaH tayoH // GarP_1,147.29 //

   sannipātajvarau ghorau tāvasahyatamau matau // GarP_1,147.30 //	sannipAta jvarO GorO tO= asahyatamO matO // GarP_1,147.30 //
   tantrā bhicārikairmantrairdūyamānañca tapyate /	tantrAH BicArikEH mantrEH dUyam AnaQca tapyate /

   iti jvaro 'ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāddvibidhastu saḥ // GarP_1,147.32 //	iti jvaraH azwaDA dRzwaH samAsAt t vibiDaH tu saH // GarP_1,147.32 //
   śārīro mānasaḥ saumyastīkṣṇoṃntarbahirāśrayaḥ /	SArIraH mAnasaH sOmyaH tIkzNoMntar bahis ASrayaH /
   prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ sāmo nirāmakaḥ // GarP_1,147.33 //	prAkRtaH vEkRtaH sADyaH asADyaH sAmaH nirAmakaH // GarP_1,147.33 //
   pūrvaṃ śarire śarīre tāpo manasi mānase /	pUrvam Sarire SarIre tApaH manasi mAnase /

   bahireva bahirvege tāpo 'pi ca sa sādhitaḥ /	bahis eva bahis vege tApaH api ca sa sADitaH /
   varṣāśaradvasanteṣu vātādyaiḥ prakṛtaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,147.36 //	varzA Sarad vasantezu vAta AdyEH prakRtaH kramAt // GarP_1,147.36 //
   vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ sādhyaḥ prāyaśca prākṛto 'nilāt /	vEkRtaH anyaH sa duH sADyaH prAyas ca prAkRtaH anilAt /

   kuryācca pittaṃ śaradi tasya cānucaraḥ kaphaḥ /	kuryAt ca pittam Saradi tasya ca anucaraH kaPaH /

   kapho vasante tamapi vātapittaṃ bhavedanu /	kaPaH vasante tam api vAta pittam Bavet anu /

   sarvathā vikṛtijñāne prāgasādhya udāhṛtaḥ /	sarvaTA vikRti jQAne prAk asADyaH udAhRtaH /
   jvaropadravatīkṣṇatvaṃ mandāgnirbahumūtratā // GarP_1,147.40 //	jvara upadrava tIkzNa tvam manda agniH bahu mUtra tA // GarP_1,147.40 //
   na pravṛttirna vijīrṇā na kṣutsāmajvarākṛtiḥ /	na pravRttiH na vijIrNA na kzuD sAma jvara AkRtiH /
   jvaravego 'dhikastṛṣṇā pralāpaḥ śvasanaṃ bhramaḥ // GarP_1,147.41 //	jvara vegaH aDikaH tRzNA pralApaH Svasanam BramaH // GarP_1,147.41 //
   malapravṛttirutkleśaḥ pacyamānasya lakṣaṇam /	mala pravRttiH utkleSaH pacyamAnasya lakzaNam /
   jīrṇatāmaviparyāsātsaptarātraṃ ca laṅghanam // GarP_1,147.42 //	jIrNa tAm aviparyAsAt sapta rAtram ca laFGanam // GarP_1,147.42 //
   jvaraḥ pañcavidhaḥ prokto malakālabalābalāt /	jvaraH paQcaviDaH proktaH mala kAla bala abalAt /

   santataḥ satato 'nyedyustṛtīyakacaturthakau /	santataH satataH anyedyus tRtIyaka caturTakO /

   tāpayantastanuṃ sarvāṃ tulyadṛṣṭyādivardhitāḥ /	tApayantaH tanum sarvAm tulya dRzwi Adi varDitAH /

   satataṃ niṣpratidvandvājvaraṃ kuryuḥ suduḥ saham /	satatam nizpratidvandvA jvaram kuryuH su duH saham /

   sarvākāraṃ rasādīnāṃ śuddhyāsuddhyāpi vā kramāt /	sarva AkAram rasa AdInAm SudDyA sudDyA api vA kramAt /
   vātapittakaphaiḥ saptada śadvādaśavāsarāt // GarP_1,147.47 //	vAta pitta kaPEH saptada SadvAdaSa vAsarAt // GarP_1,147.47 //
   prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṃ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca /	prAyas anuyAti maryAdAm mokzAya ca vaDAya ca /
   ityagniveśasya mataṃ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,147.48 //	iti agniveSasya matam hArItasya punar smRtiH // GarP_1,147.48 //
   dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamyekādaśī tathā /	dviguNA saptamI yA ca navamI ekAdaSI taTA /
   eṣā tridoṣamaryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca // GarP_1,147.49 //	ezA tridoza maryAdA mokzAya ca vaDAya ca // GarP_1,147.49 //
   śuddhyāśuddhyā jvaraḥ kālaṃ dīrghamapyatra vartate /	SudDyA aSudDyA jvaraH kAlam dIrGam api atra vartate /
   kṛśānāṃ vyādhiyuktānāṃ mithyāhārādisevinām // GarP_1,147.50 //	kRSAnAm vyADi yuktAnAm miTyA AhAra Adi sevinAm // GarP_1,147.50 //
   alpo 'pi doṣo duṣṭyāderlabdhvānyatamato balam /	alpaH api dozaH duzwi AdeH labDvA anyatamataH balam /
   sa pratyanīko viṣamaṃ yasmādvṛddhikṣayānvitaḥ // GarP_1,147.51 //	sa pratyanIkaH vizamam yasmAt vRdDi kzaya anvitaH // GarP_1,147.51 //
   savikṣepo jvaraṃ kuryādviṣamakṣayavṛddhibhāk /	sa vikzepaH jvaram kuryAt vizama kzaya vRdDi BAj /
   doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṃ sve kāle jvarayanbalī // GarP_1,147.52 //	dozaH pravartate tezAm sve kAle jvarayan balI // GarP_1,147.52 //
   nivartate punaścaiva pratyanīkabalābalaḥ /	nivartate punar ca eva pratyanIka bala abalaH /
   kṣīṇadoṣo jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣveva līyate // GarP_1,147.53 //	kzINa dozaH jvaraH sUkzmaH rasa Adizu eva lIyate // GarP_1,147.53 //
   līnatvātkārśyavaivarṇyajāḍyādīnāṃ dadhāti saḥ /	lIna tvAt kArSya vEvarNya jAxya AdInAm daDAti saH /
   āsannavikṛtāsyatvātsrotasāṃ rasavāhinām // GarP_1,147.54 //	Asanna vikRta Asya tvAt srotasAm rasa vAhinAm // GarP_1,147.54 //
   āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptidoṣo na jāyate /	ASu sarvasya vapuzaH vyApti dozaH na jAyate /
   santaḥ satatastena viparīto viparyayāt // GarP_1,147.55 //	santaH satataH tena viparItaH viparyayAt // GarP_1,147.55 //
   viṣamo viṣamārambhaḥ kṣapākālena saṅgavān /	vizamaH vizama AramBaH kzapA kAlena saFgavAn /
   doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti santataṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.56 //	dozaH rakta ASrayaH prAyas karoti santatam jvaram // GarP_1,147.56 //
   ahorātrasya sandhau syātsakṛdanyedyurāśritaḥ /	ahorAtrasya sanDO syAt sakRt anyedyus ASritaH /
   tasminmāṃsavahā nāḍī medonāḍī tṛtīyake // GarP_1,147.57 //	tasmin mAMsa vahA nAxI medaH nAxI tRtIyake // GarP_1,147.57 //
   grāhī pittānilānmūrdhnastrikasya kaphapittataḥ /	grAhI pitta anilAn mUrDnaH trikasya kaPa pittataH /
   sapṛṣṭhasyānilakaphātsa caikāhāntaraḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,147.58 //	sa pRzWasya anila kaPAt sa ca ekAha antaraH smRtaH // GarP_1,147.58 //
   caturthako malairmedomajjāsthyanyatare sthitaḥ /	caturTakaH malEH medaH majja asTi anyatare sTitaH /
   majjāstha eva hyaparaḥ prabhāvamanudarśayet // GarP_1,147.59 //	majjA sTaH eva hi aparaH praBAvam anudarSayet // GarP_1,147.59 //
   dvidhā kaphoṇijaṅghābhyāṃ sa pūrvaṃ śirasānilāt /	dviDA kaPoNi jaFGAByAm sa pUrvam SirasA anilAt /
   asthimajjorupagataścaturthakaviparyayaḥ // GarP_1,147.60 //	asTi majjoH upagataH caturTaka viparyayaH // GarP_1,147.60 //
   tridhā tryahaṃ jvarayati dinamekantu muñcati /	triDA tri aham jvarayati dinam ekantu muQcati /
   balā balena doṣaṇāmanyaceṣṭādijanmanām // GarP_1,147.61 //	balAH balena dozaNAm anya cezwA Adi janmanAm // GarP_1,147.61 //
   pakrānāmaviparyāsātsaptarātrañca laṅghayet /	pakrAnAm aviparyAsAt sapta rAtraQca laFGayet /
   jvaraḥ syānmanasastadvatkarmaṇaśca tadātadā // GarP_1,147.62 //	jvaraH syAt manasaH tadvat karmaNaH ca tadA atadA // GarP_1,147.62 //
   gambhīradhātucāritvātsannipātena sambhavāt /	gamBIra DAtu cAri tvAt sannipAtena samBavAt /
   tulyocchrayācca doṣāṇāṃ duścikitsyaścaturthakaḥ // GarP_1,147.63 //	tulya ucCrayAt ca dozANAm duScikitsyaH caturTakaH // GarP_1,147.63 //
   sūkṣāmātsūkṣmajvareṣveṣu dūraddūratareṣu ca /	sUkzAmAt sUkzma jvarezu ezu dUrat dUratarezu ca /
   doṣo raktādimārgeṣu śanairalpaścireṇa yat // GarP_1,147.64 //	dozaH rakta Adi mArgezu SanEs alpaH cireNa yat // GarP_1,147.64 //
   yāti dehañca nāśeṣaṃ santāpādīnkarotyataḥ /	yAti dehaQca na aSezam santApa AdIn karoti atas /

   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   ityeṣa kṣayajaḥ kāsa kṣīṇānāṃ dehanāśanaḥ /	iti eza kzaya jaH kAsa kzINAnAm deha nASanaH /
   yāpyau vā balināṃ tadvatkṣatajo 'pi navau tu tau // GarP_1,149.19 //	yApyO vA balinAm tadvat kzata jaH api navO tu tO // GarP_1,149.19 //
   sidhyetāmapi sāmarthyātsādhyādau ca pṛthakkramaḥ /	siDyetAm api sAmarTyAt sADya AdO ca pRTakkramaH /

   kāsaśvāsakṣayacchardisvarasādādayo gadāḥ /	kAsa SvAsa kzaya= Cardi svarasAda AdayaH gadAH /

   āmātisāravamathuviṣapāṇḍujvarairapi /	AmAtisAra vamaTu viza pANxu jvarEH api /

   prāṇodakānnavāhīni duṣṭasrotāṃsi dūṣayan /	prANa udaka anna vAhIni duzwa srotAMsi dUzayan /

   preritaḥ prerayankṣudraṃ svayaṃ sa samalaṃ marut /	preritaH prerayan kzudram svayam sa sa malam marut /

   parigṛhyaśirogrīvamuraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan /	parigRhya SiraH grIvam uraH pArSve ca pIxayan /

   karoti tīvravegañca śvāsaṃ prāṇopatāpinam /	karoti tIvra vegaQca SvAsam prANa upatApinam /

   kṛcchrācchayānaḥ śvasiti niṣaṇṇaḥ svāsthyamarhati /	kRcCrAt SayAnaH Svasiti nizaNNaH svAsTyam arhati /
   ucchritākṣo lalāṭena svidyatā bhṛśamārtimān // GarP_1,150.9 //	ucCrita akzaH lalAwena svidyatA BRSam ArtimAn // GarP_1,150.9 //
   viśuṣkāsyo muhuḥ śvāsaḥ kāṅkṣatyuṣṇaṃ savepathuḥ /	viSuzka AsyaH muhur SvAsaH kAFkzati uzNam sa vepaTuH /
   meghāmbuśītaprāgvātaiḥ śleṣmalaiśca vivardhate // GarP_1,150.10 //	meGa ambu SIta prAc vAtEH SlezmalEH ca vivarDate // GarP_1,150.10 //
   sa yāpyastamakaḥ sādhyo narasya balino bhavet /	sa yApyaH tamakaH sADyaH narasya balinaH Bavet /

   kāsaśvasitavacchīrṇamarmacchedarujārditaḥ /	kAsa Svasita vat SIrNa marma= Ceda rujA arditaH /

   adhodṛṣṭiḥ śutākṣastu snihyadraktaikalocanaḥ /	aDas dRzwiH Suta akzaH tu snihyat rakta eka locanaH /
   śuṣkāsyaḥ pralapandīno naṣṭacchāyo vicetanaḥ // GarP_1,150.13 //	Suzka AsyaH pralapan dInaH nazwa= CAyaH vicetanaH // GarP_1,150.13 //
   mahātāmahatā dīno nādena śvasiti krathan /	mahAtAma hatA dInaH nAdena Svasiti kraTan /
   uddhūyamānaḥ saṃrabdho mattarṣabha ivāniśam // GarP_1,150.14 //	udDUyamAnaH saMrabDaH matta RzaBaH iva aniSam // GarP_1,150.14 //
   pranaṣṭajñānavijñāno vibhrāntanayanānanaḥ /	pranazwa jQAna vijQAnaH viBrAnta nayana AnanaH /

   śuṣkakaṇṭho muhuścaiva karṇaśaṅkhāśiro 'tiruk /	Suzka kaNWaH muhur ca eva karNa SaFKA SiraH ati ruj /

   śleṣmāvṛtamukhaśrotraḥ kruddhagandhavahārditaḥ /	Slezma AvRta muKa SrotraH krudDa ganDavaha arditaH /

   marmasu cchidyamāneṣu paridevī niruddhavāk /	marmasu cCidyamAnezu paridevI nirudDa vAc /

   śvāsaikahetuḥ prāgrūpaṃ saṃkhyā prakṛtisaṃśrayā // GarP_1,151.1 //	SvAsa eka hetuH prAgrUpam saMKyA prakRti saMSrayAH // GarP_1,151.1 //
   hikrā bhakṣyodbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatīti ca /	hikrA Bakzya udBavA kzudrA yamalA mahatI iti ca /
   gambhīrā ca maruttatra tvarayāyuktisevitaiḥ // GarP_1,151.2 //	gamBIrA ca marut tatra tvarayA ayukti sevitEH // GarP_1,151.2 //
   rūkṣatīkṣṇakharāśāntairannapānaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ /	rUkza tIkzNa Kara aSAntEH anna pAnEH prapIxitaH /
   karoti hikrāṃ śvasanaḥ mandaśabdāṃ kṣudhānugām // GarP_1,151.3 //	karoti hikrAm SvasanaH manda SabdAm kzuDA anugAm // GarP_1,151.3 //
   samaṃ sandhyānnapānena yā prayāti ca sānnajā /	samam sanDyA anna pAnena yA prayAti ca sa anna jAH /
   āyāsātpavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrāṃ hikrāṃ pravartayet // GarP_1,151.4 //	AyAsAt pavanaH krudDaH kzudrAm hikrAm pravartayet // GarP_1,151.4 //
   jatrumūlātparisṛtā mandavegavantī hi sā /	jatru mUlAt parisRtA manda vegavantI hi sA /
   vṛddhimāyāsato yāti bhuktamātre ca mārdabam // GarP_1,151.5 //	vRdDim AyAsataH yAti Bukta mAtre ca mArdabam // GarP_1,151.5 //

   kampayantī śiro grīvāṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /	kampayantI SiraH grIvAm yamalAm tAm vinirdiSet /

   yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā /	yamalA veginI hikrA pariNAmavatI ca sA /

   stambhayantī tanuṃ vācaṃ smṛtiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca muñcatī /	stamBayantI tanum vAcam smRtim saMjQAm ca muQcatI /

   pakrāśayācca nābhervā pūrvavatsā pravartate // GarP_1,151.11 //	pakrASayAt ca nABeH vA pUrvavat sA pravartate // GarP_1,151.11 //
   tadrūpā sā mahatkuryāñjṛmbhaṇāṃ gaprasāraṇam /	tad rUpA sA mahat kuryAn jRmBaNAm ga prasAraNam /
   gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet // GarP_1,151.12 //	gamBIreNa nidAnena gamBIrA tu susADayet // GarP_1,151.12 //
   ādye dve varjayedanye sarvaliṅgāṃ ca veginīm /	Adye dve varjayet anye sarva liFgAm ca veginIm /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  152	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 152
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   athāto yakṣmarogasya nidānaṃ pravadāmyaham /	aTa atas yakzma rogasya nidAnam pravadAmi aham /
   anekarogānugato bahurogapurogamaḥ // GarP_1,152.1 //	aneka roga anugataH bahu roga purogamaH // GarP_1,152.1 //
   rājayakṣmā kṣayaḥ śoṣo rogarāḍiti kathyate /	rAjayakzmA kzayaH SozaH rogarAj iti kaTyate /
   nakṣatrāṇāṃ dvijānāñca rājño 'bhūdyadayaṃ purā // GarP_1,152.2 //	nakzatrANAm dvijAnAQca rAjQaH aBUt yat ayam purA // GarP_1,152.2 //
   yacca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tato mataḥ /	yat ca rAjA ca yakzmA ca rAjayakzmA tatas mataH /
   dehauṣadhakṣayakṛteḥ kṣayastatsambhavācca saḥ // GarP_1,152.3 //	deha OzaDa kzaya kRteH kzayaH tad samBavAt ca saH // GarP_1,152.3 //
   rasādiśoṣaṇācchoṣo rogarāḍiti rājavat /	rasa Adi SozaNAt SozaH rogarAj iti rAja vat /
   sāhasaṃ vegasaṃrodhaḥ śukraujaḥ snehasaṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_1,152.4 //	sAhasam vega saMroDaH Sukra ojaH sneha saMkzayaH // GarP_1,152.4 //
   annapānavidhityāgaścatvārastasyahetavaḥ /	anna pAna viDi tyAgaH catvAraH tasya hetavaH /
   tairudīrṇo 'nilaḥ pittaṃ vyarthaṃ codīrya sarvataḥ // GarP_1,152.5 //	tEH udIrNaH anilaH pittam vyarTam ca udIrya sarvatas // GarP_1,152.5 //
   śarirasandhimāviśya tāḥ śirāḥ pratipīḍayan /	SariH asan Dima AviSya tAH SirAH pratipIxayan /
   mukhāni srotasāṃ ruddhvā tathaivātivisṛjya vā // GarP_1,152.6 //	muKAni srotasAm rudDvA taTA eva ativisRjya vA // GarP_1,152.6 //
   madhyamūrdhvamadhastiryagavyathāṃ sañjanayeddhṛdaḥ /	maDyam UrDvam aDas tiryak avyaTAm saQjanayet hRdaH /

   praseko mukhamādhuryaṃ mārdavaṃ vahnide hayoḥ /	prasekaH muKa mADuryam mArdavam vahni de hayoH /

   makṣikātṛṇakeśādipātaḥ prāyo 'nnapānayoḥ /	makzikA tRNa keSa Adi pAtaH prAyas anna pAnayoH /
   hṛllāsaśchardirarucirasnāte 'pi balakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,152.9 //	hRllAsaH CardiH aruciH asnAte api bala kzayaH // GarP_1,152.9 //
   pāṇyoruvakṣaḥ pādāsyakukṣyakṣṇoratiśuklatā /	pANyA Uru vakzaH pAda Asya kukzi a kzNoH ati Sukla tA /
   bāhvoḥ pratodo jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsyadarśanam // GarP_1,152.10 //	bAhvoH pratodaH jihvAyAH kAye bEBatsya darSanam // GarP_1,152.10 //
   strīmadyamāṃsapriyatā ghṛṇitā mūrdhaguṇṭhanam /	strI madya mAMsa priya tA GRNitAH mUrDa guNWanam /
   nakhakeśāsthivṛddhiśca svapne cābhibhavo bhavet // GarP_1,152.11 //	naKa keSa asTi vRdDiH ca svapne ca aBiBavaH Bavet // GarP_1,152.11 //
   patanaṃ kṛkalāsāhikapiśvāpadapakṣibhiḥ /	patanam kRkalAsa ahi kapi SvApada pakziBiH /

   śūnyānāṃ grāmadeśānāṃ darśanaṃ śuṣyato 'mbhasaḥ /	SUnyAnAm grAma deSAnAm darSanam SuzyataH amBasaH /
   jyotirdivi davāgnīnāṃ jvalatāṃ ca mahīruhām // GarP_1,152.13 //	jyotiH divi dava agnInAm jvalatAm ca mahIruhAm // GarP_1,152.13 //
   pīnasaśvāsakāsaṃ ca svaramūrdharujo 'ruciḥ /	pInasa SvAsa kAsam ca svara mUrDa rujaH aruciH /

   sthite pārśve ca rugbodhe sandhisthe bhavati jvaraḥ /	sTite pArSve ca ruj boDe sanDi sTe Bavati jvaraH /

   tatra vātācchiraḥ pārśvaśūlanaṃ sāṃgamardanam /	tatra vAtAt SiraH pArSva SUlanam sa aMga mardanam /

   dāho 'tisāro 'sṛk chardirmukhagandho jvaro madaḥ /	dAhaH atisAraH asRk CardiH muKaganDaH jvaraH madaH /

   prasekaḥ pīnasaḥ śvāsaḥ svarabhedo 'lpavahnitā /	prasekaH pInasaH SvAsaH svaraBedaH alpa vahni tA /
   doṣairmandānalatvena śothalepakapholbaṇaiḥ // GarP_1,152.19 //	dozEH manda anala tvena SoTa lepa kaPa ulbaNEH // GarP_1,152.19 //
   srotomukheṣu ruddheṣu dhātuṣu svalpakeṣu ca /	srotaH muKezu rudDezu DAtuzu su alpakezu ca /
   vidāho manasaḥ sthāne bhavantyanye hyupadravāḥ // GarP_1,152.20 //	vidAhaH manasaH sTAne Bavanti anye hi upadravAH // GarP_1,152.20 //
   pacyate koṣṭha evānnamamlayuktai rasairyutam /	pacyate kozWaH eva annam amla yuktEH rasEH yutam /
   prāyo 'sya kṣayabhāgānāṃ naivānnaṃ cāṅgapuṣṭaye // GarP_1,152.21 //	prAyas asya kzaya BAgAnAm na eva annam ca aFga puzwaye // GarP_1,152.21 //
   raso hyasya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat /	rasaH hi asya na raktAya mAMsAya kurute tu tat /
   upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantācca kevalaṃ vartate kṣayī // GarP_1,152.22 //	upazwabDaH samantAt ca kevalam vartate kzayI // GarP_1,152.22 //
   liṅgeṣvalpeṣvatikṣīṇaṃ vyādhau ṣaṭkaraṇakṣayam /	liFgezu alpezu ati kzINam vyADO zaz karaNa kzayam /
   varjayetsādhayedeva sarveṣvapi tato 'nyathā // GarP_1,152.23 //	varjayet sADayet eva sarvezu api tatas anyaTA // GarP_1,152.23 //
   doṣairvyastaiḥ samastaiśca kṣayātsarvasya medasaḥ /	dozEH vyastEH samastEH ca kzayAt sarvasya medasaH /
   svarabhedo bhavettasya kṣāmo rūkṣaścalaḥ svaraḥ // GarP_1,152.24 //	svaraBedaH Bavet tasya kzAmaH rUkzaH calaH svaraH // GarP_1,152.24 //
   śukavarṇābhakaṇṭhatvaṃ snigdhoṣṇopaśamo 'nilāt /	Suka varNa ABa kaNWa tvam snigDa uzNa upaSamaH anilAt /
   pittāttālugale dāhaḥ śoṣo bhavati santatam // GarP_1,152.25 //	pittAt tAlu gale dAhaH SozaH Bavati santatam // GarP_1,152.25 //
   limpanniva kaphaiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ mukhaṃ ghuraghurāyate /	limpan= iva kaPEH kaNWam muKam GuraGurAyate /

   durvikalpahato mūḍhaḥ sukhamityabhimucyate /	durvikalpa hataH mUXaH suKam iti aBimucyate /

   eko 'yaṃ bahumārgāyāḥ durgar (ma) terdarśakaḥ param /	ekaH ayam bahu mArgAyAH durgar (ma) teH darSakaH param /

   sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ pramoho hṛdayavyathā /	sAmAnya lakzaNam tezAm pramohaH hRdaya vyaTA /

   śleṣmaṇaśchardirhṛllāso nidrā codaragauravam /	SlezmaNaH CardiH hRllAsaH nidrA ca udara gOravam /

   sahasā ruciraṃ cānyataradhvaṃsakaśoṣiṇau /	sahasA ruciram ca anyatara DvaMsaka SoziNO /

   dhvaṃsakaśleṣmaniṣṭhivāḥ kaṇṭhaśoṣo 'tinidratā /	DvaMsaka Slezma nizWivAH kaNWa SozaH atinidra tA /
   śabdāsahatvaṃ taccittavikṣepo 'ṅge hi vātaruk // GarP_1,155.16 //	Sabda asaha tvam tad citta vikzepaH aFge hi vAta ruj // GarP_1,155.16 //
   hṛtkaṇṭharogaḥ saṃmohaḥ śvāsatṛṣṇāvamijvarāḥ /	hRd kaNWa rogaH saMmohaH SvAsa tRzNA vami jvarAH /
   nivartedyastu madyebhyo jitātmā buddhipūrvakṛt // GarP_1,155.17 //	nivartet yaH tu madyeByaH jita AtmA budDi pUrva kRt // GarP_1,155.17 //
   vikāraiḥ kliśyate jātu na sa śarīramānasaḥ /	vikArEH kliSyate jAtu na sa SarIra mAnasaH /

   vasāsṛkkledanāvāhisrotorodhaḥ sudbhavāḥ /	vasA asRk kleda nA vAhi srotaH roDaH sudBavAH /

   mado 'tra doṣaiḥ sarvaistu raktamadyaviṣairapi /	madaH atra dozEH sarvEH tu rakta madya vizEH api /

   rūkṣaśyāmāruṇatanurmadye vātodbhave bhavet /	rUkza SyAmA aruNa tanuH madye vAta udBave Bavet /
   pittena krodhano raktapītābhaḥ kalahapriyaḥ // GarP_1,155.21 //	pittena kroDanaH rakta pIta ABaH kalaha priyaH // GarP_1,155.21 //
   svapne 'sambaddhavākyādiḥ kaphāddhyānaparo hi saḥ /	svapne asambadDa vAkya AdiH kaPAt DyAna paraH hi saH /
   sarvotthasannipātena raktastambhāṅgadūṣaṇam // GarP_1,155.22 //	sarva utTa sannipAtena rakta stamBa aFga dUzaNam // GarP_1,155.22 //
   pittaliṅgatvamādyena vikṛtehā svarājñatā /	pitta liFga tvam Adyena vikRta IhA svarAjQa tA /
   visatkampotinidrā ca sarvebhyo 'bhyadhikaṃ śramaḥ // GarP_1,155.23 //	visat kampa uti nidrA ca sarveByaH aByaDikam SramaH // GarP_1,155.23 //
   lakṣayellakṣaṇotkarṣādvātādīñchoṇitādiṣu /	lakzayet lakzaNa utkarzAt vAta AdIn SoNita Adizu /
   aruṇaṃ nīlakṛṣṇaṃ vā sampraviśyanviśettamaḥ // GarP_1,155.24 //	aruNam nIla kRzNam vA sampraviSyan viSet tamaH // GarP_1,155.24 //
   śīghraṃ ca pratibudhyeta hṛtpīḍā vepathurbhramaḥ /	SIGram ca pratibuDyeta hRd pIxA vepaTuH BramaH /
   kāsaḥ śyāvāruṇā cchāyā mūrchāyāṃ mārutātmakaḥ // GarP_1,155.25 //	kAsaH SyAva aruNA cCAyA mUrCAyAm mAruta AtmakaH // GarP_1,155.25 //
   pittena raktaṃ pītaṃ vā nabhaḥ paśyanviśettamaḥ /	pittena raktam pItam vA naBaH paSyan viSet tamaH /
   vibudhyeta ca sasvedo dāhatṛṣṇopapīḍitaḥ // GarP_1,155.26 //	vibuDyeta ca sa svedaH dAha tRzNA upapIxitaH // GarP_1,155.26 //
   bhinnavatpītanīlābho raktanīlākulekṣaṇaḥ /	Binna vat pIta nIla ABaH rakta nIla Akula IkzaNaH /
   kaphena meghasaṃkāśaṃ paśyatyākāśamāviśet // GarP_1,155.27 //	kaPena meGa saMkASam paSyati AkASam AviSet // GarP_1,155.27 //
   tamaścirācca budhye hṛduraḥ suprasekavān /	tamaH cirAt ca buDye hRduraH su prasekavAn /
   gurubhistimitai (rai) raṅge rājadharmāvabandhān (vat) // GarP_1,155.28 //	guru BistimitEH (rE) raFge rAja Darma avabanDAn (vat) // GarP_1,155.28 //
   sarvākṛtistribhirdeṣairapasmāra ivāparaḥ /	sarva AkRtiH triBiH dezEH apasmAraH iva aparaH /
   pātayatyāśu niśceṣṭaṃ vinā bībhatsaceṣṭitaiḥ // GarP_1,155.29 //	pAtayati ASu niScezwam vinA bIBatsa cezwitEH // GarP_1,155.29 //
   doṣaistu madamūrchāyāṃ kṛtavegeṣu dehinām /	dozEH tu mada mUrCAyAm kRta vegezu dehinAm /
   svayamevopaśāmyanti saṃnyāsenauṣadhairnivā // GarP_1,155.30 //	svayam eva upaSAmyanti saMnyAsena OzaDEH nivAH // GarP_1,155.30 //
   vāgdehamanasāṃ ceṣṭāmākṣipyātibalābalāḥ /	vAc deha manasAm cezwAm Akzipya atibala abalAH /
   sasanyāsaṃ nipatitāḥ prāṇāghātanasaṃśrayāḥ // GarP_1,155.31 //	sa sanyAsam nipatitAH prANa AGAtana saMSrayAH // GarP_1,155.31 //
   bhavanti tena puruṣāḥ kāṣṭhabhūtā mṛtopamāḥ /	Bavanti tena puruzAH kAzWa BUtAH mRta upamAH /
   mriyeta śīghraṃ śīghraṃ ceccikitsā na prayujyate // GarP_1,155.32 //	mriyeta SIGram SIGram ced cikitsA na prayujyate // GarP_1,155.32 //
   agādhe grāhabahule salilaugha ivārṇave /	agADe grAha bahule salila oGaH iva arNave /
   saṃnyāse vinimajjantaṃ naramāśu nivartayet // GarP_1,155.33 //	saMnyAse vinimajjantam naram ASu nivartayet // GarP_1,155.33 //
   madamānaroṣatoṣa pravṛttibhiritastataḥ /	mada mAna roza toza pravRttiBiH itas tatas /
   yuktāyuktaṃ ca samaṃ yuktiṃ yuṅkte na madyena // GarP_1,155.34 //	yukta ayuktam ca samam yuktim yuFkte na madyena // GarP_1,155.34 //
   balakāsadeśapātraṃ prakṛtisahatāmathavā vayāṃsi? /	bala kAsa deSa pAtram prakRti sahatAm aTavA vayAMsi? /
   pravibhajjyāttanurūpaṃ pibati tataḥ pibatyamṛta // GarP_1,155.35 //	praviBajjyAt tanu rUpam pibati tatas pibati amRtaH // GarP_1,155.35 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   madātyayādinidānaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	madAtyayAdinidAnam nAma paQcapaQcASaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  156	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 156
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   athārśasāṃ nidānaṃ ca vyākhyāsyami ca suśruta ! /	aTa arSasAm nidAnam ca vyAKyAsyami ca suSrutaH ! /
   sarvadā prāṇināṃ māṃse kīlakāḥ prabhavanti ye // GarP_1,156.1 //	sarvadA prANinAm mAMse kIlakAH praBavanti ye // GarP_1,156.1 //
   arśāṃsi tasmāducyante gudamārganirodhanāt /	arSAMsi tasmAt ucyante guda mArga niroDanAt /
   doṣastvaṅmāṃsamedāṃsi sandūṣya vividhākṛtīn // GarP_1,156.2 //	dozaH tvac mAMsa medAMsi sandUzya viviDa AkRtIn // GarP_1,156.2 //
   māṃsāṃkurānapānādau kurvantyarśāṃsi tāñjaguḥ /	mAMsAMkurAnapAna AdO kurvanti arSAMsi tAn jaguH /
   sahajanmāntarotthena bhedo dvedhā samāsataḥ // GarP_1,156.3 //	sahajanma antara utTena BedaH dveDA samAsatas // GarP_1,156.3 //
   śuṣkāgrāvāvibhedāśca gudasthānānusaṃśrayāḥ /	Suzka agrAva aviBedAH ca guda sTAna anusaMSrayAH /
   ardhapañcāṅgulistasmiṃstisro 'ghyardhāṅgulisthitāḥ // GarP_1,156.4 //	arDa paQcAFguliH tasmin= tisraH aGi arDa aFguli sTitAH // GarP_1,156.4 //
   bālyapravāhiṇī tāsāmantramadhye visarjinī /	bAlya pravAhiNI tAsA mantra maDye visarjinI /
   bāhyāsaṃvaraṇe tasyā gudādau bahiraṅgule // GarP_1,156.5 //	bAhya asaMvaraNe tasyAH guda AdO bahis aFgule // GarP_1,156.5 //
   sārdhāṅgulapramāṇena romāṇyatra tataḥ param /	sArDa aFgula pramANena romANi atra tatas param /
   tatra hetuḥ sahotthānāṃ bālye bījopataptatā // GarP_1,156.6 //	tatra hetuH saha utTAnAm bAlye bIja upatapta tA // GarP_1,156.6 //
   arśasāṃ bījasṛṣṭistu mātāpitrapacārataḥ /	arSasAm bIja sRzwiH tu mAtA pitR apacArataH /
   devatānāṃ prakope hi sānnipātasya cānyataḥ // GarP_1,156.7 //	devatAnAm prakope hi sAnnipAtasya ca anyatas // GarP_1,156.7 //
   asādhyā evamākhyātāḥ sarve rogāḥ kulodbhavāḥ /	asADyAH evam AKyAtAH sarve rogAH kula udBavAH /
   sahajāni viśeṣeṇa rūkṣadurdarśanāni tu // GarP_1,156.8 //	sahajAni viSezeNa rUkza durdarSanAni tu // GarP_1,156.8 //
   antarmukhāni pāṇḍūni dāruṇopadravāṇi ca /	antar muKAni pANxUni dAruNa upadravANi ca /
   yojyāni ca pṛthogdoṣasaṃsarganicayātsvataḥ // GarP_1,156.9 //	yojyAni ca pRTok doza saMsarga nicayAt svataH // GarP_1,156.9 //
   śuṣkāṇi vātaśleṣmabhyāmārdrāṇi tvasya pittataḥ /	SuzkANi vAta SlezmaByAm ArdrANi tu asya pittataH /
   doṣaprakopahetustu prāguktevastrasādini // GarP_1,156.10 //	doza prakopa hetuH tu prAk uktevastra sAdini // GarP_1,156.10 //
   agnau male 'tinicite punaścāyaṃ (ti) vyavāyataḥ /	agnO male ati nicite punar ca ayam (ti) vyavAyataH /
   pānasaṃkṣobhaviṣamakaṭhinakṣudrakāśanāt // GarP_1,156.11 //	pAna saMkzoBa vizama kaWina kzudraka aSanAt // GarP_1,156.11 //
   bastinetragalauṣṭhotthatalabhedādighaṭṭanāt /	basti netra gala ozWa utTa tala Beda Adi GawwanAt /
   bhṛśaśītāmbusaṃsparśapratatātipravāhaṇāt // GarP_1,156.12 //	BRSa SIta ambu saMsparSa pratata ati pravAhaNAt // GarP_1,156.12 //
   gatamūtraśakṛdvegadhāraṇāttadudīraṇāt /	gata mUtra SakRt vega DAraNAt tad udIraNAt /
   jugupsātīsārameva grahaṇī so 'pyupadravaḥ // GarP_1,156.13 //	jugupsA atIsAram eva grahaNI saH api upadravaH // GarP_1,156.13 //
   karṣaṇādviṣamādeścaceṣṭābhyo yoṣitāṃ punaḥ /	karzaNAt vizama AdeH ca cezwAByaH yozitAm punar /

   īdṛśaiścāparairvāyurapānaḥ kupito male /	IdRSEH ca aparEH vAyuH apAnaH kupitaH male /

   jāyanter'śāṃsitu tatpūrvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vahnimandatā /	jAyanter aSAMsitu tat pUrvam lakzaNam vahni manda tA /

   indriyārtheṣu laulyaṃ ca krodho duḥ khopacārataḥ /	indriya arTezu lOlyam ca kroDaH duH Ka upacArataH /

   etānyeva vivardhante jāteṣvahatanāmasu /	etAni eva vivarDante jAtezu ahata nAmasu /

   kṣobhayedanilānanyān sarvendriyaśarīgān /	kzoBayet anilAn anyAn sarva indriya SarIgAn /

   purīṣaṃ vātaviṣṇūtrasaṃgaṃ kurvīta dāruṇam? /	purIzam vAta vizNUtra saMgam kurvIta dAruNam? /
   tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭhapṛṣṭhahṛtpārśvagā bhavet // GarP_1,156.48 //	tena tIvrA rujA kozWa pRzWa hRd pArSva gA Bavet // GarP_1,156.48 //
   ādhmānamudare viṣṭhā hṛllāsaparikartane /	ADmAnam udare vizWA hRllAsa parikartane /
   bastau ca sutarāṃ śūlo gaṇḍaśvayathusaṃbhavaḥ // GarP_1,156.49 //	bastO ca sutarAm SUlaH gaNxa SvayaTu saMBavaH // GarP_1,156.49 //
   pavanasyordhvagāmitvāttataśchardyarucijvarāḥ /	pavanasya UrDva gAmi tvAt tatas Cardi aruci jvarAH /
   hṛdrogagrahaṇīdoṣamūtrasaṃgapravāhikāḥ // GarP_1,156.50 //	hRd roga grahaNI doza mUtra saMga pravAhikAH // GarP_1,156.50 //
   bādhiryātiśiraḥ śvāsaśirorukkāśapīnasāḥ? /	bADirya ati SiraH SvAsa SiraH ruj kASa pInasAH? /
   manovikārastṛṭśvāsapittagulmodarādayaḥ // GarP_1,156.51 //	manaH vikAraH tRz SvAsa pitta gulmodara AdayaH // GarP_1,156.51 //
   ete ca vātajā rogā jāyante bhṛśadāruṇāḥ /	ete ca vAta jAH rogAH jAyante BRSa dAruNAH /
   durnāmāmṛtyūdāvartaparamo 'yamupadravaḥ // GarP_1,156.52 //	durnAma amRtyu udAvarta paramaH ayam upadravaH // GarP_1,156.52 //
   vātābhibhūtakoṣṭhānāṃ tairvināpi vijāyate /	vAta aBiBUta kozWAnAm tEH vinA api vijAyate /
   sahajāni tu doṣāṇi yāni cābhyantare valau // GarP_1,156.53 //	sahajAni tu dozANi yAni ca aByantare valO // GarP_1,156.53 //
   sthitāni tānyasādhyāni yāpyante 'gnibalādibhiḥ /	sTitAni tAni asADyAni yApyante agni bala AdiBiH /
   dvandvajāni dvitīyāyāṃ valā yānyāśritāni ca // GarP_1,156.54 //	dvandva jAni dvitIyAyAm valAH yAni ASritAni ca // GarP_1,156.54 //
   kṛcchrasādhyāni tānyāhuḥ parisaṃvatsarāṇi ca /	kRcCra sADyAni tAni AhuH parisaMvatsarANi ca /
   bāhyāyāṃ tu valau jātānyekadoṣolbaṇāni ca // GarP_1,156.55 //	bAhyAyAm tu valO jAtAni eka doza ulbaNAni ca // GarP_1,156.55 //
   arśāṃsi sukhasādhyāni na cirotpattikāni ca /	arSAMsi suKa sADyAni na cira utpattikAni ca /
   meḍhrādiṣvapi vakṣyante yathāsvaṃ nābhijāni tu // GarP_1,156.56 //	meXra Adizu api vakzyante yaTAsvam nABi jAni tu // GarP_1,156.56 //
   gaṇḍūpadasya rūpāṇi picchilāni mṛdūni ca /	gaNxUpadasya rUpANi picCilAni mRdUni ca /
   vyāno gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇaṃ karotyarśastvaco bahiḥ // GarP_1,156.57 //	vyAnaH gRhItvA SlezmANam karoti arSaH tvacaH bahis // GarP_1,156.57 //
   kīlopamaṃ sthirakharaṃ carmakīlaṃ ca tadviduḥ /	kIla upamam sTira Karam carmakIlam ca tat viduH /
   vātena todaḥ pāruṣyaṃ pittādasitavaktratā // GarP_1,156.58 //	vAtena todaH pAruzyam pittAt asita vaktra tA // GarP_1,156.58 //
   śleṣmaṇaḥ snigdhatā tasya grathitatvaṃ savarṇatā /	SlezmaNaH snigDa tA tasya graTita tvam savarNa tA /
   arśasāṃ praśame yatnamāśu kurvīta buddhimān /	arSasAm praSame yatnam ASu kurvIta budDimAn /
   tānyāśu hi gadandhā (kār) yya kuryurbaddhagudodaram // GarP_1,156.59 //	tAni ASu hi gadanDA (kAr) yya kuryuH badDa guda udaram // GarP_1,156.59 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'śonidānā	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxer aSonidAnA
   nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nAma zawpaQcASaduttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  157	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 157
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   atīsāragrahaṇyośca nidānaṃ vacmi suśruta /	atIsAra grahaNyoH ca nidAnam vacmi suSrutaH /
   doṣairvyastaiḥ samastaiśca bhayācchokācca ṣaḍvidhaḥ // GarP_1,157.1 //	dozEH vyastEH samastEH ca BayAt SokAt ca zaxviDaH // GarP_1,157.1 //
   atīsāraḥ sa sutarāṃ jāyate 'tyambupānataḥ /	atIsAraH sa sutarAm jAyate ati ambu pAnataH /
   viśuṣkānnavasāsnehatilapiṣṭavirūḍhakaiḥ // GarP_1,157.2 //	viSuzka anna vasA sneha tila pizwa virUXakEH // GarP_1,157.2 //
   madyarūkṣātimātrādirasātisnehavibhramāt /	madya rUkza atimAtra Adi rasa atisneha viBramAt /
   kṛmighoṣavirodhācca tadvidheḥ kupitānilaḥ // GarP_1,157.3 //	kRmi Goza viroDAt ca tad viDeH kupita anilaH // GarP_1,157.3 //
   vistraṃsayatyadhovātaṃ hatvā tenaiva cānalam /	vistraMsayati aDovAtam hatvA tena eva ca analam /
   vyāpāryānnaśakṛtkoṣṭhapurīṣadravatādayaḥ // GarP_1,157.4 //	vyApArya anna SakRt kozWa purIza dravata AdayaH // GarP_1,157.4 //
   prakalpate 'tīsārasya lakṣaṇaṃ tasya bhāvinaḥ /	prakalpate atIsArasya lakzaNam tasya BAvinaH /
   bhedo hṛdgudakoṣṭheṣu gātrasvedo malagrahaḥ // GarP_1,157.5 //	BedaH hRd guda kozWezu gAtra svedaH mala grahaH // GarP_1,157.5 //
   ādhmānamavipākaśca tatra vātena vijvaram /	ADmAnam avipAkaH ca tatra vAtena vijvaram /
   alpālpaṃ śabdaśūnyāḍhyaṃ viru (ba)ddhamupaveśyate // GarP_1,157.6 //	alpa alpam Sabda SUnya AXyam viru (ba)dDam upaveSyate // GarP_1,157.6 //
   rūkṣaṃ saphenamacchaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ va muhurmuhuḥ /	rUkzam sa Penam acCam ca gRhItam va muhur muhur /
   tathādagdhagadābhāsaṃ picchilaṃ parikartayan // GarP_1,157.7 //	taTA dagDa gada ABAsam picCilam parikartayan // GarP_1,157.7 //
   saśuṣkabhraṣṭapāyuśca hṛṣṭaromā viniśvasan /	sa Suzka Brazwa pAyuH ca hRzwa romA viniSvasan /
   pittena pītamaśitaṃ hāridraṃ śādvalaprabham // GarP_1,157.8 //	pittena pItam aSitam hAridram SAdvala praBam // GarP_1,157.8 //
   saraktamatidurgandhaṃ tṛṇmūrchāsvedadāhavān /	sa raktam ati durganDam tRz mUrCA sveda dAhavAn /
   saśūlapāyusantāpapākavāñchleṣmaṇā ghanam // GarP_1,157.9 //	sa SUla pAyu santApa pAkavAn SlezmaNA Ganam // GarP_1,157.9 //
   picchilaṃ tatrānusāramalpālpaṃ sapravāhikam /	picCilam tatra anusAram alpa alpam sa pravAhikam /
   saromaharpaḥ sekleśo gurubastigudodaraḥ // GarP_1,157.10 //	sa roma harpaH sekleSaH guru basti guda udaraH // GarP_1,157.10 //
   kṛte 'pyakṛtasaṅgaśca sarvātmā sarvalakṣaṇaḥ /	kRte api akRta saFgaH ca sarva AtmA sarva lakzaNaH /
   bhayena kṣubhite citte śāyite drāvayetsa (ccha) kṛt // GarP_1,157.11 //	Bayena kzuBite citte SAyite drAvayet sa (cCa) kRt // GarP_1,157.11 //
   vāyustato nivāryeta kṣipramuṣṇaṃ dravaṃ plavam /	vAyuH tatas nivAryeta kzipram uzNam dravam plavam /
   vātapitte samaṃ liṅgamāhustadvacca śokataḥ // GarP_1,157.12 //	vAta pitte samam liFgam AhuH tadvat ca SokataH // GarP_1,157.12 //
   atīsāraḥ samāsena dvedhā sāmo nirāmakaḥ /	atIsAraH samAsena dveDA sAmaH nirAmakaH /
   sāsṛgjātaṃ rasadrogo gauravādapsu muñcati? /	sa asRk jAtam rasadrogaH gOravAt apsu muQcati? /
   śakṛddurgandhamāṭopaviṣṭambhārtiprasekinaḥ // GarP_1,157.13 //	SakRt durganDam Awopa vizwamBa Arti prasekinaH // GarP_1,157.13 //
   viparīto nirāmastu kaphātko 'pi na majjati /	viparItaH nirAmaH tu kaPAt kaH api na majjati /
   atīsāreṣu yo nāti yatnavān grahaṇīgadaḥ // GarP_1,157.14 //	atIsArezu yaH na ati yatnavAn grahaNI gadaH // GarP_1,157.14 //
   tasya syādagninirvāṇakāryairatyarthasañcitaiḥ /	tasya syAt agni nirvANa kAryEH atyarTa saQcitEH /
   sāmaṃ śakṛnnirāmaṃ vā jīrṇaṃ yenātisāryate // GarP_1,157.15 //	sAmam SakRt nirAmam vA jIrNam yena atisAryate // GarP_1,157.15 //
   so 'tisāro 'tisaraṇā dāśukārīḥ svabhāvataḥ /	saH atisAraH atisaraNAH dASu kArIH svaBAvataH /
   sāmaṃśīrṇamajīrṇena jīrṇe pakvaṃ tu naiva ca // GarP_1,157.16 //	sAmaMSIrNam ajIrNena jIrNe pakvam tu na eva ca // GarP_1,157.16 //
   cirakṛd grahaṇīdoṣaḥ sañcayāṃścopaveśayet /	cira kRt grahaNI dozaH saQcayAn= ca upaveSayet /
   akasmādvārasurvedhamakasmātsandhinīmuhuḥ? /	akasmAt vAra suH veDam akasmAt sanDinImuhuH? /
   sa caturdhā pṛthagdoṣaiḥ sannipātācca jāyate // GarP_1,157.17 //	sa caturDA pRTak dozEH sannipAtAt ca jAyate // GarP_1,157.17 //
   prāgrūpāṅgasya sadanaṃ cirātpavana alpakaḥ /	prAgrUpa aFgasya sadanam cirAt pavana alpakaH /
   praseko vaktravairasyamarucistṛṭśramobhramaḥ // GarP_1,157.18 //	prasekaH vaktra vErasyam aruciH tRz SramaH BramaH // GarP_1,157.18 //
   āba (na) ddhodaratā chardiḥ karṇake 'pyanukūjakam /	Aba (na) dDA udara tA CardiH karNake api anukUjakam /
   sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kārśyaṃ vamaka stamako jvaraḥ // GarP_1,157.19 //	sAmAnya lakzaNam kArSyam vamaka stamakaH jvaraH // GarP_1,157.19 //
   mūrchā śiroruviṣṭambhaḥ śvayathuḥ karapādayoḥ /	mUrCA Siroru vizwamBaH SvayaTuH kara pAdayoH /
   tandrānilāttāluśoṣastimiraṃ karṇayoḥ svanaḥ // GarP_1,157.20 //	tandrA anilAt tAlu SozaH timiram karNayoH svanaH // GarP_1,157.20 //
   pārśvoruvaṅkṣaṇagrīvārujā tīkṣṇaviṣūcikā /	pArSva Uru vaFkzaNa grIvA rujA tIkzNa vizUcikA /
   rugṇeṣu vṛddhiḥ sarvaṣu kṣuttṛṣṇāparihartrikā // GarP_1,157.21 //	rugNezu vRdDiH sarvazu kzut tRzNA parihartrikA // GarP_1,157.21 //
   jīrṇejīryati cādhmānaṃ bhukte svāsthyaṃ samaśnute /	jIrNejIryati ca ADmAnam Bukte svAsTyam samaSnute /
   vātāddhṛdrogagulmārśaḥplīhapāṇḍuraśaṅkitāḥ // GarP_1,157.22 //	vAtAt hRd roga gulma arSaH plIha pANxura SaFkitAH // GarP_1,157.22 //
   cirādduḥ khaṃ dravaṃ śuṣkaṃ tundāraṃ śabdaphenavat /	cirAt duH Kam dravam Suzkam tundAram Sabda Pena vat /
   punaḥ punaḥ sṛjedvarcaṃ pāyurucchvāsakāsavān // GarP_1,157.23 //	punar punar sRjet varcam pAyuH ucCvAsa kAsavAn // GarP_1,157.23 //
   pītena pītanīlābhaṃ pītābhaṃ sṛjati dravam /	pItena pIta nIla ABam pIta ABam sRjati dravam /
   pūtyamlodgārahṛtkaṇṭhadāhārucitṛḍarditaḥ // GarP_1,157.24 //	pUti amla udgAra hRd kaNWa dAha aruci tRz arditaH // GarP_1,157.24 //
   śleṣmaṇā pacyate duḥkhe manaśchardirarocakaḥ /	SlezmaNA pacyate duHKe manaH CardiH arocakaH /
   āsyopadāhaniṣṭhīvakāsahṛllāsapīnasāḥ // GarP_1,157.25 //	Asya upadAha nizWIva kAsa hRllAsa pInasAH // GarP_1,157.25 //
   hṛdayaṃ manyate styānamudaraṃ stimitaṃ guru /	hRdayam manyate styAnam udaram stimitam guru /
   udgāro duṣṭamadhuraḥ sadanaṃ sapraharṣaṇam // GarP_1,157.26 //	udgAraH duzwa maDuraH sadanam sa praharzaNam // GarP_1,157.26 //
   sambhinnaśleṣmasaṃśliṣṭagurucāmlaiḥ (varcaḥ) pravartacam /	samBinna Slezma saMSlizwa gurucAmlEH (varcaH) pravartacam /
   akṛśasyāpi daurbalyaṃ sarvaje sarvadarśanam // GarP_1,157.27 //	akRSasya api dOrbalyam sarvaje sarva darSanam // GarP_1,157.27 //
   vibhāge 'ṅgasya ye proktā pipāsādyāstrayo malāḥ /	viBAge aFgasya ye proktA pipAsA AdyAH trayaH malAH /
   te 'pyasya grahaṇīdoṣāḥ samanteṣvasti kāraṇam // GarP_1,157.28 //	te api asya grahaNI dozAH samantezu asti kAraNam // GarP_1,157.28 //
   vātavyādhyaśmarīkuṣṭhamehodarabhagandaram /	vAta vyADi aSmarI kuzWa meha udara Bagandaram /
   arśāṃsi grahaṇītyaṣṭau mahārogāḥ sudustarāḥ // GarP_1,157.29 //	arSAMsi grahaNI iti azwO mahA rogAH su dustarAH // GarP_1,157.29 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye
   ācārakāṇḍetisāranidāna nāma saptañcāśaduttaraśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	AcAra kANxa itisAranidAna nAma saptaQcASaduttaraSatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  158	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 158
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   athāto mūtraghātasya nidānaṃ śṛṇu suśruta /	aTa atas mUtra GAtasya nidAnam SRNu suSrutaH /
   bastibastiśiromeḍhrakaṭīvṛṣaṇapāyu ca // GarP_1,158.1 //	basti basti SiraH meXra kawI vRzaNa pAyu ca // GarP_1,158.1 //
   ekasaṃvahanāḥ proktā gudāsthivivarāśrayāḥ /	eka saMvahanAH proktAH guda asTi vivara ASrayAH /
   adhomukho 'pi bastirhi mūtravāhiśirāmukhaiḥ // GarP_1,158.2 //	aDomuKaH api bastiH hi mUtra vAhi SirA muKEH // GarP_1,158.2 //
   pārśvebhyaḥ pūryate ślakṣṇai (sūkṣmaiḥ) syandamānairanāratam /	pArSveByaH pUryate SlakzNEH (sUkzmEH) syandamAnEH anAratam /
   taistaireva praviśyaivandoṣānkuvanti viṃśatim // GarP_1,158.3 //	tEH tEH eva praviSya evandozAn kuvanti viMSatim // GarP_1,158.3 //
   mūtrāghātaḥ pramehaśca kṛcchrānmarma samāśrayet /	mUtrAGAtaH pramehaH ca kRcCrAt marma samASrayet /
   bastivaṅkṣaṇameḍhrārtiyuktolpālpaṃ muhurmuhuḥ // GarP_1,158.4 //	basti vaFkzaNa meXra Arti yukta ulpa alpam muhur muhur // GarP_1,158.4 //
   mūtrāṇyāvātaje kṛcchrapītte pītaṃ sadāharuk /	mUtrANi AvAta je kRcCra pItte pItam sa dAha ruj /
   raktaṃ vā kaphajo bastimeḍhragauravaśothavān // GarP_1,158.5 //	raktam vA kaPa jaH basti meXra gOrava SoTavAn // GarP_1,158.5 //
   sapicchaṃ saniruddhaṃ ca sarvaiḥ sarvātmakaṃ malaiḥ /	sa picCam sa nirudDam ca sarvEH sarva Atmakam malEH /
   yadā vāyurmukhaṃ bastervyāvartya pāriśoṣayan // GarP_1,158.6 //	yadA vAyuH muKam basteH vyAvartya pAriSozayan // GarP_1,158.6 //
   mūtraṃ sapittaṃ sakaphaṃ saśukraṃ vā tadā kramāt /	mUtram sa pittam sa kaPam sa Sukram vA tadA kramAt /
   saṃjāyate 'śmarī ghorā pittaṃ goriva rocanā // GarP_1,158.7 //	saMjAyate aSmarI GorA pittam goH iva rocanA // GarP_1,158.7 //
   śleṣmāśrayā ca sarvā syādathāsyāḥ pūrvalakṣaṇam /	Slezma ASrayA ca sarvA syAt aTa asyAH pUrva lakzaNam /
   bastyādhmānaṃ tadāsannadeśohi parito 'tiruk // GarP_1,158.8 //	basti ADmAnam tadAsanna deSaH hi paritas ati ruj // GarP_1,158.8 //
   bastau ca mūtrasaṅgitvaṃ mūtrakṛcchraṃ jvaro 'ruciḥ /	bastO ca mUtra saFgi tvam mUtrakRcCram jvaraH aruciH /
   sāmānyaliṅgaṃ ruṅnābhisīvanībastimūrdhasu // GarP_1,158.9 //	sAmAnya liFgam ruj nABi sIvanI basti mUrDasu // GarP_1,158.9 //
   vistīrṇavā saṃ mūtraṃ syāttathā mārganirodhane /	vistIrNavA sam mUtram syAt taTA mArga niroDane /
   baddhaṃ baddhvā sukhaṃ mehedacchaṃ gomedakopamam // GarP_1,158.10 //	badDam badDvA suKam mehet acCam gomedaka upamam // GarP_1,158.10 //
   tatsaṃkṣobhādbhavetsāsṛṅmāṃsamadhvani rugbhavet /	tad saMkzoBAt Bavet sa asRk mAMsam aDvani ruj Bavet /
   tatra bātābhisṛtyārtodantān khādati vepate // GarP_1,158.11 //	tatra bAta aBisRtya ArtaH dantAn KAdati vepate // GarP_1,158.11 //
   gṛhṇāti mehanaṃ nābhiṃ pīḍayatyatilakṣaṇam /	gRhNAti mehanam nABim pIxayati ati lakzaNam /
   sānilaṃ muñcati śakṛnmuhurmehati binduśaḥ // GarP_1,158.12 //	sa anilam muQcati SakRt muhur mehati binduSaH // GarP_1,158.12 //
   śyāmarūkṣāśmarī cāsya syāccitā kaṇṭakairiva /	SyAma rUkza aSmarI ca asya syAt citA kaNwakEH iva /
   pittena dahyate bastiḥ pacyamāna ivoṣṇavān // GarP_1,158.13 //	pittena dahyate bastiH pacyamAnaH iva uzNavAn // GarP_1,158.13 //
   bhallātakāsthisaṃsthānā raktā pītā sitāśmarā /	BallAtaka asTi saMsTAnA raktA pItA sita aSmarAH /
   bastirnistudyata iva śleṣmaṇā śītalo guruḥ // GarP_1,158.14 //	bastiH nistudyate iva SlezmaNA SItalaH guruH // GarP_1,158.14 //
   aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhuvarṇātha vā sitā /	aSmarI mahatI SlakzNA maDu varNA aTa vA sitA /
   etā bhavanti bālanāṃ teṣāmeva ca bhūyasām // GarP_1,158.15 //	etAH Bavanti bAlanAm tezAm eva ca BUyasAm // GarP_1,158.15 //
   āśayopacayālpatvādgahaṇāharaṇe sukhī /	ASaya upacaya alpa tvAt gahaNa AharaNe suKI /
   sukrāśmarī tu mahatī jāyate śukradhāraṇāt // GarP_1,158.16 //	sukra aSmarI tu mahatI jAyate Sukra DAraNAt // GarP_1,158.16 //
   sthānacyutamabhuktaṃ vā aṇḍayorantare 'nilaḥ /	sTAna cyutam aBuktam vE aNxayoH antare anilaH /
   śoṣayatyupasaṃgṛhya śukraṃ tacchukramaśmarī // GarP_1,158.17 //	Sozayati upasaMgRhya Sukram tat Sukram aSmarI // GarP_1,158.17 //
   bastirukkṛcchramūtratvaṃ śuklā śvayathukāriṇī /	basti ruj kRcCra mUtra tvam SuklA SvayaTu kAriNI /
   tasyāmutpannamātrāyāṃ śuṣkametya vilīyate // GarP_1,158.18 //	tasyAm utpanna mAtrAyAm Suzkam etya vilIyate // GarP_1,158.18 //
   pīḍite jvarakāse 'sminnaśmaryeva ca śarkarā /	pIxite jvara kAse asmin= aSmarI eva ca SarkarA /
   asau vā vāyunā bhinnā sā tvasminnamulomage // GarP_1,158.19 //	asO vA vAyunA BinnA sA tu asmin= amuloma ge // GarP_1,158.19 //
   nireti saha mūtreṇa pratilome vipacyate /	nireti saha mUtreNa pratilome vipacyate /
   mūtrasaṃdhāraṇaṃ kuryātkruddho bastermukhe marut // GarP_1,158.20 //	mUtra saMDAraNam kuryAt krudDaH basteH muKe marut // GarP_1,158.20 //

   pracchādya bastimuddhṛtya garmāntaṃ sthūlaviplutām // GarP_1,158.21 //	pracCAdya bastim udDRtya garma antam sTUla viplutAm // GarP_1,158.21 //
   karoti tatra rugdāhaṃ spandanodveṣṭanāni ca /	karoti tatra ruj dAham spandana udvezwanAni ca /

   dhārāvarodhaścāpyeṣa vātabastiriti smṛtaḥ /	DArA avaroDaH ca api eza vAtabastiH iti smRtaH /

   vātāṣṭhīleti sātmānaṃ viṣṇūtrānila (ti) sargakṛt /	vAtAzWIlA iti sa AtmAnam vizNUtra anila (ti) sarga kRt /

   ābadhya mūtraṃ bhramati saṃstambhodveṣṭagauravam /	AbaDya mUtram Bramati saMstamBa udvezwa gOravam /

   vātakuṇḍaliketyeva mūtraṃ tu vidhṛte 'ciram /	vAtakuNxalikA iti eva mUtram tu viDRte aciram /
   na nireti niruddhaṃ vā mūtrātītaṃ tadalparuk // GarP_1,158.27 //	na nireti nirudDam vA mUtra atItam tad alpa ruj // GarP_1,158.27 //
   vidhāraṇātpratihataṃ vātādāvartitaṃ yadā /	viDAraNAt pratihatam vAtAt Avartitam yadA /

   ākṣiptamalpamūtrasya vastau nābhau ca vā male /	Akziptam alpa mUtrasya vastO nABO ca vA male /

   mūtrotsargaṃ savicchinnaṃ tacchreyo guruśephasoḥ /	mUtra utsargam sa vicCinnam tat SreyaH guru SePasoH /

   sthānāccyutaṃ mūtrayataḥ prāk paścādvā pravartate /	sTAnAt cyutam mUtrayataH prAk paScAt vA pravartate /

   rūkṣadurbalayorvātenodāvartaṃ śakṛdyadā /	rUkza durbalayoH vAtena udAvartam SakRt yadA /
   mūtrasroto 'nuparyeti saṃsṛṣṭaṃ śakṛtā tadā // GarP_1,158.34 //	mUtra srotaH anuparyeti saMsRzwam SakRtA tadA // GarP_1,158.34 //
   mūtrabinduṃ tulyagandhaṃ syādvighātaṃ tamādiśet /	mUtra bindum tulya ganDam syAt viGAtam tam AdiSet /
   pittavyāyāmatīkṣṇāmlabhojanādhmānakādibhiḥ // GarP_1,158.35 //	pitta vyAyAma tIkzNa amla Bojana ADmAnaka AdiBiH // GarP_1,158.35 //
   pravṛddhavāyunā mūtre vastisthe caiva dāhakṛt /	pravRdDa vAyunA mUtre vasti sTe ca eva dAha kRt /
   mūtraṃ vartayate pūrvaṃ saraktaṃ raktameva vā // GarP_1,158.36 //	mUtram vartayate pUrvam sa raktam raktam eva vA // GarP_1,158.36 //
   uṣṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ kṛcchrāduṣṇavātaṃ vadanti tam /	uzNam punar punar kRcCrAt uzNa vAtam vadanti tam /
   rūkṣasya klāntadehasya bastisthau pittamārutau // GarP_1,158.37 //	rUkzasya klAnta dehasya basti sTO pitta mArutO // GarP_1,158.37 //
   mūtrakṣayaṃ sarugdāhaṃ janayetāṃ tadāhvayam /	mUtra kzayam sa ruj dAham janayetAm tad Ahvayam /

   kṛcchrānmūtraṃ tadā pītaṃ raktaṃ śvetaṃ ghanaṃ sṛjet /	kRcCrAt mUtram tadA pItam raktam Svetam Ganam sRjet /
   sadāhaṃ rocanāśaṅkhacūrṇavarṇaṃ bhavecca tat // GarP_1,158.39 //	sa dAham rocanA SaFKa cUrNa varNam Bavet ca tat // GarP_1,158.39 //
   śuṣkaṃ samastavarṇaṃ vā mūtrasādaṃ vadantitam /	Suzkam samasta varNam vA mUtra sAdam vadantitam /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  159	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 159
   dhanvanvariruvāca /	Danvan variH uvAca /
   pramehāṇāṃ nidānante vakṣye 'haṃ śṛṇu suśruta ! /	pramehANAm nidAnante vakzye aham SRNu suSrutaH ! /
   pramehā viṃśatistatra śleṣmaṇo daśa pittataḥ // GarP_1,159.1 //	pramehA viMSatiH tatra SlezmaNaH daSa pittataH // GarP_1,159.1 //
   ṣaṭcatvāro 'nilātteca medomatrakaphāvahāḥ /	zaz catvAraH anilAt teca medaH matra kaPa AvahAH /
   hāridramehī kaṭukaṃ haridrāsannibhaṃ śakṛt // GarP_1,159.2 //	hAridramehI kawukam haridrA sanniBam SakRt // GarP_1,159.2 //
   vistraṃ māñjiṣṭhameheca mañjiṣṭhā salilopamam /	vistram mAQjizWameha ica maQjizWA salila upamam /
   vistramuṣṇaṃ salavaṇaṃ raktābha raktamehataḥ // GarP_1,159.3 //	vistram uzNam sa lavaNam rakta ABa raktamehataH // GarP_1,159.3 //
   vasāmehī vasāmiśraṃ vasābhaṃ mūtrayenmuhuḥ /	vasAmehI vasA miSram vasA ABam mUtrayet muhur /

   hastī matta ivājastraṃ mūtraṃ vegavivarjitam /	hastI mattaH iva ajastram mUtram vega vivarjitam /

   madhumehī madhusamaṃ jāyate sa kila dvidhā /	maDumehI maDu samam jAyate sa kila dviDA /
   kruddhe dhātukṣayādvāyau doṣāvṛtapathe yadā // GarP_1,159.6 //	krudDe DAtu kzayAt vAyO doza AvRta paTe yadA // GarP_1,159.6 //
   āvṛto doṣaliṅgāni so 'nimittaṃ pradarśayet /	AvRtaH doza liFgAni saH animittam pradarSayet /

   upadravāḥ prajāyante mehānāṃ kaphajanmanām /	upadravAH prajAyante mehAnAm kaPa janmanAm /

   śūlamunnidrātā śoṣaḥ śvāsaḥ kāsañca jāyate /	SUlam unnidrAtA SozaH SvAsaH kAsaQca jAyate /

   mūtravarṇādibhedena bhedo meheṣu kalpyate /	mUtra varNa Adi Bedena BedaH mehezu kalpyate /

   mehatyudakamehena kiñcidāvilapicchilam /	mehati udakamehena kiQcid Avila picCilam /

   sāndrī bhavetparyuṣitaṃ sāndramehena mehati /	sAndrI Bavet paryuzitam sAndramehena mehati /

   sahṛṣṭaromā piṣṭena piṣṭabadbahulaṃ sitam /	sa hRzwa romA pizwena pizwa badbahulam sitam /

   mūtrayetsikatāmehī sikatārūpiṇo malān /	mUtrayet sikatAmehI sikatA rUpiNaH malAn /

   gandhavarṇarasasparśeḥ kṣāreṇa kṣāratoyavat /	ganDa varNa rasa sparSeH kzAreNa kzAra toya vat /

   sandhimarmasu jāyante māṃsaleṣu ca dhāmasu /	sanDi marmasu jAyante mAMsalezu ca DAmasu /

   sarṣapopamasaṃsthānā jihvāpākamahārujā /	sarzapa upama saMsTAnA jihvA pAka mahA rujA /

   vidārīkandavadvṛttā kaṭhinā ca vidārikā /	vidArI kanda vat vRttA kaWinA ca vidArikA /

   putriṇī ca vidārī ca duḥ sahā bahumedasaḥ /	putriNI ca vidArI ca duH sahAH bahu medasaH /

   piḍikāstā bhaveyuḥ syāddoṣodreko yathāyatham /	pixikAH tAH BaveyuH syAt doza udrekaH yaTAyaTam /

   tāvacca nopalakṣyante yāvadvarṇañca varjitam /	tAvat ca na upalakzyante yAvat varNaQca varjitam /

   yo mūtrayeta tanmaheṃ raktapittantu tadviduḥ /	yaH mUtrayeta tat mahem raktapittantu tat viduH /

   śītapriyatvaṃ galatāluśoṣo mādhurya māsye karapādadāhaḥ /	SIta priya tvam gala tAlu SozaH mADurya mAsye kara pAda dAhaH /
   bhaviṣyato mehagaṇasya rūpaṃ mūtre 'pi dhāvanti pipīlikāśca //	BavizyataH meha gaNasya rUpam mUtre api DAvanti pipIlikAH ca //
   GarP_1,159.37 //	GarP_1,159.37 //
   tṛṣṇā pramehe madhuraṃ prapicchaṃ madhvāmaye syādvividhovikāraḥ /	tRzNA pramehe maDuram prapicCam maDu Amaye syAt viviDaH vikAraH /
   sampūraṇādvā kaphasambhavaḥ syātkṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣvanilātmako vā //	sampUraNAt vA kaPa samBavaH syAt kzINezu dozezu anila AtmakaH vA //
   GarP_1,159.38 //	GarP_1,159.38 //
   sampūrṇarūpāḥ kaphapittamehāḥ krameṇa ye vai ratisambhavāśca /	sampUrNa rUpAH kaPa pitta mehAH krameNa ye vE rati samBavAH ca /
   sakrāmate pittakṛtāstu yāpyāḥ sādhyo 'sti meho yadi nāsti diṣṭam //	sakrAmate pitta kRtAH tu yApyAH sADyaH asti mehaH yadi na asti dizwam //
   GarP_1,159.39 //	GarP_1,159.39 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   pramehanidāna nāmaikonaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	pramehanidAna nAma ekonazazwyuttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  160	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 160
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   nidānaṃ vidradhervakṣye gulmasya śṛṇu śuśruta ! /	nidAnam vidraDeH vakzye gulmasya SRNu SuSruta ! /
   bhuktaiḥ paryuṣitātyuṣṇaśuṣkarūkṣavidāhibhiḥ // GarP_1,160.1 /	BuktEH paryuzita ati uzNa Suzka rUkza vidAhiBiH // GarP_1,160.1 /
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  160	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 160
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   nidānaṃ vidradhervakṣye gulmasya śṛṇu śuśruta ! /	nidAnam vidraDeH vakzye gulmasya SRNu SuSruta ! /
   bhuktaiḥ paryuṣitātyuṣṇaśuṣkarūkṣavidāhibhiḥ // GarP_1,160.1 //	BuktEH paryuzita ati uzNa Suzka rUkza vidAhiBiH // GarP_1,160.1 //
   jihmaśayyāviceṣṭābhistaistaiścāsṛkpradūṣaṇaiḥ /	jihma SayyA vicezwABiH tEH tEH ca asRk pradUzaNEH /
   duṣṭasatvaṅmāṃsamedo 'sthimadāmṛṣṭodarāśrayaḥ // GarP_1,160.2 //	duzwa satvac mAMsa medaH asTi madAmRzwa udara ASrayaH // GarP_1,160.2 //
   yaḥ śotho bahirantaśca mahāśūlo mahārujaḥ /	yaH SoTaH bahis antar ca mahA SUlaH mahA rujaH /
   vṛttaḥ syādāyato yo vā smṛto rogaḥ sa vidradhiḥ // GarP_1,160.3 //	vRttaH syAt AyataH yaH vA smRtaH rogaH sa vidraDiH // GarP_1,160.3 //
   doṣaiḥ pṛthaksamuditaiḥ śoṇitena stratena ca /	dozEH pRTak samuditEH SoNitena stratena ca /
   vahate tatra tatrāṅge dāruṇe grathito 'strutaḥ // GarP_1,160.4 //	vahate tatra tatra aFge dAruNe graTitaH astrutaH // GarP_1,160.4 //
   antarā dāruṇaścaiva gambhīro gulmavardhanaḥ /	antarA dAruNaH ca eva gamBIraH gulma varDanaH /
   valmīkavatsamutstrāvī hyagnimāndyañca jāyate // GarP_1,160.5 //	valmIka vat samutstrAvI hi agnimAndyaQca jAyate // GarP_1,160.5 //
   nābhibastiyakṛtplīhaklomahṛtkukṣivaṅkṣaṇi /	nABi basti yakRt plIha kloma hRd kukzi vaFkzaNi /
   hṛdaye vepamāne tu tatratatrātitīvraruk // GarP_1,160.6 //	hRdaye vepamAne tu tatra tatra ati tIvra ruj // GarP_1,160.6 //
   śyāmāruṇaśirotthānapāko viṣamasaṃsthitiḥ /	SyAma aruNa SirA utTAna pAkaH vizama saMsTitiH /
   saṃjñācchedabhramānāhasyandasarpaṇaśabdavān // GarP_1,160.7 //	saMjQA AcCeda Brama AnAha syanda sarpaNa SabdavAn // GarP_1,160.7 //
   raktatāmrāsitaḥ pittāttṛṇmohajvaradāhavān /	rakta tAmra asitaH pittAt tRz moha jvara dAhavAn /
   kṣiptotthānaprapākaśca pāṇḍuḥ kaṇḍūyutaḥ kaphāt // GarP_1,160.8 //	kzipta utTAna prapAkaH ca pANxuH kaNxU yutaH kaPAt // GarP_1,160.8 //
   saṃkleśaśītakastambhajṛmbhārocakagauravāḥ /	saMkleSa SItaka stamBa jRmBA arocaka gOravAH /
   cirotthāno 'vipākaśca saṃkīrṇaḥ sannipātajaḥ // GarP_1,160.9 //	cira utTAnaH avipAkaH ca saMkIrNaH sannipAta jaH // GarP_1,160.9 //
   sāmarthyāccātra viḍbhedo bāhyābhyantaralakṣaṇam /	sAmarTyAt ca atra vixBedaH bAhya aByantara lakzaNam /
   kṛṣṇasphoṭāvṛtaśyāmastīvradāharujājvaraḥ // GarP_1,160.10 //	kRzNa sPowa AvRta SyAmaH tIvra dAha rujA jvaraH // GarP_1,160.10 //
   pittaliṅgo 'sṛjā bāhye strīṇāmeva tathāntaram /	pitta liFgaH asRjA bAhye strINAm eva taTA antaram /
   śastrādyairabhighātottharaktaiśca rogakāraṇam // GarP_1,160.11 //	Sastra AdyEH aBiGAta utTa raktEH ca roga kAraNam // GarP_1,160.11 //
   kṣatottho vāyunā kṣiptaḥ sa raktaḥ pittamīrayan /	kzata utTaH vAyunA kziptaH sa raktaH pittam Irayan /
   pittāsṛglakṣaṇaṃ kuryādvidradhiṃ bhūryupadravam // GarP_1,160.12 //	pitta asRj lakzaNam kuryAt vidraDim BUri upadravam // GarP_1,160.12 //
   tenopadravabhedaśca smṛto 'dhiṣṭhānabhedataḥ /	tena upadrava BedaH ca smRtaH aDizWAna BedataH /
   nābhau hi dhmātaṃ cedbastau mūtrakṛcchrañcajāyate // GarP_1,160.13 //	nABO hi DmAtam ced bastO mUtrakRcCraQcajAyate // GarP_1,160.13 //
   śvāsapraśvāsarodhaśca plīhāyāmatitṛṭ param /	SvAsa praSvAsa roDaH ca plIhAyAm ati tRz param /
   galarodhaśca klomni syātsarvāṅgaprarujā hṛdi // GarP_1,160.14 //	gala roDaH ca klomni syAt sarva aFga prarujAH hRdi // GarP_1,160.14 //
   pramohastamakaḥ kāsau hṛdayoddhaṭṭanantathā /	pramohaH tamakaH kAsO hRdaya udDawwanan taTA /
   kukṣipārśvāntare caiva kukṣau doṣopajanma ca // GarP_1,160.15 //	kukzi pArSva antare ca eva kukzO doza upajanma ca // GarP_1,160.15 //
   tathā cedūrusandhau ca vaṅkṣaṇe kaṭipṛṣṭhayoḥ /	taTA ced Uru sanDO ca vaFkzaNe kawi pRzWayoH /
   pārśvayośca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam // GarP_1,160.16 //	pArSvayoH ca vyaTA pAyO pavanasya niroDanam // GarP_1,160.16 //
   āmapakvavidagdhatvaṃ teṣāṃ śothavadādiśet /	Ama pakva vidagDa tvam tezAm SoTa vat AdiSet /
   nābherūrdhvamukhātpakvātpradravantyapare gudāt // GarP_1,160.17 //	nABeH UrDva muKAt pakvAt pradravanti apare gudAt // GarP_1,160.17 //
   gudāstanābhije vidyāddoṣakledoccavidradhau /	guda astanABije vidyAt doza kleda ucca vidraDO /
   kurute svādhiṣṭhānasya vivartaṃ sannipātajaḥ // GarP_1,160.18 //	kurute svADizWAnasya vivartam sannipAta jaH // GarP_1,160.18 //
   pakvo hi nābhivastistho bhinno 'ntarbahireva vā /	pakvaH hi nABi vasti sTaH BinnaH antar bahis eva vA /
   pākaścāntaḥ pravṛddhasya kṣīṇasyopadravārditaḥ // GarP_1,160.19 //	pAkaH ca antar pravRdDasya kzINasya upadrava arditaH // GarP_1,160.19 //
   vidradhiśca bhavettatra pāpānāṃ pāpayoṣitām /	vidraDiH ca Bavet tatra pApAnAm pApa yozitAm /
   mṛte tu garbhage caiva sambhavecchvayatharghanaḥ // GarP_1,160.20 //	mRte tu garBa ge ca eva samBavet SvayaTarGanaH // GarP_1,160.20 //
   stane samatthe duḥkhaṃ vā bāhyavidradhilakṣaṇam /	stane samatTe duHKam vA bAhya vidraDi lakzaNam /
   nārīṇāṃ sūkṣmaraktatvātkanyāyāntu na jāyate // GarP_1,160.21 //	nArINAm sUkzma rakta tvAt kanyA yAn tu na jAyate // GarP_1,160.21 //
   kruddho ruddhagatirvāyuḥ śephamūlakaro?hi saḥ /	krudDaH rudDa gatiH vAyuH SePa mUla karo?hi saH /
   muṣkavaṅkṣaṇataḥ prāpya phalakoṣātivāhinīm // GarP_1,160.22 //	muzka vaFkzaNataH prApya Pala koza ati vAhinIm // GarP_1,160.22 //
   āpīḍya dhamanīvṛddhiṃ karoti phalakoṣayoḥ /	ApIxya DamanI vRdDim karoti Pala kozayoH /
   doṣo medaḥsu tatrāste savṛddhiḥ saptadhā gadaḥ // GarP_1,160.23 //	dozaH medaHsu tatra Aste sa vRdDiH saptaDA gadaH // GarP_1,160.23 //
   mūtrantayorapyanilādbāhye vābhyantare tathā /	mUtrantayoH api anilAt bAhye vA aByantare taTA /
   vātapūrṇaḥ kharasparśo rūkṣo vātācca dāhakṛt // GarP_1,160.24 //	vAta pUrNaH Kara sparSaH rUkzaH vAtAt ca dAha kRt // GarP_1,160.24 //
   pakvodumbarasaṅkāśaḥ pittāddāhoṣmapākavān /	pakva udumbara saFkASaH pittAt dAha Uzma pAkavAn /
   kaphāttīvro guruḥ snigdhaḥ kaṇḍūmānkaṭhino 'lparuk // GarP_1,160.25 //	kaPAt tIvraH guruH snigDaH kaNxUmAn kaWinaH alpa ruj // GarP_1,160.25 //
   kṛṣṇaḥ sphoṭāvṛtaḥ piṇḍoṃ vṛddhiliṅgaśca raktataḥ /	kRzNaH sPowa AvRtaH piNxom vRdDi liFgaH ca raktataH /
   kaphavanmedasāṃ vṛddhirmṛdutālaphalopamaḥ // GarP_1,160.26 //	kaPa vat medasAm vRdDiH mRdu tAla Pala upamaH // GarP_1,160.26 //
   mūtradhāraṇaśīlasya mūtrajastatra gacchataḥ /	mUtra DAraNa SIlasya mUtra jaH tatra gacCataH /
   alobhaḥ pūrṇadhṛtimānkṣobhaṃ yāti saranmṛdu // GarP_1,160.27 //	aloBaH pUrNa DRtimAn kzoBam yAti sarat mRdu // GarP_1,160.27 //
   mūtrakṛcchramadhastācca valayaḥ phalakoṣayoḥ /	mUtrakRcCram aDastAt ca valayaH Pala kozayoH /
   vātakopibhisahāraiḥ śītatoyāvagāhanaiḥ // GarP_1,160.28 //	vAtakopiBi sahArEH SIta toya avagAhanEH // GarP_1,160.28 //
   viṇmūtradhāraṇāccaiva viṣamāṅgaviceṣṭanaiḥ /	viz mUtra DAraNAt ca eva vizama aFga vicezwanEH /
   kṣobhitaiḥ kṣobhitaujāśca kṣīṇāntardehino yadā // GarP_1,160.29 //	kzoBitEH kzoBita ojAH ca kzINa antar dehinaH yadA // GarP_1,160.29 //
   pavano viguṇībhūya śoṇitaṃ tadadhonayet /	pavanaH viguNIBUya SoNitam tat aDonayet /
   kuryāttatkṣaṇasandhistho granthyābhaḥ śvayathustadā // GarP_1,160.30 //	kuryAt tad kzaNa sanDi sTaH granTi ABaH SvayaTuH tadA // GarP_1,160.30 //
   upekṣyamāṇasya ca gulmavṛddhimādhmānarugvai vividhāśca rogāḥ /	upekzyamANasya ca gulma vRdDim ADmAna ruj vE viviDAH ca rogAH /
   supīḍito 'ntaḥ svanavān prayāti pradhmāpayanneti punaśca mūrdhni //	su pIxitaH antar svanavAn prayAti praDmApayan= eti punar ca mUrDni //
   GarP_1,160.31 //	GarP_1,160.31 //
   raktavṛddhirasādhye 'yaṃ vātavṛddhisamākṛtiḥ /	rakta vRdDiH asADye ayam vAta vRdDi sama AkRtiH /
   rūkṣakṛṣṇāruṇaśirā ūrṇāvṛtagavākṣavat // GarP_1,160.32 //	rUkza kRzNa aruNa SirAH UrNA AvRta gavAkza vat // GarP_1,160.32 //
   vāto 'ṣṭadhā pṛthadauṣaiḥ saṃspṛṣṭairnicayaṃ gataḥ /	vAtaH azwaDA pRTat OzEH saMspRzwEH nicayam gataH /
   ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇāṃ jāyate 'ṣṭamaḥ // GarP_1,160.33 //	Artavasya ca dozeNa nArINAm jAyate azwamaH // GarP_1,160.33 //
   jvaramūrchātisāraiśca vamanādyaiśca karmabhiḥ /	jvara mUrCA atisArEH ca vamana AdyEH ca karmaBiH /
   karśito balavānyāti śītārtaśca bubhukṣitaḥ // GarP_1,160.34 //	karSitaH balavAn yAti SIta ArtaH ca buBukzitaH // GarP_1,160.34 //
   yaḥ pibatyannapānāni laṅghanaplāvanādikam /	yaH pibati anna pAnAni laFGana plAvana Adikam /
   sevate hīnasaṃjñābhirarditaḥ samudīrayan // GarP_1,160.35 //	sevate hIna saMjQABiH arditaH samudIrayan // GarP_1,160.35 //
   snehasvedāvanabhyasya śoṣaṇaṃ vā niṣevayet /	sneha svedO= anaByasya SozaNam vA nizevayet /
   śuddho vā suddhihānirvā bhajeta spandanāni vā // GarP_1,160.36 //	SudDaH vA sudDi hAniH vA Bajeta spandanAni vA // GarP_1,160.36 //
   vātolbaṇāstasya malāḥ pṛthakcaiva hi te 'thavā /	vAta ulbaNAH tasya malAH pRTak ca eva hi te aTavA /
   sarvo raktayuto vātāddehasnoto 'nusāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,160.37 //	sarvaH rakta yutaH vAtAt deha snotaH anusAriNaH // GarP_1,160.37 //
   ūrdhvādhomārgamāvṛtya vāyuḥ śūlaṃ karoti vai /	UrDva aDas mArgam AvRtya vAyuH SUlam karoti vE /
   sparśopalabhyaṃ gulmotthamuṣṇaṃ granthisvarūpiṇam // GarP_1,160.38 //	sparSa upalaByam gulma utTam uzNam granTi svarUpiNam // GarP_1,160.38 //
   karṣaṇātkaphaviḍghātairmārgasyāvaraṇena vā /	karzaNAt kaPa viS GAtEH mArgasya AvaraNena vA /
   vāyuḥ kṛtāśrayaḥ koṣṭhe raukṣyātkāṭhinyamāgataḥ // GarP_1,160.39 //	vAyuH kRta ASrayaH kozWe rOkzyAt kAWinyam AgataH // GarP_1,160.39 //
   svatantraḥ svāśraye duṣṭaḥ paratantraḥ parāśraye /	svatantraH sva ASraye duzwaH paratantraH para ASraye /
   tataḥ piṇḍakavacchleṣmā malasaṃsṛṣṭa eva ca // GarP_1,160.40 //	tatas piNxaka vat SlezmA mala saMsRzwaH eva ca // GarP_1,160.40 //
   gulama ityucyate bastinābhihṛtpārśvasaṃśrayaḥ /	gulamaH iti ucyate basti nABi hRd pArSva saMSrayaH /
   vātajanye śiraḥ śūlajvara plīhāntrakūjanam // GarP_1,160.41 //	vAta janye SiraH SUla jvara plIha antra kUjanam // GarP_1,160.41 //
   vedhaḥ sūcyeva viḍbhraṃśaḥ kṛcchre mūtraṃ pravartate /	veDaH sUcyA iva viz BraMSaH kRcCre mUtram pravartate /
   gātre mukhe pade śothaḥ hyagnimāndyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,160.42 //	gAtre muKe pade SoTaH hi agni mAndyam taTA eva ca // GarP_1,160.42 //
   rūkṣakṛṣṇatvagāditvaṃ calatvādanilasyaca /	rUkza kRzNa tvac Adi tvam cala tvAt anilasya ca /
   anirūpitasaṃsthāno vividhāñjanayedvyathām // GarP_1,160.43 //	anirUpita saMsTAnaH viviDAn janayet vyaTAm // GarP_1,160.43 //
   pipīlikāvyāpta iva gulmaḥ sphurati nudyate /	pipIlikA vyAptaH iva gulmaH sPurati nudyate /
   pittāddāhāmlakau mūrchā viḍbhedaḥ svedatṛḍjvarāḥ // GarP_1,160.44 //	pittAt dAha amlakO mUrCA vixBedaH sveda tRz jvarAH // GarP_1,160.44 //
   hāridrayaṃ sarvagātreṣu gulmācchothasya darśanam /	hAridrayam sarva gAtrezu gulmAt SoTasya darSanam /
   hīyate dīpyate śleṣmā svasthānaṃ dahatīvaca // GarP_1,160.45 //	hIyate dIpyate SlezmA sva sTAnam dahatI va ca // GarP_1,160.45 //
   kaphātstaimityamaruciḥ sadanaṃ śirasi jvaraḥ /	kaPAt stEmityam aruciH sadanam Sirasi jvaraH /
   pīnasālasyahṛllāsau śuklakṛṣṇatvagāditā // GarP_1,160.46 //	pInasa Alasya hRllAsO Sukla kRzNa tvac AditAH // GarP_1,160.46 //
   gulmo gabhīraḥ kaṭhino gururgarbhasthabālavat /	gulmaH gaBIraH kaWinaH guruH garBa sTa bAla vat /
   svasthānasthā adhāvantastata evātra mārakāḥ // GarP_1,160.47 //	sva sTAna sTAH aDAvantaH tatas eva atra mArakAH // GarP_1,160.47 //
   prāyastu yattaddvandvotthā gulmāḥ saṃsṛṣṭamaithunāḥ /	prAyas tu yat tat dvandva utTAH gulmAH saMsRzwa mETunAH /
   sarvajastīvrarugdāhaḥ śīghrapākī ghanonnataḥ // GarP_1,160.48 //	sarvajaH tIvra ruj dAhaH SIGrapAkI Gana unnataH // GarP_1,160.48 //
   so 'sādhyo raktagulmastu striyā eva prajāyate /	saH asADyaH rakta gulmaH tu striyAH eva prajAyate /
   ṛtau yā caiva śūlārtā yati vā yonirogiṇī // GarP_1,160.49 //	RtO yA ca eva SUla ArtA yati vA yoni rogiNI // GarP_1,160.49 //
   sevate vānilāṃśca strī kruddhastasyāḥ samīraṇaḥ /	sevate vA anilAn= ca strI krudDaH tasyAH samIraNaH /
   nirudhyātyārtavaṃ yonyāṃ pratimāsaṃ vyavasthitam // GarP_1,160.50 //	niruDya ati Artavam yonyAm pratimAsam vyavasTitam // GarP_1,160.50 //
   sukṣau karoti tadgarbhe liṅgamāviṣkaroti ca /	sukzO karoti tad garBe liFgam Avizkaroti ca /
   hṛllāsadauhṛdastanyadarśanaṃ kāmacāritā // GarP_1,160.51 //	hRllAsa dOhRda stanya darSanam kAma cAritAH // GarP_1,160.51 //
   krameṇa vāyoḥ saṃsargātpittaṃ yoniṣu sañcayam /	krameNa vAyoH saMsargAt pittam yonizu saQcayam /
   raktasya kurute tasyā vātapittoktagulmajān // GarP_1,160.52 //	raktasya kurute tasyAH vAta pitta ukta gulma jAn // GarP_1,160.52 //
   garbhāśaye ca sutarāṃ śūlāṃścaivāsṛgāśraye /	garBASaye ca sutarAm SUlAn= ca eva asRj ASraye /
   yonistrāvaśca daurgandhyaṃ bhūyaḥ syandanavedane // GarP_1,160.53 //	yoniH trAvaH ca dOrganDyam BUyas syandana vedane // GarP_1,160.53 //
   kadāpi garbhavadgulmaḥ sarve te ratisambhavāḥ /	kadApi garBa vat gulmaH sarve te rati samBavAH /
   pākañcireṇa bhajate naidhate vidradhiḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,160.54 //	pAkaQcireNa Bajate na eDate vidraDiH punar // GarP_1,160.54 //
   pacyate śīghramatyarthaṃ duṣṭaraktāśrayastu saḥ /	pacyate SIGram atyarTam duzwa rakta ASrayaH tu saH /
   ataḥ śīghraṃ vidāhitvādvadradhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate // GarP_1,160.55 //	atas SIGram vidAhi tvA advadraDiH saH aBIDIyate // GarP_1,160.55 //
   gulmāntāraśraye bastidāhaśca plīhavedanā /	gulma antAra Sraye basti dAhaH ca plIha vedanA /
   agnivarṇabalabhraṃśo vegānāṃ vā pravartanam // GarP_1,160.56 //	agni varNa bala BraMSaH vegAnAm vA pravartanam // GarP_1,160.56 //
   ato viparyaye bāhyakoṣṭhāṅgeṣu ca nātiruk /	atas viparyaye bAhya kozWa aFgezu ca na ati ruj /
   vaivarṇyamatha vā kāso bahirunnatatādhikam // GarP_1,160.57 //	vEvarNyam aTa vA kAsaH bahis unnata tA aDikam // GarP_1,160.57 //
   sāṭopamatyugrarujamādhmānamudare bhṛśam /	sa Awopam ati ugra rujam ADmAnam udare BRSam /
   ūrdhvādho vātarodhena tamānāhaṃ pracakṣate // GarP_1,160.58 //	UrDva aDas vAta roDena tam AnAham pracakzate // GarP_1,160.58 //
   dhanaścāṣṭhyupamo granthilo 'ṣṭhīlātu samunnatā /	DanaH ca azWI upamaH granTilaH azWIlA tu samunnatA /
   samastāliṅgasaṃyuktaḥ pratyaṣṭhīlā tadākṛtiḥ // GarP_1,160.59 //	samasta aliFga saMyuktaH pratyazWIlA tad AkRtiH // GarP_1,160.59 //
   pakvaśayodbhavo 'pyevaṃ vāyustīvrarujāśrayāt /	pakva Saya udBavaH api evam vAyuH tIvra rujA ASrayAt /
   udgārabāhulyapurīṣabandhatṛptyakṣamatvāntravikūjanāni // GarP_1,160.60 //	udgAra bAhulya purIza banDa tRpti akzama tva antra vikUjanAni // GarP_1,160.60 //
   ācopamādhmānamapaktiśaktiḥ āsannagulmasya bhavecca cihnam // GarP_1,160.61	Acopama ADmAnam apakti SaktiH Asanna gulmasya Bavet ca cihnam // GarP_1,160.61
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  161	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 161
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   anīrṇāmayāścāpyanye jāyante malasaṃcayāt /	anIrNa AmayAH ca api anye jAyante mala saMcayAt /

   prāṇānapānānsaṃdūṣya kuryustānmāṃsasandhigān /	prANAn apAnAn saMdUzya kuryuH tAn mAMsa sanDi gAn /

   pṛthagdoṣaiḥ samastauśca plīhavaṅkṣakṣatodakaiḥ /	pRTak dozEH samastOH ca plIha vaFkza kzata udakEH /

   kṣīyate balamaṅgasya śvasityalpo 'viceṣṭitaḥ /	kzIyate balam aFgasya Svasiti alpaH avicezwitaH /

   rugbastisandhau satataṃ laghvalpabhojanairapi /	ruj basti sanDO satatam laGu alpa BojanEH api /

   svatantratandrālasatā malasargo 'lpavahnitā /	svatantra tandrA alasatA mala sargaH alpa vahni tA /

   sarvatra toye maraṇaṃ śocanaṃ tatra niṣphalam /	sarvatra toye maraNam Socanam tatra nizPalam /

   pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddhamalo gude /	pakve BUte yakRti ca sadA badDa malaH gude /

   toyapūrṇānmṛdusparśātsadṛśakṣobhavepathu /	toya pUrNAt mRdu sparSAt sadRSa kzoBa vepaTu /

   upekṣāyāñca sarveṣāṃ svasthānāṃ paricālitāḥ /	upekzA yAQca sarvezAm svasTAnAm paricAlitAH /

   svede caiva tu saṃruddhe mūrchitāścāntarasthitāḥ /	svede ca eva tu saMrudDe mUrCitAH ca antara sTitAH /

   śirāntardhānamudare sarvalakṣaṇamucyate /	Sira antarDAnam udare sarva lakzaNam ucyate /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANme pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  162	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 162
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
