   pittapradhānāḥ kupitā yathoktaiḥ kopanairmalāḥ // GarP_1,162.1 //	pitta praDAnAH kupitAH yaTA uktEH kopanEH malAH // GarP_1,162.1 //
   natrānilena balinā kṣiptākṣiptaṃ yadi sthitam /	natra anilena balinA kzipta Akziptam yadi sTitam /
   dhamanīrdaśamīḥ prāpya vyāpnuvansakalāṃ tanum // GarP_1,162.2 //	DamanIH daSamIH prApya vyApnuvan sakalAm tanum // GarP_1,162.2 //
   tvagasṛkchleṣmamāṃsāni pradūṣyanrasamāśritam /	tvac asRj Slezma mAMsAni pradUzyan rasamASritam /
   tvaṅmāṃsayostu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān // GarP_1,162.3 //	tvac mAMsayoH tu kurute tvaci varNAn pRTagviDAn // GarP_1,162.3 //
   svayaṃ haridrā hāridraṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ teṣu cādhikam /	svayam haridrA hAridram pANxu tvam tezu ca aDikam /
   yāto 'yaṃ prahatedugraḥ sa rogastena gauravam // GarP_1,162.4 //	yAtaH ayam prahatet ugraH sa rogaH tena gOravam // GarP_1,162.4 //
   dhātūnāṃ sparśaśaithilyamāmajaśca guṇakṣayaḥ /	DAtUnAm sparSa SETilyam Ama jaH ca guNa kzayaH /
   tato 'lparaktamedo 'sthiniḥ sāraḥ syācchlathendriyaḥ // GarP_1,162.5 //	tatas alpa rakta medaH asTiniH sAraH syAt SlaTa indriyaH // GarP_1,162.5 //
   śīryamāṇairivāṅgaistu dravatā hṛdayena ca /	SIryamANEH iva aFgEH tu drava tA hRdayena ca /
   śūlokṣikūṭavadane staimityaṃ tatra lālayā // GarP_1,162.6 //	SUla ukzi kUwa vadane stEmityam tatra lAlayA // GarP_1,162.6 //
   hīnatṛṭ śiśiradveṣī śīrṇalobho hatānalaḥ /	hIna tRz SiSira dvezI SIrNa loBaH hata analaH /
   mandaśaktirjvarī śvāsī karṇaśūlī tathā bhramī // GarP_1,162.7 //	manda SaktiH jvarI SvAsI karNa SUlI taTA BramI // GarP_1,162.7 //
   sa pañcadhā pṛthagdoṣaiḥ samastairmṛttikādanāt /	sa paQcaDA pRTak dozEH samastEH mRttikA adanAt /
   prāgrūpamasya hṛdayaspandanaṃ rūkṣatā tvaci // GarP_1,162.8 //	prAgrUpam asya hRdaya spandanam rUkza tA tvaci // GarP_1,162.8 //
   aruciḥ pītamūtratvaṃ svedābhāvo 'lpamṛtratā /	aruciH pIta mUtra tvam sveda aBAvaH alpa mRtra tA /
   medaḥ samānilāttatra gāḍharukkledagātratā // GarP_1,162.9 //	medaH sama anilAt tatra gAXa ruj kleda gAtra tA // GarP_1,162.9 //
   kṛṣṇekṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśirānakhaviṇmūtranetratā /	kRzNa IkzaNam kRzNa SirA naKa viz mUtra netra tA /
   śotho nāsāsyavairasyaṃ viṭśoṣaḥ pārśvamūrchanā // GarP_1,162.10 //	SoTaH nAsA Asya vErasyam viz SozaH pArSva mUrCanAH // GarP_1,162.10 //
   pitte haritapittābhaḥ śirādiṣu jvarastamaḥ /	pitte harita pitta ABaH Sira Adizu jvaraH tamaH /
   tṛṭśoṣamūrchādaurgandhyaṃ śītecchā kaṭuvakratā // GarP_1,162.11 //	tRz Soza mUrCA dOrganDyam SIta icCA kawu vakratA // GarP_1,162.11 //
   viḍbhedaścāmlako dāhaḥ kaphācca hṛdayārdratā /	vixBedaH ca amlakaH dAhaH kaPAt ca hRdaya Ardra tA /
   tandrā lavaṇavakratvaṃ romaharṣaḥ svarakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,162.12 //	tandrA lavaNa vakra tvam romaharzaH svara kzayaH // GarP_1,162.12 //
   kāśaśchardiśca nicayānnaṣṭaliṅgo 'tiduḥ sahaḥ /	kASaH CardiH ca nicayAt nazwa liFgaH ati duH sahaH /
   utkṛṣṭenilapittābhyā kaṭurvā madhuraḥ kaphaḥ // GarP_1,162.13 //	utkRzwenila pittAByA kawuH vA maDuraH kaPaH // GarP_1,162.13 //
   dūṣayitvā vasādīṃśca raukṣyādraktavimokṣaṇam /	dUzayitvA vasA AdIn= ca rOkzyAt rakta vimokzaNam /
   srotasāṃ saṃkṣayaṃ kuryādanurudhya ca pūrvavat // GarP_1,162.14 //	srotasAm saMkzayam kuryAt anuruDya ca pUrvavat // GarP_1,162.14 //
   pāṇḍurogekṣayejāte nābhipādāsyamehanam /	pANxu roga IkzayA ijAte nABi pAda Asya mehanam /
   purīṣaṃ kṛmivanmuñcedbhinnaṃ sāstraṃ kaphānvitam // GarP_1,162.15 //	purIzam kRmi vat muQcet Binnam sa astram kaPa anvitam // GarP_1,162.15 //
   yaḥ pittarogī seveta pittalaṃ tasya kāmalam /	yaH pitta rogI seveta pittalam tasya kAmalam /
   koṣṭhaśā khodgataṃ pittaṃ dagdhvāsṛṅmāṃsamāharet // GarP_1,162.16 //	kozWaSA Ka udgatam pittam dagDvA asRk mAMsam Aharet // GarP_1,162.16 //
   hāridramūtranetratvaṃ mukhaṃ raktaṃ śakṛttathā /	hAridra mUtra netra tvam muKam raktam SakRt taTA /
   dāhī vipākatṛṣṇāvān bhekābho durbalendriyaḥ // GarP_1,162.17 //	dAhI vipAka tRzNAvAn Beka ABaH durbala indriyaH // GarP_1,162.17 //
   bhavetpittānugaḥ śothaḥ pāṇḍurogāvṛtasya ca /	Bavet pitta anugaH SoTaH pANxu roga AvRtasya ca /
   upekṣayā ca śothādyāḥ sakṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ // GarP_1,162.18 //	upekzayA ca SoTa AdyAH sa kRcCrAH kumBakAmalAH // GarP_1,162.18 //

   tandrā vā cānalabhraṃśastaṃ vadanti halīmakam /	tandrA vA ca anala BraMSaH tam vadanti halImakam /

   sarvahetuviśaṣaistu rūpabhedānnavātmakam /	sarva hetu viSazEH tu rUpa BedAt nava Atmakam /

   sāmānyahetuḥ śothānāṃ doṣajāto viśeṣataḥ /	sAmAnya hetuH SoTAnAm doza jAtaH viSezataH /

   atimātraṃ yadāsevedgurumatyantaśītalam /	atimAtram yat Asevet gurum atyanta SItalam /

   rodho vegasya vallūramajīrṇaśramamaithunam /	roDaH vegasya vallUram ajIrNa Srama mETunam /

   śvāsakāsātisārārśojaṭharapradarajvarāḥ /	SvAsa kAsa atisAra arSaH jaWara pradara jvarAH /

   ūrdhvaśothamadho bastau madhye kurvanti madhyagāḥ /	UrDva SoTam aDas bastO maDye kurvanti maDya gAH /
   sarvāṅgagaḥ sarvagataḥ pratyapratyageti tadāśrayaḥ // GarP_1,162.29 //	sarva aFga gaH sarva gataH pratyapratyageti tad ASrayaH // GarP_1,162.29 //
   tatpūrvarūpaṃ kṣavathuḥ śirāyāmaṅgagauravam /	tad pUrvarUpam kzavaTuH SirAyAm aFga gOravam /

   śaṅkhabastyantraśophartimedobhedāḥ prasuptitā /	SaFKa basti antra SoPa rti medaH BedAH prasuptitA /

   satṛṭdāhajvarasvedo bhramaklodamadabhramāḥ /	sa tRz dAha jvara svedaH Brama kloda mada BramAH /

   kaṇḍūmānpāṇḍuromā tvakkaṭhinaḥ śītalo guruḥ /	kaNxUmAn pANxu romA tvac kaWinaH SItalaH guruH /

   rasaiḥ śuṣkaiśca saṃsparśācchvayathuḥ syādvisarpavān /	rasEH SuzkEH ca saMsparSAt SvayaTuH syAt visarpavAn /

   mṛduścalo 'valambī ca śīghro dāharujākaraḥ /	mRduH calaH avalambI ca SIGraH dAha rujA akaraH /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  163	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 163
   dhanvantīraruvāca /	DanvantIraruvAca /

   yaṃyaṃ deśaṃ visarpaśca visarpati bhavetsasaḥ // GarP_1,163.9 //	yaMyam deSam visarpaH ca visarpati Bavet sasaH // GarP_1,163.9 //
   śāntāṅgārāsito nīlo rakto vāsu ca cīyate /	SAnta aFgAra asitaH nIlaH raktaH vAsu ca cIyate /

   marmānusārī vīsarpaḥ syādvāto 'tibalastataḥ /	marma anusArI vIsarpaH syAt vAtaH atibalaH tatas /

   hikkāñca sa gato 'vasthāmīdṛśīṃ labhate naraḥ /	hikkAQca sa gataH avasTAm IdRSIm laBate naraH /

   ceṣṭamānastataḥ kliṣṭo manodehapramohavān /	cezwamAnaH tatas klizwaH manaH deha pramohavAn /

   kaphena ruddhaḥ pavano bhittvātaṃ bahudhā kapham /	kaPena rudDaH pavanaH BittvA atam bahuDA kaPam /

   snidhno 'sito mecakābho malinaḥ śothavānguruḥ /	sniDnaH asitaH mecaka ABaH malinaH SoTavAn guruH /

   pakvavacchīrṇamāṃsaśca spaṣṭasnāyuśirāgaṇaḥ /	pakva vat SIrNa mAMsaH ca spazwa snAyu SirA gaNaH /

   bāhyahetoḥ kṣatātkruddhvaḥ saraktaṃ pittamīrayan /	bAhya hetoH kzatAt krudDvaH sa raktam pittam Irayan /

   asādhyāḥ kṛtasarvotthāḥ sarve cākrāntamarmaṇaḥ /	asADyAH kRta sarva utTAH sarve ca AkrAnta marmaNaH /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  164	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 164
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   pāpmabhiḥ karmabhiḥ sadyaḥ prāktanaiḥ preritāmalāḥ /	pApmaBiH karmaBiH sadyas prAktanEH prerita amalAH /

   dūṣayanti ca saṃśoṣya niścarantastato bahiḥ /	dUzayanti ca saMSozya niScarantaH tatas bahis /

   prapadya dhātūnbāhyāntaḥ sarvānsaṃkledya cāvahet // GarP_1,164.4 //	prapadya DAtUn bAhya antar sarvAn saMkledya ca avahet // GarP_1,164.4 //
   sasvedakledasaṅkocānkṛmīn sūkṣmāṃścadāruṇān /	sa sveda kleda saFkocAn kRmIn sUkzmAn= ca dAruNAn /

   bhasmācchāditavatkuryādbāhyaṃ kuṣṭhamudāhṛtam /	Basma AcCAdita vat kuryAt bAhyam kuzWam udAhRtam /
   kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthagdvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // GarP_1,164.6 //	kuzWAni saptaDA dozEH pRTak dvandvEH samAgatEH // GarP_1,164.6 //
   sarveṣvapi tridoṣeṣu vyapadeśo 'dhikastataḥ /	sarvezu api tridozezu vyapadeSaH aDikaH tatas /
   vātena kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ pittenaudumbaraṃ kaphāt // GarP_1,164.7 //	vAtena kuzWam kApAlam pittena Odumbaram kaPAt // GarP_1,164.7 //
   maṇḍalākhyaṃ vicarco ca ṛṣyākhyaṃ vātapittajam /	maNxala AKyam vicarcaH ca Rzi AKyam vAta pitta jam /
   carmaikakuṣṭhaṃ kiṭimaṃ sidhmālasavipādikāḥ // GarP_1,164.8 //	carma eka kuzWam kiwimam siDma alasa vipAdikAH // GarP_1,164.8 //
   vātaśleṣmodbhavāḥ śleṣmapittāddadrūśatāruṣī /	vAta Slezma udBavAH Slezma pittAt dadrU Sata AruzI /
   puṇḍarīkaṃ savisphoṭaṃ pāmā carmadalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,164.9 //	puNxarIkam sa visPowam pAmA carmadalam taTA // GarP_1,164.9 //
   sarvebhyaḥ kākaṇaṃ pūrvatrikaṃ dadru sakākaṇam /	sarveByaH kAkaNam pUrva trikam dadru sa kAkaNam /
   puṇḍarīkaryajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu // GarP_1,164.10 //	puNxarIkaryajihve ca mahAkuzWAni sapta tu // GarP_1,164.10 //
   atiślakṣṇakharasparśasvedāsvedavivarṇatāḥ /	ati SlakzNa Kara sparSa sveda Asveda vivarNatAH /
   dāhaḥ kaṇḍūstvaci svāpastodaḥ koconnatistamaḥ // GarP_1,164.11 //	dAhaH kaNxUH tvaci svApaH todaH koca unnatiH tamaH // GarP_1,164.11 //
   vraṇānāmadhikaṃ śūlaṃ śīghrotpattiścirasthitiḥ /	vraNAnAm aDikam SUlam SIGra utpattiH cira sTitiH /
   rūḍhānāmapi rūkṣatvaṃ nimitte 'lpe 'tikopanam // GarP_1,164.12 //	rUXAnAm api rUkza tvam nimitte alpe ati kopanam // GarP_1,164.12 //

   kṛṣṇāruṇakapālābhaṃ yadrūkṣaṃ paruṣaṃ tanu // GarP_1,164.13 //	kRzNa aruNa kapAla ABam yat rUkzam paruzam tanu // GarP_1,164.13 //
   vistṛtākṛtiparyastandūṣitairlomabhiścitam /	vistRta AkRti paryastandUzitEH lomaBiH citam /

   asaṃcchannamadaraṇaṃ kṛmivatsyādudumbaram /	asaMcCannam adaraNam kRmi vat syAt udumbaram /
   sthiraṃ satyānaṃ guru snigdhaṃ śvetaraktaṃ malānvitam // GarP_1,164.16 //	sTiram satyAnam guru snigDam Svetaraktam mala anvitam // GarP_1,164.16 //
   anyonyasaktapucchūnabahukaṇḍūsnutikṛmi /	anyonya sakta pucCUna bahu kaNxU snuti kRmi /

   sakaṇḍūpiṭikā śyāvā sakledā ca vicarcikā /	sa kaNxU piwikA SyAvA sa kledA ca vicarcikA /

   asvedañcamatsyaśalkasannibhaṃ kiṭimaṃ punaḥ /	asvedaQca matsya Salka sanniBam kiwimam punar /

   prāyeṇa cordhvakārśyañca kuṇḍaiḥ kaṇḍūparaiścitam /	prAyeNa ca UrDvakArSyaQca kuNxEH kaNxU parEH citam /

   doṣabhedāya vihitairādiśelliṅgakarmabhiḥ /	doza BedAya vihitEH AdiSet liFga karmaBiH /

   kuṣṭhoktaṃ yacca yaccāsthimajjāśukrasamāśrayam /	kuzWa uktam yat ca yat ca asTi majjA Sukra samASrayam /

   tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇyarūkṣātā // GarP_1,164.32 //	tatra tvaci sTite kazWe kAye vEvarNya rUkzAtA // GarP_1,164.32 //
   svedatāpaśvayathavaḥ śoṇite piśite punaḥ /	sveda tApa SvayaTavaH SoNite piSite punar /

   kṣate ca krimibhiḥ śukre svadārāpatyabādhanam /	kzate ca krimiBiH Sukre sva dAra apatya bADanam /
   yathāpūrvāṇi sarvāṇi svaliṅgāni mṛgādiṣu // GarP_1,164.35 //	yaTApUrvANi sarvANi sva liFgAni mRga Adizu // GarP_1,164.35 //

   vātādrūkṣāruṇaṃ pittāttāmraṃ kamalapatravat /	vAtAt rUkza aruNam pittAt tAmram kamala patra vat /
   sadāhaṃ romavidhvaṃsi kaphācchvetaṃ ghana guru // GarP_1,164.37 //	sa dAham roma viDvaMsi kaPAt Svetam Gana guru // GarP_1,164.37 //
   sakaṇḍūraṃ kramādraktamāṃsamedaḥ su cādiśet /	sa kaNxUram kramAt rakta mAMsa medaH su ca AdiSet /
   varṇenaivedṛgubhayaṃ kṛcchraṃ taccottarottaram // GarP_1,164.38 //	varNena eva IdRS uBayam kRcCram tat ca uttarottaram // GarP_1,164.38 //
   aśuklaromabahulamasaṃśliṣṭaṃ mitho navam /	aSukla roma bahulam asaMSlizwam miTas navam /

   guhyapāṇitalauṣṭheṣu jātamapyacirantaram /	guhya pANi tala ozWezu jAtam api acirantaram /

   sparśaikāhārasaṃgādisevanātprāyaśo gadāḥ /	sparSa eka AhAra saMga Adi sevanAt prAyaSas gadAH /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  165	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 165
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   bahirmalakaphāsṛgviṭjanmabhedāccaturvidhāḥ // GarP_1,165.1 //	bahis mala kaPa asRj viz janma BedAt caturviDAH // GarP_1,165.1 //

   bahupādāśca sūkṣmāśca yūkā likṣāśca nāmataḥ /	bahu pAdAH ca sUkzmAH ca yUkAH likzAH ca nAmataH /

   kuṣṭhaikahetavo 'ntarjāḥ śleṣmajā bāhyasambhavāḥ /	kuzWa eka hetavaH antar jAH Slezma jAH bAhya samBavAH /

   kaphādāmāśaye jātā vṛddhāḥ sarpanti sarvataḥ /	kaPAt AmASaye jAtAH vRdDAH sarpanti sarvatas /
   pṛthubradhnanibhāḥ kecitkecidgaṇḍūpadopamāḥ // GarP_1,165.5 //	pRTu braDna niBAH kecid kecid gaNxUpada upamAH // GarP_1,165.5 //

   antrādā udarāveṣṭā hṛdayādā mahāgudāḥ /	antrAdAH udarAvezwAH hRdayAdAH mahA gudAH /
   cyuravo darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāste ca kurvate // GarP_1,165.7 //	cyuravaH darBa kusumAH suganDAH te ca kurvate // GarP_1,165.7 //
   hṛllāsamāsyaśravaṇamavipākamarocakam /	hRllAsam Asya SravaNam avipAkam arocakam /
   mūrchācchardijvarānāhakārśyakṣavathupīnasān // GarP_1,165.8 //	mUrCA a= Cardi jvara AnAha kArSya kzavaTu pInasAn // GarP_1,165.8 //
   raktavāhiśirāsthānaraktajā jantavo 'ṇavaḥ /	rakta vAhi SirA sTAna rakta jAH jantavaH aNavaH /
   apādā vṛttatāmrāśca saukṣmyātkecidadarśanāḥ // GarP_1,165.9 //	apAdAH vRtta tAmrAH ca sOkzmyAt kecid adarSanAH // GarP_1,165.9 //
   keśādā romavidhvaṃsā romadvīpā udumbarāḥ /	keSAdAH roma viDvaMsAH romadvIpAH udumbarAH /
   ṣaṭte kuṣṭhaikakarmāṇaḥ sahasaurasamātaraḥ // GarP_1,165.10 //	zawte kuzWa eka karmANaH saha sA Orasa mAtaraH // GarP_1,165.10 //
   pakvāśaye purīṣotthā jāyante 'thovisarpiṇaḥ /	pakvASaye purIza utTAH jAyante aTa uvisarpiNaH /
   vṛddhāste syurbhaveyuśca te yadāmāśayonmukhāḥ // GarP_1,165.11 //	vRdDAH te syuH BaveyuH ca te yat A AmASaya unmuKAH // GarP_1,165.11 //
   tadāsyodgāraniḥ śvāmaviḍgandhānuvidhāyinaḥ /	tadA asya udgAra niH SvAma viz ganDa anuviDAyinaH /
   pṛthuvṛttatanusthūlāḥ śyāvapītasitāsitāḥ // GarP_1,165.12 //	pRTu vRtta tanu sTUlAH SyAva pIta sita asitAH // GarP_1,165.12 //
   te pañcanāmnā krimayaḥ kakerukamakerukāḥ /	te paQca nAmnA krimayaH kakeruka makerukAH /
   sausurādāḥ saśūlākhyā lelihā janayanti hi // GarP_1,165.13 //	sOsurAdAH sa SUla AKyAH lelihAH janayanti hi // GarP_1,165.13 //
   vaṅbhedaśūlaviṣṭambhakārśyapāruṣyapāṇḍutāḥ /	vaFBeda SUla vizwamBa kArSya pAruzya pANxu tAH /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   kriminidānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	kriminidAnam nAma paQcazazWI aDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  166	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 166
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   vātavyādhinidānaṃ te vakṣye suśruta tacchṛṇu /	vAta vyADi nidAnam te vakzye suSruta tat SRNu /
   sarvathānarthakathane vighna eva ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,166.1 //	sarvaTA anarTa kaTane viGnaH eva ca kAraNam // GarP_1,166.1 //
   adṛṣṭaduṣṭapavanaśarīramaviśeṣataḥ /	adRzwa duzwa pavana SarIram aviSezatas /
   sa viśvakarmā viśvātmā viśvarūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,166.2 //	sa viSvakarmA viSvAtmA viSva rUpaH prajApatiH // GarP_1,166.2 //
   sraṣṭā dhātā vibhurviṣṇuḥ saṃhartā mṛtyurantakaḥ /	srazwA DAtA viBuH vizNuH saMhartA mRtyuH antakaH /
   tadvaduktaṃ ca yatnena yatitavyamataḥ sadā // GarP_1,166.3 //	tadvat uktam ca yatnena yatitavyam atas sadA // GarP_1,166.3 //
   tasyokte doṣavijñāne karma prākṛtavaikṛtam /	tasya ukte doza vijQAne karma prAkRta vEkRtam /
   samāsavyāsato doṣabhedānāmavadhārya ca // GarP_1,166.4 //	samAsa vyAsataH doza BedAnAm avaDArya ca // GarP_1,166.4 //
   pratyekaṃ pañcadhā vīro vyāpāraśceha vaikṛtaḥ /	pratyekam paQcaDA vIraH vyApAraH ca iha vEkRtaH /
   tasyocyate vibhāgena sanidānaṃ salakṣaṇam // GarP_1,166.5 //	tasya ucyate viBAgena sa nidAnam sa lakzaNam // GarP_1,166.5 //
   dhātukṣayakarairvāyuḥ kruddho nātiniṣevyate /	DAtu kzaya karEH vAyuH krudDaH na ati nizevyate /
   catuḥ snoto 'vakāśeṣu bhūyastānyeva pūrayet // GarP_1,166.6 //	catuH snotaH avakASezu BUyas tAni eva pUrayet // GarP_1,166.6 //
   tebhyastu doṣapūrṇebhyaḥ pracchādya vivaraṃ tataḥ /	teByaH tu doza pUrNeByaH pracCAdya vivaram tatas /
   tava vāyuḥ sakṛtkruddhaḥ śūlānāhāntrakūjanam // GarP_1,166.7 //	tava vAyuH sakRt krudDaH SUla AnAha antra kUjanam // GarP_1,166.7 //
   malarodhaṃ svarabhraṃśaṃ dṛṣṭipṛṣṭhakaṭigraham /	mala roDam svara BraMSam dRzwi pRzWa kawi graham /
   karotyeva punaḥ kāye kṛcchrānanyānupadravān // GarP_1,166.8 //	karoti eva punar kAye kRcCrAn anyAn upadravAn // GarP_1,166.8 //
   āmāśayotthavamathuśvāsakāsaviṣūcikāḥ /	AmASaya utTa vamaTu SvAsa kAsa vizUcikAH /
   kaṇḍūparodhagharmādivyādhīnūrdhvañca nābhitaḥ // GarP_1,166.9 //	kaNxU uparoDa Garma Adi vyADIn UrDvaQca nABitaH // GarP_1,166.9 //
   śrotrādīndriyabādhāṃ ca tvaci sphoṭanarūkṣatām /	Srotra Adi indriya bADAm ca tvaci sPowana rUkza tAm /
   cakretīvrarujāśvāsagarāmayavivarṇatāḥ // GarP_1,166.10 //	cakretIvra rujA SvAsa gara Amaya vivarNa tAH // GarP_1,166.10 //
   antrasyāntañca viṣṭambhamaruciṃ kṛśatāṃ bhramam /	antrasya antaQca vizwamBam arucim kRSa tAm Bramam /
   māṃsamedogatagranthiṃ carmādāvupakarkaśam // GarP_1,166.11 //	mAMsa medaH gata granTim carma AdO= upakarkaSam // GarP_1,166.11 //
   gurvaṅgantudyate 'tyarthaṃ daṇḍamuṣṭihataṃ yathā /	guru aFgantudyate atyarTam daNxa muzwi hatam yaTA /
   asthisthaḥ sakthisandhyasthiśūlaṃ tīvrañca lakṣayet // GarP_1,166.12 //	asTi sTaH sakTi sanDi asTi SUlam tIvraQca lakzayet // GarP_1,166.12 //
   majjastho 'sthiṣu cāsthairyamasvapnaṃ yattadā rujām /	majja sTaH asTizu ca asTEryam asvapnam yat tadA rujAm /
   śukrasya śīghramutsaṅgasargānvikṛtimeva vā // GarP_1,166.13 //	Sukrasya SIGram utsaFga sargAn vikRtim eva vA // GarP_1,166.13 //
   tattadgarbhasthaśukrasthaḥ śirasyādhmānariktātā /	tad tad garBa sTa Sukra sTaH Sirasi ADmAna riktAtA /
   tatra sthānasthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathukṛcchratām // GarP_1,166.14 //	tatra sTAna sTitaH kuryAt krudDaH SvayaTu kRcCra tAm // GarP_1,166.14 //
   jalapūrṇadṛtisparśaṃ śoṣaṃ sandhigato 'nilaḥ /	jala pUrNa dRti sparSam Sozam sanDi gataH anilaH /
   sarvāṅgasaṃśrayastodabhedasphuraṇabhañjanam // GarP_1,166.15 //	sarva aFga saMSrayaH toda Beda sPuraNa BaQjanam // GarP_1,166.15 //
   stambhanākṣepaṇaṃ svapnaḥ sandhibhañjanakampanam /	stamBana AkzepaNam svapnaH sanDi BaQjana kampanam /
   yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddho 'bhyeti muhurmuhuḥ /	yadA tu DamanIH sarvAH krudDaH aByeti muhur muhur /
   tadāṅgamākṣipatyeṣa vyādhirākṣepaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,166.16 //	tadA aFgam Akzipati eza vyADiH AkzepaNaH smRtaH // GarP_1,166.16 //
   adhaḥ pratihato vāyurvrajedūrdhvaṃ yadā punaḥ /	aDas pratihataH vAyuH vrajet UrDvam yadA punar /
   tadāvaṣṭabhya hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet // GarP_1,166.17 //	tadA avazwaBya hRdayam SiraH SaFKO ca pIxayet // GarP_1,166.17 //
   sakṣipetparito gātraṃ hanuṃ vā cāsya nāmayat /	sakzipet paritas gAtram hanum vA ca asya nAmayat /
   kṛcchrāducchvasitaṃ cāpi nimīlannayanadvayam // GarP_1,166.18 //	kRcCrAt ucCvasitam ca api nimIlat nayana dvayam // GarP_1,166.18 //
   kapota iva kūjecca niḥ saṃgaḥ sopatantrakaḥ /	kapotaH iva kUjet ca niH saMgaH sa upatantrakaH /
   sa eva vāmanāsāyāṃ yuktastu marutā hṛdi // GarP_1,166.19 //	saH eva vAma nAsAyAm yuktaH tu marutA hRdi // GarP_1,166.19 //
   prāpnoti ca muhuḥ svāsthyaṃ muhurasvāsthyavānbhavet /	prApnoti ca muhur svAsTyam muhur asva asTyavAn Bavet /
   abhighātasamutthaśca duścikitsyatamo mataḥ // GarP_1,166.20 //	aBiGAta samutTaH ca duScikitsyatamaH mataH // GarP_1,166.20 //
   svedastambhaṃ tadā tasya vāyuśchinnatanuryadā /	sveda stamBam tadA tasya vAyuH Cinna tanuH yadA /
   vyāpnoti sakalaṃ dehaṃ yatra cāyāmyate punaḥ // GarP_1,166.21 //	vyApnoti sakalam deham yatra ca AyAmyate punar // GarP_1,166.21 //
   antardhāntugataścaiva vegastambhaṃ ca netrayoḥ /	antarDAntu gataH ca eva vega stamBam ca netrayoH /
   karoti jṛmbhāṃ sadanaṃ daśanānāṃ hatodyamam // GarP_1,166.22 //	karoti jRmBAm sadanam daSanAnAm hata udyamam // GarP_1,166.22 //
   pārśvayorvedanāṃ bāhyāṃ hanupṛṣṭhasirograham /	pArSvayoH vedanAm bAhyAm hanu pRzWa sirograham /
   dehasya bahirāyāmaṃ pṛṣṭhato hṛdaye śiraḥ // GarP_1,166.23 //	dehasya bahis AyAmam pRzWatas hRdaye SiraH // GarP_1,166.23 //
   uraścotkṣipyate tatra skandho vā nāmyate tadā /	uraH ca utkzipyate tatra skanDaH vA nAmyate tadA /
   danteṣvāsye ca vaivarṇyaṃ hyasvedastatra gātrataḥ // GarP_1,166.24 //	dantezu Asye ca vEvarNyam hi asvedaH tatra gAtrataH // GarP_1,166.24 //
   bāhyāyāmaṃ hanustambhaṃ bravate vātarogiṇam /	bAhyAyAmam hanu stamBam bravate vAta rogiNam /
   viṇmūtramasṛjaṃ prāpya sasamīrasamīraṇāḥ? // GarP_1,166.25 //	viz mUtram asRjam prApya sa samIra samIraNAH? // GarP_1,166.25 //
   āyacchanti tanordeṣāḥ sarvamāpādamastakam /	AyacCanti tanoH dezAH sarvam ApAda mastakam /
   tiṣṭhataḥ pāṇḍumātrasya vraṇāyāmaḥ suvardhitaḥ // GarP_1,166.26 //	tizWataH pANxu mAtrasya vraNAyAmaH su varDitaH // GarP_1,166.26 //
   gātravege bhavetsvāsthyaṃ sarveṣvākṣepaṇena tat /	gAtra vege Bavet svAsTyam sarvezu AkzepaNena tat /
   jihvāvilekhanāduṣṇabhakṣaṇādatimānataḥ // GarP_1,166.27 //	jihvA vileKanAt uzNa BakzaNAt ati mAnataH // GarP_1,166.27 //
   kupito hanumūlasthaḥ stambhayitvānilo hanum /	kupitaH hanu mUla sTaH stamBayitvA anilaH hanum /
   karoti vivṛtāsyatvamathavā saṃvṛtāsyatām // GarP_1,166.28 //	karoti vivRta Asya tvam aTavA saMvRta Asya tAm // GarP_1,166.28 //
   hanastambhaḥ sa tena syātkṛcchrāccarvaṇabhāṣaṇam /	hana stamBaH sa tena syAt kRcCrAt carvaNa BAzaNam /
   vāgvādinī śirāstambho jihvāṃ stambhayate 'nilaḥ // GarP_1,166.29 //	vAc vAdinI SirA stamBaH jihvAm stamBayate anilaH // GarP_1,166.29 //
   jihvāstambhaḥ sa tenānnapānavākyeṣvanīśatā /	jihvA stamBaH sa tena anna pAna vAkyezu anISa tA /
   śirasā bhāraharaṇādatihāsyaprabhāṣaṇāt // GarP_1,166.30 //	SirasA BAra haraNAt ati hAsya praBAzaNAt // GarP_1,166.30 //
   viṣamādupadhānācca kaṭhinānāṃ ca carvaṇāt /	vizamAt upaDAnAt ca kaWinAnAm ca carvaNAt /
   vāyurvivardhate taiśca vātūlairūrdhvamāsthitaḥ // GarP_1,166.31 //	vAyuH vivarDate tEH ca vAtUlEH UrDvam AsTitaH // GarP_1,166.31 //
   vakrīkaroti vaktraṃ ca hyuccairhasitamīkṣitam /	vakrIkaroti vaktram ca hi uccEs hasitam Ikzitam /
   tato 'sya kurute mṛdvīṃ vākśaktiṃ stabdhanetratām // GarP_1,166.32 //	tatas asya kurute mRdvIm vAc Saktim stabDa netra tAm // GarP_1,166.32 //
   dantacālaṃ svarabhraṃśaḥ śrutihānīkṣitagrahau /	danta cAlam svara BraMSaH Sruti hAni Ikzita grahO /
   gandhājñānaṃ smṛtidhvaṃsastrāsaḥ śvāsaśca jāyate // GarP_1,166.33 //	ganDa ajQAnam smRti DvaMsaH trAsaH SvAsaH ca jAyate // GarP_1,166.33 //
   niṣṭhīvaḥ pārśvatodaśca hyekasyākṣṇo nimīlanam /	nizWIvaH pArSva todaH ca hi ekasya akzNaH nimIlanam /
   jatrorūrdhvaṃ rujastīvrāḥ śarīrārdhadharo 'pi vā // GarP_1,166.34 //	jatroH UrDvam rujaH tIvrAH SarIra arDa DaraH api vA // GarP_1,166.34 //
   tamāhurarditaṃ kecidekāṅgamatha cāpare /	tam AhuH arditam kecid eka aFgam aTa ca apare /
   raktamāśritya ca śirāḥ kuryānmūrdhadharāḥ śirāḥ? // GarP_1,166.35 //	raktam ASritya ca SirAH kuryAt mUrDa DarAH SirAH? // GarP_1,166.35 //
   rūkṣaḥ savedanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ so 'sādhyaḥ syācchirograhaḥ /	rUkzaH sa vedanaH kRzNaH saH asADyaH syAt SiraH grahaH /
   tanuṃ gṛhītvā vāyuśca snāyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,166.36 //	tanum gRhItvA vAyuH ca snAyuH taTA eva ca // GarP_1,166.36 //
   pakṣamanyataraṃ hanti pakṣāghātaḥ sa ucyate /	pakzam anyataram hanti pakzAGAtaH saH ucyate /
   kṛtsnasya kāyasyārdhaṃ syādakarmaṇyamacetanam // GarP_1,166.37 //	kRtsnasya kAyasya arDam syAt akarmaNyam acetanam // GarP_1,166.37 //
   ekāṅgarogatāṃ kecidanye kakṣarujāṃ viduḥ /	eka aFga roga tAm kecid anye kakza rujAm viduH /
   sarvāṅgarodhaḥ stambhaśca sarvakāyāśrite 'nile // GarP_1,166.38 //	sarva aFga roDaH stamBaH ca sarva kAya ASrite anile // GarP_1,166.38 //
   śuddhavātakṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ kṛcchrasādhyatamo mataḥ /	SudDa vAta kRtaH pakzaH kRcCra sADyatamaH mataH /
   kṛcchraścānyena saṃsṛṣṭo vivṛddhaḥ kṣayahetukaḥ // GarP_1,166.39 //	kRcCraH ca anyena saMsRzwaH vivRdDaH kzaya hetukaH // GarP_1,166.39 //
   āmabaddhāyanaḥ kuryātsaṃstabhyāṅgaṃ kaphānvitaḥ /	Ama badDa ayanaH kuryAt saMstaBya aFgam kaPa anvitaH /
   asādhya eva sarvo hi bhaveddaṇḍāpatānakaḥ // GarP_1,166.40 //	asADyaH eva sarvaH hi Bavet daNxApatAnakaH // GarP_1,166.40 //
   aṃsamūlotthito vāyuḥ śirāḥ saṃkucya tatragaḥ /	aMsa mUla utTitaH vAyuH SirAH saMkucya tatragaH /
   bahiḥ prasyanditaharaṃ janayatyeva bāhukam // GarP_1,166.41 //	bahis prasyandita haram janayati eva bAhukam // GarP_1,166.41 //
   talaṃ pratyaṅgulīnāṃ yaḥ kaṇḍarā bāhupṛṣṭhataḥ /	talam pratyaFgulInAm yaH kaNxarA bAhu pRzWataH /
   bāhvoḥ karmakṣayakarī vipūcī veti socyate // GarP_1,166.42 //	bAhvoH karma kzaya karI vipUcI vA iti sA ucyate // GarP_1,166.42 //
   vāyuḥ kaṭyāśritaḥ sakthnaḥ kaṇḍarāmākṣaipedyadā /	vAyuH kawI ASritaH sakTnaH kaNxa rAm AkzEpet ya dA /
   tadā khañjo bhavejjantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnordvayorvadhāt // GarP_1,166.43 //	tadA KaQjaH Bavet jantuH paFguH sakTnoH dvayoH vaDAt // GarP_1,166.43 //
   kampate gamanārambhe khañjanniva ca gacchati /	kampate gamana AramBe KaQjan= iva ca gacCati /

   śītoṣṇadravasaṃsuṣkagurusnigdhaiśca sevitaiḥ /	SIta uzNa drava saMsuzka guru snigDEH ca sevitEH /
   jīrṇājīrṇe tathāyāsakṣobhasnigdhaprajāgaraiḥ // GarP_1,166.45 //	jIrNa ajIrNe taTA AyAsa kzoBa snigDa prajAgarEH // GarP_1,166.45 //
   śleṣmabhedaḥ samaye paramatyarthasaṃcitam /	Slezma BedaH samaye param atyarTa saMcitam /
   abhibhūyetaraṃ doṣaṃ śarīraṃ pratipadyate // GarP_1,166.46 //	aBiBUya itaram dozam SarIram pratipadyate // GarP_1,166.46 //
   sakthyasthīni prapūryāntaḥ śleṣmaṇā stambhitena tat /	sakTi asTIni prapUrya antar SlezmaNA stamBitena tat /
   tadāsthi snāti tenorostathā śītānilena tu // GarP_1,166.47 //	tadA asTi snAti tena UroH taTA SIta anilena tu // GarP_1,166.47 //
   śyāmāṅgamaṅgastaimityatandrāmūrchārucijvaraiḥ /	SyAma aFgam aFga stEmitya tandrA mUrCA aruci jvarEH /
   tamūrustambhamityāha bāhyavātamathāpare // GarP_1,166.48 //	tam UrustamBam iti Aha bAhya vAtam aTa apare // GarP_1,166.48 //
   vātaśoṇitasaṃśotho jānumadhye mahārujaḥ /	vAta SoNita saMSoTaH jAnu maDye mahA rujaH /
   jñeyaḥ kroṣṭukaśīrṣastu sthūlakroṣṭukaśīrṣavat // GarP_1,166.49 //	jQeyaH krozwukaSIrzaH tu sTUla krozwuka SIrza vat // GarP_1,166.49 //
   rukpādaviṣamanyaste śramādvā jāyate yadā /	ruj pAda vizama nyaste SramAt vA jAyate yadA /
   vātena gulphamākṣitya tamāhurvātakaṇṭakam // GarP_1,166.50 //	vAtena gulPam Akzitya tam AhuH vAtakaNwakam // GarP_1,166.50 //
   pārṣṇipratyaṅgulīnābhau kaṇṭhe vā mārutārdite /	pArzNi pratyaFgulI nABO kaNWe vA mAruta ardite /
   satikṣepaṃ nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate // GarP_1,166.51 //	sati kzepam nigRhNAti gRDrasIm tAm pracakzate // GarP_1,166.51 //
   hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetāṃ cāpi suptakau /	hRzyete caraNO yasya BavetAm ca api suptakO /
   pādaharṣaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ kaphamārutakopajaḥ // GarP_1,166.52 //	pAda harzaH sa vijQeyaH kaPa mAruta kopa jaH // GarP_1,166.52 //
   pādayoḥ kurute dāhaṃ pittāsṛksahito 'nilaḥ /	pAdayoH kurute dAham pitta asRj sahitaH anilaH /
   viśeṣataścaṅkramataḥ pādadāhaṃ tamādiśet // GarP_1,166.53 //	viSezataH caFkramataH pAda dAham tam AdiSet // GarP_1,166.53 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   vātavyādhinidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	vAtavyADinidAnam nAma zawUzazwyaDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  167	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 167
   dhanvantarīruvāca /	DanvantarIH uvAca /
   vātaraktanidānaṃ te vakṣye suśruta tacchṛṇu /	vAta rakta nidAnam te vakzye suSruta tat SRNu /
   viruddhādhyaśanakrodhadivāsvapnaprajāgaraiḥ // GarP_1,167.1 //	virudDa aDyaSana kroDa divAsvapna prajAgarEH // GarP_1,167.1 //
   prāyaśaḥ sukumārāṇāṃ mithyāhāravihāriṇām /	prAyaSas sukumArANAm miTyA AhAra vihAriNAm /
   sthūlānāṃ sukhināṃ cāpi kupyate vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.2 //	sTUlAnAm suKinAm ca api kupyate vAta SoNitam // GarP_1,167.2 //
   agnighātādaśuddheśca nṛṇāmasṛji dūṣite /	agni GAtAt aSudDeH ca nRNAm asRji dUzite /
   vātalaiḥ śītalairvāyurvṛddhaḥ kruddho vimārgagaḥ // GarP_1,167.3 //	vAtalEH SItalEH vAyuH vRdDaH krudDaH vimArga gaH // GarP_1,167.3 //
   tādṛśaivāsṛjā ruddhaḥ prāktadaiva pradūṣayet /	tAdRSA eva asRjA rudDaH prAc tadEva pradUzayet /
   tathā vāto gude pīḍāṃ balāsaṃ vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.4 //	taTA vAtaH gude pIxAm balAsam vAta SoNitam // GarP_1,167.4 //
   saṃstabhya janayetpūrvaṃ paścātsarvatra dhāvati /	saMstaBya janayet pUrvam paScAt sarvatra DAvati /
   viśeṣādvamanādyaiśca pralambastasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,167.5 //	viSezAt vamana AdyEH ca pralambaH tasya lakzaNam // GarP_1,167.5 //
   bhaviṣyataḥ kuṣṭhasamaṃ tathā sāmbudasaṃjñakam /	BavizyataH kuzWa samam taTA sa ambuda saMjQakam /
   jānujaṅghorukaṭyaṃsahastapādāṅgasandhiṣu // GarP_1,167.6 //	jAnu jaFGA Uru kawI aMsa hasta pAda aFga sanDizu // GarP_1,167.6 //
   kaṇḍūsphuraṇanistodabhedagauravasuptatāḥ /	kaNxU sPuraNa nistoda Beda gOrava supta tAH /
   bhūtvā bhūtvā praśāmyanti muhurāvirbhavanti ca // GarP_1,167.7 //	BUtvA BUtvA praSAmyanti muhur AvirBavanti ca // GarP_1,167.7 //
   pādayormūlamāsthāya kadāciddhastayorapi /	pAdayoH mUlam AsTAya kadAcid hastayoH api /
   ākhoriva vilaṃ kruddhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ dehaṃ bidhāvati // GarP_1,167.8 //	AKoH iva vilam krudDaH kRtsnam deham biDAvati // GarP_1,167.8 //
   tvaṅmāṃsāśrayamattānaṃ tatpūrvaṃ jāyate tataḥ /	tvac mAMsa ASraya mattAnam tat pUrvam jAyate tatas /
   kālāntareṇa gambhīraṃ sarvadhātūnabhidravet // GarP_1,167.9 //	kAla antareNa gamBIram sarva DAtUn aBidravet // GarP_1,167.9 //
   kaṭyādisaṃyatasthāne tvaktāmraśyāvalohitāḥ /	kawi Adi saMyata sTAne tvac tAmra SyAva lohitAH /
   śvayathurgrathitaḥ pākaḥ sa vāyuścāsthimajjasu // GarP_1,167.10 //	SvayaTuH graTitaH pAkaH sa vAyuH ca asTi majjasu // GarP_1,167.10 //
   chindanniva caratyantaścakīkurvaṃśca vegavān /	Cindan= iva carati antar cakIkurvan= ca vegavAn /
   karoti khañjaṃ paṅguṃ vā śarīraṃ sarvataścaran // GarP_1,167.11 //	karoti KaQjam paFgum vA SarIram sarvatas caran // GarP_1,167.11 //
   vātādhike 'dhikaṃ tatra śūlasphuraṇabhañjanam /	vAta aDike aDikam tatra SUla sPuraNa BaQjanam /
   śothasya raukṣyaṃ kṛṣṇatvaṃ śyāvatāvṛddhihānayaḥ // GarP_1,167.12 //	SoTasya rOkzyam kRzNa tvam SyAva tA vRdDi hAnayaH // GarP_1,167.12 //
   dhamanyaṅgulisandhīnāṃ saṃkocoṅgagraho tiruk /	Damani aFguli sanDInAm saMkoca uFga grahaH tiruj /
   śītadveṣānupaśayau stambhavepathusuptayaḥ // GarP_1,167.13 //	SIta dveza anupaSayO stamBa vepaTu suptayaH // GarP_1,167.13 //
   rakte śotho 'tiruktodastāmrāścimicimāyate /	rakte SoTaH ati rukta udaH tAmrAH cimicimAyate /
   snigdharūkṣaiḥ samaṃ naiti kaṇḍukledasamanvitaḥ // GarP_1,167.14 //	snigDa rUkzEH samam na eti kaNxu kleda samanvitaH // GarP_1,167.14 //
   pitte vidāhaḥ saṃmohaḥ svādo mūrchā madastṛṣā /	pitte vidAhaH saMmohaH svAdaH mUrCA madaH tRzA /
   sparśāsahatvaṃ rugrāvaḥ śoṣaḥ pāko bhṛśoṣmatā // GarP_1,167.15 //	sparSa asaha tvam ruj rAvaH SozaH pAkaH BRSa Uzma tA // GarP_1,167.15 //
   kaphe staimityagurutā suptisnigdhatvaśītatā /	kaPe stEmitya guru tA supti snigDa tva SIta tA /
   kaṇḍūrmandā ca rugdbandvaṃ sarvaliṅgañca saṃkarāt // GarP_1,167.16 //	kaNxUH mandA ca ruj dbandvam sarva liFgaQca saMkarAt // GarP_1,167.16 //
   ekadoṣañca saṃsādhyaṃ yāpyañcaiva dvidoṣajam /	eka dozaQca saMsADyam yApyaQca eva dvi doza jam /
   tridoṣajantyajedāśu raktapittaṃ sudāruṇam // GarP_1,167.17 //	tridoza janti ajet ASu raktapittam su dAruNam // GarP_1,167.17 //
   raktamaṅge nihantyāśu śākhāsandhiṣu mārutaḥ /	raktam aFge nihanti ASu SAKA sanDizu mArutaH /
   niveśyānyonyamāvārya vedanābhirharatyasūn // GarP_1,167.18 //	niveSya anyonyam AvArya vedanABiH harati asUn // GarP_1,167.18 //
   vāyau pañcātmake prāṇe raukṣyāccāpalyalaṅghanaiḥ /	vAyO paQca Atmake prANe rOkzyAt cApalya laFGanEH /
   atyāhārābhighātācca vegodīraṇacāraṇaiḥ // GarP_1,167.19 //	ati AhAra aBiGAtAt ca vega udIraNa cAraNEH // GarP_1,167.19 //
   kupitaścakṣurādīnāmupaghātaṃ prakalpayet /	kupitaH cakzuH AdInAm upaGAtam prakalpayet /
   pīnaso dāhatṛṭkāsaśvāsādiścaiva jāyate // GarP_1,167.20 //	pInasaH dAha tRz kAsa SvAsa AdiH ca eva jAyate // GarP_1,167.20 //
   kaṇṭharodhomalabhraṃśacchardyarocakapīnasān /	kaNWa roDaH mala BraMSa= Cardi arocaka pInasAn /

   vyāno 'tigamanasnānakrīḍāviṣayacoṣṭitaiḥ /	vyAnaH ati gamana snAna krIxA vizaya cozwitEH /

   vāyorāvaraṇaṃ vāto bahubhedaṃ pracakṣate /	vAyoH AvaraNam vAtaH bahu Bedam pracakzate /

   āḍhyavāta iva jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchro medasāvataḥ /	AXyavAtaH iva jQeyaH sa kRcCraH medasAvataH /

   evaṃ vijñāya rogādīṃścikitsāmatha vai caret /	evam vijQAya roga AdIn= cikitsAm aTa vE caret /

   savyoṣā triphalā vāpi sarvarogapramardinī /	sa vyozA triPalA vA api sarva roga pramardinI /

   punarnavā ca bṛhatī nirguṇḍī nimbapatrakam // GarP_1,167.59 //	punarnavA ca bRhatI nirguNxI nimba patrakam // GarP_1,167.59 //
   bhṛṅgarājaścāmalakaṃ vāsakastadrasena vā /	BRFgarAjaH ca Amalakam vAsakaH tad rasena vA /

   pūrvoktaśca yathālābhayuktaiścūrṇañca modakaḥ /	pUrva uktaH ca yaTA lABa yuktEH cUrNaQca modakaH /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  168	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 168
   nidānaṃ samāptam /	nidAnam samAptam /
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   śṛṇu suśrutaṃ saṃkṣepātprāṇināṃ jīvahetave // GarP_1,168.1 //	SRNu suSrutam saMkzepAt prANinAm jIva hetave // GarP_1,168.1 //
   kaṣāyakaṭutiktāmlarūkṣāhārādibhojanāt /	kazAya kawu tikta amla rUkza AhAra Adi BojanAt /

   uccairbhāṣātibhārācca karmayogātikarṣaṇāt /	uccEs BAzA ati BArAt ca karma yoga atikarzaNAt /
   vāyuḥ kupyati parjanye jīrṇānne dinasaṃkṣaye // GarP_1,168.3 //	vAyuH kupyati parjanye jIrNa anne dina saMkzaye // GarP_1,168.3 //
   uṣṇāmla lavaṇakṣārakaṭukājīrṇabhojanāt /	uzNa amla lavaNa kzAra kawuka ajIrNa BojanAt /
   tīkṣṇātapāgnisantāpamadyakrodhaniṣevaṇāt // GarP_1,168.4 //	tIkzNa Atapa agni santApa madya kroDa nizevaNAt // GarP_1,168.4 //
   vidāhakāle bhuktasya madhyāhne jaladātyaye /	vidAha kAle Buktasya maDyAhne jalada atyaye /
   grīṣmakāler'ddharātre 'pi pittaṃ kupyati dehinaḥ // GarP_1,168.5 //	grIzma kAler adDa rAtre api pittam kupyati dehinaH // GarP_1,168.5 //
   svādvamlalavaṇasnigdhaguruśītātibhojanāt /	svAdu amla lavaNa snigDa guru SIta atiBojanAt /

   avyāyāma divāsvapnaśayyāsanasukhādibhiḥ /	avyAyAma divAsvapna SayyA Asana suKa AdiBiH /
   kaphapradoṣo bhukte ca vasante ca prakupyati // GarP_1,168.7 //	kaPa pradozaH Bukte ca vasante ca prakupyati // GarP_1,168.7 //
   dehapāruṣyasaṃkocatodaviṣṭambhakādayaḥ /	deha pAruzya saMkoca toda vizwamBaka AdayaH /
   tathā ca suptā romaharṣastambhanaśoṣaṇam // GarP_1,168.8 //	taTA ca suptA roma harza stamBana SozaNam // GarP_1,168.8 //
   śyāmatvamaṅgaviśleṣabalamāyāsavardhanam /	SyAma tvam aFga viSleza balam AyAsa varDanam /
   vāyorliṅgāni tairyuktaṃ rogaṃ vātātmakaṃ vadet // GarP_1,168.9 //	vAyoH liFgAni tEH yuktam rogam vAta Atmakam vadet // GarP_1,168.9 //
   dāhoṣmapādasaṃkledakoparāgapariśramāḥ /	dAha Uzma pAda saMkledakopa rAga pariSramAH /
   kaṭvamlaśavavaigandhyasvedamūrchātitṛṭbhramāḥ // GarP_1,168.10 //	kawu amla Sava vEganDya sveda mUrCA ati tRz BramAH // GarP_1,168.10 //
   hāridraṃ haritatvañca pittaliṅgānvitairnaraḥ /	hAridram harita tvaQca pitta liFga anvitEH naraH /
   dehe snigdhatvamādhuryacirakāritvabandhanam // GarP_1,168.11 //	dehe snigDa tva mADurya cira kAri tva banDanam // GarP_1,168.11 //
   staimityatṛptisaṅghātaśothaśatilagauravam /	stEmitya tRpti saFGAta SoTa Satila gOravam /
   kaṇḍūnidrābhiyogaśca lakṣaṇaṃ kaphasambhavam // GarP_1,168.12 //	kaNxU nidrA aBiyogaH ca lakzaNam kaPa samBavam // GarP_1,168.12 //
   hetulakṣaṇasaṃsargādvidyādvyādhiṃ dvidoṣajam /	hetu lakzaNa saMsargAt vidyAt vyADim dvi doza jam /
   sarvahetusamutpannaṃ triliṅgaṃ sānnipātikam // GarP_1,168.13 //	sarva hetu samutpannam tri liFgam sAnnipAtikam // GarP_1,168.13 //
   doṣadhātumalādhāro dehināṃ deha ucyate /	doza DAtu mala ADAraH dehinAm dehaH ucyate /
   teṣāṃ samatvamārogyaṃ kṣayavṛddherviparyayaḥ // GarP_1,168.14 //	tezAm sama tvam Arogyam kzaya vRdDeH viparyayaH // GarP_1,168.14 //
   vasāsṛṅmāṃsamedo 'sthimajjāśukrāṇi dhātavaḥ /	vasA asRk mAMsa medaH asTi majjA SukrANi DAtavaH /
   vātapittakaphā doṣā viṇmūtrādyā malāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,168.15 //	vAta pitta kaPAH dozAH viz mUtra AdyAH malAH smRtAH // GarP_1,168.15 //
   vāyuḥ śīto laghuḥ sūkṣmaḥ svaranāśīsthiro balī /	vAyuH SItaH laGuH sUkzmaH svara nASI sTiraH balI /
   pittamamlakaṭūṣṇañcāpaṅktī rogakāraṇam // GarP_1,168.16 //	pittam amla kawu uzNaQcA paFktiH roga kAraNam // GarP_1,168.16 //
   madhuro lavaṇaḥ snigdho guruḥ śleṣamātipicchilaḥ /	maDuraH lavaNaH snigDaH guruH Sleza mAti picCilaH /
   gudaśroṇyāśrayo vāyuḥ pittaṃ pakvāśayasthitam // GarP_1,168.17 //	guda SroNi ASrayaH vAyuH pittam pakvASaya sTitam // GarP_1,168.17 //
   kaphasyāmāśayasthānaṃ kaṇṭho vā mūrdhasandhayaḥ /	kaPasya AmASaya sTAnam kaNWaH vA mUrDa sanDayaH /
   kaṭutiktakaṣāyāśca kopayanti samīraṇam // GarP_1,168.18 //	kawu tikta kazAyAH ca kopayanti samIraNam // GarP_1,168.18 //
   kaṭvamlalavaṇāḥ pittaṃ svādūṣṇalavaṇāḥ kapham /	kawu amla lavaNAH pittam svAdu uzNa lavaNAH kaPam /
   eta eva viparyastāḥ śamāyaiṣāṃ prayojitāḥ /	ete eva viparyastAH SamAya ezAm prayojitAH /
   bhavanti rogiṇāṃ śāntyai svasthāne sukhahetavaḥ // GarP_1,168.19 //	Bavanti rogiNAm SAntyE sva sTAne suKa hetavaH // GarP_1,168.19 //
   cakṣuṣyo madhuro jñeyo rasadhātuvivahddhanaḥ /	cakzuzyaH maDuraH jQeyaH rasa DAtu vivaht DanaH /
   amlottaro manohṛdyaṃ tathā dīpanapācanam // GarP_1,168.20 //	amla uttaraH manaH hRdyam taTA dIpana pAcanam // GarP_1,168.20 //
   dīpanojvaratṛṣṇāghnastiktaḥ śodhanaśoṣaṇaḥ /	dIpanaH jvara tRzNA GnaH tiktaH SoDana SozaNaH /
   pittalo lekhana stambhī kaṣāyo grāhiśoṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,168.21 //	pittalaH leKana stamBI kazAyaH grAhi SozaNaH // GarP_1,168.21 //
   rasavīryavipākānāmāśrayaṃ dravyamuttamam /	rasa vIrya vipAkAnAm ASrayam dravyam uttamam /
   rasapākāntarasthāyi sarvadravyāśrayaṃ drutam // GarP_1,168.22 //	rasa pAka antara sTAyi sarva dravya ASrayam drutam // GarP_1,168.22 //
   śītoṣṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ vīryamatha vā śaktiriṣyate /	SIta uzNam lavaNam vIryam aTa vA SaktiH izyate /
   rasānāṃ dvividhaḥ pāko kaṭureva ca // GarP_1,168.23 //	rasAnAm dviviDaH pAkaH kawuH eva ca // GarP_1,168.23 //
   bhiṣagbheṣajarogārtaparicārakasampadaḥ /	Bizaj Bezaja roga Arta paricAraka sampadaH /
   cikitsāṅgānicatvāri viparītānyasiddhaye // GarP_1,168.24 //	cikitsA aFga AnicatvAri viparIta ani asidDaye // GarP_1,168.24 //
   deśakālavayovahnisāmyaprakṛtibheṣajam /	deSa kAla vayaH vahni sAmya prakRti Bezajam /
   dehasattvabalavyādhīnbuddhvā karma samācaret // GarP_1,168.25 //	deha sattva bala vyADIn budDvA karma samAcaret // GarP_1,168.25 //
   bahūdakanago 'nūpaḥ kaphamārutakopavān /	bahu udaka nagaH anUpaH kaPa mAruta kopavAn /
   jāṅgalo 'paraśākhī ca raktapittagadottaraḥ // GarP_1,168.25*1 //	jAFgalaH apara SAKI ca raktapitta gada uttaraH // GarP_1,168.25*1 //
   saṃsṛṣṭalakṣaṇopeto deśaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /	saMsRzwa lakzaNa upetaH deSaH sADAraNaH smRtaH /
   bāla ā ṣoḍaśānmadhyaḥ saptatervṛddha ucyate // GarP_1,168.26 //	bAlaH A zoxaSAt maDyaH saptateH vRdDaH ucyate // GarP_1,168.26 //
   kaphapittānilāḥ prāyo yathākramamudīritāḥ /	kaPa pitta anilAH prAyas yaTAkramam udIritAH /
   kṣārāgniśastrarahitā kṣīṇe pravayasi kriyāḥ // GarP_1,168.27 //	kzAra agni Sastra rahitA kzINe pravayasi kriyAH // GarP_1,168.27 //
   kṛśasya vṛṃhaṇaṃ kāryaṃsthūladehasya karṣaṇam /	kRSasya vRMhaNam kAryaMsTUla dehasya karzaNam /
   rakṣaṇaṃ madhyakāyasya dehabhedāstrayo matāḥ // GarP_1,168.28 //	rakzaNam maDya kAyasya deha BedAH trayaH matAH // GarP_1,168.28 //
   sthairyavyāyāmasantoṣairboddhavyaṃ yatnato balam /	sTErya vyAyAma santozEH bodDavyam yatnataH balam /
   avikārī mahotsāho mahāsāhasiko naraḥ // GarP_1,168.29 //	avikArI mahA utsAhaH mahA sAhasikaH naraH // GarP_1,168.29 //
   pānāhārādayo yasya viruddhāḥ prakṛterapi /	pAna AhAra AdayaH yasya virudDAH prakRteH api /
   śvasukhāyopakalpyante tatsāmyamiti kathyate // GarP_1,168.30 //	Sva suKAya upakalpyante tat sAmyam iti kaTyate // GarP_1,168.30 //
   garbhiṇyāḥ ślaiṣmikairbhakṣyaiḥ ślaiṣmiko jāyate naraḥ /	garBiNyAH SlEzmikEH BakzyEH SlEzmikaH jAyate naraH /
   vātalaiḥ pittalaistadvatsamadhāturhitāśanāt // GarP_1,168.31 //	vAtalEH pittalEH tadvat sama DAtuH hita aSanAt // GarP_1,168.31 //
   kṛśo rūkṣo 'lpakeśaśca calacitto naraḥ sthitaḥ /	kRSaH rUkzaH alpa keSaH ca cala cittaH naraH sTitaH /
   bahuvākyarataḥ svapnevātaprakṛtiko naraḥ // GarP_1,168.32 //	bahu vAkya rataH svapnA iva ata prakRtikaH naraH // GarP_1,168.32 //
   akālapalito gauraḥ prasvedī kopano budhaḥ /	akAla palitaH gOraH prasvedI kopanaH buDaH /
   svapne 'pi dīptimatprekṣī pittaprakṛtirucyate // GarP_1,168.33 //	svapne api dIptimat prekzI pitta prakRtiH ucyate // GarP_1,168.33 //
   sthiracittaḥ svaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ prasannaḥ snigdhamūrdhajaḥ /	sTira cittaH svaraH sUkzmaH prasannaH snigDa mUrDajaH /
   svapne jalaśilālokī śleṣma prakṛtiko naraḥ // GarP_1,168.34 //	svapne jalaSilA AlokI Slezma prakRtikaH naraH // GarP_1,168.34 //
   saṃmiśralakṣaṇairjñeyo dvitridoṣānvayo naraḥ /	saMmiSra lakzaNEH jQeyaH dvi tri doza anvayaH naraH /
   doṣasyetarasadbhāve 'pyadhikā prakṛtiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,168.35 //	dozasya itara sadBAve api aDikA prakRtiH smRtAH // GarP_1,168.35 //
   mandastīkṣṇo 'tha viṣamaḥ samaścaiti caturvidhāḥ /	mandaH tIkzNaH aTa vizamaH samaH ca eti caturviDAH /
   kaphapittānilādhikyāttatsāmyājjāṭharo 'nalaḥ // GarP_1,168.36 //	kaPa pitta anila ADikyAt tad sAmyAt jAWaraH analaH // GarP_1,168.36 //
   samasya pālanaṃ kāryaṃ viṣame vātanigrahaḥ /	samasya pAlanam kAryam vizame vAta nigrahaH /
   tīkṣṇe pittapratīkāro mande śleṣmaviśodhanam // GarP_1,168.37 //	tIkzNe pitta pratIkAraH mande Slezma viSoDanam // GarP_1,168.37 //
   prabhavaḥ sarvarogāṇāmajīrṇaṃ cāgnināśanam /	praBavaH sarva rogANAm ajIrNam ca agni nASanam /
   āmāmlarasaviṣṭambha lakṣaṇantaccaturvidham // GarP_1,168.38 //	Ama amla rasa vizwamBa lakzaNan tad caturviDam // GarP_1,168.38 //
   āmādviṣūcikā caiva hṛdālasyādayastathā /	AmAt vizUcikA ca eva hRd Alasya AdayaH taTA /
   vacālavaṇatoyena chardanaṃ tatra kārayet // GarP_1,168.39 //	vacA lavaNa toyena Cardanam tatra kArayet // GarP_1,168.39 //
   śukrābhāvo bhramo mūrchā tarṣo 'mlātsaṃpravartate /	Sukra aBAvaH BramaH mUrCA tarzaH amlAt saMpravartate /
   apakvaṃ tatra śītāmbupānaṃ vātaniṣevaṇam // GarP_1,168.40 //	apakvam tatra SIta ambu pAnam vAta nizevaNam // GarP_1,168.40 //
   gātrabhaṅgaṃ śirojāḍyaṃ bhaktadoṣādayo gadān /	gAtra BaFgam SiraH jAxyam Bakta doza AdayaH gadAn /
   tasminsvāpo divā kāryolaṅghanaṃ ca vivarjanam // GarP_1,168.41 //	tasmin svApaH divA kAryaH laFGanam ca vivarjanam // GarP_1,168.41 //
   śūlagulmau ca viṇmūtrasthānaviṣṭambhasūcakau /	SUla gulmO ca viz mUtra sTAna vizwamBa sUcakO /
   vidheyaṃ svedanaṃ tatra pānīyaṃ lavaṇodakam // GarP_1,168.42 //	viDeyam svedanam tatra pAnIyam lavaNa udakam // GarP_1,168.42 //
   āmamamlaṃ ca viṣṭabdhaṃ kaphapittānilaiḥ kramāt /	Amam amlam ca vizwabDam kaPa pitta anilEH kramAt /
   ālipya jaṭharaṃ prājño hiṅgutryūṣaṇasaindhavaiḥ // GarP_1,168.43 //	Alipya jaWaram prAjQaH hiFgu tryUzaNa sEnDavEH // GarP_1,168.43 //
   divāsvapnaṃ prakurvīta sarvājīrṇavināśanam /	divAsvapnam prakurvIta sarva ajIrNa vinASanam /
   ahitānnai rogarāśirahitānnaṃ tatastyajet // GarP_1,168.44 //	ahita annEH rogarASiH ahita annam tatas tyajet // GarP_1,168.44 //
   uṣṇāmbu vānupānaṃ ca mākṣikaiḥ pācanaṃ bhavet /	uzNa ambu vA anupAnam ca mAkzikEH pAcanam Bavet /
   karīradadhimatsyaiśca prāyaḥ kṣīraṃ virudhyate // GarP_1,168.45 //	karIra daDi matsyEH ca prAyas kzIram viruDyate // GarP_1,168.45 //
   bilvaḥ śoṇā ca gambhārī pāṭalā gaṇikārikā /	bilvaH SoNA ca gamBArI pAwalA gaNikArikA /
   dīpanaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ pañcamūlamidaṃ mahat // GarP_1,168.46 //	dIpanam kaPa vAta Gnam paQcamUlam idam mahat // GarP_1,168.46 //
   śālaparṇo pṛśriparṇo bṛhatīdvayagokṣuram /	SAlaparNaH pRSriparNaH bRhatI dvaya gokzuram /
   vātapittaharaṃ vṛṣyaṃ kanīyaḥ pañcamūlakam // GarP_1,168.47 //	vAta pitta haram vRzyam kanIyaH paQcamUlakam // GarP_1,168.47 //
   ubhayaṃ daśasūlaṃ syātsannipātajvarāpaham /	uBayam daSa sUlam syAt sannipAta jvara apaham /
   kāse śvāse ca tandrāyāṃ pārśvaśūle ca śasyate // GarP_1,168.48 //	kAse SvAse ca tandrAyAm pArSva SUle ca Sasyate // GarP_1,168.48 //
   etaistailāni sarpoṣi pralepādalakāṃ jayet /	etEH tElAni sarpozi pralepAt alakAm jayet /
   kvāthāccaturguṇaṃ vāri pādasthaṃ syāccaturguṇam // GarP_1,168.49 //	kvATAt caturguNam vAri pAda sTam syAt caturguNam // GarP_1,168.49 //
   snehañca tatsamaṃ kṣīraṃ kalkaśca snehapādakaḥ /	snehaQca tad samam kzIram kalkaH ca snehapAdakaH /
   saṃvartitauṣadhaiḥ pāko bastau pāne bhavetsamaḥ /	saMvartita OzaDEH pAkaH bastO pAne Bavet samaH /
   kharo 'bhyaṅge mṛdurnasye pāko 'pi saṃprakalpayet // GarP_1,168.50 //	KaraH aByaFge mRduH nasye pAkaH api saMprakalpayet // GarP_1,168.50 //
   sthūladehandriyāścintyā prakṛtiryā tvadhiṣṭhitā /	sTUla dehandriyAH cintyA prakRtiH yA tu aDizWitA /
   ārogyamiti taṃ vidyādāyuṣmantamupācaret // GarP_1,168.51 //	Arogyam iti tam vidyAt Ayuzmantam upAcaret // GarP_1,168.51 //
   yo gṛhṇātīndriyairarthānviparītānsa mṛtyubhāk /	yaH gRhNAti indriyEH arTAn viparItAn sa mRtyu BAj /
   bhiṣaṅmitragurudveṣī priyārātiśca yo bhavet // GarP_1,168.52 //	Bizaj mitra guru dvezI priya arAtiH ca yaH Bavet // GarP_1,168.52 //
   gulphajānulalāṭaṃ ca hanurgaṇḍastathaiva ca /	gulPa jAnu lalAwam ca hanuH gaNxaH taTA eva ca /
   bhraṣṭaṃ sthānacyutaṃ yasya sa jahātyacirādasūn // GarP_1,168.53 //	Brazwam sTAna cyutam yasya sa jahAti acirAt asUn // GarP_1,168.53 //
   vāmākṣimajjanaṃ jihvā śyāmā nāsā vikāriṇī /	vAma akzi majjanam jihvA SyAmA nAsA vikAriNI /
   kṛṣṇau sthānacyutau coṣṭhau kṛṣṇāsyaṃ yasyataṃ tyajet // GarP_1,168.54 //	kRzNO sTAna cyutO ca uzWO kRzNa Asyam yasyatam tyajet // GarP_1,168.54 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   vaidyakaśāstraparibhāṣā nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	vEdyakaSAstrapariBAzA nAma azwazazwyaDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  169	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 169
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   hitāhitavikekāya anupānavidhiṃ bruve /	hita ahita vikekAya anupAna viDim bruve /
   raktaśāli tridoṣaghnaṃ tṛṣṇāmedonivārakam // GarP_1,169.1 //	raktaSAli tridoza Gnam tRzNA medaH nivArakam // GarP_1,169.1 //
   mahāśāli paraṃ vṛṣyaṃ kalamaḥ śleṣmapittahā /	mahA SAli param vRzyam kalamaH Slezma pitta hA /
   śītto gurustridoṣaghnaḥ prāyaśo gauraṣaṣṭikaḥ // GarP_1,169.2 //	SIttaH guruH tridoza GnaH prAyaSas gOra zazwikaH // GarP_1,169.2 //
   śyāmākaḥ śoṣaṇo rūkṣo vātalaḥ śleṣmapittahā /	SyAmAkaH SozaNaH rUkzaH vAtalaH Slezma pitta hA /
   tadvatpriyaṅgunīvārakoradūṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,169.3 //	tadvat priyaFgu nIvAra kora dUzAH prakIrtitAH // GarP_1,169.3 //
   bahuvāraḥ sakṛcchītaḥ śleṣmapittaharo yavaḥ /	bahuvAraH sakRt SItaH Slezma pitta haraH yavaH /
   vṛṣyaḥ śīto guruḥ svādurgodhūmo vātanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,169.4 //	vRzyaH SItaH guruH svAduH goDUmaH vAta nASanaH // GarP_1,169.4 //
   kaphapittāstrajinmudgaḥ kaṣāyo madhurolaghuḥ /	kaPa pitta astra jit mudgaH kazAyaH maDura ulaGuH /
   māṣo bahubalo vṛṣyaḥ pittaśleṣmaharo guruḥ // GarP_1,169.5 //	mAzaH bahu balaH vRzyaH pitta Slezma haraH guruH // GarP_1,169.5 //
   avṛṣyaḥ śleṣmapittaghno rājamāṣo 'nilārtinut /	avRzyaH Slezma pitta GnaH rAjamAzaH anila Arti nud /
   kulatthaḥ śvāsahikkāhṛtkaphagulmānilāpahaḥ // GarP_1,169.6 //	kulatTaH SvAsa hikkA hRd kaPa gulma anila apahaH // GarP_1,169.6 //
   raktapittajvaronmātho śīto grāhī makuṣṭhakaḥ /	rakta pitta jvara unmATaH SItaH grAhI makuzWakaH /
   puṃstvāsṛkkaphapittaghnaścaṇako vātalaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,169.7 //	puMstva asRk kaPa pitta GnaH caNakaH vAtalaH smRtaH // GarP_1,169.7 //
   masūro madhuraḥ śīva saṃgrahī kaphapittahā /	masUraH maDuraH SIva saMgrahI kaPa pitta hA /
   tadvatsarvaguṇāḍhyaśca kalāyaścātivātalaḥ // GarP_1,169.8 //	tadvat sarva guNa AXyaH ca kalAyaH ca ativAtalaH // GarP_1,169.8 //
   āgkī kaphapittaghno śukralā ca tathā smṛtā /	AgkI kaPa pitta GnaH SukralA ca taTA smRtA /
   atasī pittalā jñeyā siddhārthaḥ kaphavātajit // GarP_1,169.9 //	atasI pittalA jQeyA sidDArTaH kaPa vAta jit // GarP_1,169.9 //
   sakṣāramadhurasnigdho baloṣṇapittakṛttilaḥ /	sa kzAra maDura snigDaH bala uzNa pitta kRt tilaH /
   balaghnā rūkṣalāḥ śītā vividhāḥ sasyajātayaḥ // GarP_1,169.10 //	bala GnAH rUkzalAH SItAH viviDAH sasya jAtayaH // GarP_1,169.10 //
   citrakeṅgudinālīkāḥ pippalīmadhuśigravaḥ /	citraka iFgudi nAlIkAH pippalI maDuSigravaH /
   cavyācaraṇanirguṇḍītarkārīkāśamardakāḥ // GarP_1,169.11 //	cavya AcaraNa nirguNxI tarkArI kASa mardakAH // GarP_1,169.11 //
   sabilvāḥ kaphapittaghnāḥ krimighnā laghudīpakāḥ /	sa bilvAH kaPa pitta GnAH krimi GnAH laGu dIpakAH /
   varṣābhūmārkarau vātakaphaghnau doṣanāśanau // GarP_1,169.12 //	varzABU mArkarO vAta kaPa GnO doza nASanO // GarP_1,169.12 //
   tiktarasaḥ syāderaṇḍaḥ kākamācī tridoṣahṛt /	tikta rasaH syAt eraNxaH kAkamAcI tridoza hRt /
   cāṅgerī kaphavātaghnī sarṣapaḥ sarvadoṣadam // GarP_1,169.13 //	cAFgerI kaPa vAta GnI sarzapaH sarva doza dam // GarP_1,169.13 //
   tadvadeva ca kausmasumbhaṃ rājikā vātapittalā /	tadvat eva ca kOsmasumBam rAjikA vAta pittalAH /
   nāḍīcaḥ kaphapittaghnaḥ cucurmadhuraśītalaḥ // GarP_1,169.14 //	nAxIcaH kaPa pitta GnaH cucuH maDura SItalaH // GarP_1,169.14 //
   doṣaghnaṃ padmapatrañca tripuṭaṃ vātakṛtparam /	doza Gnam padma patraQca tri puwam vAta kRt param /
   sakṣāraḥ sarvadoṣaghno vāstuko rocanaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,169.15 //	sakzAraH sarva doza GnaH vAstukaH rocanaH paraH // GarP_1,169.15 //
   taṇḍukīyovipaharaḥ pālaṅkyāśca tathāpare /	taNxukIyaH vipa haraH pAlaFkyAH ca taTA apare /
   mūlakaṃ doṣakṛcchāmaṃ svinnaṃ vātakaphāpadam // GarP_1,169.16 //	mUlakam doza kRt SAmam svinnam vAta kaPa Apadam // GarP_1,169.16 //
   sarvadoṣaharaṃ hyadyaṃ kaṇṭhyaṃ tatpakvamiṣyate /	sarva doza haram hi adyam kaNWyam tat pakvam izyate /
   karkoṭakaṃ savārtākaṃ padolaṃ kāravellakam // GarP_1,169.17 //	karkowakam sa vArtAkam padolam kAravellakam // GarP_1,169.17 //
   kuṣṭhamehajvaraśvāsakāsapittakaphāpaham /	kuzWa meha jvara SvAsa kAsa pitta kaPa apaham /
   sarvadoṣaharaṃ hṛdyaṃ kūṣmāṇḍaṃ bastiśodhanam // GarP_1,169.18 //	sarva doza haram hRdyam kUzmANxam basti SoDanam // GarP_1,169.18 //
   kaliṅgālābunī pittanāśinī vātakāriṇī /	kaliFga alAbunI pitta nASinI vAta kAriNI /
   trapuṣorvāruke vātaśleṣmale pittavāraṇe // GarP_1,169.19 //	trapuzA urvAruke vAta Slezmale pitta vAraNe // GarP_1,169.19 //
   vṛkṣāmlaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ jambīraṃ kaphavātanut /	vRkzAmlam kaPa vAta Gnam jambIram kaPa vAta nud /
   vātaghnaṃ dāḍimaṃ grāhi nāgaraṅgaphalaṃ guru // GarP_1,169.20 //	vAta Gnam dAximam grAhi nAgaraFga Palam guru // GarP_1,169.20 //
   keśaraṃ mātuluṅgaṃ ca dīpanaṃ kaphavātanut /	keSaram mAtuluFgam ca dIpanam kaPa vAta nud /
   vātapittaharo māṣastvaksnigdhoṣṇānilāpahaḥ // GarP_1,169.21 //	vAta pitta haraH mAzaH tvac snigDa uzNa anila apahaH // GarP_1,169.21 //
   saramāmalakaṃ vṛṣyaṃ madhuraṃ hṛdyamamlakṛt /	saram Amalakam vRzyam maDuram hRdyam amla kRt /
   bhuktaprarocakā puṇyā harītakyamṛtopamā // GarP_1,169.22 //	Bukta prarocakA puNyA harItakI amRta upamAH // GarP_1,169.22 //
   straṃsanī kaphavātaghnī hyakṣastadvattridoṣajit /	straMsanI kaPa vAta GnI hi akzaH tadvat tridoza jit /
   vātaśleṣmaharaṃ tvamlaṃ straṃsanaṃ tintiḍīphalam // GarP_1,169.23 //	vAta Slezma haram tu amlam straMsanam tintixI Palam // GarP_1,169.23 //
   doṣalaṃ lakucaṃ svādu bakulaṃ kaphavātajit /	dozalam lakucam svAdu bakulam kaPa vAta jit /
   gulmavātakaphaśvāsakāsaghnaṃ bījapūrakam // GarP_1,169.24 //	gulma vAta kaPa SvAsa kAsa Gnam bIjapUrakam // GarP_1,169.24 //
   kapitthaṃ grāhi doṣaghnaṃ pakvaṃ guru viṣāpaham /	kapitTam grAhi doza Gnam pakvam guru viza apaham /
   kaphapittakaraṃ bālamāpūrṇaṃ pittavardhanam // GarP_1,169.25 //	kaPa pitta karam bAlam ApUrNam pitta varDanam // GarP_1,169.25 //
   pakvāmraṃ vātakṛnmāṃsaśukravarṇabalapradam /	pakva Amram vAta kRt mAMsa Sukra varNa bala pradam /
   vātaghnaṃ kaphapittaghnaṃ grāhi viṣṭambhi jāmbavam // GarP_1,169.26 //	vAta Gnam kaPa pitta Gnam grAhi vizwamBi jAmbavam // GarP_1,169.26 //
   tindukaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ badaraṃ vātapittahṛt /	tindukam kaPa vAta Gnam badaram vAta pitta hRt /
   viṣṭambhi vātalaṃ bilvaṃ priyālaṃ pavanāpaham // GarP_1,169.27 //	vizwamBi vAtalam bilvam priyAlam pavana apaham // GarP_1,169.27 //
   rājādanaphalaṃ mocaṃ panasaṃ nārikelajam /	rAjAdana Palam mocam panasam nArikela jam /
   śukramāṃsakarāṇyāhuḥ svādusnigdhagurūṇi ca // GarP_1,169.28 //	Sukra mAMsa karANi AhuH svAdu snigDa gurUNi ca // GarP_1,169.28 //
   drākṣāmadhūkakharjūraṃ kuṅkumaṃ vātaraktajit /	drAkzA maDUka KarjUram kuFkumam vAta rakta jit /
   māgadhī madhurā pakvā śvāsapittaharā parā // GarP_1,169.29 //	mAgaDI maDurA pakvA SvAsa pitta harA parA // GarP_1,169.29 //
   ārdrakaṃ rocakaṃ vṛṣyaṃ dīpanaṃ kaphavātahṛt /	Ardrakam rocakam vRzyam dIpanam kaPa vAta hRt /
   śuṇṭhīmaricapippalyaḥ kaphavātajito matāḥ // GarP_1,169.30 //	SuNWI marica pippalyaH kaPa vAta jitaH matAH // GarP_1,169.30 //
   avṛṣyaṃ maricaṃ vidyāditi vaidyakasaṃmatam /	avRzyam maricam vidyAt iti vEdyaka saMmatam /
   gulmaśūlavibandhaghnaṃ hiṅguvātakaphāpaham // GarP_1,169.31 //	gulma SUla vibanDa Gnam hiFgu vAta kaPa apaham // GarP_1,169.31 //
   yavānīdhanyakājājyaḥ vātaśleṣmanudaḥ param /	yavAnI Danyaka aja AjyaH vAta Slezma nudaH param /
   cakṣuṣyaṃ saindhavaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,169.32 //	cakzuzyam sEnDavam vRzyam tridoza Samanam smRtam // GarP_1,169.32 //
   sauvarcalaṃ vibandhaghnamuṣṇaṃ hṛcchūlanāśanam /	sOvarcalam vibanDa Gnam uzNam hRd SUla nASanam /
   uṣṇaṃ śūlaharaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ vātanāśanam // GarP_1,169.33 //	uzNam SUla haram tIkzNam vixaFgam vAta nASanam // GarP_1,169.33 //
   romakaṃ vātalaṃ svādu rocanaṃ kledanaṃ guru /	romakam vAtalam svAdu rocanam kledanam guru /
   hṛtpāṇḍugalarogaghnaṃ yavakṣāro 'gnidīpanaḥ // GarP_1,169.34 //	hRd pANxu gala roga Gnam yavakzAraH agni dIpanaH // GarP_1,169.34 //
   dahano dīpanastīkṣṇaḥ sarjikṣāro vidāraṇaḥ /	dahanaH dIpanaH tIkzNaH sarjikzAraH vidAraNaH /
   doṣaghnaṃ nābhasaṃ vārilaghu hṛdyaṃ viṣāpaham // GarP_1,169.35 //	doza Gnam nABasam vAri laGu hRdyam viza apaham // GarP_1,169.35 //
   nādeyaṃ vātalaṃ rūkṣaṃ sārasaṃ madura laghu /	nAdeyam vAtalam rUkzam sArasam madura laGu /
   vātaśleṣmaharaṃ vārpyaṃ tāḍāgaṃ vātalaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,169.36 //	vAta Slezma haram vA arpyam tAxAgam vAtalam smRtam // GarP_1,169.36 //
   raucyamagnikaraṃ rūkṣaṃ kaphaghnaṃlaghu nairjharam /	rOcyam agni karam rUkzam kaPa GnaMlaGu nErJaram /
   dīpanaṃ pittalaṃ kaupamaudbhidaṃ pittanāśanam // GarP_1,169.37 //	dIpanam pittalam kOpamOdBidam pitta nASanam // GarP_1,169.37 //
   divārkakiraṇairjuṣṭaṃ rātrau caivenduraśmibhiḥ /	divA arka kiraNEH juzwam rAtrO ca eva indu raSmiBiH /
   sarvadoṣavinirmuktaṃ tattulyaṃ gaganāmbunā // GarP_1,169.38 //	sarva doza vinirmuktam tad tulyam gagana ambunA // GarP_1,169.38 //
   uṣṇaṃ vāri jvaraśvāsamedo 'nilakaphāpaham /	uzNam vAri jvara SvAsa medaH anila kaPa apaham /
   śṛtaṃ śītatridoṣaghnamuṣitaṃ tacca doṣalam // GarP_1,169.39 //	SRtam SIta tridoza Gna muzitam tat ca dozalam // GarP_1,169.39 //
   gokṣīraṃ vātapittagnaṃ snigdhaṃ gururasāyanam /	go kzIram vAta pittagnam snigDam guru rasAyanam /
   gavyādgurutaraṃ snigdhaṃ māhiṣ vahnināśanam // GarP_1,169.40 //	gavyAt gurutaram snigDam mAhiH vahni nASanam // GarP_1,169.40 //
   chāgaṃ raktātisāraghnaṃ kāsaśvāsakaphāpaham /	CAgam rakta atisAra Gnam kAsa SvAsa kaPa apaham /
   cakṣuṣyaṃ jīvanaṃ strīṇāṃ raktapitte canāvanam // GarP_1,169.41 //	cakzuzyam jIvanam strINAm raktapitte ca nAvanam // GarP_1,169.41 //
   paraṃ vātaharaṃ vṛṣyaṃ pittaśleṣmakaraṃ dadhi /	param vAta haram vRzyam pitta Slezma karam daDi /
   doṣaghnaṃ manthajātantu mastu srotoviśodhanam // GarP_1,169.42 //	doza Gnam manTa jAtantu mastu srotaH viSoDanam // GarP_1,169.42 //
   grahaṇyarśo 'rditārtighnaṃ navanītaṃ navoddhṛtam /	grahaNI arSaH ardita Arti Gnam navanItam nava udDRtam /
   vikārāśca kilāṭādyā guravaḥ kuṣṭhahetavaḥ // GarP_1,169.43 //	vikArAH ca kila Awa AdyAH guravaH kuzWa hetavaH // GarP_1,169.43 //
   paraṃ grahaṇīśothārśaḥ pāṇḍvatīsāragulmanut /	param grahaNI SoTa arSaH pANxu atIsAra gulma nud /
   tridoṣaśamanaṃ takraṃ kathitaṃ pūrvasūribhiḥ // GarP_1,169.44 //	tridoza Samanam takram kaTitam pUrva sUriBiH // GarP_1,169.44 //
   vṛṣyañca madhuraṃ sarpirvātapittakaphāpaham /	vRzyaQca maDuram sarpiH vAta pitta kaPa apaham /
   gavyaṃ medhyañca cākṣuṣyaṃ saṃskārācca tridoṣajit // GarP_1,169.45 //	gavyam meDyaQca cAkzuzyam saMskArAt ca tridoza jit // GarP_1,169.45 //
   apasmāragadonmādamūrchāghnaṃ saṃskṛtaṅghṛtam /	apasmAra gada unmAda mUrCA Gnam saMskRtaFGRtam /
   ajādīnāñca sarpoṣi vidyādgokṣīrasadguṇaiḥ /	aja AdInAQca sarpozi vidyAt go kzIra sat guNEH /
   kaphavātaharaṃ mūtraṃ sarvakrimiviṣāpaham // GarP_1,169.46 //	kaPa vAta haram mUtram sarva krimi viza apaham // GarP_1,169.46 //
   pāṇḍutvodarakuṣṭhārśaḥ śothagulmapramehanut /	pANxu tvA udara kuzWa arSaH SoTa gulma prameha nud /
   vātaśleṣmaharaṃ balyaṃ tailaṃ kaśyaṃ tilodbhavam // GarP_1,169.47 //	vAta Slezma haram balyam tElam kaSyam tila udBavam // GarP_1,169.47 //
   sārṣapaṃ kṛmipāṇḍughnaṃ kaphamedo 'nilāpaham /	sArzapam kRmi pANxu Gnam kaPa medaH anila apaham /
   kṣaumaṃ tailamacakṣuṣyaṃ pittahṛdvātanāśanam // GarP_1,169.48 //	kzOmam tElam acakzuzyam pitta hRd vAta nASanam // GarP_1,169.48 //
   akṣajaṃ kaphapittaghnaṃ keśyaṃ tvakśrotratarpaṇam /	akza jam kaPa pitta Gnam keSyam tvac Srotra tarpaNam /
   tridoṣaghnaṃ madhu proktaṃ vātalañca prakīrtitam // GarP_1,169.49 //	tridoza Gnam maDu proktam vAta laQca prakIrtitam // GarP_1,169.49 //
   hikkāśvāsakṛmicchardimehatṛṣṇāviṣāmaham /	hikkA SvAsa kRmi= Cardi meha tRzNA AvizAm aham /
   ikṣavoraktapittaghno balyā vṛṣyāḥ kaphapradāḥ // GarP_1,169.50 //	ikzavaH rakta pitta GnaH balyAH vRzyAH kaPa pradAH // GarP_1,169.50 //
   phāṇitaṃ pittalaṃ tavriṃ surā matsyaṇḍikā laghuḥ /	PANitam pittalam tavrim surA matsyaNxikA laGuH /
   khaṇḍaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tathā snigdhaṃ svādvasṛkpittavātajit // GarP_1,169.51 //	KaNxam vRzyam taTA snigDam svAdu asRk pitta vAta jit // GarP_1,169.51 //
   vātapittaharo rūkṣo vātaghnaḥ kaphakṛdguḍaḥ /	vAta pitta haraH rUkzaH vAta GnaH kaPa kRt guxaH /
   sa pittaghnaḥ paraḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo 'sṛkprasādanaḥ // GarP_1,169.52 //	sa pitta GnaH paraH paTyaH purANaH asRk prasAdanaH // GarP_1,169.52 //
   raktipittaharā vṛṣyā sasnehā gaḍaśarkarā /	rakti pitta harA vRzyA sa snehA gaxa SarkarA /
   sarvapittakaraṃ madyamamlatvātkaphavātajit // GarP_1,169.53 //	sarva pitta karam madyam amla tvAt kaPa vAta jit // GarP_1,169.53 //
   raktapittakarāstīkṣṇāstathā sauvīrajātayaḥ /	rakta pitta karAH tIkzNAH taTA sOvIra jAtayaH /
   pācano dīpanaḥ pathyo maṇḍaḥ syādbhṛṣṭataṇḍulaḥ // GarP_1,169.54 //	pAcanaH dIpanaH paTyaH maNxaH syAt BRzwa taNxulaH // GarP_1,169.54 //
   vātānulomanī laghvī peyā vastiviśodhanī /	vAta anulomanI laGvI peyA vasti viSoDanI /
   satakradāḍimavyoṣā saguḍā madhupippalī // GarP_1,169.55 //	sa takra dAxima vyozA sa guxA maDu pippalI // GarP_1,169.55 //
   intīyaṃ sukṛtā peyā kāsaśvā sapravāhikāḥ /	intIyam sukRtA peyA kAsaSvA sa pravAhikAH /
   pāyasaḥ kaphakṛdbalyaḥ kṛśarā vātanāśinī // GarP_1,169.56 //	pAyasaH kaPa kRt balyaH kRSarA vAta nASinI // GarP_1,169.56 //
   sudhautaḥ prastrutaḥ snigdhaḥ sukhoṣṇo laghurocanaḥ /	su DOtaH prastrutaH snigDaH suKa uzNaH laGurocanaH /
   kandamūlaphalehaiḥ sādhito bṛṃhaṇoguruḥ // GarP_1,169.57 //	kanda mUla PalehEH sADitaH bRMhaNa uguruH // GarP_1,169.57 //
   īṣaduṣṇasevanācca laghuḥ sūpaḥ susādhitaḥ /	Izat uzNa sevanAt ca laGuH sUpaH su sADitaH /
   svinna niṣpīḍitaṃ śākaṃ hitaṃ snehādisaṃskṛtam // GarP_1,169.58 //	svid na nizpIxitam SAkam hitam sneha Adi saMskRtam // GarP_1,169.58 //
   dāḍimāmalakairyūṣo vahnikṛdvātapittahā /	dAxima AmalakEH yUzaH vahni kRt vAta pitta hA /
   śvāsakāsapratiśyāyakaphaghno malakaiḥ kṛtaḥ // GarP_1,169.59 //	SvAsa kAsa pratiSyAya kaPa GnaH malakEH kRtaH // GarP_1,169.59 //
   yavakolakulatthānāṃ yūṣaḥ kaṇṭhyo 'nilāpahaḥ /	yava kola kulatTAnAm yUzaH kaNWyaH anila apahaH /
   mudgāmalakajo grāhī śleṣmapittavināśanaḥ // GarP_1,169.60 //	mudga Amalaka jaH grAhI Slezma pitta vinASanaH // GarP_1,169.60 //
   saguḍaṃ dadhi vātaghnaṃ saktavo rūkṣavātulāḥ /	sa guxam daDi vAta Gnam saktavaH rUkza vAtulAH /
   ghṛtapūrṇo 'gnikārī syādvṛṣyā gurvo ca śaṣkulī // GarP_1,169.61 //	GRta pUrNaH agni kArI syAt vRzyA gurvaH ca SazkulI // GarP_1,169.61 //
   bṛṃhaṇāḥ sāmiṣā bhakṣyapiṣṭa kā gukhaḥ smṛtāḥ /	bRMhaNAH sa AmizA Bakzya pizwa kA guKaH smRtAH /
   tailasiddhāśca dṛṣṭighnāstoyasvinnāśca durjarāḥ // GarP_1,169.62 //	tEla sidDAH ca dRzwi GnAH toya svinnAH ca durjarAH // GarP_1,169.62 //
   atyuṣṇā maṇḍakāḥ pathyāḥ śītalā gukho matāḥ /	ati uzNAH maNxakAH paTyAH SItalAH guKaH matAH /
   anupānañca pānīyaṃ śramatṛṣṇādināśanam // GarP_1,169.63 //	anupAnaQca pAnIyam Srama tRzNA Adi nASanam // GarP_1,169.63 //
   annapānādinā rakṣā kṛtsyādrogavarjitaḥ /	anna pAna AdinA rakzA kRtsyAt roga varjitaH /
   anuṣṇaḥ śikhikaṇṭhābho viṣañcaiva vivarṇakṛt // GarP_1,169.64 //	anuzNaH SiKi kaNWa ABaH vizaQca eva vivarNa kRt // GarP_1,169.64 //
   gandhasparśarasāstīvrābhoktuśca syānmanovyathā /	ganDa sparSa rasAH tIvra aBoktuH ca syAt manaH vyaTA /
   āghrāṇe cākṣirogaḥ syādasādhyaśca bhiṣagvaraiḥ /	AGrANe ca akzi rogaH syAt asADyaH ca Bizaj varEH /
   vepathurjṛmbhaṇādyaṃ syādviṣasyaitattu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,169.65 //	vepaTuH jRmBaNa Adyam syAt vizasya etat tu lakzaNam // GarP_1,169.65 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   anupānādividhikathanaṃ nāmaikonasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	anupAnAdiviDikaTanam nAma ekonasaptati aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  170	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 170
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   jvaro 'ṣṭadhā pṛthagdvandvasaṃghātāgantujaḥ smṛtaḥ /	jvaraH azwaDA pRTak dvandva saMGAta Agantu jaH smRtaH /
   mustaparpaṭakośīracandanodīcyanāgaraiḥ /	musta parpawaka uSIra candana udIcya nAgarEH /
   śṛtaśītaṃ jalaṃ dadyātpipāsājvaraśāntaye // GarP_1,170.1 //	SRtaSItam jalam dadyAt pipAsA jvara SAntaye // GarP_1,170.1 //
   nāgaraṃ devakāṣṭhañca dhānyākaṃ bṛhatīdvayam /	nAgaram deva kAzWaQca DAnyAkam bRhatI dvayam /
   dadyātpācanakaṃ pūrvaṃ jvaritāya jvarāpaham // GarP_1,170.2 //	dadyAt pAcanakam pUrvam jvaritAya jvara apaham // GarP_1,170.2 //
   āragvadhābhayāmustātiktāgranthikanirmitaḥ /	AragvaDa aBayA mustA tiktA granTika nirmitaH /
   kaṣāyaḥ pācanaḥ sāme saśūle ca jvarehitaḥ // GarP_1,170.3 //	kazAyaH pAcanaH sa Ame sa SUle ca jvarehitaH // GarP_1,170.3 //
   madhūkasārasindhūtthavacoṣaṇakaṇāḥ samāḥ /	maDUka sAra sinDUtTa vacA UzaNa kaNAH samAH /
   ślakṣṇaṃ piṣṭvāmbhasā nasyaṃ kuryātsaṃjñāprabodhanam // GarP_1,170.4 //	SlakzNam pizwvA amBasA nasyam kuryAt saMjQA praboDanam // GarP_1,170.4 //
   trivṛdviśālātriphalākaṭukāragvadhaiḥ kṛtaḥ /	trivRt viSAlA triPalA kawuka AragvaDEH kRtaH /
   sakṣāro bhedanaḥ kvāthaḥ peyaḥ sarvajvarāpahaḥ // GarP_1,170.5 //	sakzAraH BedanaH kvATaH peyaH sarva jvara apahaH // GarP_1,170.5 //
   mahauṣadhāmṛtāmustacandanośīradhānyakaiḥ /	mahOzaDa amRtA musta candana uSIra DAnyakEH /
   kvāthastṛtīyakaṃ hanti śarkarāmadhuyojitaḥ // GarP_1,170.6 //	kvATaH tRtIyakam hanti SarkarA maDu yojitaH // GarP_1,170.6 //
   apāmagajaṭākaṭyāṃ lohitaiḥ saptatantubhiḥ /	apAmagajawA kawyAm lohitEH sapta tantuBiH /
   baddhvā vāre ravernūnaṃ jvaraṃ hanti tṛtīyakam // GarP_1,170.7 //	badDvA vAre raveH nUnam jvaram hanti tRtIyakam // GarP_1,170.7 //
   gaṅgāyā uttare kūle aputrastāpaso mṛtaḥ /	gaFgAyAH uttare kUle aputraH tApasaH mRtaH /
   tasmai tilodakaṃ dadyānmuñcatyaikāhiko jvaraḥ // GarP_1,170.8 //	tasmE tila udakam dadyAt muQcati EkAhikaH jvaraH // GarP_1,170.8 //
   guḍūcyāḥ kvāthakalkābhyāṃ viphalāvāsakasya ca /	guxUcyAH kvATa kalkAByAm viPala AvAsakasya ca /
   mṛdvīkāyā balāyāśca siddhāḥ snehā jvaracchidaḥ // GarP_1,170.9 //	mRdvIkAyAH balAyAH ca sidDAH snehAH jvara= CidaH // GarP_1,170.9 //
   dhātrīśivākaṇāvahnikvāthaḥ sarvajvarāntakaḥ /	DAtrI SivA kaNA vahni kvATaH sarva jvara antakaH /
   jvarātisāraharaṇamauṣadhaṃ pravadāmyatha // GarP_1,170.10 //	jvara atisAra haraNam OzaDam pravadAmi aTa // GarP_1,170.10 //
   pṛśriparṇobalāvilvanāgarotpaladhānyakaiḥ /	pRSriparNaH balA vilva nAgara utpala DAnyakEH /
   pāṭhendrayavabhūnimbamustaparpaṭakaiḥ śṛtāḥ /	pAWA indrayava BUnimba musta parpawakEH SRtAH /
   jyantyāmamatīsāraṃ sajvaraṃ samahauṣadhāḥ // GarP_1,170.11 //	jyanti Amam atIsAram sa jvaram sa mahOzaDAH // GarP_1,170.11 //
   nāgarātiviṣāmustabhūnimbāmṛtavatsakaiḥ /	nAgara ativizA musta BUnimba amRta vatsakEH /
   sarvajvaraharaḥ kvathaḥ sarvātīsāranāśanaḥ // GarP_1,170.12 //	sarva jvara haraH kvaTaH sarva atIsAra nASanaH // GarP_1,170.12 //
   mustaparpaṭakadivyaśṛṅgaveraśṛtaṃ payaḥ /	musta parpawaka divya SRFgavera SRtam payaH /
   śālaparṇo pṛśriparṇo bṛhatī kaṇṭakārikā // GarP_1,170.13 //	SAlaparNaH pRSriparNaH bRhatI kaNwakArikAH // GarP_1,170.13 //
   balāśvadaṃṣṭrābilvādi pāṭhānāgaradhānyakam /	bala aSva daMzwrA bilva Adi pAWA nAgara DAnyakam /
   etadāhārasaṃyoge hitaṃ sarvātisāriṇām // GarP_1,170.14 //	etad AhAra saMyoge hitam sarva atisAriNAm // GarP_1,170.14 //
   bilvacūtāsthikvāthaśca khaṇḍaṃ madhvatisāranut /	bilva cUta asTi kvATaH ca KaNxam maDu atisAra nud /
   atisāre hitā tadvatkuṭajatvakkaṇāyutā // GarP_1,170.15 //	atisAre hitA tadvat kuwaja tvakkaNA yutAH // GarP_1,170.15 //
   vatsakātiviṣāviśvakaṇākandakaṣāyakaḥ /	vatsaka ati vizA viSva kaNA kanda kazAyakaH /
   prayuktaścāmaśūlāḍhye hyatīsāre saśoṇita // GarP_1,170.16 //	prayuktaH ca Ama SUla AXye hi atIsAre sa SoNitaH // GarP_1,170.16 //
   cikitsātha grahaṇyāstugrahaṇī cāgrināśinī /	cikitsA aTa grahaNyAH tu grahaNI ca agri nASinI /

   gulmaśothodaraplīhaśūlārśoghnaṃ pradīpanam // GarP_1,170.17 //	gulma SoTa udara plIha SUla arSaH Gnam pradIpanam // GarP_1,170.17 //
   sauvarcalaṃ saindhavañca viḍaṅgaudbhidameva ca /	sOvarcalam sEnDavaQca vixaFga OdBidam eva ca /
   sāmudreṇa samaṃ pañcalavaṇānyatra yojayet // GarP_1,170.18 //	sAmudreNa samam paQcalavaNAni atra yojayet // GarP_1,170.18 //
   bheṣajaṃ śastrakṣārāgnyastridhā vai cārśasāṃ haram /	Bezajam Sastra kzAra agnyaH triDA vE ca arSasAm haram /
   viddhi taccārśasoghnantu yaddhi takraṃ navoddhṛtam // GarP_1,170.19 //	vidDi tat ca arSasaH Gnantu yat hi takram nava udDRtam // GarP_1,170.19 //
   guḍūṭīṃ pippalīyuktāmabhayāṃ ghṛtabharjitām /	guxUwIm pippalI yuktAm aBayAm GRta BarjitAm /

   tilekṣurasasaṃyogaścārśaḥ kuṣṭha vināśanaḥ /	tila ikzu rasa saMyogaH ca arSaH kuzWa vinASanaH /
   pañcakolaṃ samaricaṃ satryūṣaṇamathāgnikṛt // GarP_1,170.21 //	paQcakolam sa maricam sa tryUzaNam aTa agni kRt // GarP_1,170.21 //
   harītakī bhakṣyamāṇā nāgeraṇa guḍena vā /	harItakI BakzyamANA nAgeraNa guxena vA /
   saindhavopahitā vāpi sātatyenāgnidīpanī // GarP_1,170.22 //	sEnDava upahitA vA api sAtatyena agni dIpanI // GarP_1,170.22 //
   phalatrikāmṛtāsātiktābhūnimbanimbajaḥ /	Palatrika amRta Asa atiktA BUnimba nimba jaH /

   trivṛcca triphalā śyāmā pippalī śarkaga madhu /	trivRt ca triPalA SyAmA pippalI Sarkaga maDu /

   vāsāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmāśāyāṃ jīvitasya ca /	vAsAyAm vidyamAnAyAm ASAyAm jIvitasya ca /
   raktapittī kṣayī kāsī kimarthamavasīdati // GarP_1,170.25 //	raktapittI kzayI kAsI kimarTam avasIdati // GarP_1,170.25 //
   āṭarūpakamṛdvīkāpathyākvāthaḥ saśarkaraḥ /	Awa rUpaka mRdvIkA paTyA kvATaH sa SarkaraH /

   vāsārasaḥ khaṇḍamadhuyutaḥ pīto 'tharaktajit /	vAsA rasaH KaNxa maDu yutaH pItaH aTa rakta jit /

   samūlaphalapatrāyā nirguṇḍyāḥ svarasairghṛtam /	sa mUla Pala patrAyAH nirguNxyAH svarasEH GRtam /
   siddhaṃ pītvā kṣayakṣīṇī nirvyādirbhāti devavat // GarP_1,170.28 //	sidDam pItvA kzaya kzINI nirvyAdiH BAti deva vat // GarP_1,170.28 //
   harītakī kaṇā śuṇṭhī maricaṃ guḍasaṃyutam /	harItakI kaNA SuNWI maricam guxa saMyutam /

   kaṇṭakāriguḍūcībhyāṃ pṛthaktriṃśatpale rase /	kaNwakAri guxUcIByAm pRTak triMSat pale rase /

   kṛṣṇā dhātrī śitā śuṇṭhī hakkāghnī madhusaṃyutā /	kRzNA DAtrI SitA SuNWI hakkA GnI maDu saMyutA /
   hikkāśvāsī pivedbhārṅgo saviśvāmuṣṇavāriṇā // GarP_1,170.31 //	hikkA SvAsI pivet BArFgaH sa viSvAm uzNa vAriNA // GarP_1,170.31 //
   tailāktaṃ svarabhede vā khādiraṃ dhārayenmukhe /	tEla aktam svaraBede vA KAdiram DArayet muKe /

   sacavyajīrakaṃ vyoṣā hiṅgusauvarcalāmalāḥ /	sa cavya jIrakam vyozAH hiFgu sOvarcala amalAH /

   triphalā khadiro dārvo nyagrodho vraṇaśodhanaḥ /	triPalA KadiraH dArvaH nyagroDaH vraNa SoDanaH /
   sadyaḥ kṣataṃ vraṇaṃ vaidyaḥ saśūlaṃ pariṣecayet // GarP_1,170.72 //	sadyas kzatam vraNam vEdyaH sa SUlam parizecayet // GarP_1,170.72 //
   yaṣṭīmadhukayuktena kiñciduṣṇena sarpiṣā /	yazwImaDuka yuktena kiQcid uzNena sarpizA /
   buddhvāgantuvraṇānvaidyo ghṛtakṣaudrasamanvitām // GarP_1,170.73 //	budDvA Agantu vraNAn vEdyaH GRta kzOdra samanvitAm // GarP_1,170.73 //
   śītāṃ kriyāṃ prayuñjīta pittaraktoṣmanāśinīm /	SItAm kriyAm prayuQjIta pitta rakta Uzma nASinIm /
   kvātho vaṃśatvageraṇḍaśvadaṃṣṭravanidākṛtaḥ // GarP_1,170.74 //	kvATaH vaMSa tvac eraNxa SvadaMzwra vanidA kRtaH // GarP_1,170.74 //
   sahiṅgusaindhavaḥ pītaḥ koṣṭhasthaṃ strāvayedasṛk /	sa hiFgu sEnDavaH pItaH kozWa sTam strAvayet asRk /
   yavakolakulatthānāṃ niḥsnehena rasena vā // GarP_1,170.75 //	yava kola kulatTAnAm niHsnehena rasena vA // GarP_1,170.75 //
   bhuñjītānnaṃ yavāgvā vā pivetsaindhavasaṃyutam /	BuQjIta annam yavAgvA vA pivet sEnDava saMyutam /
   karañjāriṣṭanirguṇḍīraso hanyādvraṇakrimīn // GarP_1,170.76 //	karaQja arizwa nirguNxI rasaH hanyAt vraNa krimIn // GarP_1,170.76 //
   triphalācūrṇasaṃyukto guggulurvaṭakīkṛtaḥ /	triPalA cUrNa saMyuktaH gugguluH vawakIkRtaH /
   niryantraṇo vibandhaghno vradhanagepaṇaḥ // GarP_1,170.77 //	niryantraNaH vibanDa GnaH vraDana gepaNaH // GarP_1,170.77 //
   dūrvāsvarasasiddhaṃ vā talaṃ kampillakena vā /	dUrvA svarasa sidDam vA talam kampillakena vA /
   dārvotvacaśca kalkena pradhānaṃ vraṇaropaṇam // GarP_1,170.78 //	dArvotvacaH ca kalkena praDAnam vraNa ropaNam // GarP_1,170.78 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   jvarādicikitsānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	jvarAdicikitsAnirUpaNam nAma saptatyuttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  171	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 171
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   nāḍīvraṇādirogāṇāṃ cikitsāṃ śṛṇu suśruta /	nAxI vraNa Adi rogANAm cikitsAm SRNu suSrutaH /
   nāḍīṃ śastreṇa saṃpāṭya nājīnāṃ vraṇavatkriyā // GarP_1,171.1 //	nAxIm SastreNa saMpAwya nAjInAm vraNa vat kriyA // GarP_1,171.1 //
   guggulutriphalāvyopaiḥ samāṃśairājyayojitaiḥ /	guggulu triPalA vyopEH sama aMSEH Ajya yojitEH /
   nāḍīduṣṭavraṇaṃ śūlaṃ bhagandaramatho jayet // GarP_1,171.2 //	nAxI duzwavraNam SUlam Bagandaram aTo jayet // GarP_1,171.2 //
   nirguṇḍīrasatastailaṃ nāḍīduṣṭavraṇāpaham /	nirguNxI rasataH tElam nAxI duzwavraNa apaham /
   hitaṃ pāmāmayānāṃ tu pānābhyañjananāvanaiḥ // GarP_1,171.3 //	hitam pAma AmayAnAm tu pAna aByaQjana nAvanEH // GarP_1,171.3 //
   gaggutriphalākṛṣṇātripañcaikāṃśayojitā /	gaggutriPalA kRzNA tri paQca eka aMSa yojitA /
   ghuṭi (guḍi) kāśothagulmārśobhagandaravatāṃ hitā // GarP_1,171.4 //	Guwi (guxi) kASoTa gulma arSaH Baganda ravatAm hitAH // GarP_1,171.4 //
   dhvajamadhye śirāvedhe viśuddhirupadaṃśake /	Dvaja maDye SirA veDe viSudDiH upadaMSake /
   pāko rakṣyaḥ prayatnena śiśrakṣayakaro hi saḥ // GarP_1,171.5 //	pAkaH rakzyaH prayatnena SiSra kzaya karaH hi saH // GarP_1,171.5 //
   paṭolanimbatriphalāguḍūcīkvāthamāpibet /	pawola nimba triPalA guxUcI kvATam Api bet /
   sagugguluṃ sakhadiramupadaṃśo vinaśyati // GarP_1,171.6 //	sa guggulum sa Kadiram upadaMSaH vinaSyati // GarP_1,171.6 //
   dahetkaṭāhe triphalāṃ sāmasī (ṣī) madhasaṃyutām /	dahet kawAhe triPalAm sAmasI (zI) maDa saMyutAm /
   upadaṃśe pralepo 'ya sadyo ropayate vraṇam // GarP_1,171.7 //	upadaMSe pralepaH aya sadyas ropayate vraNam // GarP_1,171.7 //
   triphalānimbabhūnimbakarañjakhadirādibhiḥ /	triPalA nimba BUnimba karaQja Kadira AdiBiH /
   kalkaiḥ kvāthairghṛtaṃ pakvamupadaṃśaharaṃ param // GarP_1,171.8 //	kalkEH kvATEH GRtam pakvam upadaMSa haram param // GarP_1,171.8 //
   ādau bhagnaṃ viditvā tu secayecchītalāṃbunā /	AdO Bagnam viditvA tu secayet SItala aMbunA /
   pakvenālepanaṃ kāryaṃ bandhanaṃ ca kuśānvitam // GarP_1,171.9 //	pakvena Alepanam kAryam banDanam ca kuSa anvitam // GarP_1,171.9 //
   māṣaṃ māṃsaṃ tathā sarpiḥ kṣīraṃ yūṣaḥ satījalaḥ /	mAzam mAMsam taTA sarpiH kzIram yUzaH satI jalaH /
   bṛṃhaṇaṃ cānnapānaṃ syātpradeyaṃ bhagnarogiṇe // GarP_1,171.10 //	bRMhaNam ca anna pAnam syAt pradeyam Bagna rogiNe // GarP_1,171.10 //
   rasonamadhunāsājyasitākalkaṃ samaśnutā /	rasona maDu nAsa Ajya sitA kalkam samaSnutA /
   chinnabhinnacyutāsthīnāṃ sandhānamacirādbhavet // GarP_1,171.11 //	Cinna Binna cyuta asTInAm sanDAnam acirAt Bavet // GarP_1,171.11 //
   aśvatthatriphalāvyoṣāḥ savarabhiḥ samīkṛtaiḥ /	aSvatTa triPalA vyozAH sa varaBiH samIkRtEH /
   tulyo guggulunā yojyo bhagnasandhiprasādha (kṛt) kaḥ // GarP_1,171.12 //	tulyaH guggulunA yojyaH Bagna sanDi prasADaH (kRt) kaH // GarP_1,171.12 //
   sarvakuṣṭheṣu vamanaṃ recanaṃ raktamokṣaṇa /	sarva kuzWezu vamanam recanam rakta mokzaNa /
   vacāvāsāpaṭolānāṃ nimbasya kalinītvacaḥ // GarP_1,171.13 //	vacA vAsA pawolAnAm nimbasya kalinI tvacaH // GarP_1,171.13 //
   kaṣāyo madhunā pīto vātahṛnmadanānvitaḥ /	kazAyaH maDunA pItaH vAta hRt madana anvitaH /
   virecanaṃ prayoktavyaṃ trivṛtkarṇaphalatrikaiḥ // GarP_1,171.14 //	virecanam prayoktavyam trivRt karNa PalatrikEH // GarP_1,171.14 //
   manaḥ śilāṃmarīcaistu tailaṃ kuṣṭhavināśanam /	manaH SilAMmarIcEH tu tElam kuzWa vinASanam /
   sarvakuṣṭhe vilepo 'yaṃ śivāpañcaguḍaudanam // GarP_1,171.15 //	sarva kuzWe vilepaH ayam SivA paQca guxa odanam // GarP_1,171.15 //
   karañjailagajaiḥ kuṣṭhaṃ gomūtreṇa pralepataḥ /	karaQja ela gajEH kuzWam go mUtreNa pralepataH /
   karavīrodvartanaṃ ca tailāktasya ca kuṣṭhahṛt // GarP_1,171.16 //	karavIra udvartanam ca tEla aktasya ca kuzWa hRt // GarP_1,171.16 //
   haridrā malayaṃ rāsnā guḍūcyeḍagajastathā /	haridrA malayam rAsnA guxUcI exa gajaH taTA /
   āragvadhaḥ karañjaśca lepaḥ kuṣṭhaharaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,171.17 //	AragvaDaH karaQjaH ca lepaH kuzWa haraH paraH // GarP_1,171.17 //
   manaḥ śilāviḍaṅgāni vāgajī sarṣapāstathā /	manaH SilA vixaFgAni vAgajI sarzapAH taTA /
   karañjairmūtrapiṣṭo 'yaṃ lepaḥ kuṣṭaharor'kavat // GarP_1,171.18 //	karaQjEH mUtra pizwaH ayam lepaH kuzwa haroH akavat // GarP_1,171.18 //
   viḍaṅgaiḍavacā kuṣṭhaniśāsindhūtthasarṣapaiḥ /	vixaFga exavacA kuzWa niSA sinDUtTa sarzapEH /
   mūtrāmlapiṣṭo lepo 'yaṃ dadrūkuṣṭavināśanaḥ // GarP_1,171.19 //	mUtra amla pizwaH lepaH ayam dadrU kuzwa vinASanaH // GarP_1,171.19 //
   prapunnāṭasubījāni dhātrī sarjarasaḥ snuhī /	prapunnAwa su bIjAni DAtrI sarjarasaH snuhI /
   sauvīrapiṣṭaṃ dadrūṇāmetadudvartanaṃ param // GarP_1,171.20 //	sOvIra pizwam dadrUNAm etat udvartanam param // GarP_1,171.20 //
   āragvadhasya patrāṇi āranālena peṣayet /	AragvaDasya patrANi AranAlena pezayet /
   dadrūkiṭṭima (bha) kuṣṭhāni hanti sidhmānameva ca // GarP_1,171.21 //	dadrU kiwwimaH (Ba) kuzWAni hanti siDmAnam eva ca // GarP_1,171.21 //
   uṣṇo pītā vāgujī ca kuṣṭhajitkṣīrabhojanaḥ /	uzNo pItA vA agujI ca kuzWa jit kzIra BojanaH /
   tilājyatriphalākṣaudravyoṣabhallātaśarkarāḥ /	tila Ajya triPalA kzOdra vyoza BallAta SarkarAH /
   vṛṣyāḥ sapta samā medhyāḥ kaṣṭhahāḥ kāmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,171.22 //	vRzyAH sapta samAH meDyAH kazWa hAH kAma cAriNaH // GarP_1,171.22 //
   viḍaṅgatriphalākṛṣṇācūrṇaṃ līḍhaṃ samākṣikam /	vixaFga triPalA kRzNA cUrNam lIXam sa mAkzikam /
   hanti kuṣṭhakrimimehanāḍīvraṇabhagandarān // GarP_1,171.23 //	hanti kuzWa krimi meha nAxI vraNa BagandarAn // GarP_1,171.23 //
   yaḥ khādedabhayāriṣṭamariṣṭāmalakāniśāḥ /	yaH KAdet aBaya arizwam arizwa AmalakA niSAH /
   sa jayetsarvakuṣṭhānimāsādūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,171.24 //	sa jayet sarva kuzWa animAsAt UrDvam na saMSayaH // GarP_1,171.24 //
   dahyamānāyutaḥ kumbhe mūlage khadirāṅkuraḥ /	dahyamAna AyutaH kumBe mUla ge Kadira aFkuraH /
   sākṣadhātrīrasaḥ kṣaudro hanyātkuṣṭhaṃ rasāyanam // GarP_1,171.25 //	sAkzaDAtrI rasaH kzOdraH hanyAt kuzWam rasAyanam // GarP_1,171.25 //

   bhāvitaṃ malapūkvāthaiḥ somarājīphalaṃ bahu /	BAvitam mala pU kvATEH somarAjI Palam bahu /

   hanti śvitramasādhyaṃ ca lepe yojyāparājitā /	hanti Svitram asADyam ca lepe yojyA aparAjitA /

   drumatvagarkakuṣṭhāni lavaṇāni ca mūtrakam /	druma tvac arka kuzWAni lavaNAni ca mUtrakam /

   (athāmlapittacikitsā) dhātrīnimbaphalaṃ tadvadgomūtreṇa ca citrakam /	(aTa amlapitta cikitsA) DAtrI nimba Palam tadvat go mUtreNa ca citrakam /
   vāsāmṛtāparpaṭikānimbabhūnimbamārkaraiḥ (vaiḥ) /	vAsA amRtA parpawikA nimba BUnimba mArkarEH (vEH) /
   triphalākulatthaiḥ kvāthaḥ sakṣaudraścāmlapittahā // GarP_1,171.33 //	triPalA kulatTEH kvATaH sa kzOdraH ca amla pitta hA // GarP_1,171.33 //
   phalatrikaṃ paṭolaṃ ca tiktakvāthaḥ sitāyutaḥ /	Palatrikam pawolam ca tikta kvATaH sitA yutaH /
   pīto yaṣṭīmadhuyuto jvaracchardyamlapittajit // GarP_1,171.34 //	pItaH yazwImaDu yutaH jvara= CardI amlapitta jit // GarP_1,171.34 //
   vāsāghṛtaṃ tiktaghṛtaṃ pippalīghṛtameva ca /	vAsA GRtam tikta GRtam pippalI GRtam eva ca /
   amlapitte prayoktavyaṃ guḍakūṣmāṇḍakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,171.35 //	amla pitte prayoktavyam guxa kUzmANxakam taTA // GarP_1,171.35 //
   pippalī madhusaṃyuktā amlapittavināśinī /	pippalI maDu saMyuktA amla pitta vinASinI /

   piṣṭvājājīṃ sadhanyākāṃ ghṛprasthaṃ vipācayet /	pizwvA ajAjIm sa DanyAkAm GRpra sTam vipAcayet /
   kaphapittāruciharaṃ mandānalavamiṃ haret // GarP_1,171.37 //	kaPa pitta aruci haram manda anala vamim haret // GarP_1,171.37 //
   (ityamlapittacikitsā) pippalyamṛtabhūnimbavāsakāriṣṭaparpaṭaiḥ /	(iti amlapitta cikitsA) pippalI amRta BUnimba vAsaka arizwa parpawEH /
   khadirāriṣṭakaiḥ kvātho visphoṭārtijvarāpahaḥ // GarP_1,171.38 //	Kadira arizwakEH kvATaH visPowa Arti jvara apahaH // GarP_1,171.38 //
   triphalārasasaṃyuktaṃ sarpistrivṛtayāsaha /	triPalA rasa saMyuktam sarpiH trivRtayA asaha /
   prayoktavyaṃ virekārthaṃ vīsarpajvaraśāntaye // GarP_1,171.39 //	prayoktavyam vireka arTam vIsarpa jvara SAntaye // GarP_1,171.39 //
   khādirātriphalāriṣṭapaṭolāmṛtavāsakaiḥ /	Ka Adi rAtriPalA arizwa pawola amRta vAsakEH /
   kvātho 'ṣṭakākhyo jayati romāntikamasūrikām // GarP_1,171.40 //	kvATaH azwaka AKyaH jayati roma antika masUrikAm // GarP_1,171.40 //
   kuṣṭhavīsarpavisphoṭakaṇḍvādīnāṃ vighātakaḥ /	kuzWa vIsarpa visPowa kaNxU AdInAm viGAtakaH /
   laśunānāṃ tu cṛrṇasya gharṣo maśakanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,171.41 //	laSunAnAm tu cRrNasya GarzaH maSaka nASanaH // GarP_1,171.41 //
   carmakīlaṃ jarumaṇiṃ maśakāṃstilakālakān /	carmakIlam jaru maNim maSakAn= tila kAlakAn /

   paṭolanīlīlepaḥ syājjāla (jvālā) gardabharoganut /	pawola nIlI lepaH syAt jAlaH (jvAlA) gardaBa roga nud /
   guñjāphalaiḥ śṛtaṃ talaṃ bhṛṅgarājarasena tu /	guQjA PalEH SRtam talam BRFgarAja rasena tu /
   kaṇṭha (ṇḍu) dāruṇakṛtkuṣṭhavātavyādhivināśanam // GarP_1,171.43 //	kaNWa (Nxu) dAruNa kRt kuzWa vAta vyADi vinASanam // GarP_1,171.43 //
   arkāsthimajjātriphalānālīchā bhṛṅgarājakam /	arka asTi majjA triPalA anAlICA BRFgarAjakam /
