   kṣīrātsaśarkarasāddviprastho madhukātpale /	kzIrAt sa Sarka rasAt dvipra sTaH maDukAt pale /
   tailamya kuḍavaṃ pakvaṃ tannasyaṃ palitāpaham // GarP_1,171.45 //	tElamya kuxavam pakvam tat nasyam palita apaham // GarP_1,171.45 //
   mukharoge tu triphalāgaṇḍūṣaparidhāraṇam /	muKa roge tu triPalA gaNxUza pariDAraNam /
   gṛhadhūma yavakṣārapāṭhāvyoparasāñjanam // GarP_1,171.46 //	gRhaDUma yavakzAra pAWA avya uparasAQjanam // GarP_1,171.46 //
   tejodaṃ triphalālodhraṃ citrakaṃ ceti cūrṇitam /	tejodam triPalA loDram citrakam ca iti cUrNitam /
   sakṣaudraṃ dhārayedvaktre grīvādantāsyaroganut // GarP_1,171.47 //	sa kzOdram DArayet vaktre grIvA danta Asya roga nud // GarP_1,171.47 //
   paṭola nimbajamvvāgramālatīnavapallavāḥ /	pawola nimba jamvva agra mAlatInava pallavAH /
   pañcapallavakaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaṣayo mukhadhāvane // GarP_1,171.48 //	paQcapallavakaH SrezWaH kazayaH muKa DAvane // GarP_1,171.48 //
   laśunārdrakaśigrūṇāṃ pārulyā mūlakasya ca /	laSuna Ardraka SigrUNAm pArulyA mUlakasya ca /
   rudantyāśca rasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaduṣṇaḥ karṇapūraṇe // GarP_1,171.49 //	rudantyAH ca rasaH SrezWaH kaduzNaH karNapUraNe // GarP_1,171.49 //
   tīvraśūlottare karṇe saśabde kledavāhini /	tIvra SUla uttare karNe sa Sabde kleda vAhini /
   bastamūtraṃ kṣipetkoṣṇaṃ saindhavenāvacūrṇitam // GarP_1,171.50 //	basta mUtram kzipet kozNam sEnDavena avacUrNitam // GarP_1,171.50 //
   jātīpatrarase tailaṃ pakvaṃ pūtikakarṇajit /	jAtI patra rase tElam pakvam pUtika karNa jit /
   śuṇṭhītailaṃ sārṣapaṃ ca kroṣṇaṃ syātkarṇaśūlanut // GarP_1,171.51 //	SuNWI tElam sArzapam ca krozNam syAt karNa SUla nud // GarP_1,171.51 //
   pañcamūliśṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ syāccitrakaharītakī /	paQcamUli SRtam kzIram syAt citraka harItakI /
   sarpirguḍaḥ ṣaḍaṅgaścayūṣaḥ pīnasaśāntaye // GarP_1,171.52 //	sarpiH guxaH zaxaFgaH ca yUzaH pInasa SAntaye // GarP_1,171.52 //
   akṣikukṣibhavā rogāḥ pratiśyāyavraṇajvarāḥ /	akzi kukzi BavAH rogAH pratiSyAya vraNa jvarAH /
   pañcaite pañcarātreṇa praśamaṃ yānti laṅghanāt // GarP_1,171.53 //	paQca ete paQca rAtreNa praSamam yAnti laFGanAt // GarP_1,171.53 //
   dhātrīrasānāñca dṛśaḥ kopaṃ harati pūraṇāt /	DAtrI rasa anAQca dRSaH kopam harati pUraNAt /
   sakṣaudraḥ saindhavo vāpi śigrudārvirasāñjanam // GarP_1,171.54 //	sa kzOdraH sEnDavaH vA api Sigru dArvi rasAQjanam // GarP_1,171.54 //
   haridrādārusindhūtthapathyājanavagaurikaiḥ /	haridrA dAru sinDUtTa paTyA janavagOrikEH /
   piṣṭairdatto bahirlapo netravyādhinivārakaḥ // GarP_1,171.55 //	pizwEH dattaH bahis lapaH netra vyADi nivArakaH // GarP_1,171.55 //
   mṛtabhraṣṭābhayālepāttriphalā kṣīrasaṃyutā /	mRta Brazwa aBayA lepAt triPalA kzIra saMyutA /
   śuṇṭhīnimbadalaiḥ piṣṭaiḥ sukhoṣṇaiḥ svalpasaindhavaiḥ /	SuNWI nimba dalEH pizwEH suKa uzNEH su alpa sEnDavEH /
   dhāryaścakṣuṣi saṃkṣepācchothakaṇḍūrujāpahaḥ // GarP_1,171.56 //	DAryaH cakzuzi saMkzepAt SoTa kaNxU rujA apahaH // GarP_1,171.56 //
   abhayākṣāmṛtaṃ caikadvicaturbhāgikaṃ yutam /	aBayA akza amRtam ca eka dvi catur BAgikam yutam /
   madhvājyalīḍhaṃ kvātho vā sarvanetrarugardanam // GarP_1,171.57 //	maDu Ajya lIXam kvATaH vA sarva netra ruj ardanam // GarP_1,171.57 //
   candanatriphalāpūgapalāśatarumūlakaiḥ /	candana triPalA pUga palASa taru mUlakEH /

   dadhnātighṛṣṭaṃ maricaṃ rātryāndhyāpahamañjanam /	daDnA atiGRzwam maricam rAtryA anDya apaham aQjanam /
   triphalākvāthakalkābhyāṃ sapayaskaṃ śṛtaṃ ghṛtam // GarP_1,171.59 //	triPalA kvATa kalkAByAm sa payaskam SRtam GRtam // GarP_1,171.59 //
   timirāṇyacirāddhanyātpītametanniśāmukhe /	timirANi acirAt hanyAt pItam etat niSA muKe /

   trikaṭu triphalā nakta saindhavaṃ ca manaḥ śilā /	trikawu triPalA nakta sEnDavam ca manaH SilA /

   rasāñjanaṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu payastathā /	rasAQjanam BRFgarAjam GRtam maDu payaH taTA /
   etatpiṣṭvā ca vaṭikā sarvanetrarugardinī // GarP_1,171.63 //	etat pizwvA ca vawikA sarva netra ruj ardinI // GarP_1,171.63 //
   dagdhameraṇḍakaṃ mūlaṃ lepātkākikapeṣitam /	dagDam eraNxakam mUlam lepAt kAkika pezitam /
   śiro 'rtiṃ nāśayatyāśu puṣpaṃ vā mucukundaka (ja) m // GarP_1,171.64 //	SiraH artim nASayati ASu puzpam vA mucukundakaH (ja) m // GarP_1,171.64 //
   śatamūlyairaṇḍamūlacakrāvyāghrīpalaiḥ śṛtam /	Sata mUlya eraNxa mUla cakra avyAGrI palEH SRtam /
   tailaṃ nasyamaruśleṣmatimirordhvar (ddha) gadāpaham // GarP_1,171.65 //	tElam nasya maru Slezma timira UrDvar (dDa) gadA apaham // GarP_1,171.65 //
   nācanaṃ (lanaṇaṃ) saguḍaṃ viśvaṃ pippalī vā sasaindhavā /	nAcanam (lanaNaM) sa guxam viSvam pippalI vA sa sEnDavAH /
   bhujastambhādirogeṣu sarveṣūrdhvagadeṣu ca // GarP_1,171.66 //	Buja stamBa Adi rogezu sarvezu UrDva gadezu ca // GarP_1,171.66 //
   sūryāvarte vidhātavyaṃ nasyakarmādibheṣajam /	sUryAvarte viDAtavyam nasya karma Adi Bezajam /
   daśamūlīkaṣāyaṃ tu sarpiḥ saindhavasaṃyutam /	daSamUlI kazAyam tu sarpiH sEnDava saMyutam /
   nasyamaṅgavibhedaghnaṃ sūryāvartaśiro 'rtinut // GarP_1,171.67 //	nasyam aFga viBeda Gnam sUryAvarta SiraH arti nud // GarP_1,171.67 //
   dadhnā sauvarcalājājīmadhūkaṃ nīlamutpalam /	daDnA sOvarcala ajAjI maDUkam nIlam utpalam /
   pibetkṣaudrayutaṃ nārī vātāsṛgdarapīḍitā // GarP_1,171.68 //	pibet kzOdra yutam nArI vAta asRj dara pIxitAH // GarP_1,171.68 //
   vāsakasvarasaṃ paitte guḍūcyā rasameva vā /	vAsaka svarasam pEtte guxUcyAH rasam eva vA /
   jalenāmalakībījaṃ kalkaṃ vāsasitāmadhu // GarP_1,171.69 //	jalena AmalakI bIjam kalkam vAsasitA maDu // GarP_1,171.69 //
   āmalakyā madhurasaṃ mūlaṃ kārpāsameva vā /	AmalakyA maDurasam mUlam kArpAsam eva vA /
   pāṇḍupradaraśāntyarthaṃ pibettaṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,171.70 //	pANxu pradara SAnti arTam pibet taNxula vAriNA // GarP_1,171.70 //
   taṇḍulīyakamūlaṃ tu sakṣaudre sarasāñjanam /	taNxulIyaka mUlam tu sa kzOdre sarasAQjanam /
   taṇḍulodakasaṃpītaṃ sarvāṃścāsṛkdarāñjayet /	taNxula udaka saMpItam sarvAn= ca asRkdarAn jayet /
   kuśamūlaṃ taṇḍulādbhiḥ pītaṃ cāsṛkdaraṃ jayet // GarP_1,171.71 //	kuSa mUlam taNxula adBiH pItam ca asRk daram jayet // GarP_1,171.71 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   nāḍīvraṇādicikitsāvarṇanaṃ nāmaikasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nAxIvraNAdicikitsAvarNanam nAma ekasaptatyuttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  172	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 172
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   vacopakuñcikājātīkṛṣṇāvāsakasaindhavam /	vacA upakuQcikA jAtI kRzNA vAsaka sEnDavam /

   pañcapallavapiṣṭāhvamālatīkusumairghṛtam /	paQca pallava pizwa Ahva mAlatI kusumEH GRtam /

   dhātryañjanābhayācūrṇaṃ toyapītaṃ rajo haret /	DAtrI aQjana aBayA cUrNam toya pItam rajaH haret /
   sadugdhā lakṣmaṇā pītā nasyādvā putradā ṛtau // GarP_1,172.7 //	sa dugDA lakzmaNA pItA nasyAt vA putra dAH RtO // GarP_1,172.7 //

   kuśakāśorucṛkānāṃ mṛlairgokṣurakasya ca /	kuSakASa Uru cRkAnAm mRlEH gokzurakasya ca /

   pāṭhālāṅgalisiṃhāmyamayūrakūṭajaiḥ pṛthak /	pAWA lAFgali siMha Ami a mayUra kUwa jEH pRTak /

   sūtāyā hṛcchirobastiśūlamarkanda (kvalla) saṃjñitam /	sUtAyAH hRd SiraH basti SUlam arkanda (kvalla) saMjQitam /

   aṅkoṭamūlaniṣkvāthaḥ sājyaḥ pīto viṣāntakaḥ /	aFkowa mUla nizkvATaH sa AjyaH pItaH vizAntakaH /

   sindūtyarārkarāśuṇṭhīkaṇāmadhuguḍaiḥ kramāt /	sindUti arArkarA SuNWI kaNA maDu guxEH kramAt /

   ghṛtaṃ śatāvarīkalkaiḥ kṣīrairdaśaguṇaiḥ pacet /	GRtam SatAvarI kalkEH kzIrEH daSaguNEH pacet /
   śarkarāpippalīkṣaudrayuktaṃ vā jārakaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,172.29 //	SarkarA pippalI kzOdra yuktam vA jArakam viduH // GarP_1,172.29 //

   pathyāni śālayo mudrā varṣāmbhaḥ kvathitaṃ payaḥ /	paTyAni SAlayaH mudrA varza amBaH kvaTitam payaH /

   dāḍimāmalakīkolakaramardpiyālakam /	dAxima AmalakI kola karamardpiyAlakam /

   pittalānyanilaghnāni kaphotkleśakarāṇica /	pittalAni anila GnAni kaPa utkleSa karANi ca /

   dhāmārgavaśca saṃyojyāḥ sarvathā vamaneṣvamī /	DAmArgavaH ca saMyojyAH sarvaTA vamanezu amI /

   mṛdukoṣṭaśca pittena kharo vātakaphāśrayāt /	mRdukozwaH ca pittena KaraH vAta kaPa ASrayAt /
   madhyamaḥ samadoṣe syāttrivṛttite virecanam // GarP_1,172.38 //	maDyamaH sama doze syAt trivRttite virecanam // GarP_1,172.38 //
   śarkarāmadhusaṃyuktaṃ saindhavaṃ nagaraṃ trivṛt /	SarkarA maDu saMyuktam sEnDavam nagaram trivRt /

   eraṇḍatailaṃ triphalākvāthaśca dviguṇastathā /	eraNxa tElam triPalA kvATaH ca dviguNaH taTA /
   vātolbaṇeṣu doṣeṣu bhojayitvātha vāmayet // GarP_1,172.40 //	vAta ulbaNezu dozezu BojayitvA aTa vAmayet // GarP_1,172.40 //
   vaṃśādinetraṃ kurvīta paḍaṣṭadvādaśāṅgulam /	vaMSa Adi netram kurvIta paxazwa dvAdaSa aFgulam /
   karkandhṛphalavacchidraṃ vastiruttānaśāyine // GarP_1,172.41 //	karkanDR Pala vat Cidram vastiH uttAna SAyine // GarP_1,172.41 //
   nirūhadāne 'pi vidhirayamevamudīritaḥ /	nirUha dAne api viDiH ayam evam udIritaH /
   ardhatripaṭpale mātrā laghumadhyottamaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,172.42 //	arDa tri pawpale mAtrA laGu maDya uttamaH kramAt // GarP_1,172.42 //
   pathyākṣavātryokadvicaturbhāga rugardanāḥ /	paTya akza vAtri oka dvi catur BAga ruj ardanAH /
   śatavaryasṛtābhṛṅgasindhuvārādibhāvitāḥ // GarP_1,172.43 //	Sata varI a sRtA BRFga sinDuvAra Adi BAvitAH // GarP_1,172.43 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   lavaṇāni yavakṣārasarjikādiśca lāvaṇaḥ /	lavaNAni yavakzAra sarjikAdiH ca lAvaNaH /

   dhanvatariruvāca /	Danva tariH uvAca /

   abhayā ca guḍūcī ca aṭarūpakavāgujī /	aBayA ca guxUcI ca awa rUpakavA gujI /

   etanmṛdvagninā pakvaṃ sthāpayedrājate śubhe /	etat mRdu agninA pakvam sTApayet rAjate SuBe /

   tailametatpraśamayedvalyākyaṃ rājavallabham /	tElam etat praSamayet valyAkyam rAja vallaBam /

   śatapuṣpaṃ devadāru māṃsī śaileyakaṃ balā /	Satapuzpam devadAru mAMsI SEleyakam balAH /

   varṣābhūvālayā vāpi vāsakana phalatrikaiḥ /	varzABU vAlayA vA api vAsakana PalatrikEH /

   musalyā daśamūlena khadireṇa vaṭādibhiḥ /	musalyAH daSamUlena KadireNa vawa AdiBiH /

   ghṛtena madhunā vāpi adbhiḥ khaṇḍaguḍādibhiḥ /	GRtena maDunA vA api adBiH KaNxa guxa AdiBiH /

   citrakārkatrivṛdvāpi yavānīhayamārakam /	citraka arka trivRt vA api yavAnI haya mArakam /

   jyotiṣmatīñca saṃbhṛtya tailaṃ dhīro vipācayet /	jyotizmatIQca saMBRtya tElam DIraH vipAcayet /

   śodhanaṃ gepaṇaṃ caiva sarvavarṇakaraṃ param /	SoDanam gepaNam ca eva sarva varNa karam param /

   ajamodaṃ sasindūraṃ haritālaṃ niśādvayam /	ajamodam sa sindUram haritAlam niSA dvayam /
   kṣāradvayaṃ phenayutamārdraka sara (śavaḥ lodbhavam // GarP_1,174.21 //	kzAra dvayam Pena yutam Ardraka saraH (SavaH lodBavam // GarP_1,174.21 //
   indravāruṇyapāmārgakadalaiḥ syandanaiḥ samam /	indravAruNI apAmArgaka dalEH syandanEH samam /
   ebhiḥ sarṣapajaṃ tailamajāmūtraiścayojitam // GarP_1,174.22 //	eBiH sarzapa jam tElam ajA mUtrEH ca yojitam // GarP_1,174.22 //
   mṛdvagninā pacedetgavyakṣīreṇa saṃyutam /	mRdu agninA pacet et gavya kzIreNa saMyutam /

   vidagdhastu pacetpakvaṃ caiva viśodhayet /	vidagDaH tu pacet pakvam ca eva viSoDayet /
   ropaṇaṃ mṛdubhāvaṃ ca tailenānena kārayet // GarP_1,174.24 //	ropaNam mRdu BAvam ca tElena anena kArayet // GarP_1,174.24 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   brāhmīghṛtādivarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	brAhmIGRtAdivarNanam nAma catuH saptatyuttaraSatatamaH aDyAyaH

   guñjāmūlaṃ chāgamūtre ghṛṣṭaṃ timiranucca tat raupyatāmrasuvarṇānāṃ	guQjA mUlam CAga mUtre GRzwam timira nud ca tat rOpya tAmra suvarNAnAm

   dūrvādāḍimapuṣpaṃ tu alaktakaharītakī /	dUrvA dAxima puzpam tu alaktaka harItakI /

   āpiṣṭvā jāṅgalī mū (tū) laṃ tadrasena vṛṣadhvaja /	ApizwvA jAFgalI mU (tU) lam tad rasena vRzaDvaja /

   satailaṃ vraṇanutsyācca sphuṭitoddhaṭitādhare /	sa tElam vraNa nud syAt ca sPuwita udDawita aDare /
   jātīpatraṃ ca carvitvā vidhṛtaṃ mukharoganut // GarP_1,177.23 //	jAtI patram ca carvitvA viDRtam muKa roga nud // GarP_1,177.23 //
   bhakṣātkesarabījasya dantāḥ syuścalitāḥsthirāḥ /	BakzAt kesara bIjasya dantAH syuH calitAH sTirAH /
   muṣṭakaṃ kuṣṭhamelā ca yaṣṭikaṃ madhuvālakam // GarP_1,177.24 //	muzwakam kuzWam elA ca yazwikam maDuvAlakam // GarP_1,177.24 //
   dhanyākametadadanānmukhadurgandhanuddhara /	DanyAkam etadadanAt muKa durganDa nud Dara /
   kaṣāyaṃ kaṭukaṃ vāpi tiktaśākasya bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,177.25 //	kazAyam kawukam vA api tiktaSAkasya BakzaNAt // GarP_1,177.25 //
   talayuktasya nityaṃ syānmukhadurgandhatākṣayaḥ /	tala yuktasya nityam syAt muKa durganDa tA kzayaH /
   dantavraṇāni sarvāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchantyanena tu // GarP_1,177.26 //	danta vraNAni sarvANi kzayam gacCanti anena tu // GarP_1,177.26 //
   kāñjikasya satailasya gaṇḍūṣakavalāsthitiḥ /	kAQjikasya sa tElasya gaNxUza kavala AsTitiH /
   tāmbūlacūrṇadagdhasya mukhasya vyādhinucchiva ! // GarP_1,177.27 //	tAmbUla cUrNa dagDasya muKasya vyADinucCiva ! // GarP_1,177.27 //
   parityaktaśleṣmaṇaśca śuṇṭhīcarvaṇato yathā /	parityakta SlezmaNaH ca SuNWI carvaNataH yaTA /
   mātuluṅgadalānyelā yaṣṭī madhu ca pippalī // GarP_1,177.28 //	mAtuluFga dalAni elA yazwI maDu ca pippalI // GarP_1,177.28 //
   jātīpatramathaiṣāṃ ca cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā tathā kṛtam /	jAtI patram aTa ezAm ca cUrNam lIXvA taTA kRtam /
   śephālikajaṭāyāśca carvaṇaṃ galaśuṇṭhinut // GarP_1,177.29 //	SePAlika jawAyAH ca carvaNam gala SuNWi nud // GarP_1,177.29 //
   nāsāśirāraktakarṣānnaśyecchaṃśakara jihvikā /	nAsA SirA rakta karzAt naSyet SaMSa kara jihvikA /
   rasaḥ śirīṣabījānāṃ haridrāyāścaturguṇaḥ // GarP_1,177.30 //	rasaH SirIza bIjAnAm haridrAyAH caturguNaH // GarP_1,177.30 //
   tena pakvena bhūteśa nasyaṃ mastakaroganut /	tena pakvena BUteSa nasyam mastaka roga nud /
   galarogā vinaśyanti nasyamātreṇa tatkṣaṇāt // GarP_1,177.31 //	gala rogAH vinaSyanti nasya mAtreNa tad kzaNAt // GarP_1,177.31 //
   dantakīṭavināśaḥ myādguñjāmūlasya carvaṇāt /	dantakIwa vinASaH myAdguQjA mUlasya carvaNAt /
   kākajaṅghāsnuhīnīlīkavāyo madhumojitaḥ // GarP_1,177.32 //	kAkajaFGA snuhI nIlIkavAyaH maDumojitaH // GarP_1,177.32 //
   dantākrāntāndantajāṃśca kṛmīnnāśayate śiva /	danta AkrAntAn danta jAn= ca kRmIt nASayate Siva /
   ghataṃ karkaṭapādena dugdhonmiśreṇa sādhitam // GarP_1,177.33 //	Gatam karkawa pAdena dugDa unmiSreNa sADitam // GarP_1,177.33 //
   tena cāmyaṅgitādantāḥ kuryuḥ kaṭakaṭānna hi /	tena ca ami aFgitA dantAH kuryuH kawakawAn na hi /
   liptvā karkaṭapādena kevalenāthavāśiva // GarP_1,177.34 //	liptvA karkawa pAdena kevalena aTavA aSiva // GarP_1,177.34 //
   trisaptāhaṃ vāḥ piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi /	tri sapta aham vAH pizwAni jyotizmatyAH PalAni hi /
   śuklābhayāmajjalepāddantasyāṅkakalaṅkanut // GarP_1,177.35 //	Sukla aBayA majja lepAt dantasya aFka kalaFka nud // GarP_1,177.35 //
   lodhrakuṅkumamañjiṣṭhālohakā leyakāni ca /	loDra kuFkuma maQjizWA lohakAH leyakAni ca /
   yavataṇḍulametaiśca yaṣṭī madhusamanvitaiḥ // GarP_1,177.36 //	yava taNxulam etEH ca yazwI maDu samanvitEH // GarP_1,177.36 //
   vāripiṣṭairvaktralepaḥ strīṇāṃ śobhanavaktrakṛt /	vAri pizwEH vaktra lepaH strINAm SoBana vaktra kRt /
   dvibhāgaṃ chāgadugdhena tailaprasthaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,177.37 //	dvi BAgam CAga dugDena tEla prasTam tu sADitam // GarP_1,177.37 //
   raktavandanamañjiṣṭhālakṣāṇāṃ karṣakeṇa vā /	rakta vandana maQjizWA lakzANAm karzakeNa vA /
   yaṣṭīmadhukuṅkumābhyāṃ saptāhānmukhakāntikṛt // GarP_1,177.38 //	yazwImaDu kuFkumAByAm sapta ahAt muKa kAnti kRt // GarP_1,177.38 //
   śuṇṭhīpippalicūrṇaṃ tu guḍūcī kaṇṭakārikā /	SuNWI pippali cUrNam tu guxUcI kaNwakArikAH /
   ebhiśca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,177.39 //	eBiH ca kvaTitam vAri pItam ca agnim karoti vE // GarP_1,177.39 //
   vātaśūlakṣayaṃ caiva kageti prathameśvara /	vAta SUla kzayam ca eva kaga iti praTameSvara /
   karañjaparpaṭośīraṃ bahatī kaṭurohiṇī // GarP_1,177.40 //	karaQja parpawa uSIram bahatI kawurohiNI // GarP_1,177.40 //
   gokṣuraṃ kvathitaṃ tvabhirvāri pītaṃ śramāpahan /	gokzuram kvaTitam tu aBiH vAri pItam Srama apahan /
   dāhaṃ pittaṃ jvaraṃ śoṣaṃ mūrchāṃ caiva kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,177.41 //	dAham pittam jvaram Sozam mUrCAm ca eva kzayam nayet // GarP_1,177.41 //
   madhvājyapippalīcūrṇaṃ kvathitaṃ kṣīrasaṃyutam /	maDu Ajya pippalI cUrNam kvaTitam kzIra saMyutam /
   pītaṃ hṛdrogakāsasya viṣamajvaranudbhavet // GarP_1,177.42 //	pItam hRd roga kAsasya vizamajvara nud Bavet // GarP_1,177.42 //
   kvāthaupadhīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ karṣārdhaṃ grāhyameva ca /	kvATa OpaDInAm sarvAsAm karza arDam grAhyam eva ca /
   vayo 'nurūyato jñeyo viśeṣo vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.43 //	vayaH anurUyataH jQeyaH viSezaH vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,177.43 //
   dugdhaṃ pītaṃ tu saṃyuktaṃ gopurīṣarasena ca /	dugDam pItam tu saMyuktam go purIza rasena ca /
   viṣamajvaranutsyācca kākajandhārasastathā // GarP_1,177.44 //	vizamajvara nutsyAt ca kAkajanDA rasaH taTA // GarP_1,177.44 //
   maśuṇṭhi kvathitaṃ kṣīgmajāyā jvaranudbhavet /	maSuNWi kvaTitam kzIgmajAyAH jvara nud Bavet /
   yaṣṭīmadhukamustaṃ ca saindhavaṃ bṛhatīphalam // GarP_1,177.45 //	yazwImaDuka mustam ca sEnDavam bRhatI Palam // GarP_1,177.45 //
   etairnasvapridānācca nidrā syātpurupasya ca /	etEH nasva pridAnAt ca nidrA syAt purupasya ca /
   marīcapradhvaśvalālānasyānnidrā bhavecchiva // GarP_1,177.46 //	marIca praDva Svala AlAnasya annidrA Bavet Siva // GarP_1,177.46 //
   mūlaṃ tu kākajaṅghāyā nidrākṛtsyācchirasthitam /	mUlam tu kAkajaFGAyAH nidrA kRt syAt Sira sTitam /
   siddhaṃ tailaṃ kāñjikena tathā sarjarasena ca // GarP_1,177.47 //	sidDam tElam kAQjikena taTA sarjarasena ca // GarP_1,177.47 //
   śītodakasamāyuktaṃ lepātsantāpanāśanam /	SIta udaka samAyuktam lepAt santApa nASanam /
   śoṇitajvaradāhebhyo jātasantāpanuttathā // GarP_1,177.48 //	SoNita jvara dAheByaH jAta santApa nud taTA // GarP_1,177.48 //
   śṛkaśaivālamanthaśca śuṇṭhīpāpāṇabhedakam /	SRka SEvAla manTaH ca SuNWI pApANa Bedakam /
   śauvāñjanaṃ gokṣuraṃ vā varuṇacchannameva ca // GarP_1,177.49 //	SOva aQjanam gokzuram vA varuNa= Cannam eva ca // GarP_1,177.49 //
   saubhāñjanasya mūlaṃ ca etaiḥ kvathitavāri ca /	sOBAQjanasya mUlam ca etEH kvaTita vAri ca /
   dattvā hiṅguyavakṣāraṃ pītaṃ vātavināśanam // GarP_1,177.50 //	dattvA hiFgu yavakzAram pItam vAta vinASanam // GarP_1,177.50 //
   pippalī pippalīmūlaṃ tathā bhallātakaṃ śiva /	pippalI pippalI mUlam taTA BallAtakam Siva /
   vāryetaiḥ kvathitaṃ pītaṃ varaśūlāpahārakṛt // GarP_1,177.51 //	vAri etEH kvaTitam pItam vara SUla apahAra kRt // GarP_1,177.51 //
   aśvagandhāmūlakābhyāṃ siddhā valmīkamṛttikā /	aSvaganDA mUlakAByAm sidDA valmIka mRttikA /
   etayā mardanādrudra ūrustambhaḥ praśāmyati // GarP_1,177.52 //	etayA mardanAt rudraH UrustamBaH praSAmyati // GarP_1,177.52 //
   bṛhatīkasya vai mūlaṃ saṃpiṣṭamudakena ca /	bRhatIkasya vE mUlam saMpizwam udakena ca /
   pītaṃ saṃghātavātasya vipāṭanakṛdeva ca // GarP_1,177.53 //	pItam saMGAta vAtasya vipAwa na kRt eva ca // GarP_1,177.53 //
   pītaṃ takreṇa mūlaṃ ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca /	pItam takreNa mUlam ca Ardrasya tagarasya ca /
   haret jhiñjinīvātaṃ?vai vṛkṣamindrāśaniryathā // GarP_1,177.54 //	haret JiQjinI vAtaM?vE vRkzam indra aSaniH yaTA // GarP_1,177.54 //
   asthisaṃhāramekena bhaktena saha vāditam /	asTi saMhAram ekena Baktena saha vAditam /
   patiṃ māṃsarasenāpi vātanuccāsthibhaṅganut // GarP_1,177.55 //	patim mAMsa rasena api vAta nud ca asTi BaFga nud // GarP_1,177.55 //
   ghṛtaliptaṃ saśuṣkaṃ ca chāgīkṣīreṇa saṃyutam /	GRta liptam sa Suzkam ca CAgI kzIreNa saMyutam /
   tallopātpādayārnaṃśyetsakṣepye cātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,177.56 //	tad lopAt pAdayArnaMSyet sa kzepye ca atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,177.56 //
   madhvājyasaindhavaṃ sikthaṃ guḍakairikaguggulaiḥ /	maDu Ajya sEnDavam sikTam guxakErika guggulEH /
   sasarjarasasphuṭitaḥ klomaśuddhiśca lepanāt // GarP_1,177.57 //	sa sarjarasa sPuwitaH kloma SudDiH ca lepanAt // GarP_1,177.57 //
   kaṭutailena lipto vai vidhūmāgnau pratāpitaḥ /	kawutElena liptaH vE viDUma agnO pratApitaH /
   mṛttikārakhāditaḥ pādaḥ samaḥ syādvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.58 //	mRttikAra KAditaH pAdaH samaH syAt vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,177.58 //
   sarjarasāḥ sikthakaṃ ca jīrakaṃ ca harītakī /	sarjarasAH sikTakam ca jIrakam ca harItakI /
   utsādhitaghṛtābhyaṅgo hyagnidagdhavyathāpanut // GarP_1,177.59 //	utsADita GRta aByaFgaH hi agni dagDa vyaTA apanud // GarP_1,177.59 //
   tilatailaṃ cāgnidagdhaṃ yavabhasmasamanvitam /	tila tElam ca agni dagDam yava Basma samanvitam /

   navanītaṃ māhiṣaṃ ca dagdhapiṣṭatilāni ca /	navanItam mAhizam ca dagDa pizwa tilAni ca /
   sabhallākaṃ vraṇaṃ naśyeddhṛcchūlaṃ nasyalepanāt // GarP_1,177.61 //	sa BallAkam vraNam naSyet hRd SUlam nasya lepanAt // GarP_1,177.61 //
   karpūragavyasarpirbhyāṃ prahāraḥ pūrito hara /	karpUra gavya sarpirByAm prahAraH pUritaH hara /
   śastrodbhavaḥ sabaddhaśca śuklavarṇena śaṅkara ! /	Sastra udBavaH sa badDaH ca Sukla varNena SaFkara ! /
   pākaṃ ca vedanāṃ caiva saṃspṛśedvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.62 //	pAkam ca vedanAm ca eva saMspRSet vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,177.62 //
   āmra (tasya) mūlarasenaiva śastraghātaḥ prapūritaḥ /	AmraH (tasya) mUla rasena eva Sastra GAtaH prapUritaH /
   ḍhaukate śastraghātābhyāṃ nirvraṇo ghṛpūritaḥ // GarP_1,177.63 //	XOkate Sastra GAtAByAm nirvraNaH GRpUritaH // GarP_1,177.63 //
   śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā caiṣāṃ tu mūlakam /	SarapuFKA lajjAlukA pAWA ca ezAm tu mUlakam /
   jalapiṣṭaṃ tasya lepācchastraghātaḥ praśāmyati // GarP_1,177.64 //	jala pizwam tasya lepAt Sastra GAtaH praSAmyati // GarP_1,177.64 //
   mūlaṃ ca kākajaṅghāyāstrirātreṇaiva śoṣitaḥ /	mUlam ca kAkajaFGAyAH tri rAtreNa eva SozitaH /
   pākapūtiṃ vedanāṃ ca hanti vai rohito vraṇe // GarP_1,177.65 //	pAkapUtim vedanAm ca hanti vE rohitaH vraNe // GarP_1,177.65 //
   sajalaṃ tilatailaṃ ca apāmārgasya mūlakam /	sa jalam tila tElam ca apAmArgasya mUlakam /
   tatsekadānānnaśyecca prahārodbhavavedanā // GarP_1,177.66 //	tad seka dAnAt naSyet ca prahAra udBava vedanAH // GarP_1,177.66 //
   abhayāṃ saindhavaṃ śuṇṭhīmetatpiṣṭvodakena tu /	aBayAm sEnDavam SuNWIm etat pizwvA udakena tu /
   bhakṣayitvā hyajīrṇasya nāśo bhavati śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,177.67 //	BakzayitvA hi ajIrNasya nASaH Bavati SaFkara ! // GarP_1,177.67 //
   kaṭibaddhaṃ nimbamūlamakṣisūlaharaṃ bhavet /	kawi badDam nimba mUlam akzi sUla haram Bavet /
   śaṇamūlaṃ satāmbūlaṃ dagdhamindriyakasya (lpa) hṛt // GarP_1,177.68 //	SaNa mUlam sa tAmbUlam dagDam indriyakasya (lpa) hRd // GarP_1,177.68 //
   annasvinnaharidrā ca śvetasarṣapamūlakam /	anna svinna haridrA ca Sveta sarzapa mUlakam /
   bījāni mātuluṅgasya eṣāmudvartanaṃ samam /	bIjAni mAtuluFgasya ezAm udvartanam samam /
   saptarātraprayogeṇa śubhadehakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,177.69 //	sapta rAtra prayogeNa SuBa deha karam Bavet // GarP_1,177.69 //
   śvetāparājitāpatraṃ nimbapatrarasena tu /	Sveta aparAjitA patram nimba patra rasena tu /
   nasyadānāḍḍākinīnāṃ mātṝṇāṃ brahmarakṣasām /	nasya dAnAxxAkinInAm mAtLNAm brahma rakzasAm /
   mokṣaḥ syānmadhusāreṇa nasyācca vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.70 //	mokzaH syAt maDu sAreNa nasyAt ca vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,177.70 //
   mūlaṃ śvetajayantyāśca puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /	mUlam Sveta jayantyAH ca puzya Rkze tu samAhRtam /
   śvetāparājitārkasya citrakasya ca mūlakam /	Sveta aparAjita arkasya citrakasya ca mUlakam /
   kṛtvā tu vaṭikāṃ nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet // GarP_1,177.71 //	kRtvA tu vawikAm nArI tilakena vaSI Bavet // GarP_1,177.71 //
   pippalīlohacūrṇaṃ tu śuṇṭhīścāmalakāni ca /	pippalI loha cUrNam tu SuNWIH ca AmalakAni ca /
   samāni rudra jānīyātsaindhavaṃ madhuśarkarā // GarP_1,177.72 //	samAni rudra jAnIyAt sEnDavam maDu SarkarA // GarP_1,177.72 //
   udumbarapramāṇena saptāhaṃ bhakṣaṇātsamam /	udumbara pramANena sapta aham BakzaNAt samam /
   pumāṃśca balavānsa syājjīvedvarṣaśatadvayam /	pumAn= ca balavAn sa syAt jIvet varza Sata dvayam /
   oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarvavaśyaprayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarvakāmakṛt //	om Wa Wa WaH iti sarva vaSya prayogezu prayuktaH sarva kAma kRt //
   GarP_1,177.73 //	GarP_1,177.73 //
   saṃgṛhya vidvānkākasya nilayaṃ pradahecca tat /	saMgRhya vidvAn kAkasya nilayam pradahet ca tat /
   citāgnau bhasma tacchatrordattaṃ śirasi śaṅkara // GarP_1,177.74 //	citA agnO Basma tat SatroH dattam Sirasi SaFkara // GarP_1,177.74 //
   tamuccāṭayate rudra śṛṇu tadyogamuttamam /	tam uccAwayate rudra SRNu tad yogam uttamam /
   niḥ kṣiptaṃ ca purīṣaṃ vai vanamūṣikacarmaṇi // GarP_1,177.75 //	niH kziptam ca purIzam vE vanamUzika carmaNi // GarP_1,177.75 //
   kaṭitantunibaddhaṃ vai kuryānmalanirodhanam /	kawi tantu nibadDam vE kuryAt mala niroDanam /
   kṛṣṇakākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca // GarP_1,177.76 //	kRzNa kAkasya raktena yasya nAma pralipya ca // GarP_1,177.76 //
   cyutadale madhyamadhye tato niḥ kṣipyate hara ! /	cyuta dale maDya maDye tatas niH kzipyate hara ! /
   sa khādyate kākavṛndairnārī puruṣa eva ca // GarP_1,177.77 //	sa KAdyate kAka vRndEH nArI puruzaH eva ca // GarP_1,177.77 //
   śarkarāmadhvajākṣīraṃ tilagokṣurakaṃ samam /	SarkarAm aDvajA kzIram tila gokzurakam samam /
   sa śatruṃ nāśayedrudra ! uccāṭitamidaṃ hara ! // GarP_1,177.78 //	sa Satrum nASayet rudra ! uccAwitam idam hara ! // GarP_1,177.78 //
   ulūkakṛṣṇakākasya bilvasyātha samicchatam /	ulUka kRzNa kAkasya bilvasya aTa samicCatam /
   rudhireṇa samāyuktaṃ yayornāmnā tu hūyate /	ruDireNa samAyuktam yayoH nAmnA tu hUyate /
   tayormadhye mahāvairaṃ bhavennāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,177.79 //	tayoH maDye mahA vEram Bavet na asti atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,177.79 //
   bhāvitaṃ ṛkṣadugdhena matsyasya rohitasya ca /	BAvitam Rkza dugDena matsyasya rohitasya ca /
   māṃsaṃ tatsādhitaṃ tailaṃ tadabhyaṅgācca roganut /	mAMsam tat sADitam tElam tad aByaFgAt ca roga nud /
   candanodakanasyāttu romotthānaṃ bhavetpunaḥ // GarP_1,177.80 //	candana udaka nasyAt tu roma utTAnam Bavet punar // GarP_1,177.80 //
   haste lāṅgalikākandaṃ gṛhītaṃ tena lepitam /	haste lAFgalikA kandam gRhItam tena lepitam /
   śarīraṃ yena sa pumānvṛddherdarpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_1,177.81 //	SarIram yena sa pumAn vRdDeH darpam vyapohati // GarP_1,177.81 //
   mayūrarudhireṇaiva jīvaṃ saṃharate śiva /	mayUra ruDireNa eva jIvam saMharate Siva /
   jvalatāṃ tu bhujaṅgānāṃ bilasthānāmapīśvara // GarP_1,177.82 //	jvalatAm tu BujaFgAnAm bila sTAnAm api ISvara // GarP_1,177.82 //
   dehaścitāgnau dagdhaśca sarpasyājagarasya hi /	dehaH citA agnO dagDaH ca sarpasya ajagarasya hi /
   tadbhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptaṃ śatraṇāṃ bhaṅgakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,177.83 //	tat Basma saMmuKe kziptam SatraNAm BaFga kRt Bavet // GarP_1,177.83 //
   mantreṇānena tatkṣiptaṃ mahābhaṅgakaraṃ ripoḥ /	mantreNa anena tat kziptam mahA BaFga karam ripoH /
   oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha cāhīhicāhīhi svāhā /	om Wa Wa Wa ca ahIhicAhi ihi svAhA /
   oṃ udaraṃ pāhihi pāhihisvāhā // GarP_1,177.84 //	om udaram pAhihi pAhi hi svAhAH // GarP_1,177.84 //
   sudarśanāyā malaṃ tu puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /	sudarSanAyAH malam tu puzya Rkze tu samAhRtam /
   niḥ kṣiptaṃ gṛhamadhye tu bhujaṅgā varjayanti tat // GarP_1,177.85 //	niH kziptam gRha maDye tu BujaFgAH varjayanti tat // GarP_1,177.85 //
   arkamūlena raviṇā arkāgnijvalitā śiva /	arka mUlena raviNA arka agni jvalitA SivaH /
   yuktā siddhārthatailena vartirmārgāhināśinī // GarP_1,177.86 //	yuktA sidDArTa tElena vartiH mArga ahi nASinI // GarP_1,177.86 //
   mārjārapalalaṃ viṣṭhā haritālaṃ ca bhāvitam /	mArjAra palalam vizWA haritAlam ca BAvitam /
   chāga mūtreṇa tallipto mūṣiko mūṣikānharet // GarP_1,177.87 //	CAga mUtreNa tad liptaH mUzikaH mUzikAn haret // GarP_1,177.87 //
   mukto hi mandire rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	muktaH hi mandire rudra na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   viphalārjunapuṣpāṇi bhallātakaśirīṣakam // GarP_1,177.88 //	viPala arjuna puzpANi BallAtaka SirIzakam // GarP_1,177.88 //
   lākṣā sarjarasaścaiva viḍaṅgaścaiva gugguluḥ /	lAkzA sarjarasaH ca eva vixaFgaH ca eva gugguluH /
   etairdhūpo makṣikāṇāṃ maśakāṇāṃ vināśanaḥ // GarP_1,177.89 //	etEH DUpaH makzikANAm maSakANAm vinASanaH // GarP_1,177.89 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  178	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 178
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   brahmadaṇḍīvacākuṣṭhaṃ priyaṅgarnāgakeśaram /	brahmadaNxI vacA kuzWam priyaFgarnAga keSaram /
   dadyāttāmbūlasaṃyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ mantreṇa tadvaśam /	dadyAt tAmbUla saMyuktam strINAm mantreNa tad vaSam /
   oṃ nārāyaṇyai svāhā // GarP_1,178.1 //	om nArAyaNyE svAhA // GarP_1,178.1 //
   tāmbūlaṃ yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syātsumantrataḥ /	tAmbUlam yasya dIyeta sa vaSI syAt sumantrataH /
   oṃ hariḥ hariḥ svāhā // GarP_1,178.2 //	om hariH hariH svAhA // GarP_1,178.2 //
   godantaṃ haritālañca saṃyuktaṃ kākajihvayā /	godantam haritAlaQca saMyuktam kAka jihvayA /
   cūrṇokṛtya yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet /	cUrNokRtya yasya Sire dIyate sa vaSI Bavet /
   śvetasarṣapanirmālyaṃ yadgṛhe tadvināśakṛt // GarP_1,178.3 //	Sveta sarzapa nirmAlyam yat gRhe tad vinASa kRt // GarP_1,178.3 //
   vaibhī takaṃ śākhoṭakaṃ mūlaṃ patreṇa saṃyutam /	vEBI takam SAKowakam mUlam patreNa saMyutam /
   sthāpyate yadgṛhadvāre tatra vai kalaho bhavet // GarP_1,178.4 //	sTApyate yat gRha dvAre tatra vE kalahaH Bavet // GarP_1,178.4 //
   khañjarīṭasya māṃsaṃ tu madhunā saha peṣayet /	KaQjarIwasya mAMsam tu maDunA saha pezayet /
   ṛtukāleyonilepātpuruṣo dāsatāmiyāt // GarP_1,178.5 //	Rtu kAleyaH nilepAt puruzaH dAsa tAm iyAt // GarP_1,178.5 //
   aguruṃ gugguluṃ caiva nīlotpalasamanvitam /	agurum guggulum ca eva nIlotpala samanvitam /
   guḍena dhūpayitvā tu rājadvāre priyo bhavet // GarP_1,178.6 //	guxena DUpayitvA tu rAja dvAre priyaH Bavet // GarP_1,178.6 //
   śvetāpa rājitāmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ rocanayā yutam /	SvetApa rAjitA mUlam pizwam rocanayA yutam /
   yaṃ paśyettilakenaiva vaśī karyānnṛpālaye // GarP_1,178.7 //	yam paSyet tilakena eva vaSI karyAt nRpa Alaye // GarP_1,178.7 //
   kākajaṅghā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ nimbapatraṃ sukuṅkumam /	kAkajaFGA vacA kuzWam nimba patram su kuFkumam /
   ātmaraktasamāyuktaṃ vaśī bhavati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,178.8 //	Atma rakta samAyuktam vaSI Bavati mAnavaH // GarP_1,178.8 //
   āraṇyasya biḍālasya gṛhitvā rudhiraṃ śubham /	AraNyasya bixAlasya gRhitvA ruDiram SuBam /
   karañjataile tadbhāvyaṃ rudrāgnau kajjalaṃ tataḥ /	karaQja tEle tat BAvyam rudra agnO kajjalam tatas /
   pātayetpadmapatreṇa hādṛśyaḥ syāttadañjanāt // GarP_1,178.9 //	pAtayet padma patreNa hAdRSyaH syAt tad aQjanAt // GarP_1,178.9 //
   oṃ namaḥ khaḍgavajrapāṇaye mahāyakṣasenāpataye svāhā /	om namaH Kaxga vajrapANaye mahA yakza senApataye svAhA /
   oṃ rudraṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ varaśaktā tvaritāvidyā /	om rudram hrAm hrIm vara SaktA tvarita avidyA /
   oṃ mātaraḥ stambhayasvāhā /	om mAtaraH stamBayasvAhAH /
   sahasraṃ parijapyāttu vidyeyaṃ cauravāriṇī /	sahasram parijapyAt tu vidyA iyam cOra vAriNI /
   mahāsugandhikāmūlaṃ śukraṃ stambhetkaṭau sthitam // GarP_1,178.10 //	mahA suganDikA mUlam Sukram stamBet kawO sTitam // GarP_1,178.10 //
   oṃ namaḥ sarvasattvebhyo namaḥ siddhiṃ kuru kuru svāhā /	om namaH sarva sattveByaH namaH sidDim kuru kuru svAhA /
   saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā karavīrasya puṣpakam /	sapta aBimantritam kRtvA karavIrasya puzpakam /
   strīṇāmagre bhrāmayacca kṣaṇādvai sā vaśe bhavet // GarP_1,178.11 //	strINAm agre BrAmayat ca kzaNAt vE sA vaSe Bavet // GarP_1,178.11 //
   brahmadaṇḍīṃ vacāṃ patraṃ madhunā saha peṣayet /	brahmadaNxIm vacAm patram maDunA saha pezayet /
   aṅgalepācca vanitā nānyaṃ bhartāramicchati // GarP_1,178.12 //	aFga lepAt ca vanitA na anyam BartAram icCati // GarP_1,178.12 //
   brahmadaṇḍīśikhā vaktre kṣiptā śukrasya stambhanam /	brahmadaNxI SiKA vaktre kziptA Sukrasya stamBanam /

   bhṛṅgarājasya mūlaṃ tu piṣṭaṃ śukreṇa saṃyutam /	BRFgarAjasya mUlam tu pizwam SukreNa saMyutam /
   akṣiṇī cāñjayitvā tu vaśī karyānnaraṃ kila // GarP_1,178.14 //	akziNI ca aQjayitvA tu vaSI karyAt naram kila // GarP_1,178.14 //
   aparājitāśikhāntu nīlotpalasamanvitām /	aparAjita aSiKA antu nIlotpala samanvitAm /
   tāmbūlena pra (dānā) dadyācca vaśīkaraṇamuttamam // GarP_1,178.15 //	tAmbUlena pra (dAnA) dadyAt ca vaSIkaraNam uttamam // GarP_1,178.15 //
   aṅguṣṭhe ca pade gulphe jānau ca jaghane tathā /	aFguzWe ca pade gulPe jAnO ca jaGane taTA /
   nābhau vakṣasi kukṣau ca kakṣe kaṇṭhe kapolake // GarP_1,178.16 //	nABO vakzasi kukzO ca kakze kaNWe kapolake // GarP_1,178.16 //
   oṣṭhe netre lalāṭe ca mūrdhni candrakalāḥ sthitāḥ /	ozWe netre lalAwe ca mUrDni candra kalAH sTitAH /
   strīṇāṃ pakṣe site kṛṣṇe ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitā nṛṇām // GarP_1,178.17 //	strINAm pakze site kRzNe UrDva aDas saMsTitAH nRNAm // GarP_1,178.17 //
   vāmāṅge dakṣiṇāṅge ca kramādrudra dravādikṛt /	vAma aFge dakziNa aFge ca kramAt rudra drava Adi kRt /
   catuḥ ṣaṣṭi kalāḥ proktāḥ kāmaśāstre vaśīkarāḥ /	catuH zazwi kalAH proktAH kAmaSAstre vaSIkarAH /
   āliṅganādyā nārīṇāṃ kamārīṇāṃ vaśīkarāḥ // GarP_1,178.18 //	AliFgana AdyAH nArINAm kamArINAm vaSIkarAH // GarP_1,178.18 //
   rocanāgandhupuṣpāṇi nimbapuṣpaṃ priyaṅgavaḥ /	rocanA ganDu puzpANi nimba puzpam priyaFgavaH /
   kuṅkamaṃ candanañcaiva tilakena jagadvaśet // GarP_1,178.19 //	kuFkamam candanaQca eva tilakena jagat vaSet // GarP_1,178.19 //
   oṃ hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyaṃ putravaśādi dehi me /	om hrIm gOri devi sOBAgyam putra vaSa Adi dehi me /
   oṃ hrīṃ lakṣmi ! devi saubhāgyaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyamohanam // GarP_1,178.20	om hrIm lakzmi ! devi sOBAgyam sarvam trElokya mohanam // GarP_1,178.20
   sagandhasya haridrāyāḥ kuṅkamānāṃ ca lepataḥ /	sa ganDasya haridrAyAH kuFkamAnAm ca lepataH /
   vaśayedrudra dhūpaśca tathāpuṣpasugandhayoḥ // GarP_1,178.21 //	vaSayet rudra DUpaH ca taTA puzpa suganDayoH // GarP_1,178.21 //
   durālabhā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ kuṅkumañca śatāvarī /	durAlaBA vacA kuzWam kuFkumaQca SatAvarI /

   nimbakāṣṭhasya dhūmena dhūpayitvā bhagaṃ vadhūḥ /	nimba kAzWasya DUmena DUpayitvA Bagam vaDUH /
   subhagāsyātsāti rudra patirdāso bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,178.23 //	suBaga AsyAt sAti rudra patiH dAsaH Bavizyati // GarP_1,178.23 //
   māhiṣaṃ navanītañca kaṣṭañca madhuyaṣṭikā /	mAhizam navanI taQca kazwaQca maDuyazwikAH /
   saubhāgyaṃ bhagalepātsyāt patirdāso bhavettathā // GarP_1,178.24 //	sOBAgyam Baga lepAt syAt patiH dAsaH Bavet taTA // GarP_1,178.24 //
   madhuyaṣṭiśca gokṣīraṃ tathā ca kaṇṭakārikā /	maDuyazwiH ca go kzIram taTA ca kaNwakArikAH /
   etāni samabhāgāni pibeduṣṇena vāriṇā /	etAni sama BAgAni pibet uzNena vAriNA /
   caturbhāgāvaśeṣeṇa garbhasambhavamuttamam // GarP_1,178.25 //	catur BAga avaSezeNa garBa samBavam uttamam // GarP_1,178.25 //
   mātuluṅgasya bījāni kṣīreṇa saha bhāvayet /	mAtuluFgasya bIjAni kzIreNa saha BAvayet /
   tatpītvā labhate garbhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,178.26 //	tat pItvA laBate garBam na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,178.26 //
   mātuluṅgasya bījāni mūlānyeraṇḍakasya ca /	mAtuluFgasya bIjAni mUlAni eraNxakasya ca /
   ghṛtena saha saṃyojya pāyayetputrakākṣiṇī // GarP_1,178.27 //	GRtena saha saMyojya pAyayet putrakAkziNI // GarP_1,178.27 //
   paśvagandhā mṛta dugdha kvathitaṃ mutrakārakam /	paSvaganDA mRta dugDa kvaTitam mutra kArakam /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   hyaṣṭasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	hi azwasaptati aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  179	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 179
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   haritālaṃ yavakṣāṃraṃ patrāṅgaṃ raktacandanam /	haritAlam yavakzAMram patra aFgam raktacandanam /
   jātihiṅgulakaṃ lākṣāṃ paktvā dantānpralepayet // GarP_1,179.1 //	jAti hiFgulakam lAkzAm paktvA dantAn pralepayet // GarP_1,179.1 //
   harītakīkaṣāyeṇa mṛṣṭvā dantānpralepayet /	harItakI kazAyeNa mRzwvA dantAn pralepayet /
   dantāḥ syurlohitāḥ puṃsaḥ śvetā rudra na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.2 //	dantAH syuH lohitAH puMsaH SvetAH rudra na saMSayaH // GarP_1,179.2 //
   mūlakaṃ svidya mandāgnau rasaṃ tasya prapūrayet /	mUlakam svidya manda agnO rasam tasya prapUrayet /
   karṇayoḥ pūraṇāttena karṇastrāvo vinaśyati // GarP_1,179.3 //	karNayoH pUraNAt tena karNaH trAvaH vinaSyati // GarP_1,179.3 //
   arkapatraṃ gṛhītvā tu mandāgnau tāpayecchanaiḥ /	arka patram gRhItvA tu manda agnO tApayet SanEs /

   priyaṅgumadhukā caiva dhātakyutpalapāṅktibhiḥ /	priyaFgu maDukA ca eva DAtakI utpala pAFktiBiH /
   mañjiṣṭhā lodhralākṣābhiḥ kapitthasvarasena ca /	maQjizWA loDra lAkzABiH kapitTa svarasena ca /
   pacettailaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ naśyetkledaḥ prapūraṇāt // GarP_1,179.5 //	pacet tElam taTA strINAm naSyet kledaH prapUraNAt // GarP_1,179.5 //
   śuṣkamūlakaśuṇṭhīnāṃ kṣāro hiṅgumahauṣadham /	Suzka mUlaka SuNWInAm kzAraH hiFgu mahOzaDam /
   satapuṣpāvacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāru śigra rasāñjanam // GarP_1,179.6 //	sata puzpa avacA kuzWam dAru Sigra rasAQjanam // GarP_1,179.6 //
   sauvarcalaṃ yavakṣāraṃ tathā sarjakasaindhavam /	sOvarcalam yavakzAram taTA sarjaka sEnDavam /
   tathā granthirviḍaṃ mustaṃ madhuyuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,179.7 //	taTA granTiH vixam mustam maDu yuktam caturguNam // GarP_1,179.7 //
   mātuluṃ garasastadvatkadalyāśca raso hi taiḥ /	mAtulum garasaH tadvat kadalyAH ca rasaH hi tEH /
   pakvatailaṃ haredāśu strāvādīṃśca na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.8 //	pakva tElam haret ASu strA= AdIn= ca na saMSayaH // GarP_1,179.8 //
   karṇayoḥ kṛmināśaḥ syātkaṭutailasya pūraṇāt /	karNayoH kRmi nASaH syAt kawutElasya pUraNAt /
   haridrā nimbapatrāṇi pippalyo maricāni ca // GarP_1,179.9 //	haridrA nimba patrANi pippalyaH maricAni ca // GarP_1,179.9 //
   viḍaṅgabhadraṃ mustañca saptamaṃ viśvabheṣajam /	vixaFgaBadram mustaQca saptamam viSvaBezajam /
   gomūtreṇa ca piṣṭvaiva kṛtvā ca vaṭikāṃ hara ! /	go mUtreNa ca pizwvA eva kRtvA ca vawikAm hara ! /
   ajīrṇahṛdbhaveccaikaṃ dvayaṃ viṣūcikāpaham // GarP_1,179.10 //	ajIrNa hRt Bavet ca ekam dvayam vizUcika apaham // GarP_1,179.10 //
   paṭolaṃ madhunā hanti gomūtreṇa tathābudam /	pawolam maDunA hanti go mUtreNa taTA abudam /
   eṣā ca śaṅkarī vartiḥ sarvanetrāmayā pahā // GarP_1,179.11 //	ezA ca SaFkarI vartiH sarva netra AmayA pahAH // GarP_1,179.11 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   ekonāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	ekonASIti aDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  180	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 180
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   vacā māṃsī ca bilvañca tagaraṃ padmakesaram /	vacA mAMsI ca bilvaQca tagaram padma kesaram /
   nāgapuṣpaṃ priyaṅguñca samabhāgāni cūrṇayet /	nAgapuzpam priyaFguQca sama BAgAni cUrNayet /
   anena dhūpito martyaḥ kāmavadvicarenmahīm // GarP_1,180.1 //	anena DUpitaH martyaH kAma vat vicaret mahIm // GarP_1,180.1 //
   karpūraṃ devadāruñca madhunā saha yojayet /	karpUram devadAruQca maDunA saha yojayet /
   liṅgalepācca tenaiva vaśīkuryātstriyaṃ kila // GarP_1,180.2 //	liFga lepAt ca tena eva vaSIkuryAt striyam kila // GarP_1,180.2 //
   maithunaṃ puruṣo gacchedgṛhṇīyātsvakamindriyam /	mETunam puruzaH gacCet gRhNIyAt svakam indriyam /
   vāmahastena vāmañca hastaṃ liṃpettu yatstriyāḥ /	vAma hastena vAmaQca hastam liMpet tu yat striyAH /
   āliptā strī vaśaṃ yāti nānyaṃ puruṣamicchati // GarP_1,180.3 //	AliptA strI vaSam yAti na anyam puruzam icCati // GarP_1,180.3 //
   oṃ raktacāmuṇḍe amukaṃ me vaśamānaya ānaya oṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hraḥ phaṭ /	om rakta cAmuNxe amukam me vaSam AnayaH Anaya om hrIm hrEm hraH Paw /
   imaṃ japtvāyutaṃ mantraṃ tilakena ca śaṅkara ! /	imam japtvA ayutam mantram tilakena ca SaFkara ! /
   gorocanāsaṃyutena svaraktena vaśī bhavet // GarP_1,180.4 //	gorocanA saMyutena sva raktena vaSI Bavet // GarP_1,180.4 //
   saindhavaṃ kṛṣṇalavaṇaṃ sauvīraṃ matsyapittakam /	sEnDavam kRzNalavaNam sOvIram matsya pittakam /
   madhu sarpiḥ sitāyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ tadbhagalepanāt // GarP_1,180.5 //	maDu sarpiH sitA yuktam strINAm tad Baga lepanAt // GarP_1,180.5 //
   yaḥ pumānmaithunaṃ gacchennānyāṃ nārīṃ gamiṣyati /	yaH pumAn mETunam gacCet na anyAm nArIm gamizyati /
   śaṅkapuṣpī vacā māṃsī soma rājī ca phalgukam // GarP_1,180.6 //	SaFkapuzpI vacA mAMsI soma rAjI ca Palgukam // GarP_1,180.6 //
   māhiṣaṃ navanītañca tvakīkṛtya bhiṣagvaraḥ /	mAhizam navanI taQca tu akIkRtya Bizaj varaH /
   samūlāni sa patrāṇi kṣīreṇājyena peṣayet // GarP_1,180.7 //	sa mUlAni sa patrANi kzIreNa Ajyena pezayet // GarP_1,180.7 //
   guṭikāṃ śodhitāṃ kṛtvā nārīyonyā praveśayet /	guwikAm SoDitAm kRtvA nArI yonyA praveSayet /
   daśavāraṃ prasūtāpi punaḥ kanyā bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,180.8 //	daSa vAram prasUtA api punar kanyA Bavizyati // GarP_1,180.8 //
   sarṣapāśca vacā caiva madanasya phalāni ca /	sarzapAH ca vacA ca eva madanasya PalAni ca /
   mārjāraviṣṭhā dhattura strīkeśena samanvitaḥ // GarP_1,180.9 //	mArjAra vizWA Dattura strI keSena samanvitaH // GarP_1,180.9 //
   cāturthikaharo dhūpo ḍākinījvaranāśakaḥ /	cAturTika haraH DUpaH xAkinI jvara nASakaH /
   arjunasya ca puṣpāṇi bhallātakaviḍaṅgake // GarP_1,180.10 //	arjunasya ca puzpANi BallAtaka vixaFgake // GarP_1,180.10 //
   balā caiva sarjarasaṃ sauvīrasarṣapāstathā /	balA ca eva sarjarasam sOvIra sarzapAH taTA /
   sarpayūkāmakṣikāṇāṃ dhūmo maśakanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,180.11 //	sarpayUkA makzikANAm DUmaH maSaka nASanaH // GarP_1,180.11 //
   bhūtalāyāśca cūrṇena stambhaḥ syādyonipūraṇāt /	BU talAyAH ca cUrNena stamBaH syAt yoni pUraNAt /
   tena lepanato yonau bhagastambhastu jāyate // GarP_1,180.12 //	tena lepanataH yonO Baga stamBaH tu jAyate // GarP_1,180.12 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   aśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	aSIti aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  181	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 181
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   tāmbūlañca ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ lavaṇaṃ tāmrabhājane /	tAmbUlaQca GRtam kzOdram lavaNam tAmra BAjane /
   tathā payaḥ samāyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ śūlaharaṃ param // GarP_1,181.1 //	taTA payaH samAyuktam cakzuH SUla haram param // GarP_1,181.1 //
   harītakī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu manaḥ śilā /	harItakI vacA kuzWam vyozam hiFgu manaH SilA /
   kāse śvāse ca hikkāyāṃ lihyātkṣaudraṃ ghṛplutam // GarP_1,181.2 //	kAse SvAse ca hikkAyAm lihyAt kzOdram GRplutam // GarP_1,181.2 //
   pippalītriphalācūrṇaṃ madhunā lehayennaraḥ /	pippalI triPalA cUrNam maDunA lehayet naraH /
   naśyate pīnasaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaśca balavattaraḥ // GarP_1,181.3 //	naSyate pInasaH kAsaH SvAsaH ca balavattaraH // GarP_1,181.3 //
   samūlacitrakaṃ bhasmapippalīcūrṇakaṃ lihet /	sa mUla citrakam Basma pippalI cUrNakam lihet /
   śvāsaṃ kāsañca hikkāñca madhumiśraṃ vṛṣadhvaja ! // GarP_1,181.4 //	SvAsam kAsaQca hikkAQca maDu miSram vRzaDvaja ! // GarP_1,181.4 //
   nīlotpalaṃ śarkarā ca madhukaṃ padmakaṃ samam /	nIlotpalam SarkarA ca maDukam padmakam samam /
   taṇḍulodakasaṃmiśraṃ praśamedraktavikriyāḥ // GarP_1,181.5 //	taNxula udaka saMmiSram praSamet rakta vikriyAH // GarP_1,181.5 //
   śuṇṭhī ca śarkarā caiva tathā kṣaudreṇa saṃyutā /	SuNWI ca SarkarA ca eva taTA kzOdreNa saMyutAH /
   kokilasvara eva syādguṭikā bhuktimātrataḥ // GarP_1,181.6 //	kokila svaraH eva syAt guwikA Bukti mAtrataH // GarP_1,181.6 //
   haritālaṃ śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ kadalīdalabhasmanā /	haritAlam SaFKa cUrNam kadalI dala BasmanA /
   etaddravyeṇa codvartya lomaśātanamuttamam // GarP_1,181.7 //	etat dravyeNa ca udvartya loma SAtanam uttamam // GarP_1,181.7 //
   lavaṇaṃ haritālañca tumbinyāśca phalāni ca /	lavaNam haritAlaQca tumbinyAH ca PalAni ca /
   lākṣārasasamāyuktaṃ lomaśātanamuttam // GarP_1,181.8 //	lAkzA rasa samAyuktam loma SAtanam uttam // GarP_1,181.8 //
   sudhā ca haritālañca śaṅkhabhasma manaḥ śilā /	suDA ca haritAlaQca SaFKa Basma manaH SilA /
   saindhavena sahaikatra chāgamūtreṇa peṣayet // GarP_1,181.9 //	sEnDavena saha ekatra CAga mUtreNa pezayet // GarP_1,181.9 //
   tatkṣaṇodvartanādeva lomaśātanamuttamam /	tad kzaNa udvartanAt eva loma SAtanam uttamam /
   śaṅkhamāmalakaṃ patraṃ dhātakyāḥ kusumāni ca // GarP_1,181.10 //	SaFKam Amalakam patram DAtakyAH kusumAni ca // GarP_1,181.10 //
   piṣṭvā tatpayasā sārdhaṃ saptāhaṃ dhārayenmukhe /	pizwvA tad payasA sArDam sapta aham DArayet muKe /
   snigdhāḥ śvetāśca dantāśca bhavanti vimalaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,181.11 //	snigDAH SvetAH ca dantAH ca Bavanti vimala praBAH // GarP_1,181.11 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   ekāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	ekASIti aDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  182	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 182
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   śaradgrīṣmavasanteṣu prāyaśo dadhi garhitam /	Sarad grIzma vasantezu prAyaSas daDi garhitam /
   hemante śiśire caiva varṣāsu dadhi śasyate // GarP_1,182.1 //	hemante SiSire ca eva varzAsu daDi Sasyate // GarP_1,182.1 //
   bhukte tu śarkarā pītā navanītena buddhikṛt /	Bukte tu SarkarA pItA navanItena budDi kRt /
   guḍasya tu purāṇasya palamekantu bhakṣayet /	guxasya tu purANasya palam ekantu Bakzayet /
   strīsahasrañca saṃgacchetpumānbalayuto hara ! // GarP_1,182.2 //	strI sahasraQca saMgacCet pumAn bala yutaH hara ! // GarP_1,182.2 //
   kuṣṭhaṃ saṃcūrṇitaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtamākṣikasaṃyutam /	kuzWam saMcUrNitam kRtvA GRta mAkzika saMyutam /
   bhakṣayetsvapnavelāyāṃ balīpalitanāśanam // GarP_1,182.3 //	Bakzayet svapna velAyAm balI palita nASanam // GarP_1,182.3 //
   atasīmāṣagodhūmacūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu pippalī /	atasI mAza goDUma cUrNam kRtvA tu pippalI /
   ghṛtena lepayedgatramobhiḥ sārdhaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ /	GRtena lepayet gatramoBiH sArDam vicakzaNaH /
   kandarpasadṛśo martyo nityaṃ bhavati śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,182.4 //	kandarpa sadRSaH martyaH nityam Bavati SaFkara ! // GarP_1,182.4 //
   yavāstilāśvagandhā ca muśalī saralā guḍam /	yavAstilASvaganDA ca muSalI saralAH guxam /
   ebhiśca racitāṃ jagdhvā taruṇo balavānbhavet // GarP_1,182.5 //	eBiH ca racitAm jagDvA taruNaH balavAn Bavet // GarP_1,182.5 //
   hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ pītvā tu kvathitodakaiḥ /	hiFgu sOvarcalam SuNWIm pItvA tu kvaTita udakEH /
   pariṇāmākhyaśūlañca ajīrṇañcaiva naśyati // GarP_1,182.6 //	pariNAma AKya SUlaQca ajIrNaQcA eva naSyati // GarP_1,182.6 //
   dhātakīṃ somarājīñca kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet /	DAtakIm somarAjIn ca kzIreNa saha pezayet /
   durbalaśca bhavetsthūlo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.7 //	durbalaH ca Bavet sTUlaH na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,182.7 //
   śarkarāmadhusaṃyuktaṃ navanītaṃ balī lihet /	SarkarA maDu saMyuktam navanItam balI lihet /
   kṣīrāśī ca kṣayī puṣṭiṃ medhāñcaivātulāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,182.8 //	kzIra ASI ca kzayI puzwim meDAQcA eva atulAm vrajet // GarP_1,182.8 //
   kulīracūrṇaṃ sakṣīraṃ pītañca kṣayareganut /	kulIra cUrNam sa kzIram pItaQca kzaya rega nud /
   bhallātakaṃ viḍaṅgañca yavakṣārañca saindhavam // GarP_1,182.9 //	BallAtakam vixaFgaQca yavakzAraQca sEnDavam // GarP_1,182.9 //
   manaḥ śilā śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ tailapakvaṃ tathaiva ca /	manaH SilA SaFKa cUrNam tEla pakvam taTA eva ca /
   lomāni śātayatyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.10 //	lomAni SAtayati eva na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,182.10 //
   mālūrasya rasaṃ gṛhya jalaukāṃ tatra peṣayet /	mAlUrasya rasam gRhya jalOkAm tatra pezayet /
   hastau saṃlepayettena tvagnistambhanamuttamam // GarP_1,182.11 //	hastO saMlepayet tena tu agni stamBanam uttamam // GarP_1,182.11 //
   śālmalīrasamādāya kharamūtre nidhāya tam /	SAlmalI rasam AdAya Kara mUtre niDAya tam /
   agnayādau vikṣipettena hyagnistambhanamuttamam // GarP_1,182.12 //	agnayA AdO vikzipet tena hi agni stamBanam uttamam // GarP_1,182.12 //
   vāyasyā udaraṃ gṛhya maṇḍūkavasayā saha /	vAyasyAH udaram gRhya maNxUka vasayA saha /
   guṭikāṃ kārayettena tato 'gnau saṃkṣaipetsudhīḥ /	guwikAm kArayet tena tatas agnO saMkzEpet suDIH /
   evametatprayogeṇa hyagnistambhanamuttamam // GarP_1,182.13 //	evam etat prayogeNa hi agni stamBanam uttamam // GarP_1,182.13 //
   muṇḍītvakca vacā mustaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ tathā /	muNxI tvac ca vacA mustam maricam tagaram taTA /
   carvitvā ca tvimaṃ sadyo jihvayā jvalanaṃ lihet // GarP_1,182.14 //	carvitvA ca tu imam sadyas jihvayA jvalanam lihet // GarP_1,182.14 //
   gorocanāṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ cūrṇokṛtyaghṛtaṃ samam /	gorocanAm BRFgarAjam cUrNa ukRtya GRtam samam /
   divyāmbhasaḥ stambhanaṃ syānmantreṇānena vai tathā /	divya amBasaH stamBanam syAt mantreNa anena vE taTA /
   oṃ agnistambhanaṃ kuru kuru // GarP_1,182.15 //	om agni stamBanam kuru kuru // GarP_1,182.15 //
   oṃ namo bhagavate jalaṃ stambhaya saṃ saṃ saṃ keka kekaḥ caracara /	om namaH Bagavate jalam stamBaya sam sam sam keka kekaH cara caraH /
   jalastambhanamantro 'yaṃ jalaṃ stambhayate śiva ! // GarP_1,182.16 //	jala stamBana mantraH ayam jalam stamBayate Siva ! // GarP_1,182.16 //
   gṛdhrāsthiñca gavāsthiñca tathā nirmālyameva ca /	gRDra asTiQca gavAsTiQca taTA nirmAlyam eva ca /
   areryo nikhaneddvāre pañcatvamu payāti saḥ // GarP_1,182.17 //	areH yaH niKanet dvAre paQcatvamu payAti saH // GarP_1,182.17 //
   pañcaraktāni puṣpāṇi pṛthagjātyā samālabhet /	paQca raktAni puzpANi pRTak jAtyA samAlaBet /
   kuṅkumena samāyuktamātmaraktasamanvitam // GarP_1,182.18 //	kuFkumena samAyuktam Atma rakta samanvitam // GarP_1,182.18 //
   puṣpeṇa tu samaṃ piṣṭvā rocanāyāḥ palaikataḥ /	puzpeNa tu samam pizwvA rocanAyAH pala ekatas /
   striyā puṃsā kṛto rudra ! tilako 'yaṃ vaśīkaraḥ // GarP_1,182.19 //	striyA puMsA kRtaH rudraH ! tilakaH ayam vaSIkaraH // GarP_1,182.19 //
   brahmadaṇḍī tu puṣyeṇa bhakṣye pāne vaśīkaraḥ /	brahmadaNxI tu puzyeNa Bakzye pAne vaSIkaraH /
   yaṣṭi madhu palaikena pakvamuṣṇodakaṃ pibet // GarP_1,182.20 //	yazwi maDu pala ekena pakvam uzNa udakam pibet // GarP_1,182.20 //
   viṣṭambhikāñca hṛcchūlaṃ haratyeva maheśvara ! /	vizwamBi kAQca hRd SUlam harati eva maheSvara ! /
   oṃ hrūṃ jaḥ /	om hrUm jaH /
   mantro 'yaṃ harate rudra ! sarvavṛścikajaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,182.21 //	mantraH ayam harate rudraH ! sarva vRScika jam vizam // GarP_1,182.21 //
   pippalī navanītañca śṛṅgaveraṃ ca saindhavam /	pippalI navanI taQca SRFgaveram ca sEnDavam /
   maricaṃ dadhi kuṣṭhañca nasye pāne viṣaṃ haret // GarP_1,182.22 //	maricam daDi kuzWaQca nasye pAne vizam haret // GarP_1,182.22 //
   triphalārdrakakuṣṭhaṃ ca candanaṃ ghṛtasaṃyutam /	triPalA Ardraka kuzWam ca candanam GRta saMyutam /
   etatpānācca lepācca viṣanāśo bhavecchiva ! // GarP_1,182.23 //	etad pAnAt ca lepAt ca viza nASaH Bavet Siva ! // GarP_1,182.23 //
   pārāvatasya cākṣīṇi haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /	pArAvatasya ca akzINi haritAlam manaH SilA /
   etadyogādviṣaṃ hanti vainateya ivoragān // GarP_1,182.24 //	etad yogAt vizam hanti vEnateyaH iva uragAn // GarP_1,182.24 //
   saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ caiva dadhimadhvājyasaṃyutam /	sEnDavam tryUzaNam ca eva daDi maDu Ajya saMyutam /
   vṛścikasya viṣaṃ hanti lepo 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja ! // GarP_1,182.25 //	vRScikasya vizam hanti lepaH ayam vRzaBaDvaja ! // GarP_1,182.25 //
   brahmadaṇḍītilānkvāthya cūrṇaṃ trikaṭukaṃ pibet /	brahmadaNxI tilAn kvATya cUrNam trikawukam pibet /
   nāśayedrudra ! gulmāni niruddhaṃ raktameva ca // GarP_1,182.26 //	nASayet rudra ! gulmAni nirudDam raktam eva ca // GarP_1,182.26 //
   pītvā kṣīraṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ nāśayedasṛjaḥ strutim /	pItvA kzIram kzOdra yutam nASayet asRjaH strutim /
   āṭarūpakamūlena bhagaṃ nābhiṃ ca lepayet /	Awa rUpaka mUlena Bagam nABim ca lepayet /
   sukhaṃ prasūyate nārī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.27 //	suKam prasUyate nArI na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,182.27 //
   śarkarāṃ madhusaṃyuktāṃ pītvā taṇḍulavāriṇā /	SarkarAm maDu saMyuktAm pItvA taNxula vAriNA /
   raktātisāraśamanaṃ bhavatīti vṛṣadhvaja ! // GarP_1,182.28 //	rakta atisAra Samanam Bavati iti vRzaDvaja ! // GarP_1,182.28 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   dvyāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	dvyASIti aDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  183	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 183
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   maricaṃ śṛṅgaveraṃ ca kuṭajatvacameva ca /	maricam SRFgaveram ca kuwaja tvacam eva ca /
   pānācca grahaṇī naśyecchaśāṅkāṅkitaśekhara ! // GarP_1,183.1 //	pAnAt ca grahaNI naSyet SaSAFka aFkita SeKaraH ! // GarP_1,183.1 //
   pippalī pippalīmūlaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ vacā /	pippalI pippalI mUlam maricam tagaram vacA /
   devadārurasaṃ pāṭhāṃ kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet // GarP_1,183.2 //	devadAru rasam pAWAm kzIreNa saha pezayet // GarP_1,183.2 //
   anenaiva prayogeṇa hyatisāro vinaśyati /	anena eva prayogeNa hi atisAraH vinaSyati /
   marīcatilapuṣpābhyā mañjanaṃ kāmalāpaham // GarP_1,183.3 //	marIca tila puzpAByAH maQjanam kAmalA apaham // GarP_1,183.3 //
   harītakī samaguḍā madhunā saha yojitā /	harItakI samaguxA maDunA saha yojitA /
   virecanakarī rudra ! bhavatīti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,183.4 //	virecana karI rudraH ! Bavati iti na saMSayaH // GarP_1,183.4 //
   triphalā citrakaṃ citraṃ tathā kaṭukarohiṇī /	triPalA citrakam citram taTA kawukarohiNI /
   urustambhaharaṃ hyetaduttamantu virecanam // GarP_1,183.5 //	uru stamBa haram hi etat uttamantu virecanam // GarP_1,183.5 //
   harītakī śṛṅgaveraṃ devadāru ca candanam /	harItakI SRFgaveram devadAru ca candanam /
   kvāthayecchāgadugdhena apāmārgasya mūlakam /	kvATayet CAga dugDena apAmArgasya mUlakam /
   ūrustambhaṃ jayantyā vā saptarātreṇa nāśayet // GarP_1,183.6 //	UrustamBam jayantyAH vA sapta rAtreNa nASayet // GarP_1,183.6 //
   anantāśṛṅgaverasya sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet /	ananta aSRFgaverasya sUkzma cUrNAni kArayet /
   guggulaṃ guḍatulyaṃ ca guṭikāmupayujyaca /	guggulam guxa tulyam ca guwikAm upayujya ca /
   vāyuḥ snāyugataṃ caiva agnimāndyaṃ ca nāśayet // GarP_1,183.7 //	vAyuH snAyu gatam ca eva agni mAndyam ca nASayet // GarP_1,183.7 //
   saṅkhapuṣpīntu puṣpeṇa samuddhṛtya sapatrikām /	saFKa puzpIntu puzpeNa samudDRtya sa patrikAm /
   samūlāṃ chāgadugdhena apasmāraharaṃ pibet // GarP_1,183.8 //	sa mUlAm CAga dugDena apasmAra haram pibet // GarP_1,183.8 //
   aśvagandhābhaye caiva udakena samaṃ pibet /	aSvaganDA Baye ca eva udakena samam pibet /
   raktapittaṃ vinaśyettu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,183.9 //	raktapittam vinaSyet tu na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,183.9 //
   harītakīkuṣṭhacūrṇaṃ kṛtvā āsyaṃ ca pūrayet /	harItakI kuzWa cUrNam kRtvA Asyam ca pUrayet /
   śītaṃ pītvātha pānīyaṃ sarvacchardinivāraṇam // GarP_1,183.10 //	SItam pItvA aTa pAnIyam sarva= Cardi nivAraNam // GarP_1,183.10 //
   gaḍūcīpadmakāriṣṭadhānyākaṃ raktacaṃndanam /	gaxUcI padmaka arizwa DAnyAkam raktacaMndanam /
   pittaśleṣmajvaracchardidāhatṛṣṇāghnamagnikṛt /	pitta Slezma jvara= Cardi dAha tRzNA Gnam agni kRt /
   oṃ huṃ nama iti // GarP_1,183.11 //	om hum namaH iti // GarP_1,183.11 //
   śrotre baddhvā śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ jvaraṃ mantreṇa vai haret /	Srotre badDvA SaFKapuzpIm jvaram mantreNa vE haret /
   oṃ jambhinī stambhinī mohaya sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ	om jamBinI stamBinI mohaya sarva vyADIn me vajreNa WaH WaH
   sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa phaṭ iti // GarP_1,183.12 //	sarva vyADIn me vajreNa Paw iti // GarP_1,183.12 //
   puṣpamaṣṭaśataṃ japtvā haste dattvā nakhaṃ spṛśet /	puzpam azwa Satam japtvA haste dattvA naKam spRSet /
   cāturthiko jvaro rudra anye caiva jvarāstathā // GarP_1,183.13 //	cAturTikaH jvaraH rudra anye ca eva jvarAH taTA // GarP_1,183.13 //
   jmbūphalaṃ haridrā ca sarpasyaiva tu kañcukam /	jmbU Palam haridrA ca sarpasya eva tu kaQcukam /
   sarvajvarāṇāṃ dhūpo 'yaṃ haraścāturthikasya ca // GarP_1,183.14 //	sarva jvarANAm DUpaH ayam haraH cAturTikasya ca // GarP_1,183.14 //
   karavīraṃ bhṛṅgapatraṃ lavaṇaṃ kuṣṭhakarkaṭe /	karavIram BRFga patram lavaNam kuzWa karkawe /

   nijaśukraṃ gṛhī tvā tu vāmahastena yaḥ pumān /	nija Sukram gRhI tvA tu vAma hastena yaH pumAn /
   kāminīcaraṇaṃ vāmaṃ liṃpetsa syātstriyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.15 //	kAminI caraNam vAmam liMpet sa syAt striyAH priyaH // GarP_1,185.15 //
   saindhavañca mahādeva pārāvatamalaṃ madhu /	sEnDavan ca mahAdeva pArAvata malam maDu /
   ebhirlipte tu liṅge vai kāminīvaśakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,185.16 //	eBiH lipte tu liFge vE kAminI iva SakRt Bavet // GarP_1,185.16 //
   puṣpāṇi pañcaraktāni gṛhītvā yāni kāni ca /	puzpANi paQca raktAni gRhItvA yAni kAni ca /
   tattulyañca priyaṅguñca peṣayedekayogataḥ /	tat tulyaQca priyaFguQca pezayet eka yogataH /
   anena liptaliṅgasya kāminīvaśatāmiyāt // GarP_1,185.17 //	anena lipta liFgasya kAminI vaSatAm iyAt // GarP_1,185.17 //
   hayagandhā ca mañjiṣṭhā mālatīkusumāni ca /	hayaganDA ca maQjizWA mAlatI kusumAni ca /
   śvetasaṣarpa etaiśca liptaliṅgaḥ striyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.18 //	Sveta sazarpaH etEH ca lipta liFgaH striyAH priyaH // GarP_1,185.18 //
   mūlantu kākajaṅghāyā dugdhapītantu śoṣanut /	mUlantu kAkajaFGAyAH dugDa pItantu Soza nud /
   aśvagandhānāgabalāguḍamāṣaniṣeviṇaḥ /	aSvaganDA nAga balA guxa mAza nizeviNaH /
   rūpaṃ bhavedyathā tadvannavayauvanacāriṇām // GarP_1,185.19 //	rUpam Bavet yaTA tadvat nava yOvana cAriNAm // GarP_1,185.19 //
   lauhacūrṇasamāyuktaṃ triphalācūrṇameva vā /	lOha cUrNa samAyuktam triPalA cUrNam eva vA /
   madhunā sevitaṃ rudra pariṇāmākhyaśūlanut // GarP_1,185.20 //	maDunA sevitam rudra pariNAma AKya SUla nud // GarP_1,185.20 //
   kvathitodakapānantu śambūkakṣārakaṃ tathā /	kvaTita udaka pAnantu SambUka kzArakam taTA /
   mṛgaśṛṅgaṃ hyagnidagdhaṃ gavyājyena samanvitam /	mRga SRFgam hi agni dagDam gavya Ajyena samanvitam /
   pīta hṛtpṛṣṭhaśūlānāṃ bhavennāśakaraṃ śiva // GarP_1,185.21 //	pIta hRd pRzWa SUlAnAm Bavet nASa karam Siva // GarP_1,185.21 //
   hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ śuṇṭhī vṛṣadhvaja mahauṣadham? /	hiFgu sOvarcalam SuNWI vRzaDvaja mahOzaDam? /
   ebhistu kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ vai sarvaśūlanut // GarP_1,185.22 //	eBiH tu kvaTitam vAri pItam vE sarva SUla nud // GarP_1,185.22 //
   apāmārgasya vai mūlaṃ sāmudralavaṇānvitam /	apAmArgasya vE mUlam sAmudra lavaNa anvitam /
   āsvādi tamajīrṇasya śūlasya syādvimardanam // GarP_1,185.23 //	AsvAdi tam ajIrNasya SUlasya syAt vimardanam // GarP_1,185.23 //
   vaṭarohāṅkuro rudra taṇḍulodakagharṣitaḥ /	vawa roha aFkuraH rudra taNxula udaka GarzitaH /
   pītaḥ satakro 'tīsāraṃ kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.24 //	pItaH sa takraH atIsAram kzayam nayati SaFkara // GarP_1,185.24 //
   aṅkoṭamūlaṃ karṣārdhaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā /	aFkowa mUlam karza arDam pizwam taNxula vAriNA /
   sarvātīsāragrahaṇīṃ pītaṃ harati bhūtapa // GarP_1,185.25 //	sarva atIsAra grahaNIm pItam harati BUtapaH // GarP_1,185.25 //
   marīcaśuṇṭhikuṭajatvakcūrṇañca guḍānvitam /	marIca SuNWi kuwaja tvac cUrNaQca guxa anvitam /
   kramāttaddviguṇaṃ pītaṃ grahaṇīvyādhināśanam // GarP_1,185.26 //	kramAt tad dviguNam pItam grahaNI vyADi nASanam // GarP_1,185.26 //
   śvetāparājitāmūlaṃ haridrāsikthataṇḍulāḥ /	Sveta aparAjitA mUlam haridrA sikTa taNxulAH /
   apāmārgatrikaṭukameṣāñca vaṭikā śiva /	apAmArga trikawukamezAQca vawikA Siva /
   viṣūcikāmahāvyādhiṃ haratyeva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,185.27 //	vizUcikA mahA vyADim harati eva na saMSayaH // GarP_1,185.27 //
   triphalāguru bhūteśa śilājatu harītakī /	triPalA aguru BUteSa SilAjatu harItakI /
   ekaikameṣāṃ cūrṇantu madhunā ca vimiśritam /	ekEkam ezAm cUrNantu maDunA ca vimiSritam /
   pītaṃ sarvañca mehantu kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.28 //	pItam sarvaQca mehantu kzayam nayati SaFkara // GarP_1,185.28 //
   arkakṣīraprasthamekaṃ tilatailaṃ tathaiva ca /	arka kzIra prasTam ekam tila tElam taTA eva ca /
   manaḥ śilāmarīcānāṃ sindūrasya palaṃ palam // GarP_1,185.29 //	manaH SilA marIcAnAm sindUrasya palam palam // GarP_1,185.29 //
   cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tāmrapātre tvātapaiḥ śoṣayettataḥ /	cUrNam kRtvA tAmra pAtre tu AtapEH Sozayet tatas /
   pītaṃ snuhīgataṃ dugdhaṃ saindhavaṃ śūlanudbhavet // GarP_1,185.30 //	pItam snuhI gatam dugDam sEnDavam SUla nudBavet // GarP_1,185.30 //
   trikaṭutriphalānaktaṃ tilatailaṃ tathaiva ca /	trikawu triPalA naktam tila tElam taTA eva ca /
   manaḥ śilā nimbapatraṃ jātīpuṣpamajāpayaḥ // GarP_1,185.31 //	manaH SilA nimba patram jAtI puzpam ajA payaH // GarP_1,185.31 //
   tanmūtraṃ saṅkhanābhiśca candanaṃ gharṣayettataḥ /	tat mUtram saFKanABiH ca candanam Garzayet tatas /
   ebhiśca vartikāṃ kṛtvā tvakṣiṇī cāñjayettataḥ // GarP_1,185.32 //	eBiH ca vartikAm kRtvA tu akziNI ca aQjayet tatas // GarP_1,185.32 //
   naśyate paṭalaṃ kācaṃ puṣpañca timirādikam /	naSyate pawalam kAcam puzpaQca timira Adikam /
   vibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ samadhu śvāsanāśanam // GarP_1,185.33 //	viBItakasya vE cUrNam sa maDu SvAsa nASanam // GarP_1,185.33 //
   pippalītriphalācūrṇaṃ madhusaindhavasaṃyutam /	pippalI triPalA cUrNam maDu sEnDava saMyutam /
   sarvarogajvaraśvāsaśoṣapīnasahṛdbhavet // GarP_1,185.34 //	sarva roga jvara SvAsa Soza pInasa hRt Bavet // GarP_1,185.34 //
   devadārośca vai cūrṇaṃ ajāmatreṇa bhāvayet /	devadAroH ca vE cUrNam ajAmatreNa BAvayet /
   ekaviṃśativāraṃvaitvakṣiṇī tena cāñjayet /	ekaviMSati vAraMvA etu akziNI tena ca aQjayet /
   rātryandhatā paṭalatā naśyennirlomatā tathā // GarP_1,185.35 //	rAtrI anDa tA pawala tA naSyet nirlomatA taTA // GarP_1,185.35 //
   pippalīketakaṃ rudra haridrāmalakaṃ vacā /	pippalIketakam rudra haridrA Amalakam vacA /
   sarvākṣirogā naśyeyuḥ sakṣīrādañjanāttataḥ // GarP_1,185.36 //	sarva akzi rogAH naSyeyuH sa kzIrAt aQjanAt tatas // GarP_1,185.36 //
   kākajaṅghāśigrumūle mukhena vidhṛte śiva /	kAkajaFGA Sigru mUle muKena viDRte Siva /
   carvitvā dantakīṭānāṃ vināśo hi bhaveddhara // GarP_1,185.37 //	carvitvA danta kIwAnAm vinASaH hi Bavet hara // GarP_1,185.37 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   mantratantravaidyaprayodṛpañcāśītyadhiśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	mantra tantra vEdya prayodRpaQcASIti aDiSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  186	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 186
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   pītaḥ sāro guḍūcyāśca madhunā ca pramehanut /	pItaH sAraH guxUcyAH ca maDunA ca prameha nud /
   pītaṃ gohālikāmūlaṃ tiladadhyājyasaṃyutam // GarP_1,186.1 //	pItam gohAlikA mUlam tila daDi Ajya saMyutam // GarP_1,186.1 //
   niruddhamūtraṃ kvathitaṃ nivartayati śaṅkara /	nirudDa mUtram kvaTitam nivartayati SaFkara /
   tathā hikkāṃ haretpītaṃ sauvarcalayutañca vai // GarP_1,186.2 //	taTA hikkAm haret pItam sOvarcalayu taQca vE // GarP_1,186.2 //
   gorakṣakarkaṭīmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ śītodakena ca /	gorakzakarkawI mUlam pizwam SIta udakena ca /
   pītaṃ dinatrayeṇaiva nāśayedrudra śarkarām // GarP_1,186.3 //	pItam dina trayeNa eva nASayet rudra SarkarAm // GarP_1,186.3 //
   piṣṭvā vai mālatīmūlaṃ grīṣmakāle samāhitam /	pizwvA vE mAlatI mUlam grIzma kAle samAhitam /
   sādhitaṃ chāgadugdhena patiṃ śarkasyānvitam /	sADitam CAga dugDena patim Sarkasya anvitam /
   harenmūtranirodhañca haredvai pāṇḍuśarkarām // GarP_1,186.4 //	haret mUtra niroDaQca haret vE pANxu SarkarAm // GarP_1,186.4 //
   dvijayaṣṭyāśca vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā /	dvija yazwyAH ca vE mUlam pizwam taNxula vAriNA /
   gaṇḍamālāṃ harellepādasādhyaṃ galagaṇḍakam // GarP_1,186.5 //	gaNxamAlAm haret lepAt asADyam gala gaNxakam // GarP_1,186.5 //
   rasāñjanaṃ harītakyāścūrṇaṃ tenaiva guṇṭhanāt /	rasAQjanam harItakyAH cUrNam tena eva guNWanAt /
   nāśayetpuruṣo vyādhīnnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,186.6 //	nASayet puruzaH vyADIn na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,186.6 //
   karavīramūlalepādvai lepātpūgaphalasya ca /	karavIra mUla lepAt vE lepAt pUga Palasya ca /
   puṃvyādhirnaśyate rudra yogamanyaṃ vadāmyaham // GarP_1,186.7 //	puMvyADiH naSyate rudra yogam anyam vadAmi aham // GarP_1,186.7 //
   dantīmūlaṃ haridrā ca citrakaṃ tasya lepanāt /	dantI mUlam haridrA ca citrakam tasya lepanAt /
   bhagandaravināśaḥ syādanyaṃ yogaṃ vadāmyaham /	Bagandara vinASaH syAt anyam yogam vadAmi aham /
   jalaukājagdharaktañca bhagandaramumāpate // GarP_1,186.8 //	jalOkA jagDaraktaQca Bagandaram umApate // GarP_1,186.8 //
   triphalājalaghṛṣṭañca mārjārāsthi vilepitam /	triPalA jala GRzwaQca mArjAra asTi vilepitam /
   tato na prastravedraktaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,186.9 //	tatas na prastravet raktam na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,186.9 //
   haridrānekavārañca snuhīkṣīreṇa bhāvitā /	haridrA aneka vAraQca snuhI kzIreNa BAvitA /
   vaṭikār'śovināśāya tallepādvṛṣabhadhvaja /	vawikAr aSovinASAya tad lepAt vRzaBaDvaja /
   ghoṣāphalaṃ saindhavañca piṣṭvā cārśoharaṃ param // GarP_1,186.10 //	GozAPalam sEnDavaQca pizwvA ca arSaH haram param // GarP_1,186.10 //
   gavyājyaṃ sādhitaṃ pītaṃ palāśakṣāravāriṇā /	gavya Ajyam sADitam pItam palASa kzAra vAriNA /
   triguṇena trikaṭukaṃ arśāṃsi kṣapayecchiva // GarP_1,186.11 //	triguNena trikawukam arSAMsi kzapayet Siva // GarP_1,186.11 //
   bilvasya ca phalaṃ dagdhaṃ raktārśaḥ pravināśanam /	bilvasya ca Palam dagDam rakta arSaH pravinASanam /
   jagdhavā kṛṣṇatilāneva navanītayutānapi // GarP_1,186.12 //	jagDavA kRzNa tilAn eva navanIta yutAn api // GarP_1,186.12 //
   śuṇṭhīcūrṇaṃ yavakṣārayuktaṃ tulyaguḍānvitam /	SuNWI cUrNam yavakzAra yuktam tulya guxa anvitam /
   agnivṛddhiṃ karotyeva pratyūṣe vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,186.13 //	agni vRdDim karoti eva pratyUze vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,186.13 //
   śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai /	SuNWyA ca kvaTitam vAri pItam ca agnim karoti vE /
   harītakīṃ saindhavañca citrakaṃ rudra pippalī // GarP_1,186.14 //	harItakIm sEnDavaQca citrakam rudra pippalI // GarP_1,186.14 //
   cūrṇamuṣṇodakenaiṣāṃ pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram /	cUrNam uzNa udakena ezAm pItam ca ati kzuDA akaram /
   sājyaṃ sūkaramāṃsaṃ vai pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram // GarP_1,186.15 //	sa Ajyam sUkara mAMsam vE pItam ca ati kzuDA akaram // GarP_1,186.15 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	zaz aSIti aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  187	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 187
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   hastikarṇapalāśasya patrāṇi? cūrṇayeddhara /	hastikarNa palASasya patrANi? cUrNayet hara /
   sarvarogavinirmuktaṃ cūrṇaṃ palaśataṃ śiva // GarP_1,187.1 //	sarva roga vinirmuktam cUrNam pala Satam Siva // GarP_1,187.1 //
   sakṣīraṃ bhakṣītaṃ kuryātsaptāhena vṛṣadhvaja /	sa kzIram BakzItam kuryAt sapta ahena vRzaDvaja /
   naraṃ śrutidharaṃ rudra mṛgendragativikramam // GarP_1,187.2 //	naram Sruti Daram rudra mRgendra gati vikramam // GarP_1,187.2 //
   padmarāgapratīkāśaṃyuktaṃ daśaśatāyuṣā /	padmarAga pratIkA SaMyuktam daSa Sata AyuzA /
   ṣoḍaśābdākṛtiṃ rudra satataṃ dugdhabhojanāt // GarP_1,187.3 //	zoxaSa abda AkRtim rudra satatam dugDa BojanAt // GarP_1,187.3 //
   madhusarpiḥsamāyuktaṃ dugdhamāyuṣkaraṃ bhavet /	maDu sarpiH samAyuktam dugDam Ayuzkaram Bavet /
   tajjagdhaṃ madhunā sārdhaṃ daśavarṣa sahasriṇam // GarP_1,187.4 //	tat jagDam maDunA sArDam daSa varza sahasriNam // GarP_1,187.4 //
   kuryānnaraṃ śrutidharaṃ pramadājanavallabham /	kuryAt naram Sruti Daram pramadA jana vallaBam /
   dadhnā nityaṃ bhakṣitantu vajradehakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,187.5 //	daDnA nityam Bakzitantu vajra deha karam Bavet // GarP_1,187.5 //
   keśarājisamāyuktaṃ naraṃ varṣasahasriṇam /	keSa rAji samAyuktam naram varza sahasriNam /
   tacca kāñjikasaṃyuktaṃ naraṃ kuryācca bhakṣitam // GarP_1,187.6 //	tat ca kAQjika saMyuktam naram kuryAt ca Bakzitam // GarP_1,187.6 //
   śatavarṣaṃ divyadehaṃ valīpalitavarjitam /	Sata varzam divya deham valI palita varjitam /
   jagdhaṃ triphalayā kṣaudraṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,187.7 //	jagDam triPalayA kzOdram cakzuzmantam karoti vE // GarP_1,187.7 //
   andhaḥ paśyettu cūrṇasya sājyasyaiva tu bhakṣaṇāt /	anDaH paSyet tu cUrNasya sa Ajyasya eva tu BakzaNAt /
   mahiṣīkṣīrasaṃyuktastallepaḥ kṛṣṇakeśakṛt // GarP_1,187.8 //	mahizI kzIra saMyuktaH tad lepaH kRzNa keSa kRt // GarP_1,187.8 //
   khalvāṭasya ca vai keśā bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja /	KalvAwasya ca vE keSAH Bavanti vRzaBaDvaja /
   tailayuktena cūrṇena valīpalitanāśanam // GarP_1,187.9 //	tEla yuktena cUrNena valI palita nASanam // GarP_1,187.9 //
   tadudvartanamātreṇa sarvarāgaḥ pramucyate /	tad udvartana mAtreNa sarva rAgaH pramucyate /
   sacchāgakṣīracūrṇena dṛṣṭiḥ syānmāsato 'ñjanāt // GarP_1,187.10 //	sa= CAga kzIra cUrNena dRzwiH syAt mAsataH aQjanAt // GarP_1,187.10 //
   palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca /	palASasya ca bIjAni SrAvaNe vituzANi ca /
   gṛhītvā navanītena teṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ ca bhakṣayet // GarP_1,187.11 //	gRhItvA navanItena tezAm cUrNam ca Bakzayet // GarP_1,187.11 //
   karṣārdhamekaṃ seveta natvā nityaṃ hariṃ prabhum /	karza arDam ekam seveta natvA nityam harim praBum /
   purāṇaṣaṣṭidhānyasya pathyamambu pibanhara /	purANazazwi DAnyasya paTyam ambu piban hara /
   jīvedvarṣasahasrāṇi valīpalitavarjitaḥ // GarP_1,187.12 //	jIvet varza sahasrANi valI palita varjitaH // GarP_1,187.12 //
   bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlaṃ puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /	BRFgarAjasya vE mUlam puzya Rkze tu samAhRtam /
   vidhāya tasya cūrṇaṃ vai sasauvīrañca bhakṣayetaṃ // GarP_1,187.13 //	viDAya tasya cUrNam vE sa sOvIraQca Bakzayetam // GarP_1,187.13 //
   māsamātraprayogeṇa valīpalitavarjitaḥ /	mAsa mAtra prayogeNa valI palita varjitaH /
   śatāni pañca jīvecca naro nāgabalo bhavet /	SatAni paQca jIvet ca naraH nAgabalaH Bavet /
   bhavecchrutidharo rudra puṣyarkṣe caiva bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,187.14 //	Bavet Sruti DaraH rudra puzya Rkze ca eva BakzaNAt // GarP_1,187.14 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   āyuṣkarayogodṛsaptāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	Ayuzkarayoga udRsaptASIti aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  188	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 188
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   nirvraṇaḥ syātpūyaṃhīno prahāro ghṛpūritaḥ /	nirvraNaH syAt pUyaMhInaH prahAraH GRpUritaH /
   apāmārgasya vai mūlaṃ hastābhyāñca vimarditam /	apAmArgasya vE mUlam hasta aByAQca vimarditam /
   tadrasena prahārasya raktastrāvo na pūraṇāt // GarP_1,188.1 //	tad rasena prahArasya raktaH trAvaH na pUraNAt // GarP_1,188.1 //
   rudra lāṅgalikāmūlaṃ cekṣudarbhastathaiva ca /	rudra lAFgalikA mUlam ca ikzu darBaH taTA eva ca /
   tena vraṇamukhaṃ liptaṃ śalyaṃ niḥ sa rati vraṇāt /	tena vraNa muKam liptam Salyam niH sa rati vraNAt /
   cirakālapraviṣṭo 'pi tena mārgeṇa śaṅkara // GarP_1,188.2 //	cira kAla pravizwaH api tena mArgeNa SaFkara // GarP_1,188.2 //
   bālamūlaṃ meṣaśṛṅgīmūlaṃ vā vārigharṣitam /	bAla mUlam mezaSRFgI mUlam vA vAri Garzitam /
   tena liptaṃ ciraṃ jātaṃ vraṇaṃ nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati // GarP_1,188.3 //	tena liptam ciram jAtam vraNam nAxyAH praSAmyati // GarP_1,188.3 //
   jagdhaṃ māhiṣapadhnā ca yuktaṃ kodravabhaktakam /	jagDam mAhiza paDnA ca yuktam kodrava Baktakam /
   hiṅgumūlasya vai cūrṇaṃ dattaṃ nāḍīvraṇāpaham // GarP_1,188.4 //	hiFgu mUlasya vE cUrNam dattam nAxI vraNa apaham // GarP_1,188.4 //
   brahmayaṣṭiphalaṃ piṣṭaṃ vāriṇā tenalepitam /	brahma yazwi Palam pizwam vAriNA tena lepitam /
   tena ghṛṣṭaṃ raktadoṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,188.5 //	tena GRzwam rakta dozaH praNaSyati na saMSayaH // GarP_1,188.5 //
   yavabhasma viḍaṅgañca gandhapāṣāṇameva ca /	yava Basma vixaFgaQca ganDapAzANam eva ca /
   śuṇṭhireṣāñcaiva cūrṇaṃ bhvitaṃ rudhireṇavai // GarP_1,188.6 //	SuNWiH ezAQca eva cUrNam Bvitam ruDireNa vE // GarP_1,188.6 //
   kṛkalāsasya talliptaṃ vidradhiṃ nāśayecchiva /	kRkalAsasya tat liptam vidraDim nASayet Siva /
   saubhāñjanasya bījāni tvatasīmasinā saha // GarP_1,188.7 //	sOBAQjanasya bIjAni tu ata sIm asinA saha // GarP_1,188.7 //
   saurasarṣapayuktāni sarvāṇyetāni śaṅkara /	sOra sarzapa yuktAni sarvANi etAni SaFkara /
   piṣṭānyanamlatakreṇa granthikaṃ nāśayeddhi vai // GarP_1,188.8 //	pizwAni anamla takreNa granTikam nASayet hi vE // GarP_1,188.8 //
   śvetāparājitāmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā /	Sveta aparAjitA mUlam pizwam taNxula vAriNA /
   tena nasyapradānātsyādbhūtavṛndasya vidravaḥ // GarP_1,188.9 //	tena nasya pradAnAt syAt BUta vRndasya vidravaH // GarP_1,188.9 //
   agastyapuṣpanasyaṃ vai samarīcaṃ tu śūlahṛt /	agastya puzpa nasyam vE sa marIcam tu SUla hRt /
   bhujaṅgacarma vai hiṅgu nimbapatraṃ tathā yavāḥ /	BujaFga carma vE hiFgu nimba patram taTA yavAH /
   gaurasarṣama ebhiḥ syāllepo bhūtaharaḥ śiva // GarP_1,188.10 //	gOrasa rzamaH eBiH syAt lepaH BUta haraH SivaH // GarP_1,188.10 //
   gorocanā marīcāni pippalī saindhavaṃ madhu /	gorocanA marIcAni pippalI sEnDavam maDu /
   añjanaṃ kṛtamebhiḥ syādgrahabhūtaharaṃ śiva // GarP_1,188.11 //	aQjanam kRtam eBiH syAt graha BUta haram Siva // GarP_1,188.11 //
   guggulūlūkapucchābhyāṃ dhūpo grahaharo bhavet /	guggulu ulUka pucCAByAm DUpaH graha haraH Bavet /
   cāturthikajvarairmukto kṛṣṇavastrāvaguṇṭhitaḥ // GarP_1,188.12 //	cAturTika jvarEH muktaH kRzNa vastra avaguNWitaH // GarP_1,188.12 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vraṇāci	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe vraNAci
   dṛmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	dRmAzwASIti aDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  189	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 189
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   śvetāparājitāpuṣparasenākṣṇośca pūraṇe /	Sveta aparAjitA puzpa rasena akzNoH ca pUraNe /
   paṭalaṃ nāśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.1 //	pawalam nASam AyAti na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,189.1 //
   mūlaṃ gokṣurakasyaiva carvitvā nīlalohita /	mUlam gokzurakasya eva carvitvA nIlalohitaH /
   dantakīṭavyathā naśyetsurāsuravimardan // GarP_1,189.2 //	dantakIwa vyaTA naSyet sura asura vimardan // GarP_1,189.2 //
   nārī puṣpādine pītvā gokṣīreṇopavāsataḥ /	nArI puzpa Adine pItvA go kzIreNa upavAsataH /
   śvetārkasya tu vai mūlaṃ tasyāstadgulmaśūlanut // GarP_1,189.3 //	Sveta arkasya tu vE mUlam tasyAH tad gulma SUla nud // GarP_1,189.3 //
   śvetārkapuṣpaṃ vidhinā gṛhītaṃ pūrvamantritam /	Sveta arka puzpam viDinA gRhItam pUrva mantritam /
   ṛtuśuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate // GarP_1,189.4 //	RtuSudDA ca lalanA kawO badDvA prasUyate // GarP_1,189.4 //
   hastabaddhaṃ palāśasya apāmārgasya vā hara /	hasta badDam palASasya apAmArgasya vA hara /
   mūlaṃ sarvajvaraharaṃ bhūtapretādinudbhavet // GarP_1,189.5 //	mUlam sarva jvara haram BUta preta Adi nudBavet // GarP_1,189.5 //
   pītaṃ vṛścikamūlañca prātaḥ paryuṣitāmbunā /	pItam vRScika mUlaQca prAtar paryuzita ambunA /
   sārdhaṃ vināśayeddāhajvarañca parameśvara // GarP_1,189.6 //	sArDam vinASayet dAha jvaraQca parameSvara // GarP_1,189.6 //
   śikhāyāñcaiva tadbaddhaṃ bhavedaikāhikāhinut /	SiKAyAQcA eva tat badDam Bavet EkAhika ahi nud /
   pītaṃ paryuṣitādbhiśca bhavetsarvaviṣāpahṛt // GarP_1,189.7 //	pItam paryuzita adBiH ca Bavet sarva viza apahRt // GarP_1,189.7 //
   yasya lajjālukāmūlaṃ dīyate ca svaretasā /	yasya lajjAlukA mUlam dIyate ca svaretasA /
   sārdhaṃ sa vairaṃ saṃyāti pumānstrī vā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,189.8 //	sArDam sa vEram saMyAti pumAn strI vA na saMSayaH // GarP_1,189.8 //
   piṣṭvā gavyaghṛtenaiva pāṭhāmūlaṃ pibettu yaḥ /	pizwvA gavya GRtena eva pAWA mUlam pibet tu yaH /
   sarvaṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyecca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.9 //	sarvam vizam vinaSyet ca na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,189.9 //
   mūlaṃ paryuṣitodena śirīṣasya yathā tathā /	mUlam paryuzita udena SirIzasya yaTA taTA /
   raktacitrakamūlasya rasasya bharaṇāddhara /	rakta citraka mUlasya rasasya BaraNAt hara /
   karṇayoḥ kāmalāvyādhināśaḥ syānnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,189.10 //	karNayoH kAmalA vyADi nASaH syAt na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,189.10 //
   śvetakokilākṣamūlaṃ chāgīkṣīreṇa saṃyutam /	Sveta kokilAkza mUlam CAgI kzIreNa saMyutam /
   trisaptāhena vai pītaṃ kṣayarogaṃ kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,189.11 //	tri sapta ahena vE pItam kzaya rogam kzayam nayet // GarP_1,189.11 //
   nārikelasya vai puṣpaṃ chāgakṣīreṇa saṃyutam /	nArikelasya vE puzpam CAga kzIreNa saMyutam /
   pibecca trividhastasya raktavāto vinaśyati // GarP_1,189.12 //	pibet ca triviDaH tasya rakta vAtaH vinaSyati // GarP_1,189.12 //
   kuryātsudarśanāmūlaṃ mālyena susamāhṛtam /	kuryAt sudarSanA mUlam mAlyena su samAhRtam /
   kaṇṭhabaddha tryāhikādigrahabhūtavināśanam // GarP_1,189.13 //	kaNWa badDa tryAhika Adi graha BUta vinASanam // GarP_1,189.13 //
   puṣpaṃ dhavalaguñjāyā gṛhītaṃ mūlameva ca /	puzpam Davala guQjAyAH gRhItam mUlam eva ca /
   mukhe tu nihitaṃ rudra harennānāviṣaṃ bahu // GarP_1,189.14 //	muKe tu nihitam rudra haret nAnA vizam bahu // GarP_1,189.14 //
   haste baddhaṃ kāṇḍayuktaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ grahādihṛt /	haste badDam kANxa yuktam kaNWe badDam graha Adi hRt /
   kṛṣṇāyāntu caturdaśyāṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ samāhṛtam /	kRzNAyAntu caturdaSyAm kawi badDam samAhRtam /
   siṃhādiśvāpadādbhītiṃ harecca nīlalohita // GarP_1,189.15 //	siMha Adi SvApadAt BItim haret ca nIlalohitaH // GarP_1,189.15 //
   viṣṇukrāntāmūlamīśa karṇabaddhantu dhārayet /	vizNukrAntA mUlam ISa karNa badDantu DArayet /
   paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makarādibhayaṃ na vai // GarP_1,189.16 //	pawwasUtreNa BUteSa makara Adi Bayam na vE // GarP_1,189.16 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	ekonanavatI aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  190	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 190
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   aparājitāyā mūlañca gomūtreṇa samanvitam /	aparAjitAyAH mUlaQca go mUtreNa samanvitam /
   pītañcāśu haratyeva gaṇḍamālāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,190.1 //	pItaQca ASu harati eva gaNxamAlAm na saMSayaH // GarP_1,190.1 //
   athendravāruṇīmūlaṃ vidhinā pītamīśvara /	aTa indravAruNI mUlam viDinA pItam ISvara /
   jiṅgiṇyairaṇḍakaṃ rudra śūkaśimbyā samanvitam /	jiFgiNyEraNxakam rudra SUkaSimbyA samanvitam /
   śītodakañca tatryastaṃ bāhugrīvāvyathāṃ haret // GarP_1,190.2 //	SIta uda kaQca tatryastam bAhu grIva avyaTAm haret // GarP_1,190.2 //
   māhiṣaṃ navanītañca aśvagandhā ca pippalī /	mAhizam navanI taQca aSvaganDA ca pippalI /
   vacā kuṣṭhadvayaṃ lepo liṅgasrotastanārtihṛt // GarP_1,190.3 //	vacA kuzWa dvayam lepaH liFga srota stana Arti hRt // GarP_1,190.3 //
   kuṣṭhanāgabalācūrṇaṃ navanītasamanvitam /	kuzWa nAga balA cUrNam navanIta samanvitam /
   tallepo yuvatīnāñca kuryādvṛttojakau śubhau // GarP_1,190.4 //	tad lepaH yuvatInAQca kuryAt vRttojakO SuBO // GarP_1,190.4 //
   indravāruṇikāmūlaṃ yasya nāmnā sudūrataḥ /	indravAruNikA mUlam yasya nAmnA su dUrataH /
   niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.5 //	niH kzipyate samutpAwya tasya plIhA vinaSyati // GarP_1,190.5 //
   punarnavāyāḥ śuklāyā mūlaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā /	punarnavAyAH SuklAyAH mUlam taNxula vAriNA /
   pītaṃ vidradhinutsyācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.6 //	pItam vidraDi nutsyAt ca na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,190.6 //
   kadalīdalakṣārantu pānīyena prasādhitam /	kadalIdalakzArantu pAnIyena prasADitam /
   tasyādanādvinaśyanti udaravyādhayo 'khilāḥ // GarP_1,190.7 //	tasya adanAt vinaSyanti udara vyADayaH aKilAH // GarP_1,190.7 //
   kadalyā mūlamādāya guḍājyena samanvitam /	kadalyA mUlam AdAya guxa Ajyena samanvitam /
   agninā sādhitaṃ jagdhamudarasthakrimīnharet // GarP_1,190.8 //	agninA sADitam jagDam udara sTa krimIn haret // GarP_1,190.8 //
   nityaṃ nimbadalānāñca cūrṇamāmalakasya ca /	nityam nimba dala anAQca cUrNam Amalakasya ca /
   pratyūṣe bhakṣayeccaiva tasya kuṣṭhaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.9 //	pratyUze Bakzayet ca eva tasya kuzWam vinaSyati // GarP_1,190.9 //
   harītakīviḍaṅgañca haridrā sitasarṣapāḥ /	harItakI vixaFgaQca haridrA sita sarzapAH /
   somarājasya mūlāni karañjasya ca raundhavam /	somarAjasya mUlAni karaQjasya ca rOnDavam /
   gomūtrapiṣṭānyetāni kuṣṭharogaharāṇi vai // GarP_1,190.10 //	go mUtra pizwAni etAni kuzWa roga harANi vE // GarP_1,190.10 //
   ekaśca triphalābhāgastathā bhāgadvayaṃ śivā /	ekaH ca triPalA BAgaH taTA BAga dvayam SivA /
   somarājasya bījānāṃ jagdhaṃ pathyena dadrunut // GarP_1,190.11 //	somarAjasya bIjAnAm jagDam paTyena dadru nud // GarP_1,190.11 //
   amlatakraṃ sagomūtraṃ kvathitaṃ lavaṇānvitam /	amla takram sa go mUtram kvaTitam lavaNa anvitam /
   kāṃsyaghṛṣṭaṃ kharaṃ lepātkuṣṭhadadruvināśanam // GarP_1,190.12 //	kAMsya GRzwam Karam lepAt kuzWa dadru vinASanam // GarP_1,190.12 //
   haridrā haritālaśca dūrvāgomūtrasaindhavam /	haridrA haritAlaH ca dUrvA go mUtra sEnDavam /
   ayaṃ lepo hanti dadruṃ pāmānaṃ ca garaṃ tathā // GarP_1,190.13 //	ayam lepaH hanti dadrum pAmAnam ca garam taTA // GarP_1,190.13 //
   soma rājasya bījāni navanītayutāni ca /	soma rAjasya bIjAni navanIta yutAni ca /
   madhunāsvāditāni syuḥ śuklakuṣṭhaharāṇi vai /	maDunA AsvAditAni syuH Sukla kuzWa harANi vE /
   takrānnapānato rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.14 //	takra anna pAnataH rudra na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,190.14 //
   śvetāparā jitāmūlaṃ vartitaṃ cāsya vāriṇā /	Sveta aparA jita amUlam vartitam ca asya vAriNA /
