   māhiṣaṃ navanītañca sindūraṃ samarīcakam /	mAhizam navanI taQca sindUram sa marIcakam /
   pāmā vilepanānnaśyeddur nāmā vṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,190.16 //	pAmA vilepanAt naSyet duH nAmA vRzaBaDvaja // GarP_1,190.16 //
   viśuṣkagāmbhārīmūlaṃ pakvaṃ kṣīreṇa saṃyutam /	viSuzka gAmBArI mUlam pakvam kzIreNa saMyutam /
   bhakṣitaṃ śuklapittasya vināśakaramīśvara // GarP_1,190.17 //	Bakzitam Sukla pittasya vinASa karam ISvara // GarP_1,190.17 //
   mūlakasya tu bījāni hyapā mārgarasena vai /	mUlakasya tu bIjAni hi apAH mArga rasena vE /
   piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakaṃ rudra naśyati // GarP_1,190.18 //	pizwAni tena lepena siDmakam rudra naSyati // GarP_1,190.18 //
   kadalīkṣārasaṃyuktaharidrā sidhmakāpahā /	kadalI kzAra saMyukta haridrA siDmaka apahA /
   rambhāpāmārgayoḥ kṣāra eraṇḍena vimiśritaḥ /	ramBA apAmArgayoH kzAraH eraNxena vimiSritaH /
   tadabhyaṅgānmahādeva ! sadyaḥ sidhma vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.19 //	tad aByaFgAt mahAdeva ! sadyas siDma vinaSyati // GarP_1,190.19 //
   kūṣmāṇḍanālakṣāraśca sagomūtraśca tattvataḥ /	kUzmANxa nAla kzAraH ca sa go mUtraH ca tattvataH /
   jalapiṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā mandānalenahi // GarP_1,190.20 //	jala pizwA haridrA ca sidDAH manda analena hi // GarP_1,190.20 //
   māhiṣeṇa purīṣeṇa veṣṭitā vṛṣabhadhvaja /	mAhizeNa purIzeNa vezwitAH vRzaBaDvaja /
   asyā udvartanaṃ kuryādaṅgasauṣṭhavamīśvara // GarP_1,190.21 //	asyAH udvartanam kuryAt aFga sOzWavam ISvara // GarP_1,190.21 //
   tilasarṣapasaṃyuktaṃ haridrādvayakuṣṭhakam /	tila sarzapa saMyuktam haridrA dvaya kuzWakam /
   tenodvartitadehaḥ syāddurgandhaḥ surabhiḥ pumān // GarP_1,190.22 //	tena udvartita dehaH syAt durganDaH suraBiH pumAn // GarP_1,190.22 //
   manoharaścānudinaṃ dūrvāṇāṃ kākajaṅghāyā /	manoharaH ca anudinam dUrvANAm kAkajaFGAyAH /
   arjunasya tu puṣpāṇi jambūpatrayutāni ca /	arjunasya tu puzpANi jambUpatra yutAni ca /
   salodhrāṇi ca tallepo dehadurgandhatāṃ haret // GarP_1,190.23 //	sa loDrANi ca tad lepaH deha durganDa tAm haret // GarP_1,190.23 //
   yuktaṃ lodhrabhavairnoraiścūrṇantu kanakasya ca /	yuktam loDra BavEH norEH cUrNantu kanakasya ca /
   tenodvartitadehasya na syādgrīṣmaprabādhikā // GarP_1,190.24 //	tena udvartita dehasya na syAt grIzma prabADikAH // GarP_1,190.24 //
   dugdhenoṣasi sekaśca gharmadoṣaśca naśyati /	dugDena uzasi sekaH ca Garma dozaH ca naSyati /
   kākajaṅghodvartanantu hyaṅgarāgakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,190.25 //	kAkajaFGA udvartanantu hi aFga rAga karam Bavet // GarP_1,190.25 //
   madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya raso madhu /	maDuyazwI SarkarA ca vAsakasya rasaH maDu /
   etatpītaṃ raktapittakāmalāpāṇḍuroganut // GarP_1,190.26 //	etat pItam rakta pitta kAmalA pANxu roga nud // GarP_1,190.26 //
   raktapittaṃ haretpīto vāsakasya raso madhu /	raktapittam haret pItaH vAsakasya rasaH maDu /
   prātaḥ kāle toyapānātpīnasaṃ dāruṇaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.27 //	prAtar kAle toya pAnAt pInasam dAruNam haret // GarP_1,190.27 //
   bibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca /	biBItakasya vE cUrNam pippalyAH sEnDavasya ca /
   pītaṃ sakāñjikaṃ hanti svarabhedaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,190.28 //	pItam sa kAQjikam hanti svaraBedam maheSvara // GarP_1,190.28 //
   cūrṇamāmalakaṃ sevyaṃ pītaṃ gavyapayo 'nvitam /	cUrNam Amalakam sevyam pItam gavya payaH anvitam /
   manaḥ śilā balāmūlaṃ kolapaṇa ca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,190.29 //	manaH SilA balA mUlam kolapaNa ca gugguluH // GarP_1,190.29 //
   jātipatraṃ kolapatraṃ tathā caiva manaḥ śilā /	jAti patram kola patram taTA ca eva manaH SilA /
   ebhiścaiva kṛtā vartirbadaryagnau maheśvara /	eBiH ca eva kRtA vartiH badari agnO maheSvaraH /
   dhūmapānaṃ kāsaharaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.30 //	DUma pAnam kAsa haram na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,190.30 //
   triphalāpippalīcūrṇaṃ bhakṣitaṃ madhunāyutam /	triPalA pippalI cUrNam Bakzitam maDunA ayutam /
   bhojanādau hi samadhu pipāsājva(tva)ritaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.31 //	Bojana AdO hi sa maDu pipAsA jva(tu a)ritam haret // GarP_1,190.31 //
   bilvamūlañca samadhuguḍūcīkvathitaṃ jalam /	bilva mUlaQca sa maDu guxUcI kvaTitam jalam /
   pītaṃ harecca trivadhaṃ chardiṃ naivātrasaṃśayaḥ /	pItam haret ca trivaDam Cardim na eva atra saMSayaH /
   pītā dūrvā chardinutsyātpiṣṭātaṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,190.32 //	pItA dUrvA Cardi nutsyAt pizwA taNxula vAriNA // GarP_1,190.32 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   navatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	navati aDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  191	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 191
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   punarnavāyā mūlañca śvetaṃ puṣye samāhṛtam /	punarnavAyAH mUlaQca Svetam puzye samAhRtam /
   vāri pītaṃ tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ // GarP_1,191.1 //	vAri pItam tasya pArSva Bavanezu na pannagAH // GarP_1,191.1 //
   tārkṣyamūrtiṃ vahedyo vai bhallūkadantanirmitām /	tArkzya mUrtim vahet yaH vE BallUka danta nirmitAm /
   sa pannagairna dṛśyeta yāvajjīvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,191.2 //	sa pannagEH na dRSyeta yAvajjIvam vRzaDvaja // GarP_1,191.2 //
   pibecchalmalimūlaṃ yaḥ puṣyarkṣe rudra vāriṇā /	pibet Salmali mUlam yaH puzya Rkze rudra vAriNA /
   tasminnapāstadaśanā nāgāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.3 //	tasmin= apAsta daSanAH nAgAH syuH na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,191.3 //
   puṣye lajjālukāmūle hastabaddhe tu pannagān /	puzye lajjA lukA mUle hasta badDe tu pannagAn /
   gṛhṇīyāllepato vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,191.4 //	gRhNIyAt lepataH vA api na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,191.4 //
   puṣyeśvetārkamūlantu pītaṃ śītena vāriṇā /	puzyeSveta arka mUlantu pItam SItena vAriNA /
   naśyetu daṃśakaviṣaṃ karavīrādijaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,191.5 //	naSyetu daMSaka vizam karavIra Adi jam vizam // GarP_1,191.5 //
   mahākālasya vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ tatkāñjikena vai /	mahAkAlasya vE mUlam pizwam tad kAQjikena vE /
   voḍrāṇāṃ ḍuṇḍubhānāṃ ca tallopo harate viṣam // GarP_1,191.6 //	voxrANAm xuNxuBAnAm ca tat lopaH harate vizam // GarP_1,191.6 //
   taṇḍulīyakamūlaṃ ca piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā /	taNxulIyaka mUlam ca pizwam taNxula vAriNA /
   ghṛtena saha pītantu haretsarvāviṣāṇi ca // GarP_1,191.7 //	GRtena saha pItantu haret sarva avizANi ca // GarP_1,191.7 //
   nīlīlajjālukāmūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā /	nIlI lajjAlukA mUlam pizwam taNxula vAriNA /
   pītaṃ taddaṃśakaviṣaṃ naśyedekena vobhayoḥ // GarP_1,191.8 //	pItam tat daMSaka vizam naSyet ekena vA uBayoH // GarP_1,191.8 //
   kūṣmāṇḍakasya svarasaḥ saguḍaḥ sahaśarkaraḥ /	kUzmANxakasya svarasaH sa guxaH saha SarkaraH /
   pītaḥ sadugdho hanyācca daṃśakasyaviṣaṃ ca vai // GarP_1,191.9 //	pItaH sa dugDaH hanyAt ca daMSakasyavizam ca vE // GarP_1,191.9 //
   tathā kodravamūlasya mohasya hara eva ca /	taTA kodrava mUlasya mohasya haraH eva ca /
   yaṣṭīmadhusamāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā // GarP_1,191.10 //	yazwImaDu samAyuktA taTA pItA ca SarkarA // GarP_1,191.10 //
   sadugdhā ca trirātreṇa mūṣakānāṃ viṣaṃ haret /	sa dugDA ca tri rAtreNa mUzakAnAm vizam haret /
   culukatrayapānācca vāriṇaḥ śītalasya vai // GarP_1,191.11 //	culuka traya pAnAt ca vAriNaH SItalasya vE // GarP_1,191.11 //
   tāmbūladagdhamukhasya lālāstrāvo vinaśyati /	tAmbUla dagDa muKasya lAlAH trAvaH vinaSyati /
   ghṛtaṃ saśarkaraṃ ṣītvā madyapānamado na vai // GarP_1,191.12 //	GRtam sa Sarkaram zItvA madya pAna madaH na vE // GarP_1,191.12 //
   kṛṣṇāṅkolasya mūlena pītaṃ sukvathitaṃ jalam /	kRzNa aFkolasya mUlena pItam su kvaTitam jalam /
   tato naśyadgaraviṣaṃ trirātreṇa maheśvara // GarP_1,191.13 //	tatas naSyadgara vizam tri rAtreNa maheSvara // GarP_1,191.13 //
   uṣṇaṃ gavyaghṛtaṃ caiva saindhavena samanvitam /	uzNam gavya GRtam ca eva sEnDavena samanvitam /
   nāśayettanmahādeva vedanāṃ vṛścikodbhavām // GarP_1,191.14 //	nASayet tat mahAdeva vedanAm vRScika udBavAm // GarP_1,191.14 //
   kusubhaṃ kaṅkumañcaiva haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /	kusuBam kaFkumaQca eva haritAlam manaH SilA /
   karañjaṃ piṣitaṃ caiva hyarkamūlaṃ ca śaṅkara // GarP_1,191.15 //	karaQjam pizitam ca eva hi arka mUlam ca SaFkara // GarP_1,191.15 //
   viṣaṃnṛṇāṃ vinaśyettu eteṣāṃ bhakṣaṇācchiva /	vizaMnRNAm vinaSyet tu etezAm BakzaNAt Siva /
   dīpatailapradānācca daṃśairākīṭajaiḥ śiva /	dIpa tEla pradAnAt ca daMSEH AkIwa jEH Siva /
   kharjūrakaviṣaṃ naśyettadā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.16 //	KarjUraka vizam naSyet tadA vE na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,191.16 //
   daṃśasthānaṃ vṛścikasya śuṇṭhī tagarasaṃyutā /	daMSa sTAnam vRScikasya SuNWI tagara saMyutAH /
   naśyenmadhumakṣikāyā eteṣāṃ lepato viṣam // GarP_1,191.17 //	naSyet maDu makzikAyAH etezAm lepataH vizam // GarP_1,191.17 //
   śatapuṣpā saindhavañca sājyaṃ vā tena lepayet /	SatapuzpA sEnDavaQca sa Ajyam vA tena lepayet /
   śirīṣasya tu bījaṃvai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,191.18 //	SirIzasya tu bIjaMvE sidDa kzIreNa Garzitam // GarP_1,191.18 //
   tallepena mahādeva naśyetkukkurajaṃ viṣam /	tad lepena mahAdeva naSyet kukkurajam vizam /
   jvalitāgnirvāriseko tathā dardurajaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,191.19 //	jvalita agniH vAri sekaH taTA dardura jam vizam // GarP_1,191.19 //
   dhattūrakarasonmiśraṃ kṣīrādyaguḍapānataḥ /	DattUraka rasa unmiSram kzIra Adi a guxa pAnataH /
   śūnāṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyettu śaśāṅkāṅkitaśekhara // GarP_1,191.20 //	SUnAm vizam vinaSyet tu SaSAFka aFkita SeKaraH // GarP_1,191.20 //
   vaṭanimbaśamīnāñca valkalaiḥ kvathitaṃ jalam /	vawa nimba SamInAQca valkalEH kvaTitam jalam /
   tatsekānmukhadantānāṃ naśyedvai viṣavedanā // GarP_1,191.21 //	tad sekAt muKa dantAnAm naSyet vE viza vedanAH // GarP_1,191.21 //
   lepanāddevadārośca gairikasya ca lepanāt /	lepanAt devadAroH ca gErikasya ca lepanAt /
   nāgeśvaro daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakā hara /	nAgeSvaraH daridre dve taTA maQjizWakA hara /
   ebhirlepādvinaśyettu lūtāviṣamumāpate // GarP_1,191.22 //	eBiH lepAt vinaSyet tu lUtA vizam umApate // GarP_1,191.22 //
   karañjasya tu bījāni varuṇacchadameva ca /	karaQjasya tu bIjAni varuNa= Cadam eva ca /
   tilāśca sarṣapā hanyurviṣaṃ vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.23 //	tilAH ca sarzapAH hanyuH vizam vE na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,191.23 //
   ghṛtaṃ kumārīpatraṃ vai dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ hara /	GRtam kumArI patram vE dattam sa lavaNam hara /
   turaṅgamaśarīrāṇāṃ kaṇḍūrnaśyeddaśāhataḥ // GarP_1,191.24 //	turaFgama SarIrANAm kaNxUH naSyet daSa AhataH // GarP_1,191.24 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   ekanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	ekanavati aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  192	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 192
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   citrakasyāṣṭabhāgāśca śūraṇasya ca ṣoḍaśa /	citrakasya azwa BAgAH ca SUraNasya ca zoxaSa /
   śuṇṭhyā bhāgāśca catvāro maricānāṃ dvayaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.1 //	SuNWyAH BAgAH ca catvAraH maricAnAm dvayam taTA // GarP_1,192.1 //
   tritayaṃ pippalīmūlaṃ viḍaṅgānāṃ catuṣṭayam /	tritayam pippalI mUlam vixaFgAnAm catuzwayam /
   aṣṭau muśalikābhāgāstriphalāyāścatuṣṭayam /	azwO muSalikA BAgAH triPalAyAH catuzwayam /
   dviguṇena guḍenaiṣāṃ modakāniha kārayet // GarP_1,192.2 //	dviguNena guxena ezAm modakAn iha kArayet // GarP_1,192.2 //
   tadbhakṣaṇamajīrṇaṃ hi pāṇḍurogañja kāmalam /	tad BakzaNam ajIrNam hi pANxurogaQja kAmalam /
   atīsārāṃśca mandāgniṃ plīhāñcaiva nivārayet // GarP_1,192.3 //	atIsArAn= ca manda agnim plIhAQca eva nivArayet // GarP_1,192.3 //
   bilvāgnimanthaḥ śyonākapāṭalāpāribhadrakam /	bilva agnimanTaH SyonAka pAwalA pAriBadrakam /
   prasāraṇyaśvagandhā ca bṛhatī kaṇṭakārikā // GarP_1,192.4 //	prasAraNI aSvaganDA ca bRhatI kaNwakArikAH // GarP_1,192.4 //
   balā cātibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā /	balA ca atibalA rAsnA SvadaMzwrA ca punarnavAH /
   eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇo guḍūcī kapikacchukā // GarP_1,192.5 //	eraNxaH SArivA parNaH guxUcI kapikacCukAH // GarP_1,192.5 //
   eṣāṃ daśapalānbhāgānkvāthayetsalile 'male /	ezAm daSa palAn BAgAn kvATayet salile amale /
   tena pādāvaśeṣeṇa tailapātre vipācayet // GarP_1,192.6 //	tena pAda avaSezeNa tEla pAtre vipAcayet // GarP_1,192.6 //
   ājaṃ vā yadi gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ dattvā caturguṇam /	Ajam vA yadi gavyam kzIram dattvA caturguNam /
   śatāvarīṃ saindhavañca tailatulyaṃ pradāpayet // GarP_1,192.7 //	SatAvarIm sEnDavan ca tEla tulyam pradApayet // GarP_1,192.7 //
   dravyāṇiyāni peṣyāṇi tāni vakṣyāmi tacchṛṇu /	dravyANiyAni pezyANi tAni vakzyAmi tat SRNu /
   śatapuṣpā devadārurbalā parṇo vacāguru // GarP_1,192.8 //	SatapuzpA devadAruH balA parNaH vacA guru // GarP_1,192.8 //
   kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī saindhavañca palamekaṃ punarnavā /	kuzWam mAMsI sEnDavaQca palam ekam punarnavA /
   pāne nasye tathābhyaṅge tailametatpradāpayet // GarP_1,192.9 //	pAne nasye taTA aByaFge tElam etat pradApayet // GarP_1,192.9 //
   hṛcchūlaṃ pārśvaśūlañca gaṇḍamālāñca nāśayet /	hRd SUlam pArSvaSUlaQca gaNxam AlAQca nASayet /
   apasmāraṃ vātaraktaṃ vapuṣmāṃśca pumānbhavet // GarP_1,192.10 //	apasmAram vAtaraktam vapuzmAn= ca pumAn Bavet // GarP_1,192.10 //
   garbhamaśvatarī vindyātkiṃ punarmānuṣī hara /	garBam aSvatarI vindyAt kim punar mAnuzI hara /
   aśvānāṃ vātabhagnānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā /	aSvAnAm vAta BagnAnAm kuQjarANAm nRNAm taTA /
   tailametatprayoktavyaṃ sarvavātavikāriṇām // GarP_1,192.11 //	tElam etat prayoktavyam sarva vAta vikAriNAm // GarP_1,192.11 //
   hiṅgutumburuśuṇṭhībhiḥ siddhaṃ tailantu sārṣapam /	hiFgu tumburu SuNWIBiH sidDam tElantu sArzapam /
   etaddhi puraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param // GarP_1,192.12 //	etat hi puraNam SrezWam karNa SUla apaham param // GarP_1,192.12 //
   śuṣkamūlakaśuṇṭhīnāṃ kṣāro hiṅgulanāgaram /	Suzka mUlaka SuNWInAm kzAraH hiFgula nAgaram /
   takraṃ caturguṇaṃ dadyāttailametadvipācayet // GarP_1,192.13 //	takram caturguNam dadyAt tElam etat vipAcayet // GarP_1,192.13 //
   bādhiryaṃ karṇaśūlañca pūyastrāvañca karṇayoḥ /	bADiryam karNa SUlaQca pUyaH trAvaQca karNayoH /
   krimayaśca vinaśyanti tailasyāsya prapūraṇāt // GarP_1,192.14 //	krimayaH ca vinaSyanti tElasya asya prapUraNAt // GarP_1,192.14 //
   śuṣkamūlakaśuṇṭhīnāṃ kṣāro hiṅgulanāgaram /	Suzka mUlaka SuNWInAm kzAraH hiFgula nAgaram /
   śatapuṣpā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāruśigrurasāñjanam // GarP_1,192.15 //	SatapuzpA vacA kuzWam dAru Sigru rasAQjanam // GarP_1,192.15 //
   sauvarcalaṃ yavakṣāraṃ sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ tathā /	sOvarcalam yavakzAram sAmudram sEnDavam taTA /
   granthikaṃ viḍamustaṃ ca madhu śuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,192.16 //	granTikam vixa mustam ca maDu Suktam caturguNam // GarP_1,192.16 //
   mātuluṅgarasaścaiva kadalīrasa eva ca /	mAtuluFga rasaH ca eva kadalI rasaH eva ca /
   tailamebhirvipaktavyaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param // GarP_1,192.17 //	tElam eBiH vipaktavyam karNa SUla apaham param // GarP_1,192.17 //
   bādhiryaṃ karṇanādaśca pūyastrāvaśca dāruṇam /	bADiryam karNa nAdaH ca pUyaH trAvaH ca dAruNam /
   pūraṇādasya tailasya krimayaḥ karṇayorhara // GarP_1,192.18 //	pUraNAt asya tElasya krimayaH karNayoH hara // GarP_1,192.18 //
   sadyo vināśamāyānti śaśāṅkakṛtaśekhara /	sadyas vinASam AyAnti SaSAFka kRta SeKaraH /
   kṣāratailamidaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mukhadantamalāpaham // GarP_1,192.19 //	kzAratElam idam SrezWam muKa danta mala apaham // GarP_1,192.19 //
   candanaṃ kuṅkumaṃ māṃsī karpūraṃ jātipatrikā /	candanam kuFkumam mAMsI karpUram jAtipatrikA /
   jātīkaṅkolapūgānāṃ lavaṅgasya phalāni ca // GarP_1,192.20 //	jAtI kaFkola pUgAnAm lavaFgasya PalAni ca // GarP_1,192.20 //
   agurūṇi ca kastūrī kuṣṭhaṃ tagarapādikā /	agurUNi ca kastUrI kuzWam tagara pAdikA /
   gorocanā priyaṅguśca balā caiva tathā nakhī // GarP_1,192.21 //	gorocanA priyaFguH ca balA ca eva taTA naKI // GarP_1,192.21 //
   saralaṃ saptaparṇaṃ ca lākṣā cāmalakī tathā /	saralam saptaparNam ca lAkzA ca AmalakI taTA /

   prasvedamaladurgandhakaṇḍū kuṣṭhaharaṃ param /	prasveda mala durganDa kaNxU kuzWa haram param /
   gacchati strīśataṃ rudra bandhyāpi labhate sutam // GarP_1,192.23 //	gacCati strI Satam rudra banDyA api laBate sutam // GarP_1,192.23 //
   yavānī citrakaṃ dhānyaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ jīrakaṃ tathā /	yavAnI citrakam DAnyam tryUzaNam jIrakam taTA /
   sauvarcalaṃ viḍagañca pippalīmūlarājikam // GarP_1,192.24 //	sOvarcalam vixa gaQca pippalI mUla rAjikam // GarP_1,192.24 //
   ebhiḥ pacedraghṛtaprasthaṃ jalaprasthāṣṭasaṃyutam /	eBiH pacet ra GRta prasTam jala prasTa azwa saMyutam /
   tathār'śogulmaśvayathuṃ hanti vahniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,192.25 //	taTAraSaH gulma SvayaTum hanti vahnim karoti vE // GarP_1,192.25 //
   maricaṃ trivṛtaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /	maricam trivRtam kuzWam haritAlam manaH SilA /
   devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī ca candanam // GarP_1,192.26 //	devadAru haridre dve kuzWam mAMsI ca candanam // GarP_1,192.26 //
   viśālā karavīrañca arkakṣīraṃ śakṛdrasaḥ /	viSAlA karavIraQca arka kzIram SakRt rasaH /
   eṣāñca kārṣiko bhāgo viṣasyārdhapalaṃ bhavett // GarP_1,192.27 //	ezAQca kArzikaH BAgaH vizasya arDa palam Bavet t // GarP_1,192.27 //
   prasthaṃ saṭukatailasya gomūtre 'ṣṭaguṇe pacet /	prasTam sawuka tElasya go mUtre azwaguNe pacet /
   mṛtpātre lohapātre vā śanairmṛdvagninā pacet // GarP_1,192.28 //	mRd pAtre loha pAtre vA SanEs mRdu agninA pacet // GarP_1,192.28 //
   pāmā vicarcikā caiva dadrurvisphocakānica /	pAmA vicarcikA ca eva dadruH visPocakAnica /

   prabhūtānyapi śvitrāṇi tailenānena mardayet /	praBUtAni api SvitrANi tElena anena mardayet /
   cirotthitamapi śvitraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ tatkṣaṇādbhavet // GarP_1,192.30 //	cira utTitam api Svitram vinazwam tad kzaNAt Bavet // GarP_1,192.30 //
   paṭolapatraṃ kaṭukā mañjiṣṭhā śārivā niśā /	pawola patram kawukA maQjizWA SArivA niSA /
   jātīśamīnimbapatraṃ madhukaṃ kvathitaṃ ghṛtam // GarP_1,192.31 //	jAtI SamI nimba patram maDukam kvaTitam GRtam // GarP_1,192.31 //
   ebhirlepātsayurarujo vraṇā vistrāviṇaḥ śiva /	eBiH lepAt sa yurarujaH vraNAH vistrAviNaH Siva /
   śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somo brāhmī brahmasuvarcalāḥ // GarP_1,192.32 //	SaFKapuzpI vacA somaH brAhmI brahmasuvarcalAH // GarP_1,192.32 //
   abhayā ca guḍūcī ca āṭarūṣakavākucī /	aBayA ca guxUcI ca AwarUzaka vAkucI /
   etairakṣasamairbhāgairghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet // GarP_1,192.33 //	etEH akza samEH BAgEH GRta prasTam vipAcayet // GarP_1,192.33 //
   kaṇṭakāryā rasaprasthaṃ kṣīraprasthasamanvitam /	kaNwakAryAH rasa prasTam kzIra prasTa samanvitam /
   etadbrāhmīghṛtaṃ nāma smṛtimedhākaraṃ param // GarP_1,192.34 //	etat brAhmI GRtam nAma smRti meDA akaram param // GarP_1,192.34 //
   agnimantho vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam /	agnimanTaH vacA vAsA pippalI maDu sEnDavam /
   saptarātraprayogeṇa kinnarairiva gīyate // GarP_1,192.35 //	sapta rAtra prayogeNa kinnarEH iva gIyate // GarP_1,192.35 //
   apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śatāvarī /	apAmArgaH guxUcI ca vacA kuzWam SatAvarI /
   śaṅkhapuṣpābhayā sājyaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ bhakṣitaṃ samam /	SaFKapuzpa aBayA sa Ajyam vixaFgam Bakzitam samam /
   tribhirdinairnaraṃ kuryādgranthāṣṭaśatadhāriṇam // GarP_1,192.36 //	triBiH dinEH naram kuryAt granTa azwaSata DAriNam // GarP_1,192.36 //
   adbhirvā payasājyena māsamekantu sevitā /	adBiH vA payasA Ajyena mAsam ekantu sevitA /

   bhūnimbanimbatriphalāparpaṭaiśca śṛtaṃ jalam /	BUnimba nimba triPalA parpawEH ca SRtam jalam /
   paṭolīmustakābhyāñca vāsakena ca nāśayet // GarP_1,192.39 //	pawolI mustaka aByAQca vAsakena ca nASayet // GarP_1,192.39 //
   visphoṭakāni raktañca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	visPowakAni raktaQca na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   katakasya phalaṃ śaṅkhaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.40 //	katakasya Palam SaFKam sEnDavam tryUzaNam vacA // GarP_1,192.40 //
   phenī rasāñjanaṃ kṣaudraṃ viḍaṅgāni manaḥ śilā /	PenI rasAQjanam kzOdram vixaFgAni manaH SilA /
   eṣāṃ vartirhanti kācaṃ timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.41 //	ezAm vartiH hanti kAcam timiram pawalam taTA // GarP_1,192.41 //
   prasthadvayaṃ māṣakasya kvāthaśca droṇamambhasām /	prasTa dvayam mAzakasya kvATaH ca droNam amBasAm /
   caturbhāgāvaśeṣeṇa tailaprasthaṃ vipācayet // GarP_1,192.42 //	catur BAga avaSezeNa tEla prasTam vipAcayet // GarP_1,192.42 //
   kāñjikasyāḍhakaṃ dattvā piṣṭānyetāni dāpayet /	kAQjikasya AXakam dattvA pizwAni etAni dApayet /
   punarnavā gokṣurakaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.43 //	punarnavA gokzurakam sEnDavam tryUzaNam vacA // GarP_1,192.43 //
   lavaṇaṃ suradāruśca mañjiṣṭhā kaṇṭakārikā /	lavaNam suradAruH ca maQjizWA kaNwakArikAH /
   nasyātpānāddharatyeva karṇaśūlaṃ sudāruṇam // GarP_1,192.44 //	nasyAt pAnAt harati eva karNa SUlam su dAruNam // GarP_1,192.44 //
   bādhiryaṃ sarvarogāṃśca hyabhyaṅgācca maheśvara /	bADiryam sarva rogAn= ca hi aByaFgAt ca maheSvara /
   paladvayaṃ saindhavañca śuṇṭhī citrakapañcakam // GarP_1,192.45 //	pala dvayam sEnDavaQca SuNWI citraka paQcakam // GarP_1,192.45 //
   sauvīrapañcaprasthaṃ ca tailaprasthaṃ pacettataḥ /	sOvIra paQca prasTam ca tEla prasTam pacet tatas /
   asṛgdarasvaraplīhāsarvavātavikāranut // GarP_1,192.46 //	asRj dara svara plIhA sarva vAta vikAra nud // GarP_1,192.46 //
   udumbaraṃ vaṭaṃ plakṣaṃ jambūdvayamathārjunam /	udumbaram vawam plakzam jambU dvayam aTa arjunam /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   dvinavatyadhika śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	dvinavati aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  193	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 193
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /

   vacā trikaṭukañcaiva lavaṇaṃ cūrṇamuttamam // GarP_1,193.1 //	vacA trikawu kaQcA eva lavaNam cUrNam uttamam // GarP_1,193.1 //
   brāhmīrasairbhāvitañca sarpirmadhusamanvitam /	brAhmI rasEH BAvi taQca sarpiH maDu samanvitam /

   siddhārthakaṃ vacā hiṅgu karañjaṃ devadāru ca /	sidDArTakam vacA hiFgu karaQjam devadAru ca /

   dehaṃ tailākta gātraṃ vai nayedudvartanena ca /	deham tElAkta gAtram vE nayet udvartanena ca /

   sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ kṣāro rājikā lavaṇaṃ viḍam /	sAmudram sEnDavam kzAraH rAjikA lavaNam vixam /
   kaṭuloharajaścaivaṃ trivṛtsūraṇakaṃ samam /	kawuloha rajaH ca evam trivRt sUraNakam samam /
   dadhigomūtrapayasā mandapāvakapācitam // GarP_1,193.8 //	daDi go mUtra payasA manda pAvaka pAcitam // GarP_1,193.8 //
   balāgnivardhakaṃ cūrṇaṃ pibeduṣṇena vāriṇā /	bala agni varDakam cUrNam pibet uzNena vAriNA /
   jīrṇe 'jīrṇe tu bhuñjati māṃsyādighṛtamuttamam // GarP_1,193.9 //	jIrNe ajIrNe tu BuQjati mAMsi Adi GRtam uttamam // GarP_1,193.9 //
   nābhiśūlaṃ mūtraśūlaṃ gulmaplīhabhavañca yat /	na aBi SUlam mUtra SUlam gulma plIha Bavan ca yat /

   pariṇāmasamutthasya śūlasya ca hitaṃ param // GarP_1,193.10 //	pariNAma samutTasya SUlasya ca hitam param // GarP_1,193.10 //
   abhayāmalakaṃ drākṣā pippalī kaṇṭakārikā /	aBayA Amalakam drAkzA pippalI kaNwakArikAH /
   śṛṅgī punarnavā śuṇṭhī jagdhā kāsaṃ nihanti vai // GarP_1,193.11 //	SRFgI punarnavA SuNWI jagDA kAsam nihanti vE // GarP_1,193.11 //
   abhayāmalakaṃ drākṣā pāṭhā caiva vibhītakam /	aBayA Amalakam drAkzA pAWA ca eva viBItakam /
   śarkarāyā samaṃ caiva jagdhaṃ jvaraharaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,193.12 //	SarkarAyA samam ca eva jagDam jvara haram Bavet // GarP_1,193.12 //
   triphalā badaraṃ drākṣā pippalī ca virekakṛt /	triPalA badaram drAkzA pippalI ca vireka kRt /
   harītakī soṣṇānīralavaṇañca virekakṛt // GarP_1,193.13 //	harItakI sa uzNA nIra lavaNaQca vireka kRt // GarP_1,193.13 //
   kūrmamatsyāśvamahiṣagośṛgālāśca vānarāḥ /	kUrma matsya aSva mahiza go SRgAlAH ca vAnarAH /

   haṃsa eṣāñca viṇmūtraṃ māṃsaṃ vā roma śoṇitam /	haMsaH ezAQca viz mUtram mAMsam vA roma SoNitam /
   dhūpaṃ dadyājjvarārtebhya unmattebhyaśca śāntaye // GarP_1,193.15 //	DUpam dadyAt jvara ArteByaH unmatteByaH ca SAntaye // GarP_1,193.15 //
   etānyauṣadhajātāni kathitāni umāpate /	etAni OzaDa jAtAni kaTitAni umApate /

   auṣadhaṃbhagavānviṣṇuḥ saṃsmṛto roganudbhavet /	OzaDaMBagavAn vizNuH saMsmRtaH roga nud Bavet /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   trinavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	trinavati aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  194	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 194
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   sarvavyādhiharaṃ vakṣye vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ śubham /	sarva vyADi haram vakzye vEzNavam kavacam SuBam /
   yena rakṣā kṛtā śambhordaityānkṣapayataḥ purā // GarP_1,194.1 //	yena rakzA kRtA SamBoH dEtyAn kzapayataH purA // GarP_1,194.1 //
   praṇamya devamīśānamajaṃ nityamanāmayam /	praNamya devam ISAnam ajam nityam anAmayam /
   devaṃ sarveśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvavyāpinamavyayam // GarP_1,194.2 //	devam sarveSvaram vizNum sarva vyApinam avyayam // GarP_1,194.2 //
   badhnāmyahaṃ pratisaraṃ namaskṛtya janārdanam /	baDnAmi aham pratisaram namaskRtya janArdanam /
   amoghāpratimaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaduḥ khanivāraṇam // GarP_1,194.3 //	amoGa apratimam sarvam sarvaduH Ka ni vAraNam // GarP_1,194.3 //
   viṣṇurmāmagrataḥ pātu kṛṣṇo rakṣatu pṛṣṭhataḥ /	vizNuH mAm agratas pAtu kRzNaH rakzatu pRzWatas /
   harirme rakṣatu śiro hṛdayañca janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,194.4 //	hariH me rakzatu SiraH hRdayaQca janArdanaH // GarP_1,194.4 //
   mano mama hṛṣīkeśo jihvāṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ /	manaH mama hRzIkeSaH jihvAm rakzatu keSavaH /
   prātu netre vāsudevaḥ śrotre saṅkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ // GarP_1,194.5 //	prAtu netre vAsudevaH Srotre saFkarzaNaH viBuH // GarP_1,194.5 //
   pradyumnaḥ pātu me ghrāṇamaniruddhastu carma ca /	pradyumnaH pAtu me GrANam anirudDaH tu carma ca /
   vanamālī galasyāntaṃ śrīvatso rakṣatāmadhaḥ // GarP_1,194.6 //	vanamAlI galasya antam SrIvatsaH rakzatAm aDas // GarP_1,194.6 //
   pārśvaṃ rakṣatu me cakraṃ vāmaṃ daityanivāraṇam /	pArSvam rakzatu me cakram vAmam dEtya nivAraNam /
   dakṣiṇantu gadā devī sarvāsuranivāriṇī // GarP_1,194.7 //	dakziNantu gadA devI sarva asura nivAriNI // GarP_1,194.7 //
   udaraṃ musalaṃ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ me pātu lāṅgalam /	udaram musalam pAtu pRzWam me pAtu lAFgalam /
   ūrdhvaṃ rakṣatu me śārṅgaṃ jaṅghe rakṣatu nandakaḥ // GarP_1,194.8 //	UrDvam rakzatu me SArFgam jaFGe rakzatu nandakaH // GarP_1,194.8 //
   pārṣṇo rakṣatu śaṅkhaśca padmaṃ me caraṇāvubhau /	pArzNaH rakzatu SaFKaH ca padmam me caraNO= uBO /
   sarvakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pātu māṃ garuḍaḥ sadā // GarP_1,194.9 //	sarva kArya arTa sidDi arTam pAtu mAm garuxaH sadA // GarP_1,194.9 //
   varāho rakṣatu jale viṣameṣu ca vāmanaḥ /	varAhaH rakzatu jale vizamezu ca vAmanaH /
   aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhaśca sarvataḥ pātu keśavaḥ // GarP_1,194.10 //	awavyAm narasiMhaH ca sarvatas pAtu keSavaH // GarP_1,194.10 //
   hiraṇyagarbho bhagavānhiraṇyaṃ me prayacchatu /	hiraNyagarBaH BagavAn hiraNyam me prayacCatu /
   sāṃkhyācāryastu kapilo dhātusāmyaṃ karotu me // GarP_1,194.11 //	sAMKya AcAryaH tu kapilaH DAtu sAmyam karotu me // GarP_1,194.11 //
   śvetadvīpanivāsī ca śvetadvīpaṃ nayatvajaḥ /	SvetadvIpa nivAsI ca SvetadvIpam naya tva jaH /
   sarvānsūdayatāṃ śatrūnmadhukaiṭabhamardanaḥ // GarP_1,194.12 //	sarvAn sUdayatAm SatrUn maDu kEwaBa mardanaH // GarP_1,194.12 //
   sadākarṣatu viṣṇuśca kilbiṣaṃ mama vigrahāt /	sat Akarzatu vizNuH ca kilbizam mama vigrahAt /
   haṃso matsyastathā kūrmaḥ pātu māṃ sarvatodiśam // GarP_1,194.13 //	haMsaH matsyaH taTA kUrmaH pAtu mAm sarvatodiSam // GarP_1,194.13 //
   trivikramastu me devaḥ sarvapāpāni kṛntatu /	trivikramaH tu me devaH sarva pApAni kRntatu /
   tathā nārāyaṇo devo buddhiṃ pālayatāṃ mama // GarP_1,194.14 //	taTA nArAyaNaH devaH budDim pAlayatAm mama // GarP_1,194.14 //
   śeṣo me nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ karotvajñānanāśanam /	SezaH me nirmalam jQAnam karotu ajQAna nASanam /
   vaḍavāmukho nāśayatāṃ kalmaṣaṃ yatkṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,194.15 //	vaxavAmuKaH nASayatAm kalmazam yat kRtam mayA // GarP_1,194.15 //
   padbhyāṃ dadātu paramaṃ sukhaṃ mūrdhni mama prabhuḥ /	padByAm dadAtu paramam suKam mUrDni mama praBuH /
   dattātreyaḥ prakurutāṃ saputrapaśubāndhavam // GarP_1,194.16 //	dattAtreyaH prakurutAm sa putra paSu bAnDavam // GarP_1,194.16 //
   sarvānarīnnāśayatu rāmaḥ paraśunā mama /	sarvAn arIt nASayatu rAmaH paraSunA mama /
   rakṣoghnastu daśarathiḥ pātu nityaṃ mahābhujaḥ // GarP_1,194.17 //	rakzoGnaH tu daSaraTiH pAtu nityam mahA BujaH // GarP_1,194.17 //
   śatrīnhalena me hanyādrāmo yādavanandanaḥ /	SatrIn halena me hanyAt rAmaH yAdava nandanaH /
   pralambakeśicāṇūrapūtanākaṃsanāśanaḥ /	pralamba keSi cANUra pUtanA kaMsa nASanaH /
   kṛṣṇasya yo bālabhāvaḥ sa me kāmānprayacchatu // GarP_1,194.18 //	kRzNasya yaH bAla BAvaH sa me kAmAn prayacCatu // GarP_1,194.18 //
   andhakāratamoghoraṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṣiṅgalam /	anDakAra tamaH Goram puruzam kRzNa ziFgalam /
   paśyāmi bhayasantrastaḥ pāśahastamivāntakam // GarP_1,194.19 //	paSyAmi Baya santrastaH pASa hastam iva antakam // GarP_1,194.19 //
   tato 'haṃ puṇḍarīkākṣamacyutaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /	tatas aham puNxarIkAkzam acyutam SaraNam gataH /
   dhanyo 'haṃ nirbhayo nityaṃ yasya me bhagavānhariḥ // GarP_1,194.20 //	DanyaH aham nirBayaH nityam yasya me BagavAn hariH // GarP_1,194.20 //
   dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ sarvopadravanāśanam /	DyAtvA nArAyaNam devam sarva upadrava nASanam /
   vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ baddhvā vicarāmi mahītale // GarP_1,194.21 //	vEzNavam kavacam badDvA vicarAmi mahI tale // GarP_1,194.21 //
   apradhṛṣyo 'smi bhūtānāṃ sarvadevamayo hyaham /	apraDRzyaH asmi BUtAnAm sarva deva mayaH hi aham /
   smaraṇāddevadevasya viṣṇoramitatejasaḥ // GarP_1,194.22 //	smaraNAt devadevasya vizNoH amita tejasaH // GarP_1,194.22 //
   siddhirbhavatu me nityaṃ yathāmantramudāhṛtam /	sidDiH Bavatu me nityam yaTAmantram udAhRtam /
   yo māṃ paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ yañcaḥ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā /	yaH mAm paSyati cakzurByAm yaQcaH paSyAmi cakzuzA /
   sarveṣāṃ pāpaduṣṭānāṃ viṣṇurbadhnātu cakṣuṣī // GarP_1,194.23 //	sarvezAm pApa duzwAnAm vizNuH baDnAtu cakzuzI // GarP_1,194.23 //
   vāsudevasya yaccakraṃ tasya cakrasya ye tvarāḥ /	vAsudevasya yat cakram tasya cakrasya ye tvarAH /
   te hi cchindantu pāpānme mama hiṃsantu hiṃsakān // GarP_1,194.24 //	te hi cCindantu pApAt me mama hiMsantu hiMsakAn // GarP_1,194.24 //
   rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kāntāreṣvaṭavīṣu ca /	rAkzasezu piSAcezu kAntArezu awavIzu ca /
   vivāde rājamārgeṣu dyūteṣu kalaheṣu ca // GarP_1,194.25 //	vivAde rAjamArgezu dyUtezu kalahezu ca // GarP_1,194.25 //
   nadīsantāraṇe ghore saṃprāpte prāṇasaṃśaye /	nadI santAraNe Gore saMprApte prANa saMSaye /
   agnicauranipāteṣu sarvagrahanivāraṇe // GarP_1,194.26 //	agni cOra nipAtezu sarva graha nivAraNe // GarP_1,194.26 //
   vidyutsarpaviṣodvege roge vai vighnasaṅkaṭe /	vidyut sarpa viza udvege roge vE viGna saFkawe /
   japyametajjapennityaṃ śarīre bhayamāgate // GarP_1,194.27 //	japyam etat japet nityam SarIre Bayam Agate // GarP_1,194.27 //
   ayaṃ bhagavato mantro mantrāṇāṃ paramo mahān /	ayam BagavataH mantraH mantrANAm paramaH mahAn /
   vikhyātaṃ kavacaṃ guhyaṃ sarpapāpapraṇāśanam /	viKyAtam kavacam guhyam sarpa pApa praNASanam /
   svamāyākṛtinirmāṇaṃ kalpāntagahanaṃ mahat // GarP_1,194.28 //	sva mAyA AkRti nirmANam kalpa anta gahanam mahat // GarP_1,194.28 //
   anādyanta ! jagadbīja ! padmanābha ! namo 'stu te /	anAdyanta ! jagadbIja ! padmanABa ! namaH astu te /
   oṃ kālāya svāhā / oṃ kālapuruṣāya svāhā / oṃ kṛṣṇāya svāhā /	om kAlAya svAhA / om kAlapuruzAya svAhA / om kRzNAya svAhA /
   oṃ kṛṣṇarūpāya svāhā / oṃ caṇḍāya svāhā / oṃ caṇḍarūpāya svāhā /	om kRzNa rUpAya svAhA / om caNxAya svAhA / om caNxa rUpAya svAhA /
   oṃ pracaṇḍāya svāhā / oṃ pracaṇarūpāya svāhā / oṃ sarvāya svāhā /	om pracaNxAya svAhA / om pracaNa rUpAya svAhA / om sarvAya svAhA /
   oṃ sarvarūpāya svāhā / oṃ namo bhuvaneśāya trilokadhātre iha viṭi siviṭi	om sarva rUpAya svAhA / om namaH BuvaneSAya triloka DAtre iha viwi siviwi
   siviṭi svāhā/ oṃ namaḥ ayokhetaye ye ye saṃjñāpaya	siviwi svAhA/ om namaH ayoKetaye ye ye saMjQApaya
   daityadānavayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācakūṣmāṇḍāntāpasmārakacchardanaduddharrāṇāmekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikacāturthikamauhūrtikadinajvararātrijvarasandhyājvarasarvajvarādīnāṃ	dEtya dAnava yakza rAkzasa BUta piSAca kUzmANxa antApa smAraka= CardanadudDarrANAm ekAhika dvyAhika tryAhika cAturTika mOhUrtika dina jvara rAtri
   lūtākīṭakaṇṭakapūtanābhujaṅgasthāvarajaṅgamaviṣādī nāmidaṃ śarīraṃ mama	lUtA kIwa kaNwaka pUtanABu jaFga sTAvara jaFgama vizAdI nAm idam SarIram mama
   pathyaṃ tvaṃ kuru sphuṭa sphuṭa sphuṭa prakoṭa laphaṭa vikaṭadaṃṣṭra	paTyam tvam kuru sPuwa sPuwa sPuwa prakowa laPawa vikawa daMzwra

   paścimato rakṣa oṃ nivi nivi pradīptajvalanajvālākāra mahākapila uttarato	paScimatas rakzaH om nivi nivi pradIpta jvalana jvAlA AkAra mahA kapilaH uttaratas 
   rakṣa oṃ vili vili mili mili garuḍi garuḍi	rakzaH om vili vili mili mili garuxi garuxi

   paśya sarvabhūtabhayopadravebhyo rakṣa rakṣa jaya jaya vijaya tena hīyate	paSya sarva BUta Baya upadraveByaH rakza rakza jaya jaya vijaya tena hIyate

   praviśanti raśmayaḥ /	praviSanti raSmayaH /

   sarvajvarānmamaghnantu viṣṇurnārāyaṇo hariḥ // GarP_1,194.29 //	sarva jvarAn mamaGnantu vizNuH nArAyaNaH hariH // GarP_1,194.29 //

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  195	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 195
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /

   yanna spṛśanti na viduḥ manobuddhīndriyāsavaḥ /	yat na spRSanti na viduH manaH budDi indriya asavaH /

   caraṇāravindayugala parameṣṭhin namaste /	caraNa aravinda yugala paramezWin namaH te /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  196	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 196
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /

   trivikramastathākāśe sthale rakṣatu vāmanaḥ /	trivikramaH taTA AkASe sTale rakzatu vAmanaH /

   bhūmau rakṣatu vārāhau vyomni nārāyaṇo 'vatu /	BUmO rakzatu vArAhO vyomni nArAyaNaH avatu /
   karmabandhācca kapilo datto rogācca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.8 //	karma banDAt ca kapilaH dattaH rogAt ca rakzatu // GarP_1,196.8 //
   hayagrīvo devatābhyaḥ kumāro makaradhvajāt /	hayagrIvaH devatAByaH kumAraH makaraDvajAt /

   śrīdharo 'vyādardharātre padmanābho niśīthake /	SrIDaraH avyAdarDarAtre padmanABaH niSITake /

   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /

   vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālaśca sthitau pārthivamaṇḍale /	vAsukiH SaFKapAlaH ca sTitO pArTiva maNxale /

   aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntamanulomavilomataḥ /	aFguzWa Adi kanizWA antam anuloma vilomataH /

   praṇavādinamaścānte nāmnaiva ca samanvitaḥ /	praNava Adi namaH ca ante nAmnA eva ca samanvitaH /

   ādyākṣaraṃ tannāmnaśca mantro 'yaṃ parikīrtitaḥ /	Adya akzaram tat nAmnaH ca mantraH ayam parikIrtitaH /

   oṃ svāhā kramaśaścaiva pañcabhūtapurogatam /	om svAhA kramaSas ca eva paQcaBUta puras gatam /
   eṣa sākṣādbhavettārkṣyaḥ sarvakarmaprasādhakaḥ // GarP_1,197.19 //	eza sAkzAt Bavet tArkzyaH sarva karma prasADakaH // GarP_1,197.19 //
   karanyāsaṃ svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punarnyaset /	karanyAsam svarEH kRtvA SarIre tu punar nyaset /
   jvalantaṃ cintayetprāṇamātmasaṃśuddhikārakam // GarP_1,197.20 //	jvalantam cintayet prANam Atma saMSudDi kArakam // GarP_1,197.20 //
   bījantu cintayetpaścādvarṣāntamamṛtātmakam /	bIjantu cintayet paScAt varza antam amRta Atmakam /

   pṛthivīṃ pādayordadyāttaptakāñcanasaprabhām /	pRTivIm pAdayoH dadyAt tapta kAQcana sapraBAm /
   aśeṣabhuvanākīrṇāṃ lokapālasamanvitām // GarP_1,197.22 //	aSeza Buvana AkIrNAm lokapAla samanvitAm // GarP_1,197.22 //
   etāṃ bhagavatīṃ pṛthvīṃ svadehe vinyased budhaḥ /	etAm BagavatIm pRTvIm sva dehe vinyaset buDaH /
   śyāmavarṇamayaṃ dhyāyetpṛthivīdviguṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,197.23 //	SyAma varNa mayam DyAyet pRTivI dviguNam Bavet // GarP_1,197.23 //
   jvālāmālākulaṃ dīptamābrahmabhuvanāntakam /	jvAlA mAlA Akulam dIptam Abrahma Buvana antakam /
   nābhigrīvāntare nyasya trikoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ raveḥ // GarP_1,197.24 //	nABi grIva antare nyasya tri koNam maNxalam raveH // GarP_1,197.24 //
   bhinnāñjananibhākāraṃ nikhilaṃ vyāpya saṃsthitam /	BinnAQjana niBa AkAram niKilam vyApya saMsTitam /
   ātmamūrtisthitaṃ dhyāyedvāyavyaṃ tīkṣṇamaṇḍalam // GarP_1,197.25 //	Atma mUrti sTitam DyAyet vAyavyam tIkzNa maNxalam // GarP_1,197.25 //
   sikhopari sthitaṃ divyaṃ śuddhasphaṭikavarcasam /	siKA upari sTitam divyam SudDa sPawika varcasam /
   apramāṇamahāvyomavyāpakaṃ cāmṛtopamam // GarP_1,197.26 //	apramANa mahA vyoma vyApakam ca amRta upamam // GarP_1,197.26 //
   bhūtanyāsaṃ purā kṛtvā nāgānāñca yathākramam /	BUta nyAsam purA kRtvA nAga anAQca yaTAkramam /
   lakārāntā binduyutā mantrā bhūtakrameṇa tu // GarP_1,197.27 //	lakAra antAH bindu yutA mantrAH BUta krameNa tu // GarP_1,197.27 //
   śivabījaṃ tato dadyāttato dhyāyecca maṇḍalam /	SivabIjam tatas dadyAt tatas DyAyet ca maNxalam /
   yoyasya kramākhyāto maṇḍalasya vicakṣaṇaḥ /	yaH yasya krama AKyAtaH maNxalasya vicakzaNaH /
   tasya taccintayedvarṇaṃ karmakāle vidhānavit // GarP_1,197.28 //	tasya tat cintayet varNam karma kAle viDAna vid // GarP_1,197.28 //
   pādapakṣaistathā cañcatkṛṣṇanāgairvibhūṣitam /	pAda pakzEH taTA caQcat kRzNa nAgEH viBUzitam /
   tārkṣyaṃ dhyāyettato nityaṃ viṣe sthāvarajaṅgame // GarP_1,197.29 //	tArkzyam DyAyet tatas nityam vize sTAvara jaFgame // GarP_1,197.29 //
   grahabhūtapiśāce ca ḍākinīyakṣarākṣase /	graha BUta piSAce ca xAkinIyakza rAkzase /
   nāgairviveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā svadehe vinyasecchivam // GarP_1,197.30 //	nAgEH vivezwitam kRtvA sva dehe vinyaset Sivam // GarP_1,197.30 //
   dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyāto nāgānāṃ caiva bhūtayoḥ /	dviDA nyAsaH samAKyAtaH nAgAnAm ca eva BUtayoH /
   evaṃ dhyātvā karma kuryādātmatattvādikaṃ kramāt // GarP_1,197.31 //	evam DyAtvA karma kuryAt Atma tattva Adikam kramAt // GarP_1,197.31 //
   tritattvaṃ pratham dattvā sivatattvaṃ tataḥ param /	tri tattvam praTam dattvA siva tattvam tatas param /
   yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnāṃ ca parvasu // GarP_1,197.32 //	yaTA dehe taTA deve aFgulInAm ca parvasu // GarP_1,197.32 //
   dehe nyāsaṃ purā kṛtvā hyanulomavilomataḥ /	dehe nyAsam purA kRtvA hi anuloma vilomataH /
   kandaṃ nālaṃ tathā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca // GarP_1,197.33 //	kandam nAlam taTA padmam Darmam jQAna Adim eva ca // GarP_1,197.33 //
   dvitīyasvarasambhinnaṃ vargāntena tu pūjayet /	dvitIya svara samBinnam varga antena tu pUjayet /
   śaumiti karṇikāmadhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam // GarP_1,197.34 //	SOm iti karNikA maDye mUrDni rePeNa saMyutam // GarP_1,197.34 //
   akacaṭatapayaśā vargāḥ pūrvādike nyaset /	akacawata payaSAH vargAH pUrva Adike nyaset /
   patrāntakesarānte tu dvau dvau pūrvādikau tathā // GarP_1,197.35 //	patra anta kesara ante tu dvO dvO pUrva AdikO taTA // GarP_1,197.35 //
   keśare tu svarānnyasyādīśāntānṣoḍaśārcayet /	keSare tu svarAt nyasyAt ISAntAn zoxaSa arcayet /
   vāmādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāstritattvantu tato nyaset // GarP_1,197.36 //	vAma AdyAH SaktayaH proktAH tri tattvantu tatas nyaset // GarP_1,197.36 //
   āvāhayettato mardhni śivamaṅgaṃ tataḥ param /	AvAhayet tatas marDni Sivam aFgam tatas param /
   karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddevaṃ sāṃgaṃ tatra puraḥ saram // GarP_1,197.37 //	karNikAyAm nyaset devam sa aMgam tatra puras saram // GarP_1,197.37 //
   pṛtivī paścime patre āpaścottarasaṃsthitāḥ /	pRtivI paScime patre ApaH ca uttara saMsTitAH /
   tejastu dakṣiṇe patre vāyuṃ pūrveṇa pūjayet // GarP_1,197.38 //	tejaH tu dakziNe patre vAyum pUrveNa pUjayet // GarP_1,197.38 //
   svabījaṃ mūrtirūpantu prāguktaṃ pārakalpayet /	sva bIjam mUrti rUpantu prAk uktam pArakalpayet /
   yaṃ vāyumūlaṃ nairṛtye rephastvanalasaṃsthitaḥ // GarP_1,197.39 //	yam vAyu mUlam nErRtye rePaH tu anala saMsTitaH // GarP_1,197.39 //
   vaṃ ca tvīśe sadā pūjya oṃ hṛdisthañca pūjayet /	vam ca tu ISe sadA pUjya om hRdisTaQca pUjayet /
   tanmātrānbhūtamātrāṃstānbahireva prapūjayet // GarP_1,197.40 //	tanmAtrAn BUta mAtrAn= tAn bahis eva prapUjayet // GarP_1,197.40 //
   śivāṅgāni tataḥ paścāddhyātvā saṃpūjayettataḥ /	Siva aFgAni tatas paScAt DyAtvA saMpUjayet tatas /
   āgneyyāṃ hṛdayaṃ pūjya śira īśānagocare // GarP_1,197.41 //	AgneyyAm hRdayam pUjya SiraH ISAna gocare // GarP_1,197.41 //
   nairṛtye tu śikhāṃ dadyādvāyavyāṃ kavacaṃ nyaset /	nErRtye tu SiKAm dadyAt vAyavyAm kavacam nyaset /
   astrantu bāhyato dadyānnetramuttarasaṃsthitam // GarP_1,197.42 //	astrantu bAhyatas dadyAt netram uttara saMsTitam // GarP_1,197.42 //
   patrāgre karṇikagre tu bījāni paripūjayet /	patra agre karNi kagre tu bIjAni paripUjayet /
   anantādikulīrāntā aṣṭau nāgāḥ kramātsthitāḥ // GarP_1,197.43 //	ananta Adi kulIrAntAH azwO nAgAH kramAt sTitAH // GarP_1,197.43 //
   pūrvādikakrameṇaiva tvīśaparyantameva ca /	pUrva Adika krameNa eva tu ISa paryantam eva ca /
   pūjayecca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_1,197.44 //	pUjayet ca sadA mantrI viDAnena pRTak pRTak // GarP_1,197.44 //
   hṛdi padme vidhānena śilādau dattamaṇḍale /	hRdi padme viDAnena SilA AdO datta maNxale /
   etatkāryaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ nityanaimittike 'pi ca // GarP_1,197.45 //	etat kAryam samuddizwam nitya nEmittike api ca // GarP_1,197.45 //
   ātmānaṃ cintayennityaṃ kāmarūpaṃ manoharam /	AtmAnam cintayet nityam kAmarUpam manoharam /
   plāvayantaṃ jagatsarvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārakam // GarP_1,197.46 //	plAvayantam jagat sarvam sRzwi saMhAra kArakam // GarP_1,197.46 //
   jvālāmālābhiruddīptaṃ ābrahmabhuvanāntakam /	jvAlA mAlABiH uddIptam Abrahma Buvana antakam /
   daśabāhuṃ caturvaktraṃ piṅgākṣaṃ śūlapāṇinam // GarP_1,197.47 //	daSa bAhum catur vaktram piFga akzam SUlapANinam // GarP_1,197.47 //
   daṃṣṭrākarālamatyugraṃ trinetraṃ śaśiśekharam /	daMzwrA karAlam ati ugram trinetram SaSiSeKaram /
   bhairavantu smaretsiddhyai garuḍaṃ sarvakarmasu // GarP_1,197.48 //	BEravantu smaret sidDyE garuxam sarva karmasu // GarP_1,197.48 //
   nāgānāṃ nāśanārthāya garuḍaṃ bhīmabhīṣaṇam /	nAgAnAm nASana arTAya garuxam BIma BIzaNam /
   pādau pātālaṃ saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāstu saṃśritāḥ // GarP_1,197.49 //	pAdO pAtAlam saMsTO ca diSaH pakzAH tu saMSritAH // GarP_1,197.49 //
   sapta svargā urasi ca brahmāṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhamāśritam /	sapta svargAH urasi ca brahmANxam kaNWam ASritam /
   pūrvādīśānaparyantaṃ śirastasya vicintayet // GarP_1,197.50 //	pUrva Adi ISAna paryantam SiraH tasya vicintayet // GarP_1,197.50 //
   sadāśivaśikhāntasthaṃ śaktitritayameva ca /	sadASiva SiKA anta sTam Sakti tritayam eva ca /
   parātparaṃ śivaṃ sākṣāttārkṣyaṃ bhuvananāyakam // GarP_1,197.51 //	parAtparam Sivam sAkzAt tArkzyam Buvana nAyakam // GarP_1,197.51 //
   trinetramugrarūpañca viṣanāgakṣayaṅkaram /	trinetram ugra rUpaQca viza nAga kzayaFkaram /
   grasanaṃ bhīmavaktraṃ ca garuḍaṃ mantravigraham // GarP_1,197.52 //	grasanam BIma vaktram ca garuxam mantra vigraham // GarP_1,197.52 //
   kālāgnimiva dīptaṃ ca cintayetsarvakarmasu /	kAlAgnim iva dIptam ca cintayet sarva karmasu /
   evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā yadyanmanasi cintayet // GarP_1,197.53 //	evam nyAsa viDim kRtvA yat yat manasi cintayet // GarP_1,197.53 //
   tattadeva bhavetsādhyaṃ naro vai garuḍāyate /	tat tat eva Bavet sADyam naraH vE garuxAyate /
   pretā bhūtāstathā yakṣā nāgā gandharvarākṣasāḥ /	pretAH BUtAH taTA yakzAH nAgAH ganDarva rAkzasAH /
   darśanāttasya naśyanti jvarāścāturthikādayaḥ // GarP_1,197.54 //	darSanAt tasya naSyanti jvarAH cAturTika AdayaH // GarP_1,197.54 //
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   evaṃ sa garuḍaṃ proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca /	evam sa garuxam proce garuxaH kaSyapAya ca /
   maheśvaro yathā gaurīṃ prāha vidyāṃ tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,197.55 //	maheSvaraH yaTA gOrIm prAha vidyAm taTA SRNu // GarP_1,197.55 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	saptanavati aDika SatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  198	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 198
   bhairava uvāca /	BEravaH uvAca /
   nityaklinnāmatho vakṣye tripurāṃ bhuktimuktidām /	nitya klinnAm aTo vakzye tripurAm Bukti mukti dAm /
   oṃ hrīṃ āgaccha devi aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam /	om hrIm AgacCa devi Em hrIm hrIm reKA kAraNam /
   oṃ hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madanakṣobhiṇā tathā /	om hrIm kledinI Bam namaH madana kzoBiNA taTA /
   ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇarekhayā hrīṃ madanāntare ca /	E yam yam krIm vA guNa reKayA hrIm madana antare ca /
   aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā vāgati madanāntarekhe khanetrāvalīti ca /	Em hrIm hrIm ca niraQjanA vA Agati madana anta reKe Kanetra AvalI iti ca /
   vegavati mahāpretāsanāya ca pūjayet /	vegavati mahA preta AsanAya ca pUjayet /
   oṃ hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityaṃ madadrave krīṃ namaḥ /	om hrIm krEm nEm krEm nityam mada drave krIm namaH /
   aiṃ hrīṃ tripurāyai namaḥ /	Em hrIm tripurAyE namaH /
   oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ paścimavaktraṃ oṃ aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathottaram /	om hrIm krIm paScima vaktram om Em hrIm hrIm ca taTA uttaram /
   aiṃ hrīṃ dakṣiṇamūrdhvaṃvaktraṃ tu paścimam /	Em hrIm dakziNam UrDvaMvaktram tu paScimam /
   oṃ hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aiṃ kapālāya namaḥ /	om hrIm pASAya krIm aFkuSAya Em kapAlAya namaH /
   ādyaṃ bhayaṃ aiṃ hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace /	Adyam Bayam Em hrIm ca taTA SiraH taTA SiKAyE kavace /
   aiṃ hrīṃ krīṃ astrāyaphaṭ // GarP_1,198.1 //	Em hrIm krIm astrAya Paw // GarP_1,198.1 //
   pūrve kāmarūpāya asitāṅgāya bhairavāya namo brahmāṇyai /	pUrve kAmarUpAya asita aFgAya BEravAya namaH brahmANyE /
   dakṣiṇe cai kandāya vai namaḥ rurubhaivāya māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet //	dakziNe cE kandAya vE namaH ruruBa evAya mAheSvaryAH vA AvAhayet //
   GarP_1,198.2 //	GarP_1,198.2 //
   tathā paścime caṇḍāya vai namaḥ /	taTA paScime caNxAya vE namaH /
   kaumāryai cottare colkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai // GarP_1,198.3 //	kOmAryE ca uttare ca ulkAya kroDAya namaH vEzNavyE // GarP_1,198.3 //
   agnikoṇe aghorāyonmattabhairavāyeti vārāhyai /	agni koNe aGorAya unmattaBEravAya iti vArAhyE /
   rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai // GarP_1,198.4 //	rakzaH koNe sArAya kapAline BEravAya mAheH ndyE // GarP_1,198.4 //
   vāyukoṇe jālandharāya bhīṣaṇāya bhairavāya cāmuṇḍāyai /	vAyu koNe jAlanDarAya BIzaNAya BEravAya cAmuNxAyE /
   īśakoṇake vaṭukāya saṃhārañcaṇḍikāñca prapūjayet // GarP_1,198.5 //	ISa koNake vawukAya saMhAraQcaNxikAQca prapUjayet // GarP_1,198.5 //
   ratiprītikāmadevānpañcabāṇānyajedatha /	rati prIti kAmadevAn paQcabANAnyajet aTa /
   dhyānārcanājjapyahomāddevī siddhā ca sarvadā // GarP_1,198.6 //	DyAna arcanAt japya homAt devI sidDA ca sarvadA // GarP_1,198.6 //
   nityā ca tripurā vyādhiṃ hanyājjvālāmukhīkramāt /	nityA ca tripurA vyADim hanyAt jvAlA muKIkramAt /
   jvālāmukhīkramaṃ vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyataḥ śubhā // GarP_1,198.7 //	jvAlAmuKIkramam vakzye sA pUjyAH maDyatas SuBAH // GarP_1,198.7 //
   nityāruṇā madanāturā mahāmohā prakṛtyapi /	nitya aruNA madana AturA mahAmohA prakRti api /
   mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā // GarP_1,198.8 //	mahendrANI ca kalana AkarziNI BAratI taTA // GarP_1,198.8 //
   brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /	brahmANI ca eva mAheSI kOmArI vEzNavI taTA /
   vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā cāparājitā // GarP_1,198.9 //	vArAhI ca eva mAhendrI cAmuNxA ca aparAjitAH // GarP_1,198.9 //
   vijayā cājitā caivamohinī tvaritā tathā /	vijayA ca ajitA ca eva mohinI tvaritA taTA /
   stambhinī jṛmbhiṇī pūjyā kālikā padmabāhyataḥ /	stamBinI jRmBiNI pUjyA kAlikA padma bAhyatas /
   jvālāmukhīkramaṃ cārcedviṣādiharaṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,198.10 //	jvAlAmuKIkramam ca arcet viza Adi haraNam Bavet // GarP_1,198.10 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ	azwanavati aDika Sata tamaH DyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  199	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 199
   bhairava uvāca /	BEravaH uvAca /
   atha cūḍāmaṇiṃ vakṣye śubhāśubhaviśuddhaye /	aTa cUxAmaNim vakzye SuBa aSuBa viSudDaye /
   sūryaṃ devīṃ gaṇaṃ soma smṛtvā tu vilikhennaraḥ // GarP_1,199.1 //	sUryam devIm gaNam soma smRtvA tu viliKet naraH // GarP_1,199.1 //
   trirekhā gomūrtrikābhā athavā praśravākyataḥ /	tri reKA gomUrtrikA ABAH aTavA praSravAkyataH /
   diśasthānaprasūto vā dhvajādīngaṇayetkramāt // GarP_1,199.2 //	diSa sTAna prasUtaH vA Dvaja AdIn gaNayet kramAt // GarP_1,199.2 //
   dhvajo dhūmo 'tha siṃhaśca śvā vṛṣaḥ kharadantinau /	DvajaH DUmaH aTa siMhaH ca SvA vRzaH Kara dantinO /
   dhvāṅkṣaśca aṣṭamo jñeyo nāma mantraiśca tānnyaset // GarP_1,199.3 //	DvAFkzaH ca azwamaH jQeyaH nAma mantrEH ca tAn nyaset // GarP_1,199.3 //
   dhvajasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyacintādhanādikam /	Dvaja sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA rAjya cintA Dana Adikam /
   dhvajasthāne sthito dhūmro dhātucintā ca lābhakṛt // GarP_1,199.4 //	Dvaja sTAne sTitaH DUmraH DAtu cintA ca lABa kRt // GarP_1,199.4 //
   dhvajasthāne sthite siṃhe dhanalābhādikaṃ bhavet /	Dvaja sTAne sTite siMhe Dana lABa Adikam Bavet /
   sthite śunidhvajasthāne dāsīcintāsukhādikam // GarP_1,199.5 //	sTite Suni Dvaja sTAne dAsI cintA suKa Adikam // GarP_1,199.5 //
   dhvajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintā ca lābhakam /	Dvaja sTAne vRzam dRzwvA sTAna cintA ca lABakam /
   dhvajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khakleśādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.6 //	Dvaja sTAne Karam dRzwvA duH Ka kleSa Adikam Bavet // GarP_1,199.6 //
   dhvajasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintājayādikam /	Dvaja sTAne gajam dRzwvA sTAna cintA jaya Adikam /
   dhvajasthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśacintā dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.7 //	Dvaja sTAne taTA DvAFkze kleSa cintA Dana kzayaH // GarP_1,199.7 //
   dhūmrasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tato dhanam /	DUmra sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA pUrvam duH Kam tatas Danam /
   dhūmre dhūmraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā kaliduḥ khādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.8 //	DUmre DUmram taTA dRzwvA kaliduH Ka Adikam Bavet // GarP_1,199.8 //
   dhūmrasthāne sthite siṃhe manaścintādhanādikam /	DUmra sTAne sTite siMhe manaH cintA Dana Adikam /
   dhūmrasthāne śuni sthite jayalābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.9 //	DUmra sTAne Suni sTite jaya lABa Adikam Bavet // GarP_1,199.9 //
   dhūmrasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā nārīgo 'śvadhanādikam /	DUmra sTAne vRzam dRzwvA nArI gaH aSva Dana Adikam /
   dhūmrasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādhiścāpi dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.10 //	DUmra sTAne Karam dRzwvA vyADiH ca api Dana kzayaH // GarP_1,199.10 //
   dhūmrasthāne gaje dṛṣṭe rājyalābhajayādikam /	DUmra sTAne gaje dRzwe rAjya lABa jaya Adikam /
   dhūmrasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe dhanarājyavināśanam // GarP_1,199.11 //	DUmra sTAne sTite DvAFkze Dana rAjya vinASanam // GarP_1,199.11 //
   siṃhasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyalābhādi nirdiśet /	siMha sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA rAjya lABa Adi nirdiSet /
   siṃhasthāne sthite dhūmre kanyāprāptirdhanādikam // GarP_1,199.12 //	siMha sTAne sTite DUmre kanyA prAptiH Dana Adikam // GarP_1,199.12 //
   siṃhasthāne sthite siṃhe jayo mitrasamāgamaḥ /	siMha sTAne sTite siMhe jayaH mitra samAgamaH /
   kauleyake siṃhagate strīcintā grāmalābhakam // GarP_1,199.13 //	kOleyake siMha gate strI cintA grAma lABakam // GarP_1,199.13 //
   siṃha sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhakṣetrārthalābhakam /	siMha sTAne vRzam dRzwvA gRha kzetra arTa lABakam /
   siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmasvāmitvameva ca // GarP_1,199.14 //	siMha sTAne gajam dRzwvA grAma svAmi tvam eva ca // GarP_1,199.14 //
   siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā ārogyāyuḥ sukhādikam /	siMha sTAne gajam dRzwvA Arogya AyuH suKa Adikam /
   siṃhasthānesthite dhvāṅkṣe kanyādhānyaguṇādikam // GarP_1,199.15 //	siMha sTAnesTite DvAFkze kanyA DAnya guNa Adikam // GarP_1,199.15 //
   śunaḥ sthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintāsukhādikam /	SunaH sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA sTAna cintA suKa Adikam /
   śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalahaṃ kāryanāśanam // GarP_1,199.16 //	SunaH sTAne sTite DUmre kalaham kArya nASanam // GarP_1,199.16 //
   śunaḥ sthāna sthite siṃhe kāryāsiddhirbhaviṣyati /	SunaH sTAna sTite siMhe kArya asidDiH Bavizyati /
   sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhananāśo bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,199.17 //	sTite Suni SunaH sTAne Dana nASaH Bavizyati // GarP_1,199.17 //
   śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogī rogādvi mucyate /	SunaH sTAne vRzam dRzwvA rogI rogAt vi mucyate /
   śunaḥ sthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.18 //	SunaH sTAne Karam dRzwvA kalahasya Bayam Bavet // GarP_1,199.18 //
   śunaḥ sthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā putrabhāryāsamāgamaḥ /	SunaH sTAne gajam dRzwvA putra BAryA samAgamaH /
   śvasthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍāsyātkulanāśanam // GarP_1,199.19 //	Sva sTAne ca sTite DvAFkze pIxA AsyAt kula nASanam // GarP_1,199.19 //
   vṛṣasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājapūjāsukhādikam /	vRza sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA rAja pUjA suKa Adikam /
   vṛṣasthāne sthite dhūmre rājapūjāsukhādikam // GarP_1,199.20 //	vRza sTAne sTite DUmre rAja pUjA suKa Adikam // GarP_1,199.20 //
   vṛṣasthāne sthite siṃhe saubhāgyañca dhanādikam /	vRza sTAne sTite siMhe sOBAgyaQca Dana Adikam /
   sthite śuni vṛṣasthāne balaśrīkāma īritaḥ // GarP_1,199.21 //	sTite Suni vRza sTAne bala SrI kAmaH IritaH // GarP_1,199.21 //
   vṛṣasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā kīrtituṣṭisukhādikam /	vRza sTAne vRzam dRzwvA kIrti tuzwi suKa Adikam /
   vṛṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahālābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.22 //	vRza sTAne Karam dRzwvA mahA lABa Adikam Bavet // GarP_1,199.22 //
   vṛṣasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā strīgajādisamāgamaḥ /	vRza sTAne gajam dRzwvA strI gaja Adi samAgamaH /
   vṛṣasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe sthānamānasamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,199.23 //	vRza sTAne sTite DvAFkze sTAna mAnasamAgamaH // GarP_1,199.23 //
   kharasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogaśokādikaṃ bhavet /	Kara sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA roga Soka Adikam Bavet /
   kharasthāne sthite dhūmre taskarādibhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.24 //	Kara sTAne sTite DUmre taskara Adi Bayam Bavet // GarP_1,199.24 //
   kharasthāne sthite siṃhe pūjāśrīvijayādikam /	Kara sTAne sTite siMhe pUjA SrI vijaya Adikam /
   sthite śunikharasthāne santāpadhananāśanam // GarP_1,199.25 //	sTite Suni Kara sTAne santApa Dana nASanam // GarP_1,199.25 //
   kharasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ priyasamāgamaḥ /	Kara sTAne vRzam dRzwvA suKam priya samAgamaH /
   kharasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khīpīḍādi nirdiśet // GarP_1,199.26 //	Kara sTAne Karam dRzwvA duH KI pIxA Adi nirdiSet // GarP_1,199.26 //
   kharasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaputtrādikaṃ bhavet /	Kara sTAne gajam dRzwvA suKa puttra Adikam Bavet /
   kharasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalaho vyādhireva ca // GarP_1,199.27 //	Kara sTAne sTite DvAFkze kalahaH vyADiH eva ca // GarP_1,199.27 //
   gajasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā strījayaśrīsukhādikam /	gaja sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA strI jaya SrI suKa Adikam /
   gajasthānesthite dhūmre dhanadhānyasamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,199.28 //	gaja sTAnesTite DUmre Dana DAnya samAgamaH // GarP_1,199.28 //
   gajasthāne sthite siṃhe jayasiddhisamāgamaḥ /	gaja sTAne sTite siMhe jaya sidDi samAgamaH /
   sthite śuni gajasthāne ārogyaṃ sukhasampadaḥ // GarP_1,199.29 //	sTite Suni gaja sTAne Arogyam suKa sampadaH // GarP_1,199.29 //
   gajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājamānadhanādikam /	gaja sTAne vRzam dRzwvA rAjamAna Dana Adikam /
   gajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tataḥ sukham // GarP_1,199.30 //	gaja sTAne Karam dRzwvA pUrvam duH Kam tatas suKam // GarP_1,199.30 //
   gajasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣetradhānyasukhādikam /	gaja sTAne gajam dRzwvA kzetraDAnya suKa Adikam /
   gajasthānesthite dhvāṅkṣe dhanadhānyasamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,199.31 //	gaja sTAnesTite DvAFkze Dana DAnya samAgamaH // GarP_1,199.31 //
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāryanāśo bhaviṣyati /	DvAFkza sTAne Dvajam dRzwvA kArya nASaH Bavizyati /
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ khaṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,199.32 //	DvAFkza sTAne sTite DUmre kaliduH Kam gamizyati // GarP_1,199.32 //
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite siṃhe vigraho duḥ khameva ca /	DvAFkza sTAne sTite siMhe vigrahaH duH Kam eva ca /
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite śvāne gṛhabhaṅgabhayādikam // GarP_1,199.33 //	DvAFkza sTAne sTite SvAne gRha BaFga Baya Adikam // GarP_1,199.33 //
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānabhraṃśabhayādikam /	DvAFkza sTAne vRzam dRzwvA sTAna BraMSa Baya Adikam /
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhananāśaparājayau // GarP_1,199.34 //	DvAFkza sTAne Karam dRzwvA Dana nASa parAjayO // GarP_1,199.34 //
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanakīrtyādikaṃ bhavet /	DvAFkza sTAne gajam dRzwvA Dana kIrti Adikam Bavet /
   dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe videśagamanādikam // GarP_1,199.35 //	DvAFkza sTAne sTite DvAFkze videSa gamana Adikam // GarP_1,199.35 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   navanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	navanavatI aDikaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  200	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 200
   bhairava uvāca /	BEravaH uvAca /
   vakṣye vāyujayaṃ devi jayā jayavideśakam /	vakzye vAyu jayam devi jayA jaya videSakam /
   vāyvagnijalaśakrākhyaṃ maṅgalānāñcatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,200.1 //	vAyu agni jala Sakra AKyam maFgala anAQcatuzwayam // GarP_1,200.1 //
   vāmadakṣiṇasaṃsthaśca vāyuśca bahulo bhavet /	vAma dakziNa saMsTaH ca vAyuH ca bahulaH Bavet /
   ūrdhvavāhī bhavedagniradhastu varuṇo bhavet // GarP_1,200.2 //	UrDvavAhI Bavet agniH aDas tu varuNaH Bavet // GarP_1,200.2 //
   mahendro madhyasaṃsthastu śuklapakṣe tu vāmagaḥ /	mahendraH maDya saMsTaH tu Sukla pakze tu vAma gaH /
   kṛṣṇapakṣe dakṣiṇaga udayasya tryahantryaham // GarP_1,200.3 //	kRzNa pakze dakziNa gaH udayasya tryahantrI aham // GarP_1,200.3 //
   vahetpratipadādye ca viparīte bhavennatiḥ /	vahet pratipad A Adye ca viparIte Bavet natiH /
   udayaḥ sūryamārgeṇa candreṇāstamayo yadi // GarP_1,200.4 //	udayaH sUrya mArgeNa candreNa astamayaH yadi // GarP_1,200.4 //
   vardhante guṇasaṃghātā anyathā vighnamaucitam /	varDante guNa saMGAtAH anyaTA viGnam Ocitam /
   saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśaproktā divā rātrau varānane // GarP_1,200.5 //	saMkrAntyaH zoxaSa proktAH divA rAtrO varAnane // GarP_1,200.5 //
   yadā ca saṃkramedvāyurardhārdhaprahare sthitaḥ /	yadA ca saMkramet vAyuH arDa arDa prahare sTitaH /
   svāsthyāhānistadā jñeyā vāyurbhramati dehiṣu // GarP_1,200.6 //	svAsTya ahAniH tadA jQeyA vAyuH Bramati dehizu // GarP_1,200.6 //
   dakṣiṇe ca puṭe vāyurhito bhojanamaithune /	dakziNe ca puwe vAyuH hitaH Bojana mETune /
   khaḍgahasto jayedyuddhe ripūnkāmasamanvitaḥ // GarP_1,200.7 //	Kaxga hastaH jayet yudDe ripUn kAma samanvitaH // GarP_1,200.7 //
   vāmeva gamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvakāryeṣu bhūṣitam /	vAm eva gamanam SrezWam sarva kAryezu BUzitam /
   vāyurvahati tatrasthaḥ praśro bhūtasya śobhanaḥ // GarP_1,200.8 //	vAyuH vahati tatrasTaH praSraH BUtasya SoBanaH // GarP_1,200.8 //
   māhendre vāruṇe vāte ko 'pi doṣo na jāyate /	mAhendre vAruNe vAte kaH api dozaH na jAyate /
   anāvṛṣṭirdakṣavāhe vṛṣṭiḥ syādvāmavāhake // GarP_1,200.9 //	anAvRzwiH dakzavAhe vRzwiH syAt vAma vAhake // GarP_1,200.9 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   dviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  201	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 201
   dhanvantariruvāca /	DanvantariH uvAca /
   hayāyurvedamākhyāsye hayaṃ sarvārthalakṣaṇam /	haya Ayurvedam AKyAsye hayam sarva arTa lakzaNam /
   kākatuṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇajihvo vṛkṣāsyaścoṣṇatālukaḥ // GarP_1,201.1 //	kAkatuNxaH kRzNajihvaH vRkza AsyaH ca uzNa tAlukaH // GarP_1,201.1 //
   karālo hīnadantaśca śṛṅgī viraladantakaḥ /	karAlaH hIna dantaH ca SRFgI viraladantakaH /
   ekāṇḍaścaiva jātāṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvikhurī stanī // GarP_1,201.2 //	ekANxaH ca eva jAtANxaH kaQcukI dvi KurI stanI // GarP_1,201.2 //
   mārjārapādo vyāghrābhaḥ kuṣṭhavidradhisannibhaḥ /	mArjAra pAdaH vyAGra ABaH kuzWa vidraDi sanniBaH /
   yamajo vāmanaścaiva mārjāraḥ kapilocanaḥ // GarP_1,201.3 //	yama jaH vAmanaH ca eva mArjAraH kapi locanaH // GarP_1,201.3 //
   etaddoṣī hayastyājya uttamo 'śvasturuṣkajaḥ /	etad dozI hayaH tyAjyaH uttamaH aSvasturuzka jaH /
   madhyamaḥ pañcahastaśca kanīyāṃśca trihastakaḥ // GarP_1,201.4 //	maDyamaH paQca hastaH ca kanIyAn= ca tri hastakaH // GarP_1,201.4 //
   asaṃhatā ye ca vāhā hrasvakarṇāstathaiva ca /	asaMhatAH ye ca vAhAH hrasva karNAH taTA eva ca /
   śabalābhāḥ prabhāveṣu na dīnāścirajīvinaḥ // GarP_1,201.5 //	Sabala ABAH praBAvezu na dInAH cira jIvinaH // GarP_1,201.5 //
   revantapūjanāddhomādrakṣyāśca dvijabhājenāt /	revanta pUjanAt homAt rakzyAH ca dvija BAjenAt /
   saralaṃ nimbapatrāṇi guggulaṃ sarṣapānghṛtam? // GarP_1,201.6 //	saralam nimba patrANi guggulam sarzapAn GRtam? // GarP_1,201.6 //
   tilañcaiva vacāṃ higuṃ badhnīyādvājino gale /	tilaQcA eva vacAm higum baDnIyAt vAjinaH gale /
   āgantujaṃ doṣajantu vraṇaṃ dvividhamīritam // GarP_1,201.7 //	Agantu jam doza jantu vraNam dviviDam Iritam // GarP_1,201.7 //
   cirapākaṃ vātajantu śleṣmajaṃ kṣiprapākakam? /	cira pAkam vAta jantu Slezma jam kzipra pAka kam? /
   kaṇṭhadāhātmakaṃ pittācchoṇitānmandavedanam // GarP_1,201.8 //	kaNWa dAha Atmakam pittAt SoNitAn manda vedanam // GarP_1,201.8 //
   āgantujantu śastrādyairduṣṭavraṇaviśodhanam /	Agantu jantu Sastra AdyEH duzwavraNa viSoDanam /
   eraṇḍamūlaṃ dviniśaṃ citrakaṃ viśvabheṣajam // GarP_1,201.9 //	eraNxa mUlam dvi niSam citrakam viSvaBezajam // GarP_1,201.9 //
   rasonaṃ saindhavaṃ vāpi takrakāñjikapoṣitam /	rasonam sEnDavam vA api takra kAQjika pozitam /
   tilasaktukapiṇḍikā dadhiyuktā sasaindhavā /	tila saktuka piNxikA daDi yuktA sa sEnDavAH /
   nimbapatrayutaṃ piṇḍaṃ vraṇaśodhanaropaṇam // GarP_1,201.10 //	nimba patra yutam piNxam vraNa SoDana ropaNam // GarP_1,201.10 //
   paṭolaṃ nimbapatrañca vacā citrakameva ca /	pawolam nimba patraQca vacA citrakam eva ca /
   pippalīśṛṅgaverañca cūrṇamekatra kārayet // GarP_1,201.11 //	pippalI SRFgaveraQca cUrNam ekatra kArayet // GarP_1,201.11 //
   etatpānātkrimiśleṣmamandānilavināśanam /	etad pAnAt krimi Slezma manda anila vinASanam /
   nimbapatraṃ paṭo lañca triphalā khadiraṃ tathā // GarP_1,201.12 //	nimba patram pawaH laQca triPalA Kadiram taTA // GarP_1,201.12 //
   kvāthayitvā tato vāhaṃ sṛtaraktaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ /	kvATayitvA tatas vA aham sRta raktam vicakzaNaH /
   tryahameva pridātavyaṃ hayakuṣṭhopaśāntaye // GarP_1,201.13 //	tri aham eva pridAtavyam haya kuzWa upaSAntaye // GarP_1,201.13 //
   savraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailaṃ sarṣapajaṃ hitam /	sa vraNezu ca kuzWezu tElam sarzapa jam hitam /
   laśunādikaṣāyaśca pānabhuktyupaśāntaye // GarP_1,201.14 //	laSuna Adi kazAyaH ca pAna Bukti upaSAntaye // GarP_1,201.14 //
   mātuluṅgarasopetaṃ māṃsīnāṃ rasakena vā /	mAtuluFga rasa upetam mAMsInAm rasakena vA /
   sadyo dadyāttatra nasyamanyairvātaiḥ susaṃyutaiḥ // GarP_1,201.15 //	sadyas dadyAt tatra nasyam anyEH vAtEH su saMyutEH // GarP_1,201.15 //
   paladvayaṃ prathame 'hni ekaikapalavṛddhitaḥ /	pala dvayam praTame ahni ekEka pala vRdDitaH /
   yāvaddināni pūrṇāni palānyaṣṭādaśottame // GarP_1,201.16 //	yAvat dinAni pUrNAni palAni azwAdaSa uttame // GarP_1,201.16 //
   adhame 'ṣṭapalāni syurmadhyame syuścaturdaśa /	aDame azwa palAni syuH maDyame syuH caturdaSa /
   śarannidāghayornaivadeyaṃ naiva tu dāpayet // GarP_1,201.17 //	Sarad nidAGayoH nEva deyam na eva tu dApayet // GarP_1,201.17 //
   tailena vātike roge śarkarājyapayonvitaiḥ /	tElena vAtike roge SarkarAjya payaH nvitEH /
   kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte catriphalāmbubhiḥ // GarP_1,201.18 //	kawutElEH kaPe vyozEH pitte catriPalA ambuBiH // GarP_1,201.18 //
   śāliṣaṣṭikadugdhāśī hayo hina jugupsitaḥ /	SAli zazwika dugDa ASI hayaH hinaH jugupsitaH /
   pakvajambūnibho hemavarṇo 'śvo na jugupsitaḥ // GarP_1,201.19 //	pakva jambU niBaH hema varNaH aSvaH na jugupsitaH // GarP_1,201.19 //
   ardhapraharaṇe dhurye gugguluṃ prāśayeddhayam /	arDa praharaNe Durye guggulum prASayet hayam /
   bhojayetpāyasaṃ dugdhaṃ satvaraṃ susthiro hayaḥ // GarP_1,201.20 //	Bojayet pAyasam dugDam sa tvaram susTiraH hayaH // GarP_1,201.20 //
   vikāre bhojane dugdhaṃ śālyannaṃ vātale dadet /	vikAre Bojane dugDam SAli annam vAtale dadet /
   karṣamāṃsarasaiḥ pitte madhumudgarasājyakaiḥ // GarP_1,201.21 //	karza mAMsa rasEH pitte maDu mudga ra sAjyakEH // GarP_1,201.21 //
   kaphe mudgānkulatthānvā kaṭutiktānkaphe haye /	kaPe mudgAn kulatTAn vA kawu tiktAn kaPe haye /
   bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣādau tu gugguluḥ // GarP_1,201.22 //	bADirye vyADite grAse tridoza AdO tu gugguluH // GarP_1,201.22 //
   ghāsairdūrvā sarvaroge prathame 'hni palaṃ dadet /	GAsEH dUrvA sarva roge praTame ahni palam dadet /
   vivardhayettataḥ karṣamekāhni palapañcakam // GarP_1,201.23 //	vivarDayet tatas karzam eka ahni pala paQcakam // GarP_1,201.23 //
   pāne ca bhojane caiva aśītipalakaṃ param /	pAne ca Bojane ca eva aSIti palakam param /
   madhye ṣaṣṭiścādhameṣu catvāriṃśacca bhogiṣu // GarP_1,201.24 //	maDye zazwiH ca aDamezu catvAriMSat ca Bogizu // GarP_1,201.24 //
   vraṇe kuṣṭheṣu khañjeṣu triphalākvāthasaṃyutam /	vraNe kuzWezu KaQjezu triPalA kvATa saMyutam /
   mandāgnau śotharoge ca gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojitam // GarP_1,201.25 //	manda agnO SoTa roge ca gavAm mUtreNa yojitam // GarP_1,201.25 //
   vātapitte vraṇe vyādhau gokṣīraṃ ghṛtasaṃyutam /	vAta pitte vraNe vyADO go kzIram GRta saMyutam /
   deyaṃ kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ māṃsairyuktaṃ ca bhojanam // GarP_1,201.26 //	deyam kRSAnAm puzwi arTam mAMsEH yuktam ca Bojanam // GarP_1,201.26 //
   supiṣṭāyāḥ pradātavyaṃ guḍūcyāḥ palapañcakam /	su pizwAyAH pradAtavyam guxUcyAH pala paQcakam /
   prabhāte ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ śaradgīṣme ca vājinām // GarP_1,201.27 //	praBAte GRta saMyuktam Sarad gIzme ca vAjinAm // GarP_1,201.27 //
   rogaghnaṃ puṣṭidaṃ cāpi balatejovivardhanam /	roga Gnam puzwi dam ca api bala tejaH vivarDanam /
   tadevāśvāyadātavyaṃ kṣīrayuktamathāpi vā // GarP_1,201.28 //	tat eva ASvAya dAtavyam kzIra yuktam aTa api vA // GarP_1,201.28 //
   guḍūcīkalpayogena śatāvaryaśvagandhayoḥ /	guxUcI kalpa yogena SatAvari aSvaganDayoH /
   catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi // GarP_1,201.29 //	catvAri trINi maDyasya jaGanyasya palAni hi // GarP_1,201.29 //
   akasmādyatra vāhānāmekarūpaṃ yadā bhavet /	akasmAt yatra vAhAnAm eka rUpam yadA Bavet /
   mriyate ca yadā kṣipramupasargaṃ tamādiśet // GarP_1,201.30 //	mriyate ca yadA kzipram upasargam tam AdiSet // GarP_1,201.30 //
   homādyai rakṣayā viprabhojanairbalikarmaṇā /	homa AdyEH rakzayA vipra BojanEH bali karmaNA /
   śāntyopasargaśāntiḥ syāddharītakyādikalpataḥ // GarP_1,201.31 //	SAntyA upasarga SAntiH syAt harItakI Adi kalpataH // GarP_1,201.31 //
   harītakī gavāṃ mūtraistailena lavaṇānvitā /	harItakI gavAm mUtrEH tElena lavaNa anvitA /
   ādau pañca tataḥ pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇaśatāvadhi /	AdO paQca tatas paQca vRdDyA pUrNa Sata avaDi /
   uttamā ca śataṃ mātrāstvaśītiḥ ṣaṣṭireva vā // GarP_1,201.32 //	uttamA ca Satam mAtrAH tu aSItiH zazwiH eva vA // GarP_1,201.32 //
   gajāyurvedamākhyāsye uktāḥ kalpā gaje hitāḥ /	gajAyurvedam AKyAsye uktAH kalpAH gaje hitAH /
   gaje caturguṇā mātrāstābhirgajarugardanaḥ // GarP_1,201.33 //	gaje caturguNAH mAtrAH tABiH gaja ruj ardanaH // GarP_1,201.33 //
   gajo pasargavyādhīnāṃ śamanaṃ śāntikarma ca /	gajaH pasarga vyADInAm Samanam SAnti karma ca /
   pūjayitvā surānviprānratnairgāṃ kapilāṃ dadet // GarP_1,201.34 //	pUjayitvA surAn viprAn ratnEH gAm kapilAm dadet // GarP_1,201.34 //
   dantidantadvaye mālāṃ nibandhīyādupoṣitaḥ /	danti danta dvaye mAlAm nibanDIyAt upozitaH /
   mantreṇa mantritānvaidyairvacāsiddhārthakāṃstathā // GarP_1,201.35 //	mantreNa mantritAn vEdyEH vacA sidDArTakAn= taTA // GarP_1,201.35 //
   sūryādiśivadurgāśrīviṣṇvarcā rakṣayedgajam /	sUrya Adi Siva durga aSrI vizNu arcAH rakzayet gajam /
   baliṃ dadyācca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayecca caturghaṭaiḥ // GarP_1,201.36 //	balim dadyAt ca BUteByaH snApayet ca catur GawEH // GarP_1,201.36 //
   bhojanaṃ mantritaṃ dadyādbhasmanoddhūnayedgajamam /	Bojanam mantritam dadyAt BasmanA udDUnayet gajamam /
   bhūtarakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇaṃ rakṣayetsadā // GarP_1,201.37 //	BUta rakzA SuBAH meDyAH vAraNam rakzayet sadA // GarP_1,201.37 //
   triphalāpañcakole ca daśamūlaṃ viḍaṅgakam /	triPalA paQcakole ca daSamUlam vixaFgakam /
   śatāvarīguḍūcī ca nimbavāsakakiṃśukāḥ // GarP_1,201.38 //	SatAvarI guxUcI ca nimba vAsaka kiMSukAH // GarP_1,201.38 //
   gajarogavināśāya hito rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyakaḥ /	gaja roga vinASAya hitaH rUkzaH kazAyakaH /
   āyurvedadvayoktānāmuktaṃ saṃkṣepasārataḥ // GarP_1,201.39 //	Ayurveda dvaya uktAnAm uktam saMkzepa sArataH // GarP_1,201.39 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	gajASvAyurvedanirUpaNam nAma eka aDika dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  202	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 202
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   ekaṃ punarnavāmūlamapāmārgasya vā śiva /	ekam punarnavA mUlam apAmArgasya vA Siva /
   sarasaṃ yoniniḥ kṣiptaṃ varāṅgasya vyathāṃ haret /	sarasam yoniniH kziptam varAFgasya vyaTAm haret /
   prasūtivedanāñcaiva taruṇīnāṃ vyathāṃ haret // GarP_1,202.1 //	prasUti vedanAQcA eva taruNInAm vyaTAm haret // GarP_1,202.1 //
   bhūmi kūṣmāṇḍamūlaṃ vai śālicūrṇamathāpi vā /	BUmi kUzmANxa mUlam vE SAli cUrNam aTa api vA /
   saptāhaṃ dugdhapītaṃ syātstrīṇāṃ bahupayaskaram // GarP_1,202.2 //	sapta aham dugDa pItam syAt strINAm bahu payaskaram // GarP_1,202.2 //
   rudrendravāruṇīmulaṃ lepātstrīstanavedanā /	rudra indravAruNI mulam lepAt strI stana vedanA /
   naśyeta ghṛtapakvā ca kāryāvaśyantu polikā // GarP_1,202.3 //	naSyeta GRta pakvA ca kAryA vaSyantu polikAH // GarP_1,202.3 //
   bhakṣitā sā maheśāna yoniśūlaṃ vināśayet /	BakzitA sA maheSAna yoni SUlam vinASayet /
   pralepitā kāravellamūlenaiva vinirgatā // GarP_1,202.4 //	pralepitA kAravella mUlena eva vinirgatAH // GarP_1,202.4 //
   yoniḥ praveśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	yoniH praveSam AyAti na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   nīlīpaṭolamūlāni sājyāni tilavāriṇā // GarP_1,202.5 //	nIlI pawola mUlAni sa AjyAni tila vAriNA // GarP_1,202.5 //
   piṣṭānyeṣāṃ pralepo vai jvālāgardabharāganat /	pizwAni ezAm pralepaH vE jvAlAgardaBarAganat /
   pāṭhāmūlaṃ rudra pītaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,202.6 //	pAWA mUlam rudra pItam pizwam taNxula vAriNA // GarP_1,202.6 //
   pāparogaharaṃ syācca kuṣṭhapānaṃ tathaiva ca /	pApa roga haram syAt ca kuzWa pAnam taTA eva ca /
   vāsyodakañca samadhu pītamantargatasya vai // GarP_1,202.7 //	vAsya udakaQca sa maDu pItam antargatasya vE // GarP_1,202.7 //
   pāparogasya santāpanivṛktiṃ kurute śiva /	pApa rogasya santApa nivRktim kurute Siva /
   ghṛtatulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha // GarP_1,202.8 //	GRta tulyA rudra lAkzA pItA kzIreNa vE saha // GarP_1,202.8 //
   pradaraṃ harate rogaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /	pradaram harate rogam na atra kAryA vicAraNA /
   dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ harecchiva // GarP_1,202.9 //	dvijayazwI trikawukam cUrNam pItam haret Siva // GarP_1,202.9 //
   tilakvāthena saṃyuktaṃ raktagulmaṃ striyā hara /	tila kvATena saMyuktam rakta gulmam striyAH hara /
   kusumasya nibaddhañca taruṇīnāṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,202.10 //	kusumasya nibadDaQca taruNInAm maheSvara // GarP_1,202.10 //
   raktotpalasya vai kandaṃ śarkarātilasaṃyutam /	raktotpalasya vE kandan SarkarA tila saMyutam /
   pītaṃ saśarkaraṃ strīṇāṃ dhārayedgarbhapātanam // GarP_1,202.11 //	pItam sa Sarkaram strINAm DArayet garBapAtanam // GarP_1,202.11 //
   raktastrāvasya nāśaḥ syācchītodakaniṣevaṇāt /	raktaH trAvasya nASaH syAt SIta udaka nizevaNAt /
   pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitaṃ śarapuṅkhayā // GarP_1,202.12 //	pItantu kAQjika rudra kvaTitam SarapuFKayA // GarP_1,202.12 //
   hiṅgustraindhavasaṃyuktaṃ śīghraṃ strīṇāṃ prasūtikṛt /	hiFguH trEnDava saMyuktam SIGram strINAm prasUti kRt /
   mātuluṅgasya vai mūlaṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ prasūtikṛt // GarP_1,202.13 //	mAtuluFgasya vE mUlam kawi badDam prasUti kRt // GarP_1,202.13 //
   apāmārgasya vai mūle garbhavatyāstu nāmataḥ /	apAmArgasya vE mUle garBavatyAH tu nAmataH /
   utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syādānyathā sutā // GarP_1,202.14 //	utpAwyamAne sakale puttraH syAdA anyaTA sutAH // GarP_1,202.14 //
   apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇāṃ śirasi sthite /	apAmArgasya vE mUle nArINAm Sirasi sTite /
   garbhaśūlaṃ vinaśyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,202.15 //	garBa SUlam vinaSyeta na atra kAryA vicAraNAH // GarP_1,202.15 //
   karpūra madanaphala madhukaiḥ pūritaḥ śiva /	karpUra  madana Pala  maDukEH pUritaH SivaH /
   yoniḥ subhā syādvṛddhāyā yuvatyāḥ kiṃ punarhara // GarP_1,202.16 //	yoniH suBA syAt vRdDAyAH yuvatyAH kim punar hara // GarP_1,202.16 //
   yasya bālasya tilakaḥ kṛto gaurocanākhyayā /	yasya bAlasya tilakaH kRtaH gOrocana AKyayA /
   śarkarā kuṣṭhapānañca dattaṃ sa syācca nirbhayaḥ /	SarkarA  kuzWa pAnaQca dattam sa syAt ca nirBayaH /
   viṣa bhūta grahādibhyo vyādhibhyo bālakaḥ śiva // GarP_1,202.17 //	viza BUta  graha AdiByaH vyADiByaH bAlakaH Siva // GarP_1,202.17 //
   śaṅkha nābhi vacā kuṣṭha lohānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ sadā /	SaFKa nABi  vacA  kuzWa  lohAnAm DAraNam sadA /
   bālānāmupasargebhyo rudra rakṣākaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,202.18 //	bAlAnAm upasargeByaH rudra rakzA akaram Bavet // GarP_1,202.18 //
   palāśacūrṇaṃ samadhu gavyājyāmalakānvitam /	palASa cUrNam sa maDu gavya Ajya Amalaka anvitam /
   saviḍaṅgaṃ pītamātraṃ naraṃ kuryānmahāmatim // GarP_1,202.19 //	sa vixaFgam pIta mAtram naram kuryAt mahAmatim // GarP_1,202.19 //
   māsaikena mahādeva jarā maraṇavarjitaḥ // GarP_1,202.20 //	mAsa ekena mahAdeva jarA maraNa varjitaH // GarP_1,202.20 //
   palāśabījaṃ saghṛtaṃ tila madhvanvitaṃ samam /	palASa bIjam sa GRtam tila maDu anvitam samam /
   saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rudra jarāṃ nayati saṃkṣayam // GarP_1,202.21 //	sapta aham Bakzitam rudra jarAm nayati saMkzayam // GarP_1,202.21 //
   rudrāmalakacūrṇaṃ vai madhu taila ghṛtānvitam /	rudra Amalaka cUrNam vE maDu  tEla GRta anvitam /
   jagdhvā māsaṃ yuvā syācca naro vāgīśvarī bhavet // GarP_1,202.22 //	jagDvA mAsam yuvA syAt ca naraH vAgISvarI Bavet // GarP_1,202.22 //
   śivāmalakacūrṇaṃ vai madhunā udakena vā /	Siva Amalaka cUrNam vE maDunA udakena vA /
   balāni kuryānnāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitaṃ śiva // GarP_1,202.23 //	balAni kuryAt nAsAyAH pratyUze Bakzitam Siva // GarP_1,202.23 //
   kuṣṭhacūrṇaṃ sājya madhu prātarjagdhvā bhavennaraḥ /	kuzWa cUrNam sa Ajya  maDu prAtar jagDvA Bavet naraH /
   sākṣātsurabhideho vai jīvedvarṣasahasrakam // GarP_1,202.24 //	sAkzAt suraBi dehaH vE jIvet varza sahasrakam // GarP_1,202.24 //
   māṣasya vidalānye vituṣāṇi maheśvara /	mAzasya vidalAnye vituzANi maheSvaraH /
   ghṛtabhāvitaśuṣkāṇi payasā sādhitāni vai // GarP_1,202.25 //	GRta BAvita SuzkANi payasA sADitAni vE // GarP_1,202.25 //
   samādhvājyapayobhiśca bhakṣayitvā ca kāmayet /	sa mADvAjya payoBiH ca BakzayitvA ca kAmayet /
   strīṇāṃ śataṃ mahādeva tatkṣaṇānnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,202.26 //	strINAm Satam mahAdeva tad kzaNAt na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,202.26 //
   rasaścairaṇḍatailena gandhakena śubho bhavet /	rasaH ca eraNxa tElena ganDakena SuBaH Bavet /
   trikālodakasaṃghuṣṭo balakṛdbhakṣaṇādbhavet // GarP_1,202.27 //	tri kAla udaka saMGuzwaH bala kRt BakzaNAt Bavet // GarP_1,202.27 //
   dugdhaṃ vituṣamāṣaiśca śimbābījaiśca sādhitam /	dugDam vituza mAzEH ca SimbAbIjEH ca sADitam /
   apāmārgasya tailena pītaṃ strīśatakāmakṛt // GarP_1,202.28 //	apAmArgasya tElena pItam strI Sata kAma kRt // GarP_1,202.28 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nAnAviDozaDaprayogAnirUpaNam nAma dvi uttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  203	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 203
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   yā gaurdveṣṭiṃ svakaṃ vatsaṃ tasyā deyaṃ svakaṃ payaḥ /	yA gOH dvezwim svakam vatsam tasyAH deyam svakam payaH /
   lavaṇena samāyuktaṃ tasyā vatsaḥ priyo bhavet // GarP_1,203.1 //	lavaNena samAyuktam tasyAH vatsaH priyaH Bavet // GarP_1,203.1 //
   śuno 'sthi kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ hi mahiṣāṇāṃ gavā tathā /	SunaH asTi kaNWa badDam hi mahizANAm gavA taTA /
   kṛmijālaṃ pātayati sakalaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,203.2 //	kRmi jAlam pAtayati sakalam na atra saMSayaH // GarP_1,203.2 //
   gojaṅganābhipātaḥ syādguñjāmūlasya bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,203.3 //	gojaFgana aBipAtaH syAt guQjA mUlasya BakzaNAt // GarP_1,203.3 //
   varuṇaphalasyarasaṃ kareṇa mathitaṃ śiva /	varuNa Palasya rasam kareNa maTitam Siva /
   catuṣpāda dvipadayoḥ kṛmijālaṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,203.4 //	catuzpAda  dvipadayoH kRmi jAlam nipAtayet // GarP_1,203.4 //
   vraṇañca śamayedrudra jayāyāḥ pūraṇāt tathā /	vraNaQca Samayet rudra jayAyAH pUraNAt taTA /
   gajamūtrasya vai pānaṃ go mahiṣyupasarganut // GarP_1,203.5 //	gaja mUtrasya vE pAnam go mahizI upasarga nud // GarP_1,203.5 //
   samasūra śālibījaṃ pītaṃ takreṇa gharṣitam /	samasUra SAlibIjam pItam takreNa Garzitam /
   kṣīre go mahīṣasyaiva goḥ puṃsaśca hitaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,203.6 //	kzIre go mahIzasya eva goH puMsaH ca hitam Bavet // GarP_1,203.6 //
   patrañca śarapuṅkhāyā dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ śiva /	patraQca SarapuFKAyAH dattam sa lavaNam Siva /
   vārisphoṭaṃ hayānāñca kesarāṇāṃ vināśayet // GarP_1,203.7 //	vArisPowam haya anAQca kesarANAm vinASayet // GarP_1,203.7 //
   ghṛtakumārīpatrameva dattaṃ salakṣaṇaṃ hara /	GRta kumArI patram eva dattam sa lakzaNam hara /
   turagama kesarāṇāṃ kaṇḍūnaṃśyenna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,203.8 //	tura gama kesarANAm kaNxU naMSyet na saMSayaH // GarP_1,203.8 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nAnOzaDaprayoganirUpaNam nAma tryuttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  204	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 204
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   evaṃ dhanvantariḥ prāha suśrutāyaca vaidyakam /	evam DanvantariH prAha suSrutAyaca vEdyakam /
   ata nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnāṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_1,204.1 //	atas nAmAni vakzyAmi ozaDInAm samAsatas // GarP_1,204.1 //
   sthirā vidārigandhā ca śālapaṇyaśumatyapi /	sTirA vidAriganDA ca SAlapaNyaSumati api /
   lāṅgalī kalasī caiva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā // GarP_1,204.2 //	lAFgalI kalasI ca eva krozwupucCAH guhA matAH // GarP_1,204.2 //
   punarnavātha parṣābhūḥ kaṭhilyā kāruṇā tathā /	punarnavA aTa parzABUH kaWilyA kAruNA taTA /
   eraṇḍaścoruvūkaḥ syādāmardo vardhamānakaḥ // GarP_1,204.3 //	eraNxaH ca uruvUkaH syAt AmardaH varDamAnakaH // GarP_1,204.3 //
   jhaṣā nāgabalā jñeyā śvadaṃṣṭrā gokṣuro mataḥ /	JazA nAgabalA jQeyA SvadaMzwrA gokzuraH mataH /
   śatāvarī varā bhīru pīvarīndīvarī varī // GarP_1,204.4 //	SatAvarI varA BIru pIvarI indIvarI varI // GarP_1,204.4 //
   vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā /	vyAGrI tu bRhatI kRzNA haMsapAdI maDustravAH /
   dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syātkṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā // GarP_1,204.5 //	DAmanI kaNwakArI syAt kzudrA siMhI nidigDikAH // GarP_1,204.5 //
   vṛścikā tryamṛtā kālī viṣaghnī sarpadaṃṣṭrikā /	vRScikA tri amRtA kAlI viza GnI sarpa daMzwrikA /
   markaṭī cātmaguptā syādārṣeyī kapikacchukā // GarP_1,204.6 //	markawI ca AtmaguptA syAt ArzeyI kapikacCukAH // GarP_1,204.6 //
   mudgaparṇo kṣudrasahā māṣaparṇo mahāsahā /	mudgaparNaH kzudrasahA mAzaparNaH mahAsahA /
   tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayonyaṅkasaṃjñayā /	tyajA parA ca mahA jQeyA daNxa yoni aFka saMjQayA /
   nyagrodhastu vaṭo jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.7 //	nyagroDaH tu vawaH jQeyaH aSvatTaH kapilaH mataH // GarP_1,204.7 //
   plakṣo 'tha gardabhāṇḍaḥ syātparkaṭī ca kapītanaḥ /	plakzaH aTa gardaBa aNxaH syAt parkawI ca kapItanaH /
   pārthastu kakubho dhanvi vijñeyor'junanāmabhiḥ // GarP_1,204.8 //	pArTaH tu kakuBaH Danvi vijQeyor ajuna nAmaBiH // GarP_1,204.8 //
   nandīvṛkṣaḥ prarohī syātpuṣṭikārīti cocyate /	nandIvRkzaH prarohI syAt puzwikArI iti ca ucyate /
   vañjulo vetaso jñeyo bhallātaścāpyaruṣkaraḥ // GarP_1,204.9 //	vaQjulaH vetasaH jQeyaH BallAtaH ca api aruzkaraH // GarP_1,204.9 //

   vidyātkarṣaṃ tathā cāpi suvarṇaṃ kavalagraham /	vidyAt karzam taTA ca api suvarNam kavala graham /
   palārdhaṃ śuktimicchanti tathāṣṭaumāṣakāstviti // GarP_1,204.72 //	pala arDam Suktim icCanti taTA azwOmAzakAH tu iti // GarP_1,204.72 //
   palaṃ bilvañca muṣṭiḥ syāddve pale prasṛtiṃ vadet /	palam bilvaQca muzwiH syAt dve pale prasRtim vadet /
   añjaliṃ kuḍavañcaiva vidyātpalacatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,204.73 //	aQjalim kuxavaQca eva vidyAt pala catuzwayam // GarP_1,204.73 //
   aṣṭamānaṃ palānyaṣṭau tacca mānamiti smṛtam /	azwamAnam palAni azwO tat ca mAnam iti smRtam /
   caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prastha prasthāścatvāra āḍhakaḥ // GarP_1,204.74 //	caturBiH kuxavEH prasTa prasTAH catvAraH AXakaH // GarP_1,204.74 //
   kāśapātrañca saṃprokto droṇaścacaturāḍhake /	kASa pAtraQca saMproktaH droNaH ca catur AXake /
   tulā palaśataṃ proktaṃ bhāgo viṃśatpalaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,204.75 //	tulA pala Satam proktam BAgaH viMSat palaH smRtaH // GarP_1,204.75 //
   mānamevaṃ vidhaṃ proktaṃ prasthadravyeṣu paṇḍitaiḥ /	mAnam evam viDam proktam prasTa dravyezu paNxitEH /
   dravadravyeṣu coddiṣṭaṃ dviguṇaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_1,204.76 //	drava dravyezu ca uddizwam dviguNam parikIrtitam // GarP_1,204.76 //
   bhadradāru devakāṣṭhaṃ dāru syāddevadārukam /	BadradAru devakAzWam dAru syAt devadArukam /
