   śaṅkhaḥ śuktinakhaḥ śaṅkho vyāghro vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ /	SaFKaH SuktinaKaH SaFKaH vyAGraH vyAGranaKaH smRtaH /
   puraṃ palaṅkaṣaṃ vidyānmahiṣākṣañca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,204.78 //	puram palaFkazam vidyAt mahizAkzaQca gugguluH // GarP_1,204.78 //
   raso gandharaso bole sarjaḥ sarjaraso mataḥ /	rasaH ganDarasaH bole sarjaH sarjarasaH mataH /
   priyaṅguḥ phalinī śyāmā gaurī kānteti cocyate // GarP_1,204.79 //	priyaFguH PalinI SyAmA gOrI kAntA iti ca ucyate // GarP_1,204.79 //
   karañjau naktamālaḥ syātpūtikaścirabilvakaḥ /	karaQjO naktamAlaH syAt pUtikaH cirabilvakaH /
   śigruḥ śobhāñjano nāma jñānamānaśca kīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,204.80 //	SigruH SoBAQjanaH nAma jQAna mAnaH ca kIrtitaH // GarP_1,204.80 //
   jayā jayantī śaraṇī nirguṇḍī sindhuvārakaḥ /	jayA jayantI SaraNI nirguNxI sinDuvArakaH /
   moraṭā pīluparṇo ca tuṇḍī syāttuṇḍikerikā // GarP_1,204.81 //	morawA pIluparNaH ca tuNxI syAt tuNxikerikA // GarP_1,204.81 //
   madano gālavo bodho ghoṭā ghoṭī ca kathyate /	madanaH gAlavaH boDaH GowA GowI ca kaTyate /
   caturaṅgula sampāko vyādhighātābhisaṃjñakaḥ // GarP_1,204.82 //	catur aFgula sampAkaH vyADiGAta aBisaMjQakaH // GarP_1,204.82 //

   nimbo 'riṣṭaḥ samākhyātaḥ paṭolaṃ kolakaṃ viduḥ /	nimbaH arizwaH samAKyAtaH pawolam kolakam viduH /
   vayasthā ca viśalyā ca cchinnā chinnaruhā matā // GarP_1,204.84 //	vayasTA ca viSalyA ca cCinnA CinnaruhA matAH // GarP_1,204.84 //
   vaśā dantyamṛtā ceti guḍūcīnāmasaṃgrahaḥ /	vaSAH dantI amRtA ca iti guxUcI nAm asaMgrahaH /
   kirātatiktakaścaiva bhūnimbaḥ kāṇḍatiktakaḥ // GarP_1,204.85 //	kirAtatiktakaH ca eva BUnimbaH kANxatiktakaH // GarP_1,204.85 //
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /

   ato vyākaraṇaṃ vakṣye kumāroktañca śaunaka // GarP_1,204.86 //	atas vyAkaraNam vakzye kumAra uktaQca SOnakaH // GarP_1,204.86 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   siddhaśabdavivekāya bālavyutpattihetave // GarP_1,205.1 //	sidDa Sabda vivekAya bAla vyutpatti hetave // GarP_1,205.1 //

   ṅebhyāṃbhyasaścaturtho syātsampradāne ca kārake /	FeByAMByasaH caturTaH syAt sampradAne ca kArake /

   yato 'paiti samādatte upādatte bhayaṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,205.7 //	yatas apEti samAdatte upAdatte Bayam yatas // GarP_1,205.7 //
   ṅasosāmaśca ṣaṣṭhī syātsvāmisambandhamukhyake /	FasosAmaH ca zazWI syAt svAmi sambanDa muKyake /
   ṅayoḥ supo vai saptamī syātsā cādhikaraṇe bhavet // GarP_1,205.8 //	FayoH supaH vE saptamI syAt sA ca aDikaraNe Bavet // GarP_1,205.8 //
   ādhāraścādhikaraṇaṃ rakṣārthānāṃ prayogataḥ /	ADAraH ca aDikaraNam rakzA arTAnAm prayogataH /

   pañcamī paryupāṅyoge itararte 'nyadiṅmukhe /	paQcamI paryupAFyoge itara rte anya diFmuKe /

   vīpsetthambhāvacihne 'bhirbhāgenaiva paripratī /	vIpsetTamBAva cihne aBirBAgena eva paripratI /
   anureṣu sahārthe ca hīne 'nūpaśca kathyate // GarP_1,205.11 //	anurezu saha arTe ca hIne anUpaH ca kaTyate // GarP_1,205.11 //
   dvitīyā ca caturtho syācceṣṭāyāṃ gatikarmaṇi /	dvitIyA ca caturTaH syAt cezwAyAm gati karmaNi /
   aprāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manyakarmaṇyanādare // GarP_1,205.12 //	aprANe hi viBaktI dbe manya karmaNi anAdare // GarP_1,205.12 //
   namaḥ svastisvadhāsvāhālaṃvaṣaḍyoga īritā /	namaH svasti svaDA svAha alaMva zaz yogaH IritA /

   tṛtīyā sahayoge syātkutsiteṅge viśeṣaṇe /	tRtIyA saha yoge syAt kutsita iFge viSezaNe /
   kāle bhāve saptamī syādetairyoge 'piṣaṣṭhyati // GarP_1,205.14 //	kAle BAve saptamI syAt etEH yoge apizazWyati // GarP_1,205.14 //
   svāmīśvarādhipatibhiḥ sākṣidāyādaprasūtaiḥ /	svAm I ISvara aDipatiBiH sAkzi dAyAdaprasUtEH /

   smṛtyarthakarmaṇi tathā karoteḥ pratiyatnake /	smRti arTa karmaNi taTA karoteH pratiyatnake /
   hiṃsārthānāṃ prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.16 //	hiMsA arTAnAm prayoge ca kRti karmaNi kartari // GarP_1,205.16 //
   na kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhī niṣṭhayoḥ prātipadike /	na kartR karmaNoH zazWI nizWayoH prAtipadike /

   bhūvāndibhyastiṅo laḥ syāllakārā daśa vai smṛtāḥ /	BUvAn diByaH tiFaH laH syAt lakArAH daSa vE smRtAH /
   tiptasūjhi prathamo madhyaḥ sipthasthottamapūruṣaḥ // GarP_1,205.18 //	tipta sUJi praTamaH maDyaH sipTa sTa uttama pUruzaH // GarP_1,205.18 //
   mibvasmastu parasmai hi padānāṃ cātmanepadam /	mibU asmaH tu parasmE hi padAnAm ca Atmanepadam /

   ādeśā iḍbahimahi dhātutotha ṇijādivat /	AdeSAH ixbahimahi DAtu toTa Nija Adi vat /
   nāmni prayujyamāne 'pi prathamaḥ puruṣo bhavet // GarP_1,205.20 //	nAmni prayujyamAne api praTamaH puruzaH Bavet // GarP_1,205.20 //
   madhyamo yuṣmadi prokta uttamaḥ puruṣo 'smadi /	maDyamaH yuzmadi proktaH uttamaH puruzaH asmadi /
   bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ proktāḥ sanādyantāstathā tataḥ // GarP_1,205.21 //	BUva AdyAH DAtavaH proktAH sana Adi antAH taTA tatas // GarP_1,205.21 //
   laḍīrito vartamāne smenātīte ca dhātutaḥ /	laxIritaH vartamAne smena atIte ca DAtutaH /
   bhūte 'nadyatane laṅvā loḍādyāśiṣi dhātutaḥ // GarP_1,205.22 //	BUte anadyatane laFvA loxa AdyASizi DAtutaH // GarP_1,205.22 //
   vidhyādāvevānumato loḍvācyo mantraṇe bhavet /	viDi AdO= eva anumataH loxvAcyaH mantraNe Bavet /

   liṅatīte parokṣe syālliḍ bhūte ḷḍ bhaviṣyati /	liFati ite parokze syAt liz BUte ?j Bavizyati /

   dātorḷṅ kriyātipattau liṅarthe leṭ prakīrtitaḥ /	dAtoH ?F kriyA atipattO liFarTe lej prakIrtitaH /
   kṛtastriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.25 //	kRtaH trizu api vartante BAve karmaNi kartari // GarP_1,205.25 //

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /

   devīgṛhamatho atra a avehi paṭū imau // GarP_1,206.4 //	devI gRham aTo atra a avehi pawU imO // GarP_1,206.4 //

   ka ihātra ka evāhurdevā āhuśca bho vraja /	kaH iha atra kaH eva AhuH devAH AhuH ca Bo vraja /

   asmāneṣa vrajetsasyādṛksāma sa ca gacchati /	asmAn eza vrajet sasyAdRS sAma sa ca gacCati /

   samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ /	samAsAH zaw samAKyAtAH sa dvijaH karmaDA arayaH /
   dvigustrivedī grāmaśca ayaṃ tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,206.11 //	dvi guH tri vedI grAmaH ca ayam tatpuruzaH smRtaH // GarP_1,206.11 //
   tatkṛtaśca tadarthaśca vṛkabhītiśca yaddhanam /	tad kRtaH ca tad arTaH ca vRka BItiH ca yat Danam /
   jñānadakṣeṇa tattvajño bahuvrīhirathāvyayī // GarP_1,206.12 //	jQAna dakzeNa tattva jQaH bahuvrIhi raTa avyayI // GarP_1,206.12 //
   bhāvo 'dhistri yathoktaṃ tu dvandvo devarṣimānavāḥ /	BAvaH aDistri yaToktam tu dvandvaH deva Rzi mAnavAH /

   devāgnisakhipatyaṃśukroṣṭusvāyambhuvaḥ pitā /	deva agni saKi pati aMSu krozwu svAyamBuvaH pitA /
   nā praśastāścarā gaurglaurabajantāśca puṃsyapi // GarP_1,206.14 //	nA praSastAH carAH gOH glOrabajantAH ca puMsi api // GarP_1,206.14 //
   halantaścāśvayukkṣmābhuṅmarutkravyānmṛgāvidhaḥ /	halantaH ca aSva yukkzmA Buj marut kravyAn mRgAviDaH /

   viḍve dhā uśanānaḍvānmadhuliṭ kāṣṭhataṭ tathā /	vixve DA uSana anaxvAn maDulih kAzWa taw taTA /
   banavāryasthivastūni jagatsāmāhanī tathā // GarP_1,206.16 //	bana vAri asTi vastUni jagat sAmAhanI taTA // GarP_1,206.16 //
   karmasarpirvapusteja ajjhalantā napuṃsake /	karma sarpiH vapuH tejaH ajJalantAH napuMsake /
   jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrīstrībhūmirvadhūrapi // GarP_1,206.17 //	jAyA jarA nadI lakzmIH SrI strI BUmiH vaDUH api // GarP_1,206.17 //
   bhrūḥ punarbhūstathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ /	BrUH punarBUH taTA DenuH svasA mAtA ca nO striyaH /
   vāksragdiṅmutkrudhaḥ prāyo yuvatiḥ kukubhastathā // GarP_1,206.18 //	vAc sraj diFmutkruDaH prAyas yuvatiH kukuBaH taTA // GarP_1,206.18 //
   dyodivau prāvṛṣaścaiva sumāna uṣṇigastriyām /	dyaH divO prAvRzaH ca eva sumAnaH uzNiga striyAm /
   guṇadravyakriyāyogātstrīliṅgāṃśca vadāmi te // GarP_1,206.19 //	guNa dravya kriyA yogAt strI liFgAn= ca vadAmi te // GarP_1,206.19 //
   śuklakīlālapāścaiva śuciśca grāmaṇīḥ sudhīḥ /	Sukla kIlAlapAH ca eva SuciH ca grAmaNIH suDIH /

   caturdaśalaghuḥ syācca śreṣṭhā śaśikalā sagā /	caturdaSa laGuH syAt ca SrezWA SaSi kalA sagAH /

   elā sayau nanau yaḥsyāccitralekhāsvarāṣṭakaiḥ /	elA sayO nanO yaH syAt citra leKA svara azwakEH /

   najabhajarā vāṇinī gaḥ piṅgalenāṣṭirīritā // GarP_1,209.28 //	najaBa jarA vANinI gaH piFgalena azwiH IritAH // GarP_1,209.28 //
   rasarudraiḥ śikhariṇī yamau nasabhalā guruḥ /	rasa rudrEH SiKariNI yamO nasaBalA guruH /
   vasugrayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasayalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.29 //	vasugrayatiH pRTvI jasO jasayalA guruH // GarP_1,209.29 //
   daśasvarairvaṃśapatrapatitaṃ bhraunnabhā lagau /	daSa svarEH vaMSa patra patitam BrOnnaBAH lagO /
   ṣaḍvedāśvaiśca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.30 //	zaz veda aSvEH ca hariNI na samA rasalA guruH // GarP_1,209.30 //
   mandākrāntabdhiṣaḍnagairmabhanāstatagā guruḥ /	manda AkrAntabDi zaxna gEH maBanAH tatagA guruH /
   nardaṭakaṃ najabhajā jalau go yatireva ca // GarP_1,209.31 //	nardawakam najaBajAH jalO gaH yatiH eva ca // GarP_1,209.31 //
   saptartvabdhiḥ kokilakamatyaṣṭiḥ syācca pūrvavat /	saptartu abDiH kokilakam ati azwiH syAt ca pUrvavat /
   bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatā mtau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,209.32 //	BUta Rtu aSvEH kusumita latA mtO nyO yayO DRtiH // GarP_1,209.32 //
   rasartvaśvairyamau nsau rau meghavisphūrjitā ragau /	rasa Rtu aSvEH yamO nsO rO meGa visPUrjitAH ragO /
   śārdūlavikrīḍitaṃ maḥ sūryaśvaiḥ sajsatāstagau // GarP_1,209.33 //	SArdUla vikrIxitam maH sUryaSvEH sajsatAH tagO // GarP_1,209.33 //
   chando hyatidhṛtiḥ proktamata ūrdhvaṃ kṛtirbhavet /	CandaH hi atiDRtiH proktam atas UrDvam kRtiH Bavet /
   saptāśvartuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.34 //	sapta aSva rtuH su vadanA BrO manO yaBalA guruH // GarP_1,209.34 //
   vṛttaṃ rajau rajau pāde rajau go laḥ kṛtirbhavet /	vRttam rajO rajO pAde rajO gaH laH kRtiH Bavet /
   trisaptakaiḥ snagdharā syātprakṛtirmnabhanaistriyaiḥ // GarP_1,209.35 //	tri saptakEH snagDarA syAt prakRtiH mnaBa nEstriyEH // GarP_1,209.35 //
   digarkairbhadrakaṃ bhrau nrau naranā go yathākṛtiḥ /	diS arkEH Badrakam BrO nrO naranA go yaTA AkRtiH /
   najau bhaśvāśvalalitaṃ jabhau jabhalagā bhavet // GarP_1,209.36 //	najO BaSva aSva lalitam jaBO jaBala gA Bavet // GarP_1,209.36 //
   mattākrīḍañcāṣṭabāṇadaśakairmau tanau nanau /	mattAkrIxaQca azwa bANa daSa kEH mO tanO nanO /
   nalau guruśca vikṛtiśchinnā saṃkṛtirucyate // GarP_1,209.37 //	nalO guruH ca vikRtiH CinnA saMkRtiH ucyate // GarP_1,209.37 //
   pañcāśvārkairbhatau tanvī nasabhā bhanayā gaṇāḥ /	paQcASva arkEH BatO tanvI nasaBAH BanayAH gaNAH /
   krauñcapadā bāṇaśaravasuśailairbhamau sabhau // GarP_1,209.38 //	krOQca padAH bANa Sara vasu SElEH BamO saBO // GarP_1,209.38 //
   nau nau go 'tikṛtiḥ proktā cchando hyutkṛtirucyate /	nO nO gaH atikRtiH proktA cCandaH hi utkRtiH ucyate /
   vasvīśāśvairmamatanaiḥ syādbhujaṅgavijṛmbhitam // GarP_1,209.39 //	vasvISa aSvEH ma matanEH syAt BujaFga vijRmBitam // GarP_1,209.39 //
   nanarasairlagayuktaiśca apavāhākhyakaṃ yatiḥ /	nana rasEH laga yuktEH ca apavAha AKyakam yatiH /
   guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasairbāṇairmonāḥ ṣaṭsagagā gaṇāḥ // GarP_1,209.40 //	guhEH zaxBiH rasEH bANEH monAH zawsa gagAH gaNAH // GarP_1,209.40 //
   caṇḍavṛttiprapāto 'sau daṇḍako nau tato 'garaḥ /	caNxa vRtti prapAtaH asO daNxakaH nO tatas agaraH /
   raphevṛddhāntakādasya vyālajīmūtakādayaḥ // GarP_1,209.41 //	raPevRdDAntakAt asya vyAla jImUtaka AdayaH // GarP_1,209.41 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	samavRttalakzaNAdinirUpaNam nAma nava uttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  210	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 210
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   sasasalagāśca viṣame pāde yadyupacitrakam /	sa sasalagAH ca vizame pAde yadi upacitrakam /
   same bhau bhagagāḥ syuśca drutamadhyā bhabhau bhagau // GarP_1,210.1 //	same BO Baga gAH syuH ca druta maDyAH BaBO BagO // GarP_1,210.1 //
   gaḥ pāde viṣame 'nyatra najau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau // GarP_1,210.2 //	gaH pAde vizame anyatra najO jyO ca gaNO smRtO // GarP_1,210.2 //
   viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ /	vizame vegavatI sA gaH same BO Bo gagO gaNAH /
   pāde 'same tajau ro gaḥ same masau jagau garuḥ /	pAde asame tajO raH gaH same masO jagO garuH /
   bhavedbhadravirāṭ ketumatī tu viṣame sajau // GarP_1,210.3 //	Bavet BadravirAj ketumatI tu vizame sa jO // GarP_1,210.3 //

   viparītākhyānakaṃ syādviṣame jastajau gagau /	viparIta AKyAnakam syAt vizame jasta jO gagO /

   pāde 'tha viṣame caiva puṣpitāgrā nanau rayau /	pAde aTa vizame ca eva puzpita agrAH nanO rayO /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  211	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 211
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   prathamo 'ṣṭākṣaraiḥ pādo dvitīyo dvādaśākṣaraiḥ /	praTamaH azwa akzarEH pAdaH dvitIyaH dvAdaSa akzarEH /
   tṛtīyaḥ ṣoḍaśārṇaiśca viṃśadvarṇaiścaturthakaḥ // GarP_1,211.1 //	tRtIyaH zoxaSa arNEH ca viMSat varNEH caturTakaH // GarP_1,211.1 //
   sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ padacaturūrdhvābhiradhasya hi // GarP_1,211.1 //	sAmAnya lakzaNam pada catur UrDva aBiH aDasya hi // GarP_1,211.1 //
   āpīḍaḥ sarvalaḥ proktaḥ pūrvapādāntagadvayaḥ // GarP_1,211.2 //	ApIxaH sarvalaH proktaH pUrva pAda antaga dvayaH // GarP_1,211.2 //
   dvitīye 'ṣṭākṣaraiḥ pāde kalikā prathamer'kaje /	dvitIye azwa akzarEH pAde kalikA praTamer akaje /
   lavalī syāttṛtīye 'tha pūrvavaccāṣṭa kākṣare /	lavalI syAt tRtIye aTa pUrvavat ca azwa kAkzare /
   proktā cāmṛtadhāreyaṃ caturaṣṭākṣare sati // GarP_1,211.3 //	proktA ca amRta DArA iyam catur azwa akzare sati // GarP_1,211.3 //
   (iti padacaturūrdhvaprakaraṇam) /	(iti pada catur UrDva prakaraNam) /
   sajau salau ca prathame nasajā go dvitīyake /	sa jO salO ca praTame nasa jAH gaH dvitIyake /
   tṛtīye bhanabhā gaśca caturthe sajasā jagau // GarP_1,211.4 //	tRtIye BanaBAH gaH ca caturTe sajasA jagO // GarP_1,211.4 //
   pūrvavatsyātsaurabhakaṃ tṛtīye 'ghrau ranau bhagau /	pUrvavat syAt sOraBakam tRtIye aGrO ranO BagO /
   lalitañcādgatāvatsyātṛtīyeṃ'ghrau nanau sasau // GarP_1,211.5 //	lali taQcAt gatAvatsya AtRtIyeM aGrO nanO sasO // GarP_1,211.5 //
   (ityudgatāprakaraṇam) /	(itI udgata aprakaraNam) /
   upasthitapracupitaṃ prathame 'ghrau masau jabhau /	upasTita pracupitam praTame aGrO masO jaBO /
   gau dvitīye sanajarā gastṛtīye nanau ca saḥ /	gO dvitIye sana jarAH gastRtIye nanO ca saH /
   nau najau yaścaturthe syāccheṣa pādāśca pūrvavat // GarP_1,211.6 //	nO najO yaH caturTe syAt Seza pAdAH ca pUrvavat // GarP_1,211.6 //
   tṛtīrye 'ghrau viśeṣaśca vṛttaṃ syānnau sanau nasau // GarP_1,211.7 //	tRtIrye aGrO viSezaH ca vRttam syAt nO sanO nasO // GarP_1,211.7 //
   ārṣabhaṃ tajarāḥ pāde tṛtīye 'nyacca pūrvavat /	ArzaBam tajarAH pAde tRtIye anyat ca pUrvavat /
   pūrvavatprathamaṃ śeṣe tajrāḥ śuddhavirāḍbhavet // GarP_1,211.8 //	pUrvavat praTamam Seze tajrAH SudDa virAj Bavet // GarP_1,211.8 //
   (ityupasthitapracupitaprakaraṇam) /	(iti upasTita pracupita prakaraNam) /
   viṣamākṣarapādaṃ vā pañcaṣaṭkādi yāvakam /	vizama akzara pAdam vA paQca zawka Adi yAvakam /
   chando 'tra noktā gātheti daśadharṃmādivadbhavet // GarP_1,211.9 //	CandaH atra na uktA gATA iti daSa DarMma Adi vat Bavet // GarP_1,211.9 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśottaradviśaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	vizamavRttalakzaNAdinirUpaNam nAma ekAdaSa uttara dviSaSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  212	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 212
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   prastāra ādyago 'tho laḥ paratulyo 'tha pūrvagaḥ /	prastAraH Adya gaH aTo laH para tulyaH aTa pUrva gaH /
   naṣṭamadhye sameṃ'ke laḥ same 'rdhe viṣame guruḥ // GarP_1,212.1 //	nazwa maDye sameM ake laH same arDe vizame guruH // GarP_1,212.1 //
   pratilomaguṇaṃ lādyaṃ dviruddiṣṭaka ekanut // GarP_1,212.2 //	pratiloma guNam lAdyam dvis uddizwakaH eka nud // GarP_1,212.2 //
   saṃkhyā dvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritam /	saMKyA dvis arDe rUpe tu SUnyam SUnye dvis Iritam /

   pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruḥ prastārato bhavet // GarP_1,212.4 //	pare pUrNam pare pUrNam meruH prastArataH Bavet // GarP_1,212.4 //
   lagasaṃkhyā vṛttasaṃkhyā cādyāṅgulamathordhvataḥ /	laga saMKyA vRtta saMKyA ca adya aFgulam aTa UrDvataH /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān  ācā  chandolakṣaṇaṃ nāma	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTamAn AcA CandolakzaNam nAma

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  213	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 213
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   hareḥ śrutvābravīdbrahmā yathā vyāsāya śaunaka /	hareH SrutvA abravIt brahmA yaTA vyAsAya SOnakaH /
   brāhmaṇādisamācāraṃ sarvadaṃ te tathā vade // GarP_1,213.1 //	brAhmaNa Adi samAcAram sarva dam te taTA vade // GarP_1,213.1 //
   śrutismṛtī tu vijñāya śrautaṃ karma samācaret /	Sruti smRtI tu vijQAya SrOtam karma samAcaret /
   śrautaṃ karma na ceduktaṃ tadā smārtaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.2 //	SrOtam karma na ced uktam tadA smArtam samAcaret // GarP_1,213.2 //
   tatrāpyaśaktaḥ karaṇe sadācāraṃ caredvudhaḥ /	tatra api aSaktaH karaNe sat AcAram caret vuDaH /
   śrutismṛtī ha viprāṇāṃ locane karmadarśane // GarP_1,213.3 //	Sruti smRtI ha viprANAm locane karma darSane // GarP_1,213.3 //
   śrutyuktaḥ paramo dharmaḥ smṛtiśāstragato 'paraḥ /	Sruti uktaH paramaH DarmaH smRti SAstra gataH aparaH /
   siṣṭācāreṇa saṃprāptastrayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ // GarP_1,213.4 //	sizwa AcAreNa saMprAptaH trayaH DarmAH sanAtanAH // GarP_1,213.4 //
   satyaṃ dānaṃ dayālobho vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /	satyam dAnam dayA loBaH vidyA ijyA pUjanam damaH /
   aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.5 //	azwO tAni pavitrANi Sizwa AcArasya lakzaNam // GarP_1,213.5 //
   tejomayāni pūrveṣāṃ śarīrāṇīndriyāṇi ca /	tejaH mayAni pUrvezAm SarIrANi indriyANi ca /
   na lipyate pātakena padmapatramivāmbhasā // GarP_1,213.6 //	na lipyate pAtakena padma patram iva amBasA // GarP_1,213.6 //
   nivāsamukhyā varṇānāṃ dharmācārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /	nivAsa muKyAH varNAnAm Darma AcArAH prakIrtitAH /
   satyaṃ yajñastapo dānametaddharmasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.7 //	satyam yajQaH tapaH dAnam etat Darmasya lakzaNam // GarP_1,213.7 //
   adattasyānupādānaṃ dānamadhyayanaṃ japaḥ /	adattasya anupAdAnam dAnam aDyayanam japaH /
   vidyā vittaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ kule janma tvarogitā // GarP_1,213.8 //	vidyA vittam tapaH SOcam kule janma tvarA ugitAH // GarP_1,213.8 //
   saṃsārocchittihetuśca dharmādeva pravartate /	saMsAra ucCitti hetuH ca DarmAt eva pravartate /
   dharmātsukhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca jñānānmokṣo 'dhigamyate // GarP_1,213.9 //	DarmAt suKam ca jQAnam ca jQAnAt mokzaH aDigamyate // GarP_1,213.9 //
   ijyādhyayanadānāni yathāśāstraṃ sanātanaḥ /	ijyA aDyayana dAnAni yaTASAstram sanAtanaH /
   brahmakṣattriyavaiśyānāṃ sāmānyo dharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.10 //	brahma kzattriya vESyAnAm sAmAnyaH DarmaH ucyate // GarP_1,213.10 //
   yājanādhyayane śuddhe viśuddhācca pratigrahaḥ /	yAjana aDyayane SudDe viSudDAt ca pratigrahaH /
   vṛttitrayamidaṃ prāhurmunayaḥ śreṣṭhavarṇinaḥ // GarP_1,213.11 //	vRtti trayam idam prAhuH munayaH SrezWa varNinaH // GarP_1,213.11 //
   śastreṇājīvanaṃ rājño bhūtānāñcābhirakṣaṇam /	SastreNa AjIvanam rAjQaH BUtAnAQca aBirakzaNam /
   pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣiḥ paṇyaṃ vaiśyasyājīvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.12 //	pASupAlyam kRziH paNyam vESyasya ajIvanam smRtam // GarP_1,213.12 //
   śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā dvijānāmanupūrvaśaḥ /	SUdrasya dvija SuSrUzA dvijAnAm anupUrvaSas /
   gurau vāso 'gniśuśrūṣā svādhyāyo brahmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,213.13 //	gurO vAsaH agni SuSrUzA svADyAyaH brahmacAriNaH // GarP_1,213.13 //
   triḥ snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyaṃ gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ /	tris snAtA snApitA BEkzyam gurO prANAntikI sTitiH /
   samekhalo jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā gurusaṃśrayaḥ // GarP_1,213.14 //	sa meKalaH jawI daNxI muNxI vA guru saMSrayaH // GarP_1,213.14 //
   agnihotropacaraṇaṃ jīvanaṃ ca svakarmabhiḥ /	agnihotra upacaraNam jIvanam ca sva karmaBiH /
   dharmadāreṣu kalpeta parvavarjaṃ ratikriyāḥ // GarP_1,213.15 //	Darma dArezu kalpeta parva varjam rati kriyAH // GarP_1,213.15 //
   devapitratitibhyaśca pūjādiṣvanukalpanam /	deva pitR atitiByaH ca pUjA Adizu anukalpanam /
   śrutismṛtyarthasaṃsthānaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ gṛhamedhinaḥ // GarP_1,213.16 //	Sruti smRti arTa saMsTAnam DarmaH ayam gRhameDinaH // GarP_1,213.16 //
   jaṭitvamagnihotratvaṃ bhūśayyājinadhāraṇam /	jawi tvam agni hotra tvam BU SayyA ajina DAraNam /
   vane vāsaḥ payomūlanīvāraphalavṛttitā // GarP_1,213.17 //	vane vAsaH payaH mUla nIvAra Pala vRtti tAH // GarP_1,213.17 //
   pratiṣiddhānnivṛttiśca triḥ snānaṃ vratadhāritā /	pratizidDAt nivRttiH ca tris snAnam vrata DAritAH /
   devatātithipūjā ca dharmo 'yaṃ vanavāsinaḥ // GarP_1,213.18 //	devatA atiTi pUjA ca DarmaH ayam vana vAsinaH // GarP_1,213.18 //
   sarvārambhaparityāgo bhikṣānnaṃ vṛkṣamūlatā /	sarva AramBa parityAgaH BikzA annam vRkza mUla tA /
   niṣparigrahatādrohaḥ samatā sarvajantuṣu // GarP_1,213.19 //	nizparigraha tA drohaH sama tA sarva jantuzu // GarP_1,213.19 //
   priyāpriyapariṣvaṅgesukhaduḥ khādhikāritā /	priya apriya parizvaFge suKa duH Ka aDikAritA /
   sabāhyābhyantare śaucaṃ vāgyamo dhyānacāritā // GarP_1,213.20 //	sa bAhya aByantare SOcam vAgyamaH DyAna cAritAH // GarP_1,213.20 //
   sarvaidriyasamāhāro dhāraṇādhyānanityatā /	sarvEdriya samAhAraH DAraNA DyAna nitya tA /
   bhāvasaṃśuddhiretyeṣa parivrāḍdharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.21 //	BAva saMSudDiH eti eza parivrAj DarmaH ucyate // GarP_1,213.21 //
   ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaśauce kṣamā dayā /	ahiMsA sUnRtA vANI satya SOce kzamA dayA /
   varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.22 //	varNinAm liFginAm ca eva sAmAnyaH DarmaH ucyate // GarP_1,213.22 //
   yathoktakāriṇaḥ sarve prayānti paramāṃ gatim /	yaTA ukta kAriNaH sarve prayAnti paramAm gatim /
   ā bodhātsvapanaṃ yāvat gṛhidharmaṃ ca vacmi te // GarP_1,213.23 //	A boDAt svapanam yAvat gRhi Darmam ca vacmi te // GarP_1,213.23 //
   brāhme muhūrte budhyeta dharmārthau cānucintayet /	brAhme muhUrte buDyeta Darma arTO ca anucintayet /
   kāyakleśāṃśca tanmūlānvedatattvārthameva ca // GarP_1,213.24 //	kAya kleSAn= ca tad mUlAn veda tattva arTam eva ca // GarP_1,213.24 //
   śarvaryante samutthāya kṛtaśaucaḥ samāhitaḥ /	SarvarI ante samutTAya kRta SOcaH samAhitaH /
   snātvā sandhyāmupāsīta sarvakālamatandritaḥ // GarP_1,213.25 //	snAtvA sanDyAm upAsIta sarvakAlam atandritaH // GarP_1,213.25 //
   prātaḥ sandhyāmupā sīta dantadhāvanapūrvikām /	prAtar sanDyAm upA sIta dantaDAvana pUrvikAm /
   ubhe mūtrapurīṣe ca divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ // GarP_1,213.26 //	uBe mUtra purIze ca divA kuryAt udaFmuKaH // GarP_1,213.26 //
   rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā /	rAtrO ca dakziNe kuryAt uBe sanDye yaTA divA /
   chāyāyāmandhakāre vā rātrau vāhani vā dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.27 //	CAyAyAm anDakAre vA rAtrO vA ahani vA dvijaH // GarP_1,213.27 //
   yathā tu samukhaḥ kuryātprāṇabādhābhayeṣu ca /	yaTA tu samuKaH kuryAt prANa bADa aBayezu ca /
   gomayāṅgāravalmīkaphālākṛṣṭe śubhe // GarP_1,213.28 //	gomaya aFgAra valmIka PAla AkRzwe SuBe // GarP_1,213.28 //
   mārgopajīvyacchāyāsu na mūtraṃ ca purīṣakam /	mArga upajIvya= CAyAsu na mUtram ca purIzakam /
   antarjalāddevagṛhādvalmīkānmūṣikasthalāt // GarP_1,213.29 //	antar jalAt deva gRhAt valmIkAn mUzika sTalAt // GarP_1,213.29 //
   pareṣāṃ śaucaśiṣṭācca śmaśānācca mṛdaṃ tyajet /	parezAm SOca SizwAt ca SmaSAnAt ca mRdam tyajet /
   ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyādvāma haste mṛdaṃ dvidhā // GarP_1,213.30 //	ekAm liFge mRdam dadyAt vAma haste mRdam dviDA // GarP_1,213.30 //
   ubhayordve ca dātavye mūtraśaucaṃ pracakṣate /	uBayoH dve ca dAtavye mUtra SOcam pracakzate /
   ekāṃ liṅge gude tistrastathā vāmakare daśa // GarP_1,213.31 //	ekAm liFge gude tistraH taTA vAma kare daSa // GarP_1,213.31 //
   pañca pāde daśaikasminkarayoḥ saptamṛttikāḥ /	paQca pAde daSa ekasmin karayoH sapta mRttikAH /
   ardhaprasṛtimātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā // GarP_1,213.32 //	arDa prasRti mAtrA tu praTamA mRttikA smRtAH // GarP_1,213.32 //
   dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tadardhā parikīrtitā /	dvitIyA ca tRtIyA ca tad arDA parikIrtitA /
   upaviṣṭastu viṇmūtraṃ kartuṃ yastu na vindati // GarP_1,213.33 //	upavizwaH tu viz mUtram kartum yaH tu na vindati // GarP_1,213.33 //
   sa kuryādardhaśaucaṃ tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā /	sa kuryAt arDa SOcam tu svasya SOcasya sarvadA /
   divā śaucasya rātryardhaṃ yadvā pādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,213.34 //	divA SOcasya rAtrI arDam yat vA pAdaH viDIyate // GarP_1,213.34 //
   svasthasya tu yathoddiṣṭamārtaḥ kuryādyathābalam /	svasTasya tu yaTA uddizwam ArtaH kuryAt yaTAbalam /
   vasā śukramasṛṅ majjā lālā viṇmūtrakarṇaviṭ // GarP_1,213.35 //	vasA Sukram asRj majjA lAlA viz mUtra karNa viz // GarP_1,213.35 //
   śleṣmāśradūṣikā svedo dvādaśaite nṛṇāṃ malāḥ /	Slezma aSradUzikA svedaH dvAdaSA ete nRNAm malAH /
   manyeta yāvatā śuddhiṃ tāvacchaucaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.36 //	manyeta yAvatA SudDim tAvat SOcam samAcaret // GarP_1,213.36 //
   pramāṇaṃ śaucasaṃkhyāyā nādiṣṭairavaśiṣyate /	pramANam SOca saMKyAyAH na AdizwEH avaSizyate /
   śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.37 //	SOcam tu dviviDam proktam bAhyam AByantaram taTA // GarP_1,213.37 //
   mṛjjalābhyāṃ smṛtaṃ bāhyaṃ bhāvaśuddhirathāntaram /	mRd jalAByAm smRtam bAhyam BAva SudDi H aTa antaram /
   trirācāmedapaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāttato mukham // GarP_1,213.38 //	tris AcAmet apaH pUrvam dvis pramRjyAt tatas muKam // GarP_1,213.38 //
   saṃmṛjyāṅguṣṭhamūlena tribhirāsyamupaspṛśet /	saMmRjya aFguzWa mUlena triBiH Asyam upaspRSet /
   aṅguṣṭhena pradeśinyā ghrāṇaṃ paścādanantaram // GarP_1,213.39 //	aFguzWena pradeSinyA GrANam paScAt anantaram // GarP_1,213.39 //
   aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punaḥ punaḥ /	aFguzWa anAmikAByAm ca cakzuH Srotre punar punar /
   kaniṣṭhāṅgaṣṭhayornābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai // GarP_1,213.40 //	kanizWA aFgazWayoH nABim hRdayam tu talena vE // GarP_1,213.40 //
   sarvābhistu śiraḥ paścādbāhū cāgreṇa saṃspṛśet /	sarvABiH tu SiraH paScAt bAhU ca agreNa saMspRSet /
   ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni triḥ paṭhanprīṇayetkramāt // GarP_1,213.41 //	RcaH yajUMzi sAmAni tris paWan prINayet kramAt // GarP_1,213.41 //
   atharvāṅgirasau pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramārṣṭyatha tansukham /	aTarva aFgirasO pUrvam dvis pramArzwi aTa tat suKam /
   itihāsapurāṇāni vedāṅgāni vedāṅgāni yathākramam // GarP_1,213.42 //	itihAsa purANAni vedAFgAni vedAFgAni yaTAkramam // GarP_1,213.42 //
   khaṃ mukhe nāsike vāyuṃ netre sūryaṃ śrutī (tīrdi) diśaḥ /	Kam muKe nAsike vAyum netre sUryam SrutI (tIrdi) diSaH /
   prāṇagranthimatho nābhiṃ brahmāṇaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet // GarP_1,213.43 //	prANagranTim aTo nABim brahmANam hRdaye spRSet // GarP_1,213.43 //
   rudraṃ mūrdhnā samālabhya prīṇātyatha śikhāmṛṣīn /	rudram mUrDnA samAlaBya prINAti aTa SiKAm RzIn /
   bāhū yamendravaruṇakuberavasudhānalān // GarP_1,213.44 //	bAhU yama indra varuNa kubera vasuDA analAn // GarP_1,213.44 //
   abhyukṣya caraṇau viṣṇumindraṃ viṣṇu karadvayam /	aByukzya caraNO vizNum indram vizNu kara dvayam /
   agnirvāyuśca sūryendugirayo 'ṅguliparvasu // GarP_1,213.45 //	agniH vAyuH ca sUrya indu girayaH aFguli parvasu // GarP_1,213.45 //
   gaṅgādyāḥ saritastāsu yā rekhāḥ karamadhyagāḥ /	gaFgA AdyAH saritaH tAsu yAH reKAH kara maDya gAH /
   uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathārthavat // GarP_1,213.46 //	uzaH kAle tu saMprApte SOcam kRtvA yaTArTavat // GarP_1,213.46 //
   tataḥ snānarṃ pkurvīta dantadhāvanapūrvakam /	tatas snAnarm pkurvIta danta DAvana pUrvakam /
   mukhe paryuṣite nityaṃ bhavatyaprayato naraḥ // GarP_1,213.47 //	muKe paryuzite nityam Bavati aprayataH naraH // GarP_1,213.47 //
   tasmātsarvaprayatnena kuryādvai dantaghāvanam /	tasmAt sarva prayatnena kuryAt vE dantaGAvanam /
   kadambabilvakhadirakaravīravaṭārjunāḥ // GarP_1,213.48 //	kadamba bilva Kadira karavIra vawA arjunAH // GarP_1,213.48 //
   yūthī ca bṛhatī jātī karañjārkātimuktakāḥ /	yUTI ca bRhatI jAtI karaQja arka atimuktakAH /
   jambūmadhūkā pāmārgaśirīṣodumbarāsanāḥ // GarP_1,213.49 //	jambU maDUkA pAmArga SirIza udumbara AsanAH // GarP_1,213.49 //
   kṣīrikaṇṭakivṛkṣādyāḥ praśastā dantadhāvane /	kzIri kaNwaki vRkza AdyAH praSastAH dantaDAvane /
   kaṭutiktakaṣāyāśca dhanārogyasukhapradāḥ // GarP_1,213.50 //	kawu tikta kazAyAH ca Dana Arogya suKa pradAH // GarP_1,213.50 //
   prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tadācāmet /	prakzAlya BuktvA ca SucO deSe tyaktvA tat AcAmet /
   amāyāṃ ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipadyapi // GarP_1,213.51 //	amAyAm ca taTA zazWyAm navamyAm pratipadi api // GarP_1,213.51 //
   varjayeddantakāṣṭhantu tathaivārkasya vāsare /	varjayet dantakAzWantu taTA eva arkasya vAsare /
   abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyāṃ tathā tithau // GarP_1,213.52 //	aBAve danta kAzWasya nizidDAyAm taTA tiTO // GarP_1,213.52 //
   aṣāṃ dvādaśagaṇḍūṣaiḥ kurvīta mukhaśodhanam /	azAm dvAdaSa gaNxUzEH kurvIta muKa SoDanam /
   prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakaraṃ hitam // GarP_1,213.53 //	prAtar snAnam praSaMsanti dRzwa adRzwa karam hitam // GarP_1,213.53 //
   sarvamar hati śuddhātmā prātaḥ snāyī japādikam /	sarvam ar hati SudDa AtmA prAtar snAyI japa Adikam /
   atyantamalinaḥ kāyo navacchidrasamanvitaḥ // GarP_1,213.54 //	atyanta malinaH kAyaH nava= Cidra samanvitaH // GarP_1,213.54 //
   stravatyeṣa divā rātrau prātaḥ snānaṃ viśodhanam /	stravati eza divA rAtrO prAtar snAnam viSoDanam /
   manaḥ prasādajananaṃ rūpasaubhāgyavardhanam // GarP_1,213.55 //	manaH prasAda jananam rUpa sOBAgya varDanam // GarP_1,213.55 //
   śokaduḥ khapraśamanaṃ gaṅgāsnānavadācaret /	SokaduH Ka praSamanam gaFgA snAna vat Acaret /
   adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyāṃ jyeṣṭhake site // GarP_1,213.56 //	adya haste tu nakzatre daSamyAm jyezWake site // GarP_1,213.56 //
   daśapāpa harāyāṃ ca adatvā dānakalmaṣam /	daSa pApa harAyAm ca adatvA dAna kalmazam /
   viruddhācaraṇaṃ hiṃsā paradāropasevanam // GarP_1,213.57 //	virudDa AcaraNam hiMsA para dAra upasevanam // GarP_1,213.57 //
   pāruṣyānṛtapaiśunyamasambaddhābhibhāṣaṇam /	pAruzya anRta pESunyam asambadDa aBiBAzaNam /
   paradravyābhidhānaṃ ca manasāniṣṭacintanam // GarP_1,213.58 //	para dravya aBiDAnam ca manasA anizwa cintanam // GarP_1,213.58 //
   etaddaśāghaghātārthaṃ gaṅgāsnānaṃ karomyaham /	etad daSa aGa GAta arTam gaFgA snAnam karomi aham /
   prātaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ snānaṃ vānaprasthagṛhasthayoḥ // GarP_1,213.59 //	prAtar saMkzepataH snAnam vAnaprasTa gRha sTayoH // GarP_1,213.59 //
   yatestriṣavaṇaṃ snānaṃ sakṛtta brahmacāriṇaḥ /	yateH trizavaNam snAnam sakRtta brahmacAriNaH /
   ācamya tīrthamāvāhya snāyātsmṛtvāvyayaṃ harim // GarP_1,213.60 //	Acamya tIrTam AvAhya snAyAt smRtvA avyayam harim // GarP_1,213.60 //
   tisraḥ koṭyastu vijñeyā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ /	tisraH kowyaH tu vijQeyAH mandehAH nAma rAkzasAH /
   udayantaṃ durātmānaḥ sūryamicchanti khāditum // GarP_1,213.61 //	udayantam durAtmAnaH sUryam icCanti KAditum // GarP_1,213.61 //
   sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /	sa hanti sUryam sanDyAyAm na upAstim kurute tu yaH /
   dahanti mantrapūtena toyenānalarūpiṇā // GarP_1,213.62 //	dahanti mantra pUtena toyena anala rUpiNA // GarP_1,213.62 //
   ahorātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavatīti ha /	ahorAtrasya yaH sanDiH sA sanDyA Bavati iti ha /
   dvināḍikā bhavetsandhyā yāvadbhavati darśanam // GarP_1,213.63 //	dvi nAxikA Bavet sanDyA yAvat Bavati darSanam // GarP_1,213.63 //
   gandhyākarmāvasāne tu svayaṃ homo vidhīyate /	ganDyA karma avasAne tu svayam homaH viDIyate /
   svayaṃ homaphalaṃ yattu tadanyena na jāyate // GarP_1,213.64 //	svayam homa Palam yat tu tad anyena na jAyate // GarP_1,213.64 //
   ṛtvikputro gururbhrātā bhāgineyo 'tha viṭpatiḥ /	Rtvij putraH guruH BrAtA BAgineyaH aTa viz patiH /
   ebhireva hutaṃ yattu taddhutaṃ svayameva hi // GarP_1,213.65 //	eBiH eva hutam yat tu tat hutam svayam eva hi // GarP_1,213.65 //
   brahmā vai gārhapatyāgnirdakṣaṇāgnistrilocanaḥ /	brahmA vE gArhapatya agniH dakzaNa agniH trilocanaH /
   viṣṇurāhavanīyāgniḥ kumāraḥ satya ucyate // GarP_1,213.66 //	vizNuH AhavanIya agniH kumAraH satyaH ucyate // GarP_1,213.66 //
   kṛtvā homaṃ yathākālaṃ saurānmantrāñjapettataḥ /	kRtvA homam yaTAkAlam sOrAn mantrAn japet tatas /
   samāhitātmā sāvitrīṃ praṇavaṃ ca yathoditam // GarP_1,213.67 //	samAhita AtmA sAvitrIm praNavam ca yaTA uditam // GarP_1,213.67 //
   praṇave nityayuktasya vyāhṛtīṣu ca saptasu /	praNave nitya yuktasya vyAhRtIzu ca saptasu /
   tripadāyāṃ ca sāvitryāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // GarP_1,213.68 //	tripadAyAm ca sAvitryAm na Bayam vidyate kvacid // GarP_1,213.68 //
   gāyattrīṃ yo japennityaṃ kalyamutthāya mānavaḥ /	gAyattrIm yaH japet nityam kalyam utTAya mAnavaH /
   lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā // GarP_1,213.69 //	lipyate na sa pApena padma patram iva amBasA // GarP_1,213.69 //
   śvetavarṇā samuddiṣṭā kauśaiyavasanā tathā /	Sveta varNA samuddizwA kOSEya vasanA taTA /
   akṣasūtradharā devī padmāsanagatā śubhā // GarP_1,213.70 //	akza sUtra DarA devI padmAsana gatA SuBAH // GarP_1,213.70 //
   āvāhya yajupānena tejo 'sīti vidhānataḥ /	AvAhya yaju pAnena tejaH asi iti viDAnataH /
   etadyajuḥ purā daivairdṛṣṭidarśanakāṅkṣibhiḥ // GarP_1,213.71 //	etat yajuH purA dEvEH dRzwi darSana kAFkziBiH // GarP_1,213.71 //
   ādityamaṇḍalāntaḥ sthāṃ brahmalokasthitāmapi /	Aditya maNxala antar sTAm brahma loka sTitAm api /
   tatrāvāhya japitvāto namaskārādvisarjayet // GarP_1,213.72 //	tatra AvAhya japitvA ataH namaskArAt visarjayet // GarP_1,213.72 //
   pūrvāhna eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam /	pUrvAhnaH eva kurvIta devatAnAm ca pUjanam /
   na viṣṇoḥ paramo devastasmāttaṃ pūjayetsadā // GarP_1,213.73 //	na vizNoH paramaH devaH tasmAt tam pUjayet sadA // GarP_1,213.73 //
   brahmaviṣṇuśivāndevānna pṛthagbhāvayetsudhīḥ /	brahma vizNu SivAn devAn na pRTak BAvayet suDIH /
   loke 'sminmaṅgalānyaṣṭau brāhmaṇo gaurhutāśanaḥ // GarP_1,213.74 //	loke asmin maFgalAni azwO brAhmaNaH gOH hutA aSanaH // GarP_1,213.74 //
   hiraṇyaṃ sarpirāditya āpo rājā tathāṣṭamaḥ /	hiraNyam sarpiH AdityaH ApaH rAjA taTA azwamaH /
   etāni satataṃ paśyedarcayecca pradakṣiṇam // GarP_1,213.75 //	etAni satatam paSyet arcayet ca pradakziNam // GarP_1,213.75 //
   vedasyādhyayanaṃ pūrvaṃ vicārobhyasanaṃ japaḥ /	vedasya aDyayanam pUrvam vicAra uByasanam japaH /
   taddānaṃ caiva śiṣyabhyo vedābhyāso hi pañcadhā // GarP_1,213.76 //	tat dAnam ca eva SizyaByaH veda aByAsaH hi paQcaDA // GarP_1,213.76 //
   vedārthaṃ yajñaśāstrāṇi dharmaśāstrāṇi caiva hi /	veda arTam yajQa SAstrANi Darma SAstrANi ca eva hi /
   mūlyena lekhayitvā yo dadyādyāti sa vaidikam // GarP_1,213.77 //	mUlyena leKayitvA yaH dadyAt yAti sa vEdikam // GarP_1,213.77 //
   itihā sapurāṇāni likhitvāyaḥ prayacchati /	itihA sa purANAni liKitvA ayaH prayacCati /
   brahmadānasamaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnoti dviguṇīkṛtam // GarP_1,213.78 //	brahma dAna samam puNyam prApnoti dvi guNIkRtam // GarP_1,213.78 //
   mṛtīye ca tathā bhāge poṣyavargārthasādhanam /	mRtIye ca taTA BAge pozya varga arTa sADanam /
   mātā pitā gururbhrātā prajā dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ // GarP_1,213.79 //	mAtA pitA guruH BrAtA prajAH dInAH samASritAH // GarP_1,213.79 //
   abhyāgato 'tithiścāgniḥ poṣyavargā udāhṛtaḥ /	aByAgataH atiTiH ca agniH pozya vargAH udAhRtaH /
   bharaṇaṃ poṣyavargasya praśastaṃ svargasādhanam // GarP_1,213.80 //	BaraNam pozya vargasya praSastam svarga sADanam // GarP_1,213.80 //
   bharaṇaṃ poṣya vargasya tasmādyatnena kārayet /	BaraNam pozya vargasya tasmAt yatnena kArayet /
   sa jīvati varaścaiko bahubhiryopajīvyati // GarP_1,213.81 //	sa jIvati varaH ca ekaH bahuBiH yA upajIvyati // GarP_1,213.81 //
   jīvanto mṛtakāstvanye puruṣāḥ svodarambharāḥ /	jIvantaH mRtakAH tu anye puruzAH sva udaramBarAH /
   svakīyodarapūrtiśca kukkurasyāpi vidyate // GarP_1,213.82 //	svakIya udara pUrtiH ca kukkurasya api vidyate // GarP_1,213.82 //
   arthebhyo 'pi vivṛddhebhyaḥ sambhūtebhyastatastataḥ /	arTeByaH api vivRdDeByaH samBUteByaH tatas tatas /
   kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // GarP_1,213.83 //	kriyAH sarvAH pravartante parvateByaH iva ApagAH // GarP_1,213.83 //
   sarvaratnākarā bhūmirdhānyāni paśavaḥ striyaḥ /	sarva ratna AkarAH BUmiH DAnyAni paSavaH striyaH /
   arthasya kāryayogitvādartha ityabhidhīyate // GarP_1,213.84 //	arTasya kArya yogi tvAt arTaH iti aBiDIyate // GarP_1,213.84 //
   adroheṇaiva bhūtānāmalpadroheṇa vā punaḥ /	adroheNa eva BUtAnAm alpa droheNa vA punar /
   yā vṛttistāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīvedanāpadi // GarP_1,213.85 //	yA vRttiH tAm samAsTAya vipraH jIvet anApadi // GarP_1,213.85 //
   dhanaṃ tu trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalameva ca /	Danam tu triviDam jQeyam Suklam Sabalam eva ca /
   kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyo vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // GarP_1,213.86 //	kRzNam ca tasya vijQeyaH viBAgaH saptaDA pRTak // GarP_1,213.86 //
   kramāyattaṃ prītidattaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /	krama Ayattam prIti dattam prAptam ca saha BAryayA /
   aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,213.87 //	aviSezeNa sarvezAm varNAnAm triviDam Danam // GarP_1,213.87 //
   vaiśeṣikaṃ dhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇasya trilakṣaṇam /	vESezikam Danam dRzwam brAhmaNasya tri lakzaNam /
   yājanādhyāpane nityaṃ viśuddhaśca (ddhācca) pratigrahaḥ // GarP_1,213.88	yAjana aDyApane nityam viSudDaH ca (dDAt ca) pratigrahaH // GarP_1,213.88
   trividhaṃ kṣatriyasyāpi prāhurvaiśeṣikaṃ dhanam /	triviDam kzatriyasya api prAhuH vESezikam Danam /
   śuddhārthaṃ labdhakarajaṃ daṇḍāptaṃ jayajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.89 //	SudDa arTam labDa kara jam daNxa Aptam jaya jam taTA // GarP_1,213.89 //

   kṛṣigorakṣavāṇijyaṃ śūdrasyaibhyastvanugrahāt // GarP_1,213.90 //	kRzi gorakza vANijyam SUdrasya eByaH tu anugrahAt // GarP_1,213.90 //
   kusīdakṛṣivāṇijyaṃ prakurvīta svayaṃ param (kṛtam) /	kusIda kRzi vANijyam prakurvIta svayam param (kRtam) /
   āpatkāle svayaṃ kurvannainasā yujyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.91 //	Apad kAle svayam kurvat = EnasA yujyate dvijaH // GarP_1,213.91 //
   bahavo vartanopāyā ṛṣibhiḥ parikīrtitāḥ /	bahavaH vartana upAyAH RziBiH parikIrtitAH /
   sarveṣāmapi caivaiṣāṃ kusīdamadhikaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,213.92 //	sarvezAm api ca eva ezAm kusIdam aDikam viduH // GarP_1,213.92 //
   anāvṛṣṭyā rājabhayānmūṣikādyairupadravaiḥ /	anAvRzwyA rAja BayAt mUzikA AdyEH upadravEH /
   kṛṣyādike bhavedbādhā sā kusīde na vidyate // GarP_1,213.93 //	kRzi Adike Bavet bADA sA kusIde na vidyate // GarP_1,213.93 //
   śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyāṃ divasepi vā /	Sukla pakze taTA kRzNe rajanyAm divasepi vA /
   uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanaṃ na nivartate // GarP_1,213.94 //	uzNe varzati SIte vA varDanam na nivartate // GarP_1,213.94 //
   deśaṃ gatānāṃ yā vṛddhirnānāpaṇyopajīvinām /	deSam gatAnAm yA vRdDiH nAnA paNya upajIvinAm /
   kusīdaṃ kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasyaiva jāyate // GarP_1,213.95 //	kusIdam kurvataH samyak saMsTitasya eva jAyate // GarP_1,213.95 //
   labdhalābhaḥ pitṝndevānbrāhmaṇāṃścaiva pūjayet /	labDa lABaH pitLn devAn brAhmaNAn= ca eva pUjayet /
   te tṛptāstasya taddoṣaṃ śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,213.96 //	te tRptAH tasya tad dozam Samayanti na saMSayaH // GarP_1,213.96 //
   vaṇikkusīdaṃ dadyādyo vastraṃ gāṅkāñcanādikam /	vaNij kusIdam dadyAt yaH vastram gAFkAQcana Adikam /
   kṛṣīvalo 'nnapānādiyānaśayyāsanāni ca // GarP_1,213.97 //	kRzIvalaH anna pAna Adi yAna SayyA AsanAni ca // GarP_1,213.97 //
   rājabhyo viṃśatiṃ dattvā paśusvarṇādikaṃ śatam /	rAjaByaH viMSatim dattvA paSu svarNa Adikam Satam /

   ardhena cātmabharaṇaṃ nityanaimittikāṃnvitam /	arDena ca Atma BaraNam nitya nEmittika aMnvitam /

   vidyā śilpaṃ bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ /	vidyA Silpam BUtiH sevA gorakzA vipaNiH kRziH /
   vṛttirbhaikṣyaṃ kusīdaṃ ca daśa jīvanahetavaḥ // GarP_1,213.100 //	vRttiH BEkzyam kusIdam ca daSa jIvana hetavaH // GarP_1,213.100 //
   pratigrahārjitā vipre kṣatriye śastranirjitā /	pratigraha arjitAH vipre kzatriye Sastra nirjitA /

   nadī bahūdakā śākamṛtparṇāni samitkuśāḥ /	nadI bahu udakA SAka mRd parNAni samiD kuSAH /

   ayācitopapanne tu nāsti doṣaḥ pratigrahe /	ayAcita upapanne tu na asti dozaH pratigrahe /

   caturthe ca tathā bhāge snānārthaṃ mṛda māharet /	caturTe ca taTA BAge snAna arTam mRda mA Aharet /

   pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārthataḥ /	paQcame ca taTA BAge saMviBAgaH yaTArTataH /

   brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāyāgra yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ sahāśnute /	brAhmaNeByaH pradAya agra yaH suhRdBiH saha aSnute /
   sa pretya labhate svargamannadānaṃ samācaran // GarP_1,213.148 //	sa pretya laBate svargam anna dAnam samAcaran // GarP_1,213.148 //
   pūrvaṃ madhuramaśrīyāllavaṇāmlau ca madhyataḥ /	pUrvam maDuram aSrIyAt lavaNa amlO ca maDyatas /
   kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṃśca payaścaiva tathāntataḥ // GarP_1,213.149 //	kawu tikta kazAyAn= ca payaH ca eva taTA antataH // GarP_1,213.149 //
   śākaṃ ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭhamatyantaṃ ca vivarjayet /	SAkam ca rAtrO BUmizWam atyantam ca vivarjayet /
   nacaikarasasevāyāṃ prasajjeta kadācana // GarP_1,213.150 //	naca eka rasa sevAyAm prasajjeta kadAcana // GarP_1,213.150 //
   samṛtaṃ brāhmaṇasyānnaṃ kṣatriyānnaṃ payaḥ smṛtam /	samRtam brAhmaNasya annam kzatriya annam payaH smRtam /
   vaiśyasya cānnamevānnaṃ śūdrānnaṃ rudhiraṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.151 //	vESyasya ca annam eva annam SUdra annam ruDiram smRtam // GarP_1,213.151 //
   amāvāsī vasedatra ekahāyanameva vā // GarP_1,213.152 //	amAvAsI vaset atra eka hAyanam eva vA // GarP_1,213.152 //
   tatra śrīścaiva lakṣmīśca vasate nātra saṃśayaḥ /	tatra SrIH ca eva lakzmIH ca vasate na atra saMSayaH /
   udare gārhapatyāgniḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ // GarP_1,213.153 //	udare gArhapatya agniH pRzWa deSe tu dakziNaH // GarP_1,213.153 //
   āsye cāhavanīyo 'gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani /	Asye ca AhavanIyaH agniH satyaH parva ca mUrDani /
   yaḥ pañcāgnīnimānveda āhitāgniḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,213.154 //	yaH paQca agnIn imAn vedaH AhitAgniH saH ucyate // GarP_1,213.154 //
   śariramāpaḥ somaṃ ca vividhaṃ cānnamucyate /	SariramApaH somam ca viviDam ca annam ucyate /
   prāṇo hyagnistathādityastribhoktā eka eva tu // GarP_1,213.155 //	prANaH hi agniH taTA AdityaH tri BoktAH ekaH eva tu // GarP_1,213.155 //
   annaṃ balāya me bhūmerapāmagnyanilasya ca /	annam balAya me BUmeH apAm agni anilasya ca /
   bhavatyetatpariṇatau mamāpyavyāhataṃ sukham // GarP_1,213.156 //	Bavati etat pariNatO mama api avyAhatam suKam // GarP_1,213.156 //
   hastena parimārjyātha kuryāttāmbūlabhakṣaṇam /	hastena parimArjya aTa kuryAt tAmbUla BakzaNam /
   śravaṇaṃ cetihāsasya tatkuryātsusamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,213.157 //	SravaNam ca itihAsasya tat kuryAt su samAhitaH // GarP_1,213.157 //
   itihāsapurāṇādyaiḥ ṣaṣṭhasaptamakenayet /	itihAsa purANa AdyEH zazWa saptamakenayet /
   tataḥ sandhyāmupāsīta snātvā vai paścimāṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,213.158 //	tatas sanDyAm upAsIta snAtvA vE paScimAm naraH // GarP_1,213.158 //
   etadvā divase proktamanuṣṭhānaṃ mayā dvija /	etat vA divase proktam anuzWAnam mayA dvija /
   ācāraṃ yaḥ paṭhedvidvāñchṛṇuyātsa divaṃvrajet /	AcAram yaH paWet vidvAn SRNuyAt sa divaMvrajet /
   ācārādirdharmakartā keśavo hi smṛto dvija // GarP_1,213.159 //	AcAra AdiH Darma kartA keSavaH hi smRtaH dvija // GarP_1,213.159 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	paQca uttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH

   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /

   pratidhātā ca vaktārastāhṛdayāvipaścit /	pratiDAtA ca vaktAraH tA hRdaya avipaScit /

   varuṇāya namaḥ // GarP_1,214.6 //	varuNAya namaH // GarP_1,214.6 //
   oṃ ye te śataṃ varuṇaye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ /	om ye te Satam varuNaye sahasram yajQiyAH pASAH vitatAH mahAntaH /

   oṃ idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍhamasya pāṃsure /	om idam vizNuH vicakrame treDA niDe padam samUXam asya pAMsure /

   oṃ āpo asmānmātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu /	om ApaH asmAn mAtaraH SunDayantu GRtena naH GRtazvaH punantu /
   viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīrudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi //	viSvam hi ripram pravahanti devIrudidAByaH SuciH ApUtaH emi //
   GarP_1,214.11 //	GarP_1,214.11 //

   GarP_1,214.13 //	GarP_1,214.13 //
   tato 'bhiṣiñcenmantraistu varuṇaistu yathākramam /	tatas aBiziQcet mantrEH tu varuNEH tu yaTAkramam /

   āpo tvantumasīti ca muñcantvavabhṛteti ca /	ApaH tu antum asi iti ca muQcantu avaBRta iti ca /
   oṃ imaṃme varuṇa śrudhīhavamadyā ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyurācake //	om imaMme varuNa SruDIhava madyA ca mRxayatvA mavasyurAcake //
   GarP_1,214.15 //	GarP_1,214.15 //
   oṃ tattvayāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadāśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /	om tat tvayAmi brahmaNA vandamAnaH tad ASAste yajamAnaH havirBiH /
   aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃ samāna āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ /	ahexamAnaH varuNa iha boDyu ruSam samAnaH AyuH pramozIH /
   oṃ tvanno agne varuṇasya vidvāndevasya heḍo avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /	om tu at naH agne varuNasya vidvAn devasya hexaH avayAsi sIzWAH /
   yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsipramumugdhyasmatsvāhā /	yajizWaH vahnitamaH SoSucAnaH viSvA dveza aMsi pramu mugDi asmad svAhA /
   oṃ sa tvanno agnevamo bhavatī nediṣṭho asyā uṣasovyuṣṭau /	om sa tvannaH agnevamaH BavatI nedizWaH asyAH uzasaH vyuzwO /
   avayakṣvano varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhimṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi /	avayakzvanaH varuNam rarANaH vIhi mRxIkam suhavaH naH eDi /
   oṃ āpo nauṣadhi hiṃsārdhamno rājastato varuṇo nomuñcā yadāharaghnyā iti	om ApaH na ozaDi hiMsA arDamnaH rAjaH tatas varuNaH na umuQcAH yadAharaGnyA iti
   varuṇeti śapārmahe tato varuṇa no muñca /	varuNa iti SapArmahe tatas varuNa naH muQca /
   oṃ uduttamaṃ varuṇa pāśamasmadavādhamaṃ vimadhyamaṃśrathāya /	om uduttamam varuNa pASam asmad ava aDamam vimaDyam aMSraTAya /
   athāvayamādityavrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma /	aTa Avayam Aditya vrate tava anAgasaH aditaye syAma /
   muñcantumāmapyathādvaruṇasya tvat /	muQcantumAm api aTAdvaruNasya tvat /
   aho yamasya patnīmānaḥ sarvasmādeva kilbiṣāt /	aho yamasya patnI mAnaH sarvasmAt eva kilbizAt /
   avabhṛthanicaṃ punarvicerusi nityaṃ prannaḥ /	avaBRTanicam punar vicerusi nityam prannaH /
   avadevairdevakṛtā manoyāsi samavatyai kṛtaṃ puṣpācchā devadhīmalpāhī //	avadevEH deva kRtA manoyAsi samavatyE kRtam puzpa acCA deva DI malpAhI //
   GarP_1,214.16 //	GarP_1,214.16 //

   āpo devo pāvamānyaḥ punantvādyā ṛco nava // GarP_1,214.19 //	ApaH devaH pAvamAnyaH punantvA AdyAH RcaH nava // GarP_1,214.19 //
   citpatirmeti ca śanaiḥ plāvyātmanaṃ samāhitaḥ /	citpatiH mA iti ca SanEs plAvya Atmanam samAhitaH /

   taratsāmā śuddhavatyaḥ pavitrāṇi ca śaktitaḥ /	tarat sAmA SudDavatyaH pavitrANi ca Saktitas /

   jalamadhyasthitasyaiva mārjanaṃ tu vidhīyate /	jala maDya sTitasya eva mArjanam tu viDIyate /

   savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā japedbudhaḥ āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ	sa vyAhRtim sa praNavAm gAyatrIm vA japet buDaH Avartayet vA praNavam

   tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa nimajyāpsu punaḥ punaḥ /	tat vizNoH iti mantreNa nimajya apsu punar punar /

   oṃ idamāpapravahatā svaṃ malaṃ kṣālalohitam /	om idam Apa pravahatA svam malam kzAla lohitam /

   āpo mā tasmādenasaḥ pāvamānaśca muñcatu iviṣmato vimā āpohaviṣmān	ApaH mA tasmAt enasaH pAvamAnaH ca muQcatu ivizmataH vimA Apoha vizmAn
   āvirāsati /	AvirAsati /

   yābhirmitrāvaruṇasya siñcayābhirindramanayatyanna vātī vadrupadāṃ śanno	yABiH mitrAvaruNasya siQcayABiH indram anayatyat na vAtI vadrupadAm Sanno

   gṛhṇāsyuttamam /	gRhNAsi uttamam /
   āpo devīrupasūrya madhumatīvayasyāya prajābhyaḥ tāsā	ApaH devIH upasUrya maDum atIvayasyAya prajAByaH tAsA
   māsthānātvarjihatāmoṣadhayaḥ sapippalāḥ /	mA sTAnAtvarji hatAm ozaDayaH sa pippalAH /
   punantu mā pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ punantvanāpi pitā sahasāḥ pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā	punantu mA pitaraH sOmya AsaH punantvanA api pitA sahasAH pavitreNa gata AyuzA
   punantu mā pitāmahāḥ punantu prapitāmahāḥ /	punantu mA pitAmahAH punantu prapitAmahAH /
   pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā viśvamāyurvyaśravaiḥ /	pavitreNa gata AyuzA viSvam AyuH vyaSravEH /
   agna āyūṃṣi parasatmācarorjamiṣañca tvace vāvasvatvacchūnām /	agne AyUMzi para satma AcaroH jamizaQca tvace vAvasva tvat SUnAm /
   punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ /	punantu mA deva janAH punantu manasA DiyaH /
   punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ ! punīhi mā /	punantu viSvA BUtAni jAtavedaH ! punIhi mA /
   pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat /	pavitreNa punIhi mA SukreNa deva dIdyat /
   agne kratvā kratūṃranu /	agne kratvA kratUMranu /
   yatte pavitramarciṣyagne vitatamantarā brahmā tena punātu mā /	yat te pavitram arcizI agne vitatam antarA brahmA tena punAtu mA /
   pavamānaḥ suvarjanaḥ / pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ / yaḥ potā sa punātu mā /	pavamAnaH suvarjanaH / pavitreNa vicarzaNiH / yaH potA sa punAtu mA /
   ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ / pavitreṇa savena ca / idaṃ brahmapunīmahe /	uBAByAm deva savitar / pavitreNa savena ca / idam brahma punImahe /
   vaiśvadevīḥ punatī devyā gṛbhnāsyāmisāvakṣyastānnovīta pūjyāḥ /	vESvadevIH punatI devyAH gRBna AsyAmisAvakzyaH tAn novIta pUjyAH /
   tayāmadantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām /	tayA AmadantaH saDamAdezu vayam syAma patayaH rayINAm /
   citpa tirmā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /	citpa tirmA punAtva= CidreNa pavitreNa sUryasya raSmiBiH /
   tasya te pavitrapūtasya yatkāmaḥ /	tasya te pavitra pUtasya yat kAmaH /
   praṇitacchakeyaṃ devo vākpatirmā savitā tvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya	praNitacSakA iyam devaH vAc patiH mA savitA tvad CidreNa pavitreNa sUryasya
   raśmibhiḥ /	raSmiBiH /
   tasya te pavitrapate ! pavitrapūtasya catkāmaḥ /	tasya te pavitra pate ! pavitra pUtasya cat kAmaH /

   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /

   oṃ prajāpataye svāhā /	om prajApataye svAhA /

   oṃ vasudhāpitṛbhyaḥ svāhā /	om vasuDA pitRByaH svAhA /
   oṃ ye bhūtā pracaranti dīnāca nimihanto bhuvanasya madhye /	om ye BUtAH pracaranti dInAca nimihantaH Buvanasya maDye /

   gandhapuṣpe hastābhyāṃ dattvā pitṛpātramutthāpya yā divyeti paṭhitvā	ganDa puzpe hastAByAm dattvA pitRpAtram utTApya yA divyA iti paWitvA
   amukagotrāsmatpitaḥ ! amukadevaśarman ! sapatnīka ! eṣa te 'rghyaḥ svadhā	amuka gotra asmad pitaH ! amuka deva Sarman ! sa patnIkaH ! eza te arGyaH svaDA
   apavitraṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā vāmapārśve dakṣiṇe kuśopari oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ	apavitram pAtram gRhItvA vAma pArSve dakziNe kuSa upari om pitRByaH
   sthānamasītyadhomukhapātrasthāpanam // GarP_1,218.13 //	sTAnam asi iti aDomuKa pAtra sTApanam // GarP_1,218.13 //
   oṃ śundhantāṃ lokāḥ pitṛsadanāḥ pitṛsadanamasi /	om SunDantAm lokAH pitR sadanAH pitR sadanam asi /
   adhomukhapāttrasparśanam /	aDomuKa pAttra sparSanam /
   amukagotrebhyo 'smatpitṛpitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhya etāni	amuka gotreByaH asmad pitR pitAmaha prapitAmaheByaH sapatnIkeByaH etAni
   gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāsoguṇasottarīyayajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena	ganDa puzpa DUpa dIpa vAsaH guNasa uttarIya yajQa upavItAni vaH svaDA pitRtIrTena
   gandhādidānam /	ganDa Adi dAnam /
   gandhādidānamakṣayyamastu /	ganDa Adi dAnam akzayyam astu /
   saṃkalpasiddhirastu /	saMkalpa sidDiH astu /
   brāhmaṇavacanam /	brAhmaNa vacanam /
   evaṃ mātāmahādīnāmanujñāpanādikarma /	evam mAtAmaha AdInAm anujQApana Adi karma /
   oṃ yādivyetibhūmisaṃmārjanam /	om yAdi vyeti BUmi saMmArjanam /
   tato ghṛtāktamannaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇopavītī pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ agnau	tatas GRta aktam annam gRhItvA dakziNA upavItI pitR brAhmaNam om agnO
   karaṇamahaṃ kariṣye /	karaNam aham karizye /
   oṃ kuruṣveti tenokte oṃ agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhutidvayaṃ	om kuruzva iti tena ukte om agnaye kavyavAhanAya svAhA iti Ahuti dvayam
   devabrāhmaṇahaste dattvā avaśiṣṭānnaṃ piṇḍārthaṃ sthāpayitvā aparamardhaṃ	deva brAhmaNa haste dattvA avaSizwa annam piNxa arTam sTApayitvA aparam arDam
   pitrādipātre mātāmahādipātre ca niḥ kṣipet // GarP_1,218.14 //	pitR Adi pAtre mAtAmaha Adi pAtre ca niH kzipet // GarP_1,218.14 //
   pātramudrādi nidhāya kuśaṃ dattvā adhomukhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā	pAtra mudrA Adi niDAya kuSam dattvA aDomuKAByAm pANiByAm pAtram gRhItvA
   oṃ pṛthivīte pātraṃ dyaurapidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ juhomi	om pRTivIte pAtram dyOH apiDAnam brAhmaNasya muKe amRte amRtam juhomi
   svāhā pātrābhimantraṇam /	svAhA pAtra aBimantraNam /
   idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidadhe padam /	idam vizNuH vicakrame treDA nidaDe padam /
   samūḍhamasya pāṃsure /	sa mUXam asya pAMsure /
   viṣṇo havyaṃrakṣasva ityannamadhye adhomukhadvijāṅguṣṭhaniveśanam //	vizNo havyaMrakzasva iti anna maDye aDomuKa dvija aFguzWa niveSanam //
   GarP_1,218.15 //	GarP_1,218.15 //
   apahateti triryavavikiraṇam /	apahata iti tris yava vikiraNam /
   oṃ nihanmi sarvaṃ yadamedhyavadbhaveddhatāśca sarve 'suradānavā mayā /	om nihanmi sarvam yat ameDya vat Bavet hatAH ca sarve asura dAnavAH mayA /
   rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sapiśācasaṅghā hatā mayā yātudhānāśca sarve iti	rakzAMsi yakzAH sa piSAca saFGAH hatAH mayA yAtuDAnAH ca sarve iti
   siddhārthavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.16 //	sidDArTa vikiraNam // GarP_1,218.16 //
   tato dhūrilocanasaṃjñakebhyodavebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ	tatas DUri locana saMjQakeByodaveByaH etat annam sa GRtam sa pAnIyam
   savyañjanaṃ svāheti vārikuśādyairanusaṅkalpanam /	sa vyaQjanam svAhA iti vAri kuSa AdyEH anusaFkalpanam /
   oṃ annamidamakṣayyamastu oṃ saṃṅkalpasiddhirastu // GarP_1,218.17 //	om annam idam akzayyam astu om saMFkalpa sidDiH astu // GarP_1,218.17 //
   tato viparītopavītena savyañjanaṃ saghṛtamannaṃ pitrādi brāhmaṇapātre	tatas viparIta upavItena sa vyaQjanam sa GRtam annam pitR Adi brAhmaNa pAtre
   nidhāya tadupari bhūmisaṃlagnakuśaṃ dattvā oṃ pṛthivī te pātraṃ iti	niDAya tad upari BUmi saMlagna kuSam dattvA om pRTivI te pAtram iti
   mantreṇa uttānābhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ idaṃ viṣṇorityannopari uttānaṃ	mantreNa uttAnAByAm pAtram gRhItvA om idam vizNoH iti anna upari uttAnam
   dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet /	dvija aFguzWam niveSayet /
   oṃ apahateti tilavikiraṇam /	om apahata iti tila vikiraNam /
   bhūmipātitavāmajānuḥ amukagotrebhyaḥ asmatpitṛpitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ	BUmipAtita vAma jAnuH amuka gotreByaH asmad pitR pitAmaheByaH sapatnIkeByaH
   etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ svadhā /	etat annam sa GRtam sa pAnIyam sa vyaQjanam pratizidDa varjitam svaDA /
   annaṃ saṅkalpya oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛta payaḥ kīlālaṃ paristrutaṃ	annam saFkalpya om Urjam vahan tIH amRtam GRta payaH kIlAlam paristrutam
   svadhāstu tarpayata me pitaram /	svaDA astu tarpayata me pitaram /
   dakṣiṇāmukhavaridhāratyāgaḥ // GarP_1,218.18 //	dakziNA muKa vari DAra tyAgaH // GarP_1,218.18 //
   oṃ śrāddhamidamacchidramastu oṃ saṅkalpasiddharastu /	om SrAdDam idam at Cidram astu om saFkalpa sidDaraH tu /
   oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svastatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ	om BUH BuvaH svaH tat savituH vareNyam Bargodevasya DImahi DiyaH yaH naH
   pracodayāt iti visajayitvā oṃ madhuvātā ṛtāyate madhukṣarantu sindhavaḥ	pracodayAt iti visajayitvA om maDuvAtA RtAyate maDukzarantu sinDavaH
   mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso madhutpārthivaṃ rajaḥ /	mADvIH naH santu oza DIH maDu naktamuta uzasaH maDutpArTivam rajaH /
   madhudyaurastu naḥ pitā madhumānno vanaspatiḥ madhumānastu sūryo	maDudyOraH tu naH pitA maDumAnnaH vanaspatiH maDumAnaH tu sUryaH 
   mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ /	mADvIH gAvaH Bavantu naH /
   madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.19 //	maDu maDu maDu iti japaH // GarP_1,218.19 //
   yathāsukhaṃ vāgyatā juṣadhvam iti brūyāt /	yaTAsuKam vAgyatA juzaDvam iti brUyAt /
   buktavatsu saptavyādhādikaṃ pitṛstotraṃ japet /	buktavatsu sapta vyADa Adikam pitR stotram japet /
   tacca saptavyādhā daśārṇeṣu mṛgāḥ kālañjare girau /	tat ca  sapta vya aDAH daSArNezu mRgAH kAlaQjare girO /
   cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // GarP_1,218.20 //	cakravAkAH SarAdvIpe haMsAH sarasi mAnase // GarP_1,218.20 //
   te 'bhijātāḥ kurukṣetre brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /	te aBijAtAH kurukzetre brAhmaNAH vedapAragAH /
   prasthitā dūramadhvānaṃ yūyaṃ kimavasīdatha // GarP_1,218.21 //	prasTitA dUram aDvAnam yUyam kim avasIt aTa // GarP_1,218.21 //
   tatastṛpyasva dakṣiṇābhimukho vāmopavītī tadutsṛṣṭāgrataḥ /	tatas tRpyasva dakziNa aBimuKaH vAma upavItI tad utsRzwa agratas /
   oṃ agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā ye 'pyadagdhāḥ kule mama /	om agni dagDAH ca ye jIvAH ye api adagDAH kule mama /
   bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṅgatim /	BUmO dattena tRpyantu tRptAH yAntu para aFgatim /
   iti bhūmau kuśopari saghṛtamannaṃ jalaplutaṃ vikiret // GarP_1,218.22 //	iti BUmO kuSa upari sa GRtam annam jala plutam vikiret // GarP_1,218.22 //
   tato brāhmaṇakrameṇa jalagaṇḍūṣaṃ dattvā pūrvavatsavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ	tatas brAhmaNa krameNa jala gaNxUzam dattvA pUrvavat savya AhRtikAm gAyattrIm
   madhuvātetitryṛcaṃ japtvā oṃ rucitaṃ bhavadbhiriti devabrāhmaṇapraśraḥ /	maDu vAtetitri Rcam japtvA om rucitam BavadBiH iti deva brAhmaNa praSraH /
   surucitamiti tenokte oṃ śeṣamannamiti praśraḥ /	surucitam iti tena ukte om Sezam annam iti praSraH /
   iṣṭaiḥ saha bhojanam /	izwEH saha Bojanam /
   pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ vāmopavītena oṃ tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ /	pitR Adi brAhmaNam vAma upavItena om tRptAH sTaH iti praSraH /
   oṃ tṛptāḥ sma iti tenokte bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalacatuṣkoṇaṃ ti	om tRptAH smaH iti tena ukte BUmi aByukzaNam maNxala catuzkoNam ti
   lavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.23 //	lavi kiraNam // GarP_1,218.23 //
   oṃ amukagotra ! asmatpitaḥ ! amukadevadarśan ! sapatnīka ! etatte	om amuka gotra ! asmad pitaH ! amuka deva darSan ! sa patnIkaH ! etat te
   piṇḍāsanaṃ svadhā /	piNxAsanam svaDA /
   itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya khavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti	itTam reKA maDye pitAmahAya Ka vyAhRtikAm gAyattrIm maDuvAta iti
   trarjapannannaṃ sājyaṃ piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kuśopari amukagotra asmatpitaḥ !	trarjapan= annam sa Ajyam piNxam kRtvA kuSa upari amuka gotra asmad pitaH !
   amukadevaśraman ! sapatnīka eṣa piṇḍaste svadhā /	amukadeva Sraman ! sa patnIkaH eza piNxaH te svaDA /
   itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya /	itTam reKA maDye pitAmahAya /
   tataḥ savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trirjaṃpanpiṇḍavikiraṇaṃ	tatas sa vyAhRtikAm gAyattrIm maDuvAta iti tris jaMpan piNxa vikiraNam
   piṇḍāntike /	piNxa antike /
   oṃ lepabhujaḥ prīyantamiti staraṇkuśeṣu hastamārjanaṃ	om lepa BujaH prIyantam iti staraNkuSezu hasta mArjanam
   prakṣālitapiṇḍodakena oṃ amukagotra ! asmatpitaḥ ! amukaśarman sapatnīka	prakzAlita piNxa udakena om amuka gotra ! asmad pitaH ! amukaSarman sa patnIka
   etatte jalamavanekṣva ye cātratvāmanujāśca tvāmanu tasmai tesvadheti	etat te jalam avana ikzva ye ca atra tvAm anujAH ca tvAm anu tasmE tesvaDA iti
   pitṛpiṇḍasecanam /	pitR piNxa secanam /

   yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyadhvamiti japet /	yaTA BAgam AvRzAyaDvam iti japet /
   apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udaṅmukhaḥ prāṇāṃstriḥ saṃyamya ṣaḍbhya	apaH spRzwvA vAmena parAvRttya udaFmuKaH prANAn= tris saMyamya zaxBya
   ṛtubhyo namaḥ iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.24 //	RtuByaH namaH iti japaH // GarP_1,218.24 //
   vāmenaiva parāvṛtya puṣpadānam /	vAmena eva parAvRtya puzpa dAnam /
   akṣatañcāriṣṭañcāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntipuṣṭidṛ /	akza taQcA arizwaQcA aH tu me puNyam SAnti puzwi dR /
   dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaro yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ /	dakziNAmuKaH amI mad antaH pitaraH yaTA BAgam AvRzAyizate iti japaH /
   vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro namo vaḥ iti japaḥ /	vAsaH SiTilIkRtvA aQjalim kRtvA om namaH vaH pitaraH namaH vaH iti japaH /
   gṛhānnaḥ pitaro datta iti gṛhavīkṣaṇam /	gRhAt naH pitaraH dattaH iti gRha vIkzaNam /
   tataḥ sadā vaḥ pitaro dveṣma iti vīkṣya etadvaḥ pitaro vāsa ityuccārya	tatas sadA vaH pitaraH dvezma iti vIkzya etat vaH pitaraH vAsaH iti uccArya
   amukagotra etatte vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam /	amuka gotraH etat te vAsaH svaDA iti sUtra dAnam /
   vāmena pāṇinā udakapātraṃ gṛhītvā ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ityādi	vAmena pANinA udaka pAtram gRhItvA Urjam vahan tIH amRtam GRtam payaH ityAdi
   piṇḍopari dhārātyāgaḥ // GarP_1,218.25 //	piNxa upari DArA tyAgaH // GarP_1,218.25 //
   pūrvasthāpitapātraśeṣodakaiḥ pratyekaṃ piṇḍasecanaṃ piṇḍamāvāhya	pUrva sTApita pAtra Seza udakEH pratyekam piNxasecanam piNxam AvAhya
   gandhādidānaṃ piṇḍopari kuśapatrañca dattvā oṃ akṣannamīmadantahya va	ganDa Adi dAnam piNxa upari kuSapatraQca dattvA om akzannamImadantahya va
   priyā adhūṣata astoṣatasvabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayāmatī /	priyAH aDUzata astozata svaBAnavaH viprAH na vizWayAmatI /
   yo jānvindra te harīti trirjapaḥ // GarP_1,218.26 //	yaH jAnu indra te hari iti tris japaH // GarP_1,218.26 //
   oṃ itthaṃ mātāmahādibrāhmaṇānāmācamanam /	om itTam mAtAmaha Adi brAhmaNAnAm Acamanam /
   oṃ susuprokṣitamastviti bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā /	om su su prokzitam astu iti BUmi aByukzaNam kRtvA /
   oṃ apāṃ madhye sthitā devāḥ sarvamapsu pratiṣṭhitam /	om apAm maDye sTitAH devAH sarvam apsu pratizWitam /
   brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivā āpo bhavantu naḥ /	brAhmaNasya kare nyastAH SivAH ApaH Bavantu naH /
   śivā āpaḥ santviti brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam /	SivAH ApaH santu iti brAhmaNa haste jala dAnam /
   lakṣmīrvasatipuṣpeṣu lakṣmīrvasati puṣkare /	lakzmIH vasati puzpezu lakzmIH vasati puzkare /
   lakṣmīrvasati goṣṭheṣu saumanasyaṃ sadāstu te /	lakzmIH vasati gozWezu sOmanasyam sadA astu te /
   saumanasyamastviti puṣpadānam /	sOmanasyam astu iti puzpa dAnam /
   akṣataṃ cāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntiḥ puṣṭirdhṛtiśca me /	akzatam ca astu me puNyam SAntiH puzwiH DRtiH ca me /
   yadyacchreyaskaraṃ loke tattadastu sadā mama /	yat yat Sreyaskaram loke tat tat astu sadA mama /
   oṃ akṣatañcāriṣṭañcāstu iti yavataṇḍuladānam // GarP_1,218.27 //	om akza taQcA arizwaQcAH tu iti yava taNxula dAnam // GarP_1,218.27 //
   amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ	amuka gotrANAm asmat pitR pitAmaha prapitAmahAnAm
   sapatnīkānāmidamannapānādikamakṣayyamastviti pitrādibrāhmaṇahaste	sapatnIkAnAm idam anna pAna Adikam akzayyam astu iti pitR Adi brAhmaNa haste
   tilajaladānam /	tila jala dAnam /
   astviti brāhmaṇo vadet /	astu iti brAhmaNaH vadet /
   etanmātāmahādīnāmakṣayyamāśiṣaḥ /	etat mAtAmaha AdInAm akzayyam ASizaH /
   oṃ aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotraṃ no vardhatāṃ  dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ	om aGorAH pitaraH santu gotram naH varDatAM  dAtAraH naH aBivarDantAm
   vedāḥ santatireva ca /	vedAH santatiH eva ca /
   śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyañca no 'stviti /	SradDA ca naH mA vyagamat bahu deyaQca naH astu iti /
   annañca no bahu bhavedatithīṃśca labhemahi /	annaQca naH bahu Bavet atiTIn= ca laBemahi /
   yācitāraśca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana /	yAcitAraH ca naH santu mA ca yAcizma kaQcana /
   etāḥ satyāśiṣaḥ santu // GarP_1,218.28 //	etAH satya ASizaH santu // GarP_1,218.28 //
   saumanasyamastu /	sOmanasyam astu /
   astvityukte pradattapiṇḍasthāne arghyārthapavitramocanam /	astu iti ukte pradatta piNxa sTAne arGya arTa pavitra mocanam /
   kuśapavitraṃ gṛhītvātena kuśena pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā svadhāṃ	kuSa pavitram gRhItvAtena kuSena pitR Adi brAhmaNam spRzwvA svaDAm
   vācayiṣye oṃ vācyatāṃ oṃ pitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ	vAcayizye om vAcyatAM om pitR pitAmaheByaH yaTAnAma SarmaByaH
   sapatnīkebhyaḥ svadhocyatām /	sapatnIkeByaH svaDA ucyatAm /
   astusvadhā ityukte ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtamiti piṇḍopari vāridhārāṃ	astu svaDAH iti ukte Urjam vahantIH amRtam GRtam iti piNxa upari vAri DArAm
   dadyāt // GarP_1,218.29 //	dadyAt // GarP_1,218.29 //
   tataḥ oṃ viśvedevā asminyajñe prīyantā  devabrāhmaṇahaste yavodakadānam /	tatas om viSvedevAH asmin yajQe prIyantA  deva brAhmaNa haste yava udaka dAnam /
   oṃ prīyantāmiti tenokte oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.30 //	om prIyantAm iti tena ukte om devatAByaH iti tris japet // GarP_1,218.30 //
   adhomukhaḥ piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇopavītī pūrvābhimukhaḥ oṃ	aDomuKaH piNxa pAtrANi cAlayitvA Acamya dakziNA upavItI pUrva aBimuKaH om
   amukagotrāya amukadevaśarmaṇe brāhmaṇāya sapatnīkāya	amuka gotrAya amukadeva SarmaNe brAhmaNAya sa patnIkAya
   śrāddhapratiṣṭhārthadakṣiṇāmetadrajataṃ tubhyamahaṃ sampradade iti	SrAdDa pratizWA arTa dakziNAm etat rajatam tuByam aham sampradade iti
   dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt /	dakziNAm dadyAt /
   iti devūbrāhmaṇāya dakṣiṇādānam // GarP_1,218.31 //	iti devU brAhmaNAya dakziNa AdAnam // GarP_1,218.31 //
   tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannā iti praśraḥ /	tatas pitR brAhmaNe piNxAH sampannAH iti praSraH /
   susampannā iti piṇḍe kṣīradhārāṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanaṃ atithibrāhmaṇe	su sampannAH iti piNxe kzIra DArAm dattvA piNxa cAlanam atiTi brAhmaNe
   piṇḍapātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā oṃ vāje vāje vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā	piNxa pAtram uttAnam kRtvA om vAje vAje vata vAjinaH naH Danezu viprAH amRtA
   ṛtajñāḥ /	RtajQAH /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  219	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 219
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /

   GarP_1,219.2 //	GarP_1,219.2 //
   dakṣiṇajānu gṛhītvā adyāsmadīyāmukavṛddhau	dakziNa jAnu gRhItvA adya asmadIya amuka vRdDO
   amukagātrāṇāmasmatprapitāmahīpitāmahīmātṝṇāmamukadevīnāmamukagotrāṇāṃ	amuka gAtrANAm asmad prapitAmahIpitAmahI mAtLNAm amuka devInAm amuka gotrANAm
   śrāddhe kartavye vasusatyasaṃjñakānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrāddhaṃ	SrAdDe kartavye vasu satya saMjQakAnAm viSvezAm devAnAm SrAdDam
   siddhānnenayuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti devabrāhmaṇāmantraṇam /	sidDAnnena yuzmAsu mayA kartavyam iti deva brAhmaNa AmantraNam /

   GarP_1,219.4 //	GarP_1,219.4 //

   pe agnijihvā utavā yadatrā āsādyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /	pe agni jihvA utavA yat atrA AsAdya asmin barhizi mAdayaDvam /

   matpitāmaha amukadevaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te arghyaḥ svadhā /	mad pitAmaha amuka deva Sarman sa patnIkaH eza te arGyaH svaDA /

   pitṛbrāhmaṇavāmapārśva dakṣiṇāgrakuśopari pitṛbhyaḥ stānamasīti	pitR brAhmaNa vAma pArSva dakziNa agra kuSa upari pitRByaH stAnam asi iti

   tasmai te svadhā iti // GarP_1,220.5 //	tasmE te svaDA iti // GarP_1,220.5 //
