   brahāmovāca /	brahAmA uvAca /
   dharmasāramahaṃ vakṣye saṃkṣepācchuṇu śaṅkara /	DarmasAram aham vakzye saMkzepAt SuNu SaFkara /
   bhuktimuktipradaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvapāpavināśanam // GarP_1,221.1 //	Bukti mukti pradam sUkzmam sarva pApa vinASanam // GarP_1,221.1 //
   śrutaṃ dharmaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ sukhamutsāhameva ca /	Srutam Darmam balam DEryam suKam utsAham eva ca /
   śoko harati vai nṝṇāṃ tasmācchokaṃ parityajet // GarP_1,221.2 //	SokaH harati vE nLNAm tasmAt Sokam parityajet // GarP_1,221.2 //
   karmadārāḥ karmalokāḥ karmasambandhibāndhavāḥ /	karma dArAH karma lokAH karma sambanDi bAnDavAH /
   karmāṇi prerayantīha puruṣaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ // GarP_1,221.3 //	karmANi prerayanti iha puruzam suKa duH KayoH // GarP_1,221.3 //
   dāname paro dharmo dānātsarvamavāpyate /	dAname paraH DarmaH dAnAt sarvam avApyate /
   dānāḥtsvargaśca rājyañca dadyāddanaṃ tato naraḥ // GarP_1,221.4 //	dAnAHtsvargaH ca rAjyaQca dadyAt danam tatas naraH // GarP_1,221.4 //
   ekato dānamevāhuḥ samagravaradakṣiṇam /	ekatas dAnam eva AhuH samagra vara dakziNam /
   ekato bhayabhītasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇarakṣaṇam // GarP_1,221.5 //	ekatas Baya BItasya prANinaH prANa rakzaNam // GarP_1,221.5 //
   tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punaḥ /	tapasA brahmacaryeNa yajQEH snAnena vA punar /
   dharmasya nāśakā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ // GarP_1,221.6 //	Darmasya nASakAH ye ca te vE niraya gAminaH // GarP_1,221.6 //
   ye ca homajapasnānadevatārcanatatparāḥ /	ye ca homa japa snAna devatA arcana tatparAH /
   satyakṣamādayāyuktāste narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // GarP_1,221.7 //	sati akzamAdaya ayuktAH te narAH svarga gAminaH // GarP_1,221.7 //
   na dātā sukhaduḥ khānāṃ na ca hartāsti kaścana /	na dAtA suKa duH KAnAm na ca hartA asti kaScana /
   bhuñjate svakṛtānyeva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,221.8 //	BuQjate sva kRtAni eva duH KAni ca suKAni ca // GarP_1,221.8 //
   dharmārthaṃ jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ durgāṇyatitaranti te /	Darma arTam jIvitam yezAm durgANi atitaranti te /
   santuṣṭaḥ ko na śaknoti phalamūlaiśca vartitum // GarP_1,221.9 //	santuzwaH kaH na Saknoti Pala mUlEH ca vartitum // GarP_1,221.9 //
   sarva eva hi saukhyena saṅkaṭānyavagāhate /	sarve eva hi sOKyena saFkawAni avagAhate /
   idameva hi lobhasya kāryaṃ syā datiduṣkaram // GarP_1,221.10 //	idam eva hi loBasya kAryam syAH dati duzkaram // GarP_1,221.10 //
   lobhātkrodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāddrohaḥ pravartate /	loBAt kroDaH praBavati loBAt drohaH pravartate /
   lobhānmohaśca māyā ca māno matsara eva ca // GarP_1,221.11 //	loBAt mohaH ca mAyA ca mAnaH matsaraH eva ca // GarP_1,221.11 //
   rāgadveṣānṛtakrodhalomamohamadojjhitaḥ /	rAga dveza anRta kroDa loma moha mada ujJitaH /
   yaḥ sa śāntaḥ paraṃ lokaṃ yāti pāpavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,221.12 //	yaH sa SAntaH param lokam yAti pApa vivarjitaH // GarP_1,221.12 //
   devatā munayo nāgā gandharvā guhyakā hara /	devatAH munayaH nAgAH ganDarvAH guhyakAH hara /
   dhārmikaṃ pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyaṃ na kāminam // GarP_1,221.13 //	DArmikam pUjayanti iha na Dana AXyam na kAminam // GarP_1,221.13 //
   anantabalavīryeṇa prajñayā pauruṣeṇa vā /	ananta bala vIryeNa prajQayA pOruzeNa vA /
   alabhyaṃ labhate martyastatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,221.14 //	alaByam laBate martyaH tatra kA parivedanAH // GarP_1,221.14 //
   sarvasattvadayālutvaṃ sarvendriyavinigrahaḥ /	sarva sattva dayAlu tvam sarva indriya vinigrahaH /
   sarvatrānityabuddhitvaṃ śreyaḥ paramidaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,221.15 //	sarvatra anitya budDi tvam SreyaH param idam smRtam // GarP_1,221.15 //
   paśyannivāgrato mṛtyuṃ yo dharmaṃ nācarennaraḥ /	paSyan= iva agratas mRtyum yaH Darmam na Acaret naraH /
   ajāgalastanasyeva tasya janma nirarthakam // GarP_1,221.16 //	ajAgala stanasya iva tasya janma nirarTakam // GarP_1,221.16 //
   bhrūṇahā brahmahā goghnaḥ pitṛhā gurutalpagaḥ /	BrUNa hA brahma hA go GnaH pitR hA guru talpa gaH /
   bhūmiṃ sarvaguṇopetāṃ dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,221.17 //	BUmim sarva guNa upetAm dattvA pApEH pramucyate // GarP_1,221.17 //
   na godānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidastīti me matiḥ /	na go dAnAt param dAnam kiQcid asti iti me matiH /
   yā gaurnyāyārjitā dattā kṛtsnaṃ tārayate kulam // GarP_1,221.18 //	yA gOH nyAya arjitA dattA kRtsnam tArayate kulam // GarP_1,221.18 //
   nānnadānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidasti vṛṣadhvaja ! /	na anna dAnAt param dAnam kiQcid asti vRzaDvaja ! /
   annena dhāryate sarvaṃ carācaramidaṃ jagat // GarP_1,221.19 //	annena DAryate sarvam carAcaram idam jagat // GarP_1,221.19 //
   kanyādānaṃ vṛṣotsargastīrthasevā śrutaṃ tathā /	kanyA dAnam vRzotsargaH tIrTa sevA Srutam taTA /
   hastyaśvarathadānāni maṇiratnavasundharāḥ // GarP_1,221.20 //	hasti aSva raTa dAnAni maNi ratna vasunDarAH // GarP_1,221.20 //
   annadānasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm /	anna dAnasya sarvANi kalAm na arhanti zoxaSIm /
   annātprāṇā balaṃ tejaścānnādvīryaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,221.21 //	annAt prANAH balam tejaH ca annAt vIryam DRtiH smRtiH // GarP_1,221.21 //
   kūpavāpītaḍāgādīnārāmāṃścaiva kārayet /	kUpa vApI ta xAga AdIn ArAmAn= ca eva kArayet /
   trisaptakulamuddhṛtya viṣṇuloke mahīyate // GarP_1,221.22 //	tri sapta kulam udDRtya vizNu loke mahIyate // GarP_1,221.22 //
   sādhūnāṃ darśanaṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthādapi viśiṣyate /	sADUnAm darSanam puNyam tIrTAt api viSizyate /
   kālena tīrthaṃ phalati sadyaḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,221.23 //	kAlena tIrTam Palati sadyas sADu samAgamaH // GarP_1,221.23 //
   satyaṃ damastapaḥ śaucaṃ santoṣaśca kṣamārjavam /	satyam damaH tapaH SOcam santozaH ca kzamA Arjavam /
   jñānaṃ śamo dayā dānameṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,221.24 //	jQAnam SamaH dayA dAnam eza DarmaH sanAtanaH // GarP_1,221.24 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   dharmasārakathanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	DarmasArakaTanam nAma ekaviMSa aDika dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  222	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 222
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   prāyaścittādi vakṣye 'haṃ narakaughavimardanam /	prAyaScitta Adi vakzye aham naraka oGa vimardanam /
   makṣikā vipruṣo nārī bhuvi toyaṃ hutāśanaḥ /	makzikA vipruzaH nArI Buvi toyam hutASanaH /
   mārjāro nakulaścaiva śucīnyetāni nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,222.1 //	mArjAraH nakulaH ca eva SucIni etAni nityaSas // GarP_1,222.1 //
   yaḥ śūdrocchiṣṭasaṃspṛṣṭaṃ pramādādbhakṣayeddvijaḥ /	yaH SUdra ucCizwa saMspRzwam pramAdAt Bakzayet dvijaH /
   ahorātroṣito bhūtvā pañcagavyena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.2 //	ahorAtra uzitaH BUtvA paQcagavyena SuDyati // GarP_1,222.2 //
   vipro vipreṇa saṃspṛṣṭa ucchiṣṭena kadācana /	vipraH vipreNa saMspRzwaH ucCizwena kadAcana /
   snānaṃ japyañca kartavyaṃ dinasyānte ca bhojanam // GarP_1,222.3 //	snAnam japyaQca kartavyam dinasya ante ca Bojanam // GarP_1,222.3 //
   annaṃ samakṣikākeśaṃ śudhyedvāntena tatkṣaṇāt /	annam sa makzikAkeSam SuDyet vAntena tad kzaNAt /
   yaśca pāṇitale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ // GarP_1,222.4 //	yaH ca pANi tale BuFkte aFgulyA bAhunA ca yaH // GarP_1,222.4 //
   ahorātreṇa śudhyeta pibedyadi na vāryuta /	ahorAtreNa SuDyeta pibet yadi na vAri uta /
   pītaśeṣantu yattoyaṃ vāmahastena madyavat // GarP_1,222.5 //	pIta Sezantu yat toyam vAma hastena madya vat // GarP_1,222.5 //
   carmamadhyagataṃ toyamaśuci syānna tatpibet /	carma maDya gatam toyam aSuci syAt na tat pibet /
   antyajātiravijñāto nivasedyasya veśmani // GarP_1,222.6 //	antya jAtiH avijQAtaH nivaset yasya veSmani // GarP_1,222.6 //
   cāndrāyaṇaṃ parākaṃ vā dvijātīnāṃ viśodhanam /	cAndrAyaNam parAkam vA dvijAtInAm viSoDanam /
   prājāpatyantu śūdrasya paścājjñāte tathāpare // GarP_1,222.7 //	prAjApatyantu SUdrasya paScAt jQAte taTA apare // GarP_1,222.7 //
   yastatra bhuṅkte pakvānnaṃ kṛcchrārdhaṃ tasya dāpayet /	yaH tatra BuFkte pakva annam kRcCra arDam tasya dApayet /
   teṣāmapi ca yo bhuṅkte kṛcchrapādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.8 //	tezAm api ca yaH BuFkte kRcCra pAdaH viDIyate // GarP_1,222.8 //
   rajakānāñca śailū ṣaveṇucarmopajīvinām /	rajakAn AQca SElU zaveNu carma upajIvinAm /
   etadannañca yo bhuṅkte dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,222.9 //	etat annaQca yaH BuFkte dvijaH cAndrAyaNam caret // GarP_1,222.9 //
   cāṇḍālakūpabhāṇḍeṣu ajñānāccetpibejjalam /	cANxAla kUpa BANxezu ajQAnAt ced pibet jalam /
   kuryātsāntapanaṃ viprastadardhañca viśaḥ smṛtam // GarP_1,222.10 //	kuryAt sAntapanam vipraH tad arDaQca viSaH smRtam // GarP_1,222.10 //
   pādaṃ śūdrasya dātavyamajñānādantyaveśmani /	pAdam SUdrasya dAtavyam ajQAnAt antya veSmani /
   prāyaścittaṃ trikṛcchraṃ syātparākamantyajāgatau // GarP_1,222.11 //	prAyaScittam trikRcCram syAt parAkam antyaja AgatO // GarP_1,222.11 //
   antyajocchiṣṭabhukcchudhyeddvijaścāndrāyaṇena ca /	antyaja ucCizwa Buk= SuDyet dvijaH cAndrAyaNena ca /
   cāṇḍālannaṃ yadā bhuṅkte pramādādaindavañcaret // GarP_1,222.12 //	cANxAlannam yadA BuFkte pramAdAt EndavaQcaret // GarP_1,222.12 //
   kṣattrajātiḥ sāntapanaṃ ṣaḍdvirātraṃ pare tathā /	kzattra jAtiH sAntapanam zaz dvi rAtram pare taTA /
   ekavṛkṣa tu caṇḍālaḥ pramādādbrāhmaṇo yadi /	ekavRkza tu caNxAlaH pramAdAt brAhmaNaH yadi /
   phalaṃ bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,222.13 //	Palam Bakzayate tatra ahorAtreNa SuDyati // GarP_1,222.13 //
   bhuktvopaviṣṭo 'nācāntaścaṇḍālaṃ yadi saṃspṛśet /	BuktvA upavizwaH anAcAntaH caNxAlam yadi saMspRSet /
   gāyattryaṣṭasahasrantu drupadāṃ vā śataṃ japet // GarP_1,222.14 //	gAyattrI azwa sahasrantu drupadAm vA Satam japet // GarP_1,222.14 //
   cāṇḍālaśvapacairvāpi viṇmūtre tu kṛte dvijāḥ /	cANxAla SvapacEH vA api viz mUtre tu kRte dvijAH /
   prāyaścittaṃ trirātraṃ syātparākaścāntyajāgatau // GarP_1,222.15 //	prAyaScittam tri rAtram syAt parAkaH ca antyaja AgatO // GarP_1,222.15 //
   akāmataḥ striyo gatvā parākastatra sādhakaḥ /	akAmatas striyaH gatvA parAkaH tatra sADakaH /
   antyajātiprasūtasya prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // GarP_1,222.16 //	antyajAti prasUtasya prAyaScittam na vidyate // GarP_1,222.16 //
   madyādiduṣṭabhāṇḍeṣu yādapaḥ pibati dvijaḥ /	madya Adi duzwa BANxezu yAdapaH pibati dvijaH /
   kṛcchrapādena śudhyedvai punaḥ saṃskārakarmaṇā // GarP_1,222.17 //	kRcCra pAdena SuDyet vE punar saMskAra karmaNA // GarP_1,222.17 //
   ye pratyavasitā viprā vajrāgnipavanādiṣu /	ye pratyavasitAH viprAH vajra agni pavana Adizu /
   annapānādi saṃgṛhya cikīrṣanti gṛhāntaram // GarP_1,222.18 //	anna pAna Adi saMgRhya cikIrzanti gRha antaram // GarP_1,222.18 //
   cārayettrīṇi kṛcchāṇi trīṇi cāndrāyaṇāni vai /	cArayet trINi kRcCANi trINi cAndrAyaNAni vE /
   jātakarmādisaṃskāraṃ vasiṣṭho munirabravīt // GarP_1,222.19 //	jAtakarma Adi saMskAram vasizWaH muniH abravIt // GarP_1,222.19 //
   prājāpatyādibhirdraṣṭā strī śudhyettu dvibhojanāt /	prAjApatya AdiBiH drazwA strI SuDyet tu dvi BojanAt /
   ucchiṣṭocchiṣṭasaṃspṛṣṭaṃśunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ // GarP_1,222.20 //	ucCizwa ucCizwa saMspRzwaMSunA SUdreNa vA dvijaH // GarP_1,222.20 //
   upoṣya rajanīmekāṃ pañcagavyena śudhyati /	upozya rajanIm ekAm paQcagavyena SuDyati /
   varṇabāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañcarātreṇa vai tadā // GarP_1,222.21 //	varNa bAhyena saMspRzwaH paQca rAtreNa vE tadA // GarP_1,222.21 //
   aduṣṭāḥ santatā dhārāḥ vātoddhūtāśca reṇavaḥ /	aduzwAH santatAH DArAH vAta udDUtAH ca reNavaH /
   striyo bālāśca vṛddhāśca na duṣyanti kadācana // GarP_1,222.22 //	striyaH bAlAH ca vRdDAH ca na duzyanti kadAcana // GarP_1,222.22 //
   nityamāsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuntaiḥ pātitaṃ phalam /	nityam Asyam Suci strINAm SakuntEH pAtitam Palam /
   prastrave ca śucirvatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // GarP_1,222.23 //	prastrave ca SuciH vatsaH SvA mRga grahaNe SuciH // GarP_1,222.23 //
   udake codakasthaṃ tu sthaleṣu sthalajaṃ śuci /	udake ca udaka sTam tu sTalezu sTala jam Suci /
   pādau sthāpyau ca tatraiva ācāntaḥ śucitāmiyāt // GarP_1,222.24 //	pAdO sTApyO ca tatra eva AcAntaH Suci tAm iyAt // GarP_1,222.24 //
   śudhyettadbhasmanā kāṃsyaṃ surayā yanna lipyate /	SuDyet tad BasmanA kAMsyam surayA yat na lipyate /
   mūtreṇa surayā miśraṃ tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati // GarP_1,222.25 //	mUtreNa surayA miSram tapanEH Kalu SuDyati // GarP_1,222.25 //
   gavāghrātāni kāṃsyāni śūdrocchiṣṭāni yāni ca /	gavA AGrAtAni kAMsyAni SUdra ucCizwAni yAni ca /
   kākaśvāpahatānyeva śudhyanti daśa bhasmanā // GarP_1,222.26 //	kAka Sva apahatAni eva SuDyanti daSa BasmanA // GarP_1,222.26 //
   śūdrabhājanabhoktā yaḥ pañcagavyaṃ tryupoṣitaḥ /	SUdra BAjana BoktA yaH paQcagavyam tri upozitaH /
   ucchiṣṭaṃ spṛśate vipraḥ śvasūdraścāparādhikaḥ // GarP_1,222.27 //	ucCizwam spRSate vipraH SvasUdraH ca apara aDikaH // GarP_1,222.27 //
   upoṣitaḥ pañcagavyācchudhyetspṛṣṭvā rajasvalām /	upozitaH paQcagavyAt SuDyet spRzwvA rajasvalAm /
   anudakeṣu deśeṣu coravyāghrākule pathi // GarP_1,222.28 //	anudakezu deSezu cora vyAGra Akule paTi // GarP_1,222.28 //
   kṛtvā mūtrapurīṣantu dravyahasto na duṣyati /	kRtvA mUtra purIzantu dravya hastaH na duzyati /
   bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya taddravyaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,222.29 //	BU mOniH kzEpya tat dravyam SOcam kRtvA samAhitaH // GarP_1,222.29 //
   āranālaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ takrantu kṛsarañca yat /	AranAlam daDi kzIram takrantu kRsaraQca yat /
   śūdrādapi ca tadgāhyaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu tathāntyajāt // GarP_1,222.30 //	SUdrAt api ca tat gAhyam mAMsam maDu taTA antyajAt // GarP_1,222.30 //
   gauḍīṃ paiṣṭīñca mādhvīkaṃ viprādiryaḥ surāṃ pibet /	gOxIm pEzwIQca mADvIkam vipra AdiH yaH surAm pibet /
   surāṃ pibandvijaḥ śudhyedagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ piban // GarP_1,222.31 //	surAm piban dvijaH SuDyet agni varNAm surAm piban // GarP_1,222.31 //
   vipraḥ pañcaśataṃ japyaṃ gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śataṃ vipraśca	vipraH paQca Satam japyam gAyatryAH kzatriyasya ca Satam vipraH ca
   bhuktvānnaṃ pānapātreṇa sūtake // GarP_1,222.32 //	BuktvA annam pAna pAtreNa sUtake // GarP_1,222.32 //
   śucirvipro daśāhena kṣattriyo dvādaśāhataḥ /	SuciH vipraH daSa ahena kzattriyaH dvAdaSa AhataH /
   vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhana śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.33 //	vESyaH paQcadaSa ahana SUdraH mAsena SuDyati // GarP_1,222.33 //
   rājñāṃ yuddheṣu yajñādau deśāntaragateṣu ca /	rAjQAm yudDezu yajQa AdO deSa antara gatezu ca /
   bāle prete māsike ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.34 //	bAle prete mAsike ca sadyas SOcam viDIyate // GarP_1,222.34 //
   avivāhā tathā kanyā dvijo mauñjīvivarjitaḥ /	avivAhA taTA kanyA dvijaH mOQjI vi varjitaH /
   jatadantaśca bālaśca kumārī ca trivarṣikā // GarP_1,222.35 //	jata dantaH ca bAlaH ca kumArI ca tri varzikAH // GarP_1,222.35 //
   teṣāṃ śuddhistrirātreṇa garbhastrāve trirātribhiḥ /	tezAm SudDiH tri rAtreNa garBaH trAve tri rAtriBiH /
   sūtāyāṃ māsatulyāśca caturthe 'hni rajasvalā // GarP_1,222.36 //	sUtAyAm mAsa tulyAH ca caturTe ahni rajasvalAH // GarP_1,222.36 //
   durbhikṣe rāṣṭrasaṃpate sūtake mṛtakepi vā /	durBikze rAzwra saMpate sUtake mRta kepi vA /
   niyamāśca na duṣyanti dānadharmaparāstathā // GarP_1,222.37 //	niyamAH ca na duzyanti dAna Darma parAH taTA // GarP_1,222.37 //
   dakṣikāle vivāhādau devadvijanimantrite /	dakzi kAle vivAha AdO deva dvija nimantrite /
   pūrvasaṃkalpite vāpi nāśaucaṃ mṛtasūtake // GarP_1,222.38 //	pUrva saMkalpite vA api na ASOcam mRta sUtake // GarP_1,222.38 //
   prasūtapatnīsaṃsparśādaśuciḥ syāttathā dvijaḥ /	prasUta patnI saMsparSAt aSuciH syAt taTA dvijaH /
   agnayo yatra hūyante vedo vā yatra paṭhyate // GarP_1,222.39 //	agnayaH yatra hUyante vedaH vA yatra paWyate // GarP_1,222.39 //
   satataṃ vaiśvadevā di na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet /	satatam vESvadevAH di na tezAm sUtakam Bavet /
   aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte trirātrācchudhyati dvijaḥ // GarP_1,222.40 //	aSudDe ca gRhe Bukte tri rAtrAt SuDyati dvijaH // GarP_1,222.40 //
   brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā caiva rajasvalā /	brAhmaNI kzatriyA vESyA SUdrA ca eva rajasvalA /
   anyonyasparśanāttatra brāhmaṇī tu trirātrataḥ // GarP_1,222.41 //	anyonya sparSanAt tatra brAhmaNI tu tri rAtrataH // GarP_1,222.41 //
   dvirātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hyupoṣitā /	dvi rAtrataH kzatriyA ca SudDA vESyA hi upozitA /
   śūdrā snānena śudhyettu droṇārthaṃ na visarjayet // GarP_1,222.42 //	SUdrA snAnena SuDyet tu droNa arTam na visarjayet // GarP_1,222.42 //
   kākaśvānopanī tantu annaṃ bāhyantu tattyajet /	kAka SvAnopanI tantu annam bAhyantu tat tyajet /
   suvarṇādbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet // GarP_1,222.43 //	suvarNa adBEH samaByukzya hutASe ca pratApayet // GarP_1,222.43 //
   kūpe ca patitāndṛṣṭvā śvaśṛgālau ca markaṭam /	kUpe ca patitAn dRzwvA Sva SRgAlO ca markawam /
   tatkūpasyodakaṃ pītvā śudhyedviprastribhirdinaiḥ /	tad kUpasya udakam pItvA SuDyet vipraH triBiH dinEH /
   kṣatriyo 'hardvayenaiva vaiśyo vaikāhataḥ param // GarP_1,222.44 //	kzatriyaH ahar dvayena eva vESyaH vA eka AhataH param // GarP_1,222.44 //
   asthi carma malaṃ vāpi mūṣikāṃ yadi kūpataḥ /	asTi carma malam vA api mUzikAm yadi kUpataH /
   uddhṛtya codakaṃ pañca gavyācchuddhyettu śodhitam // GarP_1,222.45 //	udDRtya ca udakam paQca gavyAt SudDyet tu SoDitam // GarP_1,222.45 //
   taḍāge puṣkariṇyādau bhasmādiṃ pātayettathā /	taxAge puzkariNI AdO Basma Adim pAtayet taTA /
   ṣaṭkumbhānapa utddhṛya pañcagavyena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.46 //	zaz kumBAn apaH utdDRya paQcagavyena SuDyati // GarP_1,222.46 //
   strīrajaḥ patitaṃ madhye triṃśatkumbhānsamuddharet /	strI rajaH patitam maDye triMSat kumBAn samudDaret /
   agamyāgamanaṃ kṛtvā madyagomāṃsabhakṣaṇam // GarP_1,222.47 //	agamyA gamanam kRtvA madya go mAMsa BakzaNam // GarP_1,222.47 //
   śudhye ccāndrāyaṇādvipraḥ prājāpatyena bhūmipaḥ /	SuDye ccAndrAyaNAt vipraH prAjApatyena BUmipaH /
   vaiśyaḥ sāntapanācchūdraḥ pañcāhobhirviśudhyati // GarP_1,222.48 //	vESyaH sAntapanAt SUdraH paQca ahoBiH viSuDyati // GarP_1,222.48 //
   prāyaścitte kṛte dadyādgavāṃ brāhmaṇabhojanam /	prAyaScitte kRte dadyAt gavAm brAhmaNa Bojanam /
   krīḍāyāṃ śayanīyādau nīlīvastraṃ na duṣyati // GarP_1,222.49 //	krIxAyAm SayanIya AdO nIlI vastram na duzyati // GarP_1,222.49 //
   nīlīvastraṃ na spṛśecca nīlī ca nirayaṃ brajet /	nIlI vastram na spRSet ca nIlI ca nirayam brajet /
   vrahmaghnaśca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.50 //	vrahmaGnaH ca surApaH ca steyI ca guru talpa gaH // GarP_1,222.50 //
   ṛkṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ /	Rkzam dRzwvA viSuDyante tad saMyogI ca paQcamaH /
   tato dhenuśataṃ dadyādbrāhmaṇānāntu bhojanam // GarP_1,222.51 //	tatas Denu Satam dadyAt brAhmaNAn Antu Bojanam // GarP_1,222.51 //
   brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /	brahma hA dvAdaSa abdAni kuwIm kRtvA vane vaset /
   nyasyedātmānamagnau vā susamiddhe surāpakaḥ // GarP_1,222.52 //	nyasyet AtmAnam agnO vA su samidDe surApakaH // GarP_1,222.52 //
   steyī sarvaṃ vedavide brāhmaṇāyopapādayet /	steyI sarvam veda vide brAhmaNAya upapAdayet /
   vṛṣamekaṃ sahasraṃ gāṃ dadyācca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.53 //	vRzam ekam sahasram gAm dadyAt ca guru talpa gaH // GarP_1,222.53 //
   kṛtapāpaścaredrodhe dvau pādau bandhayanpaśoḥ /	kRta pApaH caret roDe dvO pAdO banDayan paSoH /
   sarvakṛcchraṃ nipānesyātkāntāre gṛhadāhataḥ // GarP_1,222.54 //	sarva kRcCram nipAnesyAt kAntAre gRhadAhataH // GarP_1,222.54 //
   kaṇṭhābharaṇadoṣeṇa kṛcchrapādaṃ mṛte gavi /	kaNWa ABaraNa dozeNa kRcCra pAdam mRte gavi /
   asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā śṛṅgabhaṅgamathāpi vā // GarP_1,222.55 //	asTi BaFgam gavAm kRtvA SRFga BaFgam aTa api vA // GarP_1,222.55 //
   tvagbhedaṃ pucchanāśe vā māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet /	tvac Bedam pucCa nASe vA mAsa arDam yAvakam pibet /
   sarvaṃ hastyaśvaśastrādyairniścayaṃ kṛcchrameva tu // GarP_1,222.56 //	sarvam hasti aSva Sastra AdyEH niScayam kRcCram eva tu // GarP_1,222.56 //
   ajñānātprāśya viṇmūtraṃ surāsaṃspṛṣṭameva ca /	ajQAnAt prASya viz mUtram surA saMspRzwam eva ca /
   punaḥ saṃskāramāyānti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ // GarP_1,222.57 //	punar saMskAram AyAnti trayaH varNAH dvijAtayaH // GarP_1,222.57 //
   vapanaṃ mekhlā daṇḍo bhaikṣyacaryāvratāni ca /	vapanam meKlA daNxaH BEkzya caryA vratAni ca /
   nivartante dvijātīnāṃ punaḥ saṃskārakarmaṇi // GarP_1,222.58 //	nivartante dvijAtInAm punar saMskAra karmaNi // GarP_1,222.58 //
   āmamāṃsaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ snehaśca kālasambhavāḥ /	Ama mAMsam GRtam kzOdram snehaH ca kAla samBavAH /
   antyabhāṇḍasthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,222.59 //	antya BANxa sTitAH sarve nizkrAntAH SucayaH smRtAH // GarP_1,222.59 //
   tailādighṛtamādhvīkaṃ paṇyadravyaṃ dravastathā /	tEla Adi GRta mADvIkam paNya dravyam dravaH taTA /
   ekabhaktaṃ kramānnaktaṃ ekaikāhamayācitam /	eka Baktam kramAt naktam ekEka aham ayAcitam /
   upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhadviguṇaṃ hi yat // GarP_1,222.60 //	upavAsaH pAda kRcCram kRcCA arDa dviguNam hi yat // GarP_1,222.60 //
   prājāpatyantu tatsyācca sarvapātakanāśanam /	prAjApatyantu tat syAt ca sarva pAtaka nASanam /
   kṛcchraṃ saptopavāsaiśca mahāsāntapanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,222.61 //	kRcCram sapta upavAsEH ca mahAsAntapanam smRtam // GarP_1,222.61 //
   tryahamuṣṇaṃ pibecchāpaḥ tryahamuṣṇaṃ payaḥ pibet /	tri aham uzNam pibet SApaH tri aham uzNam payaH pibet /
   tryamuṣṇaṃ pibetsarpistaptakṛcchramaghāpaham // GarP_1,222.62 //	tryam uzNam pibet sarpiH tapta kRcCram aGa apaham // GarP_1,222.62 //
   dvādaśāhopavāsena parākaḥ sarvapāpahā /	dvAdaSa aha upavAsena parAkaH sarva pApa hA /
   ekaikaṃ vardhayetpiṇḍaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet // GarP_1,222.63 //	ekEkam varDayet piNxam Sukle kRzNe ca hrAsayet // GarP_1,222.63 //
   payaḥ kāñcanavarṇāyāḥ śvetavarṇaṃ ca gomayam /	payaH kAQcana varNAyAH Sveta varNam ca gomayam /
   gomūtraṃ tāmravarṇāyā nīlavarṇabhavaṃ ghṛtam // GarP_1,222.64 //	go mUtram tAmra varNAyAH nIla varNa Bavam GRtam // GarP_1,222.64 //
   dadhi syātkṛṣṇavarṇāyā darbhodakasamāyutam /	daDi syAt kRzNa varNAyAH darBa udaka samAyutam /
   gomūtramāṣakāṇyaṣṭau gomayasya catuṣṭayam // GarP_1,222.65 //	go mUtra mAzakANi azwO gomayasya catuzwayam // GarP_1,222.65 //
   kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktā dadhnastu daśa ucyate /	kzIrasya dvAdaSa proktA daDnaH tu daSaH ucyate /
   ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyaṃ malāpaham // GarP_1,222.66 //	GRtasya mAzakAH paQca paQcagavyam mala apaham // GarP_1,222.66 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   prāyaścitakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	prAyaScitakaTanam nAma dvAviMSati aDika dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  223	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 223
   brahmovāca munibhiścaritā dharmā bhaktyā vyāsa mayoditāḥ /	brahmA uvAca muniBiH caritAH DarmAH BaktyA vyAsa mayA uditAH /
   yairviṣṇustuṣyate caiva sūryādiparicāraṇāt // GarP_1,223.1 //	yEH vizNuH tuzyate ca eva sUrya Adi paricAraNAt // GarP_1,223.1 //
   tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyā vandanena ca /	tarpaNena ca homena sanDyAyAH vandanena ca /
   prāpyate bhagavān viṣṇurdharmakāmārthamokṣadaḥ // GarP_1,223.2 //	prApyate BagavAn vizNuH Darma kAma arTa mokza daH // GarP_1,223.2 //
   dharmo hi bhagavānviṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇostu tarpaṇam /	DarmaH hi BagavAn vizNuH pUjI vizNoH tu tarpaNam /
   homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā sakalaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,223.3 //	homaH sanDyA taTA DyAnam DAraNA sakalam hariH // GarP_1,223.3 //
   sūca uvāca /	sUcaH uvAca /
   pralayaṃ jagato vakṣye tatsarvaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka /	pralayam jagataH vakzye tat sarvam SRNu SOnakaH /
   caturyugasahasrantu kalpaikābjadinaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,223.4 //	caturyuga sahasrantu kalpa eka abja dinam smRtam // GarP_1,223.4 //
   kṛtatretādvāparādiyugāvasthā nibodhame /	kRta tretA dvApara Adi yuga avasTA niboDame /
   kṛte dharmaścatuṣpācca satyaṃ dānaṃ tapo dayā // GarP_1,223.5 //	kRte DarmaH catuzpAd ca satyam dAnam tapaH dayA // GarP_1,223.5 //
   dharmapātā hariśceti santuṣṭā jñānino narāḥ /	DarmapAtA hariH ca iti santuzwAH jQAninaH narAH /
   caturvaṃṣarsahasrāṇi narā jīvanti vai tadā // GarP_1,223.6 //	catur vaMzar sahasrANi narAH jIvanti vE tadA // GarP_1,223.6 //
   kṛtānte kṣattriyairviprā viṭśūdrāśca jitā dvijaiḥ /	kRtAnte kzattriyEH viprAH viS SUdrAH ca jitAH dvijEH /
   śūraścātibalo viṣṇū rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha // GarP_1,223.7 //	SUraH ca atibalaH vizNuH rakzAMsi ca jaGAna ha // GarP_1,223.7 //
   tretāyuge tripāddharmaḥ satyadānadayātmakaḥ /	tretA yuge tripAd DarmaH satya dAna daya AtmakaH /
   narā yajñaparāstasmiṃstathā kṣatrodbhavaṃ jagat // GarP_1,223.8 //	narAH yajQa parAH tasmin= taTA kzatra udBavam jagat // GarP_1,223.8 //
   rakto harirnaraiḥ pūjyo narā daśaśatāyuṣaḥ /	raktaH hariH narEH pUjyaH narAH daSa Sata AyuzaH /
   tatra viṣṇurbhomarathaḥ kṣatriyā rākṣasānahan // GarP_1,223.9 //	tatra vizNuH BomaraTaH kzatriyAH rAkzasAn ahan // GarP_1,223.9 //
   dvipādavigro dharmaḥ pītāñcācyute gate /	dvi pAda vigraH DarmaH pItAQca acyute gate /
   catuḥ śatāyuṣo lokā dvijakṣatrodbhavāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,223.10 //	catuH Sata AyuzaH lokAH dvija kzatra udBavAH prajAH // GarP_1,223.10 //
   tatra dṛṣṭvālpabuddhīṃśca viṣṇurvyāsasvarūpadhṛk /	tatra dRzwvA alpabudDIn= ca vizNuH vyAsa svarUpa DRk /
   tadekantu yajurvedaṃ? caturdhā vyabhajatpunaḥ // GarP_1,223.11 //	tat ekantu yajurvedan? caturDA vyaBajat punar // GarP_1,223.11 //
   śiṣyānadhyāpayāmāsa samastāṃstānnibodha me /	SizyAn aDyApayAmAsa samastAn= tAn niboDa me /
   ṛgvedamatha pailant sāmavedañca jaiminim // GarP_1,223.12 //	Rgvedam aTa pElant sAmavedan ca jEminim // GarP_1,223.12 //
   atharvāṇaṃ sumantuntu yajurvedaṃ mahāmunim /	aTarvANam sumantuntu yajurvedam mahA munim /
   vaiśampāyanamaṅgantu purāṇaṃ sūtameva ca /	vESampAyanam aFgantu purANam sUtam eva ca /
   aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni yair vedyo harireva hi // GarP_1,223.13 //	azwAdaSa purANAni yEH vedyaH hariH eva hi // GarP_1,223.13 //
   sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca /	sargaH ca pratisargaH ca vaMSaH manvantarANi ca /
   vaṃśānucaritaccaiva purāṇaṃ pañcalakṣaṇam // GarP_1,223.14 //	vaMSAnucaritat ca eva purANam paQca lakzaNam // GarP_1,223.14 //
   brāhmaṃ pādmaṃ vaiṣṇavañca śaivaṃ bhāgavatantathā /	brAhmam pAdmam vEzNavaQca SEvam BAgavatan taTA /
   bhaviṣyannāradīyañcaskāndaṃ liṅgaṃ varāhakam // GarP_1,223.15 //	Bavizyat nAradIyaQca skAndam liFgam varAhakam // GarP_1,223.15 //
   mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tathāgneyaṃ brahmavaivartameva ca /	mArkaNxeyam taTA Agneyam brahmavEvartam eva ca /
   kaurmaṃ mātsyaṃ gāruḍañca vāyavīyamanantaram /	kOrmam mAtsyam gAruxaQca vAyavIyam anantaram /
   aṣṭādaśasamuddiṣṭaṃ brahmāṇḍamiti saṃjñitam // GarP_1,223.16 //	azwAdaSa samuddizwam brahmANxam iti saMjQitam // GarP_1,223.16 //
   anyānyupapurāṇāni munibhiḥ kathitāni tu /	anyAni upapurANAni muniBiH kaTitAni tu /
   ādyaṃ sanatkumāroktaṃ nārasiṃhamathāparam // GarP_1,223.17 //	Adyam sanatkumAra uktam nArasiMham aTa aparam // GarP_1,223.17 //
   tṛtīyaṃ skāndamuddiṣṭaṃ kumāreṇa tu bhāṣitam /	tRtIyam skAndam uddizwam kumAreNa tu BAzitam /
   caturthaṃ śivadharmākhyaṃ syānnandīśvarabhāṣitam // GarP_1,223.18 //	caturTam SivaDarma AKyam syAt nandISvara BAzitam // GarP_1,223.18 //
   durvāsasoktamāścaryaṃ nāradoktamataḥ param /	durvAsasA uktam AScaryam nArada uktam atas param /
   kāpilaṃ vāmanañcaiva tathaivośanaseritam // GarP_1,223.19 //	kApilam vAmanaQca eva taTA eva uSanasA Iritam // GarP_1,223.19 //
   brahmāṇḍaṃ vāruṇañcātha kālikāhvayameva ca /	brahmANxam vAruNaQca aTa kAlikA Ahvayam eva ca /
   māheśvaraṃ tathā sāmbamevaṃ sarvārthasañcayam /	mAheSvaram taTA sAmbam evam sarva arTa saQcayam /
   parāśaroktamaparaṃ mārīcaṃ bhārgavāhvayam // GarP_1,223.20 //	parASara uktam aparam mArIcam BArgava Ahvayam // GarP_1,223.20 //
   purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstrañca vedāstvaṅgāni yanmune /	purANam DarmaSAstraQca vedAH tu aFgAni yat mune /
   nyāyaḥ śaunaka mīmāṃsā āyurvedārthaśāstrakam /	nyAyaH SOnaka mImAMsA Ayurveda arTa SAstrakam /
   gāndharvaśca dhanurvedo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśasmṛtāḥ // GarP_1,223.21 //	gAnDarvaH ca DanurvedaH vidyAH hi azwAdaSa smRtAH // GarP_1,223.21 //
   dvāparāntena ca harirgurubhāramapāharat /	dvApara antena ca hariH guru BAram apAharat /
   ekapādasthite dharme kṛṣṇatvañcācyute gate // GarP_1,223.22 //	eka pAda sTite Darme kRzNa tvaQca acyute gate // GarP_1,223.22 //
   janāstadā durācārā bhaviṣyanti ca nirdayāḥ /	janAH tadA durAcArAH Bavizyanti ca nirdayAH /
   sattvaṃ rajastama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ /	sattvam rajaH tamaH iti dRSyante puruze guNAH /
   kālasañcoditāste 'pi parivartanta ātmani // GarP_1,223.23 //	kAla saQcoditAH te api parivartante Atmani // GarP_1,223.23 //
   prabhūtañca yadā sattvaṃ mano burdhondriyāṇi ca /	praBUtaQca yadA sattvam manaH burDA undriyANi ca /
   tadā kṛtayugaṃ vidyājjñāne tapasi yadratiḥ // GarP_1,223.24 //	tadA kRta yugam vidyAt jQAne tapasi yat ratiH // GarP_1,223.24 //
   yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu śaktiryaśasi dehinām /	yadA karmasu kAmyezu SaktiH yaSasi dehinAm /
   tadā tretā rajobhūtiriti jānīhiśaunaka // GarP_1,223.25 //	tadA tretA rajaH BUtiH iti jAnIhi SOnaka // GarP_1,223.25 //
   yadā lobhastvasantoṣo māno dambhaśca matsaraḥ /	yadA loBaH tu asantozaH mAnaH damBaH ca matsaraH /
   karmaṇāñcāpi kāmyānāṃ dvāparaṃ tadrajastamaḥ // GarP_1,223.26 //	karmaNA aQcA api kAmyAnAm dvAparam tat rajaH tamaH // GarP_1,223.26 //
   yadā sadānṛtaṃ nandrā nidrā hiṃsādisādhanam /	yadA sadA anRtam nandrA nidrA hiMsA Adi sADanam /
   śokamohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistamasi smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,223.27 //	Soka mohO Bayam dEnyam sa kaliH tamasi smRtaH // GarP_1,223.27 //
   yasmiñjanāḥ kāminaḥ syuḥ śaśvatkaṭukabhāṣiṇaḥ /	yasmin janAH kAminaH syuH SaSvat kawuka BAziNaH /
   dasyūtkṛṣṭā janapadāvedāḥ pāṣaṇḍadūṣitāḥ // GarP_1,223.28 //	dasyu utkRzwAH janapada AvedAH pAzaNxa dUzitAH // GarP_1,223.28 //
   rājānaśca prajābhikṣāḥ śiśrodaraparājitāḥ /	rAjAnaH ca prajA BikzAH SiSrodara parAjitAH /
   avratā vaṭacavo 'śaucā bhikṣavaśca kuṭumbinaḥ // GarP_1,223.29 //	avratAH vawacavaH aSOcAH BikzavaH ca kuwumbinaH // GarP_1,223.29 //
   tapasvinogrāmavāsāḥ nyāsino hyarthalolupāḥ /	tapasvinaH grAma vAsAH nyAsinaH hi arTa lolupAH /
   hrasvakāyā mahāhārāścaurāste sādhavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,223.30 //	hrasvakAyAH mahA AhArAH cOrAH te sADavaH smRtAH // GarP_1,223.30 //
   tyakṣyanti bhṛtyāśca patiṃ tāpasastyakṣyati vratam /	tyakzyanti BRtyAH ca patim tApasaH tyakzyati vratam /
   śūdrāḥ pratigrahiṣyanti vaiśyā vrataparāyaṇaḥ // GarP_1,223.31 //	SUdrAH pratigrahizyanti vESyAH vrata parAyaNaH // GarP_1,223.31 //
   udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśācasadṛśāḥ prajāḥ /	udvignAH santi ca janAH piSAca sadRSAH prajAH /
   anyāyabhojanenāgnidevatātithipūjanam // GarP_1,223.32 //	anyAya Bojanena agni devatA atiTi pUjanam // GarP_1,223.32 //
   kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitryodakakriyām /	karizyenti kalO prApte na ca pitrya udaka kriyAm /
   strīparāśca janāḥ sarve śūdraprāyāśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.33 //	strI parAH ca janAH sarve SUdra prAyAH ca SOnakaH // GarP_1,223.33 //
   bahuprajālpabhāgyāśca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ /	bahu prajA alpa BAgyAH ca Bavizyanti kalO striyaH /
   śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanaparā ājñāṃ bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ // GarP_1,223.34 //	SiraH kaNxUyana parAH AjQAm Betsyanti BartsitAH // GarP_1,223.34 //
   viṣṇuṃ na pūjayiṣyanti pāṣaṇḍopahatā janāḥ /	vizNum na pUjayizyanti pAzaNxa upahatAH janAH /
   kalerdeṣanidherviprā asti hyeko mahāguṇaḥ // GarP_1,223.35 //	kaleH deza niDeH viprAH asti hi ekaH mahA guNaH // GarP_1,223.35 //
   kīrtanādeva kṛṣṇasya mahābandhaṃ parityajet /	kIrtanAt eva kRzNasya mahAbanDam parityajet /
   kṛte yadyyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ japataḥ phalam // GarP_1,223.36 //	kRte yadi i AyataH vizNum tretAyAm japataH Palam // GarP_1,223.36 //
   dvāpare paricaryāyāṃ kalau taddharikīrtanāt /	dvApare paricaryAyAm kalO tad hari kIrtanAt /
   tasmāddhyeyo harirnityaṃ geyaḥ pūjyaśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.37 //	tasmAt DyeyaH hariH nityam geyaH pUjyaH ca SOnakaH // GarP_1,223.37 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   yugadharmakathanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	yugaDarmakaTanam nAma trayoviMSati aDika dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  224	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 224
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   caturyugasahasrānte brāhmo naimittiko layaḥ /	caturyuga sahasra ante brAhmaH nEmittikaH layaH /
   anāvṛṣṭiśca kalpānte jāyate śatavārṣikī // GarP_1,224.1 //	anAvRzwiH ca kalpa ante jAyate Sata vArzikI // GarP_1,224.1 //
   utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrā divi sapta divākarāḥ /	utizWanti tadA rOdrAH divi sapta divAkarAH /
   te tu pītvā jalaṃ sarvaṃ śoṣayanti jagattrayam // GarP_1,224.2 //	te tu pItvA jalam sarvam Sozayanti jagattrayam // GarP_1,224.2 //
   bhūrbhuvaḥ svarmaharlokaṃ carācaraṃ janastathā /	BUH BuvaH svar ma har lokam carAcaram janaH taTA /
   viṣṇuśca rudro bhūtvāsau pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,224.3 //	vizNuH ca rudraH BUtvA asO pAtAlAni dahati aDas // GarP_1,224.3 //
   viṣṇurdahettrilokañci mukhānmeghān sṛjatyalam /	vizNuH dahet trilokaQci muKAt meGAn sRjati alam /
   varṣante vai varṣaśataṃ nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ // GarP_1,224.4 //	varzante vE varza Satam nAnA varNAH mahA GanAH // GarP_1,224.4 //
   viṣṇurūpaḥśataṃ vāti varṣāṇāṃ vāyurūrjitaḥ /	vizNu rUpaH Satam vAti varzANAm vAyuH UrjitaH /
   viṣṇure kārṇavī bhūte varṣe brahmasvarūpadhṛk /	vizNure kArNavI BUte varze brahma svarUpa DRk /
   śete 'nantāsane viṣṇurnaṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame // GarP_1,224.5 //	Sete ananta Asane vizNuH nazwe sTAvara jaFgame // GarP_1,224.5 //
   suptvā varṣasahasraṃ sa jagadbhūyo 'sṛjaddhariḥ /	suptvA varza sahasram sa jagat BUyas asRjat hariH /
   atha prākṛtikaṃ vakṣye pralayaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka // GarP_1,224.6 //	aTa prAkRtikam vakzye pralayam SRNu SOnakaH // GarP_1,224.6 //
   pūrṇe saṃvatsaraśate saṃhṛtya sakalaṃ jagat /	pUrNe saMvatsara Sate saMhRtya sakalam jagat /
   brahmāṇaṃ nyasya dehe hi mukto yogabalairhariḥ // GarP_1,224.7 //	brahmANam nyasya dehe hi muktaH yoga balEH hariH // GarP_1,224.7 //
   ye gatā brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ te 'pi yānti paraṃ padam /	ye gatAH brahmaNaH sTAnam te api yAnti param padam /
   anāvṛṣṭyarkasampannā āsanmeghāstathā dvija /	anAvRzwi arka sampannAH Asan meGAH taTA dvija /
   śataṃ varṣāṇi varṣadbhirmedhairaṇḍaṃ prapūryate // GarP_1,224.8 //	Satam varzANi varzadBiH meDA eraNxam prapUryate // GarP_1,224.8 //
   antargatena toyena bhinnamaṇḍaṃ jagatpateḥ /	antargatena toyena Binna maNxam jagatpateH /
   pūrṇe brahmāyuṣi gate bhidyate 'mbhasi līyate // GarP_1,224.9 //	pUrNe brahma Ayuzi gate Bidyate amBasi lIyate // GarP_1,224.9 //
   evaṃ sā jagadādhārā toye corvo pralīyate /	evam sA jagat ADArAH toye ca urvaH pralIyate /
   āpastejasi līyante tejo vāyau pralīyate // GarP_1,224.10 //	ApaH tejasi lIyante tejaH vAyO pralIyate // GarP_1,224.10 //
   vāyuḥ khe khañca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān /	vAyuH Ke KaQca BUtAdO viSate ca tadA mahAn /
   mahānprapadyate 'vyaktaṃ prakṛtiḥ puruṣe pare // GarP_1,224.11 //	mahAn prapadyate avyaktam prakRtiH puruze pare // GarP_1,224.11 //
   śatavarṣaṃ hariḥ śete sṛjatyatha dinagame /	Sata varzam hariH Sete sRjati aTa dina game /
   avyaktādikrameṇaiva vyaktībhūtaṃ carācaram // GarP_1,224.12 //	avyakta Adi krameNa eva vyaktIBUtam carAcaram // GarP_1,224.12 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  225	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 225
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   ādhyātmikāditāpāṃstrīñjñātva saṃsrācakravit /	ADyAtmika Adi tApAn= trIn jQAtva saMsrAcakra vid /
   utpannajñānavairāgyaḥ prāpnotyātyantikaṃ layam // GarP_1,225.1 //	utpanna jQAna vErAgyaH prApnoti Atyantikam layam // GarP_1,225.1 //
   saṃsāracakraṃ vakṣye 'hamādābutkrāntikālataḥ /	saMsAra cakram vakzye aham AdAbutkrAnti kAlataH /
   yadvinā puruṣārtho na līnaḥ syātparamātmani // GarP_1,225.2 //	yat vinA puruza arTaH na lInaH syAt paramAtmani // GarP_1,225.2 //
   ūrdhvavāsī narastyaktvā dehamanyatprapadyate /	UrDvavAsI naraH tyaktvA deham anyat prapadyate /
   nīyatedvādaśāhena yamasya yamapūruṣaiḥ // GarP_1,225.3 //	nIyatedvAdaSa ahena yamasya yama pUruzEH // GarP_1,225.3 //
   tatra yadvāndhavāstoyaṃ prayacchanti tilaiḥ saha /	tatra yat vA anDavAH toyam prayacCanti tilEH saha /
   yacca piṇḍaṃ prayacchanti yamaloke tadaśnute // GarP_1,225.4 //	yat ca piNxam prayacCanti yama loke tat aSnute // GarP_1,225.4 //
   gataśca narakaṃ pāpātsvargaṃ yāti svapuṇyataḥ /	gataH ca narakam pApAt svargam yAti sva puNyataH /
   pāpakṛdyāti narakaṃ puṇyakṛdyāti vai divam // GarP_1,225.5 //	pApa kRt yAti narakam puNya kRt yAti vE divam // GarP_1,225.5 //
   svargācca narakāttyaktaḥ strīṇāṃ garbhe bhavatyapi /	svargAt ca narakAt tyaktaH strINAm garBe Bavati api /
   nābhibhūtañca tasyaiva yāti bījadvayaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,225.6 //	na aBiBU taQca tasya eva yAti bIja dvayam hi tat // GarP_1,225.6 //
   kalalaṃ budbrudamayaṃ tataḥ śoṇitameva ca /	kalalam budbruda mayam tatas SoNitam eva ca /
   peśyāḥ palasamo 'ṇḍaḥ syādaṅkuraṃ tata ucyate // GarP_1,225.7 //	peSyAH pala samaH aNxaH syAt aFkuram tatas ucyate // GarP_1,225.7 //
   upāṅgānyaṅgulīnetranāsāsyaśravaṇāni ca /	upAFgAni aFgulI netra nAsA Asya SravaNAni ca /
   āvahaṃ yāti cāṅgebhyastatparantu nakhādikam // GarP_1,225.8 //	Avaham yAti ca aFgeByaH tat parantu naKa Adikam // GarP_1,225.8 //
   tvaco romāṇi jāyante keśāścaiva tataḥ param /	tvacaH romANi jAyante keSAH ca eva tatas param /
   naraścādhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate // GarP_1,225.9 //	naraH ca aDomuKaH sTitvA daSame ca saH jAyate // GarP_1,225.9 //
   tatastu vaiṣṇavī māyā vṛṇotyatyantamohinī /	tatas tu vEzNavI mAyA vRNoti atyanta mohinI /
   bālatvaṃ tvatha kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi // GarP_1,225.10 //	bAla tvam tu aTa kOmAram yOvanam vRdDa tAm api // GarP_1,225.10 //
   tataśca maraṇaṃ tattaddharmāmāpnoti mānavaḥ /	tatas ca maraNam tad tad DarmAm Apnoti mAnavaH /
   evaṃ saṃsāracakre 'smin bhrāmyate ghaṭīyantravat // GarP_1,225.11 //	evam saMsAra cakre asmin BrAmyate GawIyantra vat // GarP_1,225.11 //
   narakātpratimuktastu pāpayoniṣu jāyate /	narakAt pratimuktaH tu pApa yonizu jAyate /
   patitātpratigṛhyātha adhoyoniṃ vrajedbudhaḥ // GarP_1,225.12 //	patitAt pratigRhya aTa aDas yonim vrajet buDaH // GarP_1,225.12 //
   narakātpratimuktastu kṛmirbhavati yācakaḥ /	narakAt pratimuktaH tu kRmiH Bavati yAcakaH /
   upādhyāyavyalīkaṃ tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija // GarP_1,225.13 //	upADyAya vyalIkam tu kRtvA SvA Bavati dvija // GarP_1,225.13 //
   tajjāyāṃ manasā vāñchaṃstaddravyaṃ vāpyasaṃśayam /	tad jAyAm manasA vAQCan= tat dravyam vA api asaMSayam /
   gardabhojāyate janturmitrasyaivāpamānakṛt // GarP_1,225.14 //	gardaBaH jAyate jantuH mitrasya eva apamAna kRt // GarP_1,225.14 //
   pitarau pīḍayitvā tu kacchapatvañca jāyate /	pitarO pIxayitvA tu kacCapatvaQca jAyate /
   bhurtuḥ piṇḍamupāśvasto vañjayitvā tameva yaḥ // GarP_1,225.15 //	BurtuH piNxam upASvastaH vaQjayitvA tam eva yaH // GarP_1,225.15 //
   so 'pi mohasamāpanno jāyate vānaro mṛtaḥ /	saH api moha samApannaH jAyate vAnaraH mRtaH /

   asūyakaśca narakānmukto bhavati rākṣasaḥ /	asUyakaH ca narakAt muktaH Bavati rAkzasaH /
   viśvāsahartā ca naro mīnayonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.17 //	viSvAsa hartA ca naraH mIna yonO prajAyate // GarP_1,225.17 //
   yavadhānyāni saṃhṛtya jāyate mūṣako mṛtaḥ /	yava DAnyAni saMhRtya jAyate mUzakaH mRtaH /
   paradārābhimarśāttu vṛko ghoro 'bhijāyate // GarP_1,225.18 //	para dAra aBimarSAt tu vRkaH GoraH aBijAyate // GarP_1,225.18 //

   śūdrastu brāhmaṇīṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate /	SUdraH tu brAhmaNIm gatvA kRmi yonO prajAyate /
   tasyāmapatyamutpādya kāṣṭhāntaḥ kaṭīko bhavet // GarP_1,225.22 //	tasyAm apatyam utpAdya kAzWa antar kawIkaH Bavet // GarP_1,225.22 //
   kṛtaghnaḥ kṛmikaḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgo vṛścikastathā /	kRtaGnaH kRmikaH kIwaH pataFgaH vRScikaH taTA /

   kṛmiḥ strīvadhakartā ca bālahantā ca jāyate /	kRmiH strI vaDa kartA ca bAlahantA ca jAyate /
   bhojanañcorayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,225.24 //	BojanaQcorayitvA tu makzikA jAyate naraH // GarP_1,225.24 //
   hṛtvājyañcaiva mārjārastilahṛccaiva mūṣakaḥ /	hRtvA AjyaQcA eva mArjAraH tila hRt ca eva mUzakaH /

   madhu hṛtvā naro daṃśa pūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ /	maDu hRtvA naraH daMSa  pUpam hRtvA pipIlikaH /
   apo hṛtvā tu pāpātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate // GarP_1,225.26 //	apaH hRtvA tu pApa AtmA vAyasaH samprajAyate // GarP_1,225.26 //
   hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapoto vā prajāyate /	hRte kAzWe ca hArItaH kapotaH vA prajAyate /
   hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.27 //	hRtvA tu kAQcanam BANxam kRmi yonO prajAyate // GarP_1,225.27 //
   kārpāsike hṛte krauñco vahrihartā bakastathā /	kArpAsike hRte krOQcaH vahri hartA bakaH taTA /

   jīvañjīvakatāṃ yāti raktavastvapahṛnnaraḥ /	jIvaQjIvaka tAm yAti rakta vastu apahRd naraH /

   ṣaṇḍāḥ kalāpaharaṇe kāṣṭhahṛttṛṇakīṭakaḥ /	zaNxAH kalA apa haraNe kAzWahRttRNa kIwakaH /
   puṣpaṃ hṛtvā daridrastu paṅguryācakahṛnnaraḥ // GarP_1,225.30 //	puzpam hRtvA daridraH tu paFguH yAcaka hRd naraH // GarP_1,225.30 //
   śākahartā ca hārītastoyahartā ca cātakaḥ /	SAka hartA ca hArItaH toya hartA ca cAtakaH /
   gṛhahṛnnarakāngatvā rauravādīnsudāruṇān // GarP_1,225.31 //	gRha hRd narakAn gatvA rOrava AdIn su dAruNAn // GarP_1,225.31 //
   tṛṇagulmalatāvallītvagghārī tarutāṃ vrajet /	tRNa gulma latA vallI tvac hArI taru tAm vrajet /

   vidyāpahārī mūkaḥ syādgatvā ca narakānbahan /	vidyA apahArI mUkaH syAt gatvA ca narakAn bahan /

   parasvaharaṇāśaucaṃ devatānāṃ ca kutsanam /	para sva haraNa ASOcam devatAnAm ca kutsanam /

   upalakṣaṇādvijānīyānmuktānāṃ narakādanu // GarP_1,225.35 //	upalakzaNAt vijAnIyAt muktAnAm narakAt anu // GarP_1,225.35 //
   dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ paralokaṃ prati kriyā /	dayA BUtezu saMvAdaH para lokam prati kriyA /
   satyaṃ hitārthamuktiśca vedaprāmāṇyadarśanam // GarP_1,225.36 //	satyam hita arTa muktiH ca veda prAmANya darSanam // GarP_1,225.36 //
   gurudevarṣisiddharṣisevanaṃ sādhusaṃyamaḥ /	guru deva Rzi sidDa Rzi sevanam sADu saMyamaH /

   aṣṭāṅgayogavijñānātprāpnotyātyantikaṃ phalam // GarP_1,225.37 //	azwAFga yoga vijQAnAt prApnoti Atyantikam Palam // GarP_1,225.37 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   karmavipākādikathanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	karmavipAkAdikaTanam nAma paQcaviMSati aDika dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  226	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 226
   sūta uvāca vakṣye sāṅgaṃ mahāyogaṃ bhuktimuktikaraṃ param /	sUtaH uvAca vakzye sAFgam mahA yogam Bukti mukti karam param /
   sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ bhaktyānupaṭhitaṃ śṛṇu // GarP_1,226.1 //	sarva pApa praSamanam BaktyA anupaWitam SRNu // GarP_1,226.1 //
   mameti mūlaṃ duḥ khasya na mameti nivartanam /	mama iti mUlam duH Kasya na mama iti nivartanam /
   dattātreyo hyalarkāya imamāha mahāmatiḥ // GarP_1,226.2 //	dattAtreyaH hi alarkAya imam Aha mahAmatiH // GarP_1,226.2 //
   ahamityaṅkurotpanno mameti skandhavānmahān /	aham iti aFkura utpannaH mama iti skanDavAn mahAn /
   gṛhakṣetrāṇi śākhāśca yatra dārābhipallavaḥ // GarP_1,226.3 //	gRha kzetrANi SAKAH ca yatra dAra aBipallavaH // GarP_1,226.3 //
   dhanadhānye mahāpatre pāpamūlo 'tidurgamaḥ /	Dana DAnye mahApatre pApa mUlaH ati durgamaH /
   vidhivatsukhaśāntyarthaṃ jāto 'jñānamahātaruḥ // GarP_1,226.4 //	viDivat suKa SAnti arTam jAtaH ajQAna mahA taruH // GarP_1,226.4 //
   chinno vidyākuṭhāreṇa te gatā layamīśvare /	CinnaH vidyA kuWAreNa te gatA layam ISvare /
   prāpya brahmarasaṃ pītaṃ nīrajaskamakaṇṭakam // GarP_1,226.5 //	prApya brahma rasam pItam nIrajaskama kaNwakam // GarP_1,226.5 //
   prāpnuvanti parāḥ prājñāḥ sukhanirvṛtimeva ca /	prApnuvanti parAH prAjQAH suKa nirvRtim eva ca /
   mūrtendriyalayaṃ nūnaṃ na tvaṃ rājan na cāpyaham // GarP_1,226.6 //	mUrta indriya layam nUnam na tvam rAjan na ca api aham // GarP_1,226.6 //
   na tanmātrādikaṃ vācā naivāntaḥ karaṇaṃ tathā /	na tanmAtra Adikam vAcA na eva antar karaNam taTA /
   kaṃ vā paśyasi rājendra pradhānamidamāvayoḥ // GarP_1,226.7 //	kam vA paSyasi rAja indra praDAnam idam AvayoH // GarP_1,226.7 //
   mṛtaḥ pare 'hni kṣetrajñaḥ saṃjāto 'yaṃ guṇātmakaḥ /	mRtaH pare ahni kzetrajQaH saMjAtaH ayam guNa AtmakaH /
   ekatve 'pi pṛthagbhāvastathā kṣetrātmano nṛpa // GarP_1,226.8 //	eka tve api pRTak BAvaH taTA kzetra AtmanaH nRpa // GarP_1,226.8 //
   jñānapūrvaviyogo 'sau jñāne naṣṭe ca yoginaḥ /	jQAna pUrva viyogaH asO jQAne nazwe ca yoginaH /
   sā muktirbrahmaṇā caikya manaikyaṃ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ // GarP_1,226.9 //	sA muktiH brahmaNA ca ekya manEkyam prAkRtEH guNEH // GarP_1,226.9 //
   tadgṛhaṃ yatra vasati tadbhojyaṃ yena jīvati /	tad gRham yatra vasati tad Bojyam yena jIvati /
   yanmuktaye tadevoktaṃ jñānājñāne na cānyathā // GarP_1,226.10 //	yat muktaye tat eva uktam jQAna ajQAne na ca anyaTA // GarP_1,226.10 //
   upabhogena puṇyānā mapuṇyānāñca pārthiva /	upaBogena puNyAnAH mapuNyAnAQca pArTiva /
   kartavyānāñca nityānāṃ kṣayantvakaraṇāttathā // GarP_1,226.11 //	kartavyAnAQca nityAnAm kzayantu akaraNAt taTA // GarP_1,226.11 //
   ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau /	ahiMsA satyam asteyam brahmacarya aparigrahO /
   yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ dvividhamīritam // GarP_1,226.12 //	yamAH paQca aTa niyamAH SOcam dviviDam Iritam // GarP_1,226.12 //
   santoṣastapasā śāntirvāsudevārcanaṃ damaḥ /	santozaH tapasA SAntiH vAsudeva arcanam damaH /
   āsana padmakādyuktaṃ prāṇāyāmo marujjayaḥ // GarP_1,226.13 //	Asana padmaka Adi uktam prANAyAmaH marut jayaH // GarP_1,226.13 //
   pratyekaṃ trividhaḥ so 'pi pūrakumbhakarecakaiḥ /	pratyekam triviDaH saH api pUra kumBaka recakEH /
   laghuryo daśamātrastu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ // GarP_1,226.14 //	laGuH yaH daSa mAtraH tu dviguNaH sa tu maDyamaH // GarP_1,226.14 //
   triguṇābhistu mātrābhiruttamaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ /	triguNABiH tu mAtrABiH uttamaH saH udAhRtaH /
   japadhyānayutau garbho viparītastvarbhakaḥ // GarP_1,226.15 //	japa DyAna yutO garBaH viparItaH tu arBakaH // GarP_1,226.15 //
   prathame najayetsvapnaṃ madhyamena ca vepathum /	praTame najayet svapnam maDyamena ca vepaTum /
   vipākaṃ hi tṛtīyena jātāndoṣāstvanukramāt // GarP_1,226.16 //	vipAkam hi tRtIyena jAtAn dozAH tu anukramAt // GarP_1,226.16 //
   āsanasthantuyuñjīta kṛtvā ca praṇavaṃ hṛdī /	Asana sTantuyuQjIta kRtvA ca praNavam hRdI /
   pārṣṇibhyāṃ liṅgavṛṣaṇau sparśannakāgramānasaḥ // GarP_1,226.17 //	pArzNiByAm liFga vRzaNO sparSannaka agra mAnasaH // GarP_1,226.17 //
   rajasā tamaso vṛttiṃ sattvena rajasastathā /	rajasA tamasaH vRttim sattvena rajasaH taTA /
   nirudhya niścalo bhūtvā sthito yuñjīta yogavit // GarP_1,226.18 //	niruDya niScalaH BUtvA sTitaH yuQjIta yoga vid // GarP_1,226.18 //
   indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ prāṇādīnamna eva ca /	indriyANi indriya arTeByaH prANa AdI namnaH eva ca /
   nigṛhya samavāyena pratyāhāra mupakramet // GarP_1,226.19 //	nigRhya samavAyena pratyAhAra mupakramet // GarP_1,226.19 //
   prāṇāyāmā daśāṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate /	prANAyAmAH daSa azwO ca DAraNA sA viDIyate /
   dve dhāraṇe smṛto yogo yogibhistattvadarśibhiḥ // GarP_1,226.20 //	dve DAraNe smRtaH yogaH yogiBiH tattva darSiBiH // GarP_1,226.20 //
   prāṅnāḍyāṃ hṛdaye cātra tṛtīyā ca tathorasi /	prAk nAxyAm hRdaye ca atra tRtIyA ca taTA urasi /
   kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikāgre netre bhrūmadhyamūrdhasu // GarP_1,226.21 //	kaNWe muKe nA sikA agre netre BrU maDya mUrDasu // GarP_1,226.21 //
   kiñcittasmātparasmiṃśca dhāraṇā daśadhā smṛtā /	kiQcid tasmAt parasmin= ca DAraNA daSaDA smRtA /
   daśaitā dhāraṇāḥ prāpya prāpnotyakṣararūpatām // GarP_1,226.22 //	daSa etAH DAraNAH prApya prApnoti akzara rUpa tAm // GarP_1,226.22 //
   yathāgniragnau saṃkṣiptastathātmā paramātmani /	yaTA agniH agnO saMkziptaH taTA AtmA paramAtmani /
   brahmarūpaṃ mahāpuṇyamomityekākṣaraṃ japet // GarP_1,226.23 //	brahma rUpam mahA puNyam omiti eka akzaram japet // GarP_1,226.23 //
   akāraśca tathokāro makāraścākṣaratrayam /	akAraH ca taTA ukAraH makAraH ca akzara trayam /
   etāstistrastato mātrāḥ sattvarājasatāmasāḥ // GarP_1,226.24 //	etAH tiH traH tatas mAtrAH sattva rAjasa tAmasAH // GarP_1,226.24 //
   nirguṇā yogigamyādyārdhamātrā parā sthitā /	nirguNA yogi gamya adya arDa mAtrA parA sTitAH /
   gāndhārīti ca vijñeyā gāndhārasvarasaṃśrayā /	gAnDArI iti ca vijQeyAH gAnDAra svara saMSrayAH /
   ityetadakṣaraṃ brahma paramoṅkārasaṃjñitam // GarP_1,226.25 //	iti etat akzaram brahma parama uFkAra saMjQitam // GarP_1,226.25 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sthūladehavivarjitam /	aham brahma param jyotiH sTUla deha vivarjitam /
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjarāmaraṇavarjitam // GarP_1,226.26 //	aham brahma param jyotiH jarA maraNa varjitam // GarP_1,226.26 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyā malavarjitam /	aham brahma param jyotiH pRTivyAH mala varjitam /
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvāyvākāśavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.27 //	aham brahma param jyotiH vAyu AkASa vivarjitam // GarP_1,226.27 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sūkṣmadehavivarjitam /	aham brahma param jyotiH sUkzma deha vivarjitam /
   ahaṃ brahmaparaṃ jyotiḥ sthānāsthānavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.28 //	aham brahma param jyotiH sTAna AsTAna vivarjitam // GarP_1,226.28 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirgandhamātravivarjitam /	aham brahma param jyotiH ganDa mAtra vivarjitam /
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakparivarjitam // GarP_1,226.29 //	aham brahma param jyotiH Srotra tvac parivarjitam // GarP_1,226.29 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjihvāghrāṇavivarjitam /	aham brahma param jyotiH jihvA GrANa vivarjitam /
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.30 //	aham brahma param jyotiH prANa apAna vivarjitam // GarP_1,226.30 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvyānodānavivarjitam /	aham brahma param jyotiH vyAna udAna vivarjitam /
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirajñānaparivarjitam // GarP_1,226.31 //	aham brahma param jyotiH ajQAna parivarjitam // GarP_1,226.31 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotisturīyaṃ paramaṃ padam /	aham brahma param jyotiH turIyam paramam padam /
   dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitam // GarP_1,226.32 //	deha indriya manaH budDi prANa ahaFkAra varjitam // GarP_1,226.32 //
   nityaśuddhabuddhaṃmuktamahāmānandamadvayam /	nitya SudDa budDaMmukta mahAm Anandam advayam /
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjñānarūpo vimuktaye // GarP_1,226.33 //	aham brahma param jyotiH jQAna rUpaH vimuktaye // GarP_1,226.33 //
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   ityaṣṭāṅgo mayā yoga uktaḥ śaunaka muktidaḥ /	iti azwa aFgaH mayA yogaH uktaH SOnaka mukti daH /
   nityanaimittikaṃ gatvā layaṃ prākṛtabandhanāḥ // GarP_1,226.34 //	nitya nEmittikam gatvA layam prAkRta banDanAH // GarP_1,226.34 //
   utpadyante hi saṃsāre naikaṃ yātvā parātmanām /	utpadyante hi saMsAre na ekam yAtvA para AtmanAm /
   vimucyate vimuktaśca jñānādajñānamohitaḥ // GarP_1,226.35 //	vimucyate vimuktaH ca jQAnAt ajQAna mohitaH // GarP_1,226.35 //
   tato naṃ mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān /	tatas nam mriyate duH KI na rogI na ca vanDavAn /
   na pāpairyujyate yogī narake na vipacyate // GarP_1,226.36 //	na pApEH yujyate yogI narake na vipacyate // GarP_1,226.36 //
   garbhavāse sa no duḥ khī sa syānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ /	garBa vAse sa naH duH KI sa syAt nArAyaNaH avyayaH /
   bhaktyā tvananyayā labhyo bhagavānbhuktimuktidaḥ // GarP_1,226.37 //	BaktyA tu ananyayA laByaH BagavAn Bukti mukti daH // GarP_1,226.37 //
   dhyānena pūjayā japyaiḥ samyak stotrairyatavrataiḥ /	DyAnena pUjayA japyEH samyak stotrEH yata vratEH /
   yajñairdānaiścittaśuddhistayā jñānañca labhyate // GarP_1,226.38 //	yajQEH dAnEH citta SudDiH tayA jQAnaQca laByate // GarP_1,226.38 //
   praṇavādikamantraiśca japyairmuktiṃ gatā dvijāḥ /	praNava Adika mantrEH ca japyEH muktim gatAH dvijAH /
   indro 'pi paramaṃ sthānaṃ gandharvāpsaraso varāḥ // GarP_1,226.39 //	indraH api paramam sTAnam ganDarva apsarasaH varAH // GarP_1,226.39 //
   prāptā devāśca devatvaṃ munitvaṃ munayo gatāḥ /	prAptAH devAH ca deva tvam muni tvam munayaH gatAH /
   gandharvatvañca gandharvā rājatvañca nṛpādayaḥ // GarP_1,226.40 //	ganDarva tvaQca ganDarvAH rAjatvaQca nRpa AdayaH // GarP_1,226.40 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye
   ācārakāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	AcArakANxezwAFgayogakaTanam nAma zaxviMSati aDika dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  227	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 227
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   viṣṇubhaktiṃ pravakṣyāmi yayā sarvamavāpyate /	vizNu Baktim pravakzyAmi yayA sarvam avApyate /
   yathā bhaktyā haristuṣyettathā nānyena kenacit // GarP_1,227.1 //	yaTA BaktyA hariH tuzyet taTA na anyena kenacid // GarP_1,227.1 //
   mahataḥ śreyaso mūlaṃ prasavaḥ puṇyasantateḥ /	mahataH SreyasaH mUlam prasavaH puNya santateH /
   jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.2 //	jIvitasya Palam svAdu niyatam smaraNam hareH // GarP_1,227.2 //
   tasmātsevā budhaiḥ proktā bhaktisādhanabhūyasī /	tasmAt sevA buDEH proktA Bakti sADana BUyasI /
   te bhaktā lokanāthasya nāmakarmādikīrtane // GarP_1,227.3 //	te BaktAH lokanATasya nAma karma Adi kIrtane // GarP_1,227.3 //
   muñcantyaśrūṇi saṃharṣādye prahṛṣṭanūruhāḥ /	muQcanti aSrUNi saMharza At ye prahRzwa nUruhAH /
   jagaddhāturmaheśasya divyājñācaraṇā vayam // GarP_1,227.4 //	jagadDAtuH maheSasya divya AjQa AcaraNAH vayam // GarP_1,227.4 //
   iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhā ye vaiṣṇavāstu te /	iha nityakriyAH kuryuH snigDAH ye vEzNavAH tu te /
   brahmākṣaraṃ na śṛṇvanvai tayā bhagavateritam // GarP_1,227.5 //	brahma akzaram na SRNvan vE tayA BagavatA Iritam // GarP_1,227.5 //
   praṇāmapūrvakaṃ bhaktyā yo vadedvaiṣṇavo hi saḥ /	praNAma pUrvakam BaktyA yaH vadet vEzNavaH hi saH /
   tadbhaktajanavātsalyaṃ pūjanaṃ cānumodanam // GarP_1,227.6 //	tad Bakta jana vAtsalyam pUjanam ca anumodanam // GarP_1,227.6 //
   tatkathāśravaṇe prītiraśrunetrāṅgavikriyāḥ /	tad kaTA SravaNe prItiH aSru netra aFga vikriyAH /
   yena sarvātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvo niveśitaḥ // GarP_1,227.7 //	yena sarva AtmanA vizNO BaktyA BAvaH niveSitaH // GarP_1,227.7 //
   viprebhyaśca kṛtātmatvānmahābhāgavato hi saḥ /	vipreByaH ca kRtAtma tvAt mahA BAgavataH hi saH /
   viśvopakaraṇaṃ nityaṃ tadarthaṃ saṅgavarjanam /	viSva upakaraNam nityam tad arTam saFga varjanam /
   svayamabhyarcanañcaiva yo viṣṇuñcopajīvati // GarP_1,227.8 //	svayam aByarcanaQca eva yaH vizNuQcA upajIvati // GarP_1,227.8 //
   bhaktiraṣṭavidhā hyeṣā yasminmleccho 'pi vartate /	BaktiH azwaviDA hi ezA yasmin mlecCaH api vartate /
   sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,227.9 //	sa vipra indraH muniH SrImAn sa yAti paramAm gatim // GarP_1,227.9 //
   tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hariḥ /	tasmE deyam tatas grAhyam sa ca pUjyaH yaTA hariH /
   smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamaḥ /	smRtaH saMBAzitaH vA api pUjitaH vA dvijottamaH /
   punāti bhagavadbhaktaścaṇḍālo 'pi yadṛcchayā // GarP_1,227.10 //	punAti Bagavat BaktaH caNxAlaH api yadRcCayA // GarP_1,227.10 //
   dayāṃ kuru prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yo vadet /	dayAm kuru prapannAya tava asmi iti ca yaH vadet /
   abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadyādetad vrataṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.11 //	aBayam sarva BUteByaH dadyAt etat vratam hareH // GarP_1,227.11 //
   mantrajāpisahasrebhyaḥ sarvavedāntapāragaḥ /	mantra jApi sahasreByaH sarva vedAnta pAragaH /
   sarvavedāntavitkoṭyāṃ viṣṇubhakto viśiṣyate // GarP_1,227.12 //	sarva vedAnta vid kowyAm vizNu BaktaH viSizyate // GarP_1,227.12 //
   ekāntinaḥ svavapuṣā gacchanti paramaṃ padam /	ekAntinaH sva vapuzA gacCanti paramam padam /
   ekāntena samo viṣṇustasmādeṣāṃ parāyaṇaḥ // GarP_1,227.13 //	ekAntena samaH vizNuH tasmAt ezAm parAyaNaH // GarP_1,227.13 //
   yasmādekāntinaḥ proktāstadbhāgavatacetasaḥ /	yasmAt ekAntinaH proktAH tad BAgavata cetasaH /
   priyāṇāmapi sarveṣāṃ devadevasya supriyaḥ // GarP_1,227.14 //	priyANAm api sarvezAm devadevasya supriyaH // GarP_1,227.14 //
   āpatsvapi sadā bhasya bhaktiravyabhicāriṇā /	Apatsu api sadA Basya BaktiH avyaBicAriNA /
   yā prītiradhikā viṣṇorviṣayeṣvanapāyinī // GarP_1,227.15 //	yA prItiH aDikA vizNoH vizayezu anapAyinI // GarP_1,227.15 //
   viṣṇuṃ saṃsmarataḥ sā me hṛdayānnopasarpati /	vizNum saMsmarataH sA me hRdayAt na upasarpati /
   dṛḍhabhakto 'pi vedādisarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ // GarP_1,227.16 //	dRXa BaktaH api veda Adi sarva SAstra arTa pAragaH // GarP_1,227.16 //
   yo na sarveśvare bhaktastaṃ vidyātpuruṣādhamam /	yaH na sarveSvare BaktaH tam vidyAt puruza aDamam /
   nādhītavedaśāstro 'pi na kṛto 'dhvarasambhavaḥ /	na aDIta veda SAstraH api na kRtaH aDvara samBavaH /
   yo bhaktiṃ vahate viṣṇau tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,227.17 //	yaH Baktim vahate vizNO tena sarvam kRtam Bavet // GarP_1,227.17 //
   yajvānaḥ kratumukhyānāṃ vedānāṃ pāragā api /	yajvAnaH kratu muKyAnAm vedAnAm pAragAH api /
   na tāṃ yānti gatiṃ bhaktā yāṃ yānti munisattamāḥ // GarP_1,227.18 //	na tAm yAnti gatim BaktAH yAm yAnti muni sattamAH // GarP_1,227.18 //
   yaḥ kaścidvaiṣṇavo loke mithyācāro 'pyanāśramī /	yaH kaScid vEzNavaH loke miTyA AcAraH api anASramI /
   punāti sakalāṃllokānsahasrāṃśurivoditaḥ // GarP_1,227.19 //	punAti sakalAn= lokAn sahasrAMSuH iva uditaH // GarP_1,227.19 //
   ye nṛśaṃsā durātmānaḥ pāpācararatāstathā /	ye nRSaMsAH durAtmAnaH pApa Acara ratAH taTA /
   te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,227.20 //	te api yAnti param sTAnam nArAyaNa parAyaNAH // GarP_1,227.20 //
   dṛḍhā janārdane bhaktiryadaivāvyabhicāriṇī /	dRXA janArdane BaktiH yadA eva avyaBicAriNI /
   tadā kiyatsvargasukhaṃ saiva nirvāṇahetukā // GarP_1,227.21 //	tadA kiyat svarga suKam sA eva nirvANa hetukAH // GarP_1,227.21 //
   bhrāmyatāṃ tatra saṃsāre narāṇāṃ kurmadurgame /	BrAmyatAm tatra saMsAre narANAm kurma durgame /
   hastāvalambane hyekaṃ yena tuṣyejjanārdanaḥ /	hasta avalambane hi ekam yena tuzyet janArdanaH /
   na śṛṇoti guṇāndivyāndevadevasya cakriṇaḥ /	na SRNoti guNAn divyAn devadevasya cakriNaH /
   sa maro badhiro jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // GarP_1,227.22 //	sa maraH baDiraH jQeyaH sarva Darma bahizkRtaH // GarP_1,227.22 //

   dhyānameva paro dharmo dhyānameva paraṃ tapaḥ /	DyAnam eva paraH DarmaH DyAnam eva param tapaH /
   dhyānameva paraṃ śaucaṃ tasmāddhyānaparo bhavet // GarP_1,230.10 //	DyAnam eva param SOcam tasmAt DyAna paraH Bavet // GarP_1,230.10 //
   nāsti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ dhtheyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparam /	na asti vizNoH param DTeyam tapaH na anaSanAt param /
   tasmātpradhānamatroktaṃ vāsudevasya cintanam // GarP_1,230.11 //	tasmAt praDAnam atra uktam vAsudevasya cintanam // GarP_1,230.11 //
   yaddurlabhaṃ paraṃ prāpyaṃ manaso yanna gocaram /	yat durlaBam param prApyam manasaH yat na gocaram /
   tadapyaprārthitaṃ dhyāto dadāti madhusūdanaḥ // GarP_1,230.12 //	tat api aprArTitam DyAtaH dadAti maDusUdanaH // GarP_1,230.12 //
   pramādātkurvatāṃ karma pracyavetādhvareṣu yat /	pramAdAt kurvatAm karma pracyaveta aDvarezu yat /
   smaraṇādeva tadviṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ syāditi śrutiḥ // GarP_1,230.13 //	smaraNAt eva tat vizNoH saMpUrNam syAt iti SrutiH // GarP_1,230.13 //
   dhyānena sadṛśo nāsti śodhanaṃ pāpakarmaṇām /	DyAnena sadRSaH na asti SoDanam pApa karmaNAm /
   āgāmidehahetūnāṃ dāhako yogapāvakaḥ // GarP_1,230.14 //	AgAmi deha hetUnAm dAhakaH yoga pAvakaH // GarP_1,230.14 //
   viniṣpannasamādhistu muktimatraiva janmani /	vinizpanna samADiH tu muktim atra eva janmani /
   prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmā ca yo 'cirāt // GarP_1,230.15 //	prApnoti yogI yoga agni dagDa karmA ca yaH acirAt // GarP_1,230.15 //
   yathāgnirudyataśikhaḥ kakṣaṃ dahati vānilaḥ /	yaTA agniH udyata SiKaH kakzam dahati vA anilaH /
   tathā cittasthite viṣṇau yoginā sarvakilbiṣam // GarP_1,230.16 //	taTA citta sTite vizNO yoginA sarva kilbizam // GarP_1,230.16 //
   yathāgniyogātkanakamamalaṃ saṃprajāyate /	yaTA agni yogAt kanakam amalam saMprajAyate /
   saṃpluṣṭo vāsudevena manuṣyāṇāṃ sadā malaḥ // GarP_1,230.17 //	saMpluzwaH vAsudevena manuzyANAm sadA malaH // GarP_1,230.17 //
   gaṅgāsnānasahasreṣu puṣkarasnānakoṭiṣu /	gaFgA snAna sahasrezu puzkara snAna kowizu /
   yatpāpaṃ nilayayāti smṛte naśyati taddharau // GarP_1,230.18 //	yat pApam nilaya yAti smRte naSyati tad harO // GarP_1,230.18 //
   prāṇāyāmasahasnaistu yatpāpaṃ naśyati dhruvam /	prANAyAma sahasnEH tu yat pApam naSyati Druvam /
   kṣaṇamātreṇa tatpāpaṃ harerdhyānātpraṇaśyati // GarP_1,230.19 //	kzaNa mAtreNa tat pApam hareH DyAnAt praNaSyati // GarP_1,230.19 //
   kaliprabhāvādduṣṭoktiḥ pāṣaṇḍānāṃ tathoktayaḥ /	kali praBAvAt duzwa uktiH pAzaNxAnAm taTA uktayaH /
   na krāmenmānasaṃ tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ // GarP_1,230.20 //	na krAmet mAnasam tasya yasya cetasi keSavaH // GarP_1,230.20 //
   sā tithistadahorātraṃ sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ /	sA tiTiH tat ahorAtram sa yogaH sa ca candramAH /
   lagnaṃ tadeva vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ // GarP_1,230.21 //	lagnam tat eva viKyAtam yatra saMsmaryate hariH // GarP_1,230.21 //
   sā hānistanmahacchidraṃ sā cārthajaḍamūkatā /	sA hAniH tat mahat Cidram sA ca arTa jaxa mUka tA /
   canmuhūrtaṃ kṣaṇo vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // GarP_1,230.22 //	cat muhUrtam kzaNaH vA api vAsudevaH na cintyate // GarP_1,230.22 //
   kalau kṛta yugaṃ tasya kalistasya kṛte yuge /	kalO kRta yugam tasya kaliH tasya kRte yuge /
   hṛdi no yasya govindo yasya cetasi nācyutaḥ // GarP_1,230.23 //	hRdi naH yasya govindaH yasya cetasi na acyutaH // GarP_1,230.23 //
   yasyāgratastathā pṛṣṭhe gacchatastiṣṭhato 'pi vā /	yasya agratas taTA pRzWe gacCataH tizWataH api vA /
   govinde niyataṃ cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadaiva saḥ // GarP_1,230.24 //	govinde niyatam cetaH kRtakRtyaH sadA eva saH // GarP_1,230.24 //
   vāsudeve mano yasya japahomārcanādiṣu /	vAsudeve manaH yasya japa homa arcana Adizu /
   tasyāntarāyo maitreya vevendratvādikaṃ phalam // GarP_1,230.25 //	tasya antarAyaH mEtreya veva indra tva Adikam Palam // GarP_1,230.25 //
   asaṃtyajya ca gārhasthayaṃ sa taptvā ca mahattapaḥ /	asaMtyajya ca gArhasTayam sa taptvA ca mahat tapaH /
   chinatti pauruṣīṃ māyāṃ keśavārpitamānasaḥ // GarP_1,230.26 //	Cinatti pOruzIm mAyAm keSava arpita mAnasaH // GarP_1,230.26 //
   kṣamāṃ kurvanti kruddheṣu dayāṃ mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ /	kzamAm kurvanti krudDezu dayAm mUrKezu mAnavAH /
   mudañca dharmaśīleṣu govinde hṛdayasthite // GarP_1,230.27 //	mudaQca Darma SIlezu govinde hRdaya sTite // GarP_1,230.27 //
   dhyāyennārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ snānadānādikarmasu /	DyAyet nArAyaNam devam snAna dAna Adi karmasu /
   prāyaściteteṣu sarveṣu duṣkṛteṣu viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,230.28 //	prAyaScitetezu sarvezu duzkRtezu viSezataH // GarP_1,230.28 //
   lābhasteṣāṃ jayasteṣāṃ kutasteṣāṃ parābhavaḥ /	lABaH tezAm jayaH tezAm kutas tezAm parABavaH /
   yeṣāmindīvaraśyāmo hṛdayastho janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,230.29 //	yezAm indIvara SyAmaH hRdaya sTaH janArdanaH // GarP_1,230.29 //
   kīṭapakṣigaṇānāñca harau saṃnyastacetasām /	kIwa pakzi gaNa anAQca harO saMnyasta cetasAm /
   ūrdhvā hyeva gatiścāsti kiṃ punarjñānināṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,230.30 //	UrDvA hi eva gatiH ca asti kim punar jQAninAm nRNAm // GarP_1,230.30 //
   vāsudevatarucchāyā nātiśītātitāpadā /	vAsudeva taru= CAyA na ati SIta atita ApadA /
   narakadvāraśamanī sā kimarthaṃ na sevyate // GarP_1,230.31 //	naraka dvAra SamanI sA kimarTam na sevyate // GarP_1,230.31 //
   na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpo rājyañcāpi śacīpateḥ /	na ca durvAsasaH SApaH rAjyaQca api SacIpateH /
   hantuṃ samarthaṃ hi sakhe hṛtkṛte madhusūdane // GarP_1,230.32 //	hantum samarTam hi saKe hRd kRte maDusUdane // GarP_1,230.32 //
   vadatastiṣṭhato 'nyadvā svecchayā karma kurvataḥ /	vadataH tizWataH anyat vA sva icCayA karma kurvataH /
   nāpayāti yadā cintā siddhāṃ manyeta dhāraṇām // GarP_1,230.33 //	na apayAti yadA cintA sidDAm manyeta DAraNAm // GarP_1,230.33 //
   dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛmaṇḍalamadhyavarto nārāyaṇaḥ sarasijāsanasanniviṣṭaḥ /	DyeyaH sadA savitR maNxala maDya vartaH nArAyaNaH sarasija Asana sannivizwaH /
   keyūravānmakarakuṇḍalavānkirīṭī hārī hiraṇmayavapurdhṛtaśaṅkhacakraḥ //	keyUravAn makara kuNxalavAn kirIwI hArI hiraNmaya vapuH DRta SaFKa cakraH //
   GarP_1,230.34 //	GarP_1,230.34 //
   na hi dhyānena sadṛśaṃ pavitramiha vidyate /	na hi DyAnena sadRSam pavitram iha vidyate /
   śvapacānnāni bhuñjāno pāpī naivātra lipyate // GarP_1,230.35 //	Svapaca annAni BuQjAnaH pApI na eva atra lipyate // GarP_1,230.35 //
   sadā cittaṃ samāsaktaṃ jantorviṣayagocare /	sadA cittam samAsaktam jantoH vizaya gocare /
   yadi nārāyaṇe 'pyevaṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.36 //	yadi nArAyaNe api evam kaH na mucyeta banDanAt // GarP_1,230.36 //
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   viṣṇubhaktiryasya citte kaṃ vā jīvo nametsadā /	vizNu BaktiH yasya citte kam vA jIvaH namet sadA /
   sa tārayati cātmānaṃ tadaiva duritārṇavāt // GarP_1,230.37 //	sa tArayati ca AtmAnam tadA eva durita arNavAt // GarP_1,230.37 //
   tañjñānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sā kathā yatra kāśavaḥ /	taQjQAnam yatra govindaH sA kaTAH yatra kASavaH /
   tatkarma yattadarthāya kimanyairbahubhāṣitaiḥ // GarP_1,230.38 //	tat karma yat tad arTAya kim anyEH bahu BAzitEH // GarP_1,230.38 //
   sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam /	sA jihvA yA harim stOti tat cittam yat tat arpitam /
   tāveva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau // GarP_1,230.39 //	tO= eva kevalO SlAGyO yO tad pUjA karO karO // GarP_1,230.39 //
   praṇāmamīśasya śiraḥ phalaṃ vidustadarcanaṃ pāṇiphalaṃ divaukasaḥ /	praNAmam ISasya SiraH Palam viduH tad arcanam pANiPalam divOkasaH /
   manaḥ phalaṃ tadguṇakarmacintanaṃ vacastu govindaguṇastutiḥ phalam //	manaH Palam tad guNa karma cintanam vacaH tu govinda guNa stutiH Palam //
   GarP_1,230.40 //	GarP_1,230.40 //
   merumandaramātro 'pi rāśiḥ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ /	meru mandara mAtraH api rASiH pApasya karmaNaH /
   keśavasmaraṇādeva tasya sarvaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_1,230.41 //	keSava smaraNAt eva tasya sarvam vinaSyati // GarP_1,230.41 //
   yatkiñcitkurute karma puruṣaḥ sādhvasādhu vā /	yat kiQcitkurute karma puruzaH sADu asADu vA /
   sarvaṃ nārāyaṇe nyasya kurvannapi na limpati // GarP_1,230.42 //	sarvam nArAyaNe nyasya kurvan= api na limpati // GarP_1,230.42 //
   tṛṇādicaturāsyāntaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham /	tRNa Adi caturAsya antam BUta grAmam caturviDam /
   carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ māyayā tava // GarP_1,230.43 //	carAcaram jagat sarvam prasuptam mAyayA tava // GarP_1,230.43 //
   yasminnyastamatirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra navā	yasmin nyasta matiH na yAti narakam svargaH api yat cintane viGnaH yatra navA
   viśetkathamapi brāhmo 'piloko 'lpakaḥ /	viSet kaTam api brAhmaH api lokaH alpakaH /
   muktiñcetasi saṃsthito jaḍadhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiñcitraṃ yadayaṃ	muktiQcetasi saMsTitaH jaxa DiyAm puMsAm dadAti avyayaH kiQcitram yat ayam
   prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // GarP_1,230.44 //	prayAti vilayam tatra acyute kIrtite // GarP_1,230.44 //
   agnikāryaṃ japaḥ snānaṃ viṣṇordhyānañca pūjanam /	agni kAryam japaH snAnam vizNoH DyAnaQca pUjanam /
   gantuṃ duḥ khodadheḥ kuryurye ca tatra naranti te // GarP_1,230.45 //	gantum duH KodaDeH kuryuH ye ca tatra naranti te // GarP_1,230.45 //
   rāṣṭrasya śaraṇaṃ rājā pitaro bālakasya ca /	rAzwrasya SaraNam rAjA pitaraH bAlakasya ca /
   dharmaśca sarvamartyānāṃ sarvasya śaraṇaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,230.46 //	DarmaH ca sarva martyAnAm sarvasya SaraNam hariH // GarP_1,230.46 //
   ye namanti jagadyoniṃ vāsudevaṃ sanātanam /	ye namanti jagadyonim vAsudevam sanAtanam /
   na yebhyo vidyate tīrthamadhikaṃ munisattam // GarP_1,230.47 //	na yeByaH vidyate tIrTam aDikam muni sattam // GarP_1,230.47 //
   anargharatnapūjāñca kuryātsvādhyāyameva ca /	anarGa ratna pUjAQca kuryAt svADyAyam eva ca /
   tamevoddiśya govindaṃ dhyāyannityamatandritaḥ // GarP_1,230.48 //	tam eva uddiSya govindam DyAyat nityam atandritaH // GarP_1,230.48 //
   śūdraṃ vā bhagavadbhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /	SUdram vA Bagavat Baktam nizAdam Svapacam taTA /
   dvijajāti samaṃmanyo na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,230.49 //	dvija jAti samaMmanyaH na yAti narakam naraH // GarP_1,230.49 //
   ādareṇa sadā stauti dhanavantaṃ dhanecchayā /	AdareNa sadA stOti Danavantam Dana icCayA /
   tathā viśvasya kartāraṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.50 //	taTA viSvasya kartAram kaH na mucyeta banDanAt // GarP_1,230.50 //
   yathā prāptavano vahnirdahatyārdramapīndhanam /	yaTA prApta vanaH vahniH dahati Ardram api inDanam /
   tathāvidhaḥ sthito viṣṇuryogināṃ sarvakilviṣam // GarP_1,230.51 //	taTAviDaH sTitaH vizNuH yoginAm sarva kilvizam // GarP_1,230.51 //
   ādīptaṃ parvataṃ yadvannāśrayanti mṛgādayaḥ /	AdIptam parvatam yat vat na ASrayanti mRga AdayaH /
   tadvatpāpani sarvāṇi yogābhyāsarataṃ naram // GarP_1,230.52 //	tadvat pApani sarvANi yoga aByAsa ratam naram // GarP_1,230.52 //
   yasya yāvāṃśca viśvāsastasya siddhistu tāvatī /	yasya yAvAn= ca viSvAsaH tasya sidDiH tu tAvatI /
   etavāneva kṛṣṇasya prabhāvaḥ parimīyate // GarP_1,230.53 //	etavAn eva kRzNasya praBAvaH parimIyate // GarP_1,230.53 //
   vidveṣādapi govindaṃ damaghoṣātmajaḥ smaran /	vidvezAt api govindam damaGoza AtmajaH smaran /
   śiśupālo gatastattvaṃ kiṃ punastatparāyaṇaḥ // GarP_1,230.54 //	SiSupAlaH gataH tattvam kim punar tad parAyaNaH // GarP_1,230.54 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   viṣṇumahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	vizNumahAtmyavarNanam nAma triMSaduttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  231	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 231
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   nārasiṃhastutiṃ vakṣye śivoktaṃ śaunakādhunā /	nArasiMha stutim vakzye Siva uktam SOnaka aDunA /
   pūrvaṃ mātṛgaṇāḥ sarve śaṅkaraṃ vākyamabruvan // GarP_1,231.1 //	pUrvam mAtR gaNAH sarve SaFkaram vAkyam abruvan // GarP_1,231.1 //
   bhagavan bhakṣayiṣyāmaḥ sadevāsuramānuṣam /	Bagavan BakzayizyAmaH sa deva asura mAnuzam /
   tvatprasādājjagatsarvaṃ tadanujñātumarhasi // GarP_1,231.2 //	tvad prasAdAt jagat sarvam tat anujQAtum arhasi // GarP_1,231.2 //
   śaṅkarauvāca /	SaFkara OvAca /
   bhavatībhiḥ prajāḥ sarvā rakṣaṇīyā na saṃśayaḥ /	BavatIBiH prajAH sarvAH rakzaNIyAH na saMSayaH /
   tasmāḍvorataraprāyaṃ manaḥ śīghraṃ nivartyatām // GarP_1,231.3 //	tasmAt voH atara prAyam manaH SIGram nivartyatAm // GarP_1,231.3 //
   ityevaṃ śaṅkareṇoktamanādṛtya tu tadvacaḥ /	iti evam SaFkareNa uktam anAdRtya tu tad vacaH /
   bhakṣayāmāsuravyagrāstrailokyaṃ sacarācaram // GarP_1,231.4 //	BakzayAmAsuH avyagrAH trElokyam sa carAcaram // GarP_1,231.4 //
   trailokye bhakṣyamāṇe tu tadā mātṛgaṇena vai /	trElokye BakzyamANe tu tadA mAtR gaNena vE /
   nṛsiṃharūpiṇaṃ devaṃ pradadhyau bhagavāñchivaḥ // GarP_1,231.5 //	nRsiMha rUpiNam devam pradaDyO BagavAn SivaH // GarP_1,231.5 //
   anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ sarvabhūtabhavodbhavam /	anAdiniDanam devam sarva BUta Bava udBavam /
   vidyujjihvaṃ mahādaṃṣṭraṃ sphuratkesaramālinam // GarP_1,231.6 //	vidyujjihvam mahA daMzwram sPurat kesara mAlinam // GarP_1,231.6 //
   ratnāṅgadaṃ samukuṭaṃ hemakesarabhūṣitam /	ratna aFgadam sa mukuwam hema kesara BUzitam /
   khoṇisūtreṇa mahatā kāñcanena virājitam // GarP_1,231.7 //	KoNi sUtreNa mahatA kAQcanena virAjitam // GarP_1,231.7 //
   nīlotpaladalaśyāmaṃ ratnanūpurabhūṣitam /	nIlotpala dala SyAmam ratna nUpura BUzitam /
   tejasākrāntasakalabrahmāṇḍodaramaṇḍapam // GarP_1,231.8 //	tejasA AkrAnta sakala brahmANxa udara maNxapam // GarP_1,231.8 //
   āvartasadṛśākāraiḥ saṃyuktaṃ deharomabhiḥ /	Avarta sadRSa AkArEH saMyuktam deha romaBiH /
   sarvapuṣpairyojitāñca dhārayaṃśca mahāstrajam // GarP_1,231.9 //	sarva puzpEH yojitAn ca DArayan= ca mahA astra jam // GarP_1,231.9 //
   sa dhyātamātro bhagavānpradadau tasya darśanam /	sa DyAta mAtraH BagavAn pradadO tasya darSanam /
   yādṛśena rūpeṇa dhyāto rudraistu bhaktitaḥ // GarP_1,231.10 //	yAdRSena rUpeNa DyAtaH rudrEH tu BaktitaH // GarP_1,231.10 //
   tādṛśenaiva rūpeṇa durnirīkṣyeṇa daivataiḥ /	tAdRSena eva rUpeNa durnirIkzyeNa dEvatEH /
   praṇipatya tu deveśaṃ tadā tuṣṭāva śaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,231.11 //	praNipatya tu deveSam tadA tuzwAva SaFkaraH // GarP_1,231.11 //
   śaṅkara uvāca /	SaFkaraH uvAca /
   namaste 'sta jagannātha narasiṃhavapurdhara /	namaH te asta jagannATa narasiMha vapuH Dara /
   daityeśvarendrasaṃhārinakhaśuktivirājita // GarP_1,231.12 //	dEtya ISvara indra saMhAri naKa Sukti virAjita // GarP_1,231.12 //
   nakhamaṇḍalasabhinnahemapiṅgalavigraha /	naKa maNxala saBinna hema piFgala vigrahaH /
   namo 'stu padmanābhāya śobhanāya jagadguro /	namaH astu padmanABAya SoBanAya jagadguro /
   kalpāntāmbhodanirghoṣa sūryakoṭisamaprabha // GarP_1,231.13 //	kalpa anta amBoda nirGoza sUrya kowi sama praBaH // GarP_1,231.13 //
   sahasrayamasaṃtrāsa sahasrendraparākrama /	sahasrayama saMtrAsa sahasra indra parAkramaH /
   hasastradhanadasphīta sahasracaraṇātmaka // GarP_1,231.14 //	hasastra Danada sPIta sahasra caraNa AtmakaH // GarP_1,231.14 //
   sahasracandapratima ! sahasrāṃśuharikrama /	sahasra canda pratima ! sahasrAMSu hari kramaH /
   sahasrarudratejaska sahasrabrahmasaṃstuta // GarP_1,231.15 //	sahasra rudra tejaska sahasra brahma saMstutaH // GarP_1,231.15 //
   sahasrarudrasaṃjapta sahasrākṣanirīkṣaṇa /	sahasra rudra saMjapta sahasrAkza nirIkzaNa /
   sahasrajanmamathana sahasrabandhanamocana // GarP_1,231.16 //	sahasra janma maTana sahasrabanDana mocanaH // GarP_1,231.16 //
   sahasravāyuvegākṣa sahasrājñakṛpākara /	sahasra vAyu vega akza sahasrAjQa kRpA karaH /
   stutvaivaṃ devadeveśaṃ nṛsiṃhavapuṣaṃ harim /	stutvA evam devadeveSam nRsiMha vapuzam harim /
   vijñāpayāmāsa punarvinayāvanataḥ śivaḥ // GarP_1,231.17 //	vijQApayAmAsa punar vinaya avanataH SivaH // GarP_1,231.17 //
   andhakasya vināśāya yā sṛṣṭā mātaro mayā /	anDakasya vinASAya yA sRzwAH mAtaraH mayA /
   anādṛtya tu madvākyaṃ bhakṣyantvadbhutāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,231.18 //	anAdRtya tu mad vAkyam Bakzyan tu adButAH prajAH // GarP_1,231.18 //
   sṛṣṭvā tāśca na śakto 'haṃ saṃhartumaparājitaḥ /	sRzwvA tAH ca na SaktaH aham saMhartum aparAjitaH /

   evamuktaḥ sa rudreṇa narasihavapurhariḥ /	evam uktaH sa rudreNa nara siha vapuH hariH /

   tathā suragaṇānsarvānraudrānmātṛgaṇānvibhuḥ /	taTA sura gaNAn sarvAn rOdrAn mAtR gaNAn viBuH /

   nārasiṃhamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhenniyatendriyaḥ /	nArasiMham idam stotram yaH paWet niyata indriyaH /
