   hastāvupasthamudaraṃ vākcaturtho catuṣṭayam // GarP_1,235.6 //	hastO= upasTam udaram vAc caturTaH catuzwayam // GarP_1,235.6 //
   etatsusaṃyataṃ yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ (dhaḥ) /	etat su saMyatam yasya sa vipraH kaTyate buDEH (DaH) /
   paravittaṃ na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsāṃ kurute tathā // GarP_1,235.7 //	para vittam na gRhNAti na hiMsAm kurute taTA // GarP_1,235.7 //
   nākṣakrīḍārato yastu hastau tasya susaṃyatau /	na akza krIxA rataH yaH tu hastO tasya su saMyatO /
   parastrīvarjanaratastasyopasthaṃ susaṃyatam // GarP_1,235.8 //	para strI varjana rataH tasya upasTam su saMyatam // GarP_1,235.8 //
   alolupamidaṃ bhuṅkte jaṭharaṃ tasya saṃyatam /	alolupam idam BuFkte jaWaram tasya saMyatam /
   satyaṃ hitaṃ mitaṃ brūte yasmādvāktasya saṃyatā // GarP_1,235.9 //	satyam hitam mitam brUte yasmAt vAktasya saMyatAH // GarP_1,235.9 //
   yasya saṃyatānyetāni tasya kiṃ tapasādhvaraiḥ /	yasya saMyatAni etAni tasya kim tapasA aDvarEH /
   aikyaṃ yadbuddhimanasorindriyāṇāṃ ca sarvadā // GarP_1,235.10 //	Ekyam yat budDi manasoH indriyANAm ca sarvadA // GarP_1,235.10 //
   sabījaṃ vāpi nirbojaṃ dhyānametatprakīrtitam /	sa bIjam vA api nirbojam DyAnam etat prakIrtitam /
   bhruvormadhye sthitāṃ buddhiṃ viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ // GarP_1,235.11 //	BruvoH maDye sTitAm budDim vizayezu yunakti yaH // GarP_1,235.11 //
   handriyāṇāmuparame manasi hyavyavasthite // GarP_1,235.12 //	handriyANAm uparame manasi hi avyavasTite // GarP_1,235.12 //
   svapnānpaśyatyasau jīvo bāhyānābhyantarānatha /	svapnAn paSyati asO jIvaH bAhyAna aByantarAn aTa /
   jīvo jāgradavasthāyāmevamāhurvipāścitaḥ // GarP_1,235.13 //	jIvaH jAgrat avasTAyAm evam AhuH vipAH citaH // GarP_1,235.13 //
   hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohito na smaratyapi /	hRdi sTitaH sa tamasA mohitaH na smarati api /
   yadā tasya kuto veti suṣuptiriti kathyate // GarP_1,235.14 //	yadA tasya kutas vA iti suzuptiH iti kaTyate // GarP_1,235.14 //
   jāgrato yasya no tandrā na moho na bhramastathā /	jAgrataH yasya no tandrA na mohaH na BramaH taTA /
   utpadyate na jānāti śabdārthaviṣayānvaśī // GarP_1,235.15 //	utpadyate na jAnAti Sabda arTa vizayAn vaSI // GarP_1,235.15 //
   indriyāṇi samāhṛtya viṣayebhyo manastathā /	indriyANi samAhRtya vizayeByaH manaH taTA /
   buddhyāhaṅkāramapi ca prakṛtyā buddhimeva ca // GarP_1,235.16 //	budDyA ahaFkAram api ca prakRtyA budDim eva ca // GarP_1,235.16 //
   saṃyamya prakṛtiṃ cāpi cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ /	saMyamya prakRtim ca api cicCaktyA kevale sTitaH /
   paśyatyātmāni cātmānamātmanātmaprakāśakam // GarP_1,235.17 //	paSyati AtmAni ca AtmAnam AtmanA Atma prakASakam // GarP_1,235.17 //
   cidrūpamamṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ niṣkriyaṃ vyāpakaṃ śivam /	cit rUpam amRtam SudDam nizkriyam vyApakam Sivam /
   turīyāyāmavasthāyāmāsthito 'sau na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,235.18 //	turIyAyAm avasTAyAm AsTitaH asO na saMSayaH // GarP_1,235.18 //
   śabdādayo guṇāḥ pañca sattvādyāśca guṇāstrayaḥ /	Sabda AdayaH guNAH paQca sattva AdyAH ca guNAH trayaH /
   puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇyaṣṭau ca tāni hi // GarP_1,235.19 //	puryazwakasya padmasya patrANi azwO ca tAni hi // GarP_1,235.19 //
   sāmyāvasthā guṇakṛtā prakṛtistatra karṇikā /	sAmya avasTA guNa kRtA prakRtiH tatra karNikA /
   karṇikāyāṃ sthito devo dehī cidrūpa eva hi // GarP_1,235.20 //	karNikAyAm sTitaH devaH dehI cit rUpaH eva hi // GarP_1,235.20 //
   puryaṣṭakaṃ parityajya prakṛtiñca guṇātmikām /	puryazwakam parityajya prakRtiQca guNa AtmikAm /
   yadā yāti tadā jīvo yāti muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,235.21 //	yadA yAti tadA jIvaH yAti muktim na saMSayaH // GarP_1,235.21 //
   prāṇāyāmo japaścaiva pratyāhāro 'tha dhāraṇā /	prANAyAmaH japaH ca eva pratyAhAraH aTa DAraNA /
   dhyānaṃ samādhirityete ṣaḍ yogasya prasādhakāḥ // GarP_1,235.22 //	DyAnam samADiH iti ete zaw yogasya prasADakAH // GarP_1,235.22 //
   pāpakṣaye devatānāṃ prītirindriyasaṃyamaḥ /	pApa kzaye devatAnAm prItiH indriya saMyamaH /
   japadhyānayuto garbho viparītastvagarbhakaḥ // GarP_1,235.23 //	japa DyAna yutaH garBaH viparItaH tu agarBakaH // GarP_1,235.23 //
   ṣaṭtriṃśanmātrakaḥ śreṣṭhaścaturviṃśatimātrakaḥ /	zawtriMSanmAtrakaH SrezWaH caturviMSati mAtrakaH /
   madhyo dvādaśamātrastu oṅkāraṃ satataṃ japet // GarP_1,235.24 //	maDyaH dvAdaSa mAtraH tu oFkAram satatam japet // GarP_1,235.24 //
   vācake praṇave jñāte vācyaṃ brahma prasīdati /	vAcake praNave jQAte vAcyam brahma prasIdati /
   (oṃnamo viṣṇave).ṣaṣṭhākṣaraśca japtavyo gāyattrī dvādaśākṣarī //	(oMnamaH vizNave).zazWa akzaraH ca japtavyaH gAyattrI dvAdaSa akzarI //
   GarP_1,235.25 //	GarP_1,235.25 //
   sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ tu pravṛtirviṣayeṣu ca /	sarvezAm indriyANAm tu pravRtiH vizayezu ca /
   nivṛttirmanasastasyāḥ pratyāhāraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,235.26 //	nivRttiH manasaH tasyAH pratyAhAraH prakIrtitaH // GarP_1,235.26 //
   indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ samāhṛtya hito hi saḥ /	indriyANi indriya arTeByaH samAhRtya hitaH hi saH /
   sahasā saha buddhyā ca pratyāhāreṣu saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_1,235.27 //	sahasA saha budDyA ca pratyAhArezu saMsTitaH // GarP_1,235.27 //
   prāṇāyāmairdvādaśabhiryāvatkālaḥkṛto bhavet /	prANAyAmEH dvAdaSaBiH yAvat kAlaHkRtaH Bavet /
   yastāvatkālaparyantaṃ mano brahmaṇi dhārayet // GarP_1,235.28 //	yaH tAvat kAla paryantam manaH brahmaNi DArayet // GarP_1,235.28 //
   tasyaiva brahmaṇā proktaṃ dhyānaṃ dvādaśa dhāraṇāḥ /	tasya eva brahmaNA proktam DyAnam dvAdaSa DAraNAH /
   tuṣyeta niyato yuktaḥ samādhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate // GarP_1,235.28*1 //	tuzyeta niyataH yuktaH samADiH saH aBIDIyate // GarP_1,235.28*1 //
   dhyāyanna calate yasya manobhidhyāyato bhṛśam // GarP_1,235.29 //	DyAyan na calate yasya manoBiDyAyataH BRSam // GarP_1,235.29 //
   prāpyāvadhikṛtaṃ kālaṃ yāvatsā dhāraṇā smṛtā /	prApya avaDikRtam kAlam yAvat sA DAraNA smRtA /
   dhyeye saktaṃ mano yasya dhyeyamevānupaśyati // GarP_1,235.30 //	Dyeye saktam manaH yasya Dyeyam eva anupaSyati // GarP_1,235.30 //
   nānyaṃ padārthaṃ jānāti dhyānametatprakīrtitam /	na anyam padArTam jAnAti DyAnam etat prakIrtitam /
   dhyeye mano niścalatāṃ yāti dhyeyaṃ vicintayan // GarP_1,235.31 //	Dyeye manaH niScala tAm yAti Dyeyam vicintayan // GarP_1,235.31 //
   yattaddhyānaṃ paraṃ proktaṃ munibhirdhyānacintakaiḥ /	yat tat DyAnam param proktam muniBiH DyAna cintakEH /
   dhyeyameva hi sarvatra dhyātā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,235.32 //	Dyeyam eva hi sarvatra DyAtA tad maya tAm gataH // GarP_1,235.32 //
   paśyati dvaitarahitaṃ samādhiḥ so 'bhidhīyate /	paSyati dvEta rahitam samADiH saH aBiDIyate /
   manaḥ saṅkalparahitamindriyārthānna cintayet // GarP_1,235.33 //	manaH saFkalpa rahitam indriya arTAn na cintayet // GarP_1,235.33 //
   yasya brahmaṇi saṃlīnaṃ samādhisthaṃ tadocyate /	yasya brahmaNi saMlInam samADi sTam tadA ucyate /
   dhyāyataḥ paramātmānamātmasthaṃ yasya yoginaḥ // GarP_1,235.34 //	DyAyataH paramAtmAnam Atma sTam yasya yoginaH // GarP_1,235.34 //
   manastanmayatāṃ yāti samādhisthaḥ sa kīrtitaḥ /	manaH tad maya tAm yAti samADi sTaH sa kIrtitaH /
   cittasya sthiratā bhrāntirdairmanasyaṃ pramādatā // GarP_1,235.35 //	cittasya sTira tA BrAntiH dErmanasyam pramAdatA // GarP_1,235.35 //
   yogināṃ kathitā doṣā yogavighnapravartakāḥ /	yoginAm kaTitAH dozAH yoga viGna pravartakAH /
   sthityarthaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ sthūlarūpaṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,235.36 //	sTiti arTam manasaH sarvam sTUla rUpam vicintayet // GarP_1,235.36 //
   tadvrataṃ niścalībhūtaṃ sūyyasthaṃ sthiratāṃ vrajet /	tad vratam niScalIBUtam sUyya sTam sTira tAm vrajet /
   na vinā paramātmānaṃ kiñcijjagati vidyate // GarP_1,235.37 //	na vinA paramAtmAnam kiQcid jagati vidyate // GarP_1,235.37 //
   viśvarūpaṃ tamevaikamiti jñātvā vimuñcati /	viSva rUpam tam eva ekam iti jQAtvA vimuQcati /
   oṅkāraṃ paramaṃ brahma dhyāyedabjasthitaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,235.38 //	oFkAram paramam brahma DyAyet abja sTitam viBum // GarP_1,235.38 //
   kṣetrakṣetrajñarahitaṃ japenmātrātrayānvitam /	kzetra kzetrajQa rahitam japet mAtrA traya anvitam /
   hṛdi sañcintayetpūrvaṃ pradhānaṃ tasya copari // GarP_1,235.39 //	hRdi saQcintayet pUrvam praDAnam tasya ca upari // GarP_1,235.39 //
   tamo rajastathā sattvaṃ maṇḍalatritayaṃ kramāt /	tamaH rajaH taTA sattvam maNxala tritayam kramAt /
   kṛṣṇaraktasitaṃ tasminpuruṣaṃ jīvasaṃjñitam // GarP_1,235.40 //	kRzNa rakta sitam tasmin puruzam jIva saMjQitam // GarP_1,235.40 //
   tasyopari guṇaiśvaryamaṣṭapatraṃ saroruham /	tasya upari guNa ESvaryam azwa patram saroruham /
   jñānaṃ tu karṇikā tatra vijñānaṃ kesarāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,235.41 //	jQAnam tu karNikA tatra vijQAnam kesarAH smRtAH // GarP_1,235.41 //
   vairāgyanālaṃ tatkando vaiṣṇavo dharma uttamaḥ /	vErAgya nAlam tat kandaH vEzNavaH DarmaH uttamaH /
   karṇikāyāṃ sthitaṃ tatra jīvavanniścalaṃ vibhu // GarP_1,235.42 //	karNikAyAm sTitam tatra jIva vat niScalam viBu // GarP_1,235.42 //
   dhyāyedurasi saṃyuktamoṅkāraṃ muktisādhakam /	DyAyet urasi saMyuktam oFkAram mukti sADakam /
   dhyāyanyadi tyajetprāṇānyāti brahma svasannidhim // GarP_1,235.43 //	DyAyan yadi tyajet prANAn yAti brahma sva sanniDim // GarP_1,235.43 //
   hariṃ saṃsthāpya dehābje dhyāyanyo gī ca bhaktibhāk /	harim saMsTApya deha abje DyAyan yaH gI ca Bakti BAj /
   ātmānamātmanā kecitpaśyanti dhyānacakṣuṣaḥ // GarP_1,235.44 //	AtmAnam AtmanA kecid paSyanti DyAna cakzuzaH // GarP_1,235.44 //
   sāṃkhyabuddhyā tathaivānye yogenānye tu yoginaḥ /	sAMKya budDyA taTA eva anye yogena anye tu yoginaH /
   brahmaprakāśakaṃ jñānaṃ bhavabandhavibhedanam // GarP_1,235.45 //	brahma prakASakam jQAnam Bava banDa viBedanam // GarP_1,235.45 //
   tatraikacittatāyogo muktido nātra saṃśayaḥ /	tatra ekacitta tA yogaH mukti daH na atra saMSayaH /
   jitendriyātmakaraṇo jñānadṛpto hi yo bhavet // GarP_1,235.46 //	jita indriya Atma karaNaH jQAna dRptaH hi yaH Bavet // GarP_1,235.46 //
   sa muktaḥ kathyate yogī paramātmanyavasthitaḥ /	sa muktaH kaTyate yogI paramAtmani avasTitaH /
   āsanasthānavidhayo na yogasya prasādhakāḥ // GarP_1,235.47 //	Asana sTAna viDayaH na yogasya prasADakAH // GarP_1,235.47 //
   vilambajanakāḥ sarve vistarāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /	vilamba janakAH sarve vistarAH parikIrtitAH /
   śiśupālaḥ siddhimāpa smaraṇābhyāsagauravāt // GarP_1,235.48 //	SiSupAlaH sidDim Apa smaraNa aByAsa gOravAt // GarP_1,235.48 //
   yogābhyāsaṃ prakurvantaḥ pasyantyātmānamātmanā /	yoga aByAsam prakurvantaH pasyanti AtmAnam AtmanA /
   sarvabhūteṣu kāruṇyaṃ vidveṣaṃ viṣayeṣu ca // GarP_1,235.49 //	sarva BUtezu kAruNyam vidvezam vizayezu ca // GarP_1,235.49 //
   guptaśiśrodarādiśca kurvanyogī vimucyate /	gupta SiSra udara AdiH ca kurvan yogI vimucyate /
   indriyairindriyārthāṃstu na jānāti naro yadā // GarP_1,235.50 //	indriyEH indriya arTAn= tu na jAnAti naraH yadA // GarP_1,235.50 //
   kāṣṭhavadbrahmasaṃlīno yogī muktastadā bhavet /	kAzWa vat brahma saMlInaH yogI muktaH tadA Bavet /
   sarvavarṇāḥ śriyaḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā pāpāni bhasmasāt // GarP_1,235.51 //	sarva varNAH SriyaH sarvAH kRtvA pApAni BasmasAt // GarP_1,235.51 //
   dhyānāgninā ca medhāvī labhate paramāṃ gatim /	DyAna agninA ca meDAvI laBate paramAm gatim /
   manthanāddṛśyate hyagnistadvaddhyānena vai hariḥ // GarP_1,235.52 //	manTanAt dRSyate hi agniH tadvat DyAnena vE hariH // GarP_1,235.52 //
   brahmātmanoryadaikatvaṃ sa yogaścottamottamaḥ /	brahma AtmanA uH yada eka tvam sa yogaH ca uttama uttamaH /
   bāhyarūpairna muktistu cāntasthaiḥ syādyamādibhiḥ // GarP_1,235.53 //	bAhya rUpEH na muktiH tu ca antasTEH syAt yama AdiBiH // GarP_1,235.53 //
   sāṅkhyajñānena yogena vedāntaśravaṇena ca /	sAFKya jQAnena yogena vedAnta SravaNena ca /
   pratyakṣatātmano yā hi sā muktirabhidhīyate /	pratyakzatA AtmanaH yA hi sA muktiH aBiDIyate /
   anātmanyātmarūpatvamasataḥ satsvarūpatā // GarP_1,235.54 //	anAtmani Atma rUpa tvam asataH sat svarUpa tA // GarP_1,235.54 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe
   brahmavijñānasvarūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	brahmavijQAnasvarUpaNam nAma paQcatriMSaduttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  236	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 236
   śrībhagavānuvāca /	SrI BagavAn uvAca /
   ātmajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada tattvataḥ /	Atma jQAnam pravakzyAmi SRNu nArada tattvataH /
   advaitaṃ sāṅkhyamityāhuryogastatraikacittatā // GarP_1,236.1 //	advEtam sAFKyam iti AhuH yogaH tatra ekacitta tA // GarP_1,236.1 //
   advaitayogasampannāste mucyante 'tibandhanāt /	advEta yoga sampannAH te mucyante atibanDanAt /
   atītārabdhamāgāmi karma naśyati bodhataḥ // GarP_1,236.2 //	atIta ArabDam AgAmi karma naSyati boDataH // GarP_1,236.2 //
   sadvicārakuṭhāreṇa cchinnasaṃsārapādapaḥ /	sat vicAra kuWAreNa cCinna saMsAra pAdapaH /
   jñānavairāgyatīrthena labhate vaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,236.3 //	jQAna vErAgya tIrTena laBate vEzNavam padam // GarP_1,236.3 //
   jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaṃ ca māyā tripuramucyate /	jAgrat svapna suzuptam ca mAyA tripuram ucyate /
   atraivāntargataṃ sarvaṃ śāśvate nādvaye pade // GarP_1,236.4 //	atra eva antargatam sarvam SASvate na advaye pade // GarP_1,236.4 //
   nāmarūpakriyāhīnaṃ sarvaṃ tatparamaṃ padam /	nAma rUpa kriyA hInam sarvam tat paramam padam /
   jagatkṛtveśvaro 'nantaṃ svayamatra praviṣṭavān // GarP_1,236.5 //	jagat kRtvA ISvaraH anantam svayam atra pravizwavAn // GarP_1,236.5 //
   vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ cidrūpaṃ tamasaḥ param /	veda aham etam puruzam cit rUpam tamasaH param /
   so 'hamasmīti mokṣāya nānyaḥ panthā vimuktaye // GarP_1,236.6 //	saH aham asmi iti mokzAya na anyaH panTAH vimuktaye // GarP_1,236.6 //
   śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ dhyānaṃ jñānānāṃ caiva sādhanam /	SravaNam mananam DyAnam jQAnAnAm ca eva sADanam /
   yajñadānatapastīrthavedairmuktirna labhyate // GarP_1,236.7 //	yajQa dAna tapaH tIrTa vedEH muktiH na laByate // GarP_1,236.7 //
   tyāgena kenaciddhyānapūjākarmādibhiryathā /	tyAgena kenacid DyAna pUjA karma AdiBiH yaTA /
   dvividhaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca // GarP_1,236.8 //	dviviDam veda vacanam kuru karma tyaja iti ca // GarP_1,236.8 //
   yajñādayo vimuktānāṃ niṣkāmānāṃ vimuktaye /	yajQa AdayaH vimuktAnAm nizkAmAnAm vimuktaye /
   antaḥ karaṇaśuddhyarthamūcurevātra kecana // GarP_1,236.9 //	antar karaNa SudDi arTam UcuH eva atra kecana // GarP_1,236.9 //
   ekena janmanā jñānanmuktirna dvaitabhāvinām /	ekena janmanA jQAnat muktiH na dvEta BAvinAm /
   yogabhraṣṭāḥ kuyogāśca viprā yogikulodbhavāḥ // GarP_1,236.10 //	yoga BrazwAH ku yogAH ca viprAH yogi kula udBavAH // GarP_1,236.10 //
   karmaṇā badhyate janturjñānānmukto bhavādbhavet /	karmaNA baDyate jantuH jQAnAt muktaH BavAt Bavet /
   ātmajñānantvāśrayedvai ajñānaṃ yadato 'nyathā // GarP_1,236.11 //	Atma jQAnantu ASrayet vE ajQAnam yat atas anyaTA // GarP_1,236.11 //
   yadā sarve vimucyante kāmā yesyahṛdi sthitāḥ /	yadA sarve vimucyante kAmAH yesya hRdi sTitAH /
   tadāmṛtatvamāpnoti jīvanneva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,236.12 //	tadA amRta tvam Apnoti jIvan= eva na saMSayaH // GarP_1,236.12 //
   vyāpakatvātkathaṃ yāti ko yāti kva sa yāti ca /	vyApaka tvAt kaTam yAti kaH yAti kva sa yAti ca /
   anantatvānnadeśo 'sti amūrtitvādgatiḥ kutaḥ // GarP_1,236.13 //	ananta tva anna deSaH asti amUrti tvAt gatiH kutas // GarP_1,236.13 //
   advayatvānna ko 'pyasti bodhatvājjaḍatā kutaḥ /	advaya tvAt na kaH api asti boDa tvAt jaxatA kutas /
   ekoddiṣṭaṃ yadanyasya mativāggatisaṃsthiti (m) // GarP_1,236.14 //	ekoddizwam yat anyasya mati vAc gati saMsTiti (m) // GarP_1,236.14 //
   kathamākāśakalpasya gatirāgatisaṃsthiti /	kaTam AkASa kalpasya gati rAgati saMsTiti /
   jāgratsvapnasuṣuptaṃ ca māyayā parikalpitam // GarP_1,236.15 //	jAgrat svapna suzuptam ca mAyayA parikalpitam // GarP_1,236.15 //
   vastu taijasakaṃ prājñe yattu puṇyamakhaṇḍakam /	vastu tEjasakam prAjQe yat tu puNyam aKaNxakam /
   yathā te priyātmā naḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā priyaḥ // GarP_1,236.16 //	yaTA te priya AtmA naH sarvezAm ca taTA priyaH // GarP_1,236.16 //
   bodhamārge yathā cittaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā mate /	boDa mArge yaTA cittam sarvezAm ca taTA mate /
   sarvadā sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvasya ca mahāmune // GarP_1,236.17 //	sarvadA sarva BUtAnAm sarvasya ca mahA mune // GarP_1,236.17 //
   nāhamatrātmavijñānaṃ tasmātpūrṇaṃ nirantaram /	na aham atra Atma vijQAnam tasmAt pUrNam nirantaram /
   jāgratsvapnaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ sauṣuptasukhameva ca // GarP_1,236.18 //	jAgrat svapnam taTA vRttam sOzupta suKam eva ca // GarP_1,236.18 //
   smaraṇaṃ vismṛtārthasya nāsti cetkasya jāyate /	smaraNam vismRta arTasya na asti ced kasya jAyate /
   satyamastu tathā vāṇu aśarīraṃ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,236.19 //	satyam astu taTA vA aNu aSarIram param taTA // GarP_1,236.19 //
   nāsti cetsukhaduḥ khānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vedanaṃ katham /	na asti ced suKa duH KAnAm sarvezAm vedanam kaTam /
   sadā sarvatra sarvajñaḥ sarvasya hṛdaye na yet // GarP_1,236.20 //	sadA sarvatra sarvajQaH sarvasya hRdaye na yet // GarP_1,236.20 //
   sākṣibhūtaḥ samāśritya ko jānāti viceṣṭitam /	sAkzi BUtaH samASritya kaH jAnAti vicezwitam /
   satya jñānānanta bhinnaṃ syānnasatyaṃ jñānataḥ pṛthak // GarP_1,236.21 //	satya jQAna ananta Binnam syAt nasatyam jQAnataH pRTak // GarP_1,236.21 //
   nānantyātpṛthagānandaṃ nāpyamānandataḥ pṛthak /	na anantyAt pRTak Anandam na apyam AnandataH pRTak /
   tvameva paramaṃ brahma satyajñānādilakṣaṇam // GarP_1,236.22 //	tvam eva paramam brahma satya jQAna Adi lakzaNam // GarP_1,236.22 //
   ahaṃ brahma paraṃ tattvaṃ jñātvā tvakhilavidbhavet /	aham brahma param tattvam jQAtvA tu aKila vid Bavet /
   yathaikamṛnmaye jñāte sarvametaccarācaram // GarP_1,236.23 //	yaTA eka mRd maye jQAte sarvam etat carAcaram // GarP_1,236.23 //
   yathaikahemamaṇinā sarvaṃ hemamayaṃ bhavet /	yaTA eka hema maNinA sarvam hema mayam Bavet /
   jñānaṃ tathaivamīśena jñānināpyakhilaṃ jagat // GarP_1,236.24 //	jQAnam taTA evam ISena jQAninA api aKilam jagat // GarP_1,236.24 //
   yathāndhakāradoṣeṇa rajjuḥ samyaṅnadṛśyate /	yaTA anDakAra dozeNa rajjuH samyak nadRSyate /
   yathā saṃmohadoṣeṇa cātmā samyaṅnadṛśyate // GarP_1,236.25 //	yaTA saMmoha dozeNa ca AtmA samyak nadRSyate // GarP_1,236.25 //
   sarpadhārādibhirbhedarainyathā vastukalpanam /	sarpa DArA AdiBiH BedarEnyaTA vastu kalpanam /

   hāhiṣṇodvijā kathi dbhohamitidṛ /	hAhizNa udvijA kaTi dBoham iti dR /

   māyāviṣṭastathā jīvo dehohamiti manyate /	mAyA AvizwaH taTA jIvaH dehoham iti manyate /

   svarūpadarśanāccāyaṃ māyā nāśantayā vinā // GarP_1,236.31 //	sva rUpa darSanAt ca ayam mAyA na aSantayA vinA // GarP_1,236.31 //

   sattāvakalpanaṃ kāle na santi paramārthataḥ /	sattAvakalpanam kAle na santi paramArTataH /

   tathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bhūtāni na tu sannidhau /	taTA jAgrat avasTAyAm BUtAni na tu sanniDO /

   evametatparaṃ brahma svapnajāgratpadadvaye /	evam etat param brahma svapna jAgrat pada dvaye /

   śrībagavānuvāca /	SrI bagavAn uvAca /

   yathādarśatalaprakhye paśyatyātmānamātmani /	yaTA AdarSa tala praKye paSyati AtmAnam Atmani /
   indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃśca mahābhūtāni pañcakam // GarP_1,237.7 //	indriyANi indriya arTAn= ca mahABUtAni paQcakam // GarP_1,237.7 //
   manobuddhirahaṅkāramavyaktaṃ puruṣaṃ tathā /	manaH budDiH ahaFkAram avyaktam puruzam taTA /
   prasaṃkhyāya paraṃvyāpto vimukto bandhavairbhavet // GarP_1,237.8 //	prasaMKyAya paraMvyAptaH vimuktaH banDavEH Bavet // GarP_1,237.8 //
   indriyagrāmamakhilaṃ manasābhiniveśya ca /	indriya grAmam aKilam manasA aBiniveSya ca /
   manaścaivāpyahaṅkāre pratiṣṭhāpya ca pāṇḍava // GarP_1,237.9 //	manaH ca eva api ahaFkAre pratizWApya ca pANxava // GarP_1,237.9 //
   ahaṃ kāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāvapi /	aham kAram taTA budDO budDim ca prakRtO= api /

   ahaṃ bahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prasaṃkhyāya vimucyate /	aham bahma param jyotiH prasaMKyAya vimucyate /
   navadvāramidaṃ gehaṃ tisṛṇāṃ?pañcasākṣikam // GarP_1,237.11 //	nava dvAram idam geham tisRNAn?paQca sAkzikam // GarP_1,237.11 //
   kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ vidvānyo veda sa varaḥ kaviḥ /	kzetrajQa aDizWitam vidvAn yaH veda sa varaH kaviH /

   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   dravyāṇāmapyanādānamāpatsvapi tathecchayā /	dravyANAm api anAdAnam Apatsu api taTA icCayA /
   aparigrahamityāhustaṃ prayatnena varjayet // GarP_1,238.7 //	aparigraham iti AhuH tam prayatnena varjayet // GarP_1,238.7 //

   manasaścaindriyāṇāṃ ca aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ /	manasaH ca EndriyANAm ca EkAgryam paramam tapaH /

   prāṇaḥ svadehajo vāyurāyāmastannirodhanam /	prANaH sva deha jaH vAyuH AyAmaH tad niroDanam /

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  239	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 239
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /

   ahaṃbrahmāsmi vākyotthajñānānmokṣo bhavennaṇām // GarP_1,239.1 //	ahaMbrahmA asmi vAkya utTa jQAnAt mokzaH Bavet naNAm // GarP_1,239.1 //

   brahmāhamasmyahaṃ brahma cāhaṃbrahmapadārthayoḥ // GarP_1,239.8 //	brahmA aham asmi aham brahma ca ahaMbrahma padArTayoH // GarP_1,239.8 //
   ahaṃbrahmāsmivākyācca svanubhūtiphalārthakam /	ahaMbrahma asmi vAkyAt ca su anuBUti Pala arTakam /
   aikyajñānaṃ tu hi bhavedvedāntāddūrato dhruvam // GarP_1,239.9 //	Ekya jQAnam tu hi Bavet vedAntAt dUratas Druvam // GarP_1,239.9 //
   jñānādajñānakāryasya nivṛttyā muktiraikyataḥ // GarP_1,239.10 //	jQAnAt ajQAna kAryasya nivRttyA muktiH EkyataH // GarP_1,239.10 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSa AKye AcAra kANxe

   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  239	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 239
   śrībhagavānuvāca /	SrI BagavAn uvAca /
   sannapi brahma tasmātkhaṃ marutkhācca tato 'nalaḥ // GarP_1,239.1 //	san= api brahma tasmAt Kam marut KAt ca tatas analaH // GarP_1,239.1 //
   agnerāpastataḥ pṛthvī prapañcākṛtisūtikā /	agneH ApaH tatas pRTvI prapaQca AkRti sUtikA /
   tataḥ saptadaśaṃ liṅgaṃ pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,239.2 //	tatas saptadaSam liFgam paQcakarmendriyANi ca // GarP_1,239.2 //
   vākpāṇipādaṃ pāyuścāpyupasthamatha dhīndriyam /	vAc pANi pAdam pAyuH ca api upasTam aTa DIndriyam /
   śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ syātpañca vāyavaḥ // GarP_1,239.3 //	Srotram tvac cakzuzI jihvA GrANam syAt paQca vAyavaH // GarP_1,239.3 //
   prāṇopānaḥ samānaśca vyānastūdāna eva ca /	prANa upAnaH samAnaH ca vyAnaH tu udAnaH eva ca /

   buddhirniścayarūpā tu etatsūkṣmasvarūpakam /	budDiH niScaya rUpA tu etat sUkzma svarUpakam /
   hiraṇyagarbhamātmīyasūtraṃ tatkāryāliṅgakam // GarP_1,239.5 //	hiraNyagarBam AtmIya sUtram tad kArya AliFgakam // GarP_1,239.5 //
   pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni hyapañcīkṛtabhūtataḥ /	paQcIkRtAni BUtAni hi apaQcIkRta BUtataH /
   pañcīkṛtebhyo bhūtebhyo brahmāṇḍaṃ samajāyata // GarP_1,239.6 //	paQcIkRteByaH BUteByaH brahmANxam samajAyata // GarP_1,239.6 //
   lokaprasiddhaṃ sthūlākhyaṃ śarīraṃ caraṇādimat /	loka prasidDam sTUla AKyam SarIram caraNa Adimat /
   pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tatkāryaṃ tatsthameva ca // GarP_1,239.7 //	paQcIkRtAni BUtAni tat kAryam tat sTam eva ca // GarP_1,239.7 //
   sarvaṃ śarīrajātaṃ ca prāṇināṃ sthūlamīritam /	sarvam SarIra jAtam ca prANinAm sTUlam Iritam /
   tridhāhri paramātmasthaṃ śarīraṃ procyate budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.8 //	triDA ahri paramAtma sTam SarIram procyate buDEH // GarP_1,239.8 //
   dehadvayābhigāmī ca tvamatho jīva ekataḥ /	deha dvaya aBigAmI ca tvam aTo jIvaH ekatas /
   svabhedavākyādbrahmaiva praviṣṭaṃ dehayordvayoḥ // GarP_1,239.9 //	sva Beda vAkyAt brahmA eva pravizwam dehayoH dvayoH // GarP_1,239.9 //
   jalārkvavadvadaravajjīvaḥ prāṇādidhāraṇaḥ /	jala arkva vat vadara vat jIvaH prANa Adi DAraNaH /
   jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīnāṃ sākṣī jīvaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,239.10 //	jAgrat svapna suzuptInAm sAkzI jIvaH sa ca smRtaH // GarP_1,239.10 //
   jāgratsvapnasuṣuptyākhyairvyātiriktaśca nirguṇaḥ /	jAgrat svapna suzupti AKyEH vyAtiriktaH ca nirguNaH /
   nirgātāvayavosaṃgo nityaśuddhasvabhāvakaḥ // GarP_1,239.11 //	nirgAta avayavosaMgaH nitya SudDa svaBAvakaH // GarP_1,239.11 //
   paramātmaiva yajjāgratsvapnādyairyastridhā mataḥ /	paramAtmA eva yat jA agrat svapna AdyEH yaH triDA mataH /
   antaḥ karaṇarāśeścaivāntaḥ karaṇaḥsthitaḥ // GarP_1,239.12 //	antar karaNa rASeH ca eva antar karaNaH sTitaH // GarP_1,239.12 //
   jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīśca paśyato vikṛtiḥ sadā /	jAgrat svapna suzuptIH ca paSyataH vikRtiH sadA /
   phalakriyākārakayorjāgradādīnvadāmyaham // GarP_1,239.13 //	Pala kriyA kArakayoH jAgrat AdIn vadAmi aham // GarP_1,239.13 //
   indriyairatha vijñānaṃ jāgratsthānamudīritam /	indriyEH aTa vijQAnam jAgrat sTAnam udIritam /
   jāgratsaṃskārasaṃbhūtapratyayo viṣayārthinaḥ // GarP_1,239.14 //	jAgrat saMskAra saMBUta pratyayaH vizaya arTinaH // GarP_1,239.14 //
   svapnaṃ suṣuptiḥ karaṇopasaṃghāte dhiyaḥ (pa) sthita (ti) /	svapnam suzuptiH karaNa upasaMGAte DiyaH (pa) sTitaH (ti) /
   brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ sthitiḥ kālakātmanā // GarP_1,239.15 //	brahmaNaH kAraNa avasTAyAm sTitiH kAlaka AtmanA // GarP_1,239.15 //
   kramatokramato jīvo jāgradādi sa paśyati /	krama tokramataH jIvaH jAgrat Adi sa paSyati /
   samādhyāraṃbhakāle tu pūrvamevāvadhārayet // GarP_1,239.16 //	samADi AraMBa kAle tu pUrvam eva avaDArayet // GarP_1,239.16 //
   mumukṣāvatha saṃjāte antaḥ karaṇakevale /	mumukzO= aTa saMjAte antar karaNa kevale /
   vilāpayetkṣetrajātaṃ tatkṣetraṃ pariśeṣayet // GarP_1,239.17 //	vilApayet kzetra jAtam tat kzetram pariSezayet // GarP_1,239.17 //
   pañcīkṛtebhyo bhūtebhyo bhāṇḍādi vyatiriktakam /	paQcIkRteByaH BUteByaH BANxa Adi vyatiriktakam /
   yathā mṛdo ghaṭo bhinno nāsti tatkāryatastathā // GarP_1,239.18 //	yaTA mRdaH GawaH BinnaH na asti tad kAryataH taTA // GarP_1,239.18 //
   pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni apañcīkṛtabhūtataḥ /	paQcIkRtAni BUtAni apaQcIkRta BUtataH /
   śaṃsaṃti vyatirekeṇa śiṣṭāḥ sūkṣmaśarīrakam // GarP_1,239.19 //	SaMsaMti vyatirekeNa SizwAH sUkzmaSarIrakam // GarP_1,239.19 //
   apañcīkṛtabhūtebhyo na liṅgaṃ vyatiriktakam /	apaQcIkRta BUteByaH na liFgam vyatiriktakam /
   pṛthvyādhāraṃ vinā nāsti vinā nāsti ca tena sā // GarP_1,239.20 //	pRTvI ADAram vinA na asti vinA na asti ca tena sA // GarP_1,239.20 //
   tejaśca vāyunā nāsti vāyuḥ khena vinā na hi /	tejaH ca vAyunA na asti vAyuH Kena vinA na hi /
   yadbrahmaṇā ca khaṃ nāsti śuddha brahma vinā ca kham // GarP_1,239.21 //	yat brahmaNA ca Kam na asti SudDa brahma vinA ca Kam // GarP_1,239.21 //
   śuddhabhāvastadā jāgratsvapnādīnāmasaṃbhavaḥ /	SudDa BAvaH tadA jAgrat svapna AdInAm asaMBavaH /
   jīvatvavarjitaḥ prāptātmacaitanyānurūpataḥ // GarP_1,239.22 //	jIva tva varjitaH prApta Atma cEtanya anurUpataH // GarP_1,239.22 //
   nityaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhamuktaṃ satyaṃ brahmādvitīyakam /	nityam SudDam budDamuktam satyam brahmAdvitIyakam /

   ukāraśca akāraśca makāroyamṛgadvayaḥ /	ukAraH ca akAraH ca makAroya mRga dvayaH /
   brahmāhamasmyahaṃ brahmajñānamajñānavardhanam // GarP_1,239.24 //	brahmA aham asmi aham brahma jQAnam ajQAna varDanam // GarP_1,239.24 //
   ayamātmā paraṃ jyotiścinnāmānandarūpakaḥ /	ayam AtmA param jyotiScit nAma Ananda rUpakaH /
   satyaṃ jñānamanataṃ hi tvamasīti śrutīritam // GarP_1,239.25 //	satyam jQAnam anatam hi tvam asi iti Sruti Iritam // GarP_1,239.25 //
   ahaṃ brahmāsmi nirlepamahaṃ brahmāsmi sarvagam /	aham brahmA asmi nirlepam aham brahma asmi sarvagam /

   gītāsāror'junāyokto yena brahmaṇi vai layaḥ // GarP_1,239.26 //	gIta AsAror ajunAya uktaH yena brahmaNi vE layaH // GarP_1,239.26 //
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāro	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe praTama aMSe AcAra kANxe brahma gIta AsAraH 
   nāmekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	nAma ikonacatvAriMSaduttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇam  240	SrI garuxa mahApurANam 240
   hariruvāca /	hariH uvAca /
   purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ rudra proktaṃ sāraṃ mayātava /	purANam gAruxam rudra proktam sAram mayA atava /
   brahmādīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ ca bhuktimuktipradāyakam // GarP_1,240.1 //	brahma AdInAm SRNvatAm ca Bukti mukti pradAyakam // GarP_1,240.1 //
   vidyākīrtiprabhālakṣmījayārogyādikārakam /	vidyA kIrti praBA lakzmI jayA rogya Adi kArakam /
   yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādrudra sarvavitsa divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,240.2 //	yaH paWet SRNuyAt rudra sarva vid sa divam vrajet // GarP_1,240.2 //
   brahmovāca /	brahmA uvAca /
   iti vyāsa mayā viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ muktidaṃ śrutam /	iti vyAsa mayA vizNoH purANam mukti dam Srutam /
   vyāsa uvāca /	vyAsaH uvAca /
   śrutvaitadgāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmāsmānityuvāca ha // GarP_1,240.3 //	SrutvA etat gAruxam puNyam brahma asmAn iti uvAca ha // GarP_1,240.3 //
   dakṣanārada mukhyādin brahma dhyānhariṃ gataḥ /	dakza nArada muKya Adin brahma DyAn harim gataH /
   mayāpi tubhyaṃ sūtena purāṇaṃ kathitaṃ param // GarP_1,240.4 //	mayA api tuByam sUtena purANam kaTitam param // GarP_1,240.4 //
   yacchrutvā sarvavitprāptakāmo brahma phalaṃ bhavet /	yat SrutvA sarva vid prApta kAmaH brahma Palam Bavet /
   viṣṇuḥ sāratamaṃprāha garuḍaṃ gāruḍaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,240.5 //	vizNuH sAratam aMprAha garuxam gAruxam tatas // GarP_1,240.5 //
   mahāsāraṃ dharmakāmadhanamokṣādidāyakam /	mahA sAram Darma kAma Dana mokza Adi dAyakam /

   śaunaka pravaraṃ proktaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava // GarP_1,240.6 //	SOnaka pravaram proktam purANam gAruxam tava // GarP_1,240.6 //
   yadabravītpurā vyāsaḥ sāraṃ māṃ gāruḍeritam /	yat abravIt purA vyAsaH sAram mAm gAruxa Iritam /
   vyāsaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaśca purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /	vyAsaH SrutvA brahmaNaH ca purANam gAruxam SuBam /
   devaṃ dhyāyanvedamekaṃ caturdhā vyabhajaddhariḥ // GarP_1,240.7 //	devam DyAyan vedam ekam caturDA vyaBajat hariH // GarP_1,240.7 //
   aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni tāni māṃ prāha vai śukaḥ /	azwAdaSa purANAni tAni mAm prAha vE SukaH /
   idaṃ tu gāruḍaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā te śaunakeritam // GarP_1,240.8 //	idam tu gAruxam SrezWam mayA te SOnaka Iritam // GarP_1,240.8 //
   munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ madhye pṛcchataḥ sarvavācakam /	munInAm SRNvatAm maDye pRcCataH sarva vAcakam /
   yaḥ paṭhecchaṇuyādvāpi śrāvayedvā samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,240.9 //	yaH paWet SaNuyAt vA api SrAvayet vA samAhitaH // GarP_1,240.9 //
   saṃlikhellekhayedvāpi dhārayetpustake nanu /	saMliKet leKayet vA api DArayet pustake nanu /
   dharmārtho prāpnuyāddharmarthārtho cārthamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.10 //	Darma arTaH prApnuyAt DarmarTa arTaH ca arTam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.10 //
   kāmā navāpnuyātkāmī mokṣārtho mokṣamāpnuyāt /	kAmA nava ApnuyAt kAmI mokza arTaH mokzam ApnuyAt /
   yadyadicchati tatsarvaṃ gāruḍaśravaṇāllabhet // GarP_1,240.11 //	yat yat icCati tat sarvam gAruxa SravaNAt laBet // GarP_1,240.11 //
   brāhmaṇo vedapārasya gantā syānnātra saṃśayaḥ /	brAhmaNaH veda pArasya gantA syAt na atra saMSayaH /
   kṣattriyo kṣattriyasyāpi rakṣitā bhavatīha ca // GarP_1,240.12 //	kzattriyaH kzattriyasya api rakzitA Bavati iha ca // GarP_1,240.12 //
   nānyasya śravaṇaṃ hi syātpurāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam /	na anyasya SravaNam hi syAt purANam veda saMmitam /
   vadedyadi sa mūḍhātmā kīrtihānimavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.13 //	vadet yadi sa mUXa AtmA kIrti hAnim avApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.13 //
   anyasmai ca vadedvidvān brāhmaṇontarito ya di /	anyasmE ca vadet vidvAn brAhmaNa untaritaH yaH di /
   brāhmaṇāntaritai sarvaiḥ śrotavyaṃ gāruḍaṃ tvidama // GarP_1,240.14 //	brAhmaNa antaritEH sarvEH Srotavyam gAruxam tu idamaH // GarP_1,240.14 //
   yathā viṣṇustathā tārkṣyastārkṣyastotrāddhariḥ stutaḥ /	yaTA vizNuH taTA tArkzyaH tArkzya stotrAt hariH stutaH /
   gāruḍaṃ vasurājaśca śrutvā sarvamavāpa ha // GarP_1,240.15 //	gAruxam vasu rAjaH ca SrutvA sarvam avApa ha // GarP_1,240.15 //
   varuruvāca /	varuH uvAca /
   namasyāmi mahābāhuṃ khagedra harivāhanam /	namasyAmi mahA bAhum Kagedra hari vAhanam /
   viṣṇordhvasaṃsthānaṃ vitrāsitamahāsuram // GarP_1,240.16 //	vizNa UrDva saMsTAnam vitrAsita mahA asuram // GarP_1,240.16 //
   namaste nāgadarpaghna vinatānandavardhana /	namaH te nAga darpa Gna vinatA Ananda varDana /
   supakṣapāta niddabha dīnadaityanirīkṣita // GarP_1,240.17 //	su pakzapAta niddaBa dIna dEtya nirIkzitaH // GarP_1,240.17 //
   parasparasya śāpena supratīkavibhāvasū /	parasparasya SApena supratIka viBAvasU /
   gajakacchapatāṃ prāptau bhrātaraucaiva saṃyutau // GarP_1,240.18 //	gaja kacCapatAm prAptO BrAtarOca eva saMyutO // GarP_1,240.18 //
   yaducchritau yojanāni jastaddviguṇāyataḥ /	yat ucCritO yojanAni jastat dviguNa AyataH /

   na khādyau tau tvayānīcau caturbhujau ca pakṣipa? /	na KAdyO tO tvayA anIcO catur BujO ca pakzipa? /
   parasparakṛtācchāpadoṣācca parimocitau // GarP_1,240.20 //	paraspara kRtAt SApa dozAt ca parimocitO // GarP_1,240.20 //
   niṣādadeśasvādena devaṃ brūsmāniditam? /	nizAda deSa svAdena devam brUsmA niditam? /
   viṣādīśastato muktastatrāpi brāhmaṇastvayā // GarP_1,240.21 //	vizAt I ISaH tatas muktaH tatra api brAhmaNaH tvayA // GarP_1,240.21 //
   vaṭārohiṇavṛkṣasya yojanānāṃ śatāyutā /	vawArohiNa vRkzasya yojanAnAm Sata ayutA /
   śākhā bhinnā tvayā yatra vālakhilyāḥ samāsthitāḥ // GarP_1,240.22 //	SAKAH BinnA tvayA yatra vAlaKilyAH samAsTitAH // GarP_1,240.22 //
   tvayā yatnakṛtā kṛtvānakhasthau gajakacchapau /	tvayA yatna kRtA kRtvA AnaKa sTO gaja kacCapO /
   nabhaspapinirālaṃbe sarvataḥ parivāritau // GarP_1,240.23 //	naBaspa pinirAlaMbe sarvatas parivAritO // GarP_1,240.23 //
   tvayā jitā raṇe devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ /	tvayA jitAH raNe devAH sarve Sakra purogamAH /
   āhṛtaṃ tatpurā somaṃ vāhniṃ nirvāpya kāśyape // GarP_1,240.24 //	AhRtam tad purA somam vAhnim nirvApya kASyape // GarP_1,240.24 //
   nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā tu vicakṣuṣau /	nAgO dRzwi vizO kRtvA rajasA tu vicakzuzO /
   tīkṣṇāgreṇa na sā bhaṅktvāvikravetau manohataḥ? // GarP_1,240.25 //	tIkzNa agreNa na sA BaFktvA avikravetO manohataH? // GarP_1,240.25 //
   āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītameva na bhaktitaḥ /	AhRtya api tvayA somam nItam eva na BaktitaH /
   tena viṣṇordhvajasthānaṃ vāhanatvaṃ gato hyasi // GarP_1,240.26 //	tena vizNoH Dvaja sTAnam vAhana tvam gataH hi asi // GarP_1,240.26 //
   tvayā niḥ kṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāśca vañcitāḥ /	tvayA niH kzipya darBezu somam nAgAH ca vaQcitAH /
   jahāra cāmṛtaṃ pātraṃ śīghraṃ vai brahmasūdana // GarP_1,240.27 //	jahAra ca amRtam pAtram SIGram vE brahma sUdana // GarP_1,240.27 //
   yatra jihvādvidhābhūtāḥ pannagānāṃ dvijottama /	yatra jihvA dviDA BUtAH pannagAnAm dvijottamaH /
   vinatā mocitā dāsyātkadvā pūrvajitā raṇe // GarP_1,240.28 //	vinatA mocitA dAsyAt kadvA pUrva jitAH raNe // GarP_1,240.28 //
   uccaiḥ śravāḥ sa kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ityeva bhāṣate /	uccEs SravAH sa kiMvarNaH SuklaH iti eva BAzate /
   kṛṣṇavarṇamahaṃ manye pūrvadṛṣṭamuvāca ha // GarP_1,240.29 //	kRzNa varNam aham manye pUrva dRzwam uvAca ha // GarP_1,240.29 //
   tvayā vajrapahāreṇa pakṣamuktaṃ purā svataḥ? /	tvayA vajrapahAreNa pakzamuktam purA svataH? /
   dadhīcavajraśakrāṇāṃ māturarthāya nānyathā // GarP_1,240.30 //	daDIca vajra SakrANAm mAtuH arTAya na anyaTA // GarP_1,240.30 //
   tasya pakṣasya devendro yadānītaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān /	tasya pakzasya deva indraH yat AnItam hi dRzwavAn /
   tadā tava suparṇoti nāma sthānaṃ jagattraye // GarP_1,240.31 //	tadA tava suparNoti nAma sTAnam jagattraye // GarP_1,240.31 //
   dhyānamātrādvinaśyettu viṣaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam /	DyAna mAtrAt vinaSyet tu vizam sTAvara jaFgamam /
   paṭhedvā śṛṇuyādyaśca bhuktiṃ muktimavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.32 //	paWet vA SRNuyAt yaH ca Buktim muktim avApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.32 //
   sūta uvāca /	sUtaH uvAca /
   vasurājo gāruḍaṃ vai śrutvā sarvamavāptavān /	vasurAjaH gAruxam vE SrutvA sarvam avAptavAn /
   garuḍo bhagavānviṣṇudhyāṃyansarvavāptavān // GarP_1,240.33 //	garuxaH BagavAn vizNu DyAMyan sarva vAptavAn // GarP_1,240.33 //
   taduktaṃ gāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ /	tat uktam gAruxam puNyam purANam yaH paWet naraH /
   sarvakāmamavāpyātha prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,240.34 //	sarva kAmam avApya aTa prApnoti paramAm gatim // GarP_1,240.34 //
   ślokapādaṃ paṭhitvā ca sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet /	Sloka pAdam paWitvA ca sarva pApa kzayaH Bavet /
   yasyedaṃ vartate geha tasya sarvaṃ bhavediha // GarP_1,240.35 //	yasya idam vartate geha tasya sarvam Bavet iha // GarP_1,240.35 //
   gāruḍaṃ yasya haste tu tasya hastagato nayaḥ /	gAruxam yasya haste tu tasya hasta gataH nayaH /
   yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādetadbhuktiṃ muktiṃ samāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.36 //	yaH paWet SRNuyAt etat Buktim muktim samApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.36 //
   dharmārthakāmamokṣāṃśca prāpnuyācchravaṇāditaḥ /	Darma arTa kAma mokzAn= ca prApnuyAt SravaNa Aditas /
   putrārtho labhate putrān kāmārtho kāmamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.37 //	putra arTaH laBate putrAn kAma arTaH kAmam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.37 //
   vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ jayārtho labhate jayam /	vidyA arTaH laBate vidyAm jaya arTaH laBate jayam /
   brahmahatyādinā pāpī pāpaśuddhimavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.38 //	brahmahatyA AdinA pApI pApa SudDim avApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.38 //
   vandhyāpi labhate puttraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim /	vanDyA api laBate puttram kanyA vindati sat patim /
   kṣemārtho labhate kṣemaṃ bogārtho bogamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.39 //	kzema arTaH laBate kzemam boga arTaH bogam ApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.39 //
   maṅgalārtho maṅgalāni guṇārtho guṇamāpnuyāt /	maFgala arTaH maFgalAni guNa arTaH guNam ApnuyAt /
   kāvyārtho ca kavitvaṃ ca sārārtho sāramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.40 //	kAvya arTaH ca kavi tvam ca sAra arTaH sAram ApnuyAt // GarP_1,240.40 //
   jñānārtho labhate jñānaṃ sarvasaṃsāramardanam /	jQAna arTaH laBate jQAnam sarva saMsAra mardanam /
   idaṃ svastyayanaṃ dhanyaṃ gāruḍaṃ garuḍeritam // GarP_1,240.41 //	idam svastyayanam Danyam gAruxam garuxa Iritam // GarP_1,240.41 //
   nākāle maraṇaṃ tasya ślokamekaṃ tu yaḥ paṭhet /	na akAle maraNam tasya Slokam ekam tu yaH paWet /
   ślokārdhapaṭhanādasya duṣṭaśatrukṣayo dhruvam // GarP_1,240.42 //	Sloka arDa paWanAt asya duzwa Satru kzayaH Druvam // GarP_1,240.42 //
   sūtācchrutvā śaunakastunaumiṣe munibhiḥ kratau /	sUtAt SrutvA SOnakaH tunOmize muniBiH kratO /
   ahaṃ braheti saṃdhyāyanmuktobhūdgaruḍadhvajāt // GarP_1,240.43 //	aham braha iti saMDyAyat muktaH BUt garuxa DvajAt // GarP_1,240.43 //
   oṃ	om
   iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe	iti SrI gAruxe mahApurANe pUrva KaNxe praTama aMSe AcAra kANxe
   garuḍapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ	garuxapurANamAhAtmyam nAma catvAriMSaduttara dviSatatamaH aDyAyaH
   śubhaṃ bhūyāt /	SuBam BUyAt /
   iti śrīgāruḍe prathamāṃśa ācārakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ /	iti SrI gAruxe praTama aMSaH AcAra kANxaH samAptaH /
